2_33_2_Ngiyakuthuma ingelosi phambi kwakho, ngiwaxoshe amaKhanani, nama-Amori, namaHeti, namaPherizi, namaHivi, namaJebusi, 
2_33_3_uye ezweni elichichima ubisi nezinyosi. Angiyikukhuphuka ngiphakathi kwenu, lokhu ningabantu abantamo ilukhuni, funa nginiqede endleleni.” 
2_33_4_Abantu beyizwa le ndaba embi badabuka, akwabakho muntu owafaka izivunulo zakhe. 
2_33_5_UJehova wayesethi kuMose: “Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Ningabantu abantamo ilukhuni; uma ngikhuphuka ngiphakathi kwenu nangokuphazima kweso nje, ngizakuniqeda. Ngalokho khumulani manje izivunulo zenu, ukuze ngazi ukuthi ngiyakwenzani kini.’ ” 
2_33_6_Abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bazihlubula izivunulo zabo, kusukela entabeni yaseHorebe. 
2_33_7_UMose wayevama ukulithatha itende, walimisa ngaphandle kwekamu, libe kude nekamu, walibiza ngokuthi itende lokuhlangana. Kwathi bonke abamfunayo uJehova baphuma, baya etendeni lokuhlangana elalingaphandle kwekamu. 
2_33_8_Kwathi uMose ephuma eya etendeni, bonke abantu basukuma bema, kwaba yilowo nalowo ngasemnyango wetende lakhe, bambuka uMose waze wangena etendeni. 
2_33_9_Kwathi uMose engena etendeni, insika yefu yehla, yema ngasemnyango wetende; uJehova wakhuluma noMose. 
2_33_10_Bonke abantu bayibona insika yefu imi ngasemnyango wetende; bonke abantu basukuma, bakhuleka, kwaba yilowo nalowo ngasemnyango wetende lakhe. 
2_33_11_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose ubuso nobuso, njengalokhu umuntu ekhuluma nomhlobo wakhe. Wabuyela ekamu, kepha inceku yakhe uJoshuwa indodana kaNuni, insizwa, ayiphumanga etendeni. 
2_33_12_UMose wathi kuJehova: “Bheka, uthi kimi: ‘Khuphula laba bantu,’ kepha awungazisanga yena oyakumthuma nami. Nokho ushilo ukuthi: ‘Ngiyakwazi ngegama, ufumene umusa emehlweni ami.’ 
2_33_13_Ngalokho uma ngifumene umusa emehlweni akho, ake ungibonise izindlela zakho ukuba ngikwazi, ukuze ngifumane umusa emehlweni akho, ubhekisise ukuthi lesi sizwe singabantu bakho.” 
2_33_14_Wayesethi: “Ngiyakuhamba mina uqobo, ngikuphumuze, na?” 
2_33_15_Wathi kuye: “Uma ungahambi wena uqobo, ungasikhuphuli lapha. 
2_33_16_Ngokuba kuyakwaziwa ngani ukuthi ngifumene umusa emehlweni akho, mina nabantu bakho, na? Akungalokhu yini ukuthi uhamba nathi, ukuze sahlukaniswe, mina nabantu bakho, nabanye abantu abasebusweni bomhlaba na?” 
2_33_17_UJehova wathi kuMose: “Ngiyakwenza nalokho okushiloyo, ngokuba ufumene umusa emehlweni ami; ngiyakwazi ngegama.” 
2_33_18_Wayesethi: “Ake ngibone inkazimulo yakho.” 
2_33_19_Wathi: “Ngiyakudlulisa phambi kwakho ubuhle bami, ngilimemezele igama likaJehova phambi kwakho, ngibe nomusa kuyena engithanda ukuba nomusa kuye, ngibe nesihe kuyena engithanda ukuba nesihe kuye.” 
2_33_20_Wathi: “Awunakubona ubuso bami, ngokuba akukho muntu ongangibona, aphile.” 
2_33_21_UJehova wathi: “Bheka, nansi indawo kimi; uyakuma edwaleni. 
2_33_22_Kuyakuthi isadlula inkazimulo yami, ngiyakukufaka ofantwini lwedwala, ngikumboze ngesandla sami, ngize ngidlule. 
2_33_23_Besengisusa isandla sami, ubone umhlane wami, kepha ubuso bami abuyikubonwa.” 
2_34_1_UJehova wathi kuMose: “Zibazele izibhebhe ezimbili zamatshe njengezokuqala, ngilobe ezibhebheni amazwi ayesezibhebheni zokuqala owazaphulayo. 
2_34_2_Mawube usulungele kusasa, ukhuphukele entabeni yaseSinayi ekuseni, ume khona phambi kwami esiqongweni sentaba. 
2_34_3_Akuyikukhuphuka muntu nawe, kungabonakali muntu entabeni yonke, futhi kungaklabi zimvu nazinkomo ngaphambi kwaleyo ntaba.” 
2_34_4_Wayesebaza izibhebhe ezimbili zamatshe njengezokuqala; uMose wavuka ekuseni kakhulu, wakhuphukela entabeni yaseSinayi, njengalokho uJehova emyalile; waphatha ngesandla sakhe izibhebhe ezimbili zamatshe. 
2_34_5_UJehova wehla ngefu, wema naye lapho, wamemezela igama likaJehova. 
2_34_6_UJehova wadlula phambi kwakhe, wamemeza wathi: “NguJehova! NguJehova! NguNkulunkulu ogcwele isihe, onomusa, ophuza ukuthukuthela, novame ubumnene neqiniso, 
2_34_7_ogcinela abayizinkulungwane umusa, othethelela ububi neziphambeko nezono, ongayikuyekela onecala, ehambela ububi bawoyise kubantwana nakubantwana babantwana, kwabesizukulwane sesithathu nesesine.” 
2_34_8_UMose washesha wakhothamela emhlabathini, wakhuleka. 
2_34_9_Wathi: “Nkosi, uma ngifumene umusa emehlweni akho, iNkosi mayihambe iphakathi kwethu, ngokuba bangabantu abantamo ilukhuni; usithethelele ububi bethu nokona kwethu, usithabathe sibe yifa lakho.” 
2_34_10_Wayesethi: “Bheka, ngiyenza isivumelwano; phambi kwabantu bonke bakho ngiyakuzenza izimangaliso ezingazange zenziwe emhlabeni wonke nakusiphi isizwe; bonke abantu okhona phakathi kwabo bayakuwubona umsebenzi kaJehova, ngokuba kuyesabeka lokhu engikwenza kuwe. 
2_34_11_Qaphela lokhu engikuyala ngakho namuhla: bheka, ngixosha phambi kwakho ama-Amori, namaKhanani, namaHeti, namaPherizi, namaHivi, namaJebusi. 
2_34_12_Xwaya ukuba ungasenzi isivumelwano nabakhileyo ezweni oya kulo, funa babe lugibe kuwe. 
2_34_13_Kepha niyakuwadiliza ama-altare abo, niziphahlaze izinsika zabo, nibagawule o-Ashera babo, 
2_34_14_ngokuba awuyikukhonza omunye unkulunkulu, lokhu uJehova, igama lakhe linguMhawu, unguNkulunkulu onomhawu, 
2_34_15_funa wenze isivumelwano nabakhileyo ezweni, baye baphinge nawonkulunkulu babo, bahlabele onkulunkulu babo, omunye akumeme, udle umhlatshelo wakhe, 
2_34_16_uthathele amadodana akho amadodakazi abo, amadodakazi abo aye aphinge nawonkulunkulu babo, enze ukuba amadodana akho aye aphinge nawonkulunkulu babo. 
2_34_17_“Awuyikuzenzela onkulunkulu ababunjiweyo. 
2_34_18_“Umkhosi wesinkwa esingenamvubelo wowugcina. Uyakudla isinkwa esingenamvubelo izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, njengalokho ngakuyala, ngesikhathi esinqunyiweyo senyanga ka-Abibi, ngokuba ngenyanga ka-Abibi waphuma eGibithe. 
2_34_19_“Konke okuvula isizalo kungokwami, nawo onke amaduna ezinkomo zakho, amazibulo ezinkomo nawezimvu. 
2_34_20_Kepha izibulo lembongolo wolihlenga ngewundlu; uma ungalihlengi, ulaphule intamo. Amazibulo onke amadodana akho wowahlenga, kungabonakali muntu phambi kwami engaphethe lutho. 
2_34_21_“Wosebenza izinsuku eziyisithupha, uphumule ngosuku lwesikhombisa; uyakuphumula ngesikhathi sokulima nangokuvuna. 
2_34_22_“Uyakugcina umkhosi wamasonto, owolibo lukakolweni ovuniweyo, nomkhosi wokuvuna ngasekupheleni komnyaka. 
2_34_23_Kathathu ngomnyaka abesilisa bakho bonke bayakubonakala phambi kweNkosi uJehova, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli. 
2_34_24_Ngokuba ngiyakuxosha izizwe phambi kwakho, ngandise imikhawulo yakho; akuyikubakho muntu olifisa izwe lakho, nxa ukhuphuka uya ukubonakala phambi kukaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho kathathu ngomnyaka. 
2_34_25_“Awuyikunikela ngegazi lomhlatshelo womkhosi wephasika kuze kuse. 
2_34_26_“Izandulela zolibo lwezwe lakho woziyisa endlini kaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho. Awuyikupheka izinyane lembuzi obisini lukanina.” 
2_34_27_UJehova wathi kuMose: “Zilobele lawa mazwi, ngokuba ngokwalawa mazwi ngenzile isivumelwano nawe nabakwa-Israyeli.” 
2_34_28_Wayelapho noJehova izinsuku ezingamashumi amane nobusuku obungamashumi amane, kadlanga lutho, kaphuzanga manzi. Waloba ezibhebheni amazwi esivumelwano, imiyalelo eyishumi. 
2_34_29_Kwathi uMose esehla entabeni yaseSinayi, izibhebhe zombili zobufakazi zisesandleni sikaMose esehla entabeni, uMose wayengazi ukuthi isikhumba sobuso bakhe sasikhazimula ngenxa yokukhuluma kwakhe naye. 
2_34_30_Bathi u-Aroni nabo bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bembona uMose, bheka, isikhumba sobuso bakhe sasikhazimula, besaba ukusondela kuye. 
2_34_31_UMose wayesebabiza; u-Aroni nazo zonke izinduna zenhlangano babuyela-ke kuye; uMose wayesekhuluma kubo. 
2_34_32_Ngasemuva bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli basondela, wabayala ngakho konke uJehova akukhulume kuye entabeni yaseSinayi. 
2_34_33_UMose eseqedile ukukhuluma nabo, wafaka iveli ebusweni bakhe. 
2_34_34_Kepha uMose esezakungena phambi kukaJehova ukukhuluma naye, walikhumula iveli waze waphuma; waphuma, wakhuluma kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli lokho akuyalelweyo. 
2_34_35_Abantwana bakwa-Israyeli babubona ubuso bukaMose ukuthi isikhumba sobuso bukaMose sasikhazimula; uMose wayesebuye walifaka iveli ebusweni bakhe waze wangena ukuyokhuluma naye. 
2_35_1_UMose wabutha yonke inhlangano yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, wathi kuyo: “Yilawa mazwi awayalile uJehova ukuba niwenze. 
2_35_2_Izinsuku eziyisithupha kosetshenzwa umsebenzi, kepha ngosuku lwesikhombisa kuyakuba kini usuku olungcwele, lube yisabatha lokuphumula likaJehova; bonke abenza umsebenzi ngalo bayakubulawa. 
2_35_3_Aniyikubasa mlilo ezindlini zenu ngosuku lwesabatha.” 
2_35_4_UMose wakhuluma kuyo yonke inhlangano yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, wathi: “Yile nto ayale ngayo uJehova, ethi: 
2_35_5_Thabathani phakathi kwenu umnikelo ube ngokaJehova; bonke abanenhliziyo ethandayo mabawulethe, ube ngumnikelo kaJehova: igolide, nesiliva, nethusi, 
2_35_6_nokuluhlaza nokububende nokubomvu, nelineni elicolekileyo, noboya bezimbuzi, 
2_35_7_nezikhumba ezibomvu zezinqama, nezikhumba zamatahasi, nomuthi womtholo, 
2_35_8_namafutha okukhanyisa, namakha amafutha okugcoba nawempepho ethaphukayo, 
2_35_9_namatshe amashohamu, namatshe okufakwa, abe ngawengubo yamahlombe nawesihlangu sesifuba. 
2_35_10_“Bonke abahlakaniphile ngenhliziyo mabeze, bakwenze konke uJehova akuyalileyo: 
2_35_11_itabernakele, netende lalo, nesifulelo salo, nezinkibaniso zalo, namapulangwe alo, nemishayo yalo, nezinsika zalo, nezinyawo zalo; 
2_35_12_umphongolo nezinti zawo, nesihlalo somusa, nesihenqo seveli; 
2_35_13_itafula nezinti zalo nezitsha zonke zalo, nezinkwa zokubukwa; 
2_35_14_nothi lwezibani lokukhanyisa, nezitsha zalo nezibani zalo, namafutha okukhanyisa; 
2_35_15_ne-altare lempepho nezinti zalo, namafutha okugcoba, nempepho ethaphukayo, neveli lomnyango ngasemnyango wetabernakele; 
2_35_16_i-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa nehele lalo lethusi, nezinti zalo, nezitsha zonke zalo, nomcengezi nesinqe sawo, 
2_35_17_nezilenge zegceke, nezinsika zalo, nezinyawo zazo, neveli lesango legceke, 
2_35_18_nezikhonkwane zetabernakele, nezikhonkwane zegceke, nezintambo zazo, 
2_35_19_nezambatho ezifekethisiweyo zokukhonza endaweni engcwele, nezambatho ezingcwele zika-Aroni umpristi, nezambatho zamadodana akhe zokukhonza esikhundleni sobupristi.” 
2_35_20_Yayisisuka yonke inhlangano yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli ebusweni bukaMose. 
2_35_21_Bafika, kwaba yilowo nalowo owavuswa yinhliziyo yakhe nowaqhutshwa ngumoya wakhe, baletha umnikelo kaJehova ube ngowomsebenzi wetende lokuhlangana, nowenkonzo yonke yalo, nowezambatho ezingcwele. 
2_35_22_Beza abesilisa nabesifazane, bonke abaqhutshwa yizinhliziyo zabo, baletha iziqhobosho namacici nezindandatho namasongo, izinto zonke zegolide, bonke ababenokunikela ngomnikelo wegolide kuJehova. 
2_35_23_Bonke okwafunyanwa kubo okuluhlaza nokububende nokubomvu, nelineni elicolekileyo, noboya bezimbuzi, nezikhumba ezibomvu zezinqama, nezikhumba zamatahasi, bakuletha. 
2_35_24_Bonke abanikela ngomnikelo wesiliva nowethusi baletha umnikelo kuJehova, nabo bonke okwafunyanwa kubo umuthi womtholo womsebenzi wenkonzo bawuletha. 
2_35_25_Bonke abesifazane abahlakaniphile ngenhliziyo baphotha ngezandla zabo, baletha okuphothiweyo, okuluhlaza nokububende nokubomvu, nelineni elicolekileyo. 
2_35_26_Bonke abesifazane abavuselwa yizinhliziyo zabo ukuhlakanipha baphotha uboya bezimbuzi. 
2_35_27_Izinduna zaletha amatshe amashohamu namatshe okufakwa, awengubo yamahlombe nawesihlangu sesifuba, 
2_35_28_namakha, namafutha okukhanyisa nawokugcoba nawempepho ethaphukayo. 
2_35_29_Abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bawuletha umnikelo wesihle kuJehova, bonke abesilisa nabesifazane, abanhliziyo yabo ibavusele ukulethela yonke imisebenzi ayale ngayo uJehova ukuba yenziwe ngesandla sikaMose. 
2_35_30_UMose wathi kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli: “Bhekani, uJehova ubize ngegama uBesaleli indodana ka-Uri kaHure, owesizwe sakwaJuda; 
2_35_31_umgcwalisile ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu, ngokuhlakanipha nangokuqonda nangokwazi nangamandla emisebenzini yonke 
2_35_32_ukuba aqambe imisebenzi yobungcweti, asebenze ngegolide, nangesiliva, nangethusi, 
2_35_33_nangokuqopha amatshe okufakwa, nangokuqopha imithi, ukuba asebenze yonke imisebenzi yobungcweti. 
2_35_34_Ubeke enhliziyweni yakhe ukuba afundise, yena no-Oholiyabe indodana ka-Ahisamaki, owesizwe sakwaDani. 
2_35_35_Laba ubagcwalisile ngokuhlakanipha kwenhliziyo ukuba basebenze yonke imisebenzi, eyomqophi neyengcweti neyomfekethisi, ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo, neyomaluki, neyabasebenza namuphi umsebenzi, nabaqamba imisebenzi yobungcweti. 
2_36_1_“OBesaleli no-Oholiyabe bayakusebenza nabo bonke abahlakaniphile ngenhliziyo, uJehova abeke kubo ukuhlakanipha nokuqonda ukuba bazi ukwenza yonke imisebenzi yenkonzo yendlu engcwele njengakho konke uJehova akuyalileyo.” 
2_36_2_UMose wababiza oBesaleli no-Oholiyabe nabo bonke abahlakaniphile ngenhliziyo, uJehova abeke ukuhlakanipha ezinhliziyweni zabo, bonke abavuswa yizinhliziyo zabo ukuza emsebenzini ukuba bawenze. 
2_36_3_Bawamukela kuMose wonke umnikelo, abantwana bakwa-Israyeli ababewulethele umsebenzi wenkonzo yendlu engcwele ukuba wenziwe ngawo. Kepha babesaletha kuye njalo imihla ngemihla ekuseni iminikelo yesihle. 
2_36_4_Bonke abahlakaniphileyo ababeyisebenza yonke imisebenzi yendlu engcwele beza, kwaba yilowo nalowo wavela emsebenzini wakhe owawusebenzayo, 
2_36_5_bathi kuMose: “Abantu baletha okuningi kakhulu kunokwanele inkonzo yomsebenzi ayalile ngawo uJehova ukuba wenziwe.” 
2_36_6_UMose wayeseyala, kwamenyezelwa ekamu, kwathiwa: “Makungabe kusasetshenzwa ngowesilisa nangowesifazane omunye umsebenzi womnikelo wendlu engcwele.” Base bevinjelwa abantu ukuletha. 
2_36_7_Okwase kwenziwe kwakwanele wonke umsebenzi obuyakwenziwa, futhi kwasala. 
2_36_8_Bonke abahlakaniphile ngenhliziyo phakathi kwabo abasebenza umsebenzi benza itabernakele ngezilenge eziyishumi, bazenza ngelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo, nangokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, zinamakherubi, umsebenzi wengcweti. 
2_36_9_Ubude besilenge babuyizingalo ezingamashumi amabili nesishiyagalombili, nobubanzi besilenge babuyizingalo ezine; zonke izilenge zazinesilinganiso sinye. 
2_36_10_Wahlanganisa izilenge eziyisihlanu esinye nesinye; wazihlanganisa nezinye izilenge eziyisihlanu esinye nesinye. 
2_36_11_Wazenza izihibe eziluhlaza eceleni lesinye isilenge emphethweni ngasekuhlanganeni; wenze njalo naseceleni lesilenge sokugcina ngasekuhlanganeni kwesibili. 
2_36_12_Wazenza izihibe ezingamashumi ayisihlanu kwesinye isilenge; wazenza izihibe ezingamashumi ayisihlanu eceleni lesilenge esisekuhlanganeni kwesibili; izihibe zazibhekana. 
2_36_13_Wazenza izinkibaniso ezingamashumi ayisihlanu zegolide, wazihlanganisa izilenge esinye nesinye ngezinkibaniso, kwaba yitabernakele linye. 
2_36_14_Wazenza izilenge ngoboya bezimbuzi, zibe yitende phezu kwetabernakele; wazenza izilenge eziyishumi nanye. 
2_36_15_Ubude besilenge babuyizingalo ezingamashumi amathathu, nobubanzi bezilenge babuyizingalo ezine; izilenge eziyishumi nanye zazinesilinganiso sinye. 
2_36_16_Wahlanganisa izilenge eziyisihlanu zodwa, nezilenge eziyisithupha zodwa. 
2_36_17_Wazenza izihibe ezingamashumi ayisihlanu eceleni lesilenge sokugcina ekuhlanganeni, wazenza izihibe ezingamashumi ayisihlanu eceleni lesilenge ekuhlanganeni kwesibili. 
2_36_18_Wazenza izinkibaniso ezingamashumi ayisihlanu zethusi zokuhlanganisa itende libe linye. 
2_36_19_Wasenza isifulelo setende ngezikhumba ezibomvu zezinqama, nesifulelo ngezikhumba zamatahasi phezulu. 
2_36_20_Wawenza amapulangwe amiyo etabernakele ngomuthi womtholo. 
2_36_21_Ubude bepulangwe babuyizingalo eziyishumi, nobubanzi bepulangwe babuyingalo nenxenye. 
2_36_22_Yilelo nalelo pulangwe lalinemisuka emibili, omunye malungana nomunye; wenze njalo kuwo onke amapulangwe etabernakele. 
2_36_23_Wawenza amapulangwe etabernakele, amapulangwe angamashumi amabili ohlangothi lwaseningizimu olubheka ngaseningizimu. 
2_36_24_Wazenza izinyawo ezingamashumi amane zesiliva phansi kwamapulangwe angamashumi amabili, izinyawo ezimbili phansi kwepulangwe linye, ezemisuka yalo emibili, nezinyawo ezimbili phansi kwelinye ipulangwe, ezemisuka yalo emibili. 
2_36_25_Uhlangothi lwesibili lwetabernakele ngasohlangothini lwasenyakatho walwenzela amapulangwe angamashumi amabili, 
2_36_26_nezinyawo zawo ezingamashumi amane zesiliva, izinyawo ezimbili phansi kwepulangwe linye nezinyawo ezimbili phansi kwelinye ipulangwe. 
2_36_27_Uhlangothi lwetabernakele olungasemuva ngasentshonalanga walwenzela amapulangwe ayisithupha. 
2_36_28_Amapulangwe amabili wawenzela amagumbi etabernakele angasemuva. 
2_36_29_Ayemabili phansi, kanjalo aphelela aze afika phezulu esongweni lokuqala; wenze njalo kuwo omabili emagumbini omabili. 
2_36_30_Kwakungamapulangwe ayisishiyagalombili nezinyawo zawo zesiliva, izinyawo eziyishumi nesithupha, izinyawo ezimbili phansi kwalelo nalelo pulangwe. 
2_36_31_Wayenza imishayo ngomuthi womtholo, yaba ngeyisihlanu yamapulangwe olunye uhlangothi lwetabernakele, 
2_36_32_nemishayo eyisihlanu yamapulangwe olunye uhlangothi lwetabernakele, nemishayo eyisihlanu yamapulangwe etabernakele ohlangothini olungasemuva ngasentshonalanga. 
2_36_33_Wawenza umshayo waphakathi ukuba udabule phakathi kwamapulangwe, kusukela ekugcineni ngalapha kuze kufike ekugcineni ngalapha. 
2_36_34_Wanameka amapulangwe ngegolide, wawenza amasongo awo ngegolide, abe yizindawo zezinti; wanameka nezinti ngegolide. 
2_36_35_Wasenza isihenqo ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo, wasenza saba namakherubi, umsebenzi wengcweti. 
2_36_36_Wasenzela izinsika ezine zomtholo, wazinameka ngegolide; izingwegwe zazo zaziyigolide; wazikhandela izinyawo ezine zesiliva. 
2_36_37_Walenza iveli lomnyango wetende ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo, umsebenzi womfekethisi, 
2_36_38_nezinsika zalo eziyisihlanu nezingwegwe zazo; wanameka izihloko zazo nezibopho zazo ngegolide; izinyawo zazo eziyisihlanu zaziyithusi. 
2_37_1_UBesaleli wawenza umphongolo ngomuthi womtholo; ubude bawo babuyizingalo ezimbili nenxenye, ububanzi bawo babuyingalo nenxenye, nokuphakama kwawo kwakuyingalo nenxenye. 
2_37_2_Wawunameka ngegolide elicwengekileyo ngaphakathi nangaphandle, wawenzela udini lwegolide nxazonke. 
2_37_3_Wawukhandela amasongo amane egolide ezinyaweni zawo zozine, amasongo amabili kolunye uhlangothi lwawo, namasongo amabili kolunye uhlangothi lwawo. 
2_37_4_Wazenza izinti zomuthi womtholo, wazinameka ngegolide. 
2_37_5_Wazifaka izinti emasongweni asezinhlangothini zomphongolo ukuba umphongolo uthwalwe ngazo. 
2_37_6_Wasenza isihlalo somusa ngegolide elicwengekileyo; ubude baso babuyizingalo ezimbili nenxenye, nobubanzi baso babuyingalo nenxenye. 
2_37_7_Wawenza amakherubi amabili ngegolide, wawenza ngomsebenzi okhandiweyo ekugcineni kwesihlalo somusa nxazombili, 
2_37_8_elinye ikherubi ekugcineni ngalapha nelinye ikherubi ekugcineni ngalapha; wawenza amakherubi aba kunye nesihlalo somusa, ekugcineni kwaso ngalapha nangalapha. 
2_37_9_Amakherubi awelula amaphiko awo ngaphezulu, amboza isihlalo somusa ngamaphiko awo, abhekana ngobuso; ubuso bamakherubi babheka isihlalo somusa. 
2_37_10_Walenza itafula ngomuthi womtholo; ubude balo babuyizingalo ezimbili, nobubanzi balo babuyingalo, nokuphakama kwalo kwakuyingalo nenxenye. 
2_37_11_Walinameka ngegolide elicwengekileyo, walenzela udini lwegolide nxazonke. 
2_37_12_Walenzela usiko olulingene nesandla ngobubanzi nxazonke, walwenzela usiko lwalo udini lwegolide nxazonke. 
2_37_13_Walukhandela amasongo amane egolide, wawafaka amasongo emagumbini omane asezinyaweni zalo zozine. 
2_37_14_Amasongo ayengasodinini, izindawo zezinti zokuthwala itafula. 
2_37_15_Wazenza izinti ngomuthi womtholo, wazinameka ngegolide, ukuba itafula lithwalwe ngazo. 
2_37_16_Wayesenza ngegolide elicwengekileyo izitsha ezazisetafuleni, izingqwembe zalo, nezinkezo zalo, nezinkamba zalo, nezindebe zalo zokuthela. 
2_37_17_Walwenza uthi lwezibani ngegolide elicwengekileyo, walwenza uthi lwezibani ngomsebenzi okhandiweyo, isinqe salo nesiqu salo; izimbizana zalo, namasumpa alo, nezimbali zalo kwakukunye nalo. 
2_37_18_Kwakukhona amagatsha ayisithupha aphuma ezinhlangothini zalo, amagatsha amathathu othi lwezibani kolunye uhlangothi lwalo namagatsha amathathu othi lwezibani kolunye uhlangothi lwalo. 
2_37_19_Izimbizana ezintathu zafaniswa nezimbali zemi-alimondi kwelinye igatsha, zinesumpa nembali; izimbizana ezintathu zafaniswa nezimbali zemi-alimondi kwelinye igatsha, zinesumpa nembali; kwakunjalo kuwo onke amagatsha ayisithupha aphuma othini lwezibani. 
2_37_20_Kwakukhona othini lwezibani izimbizana ezine ezifana nezimbali zemi-alimondi, zinamasumpa azo nezimbali zazo, 
2_37_21_isumpa phansi kwamagatsha amabili likunye nalo, nelinye isumpa phansi kwamagatsha amabili likunye nalo, nelinye isumpa phansi kwamagatsha amabili likunye nalo, kuwo onke amagatsha ayisithupha aphuma kulo. 
2_37_22_Amasumpa alo namagatsha alo ayekunye nalo; konke okwalo kwakungumsebenzi munye okhandiweyo wegolide elicwengekileyo. 
2_37_23_Wazenza izibani zalo eziyisikhombisa nezizenze zalo nezitsha zalo zensizi ngegolide elicwengekileyo. 
2_37_24_Walwenza ngetalenta legolide elicwengekileyo, nazo zonke izinto zalo. 
2_37_25_Walenza i-altare lempepho ngomuthi womtholo; ubude balo babuyingalo, nobubanzi balo babuyingalo; laba nezinhlangothi ezine ezilingeneyo; nokuphakama kwalo kwakuyizingalo ezimbili; izimpondo zalo zazikunye nalo. 
2_37_26_Walinameka ngegolide elicwengekileyo ngaphezulu, nezinhlangothi zalo nxazonke, nezimpondo zalo; walenzela udini lwegolide nxazonke. 
2_37_27_Walenzela amasongo amabili egolide phansi kodini lwalo nxazombili, ezinhlangothini zalo zombili, abe yizindawo zezinti zokulithwala. 
2_37_28_Wazenza izinti ngomuthi womtholo, wazinameka ngegolide. 
2_37_29_Wawenza amafutha angcwele okugcoba, nempepho enhle yamakha athaphukayo, ngokobungcweti bomthaki. 
2_38_1_Walenza i-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa ngomuthi womtholo; ubude balo babuyizingalo eziyisihlanu, nobubanzi balo babuyizingalo eziyisihlanu; laba nezinhlangothi ezine ezilingeneyo; nokuphakama kwalo kwakuyizingalo ezintathu. 
2_38_2_Wazenza izimpondo zalo emagumbini alo omane, izimpondo zalo zazikunye nalo; walinameka ngethusi. 
2_38_3_Wazenza zonke izinto ze-altare, amakhanzi, namafosholo, nezitsha, nezimfoloko, nemicengezi yomlilo; wazenza zonke izinto zalo ngethusi. 
2_38_4_Walenzela i-altare ihele lethusi elenziwe njengenetha phansi kosiko oluzungeza i-altare ukuba lifinyelele ngaphakathi kwe-altare ukuya phezulu. 
2_38_5_Wakhanda amasongo amane amagumbi omane ehele lethusi, abe yizindawo zezinti. 
2_38_6_Wazenza izinti ngomuthi womtholo, wazinameka ngethusi. 
2_38_7_Wazifaka izinti emasongweni ezinhlangothini ze-altare ukuba lithwalwe ngazo; walenza ngamapulangwe laba yigobongo. 
2_38_8_Wawenza umcengezi wethusi nesinqe sawo ngethusi lezibuko zabesifazane abahlangana ukuyokhonza ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana. 
2_38_9_Walenza negceke; ngaseningizimu ohlangothini lwaseningizimu izilenge zegceke zaziyilineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo, izingalo eziyikhulu. 
2_38_10_Izinsika zazo zazingamashumi amabili, nezinyawo zazo zazingamashumi amabili zethusi; izingwegwe zezinsika nezibopho zazo zaziyisiliva. 
2_38_11_Ngasohlangothini lwasenyakatho yizingalo eziyikhulu, izinsika zazo zingamashumi amabili, nezinyawo zazo zingamashumi amabili zethusi; izingwegwe zezinsika nemishayo yazo kwakuyisiliva. 
2_38_12_Ngasohlangothini olungasentshonalanga izilenge zaziyizingalo ezingamashumi ayisihlanu, izinsika zazo zaziyishumi, nezinyawo zazo zaziyishumi; izingwegwe zezinsika nemishayo yazo kwakuyisiliva. 
2_38_13_Nangasempumalanga ngasohlangothini olungasempumalanga yizingalo ezingamashumi ayisihlanu. 
2_38_14_Izilenge kwelinye icele lesango zaziyizingalo eziyishumi nanhlanu; izinsika zazo zazintathu, nezinyawo zazo zazintathu. 
2_38_15_Kwaba njalo nakwelinye icele: ngalapha nangalapha kwesango legceke zazikhona izilenge eziyizingalo eziyishumi nanhlanu; izinsika zazo zazintathu, nezinyawo zazo zazintathu. 
2_38_16_Zonke izilenge zegceke nxazonke zazingezelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo. 
2_38_17_Izinyawo zezinsika zaziyithusi, izingwegwe zezinsika nemishayo yazo kwakuyisiliva; izihloko zazo zazinamekwe ngesiliva; zonke izinsika zegceke zazinesibopho sesiliva. 
2_38_18_Iveli lesango legceke lalingumsebenzi womfekethisi ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo; ubude balo babuyizingalo ezingamashumi amabili, nokuphakama ngokobubanzi bezilenge kwakuyizingalo eziyisihlanu ngokulingene nezilenge zegceke. 
2_38_19_Izinsika zalo zazizine, nezinyawo zalo zazizine zethusi; izingwegwe zaziyisiliva, ukunamekwa kwezihloko nokwezibopho kwakuyisiliva. 
2_38_20_Zonke izikhonkwane zetabernakele nezegceke nxasonke zaziyithusi. 
2_38_21_Lokhu kuyimali yetabernakele, itabernakele lobufakazi, njengokubalwa kwayo ngesiyalezo sikaMose, ngokubala kwamaLevi ngesandla sika-Itamari indodana ka-Aroni umpristi. 
2_38_22_UBesaleli indodana ka-Uri kaHure, owesizwe sakwaJuda, wakwenza konke uJehova amyale ngakho uMose. 
2_38_23_Wayeno-Oholiyabe indodana ka-Ahisamaki, owesizwe sakwaDani, umqophi nengcweti nomfekethisi ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo. 
2_38_24_Lonke igolide okwasetshenzwa ngalo, wonke umsebenzi wendlu engcwele, igolide lomnikelo lalingamatalenta angamashumi amabili nesishiyagalolunye namashekeli angamakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi amathathu ngokweshekeli lendlu engcwele. 
2_38_25_Isiliva lababebalwa esizweni lalingamatalenta ayikhulu namashekeli ayinkulungwane namakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi ayisikhombisa nanhlanu ngokweshekeli lendlu engcwele, 
2_38_26_kwaba yilowo nalowo wanikela ngebeka eliyinxenye yeshekeli ngokweshekeli lendlu engcwele kubo bonke abadlulela kwababaliweyo abaneminyaka engamashumi amabili nangaphezulu, abantu abayizinkulungwane ezingamakhulu ayisithupha nantathu namakhulu ayisihlanu namashumi ayisihlanu. 
2_38_27_Amatalenta ayikhulu esiliva ayengawokukhanda izinyawo zendlu engcwele, nezinyawo zesihenqo, izinyawo eziyikhulu ngamatalenta ayikhulu, italenta ngonyawo. 
2_38_28_Ngamashekeli ayinkulungwane namakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi ayisikhombisa nanhlanu wenza izingwegwe zezinsika, wanameka izihloko zazo, wazenzela izibopho. 
2_38_29_Ithusi lomnikelo laba ngamatalenta angamashumi ayisikhombisa namashekeli ayizinkulungwane ezimbili namakhulu amane. 
2_38_30_Wenza ngalo izinyawo zomnyango wetende lokuhlangana, ne-altare lethusi, nehele lalo lethusi, nezinto zonke ze-altare, 
2_38_31_nezinyawo zegceke nxazonke, nezinyawo zesango legceke, nazo zonke izikhonkwane zetabernakele, nazo zonke izikhonkwane zegceke nxazonke. 
2_39_1_Ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu benza izambatho ezenziwe kahle zokukhonza endaweni engcwele; bamenzela u-Aroni izambatho ezingcwele, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_39_2_Wayenza ingubo yamahlombe ngegolide, nangokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo. 
2_39_3_Balikhanda igolide laba ngongcwecwe, balisika izincingwana ukuba zalukwe nokuluhlaza nokububende nokubomvu, nelineni elicolekileyo, umsebenzi wengcweti. 
2_39_4_Bayenzela iziziba zamahlombe ezihlanganisiweyo; yahlanganiswa emaceleni omabili. 
2_39_5_Ibhande elalukiwe kahle elalikuyo ukuyibhinca lalikunye nayo, lifana nokusetshenzwa kwayo, lalingelegolide, lingokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_39_6_Balungisa amatshe amashohamu ezungezwe yizisekelo zegolide, eqoshwe njengendandatho ngamagama amadodana ka-Israyeli. 
2_39_7_Wawabeka ezizibeni zengubo yamahlombe, abe ngamatshe esikhumbuzo sabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_39_8_Wayesesenza isihlangu sesifuba, umsebenzi wengcweti, njengokusetshenzwa kwengubo yamahlombe, ngegolide, nangokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu, nangelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo. 
2_39_9_Sasinezinhlangothi ezine ezilingeneyo; basenza isihlangu sesifuba siphindwe kabili; ubude baso babunjengokudazuluka kweminwe, nobubanzi baso babunjengokudazuluka kweminwe, siphindwe kabili. 
2_39_10_Bafaka kuso izinhla ezine zamatshe; uhla lwesardiyu, netopazi, nerubi lwaba luhla lokuqala; 
2_39_11_uhla lwesibili lwaba yisimaragidu, nesafire, nedayimani; 
2_39_12_uhla lwesithathu lwaba yihiyakinte, ne-agathe, ne-amethiste; 
2_39_13_uhla lwesine lwaba yikrisolithi, neshohamu, nejaspi; ayezungeziwe yizisekelo zegolide lapho zifakwe khona. 
2_39_14_Amatshe ayeyishumi nambili njengamagama amadodana ka-Israyeli, njengamagama abo; njengokuqoshwa kwendandatho yilelo nalelo lalinegama lakhe kuzo izizwe eziyishumi nambili. 
2_39_15_Benza esihlangwini sesifuba amaketanga njengamagoda, umsebenzi othandelweyo wegolide elicwengekileyo. 
2_39_16_Benza izisekelo ezimbili zegolide namasongo amabili egolide; bawafaka amasongo omabili emaceleni omabili esihlangu. 
2_39_17_Base befaka amaketanga omabili egolide athandelweyo emasongweni omabili emaceleni esihlangu sesifuba. 
2_39_18_Ezinye izihloko ezimbili zamaketanga athandelweyo bazifaka ezisekelweni ezimbili, wazibeka ngaphambili ezizibeni zengubo yamahlombe. 
2_39_19_Base bewenza amasongo amabili egolide, bawafaka emaceleni omabili esihlangu sesifuba, eceleni laso elibhekene nengubo yamahlombe ngaphakathi. 
2_39_20_Bawenza amasongo amabili egolide, bawafaka ezizibeni zombili zengubo yamahlombe phansi ngaphambili, eduze nokuhlangana kwayo, phezu kwebhande elifekethisiweyo lengubo yamahlombe. 
2_39_21_Base bebopha isihlangu sesifuba ngamasongo aso emasongweni engubo yamahlombe ngentambo eluhlaza ukuba sibe phezu kwebhande elifekethisiweyo lengubo yamahlombe, ukuze isihlangu sesifuba singakhumuki engutsheni yamahlombe, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_39_22_Walenza ijazi lengubo yamahlombe ngokwalukiweyo, ngokuluhlaza lonke. 
2_39_23_Imbobo yejazi ngaphakathi kwalo yayinjengembobo yebhantshi lensimbi, inomphetho oyizungeza imbobo yalo ukuba lingadatshulwa. 
2_39_24_Benza emiphethweni yejazi amapomegranati ngokuluhlaza nangokububende nangokubomvu okuphothiweyo. 
2_39_25_Bazenza izikhencezo zegolide elicwengekileyo, bazifaka izikhencezo phakathi kwamapomegranati emiphethweni yejazi nxazonke phakathi kwamapomegranati, 
2_39_26_isikhencezo nepomegranati, isikhencezo nepomegranati emiphethweni yejazi nxazonke, ukuba kukhonzwe ngalo, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_39_27_Base bebalukela u-Aroni namadodana akhe amabhantshi elineni elicolekileyo lomsebenzi owalukiweyo, 
2_39_28_nesigqoko selineni elicolekileyo, nezinye izigqoko ezinhle zelineni elicolekileyo, namabhulukwe elineni ngelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo, 
2_39_29_nebhande lelineni elicolekileyo lemicu ephothiweyo nelokuluhlaza nelokububende nelokubomvu, umsebenzi womfeketshisi, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_39_30_Benza ungcwecwe womqhele ongcwele ngegolide elicwengekileyo, babhala kuye umbhalo njengokuqoshwa kwendandatho wokuthi: “Wahlukaniselwe uJehova”. 
2_39_31_Babophela kuye intambo eluhlaza ukuba abekwe phezulu esigqokweni, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_39_32_Njalo-ke kwaqedwa wonke umsebenzi wetabernakele letende lokuhlangana; abantwana benza njengakho konke uJehova amyale ngakho uMose; benze njalo-ke. 
2_39_33_Baliletha itabernakele kuMose, itende nempahla yalo yonke, nezinkibaniso zalo, namapulangwe alo, nemishayo yalo, nezinsika zalo, nezinyawo zalo, 
2_39_34_nesifulelo sezikhumba ezibomvu zezinqama, nesifulelo sezikhumba zamatahasi, nesihenqo seveli, 
2_39_35_nomphongolo wobufakazi, nezinti zawo, nesihlalo somusa; 
2_39_36_itafula nezinto zonke zalo, nezinkwa zokubukwa; 
2_39_37_uthi olucwengekileyo lwezibani nezibani zalo, izibani zihleliwe, nezinto zonke zalo, namafutha okukhanyisa, 
2_39_38_ne-altare legolide, namafutha okugcoba, nempepho ethaphukayo, neveli lomnyango wetende; 
2_39_39_i-altare lethusi, nehele lalo lethusi, nezinti zalo, nezinto zonke zalo, nomcengezi nesinqe sawo; 
2_39_40_izilenge zegceke, nezinsika zalo, nezinyawo zalo, neveli lesango legceke, nezintambo zalo, nezikhonkwane zalo, nempahla yonke yenkonzo yetabernakele, netende lokuhlangana; 
2_39_41_izambatho ezenziwe kahle zokukhonza endaweni engcwele, nezambatho ezingcwele zika-Aroni umpristi, nezambatho zamadodana akhe zokukhonza esikhundleni sobupristi. 
2_39_42_Njengakho konke uJehova amyale ngakho uMose, benze njalo abantwana bakwa-Israyeli wonke umsebenzi. 
2_39_43_UMose wabona wonke umsebenzi; bheka, babewenzile; njengalokho uJehova eyalile, bawenza kanjalo; uMose wababusisa. 
2_40_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
2_40_2_“Ngosuku lokuqala lwenyanga yokuqala wolimisa itabernakele letende lokuhlangana. 
2_40_3_Wofaka khona umphongolo wobufakazi, uwuhenqele umphongolo ngesihenqo. 
2_40_4_Ulingenise itafula, uhlele izinto eziphezu kwalo, ulungenise uthi lwezibani, ubeke izibani zalo. 
2_40_5_Ubeke i-altare legolide lempepho phambi komphongolo wobufakazi, ulengise iveli lomnyango wetabernakele. 
2_40_6_“Ubeke i-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa phambi komnyango wetabernakele letende lokuhlangana. 
2_40_7_Ubeke umcengezi phakathi kwetende lokuhlangana ne-altare, uthele amanzi kuwo. 
2_40_8_Ulungise igceke nxazonke, ulengise iveli lesango legceke. 
2_40_9_“Uthabathe amafutha okugcoba, uligcobe itabernakele nakho konke okukulo, ulingcwelise kanye nempahla yalo yonke, libe ngcwele. 
2_40_10_Ugcobe i-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa nezinto zalo zonke, ulingcwelise i-altare, i-altare libe ngcwelengcwele. 
2_40_11_Ugcobe umcengezi nesinqe sawo, uwungcwelise. 
2_40_12_“Ulethe u-Aroni namadodana akhe emnyango wetende lokuhlangana, ubageze ngamanzi. 
2_40_13_Umembathise u-Aroni izambatho ezingcwele, umgcobe, umngcwelise ukuba angikhonze esikhundleni sobupristi. 
2_40_14_Ulethe amadodana akhe, uwembathise amabhantshi, 
2_40_15_uwagcobe, njengalokho wamgcoba uyise, ukuba bangikhonze esikhundleni sobupristi, ukugcotshwa kwabo kube ngubupristi obuphakade kubo ezizukulwaneni zabo.” 
2_40_16_Wenze njalo uMose; njengakho konke uJehova amyale ngakho, wenze njalo-ke. 
2_40_17_Kwathi enyangeni yokuqala ngomnyaka wesibili, ngolokuqala lwenyanga itabernakele lamiswa. 
2_40_18_UMose walimisa itabernakele, wabeka izinyawo zalo, wamisa amapulangwe alo, wafaka imishayo yalo, wamisa izinsika zalo. 
2_40_19_Weneka itende phezu kwetabernakele, wabeka isifulelo setende phezu kwalo, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_40_20_Wathabatha, wabufaka ubufakazi emphongolweni, wafaka izinti emphongolweni, wabeka isihlalo somusa phezu komphongolo. 
2_40_21_Wangenisa umphongolo etabernakele, wamisa isihenqo seveli, wahenqela umphongolo wobufakazi, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_40_22_Wafaka itafula etendeni lokuhlangana ohlangothini lwetabernakele olungasenyakatho ngaphandle kwesihenqo. 
2_40_23_Wahlela izinkwa phezu kwalo phambi kukaJehova, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_40_24_Walubeka uthi lwezibani etendeni lokuhlangana malungana netafula ohlangothini lwetabernakele olungaseningizimu. 
2_40_25_Wazibeka izibani phambi kukaJehova, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_40_26_Walibeka i-altare legolide etendeni lokuhlangana ngaphambi kwesihenqo. 
2_40_27_Washisa lapho impepho yamakha athaphukayo, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_40_28_Walengisa iveli lomnyango wetabernakele. 
2_40_29_Wabeka i-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa ngasemnyango wetabernakele letende lokuhlangana, wanikela kulo ngomnikelo wokushiswa nangomnikelo wempuphu, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_40_30_Wabeka umcengezi phakathi kwetende lokuhlangana ne-altare, wathela kuwo amanzi okugeza. 
2_40_31_OMose no-Aroni namadodana akhe bahlambela kuwo izandla zabo nezinyawo zabo. 
2_40_32_Nxa bengena etendeni lokuhlangana nanxa besondela e-altare, bageza njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
2_40_33_Walungisa igceke lizungeza itabernakele ne-altare, walengisa iveli lesango legceke; kanjalo-ke uMose wawuqeda umsebenzi. 
2_40_34_Ifu lase lisibekela itende lokuhlangana, nenkazimulo kaJehova yagcwalisa itabernakele. 
2_40_35_UMose wayengenakungena etendeni lokuhlangana, ngokuba ifu lahlala phezu kwalo, nenkazimulo kaJehova yagcwalisa itabernakele. 
2_40_36_Njalo lapho ifu lenyuswa etabernakele, abantwana bakwa-Israyeli baqhubekela phambili ezinkambeni zabo zonke. 
2_40_37_Kepha uma ifu lingenyuswanga, babengaqhubeki kwaze kwafika usuku lokwenyuswa kwalo. 
2_40_38_Ngokuba ifu likaJehova laliphezu kwetabernakele emini, nomlilo wawukulo ebusuku emehlweni ayo yonke indlu yakwa-Israyeli ezinkambeni zabo zonke. 
3_1_1_UJehova esetendeni lokuhlangana wambiza uMose, wakhuluma kuye, wathi: 
3_1_2_“Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi kubo: ‘Nxa umuntu wakini eletha umnikelo kuJehova, anonikela ngomnikelo wenu wezinkomo zemihlambi nowezimvu. 
3_1_3_“ ‘Uma umnikelo wakhe ungumnikelo wokushiswa wemihlambi, uyakunikela ngeduna elingenasici, anikele ngalo ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, aze amukeleke kuJehova. 
3_1_4_Uyakubeka isandla sakhe enhloko yomnikelo wokushiswa; uyakwamukelwa ngenxa yakhe, umenzele ukubuyisana. 
3_1_5_Wolihlaba iduna phambi kukaJehova, amadodana ka-Aroni, abapristi, alethe igazi, afafaze ngegazi nxazonke ze-altare elingasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana. 
3_1_6_Uyakuhlinza umnikelo wokushiswa, awuhlahlele izitho. 
3_1_7_Amadodana ka-Aroni umpristi abeke umlilo e-altare, ahlele izinkuni phezu komlilo; 
3_1_8_amadodana ka-Aroni, abapristi, ahlele izitho, nenhloko, namanoni, phezu kwezinkuni ezisemlilweni ophezu kwe-altare, 
3_1_9_ahlanze izibilini zalo namanqina alo ngamanzi, umpristi akushise konke e-altare, kube ngumnikelo wokushiswa, umnikelo womlilo, ube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova. 
3_1_10_“ ‘Uma umnikelo wakhe ungowemihlambi, owasezimvini noma owasezimbuzini, ube ngumnikelo wokushiswa, wonikela ngeduna elingenasici. 
3_1_11_Alihlabe ngasohlangothini lwe-altare olungasenyakatho phambi kukaJehova; amadodana ka-Aroni, abapristi, afafaze i-altare ngegazi lalo nxazonke. 
3_1_12_Alihlahlele izitho nenhloko yalo namanoni alo, umpristi akuhlele phezu kwezinkuni ezisemlilweni ophezu kwe-altare, 
3_1_13_ahlanze izibilini zalo namanqina alo ngamanzi, umpristi anikele ngakho konke, akushise e-altare kube ngumnikelo wokushiswa, umnikelo womlilo, ube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova. 
3_1_14_“ ‘Uma umnikelo wakhe kuJehova ungumnikelo wokushiswa kwezinyoni, wonikela ngomnikelo wamahobhe noma ngowamaphuphu amajuba. 
3_1_15_Umpristi awulethe e-altare, awushumpule inhloko, awushise e-altare, igazi lawo likhanyelwe ngasohlangothini lwe-altare, 
3_1_16_asuse ingila nezimpaphe, akulahle ngaseceleni kwe-altare ngasempumalanga endaweni yomlotha, 
3_1_17_awuqaqe ngamaphiko awo, angawudabuli kodwa; umpristi awushise e-altare phezu kwezinkuni ezisemlilweni, ube ngumnikelo wokushiswa, umnikelo womlilo, ube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova. 
3_2_1_“ ‘Nxa umuntu enikela ngomnikelo wempuphu kuJehova, umnikelo woba yimpuphu ecolekileyo, athele amafutha kuwo, abeke inhlaka kuwo, 
3_2_2_awulethe kumadodana ka-Aroni, abapristi, acaphune kuwo ngokhweshe wempuphu ecolekileyo yawo nowamafutha awo, kanye nayo yonke inhlaka yawo, umpristi awushise ube yisikhumbuzo sawo e-altare, umnikelo womlilo, ube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova; 
3_2_3_okuseleyo komnikelo wempuphu kuyakuba ngokuka-Aroni nokwamadodana akhe; kungcwelengcwele eminikelweni yomlilo kaJehova. 
3_2_4_“ ‘Nxa uletha umnikelo wempuphu ephekwe eziko, woba ngamaqebelengwane angenamvubelo empuphu ecolekileyo exovwe namafutha, noma imiqathane engenamvubelo, egcotshwe ngamafutha. 
3_2_5_Uma umnikelo wakho ungumnikelo wempuphu ephekwe ngomqengele, woba ngowempuphu ecolekileyo engenamvubelo, exovwe ngamafutha. 
3_2_6_Uwuhlephule izingcezu, uthele amafutha kuzo; kungumnikelo wempuphu. 
3_2_7_Uma umnikelo wakho ungumnikelo wempuphu ephekwe ngokhamba, uyakwenziwa ngempuphu ecolekileyo kanye namafutha. 
3_2_8_Woletha kuJehova umnikelo wempuphu owenziwe ngalezo zinto, unikelwe kumpristi, yena awuyise e-altare. 
3_2_9_Umpristi makathabathe okuyisikhumbuzo kuwo umnikelo wempuphu, akushise e-altare kube ngumnikelo womlilo, kube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova. 
3_2_10_Okuseleyo komnikelo wempuphu kuyakuba ngokuka-Aroni nokwamadodana akhe; kungcwelengcwele eminikelweni yomlilo kaJehova. 
3_2_11_“ ‘Awuyikwenziwa ngemvubelo umnikelo wempuphu eninikela ngawo kuJehova, ngokuba aniyikushisa imvubelo nazinyosi kube ngumnikelo womlilo kuJehova. 
3_2_12_Anonikela ngakho kube ngumnikelo wolibo; kungenyukeli e-altare nokho, kube yiphunga elimnandi. 
3_2_13_Yonke iminikelo yakho yempuphu iyoliswe ngosawoti; ungavumeli ukuba usawoti wesivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu wakho asilale emnikelweni wakho wempuphu; wonikela ngayo yonke iminikelo yakho inosawoti. 
3_2_14_“ ‘Uma unikela ngomnikelo wempuphu wolibo kuJehova, wonikela ngezikhwebu zamabele ezosiwe ngomlilo, amabele agquliweyo ezikhwebu ezintsha, ube ngumnikelo wempuphu wolibo lwakho, 
3_2_15_uthele amafutha kuwo, ubeke inhlaka phezu kwawo; kungumnikelo wempuphu. 
3_2_16_Umpristi ashise okuyisikhumbuzo sawo, inxenye yamabele agquliweyo awo nenxenye yamafutha awo kanye nayo yonke inhlaka yawo; kungumnikelo womlilo kuJehova. 
3_3_1_“ ‘Uma umnikelo wakhe ungumhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula, enikela ngowemihlambi, noma iduna noma insikazi, wonikela ngawo phambi kukaJehova ungenasici. 
3_3_2_Uyakubeka isandla sakhe enhloko yomnikelo wakhe, awuhlabe ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, amadodana ka-Aroni, abapristi, afafaze i-altare nxazonke ngegazi. 
3_3_3_Wothabatha kuwo umhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula, anikele ngomnikelo womlilo kuJehova, umhlehlo osibekela izibilini nawo onke amanoni aphezu kwezibilini, 
3_3_4_nezinso zombili namanoni akuzo angasezinkalweni, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, ewasusa ngasezinsweni. 
3_3_5_Amadodana ka-Aroni ayakukushisa e-altare phezu komnikelo wokushiswa ophezu kwezinkuni ezisemlilweni, kube ngumnikelo womlilo, kube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova. 
3_3_6_“ ‘Uma umnikelo wakhe nomhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula kuJehova ungowezimvu, noma iduna noma insikazi, wonikela ngawo ungenasici. 
3_3_7_Uma enikela ngemvu, ibe ngumnikelo wakhe, wonikela ngayo phambi kukaJehova, 
3_3_8_abeke isandla sakhe enhloko yomnikelo wakhe, awuhlabe ngaphambi kwetende lokuhlangana, amadodana ka-Aroni afafaze i-altare nxazonke ngegazi lawo. 
3_3_9_Wothabatha kuwo umhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula, anikele ngomnikelo womlilo kuJehova amanoni awo, nomsila wonke ononileyo, awunqume eduze nomhlandla, namanoni asibekela izibilini, nawo onke amanoni aphezu kwezibilini, 
3_3_10_nezinso zombili namanoni akuzo angasezinkalweni, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, ewasusa ngasezinsweni. 
3_3_11_Umpristi uyakukushisa e-altare; kungukudla komnikelo womlilo kuJehova. 
3_3_12_“ ‘Uma umnikelo wakhe uyimbuzi, wonikela ngayo phambi kukaJehova, 
3_3_13_abeke isandla sakhe enhloko yayo, ayihlabe ngaphambi kwetende lokuhlangana, amadodana ka-Aroni afafaze i-altare nxazonke ngegazi layo. 
3_3_14_Abesethabatha kuyo, anikele ngomnikelo wakhe ube ngumnikelo womlilo kuJehova, amanoni asibekela izibilini nawo onke amanoni aphezu kwezibilini, 
3_3_15_nezinso zombili namanoni akuzo angasezinkalweni, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, ewasusa ngasezinsweni. 
3_3_16_Umpristi uyakukushisa e-altare; kungukudla komnikelo womlilo, kube yiphunga elimnandi; onke amanoni angakaJehova. 
3_3_17_“ ‘Kuyakuba yisimiso esiphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu ezindlini zenu zonke zokuba ningadli amanoni nagazi.’ ” 
3_4_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_4_2_“Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Uma umuntu ona kungengamabomu kuyo imiyalo uJehova ayale ngayo ukuthi akunakwenziwa akwenze noma yikuphi, 
3_4_3_uma kungumpristi ogcotshiweyo owone kanjalo, aze ehlisele abantu icala, wonikela kuJehova ngesono sakhe one ngaso iduna elingenasici, kube ngumnikelo wesono, 
3_4_4_ayiyise inkunzi ebusweni bukaJehova ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, abeke isandla sakhe enhloko yenkunzi, ayihlabe inkunzi phambi kukaJehova. 
3_4_5_Umpristi ogcotshiweyo wothabatha igazi lenkunzi, alilethe ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, 
3_4_6_umpristi agcobhoze umunwe wakhe egazini, afafaze ngegazi kasikhombisa phambi kukaJehova, ngaphambi kwesihenqo sendlu engcwele. 
3_4_7_Umpristi abhece igazi ezimpondweni ze-altare lempepho ethaphukayo phambi kukaJehova elisetendeni lokuhlangana; lonke elinye igazi lenkunzi wolithulula ngasesinqeni se-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa elingasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana. 
3_4_8_Uyakuthabatha onke amanoni enkunzi yomnikelo wesono, amanoni asibekela izibilini nawo onke amanoni aphezu kwezibilini, 
3_4_9_nezinso zombili namanoni akuzo angasezinkalweni, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, ewasusa ngasezinsweni, 
3_4_10_njengalokho kwasuswa kuyo inkunzi yomhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula, umpristi akushise e-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa. 
3_4_11_Isikhumba senkunzi, nayo yonke inyama yayo, nenhloko yayo, namanqina ayo, nezibilini zayo, nomswani wayo, 
3_4_12_yebo, yonke inkunzi uyakuyikhiphela ngaphandle kwekamu, ayiyise endaweni ehlambulukileyo lapho uthululwa khona umlotha. 
3_4_13_“ ‘Uma-ke yonke inhlangano yakwa-Israyeli iduka, leyo nto isitheke emehlweni ebandla, benza noma yikuphi kuyo yonke imiyalo uJehova ayale ngakho ukuthi akunakwenziwa, baze babe necala, 
3_4_14_lapho isono abone ngaso sesaziwe, ibandla liyakunikela ngeduna libe ngumnikelo wesono, lililethe phambi kwetende lokuhlangana. 
3_4_15_Amalunga enhlangano ayakubeka izandla zawo enhloko yenkunzi phambi kukaJehova, inkunzi ihlatshwe phambi kukaJehova. 
3_4_16_Umpristi ogcotshiweyo alethe igazi lenkunzi etendeni lokuhlangana. 
3_4_17_Umpristi uyakugcobhoza umunwe wakhe egazini, afafaze ngalo kasikhombisa phambi kukaJehova phambi kwesihenqo. 
3_4_18_Uyakulibheca igazi ezimpondweni ze-altare eliphambi kukaJehova, elisetendeni lokuhlangana, athulule lonke elinye igazi ngasesinqeni se-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa elingasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana. 
3_4_19_Abesethabatha kuyo onke amanoni, awashise e-altare. 
3_4_20_Makenze njalo ngenkunzi; njengalokho wenza ngenkunzi yomnikelo wesono, makenze njalo nangalena. Umpristi abenzele ukubuyisana, baze bathethelelwe. 
3_4_21_Uyakuyikhiphela inkunzi ngaphandle kwekamu, ayishise, njengalokho wayishisa inkunzi yokuqala: lokhu kungumnikelo wesono webandla. 
3_4_22_“ ‘Nxa kona induna, yenza kungengamabomu noma yikuphi kuyo yonke imiyalo uJehova uNkulunkulu wayo ayale ngakho ukuthi akunakwenziwa, ize ibe necala, 
3_4_23_uma-ke yaziswa isono sayo eyone ngaso, iyakuletha umnikelo wayo ube yimbuzi, eyeduna elingenasici. 
3_4_24_Iyakubeka isandla sayo enhloko yembuzi, iyihlabele endaweni lapho behlabela khona iminikelo yokushiswa phambi kukaJehova; kungumnikelo wesono. 
3_4_25_Umpristi wothabatha igazi lomnikelo wesono ngomunwe wakhe, alibhece ezimpondweni ze-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa, igazi lawo alithulule ngasesinqeni se-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa. 
3_4_26_Onke amanoni awo uyakuwashisa e-altare njengamanoni omhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula, umpristi ayenzele ukubuyisana ngesono sayo, ize ithethelelwe. 
3_4_27_“ ‘Uma kona umuntukazana, enza kungengamabomu noma yikuphi kuyo imiyalo uJehova ayale ngakho ukuthi akunakwenziwa, aze abe necala, 
3_4_28_uma aziswa isono sakhe one ngaso, woletha umnikelo wakhe wembuzi, insikazi engenasici, ngesono sakhe one ngaso. 
3_4_29_Uyakubeka isandla sakhe enhloko yomnikelo wesono, awuhlabe umnikelo wesono endaweni yomnikelo wokushiswa. 
3_4_30_Umpristi wothabatha igazi lawo ngomunwe wakhe, alibhece ezimpondweni ze-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa, lonke elinye igazi lawo alithulule ngasesinqeni se-altare. 
3_4_31_Onke amanoni awo uyakuwasusa, njengalokhu amanoni esuswa emhlatshelweni weminikelo yokuthula, umpristi awashise e-altare abe yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana, aze athethelelwe. 
3_4_32_“ ‘Uma eletha iwundlu libe ngumnikelo wakhe wesono, woletha insikazi engenasici. 
3_4_33_Uyakubeka isandla sakhe enhloko yomnikelo wesono, awuhlabe, ube ngumnikelo wesono endaweni lapho behlabela khona umnikelo wokushiswa. 
3_4_34_Umpristi wothabatha igazi lomnikelo wesono ngomunwe wakhe, alibhece ezimpondweni ze-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa, lonke elinye igazi lawo alithulule ngasesinqeni se-altare. 
3_4_35_Onke amanoni awo uyakuwasusa, njengalokhu amanoni emvu esuswa emhlatshelweni weminikelo yokuthula, umpristi awashise e-altare phezu kweminikelo yomlilo kaJehova, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana ngesono sakhe one ngaso, aze athethelelwe. 
3_5_1_“ ‘Uma umuntu ona lapho ezwa izwi lesifungo, engufakazi wokuthile, noma ekubonile noma ekwazi, engakusho nokho, khona wothwala ububi bakhe; 
3_5_2_noma umuntu ethinta into engcolileyo, noma isidumbu sesilo esingcolileyo, noma isidumbu senkomo engcolileyo, noma isidumbu sesilwanyana esikhasayo esingcolileyo, kumsithele, engcolile nokho, woba necala. 
3_5_3_“ ‘Noma ethinta ukungcola komuntu, nakuba yikuphi ukungcola kwakhe angcole ngakho, kumsithele, lapho esekwazi woba necala. 
3_5_4_“ ‘Noma umuntu efunga ngamawala ngomlomo wakhe ukwenza okubi nokuba ukwenza okuhle, noma yikuphi umuntu angaphahluka ngakho ngesifungo, kumsithele, lapho esekwazi woba necala kokunye kwalokho. 
3_5_5_“ ‘Kuyakuthi lapho enecala kokunye kwalokho, avume lokho one ngakho, 
3_5_6_uyakuletha umnikelo wecala lakhe kuJehova ngesono sakhe one ngaso, insikazi yasezimvini, imvu noma imbuzi, kube ngumnikelo wesono, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana ngesono sakhe. 
3_5_7_“ ‘Uma amandla akhe enganeli imvu, makalethe kuJehova ngesono one ngaso amahobhe amabili noma amaphuphu amabili amajuba, elinye libe ngumnikelo wesono, elinye libe ngumnikelo wokushiswa, 
3_5_8_awalethe kumpristi oyakunikela ngelomnikelo wesono kuqala, alishumpule inhloko entanyeni, angalidabuli kodwa, 
3_5_9_afafaze uhlangothi lwe-altare ngegazi lomnikelo wesono, igazi eliseleyo likhanyelwe ngasesinqeni se-altare; kungumnikelo wesono. 
3_5_10_Uyakulungisa elesibili libe ngumnikelo wokushiswa njengokwesimiso, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana ngesono sakhe one ngaso, aze athethelelwe. 
3_5_11_“ ‘Kepha uma amandla akhe enganeli amahobhe amabili noma amaphuphu amabili amajuba, makalethe umnikelo wakhe ngalokho one ngakho, okweshumi kwe-efa lempuphu ecolekileyo, ube ngumnikelo wesono, angatheli mafutha phezu kwawo, angabeki nhlaka phezu kwawo, ngokuba kungumnikelo wesono, 
3_5_12_awulethe kumpristi, umpristi acaphune kuwo ngokhweshe, kube yisikhumbuzo sawo, akushise e-altare phezu kweminikelo yomlilo kaJehova; kungumnikelo wesono. 
3_5_13_Umpristi uyakumenzela ukubuyisana ngesono sakhe one ngaso, nakuyiphi yalezi zinto, aze athethelelwe; okuseleyo kube ngokompristi njengomnikelo wempuphu.’ ” 
3_5_14_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_5_15_“Uma umuntu esenza isiphambeko, one kungengamabomu ezintweni ezingcwele zikaJehova, woletha kuJehova umnikelo wakhe wecala, inqama yasemhlambini engenasici njengokulinganisa kwakho namashekeli esiliva ngokweshekeli lendlu engcwele, ibe ngumnikelo wecala, 
3_5_16_akhokhele lokho one ngakho entweni engcwele, athasisele kukho okwesihlanu, akunike umpristi, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana ngenqama yomnikelo wecala, aze athethelelwe. 
3_5_17_“Uma umuntu ona, enza noma yikuphi kuyo imiyalo uJehova ayale ngakho ukuthi akunakwenziwa, noma ebengakwazi, unecala nokho, futhi wothwala ububi bakhe. 
3_5_18_Woletha kumpristi inqama engenasici yasemhlambini njengokulinganisa kwakho, ibe ngumnikelo wecala, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana ngesiphosiso aphosise ngaso engazi, aze athethelelwe. 
3_5_19_Kungumnikelo wecala; nempela unecala phambi kukaJehova.” 
3_6_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_6_2_“Uma umuntu ona, enze isiphambeko kuJehova, akhohlise umakhelwane wakhe ngento ebekiweyo, noma isibambiso noma into ephangiweyo, noma ecindezela umakhelwane wakhe, 
3_6_3_noma, lapho ethola into elahlekileyo, eyiphika, afunge amanga, noma yikuphi kukho konke lokhu umuntu akwenzayo one ngakho, 
3_6_4_khona kuyakuthi, uma onile aze abe necala, uyakukubuyisa lokho okuphangiweyo, noma lokho akudlileyo, noma lokho okwakubekwe kuye, noma lokho okwakulahlekile akutholayo, 
3_6_5_noma yikuphi afungile amanga ngakho; makakubuyise, athasisele okwesihlanu kukho, amnike lowo okungokwakhe ngosuku lomnikelo wakhe wecala. 
3_6_6_Woletha umnikelo wakhe wecala kuJehova, inqama engenasici yasemhlambini ngokulinganisa kwakho, ibe ngumnikelo wecala, iyiswe kumpristi, 
3_6_7_umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana phambi kukaJehova, aze athethelelwe konke angahle abe ekwenzile anecala ngakho.” 
3_6_8_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_6_9_“Yala u-Aroni namadodana akhe, uthi: ‘Nanku umthetho weminikelo yokushiswa: umnikelo wokushiswa uyakuhlala eziko le-altare ubusuku bonke kuze kuse, umlilo we-altare uhlale kulo uvutha njalo. 
3_6_10_Umpristi uyakwembatha isambatho selineni, afake nebhulukwe lakhe lelineni emzimbeni wakhe, asuse umlotha womlilo oshise umnikelo wokushiswa e-altare, awuthele ngaseceleni kwe-altare. 
3_6_11_Abesekhumula izambatho zakhe, embathe ezinye izambatho, akhiphele umlotha ngaphandle kwekamu endaweni ehlambulukileyo. 
3_6_12_Umlilo ophezu kwe-altare uyakuhlala kulo uvutha njalo, ungacimi; umpristi uyakubasa izinkuni kulo ekuseni njalo, ahlele kulo umnikelo wokushiswa, ashise kulo amanoni eminikelo yokuthula. 
3_6_13_Umlilo wohlala e-altare uvutha njalo, ungacimi. 
3_6_14_“ ‘Nanku umthetho weminikelo yempuphu: amadodana ka-Aroni ayakunikela ngawo phambi kukaJehova ngaphambi kwe-altare. 
3_6_15_Makucashunwe kuwo ngokhweshe impuphu ecolekileyo yomnikelo wempuphu namafutha awo, nayo yonke inhlaka ephezu komnikelo wempuphu, akushise e-altare kube yisikhumbuzo sawo, kube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova. 
3_6_16_Okuseleyo kuwo kuyakudliwa ngu-Aroni namadodana akhe, kudliwe ngaphandle kwemvubelo endaweni engcwele, bakudlele egcekeni letende lokuhlangana. 
3_6_17_Akuyikuphekwa ngemvubelo. Ngikunike kube yisabelo sabo seminikelo yami yomlilo; kungcwelengcwele njengomnikelo wesono nanjengomnikelo wecala. 
3_6_18_Bonke abesilisa phakathi kwabantwana baka-Aroni bayakukudla kube yisimiso esiphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu seminikelo yomlilo kaJehova; konke okukuthintayo kuyakuba ngcwele.’ ” 
3_6_19_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_6_20_“Nanku umnikelo ka-Aroni nowamadodana akhe abayakunikela ngawo kuJehova mhla begcotshwa: okweshumi kwe-efa lempuphu ecolekileyo kube ngumnikelo wempuphu njalonjalo, inxenye yakho ekuseni nenxenye yakho kusihlwa. 
3_6_21_Uyakwenziwa emqengeleni ngamafutha; usuxutshanisiwe wowungenisa, unikele ngomnikelo wempuphu, ube yizingcezu ezihleshuliweyo, zibe yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova. 
3_6_22_Umpristi ogcotshiweyo esikhundleni sakhe phakathi kwamadodana akhe wonikela ngawo, kube yisimiso esiphakade; woshiswa wonke. 
3_6_23_Yonke iminikelo yempuphu yompristi yoshiswa yonke, ingadliwa.” 
3_6_24_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_6_25_“Yisho ku-Aroni nakumadodana akhe, uthi: ‘Nanku umthetho weminikelo yesono; endaweni ohlatshelwe kuyo umnikelo wokushiswa, mawuhlatshelwe khona umnikelo wesono phambi kukaJehova; ungcwelengcwele. 
3_6_26_Umpristi onikela ngawo ngesono wowudla, udliwe endaweni engcwele egcekeni letende lokuhlangana. 
3_6_27_Konke okuyakuthinta inyama yawo kuyakuba ngcwele; nxa ingubo ifafazwa ngegazi lawo, lapho kufafazwe khona uyakukugeza endaweni engcwele. 
3_6_28_Kepha isitsha sebumba okuphekelwe kuso masaphulwe, kodwa uma kuphekelwa esitsheni sethusi, siyakuphucuzwa, sihashazwe ngamanzi. 
3_6_29_Bonke abesilisa phakathi kwabapristi bayakuwudla; ungcwelengcwele. 
3_6_30_Kepha makungadliwa mnikelo wesono okwangeniswa igazi lawo etendeni lokuhlangana ukuba kwenziwe ukubuyisana endaweni engcwele; woshiswa ngomlilo. 
3_7_1_“ ‘Nanku umthetho weminikelo yecala; ingcwelengcwele. 
3_7_2_Endaweni abahlabela kuyo umnikelo wokushiswa, bayakuwuhlabela khona umnikelo wecala, kufafazwe i-altare nxazonke ngegazi lawo. 
3_7_3_Uyakunikela ngawo onke amanoni awo, umsila ononileyo namanoni asibekela izibilini, 
3_7_4_nezinso zombili namanoni akuzo angasezinkalweni, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, ewasusa ngasezinsweni, 
3_7_5_umprisiti akushise e-altare kube ngumnikelo womlilo kuJehova; kungumnikelo wecala. 
3_7_6_Bonke abesilisa phakathi kwabapristi bayakuwudla, udliwe endaweni engcwele; ungcwelengcwele. 
3_7_7_“ ‘Umnikelo wecala unjengomnikelo wesono; umthetho wawo munye; umpristi owenza ukubuyisana ngawo woba ngowakhe. 
3_7_8_Umpristi onikela ngomnikelo wokushiswa womuntu, isikhumba somnikelo wokushiswa anikele ngawo siyakuba ngesompristi. 
3_7_9_Yonke iminikelo yempuphu ephekwe eziko, nayo yonke elungiselwa okhambeni nasemqengeleni, iyakuba ngeyalo mpristi anikele ngayo. 
3_7_10_Yonke iminikelo yempuphu exovwe namafutha neyomileyo iyakuba ngeyamadodana onke ka-Aroni, enye ithole njengenye. 
3_7_11_“ ‘Nanku umthetho womhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula okuyakunikelwa ngayo kuJehova. 
3_7_12_“ ‘Uma enikela ngawo ube ngumnikelo wokubonga, uyakunikela kanye nomhlatshelo wokubonga ngamaqebelengwane angenamvubelo exovwe namafutha, nemiqathane engenamvubelo, egcotshwe ngamafutha, namaqebelengwane empuphu ecolekileyo axovwe namafutha. 
3_7_13_Kanye namaqebelengwane esinkwa esivutshelweyo uyakunikela ngalo mnikelo kanye nomhlatshelo weminikelo yakhe yokuthula, ube ngowokubonga. 
3_7_14_Athabathe kuwo libe linye njalo eminikelweni yakhe, libe ngumnikelo ophakanyiswayo kuJehova, libe ngelompristi ofafaza ngegazi leminikelo yokuthula. 
3_7_15_Inyama yomhlatshelo weminikelo yakhe yokuthula ongowokubonga iyakudliwa ngosuku lokunikela kwakhe, angashiyi lutho lwayo kuze kuse. 
3_7_16_“ ‘Kepha uma umhlatshelo womnikelo wakhe ungowesithembiso noma ungowesihle, uyakudliwa ngalolo suku anikela ngalo ngomhlatshelo wakhe; nangakusasa okuseleyo kuwo kuyakudliwa; 
3_7_17_kepha okusele enyameni yomhlatshelo ngosuku lwesithathu kuyakushiswa ngomlilo. 
3_7_18_Uma inyama yomhlatshelo weminikelo yakhe yokuthula idliwa ngosuku lwesithathu, ayiyikwamukeleka, ingabalelwa kuye owanikela ngayo; iyakunengeka, nomuntu oyidlayo uyakuthwala ububi bakhe. 
3_7_19_“ ‘Inyama ethinta into engcolileyo ayinakudliwa, kepha iyakushiswa ngomlilo; nokho le nyama-ke bonke abahlambulukileyo bangayidla. 
3_7_20_Kodwa umuntu oyidla inyama yomhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula engekaJehova esenakho ukungcola kwakhe, lowo muntu uyakunqunywa kubantu bakubo. 
3_7_21_Nanxa umuntu ethinta into engcolileyo, ukungcola komuntu noma isilwane esingcolileyo noma into engcolileyo enengekayo, adle inyama yomhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula engekaJehova, lowo muntu uyakunqunywa kubantu bakubo.’ ” 
3_7_22_Jehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_7_23_“Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Aniyikudla manoni enkomo, nawemvu, nawembuzi. 
3_7_24_Amanoni engcuba namanoni okudweshuliweyo angasebenza yonke eminye imisebenzi; kepha ningawadli nempela. 
3_7_25_Ngokuba yilowo nalowo odla amanoni enkomo okunikelwa ngayo ibe ngumnikelo womlilo kuJehova, lowo muntu owadlayo uyakunqunywa kubantu bakubo. 
3_7_26_Ningadli naliphi igazi, noma ngelenyoni noma ngelenkomo, nakuyiphi yezindlu zenu. 
3_7_27_Yilowo nalowo odla igazi lowo muntu uyakunqunywa kubantu bakubo.’ ” 
3_7_28_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_7_29_“Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Onikela ngomhlatshelo weminikelo yakhe yokuthula kuJehova uyakuletha umnikelo wakhe kuJehova emhlatshelweni weminikelo yakhe yokuthula; 
3_7_30_izandla zakhe uqobo zilethe iminikelo yomlilo kaJehova, alethe amanoni kanye nesifuba ukuba isifuba sizuliswe, sibe ngumnikelo wokuzuliswa phambi kukaJehova. 
3_7_31_Umpristi makashise amanoni e-altare, kepha isifuba sibe ngesika-Aroni nesamadodana akhe. 
3_7_32_Anonika umpristi umlenze wokunene, ube ngumnikelo wokuphakanyiswa emihlatshelweni yeminikelo yenu yokuthula. 
3_7_33_Lowo phakathi kwamadodana ka-Aroni onikela ngegazi leminikelo yokuthula nangamanoni koba ngowakhe umlenze wokunene, ube yisabelo sakhe. 
3_7_34_Ngokuba isifuba sokuzuliswa nomlenze wokuphakanyiswa ngikuthabathe kwabakwa-Israyeli emihlatshelweni yeminikelo yabo yokuthula, ngakunika u-Aroni umpristi namadodana akhe, kube yisimiso esiphakade kwabakwa-Israyeli.’ ” 
3_7_35_Leso siyisabelo sika-Aroni nesabelo samadodana akhe seminikelo yomlilo kaJehova mhla ebaletha ukuba bamkhonze uJehova esikhundleni sobupristi, 
3_7_36_ayala ngakho uJehova ukuba bakuphiwe ngabantwana bakwa-Israyeli mhla ebagcoba, kube yisimiso esiphakade ezizukulwaneni zabo. 
3_7_37_Lowo ungumthetho weminikelo yokushiswa, noweminikelo yempuphu, noweminikelo yesono, noweminikelo yecala, nowokwahlukaniselwa, nowomhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula, 
3_7_38_uJehova amyala ngawo uMose entabeni yaseSinayi mhla eyala abakwa-Israyeli ukuba banikele ngeminikelo yabo kuJehova ehlane laseSinayi. 
3_8_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_8_2_“Thabatha u-Aroni namadodana akhe kanye naye, nezambatho, namafutha okugcoba, nenkunzi yomnikelo wesono, nezinqama zombili, neqoma lezinkwa ezingenamvubelo, 
3_8_3_ubuthele inhlangano yonke ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana.” 
3_8_4_UMose wenza njengalokho uJehova emyalile; inhlangano yabuthelwa ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana. 
3_8_5_UMose wayesethi kuyo inhlangano: “Nansi into uJehova ayale ngayo ukuba yenziwe.” 
3_8_6_UMose waletha u-Aroni namadodana akhe, wabageza ngamanzi. 
3_8_7_Wamfaka ibhantshi, wambhincisa ibhande, wamembathisa ijazi; wamfaka ingubo yamahlombe, wambhincisa ibhande elifekethisiweyo lengubo yamahlombe, wayibophela kuye ngalo. 
3_8_8_Wamfaka isihlangu sesifuba, nasesihlangwini sesifuba wabeka i-Urimi neThumimi. 
3_8_9_Wafaka isigqoko ekhanda lakhe, nasesigqokweni ngaphambili wafaka ungcwecwe wegolide, umqhele ongcwele, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
3_8_10_UMose wathatha amafutha okugcoba, waligcoba itabernakele nakho konke okuphakathi kwalo, wakungcwelisa. 
3_8_11_Wafafaza ngawo i-altare kasikhombisa, waligcoba i-altare kanye nezitsha zonke zalo, nomcengezi nesinqe sawo, ukuba kungcweliswe. 
3_8_12_Wathela amafutha okugcoba ekhanda lika-Aroni, wamgcoba ukuba angcweliswe. 
3_8_13_UMose wayeseletha amadodana ka-Aroni, wawembathisa amabhantshi, wawabhincisa amabhande, wawafaka izigqoko, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
3_8_14_Waletha nenkunzi yomnikelo wesono; u-Aroni namadodana akhe babeka izandla zabo enhloko yenkunzi yomnikelo wesono. 
3_8_15_Wayeseyihlaba; uMose wathatha igazi, walibheca ezimpondweni ze-altare nxazonke ngomunwe wakhe, waliphothula i-altare, walithulula igazi ngasesinqeni se-altare, walingcwelisa ukuba alenzele ukubuyisana. 
3_8_16_Wathatha onke amanoni aphezu kwezibilini, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, nezinso zombili namanoni azo, uMose wakushisa e-altare. 
3_8_17_Kepha inkunzi nesikhumba sayo, nenyama yayo, nomswani wayo, wakushisa ngomlilo ngaphandle kwekamu, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
3_8_18_Wayeseletha inqama yomnikelo wokushiswa; u-Aroni namadodana akhe babeka izandla zabo enhloko yenqama. 
3_8_19_Wayihlaba, uMose wafafaza i-altare ngegazi nxazonke. 
3_8_20_Wayeseyihlahlela inyama izitho; uMose washisa inhloko nezitho namanoni. 
3_8_21_Wahlanza izibilini namanqina ngamanzi; uMose washisa yonke inqama e-altare; yayingumnikelo wokushiswa, waba yiphunga elimnandi, umnikelo womlilo kuJehova, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
3_8_22_Waletha nenye inqama, inqama yokwahlukaniselwa; u-Aroni namadodana akhe babeka izandla zabo enhloko yenqama. 
3_8_23_Wayihlaba; uMose wathatha igazi layo, walibheca esicutshini sendlebe yokunene ka-Aroni, nasesithupheni sesandla sakhe sokunene, nakuqukula wonyawo lwakhe lokunene. 
3_8_24_Wayeseletha amadodana ka-Aroni, uMose walibheca igazi esicutshini sendlebe yabo yokunene, nasesithupheni sesandla sabo sokunene, nakuqukula wonyawo lwabo lokunene; uMose wafafaza i-altare ngegazi nxazonke. 
3_8_25_Wawathatha amanoni, nomsila ononileyo, nawo onke amanoni aphezu kwezibilini, namanoni aphezu kwesibindi, nezinso zombili namanoni azo, nomlenze wokunene, 
3_8_26_naseqomeni lezinkwa ezingenamvubelo elalisebusweni bukaJehova wathatha iqebelengwane laba linye elingenamvubelo, neqebelengwane laba linye lesinkwa samafutha, nomqathane munye, wakubeka phezu kwamanoni naphezu komlenze wokunene, 
3_8_27_wakubeka konke ezandleni zika-Aroni, nasezandleni zamadodana akhe, wakuzulisa kwaba ngumnikelo wokuzuliswa phambi kukaJehova. 
3_8_28_UMose wayesekuthatha ezandleni zabo, wakushisa e-altare emnikelweni wokushiswa; kwakungokokwahlukaniselwa, kwaba yiphunga elimnandi, umnikelo womlilo kuJehova. 
3_8_29_UMose wathatha isifuba, wasizulisa saba ngumnikelo wokuzuliswa phambi kukaJehova; sasiyisabelo sikaMose sasenqameni yokwahlukaniselwa, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
3_8_30_UMose wayesethatha amafutha okugcoba, negazi elalise-altare, wafafaza ngalo u-Aroni nezambatho zakhe, namadodana akhe kanye naye, nezambatho zamadodana akhe, wangcwelisa u-Aroni nezambatho zakhe, namadodana akhe kanye naye, nezambatho zamadodana akhe. 
3_8_31_Wathi uMose ku-Aroni nakumadodana akhe: “Phekani inyama ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, niyidle kanye nesinkwa esiseqomeni lokwahlukaniselwa, njengalokho ngayala ngathi: ‘U-Aroni namadodana akhe bayakukudla.’ 
3_8_32_Okuseleyo kwenyama nokwesinkwa anokushisa ngomlilo. 
3_8_33_Ningaphumi emnyango wetende lokuhlangana izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, kungakapheli izinsuku zokwahlukaniselwa kwenu, ngokuba uyakunahlukanisela izinsuku eziyisikhombisa. 
3_8_34_UJehova uyalile ukuba kwenziwe njengalokho kwenziwe namuhla, ukuze nenzelwe ukubuyisana. 
3_8_35_Ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana niyakuhlala imini nobusuku izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, nisigcine isiyalezo sikaJehova, ukuze ningafi, ngokuba ngiyaliwe kanjalo.” 
3_8_36_U-Aroni namadodana akhe benza konke uJehova ayale ngakho ngesandla sikaMose. 
3_9_1_Kwathi ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili uMose wabiza u-Aroni namadodana akhe namalunga akwa-Israyeli, 
3_9_2_wathi ku-Aroni: “Mawuzithathele ithole lenkunzi, libe ngumnikelo wesono, nenqama ibe ngumnikelo wokushiswa, okungenasici, unikele ngakho phambi kukaJehova. 
3_9_3_Khuluma kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Thathani impongo, ibe ngumnikelo wesono, nethole newundlu, omabili abe nomnyaka munye, angenasici, abe ngumnikelo wokushiswa, 
3_9_4_nenkunzi nenqama zibe yiminikelo yokuthula, zihlatshwe phambi kukaJehova, nomnikelo wempuphu oxovwe namafutha, ngokuba namuhla uJehova uyabonakala kini.’ ” 
3_9_5_Baletha-ke lokho uMose akuyalayo phambi kwetende lokuhlangana, nenhlangano yonke yasondela, yema phambi kukaJehova. 
3_9_6_Wayesethi uMose: “Nansi into uJehova ayala ngayo ukuba niyenze, kuze kubonakale kini inkazimulo kaJehova.” 
3_9_7_UMose wathi ku-Aroni: “Sondela e-altare, unikele ngomnikelo wakho wesono nangomnikelo wakho wokushiswa, uzenzele wena nabantu ukubuyisana, andukuba unikele ngomnikelo wabantu, ubenzele ukubuyisana, njengalokho uJehova eyalile.” 
3_9_8_U-Aroni wayesesondela e-altare, walihlaba ithole lomnikelo wesono ongowakhe. 
3_9_9_Amadodana ka-Aroni aletha igazi kuye; wagcobhoza umunwe egazini, walibheca ezimpondweni ze-altare, wathulula elinye igazi ngasesinqeni se-altare; 
3_9_10_kepha amanoni nezinso namanoni aphezu kwesibindi emnikelweni wesono wakushisa e-altare, njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
3_9_11_Inyama nesikhumba wakushisa ngomlilo ngaphandle kwekamu. 
3_9_12_Wawuhlaba umnikelo wokushiswa; amadodana ka-Aroni aletha kuye igazi, wafafaza ngalo i-altare nxazonke. 
3_9_13_Anikeza kuye umnikelo wokushiswa izitho ngezitho kanye nenhloko, wakushisa e-altare. 
3_9_14_Wahlanza izibilini namanqina, wakushisa phezu komnikelo wokushiswa e-altare. 
3_9_15_Wayeseletha umnikelo wabantu, wathatha impongo yomnikelo wesono ongowabantu, wayihlaba, wanikela ngayo ngenxa yesono njengowokuqala. 
3_9_16_Waletha umnikelo wokushiswa, wanikela ngawo njengokwesimiso. 
3_9_17_Wayeseletha umnikelo wempuphu, wagcwalisa isandla sakhe ngawo, wawushisa e-altare ngaphandle komnikelo wokushiswa wasekuseni. 
3_9_18_Wahlaba inkunzi nenqama, zibe ngumhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula ongowabantu; amadodana ka-Aroni aletha kuye igazi owafafaza ngalo i-altare nxazonke, 
3_9_19_namanoni enkunzi nawenqama, nomsila ononileyo, nalawo asibekela izibilini, nezinso, namanoni esibindi, 
3_9_20_abeka amanoni phezu kwezifuba; wawashisa amanoni e-altare; 
3_9_21_izifuba nomlenze wokunene wakuzulisa, kube ngumnikelo wokuzuliswa phambi kukaJehova, njengalokho uMose eyalile. 
3_9_22_U-Aroni waphakamisela izandla zakhe kubantu, wababusisa; wayesehla ekunikeleni ngomnikelo wesono nangomnikelo wokushiswa nangeminikelo yokuthula. 
3_9_23_OMose no-Aroni bangena etendeni lokuhlangana, babuye baphuma, bababusisa abantu; yayisibonakala inkazimulo kaJehova kubantu bonke. 
3_9_24_Kwaphuma umlilo ngaphambi kukaJehova, waqeda umnikelo wokushiswa namanoni e-altare; sebekubona abantu bonke bananela, bakhothamela phansi ngobuso. 
3_10_1_ONadabi no-Abihu amadodana ka-Aroni bathatha bobabili imicengezi yabo yomlilo, bafaka umlilo kuyo, babeka impepho phezulu, banikela phambi kukaJehova ngomlilo ongafanele, angabayalanga ngawo. 
3_10_2_Kwaphuma umlilo ngaphambi kukaJehova, wabaqeda, bafa phambi kukaJehova. 
3_10_3_UMose wayesethi ku-Aroni: “Yikho uJehova akukhuluma, ethi: “ ‘Kubo abaseduze nami ngiyakungcweliswa, phambi kwabantu bonke ngiyakukhazimuliswa.’ ” U-Aroni wathula. 
3_10_4_UMose wabiza oMishayeli no-Elisafani amadodana ka-Uziyeli, uyisekazi ka-Aroni, wathi kubo: “Sondelani, nibasuse abafowenu ngaphambi kwendlu engcwele, nibakhiphele ngaphandle kwekamu.” 
3_10_5_Base besondela, babasusa bembethe amabhantshi abo, babakhiphela ngaphandle kwekamu, njengalokho eshilo uMose. 
3_10_6_UMose wayesethi ku-Aroni naku-Eleyazare naku-Itamari amadodana akhe: “Ningathukululi izinwele zamakhanda enu, ningaklebhuli izambatho zenu ukuba ningafi, ingathukuthelelwa yonke inhlangano, kepha abafowenu, yonke indlu yakwa-Israyeli, mabalilele ukushisa akuphembileyo uJehova. 
3_10_7_Ningaphumi emnyango wetende lokuhlangana, funa nife, ngokuba amafutha okugcoba kaJehova aphezu kwenu.” Benza-ke njengezwi likaMose. 
3_10_8_UJehova wakhuluma ku-Aroni, wathi: 
3_10_9_“Ungaphuzi wayini naluphuzo olunamandla, wena namadodana akho kanye nawe, nxa ningena etendeni lokuhlangana, ukuba ningafi; kuyakuba yisimiso esiphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu. 
3_10_10_Niyakwahlukanisa okungcwele nokungengcwele, okungcolileyo nokuhlambulukileyo, 
3_10_11_nize nifundise abantwana bakwa-Israyeli zonke izimiso uJehova azikhulume kubo ngesandla sikaMose.” 
3_10_12_UMose wakhuluma ku-Aroni naku-Eleyazare naku-Itamari amadodana akhe aseleyo, wathi: “Thathani umnikelo wempuphu osele eminikelweni yomlilo kaJehova, niwudle ungenamvubelo ngaseceleni kwe-altare, ngokuba ungcwelengcwele, 
3_10_13_niwudle endaweni engcwele, ngokuba kuyimfanelo yakho nemfanelo yamadodana akho eminikelweni yomlilo kaJehova; ngokuba ngiyaliwe kanjalo. 
3_10_14_Isifuba sokuzuliswa nomlenze wokuphakanyiswa niyakukudla endaweni ehlambulukileyo, wena namadodana akho namadodakazi akho kanye nawe, ngokuba kuphiwe kube yimfanelo yakho nemfanelo yamadodana akho emihlatshelweni yeminikelo yokuthula yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli. 
3_10_15_Mabalethe umlenze wokuphakanyiswa nesifuba sokuzuliswa kanye neminikelo yomlilo yamanoni ukuba bakuzulise, kube ngumnikelo wokuzuliswa phambi kukaJehova, kube ngokwakho nokwamadodana akho kanye nawe, kube yimfanelo ephakade, njengalokho uJehova eyalile.” 
3_10_16_UMose wafunisisa impongo yomnikelo wesono; bheka, yayishisiwe; wabathukuthelela o-Eleyazare no-Itamari amadodana ka-Aroni aseleyo, wathi: 
3_10_17_“Anidlanga ngani umnikelo wesono endaweni yendlu engcwele, njengokuba ungcwelengcwele, futhi niphiwe wona ukuba nisuse ububi benhlangano, niyenzele ukubuyisana phambi kukaJehova, na? 
3_10_18_Bhekani, igazi lawo alingeniswanga phakathi endaweni engcwele; bekufanele ngempela ukuba niwudlele endaweni engcwele, njengalokho ngayala.” 
3_10_19_U-Aroni wathi kuMose: “Bheka-ke, namuhla banikele ngomnikelo wabo wesono nangomnikelo wabo wokushiswa phambi kukaJehova; nokho ngehlelwe yilokhu mina; uma bengidlile umnikelo wesono namuhla, bekuzakwamukeleka emehlweni kaJehova na?” 
3_10_20_Esezwile lokho uMose, kwaba kuhle emehlweni akhe. 
3_11_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose naku-Aroni, wathi kubo: 
3_11_2_“Yishoni kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, nithi: ‘Yilokhu okuphilayo eningakudla kuzo zonke izilwane zasemhlabeni: 
3_11_3_zonke ezahlukanisa inselo, nezidabula inselo kabili, nezetshisayo kuzo izilwane, lezo ningazidla. 
3_11_4_“ ‘Kepha lezi aniyikuzidla kwezetshisayo nakwezahlukanisa inselo: ikamela, ngokuba liyetshisa, lingahlukanisi kodwa inselo; lingcolile kini; 
3_11_5_nembila, ngokuba iyetshisa, ingahlukanisi kodwa inselo; ingcolile kini; 
3_11_6_nonogwaja, ngokuba uyetshisa, engahlukanisi kodwa inselo; ungcolile kini; 
3_11_7_nengulube, ngokuba iyahlukanisa inselo, idabula inselo kabili, ingetshisi kodwa; ingcolile kini. 
3_11_8_Ningadli inyama yazo, ningathinti izidumbu zazo; zingcolile kini. 
3_11_9_“ ‘Lezi ningazidla kuzo zonke ezisemanzini: zonke ezinamaphiko nezingcwecwe ezisemanzini neziselwandle nezisemifuleni, lezo ningazidla. 
3_11_10_Kepha zonke ezingenamaphiko nazingcwecwe eziselwandle nezisemifuleni, nazo zonke eziswebezelayo emanzini, nazo zonke izinto eziphilayo emanzini ziyisinengiso kini. 
3_11_11_Zoba yisinengiso kini; ningadli inyama yazo; izidumbu zazo ziyakunengeka kini. 
3_11_12_Zonke ezingenamaphiko nazingcwecwe emanzini ziyisinengiso kini. 
3_11_13_“ ‘Yilezi eniyakunengwa yizo ezinyonini; aziyikudliwa, ziyisinengiso: ukhozi, nenqe, nengqungqulu, 
3_11_14_nonhloyile, noheshe ngezinhlobo zakhe, 
3_11_15_nawo onke amagwababa ngezinhlobo zawo, 
3_11_16_nentshe, nenkovana, nenkanu, noklebe ngezinhlobo zakhe, 
3_11_17_nesikhova, nomphishamanzi, nomxwagele, 
3_11_18_nefukezi, nevuba, nophalane, 
3_11_19_nonogolantethe, nonozalizingwenya ngezinhlobo zakhe, noziningweni, nelulwane. 
3_11_20_“ ‘Nezilwanyana zonke ezinamaphiko, ezihamba ngezinyawo zozine, ziyisinengiso kini. 
3_11_21_Kepha lezi ningazidla kuzo zonke izilwanyana ezinamaphiko, ezihamba ngezinyawo zozine, ezinamanqina ngaphezu kwezinyawo zazo ukuxhuma ngazo emhlabeni; 
3_11_22_kuzo ningadla lezi: isikhonyane ngezinhlobo zaso, namaboni ngezinhlobo zawo, namadiye ngezinhlobo zawo, nezintethe ngezinhlobo zazo. 
3_11_23_Kepha zonke ezinye izilwanyana ezinamaphiko nezinyawo ezine ziyisinengiso kini. 
3_11_24_“ ‘Niyakungcoliswa yilezi: bonke abathinta izidumbu zazo bayakuba ngabangcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_11_25_Bonke abathwala utho lwezidumbu zazo bayakuhlanza izingubo zabo, babe ngabangcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_11_26_“ ‘Zonke izilwane ezahlukanisa inselo, zingayidabuli kabili kodwa, zingetshisi, zingcolile kini; bonke abazithintayo bayakuba ngabangcolile. 
3_11_27_Nazo zonke ezihamba ngezidladla kuzo zonke izilwane ezihamba ngezinyawo ezine zingcolile kini; bonke abathinta izidumbu zazo bayakuba ngabangcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_11_28_Othwala izidumbu zazo makahlanze izingubo zakhe, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe; zingcolile kini. 
3_11_29_“ ‘Lezi zingcolile kini kuzo izilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni: uchakide, nempuku, noxamu ngezinhlobo zakhe, 
3_11_30_nesigcilikisha, nesiquzi, nentulo, nesibankwa, nonwabu. 
3_11_31_Yilezo ezingcolile kini phakathi kwezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo; bonke abazithintayo sezifile bayakuba ngabangcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_11_32_Konke esiwela phezu kwakho esinye sazo sezifile kuyakuba ngokungcolile, noma kuyinto yomuthi noma yingubo noma yisikhumba noma yisaka noma yintoni okusetshenzwa ngayo; makufakwe emanzini, kube ngokungcolile kuze kuhlwe; khona kuyakuhlanzeka. 
3_11_33_Nezitsha zonke esiwela kuzo esinye sazo, noma yintoni ephakathi kwazo iyakuba ngengcolile, nize nizaphule. 
3_11_34_Konke ukudla okudliwayo okukuzo, afika kukho futhi amanzi anjalo, kuyakuba ngokungcolile, nakho konke okuphuzwayo kuzo izitsha ezinjalo kuyakuba ngokungcolile. 
3_11_35_Konke esiwela kukho isidumbu sazo kuyakuba ngokungcolile, noma iziko noma ikhanzi; makuphohlozwe; kungcolile, kuyakuba ngokungcolile kini. 
3_11_36_Kepha umthombo nomgodi lapho amanzi eqoqene khona uyakube uhlambulukile, kodwa okuthinta izidumbu zazo kuyakuba ngokungcolile. 
3_11_37_Uma izidumbu zazo ziwela phezu kwembewu etshalwayo ezakuhlwanyelwa, iyakuba ngehlambulukile. 
3_11_38_Kepha uma amanzi ethelwa embewini, izidumbu zazo ziwele phezu kwayo, ingcolile kini. 
3_11_39_“ ‘Uma kufa isilwane esidliwayo, othinta isidumbu saso uyakuba ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_11_40_Odla isidumbu saso makahlanze izingubo zakhe, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe; nothwala isidumbu saso makahlanze izingubo zakhe, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_11_41_“ ‘Zonke izilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni ziyisinengiso; mazingadliwa. 
3_11_42_Zonke ezihamba ngesisu, nazo zonke ezihamba ngezinyawo ezine noma ngeziningi, nazo zonke ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni, ningazidli, ngokuba ziyisinengiso. 
3_11_43_Ningazenzi ninengeke ngezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo, ningazingcolisi ngazo, funa ningcole ngazo. 
3_11_44_Ngokuba nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu; ngalokho zingcweliseni, nibe ngcwele, ngokuba mina ngingcwele; ningazingcolisi ngezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni. 
3_11_45_Ngokuba nginguJehova owakukhuphula ezweni laseGibithe, ngibe nguNkulunkulu wenu; ngalokho yibani ngcwele, ngokuba ngingcwele. 
3_11_46_“ ‘Yilowo umthetho wezilwane nowezinyoni nowezilwane zonke eziswebezelayo emanzini, nowezilwanyana zonke ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni, 
3_11_47_ukuba kwahlukaniswe okungcolileyo nokuhlambulukileyo, okuphilayo okudliwayo nokuphilayo okungadliwayo.’ ” 
3_12_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_12_2_“Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Uma owesifazane ekhulelwa, azale umfana, uyakuba ngongcolile izinsuku eziyisikhombisa; njengasemihleni yokungcola ngefindo lakhe wohlala engcolile. 
3_12_3_Ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili inyama yejwabu lakhe iyakusokwa. 
3_12_4_Abesehlala esegazini lokuhlambuluka izinsuku ezingamashumi amathathu nantathu, angathinti lutho olungcwele, angangeni endlini engcwele, zize ziphelele izinsuku zokuhlambuluka kwakhe. 
3_12_5_Kepha uma ezala intombazana, makabe ngongcolile amasonto amabili njengasekungcoleni ngefindo lakhe, ahlale esegazini lokuhlambuluka izinsuku ezingamashumi ayisithupha nesithupha. 
3_12_6_“ ‘Nanxa seziphelile izinsuku zokuhlambuluka kwakhe ngomfana noma ngentombazana, makalethe imvu enomnyaka munye, ibe ngumnikelo wokushiswa, nephuphu lejuba noma ihobhe, libe ngumnikelo wesono, akulethe ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana kumpristi, 
3_12_7_yena anikele ngakho phambi kukaJehova, amenzele ukubuyisana, aze ahlambuluke emthonjeni wegazi lakhe. Yilowo umthetho wozalayo umfana noma intombazana. 
3_12_8_“ ‘Uma amandla akhe enganeli imvu, khona uyakuthatha amahobhe amabili noma amaphuphu amabili amajuba, elinye libe ngumnikelo wokushiswa, elinye libe ngumnikelo wesono, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana, aze ahlambuluke.’ ” 
3_13_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose naku-Aroni, wathi: 
3_13_2_“Nxa kumila esikhumbeni senyama yomuntu idunguza noma utwayi noma ibala elikhanyayo, kuvele esikhumbeni senyama yakhe isifo sochoko, makalethwe ku-Aroni umpristi, noma kwenye yamadodana akhe, abapristi, 
3_13_3_umpristi abheke isifo esisesikhumbeni senyama; uma uboya obusebaleni buphendukile baba mhlophe, nanxa ibala libonakala lishonile kunesikhumba senyama yakhe, kuyisifo sochoko; umpristi uyakumbheka, asho athi ungcolile. 
3_13_4_Uma ibala elikhanyayo limhlophe esikhumbeni senyama yakhe, lingabonakali lishonile kunesikhumba, noboya balo bungaphendukile baba mhlophe, khona umpristi uyakumvalela onesifo izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, 
3_13_5_umpristi ambheke ngosuku lwesikhombisa; uma isifo ngokubona kwakhe sisemi, ibala lingandanga esikhumbeni, bheka, khona umpristi uyakumvalela ezinye izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, 
3_13_6_umpristi abuye ambheke ngosuku lwesikhombisa; uma ibala lifiphele, isifo singandanga esikhumbeni, bheka, khona umpristi uyakusho athi uhlambulukile; kulutwayi; uyakuhlanza izingubo zakhe, ahlambuluke. 
3_13_7_Kepha uma utwayi lwanda esikhumbeni esezibonakalisile kumpristi ngokuhlambuluka kwakhe, abuye eziveze kumpristi,
