3_13_8_umpristi abheke; uma utwayi lwandile esikhumbeni, bheka, khona umpristi uyakusho athi ungcolile; kuluchoko. 
3_13_9_“Nxa isifo sochoko sikumuntu, uyakulethwa kumpristi, 
3_13_10_umpristi abheke; bheka, uma kukhona idunguza elimhlophe esikhumbeni, liphendulile uboya baba mhlophe, nanxa kukhona inyama ebomvu edunguzeni, 
3_13_11_bheka, kuluchoko oludala esikhumbeni senyama yakhe; khona umpristi uyakusho athi ungcolile, angamvaleli, ngokuba ungcolile. 
3_13_12_“Uma uchoko luqhamuka esikhumbeni, ukuze uchoko lusibekele isikhumba sonke sonesifo, kusukela ekhanda kuze kufike ezinyaweni njengokubona kompristi, 
3_13_13_umpristi wobheka; uma uchoko lusibekele yonke inyama yakhe, bheka, uyakusho athi onesifo uhlambulukile; konke kuphendukile kwaba mhlophe: uhlambulukile. 
3_13_14_Kepha njalo uma kuvela kuye inyama ebomvu, uyakuba ngongcolile. 
3_13_15_Umpristi uyakubheka inyama ebomvu, asho athi ungcolile; inyama ebomvu ingcolile, iluchoko. 
3_13_16_Uma-ke inyama ebomvu ibuye iphenduka ibe mhlophe, makaye kumpristi, 
3_13_17_umpristi ambheke; uma ibala liphendukile laba mhlophe, bheka, khona umpristi uyakusho athi onesifo uhlambulukile; uhlambulukile. 
3_13_18_“Nxa inyama ibinethumba esikhumbeni sayo, selaphola, 
3_13_19_kube yidunguza elimhlophe endaweni yethumba noma ibala elikhanyayo, limhlophe libomvana, khona kuyakuboniswa umpristi, 
3_13_20_umpristi abheke; uma libonakala lishonile kunesikhumba, uboya balo buphendukile baba mhlophe, bheka, makasho athi ungcolile: kuyisifo sochoko, siqhamukile ethumbeni. 
3_13_21_Kepha uma umpristi elibheka, kungekho boya obumhlophe kulo, lingashonile kunesikhumba, kodwa lifiphele, bheka, khona umpristi uyakumvalela izinsuku eziyisikhombisa; 
3_13_22_uma landa nokwanda esikhumbeni, umpristi makasho athi ungcolile; kuyisifo. 
3_13_23_Kodwa uma ibala elikhanyayo limi endaweni yalo lingandi, kuyisibanda sethumba; umpristi makasho athi uhlambulukile. 
3_13_24_“Nxa inyama inesibazi esikhumbeni sayo, inyama ebomvu yesibazi iphenduke ibala elikhanyayo, limhlophe libomvana noma limhlophe nje, 
3_13_25_umpristi makalibheke; uma uboya obusebaleni elikhanyayo buphendukile baba mhlophe, libonakala lishonile kunesikhumba, bheka, kuluchoko; luqhamukile esibazini; khona umpristi uyakusho athi ungcolile; kuyisifo sochoko. 
3_13_26_Kepha uma umpristi elibheka, kungekho boya obumhlophe ebaleni elikhanyayo, lingashonile kunesikhumba, kodwa lifiphele, bheka, khona umpristi uyakumvalela izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, 
3_13_27_umpristi ambheke ngosuku lwesikhombisa; uma landile nokwanda esikhumbeni, umpristi uyakusho athi ungcolile; kuyisifo sochoko. 
3_13_28_Uma ibala elikhanyayo limi endaweni yalo, lingandi esikhumbeni, kodwa lifiphele, kuyidunguza lesibazi; umpristi makasho athi uhlambulukile, ngokuba kuyisibanda sesibazi. 
3_13_29_“Nxa owesilisa noma owesifazane enesifo ekhanda noma esilevini, 
3_13_30_umpristi uyakubheka ibala; uma libonakala lishonile kunesikhumba, kube kulo izinwele ezincane ezimpofu, bheka, umpristi makasho athi ungcolile: kungumuna, kuluchoko lwekhanda noma olwesilevu. 
3_13_31_Uma umpristi ebheka ibala lomuna, libonakala lingashonile kunesikhumba, kungekho zinwele ezimnyama kulo, bheka, khona umpristi uyakumvalela onesifo somuna izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, 
3_13_32_ngosuku lwesikhombisa umpristi abheke isifo; uma umuna ungandile, futhi kungekho zinwele ezimpofu kuwo, umuna ubonakala ungashonile kunesikhumba, 
3_13_33_bheka, uyakuziphucula, angaphuculi umuna kodwa, umpristi amvalele onomuna ezinye izinsuku eziyisikhombisa; 
3_13_34_ngosuku lwesikhombisa umpristi abheke umuna; uma umuna ungandile esikhumbeni, futhi ubonakala ungashonile kunesikhumba, bheka, umpristi makasho athi uhlambulukile; makahlanze izingubo zakhe, ahlambuluke. 
3_13_35_Kepha uma umuna wanda esikhumbeni esehlambulukile, 
3_13_36_umpristi wombheka; uma umuna wandile nokwanda esikhumbeni, bheka, umpristi makangafuni izinwele ezimpofu; ungcolile. 
3_13_37_Kodwa uma ngokubona kwakhe umuna umi, kumilile kuwo izinwele ezimnyama, umuna usupholile, uhlambulukile; umpristi makasho athi uhlambulukile. 
3_13_38_“Nanxa owesilisa noma owesifazane enamabala akhanyayo esikhumbeni senyama yabo, amabala amhlophe akhanyayo, 
3_13_39_khona umpristi wobheka; uma amabala akhanyayo asesikhumbeni senyama yabo emhloshana efiphele, bheka, kuyisithembuzane esiqhamukile. 
3_13_40_“Uma izinwele zomuntu zisukile ekhanda lakhe, uyimpandla; uhlambulukile. 
3_13_41_Uma izinwele zisukile ekhanda lakhe ngasebusweni, uyimpandla ebunzini; uhlambulukile. 
3_13_42_Kepha uma kukhona empandleni esekhanda noma empandleni esebunzini isifo esimhlophe sibomvana, kuluchoko oluqhamuka empandleni esekhanda lakhe noma empandleni esebunzini lakhe. 
3_13_43_Khona umpristi uyakumbheka; uma idunguza lesifo limhlophe libomvana empandleni esekhanda lakhe noma empandleni esebunzini lakhe, njengokubonakala kochoko esikhumbeni senyama, 
3_13_44_bheka, ungumuntu onochoko; ungcolile; umpristi makasho athi ungcolile; isifo sakhe sisekhanda lakhe. 
3_13_45_“Onochoko esikuye isifo, maziklejulwe izingubo zakhe, zithukululwe izinwele zakhe, amboze amadevu akhe, akhale athi: ‘Ngingcolile! Ngingcolile!’ 
3_13_46_Zonke izinsuku isifo sisekuye uyakuba ngongcolile; ungcolile; uyakuhlala yedwa; indawo yokuhlala kwakhe iyakuba ngaphandle kwekamu. 
3_13_47_“Ingubo esikuyo isifo sochoko, noma yingubo yoboya noma yingubo yelineni, 
3_13_48_noma sisezintanjeni eziqondileyo noma sikwezinqamulayo, ezelineni noma ezoboya bezimvu, noma sisesikhumbeni, noma sisentweni eyenziwe ngesikhumba, 
3_13_49_uma ibala liluhlazana noma libomvana engutsheni noma esikhumbeni noma ezintanjeni eziqondileyo noma kwezinqamulayo noma entweni yesikhumba, kuyisifo sochoko, siyakuboniswa umpristi. 
3_13_50_Umpristi makabheke isifo, akuvalele lokho okunochoko izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, 
3_13_51_abheke isifo ngosuku lwesikhombisa; uma isifo sandile engutsheni noma ezintanjeni eziqondileyo noma kwezinqamulayo noma esikhumbeni, nakuba isikhumba sisetshenziswa kumuphi umsebenzi, bheka, isifo siluchoko olubi. 
3_13_52_Woshisa ingubo, noma izintanjana eziqondileyo noma ezinqamulayo, noma eyoboya bezimbuzi noma eyelineni, noma into yesikhumba esikuyo isifo, ngokuba kuluchoko olubi; kuyakushiswa ngomlilo. 
3_13_53_“Uma umpristi ebheka, isifo singandile engutsheni noma ezintanjeni eziqondileyo noma kwezinqamulayo noma entweni yesikhumba, 
3_13_54_bheka, umpristi woyala ukuba bahlanze into isifo esikuyo, ayivalele ezinye izinsuku eziyisikhombisa; 
3_13_55_umpristi ayibheke emva kokuhlanzwa kwesifo; bheka, uma ibala lingaphendulile umbala walo, lingandile, ingcolile; woyishisa ngomlilo; kungumcothu odlayo noma iqothukile ngaphakathi noma ngaphandle. 
3_13_56_Uma umpristi ebheka, ibala selifiphele lihlanziwe, bheka, makalintwengule engutsheni noma esikhumbeni noma ezintanjeni eziqondileyo noma kwezinqamulayo; 
3_13_57_uma lisabonakala engutsheni noma ezintanjeni eziqondileyo noma kwezinqamulayo noma entweni yesikhumba, wokushisa ngomlilo lokho isifo esikukho. 
3_13_58_Ingubo noma izintanjana eziqondileyo noma ezinqamulayo noma intoni yesikhumba oyakuyihlanza, uma ibala lisuka kukho, kohlanzwa ngokwesibili, kuhlambuluke.” 
3_13_59_Lowo ungumthetho wesifo sochoko engutsheni yoboya bezimvu noma kweyelineni noma ezintanjeni eziqondileyo noma kwezinqamulayo noma entweni yesikhumba wokusho ukuthi kuhlambulukile noma kungcolile. 
3_14_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_14_2_“Lo uyakuba ngumthetho wonochoko ngosuku lokuhlanjululwa kwakhe: wolethwa kumpristi, 
3_14_3_umpristi aphume ekamu, umpristi abheke; uma isifo sochoko sipholile konochoko, 
3_14_4_bheka, umpristi makayale ukuba oyakuhlanjululwa athathelwe izinyoni ezimbili ezihlambulukileyo nomsedari nendwangu ebomvu nehisopi, 
3_14_5_umpristi ayale ukuba ihlatshwe enye yezinyoni esitsheni sebumba phezu kwamanzi agobhozayo. 
3_14_6_Inyoni ezwayo uyakuyithatha kanye nomsedari nendwangu ebomvu nehisopi, akugcobhoze kanye nenyoni ezwayo egazini lenyoni eyahlatshwa phezu kwamanzi agobhozayo, 
3_14_7_amfafaze kasikhombisa oyakuhlanjululwa ochokweni lwakhe, asho athi uhlambulukile, ayiyeke inyoni ezwayo, iphumele endle. 
3_14_8_“Oyakuhlanjululwa makahlanze izingubo zakhe, aphucule zonke izinwele zakhe, ageze ngamanzi, ahlambuluke; emva kwalokho uyakungena ekamu, kepha ahlale ngaphandle kwetende lakhe izinsuku eziyisikhombisa. 
3_14_9_Kuyakuthi ngosuku lwesikhombisa aphucule zonke izinwele zekhanda lakhe nesilevu sakhe namashiya akhe, yebo, aphucule zonke izinwele zakhe, ahlanze izingubo zakhe, ageze umzimba wakhe ngamanzi, ahlambuluke. 
3_14_10_“Ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili wothatha izimvu zamaduna ezimbili ezingenasici, nexhukazi elinomnyaka munye elingenasici, nokweshumi okuthathu kwempuphu ecolekileyo, kube ngumnikelo wempuphu, kuxovwe namafutha nelogi lamafutha. 
3_14_11_Umpristi ohlambululayo uyakumbeka umuntu oyakuhlanjululwa kanye nalezo zinto phambi kukaJehova ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana; 
3_14_12_umpristi athabathe enye imvu yeduna, anikele ngayo ibe ngumnikelo wecala, nelogi lamafutha, akuzulise kube ngumnikelo wokuzuliswa phambi kukaJehova; 
3_14_13_uyakuhlaba imvu yeduna endaweni lapho kuhlatshwa khona umnikelo wesono nomnikelo wokushiswa, indawo engcwele, ngokuba umnikelo wecala ungowompristi njengomnikelo wesono; ungcwelengcwele. 
3_14_14_Umpristi wothabatha igazi kuwo umnikelo wecala, umpristi alibhece esicutshini sendlebe yokunene yoyakuhlanjululwa, nasesithupheni sesandla sakhe sokunene, nakuqukula wonyawo lwakhe lokunene, 
3_14_15_umpristi athabathe kulo ilogi lamafutha, awathele entendeni yesakhe isandla sokhohlo; 
3_14_16_umpristi agcobhoze umunwe wakhe wokunene emafutheni asesandleni sakhe sokhohlo, afafaze ngamafutha phambi kukaJehova kasikhombisa ngomunwe wakhe. 
3_14_17_Amafutha aseleyo asesandleni sakhe umpristi uyakuwabheca esicutshini sendlebe yokunene yoyakuhlanjululwa, nasesithupheni sesandla sakhe sokunene, nakuqukula wonyawo lwakhe lokunene, phezu kwegazi lomnikelo wecala. 
3_14_18_Amafutha aseleyo asesandleni sompristi uyakuwafaka ekhanda loyakuhlanjululwa, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana phambi kukaJehova. 
3_14_19_“Umpristi wonikela ngomnikelo wesono, amenzele oyakuhlanjululwa ukubuyisana ngenxa yokungcola kwakhe, andukuba ahlabe umnikelo wokushiswa, 
3_14_20_umpristi anikele ngomnikelo wokushiswa nangomnikelo wempuphu e-altare, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana, ahlambuluke. 
3_14_21_“Uma empofu, engenakuphumelela kulokho, wothabatha imvu yeduna ibe ngumnikelo wecala, uzuliswe ukumenzela ukubuyisana, nokweshumi kwempuphu ecolekileyo exovwe namafutha, kube ngumnikelo wempuphu, nelogi lamafutha, 
3_14_22_namahobhe amabili noma amaphuphu amabili amajuba, njengalokho angaphumelela kukho, elinye libe ngumnikelo wesono, elinye libe ngumnikelo wokushiswa. 
3_14_23_“Ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili awalethe kumpristi ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana phambi kukaJehova ngenxa yokuhlanjululwa kwakhe. 
3_14_24_Umpristi abesethabatha imvu yomnikelo wecala nelogi lamafutha, umpristi akuzulise kube ngumnikelo wokuzuliswa phambi kukaJehova; 
3_14_25_ahlabe imvu yomnikelo wecala, umpristi athabathe kulo igazi lomnikelo wecala, alibhece esicutshini sendlebe yokunene yoyakuhlanjululwa, nasesithupheni sesandla sakhe sokunene, nakuqukula wonyawo lwakhe lokunene; 
3_14_26_umpristi athele amafutha entendeni yesakhe isandla sokhohlo kasikhombisa; 
3_14_27_umpristi afafaze ngamafutha asesandleni sakhe sokhohlo kasikhombisa phambi kukaJehova ngomunwe wakhe wokunene; 
3_14_28_umpristi athabathe kuwo amafutha asesandleni sakhe, awabhece esicutshini sendlebe yokunene yoyakuhlanjululwa, nasesithupheni sesandla sakhe sokunene, nakuqukula wonyawo lwakhe lokunene, endaweni yegazi lomnikelo wecala; 
3_14_29_amafutha aseleyo asesandleni sompristi wowabeka ekhanda loyakuhlanjululwa ukumenzela ukubuyisana phambi kukaJehova. 
3_14_30_Uyakunikela ngelinye lamahobhe noma ngelamaphuphu amajuba, njengalokho angaphumelela kukho, 
3_14_31_yebo, njengalokho angaphumelela kukho, elinye libe ngumnikelo wesono, elinye libe ngumnikelo wokushiswa kanye nomnikelo wempuphu, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana oyakuhlanjululwa phambi kukaJehova.” 
3_14_32_Lowo ungumthetho wakhe isifo sochoko esikuye, ongenakuphumelela kulokho okuqondene nokuhlambuluka kwakhe. 
3_14_33_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose naku-Aroni, wathi: 
3_14_34_“Kuyakuthi lapho senifikile ezweni laseKhanani engininika lona libe yifa lenu, ngifake isifo sochoko endlini yezwe eniliphiweyo, 
3_14_35_umninindlu makeze amtshele umpristi, athi: ‘Kungathi kubonakele isifo endlini.’ 
3_14_36_Umpristi woyala ukuba bakhiphe okuphakathi endlini, engakangeni umpristi ukuyobona isifo, ukuze kungangcoli konke okusendlini, andukuba umpristi angene ukubona indlu. 
3_14_37_Abesebheka ibala; uma ibala lisezindongeni zendlu, linemishwe eluhlazana noma ebomvana, libonakala lishonile kunodonga, 
3_14_38_bheka, khona umpristi wophuma endlini, aye ngasemnyango wendlu, ayivale indlu izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, 
3_14_39_umpristi abuye ngosuku lwesikhombisa, abheke; uma ibala landile odongeni lwendlu, 
3_14_40_bheka, khona umpristi woyala ukuba bakhiphe amatshe isifo esikuwo, bawalahle endaweni engcolileyo ngaphandle komuzi; 
3_14_41_indlu iphalwe phakathi nxazonke, bathele udaka oluphaliweyo endaweni engcolileyo ngaphandle komuzi. 
3_14_42_Bothabatha amanye amatshe, bawafake endaweni yalawo matshe, bathabathe olunye udaka, bayinameke indlu. 
3_14_43_“Uma isifo sibuye siqhamuka endlini emva kokukhishwa kwamatshe nasemva kokuphalwa kwendlu nasemva kokunamekwa kwayo, 
3_14_44_umpristi uyakungena abheke; uma isifo sandile endlini, bheka, kuluchoko olubi endlini; ingcolile. 
3_14_45_Woyibhidliza, amatshe ayo namapulangwe ayo nalo lonke udaka lwendlu akukhiphe emzini, akulahle endaweni engcolileyo. 
3_14_46_“Ongena endlini ngezinsuku isavaliwe uyakuba ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_14_47_Olala endlini makahlanze izingubo zakhe; nodlayo endlini makahlanze izingubo zakhe. 
3_14_48_“Uma umpristi engena azobheka, isifo singandile endlini emva kokunamekwa kwendlu, bheka, khona umpristi uyakusho athi indlu ihlambulukile, ngokuba isifo sipholile. 
3_14_49_Wothabatha, ukuba ahlambulukise indlu, izinyoni ezimbili nomsedari nendwangu ebomvu nehisopi, 
3_14_50_ahlabe enye yezinyoni esitsheni sebumba phezu kwamanzi agobhozayo, 
3_14_51_athabathe umsedari nehisopi nendwangu ebomvu nenyoni ezwayo, akugcobhoze egazini lenyoni ehlatshiweyo nasemanzini agobhozayo, afafaze indlu kasikhombisa, 
3_14_52_ahlambulule indlu ngegazi lenyoni ezwayo nangomsedari nangehisopi nangendwangu ebomvu, 
3_14_53_ayiyeke inyoni ezwayo, iphume emzini iye endle, ayenzele kanjalo indlu ukubuyisana; iyakuhlambuluka.” 
3_14_54_Lowo ungumthetho wesifo sochoko esiyizinhlobonhlobo nowomuna, 
3_14_55_nowochoko lwengubo nolwendlu, 
3_14_56_nowedunguza nowotwayi nowebala elikhanyayo, 
3_14_57_ukufundisa nxa kungcolile nanxa kuhlambulukile; yilowo ongumthetho wochoko. 
3_15_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose naku-Aroni, wathi: 
3_15_2_“Yishoni kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, nithi kubo: ‘Nxa owesilisa ecucuza emzimbeni wakhe, ungcolile ngokucucuza kwakhe. 
3_15_3_Lokhu kuyakuba ngukungcola kwakhe ngokucucuza kwakhe: noma umzimba wakhe ucucuza, noma umzimba wakhe uvimbekile ekucucuzeni kwakhe, kungukungcola kwakhe. 
3_15_4_“ ‘Yonke imibhede alala kuyo ocucuzayo iyakuba ngengcolile; nezinto zonke ahlala kuzo ziyakuba ngezingcolile. 
3_15_5_Yilowo nalowo othinta umbhede wakhe uyakuhlanza izingubo zakhe, ageze ngamanzi, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_6_Ohlala entweni ahlale kuyo ocucuzayo uyakuhlanza izingubo zakhe, ageze ngamanzi, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_7_“ ‘Othinta inyama yocucuzayo uyakuhlanza izingubo zakhe, ageze ngamanzi, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_8_“ ‘Uma ocucuzayo emfela ngamathe ohlambulukileyo, yena uyakuhlanza izingubo zakhe, ageze ngamanzi, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_9_“ ‘Zonke izihlalo akhwela kuzo ocucuzayo ziyakuba ngezingcolile. 
3_15_10_Bonke abathinta into eyayiphansi kwakhe bayakuba ngabangcolile kuze kuhlwe, nalowo othwala lezo zinto uyakuhlanza izingubo zakhe, ageze ngamanzi, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_11_“ ‘Nalowo ocucuzayo amthinta, engahashazanga izandla zakhe ngamanzi, uyakuhlanza izingubo zakhe, ageze ngamanzi, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_12_“ ‘Isitsha sebumba asithinta ocucuzayo siyakwaphulwa, nazo zonke izitsha zomuthi ziyakuhashazwa ngamanzi. 
3_15_13_“ ‘Nxa ocucuzayo ehlambulukile ekucucuzeni kwakhe, uyakuzibalela izinsuku eziyisikhombisa zokuhlanjululwa kwakhe, ahlanze izingubo zakhe, ageze umzimba wakhe ngamanzi agobhozayo, ahlambuluke. 
3_15_14_Ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili wozithabathela amahobhe amabili noma amaphuphu amabili amajuba, eze phambi kukaJehova ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, awanike umpristi: 
3_15_15_umpristi anikele ngawo, elinye libe ngumnikelo wesono, elinye libe ngumnikelo wokushiswa, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana phambi kukaJehova ngenxa yokucucuza kwakhe. 
3_15_16_“ ‘Nxa umuntu eshaywa yizibuko, uyakugeza wonke umzimba wakhe ngamanzi, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_17_Zonke izingubo nazo zonke izikhumba elikuzo izibuko lakhe ziyakuhlanzwa ngamanzi, zibe ngezingcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_18_Nowesifazane elale naye indoda, imlalile yamthela ngamalotha, bayakugeza bobabili ngamanzi, babe ngabangcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_19_“ ‘Uma owesifazane ecucuza, ukucucuza kwakhe kube yigazi, uyakuhlala engcolile izinsuku eziyisikhombisa; bonke abamthintayo bayakuba ngabangcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_20_“ ‘Zonke izinto alala kuzo ekungcoleni kwakhe ziyakuba ngezingcolile; nakho konke ahlala kukho kuyakuba ngokungcolile. 
3_15_21_Yilowo nalowo othinta umbhede wakhe uyakuhlanza izingubo zakhe, ageze ngamanzi, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_22_Yilowo nalowo othinta noma intoni ahlala kuyo uyakuhlanza izingubo zakhe, ageze ngamanzi, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_23_Uma kusembhedeni noma kukuyiphi into ahlala kuyo, nxa kuthintwa ngumuntu, yena uyakuhlala engcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_24_“ ‘Uma indoda ilala naye, ukungcola kwakhe kube kuyo, iyakuba ngengcolile izinsuku eziyisikhombisa; nayo yonke imibhede alala kuyo iyakuba ngengcolile. 
3_15_25_“ ‘Uma owesifazane ecucuza igazi lakhe izinsuku eziningi, zingabi ngezokungcola kwakhe, noma ecucuza kudlula isikhathi sokungcola kwakhe, zonke izinsuku zokucucuza kokungcola kwakhe uyakuba njengasezinsukwini zokungcola kwakhe; ungcolile. 
3_15_26_Imibhede yonke alala kuyo zonke izinsuku zokucucuza kwakhe iyakuba kuye njengombhede wokungcola kwakhe; zonke izinto ahlala kuzo ziyakuba ngezingcolile njengokungcola kwefindo lakhe. 
3_15_27_Yilowo nalowo othinta lezo zinto uyakuba ngongcolile, ahlanze izingubo zakhe, ageze ngamanzi, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe. 
3_15_28_“ ‘Kepha uma ehlambuluka ekucucuzeni kwakhe, makazibalele izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, andukuba ahlambuluke. 
3_15_29_Ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili wozithabathela amahobhe amabili noma amaphuphu amabili amajuba, awalethe kumpristi ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana. 
3_15_30_Umpristi uyakunikela ngelinye libe ngumnikelo wesono, elinye libe ngumnikelo wokushiswa, umpristi amenzele ukubuyisana phambi kukaJehova ngenxa yokucucuza kokungcola kwakhe. 
3_15_31_“ ‘Kanjalo niyakwahlukanisa abantwana bakwa-Israyeli nokungcola kwabo ukuba bangafi ekungcoleni kwabo, lapho bengcolisa itabernakele lami eliphakathi kwabo.’ ” 
3_15_32_Lowo ungumthetho wocucuzayo nowoshaywa yizibuko, aze angcole ngakho, 
3_15_33_nowogula ngokungcola kwakhe, nowocucuzayo, umlisa noma owesifazane, nowakhe olala nongcolileyo. 
3_16_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose emva kokufa kwamadodana ka-Aroni ekusondeleni kwawo phambi kukaJehova, afa. 
3_16_2_UJehova wathi kuMose: “Khuluma ku-Aroni umfowenu ukuba angangeni njalo endaweni engcwele ngaphakathi kwesihenqo ngaphambi kwesihlalo somusa esiphezu komphongolo, ukuze angafi, ngokuba ngiyakubonakala efwini phezu kwesihlalo somusa.” 
3_16_3_U-Aroni kangene endaweni engcwele nalokhu: iduna, libe ngumnikelo wesono, nenqama, ibe ngumnikelo wokushiswa, 
3_16_4_embathe ibhantshi elingcwele lelineni, abe nebhulukwe lelineni emzimbeni wakhe, abhince ibhande lelineni, afake isigqoko selineni; lezi ziyizambatho ezingcwele; uyakugeza umzimba wakhe ngamanzi, azembathe. 
3_16_5_Wothabatha enhlanganweni yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli izimpongo ezimbili zibe ngumnikelo wesono, nenqama ibe ngumnikelo wokushiswa. 
3_16_6_U-Aroni kanikele ngenkunzi yomnikelo wesono engenxa yakhe, azenzele yena nendlu yakhe ukubuyisana. 
3_16_7_Wothabatha izimpongo zombili, azibeke phambi kukaJehova ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana. 
3_16_8_U-Aroni uyakwenza inkatho ngezimpongo zombili, enye inkatho ibe ngekaJehova, enye inkatho ibe ngeka-Azazeli. 
3_16_9_U-Aroni wonikela ngempongo edliwe yinkatho kaJehova, anikele ngayo ibe ngumnikelo wesono. 
3_16_10_Kepha impongo edliwe yinkatho ka-Azazeli iyakubekwa phambi kukaJehova isezwa ukuba kwenziwe ukubuyisana ngayo, ithunywe ku-Azazeli ehlane. 
3_16_11_U-Aroni wonikela ngenkunzi yomnikelo wesono engenxa yakhe, azenzele yena nendlu yakhe ukubuyisana, ahlabe inkunzi yomnikelo wesono engenxa yakhe. 
3_16_12_Wothabatha umcengezi womlilo ogcwele amalahle omlilo ase-altare phambi kukaJehova, izandla zakhe zigcwele impepho ethaphukayo icolisisiwe, akulethe ngaphakathi kwesihenqo, 
3_16_13_abeke impepho emlilweni phambi kukaJehova ukuba ifu lempepho lisibekele isihlalo somusa esiphezu kobufakazi, ukuze angafi; 
3_16_14_athabathe kulo igazi lenkunzi, afafaze ngalo isihlalo somusa ngasempumalanga ngomunwe wakhe, nangaphambi kwesihlalo somusa afafaze ngegazi kasikhombisa ngomunwe wakhe. 
3_16_15_Abesehlaba impongo yomnikelo wesono engenxa yabantu, alethe igazi layo ngaphakathi kwesihenqo, enze ngegazi layo njengalokho wenza ngegazi lenkunzi, afafaze ngalo isihlalo somusa nangaphambi kwesihlalo somusa, 
3_16_16_enzele indawo engcwele ukubuyisana ngenxa yokungcola kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli nangenxa yeziphambeko zabo ezonweni zabo zonke; akenzele njalo netende lokuhlangana elihlezi nabo phakathi kokungcola kwabo. 
3_16_17_Akuyikubakho muntu etendeni lokuhlangana, nxa engena ukwenza ukubuyisana endaweni engcwele aze aphume, azenzele ukubuyisana, yena nendlu yakhe nebandla lonke lakwa-Israyeli. 
3_16_18_Uyakuphuma, aye e-altare eliphambi kukaJehova, alenzele ukubuyisana, athabathe kulo igazi lenkunzi nakulo igazi lempongo, alibhece ezimpondweni ze-altare nxazonke. 
3_16_19_Uyakulifafaza ngegazi kasikhombisa ngomunwe wakhe, alihlambulule, alingcwelise ekungcoleni kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli. 
3_16_20_Eseqedile ukwenzela indawo engcwele ukubuyisana, netende lokuhlangana ne-altare, uyakunikela ngempongo ezwayo; 
3_16_21_u-Aroni abeke izandla zakhe zombili enhloko yempongo ezwayo, avume phezu kwayo bonke ububi babantwana bakwa-Israyeli neziphambeko ezonweni zabo zonke, akubeke enhloko yempongo, ayithume ngesandla somuntu olungiselwe lokhu, iye ehlane, 
3_16_22_impongo ithwale ububi babo bonke, iye nabo kwahlongasibi, bayiyeke impongo ehlane. 
3_16_23_U-Aroni uyakungena etendeni lokuhlangana, akhumule izambatho zelineni azembetheyo ekungeneni kwakhe endaweni engcwele, azishiye khona. 
3_16_24_Uyakugeza umzimba wakhe ngamanzi endaweni engcwele, agqoke izambatho zakhe, aphume, anikele ngomnikelo wakhe wokushiswa nangomnikelo wokushiswa wabantu, azenzele yena nabantu ukubuyisana. 
3_16_25_Amanoni omnikelo wesono uyakuwashisa e-altare. 
3_16_26_Ovuma ukuba impongo iye ku-Azazeli uyakuhlanza izingubo zakhe, ageze umzimba wakhe ngamanzi, andukuba angene ekamu. 
3_16_27_Inkunzi yomnikelo wesono nempongo yomnikelo wesono, elangeniswa igazi lazo ukwenza ukubuyisana endaweni engcwele, ziyakukhishelwa ngaphandle kwekamu, kushiswe ngomlilo izikhumba zazo nenyama yazo nomswani wazo. 
3_16_28_Ozishisayo wohlanza izingubo zakhe, ageze umzimba wakhe ngamanzi, andukuba angene ekamu. 
3_16_29_Lokhu kuyakuba yisimiso esiphakade kini: ngenyanga yesikhombisa ngolweshumi lwenyanga niyakuthobisa imiphefumulo yenu, ningasebenzi msebenzi, owokuzalwa ekhaya nomfokazi ogogobeleyo phakathi kwenu. 
3_16_30_Ngokuba ngalolo suku niyakwenzelwa ukubuyisana ukuba nihlanjululwe; niyakuhlambuluka ezonweni zenu zonke phambi kukaJehova. 
3_16_31_Kuyisabatha lokuphumula okuzothileyo kini; anothobisa imiphefumulo yenu; kuyisimiso esiphakade. 
3_16_32_Umpristi oyakugcotshwa ahlukaniselwe abe ngumpristi esikhundleni sikayise uyakwenza ukubuyisana, afake izambatho zelineni, izambatho ezingcwele, 
3_16_33_enzele indlu engcwele ukubuyisana, enzele abapristi nabantu bonke bebandla ukubuyisana. 
3_16_34_Lokho kuyakuba yisimiso esiphakade kini ukwenzela abantwana bakwa-Israyeli ukubuyisana ngenxa yezono zabo zonke kanye ngomnyaka. Wenza-ke njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
3_17_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_17_2_“Yisho ku-Aroni, nakumadodana akhe, nakubo bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi kubo: ‘Lokhu kuyikho ayale ngakho uJehova, ethi: 
3_17_3_Yilowo nalowo muntu wendlu yakwa-Israyeli ohlaba inkunzi noma imvana noma imbuzi ekamu, noma eyibulala ngaphandle kwekamu, 
3_17_4_engayilethanga emnyango wetende lokuhlangana ukunikela ngayo ibe ngumnikelo kaJehova ngaphambi kwetabernakele likaJehova, lowo muntu wobalelwa icala legazi; uchithile igazi; lowo muntu uyakunqunywa kubantu bakubo. 
3_17_5_Ngalokho abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bayakuletha imihlatshelo yabo abayihlaba endle, bayilethe kuJehova ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, kumpristi, banikele ngayo ibe yiminikelo yokuthula kuJehova. 
3_17_6_Umpristi wofafaza ngegazi i-altare likaJehova ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, ashise amanoni, abe yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova. 
3_17_7_Abasayikuhlabela amademoni imihlatshelo yabo abaye kuwo ukuphinga. Lokho kuyakuba yisimiso esiphakade kubo ezizukulwaneni zabo.’ 
3_17_8_“Wothi kubo: ‘Yilowo nalowo muntu wendlu yakwa-Israyeli noma owabafokazi abagogobeleyo phakathi kwabo onikela ngomnikelo wokushiswa noma ngomhlatshelo, 
3_17_9_engayilethi emnyango wetende lokuhlangana ukunikela ngawo kuJehova, lowo muntu uyakunqunywa kubantu bakubo. 
3_17_10_“ ‘Yilowo nalowo muntu wendlu yakwa-Israyeli noma owabafokazi abagogobeleyo phakathi kwabo odla igazi noma yiliphi, ngiyakumisa ubuso bami bumelane nalowo muntu odla igazi, ngimnqume kubantu bakubo. 
3_17_11_Ngokuba umphefumulo womzimba usegazini; ngimnike lona e-altare ukwenzela imiphefumulo yenu ukubuyisana, lokhu kuyigazi elenza ukubuyisana ngomphefumulo. 
3_17_12_Ngalokho ngathi kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli: “Makungabikho muntu kini odla igazi; nomfokazi ogogobeleyo phakathi kwenu makangadli igazi.” 
3_17_13_“ ‘Yilowo nalowo muntu wabantwana bakwa-Israyeli noma owabafokazi abagogobeleyo phakathi kwabo ozingela, abambe isilwane noma inyoni edliwayo, makachithe igazi layo, alisibekele ngothuli. 
3_17_14_Ngokuba umphefumulo wenyama yonke, igazi layo lihlangene nomphefumulo wayo; ngalokho ngathi kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli: “Maningadli igazi lenyama noma iyiphi, ngokuba umphefumulo wenyama yonke uyigazi layo; yilowo nalowo oyidlayo uyakunqunywa.” 
3_17_15_“ ‘Yilowo nalowo odla ingcuba noma lokho okudweshulwe yizilo, noma engowokuzalwa ekhaya noma engumfokazi, makahlanze izingubo zakhe, ageze ngamanzi, abe ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe; khona uyakuhlambuluka. 
3_17_16_Kepha uma engazihlanzi, angagezi umzimba wakhe, uyakuthwala ububi bakhe.’ ” 
3_18_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_18_2_“Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi kubo: ‘NginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. 
3_18_3_Ningenzi njengokwemisebenzi yezwe laseGibithe enahlala kulo, ningenzi futhi njengokwemisebenzi yezwe laseKhanani enginiyisa kulo, ningahambi ngemithetho yabo. 
3_18_4_Nenze izahlulelo zami, nigcine imithetho yami ukuba nihambe ngayo; nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. 
3_18_5_Ngalokho anogcina izimiso zami nezahlulelo zami; uma umuntu ezenza, uyakuphila ngazo; nginguJehova. 
3_18_6_“ ‘Makungasondeli muntu kowakubo ukwambula ubunqunu bakhe; nginguJehova. 
3_18_7_“ ‘Ubunqunu bukayihlo, ubunqunu bukanyoko, ungabambuli, ungunyoko; ungambuli ubunqunu bakhe. 
3_18_8_“ ‘Ubunqunu bomkayihlo ungabambuli; kungubunqunu bukayihlo. 
3_18_9_“ ‘Ungambuli ubunqunu bukadadewenu, indodakazi kayihlo noma indodakazi kanyoko, noma ezelwe kini, noma ezelwe kwelinye; ungambuli ubunqunu babo. 
3_18_10_“ ‘Ungambuli ubunqunu bendodakazi yendodana yakho noma obendodakazi yendodakazi yakho; awuyikwambula ubunqunu babo, ngokuba obabo bungubunqunu bakho. 
3_18_11_“ ‘Ungambuli ubunqunu bendodakazi yomkayihlo, ezelwe nguyihlo; ungudadewenu; awuyikwambula ubunqunu bakhe. 
3_18_12_“ ‘Ungambuli ubunqunu bukadadewabo kayihlo; uyisihlobo sikayihlo. 
3_18_13_“ ‘Ungambuli ubunqunu bukadadewabo kanyoko, ngokuba uyisihlobo sikanyoko. 
3_18_14_“ ‘Ungambuli ubunqunu bomfowabo kayihlo, ungasondeli kumkakhe; unguyihlokazi. 
3_18_15_“ ‘Ungambuli ubunqunu bukamalokazana wakho; ungumkandodana yakho; awuyikwambula ubunqunu bakhe. 
3_18_16_“ ‘Ungambuli ubunqunu bomkamfowenu; kungubunqunu bomfowenu. 
3_18_17_“ ‘Ungambuli ubunqunu bowesifazane kanye nobendodakazi yakhe; ungathathi indodakazi yendodana yakhe, noma indodakazi yendodakazi yakhe ukwambula ubunqunu bayo, ngokuba bayizihlobo; kungukonakala. 
3_18_18_“ ‘Ungathathi owesifazane kanye nodadewabo ukuba wambule ubunqunu bakhe kanye nomunye esekhona, aze ambange. 
3_18_19_“ ‘Ungasondeli kowesifazane, wambule ubunqunu bakhe esangcolile ngokungcola kwakhe. 
3_18_20_“ ‘Ungalali nomkamakhelwane ukuzingcolisa ngaye. 
3_18_21_“ ‘Unganikeli ngenzalo yakho ukuyahlukanisela kuMoloki, ungahlambalazi igama likaNkulunkulu wakho; nginguJehova. 
3_18_22_“ ‘Ungalali nowesilisa njenganowesifazane; kuyisinengiso. 
3_18_23_“ ‘Ungalali nesilwane ukuzingcolisa ngaso; nowesifazane makangemi phambi kwesilwane ukuba alale naso; kuyichilo. 
3_18_24_“ ‘Ningazingcolisi nangeyodwa yalezo zinto, ngokuba ngazo zonke lezo zingcolile lezi zizwe engizixosha phambi kwakho. 
3_18_25_Izwe lingcolile; ngalokho ngahambela ububi balo kulo, izwe lahlanza abantu balo. 
3_18_26_Gcinani izimiso zami nezahlulelo zami, ningenzi nesisodwa salezo zinengiso, noma owokuzalwa ekhaya noma umfokazi ogogobeleyo phakathi kwenu 
3_18_27_ngokuba zonke lezo zinengiso bazenza abantu balelo zwe ababekhona ngaphambi kwenu, izwe selangcola 
3_18_28_ukuze izwe linganihlanzi nani, nxa nilingcolisa, njengalokho lahlanza isizwe esasikhona phambi kwenu. 
3_18_29_“ ‘Ngokuba bonke abenza lezo zinengiso, yebo, abazenzayo bayakunqunywa kubantu bakubo. 
3_18_30_Ngalokho gcinani isiyalezo sami ukuba ningenzi nalinye lalawo masiko anengekayo, ayenziwa ngaphambi kwenu, ningazingcolisi ngawo; nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu.’ ” 
3_19_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_19_2_“Yisho kuyo yonke inhlangano yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi kuyo: ‘Niyakuba ngcwele, ngokuba mina Jehova uNkulunkulu wenu ngingcwele. 
3_19_3_“ ‘Yilowo nalowo makahloniphe unina noyise, nigcine amasabatha ami; nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. 
3_19_4_“ ‘Ningaphendukeli kuzo izithombe, ningazenzeli onkulunkulu ababunjiweyo; nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. 
3_19_5_“ ‘Nxa ninikela kuJehova ngomhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula, anonikela ngawo ukuba namukeleke. 
3_19_6_Uyakudliwa ngosuku lokunikela kwenu nangakusasa; uma kusele okuthile kuze kube lusuku lwesithathu, kuyakushiswa ngomlilo. 
3_19_7_Uma kudliwa nokuncane ngosuku lwesithathu, kuyisinengiso; awuyikwamukeleka; 
3_19_8_yilowo nalowo owudlayo uyakuthwala ububi bakhe, ngokuba udumazile okungcwele kukaNkulunkulu; lowo muntu uyakunqunywa kubantu bakubo. 
3_19_9_“ ‘Nxa nivuna isivuno sezwe lakini, awuyikuvuna ngokupheleleyo emagumbini ensimu yakho, ungakhothozi umkhothozo wesivuno sakho. 
3_19_10_Awuyikukhothoza isivini sakho, ungabuthi izithelo zesivini ezivuthulukileyo; wozishiyela abampofu nabafokazi; nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. 
3_19_11_“ ‘Ningebi, ningakhohlisani, ningaqambelani amanga. 
3_19_12_“ ‘Ningafungeli igama lami amanga, uze uhlambalaze igama likaNkulunkulu; nginguJehova. 
3_19_13_“ ‘Ungamcindezeli umakhelwane wakho, ungamphangi; inkokhelo yomqashwa ayiyikuhlala kuwe ubusuku bonke kuze kuse. 
3_19_14_“ ‘Ungaqalekisi isithulu, ungabeki isikhubekiso phambi kwempumputhe, kepha wesabe uNkulunkulu wakho; nginguJehova. 
3_19_15_“ ‘Ningenzi ukungalungi ekwahluleleni; ungakhethi ubuso bompofu, ungavuni ubuso bomkhulu, kepha wahlulele umakhelwane wakho ngokulunga. 
3_19_16_“ ‘Ungahambahambi ucetheza phakathi kwabantu bakho, ungamelani nokuphila komakhelwane wakho; nginguJehova. 
3_19_17_“ ‘Ungazondi umfowenu enhliziyweni yakho; ungamkhuza nokumkhuza umakhelwane wakho, kepha ungabi nasono ngaye. 
3_19_18_“ ‘Ungaphindisi, ungabi namagqubu nabantwana babantu bakho, kepha wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena; nginguJehova. 
3_19_19_“ ‘Niyakugcina izimiso zami; ungavumeli izilwane zakho zizekwe ngolunye uhlobo; ungahlwanyeli ensimini yakho izinhlobo ezimbili zembewu; kungezi phezu kwakho ingubo eyizinhlobonhlobo zezintanjana. 
3_19_20_“ ‘Olala nowesifazane oyisigqilakazi eyingoduso, engahlengiwe, engakhululiwe ngesihle, makabe nesijeziso, angabulawa nokho, ngokuba wayengakhululekile. 
3_19_21_Uyakuletha umnikelo wakhe wecala kuJehova ngasemnyango wetende lokuhlangana, inqama ibe ngumnikelo wecala. 
3_19_22_Umpristi uyakumenzela ukubuyisana ngenqama yomnikelo wecala phambi kukaJehova ngesono sakhe one ngaso, athethelelwe isono sakhe one ngaso. 
3_19_23_“ ‘Nanxa senifikile ezweni, nitshale imithi eyizinhlobonhlobo edliwayo, anothi izithelo zayo zingukungasoki kwayo; iminyaka emithathu iyakuba njengengasokiwe kini: mazingadliwa. 
3_19_24_Kepha ngomnyaka wesine zonke izithelo zayo ziyakuba ngcwele, ezokumdumisa uJehova. 
3_19_25_Ngomnyaka wesihlanu niyakudla kuzo izithelo zayo, ukuze inithelele kakhulu; nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. 
3_19_26_“ ‘Aniyikudla lutho olunegazi, ningenzi imilingo, ningahloli imihlola. 
3_19_27_“ ‘Aniyikudilinga amakhanda enu emaceleni; ungoni isilevu sakho emaceleni. 
3_19_28_“ ‘Aniyikuzigcaba emizimbeni yenu ngenxa yabafileyo, ningazilobi amabala; nginguJehova. 
3_19_29_“ ‘Awuyikuhlambalaza indodakazi yakho ukuyenza isifebe, funa izwe lehlelwe ngubufebe, izwe ligcwale ukonakala. 
3_19_30_“ ‘Anogcina amasabatha ami, nihloniphe indlu yami engcwele; nginguJehova. 
3_19_31_“ ‘Ningaphendukeli kwabanamadlozi nakubathakathi, ningabafuni ukuba ningcoliswe yibo; nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. 
3_19_32_“ ‘Wosukuma phambi kwempunga, uhloniphe ubuso bomuntu omdala, umesabe uNkulunkulu wakho; nginguJehova. 
3_19_33_“ ‘Uma umfokazi egogobele kuwe ezweni lakini, aniyikumhlupha. 
3_19_34_Umfokazi ogogobeleyo kini uyakuba kini njengowokuzalwa ekhaya phakathi kwenu, umthande njengalokhu uzithanda wena, ngokuba naningabafokazi ezweni laseGibithe; nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. 
3_19_35_“ ‘Aniyikwenza ukungalungi ekwahluleleni, ekulinganiseni ubude noma isisindo noma ubuningi. 
3_19_36_Niyakuba nezilinganiso ezilungileyo, nezisindo ezilungileyo, ne-efa elilungileyo, nehini elilungileyo; nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu owanikhipha ezweni laseGibithe. 
3_19_37_“ ‘Anogcina zonke izimiso zami nazo zonke izahlulelo zami, nizenze; nginguJehova.’ ” 
3_20_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_20_2_“Futhi uyakusho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Yilowo nalowo wabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, noma owabafokazi abagogobeleyo kwa-Israyeli, onikela ngenzalo yakhe kuMoloki, wobulawa nokubulawa, abantu balelo zwe bamkhande ngamatshe. 
3_20_3_Ngiyakubeka ubuso bami bumelane nalowo muntu, ngimnqume kubantu bakubo, ngokuba unikela ngenzalo yakhe kuMoloki ukungcolisa indlu yami engcwele nokuhlambalaza igama lami elingcwele. 
3_20_4_Uma abantu balelo zwe besitheza kancane amehlo abo kulowo muntu, lapho enikela ngenzalo yakhe kuMoloki, bangambulali, 
3_20_5_ngiyakubeka ubuso bami bumelane nalowo muntu nomndeni wakhe, ngimnqume kubantu bakubo kanye nabo bonke abaya kuye ukuphinga, beyophinga noMoloki. 
3_20_6_“ ‘Nalowo muntu ophendukela kwabanamadlozi nakubathakathi ukuya kubo ukuba aphinge, ngiyakubeka ubuso bami bumelane nalowo muntu, ngimnqume kubantu bakubo. 
3_20_7_“ ‘Ngalokho zingcweliseni nibe ngcwele, ngokuba nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. 
3_20_8_Anogcina izimiso zami, nizenze; nginguJehova oningcwelisayo. 
3_20_9_“ ‘Ngokuba yilowo nalowo othuka uyise noma unina wobulawa nokubulawa; uthukile uyise noma unina; igazi lakhe liyakuba phezu kwakhe. 
3_20_10_“ ‘Umuntu ophinga nomfazi womunye umuntu nophinga nomkamakhelwane wakhe, isiphingi nesiphingikazi ziyakubulawa nokubulawa. 
3_20_11_“ ‘Umuntu olala nomkayise wambulile ubunqunu bukayise; bobabili bobulawa nokubulawa, igazi labo libe phezu kwabo. 
3_20_12_“ ‘Uma umuntu elala nomalokazana wakhe, bobabili bobulawa nokubulawa; benzile ichilo; igazi labo malibe phezu kwabo. 
3_20_13_“ ‘Uma indoda ilala nowesilisa njenganowesifazane, bobabili benzile isinengiso; bobulawa nokubulawa, igazi labo libe phezu kwabo. 
3_20_14_“ ‘Uma umuntu ethatha umfazi kanye nonina, kungukonakala; bayakushiswa ngomlilo yena nabo, ukuze kungabikho konakala phakathi kwenu. 
3_20_15_“ ‘Uma umuntu elala nesilwane, wobulawa nokubulawa, nisihlabe isilwane. 
3_20_16_“ ‘Uma owesifazane esondela esilwaneni, alale naso, wobulala owesifazane nesilwane; bobulawa nokubulawa, igazi labo libe phezu kwabo. 
3_20_17_“ ‘Uma umuntu ethatha udadewabo, indodakazi kayise noma indodakazi kanina, abone ubunqunu bakhe, naye abone ubunqunu bakhe, kuyihlazo; bayakunqunywa phambi kwabantwana babantu bakubo; wambulile ubunqunu bukadadewabo; uyakuthwala ububi bakhe. 
3_20_18_“ ‘Uma umuntu elala nowesifazane onefindo lakhe, ambule ubunqunu bakhe, unqunisile umthombo wakhe, naye wambulile umthombo wegazi lakhe; bobabili bayakunqunywa kubantu bakubo. 
3_20_19_“ ‘Ungambuli ubunqunu bukadadewabo kanyoko, noma obukadadewabo kayihlo, ngokuba unqunisile isihlobo sakhe; bayakuthwala ububi babo. 
3_20_20_“ ‘Uma umuntu elala nomkayisekazi, wambulile ubunqunu bukayisekazi; bayakuthwala isono sabo; bayakufa beyizimpulule. 
3_20_21_“ ‘Uma umuntu ethatha umkamfowabo, kungukungcola; wambulile ubunqunu bomfowabo; bayakuba yizimpulule. 
3_20_22_“ ‘Ngalokho anogcina zonke izimiso zami, nazo zonke izahlulelo zami, nizenze ukuba izwe lapho nginiyisa khona ukuba nihlale kulo linganihlanzi. 
3_20_23_Aniyikuhamba ngamasiko esizwe engisixosha phambi kwenu, ngokuba benza zonke lezo zinto; ngalokho nganengwa yibo. 
3_20_24_Kepha ngishilo kini ukuthi: “Niyakulidla ifa lezwe labo, ngininike lona libe ngelenu, izwe elichichima ubisi nezinyosi,” nginguJehova onahlukanisile nabezizwe. 
3_20_25_“ ‘Ngalokho anohlukanisa izilwane ezihlambulukileyo nezingcolileyo, izinyoni ezingcolileyo nezihlambulukileyo, ningenzi imiphefumulo yenu inengeke ngesilwane noma ngenyoni noma ngantoni enwabuzelayo emhlabeni, engizahlukanisile nani, ngathi zingcolile. 
3_20_26_Niyakuba ngcwele kimi, ngokuba mina Jehova ngingcwele; nginahlukanisile nabezizwe ukuba nibe ngabami. 
3_20_27_“ ‘Owesilisa noma owesifazane, elikubo idlozi, noma umthakathi bobulawa nokubulawa, bakhandwe ngamatshe, igazi labo libe phezu kwabo.’ ” 
3_21_1_UJehova wathi kuMose: “Khuluma kubapristi, amadodana ka-Aroni, uthi kubo: ‘Makungabikho ozingcolisayo ngofileyo phakathi kwabantu bakubo, 
3_21_2_ngaphandle kwezihlobo ezinyamanye naye, okungukuthi unina, noyise, nendodana yakhe, nendodakazi yakhe, nomfowabo, 
3_21_3_nodadewabo, intombi eseduze naye, engenandoda; angazingcolisa ngaye. 
3_21_4_Akayikuzingcolisa, eyisikhulu phakathi kwabantu bakubo, ukuze azihlambalaze. 
3_21_5_“ ‘Abayikuzigega amakhanda abo, bangasiphuculi isilevu emaceleni, bangazigcabi emzimbeni. 
3_21_6_Bayakuba ngcwele kuNkulunkulu wabo, bangahlambalazi igama likaNkulunkulu wabo, ngokuba banikela ngeminikelo yomlilo kaJehova, isinkwa sikaNkulunkulu wabo; ngalokho bayakuba ngcwele. 
3_21_7_“ ‘Angathathi owesifazane oyisifebe nowonakeleyo, angathathi owesifazane olahliwe yindoda yakhe, ngokuba ungcwele kuNkulunkulu wakhe. 
3_21_8_Ngalokho uyakumngcwelisa, ngokuba unikela ngesinkwa sikaNkulunkulu wakho; uyakuba ngcwele kuwe, ngokuba mina Jehova oningcwelisayo ngingcwele. 
3_21_9_“ ‘Indodakazi yompristi, uma izingcolisa ngokufeba, iyamhlambalaza noyise; yoshiswa ngomlilo. 
3_21_10_“ ‘Ongumpristi omkhulu phakathi kwabafowabo, kuthelwe ekhanda lakhe amafutha okugcoba, nowahlukaniselwa ukuba embathe izambatho, akayikuthukulula izinwele zekhanda lakhe, angaklebhuli izambatho zakhe, 
3_21_11_angangeni nakumuphi umuntu ofileyo, angazingcolisi ngoyise noma ngonina, 
3_21_12_futhi angaphumi endlini engcwele, angahlambalazi indlu engcwele kaNkulunkulu wakhe; ngokuba umqhele wamafutha okugcoba kaNkulunkulu wakhe uphezu kwakhe; nginguJehova. 
3_21_13_“ ‘Wothatha umfazi oseyintombi. 
3_21_14_Umfelokazi noma umfazi olahliweyo noma owesifazane owonakelyo, isifebe, laba akayikubathatha, kepha uyakuthatha intombi yabantu bakubo ibe ngumkakhe. 
3_21_15_Akayikuhlambalaza inzalo yakhe phakathi kwabantu bakhe; ngokuba nginguJehova oningcwelisayo.’ ” 
3_21_16_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_21_17_“Yisho ku-Aroni, uthi: ‘Umuntu wenzalo yakho ezizukulwaneni zayo oyisilima makangasondeli ukunikela ngesinkwa sikaNkulunkulu wakhe. 
3_21_18_Ngokuba umuntu oyisilima akayikusondela: impumputhe noma unyonga, noma onekhala eliyisicaba, noma ozitho zakhe zingalingene, 
3_21_19_noma umuntu ononyawo olwaphukileyo, noma onesandla esaphukileyo, 
3_21_20_noma onesifumbu, noma oyisichwe, noma onomlanga esweni lakhe, noma onesithembuzane, noma onomuna, noma oyisilima ngamasende; 
3_21_21_akungabikho muntu wenzalo ka-Aroni umpristi oyisilima oyakusondela ukunikela ngeminikelo yomlilo kaJehova; uyisilima; makangasondeli ukunikela ngesinkwa sikaNkulunkulu wakhe. 
3_21_22_Uyakudla isinkwa sikaNkulunkulu wakhe, esingcwelengcwele nesingcwele. 
3_21_23_Kuphela akayikungena kuso isihenqo, futhi angasondeli e-altare, ngokuba uyisilima, ukuze angahlambalazi izindlu zami ezingcwele, ngokuba nginguJehova obangcwelisayo. 
3_21_24_UMose wakhuluma lokho ku-Aroni, nakumadodana akhe, nakubo bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli.’ ” 
3_22_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_22_2_“Yisho ku-Aroni nakumadodana akhe ukuba bahlukane nezinto ezingcwele zabantwana bakwa-Israyeli abangingcwelisela zona, bangalihlambalazi igama lami elingcwele; nginguJehova. 
3_22_3_“Yisho kubo ukuthi: ‘Yilowo nalowo wenzalo yenu yonke ezizukulwaneni zenu osondela ezintweni ezingcwele abantwana bakwa-Israyeli abazingcwelisela uJehova, esengcolile, lowo muntu uyakunqunywa, angabikho phambi kwami; nginguJehova. 
3_22_4_“ ‘Yilowo nalowo wenzalo ka-Aroni onochoko noma ocucuzayo akayikudla izinto ezingcwele aze ahlambuluke. Nalowo othinta okungcolile ngabafileyo, noma umuntu oshaywa yizibuko, 
3_22_5_nalowo othinta okunwabuzelayo angangcoliswa ngakho, noma umuntu angangcoliswa ngaye, nakuba enokungcola kuni, 
3_22_6_umuntu othinta okunjalo uyakuba ngongcolile kuze kuhlwe, angazidli izinto ezingcwele, uma engagezi umzimba wakhe ngamanzi. 
3_22_7_Selishonile ilanga uyakuba ngohlambulukile, andukuba adle izinto ezingcwele, ngokuba ziyisinkwa sakhe. 
3_22_8_Ingcuba nokudweshulwe yizilo akayikukudla ukuzingcolisa ngakho; nginguJehova. 
3_22_9_“ ‘Ngalokho abogcina isiyalezo sami, funa babe nesono ngaso, bafele kuso, uma besihlambalaza, nginguJehova obangcwelisayo. 
3_22_10_“ ‘Umfokazi akayikudla okungcwele; umuntu ogogobeleyo wompristi noma umqashwa angadli okungcwele. 
3_22_11_Kepha uma umpristi ethenga umuntu eyintengo yemali yakhe, yena angakudla; nabazelwe emzini wakhe bangadla isinkwa sakhe. 
3_22_12_Uma indodakazi yompristi igana umfokazi, yona mayingadli emnikelweni wokuphakanyiswa wezinto ezingcwele. 
3_22_13_Kepha uma indodakazi yompristi ingumfelokazi noma ingolahliweyo ingenamntwana, bese yibuyela endlini kayise njengasebusheni bayo, iyakudla isinkwa sikayise; kepha umfokazi makangasidli. 
3_22_14_“ ‘Uma umuntu edla okungcwele engazi, wothasisela okwesihlanu kwakho, amnike umpristi okungcwele. 
3_22_15_Abayikuhlambalaza izinto ezingcwele zabantwana bakwa-Israyeli abanikela ngazo kuJehova, 
3_22_16_bangabethwesi ububi obutholisa icala, lapho bedla izinto zabo ezingcwele; ngokuba nginguJehova obangcwelisayo.’ ” 
3_22_17_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_22_18_“Yisho ku-Aroni, nakumadodana akhe, nakubo bonke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi kubo: ‘Yilowo nalowo wendlu ka-Israyeli noma umfokazi kwa-Israyeli onikela ngomnikelo wakhe, noma owesithembiso sakhe noma oweminikelo yakhe yesihle, okunikelwa ngayo kuJehova ibe ngumnikelo wokushiswa, 
3_22_19_ukuze namukeleke, wonikela ngeduna elingenasici lezinkomo, elezimvu noma elezimbuzi. 
3_22_20_Noma yintoni enesici aniyikunikela ngayo; ngokuba aniyikwamukeleka ngayo. 
3_22_21_Umuntu onikela ngomhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula kuJehova ukugcwalisa isithembiso noma owomnikelo wesihle ezinkomeni noma ezimvini, umelwe ukuphelela ukuba wamukeleke, kungabi sici kuwo. 
3_22_22_Ephuphuthekayo noma eyaphukileyo noma elimeleyo noma enesilonda noma enokhwekhwe noma enomuna, ninganikeli ngazo kuJehova, futhi ninganikeli ngazo zibe ngumnikelo womlilo e-altare kuJehova. 
3_22_23_Inkunzi noma imvana enesitho esidluleleyo noma enesitho esincane, unganikela ngazo zibe ngumnikelo wesihle, kepha uma ungowesithembiso awunakwamukeleka. 
3_22_24_Aniyikunikela kuJehova ngento etheniwe ngokukhandwa noma ngokuchotshozwa noma ngokudwengulwa noma ngokunqunywa; ningenzi kanjalo ezweni lakini. 
3_22_25_Aniyikwamukela esandleni sowezizwe, ninikele ngezinjalo zibe yisinkwa sikaNkulunkulu wenu, ngokuba ukonakala kwazo kukuzo, zinobulima; aniyikwamukeleka ngazo.’ ” 
3_22_26_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_22_27_“Nxa kuzalwa inkunzi noma imvu noma imbuzi, iyakuhlala kunina izinsuku eziyisikhombisa; kusukela osukwini lwesishiyagalombili nangasemuva iyakwamukelwa ibe ngumnikelo womlilo kuJehova. 
3_22_28_Noma kuyinkomazi noma imvukazi, aniyikuyihlaba kanye nomntwana wayo ngalusuku lunye. 
3_22_29_“Nxa nihlabela uJehova umhlatshelo wokubonga, niyakumhlabela ukuba namukeleke. 
3_22_30_Uyakudliwa ngalolo suku, ningashiyi lutho lwawo kuze kuse; nginguJehova. 
3_22_31_“Ngalokho anogcina imiyalo yami, niyenze; nginguJehova. 
3_22_32_Ningahlambalazi igama lami elingcwele; kepha ngiyakungcweliswa phakathi kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli; nginguJehova oningcwelisayo, 
3_22_33_owanikhipha ezweni laseGibithe, ngibe nguNkulunkulu wenu; nginguJehova.” 
3_23_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_23_2_“Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi kubo: ‘Imikhosi emisiweyo kaJehova eniyakuyimemezela ibe yimihlangano engcwele, yona iyimikhosi yami emisiweyo. 
3_23_3_“ ‘Umsebenzi uyakwenziwa izinsuku eziyisithupha; kepha ngosuku lwesikhombisa kuyisabatha lokuphumula okuzothileyo, umhlangano ongcwele; ningasebenzi msebenzi; kuyisabatha kuJehova ezindlini zenu zonke. 
3_23_4_“ ‘Nansi imikhosi emisiweyo kaJehova, imihlangano engcwele eniyakuyimemezela ngezikhathi zayo ezimisiweyo. 
3_23_5_Ngenyanga yokuqala ngolweshumi nane lwenyanga kusihlwa kuyiphasika likaJehova. 
3_23_6_Ngosuku lweshumi nanhlanu lwaleyo nyanga kungumkhosi wesinkwa esingenamvubelo kuJehova; niyakudla isinkwa esingenamvubelo izinsuku eziyisikhombisa. 
3_23_7_Ngosuku lokuqala niyakuba nomhlangano ongcwele, ningasebenzi msebenzi. 
3_23_8_Kepha niyakunikela ngomnikelo womlilo kuJehova izinsuku eziyisikhombisa. Ngosuku lwesikhombisa kungumhlangano ongcwele; ningasebenzi msebenzi.’ ” 
3_23_9_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_23_10_“Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi kubo: ‘Nxa nifikile ezweni engininika lona, nivune isivuno salo, anoletha kumpristi isithungu solibo lwesivuno senu; 
3_23_11_yena asizulise isithungu phambi kukaJehova ukuba samukelwe ngenxa yenu; ngakusasa emva kwesabatha umpristi uyakusizulisa. 
3_23_12_Ngalolo suku enizulisa ngalo isithungu, niyakunikela ngemvu yeduna engenasici, enomnyaka munye, ibe ngumnikelo wokushiswa kuJehova. 
3_23_13_Umnikelo wawo wempuphu woba ngokweshumi okubili kwempuphu ecolekileyo, exovwe namafutha, umnikelo womlilo kuJehova, ube yiphunga elimnandi, nomnikelo wawo wokuphuzwa woba ngokwesine kwehini lewayini. 
3_23_14_Aniyikudla isinkwa notshwele nezikhwebu ezintsha, kuze kufike lolo suku, ningakalethi umnikelo kaNkulunkulu wenu; kuyisimiso esiphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu ezindlini zenu zonke. 
3_23_15_“ ‘Anozibalela kusukela kolwangakusasa emva kwesabatha, ngosuku enaletha ngalo isithungu somnikelo wokuzuliswa, kuze kube ngamasabatha ayisikhombisa apheleleyo; 
3_23_16_kuze kufike olwangakusasa emva kwesabatha lesikhombisa anobala izinsuku ezingamashumi ayisihlanu, ninikele ngomnikelo omusha wempuphu kuJehova. 
3_23_17_Maniphume ezindlini zenu nezinkwa ezimbili zokuzuliswa zokweshumi okubili kwempuphu ecolekileyo, ziphekwe nemvubelo, zibe lulibo kuJehova. 
3_23_18_Kanye nesinkwa niyakunikela ngezimvu eziyisikhombisa ezingenasici zinomnyaka munye, neduna nezinqama ezimbili, zibe ngumnikelo wokushiswa kuJehova kanye nomnikelo wazo wempuphu neminikelo yazo yokuphuzwa, umnikelo womlilo, ube yiphunga elimnandi kuJehova. 
3_23_19_Niyakunikela ngempongo ibe ngumnikelo wesono, nezimvu ezimbili zamaduna ezinomnyaka munye, zibe ngumhlatshelo weminikelo yokuthula. 
3_23_20_Umpristi uyakuzizulisa kanye nesinkwa solibo zibe ngumnikelo wokuzuliswa phambi kukaJehova kanye nezimvu ezimbili; ziyakuba ngcwele kuJehova, zibe ngezompristi. 
3_23_21_Niyakumemezela ngalolo suku, nibe nomhlangano ongcwele; ningasebenzi msebenzi; kuyisimiso esiphakade ezindlini zenu zonke ezizukulwaneni zenu. 
3_23_22_“ ‘Nxa nivuna isivuno sezwe lakini, awuyikuvuna ngokupheleleyo emagumbini ensimu yakho, ungakhothozi umkhothozo wesivuno sakho; uwushiyele abampofu nabafokazi; nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wakho.’ ” 
3_23_23_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_23_24_“Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Ngenyanga yesikhombisa ngolokuqala lwenyanga anoba nokuphumula okuzothileyo, isikhumbuzo ngokushaya amacilongo, umhlangano ongcwele. 
3_23_25_Ningasebenzi msebenzi, ninikele ngomnikelo womlilo kuJehova.’ ” 
3_23_26_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_23_27_“Kepha ngolweshumi lwaleyo nyanga yesikhombisa kulusuku lokubuyisana; anoba nomhlangano ongcwele, nithobise imiphefumulo yenu, ninikele ngomnikelo womlilo kuJehova. 
3_23_28_Ningasebenzi msebenzi ngalolo suku, ngokuba kulusuku lokubuyisana ukunenzela ukubuyisana phambi kukaJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. 
3_23_29_Ngokuba yilowo nalowo muntu ongathotshiswa ngalolo suku uyakunqunywa kubantu bakubo. 
3_23_30_Yilowo nalowo muntu owenza umsebenzi othile ngalolo suku, lowo muntu ngiyakumbhubhisa, angabikho kubantu bakubo. 
3_23_31_Ningasebenzi msebenzi; kuyisimiso esiphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu ezindlini zenu zonke. 
3_23_32_Kuyakuba yisabatha lokuphumula okuzothileyo kini, nithobise imiphefumulo yenu; ngolwesishiyagalolunye lwenyanga kusihlwa, kusukela kusihlwa kuze kube kusihlwa, anogcina isabatha lenu.” 
3_23_33_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_23_34_“Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Ngosuku lweshumi nanhlanu lwaleyo nyanga yesikhombisa kungumkhosi wamadokodo izinsuku eziyisikhombisa kuJehova. 
3_23_35_Ngosuku lokuqala kuyakuba ngumhlangano ongcwele, ningasebenzi msebenzi. 
3_23_36_Izinsuku eziyisikhombisa niyakunikela ngomnikelo womlilo kuJehova; ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili nibe nomhlangano ozothileyo, ninikele ngomnikelo womlilo kuJehova; kungumhlangano wokugcina; ningasebenzi msebenzi. 
3_23_37_“ ‘Le iyimikhosi emisiweyo kaJehova eniyakuyimemezela ibe yimihlangano engcwele ukunikela ngomnikelo womlilo kuJehova, umnikelo wokushiswa nomnikelo wempuphu, umhlatshelo neminikelo yokuphuzwa, kube yilowo nalowo ngosuku lwawo, 
3_23_38_ngaphandle kwamasabatha kaJehova, nangaphandle kwezipho zenu, nangaphandle kwezithembiso zenu zonke, nangaphandle kweminikelo yenu yonke yesihle eninikela ngayo kuJehova. 
3_23_39_“ ‘Kepha ngosuku lweshumi nanhlanu lwenyanga yesikhombisa, lapho senibuthile izithelo zezwe, anogcina umkhosi kaJehova izinsuku eziyisikhombisa; ngosuku lokuqala makube ngukuphumula okuzothileyo, nangosuku lwesishiyagalombili kube ngukuphumula okuzothileyo. 
3_23_40_Ngosuku lokuqala anothabatha izithelo zemithi emihle, namagatsha amasundu, nezingatsha zemithi edumbileyo, neminyezane yemifula, nethabe phambi kukaJehova uNkulunkulu wenu izinsuku eziyisikhombisa. 
3_23_41_Niyakuwugcina ube ngumkhosi kuJehova izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ngomnyaka; kuyisimiso esiphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu; niwugcine ngenyanga yesikhombisa. 
3_23_42_Niyakuhlala emadokodweni izinsuku eziyisikhombisa, bonke abangabokuzalwa kwa-Israyeli bahlale emadokodweni, 
3_23_43_ukuze izizukulwane zenu zazi ukuthi ngabahlalisa abantwana bakwa-Israyeli emadokodweni ekubakhipheni kwami ezweni laseGibithe, nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu.’ ” 
3_23_44_UMose wabatshela-ke abantwana bakwa-Israyeli imikhosi emisiweyo kaJehova. 
3_24_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_24_2_“Yala abantwana bakwa-Israyeli ukuba balethe kuwe amafutha eminqumo acwengekileyo agxotshelwe ukukhanyisa, ukuba izibani zivuthe njalonjalo. 
3_24_3_Ngaphandle kwesihenqo sobufakazi etendeni lokuhlangana u-Aroni uyakuzilungisa njalo phambi kukaJehova, aqale kusihlwa kuze kuse; kuyakuba yisimiso esiphakade ezizukulwaneni zenu, 
3_24_4_alungise njalo izibani othini olucwengekileyo phambi kukaJehova. 
3_24_5_“Wothabatha impuphu ecolekileyo, upheke ngayo amaqebelengwane ayishumi nambili, iqebelengwane linye libe nokweshumi okubili. 
3_24_6_Wowabeka izinqwaba ezimbili, ayisithupha abe senqwabeni inye etafuleni elicwengekileyo phambi kukaJehova. 
3_24_7_Uyakubeka inhlaka ecwengekileyo ezinqwabeni zombili, ibe yisikhumbuzo esinkweni nomnikelo womlilo kuJehova. 
3_24_8_Amasabatha ngamasabatha uyakuzihlela phambi kukaJehova njalo; kungenxa yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, kuyisivumelwano esiphakade. 
3_24_9_Ziyakuba ngezika-Aroni nezamadodana akhe, bazidlele endaweni engcwele, ngokuba zingcwelengcwele, zingezakhe phakathi kweminikelo yomlilo kaJehova ngesimiso esiphakade.” 
3_24_10_Indodana yowesifazane wakwa-Israyeli, uyise wayo engowaseGibithe, yaphuma yaya phakathi kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli; indodana yowesifazane wakwa-Israyeli nomuntu wakwa-Israyeli baxabana ekamu; 
3_24_11_indodana yowesifazane wakwa-Israyeli yahlambalaza iGama, yathuka; yalethwa kuMose. Igama likanina lalinguShelomiti indodakazi kaDibiri, owesizwe sakwaDani. 
3_24_12_Bayifaka etilongweni ukuba batshelwe ngomlomo kaJehova. 
3_24_13_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_24_14_“Mkhiphele ngaphandle kwekamu lowo othukile; bonke abamuzwa mababeke izandla zabo ekhanda lakhe, inhlangano yonke imkhande ngamatshe. 
3_24_15_Uyakukhuluma kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi: ‘Yilowo nalowo oqalekisa uNkulunkulu wakhe uyakuthwala isono sakhe. 
3_24_16_Ohlambalaza igama likaJehova wobulawa nokubulawa, yonke inhlangano imkhande nokumkhanda ngamatshe; umfokazi noma owokuzalwa ekhaya, nxa ehlambalaza igama likaJehova, wobulawa. 
3_24_17_“ ‘Oshaya umuntu aze afe wobulawa nokubulawa. 
3_24_18_Oshaya inkomo ize ife uyakuyikhokha, kube ngukuphila ngokuphila. 
3_24_19_Uma umuntu elimaza umakhelwane wakhe, njengalokho enzile yena kuyakwenziwa kanjalo kuye, 
3_24_20_kube ngukwaphuka ngokwaphuka, neso ngeso, nezinyo ngezinyo; njengalokho elimazile umuntu, kanjalo kuyakwenziwa kuye. 
3_24_21_Obulala inkomo woyikhokha; obulala umuntu wobulawa. 
3_24_22_Niyakuba nomthetho munye kumfokazi nakowokuzalwa ekhaya; ngokuba nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu.’ ” 
3_24_23_UMose wakhuluma-ke kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli; bamkhiphela othukileyo ngaphandle kwekamu, bamkhanda ngamatshe. Abantwana bakwa-Israyeli benza njengalokho uJehova emyalile uMose. 
3_25_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose entabeni yaseSinayi, wathi: 
3_25_2_“Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi kubo: ‘Nxa nifika ezweni engininika lona, izwe liyakumgcinela uJehova isabatha. 
3_25_3_Iminyaka eyisithupha uyakulima insimu yakho, iminyaka eyisithupha uyakuthena isivini sakho, ubuthe izithelo zaso, 
3_25_4_kepha ngomnyaka wesikhombisa kuyakuba khona isabatha lokuphumula okuzothileyo kwezwe, isabatha kuye uJehova; awuyikulima insimu yakho, ungatheni isivini sakho. 
3_25_5_Amakhikhizela esivuno sakho awuyikuwavuna, nezithelo zomvini wakho ongatheniwe awuyikuzikha; kuyakuba ngumnyaka wokuphumula okuzothileyo kwezwe. 
3_25_6_Isabatha lezwe liyakuba ngukudla kwenu, okwakho nokwenceku yakho nokwencekukazi yakho nokomqashwa wakho nokomfokazi wakho ogogobeleyo kuwe; 
3_25_7_nakuzo izinkomo zakho nezilwane ezisezweni konke ukuthela kwalo kuyakuba ngukudla. 
3_25_8_“ ‘Uyakuzibalela amasabatha ayisikhombisa eminyaka, iminyaka eyisikhombisa iphindwe kasikhombisa, kube kuwe izinsuku zamasabatha ayisikhombisa eminyaka, kube yiminyaka engamashumi amane nesishiyagalolunye. 
3_25_9_Uyakuthuma izwi lecilongo elizwakala kakhulu ngolweshumi lwenyanga yesikhombisa; ngosuku lokubuyisana niyakuthuma izwi lecilongo ezweni lonke lakini. 
3_25_10_Niyakuwungcwelisa umnyaka wamashumi ayisihlanu, nimemezele inkululeko ezweni lonke kubo bonke abakhileyo kulo; kuyakuba yijubili kini, nibuyele, kube yilowo nalowo efeni lakhe, nibuyele, kube yilowo nalowo kwabomndeni wakhe. 
3_25_11_Lo mnyaka wamashumi ayisihlanu uyakuba yijubili kini; aniyikulima, ningavuni amakhikhizela awo, ningakhi ngawo ezomvini ongatheniwe. 
3_25_12_Ngokuba uyijubili; uyakuba ngcwele kini, nidle izithelo zawo zasensimini. 
3_25_13_“ ‘Ngalowo mnyaka wejubili niyakubuyela, kube yilowo nalowo efeni lakhe. 
3_25_14_“ ‘Uma uthengisa ngotho kumakhelwane wakho noma uthenga esandleni somakhelwane wakho, ningadlani; 
3_25_15_njengenani leminyaka esemva kwejubili uyakuthenga kumakhelwane wakho nanjengenani leminyaka yezithelo uyakuthengisa kuwe. 
3_25_16_Ngobuningi beminyaka uyakwandisa intengo yalo nangobuncane beminyaka uyakunciphisa intengo yalo; ngokuba uthengisa kuwe ngenani lezithelo. 
3_25_17_Aniyikudlana, kepha uyakwesaba uNkulunkulu wakho, ngokuba nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wakho. 
3_25_18_“ ‘Ngalokho anozenza izimiso zami, nigcine izahlulelo zami, nizenze, nihlale ezweni nilondekile. 
3_25_19_Izwe liyakuthela izithelo zalo, nidle nisuthe, nihlale kulo nilondekile. 
3_25_20_Uma nisho ukuthi: “Siyakudlani ngomnyaka wesikhombisa? Bheka, asiyikulima, asiyikubutha ukudla kwethu,” 
3_25_21_khona ngiyakuyala isibusiso sami sehlele phezu kwenu ngomnyaka wesithupha, uze uthele ukudla kweminyaka emithathu. 
3_25_22_Niyakulima ngomnyaka wesishiyagalombili, nidle izithelo zikanyasa; uze ufike umnyaka wesishiyagalolunye, kungene izithelo zawo, niyakudla unyasa. 
3_25_23_“ ‘Akuyikuthengiswa ngezwe kuze kube phakade, ngokuba izwe lingelami, nina-ke ningabafokazi nabagogobeleyo kimi. 
3_25_24_Ezweni lonke lefa lenu niyakuvuma ukuhlengwa kwezwe. 
3_25_25_“ ‘Uma umfowenu eba mpofu, athengise ngefa lakhe, kuyakufika isihlobo sakhe, sihlenge lona umfowabo athengisile ngalo. 
3_25_26_Uma umuntu engenaye ongalihlenga, kodwa ebeseba ngocebileyo, athole okwanele ukulihlenga, 
3_25_27_makabale iminyaka selokhu kwathengiswa ngalo, abuyisele okudluleleyo kulowo muntu athengisa kuye ngalo, aze abuyele efeni lakhe. 
3_25_28_Uma engatholi amandla okuzibuyiselela lona, lelo athengise ngalo liyakusala esandleni solithengileyo, uze ufike umnyaka wejubili; ngejubili liyakuphuma, yena abuyele efeni lakhe. 
3_25_29_“ ‘Uma umuntu ethengisa ngendlu yokuhlala emzini onogange, angayihlenga ungakapheli umnyaka selokhu wathengisa ngayo, ngokuba umnyaka wonke uyakuba nelungelo lokuyihlenga. 
3_25_30_Uma ingahlengwanga umnyaka usuphelile, leyo ndlu esemzini onogange iyakuqiniswa ibe ngeyakhe owayithenga kuze kube phakade ezizukulwaneni zakhe; ayiyikuphuma ngejubili. 
3_25_31_Kepha izindlu zemizana engenalugange nxazonke ziyakubalwa kanye namasimu asemaphandleni; zingahlengwa, ziphume ngejubili. 
3_25_32_“ ‘Kodwa imizi yamaLevi, izindlu zemizi yefa lawo amaLevi angazihlenga noma nini. 
3_25_33_Uma umLevi engahlengi, indlu okwathengiswa ngayo nomuzi wefa lakhe kuyakuphuma ngejubili, ngokuba izindlu zemizi yamaLevi ziyifa lawo phakathi kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli. 
3_25_34_Izwe lamadlelo emizi yawo akunakuthengiswa ngalo, ngokuba liyifa lawo kuze kube phakade. 
3_25_35_“ ‘Uma umfowenu eba mpofu, engenamandla okukukhokhela, uyakumsekela, ahlale nawe njengomfokazi nogogobeleyo. 
3_25_36_Ungathathi kuye inzalo engafanele nenzuzo, kepha wesabe uNkulunkulu wakho, ukuze umfowenu ahlale nawe. 
3_25_37_Awuyikumnika imali yakho ngenzalo, ungamuphi ukudla kwakho ngenzuzo. 
3_25_38_NginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu owanikhipha ezweni laseGibithe ukuninika izwe laseKhanani, ngibe nguNkulunkulu wenu. 
3_25_39_“ ‘Uma umfowenu eba mpofu ekuwe, azithengise kuwe, awuyikumsebenzisa njengesigqila, 
3_25_40_kepha abe njengomqashwa nogogobeleyo kuwe; uyakusebenza kuwe kuze kufike umnyaka wejubili, 
3_25_41_andukuba aphume kuwe, yena nabantwana bakhe kanye naye, abuyele kwabomndeni wakhe, abuyele nasefeni lawoyise. 
3_25_42_Ngokuba bayizinceku zami engazikhipha ezweni laseGibithe; akuyikuthengiswa ngazo zibe yizigqila. 
3_25_43_Awuyikubusa kalukhuni phezu kwakhe, kepha wesabe uNkulunkulu wakho. 
3_25_44_“ ‘Izigqila zakho nezigqilakazi zakho oyakuba nazo: niyakuzithenga izigqila nezigqilakazi kwabezizwe abanizungezayo. 
3_25_45_Futhi kubantwana babafokazi abagogobeleyo kini, kubona niyakuthenga nakwabomndeni wabo abakini ababazalile ezweni lakini, babe yifa lenu. 
3_25_46_Niyakubenza ifa labantwana benu emva kwenu ukuba babe yifa labo; niyakuthatha kubo izigqila zenu kuze kube phakade; kepha aniyikubusa kalukhuni phezu kwabafowenu, abantwana bakwa-Israyeli, omunye phezu komunye. 
3_25_47_“ ‘Uma umfokazi noma ogogobeleyo kuwe eba ngocebileyo, umfowenu abe mpofu kuye, azithengise kumfokazi noma kogogobeleyo kuwe noma kowohlanga lwabomndeni wabafokazi, 
3_25_48_angahlengwa nxa sekuthengisiwe ngaye; omunye wabafowabo angamhlenga; 
3_25_49_noma uyisekazi noma indodana kayisekazi angamhlenga; noma omunye owakubo owabomndeni wakhe angamhlenga; noma eba ngocebileyo, angazihlenga yena. 
3_25_50_Uyakubalisana nalowo owamthengayo, aqale ngomnyaka owazithengisa kuye ngawo, kuze kube ngumnyaka wejubili; imali yentengiso iyakuba njengenani leminyaka; uyakuba naye njengesikhathi somqashwa. 
3_25_51_Uma isasele iminyaka eminingi, njengayo uyakubuyisa intengo yokuhlengwa kwakhe emalini athengwa ngayo. 
3_25_52_Uma isasele iminyaka eyingcosana kuze kufike umnyaka wejubili, uyakubalisana naye; njengeminyaka yakhe uyakubuyisa imali yokuhlengwa kwakhe. 
3_25_53_Njengenceku eqashwa iminyaka ngeminyaka uyakuba naye; akayikubusa kalukhuni phezu kwakhe emehlweni akho. 
3_25_54_“ ‘Uma engahlengwanga ngalezo zindlela, uyakuphuma ngomnyaka wejubili, yena nabantwana bakhe kanye naye. 
3_25_55_Ngokuba abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bayizinceku kimi; bayizinceku zami engazikhipha ezweni laseGibithe; nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. 
3_26_1_“ ‘Ningenzi izithombe, ningamisi izithombe ezibaziweyo noma insika; ningabeki itshe elinemifanekiso ezweni lakini ukukhothamela kulo; ngokuba nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. 
3_26_2_“ ‘Anogcina amasabatha ami, nihloniphe indlu yami engcwele; nginguJehova. 
3_26_3_“ ‘Uma nihamba ngezimiso zami, nigcine imiyalo yami, niyenze, 
3_26_4_ngiyakuninika imvula ngesikhathi sayo, izwe lithele ukudla kwalo, imithi yasendle ithele izithelo zayo. 
3_26_5_Ukubhula kwenu kuyakufinyelela ekuvunweni kwemivini, ukuvunwa kwemivini kuyakufinyelela esikhathini sokulima; niyakudla isinkwa senu, nisuthe, nihlale ezweni lakini nilondekile. 
3_26_6_“ ‘Ngiyakunika ukuthula ezweni, nilale phansi ningesatshiswa muntu; ngiyakuqothula izilwane ezimbi ezweni, nenkemba ayiyikudabula ezweni lakini. 
3_26_7_Niyakuxosha izitha zenu, ziwe phambi kwenu ngenkemba. 
3_26_8_Abayisihlanu kini bayakuxosha abayikhulu, nabayikhulu kini bayakuxosha izinkulungwane eziyishumi, izitha zenu ziwe phambi kwenu ngenkemba. 
3_26_9_“ ‘Ngiyakuninaka, nginenze ukuba nizale, nande, ngimise isivumelwano sami nani. 
3_26_10_Niyakudla unyasa omdala, nikhiphe unyasa ngenxa yokusha. 
3_26_11_Ngiyakubeka itabernakele lami phakathi kwenu, umphefumulo wami awuyikunengwa yinina. 
3_26_12_Ngiyakuhamba phakathi kwenu, ngibe nguNkulunkulu wenu, nibe ngabantu bami. 
3_26_13_NginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu owanikhipha ezweni laseGibithe ukuba ningabi yizigqila zabo; ngaphulile izikeyi zejoka lenu, ngenza ukuba nihambe niluleme. 
3_26_14_“ ‘Kepha uma ningalaleli, ningayenzi yonke le miyalo, 
3_26_15_uma nilahla izimiso zami, uma umphefumulo wenu unengwa yizahlulelo zami, ukuze ningayenzi yonke imiyalo yami, kepha naphule isivumelwano sami, 
3_26_16_nami ngiyakwenza lokhu kini; ngiyakunehlisela ingebhe nesifuba nomkhuhlane oyakuqeda amehlo, udangalise umphefumulo; niyakuhlwanyela ngeze imbewu yenu, ngokuba izitha zenu ziyakuyidla. 
3_26_17_Ngiyakubeka ubuso bami bumelane nani, nibulawe phambi kwezitha zenu; abanizondayo bayakubusa phezu kwenu, nibaleke ningaxoshwa muntu. 
3_26_18_“ ‘Kepha uma ningangilaleli nangalezo zinto, ngiyakubuye nginishaye kasikhombisa ngezono zenu. 
3_26_19_Ngiyakwaphula ukuzidla kwamandla enu, ngenze izulu lenu libe njengensimbi, nomhlabathi wenu ube njengethusi. 
3_26_20_Amandla enu ayakuchithwa ngeze, ngokuba izwe lakini aliyikuthela ukudla kwalo, nemithi yezwe ayiyikuthela izithelo zayo. 
3_26_21_“ ‘Uma nihamba niphambene nami, ningangilaleli, ngiyakubuye nginehlisele izinhlupheko ziphindwe kasikhombisa njengezono zenu. 
3_26_22_Ngiyakuthuma phakathi kwenu izilo zasendle eziyakunaphuca abantwana benu, zibulale izinkomo zenu, zininciphise, izindlela zenu zibe yihlane. 
3_26_23_“ ‘Kepha uma ningaxwayiswa yimi ngalezo zinto, kodwa nihamba niphambene nami, 
3_26_24_nami ngiyakuhamba ngiphambene nani, nginishaye, yebo, mina, kasikhombisa ngezono zenu. 
3_26_25_Ngiyakunehlisela inkemba yempindiselo eyakuphindisela isivumelwano sami; senibuthelwe emizini yenu, ngiyakuthuma isifo phakathi kwenu, ninikelwe esandleni sesitha. 
3_26_26_Nxa ngaphula uzime lwesinkwa, abesifazane abayishumi bayakupheka isinkwa sakho eziko linye, babuyise isinkwa senu ngesisindo; niyakudla ningasuthi. 
3_26_27_“ ‘Kepha uma ningangilaleli nangazo zonke lezo zinto, kodwa nihamba niphambene nami, 
3_26_28_nami ngiyakuhamba ngiphambene nani ngokufutheka, ngikushaye kasikhombisa ngezono zakho. 
3_26_29_Niyakudla inyama yamadodana enu, nenyama yamadodakazi enu niyakuyidla. 
3_26_30_Ngiyakuchitha izindawo zenu eziphakemeyo, nginqume ama-altare enu empepho, ngilahle izidumbu zenu phezu kwezidumbu zezithombe zenu; umphefumulo wami uyakunengwa yinina. 
3_26_31_Ngiyakuyenza imizi yenu ibe yizwekufa, ngizenze izindlu zenu ezingcwele zibe yincithakalo; angisayikuhogela unqambothi lwamaphunga lwenu olumnandi. 
3_26_32_Ngiyakulenza izwe libe yincithakalo; izitha zenu ezihlala kulo ziyakumangala ngakho. 
3_26_33_Nina-ke ngiyakunihlakazela ezizweni, ngihoshe inkemba emva kwenu, izwe lakini libe yincithakalo, nemizi yenu ibe yizwekufa. 
3_26_34_Khona izwe liyakuthokoza ngamasabatha alo ngesikhathi lihlezi lichithekile, nina nisekhona ezweni lezitha zenu; khona izwe liyakuphumula, lithokoze ngamasabatha alo. 
3_26_35_Ngesikhathi lihlezi lichithekile liyakuphumula, lokho kuphumula elalingenakho ngamasabatha enu, lapho nanisahlezi kulo. 
3_26_36_“ ‘Abaseleyo bakini ngiyakubehlisela itwetwe ezinhliziyweni zabo emazweni ezitha zabo; ubuhashahasha beqabunga elinyakaziswayo buyakubaxosha, babaleke njengalokhu umuntu ebalekela inkemba, bawe bengaxoshwa muntu. 
3_26_37_Bayakukhubeka, omunye phezu komunye, kungathi kuphambi kwenkemba, bengaxoshwa muntu; aniyikuba namandla okuma phambi kwezitha zenu. 
3_26_38_Niyakubhubha phakathi kwezizwe, izwe lezitha zenu linidle. 
3_26_39_Abaseleyo bakini bayakonda ngobubi babo emazweni ezitha zenu, nangobubi bawoyise bayakonda kanye nabo. 
3_26_40_“ ‘Bayakuvuma ububi babo nobubi bawoyise ngeziphambeko zabo abaphambeka ngazo kimi, nokuthi njengokuba bahamba bephambene nami, 
3_26_41_nami ngahamba ngiphambene nabo, ngabayisa ezweni lezitha zabo; uma-ke izinhliziyo zabo ezingasokile zithobeka, besamukela isijeziso sobubi babo, 
3_26_42_ngiyakukhumbula isivumelwano sami noJakobe; nesivumelwano sami no-Isaka, nesivumelwano sami no-Abrahama ngiyakusikhumbula, ngilikhumbule nezwe. 
3_26_43_Izwe liyakushiywa yibo, lithokoze ngamasabatha alo, lisahlezi lichithekile, lingenabo; bayakwamukela isijeziso sobubi babo, ngokuba, yebo, ngokuba balahla izahlulelo zami nangokuba umphefumulo wabo wanengwa yizimiso zami. 
3_26_44_Kepha uma kunjalo, sebekhona ezweni lezitha zabo, angiyikubalahla, nginganengwa yibo, ukuze ngibaqothule, ngisaphule isivumelwano sami nabo, ngokuba nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wabo; 
3_26_45_kepha ngenxa yabo ngiyakukhumbula isivumelwano sawokhokho babo engabakhipha ezweni laseGibithe emehlweni ezizwe ukuba ngibe nguNkulunkulu wabo; nginguJehova.’ ” 
3_26_46_Lezo ziyizimiso nezahlulelo nemithetho akwenzayo uJehova phakathi kwakhe nabantwana bakwa-Israyeli entabeni yaseSinayi ngesandla sikaMose. 
3_27_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
3_27_2_“Yisho kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli, uthi kubo: ‘Nxa umuntu enza isithembiso esithile, lapho uyakulinganisa abantu kuJehova, 
3_27_3_ukulinganisa kwakho owesilisa, kusukela koneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuze kube koneminyaka engamashumi ayisithupha, kuyakuba ngamashekeli angamashumi ayisihlanu esiliva ngokweshekeli lendlu engcwele. 
3_27_4_Uma kungowesifazane, ukulinganisa kwakho kuyakuba ngamashekeli angamashumi amathathu. 
3_27_5_Uma kusukela koneminyaka eyisihlanu kuze kube koneminyaka engamashumi amabili, ukulinganisa kwakho owesilisa kuyakuba ngamashekeli angamashumi amabili, nowesifazane amashekeli ayishumi. 
3_27_6_Uma kusukela konenyanga kuze kube koneminyaka eyisihlanu, ukulinganisa kwakho owesilisa kuyakuba ngamashekeli ayisihlanu esiliva, nokulinganisa kwakho owesifazane kuyakuba ngamashekeli amathathu esiliva. 
3_27_7_Uma kusukela koneminyaka engamashuni ayisithupha kuya phezulu, nalapho kungowesilisa, ukulinganisa kwakho kuyakuba ngamashekeli ayishumi nanhlanu, nowesifazane kube ngamashekeli ayishumi. 
3_27_8_Kepha uma empofu kunokulinganisa kwakho, uyakubekwa phambi kompristi, umpristi amlinganise; umpristi uyakumlinganisa ngokwamandla akhe owathembisayo. 
3_27_9_“ ‘Uma kuyizilwane okunganikelwa ngazo kuJehova, zonke ezinjalo umuntu anikela ngazo kuJehova ziyakuba ngcwele. 
3_27_10_Akayikuziphambanisa, angazenani ngezinye, esihle ngesibi nesibi ngesihle; uma enana nokwenana isilwane ngesilwane, sona leso kanye naso okwenanwa ngaso ziyakuba ngcwele. 
3_27_11_Uma kuyisilwane esingcolileyo okunganikelwa ngaso kuJehova, uyakusibeka isilwane phambi kompristi, 
3_27_12_umpristi asilinganise, noma sihle noma sibi; njengalokho wena mpristi ulinganisa, kuyakuba njalo. 
3_27_13_Kepha uma ethanda ngempela ukusihlenga, uyakuthasisela okwesihlanu kwaso kukho ukulinganisa kwakho. 
3_27_14_“ ‘Nxa umuntu eyakungcwelisa indlu yakhe ibe ngcwele kuJehova, umpristi uyakuyilinganisa uma inhle noma imbi; njengalokhu umpristi eyilinganisa, kuyakuba njalo. 
3_27_15_Uma oyingcwelisayo ethanda ukuyihlenga indlu yakhe, uyakuthasisela okwesihlanu kwemali yokulinganisa kwakho, ibe ngeyakhe. 
3_27_16_“ ‘Uma umuntu eyakumngcwelisela uJehova inxenye yensimu yefa lakhe, ukulinganisa kwakho kuyakuba njengokuhlwanyelwa kwayo, ukuhlwanyelwa kwehomere lebhali kube ngamashekeli angamashumi ayisihlanu esiliva. 
3_27_17_Uma engcwelisa insimu yakhe kusukela emnyakeni wejubili, iyakuma ngokulinganisa kwakho. 
3_27_18_Kepha uma ungcwelisa insimu emva kwejubili, umpristi uyakumbalela imali ngeminyaka eseleyo kuze kufike umnyaka wejubili, kuncishiswe ukulinganisa kwakho. 
3_27_19_Uma ongcwelisa insimu ethanda ngempela ukuyihlenga, uyakuthasisela kuyo okwesihlanu kwemali yokulinganisa kwakho, iqiniswe kuye. 
3_27_20_Uma engahlengi insimu, noma ethengisile ngensimu komunye umuntu, ayisayikuhlengwa. 
3_27_21_Kepha insimu ekuphumeni kwayo ngejubili iyakuba ngcwele kuJehova njengensimu eyahlukaniswayo; iyakuba yifa lompristi. 
3_27_22_“ ‘Uma engcwelisela uJehova insimu ayithengileyo, engesiyo insimu yefa lakhe, 
3_27_23_umpristi uyakumbalela imali yokulinganisa kwakho kuze kufike umnyaka wejubili, anike ukulinganisa kwakho ngalolo suku kube yinto engcwele kuJehova. 
3_27_24_Ngomnyaka wejubili insimu iyakubuyela kuye eyathengwa kuye, yebo, kuye olifa lensimu lingelakhe. 
3_27_25_Konke ukulinganisa kwakho kuyakuba ngokweshekeli lendlu engcwele; amagera angamashumi amabili ayakuba yishekeli. 
3_27_26_“ ‘Kepha izibulo lezilwane elenziwe libe yizibulo kuJehova aliyikungcweliswa muntu; noma liyinkabi noma liyimvu, lingelikaJehova. 
3_27_27_Uma kungelesilwane esingcolileyo, uyakulihlenga ngokulinganisa kwakho, athasisele kukho okwesihlanu kwakho; uma lingahlengwa, kuyakuthengiswa ngalo ngokulinganisa kwakho. 
3_27_28_“ ‘Nokho into yonke eyahlukaniswa, umuntu ayahlukanisela uJehova kukho konke anakho, noma abantu, noma izilwane, noma insimu yefa lakhe, akuyikuthengiswa ngayo, ingahlengwa; konke okwahlukanisiwe kungcwelengcwele kuJehova. 
3_27_29_“ ‘Akukho muntu owaqalekiswayo, owaqalekiswa kubantu, ongahlengwa; wobulawa nokubulawa. 
3_27_30_“ ‘Nokweshumi konke kwezwe, okwembewu yezwe noma okwezithelo zemithi, kungokukaJehova; kungcwele kuJehova. 
3_27_31_Uma umuntu ethanda ukuhlenga okuthile okokweshumi kwakhe, uyakuthasisela kukho okwesihlanu kwakho. 
3_27_32_Konke okweshumi kwezinkomo noma okwezimvu, zonke ezidlula phansi kwentonga, okweshumi kuyakuba ngcwele kuJehova. 
3_27_33_Akayikuhlola, uma kuhle noma kubi, angakwenani ngokunye; kepha uma ngempela ekwenana ngokunye, lokhu nalokho akwenana ngakho kuyakuba ngcwele; akuyikuhlengwa.’ ” 
3_27_34_Leyo iyimiyalo uJehova ayala ngayo uMose ngabantwana bakwa-Israyeli entabeni yaseSinayi. 
4_1_1_UJehova wakhuluma kuMose ehlane laseSinayi etendeni lokuhlangana ngolokuqala lwenyanga yesibili ngomnyaka wesibili emva kokuphuma kwabo eGibithe, wathi: 
4_1_2_“Balani umumo wenhlangano yonke yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise njengokomumo wamagama abo, bonke abesilisa ngezinhloko zabo; 
4_1_3_kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuya phezulu, bonke abakwa-Israyeli abangaphuma impi, wena no-Aroni anobabala ngamabandla abo. 
4_1_4_Kanye nani kuzakuba khona indoda ibe nye kuleso naleso sizwe, yileyo naleyo ibe yinhloko yendlu kayise. 
4_1_5_Lawa angamagama amadoda ayakuma nani: kwaRubeni: u-Elisuri indodana kaShedewuri. 
4_1_6_KwaSimeyoni: uShelumiyeli indodana kaSurishadayi. 
4_1_7_KwaJuda: uNaheshoni indodana ka-Aminadaba. 
4_1_8_Kwa-Isakare: uNethaneli indodana kaSuwari. 
4_1_9_KwaZebuloni: u-Eliyabe indodana kaHeloni. 
4_1_10_Kubantwana bakwaJosefa: kwa-Efrayimi: u-Elishama indodana ka-Amihudi; kwaManase: uGamaliyeli indodana kaPedasuri. 
4_1_11_KwaBenjamini: u-Abidani indodana kaGideyoni. 
4_1_12_KwaDani: u-Ahiyezeri indodana ka-Amishadayi. 
4_1_13_Kwa-Asheri: uPagiyeli indodana ka-Okirani. 
4_1_14_KwaGadi: u-Eliyasafa indodana kaDehuweli. 
4_1_15_KwaNafetali: u-Ahira indodana ka-Enani.” 
4_1_16_Yilabo ababebizwa enhlanganweni, izikhulu zezizwe zawoyise; babe yizinhloko zemizi yakwa-Israyeli. 
4_1_17_OMose no-Aroni base bethatha lawo madoda aseshiwo ngamagama. 
4_1_18_Babutha inhlangano yonke ngolokuqala lwenyanga yesibili, basho okhokho babo ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise njengokomumo wamagama, kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuya phezulu, ngezinhloko zabo. 
4_1_19_Njengalokho uJehova eyalile uMose, wababala kanjalo ehlane laseSinayi. 
4_1_20_Abantwana bakwaRubeni, izibulo lika-Israyeli, izizukulwane zabo ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise njengokomumo wamagama, ngezinhloko zabo, bonke abesilisa kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuya phezulu, bonke abangaphuma impi: 
4_1_21_labo ababalwayo kubo, abesizwe sakwaRubeni, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amane nesithupha namakhulu ayisihlanu. 
4_1_22_Kubantwana bakwaSimeyoni, izizukulwane zabo ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise, labo ababalwayo kubo njengokomumo wamagama, ngezinhloko zabo, bonke abesilisa kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuya phezulu, bonke abangaphuma impi: 
4_1_23_labo ababalwayo kubo, abesizwe sakwaSimeyoni, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisihlanu nesishiyagalolunye namakhulu amathathu. 
4_1_24_Kubantwana bakwaGadi, izizukulwane zabo ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise njengokomumo wamagama, kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuya phezulu, bonke abangaphuma impi: 
4_1_25_labo ababalwayo kubo, abesizwe sakwaGadi, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amane nanhlanu namakhulu ayisithupha namashumi ayisihlanu. 
4_1_26_Kubantwana bakwaJuda, izizukulwane zabo ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise njengokomumo wamagama, kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuya phezulu, bonke abangaphuma impi: 
4_1_27_labo ababalwayo kubo, abesizwe sakwaJuda, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisikhombisa nane namakhulu ayisithupha. 
4_1_28_Kubantwana bakwa-Isakare, izizukulwane zabo ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise njengokomumo wamagama, kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuya phezulu, bonke abangaphuma impi: 
4_1_29_labo ababalwayo kubo, abesizwe sakwa-Isakare, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisihlanu nane namakhulu amane. 
4_1_30_Kubantwana bakwaZebuloni, izizukulwane zabo ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise njengokomumo wamagama, kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuya phezulu, bonke abangaphuma impi: 
4_1_31_labo ababalwayo kubo, abesizwe sakwaZebuloni, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisihlanu nesikhombisa namakhulu amane. 
4_1_32_Kubantwana bakwaJosefa, okungukuthi kubantwana bakwa-Efrayimi, izizukulwane zabo ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise njengokomumo wamagama, kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili, bonke abangaphuma impi: 
4_1_33_labo ababalwayo kubo, abesizwe sakwa-Efrayimi, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amane namakhulu ayisihlanu. 
4_1_34_Kubantwana bakwaManase, izizukulwane zabo ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise njengokomumo wamagama, kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuya phezulu, bonke abangaphuma impi: 
4_1_35_labo ababalwayo kubo, abesizwe sakwaManase, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amathathu nambili namakhulu amabili. 
4_1_36_Kubantwana bakwaBenjamini, izizukulwane zabo ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise njengokomumo wamagama, kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuya phezulu, bonke abangaphuma impi: 
4_1_37_labo ababalwayo kubo, abesizwe sakwaBenjamini, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amathathu nanhlanu namakhulu amane. 
4_1_38_Kubantwana bakwaDani, izizukulwane zabo ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise njengokomumo wamagama, kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuya phezulu, bonke abangaphuma impi: 
4_1_39_labo ababalwayo kubo, abesizwe sakwaDani, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisithupha nambili namakhulu ayisikhombisa. 
4_1_40_Kubantwana bakwa-Asheri, izizukulwane zabo ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise njengokomumo wamagama, kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuyo phezulu, bonke abangaphuma impi: 
4_1_41_labo ababalwayo kubo, abesizwe sakwa-Asheri, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amane nanye namakhulu ayisihlanu. 
4_1_42_Kubantwana bakwaNafetali, izizukulwane zabo ngemindeni yabo nangezindlu zawoyise njengokomumo wamagama, kusukela kwabenminyaka engamashumi amabili kuya phezulu, bonke abangaphuma impi: 
4_1_43_labo ababalwayo kubo, abesizwe sakwaNafetali, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisihlanu nantathu namakhulu amane. 
4_1_44_Yilabo ababalwayo, ababalwa nguMose nangu-Aroni kanye nezikhulu zakwa-Israyeli, zingamadoda ayishumi nambili, kwaba yileyo naleyo yamela indlu kayise. 
4_1_45_Bonke ababalwayo babantwana bakwa-Israyeli ngezindlu zawoyise kusukela kwabaneminyaka engamashumi amabili kuya phezulu, bonke abakwa-Israyeli abangaphuma impi, 
4_1_46_bonke ababalwayo babe yizinkulungwane ezingamakhulu ayisithupha nantathu namakhulu ayisihlanu namashumi ayisihlanu. 
4_1_47_Kepha amaLevi ngokwesizwe sawoyise awabalwanga phakathi kwabo. 
4_1_48_Ngokuba uJehova wakhuluma kuMose, wathi: 
4_1_49_“Isizwe sakwaLevi kuphela awuyikusibala, ungabali umumo waso phakathi kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli,
