13_1_17_Amadodana kaShemi: ngo-Elamu, no-Ashuri, no-Arpakishade, noLude, no-Aramu, no-Use, noHule, noGeteri, noMesheke. 
13_1_18_U-Arpakishade wazala uShela; uShela wazala u-Ebere. 
13_1_19_U-Ebere wazala amadodana amabili: igama lomunye lalinguPhelege, ngokuba emihleni yakhe izwe ladatshulwa. Igama lomfowabo lalinguJokothane. 
13_1_20_UJokothane wazala o-Alimodade, noShelefe, noHasaramavete, noJera, 
13_1_21_noHadoramu, no-Uzali, noDikila, 
13_1_22_no-Ebali, no-Abimayele, noSheba, 
13_1_23_no-Ofiri, noHavila, noJobabi; bonke labo babe ngamadodana kaJokothane; 
13_1_24_oShemi, no-Arpakishade, noShela, 
13_1_25_no-Ebere, noPhelege, noRehu, 
13_1_26_noSerugi, noNahori, noThera, 
13_1_27_no-Abrama ongu-Abrahama. 
13_1_28_Amadodana ka-Abrahama: ngo-Isaka no-Ishmayeli. 
13_1_29_Lezi ziyizizukulwane zabo: izibulo lika-Ishmayeli uNebayoti, noKedari, no-Adibeli, noMibisamu, 
13_1_30_noMishima, noDuma, noMasa, noHadadi, noThema, 
13_1_31_noJeturu, noNafishi, noKhedema. Labo babe ngamadodana ka-Ishmayeli. 
13_1_32_Amadodana kaKetura, isancinza sika-Abrahama: wazala oZimrani, noJokishani, noMedani, noMidiyani, no-Ishibaki, noShuwa. Amadodana kaJokishani: ngoSheba noDedani. 
13_1_33_Amadodana kaMidiyani: ngo-Efa, no-Eferi, noHanoki, no-Abida, no-Elidaha. Bonke labo babe ngamadodana kaKetura. 
13_1_34_U-Abrahama wazala u-Isaka. Amadodana ka-Isaka: ngo-Esawu no-Israyeli. 
13_1_35_Amadodana ka-Esawu: ngo-Elifazi, noRehuweli, noJewushe, noJalamu, noKora. 
13_1_36_Amadodana ka-Elifazi: ngoThemani, no-Omari, noSefi, noGathamu, noKenazi, noThimna, no-Amaleki. 
13_1_37_Amadodana kaRehuweli: ngoNahati, noZera, noShama, noMiza. 
13_1_38_Amadodana kaSeyiri: ngoLothani, noShobali, noSibeyoni, no-Ana, noDishoni, no-Eseri, noDishani. 
13_1_39_Amadodana kaLothani: ngoHori noHomamu; udadewabo kaLothani wayenguThimna. 
13_1_40_Amadodana kaShobali: ngo-Aliyani, noManahati, no-Ebali, noShefi, no-Onamu. Amadodana kaSibeyoni: ngo-Aya no-Ana. 
13_1_41_Amadodana ka-Ana: nguDishoni. Amadodana kaDishoni: ngoHamrani, no-Eshibani, noJitrani, noKerani. 
13_1_42_Amadodana ka-Eseri: ngoBilihani, noZahawana, noJahakhani. Amadodana kaDishani: ngo-Use no-Arana. 
13_1_43_Lawa angamakhosi abusa ezweni lakwa-Edomi, kungakabusi nkosi phezu kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli: uBela indodana kaBeyori. Igama lomuzi wakhe laliyiDinihaba. 
13_1_44_Wafa uBela; uJobabi indodana kaZera waseBosira waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe. 
13_1_45_Wafa uJobabi; uHushamu wasezweni labakwaThemani waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe. 
13_1_46_Wafa uHushamu; uHadadi, indodana kaBedadi, owanqoba abakwaMidiyani ethafeni lakwaMowabi, waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe; igama lomuzi wakhe laliyi-Aviti. 
13_1_47_Wafa uHadadi; uSamla waseMasireka waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe. 
13_1_48_Wafa uSamla; uShawule waseRehoboti ngaseMfuleni waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe. 
13_1_49_Wafa uShawule; uBali Hanani indodana ka-Akibori waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe. 
13_1_50_Wafa uBali Hanani; uHadadi waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe; igama lomuzi wakhe laliyiPhahi; igama lomkakhe lalinguMehetabeli indodakazi kaMatiredi, indodakazi kaMezahabi. 
13_1_51_Wafa uHadadi; abanumzane bakwa-Edomi kwakuyilaba: umnumzane uThimna, nomnumzane u-Aliya, nomnumzane uJeteti, 
13_1_52_nomnumzane u-Oholibama, nomnumzane u-Ela, nomnumzane uPhinoni, 
13_1_53_nomnumzane uKenazi, nomnumzane uThemani, nomnumzane uMibisari, 
13_1_54_nomnumzane uMagidiyeli, nomnumzane u-Iramu. Yilabo abangabanumzane bakwa-Edomi. 
13_2_1_Nanka amadodana ka-Israyeli: oRubeni, noSimeyoni, noLevi, noJuda, no-Isakare, noZebuloni, 
13_2_2_noDani, noJosefa, noBenjamini, noNafetali, noGadi, no-Asheri. 
13_2_3_Amadodana kaJuda: ngo-Eri, no-Onani, noShela; labo abathathu bazalwa nguye kuBati Shuwa, umKhananikazi. Kepha u-Eri, izibulo likaJuda, wayemubi emehlweni kaJehova; wambulala. 
13_2_4_UTamari umalokazana wakhe wamzalela oPheresi noZera. Onke amadodana kaJuda ayeyisihlanu. 
13_2_5_Amadodana kaPheresi: ngoHesironi noHamule. 
13_2_6_Amadodana kaZera: ngoZimri, no-Ethani, noHemani, noKalikoli, noDara, eyisihlanu onke. 
13_2_7_Amadodana kaKarmi: ngo-Akari, umhluphi ka-Israyeli, owenza isiphambeko ngokuqalekisiweyo. 
13_2_8_Amadodana ka-Ethani: ngu-Azariya. 
13_2_9_Amadodana kaHesironi awazalelwayo: ngoJerameli, noRamu, noKelubayi. 
13_2_10_URamu wazala u-Aminadaba; u-Aminadaba wazala uNaheshoni, isikhulu sabantwana bakwaJuda; 
13_2_11_uNaheshoni wazala uSalima; uSalima wazala uBowazi; 
13_2_12_uBowazi wazala u-Obede; u-Obede wazala uJese. 
13_2_13_UJese wazala izibulo lakhe u-Eliyabi, no-Abinadaba owesibili, noShimeya owesithathu, 
13_2_14_noNethaneli owesine, noRadayi owesihlanu, 
13_2_15_no-Osemi owesithupha, noDavide owesikhombisa; 
13_2_16_odadewabo: ngoSeruya no-Abigayili. Amadodana kaSeruya: ngo-Abishayi, noJowabe, no-Asaheli, emathathu. 
13_2_17_U-Abigayili wazala u-Amasa; uyise ka-Amasa wayenguJetheri umIshmayeli. 
13_2_18_UKalebi indodana kaHesironi wazala ku-Azuba umkakhe nakuJeriyoti; amadodana akhe: ngoJesheri, noShobabi, no-Aridoni. 
13_2_19_Wafa u-Azuba; uKalebi wathatha u-Efrati, owamzalela uHure. 
13_2_20_UHure wazala u-Uri; u-Uri wazala uBesaleli. 
13_2_21_Ngasemuva uHesironi wangena kuyo indodakazi kaMakiri uyise kaGileyadi; wamthatha eseneminyaka engamashumi ayisithupha; wamzalela uSegubi. 
13_2_22_USegubi wazala uJayire, owayenemizi engamashumi amabili nantathu ezweni lakwaGileyadi. 
13_2_23_OGeshuri no-Aramu babaphuca imizi kaJayirem, kanye neKhenati nemizi yalo, imizi engamashumi ayisithupha. Bonke labo babe ngamadodana kaMakiri uyise kaGileyadi. 
13_2_24_Emva kokuba esefile uHesironi eKalebi Efratha, u-Abiya, umkaHesironi, wamzalela u-Ashuri uyise kaThekhowa. 
13_2_25_Amadodana kaJerameli, izibulo likaHesironi, ayenguRamu izibulo, noBuna, no-Oreni, no-Osemi, no-Ahiya. 
13_2_26_UJerameli wayenomunye umfazi ogama lakhe lalingu-Athara; wayengunina ka-Onamu. 
13_2_27_Amadodana kaRamu, izibulo likaJerameli, ayengoMahasi, noJamini, no-Ekheri. 
13_2_28_Amadodana ka-Onamu ayengoShamayi noJada; amadodana kaShamayi: ngoNadabi no-Abishuri. 
13_2_29_Igama lomka-Abishuri lalingu-Abihayili; wamzalela o-Ahibani noMolidi. 
13_2_30_Amadodana kaNadabi: ngoSeledi no-Aphayimi; kepha uSeledi wafa engenabantwana. 
13_2_31_Amadodana ka-Aphayimi: ngu-Ishi; amadodana ka-Ishi: nguSheshani; amadodana kaSheshani: ngu-Ahilayi. 
13_2_32_Amadodana kaJada umfowabo kaShamayi: ngoJetheri noJonathani; uJetheri wafa engenabantwana. 
13_2_33_Amadodana kaJonathani: ngoPheleti noZaza. Labo babe ngamadodana kaJerameli. 
13_2_34_Kepha uSheshani wayengenamadodana, enamadodakazi odwa. USheshani wayenenceku, eyaseGibithe, egama layo lalinguJariha. 
13_2_35_USheshani wanika uJariha inceku yakhe indodakazi yakhe ibe ngumkakhe; wamzalela u-Athayi. 
13_2_36_U-Athayi wazala uNathani; uNathani wazala uZabadi; 
13_2_37_uZabadi wazala u-Efilali; u-Efilali wazala u-Obede; 
13_2_38_u-Obede wazala uJehu; uJehu wazala u-Azariya; 
13_2_39_u-Azariya wazala uHelesi; uHelesi wazala u-Eleyasa; 
13_2_40_u-Eleyasa wazala uSisamayi; uSisamayi wazala uShalumi; 
13_2_41_uShalumi wazala uJekamiya; uJekamiya wazala u-Elishama. 
13_2_42_Amadodana kaKalebi umfowabo kaJerameli: nguMesha izibulo lakhe, owayenguyise kaZifi, namadodana kaMaresha, uyise kaHebroni. 
13_2_43_Amadodana kaHebroni: ngoKora, noTaphuwa, noRekemi, noShema. 
13_2_44_UShema wazala uRahamu uyise kaJorikeyamu; uRekemi wazala uShamayi. 
13_2_45_Indodana kaShamayi: nguMahoni; uMahoni wayenguyise kaBeti Suri. 
13_2_46_U-Efa, isancinza sikaKalebi, wazala oHarana, noMosa, noGazezi; uHarana wazala uGazezi. 
13_2_47_Amadodana kaJadayi: ngoRegemi, noJothamu, noGeshani, noPheleti, no-Efa, noShahafi. 
13_2_48_UMahakha, isancinza sikaKalebi, wazala oSheberi noThirihana. 
13_2_49_Wazala noShahafi uyise kaMadimana, noSheva uyise kaMakibena, noyise kaGibeya; indodakazi kaKalebi yayingu-Akisa. 
13_2_50_Laba babe ngamadodana kaKalebi: amadodana kaHure izibulo lika-Efratha: nguShobali uyise kaKiriyati Jeharimi, 
13_2_51_noSalima uyise kaBetlehema, noHarefi uyise kaBeti Gaderi. 
13_2_52_NoShobali uyise kaKiriyati Jeharimi wayenamadodana: nguHarowe nenxenye kaMenuhoti. 
13_2_53_Imindeni kaKiriyati Jeharimi yayingamaJetheri, namaPhuthi, namaShumati, namaMishirayiti; kubona kwavela amaSorati nama-Eshitawoli. 
13_2_54_Amadodana kaSalima: nguBetlehema, namaNethofa, no-Atharoti BetiJowabe, nenxenye yamaManahati, amaSori. 
13_2_55_Imindeni yababhali ababehlala eJabesi: ngamaThirati, namaShimeyati, namaSukati. Labo babe ngamaKheni avela kuHamati uyise wendlu kaRekabi. 
13_3_1_Laba babe ngamadodana kaDavide azalelwa wona eHebroni: izibulo ngu-Amnoni ku-Ahinohama umHizreyelikazi; owesibili nguDaniyeli ku-Abigayili umKarmelikazi; 
13_3_2_owesithathu ngu-Abisalomu indodana kaMahakha indodakazi kaTalimayi inkosi yaseGeshuri; owesine ngu-Adoniya indodana kaHagiti; 
13_3_3_owesihlanu nguShefathiya ku-Abithali; owesithupha ngu-Itereyamu ku-Egila umkakhe. 
13_3_4_Wazalelwa ayisithupha eHebroni; wabusa khona iminyaka eyisikhombisa nezinyanga eziyisithupha; eJerusalema wabusa iminyaka engamashumi amathathu nantathu. 
13_3_5_Yilaba azalelwa bona eJerusalema: ngoShimeya, noShobabi, noNathani, noSolomoni, bebane, kuBati Shuwa indodakazi ka-Amiyeli, 
13_3_6_noJibari, no-Elishama, no-Elifeleti, 
13_3_7_noNoga, noNefegi, noJafiya, 
13_3_8_no-Elishama, no-Eliyada, no-Elifeleti, beyisishiyagalolunye. 
13_3_9_Bonke labo babe ngamadodana kaDavide ngaphandle kwamadodana ezancinza; uTamari wayengudadewabo. 
13_3_10_Indodana kaSolomoni yayinguRehobowamu; ngu-Abiya indodana yakhe; ngu-Asa indodana yakhe; nguJehoshafati indodana yakhe; 
13_3_11_nguJoramu indodana yakhe; ngu-Ahaziya indodana yakhe; nguJowashi indodana yakhe; 
13_3_12_ngu-Amasiya indodana yakhe; ngu-Azariya indodana yakhe; nguJothamu indodana yakhe; 
13_3_13_ngu-Ahazi indodana yakhe; nguHezekiya indodana yakhe; nguManase indodana yakhe; 
13_3_14_ngu-Amoni indodana yakhe; nguJosiya indodana yakhe. 
13_3_15_Amadodana kaJosiya: izibulo nguJohanani; owesibili nguJehoyakimi; owesithathu nguSedekiya; owesine nguShalumi. 
13_3_16_Amadodana kaJehoyakimi: nguJekoniya indodana yakhe noSedekiya indodana yakhe. 
13_3_17_Amadodana kaJekoniya umthunjwa: ngoSheyalitiyeli indodana yakhe, 
13_3_18_noMalikiramu, noPhedaya, noShenasari, noJekamiya, noHoshama, noNedabiya. 
13_3_19_Amadodana kaPhedaya: ngoZerubabele noShimeyi; amadodana kaZerubabele: ngoMeshulamu noHananiya uShelomiti wayengudadewabo 
13_3_20_noHashuba, no-Oheli, noBerekiya, noHasadiya, noJushabi Hesedi, beyisihlanu. 
13_3_21_Amadodana kaHananiya: ngoPhelathiya, noJeshaya, namadodana kaRefaya, namadodana ka-Arinani, namadodana ka-Obadiya, namadodana kaShekaniya. 
13_3_22_Amadodana kaShekaniya: nguShemaya; amadodana kaShemaya: ngoHathushi, no-Igali, noBariya, noNehariya, noShafati, beyisithupha. 
13_3_23_Amadodana kaNehariya: ngo-Eliyohenayi, noHezekiya, no-Azirikamu, bebathathu. 
13_3_24_Amadodana ka-Eliyohenayi: ngoHodaviya, no-Eliyashibi, noPhelaya, no-Akubi, noJohanani, noDelaya, no-Anani, beyisikhombisa. 
13_4_1_Amadodana kaJuda: ngoPheresi, noHesironi, noKarmi, noHure, noShobali. 
13_4_2_URewaya indodana kaShobali wazala uJahati; uJahati wazala o-Ahumayi noLahadi. Leyo yayiyimindeni yamaSorati. 
13_4_3_Yilaba abangabakayise ka-Etamu: oJizreyeli, no-Ishima, no-Idibashi, igama likadadewabo lalinguHaseleliponi 
13_4_4_noPhenuweli, uyise kaGedori, no-Ezeri, uyise kaHusha. Yilabo ababe ngamadodana kaHure izibulo lika-Efratha, uyise kaBetlehema. 
13_4_5_U-Ashuri uyise kaThekhowa wayenabafazi ababili, oHela noNahara. 
13_4_6_UNahara wamzalela o-Ahuzamu, noHeferi, noThemeni, noHawahashitari. Yilabo ababe ngamadodana kaNahara. 
13_4_7_Amadodana kaHela: ngoSereti, noJisihari, no-Ethinani. 
13_4_8_UKhosi wazala o-Anubi, noSobeba, nemindeni ka-Ahariheli indodana kaHarumu. 
13_4_9_UJabesi wayetuseka kunabafowabo; unina wamqamba igama lokuthi uJabesi, ethi: “Ngokuba ngamzala ngibuhlungu.” 
13_4_10_UJabesi wabiza uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, wathi: “Sengathi ungangibusisa nokungibusisa, wandise umkhawulo wami, isandla sakho sibe nami, ungivikele ebubini, ngingehlelwa ngubuhlungu.” UNkulunkulu wamnika akucelayo. 
13_4_11_UKelubi umfowabo kaShuba wazala uMehiri owayenguyise ka-Eshitoni. 
13_4_12_U-Eshitoni wazala uBeti Rafa, noPhaseya, noThehina uyise ka-Iri Nahashi. Yilabo ababe ngamadodana kaRekha. 
13_4_13_Amadodana kaKenazi: ngo-Otheniyeli noSeraya; amadodana ka-Otheniyeli: nguHathati. 
13_4_14_UMehonothayi wazala u-Ofira; uSeraya wazala uJowabe uyise wesigodi sabakhandi, ngokuba babe ngabakhandi. 
13_4_15_Amadodana kaKalebi indodana kaJefune: ngo-Iru, no-Ela, noNahamu, namadodana ka-Ela, noKenazi. 
13_4_16_Amadodana kaJehaleli: ngoZifi, noZifa, noThiriya, no-Asareli. 
13_4_17_Amadodana ka-Ezra: ngoJetheri, noMeredi, no-Eferi, noJaloni; wazala oMiriyamu, noShamayi, no-Ishiba uyise ka-Eshitemowa. 
13_4_18_Umkakhe umJudakazi wazala uJeredi uyise kaGedori, noHebere uyise kaSoko, noJekuthiyeli uyise kaZanowa. Kepha abanye babe ngamadodana kaBithiya indodakazi kaFaro eyathathwa nguMeredi. 
13_4_19_Amadodana omkaHodiya udadewabo kaNahamu ayenguyise kaKeyila umGarimi no-Eshitemowa umMahakha. 
13_4_20_Amadodana kaShimoni: ngo-Amnoni, noRina, noBeni Hanani, noThiloni. Amadodana ka-Ishi: ngoZoheti noBeni Zoheti. 
13_4_21_Amadodana kaShela indodana kaJuda: ngu-Eri, uyise kaLekha, noLahada uyise kaMaresha, nemindeni yendlu yabaluka ilineni elicolekileyo bendlu ka-Ashibeya, 
13_4_22_noJokimi, nabantu baseKhozeba, noJowashi, noSarafi ababebusa kwaMowabi, noJashubi Lehemi. Ngezasendulo kodwa lezi zindaba. 
13_4_23_Labo babe ngababumbi nabakhileyo eNethayimi naseGedera; bahlala khona nenkosi ngomsebenzi wayo. 
13_4_24_Amadodana kaSimeyoni: ngoNemuweli, noJamini, noJaribi, noZera, noShawule, 
13_4_25_noShalumi indodana yakhe, noMibisamu indodana yakhe, noMishima indodana yakhe. 
13_4_26_Amadodana kaMishima: ngoHamuweli indodana yakhe, noZakuri indodana yakhe, noShimeyi indodana yakhe. 
13_4_27_UShimeyi wayenamadodana ayishumi nesithupha namadodakazi ayisithupha; kepha abafowabo babengenabantwana abaningi, nomndeni wabo awandanga njengabantwana bakwaJuda. 
13_4_28_Bahlala eBeri Sheba, naseMolada, naseHasari Shuwali, 
13_4_29_naseBiliha, nase-Esemi, naseTholadi, 
13_4_30_naseBetuweli, naseHorma, naseSikilagi, 
13_4_31_naseBeti Marikaboti, naseHasari Susimi, naseBeti Biri, naseShaharayimi. Yileyo eyayiyimizi yabo kwaze kwabusa uDavide. 
13_4_32_Imizana yabo yayiyi-Etamu, ne-Ayini, neRimoni, neThokheni, ne-Ashani, imizi eyisihlanu, 
13_4_33_kanye nayo yonke imizana eyayiyizungeza le mizi kwaze kwaba seBali. Lezo zaziyizindawo zabo, bebhalwe ngezizukulwane zabo. 
13_4_34_Futhi oMeshobabi, noJamileki, noJosha indodana ka-Amasiya, 
13_4_35_noJoweli, noJehu kaJoshibiya kaSeraya ka-Asiyeli, 
13_4_36_no-Eliyohenayi, noJahakhoba, noJeshohaya, no-Asaya, no-Adiyeli, noJesimiyeli, noBenaya, 
13_4_37_noZiza kaShifi ka-Aloni kaJedaya kaShimri kaShemaya. 
13_4_38_Labo ababizwe ngamagama babeyizikhulu emindenini yabo; izindlu zawoyise zanda kakhulu. 
13_4_39_Baya ngasekungeneni eGedori ngasohlangothini lwasempumalanga kwesigodi ukufunela izimvu zabo idlelo. 
13_4_40_Bafumana idlelo elivundileyo nelihle; izwe lalibanzi nxazombili, lizolile, linokuthula, ngokuba ababehlala khona kuqala babe ngabakwaHamu. 
13_4_41_Labo abalotshwe ngamagama bafika ezinsukwini zikaHezekiya inkosi yakwaJuda, bachitha amatende abo namaMehuni afunyanwa khona, bawaqothula kuze kube namuhla, bahlala esikhundleni sabo, ngokuba kwakukhona idlelo lezimvu zabo lapho. 
13_4_42_Abanye babo, amadodana kaSimeyoni, abantu abangamakhulu ayisihlanu, baya entabeni yaseSeyiri benezinduna zabo oPhelathiya, noNehariya, noRefaya, no-Uziyeli, amadodana ka-Ishi. 
13_4_43_Bachitha insali yama-Amaleki ephunyukileyo, bahlala khona kuze kube namuhla. 
13_5_1_Amadodana kaRubeni, izibulo lika-Israyeli ngokuba wayeyizibulo; kepha njengokuba wangcolisa umbhede kayise, ubuzibulo bakhe banikwa amadodana kaJosefa indodana ka-Israyeli, futhi akabhalwa ngezizukulwane njengezibulo. 
13_5_2_Noma uJuda ebenamandla kunabafowabo, kwavela kuye umbusi, ubuzibulo nokho babungobukaJosefa. 
13_5_3_Amadodana-ke kaRubeni, izibulo lika-Israyeli: ngoHanoki, noPhalu, noHesironi, noKarmi. 
13_5_4_Amadodana kaJoweli: nguShemaya indodana yakhe, noGogi indodana yakhe, noShimeyi indodana yakhe, 
13_5_5_noMika indodana yakhe, noRewaya indodana yakhe, noBali indodana yakhe, 
13_5_6_noBera indodana yakhe, owathunjwa nguThiligati Phileneseri inkosi yase-Asiriya; wayeyisikhulu sabakwaRubeni. 
13_5_7_Nabafowabo ngemindeni yabo, bebhalwe ngezizukulwane zabo: ngoJehiyeli inhloko noZakariya, 
13_5_8_noBela ka-Azazi kaShema kaJoweli, owahlala e-Aroweri kwaze kwaba seNebo noBali Mehoni. 
13_5_9_Ngasempumalanga wakha kwaze kwaba sekuqaleni kwehlane elisuka emfuleni u-Ewufrathe, ngokuba izinkomo zabo zanda ezweni lakwaGileyadi. 
13_5_10_Emihleni kaSawule baphaka impi kumaHagiri, awa ngesandla sabo; bahlala ematendeni abo ngasempumalanga yonke yakwaGileyadi. 
13_5_11_Amadodana kaGadi ahlala malungana nabo ezweni laseBashani kwaze kwaba seSaleka: 
13_5_12_ngoJoweli inhloko, noShafamu owesibili, noJahanayi, noShafati eBashani; 
13_5_13_nabafowabo ngezindlu zawoyise: ngoMikayeli, noMeshulamu, noSheba, noJorayi, noJakani, noZiya, no-Ebere, beyisikhombisa. 
13_5_14_Labo babe ngamadodana ka-Abihayili kaHuri kaJarowa kaGileyadi kaMikayeli kaJeshishayi kaJahido kaBuzi; 
13_5_15_u-Ahi ka-Abidiyeli kaGuni wayeyinhloko yezindlu zawoyise. 
13_5_16_Bahlala kwaGileyadi eBashani nasemizini yalo nasemadlelweni onke aseSharoni kwaze kwaba semikhawulweni yawo. 
13_5_17_Bonke labo babhalwa ngezizukulwane zabo emihleni kaJothamu inkosi yakwaJuda nasemihleni kaJerobowamu inkosi yakwa-Israyeli. 
13_5_18_Amadodana kaRubeni, nabakwaGadi, nenxenye yesizwe sakwaManase, amadoda anamandla, amadoda aphatha ihawu nenkemba, ansala umnsalo, ayefunde ukulwa, ayeyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amane nane namakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi ayisithupha aphuma impi. 
13_5_19_Aphaka impi kumaHagiri, noJeturu, noNafishi, noNodabi. 
13_5_20_Asizwa ekulweni nabo, amaHagiri anikelwa ezandleni zawo nabo bonke ababe nawo, ngokuba akhala kuNkulunkulu empini, amncenga, ngokuba ayemethemba. 
13_5_21_Asusa izinkomo zabo, namakamela ayizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisihlanu, nezimvu eziyizinkulungwane ezingamakhulu amabili namashumi ayisihlanu, nezimbongolo eziyizinkulungwane ezimbili, nabantu abayizinkulungwane eziyikhulu. 
13_5_22_Ngokuba kwawa abaningi befile, lokhu impi yayingekaNkulunkulu. Ahlala esikhundleni sabo aze athunjwa. 
13_5_23_Abantwana benxenye yesizwe sakwaManase bahlala kulelo zwe, kusukela eBashani kuze kube seBali Hermoni naseSeniri nasentabeni yaseHermoni. 
13_5_24_Nazi izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise: o-Eferi, no-Ishi, no-Eliyeli, no-Aziriyeli, noJeremiya, noHodaviya, noJahidiyeli, amaqhawe anamandla, amadoda anegama, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise. 
13_5_25_Kepha baphambuka kuNkulunkulu wawoyise, balandela ngokuphinga onkulunkulu babantu balelo zwe, uNkulunkulu abachithayo phambi kwabo. 
13_5_26_UNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli wavusa umoya kaPhuli inkosi yase-Asiriya nomoya kaThiligati Philineseri inkosi yase-Asiriya, wabathumba: abakwaRubeni, nabakwaGadi, nenxenye yesizwe sakwaManase, wabayisa eHala, naseHabori, naseHara, nasemfuleni iGozani kuze kube namuhla. 
13_6_1_Amadodana kaLevi: ngoGereshoni, noKohati, noMerari. 
13_6_2_Amadodana kaKohati: ngo-Amramu, noJisihari, noHebroni, no-Uziyeli. 
13_6_3_Abantwana bakwa-Amramu: ngo-Aroni, noMose, noMiriyamu. Amadodana ka-Aroni: ngoNadabi, no-Abihu, no-Eleyazare, no-Itamari. 
13_6_4_U-Eleyazare wazala uFinehasi; uFinehasi wazala u-Abishuwa; 
13_6_5_u-Abishuwa wazala uBuki; uBuki wazala u-Uzi; 
13_6_6_u-Uzi wazala uZeraya; uZeraya wazala uMerayoti; 
13_6_7_uMerayoti wazala u-Amariya; u-Amariya wazala u-Ahithubi; 
13_6_8_u-Ahithubi wazala uSadoki; uSadoki wazala u-Ahimahasi; 
13_6_9_u-Ahimahasi wazala u-Azariya; u-Azariya wazala uJohanani; 
13_6_10_uJohanani wazala u-Azariya; nguye owayengumpristi ethempelini elakhiwa nguSolomoni eJerusalema; 
13_6_11_u-Azariya wazala u-Amariya; u-Amariya wazala u-Ahithubi; 
13_6_12_u-Ahithubi wazala uSadoki; uSadoki wazala uShalumi; 
13_6_13_uShalumi wazala uHilikiya; uHilikiya wazala u-Azariya; 
13_6_14_u-Azariya wazala uSeraya; uSeraya wazala uJehosadaki; 
13_6_15_kepha uJehosadaki wamuka lapho uJehova ethumba uJuda neJerusalema ngesandla sikaNebukadinesari. 
13_6_16_Amadodana kaLevi: ngoGereshomu, noKohati, noMerari. 
13_6_17_Nanka amagama amadodana kaGereshomu: oLibini noShimeyi. 
13_6_18_Amadodana kaKohati: ngo-Amramu, noJisihari, noHebroni, no-Uziyeli. 
13_6_19_Amadodana kaMerari: ngoMaheli noMushi. Nansi imindeni yamaLevi njengezindlu zawoyise: 
13_6_20_abakwaGereshomu: nguLibini indodana yakhe, noJahati indodana yakhe, noZima indodana yakhe, 
13_6_21_noJowa indodana yakhe, no-Ido indodana yakhe, noZera indodana yakhe, noJewatherayi indodana yakhe. 
13_6_22_Amadodana kaKohati: ngu-Amindaba indodana yakhe, noKora indodana yakhe, no-Asiri indodana yakhe, 
13_6_23_no-Elkana indodana yakhe, no-Ebiyasafa indodana yakhe, no-Asiri indodana yakhe, 
13_6_24_noTathi indodana yakhe, no-Uriyeli indodana yakhe, no-Uziya indodana yakhe, noShawule indodana yakhe. 
13_6_25_Amadodana ka-Elkana: ngo-Amasayi no-Ahimoti. 
13_6_26_U-Elkana-ke, amadodana ka-Elkana: nguSofayi indodana yakhe, noNahati indodana yakhe, 
13_6_27_no-Eliyabe indodana yakhe, noJerohamu indodana yakhe, no-Elkana indodana yakhe. 
13_6_28_Amadodana kaSamuweli: izibulo nguJoweli, nowesibili ngu-Abiya. 
13_6_29_Amadodana kaMerari: ngoMaheli, noLibini indodana yakhe, noShimeyi indodana yakhe, no-Uza indodana yakhe, 
13_6_30_noShimeya indodana yakhe, noHagiya indodana yakhe, no-Asaya indodana yakhe. 
13_6_31_Nampa uDavide abamisela ukuhola ukuhlabelela endlini kaJehova, umphongolo usubekiwe khona. 
13_6_32_Bakhonza ngokuhlabelela phambi kwetabernakele letende lokuhlangana, uSolomoni waze wakha indlu kaJehova eJerusalema. Bema emsebenzini wabo njengomthetho wabo. 
13_6_33_Yilaba ababemi namadodana abo: kumadodana amaKohati: nguHemani, umhlabeleli, kaJoweli kaSamuweli 
13_6_34_ka-Elkana kaJerohamu ka-Eliyeli kaThowa 
13_6_35_kaSufi ka-Elkana kaMahati ka-Amasayi 
13_6_36_ka-Elkana kaJoweli ka-Azariya kaZefaniya 
13_6_37_kaThati ka-Asiri ka-Ebiyasafa kaKora 
13_6_38_kaJisihari kaKohati kaLevi ka-Israyeli; 
13_6_39_futhi umfowabo u-Asafa owayemi ngakwesokunene sakhe, u-Asafa kaBerekiya kaShimeya 
13_6_40_kaMikayeli kaBahaseya kaNalikhiya 
13_6_41_ka-Ethini kaZera ka-Adaya 
13_6_42_ka-Ethani kaZima kaShimeyi 
13_6_43_kaJahati kaGereshomu kaLevi. 
13_6_44_Amadodana kaMerari abafowabo ayengakwesokunene: ngu-Ethani kaKishi ka-Abidi kaMaluki 
13_6_45_kaHashabiya ka-Amasiya kaHilikiya 
13_6_46_ka-Amisi kaBani kaShemeri 
13_6_47_kaMaheli kaMushi kaMerari kaLevi. 
13_6_48_Abafowabo amaLevi banikelelwa yonke inkonzo yetabernakele lendlu kaNkulunkulu. 
13_6_49_Kepha u-Aroni namadodana akhe bashiya iminikelo e-altare leminikelo yokushiswa nase-altare lempepho, benza nawo wonke umsebenzi wendawo engcwelengcwele, benzela u-Israyeli ukubuyisana njengakho konke ayale ngakho uMose inceku kaNkulunkulu. 
13_6_50_Nanka amadodana ka-Aroni: u-Eleyazare indodana yakhe, noFinehasi indodana yakhe, no-Abishuwa indodana yakhe, 
13_6_51_noBuki indodana yakhe, no-Uzi indodana yakhe, noZeraya indodana yakhe, 
13_6_52_noMerayoti indodana yakhe, no-Amariya indodana yakhe, no-Ahithubi indodana yakhe, 
13_6_53_noSadoki indodana yakhe, no-Ahimahasi indodana yakhe. 
13_6_54_Lezi ziyizindawo zawo zokuhlala njengamakamu awo emikhawulweni yawo: amadodana ka-Aroni emindeni yamaKohati ngokuba yiwona adliwa yinkatho yokuqala 
13_6_55_wona bawanika iHebroni ezweni lakwaJuda namadlelo alizungezayo. 
13_6_56_Kodwa amasimu omuzi nemizana yawo bakunika uKalebi, indodana kaJefune. 
13_6_57_Banika amadodana ka-Aroni imizi yokuphephela, iHebroni neLibina namadlelo awo, neJatiri, ne-Eshitemowa namadlelo awo, 
13_6_58_neHileni namadlelo alo, neDebiri namadlelo alo, 
13_6_59_ne-Ashani namadlelo alo, neBetiShemeshi namadlelo alo, 
13_6_60_nasesizweni sakwaBenjamini, iGeba namadlelo alo, ne-Alemeti namadlelo alo, ne-Anathoti namadlelo alo. Yonke imizi yawo ngemindeni yawo yayiyimizi eyishumi nantathu. 
13_6_61_Amadodana aseleyo kaKohati anikwa ngenkatho emndenini wesizwe, enxenyeni yesizwe, inxenye kaManase, imizi eyishumi, 
13_6_62_namadodana kaGereshomu ngemindeni yawo esizweni sakwa-Isakare, nasesizweni sakwa-Asheri, nasesizweni sakwaNafetali, nasesizweni sakwaManase, eBashani, imizi eyishumi nantathu, 
13_6_63_namadodana kaMerari ngenkatho ngemindeni yawo esizweni sakwaRubeni, nasesizweni sakwaGadi, nasesizweni sakwaZebuloni imizi eyishumi nambili. 
13_6_64_Abantwana bakwa-Israyeli banika amaLevi leyo mizi namadlelo ayo. 
13_6_65_Banika ngenkatho leyo mizi ebizwe ngamagama esizweni sabantwana bakwaJuda, nasesizweni sabantwana bakwaSimeyoni, nasesizweni sabantwana bakwaBenjamini. 
13_6_66_Eminye imindeni yamadodana kaKohati yayinemizi yemikhawulo yayo esizweni sakwa-Efrayimi. 
13_6_67_Bayinika imizi yokuphephela: iShekemi ezintabeni zakwa-Efrayimi namadlelo alo, neGezeri namadlelo alo, 
13_6_68_neJokimeyamu namadlelo alo, neBeti Horoni namadlelo alo, 
13_6_69_ne-Ajaloni namadlelo alo, neGati Rimoni namadlelo alo, 
13_6_70_nasenxenyeni yesizwe sakwaManase i-Anere namadlelo alo, neBileyamu namadlelo alo, ibe ngeyomndeni oseleyo wamadodana kaKohati. 
13_6_71_Amadodana kaGereshomu anikwa emndenini wenxenye yesizwe sakwaManase iGolanu, eBashani, namadlelo alo ne-Ashitaroti namadlelo alo; 
13_6_72_nasesizweni sakwa-Isakare iKedeshi namadlelo alo, neDaberati namadlelo alo, 
13_6_73_neRamoti namadlelo alo, ne-Anemi namadlelo alo; 
13_6_74_nasesizweni sakwa-Asheri iMashali namadlelo alo, ne-Abidoni namadlelo alo, 
13_6_75_neHukoki namadlelo alo, neRehobe namadlelo alo; 
13_6_76_nasesizweni sakwaNafetali iKedeshi eGalile namadlelo alo, neHamoni namadlelo alo, neKiriyatayimi namadlelo alo. 
13_6_77_Aseleyo, amadodana kaMerari, anikwa esizweni sakwaZebuloni iRimono namadlelo alo neGhabori namadlelo alo, 
13_6_78_naphesheya kweJordani ngaseJeriko ngasempumalanga kwaseJordani esizweni sakwaRubeni iBeseri ehlane namadlelo alo, neJahasa namadlelo alo, 
13_6_79_neKedemoti namadlelo alo, neMefahati namadlelo alo; 
13_6_80_nasesizweni sakwaGadi iRamoti kwaGileyadi namadlelo alo, neMahanayimi namadlelo alo, 
13_6_81_neHeshiboni namadlelo alo, neJazeri namadlelo alo. 
13_7_1_Amadodana ka-Isakare: ngoThola, noPhuwa, noJashubi, noShimroni, bebane. 
13_7_2_Amadodana kaThola: ngo-Uzi, noRefaya, noJeriyeli, noJahemayi, no-Ibisamu, noShemuweli, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, abakwaThola, amaqhawe anamandla ngezizukulwane zawo; umumo wawo ngezinsuku zikaDavide wawuyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili nambili namakhulu ayisithupha. 
13_7_3_Amadodana ka-Uzi: nguJizirahiya; amadodana kaJizirahiya: ngoMikayeli, no-Obadiya, noJoweli, noJishiya, beyisihlanu, beyizinhloko bonke. 
13_7_4_Kanye nawo kwakukhona ngezizukulwane zawo ngezindlu zawoyise amaviyo empi yokulwa, abayizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amathathu nesithupha, ngokuba babe nabafazi abaningi namadodana amaningi. 
13_7_5_Abafowabo kuyo yonke imindeni ka-Isakare, amaqhawe anamandla, babe yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisishiyagalombili nesikhombisa, bebhalwe bonke ngezizukulwane zabo. 
13_7_6_Amadodana kaBenjamini: ngoBela, noBekeri, noJediyayeli, bebathathu. 
13_7_7_Amadodana kaBela: ngo-Esiboni, no-Uzi, no-Uziyeli, noJerimoti, no-Iri, beyisihlanu, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, amaqhawe anamandla, beyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili nambili namashumi amathathu nane, bebhalwe ngezizukulwane zabo. 
13_7_8_Amadodana kaBekeri: ngoZemira, noJowashi, no-Eliyezeri, no-Eliyohenayi, no-Omri, noJeremoti, no-Abiya, no-Anathoti, no-Alemeti. Bonke labo babe ngamadodana kaBekeri. 
13_7_9_Babhalwa ngezizukulwane zabo, beyizinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, amaqhawe anamandla, beyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili namakhulu amabili. 
13_7_10_Amadodana kaJediyayeli: nguBilihani; amadodana kaBilihani: ngoJewushe, noBenjamini, no-Ehudi, noKhenahana, noZethani, noTharishishi, no-Ahishahari. 
13_7_11_Bonke labo babe ngamadodana kaJediyayeli ngezinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, amaqhawe anamandla, beyizinkulungwane eziyishumi nesikhombisa namakhulu amabili abangaphuma impi ukuyokulwa. 
13_7_12_OShuphimi noHuphimi babe ngamadodana ka-Iri; uHushimi wayeyindodana ka-Aheri. 
13_7_13_Amadodana kaNafetali: ngoJasiyeli, noGuni, noJeseri, noShalumi, amadodana kaBiliha. 
13_7_14_Amadodana kaManase: ngu-Asiriyeli owamzalelayo umkakhe; isancinza sakhe umAramukazi sazala uMakiri uyise kaGileyadi. 
13_7_15_UMakiri wathathela oHuphimi noShuphimi abafazi; igama likadadewabo lalinguMahakha. Igama lowesibili lalinguSelofehadi; uSelofehadi wayenamadodakazi. 
13_7_16_UMahakha umkaMakiri wazala indodana, waqamba igama layo ngokuthi uPhereshi; igama lomfowabo lalinguShereshi; amadodana akhe ayengo-Ulamu noRakemi. 
13_7_17_Amadodana ka-Ulamu: nguBedani. Labo babe ngamadodana kaGileyadi kaMakiri kaManase. 
13_7_18_Udadewabo uHamoleketi wazala o-Ishihodi, no-Abiyezeri, noMahela. 
13_7_19_Amadodana kaShemida ayengo-Ahiyani, noShekemi, noLikihi, no-Aniyamu. 
13_7_20_Amadodana ka-Efrayimi: ngoShuthela, noBeredi indodana yakhe, noTahati indodana yakhe, no-Eleyada indodana yakhe, noTahati indodana yakhe, 
13_7_21_noZabadi indodana yakhe, noShuthela indodana yakhe, no-Ezeri no-Eleyadi ababulawa ngabantu baseGati ababezelwe kulelo zwe, ngokuba behla ukuthatha izinkomo zabo. 
13_7_22_U-Efrayimi uyise walila izinsuku eziningi; abafowabo beza ukumduduza. 
13_7_23_Wangena kumkakhe; wamitha, wazala indodana, waqamba igama layo ngokuthi uBeriya, ngokuba indlu yakhe yayisengozini. 
13_7_24_Indodakazi yakhe yayinguSheyera owakha iBeti Horoni laseNzansi nelaseNhla, ne-Uzeni Sheyera. 
13_7_25_URefa wayeyindodana yakhe, noReshefi, noThela indodana yakhe, noThahani indodana yakhe, 
13_7_26_noLadani indodana yakhe, no-Amihudi indodana yakhe, no-Elishama indodana yakhe, 
13_7_27_noNuni indodana yakhe, noJoshuwa indodana yakhe. 
13_7_28_Ifa labo nezindawo zabo zokuhlala kwakuyiBethele nemizana yalo, nangasempumalanga iNaharani, nangasentshonalanga iGezeri nemizana yalo, neShekemi nemizana yalo, kwaze kwaba se-Aya nemizana yalo; 
13_7_29_nangasemikhawulweni yabantwana bakwaManase iBeti Sheyani nemizana yalo, neThahanaki nemizana yalo, neMegido nemizana yalo, neDori nemizana yalo. Kuleyo kwahlala abantwana bakaJosefa indodana ka-Israyeli. 
13_7_30_Amadodana ka-Asheri: ngoJimna, no-Ishiva, no-Ishivi, noBeriya, kanye noSera udadewabo. 
13_7_31_Amadodana kaBeriya: ngoHebere noMalikiyeli owayenguyise kaBirizayiti. 
13_7_32_UHebere wazala oJafeleti, noShomeri, noHothamu, noShuwa udadewabo. 
13_7_33_Amadodana kaJafeleti: ngoPhasaki, noBimihali, no-Ashivati. Labo babe ngabantwana bakaJafeleti. 
13_7_34_Amadodana kaShemeri: ngo-Ahi, noRohiga, noJehuba, no-Aramu. 
13_7_35_Amadodana kaHelemi umfowabo: ngoSofa, noJimna, noSheleshi, no-Amali. 
13_7_36_Amadodana kaSofa: ngoShuwa, noHarineferi, noShuhali, noBeri, no-Imra, 
13_7_37_noBeseri, noHodi, noShama, noShilisha, noJitrani, noBeyera. 
13_7_38_Amadodana kaJetheri: ngoJefune, noPhisipha, no-Ara. 
13_7_39_Amadodana ka-Ula: ngo-Ara, noHaniyeli, noRisiya. 
13_7_40_Bonke labo babe ngabantwana baka-Asheri, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, amaqhawe akhethekileyo anamandla, izinhloko zezikhulu. Umumo wabo ubhalwe ngezizukulwane zabo ukuba balwe empini wawungabantu abayizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili nesithupha. 
13_8_1_UBenjamini wazala uBela izibulo lakhe, no-Ashibeli owesibili, no-Ahara owesithathu, 
13_8_2_noNoha owesine, noRafa owesihlanu. 
13_8_3_UBela wayenamadodana: ngo-Adari, noGera, no-Abihudi, 
13_8_4_no-Abishuwa, noNahamani, no-Ahowa, 
13_8_5_noGera, noShefufani, noHuramu. 
13_8_6_Nanka amadodana ka-Ehudi, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise zabakhe eGeba, ezathunjelwa eManahati, 
13_8_7_zathunjwa ngoNahamani, no-Ahiya, noGera owazala o-Uza no-Ahihudi. 
13_8_8_UShaharayimi wazala abantwana ezweni lakwaMowabi esemukisile oHushimi noBahara omkakhe. 
13_8_9_Wazala kuHodeshi umkakhe oJobabi, noSibiya, noMesha, noMalikamu, 
13_8_10_noJewuse, noShakiya, noMirima. Labo babe ngamadodana akhe, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise. 
13_8_11_Wazala kuHushimi o-Abithubi no-Eliphahali. 
13_8_12_Amadodana ka-Eliphahali: ngo-Ebere, noMishamu, noShemedi, abakha i-Ono neLodi nemizana yawo, 
13_8_13_noBeriya, noShema, ababe yizinhloko zezindlu zawoyise zabakhe e-Ajaloni, abaxosha abakhe eGati; 
13_8_14_no-Ahiyo, noShashaki, noJeremoti, 
13_8_15_noZebadiya, no-Aradi, no-Edere, 
13_8_16_noMikayeli, noJishipha, noJoha, amadodana kaBeriya, 
13_8_17_noZebadiya, noMeshulamu, noHiziki, noHebere, 
13_8_18_no-Ishmerayi, noJiziliya, noJobabi, amadodana ka-Eliphahali, 
13_8_19_noJakimi, noZikiri, noZabidi, 
13_8_20_no-Eliyenayi, noSilethayi, no-Eliyeli, 
13_8_21_no-Adaya, noBeraya, noShimrati, amadodana kaShimeyi, 
13_8_22_noJishiphani, no-Ebere, no-Eliyeli, 
13_8_23_no-Abidoni, noZikiri, noHanani, 
13_8_24_noHananiya, no-Elamu, no-Anithothiya, 
13_8_25_no-Ifideya, noPhenuweli, amadodana kaShashaki, 
13_8_26_noShamusherayi, noShehariya, no-Athaliya, 
13_8_27_noJahareshiya, no-Eliya, noZikiri, amadodana kaJerohamu. 
13_8_28_Labo babe yizinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, izinhloko ezizukulwaneni zabo, bahlala eJerusalema. 
13_8_29_EGibeyoni kwahlala uyise kaGibeyoni ogama lomkakhe lalinguMahakha; 
13_8_30_izibulo lakhe lalingu-Abidoni, kanye noSuri, noKishi, noBali, noNadabi, 
13_8_31_noGedori, no-Ahiyo, noZekeri. 
13_8_32_Kepha uMikiloti wazala uShimeya. Nabo bahlala nabafowabo eJerusalema malungana nabafowabo. 
13_8_33_UNeri wazala uKishi; uKishi wazala uSawule; uSawule wazala oJonathani, noMaliki Shuwa, no-Abinadaba, no-Eshi Bali. 
13_8_34_Indodana kaJonathani yayinguMeribi Bali; uMeribi Bali wazala uMika. 
13_8_35_Amadodana kaMika: ngoPhithoni, noMeleki, noThareya, no-Ahazi. 
13_8_36_U-Ahazi wazala uJehohada; uJehohada wazala o-Alemeti, no-Azimaveti, noZimri; uZimri wazala uMosa; 
13_8_37_uMosa wazala uBineya; uRafa wayeyindodana yakhe; ngu-Eleyasa indodana yakhe, ngu-Aseli indodana yakhe; 
13_8_38_u-Aseli wayenamadodana ayisithupha; amagama awo yilawa: o-Azirikamu, noBokeru, no-Ishmayeli, noShehariya, no-Obadiya, noHanani. Bonke labo babe ngamadodana ka-Aseli. 
13_8_39_Amadodana ka-Esheki umfowabo: ngu-Ulamu izibulo lakhe, noJewushe owesibili, no-Elifeleti owesithathu. 
13_8_40_Amadodana ka-Ulamu ayengamaqhawe anamandla, ansala umnsalo; ayenamadodana amaningi namadodana amadodana amaningi, eyikhulu namashumi ayisihlanu. Labo babe ngamadodana kaBenjamini. 
13_9_1_Wabhalwa-ke wonke u-Israyeli ngezizukulwane; bheka, balotshiwe encwadini yamakhosi akwa-Israyeli; uJuda wathunjelwa eBabele ngeziphambeko zakhe. 
13_9_2_Abakhileyo kuqala emafeni abo emizini yabo babe ngu-Israyeli, nabapristi, namaLevi, namaNethini. 
13_9_3_EJerusalema kwahlala kubantwana bakwaJuda, nakubantwana bakwaBenjamini, nakubantwana bakwa-Efrayimi noManase: 
13_9_4_ngu-Uthayi ka-Amihudi ka-Omri ka-Imri kaBani kubantwana bakwaPheresi kaJuda. 
13_9_5_KumaShiloni: ngu-Asaya izibulo namadodana akhe. 
13_9_6_Kumadodana kaZera: nguJehuweli nabafowabo, bengamakhulu ayisithupha namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye. 
13_9_7_Kumadodana kaBenjamini: nguSalu kaMeshulamu kaHodaviya kaHasenuwa, 
13_9_8_no-Ibineya indodana kaJerohamu, no-Ela ka-Uzi kaMikiri, noMeshulamu kaShefathiya kaRehuweli kaJibiniya, 
13_9_9_nabafowabo ngezizukulwane zabo, bengamakhulu ayisishiyagalolunye namashumi ayisihlanu nesithupha. Bonke labo bantu babe yizinhloko zezindlu zawoyise ngokwezindlu zawoyise. 
13_9_10_Kubapristi: ngoJedaya, noJehoyaribi, noJakini, 
13_9_11_no-Azariya kaHilikiya kaMeshulamu kaSadoki kaMerayoti ka-Ahithubi, umphathi wendlu kaNkulunkulu, 
13_9_12_no-Adaya kaJerohamu kaPhashuri kaMalikhiya noMahasayi ka-Adiyeli kaJahizera kaMeshulamu kaMeshilemiti ka-Imeri, 
13_9_13_nabafowabo, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise, beyinkulungwane namakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi ayisithupha, amadoda ahlakaniphile emsebenzini wenkonzo yasendlini kaNkulunkulu. 
13_9_14_KumaLevi: nguShemaya kaHashubi ka-Azirikamu kaHashabiya kumadodana kaMerari, 
13_9_15_noBakibakari, noHereshi, noGalali, noMathaniya kaMika kaZikiri ka-Asafa, 
13_9_16_no-Obadiya kaShemaya kaGalali kaJeduthuni, noBerekiya ka-Asa ka-Elkana owahlala emizaneni yamaNethofa, 
13_9_17_nabalindisango oShalumi, no-Akubi, noThalimoni, no-Ahimani, nabafowabo; uShalumi wayeyinhloko. 
13_9_18_Kwaze kwaba kuleso sikhathi babe sesangweni lenkosi ngasempumalanga; babe ngabalindisango bekamu labantwana bakwaLevi. 
13_9_19_UShalumi kaKore ka-Ebiyasafa kaKora, nabafowabo bendlu kayise, amaKorahi, babephethe umsebenzi wenkonzo, bengabalindisango etabernakele; oyise babemele ikamu likaJehova bengabalindisango. 
13_9_20_UFinehasi indodana ka-Eleyazare wayengumbusi phezu kwabo ngesikhathi esidlulileyo. UJehova wayenaye. 
13_9_21_UZakariya indodana kaMeshelemiya wayengumlindisango etendeni lokuhlangana. 
13_9_22_Bonke labo ababekhethiwe ukuba babe ngabalindisango babe ngamakhulu amabili neshumi nambili. Babhalwa ngezizukulwane emizaneni yabo, bamiswa ngoDavide noSamuweli umboni ezikhundleni zabo. 
13_9_23_Bona nabantwana babo babephethe amasango endlu kaJehova, indlu yetende, belinda. 
13_9_24_Abalindi babekhona ezinhlangothini ezine: ngasempumalanga, nangasentshonalanga, nangasenyakatho, nangaseningizimu. 
13_9_25_Abafowabo emizaneni yabo babeyakungena emva kwezinsuku eziyisikhombisa njalo izikhathi ngezikhathi ukuba babe nabo, 
13_9_26_ngokuba abalindi abane abakhulu ababe ngamaLevi babe sesikhundleni njalo, bephethe amakamelo nengcebo endlini kaNkulunkulu. 
13_9_27_Bahlala ebusuku bezungeza indlu kaNkulunkulu, ngokuba kwakungokwabo ukuyilinda, kwakungokwabo futhi ukuyivula ekuseni imihla ngemihla. 
13_9_28_Abanye babephethe izitsha zenkonzo, ngokuba zangeniswa ngokubalwa, zakhishwa ngokubalwa. 
13_9_29_Abanye kubo babemiselwe impahla, nezitsha zonke zendlu engcwele, nempuphu, newayini, namafutha, nenhlaka, namakha. 
13_9_30_Abanye bamadodana abapristi bagxoba amakha aba ngamafutha. 
13_9_31_UMatithiya, omunye wamaLevi, owayeyizibulo likaShalumi umKorahi wayenesikhundla sokubheka izinto ezenziwa amakhanzini. 
13_9_32_Abanye abafowabo bamadodana amaKohati babephethe izinkwa zokubukwa ukuba bazilungise onke amasabatha. 
13_9_33_Kepha abanye, abahlabeleli, izinhloko zezindlu zawoyise zamaLevi, babe semakamelweni bekhululekile kokunye, ngokuba babe semsebenzini wabo imini nobusuku. 
13_9_34_Labo babe yizinhloko zezindlu zawoyise bamaLevi, izinhloko ezizukulwaneni zabo, bahlala eJerusalema. 
13_9_35_EGibeyoni kwahlala uyise kaGibeyoni uJehiyeli ogama lomkakhe lalinguMahakha, 
13_9_36_nendodana yakhe eyizibulo u-Abidoni, kanye noSuri, noKishi, noBali, noNeri, noNadabi, 
13_9_37_noGedori, no-Ahiyo, noZakariya, noMikiloti. 
13_9_38_UMikiloti wazala uShimeyamu. Nabo bahlala nabafowabo eJerusalema malungana nabafowabo. 
13_9_39_UNeri wazala uKishi; uKishi wazala uSawule; uSawule wazala oJonathani, noMaliki Shuwa, no-Abinadaba, no-Eshi Bali. 
13_9_40_Indodana kaJonathani yayinguMeribi Bali; uMeribi Bali wazala uMika. 
13_9_41_Amadodana kaMika: ngoPhithoni, noMeleki, noThareya, no-Ahazi. 
13_9_42_U-Ahazi wazala uJara; uJara wazala o-Alemeti, no-Azimaveti, noZimri; uZimri wazala uMosa; 
13_9_43_uMosa wazala uBineya; uRefaya wayeyindodana yakhe; ngu-Eleyasa indodana yakhe, ngu-Aseli indodana yakhe; 
13_9_44_u-Aseli wayenamadodana ayisithupha; amagama awo yilawa: o-Azirikamu, noBokeru, no-Ishmayeli, noShehariya, no-Obadiya, noHanani; labo babe ngamadodana ka-Aseli. 
13_10_1_AmaFilisti alwa no-Israyeli; abantu bakwa-Israyeli babaleka phambi kwamaFilisti, bawa begwaziwe entabeni yaseGilibowa. 
13_10_2_AmaFilisti axosha uSawule namadodana akhe; amaFilisti abulala oJonathani, no-Abinadaba, noMaliki Shuwa, amadodana kaSawule. 
13_10_3_Impi yaba nzima kuSawule; abacibishelayo bamfica; wakhathazeka ngenxa yabacibishelayo. 
13_10_4_USawule wayesethi odibini lwezikhali zakhe: Hosha inkemba yakho, ungigwaze ngayo, funa labo abangasokile bafike, bangone. Kepha aluvumanga udibi lwezikhali zakhe, ngokuba lwesaba kakhulu. Ngalokho uSawule wayithatha inkemba, wawela phezu kwayo. 
13_10_5_Udibi lwezikhali zakhe selubonile ukuthi uSawule ufile, lwawela nalo phezu kwenkemba, lwafa. 
13_10_6_Wafa-ke uSawule namadodana akhe amathathu; nendlu yakhe yonke yafa kanyekanye. 
13_10_7_Lapho bonke abantu bakwa-Israyeli ababe sesigodini bebona ukuthi babaleka nokuthi uSawule namadodana akhe bafile, bashiya imizi yabo, babaleka; amaFilisti afika, ahlala kuyo. 
13_10_8_Kwathi ngangomuso, lapho amaFilisti efika ukuphanga ababuleweyo, afumana uSawule namadodana akhe bewile entabeni yaseGilibowa. 
13_10_9_Amphanga, athatha ikhanda lakhe nezikhali zakhe, akuthuma ezweni lamaFilisti nxazonke ukukumemezela kuzo izithombe zawo nakubantu. 
13_10_10_Azibeka izikhali zakhe endlini yawonkulunkulu bawo, abethela ikhanda lakhe endlini kaDagoni. 
13_10_11_Selizwile iJabeshi Gileyadi konke amaFilisti ayekwenzile kuSawule, 
13_10_12_kwasuka onke amadoda anamandla, asithatha isidumbu sikaSawule nezidumbu zamadodana akhe, aziletha eJabeshi, awembela amathambo abo phansi kwe-oki eJabeshi, azila ukudla izinsuku eziyisikhombisa. 
13_10_13_Wafa kanjalo-ke uSawule ngesiphambeko sakhe aphambuka ngaso kuJehova ngenxa yezwi likaJehova angaligcinanga nangokuba kade eyile ukubhula konedlozi ukuba abuze kuye, 
13_10_14_engabuzanga kuJehova; ngalokho-ke wambulala, wabuyisela umbuso kuDavide indodana kaJese. 
13_11_1_Wonke u-Israyeli wabuthana kuDavide, wathi: “Bheka, thina siyithambo lakho nenyama yakho. 
13_11_2_Nangesikhathi esidlulileyo uSawule eseyinkosi, nguwe owakhipha nowangenisa u-Israyeli; uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho wathi kuwe: ‘Wena uyakwalusa abantu bami u-Israyeli, wena uyakuba ngumbusi wabantu bami u-Israyeli.’ ” 
13_11_3_Kwase kufika onke amalunga akwa-Israyeli enkosini eHebroni; uDavide wenza isivumelwano nawo eHebroni phambi kukaJehova; amgcoba uDavide ukuba abe yinkosi kwa-Israyeli njengezwi likaJehova ngesandla sikaSamuweli. 
13_11_4_UDavide naye wonke u-Israyeli baya eJerusalema eliyiJebusi; amaJebusi ayakhe kulelo zwe ayeselapho. 
13_11_5_Abakhileyo eJebusi bathi kuDavide: “Awuyikungena lapha.” UDavide wathatha nokho inqaba yaseSiyoni engumuzi kaDavide. 
13_11_6_UDavide wathi: “Lowo ochitha amaJebusi kuqala uyakuba yinhloko nenduna.” Kwenyuka kuqala uJowabe indodana kaSeruya, waba yinhloko. 
13_11_7_UDavide wahlala enqabeni; ngalokho bayibiza ngokuthi umuzi kaDavide. 
13_11_8_Wakha umuzi nxazonke kusukela eMilo kuya nxazonke; uJowabe wavusa okuseleyo komuzi. 
13_11_9_UDavide waqhubeka njalo ngokukhula, ngokuba uJehova Sebawoti wayenaye. 
13_11_10_Yilaba abayizinhloko zamaqhawe uDavide ayenazo, zibambelela kuye ngamandla ebukhosini bakhe kanye naye wonke u-Israyeli ukumbeka inkosi njengezwi likaJehova ngo-Israyeli. 
13_11_11_Nanku umumo wamaqhawe uDavide ayenawo: uJashobehamu indodana yomHakimoni, inhloko yamashumi amathathu; waphakamisela abangamakhulu amathathu umkhonto wakhe, wababulala ngasikhathi sinye. 
13_11_12_Emva kwakhe ngu-Eleyazare indodana kaDodo umAhohi owayengomunye wamaqhawe amathathu. 
13_11_13_WayenoDavide ePhasi Damimi; amaFilisti abuthana khona ukuyokulwa, lapho kwakukhona isiqephu sezwe esigcwele ibhali; abantu babaleka ebusweni bamaFilisti. 
13_11_14_Bema phakathi nesiqephu sezwe, basophula, bawabulala amaFilisti; uJehova wabasindisa ngokusindisa okukhulu. 
13_11_15_Kwehla abathathu kwabayizinhloko ezingamashumi amathathu, baya etsheni kuDavide emhumeni wase-Adulamu; impi yamaFilisti yayimise esiGodini samaRefa. 
13_11_16_UDavide wayesesenqabeni, ikhanda lamaFilisti laliseBetlehema. 
13_11_17_UDavide wanxanela, wathi: “Hawu, sengathi ngingaphuziswa amanzi asemthonjeni waseBetlehema owawungasesangweni.” 
13_11_18_Labo abathathu bafohla ikamu lamaFilisti, bakha amanzi emthonjeni waseBetlehema owawungasesangweni, bawathatha, bawaletha kuDavide; kepha uDavide akavumanga ukuwaphuza, kodwa wawathululela uJehova, wathi: 
13_11_19_“UNkulunkulu wami makangenqabele ukuba ngenze lokhu; ngiyakuphuza igazi lalaba bantu ababe sengozini na?” Ngokuba bawaletha besengozini; akavumanga ukuwaphuza. Lezo zinto zenziwa yilawa maqhawe amathathu. 
13_11_20_U-Abishayi umfowabo kaJowabe wayeyinhloko yabathathu, ngokuba waphakamisela abangamakhulu amathathu umkhonto wakhe, wababulala, waba negama phakathi kwalaba abathathu. 
13_11_21_Kulaba abathathu wayetusekile kunababili, waba yisikhulu sabo, kepha akafinyelelanga kwabathathu bokuqala. 
13_11_22_NoBenaya indodana kaJehoyada, indodana yendoda enamandla, owayenze imisebenzi emikhulu, owaseKabiseyeli, wabulala amaqhawe amabili akwaMowabi; futhi wehla, wabulala ingonyama phakathi komgodi ngosuku lweqhwa. 
13_11_23_Wabulala nowaseGibithe, umuntu omude, eyizingalo eziyisihlanu; esandleni sowaseGibithe kwakukhona umkhonto onjengogongolo lomaluki; wehlela kuye ephethe induku nje, wawuhlwitha umkhonto esandleni sowaseGibithe, wambulala ngomkhonto wakhe. 
13_11_24_Lezo zinto wazenza uBenaya indodana kaJehoyada, waba negama phakathi kwalawo maqhawe amathathu. 
13_11_25_Bheka, wayetusekile kunabangamashumi amathathu, kepha akafinyelelanga kwabathathu bokuqala; uDavide wambeka phezu kwabalindi bakhe. 
13_11_26_Amaqhawe anamandla nanka: u-Asaheli umfowabo kaJowabe, no-Elihanani indodana kaDodo waseBetlehema, 
13_11_27_noShamoti waseHarori, noHelesi wasePheloni, 
13_11_28_no-Ira indodana ka-Ikheshi waseThekhowa, no-Abiyezeri wase-Anathoti, 
13_11_29_noSibekayi umHushati, no-Ilayi umAhohi, 
13_11_30_noMaharayi waseNethofa, noHeledi indodana kaBahana waseNethofa, 
13_11_31_no-Ithayi indodana kaRibayi waseGibeya labantwana bakwaBenjamini, noBenaya wasePirathoni, 
13_11_32_noHurayi wangasemifudlaneni yakwaGahashi, no-Abiyeli wase-Araba, 
13_11_33_no-Azimaveti waseBaharumi, no-Eliyaba waseShahaliboni, 
13_11_34_namadodana kaHashemi waseGizoni, noJonathani indodana kaShage waseHarari, 
13_11_35_no-Ahiyamu indodana kaSakri waseHarari, no-Elifali indodana ka-Uri, 
13_11_36_noHeferi waseMekeri, no-Ahiya wasePheloni, 
13_11_37_noHesiro waseKarmeli, noNaharayi indodana ka-Ezibayi, 
13_11_38_noJoweli umfowabo kaNathani, noMibihari indodana kaHagiri, 
13_11_39_noSeleki wakwa-Amoni, noNaharayi waseBeroti, udibi lukaJowabe indodana kaSeruya, 
13_11_40_no-Ira waseJetheri, noGarebi waseJetheri, 
13_11_41_no-Uriya umHeti, noZabadi indodana ka-Ahilayi, 
13_11_42_no-Adina indodana kaShiza wakwaRubeni, inhloko yakwaRubeni, enabangamashumi amathathu, 
13_11_43_noHanani indodana kaMahakha, noJeshoshafati umMiteni, 
13_11_44_no-Uziya wase-Ashitaroti, noShama noJehiyeli amadodana kaHothamu wase-Aroweri, 
13_11_45_noJediyayeli indodana kaShimri, noJoha umfowabo umThisi, 
13_11_46_no-Eliyeli umMahavi, noJeribayi noJoshaviya amadodana ka-Elinahama, no-Itima wakwaMowabi, 
13_11_47_no-Eliyeli, no-Obede, noJahashiyeli umMesoba. 
13_12_1_Nampa abafika kuDavide eSikilagi esagogobele ebusweni bukaSawule indodana kaKishi; babe phakathi kwamaqhawe, abasizi bakhe empini. 
13_12_2_Babehlomile iminsalo, besebenzisa isandla sokunene nesokhohlo ekuphonseni amatshe nasekucibisheleni imicibisholo ngomnsalo; ababe kubafowabo bakaSawule kwaBenjamini kwakuyilaba: 
13_12_3_inhloko u-Ahiyezeri noJowashi amadodana kaShemaha waseGibeya, noJeziyeli noPheleti amadodana ka-Azimaveti, noBerakha, noJehu wase-Anathoti, 
13_12_4_no-Ishmaya waseGibeyoni, iqhawe phakathi kwabangamashumi amathathu, ebaphethe abangamashumi amathathu, noJeremiya, noJahaziyeli, noJohanani, noJozabadi waseGedera, 
13_12_5_no-Eluzayi, noJerimoti, noBehaliya, noShemariya, noShefathiya umHarufi, 
13_12_6_no-Elkana, noJishiya, no-Azareli, noJohezeri, noJashobehamu, amaKora, 
13_12_7_noJowela noZebadiya, amadodana kaJerohamu waseGedori. 
13_12_8_KwabakwaGadi abanye bazahlukanisa baya kuDavide enqabeni ehlane, amaqhawe anamandla, abantu abazilungiselele ukulwa, abakwazi ukuphatha isihlangu nomkhonto, ababuso babo bafana nobuso bezingonyama, abanejubane njengezinsephe ezintabeni: 
13_12_9_ngu-Ezeri inhloko, no-Obadiya owesibili, no-Eliyabe owesithathu, 
13_12_10_noMishimana owesine, noJeremiya owesihlanu, 
13_12_11_no-Athayi owesithupha, no-Eliyeli owesikhombisa, 
13_12_12_noJohanani owesishiyagalombili, no-Elizabadi owesishiyagalolunye, 
13_12_13_noJeremiya oweshumi, noMakibanayi oweshumi nanye. 
13_12_14_Lawo madodana kaGadi ayeyizinhloko zempi; encinyane kuwo yayilingana nekhulu, yalingana nenkulungwane. 
13_12_15_Yilabo ababewela iJordani ngenyanga yokuqala, ligcwele liphuphuma zonke izingu zalo; baxosha bonke abasezigodini ngasempumalanga nangasentshonalanga. 
13_12_16_Kwafika nabantwana bakwaBenjamini noJuda enqabeni kuDavide. 
13_12_17_UDavide waphuma ukubahlangabeza, wathatha, wathi kubo: �Uma nize nokuthula kimi ukungisiza, inhliziyo yami iyakuba nye nani, kepha uma kungukungikhohlisa ezitheni zami, lokhu kungekho okubi ezandleni zami, uNkulunkulu wawobaba makakubheke, akujezise.� 
13_12_18_Kwase kwehla umoya phezu kuka-Amasayi owayeyinhloko yabangamashumi amathathu, wathi: �Singabakho thina, Davide, sinawe, wena ndodana kaJese; ukuthula, ukuthula makube nawe, ukuthula makube nabakusizayo, ngokuba uNkulunkulu wakho uyakusiza.� Wayesebamukela uDavide, wabenza izinhloko zeviyo. 
13_12_19_Kwafika abanye kwabakwaManase kuDavide, lapho efika namaFilisti ukulwa noSawule, kepha abawasizanga, ngokuba izinduna zamaFilisti sezilulekene zammukisa, zathi: �Uyakuhlubukela enkosini yakhe uSawule, amakhanda ethu abe sengozini.� 
13_12_20_Ekuyeni kwakhe eSikilagi kwahlubukela kuye kwabakwaManase o-Adina, noJozabadi, noJediyayeli, noMikayeli, noJozabadi, no-Elihu, noSilethayi, izinhloko zezinkulungwane zabakwaManase. 
13_12_21_Bamsiza uDavide eviyweni, ngokuba babe ngamaqhawe anamandla bonke, beyizinduna zempi. 
13_12_22_Ngokuba imihla ngemihla bafika kuDavide ukumsiza, kwaze kwaba yimpi enkulu njengempi kaNkulunkulu. 
13_12_23_Nazi izibalo zezinhloko zababehlomele ukulwa abeza kuDavide eHebroni ukuba baguqulele umbuso kaSawule kuye njengezwi likaJehova. 
13_12_24_Abantwana bakwaJuda ababephethe izihlangu nemikhonto babeyizinkulungwane eziyisithupha namakhulu ayisishiyagalombili, behlomele ukulwa. 
13_12_25_Kubantwana bakwaSimeyoni amaqhawe anamandla okulwa yizinkulungwane eziyisikhombisa nekhulu. 
13_12_26_Kubantwana bakwaLevi yizinkulungwane ezine namakhulu ayisithupha. 
13_12_27_UJehoyada wayengumholi wakwa-Aroni, enezinkulungwane ezintathu namakhulu ayisikhombisa, 
13_12_28_noSadoki insizwa eyiqhawe elinamandla, nasendlini kayise izinduna ezingamashumi amabili nambili. 
13_12_29_Kubantwana bakwaBenjamini, abafowabo bakaSawule, yizinkulungwane ezintathu, ngokuba kuze kube manje imvama yabo yayithembekile endlini kaSawule. 
13_12_30_Kubantwana bakwa-Efrayimi yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili namakhulu ayisishiyagalombili, amaqhawe anamandla, abantu abanegama ezindlini zawoyise. 
13_12_31_Kuyo inxenye yesizwe sakwaManase yizinkulungwane eziyishumi nesishiyagalombili, ezabizwa ngamagama ukuba zize zimbeke uDavide inkosi. 
13_12_32_Kubantwana bakwa-Isakare ngabazi ukuqonda izikhathi ukuba bazi okufanele ukwenziwa ngu-Israyeli; izinhloko zabo zazingamakhulu amabili; bonke abafowabo balalela izwi labo. 
13_12_33_KuZebuloni abangaphuma impi, bayihlele impi benezikhali zonke zokulwa, yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisihlanu, bezihlela nganhliziyonye. 
13_12_34_KuNafetali yizinduna eziyinkulungwane, zinezinkulungwane ezingamashumi amathathu nesikhombisa eziphethe isihlangu nomkhonto. 
13_12_35_KwabakwaDani abangahlela impi yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili nesishiyagalombili namakhulu ayisithupha. 
13_12_36_Ku-Asheri abangaphuma impi, bayihlele impi, yizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amane. 
13_12_37_Ngaphesheya kweJordani kwabakwaGadi nasenxenyeni yesizwe sakwaManase, benezikhali zonke zempi zokulwa, yizinkulungwane eziyikhulu namashumi amabili. 
13_12_38_Onke lawo madoda empi, angahlela impi, afika eHebroni ngezinhliziyo ezipheleleyo ukubeka uDavide inkosi kwa-Israyeli; nabo bonke abaseleyo bakwa-Israyeli babenhliziyonye ukumbeka uDavide inkosi. 
13_12_39_Babe lapho noDavide izinsuku ezintathu, bedla, bephuza, ngokuba abafowabo babebalungisele. 
13_12_40_Ababe seduze nabo kuze kube kwa-Isakare, nakwaZebuloni, nakwaNafetali baletha isinkwa ngezimbongolo, nangamakamela, nangeminyuzi, nangezinkabi, nokudla kwempuphu, nezigaxa zamakhiwane, nezigaxa zezithelo zomvini ezomileyo, newayini, namafutha, nezinkabi, nezimvu eziningi, ngokuba kwakukhona ukuthokoza kwa-Israyeli. 
13_13_1_UDavide welulekana nezinduna zezinkulungwane nezamakhulu, nabaholi bonke. 
13_13_2_UDavide wathi kulo lonke ibandla lakwa-Israyeli: “Uma kukuhle kini, uma kuvela kuJehova uNkulunkulu wethu, masihlakazeke sithumele kubafowethu abasele ezweni lonke lakwa-Israyeli kanye nabapristi namaLevi emizini yabo enamadlelo ukuba babuthane kithi, 
13_13_3_sibuyisele kithi umphongolo kaNkulunkulu wethu, ngokuba asiwufunanga ezinsukwini zikaSawule.” 
13_13_4_Lonke ibandla lathi liyakwenze njalo, ngokuba leyo nto yayilungile emehlweni abo bonke abantu. 
13_13_5_UDavide wayesebutha wonke u-Israyeli kusukela eSihori laseGibithe kuze kube sekuyeni eHamati ukususa umphongolo kaNkulunkulu eKiriyati Jeharimi. 
13_13_6_UDavide wenyukela kanye naye wonke u-Israyeli eBahala, okungukuthi iKiriyati Jeharimi elalingelakwaJuda, ukukhuphula khona umphongolo kaNkulunkulu uJehova ohlezi phezu kwamakherubi, owawubizwa ngegama lakhe. 
13_13_7_Bawuhambisa umphongolo kaNkulunkulu ngengqukumbane entsha, bewukhipha endlini ka-Abinadaba; o-Uza no-Ahiyo bashayela ingqukumbane. 
13_13_8_UDavide naye wonke u-Israyeli bathokoza ebusweni bukaNkulunkulu ngamandla onke ngamahubo, nangamahabhu, nangezingubhu, nangezigubhu, nangamasimbali, nangamacilongo. 
13_13_9_Ekufikeni kwabo esibuyeni sikaKidoni u-Uza welula isandla sakhe ukubamba umphongolo, ngokuba izinkabi zashelela. 
13_13_10_Intukuthelo kaJehova yamvuthela u-Uza, wamshaya, ngokuba welulela isandla emphongolweni; wafela khona lapho phambi kukaNkulunkulu. 
13_13_11_UDavide wadabuka ngokuba uJehova emhlasele u-Uza, wayibiza leyo ndawo ngokuthi iPheresi-Uza kuze kube namuhla. 
13_13_12_UDavide wamesaba uNkulunkulu ngalolo suku; wathi: “Ngizakuletha kanjani umphongolo kaNkulunkulu kimi na?” 
13_13_13_UDavide akawuyisanga umphongolo kuye emzini kaDavide, kepha wawubuyisela eceleni endlini ka-Obede Edomi umGiti. 
13_13_14_Umphongolo kaNkulunkulu wahlala nabendlu ka-Obede Edomi endlini yakhe izinyanga ezintathu; uJehova wayibusisa indlu ka-Obede Edomi nakho konke anakho. 
13_14_1_UHiramu inkosi yaseTire wathuma izithunywa kuDavide, nemisedari, nabakhi, nababazi ukuba bamakhele indlu. 
13_14_2_UDavide waqonda ukuthi uJehova wayemmisile impela ukuba abe yinkosi kwa-Israyeli, ngokuba umbuso wakhe waphakanyiselwa phezulu ngenxa yabantu bakhe u-Israyeli. 
13_14_3_UDavide wathatha abanye abafazi eJerusalema, uDavide wazala amanye amadodana namadodakazi. 
13_14_4_Nanka amagama abantwana ayenabo eJerusalema: oShamuvwa, noShobabi, noNathani, noSolomoni, 
13_14_5_noJibari, no-Elishuwa, no-Elipheleti, 
13_14_6_noNoga, noNefegi, noJafiya, 
13_14_7_no-Elishama, noBeyeliyada, no-Elifeleti. 
13_14_8_AmaFilisti esezwile ukuthi uDavide ugcotshiwe ukuba abe yinkosi kwa-Israyeli wonke, onke amaFilisti enyuka ukumfuna uDavide; uDavide wakuzwa, waphuma ukuwahlasela. 
13_14_9_AmaFilisti esefikile ukungenela isiGodi samaRefa, 
13_14_10_uDavide wabuza kuNkulunkulu, wathi: “Ngenyukele ukuhlasela amaFilisti na? Uyakuwanikela esandleni sami na?” UJehova wathi kuye: “Yenyuka, ngokuba ngiyakuwanikela esandleni sakho.” 
13_14_11_Base benyukela eBali Pherasimi, uDavide wawachitha; uDavide wathi: “UNkulunkulu ufohlele izitha zami ngesandla sami njengokufohla kwamanzi.” Ngalokho baqamba igama laleyo ndawo ngokuthi iBali Pherasimi. 
13_14_12_Ashiya khona onkulunkulu bawo; uDavide wathi mabashiswe ngomlilo. 
13_14_13_AmaFilisti abuye angenela isigodi. 
13_14_14_UDavide waphinda wabuza kuNkulunkulu; uNkulunkulu wathi kuye: “Ungenyuki emva kwawo; wagwegwesele, uwafikele malungana namajikijolo. 
13_14_15_Kuyakuthi lapho usuzwa umsindo wokuhamba ezihlokweni zamajikijolo, uphume impi, ngokuba uNkulunkulu uphumile ngaphambi kwakho ukuchitha impi yamaFilisti.” 
13_14_16_UDavide wenza njengokumyala kukaNkulunkulu, bachitha impi yamaFilisti kusukela eGibeyoni kuze kube seGezeri. 
13_14_17_Igama likaDavide laphumela emazweni onke; uJehova wehlisela izizwe zonke ingebhe ngaye. 
13_15_1_Wazakhela izindlu emzini kaDavide; walungisela umphongolo kaNkulunkulu indawo, wawumisela itende. 
13_15_2_Khona uDavide wathi: “Umphongolo kaNkulunkulu nga ungathwalwa muntu, ngamaLevi kuphela, ngokuba yiwona akhethwe nguJehova ukuthwala umphongolo kaNkulunkulu nokumkhonza kuze kube phakade.” 
13_15_3_UDavide wabuthela wonke u-Israyeli eJerusalema ukukhuphulela umphongolo kaJehova endaweni yawo awulungisele yona. 
13_15_4_UDavide wabutha amadodana ka-Aroni namaLevi; 
13_15_5_kumadodana kaKohati: ngu-Uriyeli inhloko nabafowabo, beyikhulu namashumi amabili; 
13_15_6_kumadodana kaMerari: ngu-Asaya inhloko nabafowabo, bengamakhulu amabili namashumi amabili; 
13_15_7_kumadodana kaGereshomu: nguJoweli inhloko nabafowabo, beyikhulu namashumi amathathu; 
13_15_8_kumadodana ka-Elisafani: nguShemaya inhloko nabafowabo, bengamakhulu amabili; 
13_15_9_kumadodana kaHebroni: ngu-Eliyeli inhloko nabafowabo, bengamashumi ayisihiyagalombili; 
13_15_10_kumadodana ka-Uziyeli: ngu-Aminadaba inhloko nabafowabo, beyikhulu neshumi nambili. 
13_15_11_UDavide wabiza oSadoki no-Abiyathara abapristi, namaLevi o-Uriyeli, no-Asaya, noJoweli, noShemaya, no-Eliyeli, no-Aminadaba, wathi kubo: 
13_15_12_“Nina niyizinhloko zezindlu zawoyise bamaLevi; zingcweliseni nina nabafowenu ukuba niwukhuphulele umphongolo kaJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli endaweni engiyilungisele wona. 
13_15_13_Ngokuba ngenxa yokungawuthwali kwenu kuqala uJehova uNkulunkulu wethu wafohla kithina, ngokuba singamfunanga njengomthetho.” 
13_15_14_Base bezingcwelisa abapristi namaLevi ukuba bawukhuphule umphongolo kaJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli. 
13_15_15_Abantwana bamaLevi bawuthwala umphongolo kaNkulunkulu emahlombe abo ngezinti zawo njengokuyala kukaMose ngezwi likaJehova. 
13_15_16_UDavide washo ezinduneni zamaLevi ukuba zibeke abafowabo abahlabeleli, benezinto zokubetha, izingubhu, namahabhu, namasimbali, bakubethe, baphakamise izwi labo ngokuthokoza. 
13_15_17_AmaLevi ayesebeka uHemani indodana kaJoweli, nakubafowabo u-Asafa indodana kaBerekiya, nakumadodana kaMerari, abafowabo, u-Ethani indodana kaKushaya, 
13_15_18_bekanye nabo abafowabo besigaba sesibili: oZakariya, noBeni, noJahaziyeli, noShemiramoti, noJehiyeli, no-Uni, no-Eliyabe, noBenaya, noMahaseya, noMatithiya, no-Elifelehu, noMikineya, no-Obede Edomi, noJehiyeli, abalindisango, 
13_15_19_nabahlabeleli oHemani no-Asafa no-Ethani ukuba bakhalise amasimbali ethusi, 
13_15_20_noZakariya, no-Aziyeli, noShemiramoti, noJehiyeli, no-Uni, no-Eliyabe, noMahaseya, noBenaya ukuba babe nezingubhu ezilungiselwe i-Alamoti, 
13_15_21_noMatithiya, no-Elifelehu, noMikineya, no-Obede Edomi, noJehiyeli, no-Azaziya ukuba babe namahabhu alungiselwe iSheminiti ukuba bahole. 
13_15_22_UKhenaniya induna yamaLevi wayephethe umsebenzi wokuthwala; wayefundisa ukuthwala ngokuba wayekwazi. 
13_15_23_OBerekiya no-Elkana babe ngabalindisango bomphongolo. 
13_15_24_OShebaniya, noJehoshafati, noNethaneli, no-Amasayi, noZakariya, noBenaya, no-Eliyezeri, abapristi, bashaya amacilongo phambi komphongolo kaNkulunkulu; o-Obede Edomi noJehiya babe ngabalindisango bomphongolo. 
13_15_25_UDavide namalunga akwa-Israyeli nezinduna zezinkulungwane baya ukuwukhuphula umphongolo wesivumelwano sikaJehova endlini ka-Obede Edomi ngokuthokoza; 
13_15_26_kwathi lapho uNkulunkulu esesizile amaLevi awuthwala umphongolo wesivumelwano sikaJehova, anikela ngezinkunzi eziyisikhombisa nangezinqama eziyisikhombisa. 
13_15_27_UDavide wayembethe ingubo yelineni elicolekileyo kanye nawo onke amaLevi ayethwala umphongolo, nabahlabeleli, noKhenaniya induna yokuthwala kwabahlabeleli; uDavide wayenengubo yamahlombe yelineni. 
13_15_28_Wonke u-Israyeli wawukhuphula kanjalo umphongolo wesivumelwano sikaJehova ngokukhamuluka nangezwi lomtshingo, nangamacilongo, nangamasimbali, ebetha izingubhu namahabhu. 
13_15_29_Kwathi lapho umphongolo wesivumelwano sikaJehova usungena emzini kaDavide, uMikhali indodakazi kaSawule walunguza efasiteleni, wabona inkosi uDavide isina, idlala; wayidelela enhliziyweni yakhe. 
13_16_1_Bawungenisa umphongolo kaNkulunkulu, bawubeka phakathi netende uDavide ayelimisele wona; banikela ngeminikelo yokushiswa nangeminikelo yokuthula phambi kukaNkulunkulu. 
13_16_2_UDavide eseqedile ukunikela ngomnikelo wokushiswa nangeminikelo yokuthula wababusisa abantu egameni likaJehova. 
13_16_3_Wabela bonke abantu bakwa-Israyeli, abesilisa nabesifazane, isinkwa saba sinye, nesicubu senyama, nesigaxa sezithelo zomvini ezomileyo. 
13_16_4_Wabela amaLevi athile ukukhonza phambi komphongolo kaJehova ukuba amkhumbule, ambonge, amdumise uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli: 
13_16_5_ngu-Asafa inhloko nabesigaba sakhe sesibili, oZakariya, noJehiyeli, noShemiramoti, noJehiyeli, noMatithiya, no-Eliyabe, noBenaya, no-Obede Edomi, noJehiyeli, benezingubhu namahabhu, kanye no-Asafa ephethe amasimbali, ewabetha, 
13_16_6_noBenaya noJahaziyeli abapristi, benamacilongo njalo phambi komphongolo wesivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu. 
13_16_7_Ngalolo suku uDavide wayeseqala ukuhlela ukuba uJehova abongwe ngesandla sika-Asafa nabafowabo. 
13_16_8_Bongani uJehova, nibize igama lakhe, nizazise phakathi kwabantu izenzo zakhe. 
13_16_9_Hlabelelani kuye, nimhubele, nikhulume ngezimangaliso zakhe zonke. 
13_16_10_Zibongeni egameni lakhe elingcwele; mazithokoze izinhliziyo zabamfuna uJehova. 
13_16_11_Funani uJehova namandla akhe, nifunisise ubuso bakhe njalo. 
13_16_12_Khumbulani izimangaliso zakhe azenzileyo, nezibonakaliso zakhe, nezahlulelo zomlomo wakhe, 
13_16_13_nina nzalo ka-Israyeli, inceku yakhe, nina bantwana bakaJakobe, abakhethiweyo bakhe. 
13_16_14_Yena unguJehova uNkulunkulu wethu; izahlulelo zakhe zisemhlabeni wonke. 
13_16_15_Khumbulani isivumelwano sakhe kuze kube phakade, izwi ayala ngalo izizukulwane eziyinkulungwane, 
13_16_16_avumelana kuso no-Abrahama, nesifungo sakhe ku-Isaka; 
13_16_17_wasiqinisa kuJakobe, saba ngumthetho, naku-Israyeli, saba yisivumelwano esiphakade, 
13_16_18_ethi: “Ngizakukunika izwe laseKhanani libe yisabelo sefa lakho, 
13_16_19_lapho naniyingcosana ngomumo, yebo, lapho naniyingcosana, futhi naniyizihambi kulo.” 
13_16_20_Bazulazula ezizweni ngezizwe, besuka kulo mbuso, beya kwabanye abantu. 
13_16_21_Akavumelanga muntu ukubahlupha, wajezisa amakhosi ngenxa yabo, 
13_16_22_ethi: “Ningathinti abagcotshiweyo bami, ningoni abaprofethi bami.” 
13_16_23_Hlabelelani kuJehova, mhlaba wonke, nimemeze insindiso yakhe imihla ngemihla. 
13_16_24_Landani inkazimulo yakhe phakathi kwabezizwe, izimangaliso zakhe phakathi kwabantu bonke. 
13_16_25_Ngokuba mkhulu uJehova, udumisekile kakhulu; uyesabeka phezu kwabo bonke onkulunkulu. 
13_16_26_Ngokuba bonke onkulunkulu babezizwe bayizithombe, kepha uJehova walenza izulu. 
13_16_27_Udumo nobukhosi kusebusweni bakhe; amandla nokuthokoza kusendaweni yakhe. 
13_16_28_Mnikeni uJehova nina mindeni yabantu, mnikeni uJehova inkazimulo namandla. 
13_16_29_Mnikeni uJehova inkazimulo yegama lakhe, nilethe umnikelo, nize phambi kwakhe, nikhuleke kuJehova ngobuhle bobungcwele. 
13_16_30_Thuthumelani ebusweni bakhe, mhlaba wonke; izwe lihlala liqinile, alinakushukunyiswa. 
13_16_31_Malijabule izulu, umhlaba uthokoze; makuthiwe ezizweni: UJehova uyinkosi. 
13_16_32_Maluhlokome ulwandle nokugcwala kwalo, amasimu ename nakho konke okukuwo. 
13_16_33_Khona imithi yehlathi iyakuhuba ngokujabula ebusweni bukaJehova, ngokuba uyeza ukwahlulela umhlaba. 
13_16_34_Bongani uJehova, ngokuba muhle, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade. 
13_16_35_Thanini: “Sisindise, Nkulunkulu wokusindiswa kwethu, usibuthe, usophule kwabezizwe ukuba sidumise igama lakho elingcwele, sethabe ekukudumiseni.” 
13_16_36_Makabongwe uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, kusukela phakade kuze kube phakade. Bonke abantu bathi: “Amen,” bamdumisa uJehova. 
13_16_37_Wayeseshiya khona ngaphambi komphongolo wesivumelwano sikaJehova u-Asafa nabafowabo ukuba bakhonze phambi komphongolo njalo ngokomsebenzi wemihla ngemihla, 
13_16_38_kanye no-Obede Edomi nabafowabo abangamashumi ayisithupha nesishiyagalombili u-Obede Edomi indodana kaJeduthuni noHosa babe ngabalindisango 
13_16_39_noSadoki umpristi nabafowabo abapristi ngaphambi kwetabernakele likaJehova endaweni ephakemeyo eyayiseGibeyoni 
13_16_40_ukuba banikele njalo ngeminikelo yokushiswa phezu kwe-altare lomnikelo wokushiswa ekuseni nakusihlwa njengakho konke okulotshiweyo emthethweni kaJehova ayala ngawo u-Israyeli, 
13_16_41_bekanye nabo oHemani noJeduthuni nensali yabakhethiweyo abakhonjwa ngamagama ukuba bambonge uJehova, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
13_16_42_kwakukhona kubo, oHemani noJeduthuni, amacilongo namasimbali alabo abayakuwakhalisa, nezinto zokubethwa kuNkulunkulu; amadodana kaJeduthuni ayengasesangweni. 
13_16_43_Base behamba baya, kwaba yilowo nalowo endlini yakhe; uDavide wabuya ukubusisa indlu yakhe. 
13_17_1_Kwathi lapho uDavide esehlezi endlini yakhe, uDavide wathi kuNathani umprofethi: “Bheka, mina ngihlala endlini yemisedari, kepha umphongolo wesivumelwano sikaJehova uphansi kwezilenge.” 
13_17_2_UNathani wathi kuDavide: “Yenza konke okusenhliziyweni yakho, ngokuba uNkulunkulu unawe.” 
13_17_3_Kepha kwathi ngalobo busuku izwi likaNkulunkulu lafika kuNathani, lathi: 
13_17_4_“Hamba utshele uDavide inceku yami ukuthi: ‘Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: Awuyikungakhela indlu ukuba ngihlale kuyo, 
13_17_5_ngokuba angihlalanga ndlu kusukela osukwini engakhuphula ngalo u-Israyeli kuze kube namuhla, kepha ngangisematendeni, nasematabernakele ngamatabernakele. 
13_17_6_Ezindaweni zonke engihambahambe kuzo naye wonke u-Israyeli ngake ngakhuluma yini izwi nakoyedwa wabahluleli bakwa-Israyeli engabayala ukuba baluse abantu bami, ngathi: “Aningakhelanga ngani indlu yemisedari na?” ’ 
13_17_7_“Ngalokho uyakusho kanje encekwini yami uDavide, uthi: ‘Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: Mina ngakuthatha edlelweni ekwaluseni izimvu ukuba ube ngumbusi wabantu bami u-Israyeli; 
13_17_8_nganginawe nomaphi lapho wawuya khona, nganquma zonke izitha zakho ngaphambi kwakho; ngiyakukwenza igama njengamagama abakhulu abasemhlabeni. 
13_17_9_Ngiyakumisela abantu bami u-Israyeli indawo, ngibatshale ukuba bahlale endaweni yabo, bangabe besanyakaziswa; futhi abantu ababi abasayikubachitha njengakuqala, 
13_17_10_kusukela emihleni engayaleza ngayo abahluleli ukuba babe phezu kwabantu bami u-Israyeli; ngiyakunqoba zonke izitha zakho. Futhi ngiyakutshela ukuthi uJehova uyakukwakhela indlu. 
13_17_11_Kuyakuthi lapho izinsuku zakho seziphelele ukuba uye koyihlo, ngiyakumisa inzalo yakho emva kwakho, eyakuba ngeyamadodana akho; ngiyakuqinisa umbuso wayo. 
13_17_12_Yiyo eyakungakhela indlu; ngiyakuqinisa isihlalo sayo sobukhosi kuze kube phakade. 
13_17_13_Mina ngiyakuba nguyise, yona ibe yindodana yami; angiyikuyaphuca umusa wami, njengalokho ngamaphuca owayephambi kwakho. 
13_17_14_Ngiyakuyiqinisa endlini yami nasembusweni wami kuze kube phakade, isihlalo sayo sobukhosi siqiniswe kuze kube phakade.’ ” 
13_17_15_Njengawo onke lawo mazwi nanjengawo wonke lowo mbono uNathani wakhuluma kuDavide. 
13_17_16_UDavide inkosi wayesengena, wahlala phambi kukaJehova, wathi: “Ngingubani, Jehova Nkulunkulu, nendlu yami iyini ukuba ungilethe kuze kube lapha na? 
13_17_17_Lokho kwakuyinto encane emehlweni akho, Nkulunkulu; usukhulumile ngendlu yenceku yakho isekude, wangibuka kungathi ngingumuntu ophakemeyo, Jehova Nkulunkulu. 
13_17_18_“UDavide angenezela ngokuthini kuwe ngodumo inceku yakho elwenzelweyo na? Wena uyayazi inceku yakho. 
13_17_19_Jehova, ngenxa yenceku yakho nanjengokwenhliziyo yakho wenzile konke lokho okukhulu ukuba kwaziswe bonke lobu bukhulu. 
13_17_20_“Jehova, akakho onjengawe, akukho Nkulunkulu ngaphandle kwakho njengakho konke esikuzwileyo ngezindlebe zethu. 
13_17_21_Yisiphi isizwe emhlabeni esinjengabantu bakho u-Israyeli, uNkulunkulu aya ukuzihlengela bona babe ngabantu bakhe, ukukwenzela igama ngezinto ezinkulu nezesabekayo ngokuxosha abezizwe ebusweni babantu bakho owabahlenga eGibithe, na? 
13_17_22_Ngokuba abantu bakho u-Israyeli wabenza babe ngabantu bakho kuze kube phakade, wena Jehova ube nguNkulunkulu wabo. 
13_17_23_“Manje, Jehova, izwi olikhulumile ngenceku yakho nangendlu yayo kuze kube phakade maliqiniswe, wenze njengokukhuluma kwakho. 
13_17_24_Maliqiniseke, libe likhulu igama lakho kuze kube phakade, ukuze kuthiwe: ‘UJehova Sebawoti unguNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, yebo, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli,’ nendlu kaDavide inceku yakho iqinisiwe phambi kwakho. 
13_17_25_“Ngokuba wena Nkulunkulu wami wambulele endlebeni yenceku yakho ukuthi uyakuyakhela indlu; ngalokho inceku yakho ifike kulokhu ukuba ikhuleke phambi kwakho. 
13_17_26_Manje, Jehova, wena unguNkulunkulu, ukhulumile lokho okuhle encekwini yakho; 
13_17_27_kalokhu mawuvume ukubusisa indlu yenceku yakho ukuba ibe sebusweni bakho kuze kube phakade, ngokuba okubusisile wena Jehova kuyahlala kubusisekile kuze kube phakade.” 
13_18_1_Kwathi emva kwalokho uDavide wawashaya amaFilisti, wawahlula, walithatha iGati nemizana yalo esandleni samaFilisti. 
13_18_2_Wanqoba noMowabi; abakwaMowabi baba yizinceku zikaDavide, bathela intela. 
13_18_3_UDavide washaya noHadarezeri, inkosi yaseSoba ngaseHamati, ekuhambeni kwakhe ukuqinisa isandla sakhe ngasemfuleni u-Ewufrathe. 
13_18_4_UDavide wamaphuca izinqola eziyinkulungwane, nabamahhashi abayizinkulungwane eziyisikhombisa, nemigundatshani eyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili; uDavide wanquma imisipha yawo onke amahhashi ezinqola, washiya awezinqola eziyikhulu kodwa. 
13_18_5_Ama-Aramu aseDamaseku esefika ukumsiza uHadarezeri inkosi yaseSoba, uDavide wabulala kuma-Aramu abantu abayizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili nambili. 
13_18_6_UDavide wamisa amakhanda e-Aramu laseDamaseku; ama-Aramu aba yizinceku zikaDavide, athela intela. UJehova wamnqobisa uDavide nomaphi lapho eya khona. 
13_18_7_UDavide wathatha izihlangu zegolide ezazisezincekwini zikaHadarezeri, waziletha eJerusalema. 
13_18_8_EThibahati naseKhuni imizi kaHadarezeri, uDavide wathatha ithusi eliningi kakhulu uSolomoni enza ngalo ulwandle lwethusi, nezinsika nezitsha zethusi. 
13_18_9_Lapho uThowu inkosi yaseHamati ezwa ukuthi uDavide ushayile yonke impi kaHadarezeri inkosi yaseSoba, 
13_18_10_wathuma uHadoramu, indodana yakhe, enkosini uDavide ukuyibingelela nokuyibusisa, ngokuba yayilwile noHadarezeri, yamnqoba, ngokuba uHadarezeri wayelokhu elwa noThowu; wathuma izinhlobo zonke zezitsha zegolide nezesiliva nezethusi. 
13_18_11_Nalezo inkosi uDavide yayizingcwelisela uJehova kanye nesiliva negolide alisusa ezizweni zonke: ku-Edomi, nakuMowabi, nakubantwana bakwa-Amoni, nakumaFilisti, nakuma-Amaleki. 
13_18_12_U-Abishayi, indodana kaSeruya, wabulala kwabakwa-Edomi esiGodini sikaSawoti, izinkulungwane eziyishumi nesishiyagalombili. 
13_18_13_Wamisa amakhanda kwa-Edomi; bonke abakwa-Edomi baba yizinceku zikaDavide. UJehova wamnqobisa uDavide nomaphi lapho eya khona. 
13_18_14_UDavide wabusa phezu kuka-Israyeli wonke, waphatha ukwahlulela nokulunga kubo bonke abantu bakhe. 
13_18_15_UJowabe indodana kaSeruya wayephezu kwempi; uJehoshafati, indodana ka-Ahiludi, wayengumabhalana; 
13_18_16_uSadoki, indodana ka-Ahithubi, no-Abimeleki indodana ka-Abiyathara, babe ngabapristi; noShawusha wayengumbhali; 
13_18_17_uBenaya, indodana kaJehoyada wayephezu kwamaKhereti namaPheleti; amadodana kaDavide ayengabokuqala ngasenkosini. 
13_19_1_Kwathi emva kwalokho uNahashi inkosi yabantwana bakwa-Amoni wafa, indodana yakhe yaba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe. 
13_19_2_UDavide wathi: “Ngiyakumenzela umusa uHanuni, indodana kaNahashi, ngokuba uyise wangenzela umusa.” UDavide wayesethuma izithunywa ukumduduza ngoyise. Zafika-ke izinceku zikaDavide ezweni labantwana bakwa-Amoni kuHanuni ukumduduza. 
13_19_3_Kepha izikhulu zabantwana bakwa-Amoni zathi kuHanuni: “Imbala ngokubona kwakho uthume abaduduzi kuwe ukuba atuse uyihlo na? Azifikanga yini izinceku zakhe kuwe ukuba ziphenye umuzi, ziwuchithe, ziwuhlole, na?” 
13_19_4_UHanuni wayesebamba izinceku zikaDavide, waziphucula, wahina izingubo zazo phakathi, kwaze kwaba sezinqeni zazo, wazimukisa. 
13_19_5_Bahamba, bamtshela uDavide ngalawo madoda. Wathuma ukuwahlangabeza, ngokuba ayenamahloni kakhulu lawo madoda. Yathi inkosi: “Hlalani eJeriko, zize zihlume izilevu zenu, bese nibuya.” 
13_19_6_Abantwana bakwa-Amoni sebebone ukuthi bazenzile ukuba banengeke kuDavide, uHanuni nabantwana bakwa-Amoni bathuma amatalenta ayinkulungwane esiliva ukuziqashela izinqola nabamahhashi e-Aramu Naharayimi, nase-Aramu Mahakha, naseSoba. 
13_19_7_Base beziqashela izinqola eziyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amathathu nambili kanye nenkosi yaseMahakha nabantu bayo abeza ukumisa ngaphambi kweMedeba. Abantwana bakwa-Amoni babuthana ndawonye bephuma emizini yabo; baya ukulwa. 
13_19_8_UDavide esezwile lokho wamthuma uJowabe nempi yonke yamaqhawe. 
13_19_9_Abantwana bakwa-Amoni baphuma, bahlela impi ngasesangweni lomuzi; kepha amakhosi ayefikile ayewodwa endle. 
13_19_10_UJowabe esebona ukuthi impi ibhekene naye ngaphambili nangasemuva, wakhetha kwabakhethekileyo bonke bakwa-Israyeli, wabahlela ukuba balwe nama-Aramu; 
13_19_11_abantu abaseleyo wababeka esandleni sika-Abishayi umfowabo, bazihlela ukulwa nabantwana bakwa-Amoni. 
13_19_12_Wathi: “Uma ama-Aramu engahlula, uyakungisiza; kepha uma abantwana bakwa-Amoni bekwahlula, ngiyakukusiza. 
13_19_13_Qinani, masiziqinise ngenxa yabantu bakithi nangenxa yemizi kaNkulunkulu wethu; uJehova makenze okuhle emehlweni akhe.” 
13_19_14_UJowabe nabantu ababe naye base besondela kuwo ama-Aramu ukuba balwe; kepha abaleka phambi kwakhe. 
13_19_15_Lapho abantwana bakwa-Amoni bebona ukuthi ama-Aramu abalekile, babaleka nabo phambi kuka-Abishayi umfowabo, bangena emzini; kepha uJowabe waya eJerusalema. 
13_19_16_Ama-Aramu esebonile ukuthi anqotshiwe phambi kuka-Israyeli, athuma izithunywa, akhipha ama-Aramu ayephesheya koMfula noShofaki induna yempi kaHadarezeri phambi kwawo. 
13_19_17_UDavide watshelwa, wabutha wonke u-Israyeli, wawela iJordani, wawafikela, wahlela impi ukulwa nawo. UDavide esehlelile impi ukulwa nama-Aramu, alwa naye. 
13_19_18_Ama-Aramu abaleka phambi kuka-Israyeli; uDavide wabulala kuma-Aramu izinqola eziyizinkulungwane eziyisikhombisa nemigundatshani eyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amane, wabulala noShofaki induna yempi. 
13_19_19_Lapho izinceku zikaHadarezeri zibonile ukuthi zinqotshiwe phambi kuka-Israyeli, zenza ukuthula noDavide, zamkhonza; ama-Aramu awathandanga ukusiza abantwana bakwa-Amoni futhi. 
13_20_1_Emva komnyaka ngesikhathi sokuhlasela kwamakhosi, uJowabe wahola amaqhawe empi, wachitha izwe labantwana bakwa-Amoni, weza wavimbezela iRaba; kepha uDavide wahlala eJerusalema. UJowabe walinqoba iRaba, walidiliza. 
13_20_2_UDavide wathatha umqhele wenkosi yabo ekhanda layo, wafumana isisindo sawo ukuthi sasiyitalenta legolide, itshe eliyigugu likuwo; wabekwa ekhanda likaDavide; wakhipha emzini impango eningi kakhulu. 
13_20_3_Wakhipha nabantu ababe phakathi kwawo, wabanquma ngamasaha, nangezibhuqo zensimbi, nangamazembe; wenze njalo uDavide kuyo yonke imizi yabantwana bakwa-Amoni. UDavide nabo bonke abantu babuyela eJerusalema. 
13_20_4_Emva kwalokho kwavuka impi namaFilisti eGezeri; khona uSibekayi, umHushati, wabulala uSiphayi wamadodana amaRefa; anqotshwa. 
13_20_5_Kwabuye kwaba khona impi namaFilisti; u-Elihanani, indodana kaJayire, wabulala uLahimi umfowabo kaGoliyati, umGiti, oluthi lomkhonto wakhe lwalunjengogongolo lomaluki. 
13_20_6_Kwabuye kwaba khona impi eGati, lapho kwakukhona umuntu omude; iminwe yakhe nezinzwani zakhe kwakungamashumi amabili nane, isithupha esandleni sisinye, nesithupha onyaweni lulunye; naye wazalwa yiRefa. 
13_20_7_Wameyisa u-Israyeli; ngalokho uJonathani indodana kaShimeya umfowabo kaDavide wambulala. 
13_20_8_Labo bazalwa ngamaRefa eGati, bawa ngesandla sikaDavide nangesandla sezinceku zakhe. 
13_21_1_USathane wema ukulwa no-Israyeli, wavusa uDavide ukuba abale u-Israyeli. 
13_21_2_UDavide wayesethi kuJowabe nasezinduneni zabantu: “Hambani nibale u-Israyeli kusukela eBeri Sheba kuze kube kwaDani, nilethe umumo wabo kimi ukuba ngiwazi.” 
13_21_3_UJowabe wathi: “UJehova makenezele kubantu bakhe, kuphindwe kayikhulu phezu kwalokhu abayikho; kepha, nkosi yami, nkosi, abasizo izinceku zenkosi yami bonke na? Inkosi yami ifunelani le nto na? Iyakuba yicala ngani ku-Israyeli na?” 
13_21_4_Nokho izwi lenkosi lamahlula uJowabe. UJowabe waphuma, wadabula wonke u-Israyeli, wafika eJerusalema. 
13_21_5_UJowabe wanika uDavide umumo wabantu ababaliweyo; wonke u-Israyeli wayeyizinkulungwane eziyinkulungwane nezinkulungwane eziyikhulu abahloma inkemba; uJuda wayeyizinkulungwane ezingamakhulu amane namashumi ayisikhombisa. 
13_21_6_Kepha oLevi noBenjamini akababalanga phakathi kwabo, ngokuba izwi lenkosi lalinengekile kuJowabe. 
13_21_7_Kwaba kubi emehlweni kaNkulunkulu; ngalokho washaya u-Israyeli. 
13_21_8_UDavide wayesethi kuNkulunkulu: “Ngonile kakhulu ngalokho engikwenzileyo; kepha manje, Jehova, mawuthethelele ububi benceku yakho, ngokuba ngintumazele kakhulu.” 
13_21_9_UJehova wayesekhuluma kuGadi, umboni kaDavide, ethi: 
13_21_10_“Hamba ukhulume kuDavide ngokuthi: ‘UJehova usho kanje, uthi: Ngiyakubekela izinto ezintathu; khetha enye kuzo ukuba ngikwenzele yona.’ ” 
13_21_11_UGadi wayesefika kuDavide, wathi kuye: “UJehova usho kanje, uthi: 
13_21_12_‘Zikhethele noma indlala yeminyaka emithathu, noma ukuchithwa yizitha zakho izinyanga ezintathu uficwa yinkemba yezitha zakho, noma izinsuku ezintathu zenkemba kaJehova nesifo ezweni, ingelosi kaJehova ichithe emikhawulweni yonke yakwa-Israyeli.’ Manje zibonele izwi engiyakulibuyisela kongithumileyo.” 
13_21_13_UDavide wathi kuGadi: “Nginosizi kakhulu; mangiwele esandleni sikaJehova, ngokuba umusa wakhe mkhulu kakhulu; kepha esandleni somuntu mangingaweli kuso.” 
13_21_14_UJehova wayesethuma isifo phezu kuka-Israyeli; kwafa kwa-Israyeli abantu abayizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisikhombisa. 
13_21_15_UNkulunkulu wathuma ingelosi eJerusalema ukulichitha; kwathi lapho isalichitha, uJehova wabuka, wazisola ngalobo bubi, wathi engelosini echithayo: “Sekwanele; buyisa isandla sakho.” Ingelosi kaJehova yayimi ngasesibuyeni sika-Orinani umJebusi. 
13_21_16_UDavide wayesephakamisa amehlo akhe, wayibona ingelosi kaJehova imi emkhathini womhlaba nezulu, inenkemba ehoshiweyo esandleni sayo, yelulelwe phezu kweJerusalema. UDavide namalunga bembethe izindwangu zamasaka bawa ngobuso babo. 
13_21_17_UDavide wathi kuNkulunkulu: “Akusimi yini owayaleza ukuba abantu babalwe na? Yimina engonileyo; ngenze kabi kakhulu, kepha lezi zimvu zenzeni na? Isandla sakho, Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, masibe phezu kwami naphezu kwendlu kababa, singabi phezu kwabantu bakho ukubashaya ngesifo.” 
13_21_18_Ingelosi kaJehova yamyala uGadi ukusho kuDavide ukuba uDavide enyuke, amisele uJehova i-altare esibuyeni sika-Orinani umJebusi. 
13_21_19_UDavide wenyuka ngezwi likaGadi alikhulumayo egameni likaJehova. 
13_21_20_U-Orinani waphenduka, wayibona ingelosi; amadodana akhe amane ayenaye acasha. U-Orinani wayebhula ukolweni. 
13_21_21_UDavide esefika ku-Orinani, u-Orinani wabuka, wambona uDavide, waphuma esibuyeni, wakhothamela uDavide, ubuso bakhe bubheke phansi.
