16_7_68_Amahhashi abo ayengamakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi amathathu nesithupha; iminyuzi yabo yayingamakhulu amabili namashumi amane nanhlanu; 
16_7_69_amakamela ayengamakhulu amane namashumi amathathu nanhlanu; izimbongolo zaziyizinkulungwane eziyisithupha namakhulu ayisikhombisa namashumi amabili. 
16_7_70_Ezinye izinhloko zanikelela umsebenzi; umbusi wanikelela isikhwama amadarike ayinkulungwane egolide, nezitsha ezingamashumi ayisihlanu, nezambatho zabapristi ezingamakhulu ayisihlanu namashumi amathathu. 
16_7_71_Ezinye izinhloko zawoyise zanikelela isikhwama somsebenzi amadarike ayizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili egolide namamane ayizinkulungwane ezimbili namakhulu amabili esiliva. 
16_7_72_Abakunikelayo abanye abantu kwakungamadarike ayizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili egolide, namamane ayizinkulungwane ezimbili esiliva, nezambatho zabapristi ezingamashumi ayisithupha nesikhombisa. 
16_7_73_Base behlala-ke abapristi, namaLevi, nabalindisango, nabahlabeleli, nabanye abantu, namaNethini, naye wonke u-Israyeli emizini yabo. Kwathi lapho inyanga yesikhombisa isifikile, abantwana bakwa-Israyeli babe semizini yabo. 
16_8_1_Bonke abantu babuthana njengomuntu munye esigcawini esasiphambi kweSango Lamanzi; bakhuluma ku-Ezra, umbhali, ukuba alethe incwadi yomthetho kaMose, uJehova ayeyale ngawo u-Israyeli. 
16_8_2_U-Ezra, umpristi, wawuletha umthetho phambi kwebandla, abesilisa nabesifazane nabo bonke ababe nengqondo yokuzwa, ngosuku lokuqala lwenyanga yesikhombisa. 
16_8_3_Wafunda kuwo phambi kwesigcawu esasiphambi kweSango Lamanzi, kusukela ekuseni kuze kube semini, phambi kwabesilisa nabesifazane nababe nengqondo yokuzwa; izindlebe zabantu bonke zalalela incwadi yomthetho. 
16_8_4_U-Ezra umbhali wayemi ebhesitulu lamapulangwe ababelenzele lo mgomo; eceleni kwakhe kwakumi oMatithiya, noShema, no-Anaya, no-Uriya, noHilikiya, noMahaseya ngakwesokunene sakhe, nangakwesokhohlo sakhe ngoPhedaya, noMishayeli, noMalikhiya, noHashumi, noHashibadana, noZakariya, noMeshulamu. 
16_8_5_U-Ezra wayivula incwadi emehlweni abantu bonke, ngokuba wayengaphezulu kwabantu bonke, nalapho eyivula, bonke abantu basukuma. 
16_8_6_U-Ezra wambonga uJehova uNkulunkulu omkhulu. Bonke abantu baphendula bathi: “Amen, Amen,” bephakamisa izandla zabo; bakhothama, bakhuleka kuJehova, ubuso babo bubheke phansi. 
16_8_7_NoJeshuwa, noBani, noSherebiya, noJamini, no-Akubi, noShabethayi, noHodiya, noMahaseya, noKelitha, no-Azariya, noJozabadi, noHanani, noPhelaya, namaLevi bafundisa abantu umthetho, abantu besezindaweni zabo. 
16_8_8_Bafunda encwadini, emthethweni kaNkulunkulu, bephumisela kahle; bachaza, babaqondisa okufundwayo. 
16_8_9_UNehemiya owayengumbusi, no-Ezra umpristi nombhali, namaLevi ayebafundisa abantu, bathi kubantu bonke: “Lolu suku lungcwele kuJehova uNkulunkulu wenu; ningalili, ningakhali.” Ngokuba bonke abantu bakhala, lapho bezwa amazwi omthetho. 
16_8_10_Wayesethi kubo: “Hambani nidle okunonileyo, niphuze okumnandi, nithumele izabelo kwabangalungiselwanga lutho, ngokuba lolu suku lungcwele kuJehova; ningadabuki, ngokuba injabulo kaJehova iyinqaba yenu.” 
16_8_11_AmaLevi ayesethulisa abantu bonke, ethi: “Thulani, ngokuba lolu suku lungcwele; ningadabuki.” 
16_8_12_Abantu bonke bahamba ukuba badle, baphuze, bathumele izabelo, bajabule kakhulu, ngokuba babeqondile amazwi ababewazisiwe. 
16_8_13_Ngosuku lwesibili kwabuthana izinhloko zawoyise babantu bonke, nabapristi, namaLevi ku-Ezra umbhali ukuba baqaphele amazwi omthetho. 
16_8_14_Bafumanisa kulotshiwe emthethweni ukuthi uJehova wayeyalile ngesandla sikaMose ukuba abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bahlale emadokodweni ngomkhosi wenyanga yesikhombisa, 
16_8_15_bezwakalise, bathumele izwi emizini yabo yonke naseJerusalema lokuthi: “Phumani, niye entabeni, nilande amagatsha omnqumo, namagatsha omnqumo wasendle, namagatsha ombomvana, namagatsha esundu, namagatsha emithi edumbileyo, nenze amadokodo njengokulotshiweyo.” 
16_8_16_Base bephuma abantu, balanda lokho, bazenzela amadokodo, kwaba yilowo nalowo ophahleni lwendlu, nasemagcekeni abo, nasemagcekeni endlu kaNkulunkulu, nasesigcawini seSango Lamanzi, nasesigcawini seSango lakwa-Efrayimi. 
16_8_17_Ibandla lonke lababuyileyo ekuthunjweni lenza amadokodo, lahlala emadokodweni, ngokuba kusukela ezinsukwini zikaJeshuwa, indodana kaNuni, kuze kube yilolo suku abantwana bakwa-Israyeli babengenzanga kanjalo. Kwakukhona ukuthokoza okukhulu kakhulu. 
16_8_18_Wafunda encwadini yomthetho kaNkulunkulu imihla ngemihla kusukela osukwini lokuqala kuze kube lusuku lokugcina. Bagubha umkhosi izinsuku eziyisikhombisa; ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili kwakungumhlangano ozothileyo njengomthetho. 
16_9_1_Ngosuku lwamashumi amabili nane lwaleyo nyanga abantwana bakwa-Israyeli babuthana, bazila ukudla benezindwangu zamasaka nothuli phezu kwabo. 
16_9_2_Inzalo ka-Israyeli yayizahlukanisa nabezizwe bonke, yayimi ivuma izono zayo nokona kwawoyise. 
16_9_3_Basukuma endaweni yabo, bafunda encwadini yomthetho kaJehova uNkulunkulu wabo inxenye yesine yosuku; inxenye yesine bavuma izono zabo, bakhuleka kuJehova uNkulunkulu wabo. 
16_9_4_Kwase kukhwela ezikhwelweni zamaLevi oJeshuwa, noBani, noKadimiyeli, noShebaniya, noBuni, noSherebiya, noBani, noKhenani, bamemeza ngezwi elikhulu kuJehova uNkulunkulu wabo. 
16_9_5_AmaLevi oJeshuwa, noKadimiyeli, noBani, noHashabineya, noSherebiya, noHodiya, noShebaniya, noPhethahiya athi: “Sukumani nimbonge uJehova uNkulunkulu wenu kusukela phakade kuze kube phakade. “Malibongwe igama lakho elikhazimulayo, eliphakanyisiwe ngaphezu kwakho konke ukubonga nokudumisa. 
16_9_6_Wena unguJehova, wena wedwa. Wenzile izulu, izulu lamazulu nalo lonke ibandla lawo, umhlaba nakho konke okukuwo, izilwandle nakho konke okukuzo, ulonda konke, nebandla lasezulwini likhuleka kuwe. 
16_9_7_“Wena unguJehova uNkulunkulu owakhetha u-Abrama, wamkhipha e-Uri lamaKaledi, wametha igama lokuthi u-Abrahama; 
16_9_8_wafumana inhliziyo yakhe ithembekile phambi kwakho, wenza isivumelwano naye ukunika inzalo yakhe izwe lamaKhanani, nelamaHeti, nelama-Amori, nelamaPherizi, nelamaJebusi, nelamaGirigashi, wawafeza amazwi akho, ngokuba ulungile. 
16_9_9_“Wabona ukuhlupheka kwawobaba eGibithe, wezwa ukukhala kwabo ngaseLwandle Olubomvu; 
16_9_10_wenza izibonakaliso nezimangaliso kuFaro nasezincekwini zakhe zonke, nakubo bonke abantu bezwe lakhe, ngokuba wazi ukuthi babebaqholoshela, wazenzela igama, njengalokhu kunjalo nanamuhla. 
16_9_11_Wahlukanisa ulwandle phambi kwabo, badabula phakathi kolwandle emhlabathini owomileyo; nababaxoshayo wabaphonsa otweni njengetshe emanzini anamandla. 
16_9_12_Wabahola ngensika yefu emini nangensika yomlilo ebusuku ukubakhanyisela endleleni ababeyakuhamba ngayo. 
16_9_13_“Wehlela entabeni yaseSinayi, wakhuluma nabo usezulwini, wabanika izahlulelo ezilungileyo, nemithetho eqinisileyo, nezimiso, nemiyalo emihle; 
16_9_14_wabazisa isabatha lakho elingcwele, wabayala ngemiyalo, nangezimiso, nangomthetho ngesandla sikaMose inceku yakho; 
16_9_15_wabanika isinkwa esivela ezulwini ngokulamba kwabo, wabakhiphela amanzi edwaleni ngokoma kwabo, wabayala ukuba bangene ukulidla izwe owaphakamisa ngalo isandla sakho ukuba ubanike lona. 
16_9_16_“Kepha bona nawoyise baqholosha, benza lukhuni izintamo zabo, kabalalelanga imiyalo yakho, 
16_9_17_benqaba ukulalela, abakhumbulanga izimangaliso zakho owazenza phakathi kwabo, kepha benza lukhuni izintamo zabo, nangokuhlubuka kwabo bamisa induna ukuba babuyele ebugqileni babo; kodwa wena unguNkulunkulu othethelelayo, onomusa nesihe; wephuza ukuthukuthela, ugcwele isihawu; kawubashiyanga. 
16_9_18_Yebo, lapho bezenzele ithole elibunjiweyo bethi: ‘Leli linguNkulunkulu wakho owakukhuphula eGibithe,’ benza izithuko ezinkulu, 
16_9_19_nokho wena ngomusa wakho omkhulu awubashiyanga ehlane; insika yefu ayisukanga phezu kwabo emini ukubahola endleleni, nensika yomlilo ebusuku ukubakhanyisela endleleni ababeyakuhamba ngayo. 
16_9_20_Wabanika nomoya wakho omuhle ukubafundisa; awugodlanga imana lakho emilonyeni yabo, wabanika amanzi ngokoma kwabo. 
16_9_21_Wabondla iminyaka engamashumi amane ehlane, kabaswelanga lutho; izingubo zabo aziguganga, nezinyawo azivuvukalanga. 
16_9_22_“Wabanika imibuso nezizwe owababela khona izindawo ngezindawo; badla izwe likaSihoni, izwe lenkosi yaseHeshiboni, nezwe lika-Ogi inkosi yaseBashani. 
16_9_23_Nabantwana babo wabandisa ngangezinkanyezi zezulu, wabangenisa ezweni owasho ngalo koyise ukuthi bayakungena ukulidla. 
16_9_24_Abantwana bangena-ke, balidla izwe, wahlula phambi kwabo abakhe ezweni, amaKhanani, wabanikela ezandleni zabo, kanye namakhosi abo, nabantu bezwe, ukuba benze kubo njengokuthanda kwabo. 
16_9_25_Bathatha imizi ebiyelweyo nezwe elivundileyo, badla izindlu ezigcwele okuhle konke: imithombo embiweyo, nezivini, neminqumo, nemithi eminingi yokudliwa; badla-ke, basutha, bakhuluphala, benama ngobuhle bakho obukhulu. 
16_9_26_“Kepha babengalaleli, bakuhlubuka, balahla nyovane umthetho wakho, bababulala abaprofethi bakho abafakaza ngabo ukubabuyisela kuwe, benza izithuko ezinkulu. 
16_9_27_Wawusubanikela esandleni sezitha zabo ezabahlupha; ngesikhathi sokuhlupheka kwabo sebekhala kuwe, wena wabezwa usezulwini, nangomusa wakho omkhulu wabanika abasindisi ababasindisa esandleni sezitha zabo. 
16_9_28_“Kepha sebephumulile, babuye benza okubi ebusweni bakho; wawusubashiya esandleni sezitha zabo, zaze zabusa phezu kwabo; kodwa lapho bebuye bekhala kuwe, wena wabezwa usezulwini, wabophula kaningi ngomusa wakho omkhulu, 
16_9_29_wabaxwayisa ukuba ubabuyisele emthethweni wakho, kepha baqholosha, kabayilalelanga imiyalo yakho, kodwa bona ezahlulelweni zakho, okothi uma umuntu ezenza, uyakuphila ngazo, baphendula ihlombe ngenkani, benza lukhuni intamo yabo, abaze bezwa. 
16_9_30_Nokho iminyaka eminingi wababekezelela, wabaxwayisa ngoMoya wakho ngesandla sabaprofethi bakho, kepha abezwanga; wawusubanikela esandleni sabantu bezizwe. 
16_9_31_Nokho ngomusa wakho omkhulu awubaqothulanga, awubashiyanga, ngokuba unguNkulunkulu onomusa nobumnene. 
16_9_32_“Ngalokho, Nkulunkulu wethu, Nkulunkulu omkhulu onamandla owesabekayo, ogcina isivumelwano nomusa, yonke le nkathazo mayingabi ncane ebusweni bakho esificile thina, namakhosi ethu, nezikhulu zethu, nabapristi bethu, nabaprofethi bethu, nawobaba, nabo bonke abantu bakho, kusukela esikhathini samakhosi ase-Asiriya kuze kube namuhla. 
16_9_33_Nokho wena ulungile kukho konke okusehleleyo, ngokuba wenze ngeqiniso, kepha thina sinecala; 
16_9_34_namakhosi ethu, nezikhulu zethu, nabapristi bethu, nawobaba abagcinanga umthetho wakho, kabalalelanga imiyalo yakho nezixwayiso zakho obaxwayise ngazo. 
16_9_35_Abakukhonzanga embusweni wabo, nasebuhleni bakho obukhulu owabanika bona, nasezweni elibanzi nelivundileyo owabapha lona ebusweni babo, ababuyanga emisebenzini yabo emibi. 
16_9_36_“Bheka, siyizinceku namuhla, nezwe owalinika obaba ukuba badle izithelo zalo nokuhle kwalo, bheka, siyizinceku kulo. 
16_9_37_Lithelela kakhulu amakhosi owabeke phezu kwethu ngenxa yezono zethu; abusa phezu kwemizimba yethu naphezu kwezinkomo zethu njengokuthanda kwawo; thina sisekuhluphekeni okukhulu. 
16_9_38_“Ngenxa yakho konke lokho senza isivumelwano esiqinisileyo, sasiloba; kwanamatheliswa ngophawu yizikhulu zethu, namaLevi ethu, nabapristi bethu.” 
16_10_1_Abanamathelisa nampa: uNehemiya umbusi, indodana kaHakaliya, noSedekiya, 
16_10_2_noSeraya, no-Azariya, noJeremiya, 
16_10_3_noPhashuri, no-Amariya, noMalikhiya, 
16_10_4_noHathushi, noShebaniya, noMaluki, 
16_10_5_noHarimi, noMeremoti, no-Obadiya, 
16_10_6_noDaniyeli, noGinethoni, noBaruki, 
16_10_7_noMeshulamu, no-Abiya, noMijamini, 
16_10_8_noMahaziya, noBiligayi, noShemaya; labo babe ngabapristi. 
16_10_9_AmaLevi: uJeshuwa indodana ka-Azaniya, noBinuwi wamadodana kaHenadadi, noKadimiyeli, 
16_10_10_nabafowabo oShebaniya, noHodiya, noKelitha, noPhelaya, noHanani, 
16_10_11_noMika, noRehobe, noHashabiya, 
16_10_12_noZakuri, noSherebiya, noShebaniya, 
16_10_13_noHodiya, noBani, noBeninu. 
16_10_14_Izinhloko zabantu: oPharoshi, noPhahati Mowabi, no-Elamu, noZathu, noBani, 
16_10_15_noBuni, no-Azigadi, noBebayi, 
16_10_16_no-Adoniya, noBigivayi, no-Adini, 
16_10_17_no-Atheri, noHezekiya, no-Azuri, 
16_10_18_noHodiya, noHashumi, noBesayi, 
16_10_19_noHarifi, no-Anathoti, noNobayi, 
16_10_20_noMagiphiyashi, noMeshulamu, noHeziri, 
16_10_21_noMeshezabeli, noSadoki, noJaduwa, 
16_10_22_noPhelathiya, noHanani, no-Anaya, 
16_10_23_noHosheya, noHananiya, noHashubi, 
16_10_24_noHaloheshi, noPhiliha, noShobeki, 
16_10_25_noRehumi, noHashabina, noMahaseya, 
16_10_26_no-Ahiya, noHanani, no-Anani, 
16_10_27_noMaluki, noHarimi, noBahana. 
16_10_28_Abantu abaseleyo, abapristi, namaLevi, nabalindisango, nabahlabeleli, namaNethini, nabo bonke ababezahlukanisile nabantu bezwe ukuba bazihlanganise nomthetho kaNkulunkulu, nawomkabo, namadodana abo, namadodakazi abo, bonke ababe nolwazi nokuhlakanipha, 
16_10_29_babambelela kubafowabo, abakhulu babo, benza isithembiso nesifungo sokuba bahambe emthethweni kaNkulunkulu owanikwa ngesandla sikaMose inceku kaNkulunkulu, bagcine, benze yonke imiyalo kaJehova iNkosi yethu, nezahlulelo zakhe, nezimiso zakhe 
16_10_30_ukuba singabaniki abantu bezwe amadodakazi ethu, singathatheli amadodana ethu amadodakazi abo, 
16_10_31_nokuba lapho abantu bezwe beletha impahla, noma uhlobo oluthile lwamabele ngosuku lwesabatha ukuba bathengise ngakho, singathengi kubo ngesabatha nangosuku olungcwele, futhi siwuyeke umnyaka wesikhombisa nazo zonke izikwenetu. 
16_10_32_Futhi sazimisela umthetho wokuba sithele inxenye yesithathu yeshekeli ngomnyaka, ibe ngeyomsebenzi wendlu kaNkulunkulu wethu, 
16_10_33_eyesinkwa sokubukwa kanye nomnikelo wempuphu wemihla yonke nomnikelo oshiswa imihla yonke, neyamasabatha, neyokwethwasa kwenyanga, neyemikhosi emisiweyo, neyezinto ezingcwele, neyeminikelo yezono, ukuba kwenziwe ukubuyisana kuka-Israyeli nomsebenzi wonke wendlu kaNkulunkulu wethu. 
16_10_34_Senza inkatho thina bapristi namaLevi nabantu ngomnikelo wezinkuni ukuba zingeniswe endlini kaNkulunkulu wethu njengezindlu zawobaba ngezikhathi ezinqunyiweyo, iminyaka ngeminyaka, zibaswe phezu kwe-altare likaJehova uNkulunkulu wethu njengokulotshiweyo emthethweni, 
16_10_35_kulethwe endlini kaJehova ulibo lomhlabathi wethu nolibo lwezithelo zemithi yezinhlobo zonke iminyaka ngeminyaka, 
16_10_36_kulethwe endlini kaNkulunkulu wethu namazibulo amadodana ethu, nawezimpahla zethu njengokulotshiweyo emthethweni, namazibulo ezinkomo zethu nawezimvu zethu, kubapristi abakhonza endlini kaNkulunkulu wethu; 
16_10_37_silethe ulibo lomgqakazo wethu, neminikelo yethu yokuphakanyiswa, nezithelo zemithi yezinhlobo zonke, newayini namafutha kubapristi emakamelweni endlu kaNkulunkulu wethu, nokweshumi komhlabathi wethu kumaLevi, ngokuba wona amaLevi amukela okweshumi emizini yonke esilima kuyo. 
16_10_38_Umpristi, indodana ka-Aroni, ubeyakuba namaLevi, lapho amaLevi amukela okweshumi; amaLevi ayakukhuphulela okweshumi kokweshumi endlini kaNkulunkulu wethu emakamelweni endlini yengcebo. 
16_10_39_Ngokuba abantwana bakwa-Israyeli nabantwana bakwaLevi babeyakukhuphulela umnikelo wamabele, newayini, namafutha emakamelweni, lapho kukhona izitsha zendlu engcwele, nabapristi abakhonzayo, nabalindisango, nabahlabeleli; besingenakuyishiya indlu kaNkulunkulu wethu. 
16_11_1_Izinduna zabantu zahlala eJerusalema; abantu abaseleyo benza inkatho ukuyisa omunye kwabayishumi njalo ukuba ahlale eJerusalema, umuzi ongcwele, nabayisishiyagalolunye kweminye imizi. 
16_11_2_Abantu babusisa bonke abantu ababezinikela ngenhliziyo ukuhlala eJerusalema. 
16_11_3_Nazi izinhloko zezwe ezazihlala eJerusalema; kepha emizini yakwaJuda bahlala emizini yabo, kwaba yilowo nalowo efeni lakhe: abakwa-Israyeli, nabapristi, namaLevi, namaNethini, nabantwana bezinceku zikaSolomoni. 
16_11_4_EJerusalema kwahlala abantwana abathile bakwaJuda nabakwaBenjamini. Kubantwana bakwaJuda: ngu-Athaya ka-Uziya, kaZakariya, ka-Amariya, kaShefathiya, kaMahalalele wabantwana bakwaPheresi, 
16_11_5_noMahaseya kaBaruki, kaKholi Hoze, kaHazaya, ka-Adaya, kaJoyaribi, kaZakariya, indodana yomShiloni. 
16_11_6_Onke amadodana kaPheresi ahlala eJerusalema ayengamadoda anamandla angamakhulu amane namashumi ayisithupha nesishiyagalombili. 
16_11_7_Nampa abantwana bakwaBenjamini: uSalu kaMeshulamu, kaJohedi, kaPhedaya, kaKholaya, kaMahaseya, ka-Ithiyeli, kaJeshaya. 
16_11_8_Emva kwakhe ngoGabayi noSalayi, bengamakhulu ayisishiyagalolunye namashumi amabili nesishiyagalombili. 
16_11_9_UJoweli, indodana kaZikiri, wayengumbonisi; uJuda, indodana kaHasenuwa, wayengowesibili emzini. 
16_11_10_Kubapristi: nguJedaya, indodana kaJoyaribi, noJakini, 
16_11_11_noSeraya kaHilikiya, kaMeshulamu, kaSadoki, kaMerayoti, ka-Ahithubi, umphathi wendlu kaNkulunkulu; 
16_11_12_nabafowabo ababewenza umsebenzi abangamakhulu ayisishiyagalombili namashumi amabili nambili, no-Adaya kaJerohamu, kaPhelaliya, ka-Amisi, kaZakariya, kaPhashuri, kaMalikhiya; 
16_11_13_nabafowabo, izinhloko zawoyise, bengamakhulu amabili namashumi amane nambili, no-Amashisayi ka-Azareli, ka-Ahizayi, kaMeshilemoti, ka-Imeri; 
16_11_14_nabafowabo, amaqhawe anamandla, beyikhulu namashumi amabili nesishiyagalombili; umbonisi wabo wayenguZabidiyeli, indodana kaHagedolimi. 
16_11_15_KumaLevi: nguShemaya kaHashubi, ka-Azirikamu, kaHashabiya, kaBuni, 
16_11_16_noShabethayi noJozabadi bezinhloko zamaLevi ababephethe umsebenzi wangaphandle wendlu kaNkulunkulu, 
16_11_17_noMathaniya, kaMika, kaZabidi, ka-Asafa, induna yomkhuleko wokubonga, noBakibukiya, owesibili phakathi kwabafowabo, no-Abida kaShamuwa kaGalali kaJeduthuni. 
16_11_18_Onke amaLevi emzini ongcwele ayengamakhulu amabili namashumi ayisishiyagalombili nane. 
16_11_19_Abalindisango o-Akubi noThalimoni nabafowabo ababelinda ngasemasangweni babe yikhulu namashumi ayisikhombisa nambili. 
16_11_20_Abakwa-Israyeli abaseleyo, abapristi namaLevi, babe semizini yonke yakwaJuda, kwaba yilowo nalowo efeni lakhe. 
16_11_21_AmaNethini ahlala e-Ofeli; oSiha noGishipha babe phezu kwamaNethini. 
16_11_22_Umbonisi wamaLevi eJerusalema kwakungu-Uzi kaBani, kaHashabiya, kaMathaniya, kaMika wamadodana ka-Asafa, abahlabeleli, engumphathi womsebenzi wendlu kaNkulunkulu. 
16_11_23_Ngokuba kwakukhona umyalo wenkosi ngabo, nomthetho wabahlabeleli njengokufunekayo imihla ngemihla. 
16_11_24_UPhethahiya, indodana kaMeshezabeli, wabantwana bakwaZera, indodana kaJuda, wayengasesandleni senkosi ezindabeni zonke zabantu. 
16_11_25_Emizaneni inamasimu ayo kwahlala abanye abantwana bakwaJuda: eKiriyati Araba nasemizaneni yalo, naseDiboni nasemizaneni yalo, naseJekabiseyeli nasemizaneni yalo, 
16_11_26_naseJeshuwa, naseMolada, naseBeti Pheleti, 
16_11_27_naseHasari Shuwali, naseBeri Sheba nasemizaneni yalo, 
16_11_28_naseSikilagi, naseMekhona nasemizaneni yalo, 
16_11_29_nase-Eni Rimoni, naseSora, naseJarimuthi, 
16_11_30_naseZanowa, nase-Adulamu nasemizaneni yawo, naseLakishi inamasimu alo, nase-Azeka nasemizaneni yalo. Bamisa kusukela eBeri Sheba ukuze kube sesigodini sikaHinomu. 
16_11_31_Abantwana bakwaBenjamini bahlala kusukela eGeba kuze kube seMikimasi, nase-Aja, naseBethele nasemizaneni yalo, 
16_11_32_nase-Anathoti, naseNobi, nase-Ananiya, 
16_11_33_naseHasori, naseRama, naseGitayimi, 
16_11_34_naseHadidi, naseSeboyimi, naseNebalati, 
16_11_35_naseLodi, nase-Ono, isiGodi Sababazi. 
16_11_36_KumaLevi izigaba zakwaJuda zahlanganiswa noBenjamini. 
16_12_1_Nampa abapristi namaLevi abakhuphuka noZerubabele indodana kaSheyalitiyeli noJeshuwa: oSeraya, noJeremiya, no-Ezra, 
16_12_2_no-Amariya, noMaluki, noHathushi, 
16_12_3_noShekaniya, noRehumi, noMeremoti, 
16_12_4_no-Ido, noGinethoyi, no-Abiya, 
16_12_5_noMijamini, noMahadiya, noBiliga, 
16_12_6_noShemaya, noJoyaribi, noJedaya, 
16_12_7_noSalu, no-Amoki, noHilikiya, noJedaya. Labo babe yizinhloko zabapristi nezabafowabo emihleni kaJeshuwa. 
16_12_8_AmaLevi: ngoJeshuwa, noBinuwi, noKadimiyeli, noSherebiya, noJuda, noMathaniya owayephethe ukubonga, yena nabafowabo, 
16_12_9_noBakibukiya no-Uno abafowabo, bemalungana nabo ngezigaba. 
16_12_10_UJeshuwa wazala uJoyakimi; uJoyakimi wazala u-Eliyashibi; u-Eliyashibi wazala uJoyada; 
16_12_11_uJoyada wazala uJonathani; uJonathani wazala uJaduwa. 
16_12_12_Emihleni kaJoyakimi izinhloko zawoyise babapristi zaziyilezi: ekaSeraya: nguMeraya; ekaJeremiya: nguHananiya; 
16_12_13_eka-Ezra: nguMeshulamu; eka-Amariya: nguJehohanani; 
16_12_14_ekaMaluki: nguJonathani; ekaShebaniya: nguJosefa; 
16_12_15_ekaHarimi: ngu-Adina; ekaMerayoti: nguHelekayi; 
16_12_16_eka-Ido: nguZakariya; ekaGinethoni: nguMeshulamu; 
16_12_17_eka-Abiya: nguZikiri; ekaMiniyamini, ekaMohadiya: nguPhilitayi; 
16_12_18_ekaBiliga: nguShamuwa; ekaShemaya: nguJehonathani; 
16_12_19_ekaJoyaribi: nguMathenayi; ekaJedaya: ngu-Uzi; 
16_12_20_ekaSalayi: nguKhalayi; eka-Amoki: ngu-Ebere; 
16_12_21_ekaHilikiya: nguHashabiya; ekaJedaya: nguNethaneli. 
16_12_22_AmaLevi abhalwa emihleni ka-Eliyashibi, noJoyada, noJohanani, noJaduwa njengezinhloko zawoyise kanye nabapristi ekubuseni kukaDariyu umPheresiya. 
16_12_23_Izinhloko zawoyise babantwana bakwaLevi zalotshwa encwadini yezindaba zemihla ngemihla, kwaze kwaba semihleni kaJohanani indodana ka-Eliyashibi. 
16_12_24_Izinhloko zamaLevi nazi: oHashabiya, noSherebiya, noJeshuwa, indodana kaKadimiyeli, kanye nabafowabo malungana nabo, ukuba badumise, babonge njengemiyalo kaDavide, umuntu kaNkulunkulu, isigaba malungana nesigaba. 
16_12_25_OMathaniya, noBakibukiya, no-Obadiya, noMeshulamu, noThalimoni, no-Akubi babe ngabalindisango, belinda izindlu zokubekelela ngasemasangweni. 
16_12_26_Labo babe khona emihleni kaJoyakimi indodana kaJeshuwa kaJosadaki nasemihleni kaNehemiya umbusi no-Ezra, umbhali. 
16_12_27_Ekuhlanjululweni kogange lwaseJerusalema bafuna amaLevi ezindaweni zawo zonke ukuba ayiswe eJerusalema ukwenza ukuhlambulula ngokuthokoza, nangokubonga, nangokuhlabelela ngamasimbali nangezingubhu nangamahabhu. 
16_12_28_Abantwana babahlabeleli babuthana bevela ethafeni elalizungeza iJerusalema nasemizaneni yamaLevi, 
16_12_29_naseBeti Giligali, nasemasimini aseGeba, nase-Azimaveti, ngokuba babezakhele imizana nxazonke zeJerusalema. 
16_12_30_Abapristi namaLevi base bezihlambulula; bahlambulula nabantu, namasango, nogange. 
16_12_31_Ngase ngikhuphulela ogangeni izikhulu zakwaJuda, ngabeka izigaba ezimbili ezinkulu ezabongayo, zahlaba ihele; esinye sahamba ngakwesokunene ogangeni, saya ngaseSangweni Lomquba; 
16_12_32_emva kwaso kwahamba uHoshaya nenxenye yezikhulu zakwaJuda, 
16_12_33_no-Azariya, no-Ezra, noMeshulamu, 
16_12_34_noJuda, noBenjamini, noShemaya, noJeremiya, 
16_12_35_kanye namadodana athile abapristi ephethe amacilongo: uZakariya kaJonathani, kaShemaya, kaMathaniya, kaMikhaya, kaZakuri, ka-Asafa, 
16_12_36_nabafowabo oShemaya, no-Azareli, noMilalayi, noGilalayi, noMahayi, noNethaneli, noJuda, noHanani, bephethe izinto zokubethwa zikaDavide, umuntu kaNkulunkulu; u-Ezra, umbhali, wayengaphambi kwabo. 
16_12_37_NgaseSangweni Lomthombo malungana nabo bakhuphuka ngezikhwelo zomuzi kaDavide ezikhwelweni zogange, ngasenhla kwendlu kaDavide, kwaze kwaba seSangweni Lamanzi. 
16_12_38_Esinye isigaba saya ngakwesokhohlo, mina ngasilandela kanye nenxenye yabantu ogangeni, ngasenhla koMbhoshongo Wezithando, kwaze kwaba soGangeni Olubanzi, 
16_12_39_nangenhla kweSango lakwa-Efrayimi, naseSangweni Elidala, naseSangweni Lezinhlanzi, naseMbhoshongweni KaHananeli naseMbhoshongweni KaHameya, kwaze kwaba seSangweni Lezimvu; bema eSangweni Letilongo. 
16_12_40_Zase zima lezo zigaba zombili zababongayo endlini kaNkulunkulu kanye nami, nenxenye yababusi inami, 
16_12_41_nabapristi o-Eliyakimi, noMahaseya, noMiniyamini, noMikhaya, no-Eliyohenayi, noZakariya, noHananiya, bephethe amacilongo, 
16_12_42_noMahaseya, noShemaya, no-Eleyazare, no-Uzi, noJehohanani, noMalikhiya, no-Elamu, no-Ezeri. Abahlabeleli bahlabelela ngokuzwakalisayo, benoJizirahiya umbonisi wabo. 
16_12_43_Banikela ngemihlatshelo emikhulu ngalolo suku, bathokoza, ngokuba uNkulunkulu wayebathokozisile ngentokozo enkulu; nabesifazane nabantwana bathokoza, kwezwakala kude ukuthokoza kweJerusalema. 
16_12_44_Ngalolo suku amiswa amadoda ukuba abe ngabaphathi bamakamelo engcebo, nabeminikelo yokuphakanyiswa, nabolibo, nabokweshumi ukuba baqoqele kuwo njengamasimu emizi izabelo ezinqunyelwe abapristi namaLevi ngomthetho, ngokuba uJuda wathokoza ngabapristi namaLevi asebebekiwe. 
16_12_45_Bagcina imfanelo kaNkulunkulu wabo nemfanelo yokuhlambulula kanye nabahlabeleli nabalindisango njengemiyalo kaDavide noSolomoni indodana yakhe. 
16_12_46_Ngokuba nasemihleni kaDavide neka-Asafa kwasendulo kwakukhona abaholi babahlabeleli kanye nezihlabelelo zokudumisa nezokubonga uNkulunkulu. 
16_12_47_Wonke u-Israyeli wayesenika emihleni kaZerubabele nasemihleni kaNehemiya abahlabeleli nabalindisango izabelo njengokufunekayo imihla ngemihla; bakungcwelisela amaLevi, namaLevi akungcwelisela amadodana ka-Aroni. 
16_13_1_Ngalolo suku kwafundwa encwadini kaMose ezindlebeni zabantu; kwafunyanwa kulotshiwe kuyo ukuthi owakwa-Amoni nowakwaMowabi abanakungena ebandleni likaNkulunkulu kuze kube phakade, 
16_13_2_ngokuba abahlangabezanga abakwa-Israyeli ngesinkwa namanzi, kepha babaqashela uBileyamu ukuba abaqalekise; kodwa uNkulunkulu wethu waphendula isiqalekiso saba yisibusiso. 
16_13_3_Kwathi sebezwile umthetho, bahlukanisa no-Israyeli yonke ingxubevange. 
16_13_4_Ngaphambi kwalokho u-Eliyashibi, umpristi, owayemiselwe amakamelo endlu kaNkulunkulu wethu, isihlobo sikaThobiya, 
16_13_5_wayemlungisele ikamelo elikhulu, lapho kade bebeka khona iminikelo yempuphu, nenhlaka, nezitsha, nokweshumi kwamabele, newayini, namafutha, okwakunqunyelwe ngomthetho amaLevi, nabahlabeleli, nabalindisango, kanye neminikelo yabapristi. 
16_13_6_Kepha kukho konke lokho ngangingekho eJerusalema, ngokuba ngomnyaka wamashumi amathathu nambili ka-Aritahishashita inkosi yaseBabele ngaya enkosini; nangasekugcineni kwezinsuku ngacela enkosini, 
16_13_7_ngaya eJerusalema, ngaqonda okubi u-Eliyashibi akwenzele uThobiya ngokumlungisela ikamelo emagcekeni endlu kaNkulunkulu. 
16_13_8_Kwaba kubi kakhulu kimi; ngalahla phandle zonke izinto zendlu kaThobiya zikhishwe ekamelweni. 
16_13_9_Ngase ngithi mabahlambulule amakamelo; ngabuyisela khona izitsha zendlu kaNkulunkulu kanye neminikelo yempuphu nenhlaka. 
16_13_10_Ngase ngazi ukuthi amaLevi awanikwanga izabelo zawo; amaLevi nabahlabeleli abenza umsebenzi babebalekele, kwaba yilowo nalowo ensimini yakhe. 
16_13_11_Ngase ngiphikisana nababusi, ngathi: “Ishiyelweni indlu kaNkulunkulu na?” Ngababutha, ngababeka ezindaweni zabo. 
16_13_12_Wonke uJuda wayeseletha okweshumi kwamabele, nokwewayini, nokwamafutha engcebeni. 
16_13_13_Ngabeka abaphathizikhwama phezu kwengcebo: nguShelemiya umpristi, noSadoki umbhali, noPhedaya wamaLevi; eceleni kwabo kwakunguHanani kaZakuri kaMathaniya, ngokuba kwathiwa bathembekile; babeyakwabela abafowabo. 
16_13_14_Ngalokho ngikhumbule, Nkulunkulu wami, ungesuli izenzo zami zomusa engizenzileyo endlini kaNkulunkulu wami nasenkonzweni yayo. 
16_13_15_Ngalezo zinsuku ngabona kwaJuda abanyathela izikhamo zewayini ngesabatha nabaletha izithungu zamabele, bethwesa izimbongolo, newayini, nezithelo zewayini, namakhiwane, nemithwalo yonke, bekungenisa eJerusalema ngosuku lwesabatha; ngabaxwayisa ngosuku abathengisa ngalo lokho kudla. 
16_13_16_AbaseTire ababehlala khona bangenisa izinhlanzi nezimpahla zezinhlobo zonke, bathengisa ngakho ngesabatha kubantwana bakwaJuda naseJerusalema. 
16_13_17_Ngase ngiphikisana nabakhulu bakwaJuda, ngathi kubo: “Okubi kuni lokhu enikwenzayo, nilona usuku lwesabatha na? 
16_13_18_Abenzanga kanjalo oyihlo, noNkulunkulu wenu akehliselanga yini phezu kwenu konke lokho okubi, naphezu kwalo muzi, na? Nokho nina niyenezela intukuthelo phezu kuka-Israyeli ngokulona isabatha.” 
16_13_19_Kwathi lapho amasango aseJerusalema eseqala ukuba mnyama lingakafiki isabatha, ngathi mazivalwe izivalo, ngathi futhi mazingavulwa lize lidlule isabatha, ngabeka ezinye izinceku zami ngasemasangweni ukuba kungangeniswa mthwalo ngosuku lwesabatha. 
16_13_20_Abathengi nabathengisi bezimpahla zezinhlobo zonke base belala ngaphandle kweJerusalema kanye nakabili. 
16_13_21_Ngabaxwayisa, ngathi kubo: “Nilalelani malungana noganga na? Uma niphinda, ngiyakubeka isandla sami kini.” Kusukela kuleso sikhathi abafikanga ngesabatha. 
16_13_22_Ngasho kumaLevi ukuba azihlambulule, eze, alinde amasango, angcwelise usuku lwesabatha. Ngalokho ngikhumbule, Nkulunkulu wami, ungihawukele ngokobuningi bomusa wakho. 
16_13_23_Futhi ngalezo zinsuku ngabona abaJuda ababezithathele abesifazane base-Ashidodi, nabakwa-Amoni, nabakwaMowabi. 
16_13_24_Abantwana babo bakhuluma ngokwenxenye ngesi-Ashidodi; bengenakukhuluma isiJuda bakhuluma ngolimi lwezizwe ngezizwe. 
16_13_25_Ngabasola ngalokho, ngabathuka, ngashaya abanye abantu, ngabahluthula izinwele, ngabafungisa uNkulunkulu, ngathi: “Ninganiki amadodana abo amadodakazi enu, ningathatheli amadodana enu amadodakazi abo. 
16_13_26_Akonanga ngalokho uSolomoni inkosi yakwa-Israyeli na? Phakathi kwezizwe eziningi kwakungekho nkosi enjengaye; wayethandekile kuNkulunkulu wakhe; uNkulunkulu wambeka inkosi phezu kuka-Israyeli wonke; nokho abesifazane babezizwe bamonisa naye. 
16_13_27_Sekuzwakele nangani ukuthi nenzile konke lokho okubi kakhulu ukuba niphambuke kuNkulunkulu wethu ngokuzithathela abesifazane babezizwe.” 
16_13_28_Enye yamadodana kaJoyada indodana ka-Eliyashibi umpristi omkhulu yayingumkhwenyana kaSanibalati umHoroni; ngamxosha kimi. 
16_13_29_Bakhumbule, Nkulunkulu wami, ngokuba bangcolisile ubupristi nesivumelwano sabapristi nesamaLevi. 
16_13_30_Ngase ngibahlambulula kukho konke okwabezizwe, nganquma izimfanelo zabapristi namaLevi, kwaba yilowo nalowo emsebenzini wakhe, 
16_13_31_nomnikelo wezinkuni ngezikhathi ezinqunyiweyo, nolibo. Ngikhumbule, Nkulunkulu wami, kube kuhle kimi. 
17_1_1_Kwathi emihleni ka-Ahashiveroshi yena ungu-Ahashiveroshi lowo owabusa kusukela e-Indiya kuze kube seKushe phezu kwezifunda eziyikhulu namashumi amabili nesikhombisa 
17_1_2_yebo, ngaleyo mihla lapho inkosi u-Ahashiveroshi ihlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi sombuso wayo, esasiseShushani endlini yenkosi, 
17_1_3_ngomnyaka wesithathu wokubusa kwayo, yenzela izikhulu zayo zonke nezinceku zayo idili, amaqhawe asePheresiya naseMediya, nabakhulu nezikhulu zezifunda bephambi kwayo, 
17_1_4_lapho iyibonakalisa ingcebo yombuso wayo odumileyo, nobukhosi nobuhle bobukhulu bayo izinsuku eziningi, izinsuku eziyikhulu namashumi ayisishiyagalombili. 
17_1_5_Seziphelile lezo zinsuku, inkosi yenzela abantu bonke ababe khona eShushani endlini yenkosi, abakhulu nabancane, idili izinsuku eziyisikhombisa egcekeni lensimu yendlu yenkosi. 
17_1_6_Kwakukhona izilenge ezimhlophe neziluhlaza, ziboshelwe ngezintambo zelineni elicolekileyo nezibubende emasongweni esiliva nasezinsikeni zamatshe amhlophe; imibhede yayiyigolide nesiliva phezu kwendawo egandaywe ngamatshe abomvu, nangamaparele, nangamatshe amnyama. 
17_1_7_Baphuziswa ngezitsha zegolide, izitsha zahlukene, ezinye nezinye, iwayini lamakhosi eliningi njengokwesandla senkosi. 
17_1_8_Ukuphuza kwaya ngomthetho wokuba kungacindezelwa muntu, ngokuba inkosi yayiyalile zonke izinduna zendlu yayo ukuba zenze njengokuthanda kwabantu abanye ngabanye. 
17_1_9_Naye uVashiti, inkosikazi, wenzela abesifazane idili endlini yenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi. 
17_1_10_Ngosuku lwesikhombisa, lapho inhliziyo yenkosi isithokoza ngewayini, yayala oMehumani, noBizitha, noHaribona, noBigitha, no-Abagitha, noZethari, noKarikasi, izinduna eziyisikhombisa ezazikhonza ebusweni buka-Ahashiveroshi inkosi 
17_1_11_ukuba zimlethe uVashiti inkosikazi phambi kwenkosi, abe nomqhele wobukhosi ukuba abonise abantu nezikhulu ubuhle bakhe, ngokuba wayebukeka kahle. 
17_1_12_Kepha inkosikazi uVashiti yenqaba ukuza ngesiyalezo senkosi ngesandla sezinduna; ngalokho inkosi yathukuthela kakhulu, ulaka lwayo lwashisa phakathi kwayo. 
17_1_13_Yayisisho inkosi kwabahlakaniphileyo abazazi izikhathi ngokuba yayinendlela enjalo inkosi phambi kwabo bonke ababewazi umthetho nokwahlulela; 
17_1_14_ababe seduze naye kwakungoKarishena, noShethari, no-Adimatha, noTharishishi, noMeresi, noMarisena, noMemukhani, izikhulu eziyisikhombisa zasePheresiya naseMediya ezaziphambi kobuso benkosi, zihlala emqoka embusweni 
17_1_15_yathi: “Siyakwenze njani kuyo inkosikazi uVashiti njengomthetho, ngokuba ayenzanga izwi lenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi ngesandla sezinduna, na?” 
17_1_16_UMemukhani wathi phambi kwenkosi nezikhulu: “UVashiti, inkosikazi, akonanga enkosini kuphela, kepha nakuzo zonke izikhulu nakubantu bonke abasezifundeni zenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi. 
17_1_17_Ngokuba le ndaba yenkosikazi iyakuphumela kubo bonke abesifazane ukuba amadoda abo adeleleke emehlweni abo, lapho kuthiwa inkosi u-Ahashiveroshi yamyala uVashiti, inkosikazi, ukuba alethwe phambi kwayo, kepha akafikanga. 
17_1_18_Namuhla amakhosikazi asePheresiya naseMediya ayizwile le ndaba yenkosikazi ayakukusho ezikhulwini zenkosi, kube ngukudelela nentukuthelo enkulu. 
17_1_19_“Uma kukuhle enkosini, makuphume izwi lobukhosi, lilotshwe phakathi kwemithetho yamaPheresiya namaMede, lingalahlwa, lokuba uVashiti angabe esangena phambi kwenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi, inkosi inike omunye omuhle kunaye ubukhosikazi bakhe. 
17_1_20_Lapho isimemezelo senkosi eyakusenza sesiyakuzwakala embusweni wayo wonke, ngokuba mkhulu bonke abafazi bayakuwahlonipha amadoda abo, amakhulu namancane.” 
17_1_21_Laba lihle lelo zwi emehlweni enkosi nasezikhulwini; yenza-ke inkosi njengezwi likaMemukhani; 
17_1_22_yathuma izincwadi ezifundeni zonke zenkosi, ezifundeni ngezifunda njengokubhala kwazo nasezizweni ngezizwe njengezilimi zazo ukuba yilowo nalowo muntu abuse endlini yakhe, akhulume ngolimi lwesizwe sakubo. 
17_2_1_Kwathi emihleni ka-Ahashiveroshi yena ungu-Ahashiveroshi lowo owabusa kusukela e-Indiya kuze kube seKushe phezu kwezifunda eziyikhulu namashumi amabili nesikhombisa 
17_2_2_yebo, ngaleyo mihla lapho inkosi u-Ahashiveroshi ihlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi sombuso wayo, esasiseShushani endlini yenkosi, 
17_2_3_ngomnyaka wesithathu wokubusa kwayo, yenzela izikhulu zayo zonke nezinceku zayo idili, amaqhawe asePheresiya naseMediya, nabakhulu nezikhulu zezifunda bephambi kwayo, 
17_2_4_lapho iyibonakalisa ingcebo yombuso wayo odumileyo, nobukhosi nobuhle bobukhulu bayo izinsuku eziningi, izinsuku eziyikhulu namashumi ayisishiyagalombili. 
17_2_5_Seziphelile lezo zinsuku, inkosi yenzela abantu bonke ababe khona eShushani endlini yenkosi, abakhulu nabancane, idili izinsuku eziyisikhombisa egcekeni lensimu yendlu yenkosi. 
17_2_6_Kwakukhona izilenge ezimhlophe neziluhlaza, ziboshelwe ngezintambo zelineni elicolekileyo nezibubende emasongweni esiliva nasezinsikeni zamatshe amhlophe; imibhede yayiyigolide nesiliva phezu kwendawo egandaywe ngamatshe abomvu, nangamaparele, nangamatshe amnyama. 
17_2_7_Baphuziswa ngezitsha zegolide, izitsha zahlukene, ezinye nezinye, iwayini lamakhosi eliningi njengokwesandla senkosi. 
17_2_8_Ukuphuza kwaya ngomthetho wokuba kungacindezelwa muntu, ngokuba inkosi yayiyalile zonke izinduna zendlu yayo ukuba zenze njengokuthanda kwabantu abanye ngabanye. 
17_2_9_Naye uVashiti, inkosikazi, wenzela abesifazane idili endlini yenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi. 
17_2_10_Ngosuku lwesikhombisa, lapho inhliziyo yenkosi isithokoza ngewayini, yayala oMehumani, noBizitha, noHaribona, noBigitha, no-Abagitha, noZethari, noKarikasi, izinduna eziyisikhombisa ezazikhonza ebusweni buka-Ahashiveroshi inkosi 
17_2_11_ukuba zimlethe uVashiti inkosikazi phambi kwenkosi, abe nomqhele wobukhosi ukuba abonise abantu nezikhulu ubuhle bakhe, ngokuba wayebukeka kahle. 
17_2_12_Kepha inkosikazi uVashiti yenqaba ukuza ngesiyalezo senkosi ngesandla sezinduna; ngalokho inkosi yathukuthela kakhulu, ulaka lwayo lwashisa phakathi kwayo. 
17_2_13_Yayisisho inkosi kwabahlakaniphileyo abazazi izikhathi ngokuba yayinendlela enjalo inkosi phambi kwabo bonke ababewazi umthetho nokwahlulela; 
17_2_14_ababe seduze naye kwakungoKarishena, noShethari, no-Adimatha, noTharishishi, noMeresi, noMarisena, noMemukhani, izikhulu eziyisikhombisa zasePheresiya naseMediya ezaziphambi kobuso benkosi, zihlala emqoka embusweni 
17_2_15_yathi: “Siyakwenze njani kuyo inkosikazi uVashiti njengomthetho, ngokuba ayenzanga izwi lenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi ngesandla sezinduna, na?” 
17_2_16_UMemukhani wathi phambi kwenkosi nezikhulu: “UVashiti, inkosikazi, akonanga enkosini kuphela, kepha nakuzo zonke izikhulu nakubantu bonke abasezifundeni zenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi. 
17_2_17_Ngokuba le ndaba yenkosikazi iyakuphumela kubo bonke abesifazane ukuba amadoda abo adeleleke emehlweni abo, lapho kuthiwa inkosi u-Ahashiveroshi yamyala uVashiti, inkosikazi, ukuba alethwe phambi kwayo, kepha akafikanga. 
17_2_18_Namuhla amakhosikazi asePheresiya naseMediya ayizwile le ndaba yenkosikazi ayakukusho ezikhulwini zenkosi, kube ngukudelela nentukuthelo enkulu. 
17_2_19_“Uma kukuhle enkosini, makuphume izwi lobukhosi, lilotshwe phakathi kwemithetho yamaPheresiya namaMede, lingalahlwa, lokuba uVashiti angabe esangena phambi kwenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi, inkosi inike omunye omuhle kunaye ubukhosikazi bakhe. 
17_2_20_Lapho isimemezelo senkosi eyakusenza sesiyakuzwakala embusweni wayo wonke, ngokuba mkhulu bonke abafazi bayakuwahlonipha amadoda abo, amakhulu namancane.” 
17_2_21_Laba lihle lelo zwi emehlweni enkosi nasezikhulwini; yenza-ke inkosi njengezwi likaMemukhani; 
17_2_22_yathuma izincwadi ezifundeni zonke zenkosi, ezifundeni ngezifunda njengokubhala kwazo nasezizweni ngezizwe njengezilimi zazo ukuba yilowo nalowo muntu abuse endlini yakhe, akhulume ngolimi lwesizwe sakubo. 
17_3_1_Emva kwalezo zinto inkosi, u-Ahashiveroshi, yamenza mkhulu uHamani indodana kaHamedatha umAgagi, yamphakamisa, yamisa isihlalo sakhe phezu kwazo zonke izikhulu ezazinayo. 
17_3_2_Zonke izinceku zenkosi ezazisesangweni lenkosi zakhothama, zakhuleka kuHamani, ngokuba inkosi iyale kanjalo ngaye. Kepha uMoridekayi akakhothamanga, kakhulekanga kuye. 
17_3_3_Zase zithi izinceku zenkosi ezazisesangweni lenkosi kuMoridekayi: “Weqelani isiyalezo senkosi na?” 
17_3_4_Kwathi zikhuluma kuye imihla ngemihla, engazilaleli, zamtshela uHamani ukuba zibone ukuthi amazwi kaMoridekayi ayakuma yini, ngokuba wayezitshelile ukuthi ungumJuda. 
17_3_5_Lapho uHamani ebona ukuthi uMoridekayi akakhothamanga, kakhulekanga kuye, uHamani wagcwala ulaka. 
17_3_6_Kwakudelelekile emehlweni akhe ukubeka izandla kuMoridekayi yedwa, ngokuba zase zimtshelile abantu bakaMoridekayi; ngalokho uHamani wafuna ukubulala bonke abaJuda ababe sembusweni wonke ka-Ahashiveroshi, isizwe sikaMoridekayi. 
17_3_7_Ngenyanga yokuqala eyinyanga kaNisani ngomnyaka weshumi nambili wenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi benza iPhure eliyinkatho phambi kukaHamani imihla ngemihla izinyanga ngezinyanga, kwaze kwaba ngeyeshumi nambili eyinyanga ka-Adari. 
17_3_8_UHamani wathi enkosini u-Ahashiveroshi: “Kukhona isizwe esithile esihlakazekile, sisakazekile phakathi kwabantu bezifunda zonke zombuso wakho; nemithetho yaso yahlukene neyezizwe zonke; futhi asigcini imithetho yenkosi; ngalokho akufanele ukuba inkosi isiyeke. 
17_3_9_Uma kukuhle enkosini, makulotshwe ukuba sichithwe; ngiyakukhokhela amatalenta ayizinkulungwane eziyishumi esiliva ezandleni zabenza umsebenzi wenkosi, ayiswe esikhwameni senkosi.” 
17_3_10_Inkosi yakhumula indandatho yayo esandleni sayo, yayinika uHamani indodana kaHamedatha umAgagi isitha sabaJuda. 
17_3_11_Inkosi yathi kuHamani: “Isiliva liyanikwa wena, nesizwe futhi, ukuba wenze kuso okuhle emehlweni akho.” 
17_3_12_Kwase kubizwa abalobi benkosi ngenyanga yokuqala ngosuku lweshumi nantathu lwayo, kwalotshwa njengakho konke uHamani ayala angakho othulasizwe benkosi, nababusi ababephethe izifunda ngezifunda, nezikhulu zezizwe ngezizwe, izifunda ngezifunda njengokubhala kwazo, nezizwe ngezizwe njengolimi lwazo; kwalotshwa egameni lenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi, kwanamathiselwa ngendandatho yenkosi. 
17_3_13_Izincwadi zathunywa ngesandla sezigijimi ezifundeni zonke zenkosi ukuba kuchithwe, kubulawe, kubhujiswe abaJuda bonke, abasha nabadala, izingane nabesifazane, ngalusuku lunye, ngolweshumi nantathu lwenyanga yeshumi nambili eyinyanga ka-Adari, impahla yabo ibe yimpango. 
17_3_14_Impinda yokulotshiweyo yanikwa ukuba ibe yisimemezelo ezifundeni zonke, kumenyezelwe kubantu bonke ukuba bazilungiselele lolo suku. 
17_3_15_Izigijimi zashesha zahamba ngezwi lenkosi. Umthetho washaywa eShushani endlini yenkosi; inkosi noHamani bahlala phansi, baphuza, kepha umuzi waseShushani wakhungatheka. 
17_4_1_UMoridekayi esekwazi konke okwenziweyo, uMoridekayi waziklebhula izingubo zakhe, wembatha indwangu yamasaka nomlotha, waphumela phakathi komuzi, wakhala ngokukhala okukhulu okumunyu; 
17_4_2_waya naphambi kwesango lenkosi, ngokuba kwakungekho ongangena esangweni lenkosi embethe indwangu yamasaka. 
17_4_3_Kuzo zonke izifunda lapho kwafika khona izwi lenkosi nomthetho wayo, kwaba khona ukulila okukhulu phakathi kwabaJuda, nokuzila ukudla nokukhala ngezinyembezi, nokulila; abaningi balala phansi bembethe izindwangu zamasaka nomlotha. 
17_4_4_Izintombi zika-Esteri nezinduna zakhe zafika zamtshela lokho; inkosikazi yazwiswa kakhulu ubuhlungu; yathuma izingubo zokumembathisa uMoridekayi, yasusa kuye ingubo yakhe yamasaka; kepha akazamukelanga. 
17_4_5_U-Esteri wayesebiza uHathaki wezinduna zenkosi eyayimmisile ukuba amkhonze, wamyala ukuba aye kuMoridekayi, ukuze akwazi ukuthi kuyini nokuthi kungani na? 
17_4_6_UHathaki wayesehamba, waya kuMoridekayi esigcawini somuzi esasiphambi kwesango lenkosi. 
17_4_7_UMoridekayi wamtshela konke okumehleleyo nenani lemali uHamani ayethembisile ukulikhokhela esikhwameni senkosi ngabaJuda ukuba babhujiswe. 
17_4_8_Wamnika futhi impinda yomthetho olotshiweyo owashaywa eShushani wokuba babhujiswe, ukuze amtshengise yona u-Esteri, amtshele ngayo, amyale ukuba angene enkosini ukunxusa kuyo, acelele abantu bakhe phambi kwayo. 
17_4_9_Wafika uHathaki, wamtshela u-Esteri amazwi kaMoridekayi. 
17_4_10_Wayesethi u-Esteri kuHathaki, wayala ukuba kuthiwe kuMoridekayi: 
17_4_11_Zonke izinceku zenkosi nabantu bezifunda zenkosi bayazi ukuthi bonke abesilisa nabesifazane abeza enkosini egcekeni elingaphakathi bengabizwanga, kukhona umthetho munye ngabo wokuba babulawe, ngaphandle kwalowo inkosi eyakwelulela kuye intonga yegolide ukuba aphile; kodwa mina angibizwanga ukuba ngingene enkosini ngalezi zinsuku ezingamashumi amathathu. 
17_4_12_Bamtshela uMoridekayi amazwi ka-Esteri. 
17_4_13_Wayesesho uMoridekayi ukuba babuyisele impendulo ku-Esteri ngokuthi: “Ungacabangi enhliziyweni yakho ukuthi wena uyakusinda endlini yenkosi kunabaJuda bonke. 
17_4_14_Ngokuba uma uthula nokuthula ngalesi sikhathi, ukukhululwa nokophulwa kwabaJuda kuyakuvela kwenye indawo, wena nendlu kayihlo nibhubhe. Ngubani okwaziyo, uma ungafikanga embusweni ngenxa yesikhathi esinjengalesi na?” 
17_4_15_U-Esteri wayesesho ukuba kubuyiselwe impendulo kuMoridekayi yokuthi: 
17_4_16_“Hambani nibuthe bonke abaJuda abakhona eShushani, ningizilele ukudla, ningadli, ningaphuzi izinsuku ezintathu ubusuku nemini; nami nezintombi zami siyakuzila kanjalo, ngingene enkosini noma kungengamthetho; uma ngibhubha, mangibhubhe.” 
17_4_17_Wayesehamba uMoridekayi, wenza njengakho konke u-Esteri amyale ngakho. 
17_5_1_Kwathi ngosuku lwesithathu u-Esteri wembatha ingubo yobukhosi, wema egcekeni elingaphakathi lendlu yenkosi malungana nendlu yenkosi; inkosi yayihlezi esihlalweni sayo sobukhosi endlini yobukhosi malungana nomnyango wendlu. 
17_5_2_Kwathi lapho inkosi ibona u-Esteri inkosikazi emi egcekeni, wafumana umusa emehlweni ayo; inkosi yamelulela u-Esteri intonga yegolide esesandleni sayo. Wayesesondela u-Esteri, wasithinta isihloko sentonga. 
17_5_3_Yayisithi inkosi kuye: “Ukhala ngani, nkosikazi Esteri, na? Yini oyifunayo na? Uyakunikwa kuze kube nenxenye yombuso.” 
17_5_4_Wathi u-Esteri: “Uma kukuhle enkosini, inkosi noHamani mabeze namuhla edilini engiyilungisele lona.” 
17_5_5_Yathi inkosi: “Msheshiseni uHamani ukuba kwenziwe njengezwi lika-Esteri.” Base beya inkosi noHamani edilini alilungisileyo u-Esteri. 
17_5_6_Inkosi yathi ku-Esteri ngasedilini lewayini: “Isicelo sakho siyini na? Uyakusenzelwa. Yini oyifunayo na? Kuyakwenziwa kuze kube nenxenye yombuso.” 
17_5_7_Wayesephendula u-Esteri, ethi: “Isicelo sami nengikufunayo nakhu: 
17_5_8_Uma ngifumene umusa emehlweni enkosi noma kukuhle enkosini ukunginika lokho engikucelayo nokwenza lokho engikufunayo, makuze inkosi noHamani edilini engiyakubalungisela lona; ngiyakwenza kusasa njengezwi lenkosi.” 
17_5_9_UHamani waphuma khona ngalolo suku, ethokoza enenhliziyo enhle; kepha lapho uHamani embona uMoridekayi esangweni lenkosi ukuthi akasukumanga, kanyakazanga ngaye, uHamani wagcwala ulaka ngoMoridekayi. 
17_5_10_Kepha uHamani wazibamba, waya ekhaya; wayesethuma, walanda abangane bakhe noZereshi umkakhe. 
17_5_11_UHamani wabalandisa udumo lwengcebo yakhe, nobuningi babantwana bakhe, nakho konke inkosi emkhulisile kukho, nalokho emphakamisile kukho phezu kwezikhulu nezinceku zenkosi. 
17_5_12_UHamani wathi futhi: “U-Esteri, inkosikazi, akangenisanga muntu kanye nenkosi edilini alilungisileyo ngaphandle kwami; nakusasa mina ngimenyiwe nguye kanye nenkosi. 
17_5_13_Kepha konke lokho akunganelisi ngalutho kuso sonke isikhathi engilokhu ngibona ngaso uMoridekayi, umJuda, ehlezi esangweni lenkosi.” 
17_5_14_Wayesethi uZereshi umkakhe nabo bonke abangane bakhe kuye: “Yenza umuthi, ukuphakama kwawo kube yizingalo ezingamashumi ayisihlanu, ukhulume ekuseni enkosini ukuba uMoridekayi aphanyekwe kuwo, besewungena ngokuthokoza kanye nenkosi edilini.” Laba lihle lelo zwi kuHamani, wenza umuthi. 
17_6_1_Ngalobo busuku ubuthongo babaleka enkosini, yayala ukuba kulethwe incwadi yezikhumbuzo zezindaba zemihla ngemihla, zafundwa phambi kwenkosi. 
17_6_2_Kwafumaniseka kulotshiwe ukuthi uMoridekayi wayelandile ngoBigithani noThereshi izinduna ezimbili zenkosi, abalindisango, ukuthi babefunile ukubeka isandla enkosini u-Ahashiveroshi. 
17_6_3_Inkosi yathi: “Ludumo luni nobukhulu buni okwenzelwe uMoridekayi ngalokho na?” Zase zithi izinceku zenkosi ezaziyikhonza: “Akenzelwanga lutho.” 
17_6_4_Yayisithi inkosi: “Ngubani osegcekeni na?” UHamani wayesand'ukungena nje egcekeni elingaphandle lendlu yenkosi ukuba akhulume enkosini ngokuphanyekwa kukaMoridekayi emthini abemlungisele wona. 
17_6_5_Zathi-ke izinceku zenkosi kuyo: “Bheka, uHamani umi egcekeni.” Yathi inkosi: “Makangene.” 
17_6_6_Yayisithi inkosi kuye: “Umuntu inkosi ethanda ukumdumisa wenzelwani na?” UHamani wathi enhliziyweni yakhe: “Ngubani inkosi ebiyakuthanda ukumenzela udumo ngaphandle kwami na?” 
17_6_7_Wayesethi enkosini: “Umuntu inkosi ethanda ukumenzela udumo 
17_6_8_makalethelwe isambatho sobukhosi ekade isembethe inkosi, kanye nehhashi inkosi ekade ikhwela kulo nelifakwe enhloko yalo umqhele wobukhosi; 
17_6_9_isambatho nehhashi makunikezwe esandleni sesinye sezikhulu ezidumileyo ukuba zimembathise lowo muntu inkosi ethanda ukumdumisa, zimkhwelise ehhashini esigcawini somuzi, zimemeze phambi kwakhe ngokuthi: ‘Uyakwenzelwa kanjalo umuntu inkosi ethanda ukumdumisa.’ ” 
17_6_10_Yayisithi inkosi kuHamani: “Shesha, uthathe isambatho nehhashi njengokusho kwakho, wenze njalo kuMoridekayi, umJuda, ohlezi esangweni lenkosi. Makungaphuthi lutho lwakho konke okukhulumileyo.” 
17_6_11_UHamani wathatha-ke isambatho nehhashi, wamembathisa uMoridekayi, wamkhwelisa esigcawini somuzi, wamemeza phambi kwakhe ngokuthi: “Uyakwenzelwa kanjalo umuntu inkosi ethanda ukumdumisa.” 
17_6_12_UMoridekayi wabuyela esangweni, kepha uHamani waphuthuma ekhaya ekhala, embozile ikhanda. 
17_6_13_UHamani walandisa uZereshi umkakhe nabo bonke abangane bakhe konke okumehleleyo. Zase zithi kuye izihlakaniphi zakhe noZereshi umkakhe: “Uma uMoridekayi oqale ukuwa phambi kwakhe engowenzalo yabaJuda, awuyikumahlula, kepha uyakuwa nokuwa phambi kwakhe.” 
17_6_14_Besakhuluma naye, zafika izinduna zenkosi, zashesha ukumyisa uHamani edilini u-Esteri alilungisileyo. 
17_7_1_Yafika-ke inkosi noHamani edilini lika-Esteri inkosikazi. 
17_7_2_Inkosi yabuye yathi ku-Esteri ngosuku lwesibili lwedili lewayini: “Isicelo sakho siyini, nkosikazi Esteri, na? Uyakusenzelwa. Yini oyifunayo na? Kuyakwenziwa kuze kube nenxenye yombuso.” 
17_7_3_Wayesephendula u-Esteri inkosikazi, ethi: “Uma ngifumene umusa emehlweni akho, nkosi, noma kukuhle enkosini, mangiphiwe ukuphila kwami ngesicelo sami nokwesizwe sakithi ngokufuna kwami, 
17_7_4_ngokuba kuthengisiwe ngathi, mina nesizwe sakithi, ukuba sichithwe, sibulawe, sibhubhe. Uma bekuthengisiwe ngathi sibe yizigqila nezigqilakazi kuphela, ngabe ngithulile, ngokuba usizi lwethu alwanele ukuba sisinde inkosi.” 
17_7_5_Yayisisho inkosi u-Ahashiveroshi, ithi ku-Esteri inkosikazi: “Ngubani lo, uphi yena onesibindi sokwenza lokho na?” 
17_7_6_U-Esteri wathi: “Ngumuntu omelene nathi, oyisitha, uHamani lo omubi.” UHamani wayeseshaywa luvalo phambi kwenkosi nenkosikazi. 
17_7_7_Yayisisukuma inkosi ngolaka lwayo edilini lewayini, yaya ensimini yendlu yenkosi; uHamani wasukuma ukunxusa u-Esteri inkosikazi ngokuphila kwakhe, ngokuba wabona ukuthi usenqunyelwe okubi yinkosi. 
17_7_8_Inkosi isibuya ensimini yendlu yenkosi, ingene endlini yedili lewayini, uHamani wayesewele embhedeni u-Esteri ayekuwo. Yayisithi inkosi: “Uyakuyiphoqa inkosikazi phambi kwami lapha endlini na?” Lapho liphuma leli zwi emlonyeni wenkosi, bamboza ubuso bukaHamani. 
17_7_9_Wayesethi uHaribona, enye yezinduna ezaziphambi kwenkosi: “Bheka, umuthi okuphakama kwawo kuyizingalo ezingamashumi ayisihlanu, uHamani ayewenzele uMoridekayi owakhuluma kahle ngenkosi, umi endlini kaHamani.” Inkosi yathi: “Mphanyekeni kuwo.” 
17_7_10_Base bemphanyeka-ke uHamani emthini ayewulungisele uMoridekayi. Yayisibohla intukuthelo yenkosi. 
17_8_1_Ngalolo suku inkosi u-Ahashiveroshi yanika u-Esteri, inkosikazi, indlu kaHamani isitha sabaJuda. UMoridekayi weza phambi kwenkosi, ngokuba u-Esteri wayeselandile ukuthi uyini naye. 
17_8_2_Inkosi yakhumula indandatho yayo ebiyisusile kuHamani, yayinika uMoridekayi. U-Esteri wambeka uMoridekayi phezu kwendlu kaHamani. 
17_8_3_U-Esteri waqhubeka wakhuluma phambi kwenkosi, wawa ngasezinyaweni zayo, wakhala, wayinxusa ukuba ibususe ububi bukaHamani umAgagi necebo lakhe ayelicebe ngabaJuda. 
17_8_4_Inkosi yamelulela u-Esteri intonga yegolide. Wayesesukuma u-Esteri, wema phambi kwenkosi. 
17_8_5_Wathi: “Uma kukuhle enkosini, noma ngifumene umusa phambi kwayo, noma le nto ilungile phambi kwenkosi, uma ngithandeka emehlweni ayo, makulotshwe ukuba zibuyiswe izincwadi zamacebo kaHamani indodana kaHamedatha umAgagi azilobayo ukuba bachithwe abaJuda abasezifundeni zenkosi; 
17_8_6_ngokuba ngingakubuka kanjani okubi okuyakufica isizwe sakithi, noma ngingakubuka kanjani ukuchithwa kwezihlobo zami na?” 
17_8_7_Inkosi u-Ahashiveroshi yathi ku-Esteri, inkosikazi, nakuMoridekayi, umJuda: “Bhekani, nginike u-Esteri indlu kaHamani; yena bamphanyekile emthini, ngokuba wabeka isandla sakhe kubaJuda. 
17_8_8_Kepha lobani nani ngabaJuda njengokuhle emehlweni enu egameni lenkosi, nikunamathelise ngendandatho yenkosi, ngokuba umbhalo obhalwe egameni lenkosi wanamatheliswa ngendandatho yenkosi awunakubuyiswa muntu.” 
17_8_9_Abalobi benkosi babizwa ngaleso sikhathi ngenyanga yesithathu, eyinyanga kaSivani, ngolwamashumi amabili nantathu lwayo; kwalotshwa njengakho konke uMoridekayi ayala ngakho abaJuda, nawothulasizwe, nababusi, nezikhulu zezifunda, kusukela e-Indiya kuze kufike eKushe, izifunda eziyikhulu namashumi amabili nesikhombisa, izifunda ngezifunda njengokubhala kwazo, nezizwe ngezizwe njengolimi lwazo, nabaJuda njengokubhala kwabo nanjengolimi lwabo. 
17_8_10_Waloba egameni lenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi, wakunamathelisa ngendandatho yenkosi, wazithuma izincwadi ngesandla sezigijimi zamahhashi, zigibela amahhashi anejubane, amahhashi enkosi akhethekileyo, 
17_8_11_inkosi eyavumela ngakho abaJuda ababesemizini ngemizi ukuba babuthane, bamele ukuphila kwabo, bachithe, babulale, babhubhise onke amabutho abantu nawesifunda abahlaselayo, izingane nabesifazane, impahla yabo ibe yimpango, 
17_8_12_ngosuku oluthile ezifundeni zonke zenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi, ngolweshumi nantathu lwenyanga yeshumi nambili eyinyanga ka-Adari. 
17_8_13_Impinda yokulotshiweyo yanikwa ukuba ibe yisimemezelo ezifundeni zonke, kumenyezelwe kubantu bonke ukuba abaJuda bazilungiselele lolo suku, baziphindisele ezitheni zabo. 
17_8_14_Zase ziphuma izigijimi zigibele amahhashi anejubane, amahhashi enkosi, zisheshiswa ziqhutshwa yizwi lenkosi; umthetho washaywa eShushani endlini yenkosi. 
17_8_15_Wayesephuma uMoridekayi ebusweni benkosi embethe isambatho sobukhosi esiluhlaza nesimhlophe, enomqhele omkhulu wegolide nengubo yelineni elicolekileyo nebubende; umuzi waseShushani wajabula, wathokoza. 
17_8_16_AbaJuda base benakho ukukhanya, nokuthokoza, nokujabula, nodumo. 
17_8_17_Ezifundeni zonke nasemizini yonke lapho kufika khona izwi lenkosi nomthetho wayo, abaJuda babe nokuthokoza nokujabula, nedili, nosuku oluhle. Abezizwe abaningi baphenduka abaJuda, ngokuba babehlelwe yingebhe ngabaJuda. 
17_9_1_Ngenyanga yeshumi nambili eyinyanga ka-Adari ngosuku lweshumi nantathu lwayo, lapho kusondela izwi lenkosi nomthetho wayo ukuba kwenziwe, ngosuku izitha zabaJuda ezazethembile ngalo ukubusa phezu kwabo nokho kwaguqulwa ukuze abaJuda babuse phezu kwababazondayo. 
17_9_2_AbaJuda babuthana emizini yabo ezifundeni zonke zenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi ukuba babeke izandla kulabo ababefuna ukubalimaza; akubangakho ongamelana nabo, ngokuba abantu bonke babehlelwe yingebhe ngabo. 
17_9_3_Zonke izikhulu zezifunda, nawothulasizwe, nababusi, nabenza umsebenzi wenkosi, babasiza abaJuda, ngokuba babehlelwe yingebhe ngoMoridekayi. 
17_9_4_Ngokuba uMoridekayi wayemkhulu endlini yenkosi, nodumo lwakhe lwahamba ezifundeni zonke, ngokuba lowo muntu uMoridekayi wayelokhu ekhula njalo. 
17_9_5_AbaJuda baceka zonke izitha zabo ngokuceka kwenkemba, nangokubulala, nangokuchitha, benza kwababazondayo njengokuthanda kwabo. 
17_9_6_EShushani endlini yenkosi abaJuda babulala, bachitha abantu abangamakhulu ayisihlanu. 
17_9_7_Babulala noParishanidatha, noDalifoni, no-Asiphatha, 
17_9_8_noPhoratha, no-Adaliya, no-Aridatha, 
17_9_9_noPharimashita, no-Arisayi, no-Aridayi, noVayizatha, 
17_9_10_amadodana ayishumi kaHamani indodana kaHamedatha, isitha sabaJuda, kepha ababekanga izandla zabo empangweni. 
17_9_11_Ngalolo suku inani lababuleweyo eShushani endlini yenkosi lalethwa phambi kwenkosi. 
17_9_12_Inkosi yayisithi ku-Esteri inkosikazi: “AbaJuda babulele bachitha abantu abangamakhulu ayisihlanu eShushani endlini yenkosi namadodana ayishumi kaHamani; pho, benzeni kwezinye izifunda zenkosi? Isicelo sakho siyini? Uyakusenzelwa. Yini oyifunayo na? Kuyakwenziwa.” 
17_9_13_U-Esteri wathi: “Uma kukuhle enkosini, abaJuda abaseShushani mabavunyelwe nakusasa ukwenza njengomthetho wanamuhla, aphanyekwe amadodana ayishumi kaHamani emthini.” 
17_9_14_Inkosi yasho ukuba kwenziwe kanjalo; umthetho washaywa eShushani; bawaphanyeka amadodana ayishumi kaHamani. 
17_9_15_AbaJuda ababe seShushani babuthana nangosuku lweshumi nane lwenyanga ka-Adari, babulala abantu abangamakhulu amathathu eShushani, kepha ababekanga izandla zabo empangweni. 
17_9_16_Abanye abaJuda ababe sezifundeni zenkosi babuthana, bamela ukuphila kwabo, baphumula ezitheni zabo, babulala abayizinkulungwane ezingamashumi ayisikhombisa nanhlanu ababazondayo, kepha ababekanga izandla zabo empangweni. 
17_9_17_Lokho kwakungosuku lweshumi nantathu lwenyanga ka-Adari; ngosuku lweshumi nane lwayo baphumula, balwenza lwaba lusuku lwedili nolokuthokoza. 
17_9_18_Kepha abaJuda ababe seShushani babuthana ngolweshumi nantathu lwayo nangolweshumi nane lwayo; ngolweshumi nanhlanu lwayo baphumula, balwenza lwaba lusuku lwedili nolokuthokoza. 
17_9_19_Ngalokho abaJuda basemaphandleni ababehlezi emizaneni engabiyelwe benza usuku lweshumi nane lwenyanga ka-Adari lube ngolokuthokoza nolwedili nosuku oluhle nolokuthumelana izipho omunye komunye. 
17_9_20_UMoridekayi waziloba lezo zindaba, wathuma izincwadi kubo bonke abaJuda ababe sezifundeni zonke zenkosi u-Ahashiveroshi, abaseduze nabakude, 
17_9_21_ukumisa ukuba bagcine usuku lweshumi nane lwenyanga ka-Adari nosuku lweshumi nanhlanu lwayo iminyaka yonke 
17_9_22_njengezinsuku abaJuda abathola ngazo ukuphumula ezitheni zabo nenyanga eyaguqulwa kubo osizini yaba ngeyokuthokoza nasekulileni kwaba lusuku oluhle, bazenze zibe yizinsuku zedili nezokuthokoza nezokuthumelana izipho omunye komunye, kanye nezipho kwabampofu. 
17_9_23_AbaJuda bakwamukela ukwenza lokho abakuqalileyo, nalokho ayekulobe kubo uMoridekayi, 
17_9_24_ngokuba uHamani indodana kaHamedatha umAgagi, isitha sabo bonke abaJuda, wayecebile ngabaJuda ukuba abachithe, waphonsa iPhure elinyinkatho ukuba abanqobe, abachithe; 
17_9_25_kepha lapho lokho kwafika phambi kwenkosi, yasho ngencwadi ukuba lelo cebo elibi ayelicebe ngabaJuda libuyele ekhanda lakhe, yena namadodana akhe baphanyekwe emthini. 
17_9_26_Ngalokho babiza lezo zinsuku ngokuthi iPhurimi ngegama lePhure. Ngalokho ngenxa yawo onke amazwi aleyo ncwadi, nangenxa yalokho abebekubonile ngale ndaba, nalokho okubehleleyo, 
17_9_27_abaJuda banquma bamukela, bona nenzalo yabo, nabo bonke ababezihlanganisa nabo, ukuthi bayakugcina lezo zinsuku zombili njengokubhalwa kwazo nanjengesikhathi sazo esinqunyiweyo iminyaka yonke, bangaphuthi, 
17_9_28_zikhunjulwe lezo zinsuku, zigcinwe ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane, emindenini ngemindeni, ezifundeni ngezifunda, emizini ngemizi, lezo zinsuku zePhurimi, zingaphuthi phakathi kwabaJuda, nesikhumbuzo sazo singapheli enzalweni yabo. 
17_9_29_U-Esteri inkosikazi, indodakazi ka-Abihayili, noMoridekayi umJuda base beloba ngamandla onke ukuba baqinise le ncwadi yesibili yePhurimi. 
17_9_30_Wathuma izincwadi kubo bonke abaJuda ezifundeni eziyikhulu namashumi amabili nesikhombisa zombuso ka-Ahashiveroshi, zinamazwi okuthula neqiniso, 
17_9_31_ukuba aqinise lezo zinsuku zePhurimi ngezikhathi zazo ezinqunyiweyo njengokuzimisa kukaMoridekayi umJuda no-Esteri inkosikazi, nanjengalokho bezimisele bona nenzalo yabo ngendaba yokuzila ukudla nokukhala kwabo. 
17_9_32_Izwi lika-Esteri laqinisa lezo zindaba zePhurimi, kwalotshwa encwadini. 
17_10_1_Inkosi u-Ahashiveroshi yathelisa izwe neziqhingi zolwandle. 
17_10_2_Zonke izenzo zegunya lakhe namandla akhe, nayo yonke indaba yobukhulu bukaMoridekayi inkosi eyayimkhulisela kubo angithi kulotshiwe encwadini yezindaba zemihla ngemihla yamakhosi aseMediya nasePheresiya na? 
17_10_3_Ngokuba uMoridekayi, umJuda, wayelama inkosi u-Ahashiveroshi ngobukhulu, emkhulu phakathi kwabaJuda, ethokozelwa ngabafowabo abaningi, efuna okuhle kwesizwe sakubo, ekhuluma ukuthula kuyo yonke inzalo yabo. 
18_1_1_Kwakukhona umuntu ezweni lase-Uzi ogama lakhe lalinguJobe; lowo muntu wayengenasici elungile, wayemesaba uNkulunkulu, wabalekela okubi. 
18_1_2_Wazala amadodana ayisikhombisa namadodakazi amathathu. 
18_1_3_Impahla yakhe yayiyizimvu eziyizinkulungwane eziyisikhombisa, namakamela ayizinkulungwane ezintathu, namabhangqa angamakhulu ayisihlanu ezinkabi, nezimbongolo zezinsikazi ezingamakhulu ayisihlanu, nezinceku eziningi kakhulu; wayemkhulu lowo muntu kunabo bonke abantu basempumalanga. 
18_1_4_Amadodana akhe ayehamba enza idili endlini yaleyo naleyo ngosuku lwayo; ayesethuma ebiza odadewabo abathathu ukuba badle, baphuze nawo. 
18_1_5_Kwathi lapho seziphelile izinsuku zedili lawo, uJobe wathuma wawangcwelisa, wavuka ekuseni, wanikela ngeminikelo yokushiswa njengomumo wawo onke; ngokuba uJobe wathi: “Mhlawumbe amadodana ami onile, amthukile uNkulunkulu ezinhliziyweni zawo.” Wenze njalo uJobe imihla yonke. 
18_1_6_Kwathi ngelinye ilanga kwafika amadodana kaNkulunkulu ema phambi kukaJehova, kwafika noSathane phakathi kwawo. 
18_1_7_UJehova wayesethi kuSathane: “Uvelaphi na?” USathane wamphendula uJehova, wathi: “Ekuzuleni emhlabeni nasekuhambahambeni kuwo.” 
18_1_8_Wayesethi uJehova kuSathane: “Inhliziyo yakho iyiqaphele inceku yami uJobe na? Ngokuba akakho onjengaye emhlabeni, umuntu ongenasici nolungileyo, omesaba uNkulunkulu, obalekela okubi.” 
18_1_9_USathane wamphendula uJehova, wathi: “UJobe uyamesaba uNkulunkulu ngeze na? 
18_1_10_Wena awumbiyelanga yini yena nendlu yakhe nakho konke okwakhe nxazonke, wabusisa umsebenzi wezandla zakhe na? Impahla yakhe yandile emhlabeni. 
18_1_11_Kepha ake welule isandla sakho, uthinte konke anakho, impela uyakukuthuka ebusweni bakho.” 
18_1_12_Wathi uJehova kuSathane: “Bheka, konke anakho kusesandleni sakho; kuphela kuyena uqobo ungabeki isandla sakho.” Wayesephuma uSathane ebusweni bukaJehova. 
18_1_13_Kwathi ngolunye usuku lapho amadodana akhe namadodakazi akhe edla, ephuza iwayini endlini yomfowabo oyizibulo, 
18_1_14_kwafika isithunywa kuJobe, sathi: “Izinkabi bezilima, izimbongolo ziklabile eceleni kwazo, 
18_1_15_lapho amaSheba etheleka, azithatha; izinceku azibulele ngosiko lwenkemba; mina ngedwa kuphela ngisindile, ukuze ngikubikele.” 
18_1_16_Esakhuluma lowo, kwafika nomunye, wathi: “Umlilo kaNkulunkulu uwile ezulwini, washisa izimvu nezinceku, waziqeda; mina ngedwa kuphela ngisindile, ukuze ngikubikele.” 
18_1_17_Esakhuluma lowo, kwafika nomunye, wathi: “AmaKaledi enza amaviyo amathathu, ahlasela amakamela, awathatha, azibulala izinceku ngosiko lwenkemba; mina ngedwa kuphela ngisindile, ukuze ngikubikele.” 
18_1_18_Esakhuluma lowo, kwafika nomunye, wathi: “Amadodana akho namadodakazi akho ayedla, ephuza iwayini endlini yomfowabo oyizibulo; 
18_1_19_bheka, kwafika, kwadabula ihlane umoya omkhulu, washaya amagumbi omane endlu, yawa phezu kwezinsizwa, zafa; mina ngedwa kuphela ngisindile, ukuze ngikubikele.” 
18_1_20_Wayesesukuma uJobe, waklebhula ingubo yakhe, waphucula ikhanda lakhe, wawela emhlabathini, wakhuleka, 
18_1_21_wathi: “Ngaphuma ngize esizalweni sikamame; ngiyakubuyela khona ngize; uJehova wapha, uJehova uthathile; malibongwe igama likaJehova.” 
18_1_22_Kukho konke lokho uJobe akonanga, akamthelanga uNkulunkulu okubi. 
18_2_1_Kwathi futhi ngelinye ilanga afika amadodana kaNkulunkulu, ema phambi kukaJehova; noSathane wafika phakathi kwawo ukuba eme phambi kukaJehova. 
18_2_2_UJehova wathi kuSathane: “Uvelaphi na?” USathane wamphendula uJehova, wathi: “Ekuzuleni emhlabeni nasekuhambahambeni kuwo.” 
18_2_3_Wayesethi uJehova kuSathane: “Inhliziyo yakho iyiqaphele inceku yami uJobe na? Ngokuba akakho onjengaye emhlabeni, umuntu ongenasici nolungileyo, omesaba uNkulunkulu, obalekela okubi; usabambelela ekupheleleni kwakhe, noma ungivusele ukumchitha engenacala.” 
18_2_4_USathane wamphendula uJehova, wathi: “Isikhumba ngesikhumba, yebo, konke umuntu anakho uyakunika ngokuphila kwakhe. 
18_2_5_Kepha ake welule isandla sakho, uthinte amathambo akhe nenyama yakhe, impela uyakukuthuka ebusweni bakho.” 
18_2_6_UJehova wayesethi kuSathane: “Bheka, usesandleni sakho; gcina ukuphila kwakhe kodwa.” 
18_2_7_Wayesephuma uSathane ebusweni bukaJehova, wamshaya uJobe ngamathumba amabi, kusukela ematheni onyawo kuze kufike okhakhayini. 
18_2_8_Wathatha udengezi ukuzozenwaya ngalo; wayehlezi phakathi komlotha. 
18_2_9_Wayesethi umkakhe kuye: “Usabambelela ekupheleleni kwakho na? Thuka uNkulunkulu, ufe.” 
18_2_10_Kepha wathi kuye: “Ukhuluma njengalokhu owesifazane oyisiwula ekhuluma. Siyakwamukela okuhle kuphela kuNkulunkulu, singamukeli nokubi, na?” Kukho konke lokho uJobe akonanga ngomlomo wakhe. 
18_2_11_Lapho abangane abathathu bakaJobe sebezwe ngakho konke lokho okubi okumehleleyo, bafika kuye bevela, kwaba yilowo nalowo endaweni yakhe: ngu-Elifazi umThemani, noBilidadi umShuhi, noSofari umNahama; bavumelana ukuba baye bamkhalele, bamduduze. 
18_2_12_Lapho bephakamisa amehlo abo besekude, abamazanga; badazuluka bakhala, baklebhula, kwaba yilowo nalowo ingubo yakhe, bafafaza amakhanda abo ngothuli beluphonsa phezulu. 
18_2_13_Bahlala phansi naye emhlabathini izinsuku eziyisikhombisa nobusuku obuyisikhombisa, akukhulumanga muntu kuye, ngokuba babona ukuthi usizi lwakhe lwalulukhulu kakhulu. 
18_3_1_Emva kwalokho uJobe wavula umlomo wakhe, waqalekisa usuku lwakhe. 
18_3_2_UJobe wathatha wathi: 
18_3_3_“Makubhubhe usuku engazalwa ngalo, nobusuku obathi: ‘Ukhulelwe umntwana wesilisa.’ 
18_3_4_Lolo suku malube ngubumnyama; uNkulunkulu makangalunaki ephezulu, ukukhanya makungakhanyiswa kulo. 
18_3_5_Ubumnyama nethunzi lokufa maluphiwe khona, kuhlale ifu phezu kwalo; okwenza mnyama usuku makulwesabise. 
18_3_6_Ubusuku lobo isigayegaye masibubambe; mabungajabuli phakathi kwezinsuku zomnyaka, bungangeni phakathi komumo wezinyanga. 
18_3_7_Bheka, lobo busuku mabungabi nalutho, kungangeni ukujabula kubo. 
18_3_8_Mababuqalekise abathuka amalanga, abalungele ukuvusa uLeviyathani. 
18_3_9_Izinkanyezi zokuhwelela kwabo maziphenduke ubumnyama; mabulinde ukukhanya kungabikho, bungaboni izinkophe zokusa, 
18_3_10_ngokuba abuvalanga izivalo zesizalo sikamame, abufihlanga ukuhlupheka emehlweni ami. 
18_3_11_“Angifanga ngani esizalweni na? Angibhubhanga ngani ekuphumeni kwami esiswini na? 
18_3_12_Amadolo angamukeleleni, namabele ukuba ngincele, na? 
18_3_13_Ngokuba kalokhu ngakube ngilele, ngithule; khona ngakube ngilele ubuthongo nginokuphumula 
18_3_14_kanye namakhosi nabeluleki bomhlaba abazakhela izinqaba zamathuna, 
18_3_15_noma kanye nezikhulu ezinegolide ezazigcwalisa izindlu zazo ngesiliva, 
18_3_16_noma ngangingekho njengokuphuphumileyo okuthukusiweyo, njengezingane ezingazange zibone ukukhanya. 
18_3_17_Lapho amashinga ayekile ukudlova; lapho baphumule abaphelile amandla. 
18_3_18_Lapho iziboshwa ziyatabhaya kanyekanye; azizwa izwi labazicindezelayo. 
18_3_19_Lapho nabancane nabakhulu bayafanana; isigqila sikhululekile enkosini yaso. 
18_3_20_“Odiniweyo unikelwani ukukhanya nabanomunyu emphefumulweni ukuphila; 
18_3_21_abalinda ukufa kungafiki, abakumba kunengcebo; 
18_3_22_abathokoza baze bethabe, bajabule, uma belithola ithuna, 
18_3_23_nomuntu ondlela yakhe isithekile, uNkulunkulu ambiyeleyo nxazonke zakhe, na? 
18_3_24_Ukugquma kwami kufika phambi kwesinkwa sami, nokububula kwami kuthululwa njengamanzi, 
18_3_25_ngokuba engikwesabayo sekuyangifikela, nenginovalo ngakho sekuyangehlela. 
18_3_26_Anginakuthula, angizolile, anginakuphumula; kepha ukuyaluza kuyafika.” 
18_4_1_Wayesethatha u-Elifazi, umThemani, wathi: 
18_4_2_“Uma kulingwa ukukhulunywa kuwe, uyakukhathazeka na? Kepha ngubani ongazibamba, angakhulumi, na? 
18_4_3_Bheka, uqondisile abaningi; uqinisile izandla ezibuthakathaka. 
18_4_4_Amazwi akho amisile okhubekayo; usimamisile amadolo athuthumelayo. 
18_4_5_“Kepha sekufikile kuwe, uyakhathazeka; kuyakuthinta wena, uyashaywa luvalo. 
18_4_6_Ukumesaba kwakho uNkulunkulu akusilo ithemba lakho yini, nokuphelela kwezindlela zakho akusiso isisekelo sakho na? 
18_4_7_Ake ukhumbule ukuthi ngubani owake wachithwa engenacala na? Babhujiswaphi abalungileyo na? 
18_4_8_Njengokubona kwami abalima okubi bahlwanyele ukona, bayakuvuna. 
18_4_9_Babhubha ngokuphephetha kukaNkulunkulu; ngomoya wentukuthelo yakhe bayaphela. 
18_4_10_Ukubhonga kwengonyama nezwi lebhubesi kuyaphela, namazinyo amabhongo ayaphuka. 
18_4_11_Ibhubesi elinamandla liyabhubha ngokuswela impango; amawundlu ebhubesikazi ayahlakazeka. 
18_4_12_“Kwanyenyiselwa kimi izwi, indlebe yami yabamba ukunyenyezwa kwalo. 
18_4_13_Ngokudlala kwemicabango ivuswe yimibono yasebusuku, lapho abantu sebehlelwe ngubuthongo obunzima, 
18_4_14_ngafikelwa yingebhe nokuthuthumela okwaqhaqhazelisa onke amathambo ami. 
18_4_15_Kwadlula umoya ebusweni bami; uboya bomzimba wami bavuka. 
18_4_16_Kwema okuthile, kepha angaqonda ukubonakala kwakho; isimo sasiphambi kwamehlo ami; kwathula; ngase ngizwa izwi, lathi: 
18_4_17_‘Umuntu ulungile kunoNkulunkulu na? Umuntukazana uhlambulukile kunoMenzi na? 
18_4_18_Bheka, nasezincekwini zakhe akethembi, nezingelosi zakhe uyazibeka icala; 
18_4_19_kakhulu kangakanani abahlezi ezindlini zodaka, abazisekelo zabo zisothulini, abachotshozwa njengenundu. 
18_4_20_Bagxotshwa kusukela ekuseni kuze kube kusihlwa; babhubha kuze kube phakade benganakwa muntu. 
18_4_21_Intambo yetende labo ayisishulwa yini phakathi kwabo, bafe bengazelele, na?’ 
18_5_1_“Ake umemeze; ukhona okuphendulayo na? Uyakuphendukela kumuphi kwabangcwele na? 
18_5_2_Ngokuba isiwula siyabulawa ngukukhathazeka, nomhawu uyachitha oyisiphukuphuku. 
18_5_3_Mina ngibonile isiwula sigxilile, kepha ngaqalekisa indlu yaso ngokuzumayo. 
18_5_4_Abantwana baso bakude nokusindiswa, bachotshozwa esangweni; akakho obophulayo, 
18_5_5_abakuvuna kwabo kudliwa ngabalambileyo, bakukhipha nasemeveni; abanxanelayo basezela impahla yabo. 
18_5_6_Ngokuba usizi aluveli othulini, nokuhlupheka akuphumi emhlabathini, 
18_5_7_ngokuba umuntu uzalelwa ukuhlupheka, njengokuba izinhlansi ziqhashela phezulu. 
18_5_8_“Kodwa mina bengiyakumfuna uNkulunkulu; kuNkulunkulu bengiyakubeka indaba yami, 
18_5_9_yena owenza izinto ezinkulu ezingaphenyekiyo, izimangaliso ezingenakubalwa, 
18_5_10_yena onisa imvula emhlabeni, athume amanzi ebusweni bamasimu, 
18_5_11_ukuze aphakamise abayizimpofana nabadabukileyo baphakanyiselwe ukusindiswa. 
18_5_12_Uyachitha amacebo abanobuqili, ukuze izandla zabo zingabi nakufeza umgomo wabo. 
18_5_13_Uyabamba abahlakaniphileyo ebuqilini babo; isiluleko soyisigwegwe siyachithwa ngokuphuthuma. 
18_5_14_Emini bahlangana nobumnyama, baphumputha emini njengasebusuku. 
18_5_15_Uyasindisa enkembeni yemilomo yabo, yebo, abampofu esandleni sonamandla. 
18_5_16_Ompofu usenethemba; ububi buvala umlomo wabo. 
18_5_17_“Bheka, ubusisiwe lowo muntu uNkulunkulu amlayayo; ngalokho ungadeleli ukukhuzwa nguSomandla. 
18_5_18_Ngokuba uma ezwisa ubuhlungu, ubuye abophe; uyalimaza, kepha izandla zakhe zibuye zelaphe. 
18_5_19_Uyakophula ezinhluphekweni eziyisithupha; yebo, nakweziyisikhombisa awuyikuthintwa ngokubi. 
18_5_20_Endlaleni uyakukuhlenga ekufeni nasempini emandleni enkemba. 
18_5_21_Uyakufihlwa enkalivasini yolimi; awuyikwesaba lapho kufika ukuchitha. 
18_5_22_Uyakuhleka incithakalo nendlala, nezilo zomhlaba awuyikuzesaba. 
18_5_23_Ngokuba unesivumelwano namatshe asendle; izilo zasendle zihlalisana kahle nawe. 
18_5_24_Uyakwazi ukuthi itende lakho linokuthula; uyakuhambela indlu yakho, awuyikusilalelwa lutho. 
18_5_25_Uyakwazi ukuthi inzalo yakho iyakuba nkulu, abantwana bakho babe njengotshani bomhlaba. 
18_5_26_Uyakufika ethuneni usuthi ngobudala njengeqhinqa lamabele ngesikhathi salo. 
18_5_27_Bheka, lokho sikuphenyile; kunjalo; kuzwe, uzazele khona.” 
18_6_1_Wayesephendula uJobe ethi: 
18_6_2_“Sengathi ukuncokolozwa kwami ngabe kulinganiswe nokulinganiswa, inhlupheko yami ibekwe esilinganisweni kanyekanye. 
18_6_3_Ngokuba manje iyasinda kunesihlabathi solwandle; ngalokho amazwi ami ayengukubheda. 
18_6_4_Ngokuba imicibisholo kaSomandla ikimi; isihlungu sayo siphuzwa ngumoya wami; izesabiso zikaNkulunkulu ziyangehlela. 
18_6_5_Imbongolo yasendle iyakhala yini inotshani na? Inkabi iyakhonya isekudleni kwayo na? 
18_6_6_Okudumayo kungadliwa ngaphandle kukasawoti na? Kukhona ukuklwabusa kokumhlophe kweqanda na? 
18_6_7_Umphefumulo wami uyala ukukuthinta, kungukudla okunengekayo kimi. 
18_6_8_“Sengathi isicelo sami singenziwa, uNkulunkulu angiphe lokhu engikubhekayo. 
18_6_9_Yebo, sengathi uNkulunkulu angangichoboza, athukulule isandla sakhe, anginqume. 
18_6_10_Lokho ngakube kuhlale kube yinduduzo yami, yebo, ngabe ngijabule ebuhlungwini obungahawukeliyo ukuthi angigodlanga amazwi oNgcwele. 
18_6_11_Ayini amandla ami ukuba ngingaze ngethembe na? Ukuphela kwami kuyini ukuba ngingaze ngibekezele na? 
18_6_12_Pho, amandla ami angamandla amatshe yini? Inyama yami iyithusi na? 
18_6_13_Akusikho yini ukuthi alukho usizo kimi; ukusindiswa kususwa kimi. 
18_6_14_“Odangeleyo nga ehawukelwa ngumngane wakhe; kepha ukumesaba uSomandla kuyayekwa. 
18_6_15_Abafowethu bambuluzile njengomfula, njengemithonjana yemifula eshayo, 
18_6_16_emnyama ngeqhwa, lapho ungqoqwane ezisitheza khona, 
18_6_17_kepha ngesikhathi sokufudumala inyamalale, ishe endaweni yayo, lapho libalele. 
18_6_18_Abahamba ngezindlela zayo bayaphambuka, benyukela oqwathuleni, babhubhe. 
18_6_19_Izihambi zakwaThema zabheka; izindwendwe zakwaSheba zazihlalela. 
18_6_20_Zajabha, ngokuba zazibhekile; sezifike khona zadana. 
18_6_21_Ngokuba kalokhu seniyize nje; nibona okwesabisayo niyesaba. 
18_6_22_Ngasho yini ukuthi: ‘Ngipheni, ninginike isipho empahleni yenu,’ na? 
18_6_23_noma: ‘Ngikhululeni esandleni sesitha, ningihlenge esandleni sezidlova,’ na? 
18_6_24_“Ngifundiseni, khona ngiyakuthula mina, ningiqondise lapho ngiduke khona. 
18_6_25_Ukukhuluma okuqotho kunamandla, kepha ukusolwa nokusolwa yinina kusizani na? 
18_6_26_Nicabanga yini ukusola amazwi, lokhu ukukhuluma kophelelwa ithemba kungumoya nje na? 
18_6_27_Yebo, nenza inkatho ngentandane, nithengisa ngomngane wenu. 
18_6_28_Manje, qalani ukungibuka; kuyakuba sobala, uma ngiqamba amanga. 
18_6_29_Ake niphenduke, kungabikho ukungalungi, nibuye niphenduke; indaba yami ilungile. 
18_6_30_Kukhona ukungalungi olimini lwami yini, ulwanga lwami alunakuqonda okubi na? 
18_7_1_“Umuntu akasempini yini emhlabeni, imihla yakhe ayinjengemihla yomqashwa na? 
18_7_2_Njengenceku ekhefuzelela ithunzi, nanjengomqashwa obheka umvuzo wakhe, 
18_7_3_kanjalo ngithole ifa lezinyanga zokubi; ngimiselwe ubusuku bezinhlupheko. 
18_7_4_Lapho ngilala phansi, ngisho ngithi: ‘Ngingavuka nini,’ ngokuba ubusuku bude; ngigcwele ukubinyabinyeka kuze kuse. 
18_7_5_Inyama yami yembesiwe izimpethu namagade othuli; isikhumba sami siyaphola, sibuye sibhicike. 
18_7_6_“Imihla yami iyashesha kunesaluko, iphela ingenathemba. 
18_7_7_Khumbula ukuthi ukuphila kwami kungumoya; iso lami aliyikubuye libone okuhle. 
18_7_8_Iso longibonayo alisayikungibuka; amehlo akho esekimi, angisekho. 
18_7_9_Ifu liphela lihamba; kanjalo owehlele endaweni yabafileyo akasayikukhuphuka. 
18_7_10_Kasayikubuyela endlini yakhe; indawo yakhe ayisayikumazi. 
18_7_11_“Ngalokho nami angiyikubamba umlomo wami; ngiyakukhuluma osizini lomoya wami, ngikhale ngomunyu womphefumulo wami. 
18_7_12_Ngilulwandle yini, ngingumkhomo yini, ukuze ungibekele abalindi? 
18_7_13_Lapho ngithi umbhede wami uyakungiduduza, ukhukho lwami lungithwalise ukukhala kwami, 
18_7_14_uyangesabisa ngamaphupho, ungethusa ngemibono, 
18_7_15_ukuze umphefumulo wami ukhethe ukuklinywa nokufa kunalawa mathambo ami. 
18_7_16_Ngiyanengwa yiwo; mangingahlali njalo; ngiyeke, ngokuba imihla yami iyize. 
18_7_17_Uyini umuntu ukuba umkhulise, nokuba ubeke inhliziyo yakho kuye, 
18_7_18_nokuba umhambele ekuseni njalo, umhlole njalonjalo, na? 
18_7_19_Koze kube nini uyeka ukungibheka na? Ngiyeke, ngize ngiminze amathe ami. 
18_7_20_Noma ngonile, ngenzeni kuwe mlindi wabantu na? Ungimiseleni ngibe yisigcibisholo sakho, ngize ngibe ngumthwalo nakimi, na? 
18_7_21_Awuthetheleli ngani isiphambeko sami, ususe isono sami, na? Ngokuba manje ngiyakulala phansi othulini; uyakungifunisisa, kepha angiyikubakho.” 
18_8_1_Wayesethatha uBilidadi umShuhi, wathi: 
18_8_2_“Koze kube nini ukhuluma lezi zinto, amazwi akho abe ngumoya onamandla, na? 
18_8_3_UNkulunkulu uhlanekezela ukwahlulela yini? USomandla uphendukezela ukulunga na? 
18_8_4_Uma abantwana bakho bonile kuye, yena wabanikela emandleni ezono zabo, 
18_8_5_khona, uma wena ufunisisa uNkulunkulu, unxuse kuye uSomandla, 
18_8_6_uma uhlambulukile, futhi ulungile, khona yena uyakuvuka ngenxa yakho, aphumelelise ikhaya lokulunga kwakho. 
18_8_7_Ukuqala kwakho sekuyakuba ngokuncane, nokugcina kwakho kube ngokukhulu kakhulu. 
18_8_8_Ake ubuze ezizukulwaneni zakuqala, uzibhekise lokho abakuphenyileyo oyise bazo, 
18_8_9_ngokuba thina singabezolo nje, asinalwazi, lokhu imihla yethu emhlabeni iyithunzi; 
18_8_10_bona abayikukufundisa yini, bakutshele, bakhiphe amazwi ezinhliziyweni zabo, na? 
18_8_11_Umhlanga ungahluma lapho kungekho xhaphozi na? Incema ingamila kungekho manzi na? 
18_8_12_Uma iseluhlaza, ingakakhiwa, iyabuna phambi kwabo bonke utshani. 
18_8_13_“Zinjalo izindlela zabo bonke abakhohlwa uNkulunkulu: ithemba longenaNkulunkulu liyakuchitheka; 
18_8_14_ithemba lakhe liyakunqunywa, nesisekelo sakhe siyindlu yolwembu. 
18_8_15_Uyakwencika endlini yakhe, kepha ayiyikuma; uyakubambelela kuyo, kepha ayiyikuqina. 
18_8_16_Yena uluhlaza phambi kwelanga; imixhantela yakhe iyaxhantela ensimini yakhe. 
18_8_17_Izimpande zakhe ziyathandela enqwabeni yamatshe, aqhekeze indawo yamatshe. 
18_8_18_Uma echithwa endaweni yakhe, iyakumala ngokuthi: ‘Angizange ngikubone.’ 
18_8_19_Bheka, injalo indlela yokuthokoza kwakhe; kuyakuvela abanye othulini. 
18_8_20_“UNkulunkulu akamlahli opheleleyo, kabambi isandla sababi, 
18_8_21_aze agcwalise umlomo wakho ngokuhleka, nezindebe zakho ngokumemeza. 
18_8_22_Abakuzondayo bayakwembeswa amahloni; itende lababi aliyobe lisabakho.” 
18_9_1_Wayesephendula uJobe ethi: 
18_9_2_“Ngeqiniso ngiyazi ukuthi kunjalo, kepha umuntu angaba elungile phambi kukaNkulunkulu na? 
18_9_3_Uma efuna ukuthetha amacala naye, angemphendule nakwelilodwa kwayinkulungwane. 
18_9_4_Ehlakaniphile enhliziyweni, eqinile emandleni, ngubani oziqinisele kuye, waphumelela, 
18_9_5_yena ogudluza izintaba ngokungazeleli, ezigumbuqela ngentukuthelo yakhe; 
18_9_6_ozamazamisa umhlaba usuke endaweni yawo, kuthuthumele izinsika zawo; 
18_9_7_oyala ilanga lingaphumi, avalele izinkanyezi; 
18_9_8_oweneka izulu yedwa, ahambe emazeni olwandle; 
18_9_9_owenza iBhere, neMpambano, nesiLimela, namaKamelo aseningizimu; 
18_9_10_owenza izinto ezinkulu ezingenakuhlolwa, yebo, izimangaliso ezingenakubalwa. 
18_9_11_Bheka, uyangidlula, ngingaboni; uyagudla, ngingezwa. 
18_9_12_Bheka, uyabamba; ngubani ongamkhalima na? Ngubani ongasho kuye ukuthi: ‘Wenzani na?’ 
18_9_13_“UNkulunkulu akayikubuyisa intukuthelo yakhe; phansi kwakhe bayakhothama abasizi bakaRahabi. 
18_9_14_Pho, mina ngingamphendula ngithini, ngikhethe amazwi ami aqondene naye, na? 
18_9_15_Noma bengilungile, bengingenakumphendula, kepha nginxuse umahluleli wami. 
18_9_16_Uma bengimbizile abesengiphendula, bengingayikukholwa nokho ukuthi ubekile indlebe ezwini lami. 
18_9_17_Uyangilimaza ngesiphepho; uyandisa amanxeba ami ngeze. 
18_9_18_Kavumi ukuba ngiphefumule, kepha uyangigcwalisa ngomunyu. 
18_9_19_Uma kuyindaba yamandla, nangu onawo; uma yindaba yokwahlulela, ngubani ongimemayo na? 
18_9_20_Noma ngilungile, umlomo wami uyakungilahla; noma ngingenacala, uyakuthi ngonakele. 
18_9_21_Anginasici; anginakekeli umphefumulo wami; anginanzi ukuphila kwami. 
18_9_22_Ukuphela kunye nje; ngalokho ngithi: ‘Uyaqeda ongenasici kanye nomubi.’ 
18_9_23_Uma isiswebhu sibulala ngokuzumayo, uyahleka ingozi yabangenacala. 
18_9_24_Umhlaba unikezwe esandleni sababi; uyasibekela ubuso babahluleli bawo; uma kungesiye, pho, ngubani na? 
18_9_25_“Imihla yami iyashesha kunesigijimi; iyabaleka ingabonanga okuhle. 
18_9_26_Itshuza njengomkhunjana womhlanga, njengokhozi olutheleka empangweni. 
18_9_27_Noma ngithi ngiyakukhohlwa ukukhala kwami, ngiyeke ukunyukubala kwami, ngincibilike, 
18_9_28_ngiyesaba nokho bonke ubuhlungu bami, ngiyazi ukuthi awuyikungibheka nginjengongenacala. 
18_9_29_Ngiyakulahlwa mina; ngikhandlekelani ize na? 
18_9_30_Noma ngizigeza ngamanzi eqhwa, ngihlambe izandla zami ngensipho, 
18_9_31_uyakungicwilisa nokho emgodini, izingubo zami zinengwe yimi. 
18_9_32_Ngokuba akasiye umuntu onjengami ukuba ngingase ngimphendule, siye kanyekanye ekwahlulelweni. 
18_9_33_Akukho mnqamulajuqu phakathi kwethu ongabeka isandla sakhe phezu kwethu sobabili. 
18_9_34_Makayisuse induku yakhe kimi; ingebhe ngaye mayingangesabisi. 
18_9_35_Khona ngiyakukhuluma, ngingamesabi, ngokuba anginjalo ngokwami. 
18_10_1_“Umphefumulo wami ukhathele ukuhamba kwami; ngiyazinikela ekukhaleni, ngikhulume ngomunyu womphefumulo wami.
