18_10_2_Ngiyakusho kuNkulunkulu ukuthi: ‘Ungangilahli; ngazise ukuthi uphikisanelani nami na? 
18_10_3_Kuhle yini kuwe ukuba ucindezele, ulahle umsebenzi wezandla zakho, ukhanye phezu kwamasu ababi, na? 
18_10_4_Amehlo enyama unawo na? Uyabona njengabantu na? 
18_10_5_Imihla yakho injengemihla yomuntu na? Neminyaka yakho injengezinsuku zabantu na? 
18_10_6_lokhu ufuna ukona kimi, ufunisisa isono sami, 
18_10_7_noma ukwazi ukuthi angimubi nokuthi akakho ongophula esandleni sakho. 
18_10_8_Izandla zakho zingibumbile, zangenza ngokupheleleyo nxazonke; nokho uyangichitha. 
18_10_9_Ake ukhumbule ukuthi ungenzile njengebumba; pho, uyakungibuyisela othulini na? 
18_10_10_Awungithululanga njengobisi, wangijiyisa njengoshizi, na? 
18_10_11_Awungembathisanga isikhumba nenyama, wangiphica ngamathambo nangemisipha, na? 
18_10_12_Ungenzele ukuphila nomusa; ukungihambela kwakho kulondile umoya wami. 
18_10_13_Kepha ufihlile enhliziyweni yakho lokhu; ngiyazi ukuthi lokhu kukuwe kokuthi: 
18_10_14_Uma ngona, uyangiqaphela; awuyikuthethelela ukona kwami. 
18_10_15_Uma nginecala, maye kimi! Noma bengilungile, bengingayikuphakamisa ikhanda lami, lokhu ngisuthi ngehlazo, ngibona ukuhlupheka kwami. 
18_10_16_Nokuba bengiziphakamisa, ubuyakungizingela njengengonyama, ubuye uzenze omangalisayo kimi. 
18_10_17_Ubuyakuletha kimi ofakazi abasha, wandise intukuthelo yakho kimi, amabandla ngamabandla angisukele. 
18_10_18_“ ‘Ungikhipheleni esizalweni na? Ngangiyakugqibuka lingakangiboni iso, 
18_10_19_ngibe njengokungathi ngingekho, ngiyiswe ethuneni ngisaphuma esiswini. 
18_10_20_Imihla yami ayiyingcosana na? Makapheze, angiyeke ukuba ngithokoze kancane, 
18_10_21_ngingakayi lapho ngingasayikubuya khona, izwe lobumnyama nelomthunzi wokufa, 
18_10_22_izwe lobumnyama obunjengesigayegaye nelomthunzi wokufa nelesiphithiphithi, lapho ukukhanya kunjengobumnyama.’ ” 
18_11_1_Wayesethatha uSofari waseNahama, wathi: 
18_11_2_“Awayikuphendulwa amazwi amaningi kangaka na? Umuntu oliphoshophosho angathethelelwa na? 
18_11_3_Ukugavuza kwakho kuthulisa abantu na? Nalapho ukloloda, akakho ongakuhlaza na? 
18_11_4_Ngokuba uthi: ‘Ukufundisa kwami kulungile; ngimhlophe emehlweni akho.’ 
18_11_5_Sengathi uNkulunkulu angakhuluma, akuvulele izindebe zakhe, 
18_11_6_akwazise izimfihlakalo zokuhlakanipha, ngokuba ukuqonda kwakhe kuninginingi, uze wazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu, ukuba kube kuhle kuwe, wenza ukuba ikhohlakale inxenye yecala lakho. 
18_11_7_“Ungathola imfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu na? Ungamfumana uSomandla kuze kube sekupheleleni kwakhe na? 
18_11_8_Kuphakeme njengezulu — ungenzani na? Kujulile kunendawo yabafileyo — ungazini na? 
18_11_9_Isilinganiso sakho side kunomhlaba, sibanzi kunolwandle. 
18_11_10_Uma edlula, avalele, abizele ekwahluleleni, ngubani ongamkhalima na? 
18_11_11_Ngokuba uyabazi abantu ababi; lapho ebona ukona, akayikukunaka na? 
18_11_12_Umuntu oyize uyakuba nengqondo, nxa ithole lembongolo yasendle lizalwa libe ngumuntu. 
18_11_13_“Uma ulungisa inhliziyo yakho, welulele izandla zakho kuye; 
18_11_14_uma udedisele kude ukona okusesandleni sakho, ungahlalisi ububi ematendeni akho, 
18_11_15_khona uyakuphakamisa ubuso bakho ungenamahloni, uqine, ungesabi. 
18_11_16_Ngokuba uyakukhohlwa ukuhlupheka kwakho, ukukhumbule kunjengamanzi adlulileyo. 
18_11_17_Ukuphila kwakho kuyakusa kunemini; noma kuhlwa, kuyakuba njengokusa nje. 
18_11_18_Uyakuba nokwethemba, ngokuba ithemba likhona; uyakuphendla, ulale ngokulondeka. 
18_11_19_Uyakulala, ungethuswa muntu; abaningi bayakuzincengela kuwe. 
18_11_20_Kepha amehlo ababi ayakufiphala; abayikuba nandawo yokuphephela; ithemba labo liyakuba ngukuphuma komphefumulo.” 
18_12_1_Wayesethatha uSofari waseNahama, wathi: 
18_12_2_“Awayikuphendulwa amazwi amaningi kangaka na? Umuntu oliphoshophosho angathethelelwa na? 
18_12_3_Ukugavuza kwakho kuthulisa abantu na? Nalapho ukloloda, akakho ongakuhlaza na? 
18_12_4_Ngokuba uthi: ‘Ukufundisa kwami kulungile; ngimhlophe emehlweni akho.’ 
18_12_5_Sengathi uNkulunkulu angakhuluma, akuvulele izindebe zakhe, 
18_12_6_akwazise izimfihlakalo zokuhlakanipha, ngokuba ukuqonda kwakhe kuninginingi, uze wazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu, ukuba kube kuhle kuwe, wenza ukuba ikhohlakale inxenye yecala lakho. 
18_12_7_“Ungathola imfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu na? Ungamfumana uSomandla kuze kube sekupheleleni kwakhe na? 
18_12_8_Kuphakeme njengezulu — ungenzani na? Kujulile kunendawo yabafileyo — ungazini na? 
18_12_9_Isilinganiso sakho side kunomhlaba, sibanzi kunolwandle. 
18_12_10_Uma edlula, avalele, abizele ekwahluleleni, ngubani ongamkhalima na? 
18_12_11_Ngokuba uyabazi abantu ababi; lapho ebona ukona, akayikukunaka na? 
18_12_12_Umuntu oyize uyakuba nengqondo, nxa ithole lembongolo yasendle lizalwa libe ngumuntu. 
18_12_13_“Uma ulungisa inhliziyo yakho, welulele izandla zakho kuye; 
18_12_14_uma udedisele kude ukona okusesandleni sakho, ungahlalisi ububi ematendeni akho, 
18_12_15_khona uyakuphakamisa ubuso bakho ungenamahloni, uqine, ungesabi. 
18_12_16_Ngokuba uyakukhohlwa ukuhlupheka kwakho, ukukhumbule kunjengamanzi adlulileyo. 
18_12_17_Ukuphila kwakho kuyakusa kunemini; noma kuhlwa, kuyakuba njengokusa nje. 
18_12_18_Uyakuba nokwethemba, ngokuba ithemba likhona; uyakuphendla, ulale ngokulondeka. 
18_12_19_Uyakulala, ungethuswa muntu; abaningi bayakuzincengela kuwe. 
18_12_20_Kepha amehlo ababi ayakufiphala; abayikuba nandawo yokuphephela; ithemba labo liyakuba ngukuphuma komphefumulo.” 
18_13_1_“Bheka, iso lami libone konke; indlebe yami ikuzwile, yakuqonda. 
18_13_2_Enikwaziyo ngiyakwazi nami; angahlulwa yinina. 
18_13_3_Kepha ngiyakukhuluma kuSomandla; ngifuna ukuphikisana noNkulunkulu. 
18_13_4_Kepha ningabaqambimanga; niyizinyanga ezingelutho nonke. 
18_13_5_Sengathi ningathula nokuthula, lokho kube ngukuhlakanipha kini. 
18_13_6_Ake nizwe ukuthetha kwami, niqaphele ukuzivikela kwezindebe zami. 
18_13_7_Niyakumkhulumela uNkulunkulu ngokubi, nimkhulumele ngenkohliso, na? 
18_13_8_Niyakubuvuma ubuso bakhe, nimmele uNkulunkulu, na? 
18_13_9_Kuhle yini, lapho eniphendla? Njengalokhu umuntu ekhohliswa niyakumkhohlisa na? 
18_13_10_Uyakunisola nokunisola, uma nivuna ubuso ngasese. 
18_13_11_Ubukhulu bakhe abuyikunethusa, nengebhe ngaye inehlele, na? 
18_13_12_Izikhumbuzo zenu ziyizaga zomlotha; izivikelo zenu ziyizivikelo zebumba. 
18_13_13_“Thulani, ningiyeke ukuba ngikhulume, kungehlele noma yini. 
18_13_14_Bengiyakuyithathelani inyama yami ngamazinyo ami, ngibeke ukuphila kwami esandleni sami, na? 
18_13_15_Bheka, uyakungibulala, anginathemba; nokho ngiyakuvikela izindlela zami ebusweni bakhe. 
18_13_16_Lokhu kuyakuba yinsindiso yami ukuthi ongenaNkulunkulu akezi phambi kwakhe. 
18_13_17_Zwisisani amazwi ami, ukusho kwami kube sezindlebeni zenu. 
18_13_18_Bhekani-ke, sengilungisile ukwahlulelwa kwami; ngiyazi ukuthi ngiyakuthethwa mina. 
18_13_19_Ngubani oyakuphikisana nami na? Ngokuba lapho bengiyakuthula, ngigqabuke. 
18_13_20_Izinto ezimbili kuphela ungazenzi kimi, ngize ngingacasheli ubuso bakho: 
18_13_21_masingasondeli kimi isandla sakho, ngingethuswa yingebhe ngawe. 
18_13_22_Khona mawubize, mina ngiyakuphendula, noma kukhulume mina, wena ungiphendule. 
18_13_23_Iziphambeko zami nezono zami zingakanani na? Ngazise izeqo zami nezono zami. 
18_13_24_Usithelani ubuso bakho, ungishaye isitha, na? 
18_13_25_Uyakwethusa iqabunga eliphephethwayo, uxoshe amabibi awomileyo, na? 
18_13_26_Ngokuba uloba okumunyu ngami, ungidlisa ifa lobubi bobusha bami; 
18_13_27_ufaka izinyawo zami ezingongolweni, uqaphela zonke izindlela zami, uzidwebela umudwa ngasematheni ezinyawo zami, 
18_13_28_noma nginyamalala njengokubolayo, njengengubo edliwe yizinundu. 
18_14_1_“Umuntu ozelwe ngowesifazane imihla yakhe mifushane, igcwele ukuyaluza. 
18_14_2_Uyavela njengembali, abune; ubaleka njengethunzi, angemi. 
18_14_3_Konje uvulela onjalo amehlo akho, ungingenise ekwahluleweni nawe, na? 
18_14_4_Ngubani ongaveza okuhlambulukileyo kukho okungcolileyo na? Kakho noyedwa. 
18_14_5_Uma imihla yakhe inqunyiwe, umumo wezinsuku zakhe ukuwe, ubekile umkhawulo wakhe, aze angadluli, 
18_14_6_ungambheki, aphumule, ukuze athokoze ngosuku lwakhe njengomqashwa. 
18_14_7_“Ngokuba kukhona ithemba emthini: uma unqunywa, ungabuye uhlume, nehlumela lawo aliyikuphela. 
18_14_8_Noma impande yawo iguga emhlabathini, nesiphunzi sawo sifela othulini, 
18_14_9_ngephunga lamanzi uyakuhluma, uveze izingatsha njengesithombo. 
18_14_10_Kepha umuntu ofileyo uphelile; umuntu ogqabukileyo uphi na? 
18_14_11_Njengamanzi anyamalele elwandle, nomfula oshileyo ome, 
18_14_12_kanjalo umuntu ulala phansi, angabe esavuka; lize lingabikho izulu abayikuvuka, bangaphaphanyiswa ebuthongweni babo. 
18_14_13_Sengathi ungangifihla endaweni yabafileyo, ungisithe kuze kudlule intukuthelo yakho, unginqumele isikhathi, ungikhumbule. 
18_14_14_Uma umuntu efa, uyakubuye aphile na? Bengiyakulinda zonke izinsuku zomshikashika wami, kuze kufike ukumuka kwami. 
18_14_15_Ubuyakubiza, mina ngiphendule; ubuyakulangazelela umsebenzi wezandla zakho, 
18_14_16_yebo, khona ubuyakubala izinyathelo zami, ungaqapheli isono sami. 
18_14_17_Isiphambeko besiyakuvalelwa esikhwameni, besewusibekela ukona kwami. 
18_14_18_“Impela intaba iyawa, idilike; idwala liyasuswa endaweni yalo; 
18_14_19_amanzi ayagubha amatshe; ukuphuphuma kwawo kuyakhukhula uthuli lomhlaba; kanjalo uyachitha nethemba lomuntu. 
18_14_20_Uyamsukela kuze kube phakade, amuke; uyaguqula ubuso bakhe, ummukise. 
18_14_21_Amadodana akhe ayadunyiswa, engazi yena; ayeyiswa, engakuqondi. 
18_14_22_Inyama yakhe iyezwa ubuhlungu bayo kuphela; umphefumulo wakhe uzidabukela wona kuphela.” 
18_15_1_Wayesethatha u-Elifazi umThemani, wathi: 
18_15_2_“Ohlakaniphileyo uyakuphendula ngokwazi okungumoya nje, agcwalise isisu ngomoya wasempumalanga, na? 
18_15_3_Aphikisane ngamazwi angasizi lutho nangezinkulumo ezingenalusizo na? 
18_15_4_Yebo, uyachitha ukwesaba, unciphisa ukuzindla phambi kukaNkulunkulu. 
18_15_5_Ngokuba ububi bakho buyafundisa umlomo wakho; ukhetha ulimi lwabanobuqili. 
18_15_6_Ngumlomo wakho okulahlayo, akusimi; izindebe zakho ziyafakaza ngawe. 
18_15_7_Ungumuntu wokuqala owazalwayo na? Wavela ngaphambi kwezintaba na? 
18_15_8_Uzwile imfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu, wazigodlela wedwa ukuhlakanipha na? 
18_15_9_Wazini esingayazi thina na? Uqonda ntoni engekho kithina na? 
18_15_10_Kithina kukhona izimpunga namakhehla amadala kunoyihlo. 
18_15_11_Zincane yini kuwe izinduduzo zikaNkulunkulu, nezwi elikhulunywa kahle kuwe na? 
18_15_12_Umukiselwani yinhliziyo yakho na? Kungani ukuba amehlo akho aphayizele, 
18_15_13_uphendulele kuNkulunkulu ukufutheka kwakho, ukhiphe amazwi emlonyeni wakho na? 
18_15_14_Uyini umuntu ukuba abe ngohlambulukileyo, nozelwe ngowesifazane ukuba alungisiswe, na? 
18_15_15_Bheka, nabangcwele bakhe akabethembi, nezulu alihlambulukile emehlweni akhe; 
18_15_16_kakhulu kangakanani onengekayo nowonakeleyo, umuntu ophuza ukona njengamanzi, na? 
18_15_17_“Ngiyakukwazisa, ungilalele; ngiyakukulandisa engikubonileyo 
18_15_18_lokho izihlakaniphi ezikubonakalisile, zikuthathe koyise, zingakufihlanga, 
18_15_19_zona ezaphiwa zodwa izwe, kungadabulanga kuzo umfokazi ngokuthi: 
18_15_20_Umuntu omubi uyazibinya imihla yonke, umumo weminyaka othukuselwe isidlwangudlwangu. 
18_15_21_Izwi lengebhe lisezindlebeni zakhe; lapho ehlezi kahle, uyakufikelwa ngumphangi. 
18_15_22_Akethembi ukuthi uyakubuya ebumnyameni; uyalindelwa yinkemba. 
18_15_23_Uyazulazulela ukudla: kuphi na? Uyazi ukuthi usuku lobumnyama selungasesandleni sakhe. 
18_15_24_Ukuhlupheka nosizi kuyamethusa; kuyamahlula njengenkosi ezilungiselele impi, 
18_15_25_ngokuba waselulela isandla sakhe kuNkulunkulu, wazigabisa kuSomandla. 
18_15_26_Wamdumela ngentamo elukhuni, nangamaqhubu adumbileyo amahawu akhe, 
18_15_27_ngokuba wasibekela ubuso bakhe ngamafutha akhe, wenza umvingqi okhalweni lwakhe. 
18_15_28_Wahlala emizini ebiyakuchithwa, nasezindlini ebezingahlalwa, ezaziyakuba ngamanxiwa nje. 
18_15_29_Akayikuceba, nemfuyo yakhe ayiyikuma, nokudla kwakhe akuyikukhothamela phansi. 
18_15_30_Akayikusuka ebumnyameni; ilangabi liyakushisa amagatsha akhe, amuke ngokuphefumula komlomo kaNkulunkulu. 
18_15_31_Makangethembi ezeni, ezikhohlisa, ngokuba ize liyakuba ngumvuzo wakhe. 
18_15_32_Kuyakufezwa kungakabi yisikhathi, negatsha lakhe alisayikuba luhlaza. 
18_15_33_Uyakuvuthulula igwanya lakhe njengomvini, alahle imbali yakhe njengomnqumo. 
18_15_34_Ngokuba ibandla labangenaNkulunkulu liyakuba yinyumba, umlilo uqede amatende abathengwa ngemivuzo. 
18_15_35_Bakhulelwe ingozi, bazala ukona; isisu sabo silungisela inkohliso.” 
18_16_1_Wayesephendula uJobe, wathi: 
18_16_2_“Ngizwile izinto eziningi ezinjalo; nina nonke ningabaduduzi ababi. 
18_16_3_Amazwi angumoya nje awayikuphela yini? Ucunulwa yintoni ukuba uphendule na? 
18_16_4_Nami ngingakhuluma njengani; uma imiphefumulo yenu ibisesikhundleni somphefumulo wami, bengiyakuhlanganisa amazwi ngani, ngininikinele ikhanda lami. 
18_16_5_Benginganiqinisa ngomlomo, induduzo yezindebe zami inidambise. 
18_16_6_“Noma ngikhuluma, ubuhlungu bami abudanjiswanga; noma ngiyeka, kuyini okumuka kimi na? 
18_16_7_Kepha manje ungikhathazile, uyichithile yonke indlu yami. 
18_16_8_Ungicindezele, kungubufakazi; ukonda kwami kuyangivukela, kufakaze ebusweni bami. 
18_16_9_Ulaka lwakhe luyangidwengula, lungizingele; uyangigedlela amazinyo; isitha sami singicijisela amehlo aso. 
18_16_10_Bangikhamisela imilomo yabo, bangimukula esihlathini ngenhlamba, bangihlanganyela. 
18_16_11_UNkulunkulu uyanginikela kubantu abonakeleyo, angiphonse esandleni sababi. 
18_16_12_Ngangihlezi kahle, wangichoboza; wangibamba ngentamo, wangiphahlaza; wangimisa ngibe yisigcibisholo. 
18_16_13_Abacibishelayo bakhe bangihaqa; uyaqhekeza izinso zami engenasihawu; uchithela inyongo yami emhlabathini. 
18_16_14_Uyangidiliza nokudiliza futhifuthi, angidumele njengeqhawe. 
18_16_15_“Ngithungile indwangu yamasaka phezu kwesikhumba sami. ngingcolisile uphondo lwami othulini. 
18_16_16_Ubuso bami bubomvu ngokukhala; ezinkosheni zami kukhona ithunzi lokufa, 
18_16_17_noma kungekho ubudlova ezandleni zami nokukhuleka kwami kulungile. 
18_16_18_Mhlaba, ungathukusi igazi lami; ukukhala kwami makungabi nandawo. 
18_16_19_Namanje bheka, ufakazi wami usezulwini; ummeli wami usezindaweni eziphakemeyo. 
18_16_20_Abangane bami bayangiklolodela; iso lami liphophoza izinyembezi kuNkulunkulu 
18_16_21_ukuba amphikele umuntu kuNkulunkulu nendodana yomuntu kumakhelwane wayo. 
18_16_22_Ngokuba iyingcosana iminyaka eyakubalwa, ngingakahambi indlela engingayikubuya kuyo. 
18_17_1_“Umoya wami usuchithekile, imihla yami iyacimeka; okwami sekuyithuna nje. 
18_17_2_Impela kukhona abangiklolodelayo, iso lami lisekucunuleni kwabo. 
18_17_3_Ake unginike isibambiso, ungimele; ngubani oyakuxhawulana nami na? 
18_17_4_Ngokuba uvalile izinhliziyo zabo zingaqondi; ngalokho awuyikubaphakamisa. 
18_17_5_Ochaka abangane bakhe ngenxa yesabelo, amehlo abantwana bakhe ayakufiphala. 
18_17_6_Ungibeke isaga sabantu, ngibe ngokhafulelwa ebusweni. 
18_17_7_Iso lami lifiphele ngosizi; onke amalungu ami anjengethunzi. 
18_17_8_Abaqotho bayethuswa yilokho; ongenacala uyavukela ongenaNkulunkulu. 
18_17_9_Kepha olungileyo ubambelela endleleni yakhe; onezandla ezihlanzekileyo ude eqina njalo. 
18_17_10_Nokho buyani nonke phela, nize; kodwa angiyikuthola phakathi kwenu ohlakaniphileyo. 
18_17_11_Imihla yami isidlulile, amasu ami anqunyiwe kanye nemicabango yami yenhliziyo. 
18_17_12_Ubusuku babenza imini, bathi: ‘Ukukhanya kuseduze nobumnyama.’ 
18_17_13_Uma ngithemba ukuthi indawo yabafileyo iyindlu yami, ngendlalele ukhukho lwami ebumnyameni, 
18_17_14_ngibize ukubola ngokuthi ubaba nezimpethu ngokuthi umame nodadewethu, 
18_17_15_liphi, pho, ithemba lami na? Yebo, ithemba lami, ngubani oyakulibona na? 
18_17_16_Liyakwehlela emigoqweni yendawo yabafileyo, lapho kuyakuba khona ukuphumula othulini kanyekanye.” 
18_18_1_Wayesethatha uBilidadi umShuhi, wathi: 
18_18_2_“Koze kube nini nibekela amazwi ami izingibe na? Qondani, andukuba sikhulume. 
18_18_3_Kungani ukuba sithiwe siyizilwane, singcolile emehlweni enu, na? 
18_18_4_Wena ozidwengula olakeni lwakho, umhlaba uyakushiywa ngenxa yakho, nedwala lisuswe endaweni yalo, na? 
18_18_5_Yebo, nokukhanya komubi kuyakucimeka, nelangabi lomlilo wakhe aliyikukhanya. 
18_18_6_Ukukhanya kuyakufiphala etendeni lakhe, nesibani sakhe phezu kwakhe siyakucimeka. 
18_18_7_Izinyathelo zakhe ezinamandla ziyakufinyezwa; amasu akhe ayamlahla phansi. 
18_18_8_Ngokuba uyaphonswa yizinyawo zakhe enetheni, uhamba phezu kweveku. 
18_18_9_Isicupho siyakumbamba ngesithende; ifolo liyakumbamba. 
18_18_10_Uthukuselwe inkintshela emhlabathini, nesihibe emgwaqweni. 
18_18_11_Ingebhe iyakumethusa nxazonke; iyamzingela ezinyathelweni zakhe. 
18_18_12_Ububi buyakumlambela, ulungiselwe ingozi eceleni kwakhe. 
18_18_13_Amalungu omzimba wakhe ayakudliwa, yebo, ukufa okwesabekayo kuyakudla amalungu akhe. 
18_18_14_Uyakuhlwithwa etendeni lakhe alethembayo, ayiswe enkosini yengebhe. 
18_18_15_Etendeni lakhe bayakuhlala abangesibo abakhe, kuvumvuzelwe isibabule ekhaya lakhe. 
18_18_16_Izimpande zakhe ziyakoma ngaphansi; phezulu kuyabuna amagatsha akhe. 
18_18_17_Ukukhunjulwa kwakhe kuyakuphela emhlabeni, angabi negama ezweni. 
18_18_18_Uyakukhishwa ekukhanyeni, aqhutshelwe ebumnyameni, axoshwe ezweni. 
18_18_19_Akayikuba nandodana namzukulwana phakathi kwabantu bakhe; akuyikuba khona lapho egogobala khona. 
18_18_20_Abasentshonalanga bayethuswa lusuku lwakhe, nabasempumalanga babanjwa ngukwesaba. 
18_18_21_Impela zinjalo izindlu zaboni; injalo indawo engamazi uNkulunkulu.” 
18_19_1_Wayesephendula uJobe, wathi: 
18_19_2_“Koze kube nini nihlupha umphefumulo wami, ningiphohloze ngamazwi, na? 
18_19_3_Seningihlazisile kayishumi; aninamahloni okuthi ningiphathe kabi na? 
18_19_4_Uma impela ngidukile, ukuduka kwami kukimi ngedwa. 
18_19_5_Uma impela niyazikhukhumezela kimi, niphikisane nami ngehlazo lami, 
18_19_6_yazini-ke ukuthi uNkulunkulu ungihlanekezele, ungihaqe ngenetha. 
18_19_7_Bheka, ngikhala ngithi: ‘Ngubudlova!’ Kepha angiphendulwa; ngicela ukusizwa, kodwa akukho ukwahlulelwa. 
18_19_8_Uvalile indlela yami ukuze ngingabi nakudlula; ubeka ubumnyama emikhondweni yami. 
18_19_9_Ungikhumulile udumo lwami; ususile umqhele ekhanda lami. 
18_19_10_Ungidilizile nxazonke, sengimukile; usiphulile ithemba lami njengomuthi. 
18_19_11_Ungivuthisele intukuthelo yakhe, wangishaya njengezitha kuye. 
18_19_12_Amabutho akhe afika kanyekanye, alungise indlela ukuba angisukele; amisa nxazonke zetende lami. 
18_19_13_“Udedisile kimi abafowethu, nabazana nami sebahlukene impela nami. 
18_19_14_Izihlobo zami zingishiyile, nengazana nabo bangikhohliwe. 
18_19_15_Abagogobele endlini yami nezincekukazi zami bangishaya umfokazi; ngingowezizwe emehlweni abo. 
18_19_16_Ngibiza inceku yami, kayingiphenduli; ngiyayinxusa ngomlomo wami. 
18_19_17_Umoya wami mubi kumkami, ngiyanuka kubantwana besisu sikamame. 
18_19_18_Yebo, nezingane ziyangidelela; uma ngivuka, zikhuluma ngami. 
18_19_19_Ababeyizifuba zami bayanengwa yimi; labo ababengithanda sebengifulathele. 
18_19_20_Amathambo ami anamathela esikhumbeni sami nasenyameni yami; ngisinde ngokulambisa kuphela. 
18_19_21_Ngihawukeleni, ngihawukeleni, nina bangane bami, ngokuba isandla sikaNkulunkulu singithintile. 
18_19_22_Ningizingelelani njengoNkulunkulu, ningasuthi ngenyama yami na? 
18_19_23_“Sengathi amazwi ami angalotshwa! Sengathi angabhalwa encwadini, 
18_19_24_aqoshwe edwaleni ngepeni lensimbi nangomthofu, kuze kube phakade! 
18_19_25_Kepha mina ngiyazi ukuthi uMhlengi wami ukhona; ekupheleni uyakuma othulini. 
18_19_26_Nalapho sesishabalele isikhumba sami, ngiyakumbuka uNkulunkulu ngikhululekile enyameni yami, 
18_19_27_engiyakumbona uqobo lwami; amehlo ami ayakumbona, kungabi njengomfokazi; okuphakathi kwami kuyaphela esifubeni sami. 
18_19_28_Uma nithi: ‘Siyakumxosha yini pho! njengokuba impande yendaba ifumaniseka kimi,’ 
18_19_29_yesabani inkemba, ngokuba ulaka lungolwezono ezifanele inkemba, ukuze nazi ukuthi ukwahlulelwa kukhona.” 
18_20_1_Wayesethatha uSofari umNahama, wathi: 
18_20_2_“Ngalokho imicabango yami iyangiphendula ngenxa yokushesha okuphakathi kwami. 
18_20_3_Ngiyezwa insolo engihlazisayo, kepha umoya wasengqondweni yami uyangiphendula. 
18_20_4_“Awukwazi yini ukuba lokhu kungokwasendulo, selokhu abantu babekwa emhlabeni, 
18_20_5_ukuthi ukujabula kwababi kufushane, nokuthokoza kwabangenaNkulunkulu kungokokuphazima kweso nje, na? 
18_20_6_Noma ubukhulu bakhe bukhuphukela ezulwini, nekhanda lakhe lifinyelela emafwini, 
18_20_7_uyakubhubha kuze kube phakade njengamasimba akhe; abambonayo bayakuthi: ‘Uphi na?’ 
18_20_8_Uyakundiza njengephupho, angabe esafunyanwa; uyakuxoshwa njengombono wasebusuku. 
18_20_9_Iso elalimgqolozela alisamboni, nendawo yakhe ayisamboni. 
18_20_10_Abantwana bakhe bayakuzincengela kwabampofu, izandla zakhe zibuyise impahla yakhe. 
18_20_11_Amathambo akhe agcwele ubusha, kepha buyakulala phansi kanye naye othulini. 
18_20_12_“Noma ububi bumnandi emlonyeni wakhe, noma ebufihla phansi kolimi lwakhe, 
18_20_13_noma ebugodla engabushiyi, kepha ebugcina emlonyeni wakhe, 
18_20_14_kuyaguquka nokho ukudla kwakhe phakathi kwakhe, kube yinyongo yamabululu ezibilinini zakhe. 
18_20_15_Ugwinyile ingcebo; uyakubuye ayihlanze; uNkulunkulu uyakuyikhipha esiswini sakhe. 
18_20_16_Uyakumunca isihlungu samabululu; ulimi lwenyoka luyakumbulala. 
18_20_17_Akayikubuka imifula, iminonjana nemifudlana yezinyosi namangqanga. 
18_20_18_Lokho owakukhandlekelayo uyakukubuyisa, angakugwinyi; ngempahla ayitholileyo akayikujabula. 
18_20_19_Ngokuba ucindezele, washiya abampofu; uhlwithile indlu, angabuye ayakhe. 
18_20_20_“Ngokuba wayengazi ukuthula esiswini sakhe; kayikuphepha nalutho kulokho akufisayo. 
18_20_21_Akusalanga lutho angaludlanga; ngalokho inhlanhla yakhe ayiyikuma. 
18_20_22_Ekusutheni kokuvama kwakhe uyaminywa; izandla zakho konke ukuhlupheka ziyakumfikela. 
18_20_23_Kuyakuthi lapho eyakugcwalisa isisu sakhe, uNkulunkulu aphonse kuye ukuvutha kwentukuthelo yakhe, akunise phezu kwakhe esekudleni. 
18_20_24_Uyabalekela isikhali sensimbi, kepha ubhotshozwa ngumnsalo wethusi. 
18_20_25_Uyawukhipha uphume emzimbeni wakhe; nxa uphuma unyampuza enyongweni, abesehlelwa yingebhe. 
18_20_26_Ubumnyama bonke bubekelelwe ingcebo yakhe; umlilo ongavuthelwanga uyakuyidla, uchithe okusele etendeni lakhe. 
18_20_27_Izulu liyakwambula ububi bakhe, umhlaba umvukele. 
18_20_28_Imfuyo yendlu yakhe iyakumuka, inyamalale ngomuhla wentukuthelo. 
18_20_29_Lesi siyisabelo somuntu omubi esivela kuNkulunkulu, nefa alinqunyelweyo nguNkulunkulu.” 
18_21_1_Wayesephendula uJobe, wathi: 
18_21_2_“Yizwani nokuzwa amazwi ami; lokhu makube yinduduzo evela kini. 
18_21_3_Ngivumeleni ukuba nami ngikhulume; nalapho sengikhulumile, klolodani. 
18_21_4_“Mina-ke, ukukhala kwami kungomuntu na? Ngingekhathazeke na? 
18_21_5_Ngibukeni, nimangale, nibeke izandla emilonyeni yenu. 
18_21_6_Lapho ngikhumbula nje, ngishaywa luvalo; ukwesaba kubamba inyama yami. 
18_21_7_Ababi baphilelani, baze babe badala, yebo, bakhule emandleni, na? 
18_21_8_Inzalo yabo iyema phambi kwabo kanye nabo, nabantwana babo phambi kwamehlo abo. 
18_21_9_Izindlu zabo zinokuthula, azinangebhe; uswazi lukaNkulunkulu aluphezu kwabo. 
18_21_10_Inkunzi yabo iyakhwela, kayiphuthi; inkomo yabo iyazala, kayiphunzi. 
18_21_11_Bakhipha izingane zabo njengomhlambi; abantwana babo bayagida. 
18_21_12_Bahlabelela ngesigubhu nangehabhu, bathokoza ngezwi lomtshingo. 
18_21_13_Baqeda imihla yabo ngokuhle, behlela endaweni yabafileyo ngokuthula. 
18_21_14_Nokho bathi kuNkulunkulu: ‘Suka kithi, asifuni ukwazi izindlela zakho. 
18_21_15_USomandla uyini ukuba simkhonze na? Siyakuzuzani, uma sikhuleka kuye, na?’ 
18_21_16_Bhekani, inhlanhla yabo ayisesandleni sabo; icebo lababi malibe kude nami. 
18_21_17_“Kukangaki isibani sababi sicimeka, nengozi ibehlela, babelwe izabelo ngentukuthelo, na? 
18_21_18_Babeyakuba njengezibi phambi komoya, nanjengamakhoba aphephethwa yisiphepho. 
18_21_19_UNkulunkulu ubekela abantwana babo ububi babo; yebo, kodwa makabuphindisele kubo uqobo ukuba babazi. 
18_21_20_Awabo amehlo mawabone ukuchithwa kwabo, bona baphuze ukufutheka kukaSomandla. 
18_21_21_Banokujabula kuni endlini yabo emva kwabo, lapho umumo wezinyanga zabo usunqunyiwe, na? 
18_21_22_UNkulunkulu uyakufundiswa ukwazi, yena owahlulela abaphakemeyo, na? 
18_21_23_“Omunye ufa esemi kahle kukho konke, ezinzile, enokuthula. 
18_21_24_Izinhlangothi zakhe zigcwele amafutha; umnkantsha wamathambo akhe umanzi. 
18_21_25_Omunye ufa enomphefumulo onomunyu, engazange adle okuhle. 
18_21_26_Balala phansi othulini kanyekanye; izimpethu ziyabasibekela. 
18_21_27_Bhekani, ngiyazi imicabango yenu, namacebo enu eniyakungona ngawo. 
18_21_28_Nithi: ‘Iphi indlu yezikhulu, liphi itende lokuhlala kwababi, na?’ 
18_21_29_Anibuzanga abadlula endleleni, nibazi ubufakazi babo 
18_21_30_bokuthi omubi ugodlelwa usuku lokubhujiswa nokuthi bayamukiswa ngosuku lwentukuthelo, na? 
18_21_31_Ngubani oyakumtshela indlela yakhe ebusweni bakhe? Ngubani oyakumphindisela ngalokho akwenzileyo na? 
18_21_32_Uyayiswa ethuneni, kulindwe elibeni. 
18_21_33_Amagabade asesigodini ayakuba mnandi kuye; bonke abantu bayakudonswa emva kwakhe, njengokuba bengenakubalwa nababe phambi kwakhe. 
18_21_34_“Pho, ningiduduzelani ngeze, lokhu ezimpendulweni zenu kusele inkohliso nje, na?” 
18_22_1_Wayesethatha u-Elifazi umThemani, wathi: 
18_22_2_“Umuntu angaba yinsizakalo kuNkulunkulu ukuba ohlakaniphileyo abe nosizo kuye na? 
18_22_3_Kuyintokozo yini kuSomandla, uma ulungile, kuyinzuzo kuye, uma wenza izindlela zakho ziphelele, na? 
18_22_4_“Kungokumesaba kwakho akusolayo, angene nawe ekwahlulelweni, na? 
18_22_5_Ububi bakho abubukhulu yini? Izono zakho azinakuphela. 
18_22_6_Ngokuba uthathe ngeze izibambiso kumfowenu, wahlubula abampofu izingubo zabo. 
18_22_7_Awumphuzisanga owomileyo amanzi, wamgodlela olambileyo ukudla. 
18_22_8_Umuntu onamandla, izwe lingelakhe; onodumo uyahlala kulo. 
18_22_9_Umukisile abafelokazi bengenalutho; izingalo zezintandane zaphuliwe. 
18_22_10_Ngalokho izingibe ziyakuhaqa; uvalo oluzumayo luyakwethusa. 
18_22_11_Ukukhanya kwakho kuphenduke ubumnyama, ukuze ungaboni, nesikhukhula samanzi siyakusibekela. 
18_22_12_“UNkulunkulu akakho ekuphakameni kwezulu na? Bheka inhloko yezinkanyezi ukuthi iphakeme kangaka. 
18_22_13_Uthi wena: ‘UNkulunkulu wazini na? Angahlulela engale kwesigayegaye na? 
18_22_14_Amafu ayamsibekela ukuze angaboni; uyahamba esiyingelezini sezulu.’ 
18_22_15_Uyakugcina indlela yamandulo eyahanjwa yizoni na? 
18_22_16_Yizo ezahlwitha kungakabi yisikhathi, ezisisekelo sazo sathululwa njengomfula, 
18_22_17_nezathi kuNkulunkulu: ‘Suka kithina, ngokuba uSomandla ubeyakwenzani kubo na?’ 
18_22_18_Kepha nguye owayegcwalisa izindlu zabo ngokuhle. Amasu ababi akude nami. 
18_22_19_“Abalungileyo bayakukubona, bathokoze; abangenasici bayabaklododela ngokuthi: 
18_22_20_‘Impela ababesivukela sebechithiwe, nabakushiyileyo umlilo ukuqedile.’ 
18_22_21_“Mawujwayelane naye, ube nokuthula; ngalokho okuhle kuyakufika kuwe. 
18_22_22_Mawamukele umthetho emlonyeni wakhe, ubeke amazwi akhe enhliziyweni yakho. 
18_22_23_Uma ubuyela kuSomandla, uyakwakhiwa, uma udedisa okubi kude etendeni lakho, 
18_22_24_ubeke igolide lakho othulini, nelase-Ofiri phakathi kwamatshe eminonjana. 
18_22_25_USomandla uyakuba yigugu lakho, nesiliva elikhazimulayo kuwe, 
18_22_26_ngokuba lapho uyakuthokoza ngoSomandla, uphakamisele kuNkulunkulu ubuso bakho. 
18_22_27_Uyakukhuleka kuye, akuzwe, wena ugcwalise izithembiso zakho. 
18_22_28_Uma unquma indaba, uyakuyenzelwa, ukukhanya kukhanye ezindleleni zakho. 
18_22_29_Uma zehla, uyakuthi: ‘Phezulu!’ abesephakanyiswa ozithobileyo. 
18_22_30_Abantu abangemsulwa uyakubakhulula nabo, bakhululwe ngobumhlophe bezandla zakho.” 
18_23_1_Wayesephendula uJobe, wathi: 
18_23_2_“Nanamuhla ukukhala kwami kumunyu; isandla sami siyasinda ngokububula kwami. 
18_23_3_Sengathi ngingazi ukuthi ngiyakumtholaphi, ngize ngifike endlini yakhe, 
18_23_4_ngilungise ukwahlulelwa kwami phambi kwakhe, ngigcwalise umlomo wami ngezimpendulo. 
18_23_5_Bengiyakuwazi amazwi abeyakungiphendula ngawo, ngiqonde ukuthi ubeyakuthini kimi. 
18_23_6_Ubeyakuphikisana nami ngamandla akhe amakhulu na? Cha, ubeyakubhekisa kimi. 
18_23_7_Lapho olungileyo ubeyakuphikisana naye, mina ngikhululwe kumahluleli wami kuze kube phakade. 
18_23_8_Kodwa bheka, ngiya empumalanga, kepha akakho, nasentshonalanga, kepha angimboni, 
18_23_9_nangasenyakatho ekusebenzeni kwakhe, kepha akabonwa; ujikela ngaseningizimu, kepha akabonakali. 
18_23_10_Ngokuba uyayazi indlela yami; esengivivinyile, ngiyakuphuma njengegolide. 
18_23_11_Unyawo lwami lunamathele ezinyathelweni zakhe; ngigcinile indlela yakhe, angiphambukanga. 
18_23_12_Angichezukanga emyalweni wezindebe zakhe; ngizibekele amazwi akhe kunezimiso zami. 
18_23_13_“Kodwa uyinto inye, ngubani ongambuyisa na? Okufisayo umphefumulo wakhe, lokho uyakwenza. 
18_23_14_Uyakufeza engikumiselweyo; izinto eziningi ezinjalo zikuye. 
18_23_15_Ngalokho ngishaywa luvalo ebusweni bakhe; lapho ngikuqaphela, ngiyamesaba. 
18_23_16_NguNkulunkulu odangalisileyo inhliziyo yami, uSomandla ungethusile, 
18_23_17_ngokuba anginqunywanga, bungakafiki ubumnyama; wangifihlela ukuhlwa. 
18_24_1_“Kungani ukuba uSomandla angazibekeleli izikhathi zokwahlulela, abamaziyo babone imihla yakhe, na? 
18_24_2_Imincele iyasuswa; bahlwitha imihlambi, bayiklabise. 
18_24_3_Bamukisa imbongolo yezintandane, nenkomo yomfelokazi bayayithatha ibe yisibambiso. 
18_24_4_Bafuzula abaswelayo endleleni; abampofu bomhlaba bacasha ndawonye. 
18_24_5_Bheka, njengezimbongolo ehlane bayaphumela emisebenzini yabo befunisisa ukudla; ihlane lingukudla kwabo abakunika abantwana babo. 
18_24_6_Emasimini bavuna ifoliji; bakhothoza esivinini somubi. 
18_24_7_Ebusuku balala nqunu bengenangubo, bengenanto yokuzisibekela emakhazeni. 
18_24_8_Bamanzi ngezihlambi zasezintabeni; basingatha idwala bengenasiphephelo. 
18_24_9_Intandane ihlwithwa ebeleni, nengane yompofu ithathwa ibe yisibambiso, 
18_24_10_bahambe nqunu bengenangubo, bethwele izithungu, belambile. 
18_24_11_Benza amafutha phakathi kwezingange zabahluphi; banyathela izikhamo zewayini, kepha bayoma. 
18_24_12_Bexoshwe emzini abafayo bayabubula; imiphefumulo yabalimeleyo iyakhala, kepha uNkulunkulu akanaki lokho okubi. 
18_24_13_“Bakhona abakuhlubukile ukukhanya; abazi indlela yakho, abanamatheli emikhondweni yakho. 
18_24_14_Umbulali uvuka ekuseni, abulale ompofu noswelayo; ebusuku unjengesela. 
18_24_15_Iso lesiphingi libheka ukuhlwa ngokuthi: ‘Malingangiboni iso,’ sisithe ubuso baso. 
18_24_16_Bafohla izindlu sekumnyama; emini bayazivalela; ukukhanya abakwazi. 
18_24_17_Ngokuba ithunzi lokufa kubo bonke labo linjengokusa, lokhu beyazi ingebhe yethunzi lokufa. 
18_24_18_“Banejubane ebusweni bamanzi; izabelo zabo ziqalekisiwe emhlabeni; abasayikuphendukela endleleni yezivini. 
18_24_19_Ukoma nokushisa kuyaqeda amanzi eqhwa; kanjalo indawo yabafileyo labo abonileyo. 
18_24_20_Isizalo siyamkhohlwa; izimpethu ziyamsobozela; akasayikukhunjulwa; ukungalungi kuyaphulwa njengomuthi. 
18_24_21_Uyayidla inyumba engazaliyo; akenzeli umfelokazi okuhle. 
18_24_22_Uyadonsa namaqhawe ngamandla akhe; uyavuka; akakho osenethemba lokuphila. 
18_24_23_UNkulunkulu uyamnika ukuba alondeke, asekelwe; kepha amehlo akhe aphezu kwezindlela zabo. 
18_24_24_Bayaphakanyiswa; emva kwesikhashana abasekho; bayaphela njengabanye, bafe; babuna njengezihloko zezikhwebu. 
18_24_25_“Uma kungenjalo, ngubani ongangenza onamanga, awenze ize amazwi ami, na?” 
18_25_1_Wayesethatha uBilidadi umShuhi, wathi: 
18_25_2_“Ukubusa nokwesabeka kukuye owenza ukuthula ezindaweni zakhe eziphakemeyo. 
18_25_3_Ukhona yini ongabala izimpi zakhe, nokukhanya kwakhe akuphumeli bani na? 
18_25_4_Pho, umuntu angalunga kanjani kuNkulunkulu, nozelwe ngowesifazane angahlambuluka kanjani, na? 
18_25_5_Bheka, nenyanga ayinankazimulo, nezinkanyezi azihlambulukile emehlweni akhe. 
18_25_6_Pho, kakhulu kangakanani umuntu oyimpethu, nendodana yomuntu eyisibungu, na?” 
18_26_1_Wayesephendula uJobe, wathi: 
18_26_2_“Usizile kanjani ongenamandla! Usindisile kanjani ingalo engenamandla? 
18_26_3_Umlulekile kanjani ongenakuhlakanipha! Umemezile kangakanani ukuqonda! 
18_26_4_Utshelwe ngubani lawo mazwi, nomoya kabani waphuma kuwe, na? 
18_26_5_“Izithunzi ziyathuthumela phansi kwamanzi kanye nabakhelwane bawo. 
18_26_6_Indawo yabafileyo ize phambi kwakhe, nendawo yokubhubha ayinasisibekelo. 
18_26_7_Welula inyakatho phezu kwendawo engenalutho; uphanyeka umhlaba phezu kweze. 
18_26_8_Ubopha amanzi emafwini akhe; ifu alidabuki phansi kwawo. 
18_26_9_Uyasibekela ubuso besihlalo sakhe sobukhosi; uyeneka ifu lakhe phezu kwaso. 
18_26_10_Uyingiliza ngomudwa phezu kobuso bamanzi, kuze kuphele ukukhanya ebumnyameni. 
18_26_11_Izinsika zezulu ziyathuthumela; ziyethuswa ngokukhuza kwakhe. 
18_26_12_Ngamandla akhe uyanyakazisa amanzi; ngokuqonda kwakhe uyachitha uRahabi. 
18_26_13_Ngokuphefumula kwakhe izulu liyakhazimula; isandla sakhe sigwazile inyoka esheshayo. 
18_26_14_Bheka, lokhu kungamaphethelo nje ezindlela zakhe, izwi lokunyenyeza nje elizwakalayo ngaye; indumo yamandla akhe, ngubani obeyakuyiqonda na?” 
18_27_1_UJobe wabuye waphakamisa izwi lakhe, wathi: 
18_27_2_“Kuphila kukaNkulunkulu osusile ukwahlulelwa kwami, noSomandla owenze munyu umphefumulo wami, 
18_27_3_kusekhona ukuphefumula kimi, nomoya kaNkulunkulu usemakhaleni ami, 
18_27_4_izindebe zami aziyikukhuluma okubi, nolimi lwami aluyikukhipha inkohliso. 
18_27_5_Makube kude nami ukuba nginivumele; angiyikuzaphuca ukuphelela kwami ngize ngife. 
18_27_6_Ngibambelela ekulungeni kwami, angikuyeki; inhliziyo yami ayisoli nowodwa wemihla yami. 
18_27_7_“Isitha sami masibe njengomubi, nongisukelayo njengowonileyo. 
18_27_8_Liyini ithemba longenaNkulunkulu, nxa enqunywa, lapho uNkulunkulu esusa umphefumulo wakhe, na? 
18_27_9_UNkulunkulu uyakuzwa ukukhala kwakhe, lapho ehlelwa lusizi, na? 
18_27_10_Uyakuthokoza ngoSomandla, ambize uNkulunkulu ngezikhathi zonke, na? 
18_27_11_“Ngiyakunifundisa ngesandla sikaNkulunkulu; okukuSomandla angiyikukufihla. 
18_27_12_Bhekani, nina nonke nikubonile; kungani ukuba nizenze ize na? 
18_27_13_“Lokhu kuyisabelo somuntu omubi kuNkulunkulu, nefa lezidlwangudlwangu ezilamukela kuSomandla. 
18_27_14_Uma abantwana bakhe banda, bandela inkemba; inzalo yakhe ayiyikusutha ngokudla. 
18_27_15_Abasele kuye bayakumbelwa ekufeni, abafelokazi babo bangalili. 
18_27_16_Noma enqwabela isiliva njengothuli, alungise izambatho njengodaka, 
18_27_17_makakulungise, kepha kuyakwembathwa ngolungileyo, ongenacala abele isiliva. 
18_27_18_Uyakha indlu yakhe njengenundu, ibe njengedlangala elakhiwa ngumlindi. 
18_27_19_Uyalala enothile, angakuphindi kodwa; uyavula amehlo akhe, abe engasekho. 
18_27_20_Ingebhe iyamehlela njengamanzi; isivunguvungu siyamphephula ebusuku. 
18_27_21_Umoya wasempumalanga uyamthatha, amuke; uyambhengula endaweni yakhe. 
18_27_22_Uyacibishelwa engahawukelwa; uyabaleka nokubaleka esandleni sakhe. 
18_27_23_Abantu bayakumshayela ihlombe, bamncimfele ukuba asuke endaweni yakhe. 
18_28_1_“Impela ukhona umthapho wesiliva, nendawo yegolide abalicwengayo. 
18_28_2_Insimbi iyakhishwa emhlabathini; amatshe ayancibilikiswa abe yithusi. 
18_28_3_Ubumnyama bubekelwa umkhawulo; kuyacingwa kuze kube sekupheleni konke amatshe esigayegaye nethunzi lokufa. 
18_28_4_Baqhekeza umgodi kude nalapho behlala khona abantu, lapho bekhohlakele khona lunyawo; bayalenga, bajikajika kude nabantu. 
18_28_5_Umhlaba-ke, kuwona kuvela ukudla, kepha ngaphansi kwawo uyaphendukezelwa njengangomlilo. 
18_28_6_Amatshe awo ayindawo yamasafire; inothuli lwegolide. 
18_28_7_Lowo mgudu awaziwa yinqe, neso loheshe aliwubonanga. 
18_28_8_Izilwane ezinkulu azihambanga ngawo, nengonyama ayidlulanga ngawo. 
18_28_9_Uyelulela isandla sakhe etsheni lensengetsha, agumbuqele izintaba kwasezimpandeni zazo. 
18_28_10_Uqhekeza imihohoba emadwaleni; iso lakhe liyabona konke okuyigugu. 
18_28_11_Uyavimba imifula ukuba ingaconsi; imfihlakalo uyayikhiphela ekukhanyeni. 
18_28_12_“Kepha ukuhlakanipha kufumanisekaphi? Iphi indawo yokuqonda na? 
18_28_13_Umuntu kalazi inani lakho; akutholakali ezweni labaphilayo. 
18_28_14_Utwa luthi: ‘Akukho kimi;’ ulwandle luthi: ‘Akukho kimi.’ 
18_28_15_Akunakuzuzwa ngegolide; intengo yakho ayinakulinganiswa nesiliva. 
18_28_16_Kungelingane negolide lase-Ofiri, neshohamu eliyigugu, nesafire. 
18_28_17_Igolide nengilazi kungelingane nakho; akunakwenaniswa ngezinto zegolide elicwengekileyo. 
18_28_18_Akunakukhulunywa ngekorali nangekristalu; intengo yakho iphezu kwamarubi. 
18_28_19_Itopazi laseKushe alinakulinganiswa nakho, kungelingane negolide elicwengekileyo. 
18_28_20_“Ukuhlakanipha kuvelaphi na? Indawo yokuqonda iphi na? 
18_28_21_Kusithekile emehlweni abo bonke abaphilayo, kufihliwe ezinyonini zezulu. 
18_28_22_Ukubhujiswa nokufa kuthi: ‘Ngezindlebe zethu sizwile amahemuhemu akho.’ 
18_28_23_UNkulunkulu uyaqonda indlela yakho; yena uyazi indawo yakho. 
18_28_24_Ngokuba uyabeka imikhawulo yomhlaba, abone konke okuphansi kwezulu. 
18_28_25_Lapho emisela umoya ukusinda kwawo, elinganisa amanzi ngezilinganiso, 
18_28_26_lapho enzela imvula isimiso, nonyazi lokuduma indlela, 
18_28_27_khona wakubona, walanda ngakho, wakuhlela, wakuphenya. 
18_28_28_Wathi kubantu: ‘Bhekani, ukwesaba iNkosi lokhu kungukuhlakanipha; ukusuka ebubini kungukuqonda.’ ” 
18_29_1_UJobe wabuye waphakamisa izwi lakhe, wathi: 
18_29_2_“Sengathi nga nginjengasezinyangeni zakuqala, njengasemihleni uNkulunkulu angigcina ngayo, 
18_29_3_lapho isibani sakhe sasikhanya phezu kwekhanda lami, ngihamba ebumnyameni ngokukhanya kwakhe, 
18_29_4_yebo, njengasezinsukwini zokuvuthwa kwami, lapho ubuhlobo bukaNkulunkulu babuphezu kwetende lami; 
18_29_5_lapho uSomandla wabe esenami, nabantwana bami babe besangizungeza; 
18_29_6_lapho izinyathelo zami zagezwa ngamangqanga, nedwala elalingakimi langithelela imifula yamafutha. 
18_29_7_“Lapho ngaphuma ngaya esangweni ngasemzini, ngalungisa isihlalo sami esigcawini, 
18_29_8_izinsizwa zangibona, zacasha, nezimpunga zasuka zema, 
18_29_9_izikhulu zayeka ukukhuluma, zabeka izandla emilonyeni yazo; 
18_29_10_izwi labakhulu lathuliswa; izilimi zabo zanamathela olwangeni lwabo. 
18_29_11_Lapho indlebe yangizwa, yangibusisa, nalapho iso langibona, langifakazela. 
18_29_12_Ngokuba ngakhulula abampofu abakhalayo kanye nentandane engenamsizi. 
18_29_13_Isibusiso sobezakubhubha safika phezu kwami; ngenza inhliziyo yomfelokazi ukuba ihube ngokujabula. 
18_29_14_Ngembatha ukulunga, kwaba yisambatho kimi; ukwahlulelwa kwami kwakunjengengubo nomqhele kimi. 
18_29_15_Ngaba ngamehlo ezimpumputhe nezinyawo zezinyonga. 
18_29_16_Nganginguyise wabampofu; indaba yengingamaziyo ngayiphenya. 
18_29_17_Ngaphula imihlathi yowonayo, ngahlwitha impango emazinyweni akhe. 
18_29_18_“Ngase ngithi: ‘Ngiyakufa esidlekeni sami, ngandise izinsuku zami zibe ngangesihlabathi. 
18_29_19_Impande yami iyazivulela amanzi; amazolo alala ubusuku bonke egatsheni lami; 
18_29_20_udumo lwami lusha njalo kimi, umnsalo wami wenziwa musha esandleni sami.’ 
18_29_21_“Abantu bangilalela belinda; bathula ngesiluleko sami. 
18_29_22_Emva kwamazwi ami ababe besakhuluma; amazwi ami aconsela phezu kwabo. 
18_29_23_Bangilindela njengemvula; bangikhamisela imilomo yabo njengokukhamisela imvula yamuva. 
18_29_24_Ngabahleka bengenakukholwa; ukukhanya kobuso bami kabakufiphazanga. 
18_29_25_Uma ngangikhethile izindlela zabo, ngangiyakuhlala emqoka, ngahlalisa okwenkosi empini, njengoduduza abalilayo. 
18_30_1_“Kepha manje abancane ngeminyaka kunami bayangihleka, oyise babo engangibadelela ukuba ngingababeki naphakathi kwezinja zezimvu zami. 
18_30_2_Yebo, namandla ezandla zabo angangisiza kanjani, abantu abaphelile iziphika, na? 
18_30_3_Bondile ngokuswela nangendlala; baququda ugwadule oluyize, olwaluyilohle nakuqala. 
18_30_4_Bayakha imifino kasawoti ezihlahleni; izimpande zezinwele zingukudla kwabo. 
18_30_5_Bayaxoshwa phakathi kwabantu; bamemeza emva kwabo njengasemva kwamasela. 
18_30_6_Bahlala ezigodini ezesabekayo, nesemihumeni yomhlaba, naseziweni. 
18_30_7_Bayakhonya phakathi kwezihlahla; phansi kwezimbabazane bayabuthana, 
18_30_8_bengabantwana beziwula, abantwana babangenamagama, beshaywa, bexoshwa ezweni. 
18_30_9_“Manje sengihaywa yibo, yebo, sengiyisaga sabo. 
18_30_10_Bayanengwa yimi, bemi kude nami; abayeki ukungikhafulela ngamathe. 
18_30_11_Bakhululile imichilo yabo, bangithobisa; balahlile itomu phambi kwami. 
18_30_12_Ngakwesokunene kuvuka amachwensa; agudlumeza izinyawo zami, anginqwabelela izindlela zokubhubhisa. 
18_30_13_Achitha umkhondo wami; asebenzela ukubhujiswa kwami engazibambi. 
18_30_14_Angena kungathi ngesikhala esibanzi; phakathi kwencithakalo atheleka phezu kwami. 
18_30_15_Ingebhe ithululwa phezu kwami; njengomoya luyaxoshwa udumo lwami; inhlalakahle yami iyadlula njengefu. 
18_30_16_“Manje umphefumulo wami uthululiwe phakathi kwami; izinsuku zosizi zingibambile. 
18_30_17_Ebusuku amathambo ami ayabhotshozwa, asuke kimi; ubuhlungu obungigedlayo abuphumuli. 
18_30_18_Ngamandla amakhulu umzimba wami wonakele; unamathela kimi njengentamo yesambatho sami. 
18_30_19_Ungiphonsile odakeni; sengifana nothuli nomlotha. 
18_30_20_“Ngikhala kuwe, kepha awungiphenduli; ngimi lapha, uyangibuka nje. 
18_30_21_Uyaguquka ukuze ungiphathe ngonya; ngamandla esandla sakho uyangizingela. 
18_30_22_Uyangiphakamisela emoyeni, ungikhwelisa kuwo, wenze ukuba ngincibilike ngokuhlokoma kwesivunguvungu. 
18_30_23_Ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi ungiyisa ekufeni nasendlini yokubuthana kwabaphilayo bonke. 
18_30_24_“Kepha umuntu angelule isandla sakhe encithakalweni, akhale uma esengozini, na? 
18_30_25_Angimkhalelanga yini ozinsuku zakhe zazilukhuni na? Umphefumulo wami awuhawukelanga abampofu na? 
18_30_26_Lapho ngabheka okuhle, kwafika okubi; ngalindela ukukhanya, kwafika ubumnyama. 
18_30_27_Izibilini zami ziyaxhuxhuzela, aziphumuli; izinsuku zosizi zingehlele. 
18_30_28_Ngihamba ngimnyama, kungenziwanga yilanga; ngisukuma ebandleni ngikhala. 
18_30_29_Ngingumfowabo wamakhanka, nomngane wezintshe. 
18_30_30_Isikhumba sami simnyama, siyebuza kimi; amathambo ami ashile ngokushisa. 
18_30_31_Ihabhu lami seliphenduke isililo, nomtshingo wami uyizwi labakhalayo. 
18_31_1_“Ngenza isivumelwano namehlo ami: ngingabuka kanjani intombi na? 
18_31_2_Ngokuba siyini isabelo ebesiyakuvela kuNkulunkulu phezulu, nefa likaSomandla ebeliyakuvela ekuphakameni, na? 
18_31_3_Akusikho ukubhubha kwabangalungile nengozi kwabenza okubi na? 
18_31_4_Yena akaboni izindlela zami, abale izinyathelo zami zonke, na? 
18_31_5_“Uma ngihambile ngamanga, nonyawo lwami luphuthume enkohlisweni, 
18_31_6_mangilinganiswe ngesilinganiso esilungileyo, ukuze uNkulunkulu azi ukuphelela kwami. 
18_31_7_Uma izinyathelo zami zichezukile endleleni, inhliziyo yami yalandela amehlo ami, uma kunamathela isisihla ezandleni zami, 
18_31_8_mangihlwanyele, kudle omunye, yebo, zisishulwe izithelo zami. 
18_31_9_“Uma inhliziyo yami iyengwe ngowesifazane, ngaqamekela ngasemnyango womakhelwane wami, 
18_31_10_umkami makasilele omunye, kuguqe abanye phezu kwakhe. 
18_31_11_Ngokuba lokho ngabe kuyicala, ngabe kungububi bokujeziswa. 
18_31_12_Ngokuba kungumlilo odlayo kuze kube sekubhujisweni, kusishulwe yonke inzuzo yami. 
18_31_13_“Uma ngidelele ukwahlulelwa kwenceku yami noma okwencekukazi yami, lapho bephikisana nami, 
18_31_14_ngiyakwenze njani, lapho uNkulunkulu evuka, nalapho engiphenya, ngingaphendula ngokuthini na? 
18_31_15_Owangenza mina esiswini, wabenza nabo; owasibumba esizalweni munye. 
18_31_16_“Uma nginqabele abampofu abakufisayo, ngenza amehlo omfelokazi ukuba afiphale, 
18_31_17_ngadla ucezu lwami lwesinkwa ngingedwa, ingaludlanga nentandane 
18_31_18_hhayi, ikhulele kimi kwasebusheni bami njengakuyise; kwasesizalweni sikamame ngangingumholi wabafelokazi 
18_31_19_uma ngibone obhubhile ngokuswela isambatho, kungekho okokuzimboza kompofu; 
18_31_20_uma ukhalo lwakhe lungangibusisanga, uma engafudunyezwanga nguboya bezimvu zami; 
18_31_21_uma ngiphakamisele intandane isandla sami, ngokuba ngabona usizo lwami esangweni, 
18_31_22_maliwe ihlombe lami esiphangeni, nengalo yami yaphulwe enkothweni yayo. 
18_31_23_Ngokuba ngesaba ukubhujiswa nguNkulunkulu; ngenxa yokuphakama kwakhe bengingenakwenza lutho. 
18_31_24_“Uma ngibeke igolide libe yithemba lami, ngathi egolideni elihle: ‘Ngithemba wena;’ 
18_31_25_uma ngithokozile, ngokuba imfuyo yami inkulu nangokuba isandla sami sithole okuningi; 
18_31_26_uma ngibone ukukhanya ukuthi kuyakhazimula, nenyanga ukuthi ihamba ngencwazimulo, 
18_31_27_kwayengwa inhliziyo yami esitha, nomlomo wanga isandla sami, 
18_31_28_nalokho kwakungububi bokujeziswa, ngokuba ngangimphikile uNkulunkulu phezulu. 
18_31_29_“Uma ngithokozile ngengozi yongizondayo, ngaxhuma lapho eficwa ngokubi 
18_31_30_kepha angivumelanga ulimi lwami ukuba lone ngokucela ukuphila kwakhe ngesifungo 
18_31_31_uma abantu betende lami bengashongo ukuthi: ‘Ngubani ongathola umuntu ongasuthanga ngenyama yakhe na?’ — 
18_31_32_abafokazi kabalalanga phandle, ngavulela izihambi iminyango yami — 
18_31_33_uma ngisibekele iziphambeko zami njengo-Adamu ngokufihla ububi bami esifubeni sami, 
18_31_34_ngokuba ngesaba isixuku esikhulu, ngaba novalo lokudelelwa ngabomndeni, ngaze ngathula, angaphuma emnyango — 
18_31_35_sengathi angaba khona ongizwayo nantu uphawu lwami, makangiphendule uSomandla — ngibe nencwadi ayilobileyo omelana nami! 
18_31_36_Ngangiyakuyithwala emahlombe ami, ngiyibophe ibe ngumqhele kimi, 
18_31_37_ngimlandise ngomumo wezinyathelo zami, ngisondele kuye njengesikhulu. 
18_31_38_“Uma umhlaba wami ukhalile ngami, nemisele yawo ililile kanyekanye; 
18_31_39_uma ngidlile izithelo zawo ngingenamali, ngenza ukuba bafe abaniniwo, 
18_31_40_makuhlume ikhakhasi esikhundleni sikakolweni, kuvele ukhula endaweni yebhali.” Amazwi kaJobe asephelile. 
18_32_1_Lawo madoda amathathu ayeseyeka ukumphendula uJobe, ngokuba wayelungile emehlweni akhe. 
18_32_2_Lwase luvutha ulaka luka-Elihu, indodana kaBarakeli, umBuzi womndeni kaRamu; ulaka lwakhe lwavuthela uJobe, ngokuba wazithetha yena kunoNkulunkulu. 
18_32_3_Ulaka lwakhe lwavuthela nabangane bakhe abathathu, ngokuba noma bengafumananga impendulo, bamlahla nokho uJobe. 
18_32_4_U-Elihu wayelindele ukukhuluma kuJobe, ngokuba bona babebadala kunaye. 
18_32_5_Lapho u-Elihu esebona ukuthi ayikho impendulo emilonyeni yalawo madoda amathathu, lwavutha ulaka lwakhe. 
18_32_6_U-Elihu, indodana kaBarakeli, umBuzi, wayesethatha-ke, wathi: “Mina ngisemusha ngeminyaka, nina nibadala; ngalokho nganginamahloni, ngesaba ukunitshela umqondo wami. 
18_32_7_Ngathi: ‘Makukhulume izinsuku, ubuningi beminyaka bazise ukuhlakanipha.’ 
18_32_8_Nokho kukhona umoya kumuntu; ukuphefumula kukaSomandla kuyabaqondisa. 
18_32_9_Abakhulu abahlakaniphile, nabadala abaqondi ukwahlulela. 
18_32_10_“Ngalokho ngithi: Ngizweni; nami ngiyakusho umqondo wami. 
18_32_11_Bhekani, ngilindele amazwi enu, ngabeka indlebe emiqondweni yenu, nisaphenya eniyakukusho. 
18_32_12_Nganilalela nina; bhekani, kwakungekho noyedwa owamahlula uJobe nowaphendula amazwi akhe phakathi kwenu. 
18_32_13_Maningasho ukuthi: ‘Sifumene ukuhlakanipha; uNkulunkulu angamphengulula, hhayi umuntu.’ 
18_32_14_Akahlelelanga mina amazwi akhe; angiyikumphendula ngezinkulumo zenu. 
18_32_15_“Bayakhungatheka, abasaphenduli; baphelelwa ngamazwi. 
18_32_16_Ngibalindele yini, uma bengakhulumi, na? Ngokuba bemi bengasaphenduli. 
18_32_17_Nami ngiyakuphendula okwami, ngitshengise nami umqondo wami. 
18_32_18_Ngokuba ngigcwele amazwi; umoya phakathi kwami uyangiqhubezela. 
18_32_19_Bhekani, okuphakathi kwami kunjengewayini elingenambobo; kucishe ukuqhuma njengezimvaba ezintsha. 
18_32_20_Ngiyakukhuluma ukuba ngikhululeke; ngiyakuvula izindebe zami ukuba ngiphendule. 
18_32_21_Mangingakhethi ubuso bamuntu, ngingathophi nobani. 
18_32_22_Ngokuba angikwazi ukuthopha; uma kunjalo, uMenzi wami angangisusa masinyane. 
18_33_1_“Kepha manje, Jobe mawuzwe amazwi ami, 
18_33_2_Bheka-ke, sengivula umlomo wami; ulimi lwami lukhuluma emlonyeni wami. 
18_33_3_Amazwi ami avela enhliziyweni yami eqotho; okwaziwa yizindebe zami ziyakukhuluma ngesiminya. 
18_33_4_Umoya kaNkulunkulu ungenzile, nokuphefumula kukaSomandla kunginika ukuphila. 
18_33_5_Uma ukwazi, ngiphendule; zihlele phambi kwami, ume. 
18_33_6_Bheka, nginjengawe maqondana noNkulunkulu: ngibunjiwe nami ngebumba. 
18_33_7_Bheka, ingebhe ngami ayiyikukugebhezisa, nesandla sami esiphezu kwakho asiyikukusinda. 
18_33_8_“Impela wakhuluma ezindlebeni zami, ngezwa izwi lokukhuluma kwakho ukuthi: 
18_33_9_Ngimsulwa, anginasiphambeko; ngimhlophe, akukho okubi kimi. 
18_33_10_Bheka, uthola amathuba ngami, ungishaya isitha sakhe. 
18_33_11_Ufaka izinyawo zami ezingongolweni, aqaphele zonke izindlela zami. 
18_33_12_“Bheka, ngiyakuphendula ukuthi awuthethanga kahle lokho, ngokuba uNkulunkulu mkhulu kunomuntu. 
18_33_13_Umphikiselani ngokuthi: Akaphenduli nelilodwa lamazwi ami. 
18_33_14_Ngokuba uNkulunkulu ukhuluma kanye, yebo, nakabili, umuntu engakunaki. 
18_33_15_Ephusheni nasembonweni wasebusuku, lapho abantu behlelwe ngubuthongo obunzima, bozela emacansini, 
18_33_16_khona uyavula izindlebe zabantu, abeke uphawu ekufundisweni kwabo, 
18_33_17_ukuze aphambukise umuntu ekwenzeni kwakhe, anqume ukuzidla kumuntu; 
18_33_18_unqanda umphefumulo wakhe ekubhujisweni, nokuphila kwakhe ukuba kungachithwa ngomkhonto. 
18_33_19_Uyajeziswa ngobuhlungu nasecansini lakhe, nangokulwa okungapheliyo emathanjeni akhe. 
18_33_20_Inhliziyo iyanengwa ngukudla, nomphefumulo wakhe uzonda ukudla okade ukufisa. 
18_33_21_Inyama yakhe iyadliwa, ingabe isabonwa; amathambo akhe akade engabonakali aseqhamukile. 
18_33_22_Umphefumulo wakhe uyasondela egodini, nokuphila kwakhe kubabulali. 
18_33_23_“Uma kukhona ingelosi kuye, nehumusha noma yiliphi enkulungwaneni lokuba litshele umuntu okumlungeleyo, 
18_33_24_uNkulunkulu abeseba nomusa kuye, athi: ‘Mkhulule ukuba angehleli egodini, sengitholile ihlawulo,’ 
18_33_25_inyama yakhe ibe ntsha kuneyomntwana, abuyele emihleni yobusha bakhe, 
18_33_26_khona uyakunxusa uNkulunkulu ukuba abe nomusa kuye, abone ubuso bakhe ngokujabula, abesebuyisela kumuntu ukulunga kwakhe. 
18_33_27_Usehlabelela phambi kwabantu, uthi: ‘Ngonile, ngahlanekezela ukulunga, kepha akwenziwanga kimi njengokufaneleyo: 
18_33_28_uhlengile umphefumulo wami ukuba ungadluleli egodini; ngiyakubona ukukhanya ngiphila.’ 
18_33_29_“Bhekani, konke lokhu uNkulunkulu uyakwenza kabili, yebo, kathathu kumuntu 
18_33_30_ukuba abuyise umphefumulo wakhe egodini, akhanyiselwe ngokukhanya kwabaphilayo. 
18_33_31_Yizwa, Jobe, ungilalele; thula, mina ngizakukhuluma. 
18_33_32_Uma unamazwi, ngiphendule; khuluma, ngokuba ngifisa ukukuthethelela. 
18_33_33_Uma ungenawo, ngilalele wena; thula, ngiyakukufundisa ukuhlakanipha.” 
18_34_1_U-Elihu wathatha wathi: 
18_34_2_“Yizwani amazwi ami, nina zihlakaniphi, nibeke indlebe kimi nina zazi. 
18_34_3_Ngokuba indlebe iyavivinya amazwi, njengokuba ulwanga luzwa ukudla. 
18_34_4_Masizikhethele okulungileyo, sazi phakathi kwethu okuhle. 
18_34_5_Ngokuba uJobe uthe: ‘Ngilungile; uNkulunkulu ususile ukwahlulelwa kwami. 
18_34_6_Phezu kokwahlulelwa kwami ngishaywa onamanga; inxeba lami alinakupholiswa, noma ngingenasiphambeko.’ 
18_34_7_Ngumuphi umuntu onjengoJobe ophuza usulu njengamanzi, 
18_34_8_ohamba ngokwazana nabenza okubi, ahambisane nabantu ababi, na? 
18_34_9_Ngokuba uthi: ‘Akunalusizo kumuntu ukuba azane noNkulunkulu.’ 
18_34_10_“Ngalokho ngizweni nina bantu abanokuqonda; makube kude noNkulunkulu ukuba enze okubi, nakuSomandla ukuba enze ukona. 
18_34_11_Ngokuba uyabuyisela kumuntu njengokwenza kwakhe, atholise kube yilowo nalowo njengezindlela zakhe. 
18_34_12_Impela uNkulunkulu akenzi okubi; uSomandla kahlanekezeli ukwahlulela. 
18_34_13_Ngubani owambeka phezu komhlaba na? Ngubani owamisa izwe lonke na? 
18_34_14_Uma ebeyakuzibheka yena, azibuyisele umoya wakhe nomphefumulo wakhe, 
18_34_15_inyama yonke ibiyakufa kanyekanye, umuntu abuyele othulini. 
18_34_16_“Uma unengqondo, yizwa lokhu, ulalele izwi lokukhuluma kwami. 
18_34_17_Imbala ozonda ukwahlulela uyakubusa na? Uyakumlahla olungileyo nonamandla 
18_34_18_oshoyo enkosini ukuthi: ‘Muntu omubi,’ nasezikhulwini: ‘Mashinga,’ 
18_34_19_ongakhethi ubuso bezikhulu, onganaki ocebileyo kunompofu, na? Ngokuba bonke bangumsebenzi wezandla zakhe. 
18_34_20_Bayafa ngokuphazima kweso; phakathi kwamabili abantu bayathuthumela, banyamalale; amaqhawe ayasuswa, kepha kungengasandla. 
18_34_21_“Ngokuba amehlo akhe akuzo izindlela zomuntu; ubona zonke izinyathelo zakhe. 
18_34_22_Abukho ubumnyama, nethunzi lokufa alikho, lapho abenza okubi bengacasha khona. 
18_34_23_Ngokuba akadingi ukuba abelokhu ebheka umuntu ukuba aye kuNkulunkulu ukwahlulelwa. 
18_34_24_Uyaphahlaza abanamandla, kungahlolwanga, amise abanye ezikhundleni zabo. 
18_34_25_Ngalokho uyazi imisebenzi yabo; uyabagumbuqela ebusuku, bachotshozwe. 
18_34_26_Uyabashaya njengababi endaweni lapho bebonwa khona, 
18_34_27_ngokuba bachezuka ekumlandeleni, abanakanga neyodwa yezindlela zakhe, 
18_34_28_baze benza ukuba ukukhala kwabampofu kufike kuye, wezwa ukukhala kwabahluphekayo. 
18_34_29_Lapho yena ethula, ngubani ongalahla, nalapho ethukusa ubuso bakhe, ngubani ongambona na? Ubusa ngokufananayo, noma kuyisizwe noma kungumuntu, 
18_34_30_ukuba kungabusi muntu ongenaNkulunkulu, abantu bacushwe. 
18_34_31_“Ngokuba ukhona oke wathi kuNkulunkulu: ‘Ngithweswe icala noma ngingonanga, na? 
18_34_32_Lokhu engingakuboni, ngifundise khona; uma ngenzile okubi, angisayikukuphinda.’ 
18_34_33_Uyakuphindisela njengokuthanda kwakho, lokhu ukwenqaba, na? Ngokuba nguwe ozakukhetha, akusimina; khuluma okwaziyo. 
18_34_34_“Abantu abanokuqonda bayakusho kimi, yebo, nezihlakaniphi, lapho zingizwa, ziyakuthi: 
18_34_35_‘UJobe ukhuluma engenalwazi; amazwi akhe awanangqondo.’ 
18_34_36_Sengathi uJobe angavivinywa kuze kube sekupheleni, ngokuba uphendula njengabantu ababi. 
18_34_37_Ngokuba uyenezela ukuhlubuka esonweni sakhe; ushaya ihlombe phakathi kwethu, andise amazwi akhe kuNkulunkulu.” 
18_35_1_U-Elihu wathatha wathi: 
18_35_2_“Usho uthi lokhu kulungile na? Uthi: ‘Yilungelo lami kuNkulunkulu yini,’ 
18_35_3_njengokuba uthi: ‘Kungisiza ngani?’ nokuthi: ‘Ngizuzeni kunalokho ebengiyakukuzuza, uma ngonile, na?’ 
18_35_4_“Ngizakukuphendula mina ngamazwi, wena nabangane bakho. 
18_35_5_Bheka ngasezulwini, ubone, uqaphele amafu aphakeme kunawe. 
18_35_6_Uma wona, wenzani kuye na? Uma iziphambeko zakho ziziningi, wenzani kuyena na? 
18_35_7_Uma ulungile, umnikani yena, noma umukelani esandleni sakho na? 
18_35_8_Ububi bakho buqondene nomuntu onjengawe, nokulunga kwakho kuthintana nendodana yomuntu. 
18_35_9_“Abantu bakhala ngobuningi bezinkahlo; bakhala ngokusizwa ngenxa yengalo yabanamandla. 
18_35_10_Kepha akakho othi: ‘Uphi uNkulunkulu, uMenzi wami, ozwakalisa amahubo ebusuku, 
18_35_11_osifundisa phezu kwezilwane zomhlaba, asenze sihlakaniphe phezu kwezinyoni zezulu.’ 
18_35_12_Lapho bayakhala ngokuzidla kwababi, kepha akaphenduli. 
18_35_13_Impela uNkulunkulu akezwa okuyize, uSomandla akayikukunakekela; 
18_35_14_kakhulu kangakanani, lapho uthi awumboni nokuthi, noma icala liphambi kwakhe, usamhlalela, na? 
18_35_15_Kepha manje, ngokuba intukuthelo yakhe ingajezisi, anganaki kakhulu iziphambeko, 
18_35_16_uJobe uvulela ize umlomo wakhe; uyandisa amazwi engenalwazi.” 
18_36_1_U-Elihu waqhubeka wathi: 
18_36_2_“Ngihlalele kancane, ngiyakukubonisa, ngokuba ngisenamazwi okummela uNkulunkulu. 
18_36_3_Ngiyakulanda kude ulwazi lwami, nginike uMenzi wami ukulunga. 
18_36_4_Impela amazwi ami awasiwo amanga; unawe ophelele ekwazini. 
18_36_5_“Bheka, uNkulunkulu unamandla, kepha kadeleli muntu; mkhulu emandleni okuqonda. 
18_36_6_Akenzi ukuba omubi aphile, kepha abampofu uyabanika ukwahlulelwa. 
18_36_7_Akabuyisi amehlo akhe kwabalungileyo, kepha ubahlalisa namakhosi ezihlalweni zobukhosi, baphakame kuze kube phakade. 
18_36_8_Uma beboshwa ngamaketanga, babanjwe ngezintambo zokuhlupheka, 
18_36_9_uyababonisa izenzo zabo neziphambeko zabo zokuthi baziphakamisile. 
18_36_10_Uyavulela izindlebe zabo ukulaywa, asho ukuba babuye ebubini. 
18_36_11_Uma belalela, bamkhonze, bayakuqeda imihla yabo ebuhleni neminyaka yabo kukho okumnandi. 
18_36_12_Kepha uma bengalaleli, bayakuphela ngenkemba, bafe bengenalwazi. 
18_36_13_“Abangesabi ngenhliziyo baqongelela ulaka; abakhali lapho ebabopha. 
18_36_14_Bafa besebasha, ukuphila kwabo kube njengokwezifebe zethempeli. 
18_36_15_Ukhulula ompofu ngobumpofu bakhe, avule indlebe yabo ngokuhlupheka. 
18_36_16_“Yebo, nga ekuvusa ukuba uphume emlonyeni wosizi, uye endaweni ebanzi, lapho kungekho kunyinyeka khona, kunone okubekwa etafuleni lakho. 
18_36_17_Kepha ugcwele ukwahlulelwa kwababi; ukwahlulela nokulunga kuyakubamba. 
18_36_18_Xwaya ukuba ulaka lungakuvusi usashaywa, ungachezukiswa ngobuningi bamahlawulo. 
18_36_19_Ukukhala kwakho kungakusiza ukuba ungahlali osizini, nazo zonke izikhwepha zamandla akho, na? 
18_36_20_Ungafisi ubusuku, lapho abantu beyakususwa ezindaweni zabo. 
18_36_21_Xwaya ukuba ungabhekisi ubuso bakho ebubini, ngokuba ukhethile lokho kunokuhlupheka. 
18_36_22_“Bheka, uNkulunkulu uphakeme ngamandla akhe; ngubani ofundisa njengaye na? 
18_36_23_Ngubani ommisele indlela yakhe na? Ngubani ongasho ukuthi: ‘Wenzile okubi,’ na? 
18_36_24_Khumbula ukukhulisa izenzo zakhe abahlabelela ngazo abantu. 
18_36_25_Bonke abantu bayazibona; abokufa bayazibuka besekude. 
18_36_26_Bheka, uNkulunkulu uphakeme, asimqondi; umumo weminyaka yakhe ayinakuphenywa. 
18_36_27_“Wenyusa amathonsi amanzi, abuye awathulule njengemvula enkungwini yakhe; 
18_36_28_amafu awenza ukuba aconse, awathele phezu kwabantu abaningi. 
18_36_29_Ukhona ongaqonda ukwenekeka kwamafu nokuduma kwedokodo lakhe na? 
18_36_30_Bheka, uyasakaza ukukhanya kwakhe ngakuye; uyasibekela ubuphansi bolwandle. 
18_36_31_Ngokuba ngalokho uyabahlulela abantu, aphane kakhulu ngokudla. 
18_36_32_Uyasibekela izandla zakhe ngokukhanya, akuyale ukuba kushaye isigcibisholo. 
18_36_33_Umsindo wakhe ulanda ngaye oshisekela ububi ngentukuthelo. 
18_37_1_“Yebo, ngenxa yalokho iyathuthumela inhliziyo yami, isuke endaweni yayo. 
18_37_2_Yizwani, nizwe indumo yezwi lakhe, nemvunge ephuma emlonyeni wakhe. 
18_37_3_Uyakukhipha phansi kwalo lonke izulu, nonyazi lwakhe luya emagumbini omhlaba. 
18_37_4_Emva kwalo kuduma izwi; uduma ngezwi lobukhosi bakhe; kalumisi unyazi, lapho lizwakala izwi lakhe. 
18_37_5_UNkulunkulu uyaduma ngezwi lakhe ngokumangalisayo; wenza izinto ezinkulu esingaziqondi. 
18_37_6_Ngokuba uthi eqhweni: ‘Khithika emhlabeni;’ kanjalo nasesihlambini semvula, yebo, ezihlambini zemvula zakhe ezinamandla. 
18_37_7_Uyanamathelisa izandla zabantu bonke ukuba bonke abantu bazi imisebenzi yakhe. 
18_37_8_Seziya izilwane ezikhundleni zazo, zihlale emihumeni yazo. 
18_37_9_Isikhwishikhwishi siphuma ekamelweni laso, namakhaza emimoyeni ehlakazayo. 
18_37_10_Ngokuphefumula kukaNkulunkulu kuvela ungqoqwane, ububanzi bamanzi buqine. 
18_37_11_Yebo, uyathwesa amafu ngokuswakama; uyeneka amafu onyazi lwakhe. 
18_37_12_Ayajika, aphenduke njengokunquma kwakhe ukuba enze konke awayalayo ebusweni bomhlaba owakhiweyo, 
18_37_13_awafikise abe luswazi, afike ngenxa yomhlaba noma ngenxa yomusa. 
18_37_14_“Beka indlebe kulokhu, Jobe; yima, uqonde izimangaliso zikaNkulunkulu. 
18_37_15_Uyazi yini ukuthi uNkulunkulu uwayala kanjani, enze ukuba unyazi lwamafu akhe lukhanye na? 
18_37_16_Uyaqonda yini ukulinganiswa kwamafu, izimangaliso zoPhelele olwazini, 
18_37_17_wena ozingubo zakho zifudumala, lapho ethulisa umhlaba ngeshisandlu, na? 
18_37_18_Ungeneka isibhakabhaka njengaye, esiqinile njengesibuko esibunjiweyo, na? 
18_37_19_Sifundise ukuthi siyakuthini kuye; asinakuhlela indaba yethu ngenxa yobumnyama. 
18_37_20_Uyakutshelwa ukuthi ngiyakhuluma na? Ukhona yini oshoyo ukuthi makabhubhe na? 
18_37_21_Manje, abantu abanakukubona ukukhanya okukhazimula esibhakabhakeni, 
18_37_22_Ngasenyakatho kuvela inkazimulo yegolide; uNkulunkulu wembethe ubukhosi obesabekayo. 
18_37_23_USomandla singemqonde; mkhulu ngamandla nangokwahlulela; ngokulunga kwakhe okukhulu akoni lutho. 
18_37_24_Ngalokho abantu bayamesaba; kepha akanaki abazishaya izihlakaniphi ngenhliziyo.” 
18_38_1_UJehova wayesemphendula uJobe esesikhwishikhwishini, ethi: 
18_38_2_“Ngubani lo owenza mnyama isiluleko ngamazwi angenalwazi na? 
18_38_3_Bopha izinkalo zakho njengendoda; ngizakukubuza, wena ungazise. 
18_38_4_Wawukuphi, lapho ngasekela umhlaba, na? Ngitshele, uma ukwazi ukuqonda. 
18_38_5_Ngubani owanquma izilinganiso zawo, ngokuba uyakwazi phela! Ngubani owelula umucu wokulinganisa phezu kwawo na? 
18_38_6_Izisekelo zawo zabekwa phezu kwani na? Ngubani owabeka itshe lawo legumbi, 
18_38_7_lapho izinkanyezi zokusa zahlabelela kanyekanye, nawo onke amadodana kaNkulunkulu ajabula, na? 
18_38_8_“Ngubani owavalela ulwandle ngezicabha, lapha lwabhoboka kungathi lwaphuma esiswini, 
18_38_9_lapho ngabeka amafu aba yisambatho salo, nesigayegaye saba yimbeleko yalo, 
18_38_10_nalapho ngalumisela umncele wami, ngamisa imigoqo nezicabha, 
18_38_11_ngathi: ‘Uyakufika lapha, kepha ungadluli; lapha amaza akho aziqhenyayo ayakumiswa,’ na? 
18_38_12_“Emihleni yakho uyalile ukusa, wazisa umthende wokusa indawo yawo 
18_38_13_ukuba ubambe amagumbi omhlaba, ababi bathintithwe kuwo, na? 
18_38_14_Uguquka njengebumba lophawu lokunamathelisa; konke kuqhamuka kungathi kwembesiwe. 
18_38_15_Ababi sebenqatshelwe ukukhanya kwabo, nengalo ephakemeyo yaphuliwe. 
18_38_16_“Wake wangena emithonjeni yolwandle, wahamba phansi otweni, na? 
18_38_17_Amasango okufa uwavulelwe, wabona amasango ethunzi lokufa, na? 
18_38_18_Uqondile ububanzi bomhlaba na? Yisho, uma ukwazi konke. 
18_38_19_“Iphi indlela eya lapho kuhlala khona ukukhanya, nobumnyama-ke, iphi indawo yabo, 
18_38_20_ukuze ukuyise emkhawulweni wakho, uqonde imikhondo yendlu yakho, na? 
18_38_21_Angithi uyakwazi, ngokuba wawusuzelwe, nomumo wemihla yakho mkhulu, na? 
18_38_22_“Wake wangena ezinqolobaneni zeqhwa, wabona izinqwaba zesichotho, 
18_38_23_engiziqongelele isikhathi sokuhlupheka nosuku lokulwa nolwempi, na? 
18_38_24_Iphi indlela eya lapho ukukhanya kwahlukaniselwa khona, nalapho umoya wasempumalanga uhlakazekela khona emhlabeni, na? 
18_38_25_Ngubani ovulele ukuchichima kwamanzi umsele nonyazi lokuduma indlela, 
18_38_26_ukunisa imvula emhlabeni lapho kungekho muntu khona, nasehlane elingenamuntu, 
18_38_27_ukusuthisa ihlane kwahlongasibi, nokuhlumisa uhlaza, na? 
18_38_28_Kukhona uyise wemvula na? Ngubani owazala amathonsi amazolo na? 
18_38_29_Iqhwa lavela esiswini sikabani, nesithwathwa sazalwa ngubani, na? 
18_38_30_Amanzi ayacasha kungathi ayitshe; ubuso botwa buhlangene. 
18_38_31_“Ungabopha amaketanga esiLimela, uthukulule izintambo zeMpambano, na? 
18_38_32_Ungakhipha izinkanyezi ngesikhathi sazo, uhole iBhere nabantwana balo, na? 
18_38_33_Uyazazi izimiso zasezulwini, umise ukumisa kwazo emhlabeni, na? 
18_38_34_“Ungaphakamisela izwi lakho emafwini, ukuze amanzi amaningi akusibekele, na? 
18_38_35_Ungathuma imibani ukuba ihambe, isho kuwe, ithi: ‘Bheka, silapha’? 
18_38_36_Ngubani obeke ukuhlakanipha phakathi komuntu, ngubani onika ukuqonda enhliziyweni na? 
18_38_37_Ngubani ongabala amafu ngokuhlakanipha, ngubani ongathulula izimvaba zasezulwini, 
18_38_38_lapho uthuli luphenduka isigaxa, namagabade anamathelane, na? 
18_38_39_“Uyazingelela ibhubesikazi impango, usuthise iphango lamabhongo, 
18_38_40_lapho elala emihumeni yawo, ehlezi esikhundleni eqamekele, na? 
18_38_41_Ngubani olungisela igwababa ukudla kwalo, lapho amaphuphu alo ekhala kuNkulunkulu, ezulazula ngokuswela ukudla, na? 
18_39_1_“Uyazi yini isikhathi sokuzala kwamagogo, uqaphela ukuzala kwezindluzelekazi, na? 
18_39_2_Ungazibala izinyanga eziziqedayo, uyasazi isikhathi ezizala ngaso, na? 
18_39_3_Ziyakhonkobala, zizala amazinyane azo, zikhiphe okwemihlelo yazo. 
18_39_4_Amazinyane azo aqina, akhulela endle; ayahamba, angabe esabuyela kuzo futhi. 
18_39_5_“Ngubani ovumele imbongolo yasendle ukuba ihambe; ngubani owathukulula izintambo zayo, 
18_39_6_engenza ihlane libe yindlu yayo, nezwe likasawoti libe yindawo yayo yokuhlala, na? 
18_39_7_Ihleka umsindo wedolobha, ingezwa ukumemeza komshayeli. 
18_39_8_Okufunyanwa ezintabeni kuyidlelo layo: ifuna zonke izinto eziluhlaza. 
18_39_9_“Inyathi iyakuthanda ukukhonza, ihlale ebusuku emkhombeni wakho, na? 
18_39_10_Ungayibophela inyathi ngentambo emseleni, ibhuqe izigodi emva kwakho, na? 
18_39_11_Ungayethemba, ngokuba amandla ayo makhulu, ushiye umshikashika wakho kuyo, na? 
18_39_12_Ungakholwa yiyo ukuba ibuyise imbewu yakho, iyibuthele esibuyeni sakho, na? 
18_39_13_“Amaphiko entshe ayaphaphaza, kepha angamakhombe nezimpaphe zothando na? 
18_39_14_Ngokuba iyashiya amaqanda ayo emhlabathini, iwafudumeze othulini. 
18_39_15_Iyakhohlwa ukuthi unyawo lungawachoboza nokuthi isilwane sasendle singawanyathela. 
18_39_16_Iphatha kalukhuni amazinyane ayo, kungathi awasiwo awayo; ayinangebhe yokuthi umshikashika wayo ungaba yize. 
18_39_17_Ngokuba uNkulunkulu wayenza ukuba ikhohlwe ukuhlakanipha, akayabelanga ukuqonda. 
18_39_18_Lapho indizela phezulu, ihleka amahhashi nabagibeli bawo. 
18_39_19_“Nguwe onika ihhashi amandla alo, wembathisile intamo yalo umhlwenga oyephuzelayo, na? 
18_39_20_Ulenze ukuba lixhume njengenkumbi na? Indumo yokuthimula kwalo iyesabeka. 
18_39_21_Liyaphanda ezigodini, liyesasa ngamandla alo, liyaphuma ukuhlangana nezimpi. 
18_39_22_Liyahleka ingebhe, alesabi, alibuyi phambi kwenkemba. 
18_39_23_Isambo siyalikhehlezela nomkhonto okhazimulayo, nengcula. 
18_39_24_Ngolaka lwalo nangokufutheka kwalo liyagwinya umhlabathi; alimi ngokukhala kwecilongo. 
18_39_25_Ekuzwakaleni kwecilongo lithi: ‘Nakho-ke;’ lihogela ukulwa kusekude, nendumo yezinduna nokumemeza kwazo. 
18_39_26_“Uklebe uyandiza ngokuqonda kwakho, awelulele ngaseningizimu amaphiko akhe, na? 
18_39_27_Ukhozi lwenyukela phezulu ngezwi lakho, lwakhe isidleke salo phezulu, na? 
18_39_28_Luhlala esiweni, lwakha khona, eweni ledwala eliyinqaba yalo. 
18_39_29_Lulapho luhlola ukudla kwalo; amehlo alo akubona kusekude. 
18_39_30_Amazinyane alo amunca igazi; lapho kukhona abagwaziweyo, lukhona nalo.” 
18_40_1_UJehova wayesemphendula uJobe, wathi: 
18_40_2_“Osolayo uyakuphikisana noSomandla na? Omkhuza uNkulunkulu makaphendule.” 
18_40_3_UJobe wamphendula uJehova, wathi: 
18_40_4_“Bheka, angiyinto yalutho; ngingakuphendula ngokuthini na? Ngibeka isandla sami emlonyeni wami. 
18_40_5_Ngikhulumile kanye, angisayikuphendula, yebo, kabili, kepha angiqhubeki.” 
18_40_6_UJehova wayesemphendula uJobe esesikhwishikhwishini, wathi: 
18_40_7_“Bopha izinkalo zakho njengendoda; ngizakukubuza, wena ungazise. 
18_40_8_Imbala uyachitha ukwahlulela kwami, ungilahle ukuba ube ngolungileyo, na? 
18_40_9_Unengalo njengoNkulunkulu, ungaduma ngezwi elinjengelakhe, na? 
18_40_10_Zihlobise ngobukhosi nangokuphakama, wembathe udumo nenkazimulo. 
18_40_11_Thulula ukuphuphuma kwentukuthelo yakho, ubheke bonke abazidlayo, ubathobise. 
18_40_12_Bheka bonke abaziphakamisayo, ubehlise phansi, unyathele ababi ezindaweni zabo. 
18_40_13_Bafihle othulini kanyekanye, ubophe ubuso babo endaweni ethukusiweyo. 
18_40_14_Khona ngiyakukudumisa nami ngokuthi isandla sakho sokunene singakusindisa. 
18_40_15_“Ake ubheke uBehemoti engamenza kanye nawe; uyadla utshani njengenkabi. 
18_40_16_Bheka-ke, amandla akhe asezinkalweni zakhe, nezikhwepha zakhe zisemisipheni yesisu sakhe. 
18_40_17_Uqinisa umsila wakhe njengomsedari; imisipha yamathanga akhe yalukene. 
18_40_18_Amathambo akhe anjengemibhobo yethusi; izimbambo zakhe zinjengemigoqo yensimbi. 
18_40_19_Ungowokuqala wezidalwa zikaNkulunkulu; ekwenziweni waphiwa inkemba yakhe. 
18_40_20_Izintaba ziyamvezela ukudla, lapho kudlala khona izilwane zonke zasendle. 
18_40_21_Ulala phansi kwezihlahla ezinomthunzi ekusitheni kwemihlanga nasemaxhaphozini. 
18_40_22_Izihlahla ezinomthunzi ziyamsibekela ngomthunzi wazo; iminyezane yasemfuleni iyamphahla. 
18_40_23_Bheka, noma kuphuphuma umfula, akethuki; uyaqalaba, noma iJordani ligijigijimela emlonyeni wakhe. 
18_40_24_Angabanjwa ebhekile, liqhunjuzelwe ikhala lakhe umkhala, na? 
18_41_1_“Ungakhipha uLeviyathani ngodobo, ucindezele phansi ulimi lwakhe ngentambo, na? 
18_41_2_Ungafaka igoda lomhlanga ekhaleni lakhe, ubhoboze umhlathi wakhe ngodobo, na? 
18_41_3_Uyakwenza imikhuleko eminingi kuwe, akhulume kuwe amazwi athambileyo, na? 
18_41_4_Uyakwenza isivumelwano nawe ukuba umthathe abe yinceku kuze kube phakade na? 
18_41_5_Ungadlala naye njengenyoni, umbophele amantombazana akho, na? 
18_41_6_Abathengi bangathengiselana ngaye, bamahlukanise phakathi kwabahwebi, na? 
18_41_7_Ungagcwalisa isikhumba sakhe ngezinhlendla, nekhanda lakhe ngamathatha ezinhlanzi, na? 
18_41_8_Beka isandla sakho kuye; khumbula ukulwa; awusayikukuphinda. 
18_41_9_Bheka, ithemba lakho liyakhohlisa; nangokumbona nje uyawiswa phansi. 
18_41_10_Akakho onesibindi sokumvusa. Ngubani, pho, ongema phambi kwami na? 
18_41_11_Ngubani ongandulele ukuba ngimbuyisele na? Konke okuphansi kwezulu kungokwami. 
18_41_12_“Angiyikuthula ngezitho zakhe, nangendaba yamandla akhe, nangesimo sakhe esihle. 
18_41_13_Ngubani ongakhumula isambatho sakhe esingaphandle; ngubani ongangena phakathi kwemihlathi yakhe emibili na? 
18_41_14_Izicabha zobuso bakhe ngubani ongazivula na? Amazinyo akhe ayesabeka nxazonke. 
18_41_15_Umhlane wakhe uyizinhla zezihlangu; zinamathelisiwe njengangophawu. 
18_41_16_Zisondelene esinye kwesinye, kungangeni moya phakathi kwazo. 
18_41_17_Zinamathelene; zibambelene, azinakwahlukaniswa. 
18_41_18_Ukuthimula kwakhe kubengezela ngokukhanya; amehlo akhe anjengezinkophe zokusa. 
18_41_19_Emlonyeni wakhe kuphuma izihlanti, nezinhlansi zomlilo ziyaqhasha. 
18_41_20_Emakhaleni akhe kuphuma umusi njengasesocweni esibilayo nasemihlangeni eshayo. 
18_41_21_Ukuphefumula kwakhe kokhela amalahle, nelangabi liphuma emlonyeni wakhe. 
18_41_22_Entanyeni yakhe kuhlala amandla, nengebhe iyaxhuma phambi kwakhe. 
18_41_23_Amanya enyama yakhe anamathelene; abunjiwe kuye, awanakususwa. 
18_41_24_Inhliziyo yakhe iqinile njengetshe, yebo, iqinile njengetshe lokusila elingaphansi. 
18_41_25_Ekuvukeni kwakhe abanamandla bayesaba; ngenxa yevuso baphela amandla. 
18_41_26_Noma inkemba ifinyelela kuye, ayinakusiza, noma umkhonto nomcibisholo nengcula. 
18_41_27_Insimbi uyishaya utshani, nethusi ibunga. 
18_41_28_Umcibisholo awunakumxosha; amatshe endwayimana aphenduka amabibi kuye. 
18_41_29_Izagila uzishaya amabibi; uyahleka ukugunquza kwengcula. 
18_41_30_Ingaphansi lakhe linjengezindengezi ezibukhali; uyenaba njengesibhuqo odakeni. 
18_41_31_Wenza inzulu ibile njengekhanzi; wenza ulwandle lufane nomfuma wamafutha. 
18_41_32_Wenza umgudu ukhazimule emva kwakhe; kungathi utwa lungwevu. 
18_41_33_Emhlabeni akukho okufana naye owenziwa abe ngongesabiyo. 
18_41_34_Ubona konke okuphakemeyo; uyinkosi phezu kwabo bonke abantwana bokuzikhukhumeza.” 
18_42_1_UJobe wayesemphendula uJehova, wathi: 
18_42_2_“Ngiyazi ukuthi ungenza konke; alinakuvinjwa icebo lakho. 
18_42_3_Ngubani ositheza iziluleko engenakwazi na? Ngikhulumile lokho ngingakuqondanga, izimangaliso ezinkulu kunami ebengingazazi. 
18_42_4_“Ake ungizwe, kukhulume mina; ngiyakukubuza, wena ungazise. 
18_42_5_Ngangizwile ngawe ngokuzwa kwezindlebe, kepha manje iso lami liyakubona. 
18_42_6_Ngalokho ngiyazinenga, ngizisole othulini nasemlotheni.” 
18_42_7_Kwathi lapho uJehova esekhulumile lawo mazwi kuJobe, uJehova wathi ku-Elifazi umThemani: “Intukuthelo yami iyavuthela wena nabangane bakho ababili, ngokuba anikhulumanga okulungileyo ngami njengenceku yami uJobe. 
18_42_8_Ngalokho zithatheleni izinkunzi eziyisikhombisa nezinqama eziyisikhombisa, niye encekwini yami uJobe, nizinikelele ngazo zibe ngumnikelo wokushiswa; uJobe inceku yami uyakunikhulekela, ngokuba uma ngivuma ubuso bakhe, angiyikwenza kini njengobuwula benu, lokhu ningakhulumanga okulungileyo ngami njengenceku yami uJobe.” 
18_42_9_Base behamba u-Elifazi umThemani, noBilidadi umShuhi, noSofari umNahama, benza njengokukhuluma kukaJehova kubo; uJehova wavuma-ke ubuso bukaJobe. 
18_42_10_UJehova wambuyisa uJobe ekuhluphekeni, lapho ekhulekela abangane bakhe; wenezela kukho konke uJobe ayenakho ngokukuphinda kabili. 
18_42_11_Kwase kufika kuye bonke abafowabo, nabo bonke odadewabo, nabo bonke ababazana naye ngaphambili, badla endlini yakhe; bamkhalela, bamduduza ngakho konke okubi uJehova amehlisele khona, yilowo nalowo wamnika uhlamvu lwemali necici legolide. 
18_42_12_Kanjalo uJehova wabusisa ukugcina kukaJobe kunokuqala kwakhe; waba nezimvu eziyizinkulungwane eziyishumi nane, namakamela ayizinkulungwane eziyisithupha, namabhangqa ayinkulungwane ezinkabi, nezimbongolo zezinsikazi eziyinkulungwane. 
18_42_13_Wayenamadodana ayisikhombisa namadodakazi amathathu. 
18_42_14_Wabiza igama leyokuqala ngokuthi uJemima, negama leyesibili ngokuthi uKesiya, negama leyesithathu ngokuthi uKereni Haphuki. 
18_42_15_Ezweni lonke akufunyanwanga abesifazane abahle njengamadodakazi kaJobe; uyise wabanika ifa phakathi kwabanewabo. 
18_42_16_Emva kwalokho uJobe wayesekhona iminyaka eyikhulu namashumi amane, wabona amadodana akhe namadodana amadodana akhe kwaze kwaba yizizukulwane ezine. 
18_42_17_Wafa-ke uJobe esemdala, esanelisiwe yizinsuku. 
19_1_1_Ubusisiwe umuntu ongahambi ngeziluleko zababi, ongemi endleleni yezoni, ongahlali enkundleni yabaklolodayo, 
19_1_2_kepha okuthokoza kwakhe kusemthethweni kaJehova, ozindla ngomthetho wakhe imini nobusuku. 
19_1_3_Unjengomuthi otshaliwe ngasemifuleni yamanzi, othela isithelo sawo ngesikhathi sawo, oqabunga lawo lingabuni, nakho konke akwenzayo uyakuba nenhlanhla kukho. 
19_1_4_Ababi abanjalo, kepha banjengamakhoba aphephethwa ngumoya. 
19_1_5_Ngalokho ababi abayikuma ekwahlulelweni, nezoni ebandleni labalungileyo. 
19_1_6_Ngokuba uJehova uyayazi indlela yabalungileyo, kodwa indlela yababi yobhubha. 
19_2_1_Kungani ukuba abezizwe baxokozele, nabantu bazindle ngokuyize na? 
19_2_2_Amakhosi omhlaba ayazihlanganisa, nababusi baceba icebo ngoJehova nangogcotshiweyo wakhe ngokuthi: 
19_2_3_“Masigqabule izibopho zabo, silahle izintambo zabo, zisuke kithina.” 
19_2_4_Yena ohlezi ezulwini uyahleka, iNkosi iyabadelela. 
19_2_5_Ibisikhuluma kubo ngentukuthelo yayo, ibethuse ngolaka lwayo, ithi: 
19_2_6_“Nokho ngibekile iNkosi yami eSiyoni, intaba yami engcwele.” 
19_2_7_Ngizakulanda ngesinqumo: uJehova wathi kimi: “Uyindodana yami wena; namuhla ngikuzele. 
19_2_8_Cela kimi, ngikunike abezizwe babe yifa lakho, nemikhawulo yomhlaba ibe yimfuyo yakho. 
19_2_9_Uzakubaphula ngentonga yensimbi, ubaphahlaze njengesitsha sombumbi.” 
19_2_10_Ngakho hlakaniphani nina makhosi; yalekani nina bahluleli bomhlaba. 
19_2_11_Mkhonzeni uJehova ngokwesaba, nethabe ngokuthuthumela. 
19_2_12_Yangeni indodana, ingaze ithukuthele, nibhubhe endleleni, ngokuba ulaka lwayo luyakuvutha masinyane. Babusisiwe bonke abaphephela kuyo. 
19_3_1_Ihubo likaDavide ebalekela u-Abisalomu indodana yakhe. Hhawu, Jehova, ziningi izitha zami. Baningi abangivukelayo. 
19_3_2_Baningi abathi emphefumulweni wami: “Akukho ukusinda kwakhe kuNkulunkulu.” Sela 
19_3_3_Kepha wena Jehova uyisihlangu kimi, uludumo lwami nophakamisa ikhanda lami. 
19_3_4_Ngezwi lami ngiyakhala kuJehova; yena uyangiphendula esentabeni yakhe engcwele. Sela 
19_3_5_Ngalala phansi, ngazunywa ngubuthongo; ngavuka, ngokuba uJehova ungiphasile. 
19_3_6_Angesabi amashumi ezinkulungwane zabantu abangihaqile nxazonke. 
19_3_7_Vuka, Jehova, ungisindise, Nkulunkulu wami, ngokuba zonke izitha zami uzishayile emhlathini, amazinyo ababi uwaphulile. 
19_3_8_Insindiso ingekaJehova; isibusiso sakho masibe kubantu bakho. Sela 
19_4_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. Ihubo likaDavide. Ngiphendule ekukhaleni kwami, Nkulunkulu wokulunga kwami. Ekucindezelweni wangenzela indawo; yiba nomusa kimi, uzwe umkhuleko wami. 
19_4_2_Madodana abantu, koze kube nini ubukhosi bami budunyazwa na? Koze kube nini nithanda okuyize, nifuna amanga, na? Sela 
19_4_3_Yazini ukuthi uJehova uzahlukanisele omesabayo; uJehova uyezwa lapha ngikhala kuye. 
19_4_4_Thukuthelani ningoni; zindlani enhliziyweni yenu okhukhweni lwenu, nithule. Sela 
19_4_5_Nikelani iminikelo yokulunga, nethembe uJehova. 
19_4_6_Baningi abathi: “Ngubani oyakusibonisa okuhle na?” Jehova, phakamisa ukukhanya kobuso bakho phezu kwethu. 
19_4_7_Ubeke injabulo enhliziyweni yami edlula eyamabele abo newayini labo sekuvamile. 
19_4_8_Ngizakucambalala ngokuthula, ngilale ubuthongo, ngokuba wena Jehova wedwa ungihlalisa ngokulondeka. 
19_5_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeNehiloti. Ihubo likaDavide. Yizwa amazwi ami, Jehova, uqaphele ukuzindla kwami. 
19_5_2_Yizwa izwi lokukhala kwami, Nkosi yami, Nkulunkulu wami, ngokuba ngithandaza kuwe. 
19_5_3_Jehova, ekuseni uyalizwa izwi lami; ekuseni ngiyakuzibika kuwe, ngilinde. 
19_5_4_Ngokuba wena awusiye uNkulunkulu othanda okubi; omubi akanakuhlala kuwe. 
19_5_5_Abazidlayo abayikuma phambi kwamehlo akho; uyabazonda bonke abenza okubi. 
19_5_6_Uyabhubhisa abakhuluma amanga; uJehova uyamenyanya umuntu wegazi nowenkohliso. 
19_5_7_Kepha mina ngiyakungena endlini yakho ngobuningi bomusa wakho, ngikhothame ngokukuhlonipha, ngibhekene nendawo yakho engcwele. 
19_5_8_Jehova, ngihole ngokulunga kwakho ngenxa yezitha zami, ulungise indlela yakho phambi kobuso bami. 
19_5_9_Ngokuba alikho iqiniso emlonyeni wabo; izibilini zabo zingukonakala: umphimbo wabo uyithuna elivulekileyo; bayathopha ngolimi lwabo. 
19_5_10_Balahle ngecala, Nkulunkulu. Mabawe ngenxa yamacebo abo, ubawise ngobuningi beziphambeko zabo, ngokuba bahlubukile kuwe. 
19_5_11_Kepha mabajabule bonke abathemba kuwe, bahalalise kuze kube phakade, abathanda igama lakho bethabela kuwe. 
19_5_12_Ngokuba wena Jehova uyambusisa olungileyo; umphahla ngomusa njengesihlangu. 
19_6_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. NgeSheminti. Ihubo likaDavide. Jehova, ungangijezisi ngentukuthelo yakho, ungangishayi ngolaka lwakho. 
19_6_2_Yiba nomusa kimi, Jehova, ngokuba ngidangele; ngiphilise, Jehova, ngokuba amathambo ami ayathuthumela, 
19_6_3_nomphefumulo wami uyathuthumela, kepha wena Jehova, koze kube nini na? 
19_6_4_Buya, Jehova, ukhulule umphefumulo wami, ungisindise ngenxa yesihawu sakho. 
19_6_5_Ngokuba akukho ukukhumbula wena ekufeni; ngubani oyakukubonga endaweni yabafileyo na? 
19_6_6_Ngikhathele ukububula kwami; ngimanzisa icansi lami njalo ebusuku, ngimanzisa ukhukho lwami ngezinyembezi zami. 
19_6_7_Iso lami liyafiphala ngokudabuka; liyaguga ngenxa yezitha zami zonke. 
19_6_8_Dedani kimi nina nonke enenza okubi, ngokuba uJehova ulizwile izwi lokukhala kwami; 
19_6_9_uJehova uzwile ukunxusa kwami, uJehova uyamukela umkhuleko wami. 
19_6_10_Zonke izitha zami ziyakujabha, zishaywe luvalo; ziyakuhlehla, zijabhe ngokuphazima kweso. 
19_7_1_IShigayoni likaDavide alihubela uJehova ngenxa yamazwi kaKushe wakwaBenjamini. Jehova, Nkulunkulu wami, ngiyaphephela kuwe; 
19_7_2_ngisindise kubo bonke abangizingelayo, ungikhulule, bangaze bawudwengule umphefumulo wami njengengonyama eklebhula, kungekho okhululayo. 
19_7_3_Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, uma ngikwenzile lokho, uma kukhona okubi ezandleni zami, 
19_7_4_uma ngiphindise okubi kohlalisene nami ngokuthula, ngaphanga isitha sami kungekho sici,
