19_7_5_isitha masiwuzingele umphefumulo wami, siwufice, sikunyathele phansi ukuphila kwami, nesithunzi sami sisilahle phansi othulini. Sela 
19_7_6_Sukuma, Jehova, ngentukuthelo yakho, uvuke ngenxa yolaka lwezitha zami, ungimele; ngokuba uyalezile ukwahlulela. 
19_7_7_Umhlangano wezizwe mawukuphahle, ubuyele phezulu ngaphezu kwawo. 
19_7_8_UJehova uyahlulela izizwe; ngahlulele, Jehova, ngokulunga kwami nangobuqotho bami obukimi. 
19_7_9_Makuphele ukonakala kwababi, kepha olungileyo mawumqinise. Nguwe phela ohlola izinhliziyo nezinso, Nkulunkulu olungileyo. 
19_7_10_Isihlangu sami sikuNkulunkulu osindisa abaqotho ngenhliziyo. 
19_7_11_UNkulunkulu ungumahluleli olungileyo; unguNkulunkulu othukuthela imihla yonke. 
19_7_12_Uma umuntu engaphenduki, uyakulola inkemba yakhe, ansale umnsalo wakhe, awulungisele, 
19_7_13_izikhali zokubulala azibhekisele kuye; imicibisholo uyenza ishise. 
19_7_14_Unemihelo ngobubi; ukhulelwe ngukona, uzala amanga. 
19_7_15_Umgodi uwumba, uwugubha, kepha ukhalakathela egebeni alenzileyo. 
19_7_16_Ukwelelesa kwakhe kubuyela ekhanda lakhe; ubudlwangudlwangu bakhe behlela okhakhayini lwakhe. 
19_7_17_Ngizakumbonga uJehova ngokokulunga kwakhe, ngihubele igama likaJehova oPhezukonke. 
19_8_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeGititi. Ihubo likaDavide. Jehova Nkosi yethu, igama lakho liyababazeka kangaka emhlabeni wonke! wena owabeka inkazimulo yakho ezulwini. 
19_8_2_Ngomlomo wezingane nowabancelayo wagxilisa amandla ngenxa yabamelene nawe ukuba uthulise isitha nophindisayo. 
19_8_3_Lapha ngibuka izulu lakho, umsebenzi weminwe yakho, inyanga nezinkanyezi ozimisileyo, 
19_8_4_umuntu uyini ukuba umkhumbule, nendodana yomuntu ukuba uyinake na? 
19_8_5_Wamenza waba ngaphansana kukaNkulunkulu, wamqhelisa ngenkazimulo nangobukhosi. 
19_8_6_Wamenza abe ngumbusi phezu kwemisebenzi yezandla zakho; konke wakubeka phansi kwezinyawo zakhe: 
19_8_7_izimvu, nezinkomo zonke, yebo, nezilwane zasendle, 
19_8_8_nezinyoni zezulu, nezinhlanzi zolwandle, nakho konke okuhamba ezindleleni zolwandle. 
19_8_9_Jehova Nkosi yethu, igama lakho liyababazeka kangaka emhlabeni wonke! 
19_9_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Ukufa kwendodana. Ihubo likaDavide. Ngiyakumbonga uJehova ngayo yonke inhliziyo yami; ngiyakulanda zonke izimangaliso zakho. 
19_9_2_Ngiyakujabula, ngethabe kuwe; ngiyakudumisa igama lakho wena oPhezukonke, 
19_9_3_ngokuba izitha zami zibuyela emuva, ziwa, zibhubha ebusweni bakho, 
19_9_4_ngokuba ulimelele ilungelo lami nendaba yami, uhlezi esihlalweni sobukhosi, ungumahluleli olungileyo. 
19_9_5_Ujezisile abezizwe, wabhubhisa ababi; igama labo ulesulile kuze kube phakade naphakade. 
19_9_6_Izitha ziphelile, zachitheka kuze kube phakade; imizi wayisimbula, ukukhunjulwa kwayo kwaphela nya. 
19_9_7_UJehova uyabusa kuze kube phakade; isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi usimisela ukwahlulela; 
19_9_8_umhlaba uyakuwahlulela ngokulunga, athethe amacala ezizwe ngobuqotho. 
19_9_9_UJehova uyinqaba yocindezelweyo, uyinqaba ezikhathini zokuhlupheka. 
19_9_10_Nabalaziyo igama lakho bayakwethemba wena; ngokuba wena Jehova awubashiyi abakufunayo. 
19_9_11_Hubani nimdumise uJehova ohlezi eSiyoni; memezelani ezizweni izenzo zakhe ezinkulu. 
19_9_12_Ngokuba yena ophindisela igazi uyabakhumbula abahluphekayo; akakhohlwa ukukhala kwabo. 
19_9_13_Yiba nomusa kimi, Jehova; kubone engihlupheka ngakho ngabangizondayo wena ongiphakamisa emasangweni okufa, 
19_9_14_ukuze ngilande ngalo lonke udumo lwakho, ngethabe ngokusindisa kwakho emasangweni endodakazi yaseSiyoni. 
19_9_15_Abezizwe bashone phansi egebeni abalenzileyo; unyawo lwabo lubhajwe esihibeni abasifihlileyo. 
19_9_16_UJehova uzazisile, wahlulela; umcuphile omubi emsebenzini wezandla zakhe. Higayoni. Sela 
19_9_17_Ababi bayakubuyela endaweni yabafileyo, bonke abezizwe abakhohlwa uNkulunkulu. 
19_9_18_Ngokuba ompofu kayikukhohlakala njalo; ithemba labahluphekayo aliyikunyamalala kuze kube phakade. 
19_9_19_Vuka, Jehova! Mawungavumi ukuba abantu bahlule; abezizwe mabahlulelwe ebusweni bakho. 
19_9_20_Mabashaywe luvalo, Jehova; abezizwe mabazazi ukuthi bangabantu nje. Sela 
19_10_1_Jehova, umeleni kude na? Uzifihlelani ubuso ezikhathini zokuhlupheka na? 
19_10_2_Ngokuqhosha komubi ompofu uyahlupheka; mababanjwe ngamacebo abawacebileyo. 
19_10_3_Ngokuba omubi uyazigabisa ngokufisa komphefumulo wakhe, nohulazayo uyamvalelisa, amdelele uJehova. 
19_10_4_Omubi ngokuzikhukhumeza kobuso bakhe uthi: “Akanaki lutho; akakho uNkulunkulu,” injalo imicabango yakhe yonke. 
19_10_5_Izindlela zakhe zithembekile izikhathi zonke; izahlulelo zakho ziphakeme kakhulu kunokubona kwakhe; zonke izitha zakhe uyazidelela. 
19_10_6_Uthi enhliziyweni yakhe: “Angiyikuzanyazanyiswa; izizukulwane nezizukulwane angisoze ngehlelwa ngozi.” 
19_10_7_Umlomo wakhe ugcwele isiqalekiso nenkohliso nobudlova; ngaphansi kolimi lwakhe kukhona ukwelelesa nokonakala. 
19_10_8_Uhlezi ezindaweni zokuqamekela zemizi; ezindaweni ezisithekileyo uyambulala ongenacala; amehlo akhe ayamhlwaya othithibeleyo. 
19_10_9_Endaweni esithekileyo uqamekela njengengonyama emphandwini wayo; uhlomele ukumbamba ohluphekileyo; uyambamba ohluphekileyo ngokumngenisa esihibeni sakhe. 
19_10_10_Uyanyonyoba, uyakhothama, abathithibeleyo bawe ngamazipho akhe. 
19_10_11_Uthi enhliziyweni yakhe: “UNkulunkulu ukhohliwe, ubusithezile ubuso bakhe; akasoze wakubona nanini.” 
19_10_12_Vuka, Jehova! Nkulunkulu, phakamisa isandla sakho, ungakhohlwa abahluphekileyo. 
19_10_13_Kungani ukuba omubi adelele uNkulunkulu, athi enhliziyweni yakhe: “Awuyikukunaka,” na? 
19_10_14_Ubonile wena; ngokuba ukukhathazeka nokuhlupheka uyakubona wena ukuze ukubeke esandleni sakho; othithibeleyo uyazinikela kuwe; wena ungumsizi wentandane. 
19_10_15_Yaphula ingalo yomubi; buphenyisise ububi besoni, ukuze ungabe usabufumana. 
19_10_16_UJehova uyinkosi kuze kube phakade naphakade; abezizwe bayachithwa emhlabeni wakhe. 
19_10_17_Jehova, uyakuzwa ukulangazela kwabamnene; uyaqinisa inhliziyo yabo, indlebe yakho uyibeka kubo 
19_10_18_ukuba wahlulele intandane nocindezelweyo, ukuze umuntu wasemhlabeni angabe esabanga uvalo. 
19_11_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Ngiyaphephela kuJehova; nisho kanjani kuwo umphefumulo wami ukuthi: “Balekela entabeni yenu njengenyoni, na? 
19_11_2_Ngokuba bhekani, ababi bawunsala umnsalo wabo, babeka imicibisholo yabo entanjeni ukuba bacibishele ebumnyameni abaqotho ngenhliziyo. 
19_11_3_Nxa izisekelo zidilizwa, olungileyo angenzani na?” 
19_11_4_UJehova usethempelini lakhe elingcwele, uJehova, isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi sisezulwini; amehlo akhe ayabuka, izinkophe zakhe ziyahlola abantwana babantu. 
19_11_5_UJehova uyamhlola olungileyo; kepha omubi nothanda ubudlwangudlwangu umphefumulo wakhe uyamzonda. 
19_11_6_Unisa izihibe phezu kwababi; umlilo nesibabule nomoya oshisayo kuyisabelo sendebe yabo. 
19_11_7_Ngokuba uJehova ulungile, uyathanda ukulunga; oqotho uyakubheka ubuso bakhe. 
19_12_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeSheminiti. Ihubo likaDavide. Siza, Jehova, ngokuba owesaba uNkulunkulu akasekho, ngokuba banyamalele abathembekileyo kubantwana babantu. 
19_12_2_Bakhuluma amanga, kwaba yilowo nalowo kumakhelwane wakhe; ngezindebe ezithophayo bakhuluma nganhliziyombili. 
19_12_3_UJehova uyakunquma zonke izindebe ezithophayo, ulimi olukhuluma amazwi amakhulu, 
19_12_4_abathi: “Siyakunqoba ngolimi lwethu; izindebe zethu zinathi; ngubani oyinkosi phezu kwethu na?” 
19_12_5_“Ngenxa yokubandezeka kwabahluphekileyo nangokububula kwabampofu ngizakuvuka kalokhu,” usho uJehova, “ngimbeke ekusindisweni akulangazelelayo.” 
19_12_6_Amazwi kaJehova angamazwi ahlanzekileyo, anjengesiliva elihlanjululwe esithandweni emhlabathini, lihlanjululwe kasikhombisa. 
19_12_7_Wena Jehova uyakubagcina, ubavikele kulesi sizukulwane kuze kube phakade. 
19_12_8_Abangamesabi uNkulunkulu bayashanguza nxazonke, lapho amanyala ephakeme kubantwana babantu. 
19_13_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Koze kube nini, Jehova, ungikhohlwa njalonjalo na? Koze kube nini usitheza ubuso bakho kimi na? 
19_13_2_Koze kube nini ngikhathazeka emphefumulweni wami, nginosizi enhliziyweni yami usuku lonke, na? Koze kube nini isitha sami siziphakamisa phezu kwami na? 
19_13_3_Bheka neno, ungiphendule, Jehova Nkulunkulu wami; khanyisa amehlo ami, ngize ngingalali ubuthongo bokufa, 
19_13_4_ukuze isitha sami singasho ukuthi: “Ngimahlulile,” funa abamelene nami bethabe lapha ngintengayo. 
19_13_5_Kepha ngiwuthembile umusa wakho; inhliziyo yami izakwethaba ngensindiso yakho; 
19_13_6_ngizakuhlabelela kuJehova, ngokuba ungenzele okuhle. 
19_14_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide. Isiwula sithi enhliziyweni yaso: “Akakho uNkulunkulu.” Yonakele, iyanengeka imisebenzi yabo; akakho owenza okuhle. 
19_14_2_UJehova uyabuka esezulwini abantwana babantu ukucinga ukuba ukhona yini oqondayo, ofuna uNkulunkulu. 
19_14_3_Baphambukile bonke, bonakele bonke; akakho owenza okuhle, akakho noyedwa. 
19_14_4_Abaqondi lutho yini bonke abenza okubi, abadla abantu bami, njengokuba bedla isinkwa, bangakhuleki kuJehova, na? 
19_14_5_Khona besaba nokwesaba, ngokuba uNkulunkulu ukuso isizukulwane sabalungileyo. 
19_14_6_Icebo lohluphekileyo niyalijabhisa, kepha uJehova uyisiphephelo sakhe. 
19_14_7_Sengathi ukusindiswa kuka-Israyeli kungavela eSiyoni. Mhla uJehova ebuyisa ukuthunjwa kwabantu bakhe uJakobe uyakwethaba, u-Israyeli ajabule. 
19_15_1_Jehova, ngubani oyakuhlala etendeni lakho na? Ngubani oyakwakha entabeni yakho engcwele na? 
19_15_2_Yilowo ohamba ngobuqotho nowenza ukulunga, okhuluma iqiniso enhliziyweni yakhe, 
19_15_3_ongahlebi ngolimi lwakhe, ongamoni umngane wakhe, nongamhlazi umakhelwane wakhe; 
19_15_4_obuka onengekayo ngokuzakumenyanya, kepha ebazisa abamesabayo uNkulunkulu; ofunga ngokuzakumlimaza, nokho angalaphuli izwi lakhe; 
19_15_5_ongatsheleki muntu imali yakhe ukuba izale, nongamukeli umvuzo ngongenacala; owenza lokhu akayikuzanyazanyiswa naphakade. 
19_16_1_IMiktamu likaDavide. Ngilondoloze, Nkulunkulu, ngokuba ngiyaphephela kuwe. 
19_16_2_Ngithi kuJehova: “Wena uyiNkosi yami; anginakho okuhle ngaphandle kwakho.” 
19_16_3_Abangcwele abasemhlabeni, abayizikhulu, yonke intokozo yami ikubona. 
19_16_4_Ziningi izinhlupheko zabazizuzela omunye unkulunkulu; angiyikunikela ngeminikelo yabo yegazi; angiyikuwaphatha amagama abo ngezindebe zami. 
19_16_5_UJehova uyisabelo esahlukaniselwe mina, nendebe yami; wena uqinisa ifa lami. 
19_16_6_Izabelo zingehlele ezindaweni ezinhle, yebo, nginalo ifa elihle. 
19_16_7_Ngiyakumbonga uJehova ongilulekayo; nasebusuku izinso zami ziyangiyala. 
19_16_8_Ngimbeke uJehova njalo phambi kwami, ngokuba ungakwesokunene sami, angiyikuzanyazanyiswa. 
19_16_9_Ngakho-ke inhliziyo yami iyajabula, nomphefumulo wami uyethaba, nenyama yami iyakuhlala ngokwethemba. 
19_16_10_Ngokuba awuyikunikela umphefumulo wami endaweni yabafileyo; awuyikuvuma ukuba ongcwele wakho abone ukubola. 
19_16_11_Uyakungazisa indlela yokuphila; ukugcwala kwenjabulo kusebusweni bakho; intokozo isesandleni sakho sokunene kuze kube phakade. 
19_17_1_Umkhuleko kaDavide. Yizwa ukulunga, Jehova, ulalele ukukhala kwami, ubeke indlebe emkhulekweni wami ophuma ezindebeni ezingenankohliso. 
19_17_2_Ukwahlulelwa kwami makuvele ebusweni bakho; amehlo akho mawabheke okulungileyo. 
19_17_3_Uyalinga inhliziyo yami; ungihambele ebusuku, uyangihlolisisa, awufumani lutho; ngiyahlosa ukuba umlomo wami ungaphambuki. 
19_17_4_Emisebenzini yabantu ngiyazilinda, ezindleleni zezidlova ngezwi lezindebe zakho. 
19_17_5_Izinyathelo zami zinamathela ezinyaweni zakho, izinyawo zami azisheleli. 
19_17_6_Ngikhala kuwe, ngokuba uyangizwa, Nkulunkulu; beka indlebe yakho kimi, uzwe izwi lami. 
19_17_7_Bonakalisa isihe sakho esimangalisayo wena osindisa ngesandla sakho sokunene labo abaphephela kuwe kwababahlaselayo. 
19_17_8_Ngigcine njengenhlamvu yeso, ungisithe ethunzini lamaphiko akho 
19_17_9_kubo ababi abangilimazayo, kuzo izitha zokuphila kwami ezingihaqileyo. 
19_17_10_Bavalelwe ngamanoni abo, bakhuluma ngokuzidla ngomlomo wabo. 
19_17_11_Noma siyaphi, bayangizungeza; amehlo abo bawabhekisa kukho ukungiwisa phansi emhlabathini. 
19_17_12_Unjengengonyama ehahela ukubamba, njengebhongo lengonyama elilele ezindaweni ezisithekileyo. 
19_17_13_Vuka, Jehova, umhlangabeze, umwise phansi; sindisa umphefumulo wami komubi ngenkemba yakho, 
19_17_14_nakubantu ngesandla sakho, Jehova, abantu baleli zwe abasabelo sabo sikulokhu kuphila, nabasisu sabo usigcwalisa ngengcebo yakho, nabashiyela izingane zabo okusele kubo. 
19_17_15_Kepha mina ngiyakubuka ubuso bakho ekulungeni, ngisuthe ngesimo sakho ekuvukeni kwami. 
19_18_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide, inceku kaJehova, owakhuluma amazwi aleli hubo kuJehova mhla uJehova emsindisile esandleni sezitha zakhe zonke nasesandleni sikaSawule. Wathi: Ngiyakuthanda, Jehova, mandla ami. 
19_18_2_Jehova uyidwala lami, nenqaba yami, nomkhululi wami; uNkulunkulu wami uyidwala lami engiphephela kulo, nesihlangu sami, nophondo lokusindiswa kwami, inqaba yami ephakemeyo. 
19_18_3_Ngiyamemeza kuJehova odumisekayo, ngisindiswe ezitheni zami. 
19_18_4_Izintambo zokufa zangizungelezela, izikhukhula zokona zangethusa. 
19_18_5_Izintambo zasendaweni yabafileyo zangizungeza, izihibe zokufa zangehlela. 
19_18_6_Ekuhluphekeni kwami ngambiza uJehova, ngakhala kuNkulunkulu wami; walizwa izwi lami esethempelini lakhe; ukukhala kwami phambi kwakhe kwangena ezindlebeni zakhe. 
19_18_7_Umhlaba wawusuzamazama, wadikizela; izisekelo zezintaba zathuthumela, zagubhuzela ngokuba ethukuthele. 
19_18_8_Kwenyuka umusi emakhaleni akhe, nomlilo odlayo emlonyeni wakhe; amalahle avutha kuye. 
19_18_9_Wathobisa izulu, wehla; ubumnyama babuphansi kwezinyawo zakhe. 
19_18_10_Wakhwela phezu kwekherubi, wandiza; washweza ngamaphiko omoya. 
19_18_11_Ubumnyama wabenza isisibekelo, idokodo lakhe elimphahlayo; amanzi amnyama, amafu anzima. 
19_18_12_Ekukhazimuleni okuphambi kwakhe amafu akhe abanga phambili, isichotho namalahle avuthayo. 
19_18_13_UJehova waduma ezulwini; oPhezukonke walizwakalisa izwi lakhe: isichotho namalahle avuthayo. 
19_18_14_Wathuma imicibisholo yakhe, wabangquzula, nemibani eminingi, wabadidizelisa. 
19_18_15_Kwase kubonakala imisinga yamanzi; izisekelo zomhlaba zambulwa ngesijeziso sakho, Jehova, ngokufutha komoya wamakhala akho. 
19_18_16_Waselula isandla sakhe ephezulu, wangibamba; wangikhipha emanzini amaningi. 
19_18_17_Wangophula esitheni sami esinamandla nakubo abangizondayo, ngokuba base bengahlulile. 
19_18_18_Bangihlasela ngosuku lwesigemegeme sami, kepha uJehova waba yinsika yami. 
19_18_19_Wangiphumisela endaweni ebanzi; wangikhulula, ngokuba ebethokoza ngami. 
19_18_20_UJehova wangivuza ngokokulunga kwami; wangibuyisela njengokuhlanzeka kwezandla zami. 
19_18_21_Ngokuba ngizigcinile izindlela zikaJehova, angimukanga kuNkulunkulu wami ngokushinga. 
19_18_22_Ngokuba yonke imithetho yakhe yayiphambi kwami, nezimiso zakhe angivumanga ukuba zisuke kimi. 
19_18_23_Ngangiphelele kuye; ngabuxwaya ububi. 
19_18_24_UJehova wayesebuyisela kimi njengokulunga kwami, njengokuhlanzeka kwezandla zami phambi kwamehlo akhe. 
19_18_25_Kothembekileyo uyazibonakalisa uthembekile; kumuntu oqotho uzibonakalisa uqotho; 
19_18_26_kohlanzekileyo uyazibonakalisa uhlanzekile; koyisigwegwe uyazibonakalisa unenkani. 
19_18_27_Ngokuba wena uyabasindisa abantu abathobekileyo, kepha amehlo abaqhoshileyo uyawathobisa. 
19_18_28_Ngokuba wena uyokhela isibani sami; uJehova uNkulunkulu wami uyakhanyisa ubumnyama bami. 
19_18_29_Ngokuba ngawe ngingahlasela impi; ngoNkulunkulu wami ngingeqa ugange. 
19_18_30_Indlela kaNkulunkulu iphelele; izwi likaJehova lihlanzekile; yena uyisihlangu kubo bonke abaphephela kuye. 
19_18_31_Ngokuba ngubani onguNkulunkulu ngaphandle kukaJehova, ngubani oyidwala ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu wethu na? 
19_18_32_uNkulunkulu ongibhincisa amandla, owenza indlela yami ilunge; 
19_18_33_owenza izinyawo zami zibe njengezendluzelekazi, angimise emagqumeni ami; 
19_18_34_ofundisa izandla zami ukulwa, ukuze izingalo zami zinsale umnsalo wethusi. 
19_18_35_Wena unginikile isihlangu sensindiso yakho, isandla sakho sokunene singisekele, nobumnene bakho bungikhulisile. 
19_18_36_Amabanga okunyathela kwami uwandisile; amaqakala ami awaxegi. 
19_18_37_Ngazixosha izitha zami, ngazifica; angibuyanga ngingakaziqedi. 
19_18_38_Ngaziphahlaza, zaze zahluleka ukuvuka; zawa phansi kwezinyawo zami. 
19_18_39_Wangibhincisa amandla okulwa; ababengivukele wabathobisa phansi kwami. 
19_18_40_Wangifulathelisela izitha zami, nabangizondayo ngabaqothula. 
19_18_41_Bakhala, kepha akubangakho osindisayo, nakuJehova, kodwa akaze aphendula. 
19_18_42_Ngabacolisisa njengothuli emoyeni; ngabalahla njengensila ezitaladini. 
19_18_43_Wangikhulula ezimpini zabantu; wangimisa ngaba yinhloko yabezizwe; abantu engingabaziyo bangikhonza. 
19_18_44_Banele ukungizwa nje ngendlebe, base bengilalela; abafo bazithoba phansi kwami. 
19_18_45_Abafo babuna, baphuma ezinqabeni zabo bethuthumele. 
19_18_46_UJehova usekhona, malidunyiswe iDwala lami; makaphakanyiswe uNkulunkulu wensindiso yami, 
19_18_47_uNkulunkulu onginikile impindiselo, wathobisa izizwe phansi kwami; 
19_18_48_ongikhululile ezitheni zami, yebo, ongiphakamisile phezu kwabangivukelayo, wangikhulula kumuntu oyisidlwangudlwangu. 
19_18_49_Ngalokho-ke ngizakukubonga phakathi kwabezizwe, Jehova, ngilihubele igama lakho. 
19_18_50_Uyenza insindiso ibe nkulu enkosini yakhe; uyenza umusa kogcotshiweyo wakhe uDavide nasenzalweni yakhe kuze kube phakade. 
19_19_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Amazulu ayalanda ngenkazimulo kaJehova, nomkhathi ushumayela umsebenzi wezandla zakhe. 
19_19_2_Usuku luyalandisa usuku inkulumo, nobusuku bushumayeza ubusuku ukwazi. 
19_19_3_Akukho ukukhuluma, awakho amazwi, lapho izwi lingezwakali khona. 
19_19_4_Isilinganiso sawo siphumele emhlabeni wonke namazwi awo emkhawulweni womhlaba. Ulimisele ilanga itende kulo. 
19_19_5_Lona linjengomyeni ephuma ekamelweni lakhe; lijabulisa okweqhawe ukugijima endleleni yalo. 
19_19_6_Ukuphuma kwalo kusemkhawulweni wezulu; ukuzungeza kwalo kuya ekugcineni kwalo; akukho okufihlelwe ukushisa kwalo. 
19_19_7_Umthetho kaJehova uphelele, uvusa umphefumulo; ukufakaza kukaJehova kuqinisile, kuhlakaniphisa oyisiwula. 
19_19_8_Imiyalo kaJehova ilungile, ijabulisa inhliziyo; umyalezo kaJehova uhlanzekile, ukhanyisa amehlo. 
19_19_9_Ukumesaba uJehova kuhlanzekile, kumi kuze kube phakade; imithetho kaJehova iyiqiniso, ilungile yonke. 
19_19_10_Inxanelekile kunegolide, kunegolide elihlanzekileyo eliningi; imnandi kunezinyosi, kunoju lwamakhekheba. 
19_19_11_Nenceku yakho iyayalwa ngayo; oyigcinayo uyakuba nomvuzo omkhulu. 
19_19_12_Ngubani owazi iziphosiso zakhe na? Ngithethelele kwezisithekileyo. 
19_19_13_Yilonde inceku yakho nasezonweni ezihlazisayo; mazingabusi phezu kwami. Yikhona ngiyakube ngiphelele, ngingabe ngisaba necala eziphambekweni ezinkulu. 
19_19_14_Amazwi omlomo wami nokuzindla kwenhliziyo yami makuthandeke ebusweni bakho, Jehova, dwala lami nomhlengi wami. 
19_20_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. UJehova makakuphendule ngosuku lokuhlupheka; igama likaNkulunkulu kaJakobe malikuvikele. 
19_20_2_Makakuthumele usizo lwasendlini engcwele, akusekele ngamandla aseSiyoni. 
19_20_3_Makakhumbule yonke iminikelo yakho yokudliwa, awamukele umnikelo wakho wokushiswa. Sela 
19_20_4_Makakunike njengokwenhliziyo yakho, afeze icebo lakho lonke. 
19_20_5_Siyahalalisa ngensindiso yakho, siphakamise ibhandela egameni likaNkulunkulu wethu; uJehova makagcwalise zonke izicelo zakho. 
19_20_6_Kalokhu ngiyazi ukuthi uJehova uyamsindisa ogcotshiweyo wakhe: esezulwini lakhe elingcwele uyamphendula ngamandla okusindisa esandla sakhe sokunene. 
19_20_7_Abanye izinqola, abanye amahhashi, kepha thina sibonga igama likaJehova uNkulunkulu wethu. 
19_20_8_Bayathoba, bawe; kepha thina siyavuka, sime. 
19_20_9_Sindisa, Jehova! INkosi mayisiphendule ngosuku lokukhala kwethu. 
19_21_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Jehova, inkosi iyajabula ngamandla akho; iyethaba kangakanani ngensindiso yakho. 
19_21_2_Uyinikile njengokwenhliziyo yayo, nesicelo sezindebe zayo awusinqabanga. Sela 
19_21_3_Ngokuba wayihlangabeza ngezibusiso zokuhle; wafaka umqhele wegolide elihle ekhanda layo. 
19_21_4_Yacela ukuphila kuwe, wayinika khona, izinsuku ezinde kuze kube phakade naphakade. 
19_21_5_Inkulu inkazimulo yayo ngenxa yensindiso yakho; udumo nobukhosi ukubeka phezu kwayo. 
19_21_6_Ngokuba uyibeka ukuba ibe yisibusiso kuze kube phakade; uyithokozisa ngenjabulo ebusweni bakho. 
19_21_7_Ngokuba inkosi iyethemba uJehova, nangenxa yesihawu soPhezukonke ayiyikuzanyazanyiswa. 
19_21_8_Isandla sakho siyakufumana zonke izitha zakho; esokunene sakho siyakubafumana abakuzondayo. 
19_21_9_Uyakubenza babe njengesithando somlilo, nxa ubonakalisa ubuso bakho; uJehova uyakubagwinya ngentukuthelo yakhe, umlilo uyakubaqeda. 
19_21_10_Isithelo sabo uyakusichitha emhlabeni kanye nenzalo yabo phakathi kwabantwana babantu. 
19_21_11_Ngokuba babehlosa okubi, baceba icebo; kepha bayahluleka. 
19_21_12_Ngokuba uyakubafulathelisa; ngosinga lomnsalo wakho uyakukhomba ebusweni babo. 
19_21_13_Mawuphakame, Jehova, emandleni akho; thina siyakuhlabelela, sidumise amandla akho. 
19_22_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Indluzelekazi yokusa. Ihubo likaDavide. Nkulunkulu wami, Nkulunkulu wami, ungishiyeleni na? Ukude namazwi okubububula kwami nokusindiswa kwami. 
19_22_2_Nkulunkulu wami, ngikhala emini, kepha awuphenduli, nasebusuku, ngingabi nakuthula. 
19_22_3_Kepha wena ungoNgcwele ohlezi ezibongweni zika-Israyeli. 
19_22_4_Obaba bethu babekwethemba; babethemba, wena wabakhulula. 
19_22_5_Bakhala kuwe, bakhululwa; bethemba wena, abaze bajabha. 
19_22_6_Kepha mina ngiyimphethu, angisiye umuntu; ngiyisithuko sabantu, ngiyindelelo yabantu. 
19_22_7_Bonke abangibonayo bayangiklolodela, baphukule imilomo, banikine amakhanda, 
19_22_8_bathi: “Zinikele kuJehova; makamsindise, amkhulule, njengokuba emthanda.” 
19_22_9_Impela nguwe owangikhipha esizalweni, wangikhoselisa ngasemabeleni kamame. 
19_22_10_Ngaphonswa phezu kwakho kwasesizalweni; unguNkulunkulu wami kwasesizalweni sikamame. 
19_22_11_Ungabi kude nami, ngokuba inhlupheko iseduze, nosizayo akakho. 
19_22_12_Izinkunzi eziningi zingibunganyele, ezinamandla zaseBashani zingizungezile. 
19_22_13_Zingikhamisele umlomo wazo njengengonyama edwengulayo nebhodlayo. 
19_22_14_Ngichithiwe njengamanzi; onke amathambo ami enyele; inhliziyo yami injengengcina, incibilikile phakathi kwezibilini zami. 
19_22_15_Amandla ami omile njengodengezi; ulimi lwami lunamathela olwangeni lwami; ungibeka othulini lokufa. 
19_22_16_Ngokuba izinja ziyangibungayela; umbonda wababi ungizungezile; izandla zami nezinyawo zami bazibhobozile. 
19_22_17_Ngingabala onke amathambo ami; bayabukela, bangibuke bengiklibhizela. 
19_22_18_Babelana izingubo zami, benzelana inkatho ngesambatho sami. 
19_22_19_Kepha wena Jehova mawungabi kude, wena mandla ami, shesha ungisize. 
19_22_20_Sindisa umphefumulo wami enkembeni, ukuphila kwami emandleni ezinja. 
19_22_21_Ngisindise emlonyeni wengonyama; nasezimpondweni zezinyathi uyangizwa. 
19_22_22_Ngiyakushumayeza abafowethu igama lakho, ngikudumise phakathi kwebandla. 
19_22_23_Nina enesaba uJehova, mbongeni; nina nonke nzalo kaJakobe, mdumiseni, nimesabe nina nonke nzalo ka-Israyeli. 
19_22_24_Ngokuba akadelelanga, akanengwanga yinhlupheko yohluphekayo; akamfihlelanga ubuso bakhe, kepha nalapha ekhala kuye, wezwa. 
19_22_25_Kuyakuvela kuwe ukudumisa kwami ebandleni elikhulu; izithembiso zami ngiyakuzigcwalisa phambi kwabamesabayo. 
19_22_26_Abamnene bayakudla, basuthe; abafuna uJehova bayakumdumisa; inhliziyo yenu mayiphile kuze kube phakade. 
19_22_27_Imikhawulo yonke yomhlaba iyakukhumbula, iphendukele kuJehova, nezizukulwane zonke zezizwe ziyakukhuleka ebusweni bakho. 
19_22_28_Ngokuba umbuso ungokaJehova; nguye obusa izizwe. 
19_22_29_Bonke abacebileyo bomhlaba bayakudla, bakhuleke; bonke abehlela othulini bayakukhothama phambi kwakhe, naye ongenakugcina umphefumulo wakhe ekuphileni. 
19_22_30_Inzalo iyakumkhonza; isizukulwane esizayo siyakulandiswa ngayo iNkosi. 
19_22_31_Bayakuza bashumayele ukulunga kwayo kuso isizwe esiyakuzalwa ngokuthi ikwenzile. 
19_23_1_Ihubo likaDavide. UJehova ungumalusi wami, angiyikuswela. 
19_23_2_Uyangilalisa emadlelweni aluhlaza; uyangiyisa ngasemanzini okuphumula. 
19_23_3_Ubuyisa umphefumulo wami; uyangihola ezindleleni zokulunga ngenxa yegama lakhe. 
19_23_4_Noma ngihamba esigodini sethunzi lokufa, angesabi okubi, ngokuba wena unami, intonga yakho nodondolo lwakho ziyangiduduza. 
19_23_5_Ulungisa itafula phambi kwami ebusweni bezitha zami; ugcoba ikhanda lami ngamafutha; indebe yami iyachichima. 
19_23_6_Impela okuhle nomusa kuyakungilandela imihla yonke yokuphila kwami; ngiyakuhlala endlini kaJehova kuze kube phakade. 
19_24_1_ElikaDavide. Ihubo. Umhlaba ungokaJehova nokugcwala kwawo, izwe nabakhileyo kulo. 
19_24_2_Ngokuba yena wawusekela phezu kwezilwandle, wawumisa phezu kwemifula. 
19_24_3_Ngubani oyakukhuphukela entabeni kaJehova, ngubani oyakuma endaweni yakhe engcwele na? 
19_24_4_Yilowo onezandla ezingenacala nenhliziyo ehlanzekileyo, ongaphenduleli umphefumulo wakhe emangeni nongafungi ngenkohliso. 
19_24_5_Uyakwamukela isibusiso kuJehova nokulunga kuNkulunkulu wensindiso yakhe. 
19_24_6_Yilesi esiyisizukulwane sabamfunayo; bona abasinga ubuso bakho bangabantwana bakaJakobe. Sela 
19_24_7_Phakamisani, masango, izinhloko zenu; nani minyango yaphakade, phakamani ukuba iNkosi yenkazimulo ingene. 
19_24_8_Ingubani le Nkosi yenkazimulo na? InguJehova onamandla, oyiqhawe, uJehova oyiqhawe lokulwa. 
19_24_9_Phakamisani, masango, izinhloko zenu; nani minyango yaphakade, phakamani ukuba iNkosi yenkazimulo ingene. 
19_24_10_Ingubani le Nkosi yenkazimulo na? UJehova Sebawoti nguyena oyiNkosi yenkazimulo. Sela 
19_25_1_ElikaDavide. Jehova, ngiphakamisela kuwena umphefumulo wami. 
19_25_2_Nkulunkulu wami, ngiyethemba kuwe; mawungangijabhisi; izitha zami mazingethabi ngami. 
19_25_3_Yebo, akuyikujabha noyedwa kwabakulindelayo; bayakujabha abaphambuka ngeze. 
19_25_4_Ngazise imendo yakho, Jehova; ngifundise izindlela zakho. 
19_25_5_Ngihambise eqinisweni lakho, ungifundise, ngokuba wena unguNkulunkulu wensindiso yami; ngilindela wena usuku lonke. 
19_25_6_Khumbula, Jehova, ububele bakho nomusa wakho, ngokuba kukhona kwaphakade. 
19_25_7_Ungazikhumbuli izono zobusha bami neziphambeko zami; ngikhumbule ngokomusa wakho ngenxa yobubele bakho, Jehova. 
19_25_8_UJehova muhle, ulungile; ngalokho ufundisa izoni indlela. 
19_25_9_Abathobekileyo ubaholela kokulungileyo, abathobekileyo ubafundisa indlela yakhe. 
19_25_10_Zonke izindlela zikaJehova zingububele neqiniso kulabo abagcina isivumelwano sakhe nezifakazelo zakhe. 
19_25_11_Ngenxa yegama lakho, Jehova, ngithethelele ukona kwami, ngokuba kukhulu. 
19_25_12_Ngumuphi umuntu omesaba uJehova na? Nguyena oyakufundiswa nguye indlela ayakuyikhetha. 
19_25_13_Umphefumulo wakhe uzakuhlala ngokwenama, inzalo yakhe iyakuzuza izwe. 
19_25_14_Ubuhlobo bukaJehova bukubo abamesabayo; uyakubazisa isivumelwano sakhe. 
19_25_15_Amehlo ami akuye uJehova njalo, ngokuba nguyena okhipha izinyawo zami enetheni. 
19_25_16_Phendukela kimi, ube nomusa kimi, ngokuba nginesizungu, ngihluphekile. 
19_25_17_Izinsizi zenhliziyo yami zikhulile; ngikhiphe ezinhluphekweni zami. 
19_25_18_Bheka ukuhlupheka kwami nosizi lwami, ungithethelele zonke izono zami. 
19_25_19_Bheka izitha zami, ngokuba ziningi; ziyangizonda ngenzondo yonya. 
19_25_20_Londoloza umphefumulo wami, ungikhulule; mawungangijabhisi, ngokuba ngiphephela kuwe. 
19_25_21_Ukulunga nobuqotho makungilondoloze, ngokuba ngilindele wena. 
19_25_22_Nkulunkulu, hlenga u-Israyeli kuzo zonke izinkathazo zakhe. 
19_26_1_ElikaDavide. Ngahlulele, Jehova, ngokuba ngihamba ekulungeni kwami; ngithemba uJehova, angiyikuntenga. 
19_26_2_Ngivivinye, Jehova, ungilinge; hlolisisa izinso zami nenhliziyo yami. 
19_26_3_Ngokuba ububele bakho buphambi kwamehlo ami; ngihamba eqinisweni lakho. 
19_26_4_Angihlali nabantu bamanga, angihambelani nezimbulu. 
19_26_5_Ngiyawuzonda umhlangano wabenza okubi, angihlali nababi. 
19_26_6_Ngiyahlamba izandla zami ngingenacala, ngizungeza i-altare lakho, Jehova, 
19_26_7_ukuba ngizwakalise izwi lokudumisa, ngilande ngazo zonke izimangaliso zakho. 
19_26_8_Jehova, ngiyayithanda inkundla yendlu yakho nendawo lapho kuhlezi khona inkazimulo yakho. 
19_26_9_Ungamukisi umphefumulo wami kanye nezoni nokuphila kwami kanye nabantu begazi 
19_26_10_abanehlazo ezandleni zabo, nesokunene sabo sigcwele izipho zenkohliso. 
19_26_11_Kepha mina ngihamba ekulungeni kwami; ngihlenge, ube nomusa kimi. 
19_26_12_Unyawo lwami lumi ebaleni; ngizakudumisa uJehova emihlanganweni. 
19_27_1_ElikaDavide. UJehova ungukukhanya kwami nensindiso yami; ngizakwesaba bani na? UJehova uyinqaba yokuphila kwami; ngizakuba novalo ngobani na? 
19_27_2_Ekusondeleni kwababi ukuba badle inyama yami abamelene nami nezitha zami bayakhubeka, bawe. 
19_27_3_Noma impi imisa ngakimi, inhliziyo yami ayesabi; noma ngivukelwa ngukulwa, nokho nginethemba. 
19_27_4_Kunye engikucele kuJehova, ngiyakufuna khona: ukuba ngihlale endlini kaJehova izinsuku zonke zokuphila kwami ukubona ubuhle bukaJehova, ngibuke ithempeli lakhe. 
19_27_5_Ngokuba uyangithukusa edokodweni lakhe ngosuku lokuhlupheka, angicashise ekusithekeni kwetende lakhe, angiphakamisele edwaleni. 
19_27_6_Nakalokhu ikhanda lami lizakuphakama ngaphezu kwezitha zami ezingihaqileyo; ngizakunikela iminikelo yokwethaba etendeni lakhe, ngihlabelele, ngidumise uJehova ngogubhu. 
19_27_7_Yizwa, Jehova, ngikhala ngezwi elikhulu; yiba nomusa kimi, ungiphendule. 
19_27_8_Kuwena othi: “Funani ubuso bami,” inhliziyo yami ithi: “Ubuso bakho, Jehova, ngiyabufuna.” 
19_27_9_Ungafihli ubuso bakho kimi, ungaxoshi inceku yakho ngokuthukuthela; wena ulusizo lwami, ungangilahli, ungangishiyi, Nkulunkulu wensindiso yami. 
19_27_10_Ngokuba ubaba nomame bangishiyile, kodwa uJehova uzakungamukela. 
19_27_11_Ngifundise indlela yakho, Jehova, ungihole endleleni ekhanyayo ngenxa yezitha zami. 
19_27_12_Unganginikeli entandweni yezitha zami; ngokuba ofakazi bamanga bangivukele kanye nabafutha ukudlozomela. 
19_27_13_Yeka, uma bengingathembanga ukubona okuhle kukaJehova ezweni labaphilayo! 
19_27_14_Lindela uJehova, uqine, inhliziyo yakho ime isibindi; yebo, lindela uJehova. 
19_28_1_ElikaDavide. Ngikhala kuwe Jehova; Dwala lami, ungabi yisithulu kimi, funa kuthi, uma uthula kimi, ngifane nabashona emgodini. 
19_28_2_Yizwa izwi lokunxusa kwami, nxa ngikhala kuwe, ngiphakamisela izandla zami endaweni yakho engcwelengcwele. 
19_28_3_Ungangimukisi kanye nababi nabenza okubi abakhuluma ukuthula nabakhelwane babo, kanti kukhona okubi ezinhliziyweni zabo. 
19_28_4_Banike njengokwenza kwabo nanjengobubi bemisebenzi yabo; banike njengokwenza kwezandla zabo, baphindisele abakwenzileyo. 
19_28_5_Ngokuba abayinaki imisebenzi kaJehova nokwenza kwezandla zakhe; uyakubadiliza, angabakhi. 
19_28_6_Makabongwe uJehova, ngokuba ulizwile izwi lokunxusa kwami. 
19_28_7_UJehova ungamandla ami nesihlangu sami; inhliziyo yami ithembe kuye, ngasizwa; ngakho-ke inhliziyo yami iyethaba; ngizakumdumisa ngesihlabelelo sami. 
19_28_8_UJehova ungamandla abantu bakhe; uyinqaba yensindiso yogcotshiweyo wakhe. 
19_28_9_Sindisa abantu bakho, ubusise ifa lakho, ubaluse, ubathwale kuze kube phakade. 
19_29_1_Ihubo likaDavide. Mnikeni uJehova, nina madodana kaNkulunkulu, mnikeni uJehova udumo namandla. 
19_29_2_Mnikeni uJehova udumo lwegama lakhe, nikhuleke kuJehova emvunulweni engcwele. 
19_29_3_Izwi likaJehova liphezu kwamanzi, uNkulunkulu wenkazimulo uyaduma; uJehova uphezu kwamanzi amakhulu. 
19_29_4_Izwi likaJehova linamandla; izwi likaJehova linenkazimulo. 
19_29_5_Izwi likaJehova liyaphula imisedari; uJehova waphula imisedari yaseLebanoni. 
19_29_6_ILebanoni ulitshekulisisa okwenkonyane, neSiriyoni njengethole lenyathi. 
19_29_7_Izwi likaJehova lidabula amalangabi omlilo. 
19_29_8_Izwi likaJehova lizamazamisa ihlane; uJehova uzamazamisa ihlane laseKadeshi. 
19_29_9_Izwi likaJehova liphunzisa izimbabala; lihluba amahlathi; nasethempelini lakhe konke kuthi: “Udumo!” 
19_29_10_UJehova wayehlezi ebusa phezu kukazamcolo; uJehova uhlezi eyinkosi kuze kube phakade. 
19_29_11_UJehova uzakunika abantu bakhe amandla; uJehova uzakubusisa abantu bakhe ngokuthula. 
19_30_1_Ihubo. Igama lokuvula indlu. ElikaDavide. Ngiyakuphakamisa, Jehova, ngokuba ungikhuphulile; awuvumanga ukuba izitha zami zijabule phezu kwami. 
19_30_2_Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, ngakhala kuwe, wangiphilisa. 
19_30_3_Jehova, umphefumulo wami uwukhuphulile endaweni yabafileyo, wangiphilisa phakathi kwabashona emgodini. 
19_30_4_Dumisani uJehova nina enimkhonzayo, nibonge igama lakhe elingcwele. 
19_30_5_Ngokuba ukuthukuthela kwakhe kuba ngokomzuzwana nje, umusa wakhe uba ngowokuphila konke; kusihlwa kungena ukukhala, ekuseni ukujabula. 
19_30_6_Mina ngithe ekubuseni kwami: Angisoze nganyakaziswa naphakade. 
19_30_7_Jehova, ngomusa wakho ubuwenzile ukuba iqine intaba yami; wabufihla ubuso bakho, ngase ngithuthumela.

19_30_11_Waphendula ukukhala kwami kwaba ngukusina; wangikhumula izingubo zami zokulila, wangembathisa ukujabula, 
19_30_12_ukuze umphefumulo wami ukudumise, ungathuli; Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, ngizakukubonga kuze kube phakade. 
19_31_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Ithemba lami ngilibeka kuwe Jehova; mawungangijabhisi naphakade; ngikhulule ngokulunga kwakho.31:1 AmaH. 25:2; 71:1. 
19_31_2_Beka kimi indlebe yakho, ungophule masinyane, ube yidwala eliqinileyo kimi, indlu yezinqaba yokungisindisa. 
19_31_3_Ngokuba wena uyidwala lami nenqaba yami; ngenxa yegama lakho uyakungihola, ungiqondise.31:3 AmaH. 23:3; IzA. 18:10. 
19_31_4_Uyakungikhipha enetheni abangicuphe ngalo, ngokuba wena uyinqaba yami. 
19_31_5_Ngibeka umoya wami esandleni sakho; uyangihlenga, Jehova Nkulunkulu othembekayo.31:5 Luk. 23:46; IzE. 7:59. 
19_31_6_Ngiyabazonda abakhonza onkulunkulu abayize, kepha mina ngithemba uJehova. 
19_31_7_Ngizakwethaba, ngijabule ngomusa wakho, ngokuba ukubonile ukuhlupheka kwami, wazinaka izinsizi zomphefumulo wami;31:7 AmaH. 9:2. 
19_31_8_awunginikelanga esandleni sesitha, wazimisa izinyawo zami endaweni ebanzi. 
19_31_9_Yiba nomusa kimi, Jehova, ngokuba ngiyahlupheka; iso lami liyafa usizi, nomphefumulo wami nomzimba wami.31:9 AmaH. 6:7. 
19_31_10_Ngokuba ukuphila kwami kuphelela osizini, neminyaka yami ekububuleni; amandla ami aphelile ngokona kwami, namathambo ami ancunzekile.31:10 AmaH. 40:12; 102:3. 
19_31_11_Ngenxa yezitha zami zonke sengaba yisihlamba, ikakhulu kubakhelwane bami ngaba ngobesabisayo abangane bami; abangibona endleleni bayangibalekela. 
19_31_12_Sengakhohlakala enhliziyweni njengofileyo; nginjengesitsha esifileyo. 
19_31_13_Ngokuba ngikuzwile ukuhleba kwabaningi ngokwesabisayo nxazonke; besenza icebo ngami bahlosa ukubulala umphefumulo wami.31:13 Jer. 20:10. 
19_31_14_Kepha mina ngithemba wena Jehova; ngithi: “UnguNkulunkulu wami.” 
19_31_15_Izikhathi zami zisesandleni sakho; ngikhulule esandleni sezitha zami nakwabangizingelayo.31:15 AmaH. 139:16. 
19_31_16_Khanyisa ubuso bakho phezu kwenceku yakho; ngisindise ngomusa wakho.31:16 Num. 6:25; AmaH. 80:3. 
19_31_17_Jehova, mawungangijabhisi, ngokuba ngiyakubiza; mabajabhiswe ababi, bathuliswe endaweni yabafileyo. 
19_31_18_Mazithuliswe izindebe zamanga ezijivaza olungileyo ngokuzidla nangokweyisa. 
19_31_19_Yeka ubukhulu bomusa wakho obagodlele wona abakwesabayo, owenzele bona ababalekela kuwe, phambi kwabantwana babantu. 
19_31_20_Ubafihla ekusithekeni kobuso bakho ngenxa yezigungu zabantu; ubalondoloza edokodweni ekuxabaneni kwezilimi.31:20 AmaH. 27:5; Jer. 36:26. 
19_31_21_Makabongwe uJehova, ngokuba ungenzele umusa wakhe omangalisayo emzini oqinileyo.31:21 AmaH. 144:1.

19_31_23_Mthandeni uJehova nina nonke enimkhonzayo; uJehova uyabalondoloza abakholekileyo, amphindisele kakhulu ozidlayo.

19_33_3_Mhubeleni ihubo elisha, nibethe kahle ngenhlokomo. 
19_33_4_Ngokuba izwi likaJehova lilungile; zonke izenzo zakhe ziyakholeka.33:4 Num. 23:19; 1 Sam. 15:29. 
19_33_5_Uthanda ukulunga nokwahlulela; umhlaba ugcwele umusa kaJehova.33:5 AmaH. 119:64. 
19_33_6_Ngezwi likaJehova izulu lenziwa, namabandla onke ngomoya womlomo wakhe.33:6 Gen. 1:2. 
19_33_7_Ubuthela ndawonye amanzi olwandle njengenqwaba; uwabeka ajulileyo ezinqolobaneni.33:7 Gen. 1:9; Jobe 38:8. 
19_33_8_Umhlaba wonke mawumesabe uJehova; bonke abakhileyo ezweni mabathuthumele phambi kwakhe. 
19_33_9_Ngokuba wakhuluma, kwaba khona; wayaleza, kwema khona.33:9 AmaH. 148:5. 
19_33_10_UJehova uchitha icebo labezizwe; uphuthisa imicabango yabantu.33:10 Jobe 5:12; IzA. 21:30. 
19_33_11_Icebo likaJehova limi phakade, nemicabango yenhliziyo yakhe ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.33:11 IzA. 19:21; Isaya 46:10. 
19_33_12_Sibusisiwe isizwe esiNkulunkulu waso nguJehova, isizwe asikhethileyo sibe yifa lakhe.33:12 AmaH. 144:15. 
19_33_13_UJehova uyabheka esezulwini; uyababona bonke abantwana babantu. 
19_33_14_Esendaweni lapho ehlala khona uyababuka bonke abakhileyo ezweni,33:14 AmaH. 11:4. 
19_33_15_yena owadala izinhliziyo zabo bonke, oqaphela zonke izenzo zabo.33:15 IzA. 16:1,2,9; 21:1. 
19_33_16_Ayikho inkosi esindiswa ngobuningi bempi yayo; isiqhwaga asikhululwa ngobukhulu bamandla aso.33:16 2 IziKr. 14:11. 
19_33_17_Ihhashi liyize ekusindiseni, alihlangulisi ngobukhulu bamandla alo.33:17 AmaH. 147:10; IzA. 21:31. 
19_33_18_Bheka, iso likaJehova liphezu kwabamesabayo, abathemba umusa wakhe, 
19_33_19_ukuba akhulule umphefumulo wabo ekufeni, abaphilise endlaleni.33:19 Jobe 5:20; AmaH. 34:9; 37:19. 
19_33_20_Umphefumulo wethu ulindela uJehova; ungukusiza kwethu nesihlangu sethu.33:20 Dut. 33:29. 
19_33_21_Ngalokho inhliziyo yethu ithokoza ngaye, ngokuba sithemba igama lakhe elingcwele. 
19_33_22_Umusa wakho, Jehova, mawube phezu kwethu, njengalokhu sithemba wena. 
19_34_1_ElikaDavide mhla ezishaya uhlanya phambi kuka-Abimeleki owamxosha waze wamuka. Ngiyakumbonga uJehova ngezikhathi zonke; ukudunyiswa kwakhe kuyakuba semlonyeni wami njalonjalo.34:1 AmaH. 146:2. 
19_34_2_Umphefumulo wami uyakuzibonga ngoJehova; abathobekileyo bayakukuzwa, bajabule. 
19_34_3_Mtuseni uJehova kanye nami, siphakamise igama lakhe kanyekanye. 
19_34_4_Ngamfuna uJehova, wangiphendula; wangikhulula kulo lonke uvalo lwami. 
19_34_5_Babheka kuye phezulu, bakhanya; ubuso babo abusoze bajabha. 
19_34_6_Nasi isihlupheki esakhala, uJehova wezwa, wasikhulula kuzo zonke izinhlupheko zaso. 
19_34_7_Ingelosi kaJehova iyamisa nxazonke kubo abamesabayo, ibakhulule.34:7 Gen. 32:1; 2 AmaKh. 6:17. 
19_34_8_Yizwani nibone ukuthi uJehova muhle; ubusisiwe lowo muntu ophephela kuye.34:8 1 Pet. 2:3. 
19_34_9_Mesabeni uJehova nina bangcwele bakhe, ngokuba abasweli lutho abamesabayo.34:9 AmaH. 33:19; 37:19. 
19_34_10_Amabhongo ezingonyama ayaswela, alambe, kepha abafuna uJehova abayikuswela lutho oluhle.34:10 Luk. 1:53. 
19_34_11_Zanini, bantwana, ningilalele; ngizakunifundisa ukumesaba uJehova. 
19_34_12_Ngumuphi umuntu othanda ukuphila, ofisa izinsuku zokuba abone okuhle na?34:12 1 Pet. 3:10. 
19_34_13_Londa ulimi lwakho kokubi, nezindebe zakho kukho ukukhuluma inkohliso.34:13 Ef. 4:29; 5:4; Kol. 4:6. 
19_34_14_Deda kukho okubi, wenze okuhle; funa ukuthula, ukujonge.34:14 AmaH. 37:27; Rom. 12:18; Heb. 12:14. 
19_34_15_Amehlo kaJehova akubo abalungileyo; izindlebe zakhe zikukho ukukhala kwabo.34:15 2 IziKr. 16:9. 
19_34_16_Ubuso bukaJehova bumelene nabenza okubi ukuba achithe ukukhunjulwa kwabo emhlabeni.34:16 AmaH. 73:20. 
19_34_17_Labo bayakhala, uJehova uyezwa; uyabakhulula kuzo zonke izinhlupheko zabo.34:17 AmaH. 145:18. 
19_34_18_UJehova useduze nabo abanenhliziyo eyaphukileyo; uyabasindisa abanomoya odabukileyo.34:18 Isaya 57:15; 66:2; Luk. 18:13. 
19_34_19_Ziningi izinhlupheko zolungileyo, kepha uJehova uyamkhulula kuzo zonke. 
19_34_20_Uyawagcina onke amathambo akhe; alaphulwa nelilodwa kuwo.34:20 Eks. 12:46; Math. 10:30; Joh. 19:36. 
19_34_21_Okubi kuyakumbulala omubi; abazonda olungileyo bayakulahlwa ngecala. 
19_34_22_UJehova ukhulula umphefumulo wezinceku zakhe; akakho kwabamethembayo oyakuba necala. 
19_35_1_ElikaDavide. Phikisana, Jehova, nabaphikisana nami, ulwe nabo abalwa nami. 
19_35_2_Thatha ihawu nesihlangu, uvuke, ungisize. 
19_35_3_Hosha umkhonto, uvimbe indlela kwabangizingelayo; yisho kuwo umphefumulo wami, uthi: “Mina ngiyinsindiso yakho.” 
19_35_4_Mabajabhe, bahlazeke abafuna umphefumulo wami; mababuyiselwe emuva, bajabhiswe abangisongelayo.35:4 AmaH. 40:14. 
19_35_5_Mababe njengamakhoba emoyeni, ingelosi kaJehova ibadudule.35:5 Hos. 13:3. 
19_35_6_Indlela yabo mayibe mnyama, ibebushelezi, ingelosi kaJehova ibaxoshe.35:6 Josh. 10:10. 
19_35_7_Ngokuba bangenzele ngasesitha igebe lenetha labo, kungekho sici, bembele umphefumulo wami umgodi, kungekho cala.35:7 Math. 22:15. 
19_35_8_Ukubhujiswa makumehlele engazelele; inetha lakhe alibeke ngasesitha malimbambe yena; makawele kulo kube ngukubhujiswa kwakhe.35:8 AmaH. 141:10. 
19_35_9_Khona umphefumulo wami uzakwethaba kuJehova, uthokoze ngokusindisa kwakhe. 
19_35_10_Onke amathambo ami azakuthi: “Jehova, ngubani onjengawe, wena okhulula ohluphekayo, yebo, ohluphekayo nompofu komphangayo, na?” 
19_35_11_Ofakazi abangalungile bayasukuma, babuza kimi engingakwaziyo.35:11 Math. 26:60; Luk. 23:2,10; Joh. 18:30. 
19_35_12_Bangiphindisela okubi ngokuhle; umphefumulo wami bawusozisele.35:12 AmaH. 109:5. 
19_35_13_Kanti ekuguleni kwabo mina ngangembethe ezokuzila; umphefumulo wami ngawuhlupha ngokuzila ukudla; umkhuleko wami wabuyela esifubeni sami.35:13 1 AmaKh. 18:42. 
19_35_14_Ngahamba kungathi bekungumngane wami nomfowethu; njengokhalela unina ngakhothama ngokulila. 
19_35_15_Kepha ekuweni kwami bahlekisa ngami, babuthana ndawonye; abashayi engingabaziyo bangibunganyela; badumaza bengayeki.35:15 Math. 26:3. 
19_35_16_Njengezinteli ezikhonzela ucezu lwesinkwa bangigedlela amazinyo. 
19_35_17_Nkosi, lokho uzakukubukela kuze kube nini na? Sindisa umphefumulo wami ekubhubhiseni kwabo, ukuphila kwami ezingonyameni ezingamabhongo.35:17 AmaH. 22:20. 
19_35_18_Ngizakukubonga ebandleni elikhulu, ngikudumise phakathi kwabantu abaningi.35:18 AmaH. 22:22. 
19_35_19_Mabangajabuli ngami abayizitha zami bengenasizathu; mabangaqwayizi amehlo abangizonda ngeze.35:19 Joh. 15:25. 
19_35_20_Ngokuba abakhulumi ukuthula, kepha baqamba amazwi enkohliso ngabazithuleleyo emhlabeni. 
19_35_21_Yebo, bangikhamisela kakhulu umlomo wabo, bathi: “Ashila, ashila, iso lethu liyabona!”35:21 Jobe 16:10. 
19_35_22_Uyakubona, Jehova; mawungathuli; Nkosi, mawungabi kude nami. 
19_35_23_Vuka, usukumele ukwahlulelwa kwami, Nkulunkulu wami, Nkosi yami, umele icala lami. 
19_35_24_Ngahlulele ngokulunga kwakho, Jehova Nkulunkulu wami; mabangajabuli ngami.35:24 AmaH. 7:8. 
19_35_25_Mabangasho enhliziyweni yabo ukuthi: “He, kwaya ngesifiso sethu!” Mabangasho ukuthi: “Simgwinyile.” 
19_35_26_Mabajabhe, babe namahloni bonke abajabula ngokuhlupheka kwami; abazikhukhumeza ngami mabembathiswe ukujabha nendumazo.35:26 AmaH. 40:14; 109:29. 
19_35_27_Mabethabe, bajabule abathokoza ngokulunga kwami; mabathi njalonjalo: “Makadunyiswe uJehova othokoza ngenhlanhla yenceku yakhe.”35:27 AmaH. 40:16. 
19_35_28_Ulimi lwami luzakushumayela ngokulunga kwakho, usuku lonke ngodumo lwakho. 
19_36_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide, inceku kaJehova. Inkulumo yesiphambeko komubi, isekujuleni kwenhliziyo yami, ithi: Akukho ukumesaba uNkulunkulu phambi kwamehlo akhe.36:1 Rom. 3:18. 
19_36_2_Ngokuba ukonakala kwakhe kuyamthopha emehlweni akhe, ukuze kungafunyanwa, azondeke ngakho.36:2 AmaH. 10:3. 
19_36_3_Amazwi omlomo wakhe angukona nenkohliso; ukuyekile ukuhlakanipha nokwenza okulungileyo. 
19_36_4_Uceba okubi ecansini lakhe, uzimisa endleleni engalungile; okubi kakwenyanyi.36:4 IzA. 4:16; Mika 2:1. 
19_36_5_Jehova, ububele bakho bufinyelela ezulwini, nokuthembeka kwakho kuze kube semafwini.36:5 AmaH. 57:10; 108:4. 
19_36_6_Ukulunga kwakho kunjengezintaba ezinkulukazi, ukwahlulela kwakho kulutwa olukhulu; usindisa abantu nezilwane, Jehova.36:6 AmaH. 145:15; Rom. 11:33. 
19_36_7_Ububele bakho, Nkulunkulu, buyigugu elingaka; abantwana babantu bakhosela ethunzini lamaphiko akho.36:7 AmaH. 17:8. 
19_36_8_Bayakusutha ngamanoni endlu yakho, ubaphuzise okomfula wokuthokoza kwakho.36:8 AmaH. 65:4. 
19_36_9_Ngokuba ukuwe umthombo wokuphila; ekukhanyeni kwakho siyakubona ukukhanya.36:9 AmaH. 49:19; Jer. 2:13; 17:13. 
19_36_10_Mawume umusa wakho kubo abakwaziyo, nokulunga kwakho kubo abaqotho ngenhliziyo. 
19_36_11_Unyawo loziqhenyayo malungangifikeli; nesandla somubi masingangixoshi. 
19_36_12_Bheka, bawile abenza okubi; bawiswe phansi, abasenakuvuka. 
19_37_1_ElikaDavide. Ungazikhathazi ngababi, ungabi namhawu ngabenza okungalungile.37:1 AmaH. 73:2; IzA. 24:19; Shum. 7:10. 
19_37_2_Ngokuba bayakusikwa masinyane njengotshani, babune njengemithana eluhlaza.37:2 AmaH. 92:7; Jak. 1:10. 
19_37_3_Themba kuJehova, wenze okulungileyo; hlala ezweni, uzondle ngokukholeka; 
19_37_4_zithokozise ngoJehova, yikhona ezakukunika okufiswa yinhliziyo yakho. 
19_37_5_Nikela indlela yakho esandleni sikaJehova, umethembe; yena uzaku 
19_38_1_Ihubo likaDavide. Elokukhumbuza. Jehova, ungangijezisi ngentukuthelo yakho, ungangishayi ngolaka lwakho.38:1 AmaH. 6:1; Jer. 10:24. 
19_38_2_Ngokuba imicibisholo yakho ingihlabile; isandla sakho singicindezele kanzima.38:2 Dut. 32:23; Jobe 6:4. 
19_38_3_Akukho ukuphila enyameni yami ngenxa yentukuthelo yakho; akukho ukuthula emathanjeni ami ngenxa yesono sami. 
19_38_4_Ngokuba iziphambeko zami zeqile phezu kwekhanda lami; njengomthwalo osindayo ziyangisinda. 
19_38_5_Izilonda zami ziyanuka, zichicha ubovu ngenxa yobuwula bami.38:5 AmaH. 40:12. 
19_38_6_Ngikhonkobele, ngithotshisiwe kakhulu; usuku lonke ngihamba ngilila. 
19_38_7_Ngokuba ukhalo lwami lutshutshumba kakhulu; akukho ukuphila enyameni yami. 
19_38_8_Ngibuthakathaka, ngidubekile kabi; ngiyakhala ngenxa yokugqiha kwenhliziyo yami. 
19_38_9_Nkosi, ukufisa kwami konke kuphambi kwakho; ukububula kwami akufihlekile kuwe. 
19_38_10_Inhliziyo yami iyagquma kakhulu; amandla ami angishiyile, ngisho nokukhanya kwamehlo ami akusekho kimi. 
19_38_11_Abathandekayo bami nabahlobo bami bemi kude nokuhlupheka kwami; abakwethu bemi kude laphaya.38:11 Jobe 19:13; AmaH. 27:10. 
19_38_12_Abafuna umphefumulo wami bayangicupha; abafuna ukungilimaza bakhuluma okubi, bazindla inkohliso usuku lonke. 
19_38_13_Mina kodwa nginjengesithulu, angizwa; nginjengesimungulu esingavuli umlomo waso.38:13 Isaya 53:7. 
19_38_14_Yebo, nginjengomuntu ongezwayo; akukho ukuphikisa emlonyeni wakhe. 
19_38_15_Ngokuba ngithemba wena Jehova; wena Nkosi Nkulunkulu wami uzakuphendula. 
19_38_16_Ngokuba ngithe: “Funa bajabule ngami, ekusheleleni konyawo lwami bazikhukhumeze ngami.” 
19_38_17_Ngokuba ngiseduze kokuwa, nobuhlungu bami buphambi kwami ngezikhathi zonke. 
19_38_18_Ngokuba ngiyabika ukona kwami; ngiyadabuka ngesono sami. 
19_38_19_Kepha izitha zami ziphilile, zinamandla; baningi abangizonda ngeze.38:19 AmaH. 3:1. 
19_38_20_Abaphindisela okubi ngokuhle bamelene nami, ngokuba ngilandela okulungileyo.38:20 AmaH. 119:95. 
19_38_21_Ungangishiyi, Jehova; Nkulunkulu wami, ungabi kude nami. 
19_38_22_Phuthuma, ungisize, Nkosi, nsindiso yami. 
19_39_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela; kuJeduthuni. Ihubo likaDavide. Ngithe: “Ngizakulinda izindlela zami ukuba ngingoni ngolimi lwami; ngizakugcina umlomo wami ngesifonyo, omubi esekhona phambi kwamehlo ami.”39:1 AmaH. 17:3. 
19_39_2_Ngabindela impela, ngathula nakukho okuhle; kwavuswa ubuhlungu bami.39:2 AmaH. 38:13,17. 
19_39_3_Inhliziyo yami yavutha phakathi kwami; kwaphembeka umlilo ngisazindla; ngakhuluma ngolimi lwami.39:3 AmaH. 119:53. 
19_39_4_“Jehova, ngazise ukuphela kwami, nesilinganiso sezinsuku zami ukuba siyini; mangazi ukuthi ngingodlulayo.39:4 AmaH. 90:12. 
19_39_5_Bheka, izinsuku zami wazenza zaba ngangobubanzi besandla; imihla yokuphila kwami ayilutho kuwe; impela yilowo nalowo muntu ungumoya nje, noma eqine kangakanani. Sela39:5 AmaH. 90:5. 
19_39_6_“Impela umuntu uhamba njengesithunzi nje; impela uzikhathaza ngokuyize nje; unqwabela imfuyo, kepha akazi ukuthi ngubani ozakuyibutha.39:6 Jobe 8:9; Shum. 2:18,21; 5:13,15. 
19_39_7_“Kalokhu-ke, Nkosi, ngilindele ntoni na? Ithemba lami likuwe. 
19_39_8_Ngisindise kuzo iziphambeko zami, ungangenzi isithuko sesiwula. 
19_39_9_Ngiyathula, angivuli umlomo wami; ngokuba nguwe okwenzileyo.39:9 AmaH. 38:13. 
19_39_10_Susa kimi ukushaya kwakho, ngokuba ngiyaqedwa ngukushaywa yisandla sakho. 
19_39_11_Nxa ulaya umuntu ngesijeziso ngenxa yeziphambeko, ubuhle bakhe ubenza buphele njengenundu; yilowo nalowo muntu ungumoya nje. Sela39:11 AmaH. 6:7. 
19_39_12_“Yizwa umkhuleko wami, Jehova, ulalele ukumemeza kwami; ungathuli ngezinyembezi zami, ngokuba ngingumfokazi kuwe; ngiyisihambi njengokhokho bami bonke.39:12 Gen. 47:9; Lev. 25:23; 1 IziKr. 29:15; Heb. 11:13; 1 Pet. 2:11. 
19_39_13_Yeka ukungibuka, ngize ngincibilike, ngingakamuki lapha, ngingabe ngisabakho.” 
19_40_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide. Ihubo. Bengilindela uJehova; wayesezikhothamisela kimi, wezwa ukukhala kwami.40:1 AmaH. 18:6. 
19_40_2_Wangikhipha emgodini wokubhujiswa odakeni lobishi, wamisa izinyawo zami edwaleni, waqinisa izinyathelo zami.40:2 AmaH. 31:8; 69:14. 
19_40_3_Wabeka igama elisha emlonyeni wami, igama lokubonga uNkulunkulu wethu; abaningi bayakukubona, besabe, bamethembe uJehova. 
19_40_4_Ubusisiwe umuntu obeka ithemba lakhe kuJehova, ongaphendukeli kwabazidlayo nakwabaphambukela emangeni. 
19_40_5_Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, ziningi izimangaliso zakho ozenzileyo, nezizindlo zakho ngathi; akukho okungafaniswa nawe; uma ngiyilanda, ngiyisho, miningi kunokuba ibalwe.40:5 Eks. 15:11. 
19_40_6_Umhlatshelo nomnikelo wokudla awuwuthandi; izindlebe zami uzibhobozile; umnikelo wokushiswa nomnikelo wesono awuwubizi.40:6 Isaya 1:11; Mika 6:7; Heb. 10:5. 
19_40_7_Ngase ngithi: “Bheka, ngiyeza; encwadini esongwayo kulotshiwe ngami ukuthi:40:7 Joh. 5:39,46; Heb. 10:7. 
19_40_8_Ngiyathanda ukwenza intando yakho, Nkulunkulu wami, nomthetho wakho usenhliziyweni yami.”40:8 AmaH. 37:31. 
19_40_9_Ngishumayelile ukulunga ebandleni elikhulu; bheka, angizivalanga izindebe zami; Jehova, wena uyakwazi.40:9 AmaH. 22:22,25. 
19_40_10_Ukulunga kwakho angikuthukusanga enhliziyweni yami; ngashumayela ukukholeka kwakho nensindiso yakho; umusa wakho neqiniso lakho angikufihlelanga ibandla elikhulu. 
19_40_11_Wena Jehova ungangigodleli ububele bakho; umusa wakho neqiniso lakho makungilonde njalo.40:11 AmaH. 61:7. 
19_40_12_Ngokuba izinhlupheko ezingenakubalwa zingihaqile, iziphambeko zami zingificile, angaze ngaba nakubona; ziningi kunezinwele zekhanda lami; inhliziyo yami ingishiyile.40:12 AmaH. 38:10. 
19_40_13_Makuthandeke kuwe Jehova ukuba ungikhulule; Jehova, mawuphuthume ungisize. 
19_40_14_Mabajabhe, babe namahloni bonke abafuna umphefumulo wami ukuba bawuhlwithe; abafisa ukulimala kwami mababuyiselwe emuva, bajabhiswe.40:14 AmaH. 35:4; 70:2. 
19_40_15_Mabashaqeke ngenxa yehlazo labo abathi kimi: “Ashila, ashila!” 
19_40_16_Mabethabe, bajabule kuwe bonke abakufunayo; abathanda insindiso yakho mabasho njalo, bathi: “Makadunyiswe uJehova.”40:16 AmaH. 34:2; 35:27. 
19_40_17_Noma ngihlupheka, ngimpofu, iNkosi iyanginaka; wena ungumsizi wami noMsindisi wami; Nkulunkulu wami, mawungalibali.

19_41_2_UJehova uyakumlondoloza, amphilise; uyakubusiswa emhlabeni; awuyikumnikela entandweni yezitha zakhe.41:2 Dan. 4:24. 
19_41_3_UJehova uyakumphasa ecansini egula; wena uyakuguqula ukhukho lwakhe ekuguleni kwakhe.41:3 2 AmaKh. 20:7. 
19_41_4_Mina ngithi: “Jehova, ngihawukele, uphulukise umphefumulo wami, ngokuba ngonile kuwe.” 
19_41_5_Izitha zami zikhuluma okubi ngami, zithi: “Uzakufa nini, igama lakhe lichitheke, na?” 
19_41_6_Nalapho kuza ozongibona, ukhuluma amanga; inhliziyo yakhe izibuthela ukonakala, abesephuma akhulume ngakho. 
19_41_7_Bonke abangizondayo banyenyezelana ngami: bangisongozela okubi, bathi:41:7 Luk. 11:54. 
19_41_8_“Into embi inamathele kuye; olele phansi kasayikululama.”

19_41_10_Kepha wena Jehova, ngihawukele, ungilulamise, ukuze ngibaphindisele. 
19_41_11_Ngalokho ngiyazi ukuthi uyangithanda, ngokuba isitha sami asihalalisi phezu kwami.

19_42_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. IMaskili lamadodana kaKora. Njengendluzele ilangazelela amanzi emifula, kanjalo umphefumulo wami ulangazelela wena Nkulunkulu. 
19_42_2_Umphefumulo wami womela uNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu ophilayo; ngiyakufika nini, ngibonakale phambi kukaNkulunkulu, na?42:2 AmaH. 63:1; 84:2. 
19_42_3_Izinyembezi zami zingukudla kwami imini nobusuku, ngokuba usuku lonke bathi kimi: “Uphi uNkulunkulu wakho na?”42:3 AmaH. 80:5. 
19_42_4_Ngiyakukhumbula lokhu, ngithulule umphefumulo wami phakathi kwami, njengalokho ngangihamba esixukwini ngiya naso endlini kaNkulunkulu ngenhlokomo yokwethaba nokubonga, ibandla ligubha umkhosi. 
19_42_5_Yini ukuba udangale, mphefumulo wami, uyaluze phakathi kwami, na? Methembe uNkulunkulu, ngokuba ngisezakumdumisa ngokusindisa kobuso bakhe. 
19_42_6_Nkulunkulu wami, umphefumulo wami udangele phakathi kwami; ngakho-ke ngikhumbula wena ezweni laseJordani, nakwelamaHermoni, nasentabeni yaseMisari.42:6 Dut. 3:8. 
19_42_7_Utwa lubizana notwa ekuhlokomeni kwezimpophoma zakho; onke amadlambi akho namaza akho eqile phezu kwami.42:7 AmaH. 69:2. 
19_42_8_Emini uJehova uyaleza umusa wakhe; ebusuku isihlabelelo sakhe sikimi, ngikhuleke kuNkulunkulu wokuphila kwami.42:8 AmaH. 92:2. 
19_42_9_Ngizakuthi kuNkulunkulu, iDwala lami: “Ungikhohlweleni na? Ngihambelani ngilila, ngicindezelwe yisitha, na?”42:9 AmaH. 13:1; 43:2. 
19_42_10_Kunjengokuphohlozwa kwamathambo ami, nxa izitha zami zingiklolodela, zithi kimi usuku lonke: “Uphi uNkulunkulu wakho na?”42:10 AmaH. 115:2. 
19_42_11_Yini ukuba udangale, mphefumulo wami, uyaluze phakathi kwami, na? Methembe uNkulunkulu, ngokuba ngisezakumdumisa yena oyinsindiso yobuso bami noNkulunkulu wami. 
19_43_1_Ngahlulele, Nkulunkulu ungimele endabeni yami esizweni esingenamusa, ngikhulule kumuntu wenkohliso nongenakulunga.43:1 AmaH. 26:1. 
19_43_2_Ngokuba wena Nkulunkulu uyisiphephelo sami; ungilahleleni na? Ngihambelani ngilila, ngicindezelwe yisitha, na?43:2 AmaH. 42:9. 
19_43_3_Thuma ukukhanya kwakho neqiniso lakho, kungihole, kungiyise entabeni yakho engcwele nasezindlini zakho,43:3 2 Sam. 6:17. 
19_43_4_ngize ngifike kulo i-altare likaNkulunkulu, kuNkulunkulu wenjabulo yokwethaba kwami, ngikudumise ngehabhu, Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu wami.43:4 AmaH. 26:6. 
19_43_5_Yini ukuba udangale, mphefumulo wami, uyaluze phakathi kwami, na? ngisezakumdumisa yena oyinsindiso yobuso bami noNkulunkulu wami. 
19_44_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Elamadodana kaKora. IMaskili. Nkulunkulu, sizwile ngezindlebe zethu, okhokho besilandisa ngesenzo owasenzayo emihleni yabo, emihleni yasendulo.44:1 Dut. 6:20; AmaH. 78:3. 
19_44_2_Nguwe owabaxosha abezizwe ngesandla sakho, kepha bona wabatshala; wazichitha izizwe, kepha bona wabandisa.44:2 Eks. 15:17; AmaH. 9:5. 
19_44_3_Ngokuba abalidlanga izwe ngenkemba yabo, nengalo yabo ayibasindisanga; kepha kwaba yisandla sakho sokunene, nengalo yakho, nokukhanya kobuso bakho, ngokuba wawubathanda.44:3 Eks. 33:14; Num. 6:25; Josh. 24:12. 
19_44_4_Wena Nkulunkulu uyinkosi yami; yaleza ukusindiswa kukaJakobe. 
19_44_5_Ngawe sizakulahla phansi izitha zethu; ngegama lakho sizakunyathela abasivukelayo.44:5 AmaH. 18:38. 
19_44_6_Ngokuba angiwethembi umnsalo wami, nenkemba yami ayingisindisi;44:6 1 Sam. 17:39. 
19_44_7_kepha nguwe owasisindisa ezitheni zethu, wajabhisa abasizondayo. 
19_44_8_Sizincoma ngoNkulunkulu usuku lonke; igama lakho siyalibonga kuze kube phakade. Sela44:8 AmaH. 54:6. 
19_44_9_Nokho ususilahlile, wasijabhisa; awusaphumi nezimpi zethu.44:9 AmaH. 60:10. 
19_44_10_Usihlehlisela emuva esitheni; abasizondayo bayaziphangela. 
19_44_11_Usinikezele ukudliwa njengezimvu, wasihlakaza phakathi kwabezizwe. 
19_44_12_Uthengisa ngesizwe sakho ngokuyize; awuzuzi lutho ngokubiza ngaso.44:12 Dut. 32:30; AbAhl. 2:14; Hez. 30:12. 
19_44_13_Usenza isihlamba kubakhelwane bethu, inhlekiso nendumazo kwabasiphahlileyo.44:13 AmaH. 79:4. 
19_44_14_Usenza isaga kwabezizwe, banikine ikhanda phakathi kwabantu. 
19_44_15_Usuku lonke ukudunyazwa kwami kuphambi kwami, namahloni amboza ubuso bami44:15 AmaH. 69:19. 
19_44_16_ngenxa yoklolodayo nojivazayo, ngenxa yesitha nomphindiseli.44:16 AmaH. 74:10. 
19_44_17_Konke lokho kusehlele, kodwa asikukhohlwanga wena; asisaphulanga isivumelwano sakho. 
19_44_18_Inhliziyo yethu ayibuyelanga emuva; izinyathelo zethu aziphambukanga endleleni yakho, 
19_44_19_uze usiphahlaze endaweni yezimpungushe, usimboze ngethunzi lokufa. 
19_44_20_Uma ngabe sikhohliwe igama likaNkulunkulu wethu, sazelulela izandla zethu kunkulunkulu mumbe, 
19_44_21_uNkulunkulu ubengayikukuhlola na? Ngokuba yena uyazazi izimfihlakalo zenhliziyo.44:21 AmaH. 7:9. 
19_44_22_Yebo, ngenxa yakho sibulawa usuku lonke, siphathiswa okwezimvu zokuhlatshwa.44:22 Rom. 8:36. 
19_44_23_Vuka, Nkosi! Ulaleleni na? Vuka, ungasilahli njalonjalo.44:23 Math. 8:24. 
19_44_24_Ubufihlelani ubuso bakho, ukhohlwe ukuhlupheka nokucindezelwa kwethu, na?44:24 AmaH. 69:17. 
19_44_25_Ngokuba umphefumulo wethu ukhothamele othulini; umzimba wethu unamathele emhlabathini. 
19_44_26_Sukuma, usisize, usihlenge ngenxa yomusa wakho. 
19_45_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Iminduze. Elamadodana kaKora. IMaskili. Igama lothando. Inhliziyo yami iyachichima ngendaba enhle; ngikhuluma igama engiliqambe ngenkosi; ulimi lwami lulusiba loloba ngokushesha.45:1 AmaH. 2:6. 
19_45_2_Umuhle wena kunabantwana babantu; ubuhle buthululelwe ezindebeni zakho; ngakho-ke uNkulunkulu ukubusisile kuze kube phakade.45:2 IsiHlab. 5:10; Luk. 4:22. 
19_45_3_Bophela inkemba yakho okhalweni lwakho wena qhawe, kube ngukuphakama kwakho nobukhosi bakho. 
19_45_4_Hlahlameleka ebukhosini bakho, uqhubeke ngenxa yeqiniso nokuthobeka nokulunga; isandla sakho sokunene siyakukufundisa izinto ezesabekayo.45:4 AmaH. 72:4. 
19_45_5_Imicibisholo yakho ibukhali, izizwe ziyawa phansi kwakho; isenhliziyweni yezitha zenkosi. 
19_45_6_Isihlalo sakho sobukhosi, Nkulunkulu, singesaphakade naphakade; intonga yobuqotho iyintonga yombuso wakho.45:6 2 Sam. 7:13,16; AmaH. 89:4; Heb. 1:8. 
19_45_7_Ukuthandile ukulunga, wakuzonda okubi: ngakho-ke uNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu wakho, ukugcobile ngamafutha enjabulo ngokungaphezu kwabangane bakho. 
19_45_8_Zonke izingubo zakho ziqholiwe ngenhlaka, nenhlaba, nekasiya; ezindlini zobukhosi zophondo lwendlovu ukubethwa kwezingubhu zezintambo kukujabulisile. 
19_45_9_Amadodakazi amakhosi aphakathi kwabesifazane bakho abadumileyo; inkosikazi imi ngakwesokunene sakho, ihlobe igolide lase-Ofiri. 
19_45_10_Mawuzwe-ke, ndodakazi, uqaphele, ubeke indlebe yakho, ukhohlwe isizwe sakini nendlu kayihlo,45:10 Gen. 12:1. 
19_45_11_yikhona inkosi izakubuthanda ubuhle bakho, ngokuba yona iyinkosi yakho, woyikhothamela. 
19_45_12_Indodakazi yaseTire, yebo, nabacebileyo babantu bancenga umusa wakho ngesipho.45:12 AmaH. 68:29; Isaya 23:18; 60:6. 
19_45_13_Indodakazi yenkosi inhle kakhulu, ilapho phakathi; ingubo yayo yalukiwe ngegolide. 
19_45_14_Iyiswa enkosini igqoke izingubo ezifekethisiweyo; izintombi ezingabangane bayo ziyayilandela; ziyiswa kuwe. 
19_45_15_Ziyiswa ngokujabula nangokwethaba, zingena endlini yenkosi. 
19_45_16_Amadodana akho ayakuba sesikhundleni sawoyihlo; uyakuwabeka abe yizikhulu emhlabeni wonke.45:16 Math. 19:28; IsAmb. 1:6; 5:10. 
19_45_17_Igama lakho ngiyakulenza likhunjulwe ezizukulwaneni zonke; ngakho-ke izizwe ziyakukubonga kuze kube phakade naphakade. 
19_46_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Elamadodana kaKora. Nge-Alamoti. Igama. UNkulunkulu uyisiphephelo sethu namandla ethu; ufunyaniswa elusizo impela ekuhluphekeni. 
19_46_2_Ngakho-ke asiyikwesaba nokuba kuguquka umhlaba, nezintaba zidilikela ekujuleni kolwandle, 
19_46_3_nokuba amanzi alo ehlokoma, ekhephuza, nezintaba zizamazama ngokukhukhumala kwalo. Sela46:3 AmaH. 65:7; Isaya 17:12. 
19_46_4_Ukhona umfula omanzi awo athokozisa umuzi kaNkulunkulu, indlu engcwele yoPhezukonke.46:4 AmaH. 48:1. 
19_46_5_UNkulunkulu uphakathi kwawo, awuyikuzanyazanyiswa; uNkulunkulu uyakuwusiza ngovivi lokusa.46:5 AmaH. 30:5. 
19_46_6_Izizwe ziyaxokozela; imibuso iyazamazama; uphumisela izwi lakhe, umhlaba uncibilike. 
19_46_7_UJehova Sebawoti unathi; uNkulunkulu kaJakobe uyinqaba yethu. Sela46:7 Rom. 8:31. 
19_46_8_Wozani nibone izenzo zikaJehova, izincithakalo azenzileyo emhlabeni.46:8 AmaH. 66:5. 
19_46_9_Uphelisa ukulwa kuze kube semikhawulweni yomhlaba; uyaphula umnsalo, anqume umkhonto, izinqola zempi azishise ngomlilo.46:9 AmaH. 76:3. 
19_46_10_Thulani, niqonde ukuthi mina nginguNkulunkulu; ngiyakuphakama phakathi kwabezizwe, ngiphakame emhlabeni.46:10 Isaya 30:15. 
19_46_11_UJehova Sebawoti unathi; uNkulunkulu kaJakobe uyinqaba yethu. Sela 
19_47_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Elamadodana kaKora. Ihubo. Shayani izandla, zizwe zonke; hlokomani kuNkulunkulu ngezwi lokuhalalisa.47:1 AmaH. 66:1. 
19_47_2_Ngokuba uJehova oPhezukonke uyesabeka; uyinkosi enkulu phezu komhlaba wonke.47:2 Zak. 14:9; Mal. 1:14. 
19_47_3_Wathobisa abantu phansi kwethu, nezizwe phansi kwezinyawo zethu.47:3 AmaH. 18:48. 
19_47_4_Wasikhethela ifa lethu, udumo lukaJakobe amthandayo. Sela 
19_47_5_UNkulunkulu wenyukile ngokuhlokoma, uJehova ngokukhala kwecilongo.47:5 AmaH. 68:18. 
19_47_6_Hubelani uNkulunkulu, hubani! Hubelani iNkosi yethu, hubani! 
19_47_7_Ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyinkosi yomhlaba wonke; hubani ihubo! 
19_47_8_UNkulunkulu uyabusa izizwe; uNkulunkulu uhlezi esihlalweni sakhe esingcwele sobukhosi.47:8 AmaH. 22:28. 
19_47_9_Izikhulu zabantu zibuthene, zibe yisizwe sikaNkulunkulu ka-Abrahama, ngokuba izihlangu zomhlaba zingezikaNkulunkulu; uphakeme kakhulu. 
19_48_1_Igama. Ihubo lamadodana kaKora. Mkhulu uJehova, udunyiswa kakhulu emzini kaNkulunkulu wethu entabeni yakhe engcwele.48:1 AmaH. 76:1. 
19_48_2_Inhle ngokuphakama, ingukuthokoza komhlaba wonke intaba yaseSiyoni emaceleni asenyakatho, umuzi weNkosi enkulu.48:2 Math. 5:35. 
19_48_3_UNkulunkulu uyaziwa ezindlini zawo zobukhosi ukuthi uyinqaba.48:3 AmaH. 46:5. 
19_48_4_Ngokuba bheka, amakhosi abuthana; aqhubeka kanyekanye.48:4 2 IziKr. 20:1. 
19_48_5_Abona, ayesemangala; ashaywa luvalo, aphaphatheka. 
19_48_6_Ehlelwa lapho ngukuthuthumela, yivuso njengakobelethayo. 
19_48_7_Ngomoya wasempumalanga waphula imikhumbi yaseTharishishi.48:7 Isaya 33:23. 
19_48_8_Njengalokho sizwile, kanjalo sikubonile emzini kaJehova Sebawoti, emzini kaNkulunkulu wethu; uNkulunkulu uyakuwumisa kuze kube phakade. Sela 
19_48_9_Siyazindla ngomusa wakho, Jehova, siphakathi ethempelini lakho. 
19_48_10_Njengalo igama lakho, Nkulunkulu, kunjalo ukubongwa kwakho kuze kube semikhawulweni yomhlaba; isandla sakho sokunene sigcwele ukulunga. 
19_48_11_Mayijabule intaba yaseSiyoni, kwethabe amadodakazi akwaJuda ngenxa yezahlulelo zakho. 
19_48_12_Zungezani iSiyoni, nilikake, nibale imibhoshongo yalo. 
19_48_13_Qaphelani izindonga zalo, nidabule izindlu zalo zobukhosi, ukuze nilandisele isizukulwane esizayo. 
19_48_14_Ngokuba lo Nkulunkulu, unguNkulunkulu wethu phakade naphakade; uzakusihola kuze kube sekufeni. 
19_49_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Elamadodana kaKora. Ihubo. Yizwani lokhu nonke nina bantu; bekani indlebe nina nonke enakhileyo ezweni, 
19_49_2_abantukazana nezikhulu, abacebileyo nabampofu. 
19_49_3_Umlomo wami uzakukhuluma ukuhlakanipha, ukuzindla kwenhliziyo yami kuzakuba ngokokuqonda. 
19_49_4_Ngizakubeka indlebe yami kuso isaga, ngiphenye imfumbe yami ngehabhu.49:4 AmaH. 78:2. 
19_49_5_Bengizakwesabelani ezinsukwini ezimbi, lapha ububi babangizingelayo bungihaqa, 
19_49_6_labo abathemba imfuyo yabo bezigabisa ngomcebo wabo omkhulu, na? 
19_49_7_Umuntu angemhlenge umfowabo, angemnike uNkulunkulu ihlawulo ngaye. 
19_49_8_Ngokuba ukuhlengwa komphefumulo wabo kubiza kakhulu; akunakuphela nanini 
19_49_9_ukuba aphile njalo, angaboni ukubola. 
19_49_10_Qha, uyakubona ukuthi abahlakaniphileyo bayafa nokuthi isiwula kanye nesiphukuphuku ziyabhubha, imfuyo yabo bayishiyele abanye.49:10 Shum. 2:16,18; Jer. 17:11. 
19_49_11_Ukucabanga kwabo kuthi izindlu zabo zizakuma kuze kube phakade, nemizi yabo ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane; amazwe abo bawabiza ngamagama abo. 
19_49_12_Kepha umuntu, nokuba enodumo, akayikuma; ufana nezilwane ezibhubhayo.49:12 Shum. 3:19. 
19_49_13_Le ndlela yabo ingubuwula babo, balandelwa ngabavumela umlomo wabo. Sela 
19_49_14_Baqhutshelwa endaweni yabafileyo njengezimvu; ukufa kuyakubalusa, abaqotho babuse phezu kwabo ngakusasa, isimo sabo siqedwe yindawo yabafileyo, bangabe besaba nandlu. 
19_49_15_Kepha uNkulunkulu uyakuwukhulula umphefumulo wami esandleni sendawo yabafileyo, ngokuba uyakungamukela. Sela 
19_49_16_Ungesabi, nxa umuntu eceba, nxa ubukhosi bendlu yakhe banda.49:16 AmaH. 37:1,7. 
19_49_17_Ngokuba ekufeni kwakhe akayikuphatha lutho; ubukhosi bakhe abuyikwehla naye.49:17 Jobe 27:16; AmaH. 39:6; Luk. 12:15. 
19_49_18_Noma ebusisa umphefumulo wakhe esaphila, futhi abantu bekudumisa, ngokuba uzondle kahle, 
19_49_19_nokho uyakuya esizukulwaneni sawoyise; abayikukubona ukukhanya naphakade. 
19_49_20_Umuntu onodumo engenakuqonda unjengezilwane ezibhubhayo. 
19_50_1_Ihubo lika-Asafa. UNkulunkulu uMninimandla onke, uJehova, uyakhuluma, ubiza umhlaba kusukela ekuphumeni kwelanga kuze kube sekushoneni kwalo. 
19_50_2_ESiyoni eliphelele ebuhleni uNkulunkulu uqhamile ekukhanyeni.50:2 AmaH. 48:2. 
19_50_3_UNkulunkulu wethu uyeza, akayikuthula; umlilo udla phambi kwakhe; uphahlwe yisivunguvungu esikhulu.50:3 AmaH. 97:3. 
19_50_4_Ubiza izulu ngaphezulu kanye nomhlaba ukuba ahlulele isizwe sakhe:50:4 Dut. 31:28. 
19_50_5_“Buthelani kimi abangcwele bami abenza isivumelwano nami ngomhlatshelo.” 
19_50_6_Izulu lishumayela ukulunga kwakhe, ngokuba uNkulunkulu ungumahluleli. Sela 
19_50_7_“Yizwa, sizwe sami, ngiyakukhuluma; Israyeli, ngizakufakaza kuwe ukuthi: NginguNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu wakho. 
19_50_8_Angiyikukujezisa ngenxa yemihlatshelo yakho; iminikelo yakho yokushiswa iphambi kwami njalo. 
19_50_9_Angiyikuthatha nkunzi endlini yakho nampongo ezibayeni zakho. 
19_50_10_Ngokuba zingezami zonke izilwane zehlathi, nezinkomo zasezintabeni eziyizinkulungwane. 
19_50_11_Ngiyazazi zonke izinyoni zasezintabeni, nezilwane zasendle zaziwa yimi. 
19_50_12_Uma bengilambile, bengingekutshele wena, ngokuba ungowami umhlaba wonke nokugcwala kwawo.50:12 AmaH. 24:1. 
19_50_13_Ngiyakudla yini inyama yezinkunzi, ngiphuze igazi lezimpongo, na?50:13 Isaya 1:11; Mika 6:7. 
19_50_14_Nikela kuNkulunkulu umnikelo wokubonga, uzigcwalise izithembiso zakho koPhezukonke;50:14 Heb. 13:15. 
19_50_15_ngibize ngosuku lwenhlupheko; ngiyakukukhulula, wena uyakungidumisa.”50:15 AmaH. 13:5; Math. 7:7. 
19_50_16_Kepha komubi uNkulunkulu uthi: “Yini ukuba ushumayele izimiso zami, uphathe isivumelwano sami ngomlomo wakho,50:16 Rom. 2:17. 
19_50_17_ingani uyazonda ukuqondiswa, amazwi ami uwalahla emva kwakho, na? 
19_50_18_Uma ubona isela, uvumelana nalo; neziphingi uhlanganyela nazo.50:18 IzA. 29:24. 
19_50_19_Umlomo wakho uwuyekela ebubini; ulimi lwakho luqamba inkohliso. 
19_50_20_Uhlala uhleba umfowenu; unyevuza indodana kanyoko. 
19_50_21_Lokho ukwenzile, ngathula; ushaye sengathi nginjengawe; ngizakukulaya, ngikubeke phambi kwamehlo akho. 
19_50_22_“Qaphelani lokho nina enikhohlwa uNkulunkulu, funa nginidwengule, kungabikho osindisayo. 
19_50_23_Onikela ngomnikelo wokubonga uyangidumisa; oqaphela indlela yakhe ngiyakumbonisa insindiso kaNkulunkulu.” 
19_51_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide ekufikeni komprofethi uNathani kuye emva kokuya kwakhe kuBati Sheba. Ngihawukele, Nkulunkulu, ngokomusa wakho; yesula iziphambeko zami ngokobubele bakho obukhulu. 
19_51_2_Ngigezisise ebubini bami, ungihlanze esonweni sami. 
19_51_3_Ngokuba ngiyazazi iziphambeko zami; isono sami siphambi kwami njalo. 
19_51_4_Ngonile kuwe wena wedwa, ngakwenza okubi emehlweni akho, ukuze uthiwe ulungile ekukhulumeni kwakho, uchache ekwahluleleni kwakho.51:4 Rom. 3:4. 
19_51_5_Bheka, ngazalelwa ebubini, umame wangithabatha esonweni.51:5 Gen. 8:21; Jobe 14:4; 25:4; Joh. 3:6. 
19_51_6_Bheka, uthanda iqiniso ngaphakathi enhliziyweni; wongifundisa ukuhlakanipha ekujuleni kwenhliziyo. 
19_51_7_Ngihlanze ngehisopi, ngihlambuluke; ngigeze, ngibe mhlophe kuneqhwa.51:7 Lev. 14:4,6; Num. 19:18; Isaya 1:18. 
19_51_8_Ngizwise intokozo nenjabulo, ukuze ethabe amathambo owachobozileyo. 
19_51_9_Fihla ubuso bakho ezonweni zami, wesule zonke izenzo zami ezimbi. 
19_51_10_Nkulunkulu, dala kimi inhliziyo ehlanzekileyo, uvuse umoya oqinileyo phakathi kwami.51:10 Hez. 11:19; 36:26. 
19_51_11_Ungangilahli ebusweni bakho, ungangemuki uMoya wakho oNgcwele. 
19_51_12_Buyisela kimi ukuthokoza kwensindiso yakho, ungiphase ngomoya ovumayo.51:12 Rom. 8:15. 
19_51_13_Khona ngiyakufundisa abaphambukayo izindlela zakho; nezoni ziyakuphendukela kuwe. 
19_51_14_Ngikhulule ecaleni legazi, Nkulunkulu, Nkulunkulu wensindiso yami. Khona ulimi lwami luyakuhubela ukulunga kwakho.51:14 2 Sam. 11:17. 
19_51_15_Nkosi, vula izindebe zami, ukuze umlomo wami ulande ngodumo lwakho. 
19_51_16_Ngokuba awuwuthandi umhlatshelo; noma bengizakukunika umnikelo wokushiswa, ubungayikuthokoza ngawo.51:16 AmaH. 40:6; Hos. 6:6. 
19_51_17_Iminikelo kaNkulunkulu ingumoya owaphukileyo; inhliziyo eyaphukileyo nedabukileyo, Nkulunkulu, awuyikuyidelela.51:17 Isaya 66:2. 
19_51_18_Lenzele iSiyoni okuhle ngokomusa wakho, uzakhe izingange zaseJerusalema. 
19_51_19_Khona uyakuyijabulela iminikelo yokulunga eshiswayo neshiswa yonke; khona bayakunikela ngezinkunzi phezu kwe-altare lakho. 
19_52_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. IMaskili likaDavide ekufikeni kukaDowegi wakwa-Edomi emazisa uSawule, ethi kuye: “UDavide ufikile endlini ka-Ahimeleki.” Uzigabiselani ngokubi wena siqhwaga na? Umusa kaNkulunkulu umi njalo. 
19_52_2_Ulimi lwakho lusongoza okubi njengempuco eloliweyo, wena owenza amacebo.52:2 AmaH. 57:4. 
19_52_3_Uthanda okubi kunokuhle, namanga kunokukhuluma ukulunga. Sela 
19_52_4_Uthanda onke amazwi okubhubhisa wena lulimi lwenkohliso. 
19_52_5_Ngakho-ke uNkulunkulu uyakukubhidliza kuze kube phakade; uyakukubamba, akukhiphe etendeni lakho, akusiphule ezweni labaphilayo. Sela 
19_52_6_Abalungileyo bayakukubona, besabe; bayakumhleka, bathi:52:6 AmaH. 58:10. 
19_52_7_“Bheka, nasi isiqhwaga esingamenzanga uNkulunkulu abe yinqaba yaso, kepha sethemba ingcebo yaso enkulu, siziqinisa ebubini baso.”52:7 AmaH. 62:10. 
19_52_8_Kepha mina nginjengomnqumo oluhlaza endlini kaNkulunkulu; ngithemba umusa kaNkulunkulu njalonjalo kuze kube phakade naphakade.52:8 AmaH. 92:12. 
19_52_9_Ngizakukudumisa kuze kube phakade, ngokuba ukwenzile; ngizakulindela igama lakho, ngokuba lihle phambi kwabangcwele bakho. 
19_53_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeMahalati. IMaskili likaDavide. Isiwula sithi enhliziyweni yaso: “Akakho uNkulunkulu,” iziphambeko zabo zimbi, ziyanengeka; akakho owenza okuhle.53:1 AmaH. 10:4; 14:1. 
19_53_2_UNkulunkulu esezulwini uyababheka abantwana babantu ukubona uma kukhona yini onokuqonda, ofuna uNkulunkulu.53:2 Rom. 3:10. 
19_53_3_Baphambukile bonke, bonakele bonke; akakho owenza okuhle, akakho noyedwa. 
19_53_4_Abanakwazi yini abenza okubi, abadla abantu bami njengalokhu bedla isinkwa, bengakhuleki kuNkulunkulu. 
19_53_5_Besaba nokwesaba, lapho kungekho okwesabisayo; ngokuba uNkulunkulu wasakaza amathambo akhe owamisa ngakuwe; wena ubajabhisile, ngokuba uNkulunkulu ubalahlile. 
19_53_6_Sengathi kungavela ukusindiswa kuka-Israyeli eSiyoni. Kuyakuthi lapho uNkulunkulu eguqula ukuthunjwa kwabantu bakhe, uJakobe ethabe, u-Israyeli ajabule. 
19_54_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. IMaskili likaDavide ekufikeni kwabaseZifi bethi kuSawule: “UDavide ucashile kithina.” Nkulunkulu, ngisindise ngegama lakho, ngahlulele ngamandla akho.54:1 AmaH. 20:1; 31:3. 
19_54_2_Nkulunkulu, yizwa umkhuleko wami, ubeke indlebe emazwini omlomo wami. 
19_54_3_Ngokuba abafo bangivukele; izidlova zifuna umphefumulo wami; azimbekile uNkulunkulu phambi kwazo. Sela54:3 AmaH. 10:4. 
19_54_4_Bheka, uNkulunkulu ungumsizi wami; iNkosi ikubo abaphasa umphefumulo wami. 
19_54_5_Uyabuyisela okubi ezitheni zami; zibhubhise ngokweqiniso lakho. 
19_54_6_Ngizakunikela kuwe ngesihle; ngizakulibonga igama lakho, Jehova, ngokuba lihle. 
19_54_7_Ngokuba ungikhululile ekuhluphekeni konke; neso lami libuka izitha zami, lidele. 
19_55_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. IMaskili likaDavide. Lalela, Nkulunkulu, umkhuleko wami, ungazifihli ekunxuseni kwami. 
19_55_2_Ngizwele, ungiphendule; ngiyayaluza ekukhaleni kwami, ngiyabubula 
19_55_3_ngenxa yezwi lesitha, ngenxa yokucindezela komubi; ngokuba bagingqela okubi phezu kwami; bangizingela bethukuthele. 
19_55_4_Inhliziyo yami iyathuthumela phakathi kwami; amavuso okufa angehlele.55:4 AmaH. 18:4. 
19_55_5_Ngifikelwe luvalo nokuqhaqhazela; ngikhwelwe ngukwesaba okukhulu. 
19_55_6_Besengithi: “Sengathi ngingaba namaphiko njengejuba; ngabe ngindizela ekudeni, ngihlale khona.”55:6 Jer. 9:2. 
19_55_7_Bheka, bengiyakubaleka, ngiye kude, ngingenise ehlane. Sela 
19_55_8_Ngabe ngiphuthuma indawo yokuphepha emoyeni ovunguzayo nasesiphephweni. 
19_55_9_Bachithe, Nkosi, uphambanise ulimi lwabo, ngokuba ngibonile ubudlwangudlwangu nokuxabana emzini.55:9 Gen. 11:9. 
19_55_10_Imini nobusuku bahamba bezungeza phezu kwezingange zawo; okubi nokushinga kuphakathi kwawo. 
19_55_11_Ububi buphakathi kwawo; imbandezelo nenkohliso akusuki esigcawini sawo. 
19_55_12_Ngokuba akusiso isitha esingiklolodelayo; ngabe ngiyakuthwala; akusiye ongizondayo oziphakamise phezu kwami; ngabe ngamcashela; 
19_55_13_kepha nguwe ntanga yami, mhlobo wami nomngane wami.55:13 2 Sam. 16:23. 
19_55_14_Sasihlalisana kamnandi; sasiya endlini kaNkulunkulu kanye nebandla elithokozayo. 
19_55_15_Ukufa makubazume, bashonele endaweni yabafileyo besezwa, ngokuba ububi busezindlini zabo nasezinhliziyweni zabo.55:15 Num. 16:23. 
19_55_16_Mina ngizakukhala kuNkulunkulu; uJehova uzakungisindisa. 
19_55_17_Kusihlwa nasekuseni nasemini ngizakuzikhalela, ngibubule, abeselizwa izwi lami.55:17 Dan. 6:10. 
19_55_18_Uyawuhlenga umphefumulo wami ngokuthula, bangasondeli kimi, ngokuba baningi abamelene nami.55:18 AmaH. 56:2. 
19_55_19_UNkulunkulu uzakuzwa, abaphendule, yena okhona kwaphakade. Sela Yibona kambe okungekho kubo ukuphenduka, nabangamesabiyo uNkulunkulu. 
19_55_20_Ubeka isandla ngakuye ohlalisene kahle naye; udumazile isivumelwano sakhe. 
19_55_21_Umlomo wakhe ubushelezi kunephehlwa, kepha inhliziyo yakhe iyimpi; amazwi akhe athambile kunamafutha; nokho ayizinkemba ezikhokhiweyo.55:21 AmaH. 57:4; 59:7. 
19_55_22_Phonsa phezu kukaJehova umthwalo wakho, uzakukuphasa; akayikuvuma naphakade ukuba olungileyo azanyazanyiswe.55:22 Math. 6:25; Luk. 12:22; 1 Pet. 5:7. 
19_55_23_Wena Nkulunkulu uyakubaphonsa egodini lokubhubhisa; abantu begazi nenkohliso abayikufinyelela nasenxenyeni yezinsuku zabo; kepha mina ngizakwethemba wena. 
19_56_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Ijuba elithulayo emajukujukwini. ElikaDavide. IMiktamu, ekubanjweni kwakhe ngamaFilisti eGati. Yiba nomusa kimi, Nkulunkulu, ngokuba abantu bafuna ukungigwinya; usuku lonke bayangicindezela belwa. 
19_56_2_Izitha zami zifuna ukungigwinya usuku lonke; ngokuba baningi abalwa nami ngokuzidla.56:2 AmaH. 3:1. 
19_56_3_Mhla ngesabayo ngiyakwethemba wena. 
19_56_4_KuNkulunkulu ngiyakudumisa izwi lakhe; ngithemba uNkulunkulu, angiyikwesaba; inyama ingangenzani na?56:4 2 IziKr. 32:8; Jer. 17:5; Heb. 13:6. 
19_56_5_Amazwi ami bawahlanekezela usuku lonke; yonke imicabango yabo iqonde ukungona. 
19_56_6_Bayabuthana, baqamekele, baqaphele izinyathelo zami, njengokuba beqamekela umphefumulo wami. 
19_56_7_Bayakuphunyuka yini ebubini babo na? Diliza izizwe ngentukuthelo, Nkulunkulu.56:7 AmaH. 59:5,13. 
19_56_8_Ukuzula kwami ukubalile wena; yetha izinyembezi zami egabheni lakho; azikho encwadini yakho na?56:8 Mal. 3:16. 
19_56_9_Khona izitha zami ziyakubuyela emuva mhla ngikhalayo; ngiyakwazi lokhu ukuthi uNkulunkulu unami. 
19_56_10_KuNkulunkulu ngiyakulidumisa izwi; kuJehova ngiyakulidumisa izwi. 
19_56_11_Ngiyethemba kuNkulunkulu, angiyikwesaba; umuntu angangenzani na?56:11 AmaH. 118:6. 
19_56_12_Nkulunkulu, izithembiso zami kuwe ziphezu kwami; ngiyakunikela kuwe iminikelo yokubonga.56:12 AmaH. 66:12. 
19_56_13_Ngokuba uwukhululile umphefumulo wami ekufeni nezinyawo zami ekuweni, ukuze ngihambe ebusweni bukaNkulunkulu ekukhanyeni kwabaphilayo. 
19_57_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Ungachithi. ElikaDavide. IMiktamu, mhla ebalekela uSawule emphandwini. Yiba nomusa kimi, Nkulunkulu; yiba nomusa kimi. Ngokuba umphefumulo wami uphephela kuwe; ngifuna ukukhosela ethunzini lamaphiko akho, zize zidlule izinhlupheko.57:1 AmaH. 17:8; 36:7; 91:4. 
19_57_2_Ngizakukhala kuNkulunkulu oPhezukonke, kuNkulunkulu ongifezelayo. 
19_57_3_Uyakuthumela esezulwini, angisindise mhla ofuna ukungigwinya ekloloda. Sela UNkulunkulu uyakuthuma umusa wakhe neqiniso lakhe. 
19_57_4_Umphefumulo wami uphakathi kwezingonyama; ngilala kwabavutha umlilo, abantwana babantu abamazinyo abo ayimikhonto nemicibisholo, abalulimi lwabo luyinkemba ebukhali.57:4 AmaH. 55:21; 59:7. 
19_57_5_Phakama, Nkulunkulu, phezu kwezulu, inkazimulo ibe phezu komhlaba wonke. 
19_57_6_Izinyathelo zami bazibekele ugibe; umphefumulo wami ugobile; bembile igebe phambi kwami, kwakhalakathela bona kulo. Sela57:6 AmaH. 7:15; 9:15. 
19_57_7_Inhliziyo yami iduduzekile, Nkulunkulu; inhliziyo yami iduduzekile; ngizakuhlabelela, ngihube.57:7 AmaH. 108:1. 
19_57_8_Vuka, mphefumulo wami; vukani, lugubhu nehabhu! Ngizakuvusa ukusa.57:8 AmaH. 30:12. 
19_57_9_Ngizakukubonga, Nkosi, phakathi kwabantu, ngikudumise phakathi kwezizwe. 
19_57_10_Ngokuba umusa wakho mkhulu kuze kube sezulwini, nokuthembeka kwakho kuze kube semafwini.57:10 AmaH. 36:5. 
19_57_11_Phakama, Nkulunkulu, phezu kwezulu, inkazimulo yakho ibe phezu komhlaba wonke. 
19_58_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Ungachithi. ElikaDavide. IMiktamu. Imbala nikhuluma ukulunga ngokuthula na? Madodana abantu, nahlulela ngobuqotho na?58:1 Isaya 56:10. 
19_58_2_Ingani enhliziyweni niphehla imisebenzi emibi; ezweni nilinganisa ngesilinganiso ukudluzula kwezandla zenu. 
19_58_3_Ababi bahlubuka kwasesizalweni, abaqamba amanga baduka kwasesiswini.58:3 Isaya 48:8. 
19_58_4_Isihlungu sabo sinjengesihlungu senyoka; banjengebululu eliyisithulu, elivimba indlebe yalo,58:4 Jer. 17:23; Hez. 12:2; IzE. 7:57. 
19_58_5_lingalaleli izwi lezinyanga ezilumba amalumbo ngokuhlakanipha. 
19_58_6_Yaphula amazinyo abo emlonyeni wabo, Nkulunkulu! Phohloza amazinyo omhlathi ezingonyama ezingamabhongo, Jehova!58:6 AmaH. 3:7. 
19_58_7_Mabaphele njengamanzi agobhozayo; nxa ekhomba ngemicibisholo yakhe, mayibe sengathi iqundekile.58:7 Jobe 14:10. 
19_58_8_Mababe njengomnenke oncibilika, uphele, njengokuphuphume kowesifazane okungalibonanga ilanga.58:8 Jobe 3:16. 
19_58_9_Amabhodwe enu engakazizwa izinkuni zameva, uyakuziphephula, noma ziluhlaza noma zivutha. 
19_58_10_Olungileyo uyakujabula ngokuba ebona impindiselo; uyakugeza izinyawo zakhe egazini lababi,58:10 AmaH. 54:7. 
19_58_11_abantu baze bathi: “Impela ukhona umvuzo wolungileyo; impela ukhona uNkulunkulu owahlulelayo emhlabeni.” 
19_59_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Ungachithi. ElikaDavide. IMiktamu, mhla uSawule ethumela, ethi mabayilinde indlu ukuba bambulale. Ngikhulule ezitheni zami, Nkulunkulu wami, ngivikele kwabangivukelayo; 
19_59_2_ngikhulule kwabenza okubi, ngisindise kubantu begazi. 
19_59_3_Ngokuba bheka, baqamekela umphefumulo wami; iziqhwaga ziyangihlanganyela, kungekho siphambeko, kungekho sono kimi, Jehova.
