19_59_4_Ziyagijima, zizilungisele, kungekho cala kimi; vuka, ungihlangabeze, ubone. 
19_59_5_Wena kambe, Jehova Nkulunkulu Sebawoti, Nkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, vuka uphindisele bonke abezizwe, ungahawukeli namunye kwabahlubukileyo. Sela 
19_59_6_Bayabuya kusihlwa, bahlaba umkhulungwane njengenja, bezula emzini. 
19_59_7_Bheka, bayampompa ngomlomo wabo, kukhona izinkemba ezindebeni zabo, ngokuba bathi: “Ngubani ozwayo na?”59:7 AmaH. 55:21; 57:4. 
19_59_8_Kepha wena Jehova uyabahleka; uyabaklolodela bonke abezizwe.59:8 AmaH. 2:4. 
19_59_9_Mandla ami, ngiyakulindela wena, ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyinqaba yami. 
19_59_10_UNkulunkulu wami uyakungihlangabeza ngomusa wakhe; uNkulunkulu uyakungibonisa izitha zami ngokwethaba. 
19_59_11_Ungazibulali, funa abantu bami bakhohlwe; zizulise ngamandla akho, uzilahle phansi, Nkosi, sihlangu sethu.59:11 Gen. 4:12. 
19_59_12_Izwi lezindebe zazo liyisono somlomo wazo; mazibanjwe ekuzidleni kwazo nangenxa yesiqalekiso namanga eziwakhulumayo. 
19_59_13_Ziqede ngokuthukuthela, ziqede zingabe zisabakho; mazazi ukuba nguNkulunkulu obusa kwaJakobe, kuze kube semikhawulweni yomhlaba. Sela 
19_59_14_Ziyabuya kusihlwa; zihlaba umkhulungwane njengenja, zizula emzini. 
19_59_15_Zizulazulela ukudla; uma zingasuthi, zihlala nasebusuku.59:15 Isaya 8:21. 
19_59_16_Kepha mina ngizakuhlabelela ngamandla akho, ngethabele umusa wakho ekuseni, ngokuba uyinqaba yami, nesiphephelo ngosuku lokuhlupheka kwami. 
19_59_17_Mandla ami, ngizakuhubela wena; ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyinqaba yami, unguNkulunkulu wami womusa. 
19_60_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Umnduze; ubufakazi. IMiktamu likaDavide, ekulweni kwakhe nama-Aramu Naharayimi nama-Aramu Soba, uJowabe ebuya, enqoba abakwa-Edomi esiGodini Sikasawoti abayizinkulungwane eziyishumi nambili. Nkulunkulu usilahlile, usichithile; mawubuye usilulamise. 
19_60_2_Uzamazamisile umhlaba, wawudabula izimfa; zivale izimfa zawo, ngokuba uyazamazama. 
19_60_3_Isizwe sakho usibonisile izinto ezinzima; usiphuzisile iwayini, sabhuyazela.60:3 AmaH. 75:8; Isaya 51:17,22; Jer. 25:15. 
19_60_4_Abakwesabayo ubanike ibhanela ukuba liphakanyiswe ngenxa yeqiniso. Sela 
19_60_5_Ukuze abathandekayo bakho bakhululwe, sindisa ngesandla sakho sokunene, ungizwele.60:5 AmaH. 108:6. 
19_60_6_UNkulunkulu ukhulumile ebungcweleni bakhe, wathi: “Ngiyakwethaba; ngiyakulidabula iShekemi, ngisilinganise isiGodi saseSukoti. 
19_60_7_Ngowami uGileyadi, ngowami uManase; u-Efrayimi uyisivikelo sekhanda lami, uJuda uyintonga yami yokubusa.60:7 Gen. 49:10. 
19_60_8_UMowabi uyisitsha sami sokuhlambela; phezu kuka-Edomi ngiphonsa isicathulo sami; yethaba ngami, Filistiya.”60:8 Num. 24:17; 2 Sam. 8:1,2,13,14. 
19_60_9_Ngubani oyakungiyisa emzini oqinileyo na? Ngubani oyakungiholela kwa-Edomi na? 
19_60_10_Akusiwena Nkulunkulu osilahlileyo na? Nkulunkulu, awusaphumi nezimpi zethu.60:10 AmaH. 44:9. 
19_60_11_Siphe ukuba sisizakale ekuhluphekeni, ngokuba ukusiza komuntu kuyize.60:11 Jer. 17:5. 
19_60_12_NgoNkulunkulu siyakwenza izenzo zamandla; yena uyakunyathela phansi izitha zethu. 
19_61_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. ElikaDavide. Yizwa, Nkulunkulu, ukukhala kwami, ulalele umkhuleko wami. 
19_61_2_Ngikhala kuwe ngisemkhawulweni womhlaba, lapho inhliziyo yami isebuthakathakeni; ngiholele edwaleni eliphakeme kunami. 
19_61_3_Ngokuba ubuyisiphephelo sami, inqaba eqinileyo ngakuso isitha. 
19_61_4_Ngiyakuhlala etendeni lakho kuze kube phakade; ngiyakukhosela ekusithekeni kwamaphiko akho. Sela 
19_61_5_Ngokuba wena Nkulunkulu uzizwile izithembiso zami, wabanika ifa abalesaba igama lakho. 
19_61_6_Uyakweleka izinsuku ezinsukwini zenkosi; iminyaka yayo iyakuba njengezizukulwane nezizukulwane. 
19_61_7_Iyakuhlala phambi kukaNkulunkulu kuze kube phakade; yimisele umusa neqiniso ukuba kuyilondoloze. 
19_61_8_Khona ngiyakulidumisa igama lakho kuze kube phakade, ukuze ngigcwalise izithembiso zami imihla ngemihla. 
19_62_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. KuJeduthuni. Ihubo likaDavide. Umphefumulo wami uzithulele kuNkulunkulu kuphela; insindiso yami ivela kuye. 
19_62_2_Nguye kuphela oyidwala lami nensindiso yami, inqaba yami; angiyikunyakaziswa kakhulu. 
19_62_3_Koze kube nini nisukela umuntu ukuba nimbulale nonke njengodonga olwengemeyo nothango oludilikayo na? 
19_62_4_Yebo, bathunga icebo lokumwisa ekuphakameni kwakhe, bathanda amanga; bayabusisa ngomlomo wabo, kepha ezibilinini zabo bayaqalekisa. Sela 
19_62_5_Mphefumulo wami, zithulisele kuNkulunkulu kuphela, ngokuba ithemba lami livela kuye. 
19_62_6_Nguye kuphela oyidwala lami nensindiso yami, inqaba yami; angiyikunyakaziswa. 
19_62_7_Insindiso yami nodumo lwami kukuNkulunkulu; idwala lami eliqinileyo nesiphephelo sami kukuNkulunkulu. 
19_62_8_Thembani kuye ngezikhathi zonke nina bantu, nithulule inhliziyo yenu phambi kwakhe; uNkulunkulu uyisiphephelo sethu. Sela 
19_62_9_Abantwana babantu bangumoya nje, abantwana bezikhulu bangamanga; esilinganisweni bayakhuphuka, balula kunomoya bonke. 
19_62_10_Maningakwethembi ukuqhwaga, ningazigabisi ngokuphangiweyo; uma imfuyo yanda, ningayibeki inhliziyo kuyo. 
19_62_11_UNkulunkulu ukhulumile kanye, ngikuzwe kabili ukuthi amandla angakaNkulunkulu. 
19_62_12_Nomusa ungowakho, Nkosi; ngokuba wena umphindisela umuntu njengokwenza kwakhe. 
19_63_1_Ihubo likaDavide esehlane lakwaJuda. Nkulunkulu, wena unguNkulunkulu wami, ngiyakufuna ekuseni; umphefumulo wami womele wena; inyama yami ilangazelela wena ezweni elomileyo eligagadekileyo, lapho amanzi engekho khona. 
19_63_2_Kanjalo ngikubheka endlini engcwele, ngibone amandla akho nenkazimulo yakho. 
19_63_3_Ngokuba umusa wakho umnandi kunokuphila; izindebe zami ziyakukudumisa. 
19_63_4_Ngiyakukubonga ngisaphila; ngiyakuphakamisa izandla zami egameni lakho. 
19_63_5_Umphefumulo wami uyakusutha kungathi ngamanoni namafutha; umlomo wami uyakudumisa ngezindebe ezethabayo, 
19_63_6_Nxa ngikukhumbula ecansini lami, ngizindla ngawe emilindweni yasebusuku. 
19_63_7_Ngokuba ungisizile; ngiyakwethaba ethunzini lamaphiko akho. 
19_63_8_Umphefumulo wami ubambelele kuwe; esokunene sakho siyangiphasa. 
19_63_9_Kepha abafuna umphefumulo wami ukuwubulala bayakwehlela ezindaweni zomhlaba eziphansi. 
19_63_10_Bayakunikelwa esandleni senkemba, babe yisabelo sezimpungushe. 
19_63_11_Kepha inkosi iyakuthokoza ngoNkulunkulu; bonke abafunga yena bayakuzibonga; ngokuba umlomo wabakhuluma amanga uyakuvalwa. 
19_64_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Yizwa, Nkulunkulu, izwi lami ekukhaleni kwami, ulondoloze ukuphila kwami evusweni lesitha. 
19_64_2_Ngisithe esigungwini sababi nasesixukwini sabenza okubi, 
19_64_3_abalola ulimi lwabo njengenkemba, bakhombe imicibisholo yabo engamazwi ababayo 
19_64_4_ukuba bamdubule ongenacala ngasesitha, bamdubule ngokuzuma bengesabi. 
19_64_5_Baqinela icebo elibi; bakhuluma ngokufihla izingibe; bathi: “Ngubani oyakusibona na?” 
19_64_6_Basongoza izenzo ezimbi, bathi: “Siliqedile icebo elisongoziweyo,” izibilini nenhliziyo yomuntu kujulile. 
19_64_7_Kepha uNkulunkulu uyakubadubula ngomcibisholo; bagwazwe ngokuzunywa. 
19_64_8_Bayakuwiswa, baficwe lulimi lwabo; bonke abababonayo bayonikina ikhanda. 
19_64_9_Bonke abantu bayashaywa luvalo; bayakushumayela izenzo zikaNkulunkulu, baqonde akwenzileyo. 
19_64_10_Olungileyo uyakujabula kuJehova, aphephele kuye; bonke abaqotho ngenhliziyo bayakuzibonga. 
19_65_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Igama. Udumiso luhlalela wena Nkulunkulu eSiyoni, nesithembiso siyakugcwaliswa kuwe. 
19_65_2_Wena ozwayo imikhuleko, beza kuwe bonke abantu. 
19_65_3_Izenzo ezimbi zangahlula; iziphambeko zethu uyaziyekela. 
19_65_4_Ubusisiwe omkhethayo wena, omsondezayo ukuba ahlale emagcekeni akho; siyakusutha ngokuhle kwendlu yakho, ithempeli lakho elingcwele. 
19_65_5_Uyakusiphendula ngezenzo ezesabekayo ekulungeni, Nkulunkulu wensindiso yethu, wena oyithemba lemikhawulo yonke yomhlaba nelolwandle olukude; 
19_65_6_yena omisa izintaba ngamandla akhe, obhince amandla; 
19_65_7_othulisa ukuduma kwezilwandle, inhlokomo yamaza azo nomsindo wabantu. 
19_65_8_Abakhile emikhawulweni yomhlaba bayesaba ngezibonakaliso zakho; uyethabisa impumalanga nentshonalanga. 
19_65_9_Uhambela umhlaba, unisa imvula, uwuvundisa kakhulu; umfula kaNkulunkulu ugcwele amanzi; ubalungisela abantu ukudla, ngokuba uwulungisa kanjalo umhlaba. 
19_65_10_Umatisa imisele yawo, ulalisa amasoyi awo; uwuthambisa ngezihlambi, ubusise okumila kuwo. 
19_65_11_Umnyaka uyawuhlobisa ngobumnene bakho, nemikhondo yakho iconsa amafutha. 
19_65_12_Amadlelo asehlane ayaconsa; amagquma abhinca injabulo. 
19_65_13_Amadlelo embethe izimvu, nezigodi zisibekelwe ngamabele; konke kuyajabula, kuhlabelele. 
19_66_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Igama. Ihubo. Mhubeleni ngenjabulo uNkulunkulu, mhlaba wonke. 
19_66_2_Hlabelelelani inkazimulo yegama lakhe, nibabaze ukudunyiswa kwakhe. 
19_66_3_Yishoni kuNkulunkulu, nithi: “Yeka ukwesabeka kwemisebenzi yakho. Ngenxa yobukhulu bamandla akho izitha zakho ziyakuzithoba phansi kwakho. 
19_66_4_Umhlaba wonke uyakukhuleka kuwe, ukudumise; bayakuhubela igama lakho.” Sela 
19_66_5_Wozani nibone izenzo zikaNkulunkulu; uyesabeka ekwenzeni kwakhe kubantwana babantu. 
19_66_6_Ulwandle waluguqula lwaba yizwe elomileyo; bawela umfula ngezinyawo; lapho sathokoza kuye. 
19_66_7_Ubusa ngamandla akhe kuze kube phakade; amehlo akhe ayahlozinga izizwe; abanenkani mabangaziphakamisi. Sela 
19_66_8_Bongani uNkulunkulu wethu nina zizwe, nizwakalise izwi lokudunyiswa kwakhe 
19_66_9_ogcina umphefumulo wethu ekuphileni, engaluvumeli unyawo lwethu lushelele. 
19_66_10_Ngokuba wena Nkulunkulu usilingile, wasihlanza njengokuhlanzwa kwesiliva. 
19_66_11_Wasingenisa enetheni; wabeka umthwalo onzima ezinkalweni zethu. 
19_66_12_Wavumela abantu ukuba bakhwele phezu kwamakhanda ethu; sangena emlilweni nasemanzini; kepha wasikhiphela ekubuseni. 
19_66_13_Ngiyakungena endlini yakho ngineminikelo yokushiswa; ngizakugcwalisa kuwe izithembiso zami 
19_66_14_ezaphinyiselwa yizindebe zami, zakhulunywa ngumlomo wami ngisekuhluphekeni. 
19_66_15_Ngiyakunikela kuwe iminikelo yokushiswa yezinonileyo kanye nephunga lezinqama; ngiyakunikela ngezinkunzi nangezimpongo. Sela 
19_66_16_Wozani nizwe nina nonke enesaba uNkulunkulu; ngizakulandisa akwenzele umphefumulo wami. 
19_66_17_Ngakhala kuye ngomlomo wami; ukudumisa kwakuphansi kolimi lwami. 
19_66_18_Uma bengiqonde ububi enhliziyweni yami, ibingayikungizwa iNkosi. 
19_66_19_Ngempela uNkulunkulu uzwile, walalela izwi lomkhuleko wami. 
19_66_20_Makabongwe uNkulunkulu ongalahlanga umkhuleko wami nomusa wakhe kimi. 
19_67_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. Ihubo. Igama. UNkulunkulu makabe nomusa kithina, asibusise; makakhanyise ubuso bakhe phezu kwethu, Sela 
19_67_2_ukuze indlela yakho yaziwe emhlabeni, insindiso yakho kubo bonke abezizwe. 
19_67_3_Abantu mabakubonge, Nkulunkulu; mabakubonge abantu bonke. 
19_67_4_Izizwe mazijabule, zethabe; ngokuba izizwe uzahlulela ngokulunga, uzihola izizwe emhlabeni. Sela 
19_67_5_Abantu mabakubonge, Nkulunkulu; mabakubonge abantu bonke. 
19_67_6_Umhlaba uthelile izithelo zawo; uNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu wethu, uyasibusisa. 
19_67_7_UNkulunkulu uyasibusisa; imikhawulo yonke yomhlaba iyakumesaba. 
19_68_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide. Ihubo. Igama. Makavuke uNkulunkulu, zihlakazeke izitha zakhe; abamzondayo babaleka phambi kwakhe. 
19_68_2_Bamukiswa njengokumukiswa komusi; njengokuncibilika kwengcina phambi komlilo ababi bachithwa phambi kukaNkulunkulu. 
19_68_3_Kepha abalungileyo bayajabula; bayethaba phambi kukaNkulunkulu bethokoza nokuthokoza. 
19_68_4_Hlabelelani kuNkulunkulu, nidumise igama lakhe; menzeleni umendo lowo odabula amahlane; igama lakhe linguJehova; yethabani phambi kwakhe, 
19_68_5_uyise wezintandane, umahluleli wabafelokazi, uNkulunkulu endlini yakhe engcwele, 
19_68_6_uNkulunkulu ohlalisa imihlalaqha ezindlini, akhiphele iziboshwa ekubuseni; ngabahlubukileyo bodwa abakhe ezweni elomileyo. 
19_68_7_Nkulunkulu, ekuphumeni kwakho phambi kwabantu bakho, ekudabuleni kwakho ihlane, Sela 
19_68_8_umhlaba wazamazama, izulu laconsa phambi kukaNkulunkulu, neSinayi lazamazama phambi kukaNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli. 
19_68_9_Wanisa imvula enkulu, Nkulunkulu; ifa lakho selahlulekile, waliqinisa. 
19_68_10_Ibandla lakho lakha kulo; ngobuhle bakho wabalungisela abahluphekayo, Nkulunkulu. 
19_68_11_INkosi iphumisa izwi; abesifazane ababika indaba ejabulisayo bayisixuku esikhulu. 
19_68_12_Amakhosi ezimpi ayabaleka; ayabaleka wona; isifazane esihlezi ekhaya sabela impango. 
19_68_13_Nxa nilala phakathi kwezibaya, kunjengamaphiko ejuba asibekelwa ngesiliva, izimpaphe zamaphiko alo ngegolide elikhazimulayo. 
19_68_14_Nxa uSomandla ehlakaza amakhosi kulo, likhithika iqhwa eSalimoni. 
19_68_15_Intaba yaseBashani iyintaba kaNkulunkulu; intaba yaseBashani iyintaba eneziqongo. 
19_68_16_Nina zintaba ezineziqongo, yini ukuba niyibuke ngomhawu intaba uNkulunkulu athanda ukuhlala kuyo na? Yebo, uJehova uyakuhlala kuyo kuze kube phakade. 
19_68_17_Izinqola zikaNkulunkulu ziyizinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili, izinkulungwane nezinkulungwane; iNkosi iphakathi kwazo; iSinayi lisendaweni engcwele. 
19_68_18_Wena wenyukela phezulu, wathumba izithunjwa, wamukela izipho kubantu nakwabahlubukileyo, ukuze uJehova uNkulunkulu ahlale khona. 
19_68_19_Mayibongwe iNkosi. Iyasithwala imihla ngemihla; uNkulunkulu uyinsindiso yethu. Sela 
19_68_20_Kithina uNkulunkulu unguNkulunkulu wezinkululo; ukukhipha ekufeni kungokukaJehova iNkosi. 
19_68_21_Impela uNkulunkulu uyakuliphohloza ikhanda lezitha zakhe, ukhakhayi olunesihluthu lwalowo osahamba ezonweni zakhe. 
19_68_22_INkosi yathi: “Ngiyakubabuyisa eBashani, ngibabuyise ekujuleni kolwandle 
19_68_23_ukuba unyawo lwakho ulucwilise egazini, ulimi lwezinja zakho lube nesabelo salo ezitheni.” 
19_68_24_Bayazibona izindwendwe zakho, Nkulunkulu, izindwendwe zikaNkulunkulu wami, iNkosi yami, ziya endlini engcwele. 
19_68_25_Ngaphambili kuhamba abahlabeleli, ngasemuva abashaya ugubhu, ngaphakathi izintombi ezishaya izingubhu. 
19_68_26_Bongani uNkulunkulu emihlanganweni; bongani iNkosi, nina bomthombo ka-Israyeli. 
19_68_27_Nango uBenjamini, omncane, umbusi wabo, neviyo lezikhulu zakwaJuda, izikhulu zakwaZebuloni nezikhulu zakwaNafetali. 
19_68_28_UNkulunkulu wakho ukumisele amandla akho; qinisa, Nkulunkulu, lokho ozenzela khona. 
19_68_29_Ngenxa yethempeli lakho eJerusalema amakhosi ayakukulethela izipho. 
19_68_30_Zikhuze izilwane zasemhlangeni, umhlambi wezinkunzi kanye namankonyane abantu, azithobise phansi ngezinqamu zesiliva; uyazihlakaza izizwe ezithanda ukulwa. 
19_68_31_Izikhulu ziyakuvela eGibithe; amaKushe ayakwelulela ngokushesha izandla zawo kuNkulunkulu. 
19_68_32_Nina mibuso yomhlaba mhubeleni uNkulunkulu, nidumise iNkosi, Sela 
19_68_33_yona ekhwela phezu kwamazulu ezulu asendulo; bhekani, iyezwakalisa izwi layo, izwi elinamandla. 
19_68_34_Nikani uNkulunkulu amandla; ubukhosi bakhe buphezu kuka-Israyeli; amandla akhe asemafwini. 
19_68_35_Nkulunkulu, uyesabeka ezindaweni zakho ezingcwele; uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli nguyena owenzela abantu amandla nokuqina; makadunyiswe uNkulunkulu. 
19_69_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Iminduze. ElikaDavide. Ngisindise, Nkulunkulu, ngokuba amanzi afikile emphefumulweni. 
19_69_2_Ngishone odakeni lobishi olujulileyo, kungekho kuma; ngingene emanzini alutwa; imisinga iyangicwilisa. 
19_69_3_Ngikhathele ukukhala kwami, umphimbo wami ushile; amehlo ami ayafiphala ekulindeleni uNkulunkulu wami. 
19_69_4_Abangizonda ngeze baningi kunezinwele zekhanda lami; baningi abafuna ukungiqeda beyizitha zami kungekho sici; nengingakuphanganga ngakubuyisela. 
19_69_5_Nkulunkulu, wena uyabazi ubuwula bami, nezono zami azifihlakele kuwe. 
19_69_6_Mabangajabhiswa ngami abakulindeleyo, Nkosi Jehova Sebawoti; mabangahlazeki ngami abakufunayo, Nkulunkulu ka-Israyeli. 
19_69_7_Ngokuba ngithwele isihlamba ngenxa yakho; ihlazo lisibekela ubuso bami. 
19_69_8_Sengaba ngumfokazi kubafowethu, nowezizwe kubantwana bakamame. 
19_69_9_Ngokuba ukushisekela indlu yakho kungidlile; izithuko zabakuthukayo zingehlele. 
19_69_10_Ngakhala, umphefumulo wami wazila; kwaba ngukudunyazwa kwami. 
19_69_11_Isaka ngalenza isambatho sami; ngaba yisaga kubo. 
19_69_12_Abahlezi esangweni bakhuluma ngami; izidakwa ziyangihaya. 
19_69_13_Kodwa mina, umkhuleko wami ukuwe Jehova esikhathini sokuzwelwa, Nkulunkulu; ngenxa yomusa wakho omkhulu ngiphendule eqinisweni lensindiso yakho. 
19_69_14_Ngikhiphe odakeni, mangingashoni; mangisindiswe kubo abangizondayo, nasemanzini alutwa. 
19_69_15_Isikhukhula samanzi masingangicwilisi, utwa lungangigwinyi, umgodi ungangivaleli emlonyeni wawo. 
19_69_16_Ngiphendule, Jehova, ngokuba umusa wakho ulungile; uphendukele kimi ngokobubele bakho obukhulu. 
19_69_17_Ungayifihleli inceku yakho ubuso bakho, ngokuba ngiyahlupheka; shesha ungiphendule. 
19_69_18_Sondela kuwo umphefumulo wami, uwuhlenge, ngikhulule ngenxa yezitha zami. 
19_69_19_Wena uyakwazi ukuthukwa kwami, namahloni ami nokudunyazwa kwami; zonke izitha zami ziphambi kwakho. 
19_69_20_Ukuthukwa kuyaphulile inhliziyo yami, ngigula kakhulu; bengibheka ukuhawukelwa, kepha akwabakho, nabaduduzayo, kepha angibatholanga. 
19_69_21_Banginika inyongo ibe ngukudla kwami; ekomeni kwami bangiphuzisa uviniga. 
19_69_22_Itafula labo malibe yisihibe phambi kwabo, libe lugibe kwabahlezi bezithulele. 
19_69_23_Amehlo abo mawafiphale, ukuze bangaboni; izinkalo zabo zintengezele njalo. 
19_69_24_Thela phezu kwabo ukunengwa kwakho; intukuthelo yakho evuthayo mayibafice. 
19_69_25_Umuzi wabo mawuchitheke; makungabikho ohlala ematendeni abo. 
19_69_26_Ngokuba oshaywe nguwe bayamzingela, baxoxa ngobuhlungu bezinkubela zakho. 
19_69_27_Yengezela ukona ekoneni kwabo; mabangezi ekulungeni kwakho. 
19_69_28_Mabesulwe encwadini yabaphilayo, bangalotshwa kanye nabalungileyo. 
19_69_29_Mina kodwa ngihluphekile, ngibuhlungu; insindiso yakho, Nkulunkulu mayingilondoloze. 
19_69_30_Ngiyakulibonga ngehubo igama likaNkulunkulu, ngimphakamise ngokubonga. 
19_69_31_Kuyakuthandeka kuJehova kunenkomo, kunenkunzi enezimpondo nezinselo. 
19_69_32_Kuyakuthi abayizivi bekubona, bajabule; nina enifuna uNkulunkulu, inhliziyo yenu mayiphile. 
19_69_33_Ngokuba uJehova uyabalalela abampofu, neziboshwa zakhe akazideleli. 
19_69_34_Uyakubongwa yizulu nomhlaba, yizilwandle nakho konke okuphila kuzo. 
19_69_35_Ngokuba uNkulunkulu uzakulisindisa iSiyoni, akhe imizi yakwaJuda; bazakuhlala khona, ibe yifa labo. 
19_69_36_Inzalo yezinceku zakhe iyakulidla ifa; abathanda igama lakhe bayakuhlala kuyo. 
19_70_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide. Elokukhumbuza. Nkulunkulu, phuthuma ungikhulule. Jehova, phuthuma ungisize. 
19_70_2_Mabajabhe, bayangaze abafuna umphefumulo wami. Mababuyiselwe emuva, bajabhiswe abangifisela umonakalo. 
19_70_3_Abathi ashila, ashila mababuyele emuva ngenxa yokuhlazeka kwabo. 
19_70_4_Mabethabe, bajabule kuwe bonke abakufunayo; abathanda insindiso yakho mabasho njalonjalo, bathi: “Makabe mkhulu uNkulunkulu.” 
19_70_5_Ngokuba mina ngihluphekile, ngimpofu; Nkulunkulu, ngiphuthumele. Wena uyinsizakalo yami nomkhululi wami; Jehova, ungalibali. 
19_71_1_Jehova, ngiyethemba wena; mangingajabhi naphakade. 
19_71_2_Ngikhulule ngokulunga kwakho, ungihlangulise; beka indlebe yakho kimi, ungisindise. 
19_71_3_Yiba kimi idwala lokuhlala, ukuze ngiye kulo njalonjalo; ukuyalezile ukusindiswa kwami, ngokuba uyidwala lami nenqaba yami. 
19_71_4_Nkulunkulu wami, ngikhulule esandleni somubi, esandleni songalungile nesonakeleyo. 
19_71_5_Ngokuba wena uyithemba lami, Nkosi Jehova, ithemba lami kwasebusheni bami. 
19_71_6_Ngencike kuwe kwasesiswini; nguwe owangikhipha ezibilinini zikamame; ukudumisa kwami kuyakuba ngawe njalo. 
19_71_7_Nginjengesimangaliso kwabaningi, kepha wena uyisiphephelo sami esinamandla. 
19_71_8_Umlomo wami uzakugcwala ukubonga wena, nalo udumo lwakho usuku lonke. 
19_71_9_Ungangilahli esikhathini sobudala, ungangishiyi ekupheleni kwamandla ami, 
19_71_10_ngokuba izitha zami zikhuluma ngami, nabawuhlomele umphefumulo wami bayahlebelana, 
19_71_11_bathi: “UNkulunkulu umshiyile; zingelani nimbambe, ngokuba akakho osindisayo.” 
19_71_12_Nkulunkulu, ungabi kude nami; Nkulunkulu, phuthuma ungisize. 
19_71_13_Abamelene nomphefumulo wami mabajabhe, baphele; abangifunela umonakalo mabembathe amahloni nenhlamba. 
19_71_14_Mina kodwa ngiyakwethemba njalo, ngengeze ukudumisa ekudunyisweni kwakho. 
19_71_15_Umlomo wami uyakulanda ukulunga kwakho, nensindiso yakho lonke usuku; ngokuba anginakukubala. 
19_71_16_Ngiyakuletha izenzo ezinqabileyo zeNkosi uJehova; ngiyakubonga ukulunga kwakho, okwakho kuphela. 
19_71_17_Nkulunkulu, ungifundisile kwasebusheni bami; ngizilandile izimangaliso zakho kuze kube manje. 
19_71_18_Futhi mawungangishiyi, nxa ngimdala, ngiyimpunga, ngize ngishumayele ingalo yakho kuso isizukulwane, amandla akho kubo bonke abezayo. 
19_71_19_Ukulunga kwakho, Nkulunkulu, kufinyelele ezulwini; wena owenze izinto ezinkulu, Nkulunkulu, ngubani onjengawe na? 
19_71_20_Wena owasizwisa izinhlupheko eziningi ezimbi, uyakubuye usiphilise, usikhuphule ezinzulwini zomhlaba. 
19_71_21_Yandisa udumo lwami, ubuye ungiduduze. 
19_71_22_Yikhona nami ngizakububonga ubuqotho bakho, Nkulunkulu wami, ngogubhu lwezintambo; ngizakukudumisa ngehabhu wena oNgcwele ka-Israyeli. 
19_71_23_Izindebe zami zizakujabula, ngokuba ngizakukudumisa wena, nomphefumulo wami owuhlengileyo. 
19_71_24_Ulimi lwami futhi luzakukhuluma lonke usuku ngokulunga; ngokuba badunyaziwe, bajabhisiwe abangifunela umonakalo. 
19_72_1_ElikaSolomoni. Nkulunkulu, nika inkosi izahlulelo zakho nendodana yenkosi ukulunga kwakho. 
19_72_2_Iyakwahlulela isizwe sakho ngeqiniso nezihlupheki zakho ngemfanelo. 
19_72_3_Izintaba ziyakuletha ukuthula kubantu; kanjalo namagquma, ngokulunga. 
19_72_4_Izakubahlulela abahluphekileyo kubantu, isindise abantwana babampofu, imphohloze onokhahlo. 
19_72_5_Bayakwesaba wena, kusekhona ilanga nenyanga, izizukulwane ngezizukulwane. 
19_72_6_Iyakwehla njengemvula edlelweni, njengesihlambi esimatisa umhlaba. 
19_72_7_Ezinsukwini zayo olungileyo uyakuqhakaza, kuvame ukuthula, ize ingabikho inyanga. 
19_72_8_Iyakubusa kusukela elwandle kuze kube selwandle, kusukela emfuleni kuze kube semikhawulweni yomhlaba. 
19_72_9_Abakhe ehlane bayakukhothama phambi kwayo; izitha zayo zizakukhotha uthuli. 
19_72_10_Amakhosi aseTharishishi naweseziqhingini ayakuletha izipho; amakhosi aseSheba naseSeba ayakwethula izipho. 
19_72_11_Onke amakhosi ayakuziwisa phambi kwayo; zonke izizwe ziyakuyikhonza. 
19_72_12_Ngokuba iyakukhulula ompofu ozikhalela kuyo, nohluphekayo ongenamsizi. 
19_72_13_Iyakuhawukela odangeleyo nompofu; iyakusindisa imiphefumulo yabampofu. 
19_72_14_Iyakukhulula umphefumulo wabo okhahlweni nasendluzuleni; igazi labo liyakuba yigugu emehlweni ayo. 
19_72_15_Iyakuphila, bayinike igolide laseSheba, bayithandazele njalo, bayibusise lonke usuku. 
19_72_16_Kuyakuba khona inala kakolweni ezweni esiqongweni sezintaba; ukudla kwalo kuyakuhashazela njengeLebanoni; abemizi bayakukhahlela njengotshani bomhlaba. 
19_72_17_Igama layo liyakuma kuze kube phakade; igama layo liyakuxhanta, lisekhona ilanga; bayakuzibusisa ngayo; bonke abezizwe bayakuthi ibusisiwe. 
19_72_18_Makabongwe uJehova uNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, onguye yedwa owenza izimangaliso. 
19_72_19_Malibongwe igama lakhe lenkazimulo kuze kube phakade, umhlaba wonke ugcwale inkazimulo yakhe. Amen, Amen. 
19_72_20_Imikhuleko kaDavide indodana kaJese isaphelile. 
19_73_1_Ihubo lika-Asafa. Impela uNkulunkulu umnene ku-Israyeli, kubo abanenhliziyo ehlanzekileyo. 
19_73_2_Kepha mina, izinyawo zami zicishe zakhubeka; kwaba kancane ukuba izinyathelo zami zishelele. 
19_73_3_Ngokuba ngaba nomhawu ngabazidlayo, lapho ngibona ukubusa kwababi. 
19_73_4_Ngokuba abanabuhlungu kuze kube sekufeni kwabo, namandla abo aqinile. 
19_73_5_Abahlupheki njengabanye abantu; abahlushwa njengabanye abantu. 
19_73_6_Ngakho-ke iqholo lingumnaka wabo; indluzula ibembesa njengengubo. 
19_73_7_Amehlo abo aphinqekile ngokunona; imicabango yenhliziyo iyachichima. 
19_73_8_Bayaklolodela; ebubini bakhuluma ngokukhahla; bakhuluma besekuphakamemi. 
19_73_9_Umlomo wabo bawuphakamisela ezulwini; ulimi lwabo luhambela emhlabeni. 
19_73_10_Ngakho-ke isizwe sakhe sibuyela lapha; amanzi amaningi bazimuncela wona. 
19_73_11_Bathi: “UNkulunkulu wazi kanjani na? Imbala kukhona ukwazi koPhezukonke na?” 
19_73_12_Bheka, laba bayibo ababi; bazinza njalo; bandisa imfuyo. 
19_73_13_Impela ngiyihlanzele ize inhliziyo yami, ngahlamba izandla zami ngingenacala, 
19_73_14_ngokuba ngahlushwa usuku lonke; kwasa ngijeziswa. 
19_73_15_Uma bengithe, ngizakukhuluma kanjalo, bheka, ngabe ngisikhohlisile isizukulwane sabantwana bakho. 
19_73_16_Kwathi ngicabanga ukuba ngikuqonde lokho, kwaba luhlupho emehlweni ami, 
19_73_17_ngaze ngangena endlini engcwele kaNkulunkulu, ngaqaphelisisa ukugcina kwabo. 
19_73_18_Impela ubabeka ezindaweni ezibushelezi; ubawisa babe yincithakalo. 
19_73_19_Maye, bachithwa ngokuphazima kweso! Bashona, babhubha benovalo. 
19_73_20_Njengephupho ekuphaphameni, Nkosi, uyakudelela umfanekiso wabo ekuvukeni kwakho. 
19_73_21_Kwathi inhliziyo yami yaba nomunyu, kuhlaba ezinsweni zami, 
19_73_22_ngaba yisiphukuphuku, angaqonda lutho; ngaba yisilwane kuwe. 
19_73_23_Kepha mina ngiyakube ngikuwe njalo; ungibambile ngesandla sami sokunene. 
19_73_24_Uyakungihola ngesiluleko sakho, andukuba ungamukele enkazimulweni. 
19_73_25_Nginobani ezulwini na? Uma nginawe, angifuni lutho emhlabeni. 
19_73_26_Inyama yami nenhliziyo yami iyaphela; nokho uNkulunkulu uyidwala lenhliziyo yami nesabelo sami kuze kube phakade. 
19_73_27_Ngokuba bheka, abakude nawe bayakubhubha; uyabachitha bonke abahlubukayo kuwe ngokuphinga. 
19_73_28_Kepha mina kungilungele ukusondela kuNkulunkulu; ngenzile iNkosi uJehova ibe yisiphephelo sami, ukuze ngishumayele zonke izenzo zakho. 
19_74_1_IMaskili lika-Asafa. Nkulunkulu, usilahleleni kuze kube phakade na? Intukuthelo yakho ithunqelelani izimvu zedlelo lakho na? 
19_74_2_Khumbula ibandla lakho owalizuza endulo, owalikhulula ukuba libe yisifunda sefa lakho, nentaba yaseSiyoni ohlala kuyo. 
19_74_3_Lulamisela izinyawo zakho emidilikweni yaphakade; isitha sone konke endlini engcwele. 
19_74_4_Izitha zakho zibhongile phakathi kwendlu yakho yokubuthana, zamisa izimpawu zazo zaba yizimpawu. 
19_74_5_Zaba sengathi abantu baphakamisa amazembe emithini eminyeneyo. 
19_74_6_Konke okubaziweyo kwayo sezikuphohloze ngembazo nangesando. 
19_74_7_Zayokhela indlu yakho engcwele; indlu yegama lakho zayidumaza kwaze kwaba phansi emhlabathini. 
19_74_8_Zathi enhliziyweni yazo: “Masibachithe kanyekanye,” zashisa zonke izindlu zokubuthana zikaNkulunkulu ezweni. 
19_74_9_Izimpawu zethu asiziboni; akusekho mprofethi; akakho kithina owaziyo ukuthi koze kube nini. 
19_74_10_Nkulunkulu, koze kube nini umcindezeli ethuka, isitha sihlambalaza igama lakho njalo, na? 
19_74_11_Usihoshelani isandla sakho, isandla sakho sokunene, na? Sihoshe esifubeni sakho, uzichithe. 
19_74_12_Nokho uNkulunkulu uyiNkosi yami kwaphakade eyenza insindiso emhlabeni. 
19_74_13_Nguwena owahlukanisa ulwandle ngamandla akho, wachofoza amakhanda ezilo ezesabekayo emanzini. 
19_74_14_Nguwena owaphohloza amakhanda kaLeviyathani, wamnika abe ngukudla kwezidalwa zasehlane. 
19_74_15_Nguwena owaqhamukisa isiphethu nomfudlana; nguwe owomisa imifula egobhoza njalo. 
19_74_16_Usuku ngolwakho, nobusuku ngobakho; nguwena owenza ukukhanya nelanga. 
19_74_17_Nguwena owamisa yonke imikhawulo yomhlaba; nguwe owenza ihlobo nobusika. 
19_74_18_Khumbula lokhu, Jehova, ukuthi isitha sithukile, nesizwe esinobuwula silihlambalazile igama lakho. 
19_74_19_Ungawunikeli umphefumulo wejuba lakho esilwaneni; ungakhohlwa ukuphila kwezihlupheki zakho njalo. 
19_74_20_Khumbula isivumelwano, ngokuba izindawo ezimnyama zezwe zigcwele izindlu zobudlova. 
19_74_21_Ocindezelweyo makangabuyi ejabhile; ohluphekayo nompofu mababonge igama lakho. 
19_74_22_Vuka, Nkulunkulu, uyimele indaba yakho; khumbula ukuthi uklolodelwa yiziwula usuku lonke. 
19_74_23_Ungakhohlwa izwi lezitha zakho, ukuxokozela kwabakuvukelayo okwenyukela njalonjalo. 
19_75_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Ungachithi. Ihubo lika-Asafa. Igama. Siyakubonga, Nkulunkulu, siyabonga; igama lakho liseduze; balanda izimangaliso zakho. 
19_75_2_Lapho ngiyakugcina isikhathi esimisiweyo, ngiyakwahlulela ngokulunga. 
19_75_3_Umhlaba uyancibilika nabo bonke abakhe kuwo; mina ngimisile izinsika zawo. Sela 
19_75_4_Ngithe kwabazidlayo: “Ningazidli,” nakwababi: “Ningaphakamisi uphondo. 
19_75_5_Ningaluphakamiseli phezulu uphondo lwenu, ningajoqi ngentamo elukhuni.” 
19_75_6_Ngokuba ukuphakanyiswa akuveli empumalanga nasentshonalanga nasehlane lasezintabeni, 
19_75_7_kepha uNkulunkulu ungumahluleli; omunye uyamehlisa, omunye amphakamise. 
19_75_8_Ngokuba esandleni seNkosi kukhona isitsha; iwayini liyakhephuza; sigcwele ngeliqungiweyo, yona iyathulula ngaso; impela bonke ababi emhlabeni bayakuyimunca inhleze yalo, bayiphuze. 
19_75_9_Kepha mina ngiyakumemezela ngakho kuze kube phakade, ngidumise uNkulunkulu kaJakobe. 
19_75_10_Zonke izimpondo zababi ngiyakuzinquma; kepha izimpondo zolungileyo ziyakuphakanyiswa. 
19_76_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. Ihubo lika-Asafa. Igama. UNkulunkulu uyaziwa kwaJuda, igama lakhe likhulu kwa-Israyeli. 
19_76_2_Itabernakele lakhe liseSalema, nendlu yakhe iseSiyoni. 
19_76_3_Waphula lapho imicibisholo yomnsalo, nesihlangu, nenkemba, nempi. Sela 
19_76_4_Uyakhazimula ngobukhosi, lapho uvela ezintabeni zempango. 
19_76_5_Bachithekile abaqinile ngenhliziyo, balele ubuthongo babo; amaqhawe awafumanisanga izandla zawo. 
19_76_6_Ngokusola kwakho, Nkulunkulu kaJakobe, kwehlelwa ngubuthongo inqola kanye nehhashi. 
19_76_7_Wena, yebo, wena uyesabeka; ngubani ongema ebusweni bakho ngesikhathi solaka lwakho na? 
19_76_8_Wezwakalisa ukwahlulela kuvela ezulwini; umhlaba wesaba, wathula 
19_76_9_mhla evuka uNkulunkulu ukuba ahlulele, asindise bonke abathobekileyo bomhlaba. Sela 
19_76_10_Ngokuba ulaka lomuntu luyakukudumisa; insalelo yolaka uyakuyibhinca. 
19_76_11_Thembisani, nigcwalise izithembiso kuJehova uNkulunkulu wenu. Bonke abamzungezileyo mabalethe izipho kuye owEsabekayo. 
19_76_12_Uyanquma umoya wezikhulu, wesabeka kuwo amakhosi omhlaba. 
19_77_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. KuJeduthuni. Elika-Asafa. Ihubo. Izwi lami ngiyakuliphakamisela kuNkulunkulu, ngikhale kuNkulunkulu ukuba angibekele indlebe. 
19_77_2_Osukwini losizi lwami ngiyayifuna iNkosi; ebusuku isandla sami seluliwe, asidangali; umphefumulo wami wala ukududuzwa. 
19_77_3_Ngiyamkhumbula uNkulunkulu ngibubula; ngiyazindla, umoya wami uyaphela amandla. Sela 
19_77_4_Uzibambile izinkophe zamehlo ami, angavaleki; ngikhathazekile, angisakwazi ukukhuluma. 
19_77_5_Ngiyazindla ngezinsuku zasendulo, ngeminyaka yaphakade. 
19_77_6_Ebusuku ngiyakhumbula ukubetha kwami ugubhu, ngizindla enhliziyweni yami; nomoya wami uyahlolisisa. 
19_77_7_INkosi iyakulahla kuze kube phakade na? Ayisenakuphinda ibe nomusa na? 
19_77_8_Umusa wayo unqamukile njalo yini na? Isithembiso siphelile yini ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane na? 
19_77_9_UNkulunkulu ukhohliwe ukuba abe nomusa na? Uvalele ububele bakhe ngolaka na? Sela 
19_77_10_Ngase ngithi: “Yilokhu ukuhlupheka kwami, ngokuba isandla sokunene soPhezukonke siphendukile.” 
19_77_11_Ngiyakukhumbula izenzo zikaJehova, yebo, ngikhumbule izimangaliso zasendulo, 
19_77_12_ngicabange ngawo wonke umsebenzi wakho, ngizindle ngezenzo zakho. 
19_77_13_Indlela yakho, Nkulunkulu, isebungcweleni; ngubani ongunkulunkulu omkhulu njengoNkulunkulu na? 
19_77_14_Wena unguNkulunkulu owenza izimangaliso; amandla akho uwazisile ezizweni. 
19_77_15_Ngengalo yamandla wasindisa abantu bakho, amadodana kaJakobe noJosefa. Sela 
19_77_16_Amanzi akubona, Nkulunkulu, amanzi akubona, athuthumela, nezintwa zazamazama. 
19_77_17_Amafu athela amanzi, izulu laduma, imicibisholo yakho yaphuma. 
19_77_18_Izwi lokuduma kwakho lalisesivunguvungwini; imibani yakhanyisa izwe; umhlaba wadikizela, wazamazama. 
19_77_19_Indlela yakho yayiselwandle, nomendo wakho wawusemanzini amaningi, kodwa izinyathelo zakho zazingaziwa. 
19_77_20_Wahola abantu bakho njengezimvu ngesandla sikaMose no-Aroni. 
19_78_1_IMaskili lika-Asafa. Zwanini, bantu bami, umthetho wami, nibeke izindlebe zenu emazwini omlomo wami. 
19_78_2_Ngizakuvula umlomo wami ngomfanekiso, ngibonakalise izimfihlakalo zasendulo. 
19_78_3_Esikuzwileyo sakwazi, nawobaba abasitshela khona, 
19_78_4_asinakukufihla kubantwana babo, izindumiso zikaJehova zisitshele kuso isizukulwane esizayo, namandla akhe nezimangaliso zakhe azenzileyo. 
19_78_5_Ngokuba wamisa ubufakazi kwaJakobe, wabeka umthetho kwa-Israyeli, ayala ngawo obaba ukuba bafundise abantwana babo, 
19_78_6_ukuze isizukulwane esilandelayo sazi, abantwana abayakuzalwa, bavuke, batshele abantwana babo, 
19_78_7_babeke ithemba labo kuNkulunkulu, bangakhohlwa imisebenzi kaNkulunkulu, kepha bagcine imiyalo yakhe. 
19_78_8_Bangabi njengawoyise, isizukulwane esiphambeneyo nesihlubukayo, isizukulwane esingaqinisanga inhliziyo yaso, nesimoya waso wawungathembekile kuNkulunkulu. 
19_78_9_Abantu bakwa-Efrayimi, sebehlomile bephethe iminsalo, babuyela emuva ngosuku lokulwa. 
19_78_10_Abasigcinanga isivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu, benqaba ukuhamba emthethweni wakhe, 
19_78_11_bakhohlwa imisebenzi yakhe nezimangaliso zakhe abebabonisile zona. 
19_78_12_Wazenza izimangaliso emehlweni awoyise ezweni laseGibithe endaweni yaseSowani. 
19_78_13_Wahlukanisa ulwandle, wabawelisa; wamisa amanzi njengodonga. 
19_78_14_Wabahola ngefu emini, nobusuku bonke ngokukhanya komlilo. 
19_78_15_Waqhekeza amadwala ehlane, wabaphuzisa njengasotweni olujulileyo. 
19_78_16_Waphumisa edwaleni izifufula, wehlisa amanzi njengemifula. 
19_78_17_Nokho baqhubeka benza ukona kuye, baphambana noPhezukonke ehlane. 
19_78_18_Bamlinga uNkulunkulu enhliziyweni yabo ngokucela ukudla abakufisayo. 
19_78_19_Bakhuluma kabi ngoNkulunkulu, bathi: “UNkulunkulu angalungisa isithebe ehlane na? 
19_78_20_Bhekani, washaya idwala, kwaphuma amanzi, nemifula yampompoza; kepha angabanika nesinkwa, alungisele abantu bakhe inyama, na?” 
19_78_21_Ngalokho uJehova ekuzwa lokho wathukuthela, kwavutha umlilo ngoJakobe, ulaka lwavuka ngo-Israyeli; 
19_78_22_ngokuba abakholwanga nguNkulunkulu, abathembanga ensindisweni yakhe. 
19_78_23_Nokho wayala amafu phezulu, wavula iminyango yezulu, 
19_78_24_wanisa phezu kwabo imana kube ngukudla, wabapha amabele ezulu; 
19_78_25_abantu badla isinkwa sezingelosi, bathunyelwa ukudla ngokugcweleyo. 
19_78_26_Waphumisa umoya wasempumalanga ezulwini; ngamandla akhe waqhuba umoya waseningizimu. 
19_78_27_Wawisa phezu kwabo inyama njengothuli, nezinyoni ezinamaphiko njengesihlabathi solwandle. 
19_78_28_Wakwehlisa phakathi kwekamu labo naphakathi kwezindlu zabo. 
19_78_29_Badla, basuthiswa kakhulu; baphiwa abakufisayo. 
19_78_30_Bebengakahlukani nokufisa kwabo, ukudla kwabo kusesemlonyeni wabo, 
19_78_31_intukuthelo kaNkulunkulu yabavukela, wabulala abakhulupheleyo babo, wawisa phansi izinsizwa zakwa-Israyeli. 
19_78_32_Nokho bona njalo, abakholwanga yizimangaliso zakhe. 
19_78_33_Ngakho waqedela izinsuku zabo ezeni neminyaka yabo ovalweni. 
19_78_34_Lapho ebabulala, bamfuna; babuye bamfunisisa uNkulunkulu. 
19_78_35_Base bekhumbula ukuthi uNkulunkulu uyidwala labo; uNkulunkulu oPhezukonke ungumkhululi wabo. 
19_78_36_Kepha bamthopha ngomlomo wabo, baqamba amanga kuye ngolimi lwabo; 
19_78_37_ngokuba inhliziyo yabo yayingabambeleli kuye, bengathembekile esivumelwaneni sakhe. 
19_78_38_Kepha yena enesihawu wathethelela ububi babo, akabhubhisanga; yebo, wabamba kaningi intukuthelo yakhe, akavusanga lonke ulaka lwakhe. 
19_78_39_Wakhumbula ukuthi bayinyama, bangumoya odlulayo ongabuyiyo. 
19_78_40_Kwaba kaningi kangakanani bephambana naye ehlane, bemdabukisa kwahlongasibi. 
19_78_41_Babuye bamlinga uNkulunkulu, bamdabukisa oNgcwele ka-Israyeli. 
19_78_42_Abakhumbulanga isandla sakhe nosuku abahlenga ngalo ezitheni, 
19_78_43_lapho ezenza izibonakaliso zakhe eGibithe nezimangaliso zakhe endaweni yaseSowani. 
19_78_44_Waphendula lapho imifula yabo nemifudlana yabo yaba yigazi, ukuze bangabi nakuphuza. 
19_78_45_Wathumela phakathi kwabo izibawu ezabadlayo namasele ababhubhisayo. 
19_78_46_Wanika imiswenya ukudla kwabo, nomsebenzi wabo isikhonyane. 
19_78_47_Wabulala imivini yabo ngesichotho, nemikhiwane yabo ngesangquma. 
19_78_48_Wanikela izinkomo zabo esichothweni nezimvu zabo kuyo imibani. 
19_78_49_Waphonsa kubo ukuvutha kwentukuthelo yakhe, nolaka, nokufutheka, nokuhlupheka, ngokuthuma izithunywa zobubi. 
19_78_50_Walungisela intukuthelo yakhe indlela; akaphephisanga umphefumulo wabo ekufeni, kepha wanikela ukuphila kwabo ezifweni. 
19_78_51_Washaya amazibulo onke aseGibithe, okokuqala kwamandla abo ematendeni kaHamu. 
19_78_52_Kepha waphumisa abantu bakhe njengezimvu; wabahola ehlane njengomhlambi. 
19_78_53_Wabahola kahle, abaze besaba; kepha ulwandle lwasibekela izitha zabo. 
19_78_54_Wabayisa emnceleni wakhe ongcwele, entabeni esasiyizuzile isandla sakhe sokunene. 
19_78_55_Waxosha abezizwe phambi kwabo; edabula izwe wababela ifa, wahlalisa izizwe zakwa-Israyeli ematendeni azo. 
19_78_56_Nokho bamlinga, baphambana noNkulunkulu oPhezukonke, abaze bagcina imiyalo yakhe. 
19_78_57_Bahoshekela emuva, bakhohlisa njengawoyise, baphenduka njengomnsalo ogejayo. 
19_78_58_Bamthukuthelisa ngezindawo zabo eziphakemeyo, bamcunula ngezithombe zabo. 
19_78_59_UNkulunkulu ekuzwa lokho wathukuthela, wamlahla impela u-Israyeli. 
19_78_60_Walishiya itebernakele laseShilo, itende abelimisile phakathi kwabantu. 
19_78_61_Wanikela amandla akhe ekuthunjweni, nenkazimulo yakhe esandleni sesitha. 
19_78_62_Wanikela abantu bakhe enkembeni, wathukuthelela ifa lakhe. 
19_78_63_Izinsizwa zabo zadliwa ngumlilo; izintombi zabo azihutshelwanga. 
19_78_64_Abapristi babo bawa ngenkemba; abafelokazi babo abaze balila. 
19_78_65_Yayisivuka iNkosi njengokade elele, njengesiqhwaga esikade sahlulwa yiwayini, 
19_78_66_yazishayela emuva izitha zayo, yazithela ngehlazo eliphakade. 
19_78_67_Yalahla indlu kaJosefa, ayikhethanga isizwe sakwa-Efrayimi. 
19_78_68_Kepha yakhetha isizwe sakwaJuda, intaba yaseSiyoni eyithandayo. 
19_78_69_Yayakha indlu yayo engcwele njengezintaba nanjengomhlaba ewusekeleyo kuze kube phakade. 
19_78_70_Yakhetha uDavide inceku yayo, yamthabatha ezibayeni zezimvu. 
19_78_71_Esalandele izimvukazi ezenyisayo, yamthabatha ukuba abeluse abantu bayo uJakobe, nefa layo u-Israyeli. 
19_78_72_Njalo wabelusa ngobuqotho benhliziyo yakhe, wabahola ngenhlakanipho yesandla sakhe. 
19_79_1_Ihubo lika-Asafa. Nkulunkulu, abezizwe bangenile efeni lakho; bangcolisile ithempeli lakho elingcwele; benze iJerusalema libe yincithakalo. 
19_79_2_Bazinikile izidumbu zezinceku zakho zibe ngukudla kwezinyoni zezulu, inyama yabakwesabayo kuzo izilo zomhlaba. 
19_79_3_Bachithile igazi labo njengamanzi nxazonke zeJerusalema, akwababikho obembelayo. 
19_79_4_Sesiyisihlamba kubakhelwane bethu, umbhinqo nenhlekiso kwabasiphahlileyo. 
19_79_5_Koze kube nini, Jehova, uthukuthele njalo, ukushisekela kwakho kuvutha njengomlilo, na? 
19_79_6_Thela ulaka lwakho phezu kwabezizwe abangakwaziyo naphezu kwemibuso engakhulekeli igama lakho. 
19_79_7_Ngokuba sebemdlile uJakobe, umuzi wakhe sebewuchithile. 
19_79_8_Mawungasibaleli amacala akuqala; umusa wakho mawusheshe usihlangabeze, ngokuba sesibuthakathaka kakhulu. 
19_79_9_Sisize, Nkulunkulu wensindiso yethu, ngenxa yenkazimulo yegama lakho; usikhulule, usithethelele izono zethu ngenxa yegama lakho. 
19_79_10_Bangasholoni abezizwe ukuthi: “Uphi uNkulunkulu wabo na?” Makwazeke kwabezizwe emehlweni ethu ukuphindiselwa kwegazi lezinceku zakho elichithiweyo. 
19_79_11_Ukububula kwesiboshwa makuze phambi kwakho; londoloza ngobukhulu bengalo yakho asebengabantwana bokufa. 
19_79_12_Buyisela kubakhelwane bethu, kuphindwe kasikhombisa esifubeni sabo inhlamba abakuhlambalaza ngayo, Nkosi. 
19_79_13_Khona thina bantu bakho, izimvu zedlelo lakho, siyakukubonga kuze kube phakade, sishumayele udumo lwakho ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane. 
19_80_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Indlela: Iminduze; ubufakazi. Elika-Asafa. Ihubo. Yizwa, malusi ka-Israyeli, ohola uJosefa njengomhlambi, ohlezi phezu kwamakherubi; mawubonakale ngokukhazimula. 
19_80_2_Vusa amandla akho phambi kuka-Efrayimi noBenjamini noManase, uze ukusisindisa. 
19_80_3_Sibuyise, Nkulunkulu, ukhanyise ubuso bakho, khona siyakusindiswa. 
19_80_4_Jehova Nkulunkulu Sebawoti, koze kube nini uthunqela ngolaka umkhuleko wabantu bakho na? 
19_80_5_Wabapha isinkwa sezinyembezi, wabaphuzisa izinyembezi ngesilinganiso esikhulu. 
19_80_6_Usenza sibe yinto ebangwa ngabakhelwane bethu, nezitha zethu zisihleka usulu. 
19_80_7_Sibuyise, Nkulunkulu Sebawoti, ukhanyise ubuso bakho, khona siyakusindiswa. 
19_80_8_Wakhipha umvini eGibithe, waxosha abezizwe, watshala wona. 
19_80_9_Wawulungisela indawo phambi kwawo, wagxila, wagcwalisa umhlaba. 
19_80_10_Izintaba zambozwa ngumthunzi wawo, nemisedari kaNkulunkulu ngamagatsha awo. 
19_80_11_Wenabisa amagatsha awo, aze afika elwandle, namaxhantela awo, aze afika emfuleni. 
19_80_12_Uzidilizeleni izintango zawo, baze bawukhe bonke abadlula ngendlela, na? 
19_80_13_Ingulube yasehlathini iyawudla, nezilwane zasendle ziyawuqothula. 
19_80_14_Nkulunkulu Sebawoti, mawubuye; bheka usezulwini, ubone, unakekele lo mvini, 
19_80_15_yebo, lo mvini otshalwe ngesokunene sakho, nendodana ozikhulisele yona. 
19_80_16_Ushiswe ngumlilo, unqunyiwe; bayakubhubha ngokukhuza kobuso bakho. 
19_80_17_Isandla sakho masibe phezu kwendoda yesokunene sakho, phezu kwendodana yomuntu ozikhulisele yona; 
19_80_18_khona asisayikuhoshekela emuva kuwe; siphilise, khona siyakukhuleka egameni lakho. 
19_80_19_Sibuyise, Jehova Nkulunkulu Sebawoti; ukhanyise ubuso bakho, khona siyakusindiswa. 
19_81_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeGititi. Elika-Asafa. Halalisani uNkulunkulu amandla ethu, nimemeze ngokujabula kuNkulunkulu kaJakobe. 
19_81_2_Hlabani ihubo, nithathe isigubhu nehabhu elihle nogubhu. 
19_81_3_Bethani icilongo ekwethwaseni kwenyanga nasekuhlanganeni kwenyanga ngosuku lomkhosi wethu. 
19_81_4_Ngokuba kuyisimiso kwa-Israyeli nomthetho kaNkulunkulu kaJakobe. 
19_81_5_Kungubufakazi abumisayo kwaJosefa mhla ephuma ezweni laseGibithe. Ngizwa ulimi ebengingalwazi luthi: 
19_81_6_“Ngasusa ihlombe lakhe emthwalweni, izandla zakhe zakhululeka eqomeni lokuthwala. 
19_81_7_Wakhuleka usosizini, ngakukhulula; ngakuphendula ngisekusithekeni kokuduma, ngakuvivinya ngasemanzini aseMeriba. Sela 
19_81_8_“Zwanini, bantu bami, ngizakufakaza kini ukuthi: O Israyeli, sengathi ungangilalela! 
19_81_9_Makungabikho kuwe unkulunkulu omunye, ungakhuleki kunkulunkulu wabezizwe. 
19_81_10_Mina nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wakho owakukhuphula ezweni laseGibithe; khamisa umlomo wakho, ngiwugcwalise. 
19_81_11_“Kepha abantu bami abalalelanga izwi lami, u-Israyeli akanginakanga. 
19_81_12_Ngase ngibayeka enkanini yenhliziyo yabo ukuba bahambe ngokuthanda kwabo. 
19_81_13_“Sengathi abantu bami bangangizwa, u-Israyeli ahambe ezindleleni zami. 
19_81_14_Bengiyakuthobisa masinyane izitha zabo, ngiselulele isandla sami kwabamelene nabo. 
19_81_15_Abazondi bakaJehova bebeyakuzithobela kuye, kepha isikhathi sabantu bami besiyakuba khona kuze kube phakade. 
19_81_16_Ubeyakubapha ukolweni omuhle; yebo, bengiyakubasuthisa ngezinyosi zasesiweni.” 
19_82_1_Ihubo lika-Asafa. UNkulunkulu umi emhlanganweni wawonkulunkulu; uyahlulela phakathi kwawonkulunkulu. 
19_82_2_Koze kube nini nahlulela ngokungalungile nikhetha ubuso bababi na? Sela 
19_82_3_Yahlulelani ompofu nentandane, nimenzele okufaneleyo olusizi noswelayo. 
19_82_4_Khululani oswelayo nompofu, nibophule esandleni sababi. 
19_82_5_Abanakwazi, abanakuqonda, bahamba ebumnyameni; izisekelo zonke zomhlaba ziyazamazama. 
19_82_6_Mina ngathi: “Ningonkulunkulu nina,” nonke ningamadodana oPhezukonke. 
19_82_7_Kanti nokho niyakufa njengabantu nje, niwe njengesinye sezikhulu. 
19_82_8_Vuka, Nkulunkulu, wahlulele umhlaba, ngokuba wena uyindlalifa yezizwe zonke. 
19_83_1_Igama. Ihubo lika-Asafa. Nkulunkulu, ungathuli, ungalibali, ungali ukukhuluma, Nkulunkulu. 
19_83_2_Ngokuba bheka, izitha zakho ziyaxokozela, nabakuzondayo baphakamisa ikhanda. 
19_83_3_Ngobuqili benza uzungu ngabantu bakho, bacebisana ukulwa nabathukusiweyo bakho. 
19_83_4_Bathi: “Wozani sibaqothule, bangabe besaba yisizwe, negama lika-Israyeli lingabe lisakhunjulwa.” 
19_83_5_Baceba nganhliziyonye, benza isivumelwano ngawe: 
19_83_6_amatende ka-Edomi naka-Ishmayeli, nakaMowabi nakaHagari, 
19_83_7_noGebali, no-Amoni, no-Amaleki, neFilistiya nabakhile eTire. 
19_83_8_Ne-Asiriya lahlangana nabo, laba yingalo yabantwana bakaLoti. Sela 
19_83_9_Yenza kubo njengakuMidiyani, nakuSisera, nakuJabini ngasemfuleni iKishoni, 
19_83_10_ababhubhela e-Eni Dori, baba ngumquba womhlabathi. 
19_83_11_Amakhosana abo wenze abe njengo-Orebi noZebi, nabakhulu babo bonke njengoZeba noSalimuna 
19_83_12_ababethi: “Masizithabathele amadlelo kaNkulunkulu.” 
19_83_13_Nkulunkulu wami, benze babe njengezibi ezikhwishizayo, njengamakhoba amuka nomoya. 
19_83_14_Njengomlilo oshisa ihlathi, njengelangabi elithungela izintaba, 
19_83_15_baxoshe kanjalo ngesivunguvungu sakho, ubethuse ngesiphepho sakho. 
19_83_16_Thela ubuso babo ngehlazo, baze bafune igama lakho, Jehova. 
19_83_17_Mabahlazeke, baphele amandla kuze kube phakade; mabahluleke, babhubhe, 
19_83_18_bazi ukuthi nguwe wedwa ogama lakho linguJehova; ungoPhezukonke emhlabeni wonke. 
19_84_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeGititi. Elamadodana kaKora. Ihubo. Zithandeka kangaka izindlu zakho, Jehova Sebawoti. 
19_84_2_Umphefumulo wami ulangazelela, womela amagceke kaJehova; inhliziyo yami nomzimba wami kuyahuba ngokwethaba kuNkulunkulu ophilayo. 
19_84_3_Ngokuba umzwilili ufumene indlu, nenkonjane isidleke sayo, lapho ibeka khona amazinyane ayo, ngisho ama-altare akho, Jehova Sebawoti, Nkosi yami, Nkulunkulu wami. 
19_84_4_Babusisiwe abahlala endlini yakho; bayakuhlala bebonga wena. Sela 
19_84_5_Ubusisiwe umuntu omandla akhe akuwe, abazindlela zakho zisezinhliziyweni zabo. 
19_84_6_Bedabula imfunda yezinyembezi bayenza ibe yindawo yeziphethu; yebo, nemvula yokuqala iyayisibekela ngezibusiso. 
19_84_7_Baqhubeka emandleni, baze babonakale phambi kukaNkulunkulu eSiyoni. 
19_84_8_Jehova Nkulunkulu Sebawoti, yizwa umkhuleko wami, ubeke indlebe, Nkulunkulu kaJakobe. Sela 
19_84_9_Wena Nkulunkulu, siHlangu sethu, bheka, ubuke ubuso bogcotshiweyo wakho. 
19_84_10_Ngokuba usuku lunye emagcekeni akho luhle kunezinye eziyizinkulungwane. Ngiyakhetha ukulinda emnyango wendlu kaNkulunkulu wami kunokuhlala ematendeni ababi. 
19_84_11_Ngokuba uJehova uNkulunkulu uyilanga nesihlangu; uJehova uyakupha umusa nodumo; akayikubenqabela okuhle abahamba ngobuqotho. 
19_84_12_Jehova Sebawoti, ubusisiwe umuntu okwethembayo. 
19_85_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Elamadodana kaKora; Ihubo. Jehova, wabusisa izwe lakho, wambuyisa uJakobe ekuthunjweni. 
19_85_2_Wasusa icala labantu bakho, wasibekela zonke izono zabo. Sela 
19_85_3_Wamukisa yonke intukuthelo yakho, waphenduka ekuvutheni kolaka lwakho. 
19_85_4_Sibuyise, Nkulunkulu wensindiso yethu, ulahle ukusicanukela kwakho. 
19_85_5_Uyakusithukuthelela njalonjalo na? Uyakwelulela ulaka lwakho ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane na? 
19_85_6_Awuzukusivusa, sibuye siphile, ukuze abantu bakho bathokoze ngawe, na? 
19_85_7_Sitshengise umusa wakho, Jehova, usiphe insindiso yakho. 
19_85_8_Mangizwe lokho uNkulunkulu uJehova azakukukhuluma; uyakhuluma ukuthula kubantu bakhe nakubo abamesabayo; mabangabuyeli ebuwuleni. 
19_85_9_Impela insindiso yakhe iseduze nabamesabayo, ukuze kuhlale udumo ezweni lethu. 
19_85_10_Kuyakuhlangabezana umusa neqiniso, kwangane ukulunga nokuthula. 
19_85_11_Kuyakuhluma iqiniso emhlabeni, kulunguzele phansi nokulunga kwasezulwini. 
19_85_12_Yebo, uJehova uyakuveza okuhle; izwe lethu liyakuthela izithelo zalo. 
19_85_13_Ukulunga kuyakuhamba phambi kwakhe, kwenzele izinyawo zakhe indlela. 
19_86_1_Umkhuleko kaDavide. Beka indlebe yakho, Jehova, ungiphendule, ngokuba ngilusizi, ngimpofu. 
19_86_2_Londoloza umphefumulo wami, ngokuba ngingoqotho; wena Nkulunkulu wami, sindisa inceku yakho ekwethembayo. 
19_86_3_Yiba nomusa kimi, Nkosi, ngokuba ngikhala kuwe usuku lonke. 
19_86_4_Thokozisa umphefumulo wenceku yakho, ngokuba kuwena, Nkosi, ngiyawuphakamisela umphefumulo wami. 
19_86_5_Ngokuba wena, Nkosi, umuhle, ungothethelelayo, unomusa omkhulu kubo bonke abakhala kuwe. 
19_86_6_Jehova, beka indlebe ekukhulekeni kwami, ulalele izwi lokunxusa kwami. 
19_86_7_Ngosuku losizi lwami ngikhala kuwe, ngokuba uzakungiphendula. 
19_86_8_Phakathi kwawonkulunkulu akakho onjengawe Nkosi; akukho okunjengemisebenzi yakho. 
19_86_9_Izizwe ozenzileyo ziyakufika zonke, zikhuleke phambi kwakho, Nkosi, zidumise igama lakho. 
19_86_10_Ngokuba umkhulu wena, uyenza izimangaliso, unguNkulunkulu wena wedwa. 
19_86_11_Ngifundise, Jehova, indlela yakho; ngiyakuhamba eqinisweni lakho; yenza inhliziyo yami iqonde ntonye, yesabe igama lakho. 
19_86_12_Ngiyakukubonga, Nkosi Nkulunkulu wami, ngenhliziyo yonke yami, ngidumise igama lakho kuze kube phakade. 
19_86_13_Ngokuba umusa wakho mkhulu phezu kwami, ukhululile umphefumulo wami endaweni yabafileyo ephansi. 
19_86_14_Nkulunkulu, izideleli zingivukele, ibandla lezidlwangudlwangu lifuna umphefumulo wami; azibekanga wena phambi kwazo. 
19_86_15_Kepha wena Nkosi unguNkulunkulu ohawukelayo, onomusa nokubekezela, uvame ubumnene nokuthembeka. 
19_86_16_Phendukela kimi, ube nomusa kimi, uyiphe inceku yakho amandla akho, usindise indodana yencekukazi yakho. 
19_86_17_Ngenzele isiboniselo sokuhle, ukuze abangizondayo babone, bajabhe, ngokuba wena Jehova uyangisiza, uyangiduduza. 
19_87_1_Elamadodana kaKora. Ihubo. Igama. Isisekelo asibekileyo sisezintabeni ezingcwele. 
19_87_2_UJehova uyawathanda amasango aseSiyoni kunazo zonke izindlu zikaJakobe. 
19_87_3_Okudumisekayo kukhulunywa ngawe, muzi kaNkulunkulu. Sela 
19_87_4_Ngiyakubala uRahabi neBabele kulabo abangaziyo; yebo, iFilistiya neThire kanye neKushe azalelwa khona. 
19_87_5_Kuyakuthiwa ngeSiyoni: “Yilo nalo wazalelwa khona; oPhezukonke uyaliqinisa.” 
19_87_6_Mhla uJehova eloba izizwe uyakubala ukuthi lo wazalelwa khona. Sela 
19_87_7_Abahubayo nabasinayo bathi: “Imithombo yami yonke ikuwe.” 
19_88_1_Igama. Ihubo lamadodana kaKora. Kumholi wokuhlabelela. NgeMahalati Leyanoti. IMaskili likaHemani umEzra. Jehova Nkulunkulu wensindiso yami, ngikhala imini nobusuku phambi kwakho. 
19_88_2_Umkhuleko wami mawufike ebusweni bakho, indlebe yakho uyibeke ekunxuseni kwami. 
19_88_3_Ngokuba umphefumulo wami ugcwele izinsizi, ukuphila kwami kusondele endaweni yabafileyo. 
19_88_4_Ngibalwa kanye nabashona emgodini, nginjengomuntu ofileyo. 
19_88_5_Icansi lami liphakathi kwabafileyo; nginjengababuleweyo abalele ethuneni, ongasabakhumbuli, benqunyiwe esandleni sakho. 
19_88_6_Ungibekile emgodini ojulile kunayo yonke, ebumnyameni, otweni. 
19_88_7_Kuyangisinda ukuthukuthela kwakho; amadlambi akho onke ayangicindezela phansi. Sela 
19_88_8_Engikade ngazana nabo ubaxoshele kude, wangenza ngibe yisinengiso kubo; ngivalelwe, ngingephume. 
19_88_9_Iso lami liyafa ngosizi; ngikhala kuwe Jehova imihla yonke, ngizelulela izandla zami kuwe. 
19_88_10_Abafileyo uyakubenzela isimangaliso na? Ziyakuvuka yini izithunzi, zikubonge, na? Sela 
19_88_11_Kuyalandiswa yini ethuneni ngomusa wakho, nangokuthembeka kwakho endaweni yokubhujiswa na? 
19_88_12_Izimangaliso zakho ziyaziwa yini ebumnyameni, nokulunga kwakho ezweni lokukhohlwa na? 
19_88_13_Kepha mina, Jehova, ngikhala kuwe; ekuseni umkhuleko wami uyenyuka phambi kwakho. 
19_88_14_Jehova, ulahlelani umphefumulo wami, ungifihlelelani ubuso bakho na? 
19_88_15_Ngihluphekile, ngingofayo kusukela ebusheni bami; ngithwele ukwesabeka kwakho, ngiphelile. 
19_88_16_Ulaka lwakho olushisayo lungehlele; ukwesabisa kwakho kungiqedile. 
19_88_17_Kungizungeza njengamanzi imihla yonke, kungikaka kanyekanye. 
19_88_18_Isihlobo nomngane ubaxoshele kude; ubumnyama bungumhlobo wami. 
19_89_1_IMaskili lika-Ethani umEzra. Ngiyakuhlabelela ngomusa kaJehova kuze kube phakade, ngomlomo wami ngazise izizukulwane ngezizukulwane ukuthembeka kwakho. 
19_89_2_Ngokuba ngithe: “Umusa uyakwakhiwa kuze kube phakade; ezulwini uyaqinisa ukuthembeka kwakho.” 
19_89_3_Ngenzile isivumelwano nokhethiweyo wami, ngifungile kuye uDavide inceku yami ukuthi: 
19_89_4_“Ngiyakuqinisa inzalo yakho kuze kube phakade, ngisakhe isihlalo sobukhosi ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.” Sela 
19_89_5_Izimangaliso zakho, Jehova, ziyadunyiswa ngamazulu, ukuthembeka kwakho ebandleni labangcwele. 
19_89_6_Ngokuba ngubani osemafwini ongalinganiswa noJehova na? Ngubani phakathi kwamadodana kaNkulunkulu ongafaniswa noJehova na? 
19_89_7_UNkulunkulu uyesabeka kakhulu emhlanganweni wabangcwele; umelwe ukuhlonishwa yibo bonke abangakuye. 
19_89_8_Jehova Nkulunkulu Sebawoti, ngubani onjengawe na? Unamandla, Jehova, nokuthembeka kwakho kuyakuhaqa. 
19_89_9_Wena uyabusa ukukhukhumala kolwandle; uma kuphakama amadlambi alo, uyawathulisa. 
19_89_10_Wena uchobozile uRahabi njengobuleweyo; uhlakazile izitha zakho ngengalo yakho enamandla. 
19_89_11_Ngelakho izulu, ngowakho umhlaba; izwe nokugcwala kwalo, kukho konke ubeke isisekelo. 
19_89_12_Inyakatho neningizimu wakudala wena; iThabori neHermoni kuyajabula egameni lakho. 
19_89_13_Ingalo yakho inobuqhawe, isandla sakho sinamandla, esokunene sakho siphakeme. 
19_89_14_Ukulunga nokwahlulela kuyisisekelo sesihlalo sakho sobukhosi; umusa neqiniso kuyahamba phambi kobuso bakho. 
19_89_15_Sibusisiwe isizwe esikwazi ukuhlabelela ngenjabulo; siyahamba, Jehova, ekukhanyeni kobuso bakho. 
19_89_16_Egameni lakho siyathokoza usuku lonke; ngokulunga kwakho siyaphakanyiswa. 
19_89_17_Ngokuba wena uyinkazimulo yamandla abo; ngomusa wakho uphondo lwethu luyaphakama. 
19_89_18_Ngokuba isihlangu sethu singesikaJehova; inkosi yethu ingeyoNgcwele ka-Israyeli. 
19_89_19_Ngaleso sikhathi wakhuluma ngombono kubo abakholwayo bakho, wathi: “Ngibekile usizo eqhaweni, ngiphakamisile okhethiwe phakathi kwabantu. 
19_89_20_Ngifumene inceku yami uDavide, ngimgcobile ngamafutha ami angcwele. 
19_89_21_Isandla sami siyakuba naye siqinile, ingalo yami iyakumqinisa. 
19_89_22_Isitha asiyikumahlula, nendodana yobubi ayiyikumhlupha. 
19_89_23_Ngiyakuchoboza izitha zakhe ebusweni bakhe, ngihluphe abamzondayo. 
19_89_24_Ukuthembeka kwami nomusa wami kuyakuba naye; egameni lami luyakuphakama uphondo lwakhe. 
19_89_25_Ngiyakubeka isandla sakhe phezu kolwandle, esokunene sakhe phezu kwemifula. 
19_89_26_Uyakungibiza ngokuthi: ‘UnguBaba, unguNkulunkulu wami nedwala lensindiso yami.’ 
19_89_27_Ngiyakumenza abe yizibulo nophakamileyo kunamakhosi omhlaba. 
19_89_28_Ngiyakumgcinela umusa wami kuze kube phakade; isivumelwano sami soba siqinile kuye. 
19_89_29_Ngiyakwenza inzalo yakhe ime kuze kube phakade, isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi sibe njengezinsuku zezulu. 
19_89_30_“Uma abantwana bakhe beshiya umthetho wami bengahambi ngezahlulelo zami, 
19_89_31_uma bephula izimiso zami bengagcini imiyalo yami, 
19_89_32_ngiyakuhambela izono zabo ngenduku, namacala abo ngemivimbo. 
19_89_33_Kepha umusa wami angiyikuwususa kuye, ngingaphikisi ukuthembeka kwami. 
19_89_34_Angiyikwaphula isivumelwano sami, nokuphumileyo ezindebeni zami angiyikukuguqula. 
19_89_35_Ngafunga kanye ubungcwele bami, angiyikuqamba amanga kuDavide. 
19_89_36_Inzalo yakhe iyakuma phakade, isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi sibe njengelanga phambi kwami. 
19_89_37_Iyakuma phakade njengenyanga nanjengofakazi othembekileyo osemafwini.” Sela 
19_89_38_Kepha usumlahlile, wamala, wamthukuthelela ogcotshiweyo wakho. 
19_89_39_Uchithile isivumelwano senceku yakho, wadumaza umqhele wayo, wawuphonsa emhlabathini. 
19_89_40_Udilizile zonke izindonga zakhe, wazenza izinqaba zakhe zaba yincithakalo. 
19_89_41_Bonke abadlula ngendlela bayamphanga; waba yihlazo kwabakhelene naye. 
19_89_42_Uphakamisile esokunene sabamelene naye, wajabulisa zonke izitha zakhe. 
19_89_43_Futhi ubuyisele emuva usiko lwenkemba yakhe, awumvumelanga ukuma ekulweni. 
19_89_44_Ususile inkazimulo yakhe, wawisa phansi emhlabathini isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi. 
19_89_45_Ufinyezile izinsuku zobusha bakhe, wamthela ngamahloni. Sela 
19_89_46_Koze kube nini uyakuzisitha, Jehova, nentukuthelo yakho ivutha njengomlilo, na? 
19_89_47_Khumbula ukuthi isikhathi sami singakanani nokuthi wadalela ize bonke abantwana babantu. 
19_89_48_Ngubani oyakuphila engayikubona ukufa, akhulule umphefumulo wakhe emandleni endawo yabafileyo, na? Sela 
19_89_49_Nkosi, uphi umusa wakho wakuqala owawufungela kuDavide ngokuthembeka kwakho na? 
19_89_50_Khumbula, Nkosi, ihlazo lezinceku zakho nokuthi ngithwele esifubeni sami ihlazo lezizwe eziningi kakhulu, 
19_89_51_ezisola ngalo izitha zakho, Jehova, ezisola ngalo ukuhamba kogcotshiweyo wakho. 
19_89_52_Makabongwe uJehova kuze kube phakade. Amen, Amen. 
19_90_1_Umkhuleko kaMose, umuntu kaNkulunkulu. Nkosi, wena uyisiphephelo sethu ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane. 
19_90_2_Kungakaveli izintaba, ungakawenzi umhlaba nezwe, kuthi kusukela phakade kuze kube phakade wena Nkulunkulu ukhona. 
19_90_3_Uyambuyisela umuntu othulini, uthi: “Buyani, bantwana babantu.” 
19_90_4_Ngokuba iminyaka eyinkulungwane emehlweni akho injengezolo selidlulile, nanjengomlindo ebusuku. 
19_90_5_Uyabamukisa njengesikhukhula, banjengobuthongo; ekuseni banjengotshani obuhlumayo; 
19_90_6_ekuseni buyakhahlela, buhlume; kusihlwa bunqunywe, bubune. 
19_90_7_Ngokuba siyaqedwa yintukuthelo yakho, nangolaka lwakho siyabhubha. 
19_90_8_Ubekile amacala ethu phambi kwakho, izono zethu ezifihliweyo ekukhanyeni kobuso bakho. 
19_90_9_Ngokuba izinsuku zethu ziyadlula ngentukuthelo yakho; siyafeza iminyaka yethu njengephefu. 
19_90_10_Izinsuku zeminyaka yethu zineminyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa; kuthi uma ziziningi, zineminyaka engamashumi ayisishiyagalombili; nokho ukuvama kwazo kungukuhlupheka nelize, ngokuba zidlula masinyane, thina siyandiza, simuke. 
19_90_11_Ngubani owaziyo amandla entukuthelo yakho nolaka lwakho olunjengakho ukwesabeka kwakho na? 
19_90_12_Sifundise, Nkosi, ukubala izinsuku zethu, sizuze inhliziyo enokuhlakanipha. 
19_90_13_Buya, Jehova! Koze kube nini na? Hawukela izinceku zakho. 
19_90_14_Sisuthise ngomusa wakho, kuse sekuseni, ukuze sithokoze, sijabule izinsuku zethu zonke. 
19_90_15_Sithokozise ngangezinsuku owasihlupha ngazo, nangangeminyaka esabona okubi ngayo. 
19_90_16_Izenzo zakho mazibonakale kuzo izinceku zakho, nenkazimulo yakho kubantwana bazo. 
19_90_17_Yebo, ubuhle beNkosi uNkulunkulu wethu abube phezu kwethu, umise umsebenzi wezandla zethu phezu kwethu; yebo, umsebenzi wezandla zethu uwumise. 
19_91_1_Yena owakhile ekusithekeni koPhezukonke nohlezi emthunzini kaSomandla 
19_91_2_uthi kuJehova: “Uyisiphephelo sami nenqaba yami noNkulunkulu wami engimethembayo.” 
19_91_3_Ngokuba yena uyakukhipha ogibeni lomcuphi nasobhadaneni olubhubhisayo. 
19_91_4_Ngezimpaphe zakhe uyakukusibekela, uphephele phansi kwamaphiko akhe; ukuthembeka kwakhe kuyisihlangu nehawu. 
19_91_5_Awuyikwesaba ivuso lasebusuku, nomcibisholo ondizayo emini, 
19_91_6_nobhadane oluhamba ebumnyameni, nesifo esibhubhisayo emini enkulu. 
19_91_7_Bayakuwa abayizinkulungwane ngaseceleni kwakho, nabayizinkulungwane eziyishumi ngakwesokunene sakho, kepha akuyikufinyelela kuwe. 
19_91_8_Uyakubuka nje ngamehlo akho, ubone ukuphindiselwa kwababi, 
19_91_9_ngokuba uthi: Jehova, uyisiphephelo sami; oPhezukonke umenzile abe yinqaba yakho. 
19_91_10_Awuyikwehlelwa ngokubi, nesifo asiyikusondela etendeni lakho. 
19_91_11_Ngokuba uyakuyaleza izingelosi zakhe ngawe, zikulondoloze ezindleleni zakho zonke. 
19_91_12_Ziyakukuthwala ngezandla, ungaqhuzuki ngonyawo lwakho etsheni. 
19_91_13_Uyakunyathela ingonyama nebululu, unyathele phansi ibhongo lengonyama nodrako. 
19_91_14_Ngenxa yokuba enamathele kimi, ngakho ngiyamkhulula; ngiyamphakamisa ngokuba elazi igama lami. 
19_91_15_Uyakungibiza, ngimphendule; ngiyakuba naye esosizini, ngimkhulule, ngimdumise. 
19_91_16_Ngiyakumsuthisa ngobude bezinsuku, ngimbonise insindiso yami. 
19_92_1_Ihubo. Igama losuku lwesabatha. Kuhle ukumbonga uJehova nokuhubela igama lakho wena oPhezukonke; 
19_92_2_ukushumayela umusa wakho ekuseni nokuthembeka kwakho ebusuku, 
19_92_3_ngokubetha ugubhu olunezintambo eziyishumi, nomqangala, kanye nehabhu elizwakala kamnandi. 
19_92_4_Ngokuba ungithokozisile, Jehova, ngezenzo zakho; ngiyakumemeza ngokujabula. 
19_92_5_Yeka ubukhulu bezenzo zakho, Jehova. Imicabango yakho ijulile kakhulu. 
19_92_6_Umuntu oyisilima angekucabange, nesiwula asikuboni.

19_92_8_Kepha wena Jehova uphakeme kuze kube phakade. 
19_92_9_Ngokuba bheka, izitha zakho, Jehova, bheka, izitha zakho, ziyakubhubha; bonke abenza okubi bayakuhlakazwa.

19_93_1_UJehova uyinkosi, wembethe ubukhosi; uJehova wembethe, ubhince amandla. Nezwe limi liqinile, lingazanyazanyiswa.

19_94_1_Nkulunkulu wempindiselo, Jehova, Nkulunkulu wempindiselo, vela ukhanye.

19_94_6_Bayabhubhisa umfelokazi nomfokazi, nezintandane bayazibulala.

19_94_10_Othethisa abezizwe, yena ofundisa abantu ukwazi, kanakujezisa na?

19_94_12_Jehova, ubusisiwe lowo muntu omyalayo, omfundisayo ngomthetho wakho, 
19_94_13_wenzela ukuba umphumuze ezinsukwini ezimbi, aze ambelwe umgodi lowo ongenamthetho. 
19_94_14_Ngokuba uJehova akayikulahla abantu bakhe, nefa lakhe akayikulishiya. 
19_94_15_Ngokuba ukulunga kuyakubuyela ekwahluleleni, bonke abaqotho ngenhliziyo bakulandele. 
19_94_16_Ngubani oyakungimela phambi kwababi na? Ngubani oyakungelekelela kwabenza okubi na? 
19_94_17_Uma uJehova ebengesilo usizo lwami, umphefumulo wami ubuyakushesha ukuhlala ekuthuleni kokufa. 
19_94_18_Lapho ngithe unyawo lwami luyashelela, umusa wakho, Jehova, wangiphasa. 
19_94_19_Kubo ubuninginingi bemicabango yenhliziyo yami ukududuza kwakho kwathokozisa umphefumulo wami. 
19_94_20_Isihlalo sobubi singahlanganyela nawe yini, leso esisebenza okubi kungathi ngomthetho na? 
19_94_21_Bahlangana ukuvukela umphefumulo wolungileyo; igazi elingenacala bayalilahla.

19_102_1_Umkhuleko wohluphekayo, nxa ephela amandla, ethulula isikhalo sakhe phambi kukaJehova. Jehova, yizwa umkhuleko wami; ukukhala kwami makufinyelele kuwe. 
19_102_2_Ungafihli ubuso bakho kimi ngosuku losizi lwami; beka indlebe yakho kimi, ngosuku engimemeza ngalo usheshe ungiphendule. 
19_102_3_Ngokuba izinsuku zami ziphelile njengomusi; amathambo ashile njengezinkuni. 
19_102_4_Inhliziyo yami ishayiwe, ibunile njengotshani, ngokuba ngiyakhohlwa ukudla isinkwa sami. 
19_102_5_Ngenxa yezwi lokububula kwami amathambo ami anamathele enyameni yami. 
19_102_6_Ngiyafana nevuba ehlane, nginjengesikhova kwahlongasibi. 
19_102_7_Ngiyaqwasha, nginjengenyoni eyodwa ophahleni lwendlu.

19_102_9_Ngokuba ngidlile umlotha njengesinkwa, nophuzo lwami ngiluxubanisile nezinyembezi. 
19_102_10_Ngenxa yentukuthelo nolaka lwakho ungifukulile, wangilahla. 
19_102_11_Izinsuku zami zinjengethunzi elandayo; mina uqobo ngiyabuna njengotshani. 
19_102_12_Kepha wena Jehova uyakuhlala kuze kube phakade, nesikhumbuzo sakho ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane. 
19_102_13_Uyakuvuka, uhawukele iSiyoni; sekuyisikhathi sokuliphatha ngomusa, yebo, isikhathi esimisiweyo sesifikile. 
19_102_14_Ngokuba izinceku zalo ziyathokoza ngamatshe alo, zihawukele uthuli lwalo. 
19_102_15_Khona abezizwe bayakulesaba igama likaJehova, amakhosi onke omhlaba inkazimulo yakho. 
19_102_16_Ngokuba uJehova ulakhile iSiyoni, ubonakele enkazimulweni yakhe; 
19_102_17_wanaka umkhuleko wabangenalutho, engawudeleli umthandazo wabo. 
19_102_18_Lokhu kuyakulotshelwa isizukulwane esizayo; abantu abayakudalwa bayakudumisa uJehova. 
19_102_19_Ngokuba ubheke phansi esekuphakameni kwakhe okungcwele, wabuka umhlaba esezulwini 
19_102_20_ukuba ezwe ukububula kwesiboshwa, akhulule abantwana bokufa, 
19_102_21_ukuze kumenyezelwe eSiyoni igama likaJehova nodumo lwakhe eJerusalema, 
19_102_22_nxa izizwe zibuthana ndawonye kanye nemibuso ukumkhonza uJehova. 
19_102_23_Wanciphisa amandla ami endleleni, wafinyeza izinsuku zami. 
19_102_24_Ngithi: “Nkulunkulu wami, ungangisusi enxenyeni yezinsuku zami; iminyaka yakho isezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane. 
19_102_25_Endulo wawusekela umhlaba, izulu lingumsebenzi wezandla zakho. 
19_102_26_Kuyakubhubha lokhu, kepha uyakuma; yebo, kuyakuguga konke njengengubo; njengesambatho uyakukuguqula, kuguqulwe. 
19_102_27_Kepha unguwe njalo, iminyaka yakho ayiyikuphela. 
19_102_28_Abantwana bezinceku zakho bayakuhlala; inzalo yabo iyakuma phambi kwakho.” 
19_103_1_Mbonge uJehova, mphefumulo wami; konke okuphakathi kwami makubonge igama lakhe elingcwele. 
19_103_2_Mbonge uJehova, mphefumulo wami, ungakhohlwa imisebenzi yonke yakhe yomusa, 
19_103_3_yena othethelela zonke izono zakho, owelapha zonke izifo zakho; 
19_103_4_okhulula ukuphila kwakho ekubhujisweni, okuqhelisa ngomusa nangobubele; 
19_103_5_osuthisa ukulangazela kwakho ngokuhle, ubusha bakho bubuyiswe njengokhozi. 
19_103_6_UJehova ubenzela bonke abacindezelwayo ukulunga nokwahlulela. 
19_103_7_Wamazisa uMose izindlela zakhe, nabantwana bakwa-Israyeli izenzo zakhe. 
19_103_8_UJehova unobubele nesihawu; wephuza ukuthukuthela, kuvama umusa. 
19_103_9_Akathethi njalonjalo; akagcini intukuthelo yakhe kuze kube phakade. 
19_103_10_Akasiphathi njengokufanele izono zethu, akasivuzi njengokwamacala ethu. 
19_103_11_Ngokuba njengokuphakama kwezulu phezu komhlaba unjalo umusa wakhe phezu kwabamesabayo. 
19_103_12_Njengokuba impumalanga yahlukene nentshonalanga, udedisile kangaka kithi iziphambeko zethu. 
19_103_13_Njengoyise ehawukela abantwana bakhe, kanjalo uJehova uyabahawukela abamesabayo. 
19_103_14_Ngokuba uyakwazi ukubunjwa kwethu; uyakhumbula ukuthi siluthuli. 
19_103_15_Izinsuku zomuntu zinjengotshani; uyakhahlela njengembali yasendle. 
19_103_16_Ngokuba umoya uyadlula phezu kwayo, bese yinyamalala, nendawo yayo ingabe isayazi. 
19_103_17_Kepha umusa kaJehova uphezu kwabamesabayo kwaphakade kuze kube phakade, nokulunga kwakhe kubantwana babantwana, 
19_103_18_kubo abagcina isivumelwano sakhe bekhumbula iziyalezo zakhe ukuba bazenze. 
19_103_19_UJehova umisile isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi ezulwini; nombuso wakhe ubusa phezu kwakho konke. 
19_103_20_Bongani uJehova nina zingelosi zakhe, nina maqhawe anamandla enenza okwezwi lakhe nilalela ukukhuluma kwezwi lakhe. 
19_103_21_Bongani uJehova nina mabandla onke akhe, nina zinceku zakhe enenza intando yakhe. 
19_103_22_Bongani uJehova nina misebenzi yakhe yonke ezindaweni zonke zombuso wakhe. Mbonge uJehova, mphefumulo wami. 
19_104_1_Mbonge uJehova, mphefumulo wami; Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, umkhulu, wembethe udumo nobukhosi; 
19_104_2_ogqoka ukukhanya njengengubo, oweneka izulu njengendwangu; 
19_104_3_obeka imishayo yezindlu zakhe emanzini, owenza amafu abe yinqola yakhe, ohamba ngamaphiko omoya; 
19_104_4_owenza izingelosi zibe yimimoya, izikhonzi zakhe zibe yilangabi lomlilo. 
19_104_5_Umisile umhlaba phezu kwezisekelo zawo, ukuze ungazanyazanyiswa kuze kube phakade naphakade. 
19_104_6_Wawumboza ngolwandle njengengubo; amanzi ema phezu kwezintaba. 
19_104_7_Ngokukhuza kwakho abaleka, ngezwi lokuduma kwakho ashesha asuka. 
19_104_8_Enyuka izintaba, ehla izigodi, aze afika endaweni owawuyimisele wona. 
19_104_9_Umisile umncele ukuba angaweqi, angabuyi ukusibekela umhlaba. 
19_104_10_Uthumela imithombo ezigodini; yona igijima phakathi kwezintaba. 
19_104_11_Iyaphuzisa izilwane zonke zasendle, izimbongolo zasendle zicime ukoma kwazo. 
19_104_12_Izinyoni zezulu zakhile ngakuyo, zizwakalisa izwi lazo phakathi kwamagatsha. 
19_104_13_Uphuzisa izintaba okuvela emakamelweni akhe; umhlaba uyaneliswa yisithelo semisebenzi yakho. 
19_104_14_Uhlumisela izinkomo utshani nemifino yokusiza umuntu, ukuze aveze ukudla emhlabeni, 
19_104_15_newayini elijabulisa inhliziyo yomuntu, namafutha okukhazimulisa ubuso, nesinkwa esiqinisa inhliziyo yomuntu. 
19_104_16_Iyasutha imithi kaJehova, imisedari yaseLebanoni ayitshalileyo, 
19_104_17_okwakhele kuyo izinyoni; ugolantethe unendlu yakhe kuyo imisayipuresi. 
19_104_18_Izintaba eziphakemeyo ngezezimbuzi zasendle; amawa ayisiphephelo sezimbila. 
19_104_19_Wenza inyanga ibe ngeyokwahlukanisa izikhathi; ilanga liyazi ukushona kwalo. 
19_104_20_Wenza ubumnyama kube ngubusuku; phakathi kwabo kuphuma izilo zonke zasehlathini. 
19_104_21_Izingonyama ezintsha zibhongela impango, zifuna ukudla kwazo kuNkulunkulu. 
19_104_22_Liphuma ilanga, bese zibuyela phansi zilale emihumeni yazo. 
19_104_23_Bese kuphuma umuntu, aye emsebenzini wakhe nasekukhandlekeni kwakhe kuze kuhlwe. 
19_104_24_Jehova, yeka ubuningi bemisebenzi yakho; yonke uyenzile ngokuhlakanipha; umhlaba ugcwele izidalwa zakho. 
19_104_25_Nantu ulwandle, lukhulu, lubanzi; lapho kukhona izilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo ezingenakubalwa, izilwane ezincane nezinkulu. 
19_104_26_Kuhamba khona imikhumbi, uLeviyathani lowo omenzile ukuba adlale kulo. 
19_104_27_Zonke lezi zidalwa zibheka wena, ukuze uzinike ukudla kwazo ngesikhathi esiyiso. 
19_104_28_Uyazinika ukudla, zibuthe; uvula isandla sakho, zisuthe ngokuhle. 
19_104_29_Uyasitheza ubuso bakho, zethuke; uyasusa umphefumulo wazo, zife, zibuyele othulini lwazo. 
19_104_30_Uyathumela umoya wakho, zidalwe; wenza bube busha ubuso bomhlaba. 
19_104_31_Inkazimulo kaJehova mayime kuze kube phakade; uJehova kathokoze ngemisebenzi yakhe, 
19_104_32_yena obheka umhlaba, besewuthuthumela, othinta izintaba, zithunqe. 
19_104_33_Ngiyakumhubela uJehova kukho konke ukuphila kwami; ngiyakuhlabelela kuNkulunkulu wami ngisekhona. 
19_104_34_Ukuzindla kwami makube mnandi kuye; mina mangithokoze kuJehova. 
19_104_35_Izoni maziphele emhlabeni, kungabe kusaba khona ababi. Mbonge uJehova, mphefumulo wami. Haleluya! 
19_105_1_Bongani uJehova, nibize igama lakhe, nizazise phakathi kwabantu izenzo zakhe. 
19_105_2_Hlabelelani kuye, nimhubele, nikhulume ngezimangaliso zakhe zonke. 
19_105_3_Zibongeni egameni lakhe elingcwele; mazithokoze izinhliziyo zabamfunayo uJehova. 
19_105_4_Funani uJehova namandla akhe, nifunisise ubuso bakhe njalo. 
19_105_5_Khumbulani izimangaliso zakhe azenzileyo, nezibonakaliso zakhe, nezahlulelo zomlomo wakhe, 
19_105_6_nina nzalo ka-Abrahama inceku yakhe, nina bantwana bakaJakobe, abakhethiweyo bakhe. 
19_105_7_Yena unguJehova uNkulunkulu wethu; izahlulelo zakhe zisemhlabeni wonke. 
19_105_8_Ukhumbulile isivumelwano sakhe kuze kube phakade, izwi ayala ngalo izizukulwane eziyinkulungwane, 
19_105_9_avumelana kuso no-Abrahama, nesifungo sakhe ku-Isaka; 
19_105_10_wasiqinisa kuJakobe, saba ngumthetho, naku-Israyeli, saba yisivumelwano esiphakade, 
19_105_11_ethi: “Ngizakukunika izwe laseKhanani libe yisabelo sefa lakho,” 
19_105_12_lapho babe yingcosana ngomumo, yebo, lapho babe yingcosana, futhi babe yizihambi kulo. 
19_105_13_Bazulazula ezizweni ngezizwe, besuka kulo mbuso, beya kwabanye abantu. 
19_105_14_Akavumelanga muntu ukubahlupha, wajezisa amakhosi ngenxa yabo, 
19_105_15_ethi: “Ningathinti abagcotshiweyo bami, ningoni abaprofethi bami.” 
19_105_16_Futhi wathuma indlala phezu kwezwe, walwaphula uzime lwesinkwa. 
19_105_17_Wathuma indoda phambi kwabo: uJosefa wathengiswa abe yisigqila. 
19_105_18_Balimaza izinyawo zakhe ngamaketanga, waboshwa ngensimbi. 
19_105_19_Kwaze kwaba yisikhathi elagcwaliseka ngaso izwi lakhe, izwi likaJehova lamhola. 
19_105_20_Inkosi yathuma yamthukulula, umbusi wabantu wamkhulula. 
19_105_21_Wamenza umphathi wendlu yakhe nenduna yezinto zakhe zonke, 
19_105_22_ukuze abophe izikhulu zakhe ngokuthanda kwakhe, afundise amalunga akhe ukuhlakanipha. 
19_105_23_U-Israyeli wayesefika eGibithe, uJakobe wagogobala ezweni likaHamu. 
19_105_24_Wandisa kakhulu abantu bakhe; wabenza babe namandla kunezitha zabo. 
19_105_25_Wayiguqula inhliziyo yabo ukuba bazonde abantu bakhe, baphathe izinceku zakhe ngobuqili. 
19_105_26_Wathuma uMose inceku yakhe, u-Aroni abemkhethile. 
19_105_27_Benza phakathi kwabo izibonakaliso zakhe nezimangaliso ezweni likaHamu. 
19_105_28_Wathuma ubumnyama, wenza kwaba mnyama, kepha baphambana namazwi akhe. 
19_105_29_Waphendula amanzi abo aba yigazi; wabhubhisa izinhlanzi zabo. 
19_105_30_Izwe labo lagcwala amasele nasezindlini zamakhosi abo. 
19_105_31_Wakhuluma, kwavela izibawu nezinsensane eminceleni yabo yonke. 
19_105_32_Wabanika isichotho saba yimvula yabo, amalangabi omlilo ezweni labo. 
19_105_33_Washaya nemivini yabo nemikhiwane yabo; waphula imithi yasezweni labo. 
19_105_34_Wakhuluma, kwavela isikhonyane nezinkumbi ezingenakubalwa. 
19_105_35_Zona zadla imifino yonke yezwe lakubo, zaqothula nezithelo zomhlabathi wabo. 
19_105_36_Washaya namazibulo onke ezweni lakubo, okokuqala kwamandla abo. 
19_105_37_Wayesebakhipha benesiliva negolide, kungekho ontengezelayo emindenini yakubo. 
19_105_38_IGibithe lajabula ekuphumeni kwabo, ngokuba ukwesaba kwabehlela. 
19_105_39_Wendlala ifu lokubasibekela, nomlilo wokukhanyisa ebusuku. 
19_105_40_Bacela, waletha izigwaca, wabasuthisa ngesinkwa sasezulwini. 
19_105_41_Wavula idwala, kwampompoza amanzi, agobhoza emahlane njengomfula. 
19_105_42_Ngokuba wakhumbula izwi lakhe elingcwele no-Abrahama inceku yakhe. 
19_105_43_Wayesekhipha abantu bakhe ngokujabula, abakhethiweyo bakhe ngokuthokoza. 
19_105_44_Wabapha amazwe abezizwe, badla isithelo somsebenzi wabantu 
19_105_45_ukuba baqaphele izimiso zakhe, bagcine imithetho yakhe. Haleluya! 
19_106_1_Haleluya! Bongani uJehova, ngokuba muhle, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade. 
19_106_2_Ngubani ongalanda izenzo zamandla zikaJehova, azwakalise lonke udumo lwakhe, na? 
19_106_3_Babusisiwe abaqaphela ukwahlulela kwakhe, owenza ukulunga ngezikhathi zonke. 
19_106_4_Ngikhumbule, Jehova, ngomusa onawo kubantu bakho, ungihambele ngensindiso yakho, 
19_106_5_ukuze ngibone inhlanhla yabakhethiweyo bakho, ngithokoze ngentokozo yesizwe sakho, ngizibonge kanye nefa lakho. 
19_106_6_Sonile kanye nawobaba; senzile okubi, sonakala. 
19_106_7_Obaba abaqondanga izibonakaliso zakho eGibithe, abakhumbulanga ubuningi bezenzo zakho zomusa; bahlubuka ngaselwandle, uLwandle Olubomvu. 
19_106_8_Nokho wabasindisa ngenxa yegama lakhe, ukuze abonakalise amandla akhe. 
19_106_9_Wakhuza uLwandle Olubomvu, lwasha; wabaholela ekujuleni njengasehlane. 
19_106_10_Wabasindisa esandleni sababazondayo, wabakhulula esandleni sesitha. 
19_106_11_Amanzi asibekela izitha zabo; akwasala noyedwa kubo. 
19_106_12_Khona bakholwa ngamazwi akhe, bahlabelela udumo lwakhe. 
19_106_13_Bashesha bakhohlwa imisebenzi yakhe, abalindelanga isiluleko sakhe. 
19_106_14_Bahaha nokuhaha ehlane, bamlinga uNkulunkulu kwahlongasibi. 
19_106_15_Wabanika abakufisayo, kepha wathuma ukonda emiphefumulweni yabo. 
19_106_16_Baba nomhawu ngoMose ekamu, nango-Aroni ongcwele kaJehova. 
19_106_17_Umhlaba wavuleka, wamgwinya uDathani, wagqiba iviyo lika-Abiramu. 
19_106_18_Kokheleka umlilo eviyweni labo; ilangabi lashisa laqeda ababi. 
19_106_19_Benza ithole eHorebe; bakhuleka kuso isithombe esibunjiweyo. 
19_106_20_Baguqula kanjalo inkazimulo yabo, yaba njengenkabi edla utshani. 
19_106_21_Bakhohlwa uNkulunkulu umsindisi wabo owayezenzile izinto ezinkulu eGibithe, 
19_106_22_izimangaliso ezweni likaHamu nokwesabekayo ngaseLwandle Olubomvu. 
19_106_23_Wathi ubezakubabhubhisa, uma uMose okhethiweyo wakhe ebengemanga ebusweni bakhe ukubakhulumela, ukuze amyekise intukuthelo yakhe, funa ababhubhise. 
19_106_24_Badelela izwe elihle, babengakholwa yizwi lakhe. 
19_106_25_Bakhonona besematendeni abo; babengalaleli izwi likaJehova. 
19_106_26_Ngalokho waphakamisa isandla sakhe ngakubo ukuba abawise ehlane, 
19_106_27_awise nenzalo yabo phakathi kwabezizwe, abahlakaze emazweni. 
19_106_28_Bazihlanganisa noBali Peyori, badla okuhlatshelwe abafileyo. 
19_106_29_Bamcunula ngezenzo zabo; kwabhoboka isifo phakathi kwabo. 
19_106_30_Wayesesuka uFinehasi, wahlulela; saphela isifo; 
19_106_31_lokhu wakubalelwa njengokulunga ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane kuze kube phakade. 
19_106_32_Bamcunula ngasemanzini aseMeriba; kwaba kubi kuMose ngenxa yabo. 
19_106_33_Ngokuba baphambana noMoya wakhe; wakhuluma ngamawala ngomlomo wakhe. 
19_106_34_Abababhubhisanga abantu uJehova abayaleza ngabo, 
19_106_35_kepha bahlangana nabezizwe, bafunda imisebenzi yabo. 
19_106_36_Bakhonza izithombe zabo, zaba lugibe kubo. 
19_106_37_Amadodana namadodakazi abo bawahlabela amademoni. 
19_106_38_Bachitha igazi elingenacala, igazi lamadodana abo namadodakazi abo abawahlabela izithombe zaseKhanani; izwe langcoliswa yigazi. 
19_106_39_Bangcola kanjalo ngemisebenzi yabo, baphinga ezenzweni zabo. 
19_106_40_Intukuthelo kaJehova yokheleka ngakubantu bakhe; ifa lakhe laba yisinengiso kuye. 
19_106_41_Wabanikela esandleni sabezizwe; ababazondayo bababusa. 
19_106_42_Izitha zabo zabacindezela, bathotshiswa phansi kwesandla sazo. 
19_106_43_Kaningi wabakhulula; kepha bahlubuka ngecebo labo, bawiswa phansi ngobubi babo. 
19_106_44_Nokho wanaka ukuhlupheka kwabo, esezwile ukukhala kwabo. 
19_106_45_Wabakhumbulela isivumelwano sakhe; waphenduka ngokobuningi bomusa wakhe. 
19_106_46_Wabatholisa ububele ebusweni babo bonke ababebathumbile. 
19_106_47_Sisindise, Jehova Nkulunkulu wethu, sibuthe kwabezizwe ukuba sidumise igama lakho elingcwele, sethabe ekukudumiseni. 
19_106_48_Makabongwe uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli kusukela phakade kuze kube phakade. Abantu bonke mabathi: “Amen.” Haleluya! 
19_107_1_Bongani uJehova, ngokuba muhle, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade. 
19_107_2_Mabasho njalo abahlengiweyo bakaJehova, abahlengileyo esandleni sesitha; 
19_107_3_wababutha emazweni, empumalanga nasentshonalanga, enyakatho naselwandle. 
19_107_4_Bazulazula ehlane ngendlela yakwahlongasibi, abafumananga umuzi wokuhlala. 
19_107_5_Belambile, bomile, umphefumulo wabo waphela amandla phakathi kwabo. 
19_107_6_Base bekhala kuJehova ekuhluphekeni kwabo; wabakhulula ezinsizini zabo. 
19_107_7_Wabahola ngendlela elungileyo ukuba baye emzini wokuhlala. 
19_107_8_Mababonge uJehova ngomusa wakhe nezimangaliso zakhe kubo abantwana babantu. 
19_107_9_Ngokuba usuthisa umphefumulo olangazelayo; umphefumulo olambayo uyawugcwalisa ngokuhle. 
19_107_10_Babehlezi ebumnyameni nasethunzini lokufa beboshiwe osizini nasensimbini, 
19_107_11_ngokuba babephambene namazwi kaNkulunkulu, babesidelele isiluleko soPhezukonke. 
19_107_12_Wathobisa inhliziyo yabo ngokuhlupheka; bawa kungekho osizayo. 
19_107_13_Base bekhala kuJehova ekuhluphekeni kwabo, wabakhulula ezinsizini zabo. 
19_107_14_Wabakhipha ebumnyameni nasethunzini lokufa, wagqabula izibopho zabo. 
19_107_15_Mababonge uJehova ngomusa wakhe nangezimangaliso zakhe kubo abantwana babantu. 
19_107_16_Ngokuba waphulile amasango ethusi, wanquma imigoqo yensimbi. 
19_107_17_Babe yizithutha ngenxa yeziphambeko zabo; ngenxa yobubi babo babehlushwa. 
19_107_18_Umphefumulo wabo wenyanya konke ukudla; basondela emasangweni okufa. 
19_107_19_Base bekhala kuJehova ekuhluphekeni kwabo; wabakhulula ezinsizini zabo. 
19_107_20_Wathuma izwi lakhe, wabaphilisa, wabakhulula emathuneni abo. 
19_107_21_Mababonge uJehova ngomusa wakhe, nezimangaliso zakhe kubo abantwana babantu. 
19_107_22_Mabanikele iminikelo yokubonga, balande imisebenzi yakhe ngokwethaba. 
19_107_23_Behlela elwandle ngemikhumbi, bathengiselana emanzini amakhulu. 
19_107_24_Laba babona imisebenzi kaJehova nezimangaliso zakhe ekujuleni. 
19_107_25_Ngokuba wakhuluma, wavusa umoya wesiphepho owaphakamisa amadlambi olwandle. 
19_107_26_Bakhuphukela ezulwini, babuye behlela kuzo izintwa; umphefumulo wancibilika ngosizi.
