19_107_27_Bayendayenda, bantengezela njengodakiweyo; konke ukuhlakanipha kwabo kwagwinywa. 
19_107_28_Base bekhala kuJehova ekuhluphekeni kwabo, wabakhulula ezinsizini zabo. 
19_107_29_Wathulisa isiphepho, kwaze kwaba ngukuthula, kwathula namadlambi olwandle. 
19_107_30_Base bethokoza, ngokuba kwaba ngukuthula; wabaholela ethekwini lokufisa kwabo. 
19_107_31_Mababonge uJehova ngomusa wakhe nangezimangaliso zakhe kubo abantwana babantu. 
19_107_32_Mabamphakamise ebandleni labantu, bamdumise emhlanganweni wamalunga. 
19_107_33_Imifula wayiphendula ihlane, nemithombo yamanzi isigagadu, 
19_107_34_nomhlabathi ovundileyo waba lugwadule lukasawoti ngenxa yobubi babahlezi khona. 
19_107_35_Ihlane waliphendula amachibi amanzi, nomhlabathi owomileyo imithombo yamanzi. 
19_107_36_Wabahlalisa khona abalambileyo, bakha khona umuzi wokuhlala. 
19_107_37_Balima amasimu, batshala isivini, kwabathelela izithelo. 
19_107_38_Wababusisa, banda kakhulu, akanciphisa izinkomo zabo. 
19_107_39_Babuye bancipha, bathotshiswa ngokucindezelwa, nangobubi, nangosizi. 
19_107_40_Wathela ukudelelwa phezu kwezikhulu, wabazulazulisa ehlane elingenandlela. 
19_107_41_Nokho waphakamisa ompofu, wamkhipha osizini, enza imindeni njengomhlambi. 
19_107_42_Olungileyo uyakukubona, ajabule; ububi bonke bumelwe ukuvala umlomo. 
19_107_43_Ohlakaniphileyo makaqaphele lokhu; bayakuqonda umusa kaJehova. 
19_108_1_Igama. Ihubo likaDavide. Inhliziyo yami iduduzekile, Nkulunkulu; ngizakuhlabelela, ngihube, ngisho nomphefumulo wami. 
19_108_2_Vukani, lugubhu nehabhu! Ngizakuvusa ukusa. 
19_108_3_Ngizakukubonga phakathi kwabantu, Jehova, ngikudumise phakathi kwezizwe. 
19_108_4_Ngokuba umusa wakho mkhulu phezu kwezulu, nokuthembeka kwakho kuze kube semafwini. 
19_108_5_Phakama, Nkulunkulu, phezu kwezulu, inkazimulo yakho ibe phezu komhlaba wonke. 
19_108_6_Ukuze abathandekayo bakho bakhululwe, sindisa ngesandla sakho sokunene, ungizwele. 
19_108_7_UNkulunkulu ukhulumile ebungcweleni bakhe, wathi: “Ngiyakwethaba; ngiyakulidabula iShekemi, ngisilinganise isiGodi saseSukoti. 
19_108_8_Ngowami uGileyadi, ngowami uManase; u-Efrayimi uyisivikelo sekhanda lami, uJuda uyintonga yami yokubusa. 
19_108_9_UMowabi uyisitsha sami sokuhlambela; phezu kuka-Edomi ngiphonsa isicathulo sami; phezu kweFilistiya ngiyethaba.” 
19_108_10_Ngubani oyakungiyisa emzini oyinqaba na? Ngubani oyakungiholela kwa-Edomi na? 
19_108_11_Akusiwena Nkulunkulu osilahlileyo na? Nkulunkulu, awusaphumi nezimpi zethu. 
19_108_12_Siphe ukuba sisizakale ekuhluphekeni, ngokuba ukusiza komuntu kuyize. 
19_108_13_NgoNkulunkulu siyakwenza izenzo zamandla; yena uyakunyathela phansi izitha zethu. 
19_109_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide. Ihubo. Ungathuli, Nkulunkulu wokubonga kwami. 
19_109_2_Ngokuba umlomo womubi nomlomo wenkohliso bawuvulile ngakimi; bakhulumile ngami ngolimi lwamanga. 
19_109_3_Bangizungeza ngamazwi enzondo; balwa nami, kungekho sizathu. 
19_109_4_Ngenxa yothando lwami bayangizonda, mina ngisemkhulekweni njalo. 
19_109_5_Bangibuyisele okubi ngokuhle, nenzondo ngothando lwami. 
19_109_6_Beka omubi phezu kwakhe; makume omelene naye ngasesandleni sakhe sokunene. 
19_109_7_Ekwahlulelweni kwakhe makalahlwe yicala; umkhuleko wakhe mawube yisono. 
19_109_8_Izinsuku zakhe mazibe yingcosana, omunye athathe isikhundla sakhe. 
19_109_9_Abantwana bakhe mababe yizintandane, umkakhe abe ngumfelokazi. 
19_109_10_Abantwana bakhe mababe yizintandane, baphanze, bacele bekude nezindawo zabo ezichithekileyo. 
19_109_11_Umtsheleki makabambe konke anakho, abafo baphange izithelo zomsebenzi wakhe. 
19_109_12_Makungabikho omenzela umusa, futhi kungabikho ohawukela izintandane zakhe. 
19_109_13_Inzalo yakhe mayinqunywe; igama layo malesulwe esizukulwaneni esilandelayo. 
19_109_14_Ububi bawoyise mabukhumbuleke kuJehova; masingesulwa isono sikanina. 
19_109_15_Mabeme phambi kukaJehova njalo, kunqunywe isikhumbuzo sabo emhlabeni. 
19_109_16_Ngokuba wayengakhumbuli ukwenza umusa, kepha wazingela umuntu odingayo nompofu nodabukile ngenhliziyo ukuba ababulale. 
19_109_17_Wathanda ukuthuka, kweza phezu kwakhe; wayengathokozi ngesibusiso, sahlala kude naye. 
19_109_18_Wagqoka ukuthuka njengesambatho, kwangena ezibilinini zakhe njengamanzi, nasemathanjeni akhe njengamafutha. 
19_109_19_Makube kuye njengesambatho asembathayo nebhande azibopha ngalo isikhathi sonke. 
19_109_20_Lokhu makube ngumvuzo wezitha, uvela kuJehova, nowabakhuluma kabi ngomphefumulo wami. 
19_109_21_Kepha wena Jehova, Nkosi yami, ngiphathe ngokwegama lakho; njengokuba umusa wakho ulungile, ngisindise. 
19_109_22_Ngokuba ngingodingayo nompofu; inhliziyo yami ilimele phakathi kwami. 
19_109_23_Njengethunzi eselilide ngiyamuka; njengesikhonyane ngiyapheshulwa. 
19_109_24_Amadolo ami abuthakathaka ngokuzila ukudla, nomzimba wami uswele ukukhuluphala. 
19_109_25_Futhi ngaba yisihlamba kubona; bengibheka banikina amakhanda abo. 
19_109_26_Ngisize, Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, ngisindise ngokomusa wakho, 
19_109_27_ukuze bazi ukuthi lokhu kuyisandla sakho; wena Jehova ukwenzile. 
19_109_28_Mabathuke bona, wena ubusise; nxa bevuka, mabajabhe; kepha inceku yakho mayithokoze. 
19_109_29_Abamelene nami mabembeswe amahloni, bagqoke ukujabha njengesambatho. 
19_109_30_Ngiyakumbonga uJehova ngomlomo wami, ngimdumise esixukwini. 
19_109_31_Ngokuba uyakuma ngakwesokunene sompofu ukumsindisa kulabo abalahla umphefumulo wakhe. 
19_110_1_ElikaDavide. Ihubo. UJehova wathi eNkosini yami: “Hlala ngakwesokunene sami, ngize ngenze izitha zakho zibe yisenabelo sezinyawo zakho.” 
19_110_2_Intonga yamandla akho uJehova uyakuyelula eseSiyoni; busa wena phakathi kwezitha zakho. 
19_110_3_Abantu bakho bayazinikela ngenjabulo ngosuku lwempi yakho; ebuhleni bobungcwele abasha bakho bavela njengamazolo esizalweni sokusa. 
19_110_4_UJehova ufungile engayikuguquka, wathi: “Wena ungumpristi kuze kube phakade ngendlela kaMelkisedeki.” 
19_110_5_INkosi ingakwesokunene sakho; iyakuchoboza amakhosi ngosuku lwentukuthelo yayo. 
19_110_6_Iyakwahlulela phakathi kwabezizwe, kugcwale izidumbu, ichoboze amakhanda ezizweni eziningi. 
19_110_7_Iyakuphuza emfuleni ngasendleleni; ngalokho iyakuphakamisa ikhanda. 
19_111_1_Haleluya! Ngiyakubonga uJehova ngenhliziyo yami yonke emhlanganweni nasebandleni labaqotho. 
19_111_2_Mikhulu imisebenzi kaJehova, iphenywa yibo bonke abathokoza ngayo. 
19_111_3_Umsebenzi wakhe ungubukhosi nodumo, nokulunga kwakhe kumi phakade. 
19_111_4_Wenzele izimangaliso zakhe isikhumbuzo; uJehova unomusa nobubele. 
19_111_5_Abamesabayo ubapha ukudla; ukhumbula njalo isivumelwano sakhe. 
19_111_6_Ubonisile abantu bakhe amandla emisebenzi yakhe ngokubapha ifa labezizwe. 
19_111_7_Imisebenzi yezandla zakhe iyiqiniso nokwahlulela; imithetho yonke yakhe iqinile; 
19_111_8_imisiwe ngeqiniso nangobuqotho. 
19_111_9_Wabathumela abantu bakhe ukukhululwa; uyalezile isivumelwano sakhe kuze kube phakade; lingcwele, liyesabeka igama lakhe. 
19_111_10_Ukumesaba uJehova kungukuqala kokuhlakanipha; banengqondo enhle bonke abakwenzayo. Udumo lwakhe lumi kuze kube phakade. 
19_112_1_Haleluya! Ubusisiwe umuntu omesabayo uJehova, othokoza kakhulu ngemithetho yakhe. 
19_112_2_Inzalo yakhe iyakuba namandla emhlabeni; isizukulwane sabaqotho siyakubusiswa. 
19_112_3_Ingcebo nemfuyo kusendlini yakhe; ukulunga kwakhe kumi phakade. 
19_112_4_Kuyabaphumela abalungileyo ukukhanya ebumnyameni: umusa, nobubele, nokulunga. 
19_112_5_Umuntu omuhle nguye onomusa, otshelekayo, esekela izindaba zakhe ngokulunga. 
19_112_6_Ngokuba akayikugudluka kuze kube phakade; olungileyo uyakukhunjulwa kuze kube phakade. 
19_112_7_Akesabi imibiko emibi; inhliziyo yakhe iqinile, iyethemba uJehova. 
19_112_8_Imisekile inhliziyo yakhe, ayesabi, aze azibuke izitha zakhe ziphansi. 
19_112_9_Uyaphana, uyabanika abampofu; ukulunga kwakhe kumi kuze kube phakade; uphondo lwakhe luyakuphakama ngodumo. 
19_112_10_Omubi uyakukubona, acunuke, agedle amazinyo akhe, abesephela; isifiso sababi siyakubhubha. 
19_113_1_Haleluya! Dumisani nina zinceku zikaJehova, nidumise igama likaJehova. 
19_113_2_Malibongwe igama likaJehova kusukela kulesi sikhathi kuze kube phakade. 
19_113_3_Kusukela ekuphumeni kwelanga kuze kube sekushoneni kwalo igama likaJehova malidunyiswe. 
19_113_4_UJehova uphakeme phezu kwezizwe zonke, inkazimulo yakhe iphezu kwezulu. 
19_113_5_Ngubani onjengoJehova uNkulunkulu wethu, ohlezi phezulu, 
19_113_6_ozithoba ukubona ezulwini nasemhlabeni, na? 
19_113_7_Uyavusa odingayo othulini, aphakamise ompofu ezaleni, 
19_113_8_ukuze amhlalise nezikhulu, yebo, izikhulu zabantu bakhe. 
19_113_9_Inyumba uyayipha ukuphatha umuzi, ibe ngunina othokozayo wabantwana. Haleluya! 
19_114_1_Kwathi ukuba u-Israyeli aphume eGibithe, indlu kaJakobe kubantu bolunye ulimi, 
19_114_2_khona uJuda waba yindlu yakhe engcwele, u-Israyeli waba ngumbuso wakhe. 
19_114_3_Ulwandle lwakubona, lwabaleka, iJordani labuyiselwa emuva. 
19_114_4_Izintaba zatshekula njengezinqama, amagquma njengamawundlu. 
19_114_5_Unani wena lulwandle ukuba ubaleke, nawe Jordani ukuba ubuyiselwe emuva, 
19_114_6_nani zintaba ukuba nitshekule njengezinqama, nani magquma eninjengamawundlu, na? 
19_114_7_Thuthumela, mhlaba, ebusweni beNkosi, ebusweni bukaNkulunkulu kaJakobe, 
19_114_8_yena ophendula idwala libe yichibi lamanzi, insengetsha ibe ngumthombo wamanzi. 
19_115_1_Ungasiphi thina, Jehova, ungasiphi thina, kepha uliphe igama lakho inkazimulo ngenxa yomusa wakho nangenxa yeqiniso lakho. 
19_115_2_Abezizwe bayakusho ngani ukuthi: “Uphi manje uNkulunkulu wabo na?” 
19_115_3_Kepha uNkulunkulu wethu usezulwini; wenza konke akuthandayo. 
19_115_4_Izithombe zabo ziyisiliva negolide, umsebenzi wezandla zomuntu. 
19_115_5_Umlomo zinawo, kepha azikhulumi; amehlo zinawo, kepha aziboni. 
19_115_6_Izindlebe zinazo, kepha azizwa; zinamakhala, kepha azihogeli. 
19_115_7_Zinezandla, kepha aziphathi; zinezinyawo, kepha azihambi; azikhulumi ngomphimbo wazo. 
19_115_8_Abazenzayo bayafana nazo, bonke abazethembayo. 
19_115_9_Israyeli, themba kuJehova; yena ulusizo lwabo nesihlangu sabo. 
19_115_10_O wena ndlu ka-Aroni, themba kuJehova; yena ulusizo lwabo nesihlangu sabo. 
19_115_11_Nina enimesabayo uJehova thembani kuJehova; yena ulusizo lwabo nesihlangu sabo. 
19_115_12_UJehova usikhumbulile; uyakubusisa, abusise indlu ka-Israyeli, abusise indlu ka-Aroni. 
19_115_13_Uyakubusisa abamesabayo uJehova, abancane nabakhulu. 
19_115_14_UJehova uyakunandisa, nina nabantwana benu. 
19_115_15_Manibe ngababusisiweyo bakaJehova owenzile izulu nomhlaba. 
19_115_16_Izulu liyizulu likaJehova, kepha umhlaba wawunika abantwana babantu. 
19_115_17_Abafileyo abamdumnisi uJehova, qha, noyedwa kwabehlelayo ekuthuleni. 
19_115_18_Kepha thina siyakumbonga uJehova kusukela kulesi sikhathi kuze kube phakade. Haleluya! 
19_116_1_Ngiyamthanda uJehova, ngokuba uyezwa izwi lokukhuleka kwami. 
19_116_2_Ngokuba ubekile indlebe kimi ngiyakukhuleka kuye zonke izinsuku zami. 
19_116_3_Izintambo zokufa zangizungeza, nobuhlungu bendawo yabafileyo bangibamba; ngafumana ukuhlupheka nosizi. 
19_116_4_Kepha ngabiza igama likaJehova, ngathi: “Ngiyakuncenga, Jehova, khulula umphefumulo wami.” 
19_116_5_Unomusa uJehova, ulungile; uNkulunkulu wethu unobubele. 
19_116_6_UJehova uyalondoloza ongenabuqili; ngithotshisiwe phansi wangisindisa. 
19_116_7_Buyela ekuphumuleni kwakho, mphefumulo wami, ngokuba uJehova ukuphathe ngomusa. 
19_116_8_Yebo, ukhululile umphefumulo wami ekufeni, amehlo ami ezinyembezini, nezinyawo zami ekuweni. 
19_116_9_Ngiyakuhamba ebusweni bukaJehova ezweni labaphilayo. 
19_116_10_Ngiyakholwa, ngalokho ngiyakhuluma; ngahlushwa kakhulu. 
19_116_11_Ngathi osizini lwami: “Bonke abantu banamanga.” 
19_116_12_Ngiyakubuyiselani kuJehova ngazo zonke izenzo zakhe ezinhle kimina na? 
19_116_13_Ngiyakuthatha indebe yensindiso, ngibize igama likaJehova. 
19_116_14_Izithembiso zami kuJehova ngiyakuzigcwalisa, yebo, nasebusweni babantu bakhe bonke. 
19_116_15_Kuyigugu emehlweni kaJehova ukufa kwabangcwele bakhe. 
19_116_16_Ngiyinceku yakho impela, Jehova; ngiyinceku yakho, indodana yencekukazi yakho; uthukululile izintambo zami. 
19_116_17_Ngiyakunikela kuwe umnikelo wokubonga, ngibize igama likaJehova. 
19_116_18_Izithembiso zami kuJehova ngiyakuzigcwalisa yebo, nasebusweni babantu bakhe bonke, 
19_116_19_emagcekeni endlu kaJehova, phakathi kwakho, Jerusalema. Haleluya! 
19_117_1_Dumisani uJehova nina bezizwe zonke, nimbabaze nina bantu bonke. 
19_117_2_Ngokuba umusa wakhe mkhulu kithina; iqiniso likaJehova limi phakade. Haleluya! 
19_118_1_Bongani uJehova, ngokuba muhle, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade. 
19_118_2_Makathi u-Israyeli: “Yebo, umusa wakhe umi phakade.” 
19_118_3_Mayithi indlu ka-Aroni: “Yebo, umusa wakhe umi phakade.” 
19_118_4_Mabathi abamesabayo uJehova: “Yebo, umusa wakhe umi phakade.” 
19_118_5_Engcingweni yami ngakhuleka kuJehova, uJehova wangiphendula endaweni ebanzi. 
19_118_6_UJehova ungakimi, angiyikwesaba; umuntu angangenzani na? 
19_118_7_UJehova ungakimi ekanye nabangisizayo; ngalokho ngiyakubabuka bephansi abangizondayo. 
19_118_8_Kuhle ukuphephela kuJehova kunokwethemba umuntu. 
19_118_9_Kuhle ukuphephela kuJehova kunokwethemba izikhulu. 
19_118_10_Bonke abezizwe bayangizungeza; egameni likaJehova ngiyakubachitha. 
19_118_11_Bayangikaka, yebo, bayangizungeza; egameni likaJehova ngiyakubachitha. 
19_118_12_Bayangibunganyela njengezinyosi, bacimeka njengomlilo wameva; egameni likaJehova ngiyakubachitha. 
19_118_13_Bayangihlohloloza ukuba ngiwe, kepha uJehova uyangisiza. 
19_118_14_UJehova ungamandla ami nesihlabelelo sami, waba yinsindiso yami. 
19_118_15_Izwi lokwethaba nelokusindiswa lisezindlini zabalungileyo; esokunene sikaJehova senza okwamandla. 
19_118_16_Esokunene sikaJehova siphakeme, esokunene sikaJehova sisebenza ngamandla. 
19_118_17_Angiyikufa, kepha ngiyakuphila, ngishumayele imisebenzi kaJehova. 
19_118_18_UJehova wangilaya nokungilaya, kodwa akanginikelanga ekufeni. 
19_118_19_Ngivuleleni amasango okulunga, ngingene ngawo, ngimdumise uJehova. 
19_118_20_Yileli isango likaJehova; olungileyo uyakungena ngalo. 
19_118_21_Ngiyakukudumisa, ngokuba ungizwile, waba yinsindiso yami. 
19_118_22_Itshe abalinqabayo abakhi selaba yinhloko yegumbi. 
19_118_23_Lona lavela kuJehova; liyisimangaliso emehlweni ethu. 
19_118_24_Yilolu usuku alwenzileyo uJehova; siyakwethaba, sithokoze ngalo. 
19_118_25_Sindisa, Jehova! ngiyakuncenga; hlahlamelisa, Jehova! ngiyakucela. 
19_118_26_Makabusiswe ozayo egameni likaJehova; siyanibusisa sisendlini kaJehova. 
19_118_27_UJehova unguNkulunkulu, usikhanyisele; hlobisani umkhosi ngamahlamvu kuze kube sezimpondweni ze-altare. 
19_118_28_Wena unguNkulunkulu wami, ngiyakukubonga; Nkulunkulu wami, ngiyakukuphakamisa. 
19_118_29_Bongani uJehova, ngokuba muhle, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade. 
19_119_1_Babusisiwe abaqotho endleleni, abahamba ngemithetho kaJehova. 
19_119_2_Babusisiwe abagcina ubufakazi bakhe, abamfuna ngenhliziyo yonke, 
19_119_3_abangenzi ukungalungi, kepha behamba ezindleleni zakhe; 
19_119_4_wena usiyalezile ukuba sizigcine ngokwempela. 
19_119_5_Sengathi zingaqondiswa izindlela zami ukuba ngigcine izimiso zakho. 
19_119_6_Khona angiyikujabha; ngiyakuhlonipha iziyalezo zonke zakho. 
19_119_7_Ngiyakukubonga ngobuqotho benhliziyo, lapho ngifunda izahlulelo zakho ezilungileyo. 
19_119_8_Izimiso zakho ngiyakuzigcina; ungangishiyi nakanci. 
19_119_9_Insizwa iyakuyihlanza kanjani indlela yayo na? Ngokuqaphela okwezwi lakho. 
19_119_10_Ngikufunile ngenhliziyo yami yonke; mangingaphambuki emiyalweni yakho. 
19_119_11_Enhliziyweni yami ngiyalonda izwi lakho, ukuze ngingoni kuwe. 
19_119_12_Mawubongwe wena Jehova, ungifundise izimiso zakho. 
19_119_13_Ngomlomo wami ngimemezele zonke izahlulelo zomlomo wakho. 
19_119_14_Ngithokoza ngendlela yobufakazi bakho njengemfuyo. 
19_119_15_Ngiyakuzindla ngeziyalezo zakho, ngihloniphe izindlela zakho. 
19_119_16_Ngiyakuthokoza ngezimiso zakho; angiyikukhohlwa izwi lakho. 
19_119_17_Yenzele okuhle inceku yakho ukuba ngiphile, ngigcine izwi lakho. 
19_119_18_Vula amehlo ami ukuba ngibone izimangaliso zasemthethweni wakho. 
19_119_19_Ngingumfokazi emhlabeni; ungangifihleli imiyalo yakho. 
19_119_20_Umphefumulo wami waphukile ngokulangazelela njalo izahlulelo zakho. 
19_119_21_Uyakhuza abazidlayo, abaqalekisiweyo, abaduka emiyalweni yakho. 
19_119_22_Susa kimi isihlamba nokudelelwa, ngokuba ngiyaqaphela ubufakazi bakho. 
19_119_23_Yebo, izikhulu zihlezi zikhuluma ngami; inceku yakho iyazindla ngezimiso zakho. 
19_119_24_Ubufakazi bakho buyintokozo yami, bungumluleki wami. 
19_119_25_Umphefumulo wami unamathela othulini; ngiphilise ngokwezwi lakho. 
19_119_26_Ngimemezele izindlela zami, wena wangizwa; ngifundise izimiso zakho. 
19_119_27_Ngiqondise indlela yeziyalezo zakho ukuba ngikhulume ngezimangaliso zakho. 
19_119_28_Umphefumulo wami uyakhala ngosizi; ngivuse ngokwezwi lakho. 
19_119_29_Susa kimi indlela yamanga, ungiphe ngomusa umthetho wakho. 
19_119_30_Ngikhethile indlela yeqiniso; izahlulelo zakho ngizibekile phambi kwami. 
19_119_31_Ngibambelele ebufakazini bakho; ungangijabhisi, Jehova. 
19_119_32_Ngiyakugijima ngendlela yemiyalo yakho, ngokuba uyakwandisa inhliziyo yami. 
19_119_33_Ngitshengise, Jehova, indlela yezimiso zakho; ngiyakuyigcina kuze kube sekupheleni. 
19_119_34_Ngiphe ingqondo, ukuze ngiqaphele umthetho wakho, ngiwugcine ngenhliziyo yami yonke. 
19_119_35_Ngihambise endleleni yemiyalo yakho, ngokuba ngiyathokoza ngayo. 
19_119_36_Thobisela inhliziyo yami ebufakazini bakho, kungabi sekuhaheni. 
19_119_37_Phendula amehlo ami, angaboni okuyize, ungiphilise endleleni yakho. 
19_119_38_Yigcwalise encekwini yakho inkulumo yakho eyenza ukuba wesatshwe. 
19_119_39_Dlulisa isihlamba engisesabayo, ngokuba izahlulelo zakho zinhle. 
19_119_40_Bheka, ngiyalangazelela iziyalezo zakho; ngiphilise ngokulunga kwakho. 
19_119_41_Mawuze kimi umusa wakho, Jehova, insindiso yakho ngokwezwi lakho. 
19_119_42_Khona ngiyakumphendula ongithukayo, ngokuba ngiyalethemba izwi lakho. 
19_119_43_Ungalisusi emlonyeni wami ngokupheleleyo izwi leqiniso, ngokuba ngiyethemba izahlulelo zakho. 
19_119_44_Khona ngiyakuwugcina njalo umthetho wakho, yebo, kuze kube phakade. 
19_119_45_Ngiyakuhamba endaweni ebanzi, ngokuba iziyalezo zakho ngiyazifuna. 
19_119_46_Ngiyakukhuluma ngobufakazi bakho phambi kwamakhosi, ngingajabhi. 
19_119_47_Ngiyakuthokoza ngemiyalo yakho engiyithandileyo. 
19_119_48_Ngiyakuphakamisela izandla zami kuyo imiyalo yakho engiyithandileyo, ngizindle ngezimiso zakho. 
19_119_49_Khumbula izwi encekwini yakho owangipha ithemba ngalo. 
19_119_50_Lokhu kuyinduduzo ekuhluphekeni kwami, ngokuba izwi lakho lingiphilisile. 
19_119_51_Abazidlayo bangihleka usulu kakhulu, kepha emthethweni wakho angichezuki. 
19_119_52_Ngiyakhumbula izahlulelo zakho zasendulo, Jehova; ngiyaduduzeka. 
19_119_53_Ukuvutha kolaka kungibambile ngenxa yababi abashiya umthetho wakho. 
19_119_54_Zaba yizihlabelelo kimina izimiso zakho endlini yokugogobala kwami. 
19_119_55_Ebusuku ngikhumbula igama lakho, Jehova, ngigcina umthetho wakho. 
19_119_56_Lokhu kwaba ngokwami, ngokuba ngagcina iziyalezo zakho. 
19_119_57_UJehova uyisabelo sami; ngithi ngiyakugcina amazwi akho. 
19_119_58_Ngincenga ubuso bakho ngenhliziyo yami yonke; yiba nomusa kimi ngokwezwi lakho. 
19_119_59_Ngizindla ngezindlela zami, ngiqondisa izinyawo zami ebufakazini bakho. 
19_119_60_Ngiyashesha, angilibali ukugcina imiyalo yakho. 
19_119_61_Izintambo zababi ziyangizungeza, kepha angikhohlwa umthetho wakho. 
19_119_62_Phakathi kobusuku ngiyakuvuka ngikubonge ngenxa yezahlulelo zakho ezilungileyo. 
19_119_63_Ngingumngane wabo bonke abakwesabayo, abagcina iziyalezo zakho. 
19_119_64_Umhlaba ugcwele umusa wakho, Jehova; ngifundise izimiso zakho. 
19_119_65_Uyenzele inceku yakho okuhle, Jehova, ngokwezwi lakho. 
19_119_66_Ngifundise ukuqonda okuhle nokwazi, ngokuba ngikholwa yimiyalo yakho. 
19_119_67_Ngingakahlupheki ngaduka, kepha manje sengiyaligcina izwi lakho. 
19_119_68_Umuhle wena, futhi wenza okuhle; ngifundise izimiso zakho. 
19_119_69_Abazidlayo baqamba amanga ngami; ngenhliziyo yonke yami ngiyakugcina iziyalezo zakho. 
19_119_70_Inhliziyo yabo injengamafutha ingezwa lutho; kepha mina ngithokoza ngomthetho wakho. 
19_119_71_Kwangilungela ukuba ngihlushwe, ukuze ngifunde izimiso zakho. 
19_119_72_Umthetho womlomo wakho muhle kunezinkulungwane zegolide nezesiliva. 
19_119_73_Izandla zakho zingenzile, zangibumba; ngiphe ingqondo, ukuze ngifunde imiyalo yakho. 
19_119_74_Abakwesabayo bayakujabula lapho bengibona, ngokuba ngethemba izwi lakho. 
19_119_75_Ngiyazi ukuthi izahlulelo zakho zilungile nokuthi wangilaya ngokuthembeka. 
19_119_76_Umusa wakho mawube yinduduzo encekwini yakho ngokwezwi lakho. 
19_119_77_Ububele bakho mabuze kimi, ukuze ngiphile, ngokuba umthetho wakho uyintokozo yami. 
19_119_78_Abazidlayo mabajabhe, ngokuba bangicindezele, kungekho sizathu; kepha mina ngiyakuzindla ngeziyalezo zakho. 
19_119_79_Mabaphendukele kimi abakwesabayo nabaziyo ubufakazi bakho. 
19_119_80_Inhliziyo yami mayiphelele ezimisweni zakho, ukuze ngingajabhi. 
19_119_81_Umphefumulo wami ulangazelela insindiso yakho; ngiyalethemba izwi lakho. 
19_119_82_Amehlo ami alangazelela izwi lakho, ngithi: “Uyakungiduduza nini na?” 
19_119_83_Nginjengemvaba emsini; izimiso zakho angizikhohlwa. 
19_119_84_Zingaki izinsuku zenceku yakho? Uzakubahlulela nini abangizingelayo na? 
19_119_85_Abazidlayo bangimbela imigodi, bona abaphambene nomthetho wakho. 
19_119_86_Yonke imiyalo yakho ithembekile; bayangizingela ngamanga; ngisize. 
19_119_87_Bacishe bangiqeda emhlabeni, kepha angishiyanga iziyalezo zakho. 
19_119_88_Ngiphilise ngokomusa wakho, ukuze ngigcine ubufakazi bomlomo wakho. 
19_119_89_Kuze kube phakade, Jehova, izwi lakho limi liqinile ezulwini. 
19_119_90_Ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane ukuthembeka kwakho kukhona; wamisa umhlaba; usemi. 
19_119_91_Ngokwezahlulelo zakho kusekhona nanamuhla, ngokuba konke kuyizinceku zakho. 
19_119_92_Uma umthetho wakho ubungesiyo intokozo yami, ngabe ngibhubhele ekuhluphekeni kwami. 
19_119_93_Angiyikukhohlwa kuze kube phakade iziyalezo zakho, ngokuba ungiphilisile ngazo. 
19_119_94_Ngingowakho, ngisindise, ngokuba ngiyafuna iziyalezo zakho. 
19_119_95_Ababi bahlalele ukungibhubhisa, kepha ngiyaqaphela ubufakazi bakho. 
19_119_96_Ngibonile ukugcina kokuphelelyo konke, kepha umthetho wakho ubanzi kakhulu. 
19_119_97_Ngiyawuthanda umthetho wakho kangaka. Usuku lonke ngizindla ngawo. 
19_119_98_Ngemiyalo yakho ngiyahlakanipha kunezitha zami, ngokuba inami kuze kube phakade. 
19_119_99_Ngiyaqonda kunabo bonke abangifundisayo, ngokuba ngizindla ngobufakazi bakho. 
19_119_100_Nginokuqonda kunabadala, ngokuba ngigcina iziyalezo zakho. 
19_119_101_Ngiyazinqanda izinyawo zami ezindleleni zonke zokubi, ukuze ngigcine izwi lakho. 
19_119_102_Ezahlulelweni zakho angichezuki, ngokuba wena uyangifundisa. 
19_119_103_Amnandi kangaka amazwi akho ekunambitheni kwami; adlula izinyosi emlonyeni wami. 
19_119_104_Ngeziyalezo zakho ngiyathola ukuqonda; ngalokho ngiyazonda zonke izindlela zamanga. 
19_119_105_Izwi lakho liyisibani ezinyaweni zami nokukhanya endleleni yami. 
19_119_106_Ngifungile; ukulonda izahlulelo zakho ezilungileyo ngakugcina. 
19_119_107_Ngiyahlupheka kakhulu; Jehova, ngiphilise ngokwezwi lakho. 
19_119_108_Jehova, yamukela iminikelo yesihle yomlomo wami, ungifundise izahlulelo zakho: 
19_119_109_Umphefumulo wami usesandleni sami njalo; nokho umthetho wakho angiwukhohlwa. 
19_119_110_Ababi bangibekele ugibe, kepha angiduki eziyalezweni zakho. 
19_119_111_Ngidlile ifa lobufakazi bakho kuze kube phakade, ngokuba kuyintokozo yenhliziyo yami. 
19_119_112_Ngithobisile inhliziyo yami ukwenza izimiso zakho njalo, yebo, kuze kube sekupheleni. 
19_119_113_Ngiyabazonda abanhliziyo mbili, kepha umthetho wakho ngiyawuthanda. 
19_119_114_Wena uyisiphephelo sami nesihlangu sami; ngiyethemba izwi lakho. 
19_119_115_Sukani kimi nina enenza okubi, ngokuba ngiyakugcina imiyalo kaNkulunkulu wami. 
19_119_116_Ngiphase ngokwezwi lakho, ukuze ngiphile, ngingajabhi ngethemba lami. 
19_119_117_Ngisekele, ngize ngisindiswe, ngibheke njalo izimiso zakho. 
19_119_118_Uyabadelela bonke abaduka ezimisweni zakho, ngokuba ubuqili babo buyize. 
19_119_119_Uyabalahla bonke ababi bomhlaba njengendiva; ngalokho ngiyathanda ubufakazi bakho. 
19_119_120_Inyama yami iyathuthumela ngovalo ngawe, ngiyesaba izahlulelo zakho. 
19_119_121_Ngiyenza ukwahlulela nokulunga; unganginikeli kubo abahluphi bami. 
19_119_122_Mela inceku yakho kube kuhle; abazidlayo mabangangicindezeli. 
19_119_123_Amehlo ami ayalangazelela insindiso yakho nezwi lokulunga kwakho. 
19_119_124_Yenza encekwini yakho ngokomusa wakho, ungifundise izimiso zakho. 
19_119_125_Ngiyinceku yakho; ngiphe ingqondo ukuba ngazi ubufakazi bakho. 
19_119_126_Kuyisikhathi sikaJehova sokusebenza, ngokuba bawenz' ize umthetho wakho. 
19_119_127_Ngalokho ngiyathanda imiyalo yakho kunegolide, yebo, kunegolide elicwengekileyo. 
19_120_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. Ekuhluphekeni kwami ngakhala kuJehova, wangiphendula. 
19_120_2_Jehova, hlenga umphefumulo wami emlonyeni wamanga nasolimini lwenkohliso. 
19_120_3_Uyakuvuzwa ngani, uyakwenezelelwani wena lulimi lwenkohliso, na? 
19_120_4_Imicibisholo ebukhali yeqhawe namalahle omlilo. 
19_120_5_Maye kimi! Ngokuba ngigogobele kwaMesheke, ngihlezi ematendeni akwaKedari. 
19_120_6_Umphefumulo wami sekukade wahlala naye ozonda ukuthula. 
19_120_7_Ngingowokuthula; kepha uma ngikhuluma, bangabalwayo. 
19_121_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. Ngiphakamisela amehlo ami ezintabeni; usizo lwami luvelaphi na? 
19_121_2_Usizo lwami luvela kuJehova owenzile izulu nomhlaba. 
19_121_3_Akayikuvuma ukuba unyawo lwakho lushelele; okulondolozayo akayikozela. 
19_121_4_Bheka, olonda u-Israyeli akozeli, akalali. 
19_121_5_UJehova ungumlondi wakho; uJehova ungumthunzi wakho ngasesandleni sakho sokunene. 
19_121_6_Ilanga aliyikukushaya emini nenyanga ebusuku. 
19_121_7_UJehova uyakukulondoloza ebubini bonke; uyakulonda umphefumulo wakho. 
19_121_8_UJehova uyakulondoloza ukuphuma kwakho nokungena kwakho kusukela kulesi sikhathi kuze kube phakade. 
19_122_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. ElikaDavide. Ngajabula lapho bethi kimi: “Masiye endlini kaJehova.” 
19_122_2_Izinyawo zethu sezimi emasangweni akho, Jerusalema, 
19_122_3_Jerusalema, wena owakhiwe njengomuzi ohlanganisiwe ngokuqinileyo, 
19_122_4_lapho imindeni ikhuphukela khona, imindeni kaJehova, ngokomthetho ka-Israyeli ukuba idumise igama likaJehova. 
19_122_5_Ngokuba kumisiwe khona izihlalo zokwahlulela, izihlalo zobukhosi zendlu kaDavide. 
19_122_6_Khulekelani ukuthula kwaseJerusalema: “Abakuthandayo bayakuphumelela kahle. 
19_122_7_Makube khona ukuthula phakathi kwezingange zakho, nenhlanhla ezindlini zakho zobukhosi.” 
19_122_8_Ngenxa yabafowethu nabangane bethu ngizakuthi manje: “Makube khona ukuthula kuwe.” 
19_122_9_Ngenxa yendlu kaJehova uNkulunkulu wethu ngiyakukufunela okuhle. 
19_123_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. Ngiyaphakamisela kuwe amehlo ami, wena ohlezi ezulwini. 
19_123_2_Bheka, njengamehlo ezinceku ekuzo izandla zamakhosi azo, namehlo encekukazi ekuso isandla senkosikazi yayo, kanjalo amehlo ethu akuye uJehova uNkulunkulu wethu, aze abe nomusa kithi. 
19_123_3_Sihawukele, Jehova sihawukele, ngokuba sesidiniwe kakhulu ngukudelelwa. 
19_123_4_Umphefumulo wethu udiniwe kakhulu ngukweyisa kwabaziqhenyayo nokudelela kwabazidlayo. 
19_124_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. ElikaDavide. Uma uJehova ebengenathi, makasho njalo manje u-Israyeli, 
19_124_2_uma uJehova ebengenathi, lapho abantu besivukela, 
19_124_3_ngabe sebesigwinyile ekuvutheni kolaka lwabo kithina; 
19_124_4_amanzi ngabe asewele phezu kwethu, kudlule isikhukhula phezu komphefumulo wethu, 
19_124_5_kudlule phezu komphefumulo wethu amanzi akhukhumeleyo. 
19_124_6_Makabongwe uJehova ongasinikelanga ukuba sibe yimpango yamazinyo abo. 
19_124_7_Umphefumulo wethu uphunyukile njengenyoni ogibeni lwabacuphi; ugibe lwaphukile, thina saphunyuka. 
19_124_8_Usizo lwethu lusegameni likaJehova owenzile izulu nomhlaba. 
19_125_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. Abamethembayo uJehova bafana nentaba yaseSiyoni engenakunyakaziswa kepha imi phakade. 
19_125_2_Njengalokhu izintaba zihaqa iJerusalema, kanjalo uJehova uhaqa abantu bakhe kalokhu kuze kube phakade. 
19_125_3_Ngokuba intonga yababi ayinakuhlala phezu kwesabelo sabalungileyo, funa abalungileyo belulele izandla zabo kokubi. 
19_125_4_Jehova, yenza okuhle kubo abalungileyo nabaqotho ezinhliziyweni zabo. 
19_125_5_Kepha abaphambukela ezindleleni zabo eziyizinsongensonge uJehova uzakubahambisa kanye nabenza okubi. Ukuthula makube phezu kuka-Israyeli. 
19_126_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. Lapho uJehova abuyisa ukuthunjwa kweSiyoni, sasinjengabaphuphayo. 
19_126_2_Umlomo wethu wawusugcwala ukuhleka nolimi lwethu ukuhuba; bathi phakathi kwabezizwe: UJehova ubenzele izinto ezinkulu. 
19_126_3_UJehova usenzele izinto ezinkulu, sajabula. 
19_126_4_Buyisa, Jehova, ukuthunjwa kwethu njengemifula yaseningizimu. 
19_126_5_Abahlwanyela ngezinyembezi bayakuvuna ngokuthokoza. 
19_126_6_Ohamba ekhala izinyembezi, ephethe imbewu yokuhlwanyela, uyakubuya ngokuthokoza, ephethe izinyanda zakhe. 
19_127_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. ElikaSolomoni. Uma uJehova engayakhi indlu, basebenzela ize abayakhayo; uma uJehova engalondolozi umuzi, umlindi wawo ulindela ize. 
19_127_2_Kuyize kini ukuba nivuke ekuseni, nephuze ukuphumula, nidle isinkwa sezinhlupheko, ngokuba uyamupha othandiweyo wakhe esalele. 
19_127_3_Bheka, abantwana bayifa elivela kuJehova, isithelo sesisu singumvuzo. 
19_127_4_Njengemicibisholo esandleni seqhawe banjalo abantwana bobusha. 
19_127_5_Ibusisiwe indoda emgodla wayo ugcwele bona; abayikujabha lapho bekhuluma nezitha zabo esangweni. 
19_128_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. Babusisiwe bonke abamesabayo uJehova, abahamba ngezindlela zakhe. 
19_128_2_Ngokuba uyakudla umsebenzi wezandla zakho; uyakuba nenhlanhla nempumelelo. 
19_128_3_Umkakho uyakuba njengomnqumo othelayo phakathi kwendlu yakho, abantwana bakho babe njengezithombo zomnqumo, bezungeza itafula lakho. 
19_128_4_Ngokuba bheka, kanjalo iyakubusiswa indoda emesabayo uJehova. 
19_128_5_UJehova makakubusise eseSiyoni; uyakubona inhlanhla yaseJerusalema zonke izinsuku zokuphila kwakho. 
19_128_6_Uyakubona abantwana babantwana bakho. Ukuthula makube phezu kuka-Israyeli. 
19_129_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. Bangihluphile kaningi kwasebusheni bami, makasho njalo u-Israyeli. 
19_129_2_Bangihluphile kakhulu, nokho abangahlulanga. 
19_129_3_Abalimi balima emhlane wami, benza ibe mide imisele yabo. 
19_129_4_UJehova ulungile; unqumile izintambo zababi. 
19_129_5_Mabajabhiswe, babuyiselwe emuva bonke abazonda iSiyoni. 
19_129_6_Mababe njengotshani ophahleni, obubuna bungakakhuli. 
19_129_7_Ovunayo akagcwalisi ngabo isandla sakhe, nobopha izinyanda izingalo zakhe. 
19_129_8_Abadlulayo abasho ukuthi: “Isibusiso sikaJehova masibe phezu kwenu; siyanibusisa egameni likaJehova.” 
19_130_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. Ngikhala kuwe Jehova ngisotweni phansi. 
19_130_2_Nkosi, yizwa izwi lami; izindlebe zakho mazilalele izwi lokuncenga kwami. 
19_130_3_Uma wena Jehova uqaphela iziphambeko, Nkosi, ngubani ongema na? 
19_130_4_Kepha ukuthethelela kukuwe, ukuze wesatshwe. 
19_130_5_Ngiyalindela uJehova, umphefumulo wami uyalinda; ngiyalethemba izwi lakhe. 
19_130_6_Umphefumulo wami uyalindela iNkosi kunabalindi belindela ukusa. 
19_130_7_U-Israyeli makamethembe uJehova, ngokuba umusa ukuJehova, nokukhulula okuningi kukuye. 
19_130_8_Uyakumhlenga u-Israyeli eziphambekweni zakhe zonke. 
19_131_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. ElikaDavide. Jehova, inhliziyo yami ayikhukhumali, amehlo ami awaziphakamisi; angingeni ezindabeni ezinkulu nasezintweni ezingahlulayo. 
19_131_2_Ngiduduzile, ngawuthulisa umphefumulo wami; njengomntwana olunyuliweyo kunina, njengolumulekileyo, unjalo umphefumulo wami phakathi kwami. 
19_131_3_Israyeli, yethemba uJehova kusukela kulesi sikhathi kuze kube phakade 
19_132_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. Jehova, mkhumbulele uDavide zonke izinhlupheko zakhe 
19_132_2_ukuthi wafunga kuJehova, wenza isithembiso kuye onguMninimandla kaJakobe, ethi: 
19_132_3_“Angiyikungena etendeni lendlu yami; angiyikwenyukela embhedeni wami; 
19_132_4_angiyikunika amehlo ami ubuthongo, nezinkophe zami ukozela 
19_132_5_ngingakatholeli uJehova indawo, indlu yonguMninimandla kaJakobe.” 
19_132_6_Bheka, sizwile ngakho e-Efratha, sakufumana ezweni laseJari. 
19_132_7_“Masingene endlini yakhe, sikhuleke ngasesenabelweni sezinyawo zakhe. 
19_132_8_Vuka, Jehova, uye ekuphumuleni kwakho, wena nomphongolo wamandla akho. 
19_132_9_Abapristi bakho mabembeswe ukulunga, abangcwele bakho bethabe.” 
19_132_10_Ngenxa yenceku yakho uDavide mawungaphenduli ubuso bogcotshiweyo wakho. 
19_132_11_UJehova ufungile kuDavide ngeqiniso, akabuyi kukho, ethi: “Owenzalo yomzimba wakho ngiyakumbeka esihlalweni sakho sobukhosi. 
19_132_12_Uma abantwana bakho begcina isivumelwano sami nobufakazi bami engiyakubafundisa bona, khona abantwana babo bayakuhlala esihlalweni sakho kuze kube phakade.” 
19_132_13_Ngokuba uJehova ukhethile iSiyoni; ulithandile libe yindawo yakhe yokuhlala: 
19_132_14_“Yona ingeyokuphumula kwami kuze kube phakade; lapha ngiyakuhlala khona, ngokuba ngiyifunile. 
19_132_15_Ngiyakubusisa kakhulu ukudla kwalo; abampofu balo ngiyakubasuthisa ngesinkwa. 
19_132_16_Abapristi balo ngiyakubembesa insindiso; abangcwele balo bayakumemeza nokumemeza ngenjabulo. 
19_132_17_“Ngiyakuhlumisa uphondo lukaDavide, ogcotshiweyo wami ngimlungisele isibani. 
19_132_18_Izitha zalo ngiyakuzembesa ihlazo, kepha kuyena uqobo umqhele wakhe uyakukhazimula.” 
19_133_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. ElikaDavide. Bheka, kuhle, kumnandi kangaka ukuba abazalwane bahlalisane ndawonye bemunye. 
19_133_2_Kufana namafutha amahle ekhanda ehlela esilevini, isilevu sika-Aroni, ehlela nasemphethweni wezambatho zakhe. 
19_133_3_Kufana namazolo aseHermoni ehlela ezintabeni zaseSiyoni. Ngokuba uJehova wayaleza khona isibusiso, yebo, ukuphila kuze kube phakade. 
19_134_1_Igama lokukhuphuka. Bhekani, nibonge uJehova nina nonke zinceku zikaJehova enimi endlini kaJehova ebusuku. 
19_134_2_Phakamiselani izandla zenu endlini engcwele, nimbonge uJehova. 
19_134_3_UJehova makakubusise eseSiyoni, yena owenzile izulu nomhlaba. 
19_135_1_Haleluya! Dumisani igama likaJehova; mdumiseni nina zinceku zikaJehova 
19_135_2_enimi endlini kaJehova emagcekeni endlu kaNkulunkulu wethu. 
19_135_3_Dumisani uJehova, ngokuba uJehova muhle; hubelani igama lakhe, ngokuba limnandi. 
19_135_4_Ngokuba uJehova uzikhethele uJakobe, no-Israyeli ukuba abe yimfuyo yakhe. 
19_135_5_Impela ngiyazi ukuthi uJehova mkhulu nokuthi iNkosi yethu iphezu kwabo bonke onkulunkulu. 
19_135_6_Konke uJehova akuthandayo uyakwenza ezulwini nasemhlabeni, emanzini nasezinzulwini zonke. 
19_135_7_Ukhuphula izinkungu emikhawulweni yomhlaba, wenza imibani kube yimvula; ukhipha umoya ezingotsheni zakhe. 
19_135_8_Washaya amazibulo aseGibithe, awabantu kanye nawezilwane. 
19_135_9_Wathuma izibonakaliso nezimangaliso phakathi kwakho, Gibithe, phezu kukaFaro nezinceku zakhe zonke. 
19_135_10_Washaya izizwe ezinkulu, wabulala amakhosi anamandla: 
19_135_11_uSihoni inkosi yama-Amori, no-Ogi inkosi yaseBashani, nemibuso yonke yaseKhanani. 
19_135_12_Wanika izwe labo laba yifa, laba yifa lika-Israyeli, isizwe sakhe. 
19_135_13_Jehova, igama lakho limi phakade; isikhumbuzo sakho, Jehova, sisezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane. 
19_135_14_Ngokuba uJehova uyakwahlulela abantu bakhe, ahawukele izinceku zakhe. 
19_135_15_Izithombe zabezizwe ziyisiliva negolide, umsebenzi wezandla zomuntu. 
19_135_16_Umlomo zinawo, kepha azikhulumi; amehlo zinawo, kodwa aziboni. 
19_135_17_Izindlebe zinazo, kepha azizwa, nomoya awukho emlonyeni wazo. 
19_135_18_Abazenzayo bayafana nazo, bonke abazethembayo. 
19_135_19_Wena ndlu ka-Israyeli, mbonge uJehova; wena ndlu ka-Aroni, mbonge uJehova. 
19_135_20_Wena ndlu kaLevi, mbonge uJehova; nina enimesabayo uJehova, mbongeni uJehova. 
19_135_21_UJehova makabongwe eSiyoni, yena owakhe eJerusalema. Haleluya! 
19_136_1_Bongani uJehova, ngokuba muhle, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade. 
19_136_2_Bongani uNkulunkulu wawonkulunkulu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade. 
19_136_3_Bongani iNkosi yamakhosi, ngokuba umusa wayo umi phakade; 
19_136_4_yona engoyedwa owenza izimangaliso ezinkulu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_5_owenzile izulu ngokuhlakanipha, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_6_owendlala umhlaba phezu kwamanzi, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_7_owenza izinkanyiso ezinkulu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_8_ilanga ukuba libuse emini, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_9_inyanga nezinkanyezi ukuba zibuse ebusuku, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_10_owalishaya iGibithe, amazibulo alo, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_11_owamkhipha u-Israyeli phakathi kwabo, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_12_ngesandla esinamandla nangengalo eyeluliweyo, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_13_owahlukanisa kabili uLwandle Olubomvu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_14_owawelisa u-Israyeli phakathi kwalo, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_15_owachitha uFaro nempi yakhe eLwandle Olubomvu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_16_owahola abantu bakhe ehlane, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_17_owashaya amakhosi amakhulu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_18_owabulala amakhosi adumileyo, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_19_uSihoni inkosi yama-Amori, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_20_no-Ogi inkosi yaseBashani, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_21_owanika izwe labo laba yifa, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_22_laba yifa lika-Israyeli inceku yakhe, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_23_owasikhumbula sisephansi, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_24_owasikhulula ezitheni zethu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade; 
19_136_25_onika inyama yonke ukudla, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade. 
19_136_26_Bongani uNkulunkulu wezulu, ngokuba umusa wakhe umi phakade. 
19_137_1_Ngasemifuleni yaseBabele sahlala khona, sakhala, lapho sikhumbula iSiyoni. 
19_137_2_Amahabhu ethu sawaphanyeka eminyezaneni ephakathi kwalo. 
19_137_3_Ngokuba abasithumbileyo bacela ukuba sihlabelele igama, nabahluphi bethu bafuna injabulo, bethi: “Sihlabeleleni elinye lamagama aseSiyoni.” 
19_137_4_Siyakuhlabelela kanjani ihubo likaJehova kwelinye izwe na? 
19_137_5_Uma ngikhohlwa wena Jerusalema, masizikhohlwe isandla sami sokunene. 
19_137_6_Ulimi lwami malunamathele olwangeni lwami, uma ngingakukhumbuli, uma ngingaphakamisi iJerusalema phezu kwentokozo yami enkulu. 
19_137_7_Khumbula, Jehova, usuku lweJerusalema, ngenxa yabantwana bakwa-Edomi abathi: “Dilizani, dilizani, kuze kube sesisekelweni salo.” 
19_137_8_Ndodakazi yaseBabele, wena oyakubhujiswa, ubusisiwe oyakuphindisela kuwe izenzo zakho owazenza kithina. 
19_137_9_Ubusisiwe oyakubamba abancane bakho, abaphahlaze edwaleni. 
19_138_1_ElikaDavide. Ngiyakukubonga ngenhliziyo yami yonke; phambi kwawonkulunkulu ngiyakukuhubela. 
19_138_2_Ngiyakukhuleka phambi kwethempeli lakho elingcwele, ngibonge igama lakho ngenxa yomusa wakho neqiniso lakho, ngokuba phezu kwakho konke uphakamisile igama lakho nezwi lakho. 
19_138_3_Ngosuku engakhala ngalo wangiphendula; wangiqunga isibindi, wangipha amandla emphefumulweni wami. 
19_138_4_Onke amakhosi omhlaba ayakukubonga, Jehova, lapho ezwile amazwi omlomo wakho. 
19_138_5_Yebo, ayakuhlabelela ngezindlela zikaJehova, ngokuba inkulu inkazimulo kaJehova. 
19_138_6_Ngokuba noma uJehova ephakeme, uyanakekela nokho ophansi; uyamazi ozidlayo ekude. 
19_138_7_Noma ngihamba phakathi kwenhlupheko, uyakungiphilisa; uyakwelulela isandla sakho olakeni lwezitha zami, esokunene sakho singisindise. 
19_138_8_UJehova uyakufeza okwami; Jehova, umusa wakho umi phakade; ungashiyi imisebenzi yezandla zakho. 
19_139_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. ElikaDavide. Ihubo. Jehova, uyangihlolisisa, uyangazi. 
19_139_2_Uyakwazi ukuhlala kwami nokuvuka kwami, uqonda umcabango wami ukude. 
19_139_3_Uyaphenya ukuhamba kwami nokulala kwami, wazana nezindlela zonke zami. 
19_139_4_Ngokuba alikho izwi olimini lwami, Jehova, ongalaziyo ngokupheleleyo. 
19_139_5_Ungizungezile ngasemuva nangaphambili, wabeka isandla sakho phezu kwami. 
19_139_6_Ukwazi okunjalo kuyangimangalisa; kuphakeme, anginakufinyelela kukho. 
19_139_7_Ngiyakuyaphi, ngisuke emoyeni wakho, na? Ngiyakubalekelaphi, ngimuke ebusweni bakho, na? 
19_139_8_Uma ngikhuphukela ezulwini, wena ulapho; uma ngendlala icansi lami endaweni yabafileyo, nangu wena. 
19_139_9_Uma ngithabatha amaphiko okusa, ngiye ngihlale emikhawulweni yolwandle, 
19_139_10_nalapho isandla sakho siyakungihola, esokunene sakho singibambe. 
19_139_11_Uma bengithi: “Ubumnyama mabungehlele, ukukhanya kube ngubusuku kimi,” 
19_139_12_ubumnyama bebungayikuba mnyama kuwe, ngokuba ubusuku bebuyakukhanya njengemini, ubumnyama bufane nokukhanya. 
19_139_13_Ngokuba wena uzenzile izinso zami, wangaluka esiswini sikamame. 
19_139_14_Ngiyakukubonga, ngokuba ngenziwa ngokwesabekayo nangokumangalisayo; imisebenzi yakho iyamangalisa; umphefumulo wami uyakwazi kahle. 
19_139_15_Amathambo ami ayengafihlekile kuwe, lapho ngenziwa ekusithekeni, ngibunjwa ezindaweni ezijulileyo zomhlaba. 
19_139_16_Amehlo akho angibona ngiseyihlule; zonke izinsuku zami zalotshwa encwadini yakho, zanqunywa, lungakafiki nolulodwa kuzo. 
19_139_17_Imicabango yakho, Nkulunkulu, ingamagugu kimi; bukhulu kangaka ubuningi bayo. 
19_139_18_Uma bengiyakuyibala, miningi kunesihlabathi; lapho ngivuka, bengiyakuba nawe. 
19_139_19_Sengathi ungabulala ababi, Nkulunkulu; ngalokho sukani kimi nina bantu begazi. 
19_139_20_Bakhuluma ngamacebo ngawe, baliphatha ngeze igama lakho. 
19_139_21_Jehova, angibazondi abakuzondayo na? Anginengwa ngabakuvukelayo na? 
19_139_22_Ngiyabazonda ngenzondo epheleleyo; bayizitha kimi. 
19_139_23_Ngihole, Nkulunkulu, wazi inhliziyo yami; ngilinge, wazi imicabango yami, 
19_139_24_ubone, uma kukhona indlela yosizi kimi, ungiholele endleleni yaphakade. 
19_140_1_Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ihubo likaDavide. Ngikhulule, Jehova, kumuntu omubi, ngilondoloze kumuntu oyisidlwangudlwangu. 
19_140_2_Baceba okubi enhliziyweni yabo; izinsuku zonke baviva impi. 
19_140_3_Bayalola ulimi lwabo njengenyoka; isihlungu samabululu siphansi kwezindebe zabo. Sela 
19_140_4_Ngilondoloze ezandleni zomubi, ngilinde kumuntu oyisidlwangudlwangu, oceba ukukhuba izinyawo zami. 
19_140_5_Abazidlayo bangifihlela ugibe; ngezintambo bendlala inetha; eceleni kwendlela bangibekela izihibe. Sela 
19_140_6_Ngathi kuJehova: �UnguNkulunkulu wami wena.� Yizwa, Jehova, izwi lokunxusa kwami. 
19_140_7_Jehova Nkosi yami, mandla ensindiso yami, uvikela ikhanda lami ngosuku lokulwa. 
19_140_8_Ungazivumeli, Jehova, izifiso zababi; ungaphumelelisi amacebo abo, funa baziphakamise. Sela 
19_140_9_Maqondana nesihlungu sabangizungezayo mabambozwe ngububi bomlomo wabo. 
19_140_10_Amalahle ashisayo mawawele phezu kwabo; mabaphonswe emlilweni nasemigodini ejulileyo, bangabe besavuka. 
19_140_11_Umuntu wamanga makangamiswa emhlabeni; ububi mabuzingele umuntu oyisidlwangudlwangu, abhujiswe. 
19_140_12_Ngiyazi ukuthi uJehova uyakumela udaba lohluphekayo nokufaneleyo kwabampofu. 
19_140_13_Impela abalungileyo bayakubonga igama lakho; abaqotho bayakuhlala ebusweni bakho. 
19_141_1_Ihubo likaDavide. Jehova, ngiyakhala kuwe, ngiphuthume; lalela izwi lami, nxa ngikhuleka kuwe. 
19_141_2_Umkhuleko wami mawube njengempepho ebusweni bakho, nokuphakanyiswa kwezandla zami njengomnikelo wakusihlwa. 
19_141_3_Jehova, bekela umlomo wami umlindi, ugcine umnyango wezindebe zami. 
19_141_4_Ungaphenduleli inhliziyo yami entweni embi ukuba ngenze imisebenzi yobubi kanye nabantu abenza okubi, ngingadli izibilebile zabo. 
19_141_5_Olungileyo makangishaye, kungumusa kimi; angisole, kungamafutha ekhanda; ikhanda lami malingawenqabi, ngokuba nasebubini babo umkhuleko wami uyobe usekhona. 
19_141_6_Abahluleli babo bayakuphonswa eweni; bayakuzwa ukuthi amazwi ami amnandi. 
19_141_7_Njengalokhu umuntu elima, eklaya umhlabathi, amathambo ethu ahlakazekile ngasemlonyeni wendawo yabafileyo. 
19_141_8_Kepha amehlo ami akuwe Jehova Nkosi yami; ngiyakwethemba wena; ungathululi umphefumulo wami. 
19_141_9_Ngihlenge ogibeni abangibekele lona, nasezihibeni zabenza okubi. 
19_141_10_Ababi mabawele emanetheni abo, mina ngidlule kuwo. 
19_142_1_IMaskili likaDavide esemhumeni. Umkhuleko. Ngiyakhala kuJehova ngezwi lami, ngincenga uJehova ngezwi lami. 
19_142_2_Ngiyathulula ebusweni bakhe isikhalo sami, ngibonakalisa kuye inhlupheko yami. 
19_142_3_Lapho umoya wami udangala phakathi kwami, wena uyawazi umkhondo wami; endleleni engihamba ngayo bangifihlele ugibe. 
19_142_4_Bheka ngakwesokunene sami, ubone ukuthi akakho onginakekelayo; isiphephelo singiphuthele, akakho okhathalela umphefumulo wami. 
19_142_5_Ngikhala kuwe Jehova, ngithi: “Wena uyisiphephelo sami nesabelo sami ezweni labaphilayo.” 
19_142_6_Lalela ukukhala kwami, ngokuba ngicindezelekile kakhulu; ngikhulule kubo abangizingelayo, ngokuba banamandla kunami. 
19_142_7_Khipha umphefumulo wami etilongweni ukuba ngibonge igama lakho; abalungileyo bayakungizungeza, ngokuba uyakungiphatha kahle. 
19_143_1_Ihubo likaDavide. Jehova, yizwa umkhuleko wami, ubeke indlebe ekuncengeni kwami; ungiphendule ngokuthembeka kwakho nokulunga kwakho. 
19_143_2_Ungangeni ekwahluleleni nenceku yakho, ngokuba akukho muntu okhona olungile emehlweni akho. 
19_143_3_Ngokuba isitha siyazingela umphefumulo wami, sicindezela phansi emhlabathini ukuphila kwami; singihlalisile ebumnyameni njengabakade bafa. 
19_143_4_Umoya wami uphelile kimi; inhliziyo yami igongobele phakathi kwami. 
19_143_5_Ngiyakhumbula izinsuku zasendulo, ngizindla ngemisebenzi yakho yonke, ngicabange ngezenzo zezandla zakho. 
19_143_6_Ngiyazelulela izandla zami kuwe; umphefumulo wami womela wena njengomhlaba owomileyo. Sela 
19_143_7_Shesha ungiphendule, Jehova; umoya wami uyaphela; ungangifihleli ubuso bakho, funa ngifane nabashona egodini. 
19_143_8_Ngizwise umusa wakho ekuseni, ngokuba ngiyethemba kuwe; ngazise indlela engifanele ukuhamba ngayo, ngokuba ngiphakamisela kuwe umphefumulo wami. 
19_143_9_Ngikhulule ezitheni zami; Jehova, ngicashe kuwe. 
19_143_10_Ngifundise ukwenza intando yakho, ngokuba wena unguNkulunkulu wami; umoya wakho omuhle mawungihole emhlabathini olelezekileyo. 
19_143_11_Jehova, ngiphilise ngenxa yegama lakho, ngokulunga kwakho uwukhiphe umphefumulo wami ekuhluphekeni. 
19_143_12_Zinqume izitha zami ngomusa wakho, ubabhubhise bonke abahlupha umphefumulo wami, ngokuba ngiyinceku yakho. 
19_144_1_ElikaDavide. Makabongwe uJehova, idwala lami, ofundisa izandla zami ukuhlasela neminwe yami ukulwa, 
19_144_2_umusa wami nenqaba yami, umbhoshongo wami ophakemeyo nomkhululi wami, isihlangu sami, nengiphephela kuye, nothobisa abantu bami phansi kwami. 
19_144_3_Jehova, uyini umuntu ukuba umazi, nendodana yomuntu ukuba uyikhumbule, na? 
19_144_4_Umuntu ufana nomoya; izinsuku zakhe zinjengethunzi elidlulayo. 
19_144_5_Thobisa amazulu akho, Jehova, wehle; thinta izintaba, zithunqe. 
19_144_6_Imibani mayinyazime, ubahlakaze; thuma imicibisholo yakho, ubaphithizise. 
19_144_7_Yelula isandla sakho phezulu, ungikhulule, ungophule emanzini amakhulu nasesandleni sabafokazi 
19_144_8_abamlomo wabo ukhuluma inkohliso, nesandla sabo sokunene singesokunene samanga. 
19_144_9_Ngiyakuhlabelela kuwe Nkulunkulu isihlabelelo esisha; ngogubhu olunezintambo eziyishumi ngiyakukuhubela. 
19_144_10_Nguye onika amakhosi insindiso, okhulula inceku yakhe uDavide enkembeni elimazayo. 
19_144_11_Ngikhulule, ungophule esandleni sabafokazi abamlomo wabo ukhuluma inkohliso, nesandla sabo sokunene singesokunene samanga. 
19_144_12_Lapho amadodana ethu enjengezithombo ezikhulileyo ebusheni bazo, namadodakazi ethu enjengamatshe amagumbi abaziwe ngendlela yokwakhiwa kwezindlu zamakhosi; 
19_144_13_lapho izingobo zethu zigcwele, ziveza izinhlobo ngezinhlobo, nezimvu zethu zizala ngezinkulungwane, yebo, ngezinkulungwane eziyishumi emadlelweni ethu; 
19_144_14_lapho izinkabi zethu zithweswe kakhulu, nalapho kungekho ukufohla kwesitha nokungena empini nezikhalo ezitaladini zethu, 
19_144_15_babusisiwe abantu abanjalo; babusisiwe abantu abaNkulunkulu wabo unguJehova. 
19_145_1_Indumiso kaDavide. Ngiyakukuphakamisa wena Nkulunkulu wami, Nkosi, ngilituse igama lakho phakade naphakade. 
19_145_2_Imihla yonke ngiyakukubonga, ngilidumise igama lakho phakade naphakade. 
19_145_3_Mkhulu uJehova, umelwe ukudunyiswa kakhulu; ubukhulu bakhe abuphenyisiseki. 
19_145_4_Isizukulwane siyakubabaza kwesinye imisebenzi yakho, simemezele izenzo zakho zamandla. 
19_145_5_Ngiyakuzindla ngenkazimulo nodumo lobukhosi bakho nangezimangaliso zakho. 
19_145_6_Abantu bayakukhuluma ngamandla ezenzo zakho ezesabekayo; ubukhulu bakho ngiyakubumemezela. 
19_145_7_Bayakweneka kakhulu inkumbulo yobuhle bakho obukhulu, bahube ngokulunga kwakho. 
19_145_8_UJehova unesihe nobumnene; uyephuza ukuthukuthela, mkhulu ngomusa. 
19_145_9_UJehova muhle kubo bonke; uyayihawukela imisebenzi yakhe yonke. 
19_145_10_Yonke imisebenzi yakho iyakukudumisa, abangcwele bakho bakubonge. 
19_145_11_Ngenkazimulo yombuso wakho bayakukhuluma, bashumayele ngamandla akho 
19_145_12_ukuba babazise abantwana babantu izenzo zakho zamandla nenkazimulo yobukhosi bombuso wakho. 
19_145_13_Umbuso wakho ungumbuso kuze kube phakade; ubukhosi bakho busezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane. 
19_145_14_UJehova uyaphasa bonke abawayo, abavuse bonke abathotshisiweyo. 
19_145_15_Amehlo abo bonke alinda wena; uyabanika ukudla ngesikhathi esiyiso. 
19_145_16_Uyavula isandla sakho, usuthise ukufisa kwakho konke okuphilayo. 
19_145_17_UJehova ulungile ezindleleni zakhe zonke, unomusa emisebenzini yakhe yonke. 
19_145_18_UJehova useduze nabo bonke abambizayo, bonke abambizayo ngeqiniso. 
19_145_19_Uyasuthisa ukufisa kwabamesabayo; uyezwa ukukhala kwabo, abasindise. 
19_145_20_UJehova uyalondoloza bonke abamthandayo, kepha ababi bonke uyakubabhubhisa. 
19_145_21_Umlomo wami uyakukhuluma udumo lukaJehova, inyama yonke ibonge igama lakhe elingcwele kuze kube phakade. 
19_146_1_Haleluya! Dumisa uJehova, mphefumulo wami. 
19_146_2_Ngisaphila ngiyakumdumisa uJehova, ngihube kuNkulunkulu wami ngisekhona. 
19_146_3_Ningethembi ezikhulwini nasendodaneni yomuntu okungekho kuyo ukusiza. 
19_146_4_Umoya wakhe uyaphuma, yena abuyele emhlabathini wakhe; ngalona lolo suku amacebo akhe ayaphela. 
19_146_5_Ubusisiwe yena omsizi wakhe unguNkulunkulu kaJakobe, othemba lakhe likuJehova uNkulunkulu wakhe 
19_146_6_owenzile izulu nomhlaba, nolwandle, nakho konke okuphakathi kwakho, ogcina iqiniso kuze kube phakade; 
19_146_7_obenzela abacindezelweyo ukwahlulela, obapha abalambileyo ukudla; uJehova uyakhulula iziboshwa. 
19_146_8_UJehova uyenza ukuba izimpumputhe zibone; uJehova uyavusa abathotshisiweyo; uJehova uyathanda abalungileyo. 
19_146_9_UJehova uyalondoloza abafokazi; uyaphasa intandane nomfelokazi; kepha indlela yababi uyayiphambanisa. 
19_146_10_UJehova uyabusa kuze kube phakade, uNkulunkulu wakho, Siyoni, ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane. Haleluya! 
19_147_1_Haleluya! Ngokuba kuhle ukuhlabelela kuNkulunkulu wethu, yebo, kumnandi; ukudumisa kufanele. 
19_147_2_UJehova uyalakha iJerusalema; abaxoshiweyo bakwa-Israyeli uyababutha. 
19_147_3_Uyaphilisa abenhliziyo echobozekileyo; izilonda zabo uyazibopha. 
19_147_4_Uyabala inani lezinkanyezi, azibize zonke ngamagama. 
19_147_5_INkosi yethu inkulu, makhulu amandla ayo; ukuqonda kwakhe akunakulinganiswa. 
19_147_6_UJehova uyaphakamisa abathobekileyo; ababi uyabawisa phansi emhlabathini. 
19_147_7_Hubelani uJehova ngokubonga, nimdumise uNkulunkulu wethu ngehabhu, 
19_147_8_osibekela izulu ngamafu, olungisela umhlaba imvula, ohlumisa utshani ezintabeni. 
19_147_9_Unika izinkomo ukudla kwazo, namazinyane egwababa akhalayo. 
19_147_10_Akathokozi ngamandla ehhashi, akajabuleli imilenze yomuntu. 
19_147_11_UJehova uyathokoza ngabamesabayo, abathemba umusa wakhe. 
19_147_12_Jerusalema, mbabaze uJehova; Siyoni, mdumise uNkulunkulu wakho. 
19_147_13_Ngokuba uqinisile imigoqo yamasango; ubusisile abantwana bakho phakathi kwakho. 
19_147_14_Uyenza ukuthula emikhawulweni yakho; uyakusuthisa ngokolweni omuhle. 
19_147_15_Uyathumela umyalo wakhe emhlabeni; izwi lakhe ligijima ngejubane elikhulu. 
19_147_16_Uyanika iqhwa njengoboya; uhlakaza isithwathwa njengomlotha. 
19_147_17_Uyaphonsa isichotho sakhe njengezinhlamvu; ngubani ongema phambi kwamakhaza akhe na? 
19_147_18_Uyathuma izwi lakhe, likuncibilikise; uyavusa umoya wakhe, amanzi agobhoze. 
19_147_19_Uyatshengisa izwi lakhe kuJakobe, izimiso zakhe nezahlulelo zakhe ku-Israyeli. 
19_147_20_Akenzanga njalo kwesinye isizwe nesisodwa: izahlulelo zakhe asizazi. Haleluya! 
19_148_1_Haleluya! Dumisani uJehova ezulwini, nimdumise kweliphezulu. 
19_148_2_Mdumiseni nina zingelosi zakhe zonke, nimdumise nina mabandla akhe onke. 
19_148_3_Mdumiseni nina langa nenyanga, nimdumise nina zinkanyezi zonke ezikhanyayo. 
19_148_4_Mdumiseni nina mazulu amazulu, nina manzi aphezu kwezulu. 
19_148_5_Makuthathe kudumise igama likaJehova, ngokuba wayaleza, kwadaleka. 
19_148_6_Futhi wakumisa kuze kube phakade; washaya umthetho ongenakweqiwa. 
19_148_7_Mdumiseni uJehova emhlabeni nina mikhomo nezintwa zonke, 
19_148_8_nawe mlilo nesichotho, liqhwa nenkwezane, nawe siphepho esenza okwezwi lakhe, 
19_148_9_nani zintaba namagquma onke, nani mithi ethelayo nayo yonke imisedari, 
19_148_10_nani zilwane nezinkomo zonke, nani eninwabuzelayo nezinyoni ezindizayo, 
19_148_11_nani makhosi omhlaba nabantu bonke, nani zikhulu nabahluleli bonke bomhlaba, 
19_148_12_nani zinsizwa nezintombi, nani maxhegu nabafana. 
19_148_13_Mabadumise igama likaJehova, ngokuba ngelakhe igama lodwa eliphakeme; inkazimulo yakhe iphezu komhlaba nezulu. 
19_148_14_Usephakamisile uphondo lwabantu bakhe; ngalokho bayamdumisa abangcwele bakhe, abantwana bakwa-Israyeli, abantu abaseduze naye. Haleluya! 
19_149_1_Haleluya! Hlabelelani kuJehova igama elisha, indumiso yakhe emhlanganweni wabangcwele. 
19_149_2_U-Israyeli makathokoze ngowamEnzayo, abantwana baseSiyoni bethabele iNkosi yabo. 
19_149_3_Mabadumise igama lakhe ngokusina, bamhubele ngesigubhu nehabhu. 
19_149_4_Ngokuba uJehova uyathokoza ngabantu bakhe; abathobekileyo uyabahlobisa ngensindiso. 
19_149_5_Abalungileyo mabethabe ngobukhosi, 
19_149_6_Ukumphakamisa uNkulunkulu makube semlonyeni wabo, nenkemba esika nhlangothi zombili esandleni sabo, 
19_149_7_ukuba benze impindiselo kubo abezizwe nezijeziso kubantu, 
19_149_8_babophe amakhosi abo ngamaketanga nabadumileyo babo ngezibopho zensimbi, 
19_149_9_bafeze phezu kwabo isahlulelo esilotshiweyo; kuludumo kubo bonke abangcwele bakhe. Haleluya! 
19_150_1_Haleluya! Dumisani uNkulunkulu endlini yakhe engcwele, nimdumise emkhathini wakhe wamandla. 
19_150_2_Mdumiseni ngenxa yezenzo zakhe zamandla, nimdumise ngenxa yobukhosi bakhe obukhulu. 
19_150_3_Mdumiseni ngezwi lecilongo, nimdumise ngogubhu nehabhu. 
19_150_4_Mdumiseni ngesigubhu nokusina, nimdumise ngezingubhu ezinezintambo eziyishumi nemitshingo. 
19_150_5_Mdumiseni ngamasimbali ancencethayo, nimdumise ngezinsimbi ezikhencezayo. 
19_150_6_Konke okuphefumulayo makudumise uJehova. Haleluya! 
20_1_1_Nazi izaga zika Solomoni indodana kaDavide, inkosi yakwa-Israyeli, 
20_1_2_zokwazi ukuhlakanipha nokulaywa, nokwahlukanisa amazwi okuqonda, 
20_1_3_nokwamukela ukulaywa kube ngukuhlakanipha, nokulunga, nokwahlulela, neqiniso, 
20_1_4_nokunika abangenalwazi ukuhlakanipha, nezinsizwa ukwazi namasu, 
20_1_5_ukuze ohlakaniphileyo ezwe, aqhubeke ekufundeni, noqondileyo athole iziluleko ezinhle 
20_1_6_ukuba aqonde izaga nezimfihlakalo, namazwi abahlakaniphileyo nezimfumbe zabo. 
20_1_7_Ukumesaba uJehova kungukuqala kokuhlakanipha; iziwula ziyadelela ukuhlakanipha nokulaywa. 
20_1_8_Ndodana yami, yizwa ukulaya kukayihlo, ungawushiyi umthetho kanyoko, 
20_1_9_ngokuba kuyakuba ngumqhele omuhle wekhanda lakho, nemigexo entanyeni yakho. 
20_1_10_Ndodana yami, uma izoni zikuyenga, ungavumi. 
20_1_11_Uma zithi: “Hamba nathi, siqamekele igazi, sibhacele ngeze ongenacala, 
20_1_12_sibagwinye besezwa njengendawo yabafileyo, besaphilile njengabehlela egodini; 
20_1_13_yonke impahla eyigugu siyakuyifumana, sigcwalise izindlu zethu ngempango; 
20_1_14_yenza inkatho yakho phakathi kwethu, sibe nesikhwama sinye sonke,” 
20_1_15_ndodana yami, ungahambi nazo endleleni, unqande unyawo lwakho emikhondweni yazo, 
20_1_16_ngokuba izinyawo zazo zigijimela ebubini, zishesha ukuchitha igazi. 
20_1_17_Ngokuba inetha lenekelwe ize emehlweni azo zonke izinyoni. 
20_1_18_Kepha laba baqamekela elabo igazi, babhacela okwabo ukuphila. 
20_1_19_Zinjalo izindlela zabo bonke abaphanga impango; iyasusa ukuphila komniniyo. 
20_1_20_Ukuhlakanipha kuyamemeza emigwaqweni, kuyezwakalisa izwi lakho ezigcawini; 
20_1_21_emashashalazini emigwaqo kuyaduma; ngasezikhaleni zamasango omuzi kuyakhuluma amazwi akho okuthi: 
20_1_22_“Koze kube nini iziwula zithanda ubuwula, nezideleli zijabula ukudelela, neziwula zizonda ukwazi, na? 
20_1_23_Buyani ngokusola kwami; bhekani, ngiyakuthulula umoya wami phezu kwenu, nginazise amazwi ami. 
20_1_24_Ngokuba ngibizile, nala nina; ngelula isandla sami, akubangakho onakayo; 
20_1_25_kepha nichithile konke ukululeka kwami, anivumanga ukusola kwami; 
20_1_26_nami ngiyakuhleka ingozi yenu, ngiklolodele ukufika kwenikwesabayo, 
20_1_27_lapho kufika njengesivunguvungu lokho enikwesabayo, nengozi yenu iza njengesikhwishikhwishi, lapho nehlelwa ngukuhlupheka nosizi. 
20_1_28_“Khona bayakungibiza, kepha angiyikuphendula; bayakungifunisisa, kepha abayikungifumana 
20_1_29_ngenxa yokuba babezonda ukwazi, kabakhethanga ukwesaba uJehova, 
20_1_30_bengavumanga ukululeka kwami, bedelela konke ukusola kwami. 
20_1_31_Ngalokho bayakudla izithelo zendlela yabo, basuthe ngamacebo abo. 
20_1_32_Ngokuba ukuhlehla kwabangenalwazi kuyakubabulala, nokunganaki kweziwula kuyakubabhubhisa. 
20_1_33_Kepha ongilalelayo uyakuhlala elondekile, agcineke, angabi naluvalo ngokubi.” 
20_2_1_Ndodana yami, uma wamukela amazwi ami, uzibekelele imiyalo yami, 
20_2_2_ukuze ubeke indlebe yakho ekuhlakanipheni, uthobisele ekuqondeni inhliziyo yakho, 
20_2_3_yebo, uma ukhala ngengqondo, uzwakalisa izwi lakho ngokuqonda, 
20_2_4_uma ukufuna njengesiliva, ukuphenya njengamagugu afihliweyo, 
20_2_5_khona uyakuqonda ukumesaba uJehova, ufumane ukumazi uNkulunkulu. 
20_2_6_Ngokuba uJehova uyanika ukuhlakanipha; emlonyeni wakhe kuphuma ukwazi nokuqonda. 
20_2_7_Uyabekela abaqotho isibusiso, uyihawu kwabahamba bengenacala, 
20_2_8_egcina izindlela zokulunga, elondoloza imikhondo yabathembekileyo bakhe. 
20_2_9_Khona uyakuqonda ukulunga nokwahlulela, neqiniso, yebo, nezindlela zonke ezinhle. 
20_2_10_Ngokuba ukuhlakanipha kuyakungena enhliziyweni yakho, ukwazi kube mnandi emphefumulweni wakho. 
20_2_11_Amasu ayakukulinda, ukuqonda kukugcine, 
20_2_12_ukuze wophulwe endleleni yobubi nakubantu abakhuluma okuphambeneyo, 
20_2_13_abashiya imikhondo yobuqotho, ukuze bahambe ngezindlela zobumnyama; 
20_2_14_abathokoza ngokwenza okubi, bajabulele ukuphambana kobubi; 
20_2_15_abazindlela zabo ziyisigwegwe, nemikhondo yabo iphambene, 
20_2_16_ukuba wophulwe kowesifazane ondindayo nakuye owezizwe onamazwi athophayo, 
20_2_17_oshiya umngane wobusha bakhe, akhohlwe isivumelwano sikaNkulunkulu wakhe, 
20_2_18_ngokuba indlu yakhe ishonela ekufeni, nasezithunzini izindlela zakhe. 
20_2_19_Bonke abangena kuye ababuyi, bangafinyeleli ezindleleni zokuphila. 
20_2_20_Kanjalo uyakuhamba ezindleleni zabahle, ugcine imikhondo yabalungileyo. 
20_2_21_Ngokuba abaqotho bayakuhlala ezweni, abapheleleyo basale kulo. 
20_2_22_Kepha ababi bayakunqunywa ezweni, nabambuluzayo bayakusishulwa kulo. 
20_3_1_Ndodana yami, ungakhohlwa umthetho wami, kepha inhliziyo yakho mayigcine imiyalo yami, 
20_3_2_ngokuba iyakwenezela kuwe ubude bezinsuku, neminyaka yokuphila, nokuthula. 
20_3_3_Isihhe neqiniso makungakushiyi; kubophe entanyeni yakho, ukulobe esibhebheni senhliziyo yakho, 
20_3_4_ukuze uthole umusa nodumo oluhle emehlweni kaNkulunkulu nabantu. 
20_3_5_Themba kuJehova ngayo yonke inhliziyo yakho, ungenciki kokwakho ukuqonda. 
20_3_6_Mazise yena ezindleleni zakho zonke, uyakuqondisa imikhondo yakho. 
20_3_7_Ungabi ngohlakaniphileyo emehlweni akho; mesabe uJehova, udede ebubini. 
20_3_8_Lokho kuyakuba yimpilo emzimbeni wakho nokuhlunyelelwa kwamathambo akho. 
20_3_9_Dumisa uJehova ngempahla yakho, nangolibo lwazo zonke izithelo zakho, 
20_3_10_izinqolobane zakho zigcwale ngobuningi, nezikhamo zakho zichichime ngewayini elisha. 
20_3_11_Ndodana yami, ungadeleli ukulaya kukaJehova, ungakhathazeki ngokusola kwakhe. 
20_3_12_Ngokuba uJehova uyamlaya amthandayo, njengoyise indodana ayithandayo. 
20_3_13_Ubusisiwe umuntu othola ukuhlakanipha nomuntu ozuza ingqondo, 
20_3_14_ngokuba inzuzo yakho inhle kunenzuzo yesiliva, nokutholakalayo kukho kunegolide. 
20_3_15_Kuyigugu kunamarubi, nakho konke ongakufisa akunakulinganiswa nakho. 
20_3_16_Ubude bezinsuku busesandleni sakho sokunene, nakwesokhohlo kukhona ingcebo nodumo. 
20_3_17_Izindlela zakho ziyizindlela zokumnandi; yonke imikhondo yakho ingukuthula. 
20_3_18_Kungumuthi wokuphila kwabakubambayo, nababambelela kukho babusisiwe. 
20_3_19_UJehova wasekela umhlaba ngokuhlakanipha; wamisa amazulu ngokuqonda. 
20_3_20_Ngokwazi kwakhe izintwa zaqhekezwa, namafu aconsa amazolo. 
20_3_21_Ndodana yami, lokho makungasuki emehlweni akho, ugcine ukuhlakanipha namasu, 
20_3_22_kube ngukuphila emphefumulweni wakho nomusa entanyeni yakho. 
20_3_23_Khona uyakuhamba indlela yakho ngokulondeka, ungaqhuzuli unyawo lwakho. 
20_3_24_Lapho ulala phansi, awuyikwesaba lutho; nanxa usulale phansi, ubuthongo bakho buyakuba mnandi. 
20_3_25_Ungethuswa luvalo oluzumayo nokuchithwa kwababi, lapho kufika, 
20_3_26_ngokuba uJehova uyakuba yithemba lakho, agcine unyawo lwakho ukuba lungabhajwa. 
20_3_27_Ungagodleli abaninikho okuhle, lapho kusemandleni esandla sakho ukukwenza. 
20_3_28_Ungasho kumakhelwane wakho ukuthi: “Hamba, ubuye, ngiyakukunika kusasa,” lapho kukhona kuwe. 
20_3_29_Ungacebi okubi ngomakhelwane wakho, lapho ehlezi nawe elondekile. 
20_3_30_Ungaphikisani namuntu ngeze, uma engakonanga ngalutho. 
20_3_31_Ungabi namhawu ngomuntu oyisidlwangudlwangu, ungakhethi neyodwa yezindlela zakhe, 
20_3_32_ngokuba ophambeneyo uyisinengiso kuJehova. kepha abaqotho bayisifuba sakhe. 
20_3_33_Isiqalekiso sikaJehova sisendlini yababi, kepha uyabusisa ikhaya labalungileyo. 
20_3_34_Izideleli uyazidelela, kepha abathobekileyo ubapha umusa. 
20_3_35_Abahlakaniphileyo bayakudla ifa lodumo, kepha iziwula ziyakuphiwa ihlazo. 
20_4_1_Zwanini, madodana ami, ukulaya kukayise, nilalele, ukuze nazi ukuqonda. 
20_4_2_Ngokuba ngiyaninika izifundiso ezinhle; ningawushiyi umthetho wami. 
20_4_3_Ngokuba ngangiyindodana kubaba, ethambileyo neyodwa emehlweni kamame. 
20_4_4_Wangifundisa, wathi kimi: “Inhliziyo yakho mayibambe amazwi ami; gcina imiyalo yami, uphile. 
20_4_5_Zuza ukuhlakanipha, zuza ukuqonda; ungakhohlwa, ungachezuki emazwini omlomo wami; 
20_4_6_ungakushiyi, kuyakukugcina; kuthande, kuyakukulondoloza. 
20_4_7_Ukuqala kokuhlakanipha yilokhu: Zuza ukuhlakanipha; yebo, ngakho konke okutholileyo zuza ukuhlakanipha. 
20_4_8_Kukhulise, kuyakukuphakamisa; kuyakukudumisa, lapho ukugona. 
20_4_9_Kuyakunika ikhanda lakho umgexo womusa, kunikeze kuwe umqhele wodumo.” 
20_4_10_Yizwa, ndodana yami, wamukele izwi lami; kuyakuthi iminyaka yokuphila kwakho ibe miningi. 
20_4_11_Ngikufundisa ngendlela yokuhlakanipha; ngikuhola emikhondweni yobuqotho. 
20_4_12_Ekuhambeni kwakho isinyathelo asiyikuvinjelwa, nasekugijimeni kwakho awuyikukhubeka. 
20_4_13_Bambelela ekulayweni, ungakuyeki; kulonde, ngokuba kungukuphila kwakho. 
20_4_14_Ungangeni emkhondweni wababi, ungahambi endleleni yabonakeleyo. 
20_4_15_Yixwaye, ungadluli ngayo; chezuka kuyo, udlule. 
20_4_16_Ngokuba abalali, uma bengenzanga okubi; ubuthongo buyasuswa, uma bengakhubekisanga muntu. 
20_4_17_Ngokuba badla isinkwa sobubi, baphuza iwayini lobudlwangudlwangu. 
20_4_18_Umkhondo wabalungileyo unjengokukhanya kokusa okuqhubeka ngokukhanya njalo kuze kube semini. 
20_4_19_Indlela yababi injengobumnyama; abazi ukuthi bakhubeka ngani. 
20_4_20_Ndodana yami, lalela amazwi ami, ubeke indlebe yakho kukho ukukhuluma kwami. 
20_4_21_Makungachezuki emehlweni akho, ukugcine phakathi kwenhliziyo yakho, 
20_4_22_ngokuba kungukuphila kwabakufumanayo nempilo yomzimba wonke wabo. 
20_4_23_Phezu kwakho konke okugcinayo, gcina inhliziyo yakho, ngokuba kuyilapho kuvela khona ukuphila. 
20_4_24_Susa kuwe ukuphambana komlomo, nezindebe eziyisigwegwe uzidedisele kude nawe. 
20_4_25_Amehlo akho mawabheke phambili, nezinkophe zakho maziqonde phambi kwakho. 
20_4_26_Yenza umkhondo wonyawo lwakho ukuba ulingane, ziqine zonke izindlela zakho. 
20_4_27_Ungaphambuki ngakwesokunene nangakwesokhohlo; chezukisa unyawo lwakho ebubini. 
20_5_1_Ndodana yami, lalela ukuhlakanipha kwami, ubeke indlebe yakho ekuqondeni kwami 
20_5_2_ukuba ugcine amasu, nezindebe zakho zilonde ukwazi. 
20_5_3_Ngokuba izindebe zowesifazane ondindayo ziconsa izinyosi; umlomo wakhe ubushelezi kunamafutha. 
20_5_4_Kepha ekugcineni umunyu njengomhlonyane, ubukhali njengenkemba enezinhlangothi ezimbili. 
20_5_5_Izinyawo zakhe ziyehlela ekufeni; izinyathelo zakhe zibambelela endaweni yabafileyo. 
20_5_6_Akanaki umkhondo wokuphila; imikhondo yakhe iyaguquguquka, engazi. 
20_5_7_Ngalokho, madodana ami, ngizweni, ningachezuki emazwini omlomo wami. 
20_5_8_Dedisela kude naye indlela yakho, ungasondeli emnyango wendlu yakhe, 
20_5_9_funa unike abanye udumo lwakho, naye ononya iminyaka yakho, 
20_5_10_funa abezizwe basuthe ngamandla akho, umshikashika wakho ube sendlini yomfokazi, 
20_5_11_uze ububule ekugcineni, lapho umzimba wakho nenyama yakho kuqediwe, 
20_5_12_ngokuthi: “Yeka ukuzonda kwami ukulaywa nokudelela kwenhliziyo yami ukusolwa! 
20_5_13_Angilalelanga izwi labafundisi bami, angibekanga indlebe yami kubo abangifundisayo. 
20_5_14_Ngacishe ngaba sebubini bonke phakathi kwebandla nasemhlanganweni.” 
20_5_15_Phuza amanzi emgodini wakho, amanzi agobhozayo emthonjeni wakho. 
20_5_16_Imithombo iyaphalala ngaphandle yini, nemifula yamanzi ezigcawini, na? 
20_5_17_Mayibe ngeyakho wena wedwa, ingabi ngeyabafokazi kanye nawe. 
20_5_18_Mawubusiswe umthombo wakho, uthokoze ngomfazi wobusha bakho. 
20_5_19_Uyindluzelekazi ethandayo negogokazi elihle; amabele akhe mawakudelise ngesikhathi sonke, weqiwe njalo luthando lwakhe. 
20_5_20_Ubuyakweqelwani ngowesifazane ondindayo, ndodana yami, ugone isifuba somfokazi, na? 
20_5_21_Ngokuba izindlela zomuntu ziphambi kwamehlo kaNkulunkulu; uyenza yonke imikhondo yakhe ukuba ilingane. 
20_5_22_Omubi uyakubanjwa ngububi bakhe, abhajwe ngezintambo zezono zakhe. 
20_5_23_Uyakufa yena ngokuswela ukulaywa, nangobuningi bobuwula bakhe uyakuduka. 
20_6_1_Ndodana yami, uma uyisibambiso somakhelwane wakho, uma uxhawulene nomfokazi, 
20_6_2_ucushiwe ngamazwi omlomo wakho, ubanjiwe ngamazwi omlomo wakho, 
20_6_3_yenza lokhu phela, ndodana yami, uzophule, lokhu ungene esandleni somakhelwane wakho: khothama phambi kwakhe, umncengisise. 
20_6_4_Unganiki amehlo akho ubuthongo, nezinkophe zakho ukozela. 
20_6_5_Zophule njengensephe kumzingeli nanjengenyoni esandleni somthiyi wezinyoni. 
20_6_6_Yana entuthwaneni, vilandini, ubone izindlela zayo, uhlakaniphe, 
20_6_7_yona ethi ingenamahluleli, nambonisi, nambusi, 
20_6_8_ilungisa nokho ehlobo isinkwa sayo, ibuthe ngesikhathi sokuvuna ukudla kwayo. 
20_6_9_Uyakulala kuze kube nini, vilandini? Uyakuvuka nini ebuthongweni bakho na? 
20_6_10_Ubuthongo obuncane, ukozela okuncane, ukusonga izandla kancane kuze kulalwe, 
20_6_11_bese kuthi ubumpofu bakho bufike njengomhambuma, nokuswela kwakho njengomuntu wesihlangu. 
20_6_12_Umuntu omubi, umuntu wokona, nguye ohamba nomlomo ophambeneyo, 
20_6_13_oqwayiza amehlo, eshudula ngezinyawo zakhe, ekhomba ngeminwe. 
20_6_14_Ubuphoxo busenhliziyweni yakhe; uceba okubi ngesikhathi sonke; ususa ukuxabana. 
20_6_15_Ngalokho ingozi yakhe iyakufika ngokuzumayo; ngokuphazima kweso uyakwaphulwa, kungabikho ukuphiliswa. 
20_6_16_Kukhona izinto eziyisithupha azizondayo uJehova, yebo, eziyisikhombisa eziyizinengiso emphefumulweni wakhe: 
20_6_17_amehlo azidlayo, nolimi lwamanga, nezandla ezichitha igazi elingenacala, 
20_6_18_nenhliziyo eceba imicabango emibi, nezinyawo ezishesha ukugijimela ebubini, 
20_6_19_nofakazi wamanga ophafuza inkohliso, obanga ukuxabana phakathi kwabazalwane. 
20_6_20_Ndodana yami, gcina umyalo kayihlo, ungawushiyi umthetho kanyoko. 
20_6_21_Yibophe enhliziyweni yakho njalo, uyithekeleze entanyeni yakho. 
20_6_22_Mayikuhole ekuhambeni kwakho, ikulondoloze ekulaleni kwakho, ikhulume kuwe ekuvukeni kwakho. 
20_6_23_Ngokuba imiyalo iyisibani, nomthetho ungukukhanya, nokusola ngokulaya kuyindlela yokuphila, 
20_6_24_ukuze ugcinwe kowesifazane omubi, nasekuthopheni kolimi lowesifazane ondindayo. 
20_6_25_Ungakhanuki ubuhle bakhe enhliziyweni yakho, angakubambi ngezinkophe zakhe. 
20_6_26_Ngokuba intengo yowesifazane oyisiphingi iyiqebelengwane lesinkwa, kepha umfazi womuntu uzingela umphefumulo onqabileyo. 
20_6_27_Umuntu angaphatha umlilo esifubeni sakhe, izingubo zakhe zingashi, na? 
20_6_28_Umuntu angahamba phezu kwamalahle avuthayo, izinyawo zakhe zingahanguki, na? 
20_6_29_Unjalo yena ongena kumkamakhelwane: akuyikuthiwa ongenacala noma yimuphi omthintileyo. 
20_6_30_Abamdeleli yini oyisela ukuthi uyeba ukuba azisuthise lapho elambile na? 
20_6_31_Uma efunyanwa, uyakubuyisa kasikhombisa, anikeze yonke impahla yendlu yakhe. 
20_6_32_Ophinga nowesifazane akanakho ukuqonda; wenza lokho okuchitha umphefumulo wakhe. 
20_6_33_Uyakuthola imivimbo nehlazo, nenhlamba yakhe ayiyikwesulwa. 
20_6_34_Ngokuba isikhwele sendoda singukufutheka; ayiyikuyeka ngosuku lokuphindisela. 
20_6_35_Ayiyikunaka neze ihlawulo; ayaneliswa, noma uphana ngezipho eziningi. 
20_7_1_Ndodana yami, gcina amazwi ami, uzibekelele imiyalo yami. 
20_7_2_Gcina imiyalo yami, uphile, nomthetho wami njengenhlamvu yeso lakho. 
20_7_3_Yibophe eminweni yakho, uyilobe esibhebheni senhliziyo yakho. 
20_7_4_Yisho kukho ukuhlakanipha: “Ungudadewethu,” ubize ukuqonda ngokuthi owazana nawe, 
20_7_5_ukuze bakugcine kowesifazane ondindayo, kumfokazi owenza bushelezi amazwi akhe. 
20_7_6_Ngokuba efasiteleni lendlu yami ngalunguza eheleni lami, 
20_7_7_ngabheka phakathi kwabangenalwazi, ngabona phakathi kwabasha insizwa engenakuqonda, 
20_7_8_edlula esitaladini eduze negumbi lakhe. iya endleleni yendlu yakhe, 
20_7_9_sekuhwelela kusihlwa, esigayegayeni sobusuku nobumnyama. 
20_7_10_Bheka, isihlangabezwa ngowesifazane; izingubo zakhe zingezesifebe, enobuqili enhliziyweni. 
20_7_11_Uyanyakaza engenakuthula; izinyawo zakhe azihlali endlini yakhe; 
20_7_12_manje usemigwaqweni, nangu usezigcawini, uqamekela emagumbini onke. 
20_7_13_Useyayibamba, uyayanga; uthwala amehlo, uthi kuyo: 
20_7_14_“Imihlatshelo yeminikelo yokuthula yayingifanele; namuhla sengigcwalisile izithembiso zami. 
20_7_15_Ngalokho ngiphumile ukukuhlangabeza ukuba ngifunisise ubuso bakho; sengikutholile. 
20_7_16_Ngendlele umbhede wami ngezindwangu zokumboza, nelineni elinemishwe laseGibithe. 
20_7_17_Ngifafazile umbhede wami ngemure, nangomhlaba, nangokinamona. 
20_7_18_Woza sizanelise ngothando kuze kuse, sijabule ngokuthandana. 
20_7_19_Ngokuba indoda yami ayikho ekhaya; ihambile uhambo olude; 
20_7_20_yaphatha isikhwama semali ngesandla sayo; iyakubuyela ekhaya ngosuku lokuhlangana kwenyanga.” 
20_7_21_Uyamphambukisa ngamazwi akhe amaningi amahle; ngokuthopha kwezindebe zakhe uyamyenga. 
20_7_22_Uyamlandela masinyane njengenkabi iya ekuhlatshweni nanjengamaketanga ehlela isiboshwa esiyisiwula, 
20_7_23_umcibisholo uze uhlabe isibindi sakhe njengenyoni isheshela ogibeni, ingazi ukuthi lubekelwe ukuphila kwayo. 
20_7_24_Ngalokho, bantwana, ngizweni, nilalele amazwi omlomo wami. 
20_7_25_Inhliziyo yakho mayingaphambukeli ezindleleni zakhe, ungahambi emikhondweni yakhe. 
20_7_26_Ngokuba uwisile phansi abaningi abalimeleyo; ababuleweyo bakhe bayisixuku esikhulu. 
20_7_27_Indlu yakhe iyindlela eya endawemi yabafileyo, yehlela emakamelweni okufa. 
20_8_1_Ukuhlakanipha akumemezi yini, nokuqonda akukhiphi izwi lakho na? 
20_8_2_Kumi esiqongweni sezindawo eziphakemeyo, ngasendleleni phakathi kwemikhondo. 
20_8_3_Ngaseceleni kwamasango, ngasekungeneni komuzi, lapho kungenwa ngeminyango, kuyamemeza ngokuthi: 
20_8_4_“Ngiyanibiza nina madoda; izwi lami likumadodana abantu. 
20_8_5_Qondani ukuhlakanipha nina eningenalwazi; nani ziwula, manibe nenhliziyo eqondileyo. 
20_8_6_Zwanini, ngokuba ngiyakulanda okukhulu; ukukhamisa kwezindebe zami kuyakuba ngokulungileyo. 
20_8_7_Ngokuba umlomo wami uyakukhuluma iqiniso; ububi buyisinengiso ezindebeni zami. 
20_8_8_Onke amazwi omlomo wami asekulungeni; akukho okuyisigwegwe nokuphambeneyo kuwo. 
20_8_9_Aqondile onke koqondayo; alungile kothola ukwazi. 
20_8_10_Yamukelani ukufundisa kwami kunesiliva, nokwazi kunegolide elikhethekileyo. 
20_8_11_Ngokuba ukuhlakanipha kuhle kunamarubi, nakho konke okungafiswa akunakulinganiswa nakho. 
20_8_12_Mina kuhlakanipha ngakhile ekuqondeni, ngithola ukwazi namasu. 
20_8_13_Ukumesaba uJehova kungukuzonda okubi; ukuzidla, nokuzikhukhumeza, nendlela embi, nomlomo wobuphoxo, ngiyakuzonda. 
20_8_14_Kimina kukhona ukululeka nempumelelo; ngingukuqonda, nginamandla. 
20_8_15_Amakhosi abusa ngami, nababusi bamisa ukulunga. 
20_8_16_Izikhulu zibusa ngami, namakhosana, bonke abahluleli bomhlaba. 
20_8_17_Ngiyathanda abangithandayo; abangifunayo bayakungifumana. 
20_8_18_Ingcebo nodumo kukimi, ukunotha okumiyo nokulunga. 
20_8_19_Isithelo sami sihle kunegolide, kunegolide elicwengekileyo, nenzuzo yami kunesiliva elikhethekileyo. 
20_8_20_Ngiyahamba endleleni yokulunga, phakathi kwemikhondo yokwahlulela, 
20_8_21_ukuze ngenze abangithandayo badle ifa lemfuyo, ngigcwalise izindlu zabo zengcebo. 
20_8_22_“UJehova wangidala ngingukuqala kwendlela yakhe ngaphambi kwemisebenzi yamandulo. 
20_8_23_Ngamiswa kwaphakade kwasekuqaleni, umhlaba ungakabikho. 
20_8_24_Lungakabikho utwa ngazalwa, ingakabikho imithombo egcwele amanzi. 
20_8_25_Zingakasekelwa izintaba, namagquma engakabikho, ngazalwa, 
20_8_26_engakawenzi umhlaba namasimu, nokuqala kothuli lwezwe. 
20_8_27_Ekulungiseni kwakhe izulu ngangikhona, nasekudwebeni kwakhe umkhathi ebusweni botwa. 
20_8_28_Lapho enza ukuba isibhakabhaka phezulu siqine, nemithombo yotwa iphuphume ngamandla, 
20_8_29_lapho emisela ulwandle umncele, ukuze amanzi angeqi izwi lakhe, nalapho emisa izisekelo zomhlaba, 
20_8_30_khona nganginaye ngiyingcweti yomsebenzi, ngiyintokozo yakhe imihla ngemihla, ngijabula phambi kwakhe isikhathi sonke, 
20_8_31_ngijabula ezweni lomhlaba wakhe, intokozo yami ikanye namadodana abantu. 
20_8_32_“Ngalokho, bantwana, ngizweni, ngokuba babusisiwe abagcina izindlela zami. 
20_8_33_Yizwani ukulaya, nihlakaniphe, ningakwenqabi. 
20_8_34_Ubusisiwe umuntu ongizwayo, elinda imihla ngemihla ngasemasangweni ami, ehlala ngasezinsikeni zeminyango yami. 
20_8_35_Ngokuba ongifumanayo, ufumana ukuphila, azuze umusa kuJehova. 
20_8_36_Ongangifumani uyona umphefumulo wakhe; bonke abangizondayo bathanda ukufa.” 
20_9_1_Ukuhlakanipha kwakhile indlu yakho; kuzibazile izinsika zakho eziyisikhombisa. 
20_9_2_Kuhlabile umhlatshelo, kuvubele iwayini lakho; futhi kulungisile itafula lakho. 
20_9_3_Kuthumile izintombi zakho, kuyamema emagqumeni aphakemeyo omuzi, kuthi: 
20_9_4_“Ongenalwazi makaphambukele lapha,” kongenangqondo kuthi: 
20_9_5_“Wozani nidle isinkwa sami, niliphuze iwayini engilivubeleyo. 
20_9_6_Yekani ubuwula, niphile, nihambe ngendlela yokuqonda. 
20_9_7_“Osola isideleli uzithathela inhlamba; othethisa omubi uzitholela isisihla. 
20_9_8_Ungathethisi isideleli, funa sikuzonde; thethisa isihlakaniphi, siyakukuthanda. 
20_9_9_Siphe isihlakaniphi, siyakwanda ngokuhlakanipha; fundisa olungileyo, uyakwenezela emfundweni. 
20_9_10_“Ukuqala kokuhlakanipha kungukumesaba uJehova, nokumazi oNgcwele kungukuqonda. 
20_9_11_Ngokuba ngami izinsuku zakho ziyakuba ziningi, neminyaka yokuphila kwakho iyakwenezelwa kuwe. 
20_9_12_Uma uhlakaniphile, uzihlakaniphele; uma udelela, uyakukuthwala wena wedwa.” 
20_9_13_Ubuwula bungowesifazane oyisithutha onomsindo, ongazi lutho. 
20_9_14_Uhlezi ngasemnyango wendlu yakhe esihlalweni ezindaweni eziphakemeyo zomuzi 
20_9_15_ukuba ameme abadlula endleleni, abaqonda emikhondweni yabo, ngokuthi: 
20_9_16_“Ongenalwazi makaphambukele lapha,” kongenangqondo uthi: 
20_9_17_“Amanzi ebiweyo amnandi, nesinkwa sentukuso singesenamisayo.” 
20_9_18_Kepha akazi ukuthi kuyizithunzi ezilapho nokuthi izimenywa zakhe zisezigodini zendawo yabafileyo. 
20_10_1_Nazi izaga zikaSolomoni: Indodana ehlakaniphileyo ithokozisa uyise, kepha indodana eyisiwula ilusizi kunina. 
20_10_2_Ingcebo yobubi ayisizi lutho, kepha ukulunga kophula ekufeni. 
20_10_3_UJehova akavumi ukuba olungileyo alambe, kepha isifiso somubi uyasihlohloloza. 
20_10_4_Isandla esinobudenge siveza ubumpofu, kepha isandla sokukhuthala siyacebisa. 
20_10_5_Obutha ehlobo uyindodana ehlakaniphileyo; olele ubuthongo ngesikhathi sokuvuna uyindodana ehlazisayo. 
20_10_6_Izibusiso zisekhanda lolungileyo, kepha umlomo wababi uyafihla ubudlwangudlwangu. 
20_10_7_Ukukhunjulwa kolungileyo kubusisekile, kepha igama lababi liyabola. 
20_10_8_Ohlakaniphile ngenhliziyo uyakwamukela imiyalo, kepha isiwula esiphoshozayo siyakuwiswa. 
20_10_9_Ohamba ngobuqotho uhamba ngokulondeka, kepha ohlanekezela izindlela zakhe uyakwaziwa. 
20_10_10_Oqwayiza iso ubanga usizi, kepha osola ubuso nobuso uveza ukuthula. 
20_10_11_Umlomo wolungileyo ungumthombo wokuphila, kepha umlomo wababi ufihla ubudlwangudlwangu. 
20_10_12_Inzondo iyabanga ukuxabana, kepha uthando luyasibekela iziphambeko zonke. 
20_10_13_Ezindebeni zoqondileyo kufunyanwa ukuhlakanipha, kepha uswazi lungolomhlane wongenangqondo. 
20_10_14_Abahlakaniphileyo bayabekelela ukwazi, kepha umlomo wesiwula uyincithakalo eseduze. 
20_10_15_Imfuyo yesicebi ingumuzi waso onamandla; incithakalo yabampofu ingubumpofu babo. 
20_10_16_Umsebenzi wolungileyo ungowokuphila; inzuzo yababi ingeyokona. 
20_10_17_Onaka ukulaywa usendleleni yokuphila, kepha owenqaba ukusolwa uyaduka. 
20_10_18_Ofihla inzondo unezindebe zamanga; ophumisa inhlebo uyisiwula. 
20_10_19_Lapho amazwi emaningi khona, akuphuthi ukuphambeka; obamba umlomo wakhe uhlakaniphile. 
20_10_20_Ulimi lolungileyo luyisiliva elikhethekileyo; ingqondo yababi iyinto encane. 
20_10_21_Izindebe zolungileyo ziyondla abaningi, kepha iziwula ziyafa ngokuswela ingqondo. 
20_10_22_Isibusiso sikaJehova siyacebisa; akenezeli usizi kuso. 
20_10_23_Ukwenza okubi kunjengokudlala kuso isiwula; kunjalo ukuhlakanipha kumuntu onengqondo. 
20_10_24_Akwesabayo omubi kuyamehlela, nabakufisayo abalungileyo bayakuphiwa. 
20_10_25_Lapho sidlula isivunguvungu, akasekho omubi, kepha olungileyo uyisisekelo esingunaphakade. 
20_10_26_Njengoviniga emazinyweni nomusi emehlweni, linjalo ivila kwabalithumileyo. 
20_10_27_Ukumesaba uJehova kuyandisa izinsuku, kepha iminyaka yababi iyancishiswa. 
20_10_28_Ithemba labalungileyo liyakuba yintokozo, kepha abakwethembayo ababi kuyakubhubha. 
20_10_29_Indlela kaJehova iyinqaba kopheleleyo, kepha incithakalo ikubenzi bokona. 
20_10_30_Olungileyo akayikunyakaziswa kuze kube phakade, kepha ababi abayikuhlala ezweni.
