20_10_31_Umlomo wolungileyo uyathela ukuhlakanipha, kepha ulimi oluphambeneyo luyakunqunywa. 
20_10_32_Izindebe zolungileyo ziyakwazi okuhle, kepha umlomo wababi okuphambeneyo. 
20_11_1_Isilinganiso esikhohlisayo siyisinengiso kuJehova, kepha isisindo esiyiso siyintokozo yakhe. 
20_11_2_Lapho kufika ukuziqhenya, kufika nehlazo; kepha kwabathobekileyo kukhona ukuhlakanipha. 
20_11_3_Ukuphelela kwabaqotho kuyabahola, kepha ukuphambanisa kwabambuluzayo kuyabachitha. 
20_11_4_Ingcebo ayisizi ngosuku lolaka, kepha ukulunga kophula ekufeni. 
20_11_5_Ukulunga kopheleleyo kuqondisa indlela yakhe, kepha omubi uyakuwa ngobubi bakhe. 
20_11_6_Ukulunga kwabaqotho kuyabophula, kepha abambuluzayo babanjwa ezifisweni zabo. 
20_11_7_Akwethembayo umuntu omubi kuyaphela ekufeni kwakhe, nethemba lobubi liyabhubha. 
20_11_8_Olungileyo uyakhululwa osizini, kepha omubi ungena esikhundleni sakhe. 
20_11_9_Ngomlomo umuntu ongenaNkulunkulu ubulala umakhelwane wakhe, kepha abalungileyo bayakhululwa ngokwazi. 
20_11_10_Nxa abalungileyo behlezi kahle, umuzi uyathokoza; lapho bebhubha, kukhona ukwenanela. 
20_11_11_Ngesibusiso sabaqotho umuzi uyaphakanyiswa, kepha ngomlomo wababi uyachithwa. 
20_11_12_Odelela umakhelwane wakhe akanakuhlakanipha, kepha umuntu onengqondo uyazithulela. 
20_11_13_Ohamba encetheza uyambula izimfihlakalo, kepha othembekile emoyeni uyayisibekela indaba. 
20_11_14_Lapho kungekho iziluleko, abantu bayawa, kepha lapho kukhona abeluleki abaningi, lapho kukhona ukuphumelela. 
20_11_15_Uyahlupheka nokuhlupheka omela umfokazi, kepha ozonda ukunika isibambiso ulondekile. 
20_11_16_Owesifazane onomusa uzuza udumo, nezidlwangudlwangu zizuza ingcebo. 
20_11_17_Umuntu onesihawu wenzela okuhle umphefumulo wakhe, kepha ononya uhlupha inyama yakhe. 
20_11_18_Omubi uthola inzuzo yenkohliso, kepha ohlwanyela ukulunga unomvuzo oqinisekileyo. 
20_11_19_Oqinile ekulungeni uyakuphila, kepha olandela okubi, kuyakuba ngukufa kwakhe. 
20_11_20_Abanhliziyo ephambeneyo bayisinengiso kuJehova. kepha abapheleleyo endleleni yabo bayintokozo kuye. 
20_11_21_Impela omubi akayekwa, kepha inzalo yabalungileyo iyakhululwa. 
20_11_22_Njengendandatho yegolide empumulweni yengulube, unjalo owesifazane omuhle ongenangqondo. 
20_11_23_Isifiso sabalungileyo singokuhle kuphela; ithemba lababi lilulaka. 
20_11_24_Ukhona ohlakazayo; nokho uyenezelwa kakhulu; kepha ogodla kunokufaneleyo ubangelwa ukuswela kuphela. 
20_11_25_Umphefumulo ophanayo uyakukhuluphaliswa; ophuzisayo uyakuphuziswa naye. 
20_11_26_Ogodla amabele, abantu bayamqalekisa, kepha isibusiso siyakuba sekhanda lothengisa ngawo. 
20_11_27_Ofuna okuhle ufuna okwamukelekayo, kepha ofuna okubi, kuyakumehlela. 
20_11_28_Owethemba ingcebo yakhe uyakuwa, kepha abalungileyo bayakuhluma njengamaqabunga aluhlaza. 
20_11_29_Okhathaza indlu yakhe uyakudla ifa lomoya, nesiwula siyakuba yinceku yonenhliziyo ehlakaniphileyo. 
20_11_30_Isithelo solungileyo singumuthi wokuphila, nohlakaniphileyo uyazuza imiphefumulo. 
20_11_31_Bheka, olungileyo uyavuzwa emhlabeni; kakhulu kangakanani omubi nesoni. 
20_12_1_Othanda ukulaywa uthanda ukwazi; ozonda ukusolwa uyisiwula. 
20_12_2_Omuhle uthola umusa kuJehova, kepha umuntu wamacebo uyamlahla. 
20_12_3_Umuntu akanakuma ngobubi, kepha impande yabalungileyo ayiyikunyakaziswa. 
20_12_4_Owesifazane okhutheleyo ungumqhele kuyo indoda yakhe, kepha ohlazisayo unjengokubola kwamathambo ayo. 
20_12_5_Imicabango yabalungileyo ingeyokwahlulela, kepha iziluleko zababi ziyinkohliso. 
20_12_6_Amazwi ababi aqamekela igazi, kepha umlomo wabaqotho uyabophula. 
20_12_7_Ababi bayachithwa, bangabikho, kepha indlu yabalungileyo iyakuma.

20_18_11_Imfuyo yesicebi ingumuzi waso onamandla; injengogange oluphakemeyo emicabangweni yaso. 
20_18_12_Ngaphambi kokubhujiswa inhliziyo yomuntu iyaziqhenya; ukuthobeka kwandulela udumo. 
20_18_13_Obuyisa izwi engakezwa, kungubuwula nehlazo kuye. 
20_18_14_Umoya womuntu uyasekela ubuthakathaka bakhe, kepha ngubani ongathwala umoya owaphukileyo na? 
20_18_15_Inhliziyo yoqondileyo iyazuza ukwazi, nezindlebe zabalungileyo ziyafuna ukwazi. 
20_18_16_Isipho somuntu siyamenzela indawo, simholele kwabakhulu. 
20_18_17_Ongowokuqala ecaleni lakhe usengathi ulungile, kepha umakhelwane wakhe ufika, amphenye. 
20_18_18_Inkatho iyaqeda ukuxabana, yahlukanise phakathi kwabanamandla. 
20_18_19_Umzalwane owoniweyo ulukhuni kunomuzi onamandla, nokuxabana kunjengemigoqo yenqaba. 
20_18_20_Isisu somuntu siyasutha ngesithelo somlomo wakhe, saneliswe ngokuthela kwezindebe zakhe. 
20_18_21_Ukufa nokuphila kusemandleni olimi, nabaluthandayo bayakudla izithelo zalo. 
20_18_22_Ofumana umfazi uthola okuhle; uzuzile isisa kuJehova. 
20_18_23_Ompofu ukhuluma ngokuncenga, kepha isicebi siphendula kalukhuni. 
20_18_24_Umuntu wabangane uyazilimaza, kepha kukhona abangane ababambelela kuneselamani. 
20_19_1_Ungcono ompofu ohamba ekupheleleni kwakhe kunophambene ngezindebe zakhe eyisiwula. 
20_19_2_Futhi akulungile ukuba umphefumulo ungabi nakwazi; oshesha ngezinyawo uyaduka. 
20_19_3_Ubuwula bomuntu buchitha indlela yakhe, kepha inhliziyo yakhe iyamthukuthelela uJehova. 
20_19_4_Imfuyo iyenezela abangane abaningi, kepha ompofu uyashiywa ngumngane wakhe. 
20_19_5_Ufakazi wamanga akayekwa, nophafuza amanga akayikusinda. 
20_19_6_Baningi abancenga izikhulu; bonke bangabangane bomuntu wezipho. 
20_19_7_Bonke abazalwane bompofu bayamzonda; kakhulu kangakanani abangane badedela kude naye; uyabaxosha ngamazwi, kepha awasekho. 
20_19_8_Ozuza ukuqonda uthanda umphefumulo wakhe; ogcina ingqondo uyakufumana okuhle. 
20_19_9_Ufakazi wamanga akayekwa, nophafuza amanga uyakubhubha. 
20_19_10_Ukutamasa akufanele isiwula; kakhulu kangakanani akufanele ukuba inceku ibuse phezu kwezikhulu. 
20_19_11_Ukuhlakanipha komuntu kubambezela intukuthelo yakhe; kuludumo lwakhe ukudlula esiphambekweni. 
20_19_12_Ukufutheka kwenkosi kunjengokubhonga kwengonyama, kepha isihhe sayo sinjengamazolo etshanini. 
20_19_13_Indodana eyisiwula iyinhlupheko kayise, nokuxabana komfazi kungukuconsa njalonjalo. 
20_19_14_Indlu nemfuyo kuyifa elivela koyise, kepha umfazi ohlakaniphileyo uvela kuJehova. 
20_19_15_Ubuvila bushonisa ebuthongweni obunzima, nesidenge siyalamba. 
20_19_16_Ogcina umyalo ulonda umphefumulo wakhe, kepha onganaki izindlela zakhe uyakufa. 
20_19_17_Onomusa kompofu utsheleka uJehova, nomsebenzi wakhe uyawubuyisela kuye. 
20_19_18_Yilaye indodana yakho, lisekhona ithemba; ungabhekisi inhliziyo yakho ukuyibulala. 
20_19_19_Onolaka olukhulu uyathweswa ihlawulo, ngokuba uma umophula, umelwe ukukuphinda. 
20_19_20_Yizwa isiluleko, wamukele ukulaywa, ukuze uhlakaniphe ekugcineni. 
20_19_21_Kukhona amacebo amaningi enhliziyweni yomuntu, kepha isiluleko sikaJehova siyakuma. 
20_19_22_Ukuthandwa komuntu kubangwa ngumusa wakhe; ompofu ungcono kunomuntu wamanga. 
20_19_23_Ukumesaba uJehova kungokokuphila; onakho uhlezi anelisiwe, akahanjelwa ngububi. 
20_19_24_Ivila liyafaka isandla salo esitsheni; alisibuyiseli nasemlonyeni walo. 
20_19_25_Shaya isideleli, ongenalwazi uyakuthola ukuqonda; sola oqondileyo, uyakuqonda ukwazi. 
20_19_26_Ochitha uyise noxosha unina uyindodana ehlazisayo nebanga amahloni. 
20_19_27_Yeka, ndodana yami, ukulalela ukulaywa, uyakuduka emazwini okwazi. 
20_19_28_Ufakazi omubi uyadelela ukwahlulela; umlomo wababi uyagwinya ukona. 
20_19_29_Izahlulelo zilungiselwa izideleli, nemivimbo umhlane weziwula. 
20_20_1_Iwayini liyisideleli, uphuzo olunamandla lungumxokozeli; bonke abaduka ngalo abahlakaniphile. 
20_20_2_Ingebhe ngenkosi injengokubhonga kwengonyama; oyithukuthelisayo wona umphefumulo wakhe. 
20_20_3_Kuludumo kumuntu ukuhlala kude nokuxabana, kepha zonke iziwula ziyaphikisana. 
20_20_4_Ngenxa yobusika ivila aliyikulima; ngalokho uyakuthekela ngesikhathi sokuvuna, kungekho lutho. 
20_20_5_Isiluleko enhliziyweni yomuntu sinjengamanzi ajulileyo, kepha umuntu oqondileyo uyakusikhipha. 
20_20_6_Abantu abaningi bayamemezela, kube yilowo nalowo umusa wakhe, kepha ngubani ongafumana umuntu othembekileyo na? 
20_20_7_Olungileyo ohamba ekupheleleni kwakhe, babusisiwe abantwana bakhe emva kwakhe. 
20_20_8_Inkosi ehlezi esihlalweni sokwahlulela ihlakaza konke okubi ngamehlo ayo. 
20_20_9_Ngubani ongasho ukuthi: “Ngihlanzile inhliziyo yami, sengihlambulukile ezonweni zami, na?” 
20_20_10_Izisindo ezimbili nama-efa amabili, kokubili kuyisinengiso kuJehova. 
20_20_11_Naye umntwana uyaziwa ngezenzo zakhe, uma isenzo sakhe sihlanzekile, noma siqotho. 
20_20_12_Indlebe ezwayo neso elibonayo, uJehova wenzile kokubili. 
20_20_13_Ungathandi ubuthongo, funa ufikelwe ngubumpofu; vula amehlo akho, uyakusutha ngesinkwa. 
20_20_14_“Kubi, kubi,” kusho umthengi; kepha esehambile uyazigabisa. 
20_20_15_Kukhona igolide namarubi amaningi, kepha ukwazi kwezindebe kuyigugu elinqabileyo. 
20_20_16_Thatha ingubo yoyisibambiso somfokazi, umbambe abe yisibambiso omela abezizwe. 
20_20_17_Isinkwa samanga simnandi kumuntu, kepha ngasemuva umlomo wakhe uyakugcwaliswa ngohlalwane. 
20_20_18_Amacebo onke ayaqiniswa ngokululekana; yilwa impi ngamasu. 
20_20_19_Ohamba encetheza uyambula izimfihlakalo; ngalokho ungahlangani naye ovula kakhulu umlomo wakhe. 
20_20_20_Oqalekisa uyise nonina, isibani sakhe siyakucimeka esigayegayeni. 
20_20_21_Imfuyo ingatholwa ngokushesha ekuqaleni, kepha ukuphela kwayo akuyikubusiswa. 
20_20_22_Ungasho ukuthi: “Ngiyakuphindisela okubi,” yethemba kuJehova, uyakukusindisa. 
20_20_23_Izisindo ezimbili ziyisinengiso kuJehova, nesilinganiso senkohliso asilungile. 
20_20_24_Izinyathelo zomuntu zingezikaJehova; pho, umuntu angaqonda kanjani indlela yakhe na? 
20_20_25_Kulugibe ukusho ngamawala ukuthi: “Kungcwele,” abesebuya acabange emva kwezithembiso zakhe. 
20_20_26_Inkosi ehlakaniphileyo iyahlakaza ababi, iphindisele phezu kwabo ukushinga kwabo. 
20_20_27_Umoya womuntu uyisibani sikaJehova, siphenya konke okuphakathi komuntu. 
20_20_28_Umusa neqiniso kuyalonda inkosi; isihlalo sayo sobukhosi sisekelwa ngomusa. 
20_20_29_Udumo lwabasha lungamandla abo, nesivunulo sabadala singubumpunga. 
20_20_30_Imivimbo elimazayo ihlanza ububi, nezishayo okuphakathi komuntu. 
20_21_1_Inhliziyo yenkosi isesandleni sikaJehova njengemifula yamanzi; uyayiphendulela lapho ethanda khona. 
20_21_2_Zonke izindlela zomuntu zilungile emehlweni akhe, kepha uJehova ulinganisa izinhliziyo. 
20_21_3_Ukwenza ukulunga nokwahlulela kukhethekile kuJehova kunemihlatshelo. 
20_21_4_Ukuzidla kwamehlo nokuziqhenya kwenhliziyo, isibani sababi, kuyisono. 
20_21_5_Imicabango yokhutheleyo isenzuzweni, kepha eyabo bonke abaphangisayo isekusweleni kuphela. 
20_21_6_Ukuthola ingcebo ngolimi lwamanga kuyize elizulazuliswa, nezingibe zokufa. 
20_21_7_Ukuchitha kwababi kuyabaqothula, ngokuba benqaba ukwenza ukulunga. 
20_21_8_Indlela yothweswe icala iyinsongensonge, kepha ohlanzekileyo, isenzo sakhe silungile. 
20_21_9_Kungcono ukuhlala egumbini lophahla kunokuhlala nowesifazane oxabanayo endlini ehlanganyelweyo. 
20_21_10_Umphefumulo womubi ufisa okubi; umakhelwane wakhe kafumani isisa emehlweni akhe. 
20_21_11_Lapho isideleli sihlawuliswa, ongenalwazi uyahlakanipha, nalapho ohlakaniphileyo efundiswa, uyathola ukwazi. 
20_21_12_Olungileyo uyaqaphela indlu yomubi; ababi bayachithelwa ebubini. 
20_21_13_Ovala indlebe yakhe ngokukhala kompofu naye uyakukhala angaphendulwa. 
20_21_14_Isipho ekusithekeni siyadambisa ulaka, nomvuzo esifubeni ukufutheka okunamandla. 
20_21_15_Kuyintokozo kolungileyo ukwenza ukwahlulela, kepha kwabenza ukona kuyincithakalo. 
20_21_16_Umuntu oduka endleleni yokuhlakanipha uyakuphumula ebandleni lezithunzi. 
20_21_17_Othanda injabulo uyakuba mpofu, nothanda iwayini namafutha kayikuceba. 
20_21_18_Omubi uyihlawulo lolungileyo, nombuluzayo usesikhundleni sabaqotho. 
20_21_19_Kungcono ukuhlala ezweni lasehlane kunokuhlala nowesifazane oxabanayo nothethayo. 
20_21_20_Kukhona ingcebo enxanelekayo namafutha endlini yohlakaniphileyo, kepha umuntu oyisiwula uyakugwinya. 
20_21_21_Olandela ukulunga nomusa uyafumana ukuphila, nokulunga, nodumo. 
20_21_22_Ohlakaniphileyo angenyukela emzini wamaqhawe, awise phansi inqaba ayethembayo wona. 
20_21_23_Ogcina umlomo wakhe nolimi lwakhe ulonda umphefumulo wakhe ezinsizini. 
20_21_24_Ozidlayo nozigabisayo, yisideleli igama lakhe, yena osebenza ngokuziphakamisa okukhulu. 
20_21_25_Isifiso sevila siyalibulala, ngokuba izandla zalo ziyenqaba ukusebenza. 
20_21_26_Kuyafiswa nokufiswa usuku lonke, kepha olungileyo uyaphana engancishi. 
20_21_27_Umhlatshelo wababi uyisinengiso; kakhulu kangakanani uma ulethwa ngomgomo omubi. 
20_21_28_Ufakazi wamanga uyabhujiswa, kepha umuntu ozwileyo angakhuluma njalo. 
20_21_29_Umuntu omubi uyenza lukhuni ubuso bakhe, kepha oqotho uyanaka indlela yakhe. 
20_21_30_Akukho ukuhlakanipha, akukho ukuqonda, nesiluleko, okungamelana noJehova. 
20_21_31_Ihhashi lilungiselwa usuku lokulwa, kepha ukusindiswa kungokukaJehova. 
20_22_1_Igama elihle likhethekile kunengcebo enkulu, nomusa kunesiliva negolide. 
20_22_2_Abacebileyo nabampofu bahlangene; uJehova ungumenzi wabo bonke. 
20_22_3_Qqondileyo uyabona ububi, acashe, kepha abangenalwazi badlula nje, bahlupheke ngakho. 
20_22_4_Umvuzo wokuthobeka kokumesaba uJehova uyingcebo, nodumo, nokuphila. 
20_22_5_Ameva nezingibe kusendleleni yabaphambeneyo, kepha ogcina umphefumulo wakhe uyakudedela kude nakho. 
20_22_6_Khulisa umntwana ngendlela eyakuba ngeyakhe; kuyakuthi lapho esekhulile, angasuki kuyo. 
20_22_7_Isicebi sibusa phezu kwabampofu, nobolekayo uyisigqila somtshelekileyo. 
20_22_8_Ohlwanyela ububi uyakuvuna usizi, nenduku yolaka lwakhe iyakuphela. 
20_22_9_Oneso elimnene uyakubusiswa, ngokuba uyapha ompofu okwesinkwa sakhe. 
20_22_10_Xosha isideleli, besekuphuma ukuxabana, kuphele ukuphikisana nehlazo. 
20_22_11_Othanda inhlanzeko ngenhliziyo nonomusa emlonyeni wakhe ungumngane wenkosi. 
20_22_12_Amehlo kaJehova anaka onokwazi, kepha uyachitha amazwi ombuluzayo. 
20_22_13_Ivila lithi: “Kukhona ingonyama ngaphandle; ngiyakubulawa phandle esigcawini.” 
20_22_14_Umlomo wowesifazane ondindayo ungumgodi ojulileyo; othukuthelelwayo nguJehova uyakuwela kuwo. 
20_22_15_Ubuwula buboshelwe enhliziyweni yomntwana, kepha induku yokulaya iyabudedisela kude naye. 
20_22_16_Ocindezela ompofu ukuba azandisele nophayo isicebi bayakuba ngabokuswela kuphela. 
20_22_17_Beka indlebe yakho, uzwe amazwi ezihlakaniphi, ubeke ukufundisa kwami enhliziyweni yakho. 
20_22_18_Ngokuba kumnandi, uma ukugcina phakathi kwakho, kubekwe kanyekanye ezindebeni zakho. 
20_22_19_Ukuba ithemba lakho libe kuJehova, ngikwazisile khona namuhla, yebo, wena. 
20_22_20_Angithi ngilobile kuwe nangaphambili ngeziluleko nangokwazi, 
20_22_21_ukuze ngikwazise ukuthembeka kwamazwi eqiniso ukuba ubuyisele kwabakuthumileyo amazwi eqiniso, na? 
20_22_22_Ungamphangi ompofu ngokuba empofu, ungamchobozi oswelayo esangweni, 
20_22_23_ngokuba uJehova uyakumela indaba yabo, aphuce ababaphucayo umphefumulo wabo. 
20_22_24_Ungabi ngumngane womuntu onolaka, ungahambi nomuntu onokufutheka, 
20_22_25_funa ufunde izindlela zakhe, uthole ugibe lomphefumulo wakho. 
20_22_26_Ungabi ngowabaxhawulanayo, nowabayizibambiso zezikwenetu; 
20_22_27_uma kungekho ongakhokha ngakho, ubuyakususelwani umbhede wakho phansi kwakho na? 
20_22_28_Ungasusi isikhonkwane esidala oyihlo abasimisileyo. 
20_22_29_Uyambona umuntu ehlakaniphile emsebenzini wakhe na? Uyakuma phambi kwamakhosi, akayikuma phambi kwabantukazana nje. 
20_23_1_Lapho uhlezi ekudleni nombusi, qonda nokuqonda ophambi kwakho, 
20_23_2_ubeke umese emphinjeni wakho, uma ungumuntu wephango. 
20_23_3_Unganxaneli izilovela zakhe, lokhu zingukudla okukhohlisayo. 
20_23_4_Ungakhandlekeli ukuceba; kuyeke ngokuqonda kwakho. 
20_23_5_Amehlo akho ayandizela kulokho, kepha akusekho, ngokuba kuyazenzela impela amaphiko njengokhozi olundizela ezulwini. 
20_23_6_Ungadli ukudla koneso elibi, ungafisi izilovela zakhe, 
20_23_7_ngokuba unjengozicabangelayo; uthi kuwe: “Yidla uphuze,” kepha inhliziyo yakhe ayikho kuwe. 
20_23_8_Umthamo owudlileyo uyakuwuhlanza, uchithe amazwi akho amnandi. 
20_23_9_Ungakhulumi ezindlebeni zesiwula, ngokuba siyakudelela ukuhlakanipha kwamazwi akho. 
20_23_10_Ungasusi isikhonkwane esidala, ungangeni emasimini ezintandane, 
20_23_11_ngokuba umhlengi wazo unamandla; uyakumela indaba yazo kuwe. 
20_23_12_Beka inhliziyo yakho ekulayweni, nezindlebe zakho emazwini okwazi. 
20_23_13_Ungayeki ukumlaya umntwana, ngokuba uma umshaya ngoswazi akayikufa. 
20_23_14_Uyakumshaya ngoswazi, wophule umphefumulo wakhe endaweni yabafileyo. 
20_23_15_Ndodana yami, uma inhliziyo yakho ihlakanipha, inhliziyo yami iyakuthokoza, yebo, eyami. 
20_23_16_Izinso zami ziyakujabula, lapho izindebe zakho zikhuluma okulungileyo. 
20_23_17_Inhliziyo yakho mayingabi namhawu ngezoni, kepha mawube sekumesabeni uJehova usuku lonke. 
20_23_18_Ngokuba impela umvuzo ukhona, nethemba lakho aliyikunqunywa. 
20_23_19_Yizwa wena ndodana yami, uhlakaniphe, uhole inhliziyo yakho ngendlela. 
20_23_20_Ungabi phakathi kwezinseli zewayini nabayiziminzi zenyama. 
20_23_21_Ngokuba inseli noyisiminzi bayakuba mpofu; ukozela kuyakwembathisa umuntu amanikiniki. 
20_23_22_Lalela uyihlo owakuzalayo, ungamdeleli unyoko lapho esemdala. 
20_23_23_Thenga iqiniso, ungathengisi ngalo, nokuhlakanipha, nokulaywa, nokuqonda. 
20_23_24_Uyise wolungileyo uyakwethaba nokwethaba, nozala ohlakaniphileyo uyathokoza ngaye. 
20_23_25_Mabathokoze uyihlo nonyoko, ethabe owakubelethayo. 
20_23_26_Ndodana yami, ngiphe inhliziyo yakho, amehlo akho enamele izindlela zami. 
20_23_27_Ngokuba isifebe singumgodi ojulileyo, nowesifazane ondindayo ungumhholo onyinyeneyo. 
20_23_28_Uqamekela njengomphangi; uyandisa abambuluzayo phakathi kwabantu. 
20_23_29_Ngubani othi: “Maye!” Ngubani othi: “Wo!” Ngubani oxabanayo? Ngubani okhalayo, ngubani onezilonda ngeze, na? Ngubani onamehlo aklwelayo na? 
20_23_30_Yibo abalibala ngasewayinini, abaya ukunambitha iwayini elixutshanisiweyo. 
20_23_31_Ungalibuki iwayini ukuthi libomvu, nokuthi liyacwebezela endebeni, ukuba lehle kalula. 
20_23_32_Ngasekugcineni liyaluma njengenyoka, lihlabe njengebululu. 
20_23_33_Amehlo akho ayakubona imihlola, inhliziyo yakho ikhulume okuphambeneyo. 
20_23_34_Uyakuba njengolele ekujuleni kolwandle nohlezi esihlokweni sensika yomkhumbi. 
20_23_35_Uyakuthi: “Bangishayile, angilimalanga; bangigalele, angikwazanga. Lapho ngivuka, ngiyakubuye ngilifune.” 
20_24_1_Ungabi namhawu ngabantu ababi, ungafisi ukuba nabo. 
20_24_2_Ngokuba izinhliziyo zabo ziceba ukuchitha, nezindebe zabo zikhuluma ngengozi. 
20_24_3_Indlu iyakhiwa ngokuhlakanipha, iqiniswe ngokuqonda. 
20_24_4_Amakamelo agcwaliswa ngokwazi, ngayo yonke ingcebo enqabileyo nemnandi. 
20_24_5_Umuntu ohlakaniphileyo udlula onamandla, nomuntu onokwazi onezikhwepha. 
20_24_6_Ngokuba ngokucabanga ungaphaka impi yakho, nokusinda kumi ngobuningi babeluleki. 
20_24_7_Ukuhlakanipha kuphakeme kunesiwula; esangweni asivuli umlomo waso. 
20_24_8_Ocabanga ukwenza okubi uyakubizwa ngokuthi owenza amacebo. 
20_24_9_Ukuceba ubuwula kuyisono, nesideleli siyisinengiso kubantu. 
20_24_10_Uma udangala ngosuku lokuhlupheka, amandla akho mancane. 
20_24_11_Bophule abayiswa ekufeni; abakhubekiselwa ekubulaweni ubagodle. 
20_24_12_Uma uthi: “Bheka, besingakwazi,” akakuqondi yini olinganisa izinhliziyo, nolonda umphefumulo wakho akakwazi, na? Futhi akayikuphindisela bonke abantu ngokwemisebenzi yabo na? 
20_24_13_Ndodana yami, yidla izinyosi, ngokuba zimnandi, noju oluhle emlonyeni wakho. 
20_24_14_Yazi ukuthi kunjalo ukuhlakanipha emphefumulweni wakho; uma ukutholile, kuyakuba khona isikhathi esizayo, nethemba lakho aliyikunqunywa. 
20_24_15_Wena omubi ungaqamekeli indlu yolungileyo, ungachithi indawo yakhe yokuphumula. 
20_24_16_Ngokuba olungileyo angawa kasikhombisa, abesebuye avuke, kepha ababi bayakukhubeka ngobubi. 
20_24_17_Ungathokozi ngokuwa kwesitha sakho, nenhliziyo yakho mayingajabuli ngokukhubeka kwaso, 
20_24_18_funa uJehova akubone, kube kubi emehlweni akhe, asuse intukuthelo yakhe kuso. 
20_24_19_Ungazikhathazi ngabenza okubi, ungabi namhawu ngamashinga. 
20_24_20_Ngokuba omubi akayikuba namvuzo, nesibani samashinga siyakucima. 
20_24_21_Ndodana yami, yesaba uJehova nenkosi, ungahlangani nabahlubukayo. 
20_24_22_Ngokuba ingozi yabo iyakuvuka masinyane; ngubani owazi ukuchithwa kweminyaka yabo na? 
20_24_23_Nalawa angamazwi ahlakaniphileyo: Ukukhetha ubuso ekwahluleleni akukuhle. 
20_24_24_Oshoyo komubi ukuthi: “Ulungile,” lowo abantu bayakumqalekisa, nezizwe ziyakumthukuthelela. 
20_24_25_Kwabamthethisayo kuyakuba mnandi, kufike phezu kwabo isibusiso esihle. 
20_24_26_Njengokwanga kwezindebe, injalo impendulo eqinisileyo. 
20_24_27_Qeda umsebenzi wakho ngaphandle, uzilungiselele wona ensimini, wakhe ngasemuva indlu yakho. 
20_24_28_Ungabi ngufakazi ngomakhelwane wakho kungekho sizathu; wothi ukhohlise ngezindebe zakho na? 
20_24_29_Ungasho ukuthi: “Njengalokho ekwenzile kimi, kanjalo ngiyakwenza kuye, ngimphindisele umuntu njengesenzo sakhe.” 
20_24_30_Ngadlula ensimini yomuntu oyivila, nasesivinini somuntu ongenangqondo; 
20_24_31_bheka, kuso sonke kwakukhona izimbathi, sisibekelwe phezulu ngezimbabazane, nogange lwaso lwamatshe lwaludilizelwe phansi. 
20_24_32_Ngabuka-ke mina, ngacabanga; ngabona, ngathola ukulaywa: 
20_24_33_ubuthongo obuncane, ukozela okuncane, ukusonga izandla kancane kuze kulalwe, 
20_24_34_besekuthi ubumpofu bakho bufike njengomhambuma, nokuswela kwakho njengomuntu wesihlangu. 
20_25_1_Nalezi ziyizaga zikaSolomoni ezaphindwa ngamadoda kaHezekiya inkosi yakwaJuda. 
20_25_2_Kuludumo lukaNkulunkulu ukusitha into, kepha udumo lwamakhosi lungukuphenya indaba. 
20_25_3_Njengezulu ngokuphakama nomhlaba ngokujula, injalo inhliziyo yomuntu ngokuphenywa. 
20_25_4_Susa amanyela esiliveni, bese kuthi kuphumele umkhandi isitsha. 
20_25_5_Susa omubi phambi kwenkosi, bese kuthi isihlalo sayo sobukhosi siqiniswe ngokulunga. 
20_25_6_Ungaziphakamisi phambi kwenkosi, ungemi endaweni yabakhulu. 
20_25_7_Ngokuba kungcono ukuba kuthiwe kuwe: “Yenyuka lapha,” kunokuba wehliswe phambi kwesikhulu asesibonile amehlo akho. 
20_25_8_Ungasheshi ukuphuma ukuyophikisana ukuba ungazi ukuthi uyakwenze njani ekugcineni, lapho umakhelwane wakho ekuhlazisile. 
20_25_9_Mela indaba yakho nomakhelwane wakho, ungambuli imfihlakalo yomunye, 
20_25_10_funa okuzwayo akuhlazise, nodumo lwakho lungabuyi. 
20_25_11_Izwi elikhulunywayo ngesikhathi esiyiso linjengama-apula asezitsheni zesiliva. 
20_25_12_Njengecici legolide nesivunulo segolide elicwengekileyo, unjalo umsoli ohlakaniphileyo endlebeni elalelayo. 
20_25_13_Njengokubanda kweqhwa ngosuku lokuvuna, sinjalo isithunywa esithembekileyo kosithumileyo, ngokuba siyahlumelela inkosi yaso. 
20_25_14_Njengamafu nomoya ngaphandle kwemvula kodwa, unjalo umuntu ozidumisa ngesipho angasiphiyo. 
20_25_15_Ngokubekezela kade isikhulu singavunyiswa, nolimi oluthambileyo luyaphula amathambo. 
20_25_16_Uma uthole izinyosi, yidla okwanele wena, funa udinwe, ubuye uhlanze. 
20_25_17_Unyawo lwakho malungavami endlini yomakhelwane wakho, funa adinwe nguwe, abuye akuzonde. 
20_25_18_Umuntu ofakazela amanga ngomakhelwane wakhe uyisando, nenkemba, nomcibisholo obukhali. 
20_25_19_Ukwethemba ombuluzayo ngosuku lokuhlupheka kunjengezinyo elaphukileyo nonyawo olwenyeleyo. 
20_25_20_Oyihlabelelela inhliziyo edabukileyo izihlabelelo unjengokhumula ibhantshi ngosuku lwamakhaza, nanjengoviniga esilondeni. 
20_25_21_Uma okuzondayo elambile, mnike ukudla, adle; uma omile, muphe amanzi, aphuze. 
20_25_22_Ngokuba uyakubuthela amalahle omlilo ekhanda lakhe, besekuthi uJehova akuvuze. 
20_25_23_Umoya wasenyakatho uyaletha imvula, nolimi olunyenyayo ubuso obuthukutheleyo. 
20_25_24_Kungcono ukuhlala egumbini lophahla kunokuhlala nowesifazane oxabanayo endlini ehlanganyelweyo. 
20_25_25_Njengamanzi aqandayo emphefumulweni owomileyo, unjalo umbiko omuhle ovela ezweni elikude. 
20_25_26_Njengomthombo odungekileyo nesiphethu esonakaleyo, unjalo olungileyo ozanyazanyiswa phambi komubi. 
20_25_27_Ukudla izinyosi eziningi akukuhle, nokuzifunela udumo kakusilo udumo. 
20_25_28_Njengomuzi odiliziweyo ungenalugange, unjalo umuntu omoya wakhe ungenakubanjwa. 
20_26_1_Njengeqhwa ehlobo nemvula ngesikhathi sokuvuna, kanjalo udumo alufanele isiwula. 
20_26_2_Njengomzwilili ekuhambeni kwawo nanjengenkonjane ekundizeni kwayo, kanjalo isiqalekiso esingenasizathu asizi. 
20_26_3_Isiswebhu singesehhashi, netomu lingelembongolo, noswazi lungolomhlane weziwula. 
20_26_4_Ungasiphenduli isiwula njengobuwula baso, funa ufane naso. 
20_26_5_Phendula isiwula njengobuwula baso, funa sibe ngohlakaniphileyo emehlweni aso. 
20_26_6_Othuma izwi ngesandla sesiwula unquma izinyawo zakhe, uphuza ingozi. 
20_26_7_Imilenze yonyonga iyalengalenga; zinjalo izaga emilonyeni yeziwula. 
20_26_8_Njengobopha itshe endwayimaneni, unjalo onika isiwula udumo. 
20_26_9_Njengeva elingena esandleni sesidakwa, sinjalo isaga emlonyweni weziwula. 
20_26_10_Ingqongqo yenza konke yodwa; oqasha isiwula uqasha abadlulayo nje. 
20_26_11_Njengenja ebuyela ebuhlanzweni bayo, kanjalo isiwula siphinda ubuwula baso. 
20_26_12_Uyabona umuntu ohlakaniphile emehlweni akhe na? Kukhona ithemba ngesiwula kunaye. 
20_26_13_Ivila lithi: “Kukhona ingonyama endleleni nebhubesi esigcawini.” 
20_26_14_Isicabha siphenduka ngezingibe zaso, nevila ecansini lalo. 
20_26_15_Ivila liyafaka isandla salo esitsheni; kuyamkhathaza ukusibuyisela emlonyeni walo. 
20_26_16_Ivila lihlakaniphile emehlweni alo kunabayisikhombisa abaphendula ngokuhlakanipha. 
20_26_17_Odlula nje ehlanganyela ukuxabana okungesikho okwakhe unjengobamba inja ngezindlebe zayo. 
20_26_18_Njengohlanya oluphonsa izikhuni nemicibisholo ebulalayo, 
20_26_19_unjalo umuntu okhohlisa umakhelwane wakhe, ethi: “Angithi ngintelile nje na?” 
20_26_20_Ngokuphela kwezinkuni umlilo uyacimeka, nalapho kungekho abancethezi, kuyabodla ukuxabana. 
20_26_21_Njengamalahle othuthwini nezinkuni emlilweni, unjalo umuntu ophikisa ukuvusa inkani. 
20_26_22_Amazwi omncethezi anjengesibiliboco: ayehlela kokuphakathi komuntu. 
20_26_23_Izindebe ezishisayo nenhliziyo embi kunjengesitsha sebumba esinamekwe ngamanyela esiliva. 
20_26_24_Ozondayo uyazenzisa ngezindebe zakhe, ubekelela inkohliso enhliziyweni yakhe. 
20_26_25_Lapho enza izwi lakhe libe mnandi, ungakholwa nguye, ngokuba kukhona izinengiso eziyisikhombisa enhliziyweni yakhe. 
20_26_26_Noma inzondo yakhe isibekelwa ngenzondo, ububi bakhe buyakwambulwa ebandleni. 
20_26_27_Omba umgodi uyakuwela kuwo, nogingqa itshe, liyakubuyela phezu kwakhe. 
20_26_28_Ulimi lwamanga luyazonda olubachobozileyo, nomlomo othophayo usebenza incithakalo. 
20_27_1_Ungazigabisi ngolwakusasa, ngokuba awukwazi okungavela ngosuku. 
20_27_2_Makakudumise omunye, kungabi ngumlomo wakho, kube ngumfokazi, kungabi yizindebe zakho. 
20_27_3_Itshe liyasinda nesihlabathi sinzima, kepha ukukhathaza kwesiwula kuyasinda kunakho kokubili. 
20_27_4_Ulaka lulunya nentukuthelo iyisikhukhula, kepha ngubani ongema phambi komhawu na? 
20_27_5_Ukusola okusobala kungcono kunothando olufihliweyo. 
20_27_6_Amanxeba othandayo athembekile, kepha ukwanga kwesitha kuyachichima. 
20_27_7_Umphefumulo osuthiyo uyanengwa yizinyosi, kepha emphefumulweni olambileyo konke okubabayo kumnandi. 
20_27_8_Njengenyoni esuka ibaleka esidlekeni sayo, unjalo umuntu obalekele indawo yakhe. 
20_27_9_Amafutha nempepho kuyathokozisa inhliziyo; bunjalo ubumnandi bomuntu ngokululeka ngenhliziyo. 
20_27_10_Ungashiyi umngane wakho nomngane kayihlo, ungangeni endlini yomfowenu ngosuku lwengozi yakho; ungcono umakhelwane oseduze kunomfowenu okude. 
20_27_11_Ndodana yami, hlakanipha, uthokozise inhliziyo yami ukuba ngiphendule ongisolayo. 
20_27_12_Oqondileyo uyabona ububi, acashe, kepha abangenalwazi badlula nje, bahlupheke ngakho. 
20_27_13_Thatha ingubo yoyisibambiso somfokazi, umbambe abe yisibambiso omela abezizwe. 
20_27_14_Obusisa umngane wakhe ngezwi elikhulu, evuka ekuseni, kuyakubalelwa kuye ukuthi kuyisiqalekiso. 
20_27_15_Ukuconsa okunganqamukiyo ngosuku lwemvula nowesifazane oxabanayo kuyafana. 
20_27_16_Omvimbela yena uvimbela umoya; isandla sakhe sokunene sihlangana namafutha nje. 
20_27_17_Insimbi ilola insimbi, nomuntu ubuso bomunye. 
20_27_18_Olonda umkhiwane uyakudla izithelo zawo, nolinda inkosi yakhe uyakudunyiswa. 
20_27_19_Njengasemanzini ubuso bubhekana nobuso, injalo inhliziyo yomuntu kumuntu. 
20_27_20_Indawo yabafileyo nokubhubha akusuthi, namehlo omuntu awasuthi. 
20_27_21_Ukhamba lokuncibilikisela lungolwesiliva, nesithando ngesegolide, nomuntu unjengodumo lwakhe. 
20_27_22_Noma ugqula isiwula ngembokodwe etsheni lokusila phakathi komqhazulo, ubuwula baso abuyikusuka kuso. 
20_27_23_Yazi nokwazi ukuma kwezimvu zakho, ubeke inhliziyo yakho emihlambini yakho. 
20_27_24_Ngokuba ingcebo ayiyikuhlala kuze kube phakade; umqhele uyahlala izizukulwane ngezizukulwane na? 
20_27_25_Lapho utshani bumuka, nohlaza lubonakala, nemifino yezintaba ibuthwa, 
20_27_26_kukhona izimvu zokuba wembathe, nezimpongo ukuba zibe yintengo yomhlaba. 
20_27_27_Kuyakuba khona ubisi lwezimbuzi olwanele ukudla kwakho nokudla kwendlu yakho, nokuphila kwamantombazana akho. 
20_28_1_Ababi bayabaleka, noma kungekho obaxoshayo, kepha abalungileyo banesibindi njengengonyama. 
20_28_2_Ngesiphambeko salo izwe linezikhulu eziningi, kepha ngabantu abaqondileyo nabanokwazi liyakuma. 
20_28_3_Umuntu oswelayo ocindezela abampofu unjengemvula ekhukhulayo engashiyi ukudla. 
20_28_4_Abashiya umthetho badumisa ababi, kepha abagcina umthetho balwa nabo. 
20_28_5_Abantu ababi abaqondi ukwahlulela, kepha abafuna uJehova baqonda konke. 
20_28_6_Ungcono ompofu ohamba ekupheleleni kwakhe kunocebileyo ophambene ngezindlela zakhe. 
20_28_7_Ogcina umthetho uyindodana eqondileyo, kepha ongumngane weziminzi uhlazisa uyise. 
20_28_8_Owandisa imfuyo yakhe ngenzalo nangenzuzo uyibuthela onomusa kwabampofu. 
20_28_9_Ophendula indlebe yakhe ekuzweni umthetho, nomkhuleko wakhe uyisinengiso. 
20_28_10_Odukisela abaqotho endleleni embi uyakuwela emgodini wakhe, kepha abapheleleyo bayakudla ifa lokuhle. 
20_28_11_Isicebi sihlakaniphile emehlweni aso, kepha ompofu oqondileyo uyakusifica. 
20_28_12_Lapho abalungileyo bethokoza, udumo lukhulu, kepha ekuvukeni kwababi abantu bamelwe ukufunwa. 
20_28_13_Ofihla iziphambeko zakhe akayikuphumelela, kepha ozivumayo azishiye uyakuthola umusa. 
20_28_14_Ubusisiwe umuntu owesaba njalo, kepha oyenza lukhuni inhliziyo yakhe uyakuwela ebubini. 
20_28_15_Njengengoyama ebhongayo nebhere elihahayo, unjalo umbusi omubi phezu kwabantu abampofu. 
20_28_16_Wena sikhulu esingenakuqonda nesicindezelayo, ozonda inzuzo engalungile uyakwandiza izinsuku zakhe. 
20_28_17_Umuntu osindwa yigazi lomunye uyakubalekela egodini; makangasizwa muntu. 
20_28_18_Ohamba ekupheleleni uyakusinda, kepha ophambene ngezindlela zakhe uyakuwa kwenye yazo. 
20_28_19_Olima insimu yakhe uyakusutha ngokudla, kepha olandela amayiyane uyakusutha ngobumpofu. 
20_28_20_Umuntu othembekileyo uyakuvama izibusiso, kepha oshesha ukuceba akayikuyekwa. 
20_28_21_Ukukhetha ubuso akukuhle; ngomthamo wesinkwa umuntu angenza isiphambeko. 
20_28_22_Umuntu oneso elibi ushesha ukuba athole imfuyo; akazi ukuthi ukuswela kuyakumehlela. 
20_28_23_Osola umuntu uyakuthola ngasemuva isisa kunothopha ngolimi lwakhe. 
20_28_24_Ophanga uyise nonina, ethi: “Akusiso isiphambeko,” yena ungumngane wochithayo. 
20_28_25_Onomoya ohahayo uyavusa ukuxabana, kepha owethemba kuJehova uyakukhuluphaliswa. 
20_28_26_Owethemba enhliziyweni yakhe uyisiwula; kepha ohamba ngokuhlakanipha uyakhululwa. 
20_28_27_Opha ompofu akayikuswela, kepha ositheza amehlo akhe uyakuba neziqalekiso eziningi. 
20_28_28_Lapho ababi bevuka, umuntu uyacasha, kepha ngokubhubha kwabo abalungileyo bayanda. 
20_29_1_Umuntu osolwayo, onentamo elukhuni kodwa, uyakwaphulwa ngokuphazima kweso, engenakuphulukiswa. 
20_29_2_Abantu bayathokoza ngokwanda kwabalungileyo, kepha ngokubusa kwababi abantu bayabubula. 
20_29_3_Umuntu othanda ukuhlakanipha uthokozisa uyise, kepha umngane wezifebe uchitha imfuyo yakhe. 
20_29_4_Inkosi iqinisa izwe ngokwahlulela, kepha umuntu olithelisayo uyalichitha. 
20_29_5_Umuntu othopha umakhelwane wakhe wenekela izinyawo zakhe inetha. 
20_29_6_Esiphambekweni somuntu omubi kukhona ugibe, kepha olungileyo uyenanela, athokoze. 
20_29_7_Olungileyo uyazi indaba yabampofu, kepha omubi akayiqondi. 
20_29_8_Abantu abayizideleli bavusa umuzi, kepha abahlakaniphileyo babuyisa ulaka. 
20_29_9_Uma ohlakaniphileyo ephikisene nesiwula, siyadlova sihleke, nokuthula akukho. 
20_29_10_Abantu begazi bayazonda opheleleyo, kepha abaqotho banaka umphefumulo wakhe. 
20_29_11_Isiwula sikhipha lonke ulaka lwaso, kepha ohlakaniphileyo uyalugodla ekugcineni. 
20_29_12_Uma umbusi elalela indaba yamanga, zonke izinceku zakhe zimbi. 
20_29_13_Ompofu nocindezelayo bandawonye; uJehova ukhanyisa amehlo abo bobabili. 
20_29_14_Inkosi eyahlulela abampofu ngeqiniso, isihlalo sayo sobukhosi siyakuma phakade. 
20_29_15_Uswazi nokusola kuyanika ukuhlakanipha, kepha umntwana oyekwayo uyahlazisa unina. 
20_29_16_Ngokwanda kwababi kuyanda iziphambeko, kepha abalungileyo bayakubuka ukuwa kwabo. 
20_29_17_Yilaye indodana yakho, iyakukuphumuza, yebo, iyakuthokozisa umphefumulo wakho. 
20_29_18_Lapho kungekho mbono khona, abantu bayadlubulunda, kepha ogcina umthetho ubusisiwe. 
20_29_19_Inceku ayisolwa ngamazwi, ngokuba noma iqonda ayilaleli. 
20_29_20_Uyabona umuntu oshesha ngamazwi na? Kukhona ithemba ngesiwula kunangaye. 
20_29_21_Inceku ekhuliswa kahle kwasebuntwaneni iyakuba yindodana ekugcineni. 
20_29_22_Umuntu onolaka uvusa ukuxabana, nomuntu ofuthekayo uvama ukuphambeka. 
20_29_23_Ukuzidla komuntu kuyamthobisa, kepha onomoya othobekileyo uyazuza udumo. 
20_29_24_Ohlanganyela nesela uzonda umphefumulo wakhe; uyezwa isifungo, kepha akasidaluli. 
20_29_25_Ukwesaba abantu kubeka ugibe, kepha owethemba uJehova uyalondeka. 
20_29_26_Abaningi bafuna ubuso bombusi, kepha ukwahlulelwa komuntu kuvela kuJehova. 
20_29_27_Umuntu owonakeleyo uyisinengiso kwabalungileyo, noqotho endleleni uyisinengiso komubi. 
20_30_1_Amazwi ka-Aguri, indodana kaJakhe waseMasa. Yathi indoda ku-Ithiyeli, ko-Ithiyeli no-Ukhali: 
20_30_2_“Impela ngiyisiwula kunabanye abantu, anginakuqonda komuntu. 
20_30_3_Angifundanga ukuhlakanipha, ukuze ngazi oNgcwele. 
20_30_4_Ngubani owenyukele ezulwini, wabuye wehla na? Ngubani oqoqele umoya ezandleni zakhe na? Ngubani obophile amanzi engutsheni yakhe na? Ngubani omisile yonke imikhawulo yomhlaba na? Ngubani igama lakhe, ngubani igama lendodana yakhe, uma ulazi, na? 
20_30_5_“Onke amazwi kaNkulunkulu acwebile; uyisihlangu kwabaphephela kuye. 
20_30_6_Ungenezeli emazwini akhe, funa akusole, ufunyanwe ungumqambimanga. 
20_30_7_“Yizinto ezimbili engizicela kuwe: unganginqabeli nazo, ngingakafi. 
20_30_8_Dedisela kude nami okuyize namanga, unganginiki ubumpofu nengcebo, kepha ngiphe isinkwa engisimiselweyo, 
20_30_9_funa ngisuthe, ngikuphike ngithi: ‘UJehova ungubani na?’ funa ngibe mpofu, ngebe, ngilone igama likaNkulunkulu wami. 
20_30_10_“Ungahlebi inceku enkosini yayo, funa ikuthuke, ube necala. 
20_30_11_“Kukhona isizukulwane esithuka uyise, esingabusisi unina. 
20_30_12_Kukhona isizukulwane esimhlophe emehlweni aso, esingahlanzwanga ensileni yaso. 
20_30_13_Kukhona isizukulwane yeka ukuzidla kwaso! Nezinkophe zaso ziphakanyisiwe. 
20_30_14_Kukhona isizukulwane esimazinyo aso ayizinkemba namazinyo emihlathi angomese bokuqeda abampofu emhlabeni, nabaswelayo phakathi kwabantu. 
20_30_15_“Umnyundu unamadodakazi amabili athi: ‘Siphe, siphe.’ “Kukhona izinto ezintathu ezingasuthi, nezine ezingasho ukuthi: ‘Kwanele!’: 
20_30_16_indawo yabafileyo, nesizalo esiyinyumba, nomhlaba ongasuthi ngamanzi, nomlilo ongasho ukuthi: ‘Kwanele!’ 
20_30_17_“Iso eliklolodela uyise nelidelela ukulalela unina liyakukhishwa ngamagwababa angasemfuleni, lidliwe ngamazinyane okhozi. 
20_30_18_“Kukhona izinto ezintathu ezingahlula ngokumangalisa, yebo, ezine engingazaziyo: 
20_30_19_indlela yokhozi emoyeni, nendlela yenyoka edwaleni, nendlela yomkhumbi phakathi kolwandle, nendlela yendoda entombini. 
20_30_20_“Inje indlela yowesifazane ophingayo: uyadla, abesesula umlomo wakhe, athi: ‘Angenzanga isono.’ 
20_30_21_“Phansi kwezinto ezintathu umhlaba uyazamazama, yebo, phansi kwezine ongezithwale: 
20_30_22_phansi kwenceku ekubekweni kwayo inkosi, nesiwula uma sisuthile ngokudla, 
20_30_23_naphansi kwesaliwakazi ekuganeni kwaso, nencekukazi ekulidleni ifa lenkosikazi yayo. 
20_30_24_“Kukhona izinto ezine ezincane emhlabeni, kepha zihlakaniphile kakhulu: 
20_30_25_izintuthwane ziyisizwe esingenamandla, kanti ziyalungisa ukudla kwazo ehlobo; 
20_30_26_izimbila ziyisizwe esibuthakathaka, kanti ziyakha izindlu zazo edwaleni; 
20_30_27_izinkumbi azinankosi, kanti ziyaphuma zonke ngamaviyo; 
20_30_28_isibankwa ungasibamba ngezandla zombili, kanti sisendlini yenkosi. 
20_30_29_“Kukhona izinto ezintathu ezinyathela ngesizotha, yebo, ezine ezihamba ngesithunzi: 
20_30_30_ingonyama, iqhawe ezilwaneni; ayihlehli nakusiphi; 
20_30_31_nehhashi lempi kanye nempongo, nenkosi phambi kwempi yayo. 
20_30_32_“Uma wenzile ubuwula ngokuziphakamisa. wacabanga okubi, beka isandla emlonyeni wakho. 
20_30_33_Ngokuba ukuphehla ubisi kuveza iphehlwa, nokucindezelwa kwempumulo kuveza igazi; kanjalo ukucindezela ulaka kuveza ukuxabana.” 
20_31_1_Amazwi kaLemuweli, inkosi yaseMasa, awafundiswa ngunina. 
20_31_2_“Yini, ndodana yami, yini, ndodana yesizalo sami, yini, ndodana yezithembiso zami, na? 
20_31_3_Unganiki abesifazane amandla akho, nezindlela zakho kwababhubhisa amakhosi. 
20_31_4_“Akusikho okwamakhosi, Lemuweli, akusikho okwamakhosi ukuphuza iwayini, nokwababusi ukufisa uphuzo olunamandla, 
20_31_5_funa baphuze, bakhohlwe izimiso, baguqule ukwahlulelwa kwabantwana bokuhlupheka. 
20_31_6_Mnike obhubhayo uphuzo olunamandla nomunyu enhliziyweni iwayini. 
20_31_7_Makaphuze akhohlwe ubumpofu bakhe, angabe esakhumbula usizi lwakhe. 
20_31_8_“Sivulele isimungulu umlomo wakho, umele bonke abantwana abayizintandane. 
20_31_9_Vula umlomo wakho, wahlulele ngokulunga, umele abahluphekayo nabampofu.” 
20_31_10_Ngubani ongathola umfazi okhutheleyo na? Ngokuba inani lakhe lidlula kakhulu amarubi. 
20_31_11_Inhliziyo yendoda yakhe iyethemba kuye; ayiyikuswela inzuzo. 
20_31_12_Uyayenzela okuhle, kungabi ngokubi, zonke izinsuku zokuphila kwakhe. 
20_31_13_Ufuna uboya bezimvu nefilakisi; usebenza ngezandla ezivumayo. 
20_31_14_Unjengemikhumbi yabathengi; ulanda kude ukudla kwakhe. 
20_31_15_Uyavuka kuse sebusuku, aphe abendlu yakhe ukudla namantombazana akhe imisebenzi yawo. 
20_31_16_Ucabanga ngensimu, ayithenge; ngesithelo sezandla zakhe utshala isivini, 
20_31_17_Uyabhinca okhalweni amandla; uyaqinisa izingalo zakhe. 
20_31_18_Uyabona ukuthi ukuphatha kwakhe kunenzuzo; isibani sakhe asicimeki nasebusuku. 
20_31_19_Uyabeka izandla zakhe othini lokuphotha izintambo, neminwe yakhe ibamba insimbi. 
20_31_20_Ohluphekayo uyamvulela isandla sakhe, yebo, uzelulela abampofu izandla zakhe. 
20_31_21_Akesatshiswa ngabendlu yakhe ngungqoqwane; ngokuba bonke abendlu yakhe bembathiswa okubomvu. 
20_31_22_Uyazenzela izindwangu ezimbozayo; izambatho zakhe ziyilineni elicolekileyo nokububende. 
20_31_23_Indoda yakhe iyaziwa emasangweni, lapho ihlezi namalunga ezwe. 
20_31_24_Wenza izingubo zelineni, athengise ngazo, anikele kubathengi amabhande. 
20_31_25_Amandla nesithunzi kungukwembatha kwakhe; uhleka usuku oluzayo. 
20_31_26_Uyawuvula umlomo wakhe ngokuhlakanipha, nomthetho womusa usolimini lwakhe. 
20_31_27_Uyaqaphela okwenziwayo endlini yakhe, akadli isinkwa sobuvila. 
20_31_28_Abantwana bakhe bayasukuma, bambusise; nendoda yakhe iyamdumisa ngokuthi: 
20_31_29_“Baningi abafazi abakhutheleyo, kepha wena ubadlula bonke.” 
20_31_30_Ubuhle buyinkohliso, nokubukeka kuyize, kepha owesifazane owesaba uJehova uyakudunyiswa. 
20_31_31_Muphe ezithelweni zezandla zakhe, izenzo zakhe zimdumise emasangweni. 
21_1_1_Amazwi oMshumayeli indodana kaDavide, inkosi yaseJerusalema. 
21_1_2_“Ize leze,” usho uMshumayeli, “ize leze, konke kuyize.” 
21_1_3_Kuyinzuzoni kumuntu ngawo wonke umshikashika wakhe awushikashikayo phansi kwelanga na? 
21_1_4_Isizukulwane siyamuka, isizukulwane siyeza, kepha umhlaba umi phakade. 
21_1_5_Ilanga liyaphuma, ilanga liyashona, lishesha ukuya endaweni yalo lapho liphuma khona. 
21_1_6_Umoya uya ngaseningizimu, uzungeze, uye ngasenyakatho; uzungazungeza njalo ekuhambeni kwawo, nasekuzungezeni kwawo umoya uyabuyela. 
21_1_7_Yonke imifula iyangena elwandle, kepha ulwandle alugcwali; endaweni eya kuyo imifula, ibuye iye khona njalo. 
21_1_8_Zonke izinto ziyakhandleka, akakho ongakuphimisa; iso alisuthi ngokubona, nendlebe ayigcwali ngokuzwa. 
21_1_9_Okwake kwaba khona yikho okuyakuba khona, nokwake kwenziwa yikho okuyakwenziwa; akukho okusha phansi kwelanga. 
21_1_10_Kukhona yini into okuthiwa ngayo: “Bheka, intsha le.” Yayikhona nasemandulo ayengaphambi kwethu. 
21_1_11_Akukho ukukhunjulwa kwase bephelile, nabalandelayo abayakufika abayikukhunjulwa nabo phakathi kwabalandela bona. 
21_1_12_Mina Mshumayeli ngangiyinkosi phezu kuka-Israyeli eJerusalema. 
21_1_13_Nganikela inhliziyo yami ukufuna nokuvivinya ngokuhlakanipha konke okwenziwa phansi kwezulu; kungumshikashika omubi uNkulunkulu awunikile amadodana abantu ukuba awushikashike. 
21_1_14_Ngiyibonile yonke imisebenzi eyenziwayo phansi kwelanga; bheka, konke kuyize nokufuna umoya. 
21_1_15_Okuyisigwegwe akunakuqondiswa, nokungekho akunakubalwa. 
21_1_16_Ngakhuluma mina nenhliziyo yami, ngathi: “Bheka, ngenzile ukuhlakanipha kube kukhulu, ngikwandisile kunabo bonke phambi kwami eJerusalema, yebo, inhliziyo yami ibonile kakhulu ukuhlakanipha nokwazi.” 
21_1_17_Nganikela inhliziyo yami ukwazi ukuhlakanipha nokwazi ubuhlanya nobuwula. Ngase ngibona ukuthi nalokho kwakungukufuna umoya. 
21_1_18_Ngokuba ekuhlakanipheni okuningi kukhona ukukhathazeka okuningi; owandisa ukwazi wandisa usizi. 
21_2_1_Ngase ngithi mina enhliziyweni yami: “Woza, ngizakukulinga ngentokozo; mawubone okuhle nje.” Kepha nalokho kwakuyize. 
21_2_2_Ngathi ngokuhleka: “Ngubuhlanya,” nangentokozo: “Yenzani na?” 
21_2_3_Ngaphenya enhliziyweni yami ukuba ngiyakuthokozisa kanjani umzimba wami ngewayini, inhliziyo ingihole nokho ngokuhlakanipha, nokuba ngibambe ubuwula, ngize ngibone ukuthi kuyini okuhle kumadodana abantu ukuba akwenze phansi kwezulu ezinsukwini zonke zokuphila kwawo. 
21_2_4_Ngazenzela imisebenzi emikhulu, ngazakhela izindlu, ngazitshalela izivini, 
21_2_5_ngazenzela izivande namahlathi, ngatshala khona imithi enezithelo zezinhlobo zonke, 
21_2_6_ngazenzela amachibi amanzi ukuba kuniselwe ngawo ihlathi lemithi emilayo. 
21_2_7_Ngathenga izinceku nezincekukazi, nganginazo ezazalwa endlini; yebo, nganginemfuyo enkulu yezinkomo neyezimvu phezu kwakho konke okwakuphambi kwami eJerusalema. 
21_2_8_Ngazibuthela futhi isiliva negolide, nemfuyo yamakhosi, nezifunda; ngathola abahlabeleli, abesilisa nabesifazane, nalokho athokoza ngakho amadodana abantu: isancinza, yebo, izancinza eziningi. 
21_2_9_Ngase ngikhula ngaba mkhulu kunabo bonke ababe phambi kwami eJerusalema. Nokuhlakanipha kwami kwakumi ngakimi. 
21_2_10_Konke amehlo ami akufisayo angikugodlanga kuwo; angenqabelanga inhliziyo yami neyodwa intokozo, ngokuba inhliziyo yami yathokoza ngawo wonke umshikashika wami; lokho kwakuyisabelo sami kuwo wonke umshikashika wami. 
21_2_11_Ngase ngibhekana nemisebenzi yonke ezaziyenzile izandla zami, nomshikashika engangishikashikile ukuwenza; bheka, konke kwakuyize nokufuna umoya, akukho nzuzo phansi kwelanga. 
21_2_12_Ngase ngiphenduka ukuba ngibone ukuhlakanipha, nokuhlanya, nobuwula, ngokuba angenzani umuntu olandela inkosi ngaphandle kwalokho okwenziweyo ngaphambili na? 
21_2_13_Ngase ngibona ukuthi ukuhlakanipha kudlula ubuwula njengalokhu ukukhanya kudlula ubumnyama. 
21_2_14_Ohlakaniphileyo unamehlo ekhanda lakhe, kepha isiwula sihamba ebumnyameni; nokho ngabona ukuthi umehlo munye wehlela bonke. 
21_2_15_Ngase ngithi enhliziyweni yami: “Njengokwehlelwa kwesiwula ngiyakwehlelwa nami; ngisidluleleni ngokuhlakanipha na?” Ngathi-ke enhliziyweni yami ukuba nalokho kwakuyize. 
21_2_16_Ngokuba akukho ukukhunjulwa kohlakaniphileyo nokwesiwula kuze kube phakade, lokhu ezinsukwini ezizayo konke kuyakube sekukhohlakele. Nohlakaniphileyo akafi njengesiwula na? 
21_2_17_Ngase ngizonda ukuphila, ngokuba umsebenzi owenziwa phansi kwelanga mubi kimi, lokhu konke kuyize nokufuna umoya nje. 
21_2_18_Yebo, ngazonda wonke umshikashika wami engangiwushikashika phansi kwelanga, lokhu ngabona ukuthi ngizakuwushiya kumuntu ofika emva kwami. 
21_2_19_Ngubani owaziyo, uma eyakuba ngumuntu ohlakaniphileyo noma isiwula na? Nokho uyakubusa phezu kwawo wonke umshikashika wami engiwushikashikile nengihlakaniphele kuwo phansi kwelanga. Nalokho kuyize. 
21_2_20_Ngase ngibuye ngaphela ithemba ngawo wonke umshikashika engangiwushikashikile phansi kwelanga. 
21_2_21_Ngokuba kukhona umuntu omshikashika wakhe wenziwe ngokuhlakanipha, nangokwazi, nangekhono, kepha nokho uyakuwunikeza kumuntu ongawushikashikanga kube yisabelo sakhe. Nalokho kuyize nobubi obukhulu. 
21_2_22_Ngokuba umuntu unanzuzoni yawo wonke umshikashika wakhe nokukhandleka kwenhliziyo yakhe akushikashikile phansi kwelanga na? 
21_2_23_Ngokuba zonke izinsuku zakhe zinobuhlungu, nomsebenzi wakhe ulusizi; yebo, nasebusuku inhliziyo yakhe ayiphumuli; nalokho kuyize. 
21_2_24_Akukho okuhle kumuntu kunalokhu kokuba adle, aphuze, abonise umphefumulo wakhe okuhle emshikashikeni wakhe, kepha nalokho ngakubona ukuthi kuvela esandleni sikaNkulunkulu. 
21_2_25_Ngokuba ngubani ongadla, ngubani ongajabula ngaphandle kwakhe na? 
21_2_26_Ngokuba umuntu omuhle kuNkulunkulu uyamnika ukuhlakanipha, nokwazi, nentokozo, kepha isoni usinika usizi lokuba sibuthe, siqongelele, ukuze simnike yena omuhle kuNkulunkulu. Nalokho kuyize nokufuna umoya. 
21_3_1_Konke kunesikhathi sakho, yonke indaba inomzuzu wayo phansi kwezulu. 
21_3_2_Kukhona isikhathi sokuzalwa nesikhathi sokufa, isikhathi sokutshala nesikhathi sokusiphula okutshaliweyo; 
21_3_3_isikhathi sokubulala nesikhathi sokuphilisa, isikhathi sokudiliza nesikhathi sokwakha; 
21_3_4_isikhathi sokukhala nesikhathi sokuhleka, isikhathi sokulila nesikhathi sokusina; 
21_3_5_isikhathi sokuphonsa amatshe nesikhathi sokuqoqa amatshe, isikhathi sokugona nesikhathi sokungagoni; 
21_3_6_isikhathi sokufuna nesikhathi sokulahlekelwa, isikhathi sokugcina nesikhathi sokuhlahla; 
21_3_7_isikhathi sokuklebhula nesikhathi sokuthunga, isikhathi sokuthula nesikhathi sokukhuluma; 
21_3_8_isikhathi sokuthanda nesikhathi sokuzonda, isikhathi sokulwa nesikhathi sokuzola. 
21_3_9_Unanzuzoni osebenzayo ngalokho akushikashikayo na? 
21_3_10_Ngibonile umshikashika uNkulunkulu awunikile amadodana abantu ukuba awushikashike. 
21_3_11_Wenzile konke kube kuhle esikhathini sakho, ubekile nokuphakade ezinhliziyweni zabo; nokho umuntu angefumane umsebenzi awenzile uNkulunkulu kwasekuqaleni kuze kube sekupheleni. 
21_3_12_Ngiyazi ukuthi akukho okuhle kubo kunokuba bathokoze, bazenzele okumnandi besekhona. 
21_3_13_Kepha futhi ukuba abantu bonke badle, baphuze, babone okuhle kuwo wonke umshikashika wabo kuyisipho sikaNkulunkulu nalokho. 
21_3_14_Ngiyazi ukuthi konke akwenzayo uNkulunkulu kuyakuba khona kuze kube phakade; akukho okungenezelwa kukho, futhi akukho okungasuswa kukho. UNkulunkulu ukwenzile ukuba abantu besabe phambi kwakhe. 
21_3_15_Lokhu okukhona yikho okwakukhona, nalokhu okuyakuba khona kade kwakukhona; uNkulunkulu ufuna okudlulileyo. 
21_3_16_Futhi ngabona phansi kwelanga ukuthi kukhona okubi endaweni yokwahlulela nokuthi kukhona ukushinga endaweni yokulunga. 
21_3_17_Ngase ngithi enhliziyweni yami: “UNkulunkulu uyakwahlulela nolungileyo nomubi, ngokuba kukhona lapha isikhathi sezindaba zonke nesemisebenzi yonke.” 
21_3_18_Ngathi enhliziyweni yami: “Kungenxa yamadodana abantu ukuze uNkulunkulu awavivinye, wona azibonele ukuthi anjengezilwane nje. 
21_3_19_Ngokuba okwehlela amadodana abantu kwehlela nezilwane, into inye ikwehlela kokubili: njengalokhu kufa lokho, kuyafa nalokhu; kunomphefumulo munye, umuntu akazidluli ngalutho izilwane, ngokuba konke kuyize. 
21_3_20_Konke kuya endaweni inye; konke kuvela othulini, konke kubuyela othulini. 
21_3_21_Ngubani owaziyo ukuthi umoya wamadodana abantu ukhuphukela phezulu, nomoya wezilwane ukuthi wehlela phansi emhlabathini, na?” 
21_3_22_Ngase ngibona-ke ukuthi akukho okungcono kunokuba umuntu athokoze ngemisebenzi yakhe, lokhu kuyisabelo sakhe, ngokuba ngubani ongambuyisa ukuba abone okuyakuba semva kwakhe na? 
21_4_1_Ngase ngibuye ngabona konke ukucindezela okwenziwa phansi kwelanga; bheka izinyembezi zabacindezelwayo; babengenamduduzi. Ohlangothini lwababacindezelayo kwakukhona amandla, kepha bona babengenamduduzi. 
21_4_2_Ngase ngibusisa abafileyo asebafa kunabaphilayo abasekhona, 
21_4_3_kepha badlulwa bobabili nguye ongakabikho, ongabonanga umsebenzi omubi owenziwa phansi kwelanga. 
21_4_4_Futhi ngabona wonke umshikashika nakho konke okwenziwe ngekhono ukuthi kungumhawu womuntu ngomakhelwane wakhe. Nalokho kuyize nokufuna umoya. 
21_4_5_Isiwula siyasonga izandla zaso, sidle umzimba waso. 
21_4_6_Kungcono ukhweshe lokuthula kunezandla zombili zigcwele umshikashika kanye nokufuna umoya. 
21_4_7_Ngase ngibuye ngabona okunye okuyize phansi kwelanga: 
21_4_8_Kukhona oyedwa, kanaye owesibili, yebo, akanamntwana, kanamfowabo, nokho ukuphela komshikashika wakhe akukho, namehlo akhe awasuthi ngengcebo. Uthi: “Ngishikashikela-bani, ngiswezisela umphefumulo wami ngokuhle, na?” Nalokho kuyize nenhlupheko embi. 
21_4_9_Kungcono ababili kunoyedwa, ngokuba banomvuzo omkhulu ngomshikashika wabo. 
21_4_10_Ngokuba uma bewa, omunye uyavusa umngane wakhe; kepha maye kuye oyedwa lapho ewa, engenawesibili wokumvusa! 
21_4_11_Futhi uma ababili belele ndawonye, banokufudumala, kepha oyedwa angafudumala kanjani na? 
21_4_12_Nakuba umuntu ahlula oyedwa, ababili bayakuma phambi kwakhe, nentambo emicu mithathu ayisheshi ukugqashuka. 
21_4_13_Kungcono umfana ompofu ohlakaniphileyo kunenkosi egugileyo eyisiwula, engasakwazi ukuxwayiswa, 
21_4_14_ngokuba waphuma etilongweni ukuba abe yinkosi, yebo, wazalwa embusweni wayo empofu. 
21_4_15_Ngabona bonke abaphilayo ababehamba phansi kwelanga bekanye nalowo mfana obeyakuma esikhundleni sakhe; 
21_4_16_kwakungekho ukuphela kwabantu bonke, bonke ayephambi kwabo; nokho abafika emuva abayikuthokoza ngaye. Impela nalokho kuyize nokufuna umoya. 
21_5_1_Gcina unyawo lwakho, lapho uya endlini kaNkulunkulu, ngokuba ukusondela ukuyokuzwa kungcono kunokunikela ngomhlatshelo weziwula, ngokuba azazi ukuthi zenza okubi. 
21_5_2_Ungabi namawala ngomlomo wakho, nenhliziyo yakho mayingasheshi ukukhipha izwi phambi kukaNkulunkulu, ngokuba uNkulunkulu usezulwini, wena usemhlabeni; ngalokho amazwi akho mawabe yingcosana. 
21_5_3_Ngokuba iphupho livela ngemisebenzi eminingi nephimbo lesiwula ngobuningi bamazwi. 
21_5_4_Lapho wenza isithembiso phambi kukaNkulunkulu, ungalibali ukusifeza, ngokuba akathokozi ngeziwula: feza lokhu okwethembisayo. 
21_5_5_Kungcono ukuba ungenzi isithembiso kunokuba uthembisa ungafezi. 
21_5_6_Ungavumeli umlomo wakho ukuba wonise inyama yakho, futhi ungasho phambi kwesithunywa sikaNkulunkulu ukuthi kuyiphutha; yini ukuba uNkulunkulu athukuthelele izwi lakho, achithe umsebenzi wezandla zakho, na? 
21_5_7_Ngokuba lapho kukhona amaphupho amaningi, kukhona nokuyize namazwi amaningi, kepha wena yesaba uNkulunkulu. 
21_5_8_Uma ubona ukudlovelwa kwabampofu nokuphangwa kokwahlulela nokokulunga ezweni, ungamangali ngakho, ngokuba omkhulu uqaphela omkhulu kunaye, futhi kukhona nabakhulu kunabo. 
21_5_9_Inkosi esebenzela amasimu iyinsizakalo yezwe kukho konke. 
21_5_10_Othanda imali akayikusutha ngemali, nothanda okuningi akaneliswa yizithelo; nalokho kuyize. 
21_5_11_Lapho okuhle kwanda, nabakudlayo bayanda; kulusizo luni kumninikho ngaphandle kokuba akubone ngamehlo akhe na? 
21_5_12_Ubuthongo besisebenzi bumnandi, noma sidla okuyingcosana noma okuningi, kepha ukusutha kocebileyo akumvumeli ukuba alale. 
21_5_13_Kukhona ububi obudabukisayo engibubonile phansi kwelanga: ingcebo egcinelwe umniniyo ukuba imlimaze; 
21_5_14_futhi uma ingcebo ichithwa ngengozi embi, indodana ayizalileyo ayinalutho esandleni sayo. 
21_5_15_Njengalokho aphuma esizalweni sikanina, uyakubuye amuke, ahambe ze njengasekufikeni kwakhe, engatholi lutho ngomshikashika wakhe, ahambe nalo esandleni sakhe. 
21_5_16_Nalokho kungububi obudabukisayo ukuthi uyamuka kukho konke njengokufika kwakhe; unanzuzoni ukuthi ushikashikele umoya na? 
21_5_17_Yebo, zonke izinsuku zakhe zisebumnyameni nasosizini, nasekukhathazekeni okuningi, nasekuguleni, nasekuthukutheleni. 
21_5_18_Bheka, engikubonile mina ukuthi kuhle nokumnandi kumuntu kungukudla, nokuphuza, nokubona okuhle kuwo wonke umshikashika wakhe awushikashikayo phansi kwelanga zonke izinsuku zokuphila kwakhe uNkulunkulu amnika zona; ngokuba lokhu kuyisabelo sakhe. 
21_5_19_Futhi bonke abantu uNkulunkulu abaphe ingcebo nemfuyo, abanike futhi namandla okudla kukho ukuba bathathe izabelo zabo, bathokoze ngomshikashika wabo lokho kuyisipho sikaNkulunkulu. 
21_5_20_Ngokuba akakhumbuli kakhulu izinsuku zokuphila kwakhe, lokhu uNkulunkulu emnika intokozo enhliziyweni yakhe. 
21_6_1_Kukhona ububi engibubonile phansi kwelanga ukuthi bunzima phezu kwabantu: 
21_6_2_umuntu uNkulunkulu amnika ingcebo, nemfuyo, nodumo, aze angasweli lutho lomphefumulo wakhe kukho konke akufisayo, uNkulunkulu angamniki nokho amandla okudla kukho, kepha kudliwa ngumfokazi; lokho kuyize, kuyisifo esibi. 
21_6_3_Uma umuntu ezala abantwana abayikhulu, ehamba iminyaka eminingi, zibe ziningi izinsuku zeminyaka yakhe, kodwa umphefumulo wakhe ungasuthi ngokuhle, futhi angabi nakumbelwa, ngithi okuphuphumileyo kungcono kunaye, 
21_6_4_ngokuba kufika ngeze, kumuke ebumnyameni, igama lakho lisitshekelwa ngubumnyama. 
21_6_5_Nelanga akulibonanga, akwazi lutho; khona kunokuphumula kunaye. 
21_6_6_Yebo, noma ephila iminyaka eyinkulungwane ephindwa kabili, engaboni okuhle, abayi bonke endaweni inye na? 
21_6_7_Wonke umshikashika womuntu wenzelwa umlomo wakhe, nokho iphango alaneliswa. 
21_6_8_Ngokuba ohlakaniphileyo udluleleni isiwula, nompofu okwazi ukuhamba phambi kwabaphilileyo unantoni na? 
21_6_9_Kungcono ukubona kwamehlo kunokuzulazula kwesifiso; nalokhu kuyize nokufuna umoya. 
21_6_10_Okukhona kwake kwabizwa ngegama; kwaziwa ukuthi umuntu uyakuba yini; akanakwahlulelana nonamandla kunaye. 
21_6_11_Lokhu kukhona amazwi amaningi akwandisa okuyize, umuntu unanzuzoni na? 
21_6_12_Ngokuba ngubani okwaziyo okuhle okuyakuba ngokomuntu ekuhambeni kwakhe zonke izinsuku zokuhamba kwakhe okuyize aziqedayo njengesithunzi na? Ngubani ongatshela umuntu okuyakuba semva kwakhe phansi kwelanga na? 
21_7_1_Igama elihle lingcono kunamafutha amahle, nosuku lokufa lungcono kunosuku lokuzalwa. 
21_7_2_Kungcono ukuya endlini yokulila kunokuya endlini yedili, ngokuba lokho kungukuphela kwabantu bonke; nophilayo makakubeke enhliziyweni yakhe. 
21_7_3_Usizi lungcono kunokuhleka, ngokuba ngokudabuka kobuso inhliziyo yenzelwa okuhle. 
21_7_4_Inhliziyo yabahlakaniphileyo isendlini yokulila, kepha inhliziyo yeziwula isendlini yentokozo. 
21_7_5_Kungcono ukuzwa ukukhuza kohlakaniphileyo kunokuba umuntu ezwe ukuhlabelela kweziwula. 
21_7_6_Njengokucacamba kwezintathawe eziphansi kwekhanzi, kunjalo ukuhleka kweziwula. Nalokho kuyize. 
21_7_7_Impela ukucindezela kuyamhlanyisa ohlakaniphileyo, nokuthengwa ngomvuzo kuchitha ingqondo. 
21_7_8_Kungcono ukuphela kwendaba kunokuqala kwayo; onomoya obekezelayo ungcono kunoziphakamisayo. 
21_7_9_Ungasheshi ukuthukuthela emoyeni wakho, ngokuba ulaka luhlala ezifubeni zeziwula. 
21_7_10_Ungasho ukuthi: “Kwenziwa kanjani ukuba izinsuku zokuqala zazizinhle kunalezi na?” Ngokuba awubuzi kanjalo ngokuhlakanipha. 
21_7_11_Ukuhlakanipha kuhle njengefa, yebo, kunenzuzo kwabalibonayo ilanga, 
21_7_12_ngokuba kusemthunzini wokuhlakanipha njengasemthunzini wemali, kepha inzuzo yokwazi ingeyokuba ukuhlakanipha kulondoloza ukuphila kwalowo onakho. 
21_7_13_Bona umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu, ngokuba ngubani ongelula lokho akugobileyo na? 
21_7_14_Yenama ngosuku lwenhlanhla, kepha ngosuku olubi qonda ukuthi nalolu uNkulunkulu ulwenzile njengalolo, ukuze umuntu angafumani lutho oluyakuba khona emva kwakhe. 
21_7_15_Konke ngikubonile emihleni yami eyize: kukhona olungileyo obhubhile ekulungeni kwakhe, kukhona nomubi owelula ukuphila kwakhe ebubini bakhe. 
21_7_16_Ungabi ngolungileyo ngokudluleleyo, ungazenzi ohlakaniphileyo kakhulu; uzichithelani na? 
21_7_17_Ungabi mubi ngokudluleleyo, ungabi yisiwula; uyakufelani kungakabi yisikhathi na? 
21_7_18_kuhle ukuba ubambelele kulokhu, yebo, ungabuyisi isandla sakho nakulokho, ngokuba owesaba uNkulunkulu uyakuphumelela kukho konke. 
21_7_19_Ukuhlakanipha kumenza ohlakaniphileyo ukuba abe namandla kunababusi abayishumi abasemzini. 
21_7_20_Ngokuba akukho muntu emhlabeni olungileyo kangaka ukuba enze okuhle, angoni. 
21_7_21_Ungabeki inhliziyo yakho emazwini onke akhulunywayo, funa uzwe inceku yakho ikuthuka, 
21_7_22_ngokuba kaninginingi inhliziyo yakho iyazi ukuba nawe ubathukile abanye. 
21_7_23_Konke lokho ngikuvivinyile ngokuhlakanipha, ngathi: “Ngiyakuhlakanipha,” kepha kwakusala kude nami. 
21_7_24_Okude nokujulile kakhulu, ngubani ongakufumana na? 
21_7_25_Ngase ngiphenduka ukuba inhliziyo yami yazi, ihlole, ifune ukuhlakanipha nendikimba yezindaba ukuyokwazi ububi ukuthi bungubuwula, nobuwula ukuthi bungubuhlanya. 
21_7_26_Ngase ngifumana okubaba kunokufa: owesifazane onhliziyo yakhe iyizingibe namanetha, nezandla zakhe ziyizibopho; omuhle phambi kukaNkulunkulu uyakuphunyuka kuye, kepha isoni siyakubanjwa nguye. 
21_7_27_“Bheka, nakhu engikufumene,” uthi uMshumayeli: “Ngibeka okunye kokunye ukuba ngithole indikimba yezindaba, 
21_7_28_nokusafunwa ngumphefumulo wami, ngingakakufumani kodwa: indoda inye phakathi kwenkulungwane ngiyifumene, kepha owesifazane phakathi kwabo bonke labo angimfumananga. 
21_7_29_Bheka, lokhu kuphela ngikufumene ukuthi uNkulunkulu wamenza umuntu waba qotho, kepha bona bafunile amacebo amaningi.” 
21_8_1_Ngubani onjengohlakaniphileyo na? Ngubani owazi ukuchasisela indaba na? Ukuhlakanipha komuntu kuyakhanyisa ubuso bakhe, nobulukhuni bobuso bakhe buyaguqulwa. 
21_8_2_Ngithi: Gcina izwi lenkosi ngenxa yesifungo ngoNkulunkulu. 
21_8_3_Ungasheshi ukusuka ebusweni bayo, ungemi endabeni embi, ngokuba yenza konke ekuthandayo. 
21_8_4_Ngokuba izwi lenkosi liyabusa; ngubani ongasho kuyo ukuthi: “Wenzani na?” 
21_8_5_Ogcina umyalo akayikwazi okubi: nenhliziyo yohlakaniphileyo iyakwazi isikhathi nokwahlulela, 
21_8_6_ngokuba kukhona isikhathi nokwahlulela ezindabeni zonke; nokho ububi bomuntu bukhulu phezu kwakhe, 
21_8_7_lokhu engazi okuyakuba khona, ngokuba ngubani ongamtshela ukuthi kuyakuba kanjani na? 
21_8_8_Akukho muntu onamandla phezu komoya ukuba awuthiye, futhi akakho obusa phezu kosuku lokufa; ukukhululwa akukho empini, nobubi abunakukhulula umninibo. 
21_8_9_Ngabona konke lokho, ngabeka inhliziyo yami kuyo yonke imisebenzi eyenziwa phansi kwelanga ngesikhathi lapho umuntu ebusa omunye kube ngukulimala kwakhe. 
21_8_10_Kanjalo ngabona ukuthi ababi bembelwa, ababengenile bephuma endaweni engcwele, bababazeka emzini lapho kade benza okunjalo; nalokho kuyize. 
21_8_11_Ngenxa yokuba ububi obenziwayo bungahlulelwa masinyane, ngalokho izinhliziyo zamadodana abantu phakathi kwawo zigcwele ukwenza okubi, 
21_8_12_ngangokuba isoni, noma senza okubi kayikhulu, kuyandiswa nokho izinsuku zaso. Kanti nokho ngiyazi ukuthi kuzakuba kuhle kwabamesabayo uNkulunkulu, lokhu besaba phambi kobuso bakhe; 
21_8_13_kodwa akuyikuba kuhle kwababi, nemihla yabo ayiyikwandiswa njengesithunzi, lokhu abesabi phambi kukaNkulunkulu. 
21_8_14_Kukhona okuyize okwenziwa emhlabeni kokuthi kukhona abalungileyo abehlelwa ngokomsebenzi wababi, nokuthi kukhona ababi abehlelwa ngokomsebenzi wabalungileyo; ngathi: “Nalokho kuyize.” 
21_8_15_Ngase ngibabaza intokozo, ngokuba umuntu akanakho okuhle phansi kwelanga kunokudla, nokuphuza, nokujabula; lokhu kuyakuhlala kuye emshikashikeni wakhe ezinsukwini zokuphila kwakhe aziphiweyo nguNkulunkulu phansi kwelanga. 
21_8_16_Lapho ngibeka inhliziyo yami ukukwazi ukuhlakanipha nokubona umshikashika owenziwa emhlabeni, ngokuba akakho obona ubuthongo ngamehlo akhe imini nobusuku, 
21_8_17_ngase ngiqonda wonke umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu ukuthi umuntu akanakuwubamba umsebenzi owenziwa phansi kwelanga, ngokuba noma umuntu eshikashikeka kangakanani ukuwuhlola, angewuthole, yebo, nakuba ohlakaniphileyo ecabanga ukuthi uyawazi, akanakuwuthola. 
21_9_1_Ngokuba konke lokho ngakubeka enhliziyweni yami ukuhlola konke lokho ukuthi abalungileyo nabahlakaniphileyo nemisebenzi yabo kusesandleni sikaNkulunkulu; noma kuluthando noma kuyinzondo, akukho muntu okwaziyo; konke kusebusweni babo. 
21_9_2_Konke kungabehlela bonke, olungileyo nomubi, omuhle nohlambulukileyo nongcolileyo, onikela ngomhlatshelo nongenawo umhlatshelo, omuhle abe njengesoni, ofungayo njengowesaba isifungo. 
21_9_3_Kubi lokhu kukho konke okwenziwa phansi kwelanga ukuthi bonke behlelwa yinto inye; ngalokho izinhliziyo zamadodana abantu zigcwele ububi, nobuhlanya busezinhliziyweni zabo besekhona, andukuba baye kwabafileyo. 
21_9_4_Ohlangene nabo bonke abaphilayo kukhona ithemba kuye, ngokuba inja ephilayo ingcono kunengonyama efileyo. 
21_9_5_Ngokuba abaphilayo bayazi ukuthi bayakufa, kepha abafileyo abazi lutho, futhi abasenawo umvuzo, ngokuba ukukhunjulwa kwabo sekukhohlakele. 
21_9_6_Uthando lwabo, nokuzonda kwabo, nomhawu wabo sekuphelile, futhi abasenaso isabelo nanini kukho konke okwenziwa phansi kwelanga. 
21_9_7_Hamba udle isinkwa sakho ngentokozo, uphuze iwayini ngenhliziyo enhle, ngokuba uNkulunkulu usevumile imisebenzi yakho. 
21_9_8_Izingubo zakho mazibe mhlophe ngezikhathi zonke, nekhanda lakho malingasweli amafutha. 
21_9_9_Thokoza ngokuphila nomkakho omthandayo zonke izinsuku zokuphila kwakho okuyize, oziphiwayo phansi kwelanga zonke izinsuku zakho eziyize, ngokuba lokhu kuyisabelo sakho kulokho kuphila ngomshikashika wakho owushikashikayo phansi kwelanga. 
21_9_10_Konke isandla sakho esikufumanayo ukukwenza, kwenze ngamandla akho, ngokuba akukho msebenzi, namcabango, nakwazi, nakuhlakanipha endaweni yabafileyo, lapho uya khona. 
21_9_11_Ngabuye ngabona phansi kwelanga ukuthi ukujaha akuyi ngabanejubane, nokulwa ngamaqhawe, nesinkwa ngabahlakaniphileyo, nengcebo ngabaqondileyo, nomusa ngabanokwazi, ngokuba bonke bahlangabezana nesikhathi nethuba. 
21_9_12_Ngokuba umuntu akasazi isikhathi sakhe; njengezinhlanzi ezibanjwa enetheni elibi nezinyoni ezibanjwa ogibeni, kanjalo amadodana abantu abekelwa isihibe ngesikhathi esibi, lapho siwehlela ngokuzumayo. 
21_9_13_Ngabona futhi ukuhlakanipha ngale ndlela phansi kwelanga, kwaba kukhulu kimi: 
21_9_14_kwakukhona umuzi omncane, unabantu abayingcosana phakathi kwawo; kwafika inkosi enkulu kuwo, yawuvimbezela, yakha izinqaba ezinkulu ngakuwo; 
21_9_15_kepha kwafunyanwa kuwo indoda empofu ehlakaniphileyo; yawukhulula umuzi ngokuhlakanipha kwayo, kodwa nokho akakho okhumbula leyo ndoda empofu. 
21_9_16_Ngase ngithi: “Ukuhlakanipha kuhle kunamandla,” kepha ukuhlakanipha kompofu kuyadelelwa, namazwi akhe awezwakali. 
21_9_17_Amazwi abahlakaniphileyo ezwakalayo ekuthuleni mahle kunokumemeza kobusa phakathi kweziwula. 
21_9_18_Ukuhlakanipha kungcono kunezikhali zokulwa, ngokuba oyedwa owonayo angachitha okuhle okuningi. 
21_10_1_Izimpukane ezifileyo zenza amafutha omthaki ukuba anuke, abile; kanjalo ubuwula obuncane bulingana nokuhlakanipha nodumo. 
21_10_2_Inhliziyo yohlakaniphileyo ingakwesokunene sakhe, kepha inhliziyo yesiwula ingakwesokhohlo. 
21_10_3_Yebo, nasendleleni esihamba ngayo isiwula, siyaphela ingqondo, sisho kubo bonke ukuthi siyisiwula. 
21_10_4_Uma umoya wombusi ukuvukela, ungashiyi indawo yakho, ngokuba ukubekezela kuvimba izono ezinkulu. 
21_10_5_Kukhona ububi engibubonile phansi kwelanga, bunjengephutha elivela kumbusi: 
21_10_6_ubuwula bubekwa ezindaweni eziningi eziphakemeyo, kepha abacebileyo bahlala kweziphansi. 
21_10_7_Ngibonile izinceku zikhwele amahhashi, nezikhulu zihamba phansi njengezinceku. 
21_10_8_Omba umgodi uyakuwela kuwo, nodiliza ugange uyakulunywa yinyoka. 
21_10_9_Okhipha amatshe uyakulinyazwa yiwo, nobanda izinkuni uyakuba sengozini ngazo. 
21_10_10_Uma insimbi ibuthuntu, umuntu engaloli usiko, uyakhamelela ngamandla; kepha okusizayo ukuphumelelisa kungukuhlakanipha. 
21_10_11_Uma inyoka iluma ingakalunjwa, umlumbi akasizi lutho. 
21_10_12_Amazwi omlomo wohlakaniphileyo anomusa, kepha izindebe zesiwula ziyasigwinya sona. 
21_10_13_Ukuqala kwamazwi omlomo waso angubuwula, nokugcina kokukhuluma kwaso kungubuhlanya obubi. 
21_10_14_Isiwula siyandisa amazwi, nokho umuntu akazi okuyakuba khona; nalokho okuyakuba ngasemva kwakhe, ngubani ongamtshela lokho na? 
21_10_15_Umshikashika weziwula uyaziqoba, ukuze zingazi nokuya emzini. 
21_10_16_Maye kuwe lizwe onkosi yakho ingumntwana, nezikhulu zakho zinedili ekuseni! 
21_10_17_Ubusisiwe wena lizwe onkosi yakho iyindodana yabakhulu, nezikhulu zakho zinedili ngesikhathi, ziziqinise, zingadakwa. 
21_10_18_Ngobuvila obukhulu indlu iyabola, nangokwenqena kwezandla iyavuza. 
21_10_19_Idili lenzelwa ukuhleka, newayini liyenamisa ukuphila, kepha imali iyimpendulo yakho konke. 
21_10_20_Ungayiqalekisi inkosi nasemicabangweni yakho, ungabathuki abacebileyo nasekamelweni lakho lokulala, ngokuba inyoni yezulu iyakulihambisa izwi, nokunamaphiko kuyakuyilanda indaba. 
21_11_1_Thuma isinkwa sakho ebusweni bamanzi, ngokuba uyakusifumana emva kwezinsuku eziningi. 
21_11_2_Yabela abayisikhombisa nabayisishiyagalombili, ngokuba awukwazi okubi okuyakuba semhlabeni. 
21_11_3_Uma amafu egcwele imvula, ayayithulula emhlabeni; futhi uma kuwa umuthi ngaseningizimu noma ngasenyakatho, endaweni lapho uwa khona umuthi, uyakuba lapho. 
21_11_4_Oqaphela umoya akayikuhlwanyela; obheka amafu kayikuvuna. 
21_11_5_Njengalokhu ungazi indlela yomoya ukuthi iphi, nokubunjwa kwamathambo esizalweni sokhulelweyo, kanjalo awuyazi nemisebenzi kaNkulunkulu owenza konke. 
21_11_6_Hlwanyela imbewu yakho kusasa, ungaphumuzi isandla sakho nakusihlwa, ngokuba awazi ukuthi yiyiphi eyakuphumelela, yilena noma yileyo, noma ziyakuba zinhle zombili ngokufanayo. 
21_11_7_Ukukhanya kumnandi, yebo, kuhle emehlweni ukubona ilanga. 
21_11_8_Noma umuntu ekhona iminyaka eminingi, makathokoze ngayo yonke, akhumbule nokho nezinsuku zobumnyama ukuthi njengokuba ziziningi, konke okufikayo kuyize. 
21_11_9_Thokoza, nsizwa, ebusheni bakho, inhliziyo yakho ikuphe ukwenama emihleni yobunsizwa bakho, uhambe ngezindlela zenhliziyo yakho njengokubona kwamehlo akho, kepha yazi ukuthi ngakho konke lokho uNkulunkulu uyakukungenisa ekwahlulelweni. 
21_11_10_Khipha usizi enhliziyweni yakho, udlulise okubi emzimbeni wakho, ngokuba ubusha nobunsizwa buyize. 
21_12_1_Futhi khumbula uMdali wakho emihleni yobusha bakho, zingakafiki izinsuku ezimbi, ingakasondeli iminyaka osho ngayo ukuthi: “Angithokozi ngayo,” 
21_12_2_yebo, lingakabi mnyama ilanga, nokukhanya, nenyanga, nezinkanyezi, namafu engakabuyi emva kwemvula, 
21_12_3_ngalolo suku lapho abalindi bendlu beyakuthuthumela, amadoda anamandla agobe, abasilikazi bayeke ngokuba beyingcosana, abalunguza emafasiteleni bafiphazelwe, 
21_12_4_iminyango ivalwe esitaladini, lapho umsindo wokusila uncipha, umuntu avuke ngezwi lenyoni, izintombi zonke zokuhlabelela zithuliswe; 
21_12_5_nalapho abantu besaba imimango izesabiso zibe sendleleni, umalimondi ukhahlele, intethe itotobe, izithelo zesihlahla sekaphari zingabe zisaba namandla, ngokuba umuntu useya endlini yakhe ephakade, nabalilayo bazulazula esitaladini; 
21_12_6_yebo, lingakagqabuki igoda lesiliva, nokhamba lwegolide lungakaphahlazwa, nembiza ingakafi ngasemthonjeni, nesondo lingakaphuki ngasemgodini wamanzi, 
21_12_7_uthuli lubuyele emhlabathini, njengokuba lwalunjalo, umoya ubuyele kuNkulunkulu owawunikayo. 
21_12_8_“Ize leze,” usho uMshumayeli, “konke kuyize.” 
21_12_9_Futhi ngokuba uMshumayeli wayehlakaniphile, wayefundisa abantu ukwazi, wazindla, waphenya walungisa izaga eziningi. 
21_12_10_UMshumayeli wafuna ukuthola amazwi anamisayo afanele ukulotshwa, amazwi eqiniso. 
21_12_11_Amazwi abahlakaniphileyo anjengezincijo, nezigaba zawo zinjengezipikili ezinamatheleyo, ephiwe nguMalusi munye. 
21_12_12_Kepha phezu kwalana, ndodana yami, mawuxwaye; ukwenza izincwadi eziningi akunakuphela, nokufunda okuningi kukhathaza umzimba. 
21_12_13_Nakhu ukuphela kwendaba, lapho sekuzwakele konke: Mesabe uNkulunkulu, ugcine imiyalo yakhe, ngokuba lokho kungokwabantu bonke. 
21_12_14_Ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyakuyisa uyakuyisa yonke imisebenzi ekwahlulelweni kanye nakho konke okufihliweyo, noma kuhle noma kubi. 
22_1_1_Isihlabelelo sezihlabelelo esingesikaSolomoni. 
22_1_2_Makangange ngokwanga komlomo wakhe! Ngokuba uthando lwakho lumnandi kunewayini. 
22_1_3_Amafutha akho anephunga elimnandi; igama lakho linjengamafutha athululiweyo; ngalokho izintombi ziyakuthanda. 
22_1_4_Ngidonse emva kwakho, sigijime; inkosi isingingenisile emakamelweni ayo. Siyakujabula, sithokoze ngawe, sikhulume ngothando lwakho kunewayini. Kufanele ukuba bakuthande. 
22_1_5_Ngimnyama, kepha ngimuhle, madodakazi aseJerusalema, njengamatende akwaKedari, njengezilenge zikaSolomoni. 
22_1_6_Ningangibuki ukuthi ngimnyamana, ngokuba ilanga lingifusile. Amadodana kamame angifutha, angenza umlindizivini, kepha isivini esingesami angisilindanga. 
22_1_7_Ngitshele wena othandwa ngumphefumulo wami ukuthi waluselaphi, uphumuzaphi umhlambi emini, ngokuba yini ukuba ngibe njengowesifazane odukileyo ngasemihlambini yabangane bakho na? 
22_1_8_Uma ungakwazi wena muhlekazi phakathi kwabesifazane, phuma uhambe ezinyathelweni zomhlambi, waluse amazinyane akho ngasematendeni abelusi. 
22_1_9_Ngikufanisa nehhashi lensikazi lezinqola zikaFaro, sithandwa sami. 
22_1_10_Izihlathi zakho zinhle kangakanani zinezintambo zobuhlalu, nentamo yakho ineminaka. 
22_1_11_Siyakukwenzela izintambo zobuhlalu begolide, namaqhosha esiliva. 
22_1_12_Inkosi isahlezi ngasetafuleni layo inadi lami lathaphuka iphunga lalo. 
22_1_13_Othandiweyo wami ungumshuqulu wemure kimi, olele phakathi kwamabele ami. 
22_1_14_Othandiweyo wami uyihlukuzo lezimbali zehena ezivinini zase-Eni Gedi. 
22_1_15_Bheka, umuhle, sithandwa sami! Bheka, umuhle! Unamehlo amajuba. 
22_1_16_Bheka, umuhle, othandiweyo wami! Yebo, umnandi, nesilili sethu siluhlaza. 
22_1_17_Imishayo yendlu yethu iyimisedari, nemiqhadi iyimisayipuresi. 
22_2_1_Ngiyintebe yaseSharoni, nomnduze wezigodi. 
22_2_2_Njengomnduze phakathi kwameva, sinjalo isithandwa sami phakathi kwezintombi. 
22_2_3_Njengomapula phakathi kwemithi yasehlathini, unjalo othandiweyo wami phakathi kwamadodana. Ngahlala phansi emthunzini wakhe ngokwenama okukhulu, nesithelo sakhe sasimnandi emlonyeni wami. 
22_2_4_Ungingenisile endlini yewayini, nebhandela lakhe phezu kwami liluthando. 
22_2_5_Ngiphaseni ngezigaxa zezithelo zomvini ezomileyo, ngihlumelele ngama-apula, ngokuba ngiyafa uthando. 
22_2_6_Isandla sakhe sokhohlo siphansi kwekhanda lami, nesokunene siyangigona. 
22_2_7_Ngiyanifungisa, madodakazi aseJerusalema, ngezinsephe nangezindluzelekazi zasendle ukuba ningalunyakazisi, ningaluvusi uthando, lungakavumi. 
22_2_8_Nanto izwi lothandiweyo wami! Bheka, uyeza eqa ezintabeni, etshekula emagqumeni. 
22_2_9_Othandiweyo wami unjengensephe noma njengesixhumu sendluzele; bheka, umi emva kodonga lwakwethu; uyalunguza emafasiteleni, ubonakala ngaseheleni. 
22_2_10_Othandiweyo wami wakhuluma, wathi kimi: “Vuka, sithandwa sami, muhlekazi wami; woza sihambe, 
22_2_11_ngokuba bheka, ubusika budlulile; imvula isiphelile, yamuka; 
22_2_12_izimbali ziyabonakala emhlabeni, nesikhathi sokuthena imivini sesisondele, nezwi lehobhe liyezwakala ezweni lakithi. 
22_2_13_Umkhiwane uthela amakhiwane awo aluhlaza, imivini inezimbali, ithaphuka iphunga layo; vuka, sithandwa sami, muhlekazi wami; woza sihambe.” 
22_2_14_Juba lami elisemifantwini yamadwala nasekusithekeni kweziwa, mangibone ubuso bakho, ngizwe izwi lakho, ngokuba izwi lakho limnandi, nobuso bakho buhle. 
22_2_15_Sibambeleni izimpungushe, izimpungushe ezincane ezichitha izivini, ngokuba izivini zethu zinezimbali. 
22_2_16_Othandiweyo wami ungowami, mina ngingowakhe; uyalusa phakathi kweminduze. 
22_2_17_Kuze kuphole ilanga, namathunzi abaleke, mawube njengensephe, wena othandiweyo wami, nanjengesixhumu sendluzele ezintabeni eziqhekezekileyo. 
22_3_1_Ebusuku embhedeni wami ngamfuna othandwa ngumphefumulo wami; ngamfuna, kepha angimtholanga. 
22_3_2_Ngiyakuvuka, ngihambahambe emzini, ezitaladini nasezigcawini; ngiyakufuna othandwa ngumphefumulo wami; ngamfuna, kepha angimtholanga. 
22_3_3_Abalindi bangifumana behambahamba emzini: “Nimbonile othandwa ngumphefumulo wami na?” 
22_3_4_Ngangidlule kancane nje kubo; ngase ngimthola othandwa ngumphefumulo wami; ngambamba, angivumanga ukuba ahambe, ngaze ngamngenisa endlini kamame nasekamelweni lowangikhulisayo. 
22_3_5_Ngiyanifungisa, madodakazi aseJerusalema, ngezinsephe nangezindluzelekazi zasendle ukuba ningalunyakazisi, ningaluvusi uthando, lungakavumi. 
22_3_6_Ngubani owenyuka ehlane njengezinsika zomusi, eqhole ngemure nangenhlaka, nangawo onke amakha omthengi, na? 
22_3_7_Bheka, luhlaka lukaSolomoni! Amaqhawe angamashumi ayisithupha aluzungezile emaqhaweni akwa-Israyeli. 
22_3_8_Onke aphethe izinkemba, afundile ukulwa; yilowo nalowo muntu unenkemba yakhe okhalweni lwakhe ngokwesaba ebusuku. 
22_3_9_Inkosi uSolomoni izenzele uhlaka ngemithi yaseLebanoni. 
22_3_10_Yenza izinsika zalo ngesiliva, nephansi lalo ngegolide, nesihlalo salo ngokububende, ubuphakathi balo bugandaywe ngothando lwamadodakazi aseJerusalema. 
22_3_11_Phumani nina madodakazi aseJerusalema, nibone inkosi uSolomoni, inomqhele eyawuqheliswa ngunina ngosuku lokugcagca kwayo nangomhla wokuthokoza kwenhliziyo yayo. 
22_4_1_Bheka, umuhle, sithandwa sami! Bheka, umuhle! Unamehlo amajuba emva kwemvakazi yakho; izinwele zakho zinjengomhlambi wezimbuzi owehla entabeni yakwaGileyadi. 
22_4_2_Amazinyo akho anjengomhlambi wezimvukazi ezisand' ukugundwa, ezikhuphuka zigeziwe, zinamawele zonke, kungekho neyodwa phakathi kwazo efelweyo. 
22_4_3_Izindebe zakho zinjengomucu obomvu, umlomo wakho muhle; izihlathi zakho zinjengenxenye yepomegranati emva kwemvakazi yakho. 
22_4_4_Intamo yakho injengombhoshongo kaDavide owakhiwe ngemihlobiso, okuphanyekwa kuwo amahawu ayinkulungwane, onke eyizihlangu zamaqhawe. 
22_4_5_Amabele akho amabili anjengezixhumu ezimbili ezingamawele ensephe, ezidla phakathi kweminduze. 
22_4_6_Lize liphole ilanga namathunzi abaleke, ngiyakuya entabeni yemure nasegqumeni lenhlaka. 
22_4_7_Umuhle wonke, sithandwa sami, akukho sisihla kuwe. 
22_4_8_Woza umuke nami eLebanoni, makoti wami, umuke nami eLebanoni, wehle esiqongweni sase-Amana, nasesiqongweni saseSeniri naseHermoni, simuke emihumeni yezingonyama, nasezintabeni zezingwe. 
22_4_9_Ungaphucile inhliziyo yami, dadewethu, makoti wami; ungaphucile inhliziyo yami ngelinye lamehlo akho, ngomgexo munye wentamo yakho. 
22_4_10_Lumnandi kangakanani uthando lwakho, dadewethu, makoti wami! Luhle kangakanani uthando lwakho, kunewayini, nephunga lamafutha akho kunamakha onke! 
22_4_11_Izindebe zakho, makoti wami, ziyaconsa izinyosi; uju nobisi kukhona phansi kolimi lwakho, nephunga lezambatho zakho linjengephunga laseLebanoni. 
22_4_12_Uyinsimu ehluthulelweyo, dadewethu, makoti wami, umthombo ohluthulelweyo nesiphethu esibekwe uphawu. 
22_4_13_Amahlumela akho ayihlathi lamapomegranati anezithelo ezinqabileyo, ihena kanye nenadi, 
22_4_14_inadi nesafroni, nomhlanga nokinamona, kanye nemithi yonke yenhlaka, nemure nomhlaba, nawo onke amakha amahle. 
22_4_15_Siphethu sensimu, mthombo wamanzi aphilayo, sifufula saseLebanoni! 
22_4_16_Vuka, moya wasenyakatho, uze wena Ningizimu, uphephethe ensimini yami, ukuze amakha ayo athaphuke; othandiweyo wami makangene ensimini yakhe, adle izithelo zayo ezinqabileyo. 
22_5_1_Sengingenile ensimini yami, dadewethu, makoti wami; ngiyabutha imure lami namakha ami, ngiyadla amakhekheba ami kanye nezinyosi zami, ngiyaphuza iwayini lami kanye nobisi lwami. Yidlani, bangane, niphuze, nisuthe ngothando. 
22_5_2_Bengilele, kepha inhliziyo yami ibiphapheme; kuyizwi lothandiweyo wami elingqongqotha lithi: “Ngivulele, dadewethu, sithandwa sami, juba lami, opheleleyo wami, ngokuba ikhanda lami ligcwele amazolo, nesihluthu sami amaconsi asebusuku.” 
22_5_3_Ngikhumulile isambatho sami, ngingasifaka kanjani? Ngigezile izinyawo zami, ngingazingcoliselani na? 
22_5_4_Othandiweyo wayesengenisa isandla sakhe embotsheni, izibilini zami zamhawukela. 
22_5_5_Ngavuka ukumvulela othandiweyo wami; izandla zami zaconsa imure, neminwe yami imure elimanzi phezu kwezibambo zesihluthulelo. 
22_5_6_Ngamvulela-ke othandiweyo wami, kepha othandiweyo wami ubephendukile, wamuka; umphefumulo wami wawuphela ngokukhuluma kwakhe, ngamfuna, kepha angamthola; ngambiza, kodwa akaphendula. 
22_5_7_Abalindi bangifumana behambahamba emzini, bangishaya, bangilimaza; abalindi bezingange bangaphuca imvakazi yami. 
22_5_8_Ngiyanifungisa, madodakazi aseJerusalema, uma nimfumana othandiweyo wami, ukuba nimtshele ukuthi ngiyafa uthando. 
22_5_9_Othandiweyo wakho udlula ngani omunye, wena muhlekazi phakathi kwabesifazane, na? Othandiweyo wakho udlula kuphi omunye ukuba usifungise kanjalo na? 
22_5_10_Othandiweyo wami uyakhazimula ngobumhlophe, ubomvu, uyabonakala phakathi kwezigidi. 
22_5_11_Ikhanda lakhe liyigolide elihle elicwengekileyo; isihluthu sakhe sinententezo, simnyama njengegwababa. 
22_5_12_Amehlo akhe anjengamajuba ngasemifuleni yamanzi, ageziwe ngobisi ehlezi ngasemifudlaneni egcweleyo. 
22_5_13_Izihlathi zakhe ziyizindima zamakha ezithaphuka iphunga, nezindebe zakhe ziyiminduze econsa imure elimanzi. 
22_5_14_Izingalo zakhe ziyizindilinga zegolide, okufakwe kuzo amakrisolithe; isidumbu sakhe sinjengokwenziwe ngophondo lwendlovu, sembesiwe ngamasafire. 
22_5_15_Imilenze yakhe iyizinsika zetshe elimhlophe ezisekelwe ezinyaweni zegolide elihle; ukubukeka kwakhe kunjengeLebanoni, kukhethekile njengemisedari. 
22_5_16_Umlomo wakhe umnandi, uyanxaneleka wonke; yilowo ongothandiweyo wami, yilowo ongumngane wami, nina madodakazi aseJerusalema. 
22_6_1_Othandiweyo wakho uyephi, wena muhlekazi phakathi kwabesifazane; ushonephi othandiweyo wakho ukuba simfune kanye nawe na? 
22_6_2_Othandiweyo wami wehlele ensimini yakhe, ezindimeni zamakha, ukuba aluse ensimini, akhe iminduze. 
22_6_3_Mina ngingowothandiweyo wami, nothandiweyo wami ungowami, lapho alusa phakathi kweminduze. 
22_6_4_Umuhle, sithandwa sami, njengeTirisa, umnandi njengeJerusalema, kepha wesabeka njengezimpi. 
22_6_5_Susa amehlo akho kimi, ngokuba ayangiphaphathekisa; izinwele zakho zinjengomhlambi wezimbuzi owehla entabeni yakwaGileyadi. 
22_6_6_Amazinyo akho anjengomhlambi wezimvukazi ezikhuphuka zigeziwe, zinamawele zonke, kungekho neyodwa phakathi kwazo efelweyo. 
22_6_7_Izihlathi zakho zinjengenxenye yepomegranati emva kwemvakazi yakho. 
22_6_8_Amakhosikazi angamashumi ayisithupha, nezancinza zingamashumi ayisishiyagalombili, nezintombi azinakubalwa. 
22_6_9_Kepha ijuba lami, opheleleyo wami munye nje; ungoyedwa kunina, ungokhethiweyo wakhe owamzalayo. Amantombazana ayambona, athi ubusisiwe; amakhosikazi nezancinza bayamdumisa. 
22_6_10_Ngubani lo olunguza njengokusa, emuhle njengenyanga, ecwebile njengelanga, kepha esabeka njengezimpi, na?
