22_6_11_Ngehlela ensimini yamantongomane ukuyobona uhlaza lwesigodi, nokubona uma imivini iqhakazile, namapomegranati uma ekhahlele. 
22_6_12_Ngingakakwazi ukulangazela kwami kwangibeka enqoleni yabantu benkosana yami. 
22_6_13_Phenduka, phenduka, mShulamiti! Phenduka, phenduka ukuba sikubuke! Nibonani kumShulamiti? Kunjengokusina kwaseMahanayimi. 
22_7_1_Zinhle kangakanani izinyawo zakho ezicathulweni zazo, wena ndodakazi yesikhulu! Amathanga akho ayizindilinga anjengemihlobiso, umsebenzi wezandla zengcweti. 
22_7_2_Inkaba yakho ingumkhele oncweliweyo, ongasweli iwayini elixutshanisiweyo; isisu sakho siyinqwaba kakolweni, ibiyelwe ngeminduze. 
22_7_3_Amabele akho amabili anjengezixhumu ezimbili ezingamawele ensephe. 
22_7_4_Intamo yakho injengoMbhoshongo woPhondo lweNdlovu; amehlo akho angamachibi aseHeshiboni ngasesangweni laseBati Rabimi; impumulo yakho injengombhoshongo waseLebanoni obhekene neDamaseku. 
22_7_5_Ikhanda lakho kuwe linjengeKarmeli, nomyeko wekhanda lakho unjengokububende; kuboshiwe inkosi ngesiyendane. 
22_7_6_Umuhle, umnandi kangakanani wena othandwa ngenjabulo! 
22_7_7_Isimo sakho siyisundu, namabele akho omabili anjengamahlukuzo. 
22_7_8_Ngathi: “Ngiyakukhwela esundwini, ngibambe amagatsha alo.” Amabele akho mawabe ngamahlukuzo omvini, nephunga lokuphefumula kwakho njengama-apula, 
22_7_9_nomlomo wakho njengewayini elihle elihamba lehle kamnandi, lewuka ngezindebe nangamazinyo. 
22_7_10_Mina ngingowothandiweyo wami, uyanginxanela. 
22_7_11_Woza wena othandiweyo wami, siye endle, silale emizaneni. 
22_7_12_Masivuke ekuseni, siye ezivinini, sibone uma umvini uqhakazile, nezimbali zawo uma zivulekile, namapomegranati uma ekhahlele. Lapho ngiyakukunika uthando lwami. 
22_7_13_Amamandragora athaphuka iphunga, nangaseminyango yethu kukhona izinhlobo zonke zezithelo ezinqabileyo, ezintsha nezindala, engizibekele wena othandiweyo wami. 
22_8_1_Sengathi nga unjengomfowethu owancela amabele kamame! Uma bengikufumana phandle, bengiyakukwanga ngingadelelwa muntu. 
22_8_2_Bengiyakukuhola, ngikuyise endlini kamame; ubuyakungifundisa; bengiyakukuphuzisa iwayini eliyolisiweyo, amanzi ompomegranati wami. 
22_8_3_Isandla sakhe sokhohlo besiyakubaphansi kwekhanda lami, nesokunene sakhe besiyakungigona. 
22_8_4_Ngiyanifungisa, madodakazi aseJerusalema, ukuba ningalunyakazisi, ningaluvusi uthando, lungakavumi. 
22_8_5_Ngubani owenyuka ehlane encike kothandiweyo wakhe na? Phansi komapula ngakuvusa; lapho unyoko wayenemihelo ngawe, khona lapho wayenemihelo owakuzalayo. 
22_8_6_Ngifake njengophawu enhliziyweni yakho, njengophawu engalweni yakho, ngokuba uthando lunamandla njengokufa; isikhwele silukhuni njengendawo yabafileyo; amalangabi alo angamalangabi omlilo, ilangabi likaJehova. 
22_8_7_Amanzi amaningi awanakulucima uthando, nemifula ayinakuluminzisa; uma umuntu ebeyakunika yonke impahla yendlu yakhe ngothando, nokho ubeyakwaliwa nokwaliwa. 
22_8_8_Sinodadewethu omncane, kanawo amabele; siyakwenza njani ngodadewethu ecelwa na? 
22_8_9_Uma elugange, siyakwakha phezu kwakhe umbhoshongwana wesiliva; uma eyisicabha, siyakumvalela ngamapulangwe omsedari. 
22_8_10_Ngilugange, namabele ami anjengemibhoshongo; khona ngaba semehlweni akhe njengofumene ukuthula. 
22_8_11_USolomoni wayenesivini eBali Hamoni; wasinika isivini kubaphathi; baletha, kwaba yilowo nalowo, izinhlamvu eziyinkulungwane zesiliva ngezithelo zaso. 
22_8_12_Isivini esingesami siphambi kwami; inkulungwane mayibe ngeyakho, Solomoni, namakhulu amabili abe ngawabaphathi bezithelo zaso. 
22_8_13_Wena ohlala emasimini, abangane balalela izwi lakho; ake ungizwise lona. 
22_8_14_Shesha, othandiweyo wami, ufane nensephe nesixhumo sendluzele ezintabeni zamakha. 
23_1_1_Umbono ka-Isaya, indodana ka-Amose, awubonayo ngoJuda neJerusalema emihleni ka-Uziya, noJothamu, no-Ahazi, noHezekiya, amakhosi akwaJuda. 
23_1_2_Yizwani, mazulu, ubeke indlebe, mhlaba, ngokuba uJehova ukhuluma uthi: “Ngikhulisile ngiphakamisile abantwana, kepha bangihlubukile. 
23_1_3_Inkabi iyamazi umniniyo nembongolo umkhombe womnikaziyo; u-Israyeli akazi, isizwe sami asiqondi.” 
23_1_4_Hawu, sizwe esonayo, bantu abasindwe ngububi, nzalo yababi, bantwana abonakeleyo! Bamshiyile uJehova, bamdelele oNgcwele ka-Israyeli, babuyele emuva. 
23_1_5_Ningabe nisashaywa kuphi, nisaqhubeka ukwambuka, na? Lonke ikhanda liyagula, nayo yonke inhliziyo ibuthakathaka. 
23_1_6_Kusukela ematheni onyawo kuze kube sekhanda akukho okuphelele, ngamanxeba nje, nemivimbo, nemidwa emisha; akukhanywanga ubovu, akuboshwanga, akuthanjiswanga ngamafutha. 
23_1_7_Izwe lakini liyihlane, imizi yenu ishisiwe ngomlilo, umhlabathi wenu udliwa ngabafokazi phambi kwenu, kuyihlane njengokuchitha kwabafokazi. 
23_1_8_Indodakazi yaseSiyoni isele njengexhiba esivinini, nanjengedladla ensimini yamaselwa, nanjengomuzi ovinjezelweyo. 
23_1_9_Uma uJehova Sebawoti ebengasishiyelanga insali, besiyakuba njengeSodoma, sifane neGomora. 
23_1_10_Yizwani izwi likaJehova nina babusi baseSodoma, nibeke indlebe ekufundiseni kukaNkulunkulu wethu nina bantu baseGomora. 
23_1_11_“Iyini kimi imihlatshelo yenu eminingi na?” usho uJehova; “ngisuthile ngeminikelo yokushiswa yezinqama nangeyamanoni amathole akhuluphalisiweyo; negazi lezinkunzi nelamawundlu nelezimpongo angithokozi ngalo. 
23_1_12_Lapho nifika ukubona ubuso bami, ngubani okubize lokhu esandleni senu ukuba ninyathele amagceke ami na? 
23_1_13_Ningabe nisaletha iminikelo eyize yempuphu; impepho iyisinengiso kimi; ezokwethwasa kwenyanga namasabatha nokubiza imihlangano angivumi ububi kanye nemikhosi. 
23_1_14_Ezokwethwasa zenu kwenyanga nemikhosi yenu emisiweyo kuyazondwa ngumphefumulo wami; kungumthwalo phezu kwami, ngikhathele ngukukuthwala. 
23_1_15_Lapho nelula izandla zenu, ngiyakufihla kini amehlo ami; yebo, lapho nenza imikhuleko eminingi, angiyikuzwa; izandla zenu zigcwele igazi. 
23_1_16_Gezani, nihlanzeke, nisuse ububi bezenzo zenu phambi kwamehlo ami, niyeke ukwenza okubi. 
23_1_17_Fundani ukwenza okuhle, nifune ukwahlulela, niqondise abacindezeli, nahlulele izintandane, nimele umfelokazi. 
23_1_18_“Wozani-ke, sithethe indaba,” usho uJehova; “noma izono zenu zibomvu kakhulu, ziyakuba mhlophe njengeqhwa; noma zibomvu njengokububende, ziyakuba njengoboya bezimvu. 
23_1_19_Uma nivuma, nilalela, niyakudla okuhle kwezwe; 
23_1_20_kepha uma nala, nihlubuka, niyakudliwa yinkemba,” ngokuba umlomo kaJehova ukhulumile. 
23_1_21_Yeka umuzi othembekileyo waphenduka, waba yisifebe, wena owawugcwele ukwahlulela! Ukulunga kwakuhlezi khona, kepha manje ababulali. 
23_1_22_Isiliva lakho seliphendukile amanyela; iwayini lakho lixubene namanzi. 
23_1_23_Izikhulu zakho ziyizihlubuki nabangane bamasela; bonke bathanda izipho, balandela imivuzo; abahluleli izintandane, nendaba yomfelokazi ayifinyeleli kubo. 
23_1_24_Ngalokho ithi iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti, uMninimandla ka-Israyeli: “E, ngiyakuzikhulula kwabamelene nami, ngiziphindisele ezitheni zami, 
23_1_25_ngibuyisele isandla sami kuwe, ngicwengisise impela amanyela akho, ngisuse lonke ithini lakho, 
23_1_26_ngibuyisele abahluleli bakho njengakuqala, nabeluleki bakho njengasekuqaleni, andukuba ubizwe ngokuthi uMuzi Wokulunga, uMuzi Othembekileyo.” 
23_1_27_ISiyoni liyakuhlengwa ngokwahlulela nabaphendukayo kulo ngokulunga. 
23_1_28_Izihlubuki nezoni ziyakubhujiswa kanyekanye, nabamshiyayo uJehova bayakuqedwa. 
23_1_29_“Yebo, bayakuba namahloni ngama-oki enawanxanelayo, niyangaze ngamasimu enawakhethayo. 
23_1_30_Ngokuba niyakuba njenge-oki elimaqabunga alo abunile, nanjengensimu engenamanzi. 
23_1_31_Abanamandla bayakuba njengefilakisi, nemisebenzi yabo njengenhlansi; bayakusha bobabili kanyekanye, akuyikubakho ocimayo.” 
23_2_1_Indaba ayibonayo u-Isaya indodana ka-Amose ngoJuda neJerusalema. 
23_2_2_Kuyakuthi ngezinsuku ezizayo intaba yendlu kaJehova iqiniswe esiqongweni sezintaba, iphakame kunamagquma, nezizwe zonke ziyakugobhozela khona. 
23_2_3_Abantu abaningi bayakuhamba, bathi: “Wozani sikhuphukele entabeni kaJehova endlini kaNkulunkulu kaJakobe; uyakusifundisa izindlela zakhe, sihambe emikhondweni yakhe,” ngokuba umthetho uyakuvela eSiyoni, nezwi likaJehova eJerusalema. 
23_2_4_Uyakwahlulela phakathi kwezizwe, anqume phakathi kwabantu abaningi; bayakukhanda izinkemba zabo zibe ngamakhuba, nemikhonto yabo ibe ngocelemba; isizwe asiyikuphakamisela isizwe inkemba, zingabe zisafunda ukulwa. 
23_2_5_Wena ndlu kaJakobe, woza sihambe ekukhanyeni kukaJehova. 
23_2_6_Ngokuba ushiyile abantu bakho, indlu kaJakobe, lokhu begcwele ezasempumalanga, behlola imihlola njengamaFilisti, bexhawulana nabantwana babezizwe. 
23_2_7_Izwe lakubo ligcwele isiliva negolide, akukho ukuphela kwengcebo yabo; izwe lakubo ligcwele futhi namahhashi, nokuphela kwezinqola akukho. 
23_2_8_Izwe lakubo ligcwele futhi nezithombe; bakhuleka kokwenziwe yizandla zabo nakwekwenzileyo iminwe yabo. 
23_2_9_Kepha abantu bayakufoliswa, namadoda ayakuthotshiswa; abayikuthethelelwa. 
23_2_10_Ngena edwaleni, ucashe othulini ngokwesabeka kukaJehova nangodumo lobukhosi bakhe. 
23_2_11_Amehlo omuntu aziphakamisileyo ayakuthotshiswa, nokuzikhukhumeza kwamadoda kuyakufola, kuphakame uJehova kuphela ngalolo suku. 
23_2_12_Ngokuba uJehova Sebawoti unosuku oluyakuba phezu kwakho konke okuzidlayo nokuzikhukhumezayo, naphezu kwakho konke okuphakemeyo, kuthotshiswe, 
23_2_13_naphezu kwayo yonke imisedari yaseLebanoni, emide nephakemeyo, naphezu kwawo onke ama-oki aseBashani, 
23_2_14_naphezu kwazo zonke izintaba ezinde, naphezu kwawo onke amagquma aphakemeyo, 
23_2_15_naphezu kwayo yonke imibhoshongo ephakemeyo, naphezu kwazo zonke izingange eziqinisiweyo, 
23_2_16_naphezu kwayo yonke imikhumbi yaseTharishishi, naphezu kwayo yonke imikhunjana enxanelekayo. 
23_2_17_Ukuzikhukhumeza kwabantu kuyakufoliswa, nokuziphakamisa kwamadoda kuyakuthotshiswa, kuphakame uJehova kuphela ngalolo suku, 
23_2_18_ziphele izithombe, zithi nya. 
23_2_19_Bayakungena emihumeni yamadwala nasemigodini yomhlaba ngokwesabeka kukaJehova nangodumo lobukhosi bakhe, lapho evuka ukushaya umhlaba ngovalo. 
23_2_20_Ngalolo suku abantu bayakulahla kuwo amavukuzi nakuwo amalulwane izithombe zabo zesiliva nezithombe zabo zegolide, abazenzele zona ukuba bakhuleke kuzo, 
23_2_21_ukuze bangene emihumeni yamadwala nasemifantwini yeziwa ngokwesabeka kukaJehova nangodumo lobukhosi bakhe, lapho evuka ukushaya umhlaba ngovalo. 
23_2_22_Bayekeni abantu okusemakhaleni abo kukhona ukuphefumula nje, ngokuba babalwa njengantoni na? 
23_3_1_Ngokuba bheka, iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti iyasusa eJerusalema nakwaJuda uzime nodondolo, lonke uzime lwesinkwa nalo lonke uzime lwamanzi: 
23_3_2_amaqhawe namadoda empi, abahluleli nabaprofethi, ababhuli namalunga, 
23_3_3_izinduna zamashumi ayisihlanu nabantu abanodumo, abeluleki nezingcweti ezihlakaniphileyo, nabanolwazi lokulumba. 
23_3_4_Ngiyakubanika abafana babe yizikhulu zabo, nezingane ziyakubabusa. 
23_3_5_Abantu bayakucindezelana, kube yilowo nalowo, yebo, yilowo nalowo nomakhelwane wakhe; abantwana bayakubhensela abadala, nabadelelekileyo abanodumo. 
23_3_6_Lapho umuntu eyakubamba umfowabo endlini kayise ethi: “Wena unengubo, yiba ngumbusi wethu, le ncithakalo ibe phansi kwesandla sakho,” 
23_3_7_ngalona lolo suku uyakudazuluka athi: “Angiyikuba ngumelaphi, ngokuba endlini yami akukho sinkwa, akukho ngubo; ningangibeki umbusi wabantu.” 
23_3_8_Ngokuba iJerusalema likhubekile, noJuda uwile, lokhu izilimi zabo nezenzo zabo ziphambene noJehova ukucunula amehlo enkazimulo yakhe. 
23_3_9_Ukukhetha kwabo ubuso kuyafakaza ngabo; benza izono zabo obala njengeSodoma, abazifihli. Maye kuyo imiphefumulo yabo! Ngokuba bazenzele okubi. 
23_3_10_Yishoni kolungileyo ukuthi kuyakuba kuhle kuye, ngokuba bayakudla izithelo zezenzo zabo. 
23_3_11_Maye komubi! Kuyakuba kubi kuye, ngokuba uyakubuyiselwa izenzo zezandla zakhe. 
23_3_12_Abantu bami-ke izingane ziyabacindezela, nabesifazane bayababusa. O bantu bami, abaniholayo bayanidukisa; bachitha indlela yemikhondo yakho. 
23_3_13_UJehova usesukumile ukuyokulwa, umi ukuthetha amacala ezizwe. 
23_3_14_UJehova uyakungena ekwahluleleni namalunga abantu bakhe nezikhulu zabo ngokuthi: “Yinina eniqedile isivini, impango yabampofu isezindlini zenu. 
23_3_15_Nichobozeleni abantu bami, nigaye ubuso babampofu, na?” isho iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti. 
23_3_16_Wathi futhi uJehova: “Ngenxa yokuba amadodakazi aseSiyoni eziphakamisa, ehamba elula izintamo, eqhikiza amehlo, ehamba ecokama ekuhambeni kwawo, ekhenceza ngezinyawo zawo, 
23_3_17_ngalokho iNkosi iyakuzenza izimpandla izinkakhayi zamadodakazi aseSiyoni, uJehova awanqunise.” 
23_3_18_Ngalolo suku iNkosi iyakususa imihlobiso yawo: izigqizo, nemiqhele, nezimbedu ezinjengenyanga, 
23_3_19_neziqhaza, namasongo, nezimvakazi, 
23_3_20_nezigqoko, nemihlobiso yemilenze, nezibhamba, nemifuma, neziqu, 
23_3_21_nezindandatho, namacici ekhala, 
23_3_22_nezambatho zemikhosi, nezangaphezulu, namatshali, nezinqalathi, 
23_3_23_nezibuko, nelineni elicolekileyo, nemishuqulo, nezilembu. 
23_3_24_Kuyakuthi esikhundleni samakha kube ngukubola, nasesikhundleni sebhande igoda, nasesikhundleni sezinwele ezilungisiweyo impandla, nasesikhundleni sesidiya isibhamba sendwangu yamasaka, nasesikhundleni sobuhle isishada. 
23_3_25_Amadoda akho ayakuwa ngenkemba namaqhawe akho ngokulwa. 
23_3_26_Amasango alo ayakukhala, alile; liyakuba yize, lihlale emhlabathini. 
23_4_1_Ngalolo suku abesifazane abayisikhombisa bayakubamba indoda inye, bathi: “Siyakudla isinkwa sethu, sembathe izingubo zethu. Masibizwe kuphela ngegama lakho, ususe ihlazo lethu.” 
23_4_2_Ngalolo suku ihlumela likaJehova liyakuba lihle, libe nenkazimulo, nezithelo zomhlaba ziyakuba nodumo nobuhle kwabaphunyukileyo bakwa-Israyeli. 
23_4_3_Kuyakuthi yena oshiyiwe eSiyoni naye osele eJerusalema, bathiwe bangcwele, bonke abalotshelwe ukuphila eJerusalema, 
23_4_4_lapho iNkosi igezile insila yamadodakazi aseJerusalema, nalapho isihlanzile igazi laseJerusalema phakathi kwalo ngomoya wokwahlulela nangomoya wokushisa. 
23_4_5_UJehova uyakudala phezu kwayo yonke indawo yentaba yaseSiyoni naphezu kwemihlangano yayo ifu nomusi emini nokukhanya kwelangabi lomlilo ebusuku, ngokuba phezu kwayo yonke inkazimulo kuyakuba khona isivikelo. 
23_4_6_Kuyakuba khona idokodo, libe ngumthunzi ekushiseni kwemini nesiphephelo nesivikelo esivunguvungwini nasemvuleni. 
23_5_1_Mangihlabelele ngothandiweyo wami, isihlabelelo sothandiweyo wami ngesivini sakhe. Othandiweyo wami wayenesivini egqumeni elivundile kakhulu; 
23_5_2_wasimba, wakhipha amatshe aso, wasitshala ngomvini omuhle, wakha isiqongo sokulinda phakathi kwaso, waqopha isikhamo kuso, wethemba ukuthi siyakuthela izithelo zomvini, kepha saveza izithelo zasendle. 
23_5_3_“Manje nina enakhileyo eJerusalema namadoda akwaJuda, ake nahlulele phakathi kwami nesivini sami. 
23_5_4_Nga kwenziwani futhi esivinini sami engingakwenzanga kuso na? Kungani ukuba lapho ngithembe ukuthi siyakuthela izithelo zomvini, saveza izithelo zasendle, na? 
23_5_5_Sengiyakunitshela engiyakukwenza kuso isivini sami: ngiyakususa uthango lwaso, ukuze sidliwe, ngidilize ugange lwaso, ukuze sinyathelwe. 
23_5_6_Ngiyakusenza sibe yincithakalo; asiyikuthenwa, asiyikulinywa, kepha kuyakuvela amakhakhasi nameva; futhi ngiyakuyala amafu ukuba anganisi imvula phezu kwaso.” 
23_5_7_Ngokuba isivini sikaJehova Sebawoti siyindlu ka-Israyeli, namadoda akwaJuda ayisithombo sakhe esithandekayo; wabheka ukwahlulela, kepha bheka, ngukucindezela, yebo, ukulunga, kepha bheka, ngukukhala. 
23_5_8_Wo kubona abahlanganisa indlu nendlu, besondeza insimu nensimu, kuze kungabe kusaba khona indawo, kwakhe nina nodwa emhlabeni! 
23_5_9_UJehova Sebawoti wathi ezindlebeni zami: “Impela izindlu eziningi ziyakuba yincithakalo, nezinkulu nezinhle zingabi namuntu ohlala kuzo. 
23_5_10_Ngokuba ama-eka ayishumi esivini ayakuthela ibhati elilodwa, nehomere lembewu liyakuthela i-efa nje.” 
23_5_11_Wo kubona abavuka ekuseni, ukuze balandele uphuzo olunamandla, balibale kuze kuhlwe, bashe iwayini! 
23_5_12_Ihabu nogubhu, isigubhu negenkle, newayini kukhona emadilini abo, kepha abanakekeli imisebenzi kaJehova, nezenzo zezandla zakhe abaziboni. 
23_5_13_Ngalokho abantu bami bayathunjwa bengazi, nabadumileyo babo bayalamba, nezixuku zabo zigangathekile ngokoma. 
23_5_14_Ngalokho indawo yabafileyo yandisile isifiso sayo, yavula umlomo wayo ngokungalinganiswayo; kwehlela kuyo amakhosi abo, nesixuku sabo esixokozelayo, kanye nabajabulayo phakathi kwabo. 
23_5_15_Abantu bayafoliswa, namadoda ayathotshiswa, namehlo abaziphakamisayo ayathotshiswa, 
23_5_16_kepha uJehova Sebawoti uphakeme ekwahluleleni, uNkulunkulu oNgcwele ungcwelisiwe ngokulunga. 
23_5_17_Amawundlu ayakuklaba njengasemadlelweni awo, nasezincithakalweni zabacebileyo kuyakuklaba amazinyane. 
23_5_18_Wo kubona abadonsa ukona ngezintambo zamanga, nezono kungathi ngamagoda ezinqola, 
23_5_19_abasho ukuthi: “Makaphuthume, asheshise umsebenzi wakhe ukuba siwubone, kusondele isiluleko soNgcwele ka-Israyeli, sifike ukuba sisazi!” 
23_5_20_Wo kubona abasho okubi ukuthi kungokuhle, nokuhle ukuthi kungububi, ababeka ubumnyama bube ngukukhanya, nokukhanya kube ngubumnyama, babeke nokubabayo kube ngubumtoti, nobumtoti bube ngokubabayo! 
23_5_21_Wo kubona abahlakaniphile emehlweni abo nabaqondile ekuboneni kwabo! 
23_5_22_Wo kubona abangamaqhawe ngokuphuza iwayini namadoda anamandla ngokuxubanisa uphuzo olunamandla, 
23_5_23_abathetha ababi ngenxa yemivuzo, basuse ukulunga kwabalungileyo! 
23_5_24_Ngalokho njengolimi lomlilo ludla amabibi, nezikhotha ezomileyo zizika elangabini, impande yabo iyakuba njengokubola, nembali yabo iyakuthuquka njengebhuqu, ngokuba balahlile umthetho kaJehova Sebawoti, balidelela izwi loNgcwele ka-Israyeli. 
23_5_25_Ngalokho intukuthelo kaJehova iyavuthela isizwe sakhe; welulela isandla sakhe kuso, uyasishaya; izintaba ziyathuthumela, nezidumbu zabo ziyimfucumfucu phakathi ezitaladini; kukho konke lokhu intukuthelo yakhe ayibuyi, isandla sakhe siseluliwe. 
23_5_26_Uyakuphakamisela isizwe esikude ibhandela, asihlabele ikhwelo ekugcineni komhlaba; bheka, uyeza masinyane ngejubane. 
23_5_27_Akakho oyakukhathala, akhubeke kuso; akakho oyakozela, alale; ibhande lezinkalo zabo aliyikuthukuluka, nomchilo wezicathulo zabo awuyikugqabuka, 
23_5_28_bona abamicibisholo yabo ibukhali, nayo yonke iminsalo yabo insaliwe; izinyawo zamahhashi abo ziyakubalwa njengensengetsha, namasondo abo njengesivunguvungu. 
23_5_29_Ukubhonga kwabo kunjengokwengonyamakazi, bayakubhonga njengamabhongo ebhubesi, yebo, bayakugwavuma, babambe impango yabo, bamuke nayo, kungekho oyophulayo. 
23_5_30_Bayakugwavuma phezu kwabo ngalolo suku njengokuduma kolwandle; uma umuntu ebuka umhlaba, bheka, naso isigayegaye sobumnyama, nokukhanya kwenziwe mnyama ngamafu awo. 
23_6_1_Ngomnyaka wokufa kwenkosi u-Uziya ngabona uJehova ehlezi esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi esiphezulu nesiphakemeyo, umsila wengubo yakhe ugcwalisa ithempeli. 
23_6_2_Ngaphezu kwakhe kwakumi amaserafi; yilelo nalelo lalinamaphiko ayisithupha; ngamabili lamboza ubuso, nangamabili lamboza izinyawo, nangamabili landiza. 
23_6_3_Elinye lamemeza kwelinye, lathi: “Ungcwele, ungcwele, ungcwele uJehova Sebawoti, wonke umhlaba ugcwele inkazimulo yakhe.” 
23_6_4_Izinsika zomnyango zathuthumela ngezwi lomemezayo, indlu yagcwala umusi. 
23_6_5_Ngase ngithi: “Maye kimi! Ngokuba ngiphelile, lokhu ngingumuntu ozindebe zakhe zingcolile, futhi ngihlezi phakathi kwabantu abazindebe zabo zingcolile, ngokuba amehlo ami abonile iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti.” 
23_6_6_Kepha landizela kimi elinye lamaserafi liphethe ilahle elivuthayo esandleni salo, elalilithathe ngodlawu e-altare, 
23_6_7_lathinta umlomo wami, lathi: “Bheka, lokhu kuthintile izindebe zakho; ububi bakho sebususiwe, nezono zakho zihlanguliwe.” 
23_6_8_Futhi ngezwa izwi leNkosi lithi: “Ngiyakuthuma bani, ngubani oyakusiyela na?” Ngase ngithi: “Bheka, nangu mina; ngithume mina.” 
23_6_9_Yathi: “Hamba usho kulaba bantu ukuthi: “ ‘Yizwani, yizwani, kepha ningaqondi; bonani, bonani, kepha ningazi.’ 
23_6_10_Yenza inhliziyo yalaba bantu ukuba ikhuluphale, nezindlebe zabo zibe buthuntu, ufiphaze amehlo abo, funa babone ngamehlo abo, bezwe ngezindlebe zabo, baqonde ngenhliziyo yabo, babuye, baphiliswe.” 
23_6_11_Ngase ngithi: “Nkosi, koze kube nini na?” Yathi: “Kuze kuchithwe imizi, kungabe kusaba khona ohlala kuyo, nezindlu zingabe zisaba namuntu, nomhlaba uchitheke ube yize, 
23_6_12_uJehova aze adedisele kude abantu, nencithakalo ibe nkulu ezweni. 
23_6_13_Yebo, noma kusekhona inxenye yeshumi kulo, yona iyakubuye ishiswe njengomtherebinte ne-oki okusiqu sakho simi lapho kugawulwa khona; inzalo engcwele iyisiqu sakho.” 
23_7_1_Kwathi ezinsukwini zika-Ahazi indodana kaJothamu ka-Uziya, inkosi yakwaJuda, uResini inkosi yase-Aramu noPheka indodana kaRemaliya, inkosi yakwa-Israyeli, bakhuphukela eJerusalema ukulwa nalo, kepha babengenakulinqoba. 
23_7_2_Kwatshelwa indlu kaDavide ukuthi: “I-Aramu limise kwa-Efrayimi.” Yayisiqhaqhazela inhliziyo yakhe nenhliziyo yabantu bakhe njengemithi yasehlathini ithuthumela ngomoya. 
23_7_3_Kepha uJehova wathi ku-Isaya: “Mawuphume ukuhlangabeza u-Ahazi, wena noSheyari Jashubi indodana yakho, ngasekugcineni komsele wechibi lasenhla elingasendleleni yeNsimu Yomhlanzi, 
23_7_4_usho kuye ukuthi: ‘Xwaya, uthule; ungesabi, nenhliziyo yakho mayingadangali ngemisila emibili yalezi zikhuni ezithunqayo, ngokuvutha kolaka lukaResini ne-Aramu nolwendodana kaRemaliya. 
23_7_5_Ngokuba i-Aramu no-Efrayimi nendodana kaRemaliya bacebile okubi ngawe, bathi: 
23_7_6_“Masikhuphukele kwelakwaJuda, silikhathaze, sizinqobele lona, sibeke inkosi phakathi kwalo, indodana kaThabeyeli,” 
23_7_7_ngalokho isho iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ithi: “ ‘Akuyikuma, futhi akuyikwenzeka. 
23_7_8_Ngokuba inhloko yase-Aramu iyiDamaseku, nenhloko yeDamaseku inguResini; phakathi kweminyaka engamashumi ayisithupha nanhlanu u-Efrayimi uyakwaphulwa angabe esaba yisizwe. 
23_7_9_Inhloko yakwa-Efrayimi iyiSamariya, inhloko yeSamariya iyindodana kaRemaliya. Uma ningakholwa, impela aniyikuma.’ ” 
23_7_10_UJehova waqhubeka ukukhuluma ku-Ahazi, wathi: 
23_7_11_“Zicelele isibonakaliso kuJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, kujule endaweni yabafileyo, noma kuphakame phezulu.” 
23_7_12_Kepha u-Ahazi wathi: “Angiyikucela, futhi angiyikumlinga uJehova.” 
23_7_13_Wayesethi: “Ake uzwe wena ndlu kaDavide! Kuncane kuwe ukukhathaza abantu, ukuze nimkhathaze noNkulunkulu wami futhi na? 
23_7_14_Ngalokho iNkosi uqobo iyakukunika isibonakaliso: bheka, intombi iyakukhulelwa, izale indodana, ibize igama layo ngokuthi u-Imanuweli. 
23_7_15_Uyakudla amangqanga nezinyosi aze azi ukwala okubi, akhethe okuhle. 
23_7_16_Ngokuba umntwana engakazi ukwala okubi nokukhetha okuhle, izwe okhathazwa ngamakhosi omabili alo liyakushiywa. 
23_7_17_UJehova uyakuletha phezu kwakho, naphezu kwabantu bakho, naphezu kwendlu kayihlo izinsuku ezingafikanga kusukela osukwini u-Efrayimi asuka ngalo kwaJuda — yinkosi yase-Asiriya.” 
23_7_18_Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku uJehova ahlabele ikhwelo izimpukane ezingasekugcineni kwemifula yaseGibithe nezinyosi ezisezweni lase-Asiriya. 
23_7_19_Ziyakufika, ziphumule zonke ezigodini ezineziwa, nasemifantwini yamadwala, nasemahlanzeni onke, nasemadlelweni onke. 
23_7_20_Ngalolo suku iNkosi iyakuphucula ngensingo eqashiweyo ngaphesheya koMfula yinkosi yase-Asiriya ikhanda noboya bezinyawo, futhi iyakuqeda nesilevu. 
23_7_21_Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku indoda yondle isithole nezimvu ezimbili, 
23_7_22_bese kuthi ngobuningi bobisi ezilwehlisayo idle amangqanga, ngokuba amangqanga nezinyosi bayakukudla bonke abasele ezweni. 
23_7_23_Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku yonke indawo lapho kukhona imivini eyinkulungwane, elingene nezinhlamvu eziyinkulungwane zesiliva, ibe ngeyamakhakhasi nameva. 
23_7_24_Kuyakuyiwa khona nemicibisholo nomnsalo, ngokuba izwe lonke liyakuba ngamakhakhasi nameva. 
23_7_25_Ezintabeni zonke ezilinywa ngegeja akuyikuyiwa khona ngokwesaba amakhakhasi nameva, kepha ziyakuba ngezokuqhubela izinkabi nezokunyathela kwezimvu. 
23_8_1_UJehova wathi kimi: “Zithathele isibhebhe esikhulu, ubhale kuso ngokwendlela yomuntu ngokuthi uMahere Shalali Hashi Bazi. 
23_8_2_Ngazifakazisela ofakazi abaqinisileyo, u-Uriya umpristi noZakariya indodana kaJeberekiya.” 
23_8_3_Ngase ngiya kumprofethikazi; wakhulelwa, wazala indodana. Wayesethi uJehova kimi: “Biza igama layo ngokuthi uMahere Shalali Hashi Bazi. 
23_8_4_Ngokuba umntwana engakazi ukumemeza ngokuthi baba nomame, kuyakususwa ingcebo yaseDamaseku nempango yaseSamariya phambi kwenkosi yase-Asiriya.” 
23_8_5_UJehova wabuye wakhuluma kimi, wathi: 
23_8_6_“Ngenxa yokuba laba bantu badelela amanzi aseShilowa ahamba kancane, bathokoza ngoResini nendodana kaRemaliya, 
23_8_7_ngalokho bheka, iNkosi iyabakhuphulela amanzi omfula anamandla namaningi — yinkosi yase-Asiriya nabo bonke ubukhosi bayo — ukhuphuke phezu kwazo zonke izingu zawo, weqe nazo zonke izindonga zawo, 
23_8_8_utheleke kwaJuda, ukhukhule, udlule, ufinyelele entanyeni, besewugcwalisa ngamaphiko awo eluliweyo ububanzi bezwe lakho, Imanuweli.” 
23_8_9_Bhevani nina zizwe, niyakuphela amandla nokho; bekani indlebe nina mazwe onke akude: zibhinceni, kepha niyakudangala, yebo, zibhinceni, niyakuphela amandla nokho. 
23_8_10_Lulekanani nokululekana, kepha kuyakuchithwa; khulumani izwi, kodwa aliyikuma, ngokuba uNkulunkulu unathi. 
23_8_11_Ngokuba uNkulunkulu ukhulumile kanjalo kimi ngesandla esinamandla, wangiyala ukuba ngingahambi ngendlela yalaba bantu, wathi: 
23_8_12_“Ningasho ukuthi kuluzungu konke abakushoyo laba bantu ukuthi kuluzungu, ningesabi abakwesabayo, nibe novalo ngakho. 
23_8_13_UJehova Sebawoti, mngcweliseni yena, kube nguye enimesabayo, yebo, kube nguye eninovalo ngaye. 
23_8_14_Uyakuba ngokungcwele, futhi abe yitshe lokukhubekisa, nedwala lokuwisa kuzo izindlu zombili zakwa-Israyeli, abe lugibe nesihibe kwabakhileyo eJerusalema. 
23_8_15_Abaningi phakathi kwabo bayakukhubeka, bawe, baphuke, bacushwe, babanjwe.” 
23_8_16_Bopha ubufakazi, uwunamathelise umthetho phakathi kwabafundi bami. 
23_8_17_Ngiyakumlindela uJehova ositheza ubuso bakhe kuyo indlu kaJakobe, ngethembe kuye. 
23_8_18_Bheka, mina, nabantwana uJehova anginike bona, siyizibonakaliso nezimangaliso kwa-Israyeli, ezivela kuJehova Sebawoti ohlezi entabeni yaseSiyoni. 
23_8_19_Lapho bethi kini: “Funani kwabanamadlozi nakubathakathi” ababetha imilozi, banyenyeze pho, abantu abayikufuna uNkulunkulu wabo yini? Kuyiwe kwabafileyo ngabaphilayo na? 
23_8_20_Emthethweni-ke nasebufakazini! Impela leli zwi abalikhulumayo alinakho ukusa. 
23_8_21_Bayakudabula izwe bexinekile, belambile; kuyakuthi lapho belamba, bavuke ulaka, bathuke inkosi yabo noNkulunkulu wabo, babheke phezulu. 
23_8_22_Bayakubheka nasemhlabeni; bheka, nakho ukuhlupheka, nobumnyama, nokuhwelela kosizi; yebo, bayakuxoshelwa esigayegayeni. 
23_9_1_Kepha ukuhwelela akuyikuba khona kohluphekayo. Njengesikhathi esidlule senza ukuba kufiliswe izwe lakwaZebuloni nezwe lakwaNafetali, isikhathi esizayo siyakwenza ukuba ikhazimule indlela yolwandle ngaphesheya kweJordani, isifunda sabezizwe. 
23_9_2_Abantu abahamba ebumnyameni babona ukukhanya okukhulu; abahlezi ezweni lethunzi lokufa ukukhanya kuyabakhanyisela. 
23_9_3_Uyakwandisa isizwe, ukhulise intokozo yaso; bathokoza phambi kwakho njengokuthokoza ekuvuneni, njengalokhu abantu bethokoza ekwabeleni kwabo impango. 
23_9_4_Ngokuba ijoka lomthwalo wabo, nenduku yamahlombe abo, noswazi lomhluphi wabo uyakwaphula njengasosukwini lukaMidiyani. 
23_9_5_Ngokuba zonke izicathulo ezifakiweyo esiyaluyalwini sokulwa nezingubo ezigingqwe egazini ziyakuba ngezokushiswa, zidliwe ngumlilo.9:5 AmaH. 46:9. 
23_9_6_Ngokuba sizalelwa umntwana, siphiwa indodana; umbuso uyakuba semahlombe akhe, negama lakhe liyakuthiwa uMluleki omangalisayo, uNkulunkulu onamandla, uYise ongunaphakade, iNkosi yokuthula. 
23_9_7_Umbuso uyakuba mkhulu, ukuthula kungabi nakuphela esihlalweni sobukhosi sikaDavide nasembusweni wakhe, ukuze uqiniswe, usekelwe ngokwahlulela nangokulunga, kusukela manje kuze kube phakade. Ukushisekela kukaJehova Sebawoti kuyakwenza lokhu. 
23_9_8_INkosi ithume izwi kuJakobe, lehlela kwa-Israyeli. 
23_9_9_Bonke abantu bayakwazi, u-Efrayimi nabakhe eSamariya, abasho ekuziphakamiseni kwabo nasekuziqhenyeni kwenhliziyo ukuthi: 
23_9_10_“Izitini ziwile, kepha siyakwakha ngamatshe abaziweyo; imithombe igawuliwe, kepha siyakutshala imisedari ezikhundleni zayo.” 
23_9_11_UJehova uyabaphakamisela izitha zikaResini, ahlomise abamelene nabo, 
23_9_12_i-Aramu ngaphambili namaFilisti ngasemuva, bamudle u-Israyeli ngomlomo okhamisiweyo; kukho konke lokhu intukuthelo yakhe ayibuyi, isandla sakhe siseluliwe. 
23_9_13_Abantu ababuyelanga nokho kobashayileyo, futhi abamfunanga uJehova Sebawoti. 
23_9_14_Ngalokho uJehova uyanquma kwa-Israyeli ikhanda nomsila, igatsha lesundu nomhlanga, ngalusuku lunye. 
23_9_15_Ilunga nophakemeyo bayikhanda, nomprofethi ofundisa amanga ungumsila. 
23_9_16_Ngokuba abahola laba bantu bayabadukisa, nabaholwa yibo bayagwinywa. 
23_9_17_Ngalokho iNkosi ayithokozi ngezinsizwa zabo, ayihawukeli izintandane nabafelokazi babo, ngokuba bonke bangabangenaNkulunkulu nabenza okubi, nayo yonke imilomo ikhuluma ubuwula; kukho konke lokhu intukuthelo yakhe ayibuyi, isandla sakhe siseluliwe. 
23_9_18_Ngokuba ububi bushisa njengomlilo, buqeda amakhakhasi nameva, buthungela ezihlahleni zamahlathi, zize zifuquke insika yomusi. 
23_9_19_Ngentukuthelo kaJehova Sebawoti izwe lishisiwe; abantu bangukudla komlilo, akakho osindisa umfowabo. 
23_9_20_Umuntu uyahlwitha ngakwesokunene, abe esalambile nokho, adle ngakwesokhohlo, kepha angasuthi; bayakudla, kube yilowo nalowo inyama yengalo yakhe, 
23_9_21_uManase u-Efrayimi, no-Efrayimi uManase, bobabili basukele kanyekanye uJuda; kukho konke lokhu intukuthelo yakhe ayibuyi, isandla sakhe siseluliwe. 
23_10_1_Wo kubona abamisa izimiso ezimbi, nakubabhali ababhalisisa okuyingozi, 
23_10_2_ukuchezukisa abampofu ekwahluleleni, nokwaphuca abaswelayo babantu bami umthetho, ukuze abafelokazi babe yimpango yabo, baqhwage izintandane. 
23_10_3_Niyakwenze njani ngosuku lokuhanjelwa nasekuchithakaleni okuvela kude na? Niyakubalekela kubani ukuba nisizwe na? Niyakushiya kubani imfuyo yenu na? 
23_10_4_Uma ningaguqi phakathi kwababoshiweyo, niyakuwa phakathi kwababuleweyo; kukho konke lokhu intukuthelo yakhe ayibuyi, isandla sakhe siseluliwe. 
23_10_5_“Wo kulo i-Asiriya, intonga yentukuthelo yami, nokusesandleni salo ukufutheka kwami kuyinduku. 
23_10_6_Ngiyalithuma esizweni esingenaNkulunkulu, ngiliyaleze ngabantu bentukuthelo yami ukuba liphange impango, liqhwage, libenze okunyathelwayo njengodaka lwasezitaladini. 
23_10_7_Nokho akusiwo umqondo walo, inhliziyo yalo ayicabangi kanjalo, kepha kusenhliziyweni yalo ukuchitha nokunquma izizwe ezingeyingcosana. 
23_10_8_Ngokuba lithi: ‘Izikhulu zami zonke azisiwo amakhosi na? 
23_10_9_IKalino alinjengeKharikemishi na? IHamati alinjenge-Aripadi na? ISamariya alinjengeDamaseku na? 
23_10_10_Njengalokhu isandla sami siyitholile imibuso yezithombe ezimifanekiso yazo ebaziweyo yahlula eyaseJerusalema neyaseSamariya, 
23_10_11_anginakwenza yini kulo iJerusalema nezithombe zalo, njengalokhu ngenzile kulo iSamariya nezithombe zalo, na?’ ” 
23_10_12_Kuyakuthi lapho iNkosi isiqedile wonke umsebenzi wayo entabeni yaseSiyoni naseJerusalema, ijezise isithelo senhliziyo ezidlayo yenkosi yase-Asiriya nokuzikhukhumeza kwamehlo ayo aziphakamisayo. 
23_10_13_Ngokuba uthi: “Ngamandla esandla sami ngikwenzile, nangokuhlakanipha kwami, ngokuba nginokuqonda; ngisusile imikhawulo yezizwe, ngiphangile ingcebo yazo, njengesiqhwaga ngawisa phansi abakhileyo khona. 
23_10_14_Isandla sami sifumene imfuyo yabantu njengesidleke, nanjengalokhu umuntu ebutha amaqanda ashiyiweyo ngibuthile wonke umhlaba, akwababikho oshaya phiko, novula mlomo, notshiyozayo.” 
23_10_15_Izembe liyakuzikhukhumeza kuye ogawula ngalo na? Isaha liyakuzikhulisa kuye oliqhubayo, njengokungathi induku izamazamisa abayiphakamisayo, nodondolo luphakamisa ongesiwo umuthi, na? 
23_10_16_Ngalokho iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti iyakuthuma ukonda phakathi kwabakhulupheleyo bakhe, nangaphansi kodumo lwakhe kuyakuphembeka ukushisa njengokushisa komlilo. 
23_10_17_Ukukhanya kuka-Israyeli kuyakuba ngumlilo, oNgcwele wakhe abe yilangabi; kuyakushisa kuqede ameva akhe namakhakhasi akhe ngalusuku lunye. 
23_10_18_Iyakuqeda udumo lwehlathi lakhe nensimu yakhe, umzimba nomphefumulo, kube njengesiguli esinyamalalayo. 
23_10_19_Insali yemithi yakhe iyakuba yingcosana, ukuze ibhalwe ngumntwana. 
23_10_20_Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku insali yakwa-Israyeli nabasindileyo bendlu kaJakobe bangasenciki kobashayileyo, kepha bencike ngeqiniso kuJehova oNgcwele ka-Israyeli. 
23_10_21_Insali iyakubuya, insali kaJakobe, ibuyele kuNkulunkulu onamandla. 
23_10_22_Ngokuba noma abantu bakho, Israyeli, bengangesihlabathi solwandle, kuyakubuya phakathi kwabo insali nje; ukuchithwa kunqunyiwe, okuchichima ukulunga. 
23_10_23_Ngokuba iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti iyakwenza ukubhujiswa okunqunyiweyo phakathi kwawo wonke umhlaba. 
23_10_24_Ngalokho isho kanje iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti, ithi: “We bantu bami, enakhe eSiyoni, ningalesabi i-Asiriya, lapho likushaya ngentonga yalo, liphakamisele kuwe udondolo lwalo ngendlela yaseGibithe. 
23_10_25_Ngokuba kusezakuba yisikhashana nje kuze kuphele ukufutheka kwami, intukuthelo yami ibe sekuchithweni kwalo.” 
23_10_26_UJehova Sebawoti uyakulivusela isiswebhu njengasekubulaweni kwabakwaMidiyani ngasedwaleni lika-Orebi, nentonga yakhe iyakuba phezu kolwandle, ayiphakamise ngendlela yaseGibithe. 
23_10_27_Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku umthwalo walo ususwe emahlombe akho nejoka lalo entanyeni yakho. Liyakhuphuka eRimoni, 
23_10_28_liyeza e-Ayati, lidlula eMigroni; lethula impahla yalo eMikimashi; 
23_10_29_badlula esikhaleni, ebusuku bahlala eGeba; iRama liyaqhaqhazela, iGibeya likaSawule liyabaleka. 
23_10_30_Zamuluka ngezwi lakho, ndodakazi yaseGalimi; qaphela, Layishi, yiphendule, Anathoti. 
23_10_31_IMadimena selibalekile, abakhileyo eGebimi bathutha impahla. 
23_10_32_Namhla nje liyema ngaseNobi, linikinele isandla salo intaba yendodakazi yaseSiyoni, intaba yaseJerusalema. 
23_10_33_Bheka, iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti iyanquma amagatsha ngokwesabekayo, kugawulwe abaphakemeyo, nabazikhukhumezayo behliswe. 
23_10_34_Izihlahla zehlathi ziyacatshwa ngensimbi, neLebanoni liyawa ngoNamandla. 
23_11_1_Kuyakuvela ihlumela esiqwini sikaJese, kuphume igatsha ezimpandeni zakhe. 
23_11_2_UMoya kaJehova uyakuhlala phezu kwakhe, umoya wokuhlakanipha nowokuqonda, umoya wamasu nowamandla, umoya wokwazi nowokumesaba uJehova. 
23_11_3_Intokozo yakhe iyakuba sekumesabeni uJehova; akayikwahlulela ngokubona kwamehlo akhe, anganqumi ngokuzwa kwezindlebe zakhe. 
23_11_4_Kepha uyakwahlulela abampofu ngokulunga, anqume ngokufaneleyo abathobileyo bomhlaba, awushaye umhlaba ngentonga yomlomo wakhe, abulale ababi ngokuphefumula kwezindebe zakhe. 
23_11_5_Ukulunga kuyakuba yibhande lezinkalo zakhe, ukuthembeka kube yibhande lamanyonga akhe. 
23_11_6_Impisi iyakuhlala newundlu, ingwe ibuthise ndawonye nezinyane lembuzi, ithole nebhongo lengonyama kukhuluphaliswe kanyekanye, nomntwana omncane uyakukuqhuba. 
23_11_7_Inkomo nebhere kuyakuklaba, amazinyane akho abuthise ndawonye, ingonyama idle utshani njengenkabi. 
23_11_8_Umntwana oncelayo uyakudlala ngasemgodini webululu, olunyuliweyo elulele isandla sakhe esiseleni sikamantshingeyana. 
23_11_9_Abayikwenza okubi, bangachithi entabeni yonke yami engcwele, ngokuba umhlaba uyakugcwala ukumazi uJehova njengamanzi asibekela ulwandle. 
23_11_10_Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku impande kaJese ime iyibhanela lezizwe; abezizwe bayakuyifuna, nendawo yayo iyakuba nodumo. 
23_11_11_Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku iNkosi ibuye yelule isandla sayo ngokwesibili ukuzuza insali yabantu bayo eyakusala e-Asiriya, naseGibithe, nasePhatirosi, naseKushe, nase-Elamu, naseShineyari, naseHamati, naseziqhingini zolwandle. 
23_11_12_Iyakuphakamisela abezizwe ibhandela, ibuthe abaxoshiweyo bakwa-Israyeli, iqoqe abahlakazekileyo bakwaJuda emagumbini omane omhlaba. 
23_11_13_Umhawu ka-Efrayimi uyakusuka, nabacindezela uJuda bayakunqunywa; u-Efrayimi akayikuba namhawu ngoJuda, noJuda kayikucindezela u-Efrayimi. 
23_11_14_Kepha bayakundizela ehlombe lamaFilisti ngasentshonalanga, baphange kanyekanye abantu basempumalanga, belulele izandla zabo ngaku-Edomi noMowabi, abakwa-Amoni babalalele. 
23_11_15_UJehova uyakuqalekisa itheku lolwandle lwaseGibithe, anikine isandla sakhe phezu koMfula ngokuhwamula komoya wakhe, awushaye ube yiminonjana eyisikhombisa, ukuze kuhanjwe ngezicathulo. 
23_11_16_Kuyakuba khona umgwaqo wensali yabantu bakhe, eyakusala e-Asiriya, njengalokho kwakunjalo ku-Israyeli ngosuku lokukhuphuka kwakhe ezweni laseGibithe. 
23_12_1_Uyakusho ngalolo suku ukuthi: “Ngiyakubonga, Jehova, ngokuba wangithukuthelela, kepha intukuthelo yakho isibuyile, uyangiduduza. 
23_12_2_Bheka, uNkulunkulu uyinsindiso yami; nginethemba, angesabi, ngokuba uJehova, uJehova ungamandla ami nehubo lami, waba yinsindiso yami.” 
23_12_3_Ngalokho niyakukha amanzi ngokujabula emithonjeni yensindiso. 
23_12_4_Niyakusho ngalolo suku ukuthi: “Bongani uJehova, nibize igama lakhe, nizazise izenzo zakhe phakathi kwezizwe, nimemezele ukuthi igama lakhe liphakeme. 
23_12_5_Hlabelelani kuJehova, ngokuba wenzile izinto ezinkulu; lokhu makwazeke emhlabeni wonke. 
23_12_6_Memeza, ujabule wena ohlezi eSiyoni, ngokuba mkhulu oNgcwele ka-Israyeli phakathi kwakho.” 
23_13_1_Isiprofetho ngeBabele asibonayo u-Isaya indodana ka-Amose. 
23_13_2_Misani ibhanela entabeni elucwatha, nibaphakamisele izwi, nibaqhwebe ngezandla ukuba bangene emasangweni abakhulu. 
23_13_3_Mina uqobo ngibayalile abangcwele bami, yebo, ngibizele amaqhawe ami okwentukuthelo yami, bona labo abami abajabula ngokuziqhenya. 
23_13_4_Umsindo wesixuku ezintabeni kungathi ngowabantu abaningi! Umsindo wokuxokozela kwemibuso yabezizwe ihlangene! UJehova Sebawoti uyabutha impi yakhe. 
23_13_5_Bavela ezweni elikude nasekugcineni kwezulu uJehova nezikhali zentukuthelo yakhe, ukuba bachithe umhlaba wonke. 
23_13_6_Klewulani, ngokuba usuku lukaJehova lusondele; njengencithakalo evela kuSomandla luyafika. 
23_13_7_Ngalokho izandla zonke ziyadangala, nezinhliziyo zonke ziyaphela amandla. 
23_13_8_Bayashaqeka, babanjwa yiminjunju nobuhlungu, bazibinya njengababelethayo. Babhekana omunye nomunye bemangala. Ubuso babo bungubuso bamalangabi. 
23_13_9_Bheka, usuku lukaJehova luyeza, lunonya, lunokufutheka, lunokuvutha kolaka, ukuba lwenz'ize umhlaba, luchithe izoni zawo kuwo. 
23_13_10_Ngokuba izinkanyezi zezulu nawondwenjana bazo akuyikukhanya; ilanga liyakuba mnyama ekuphumeni kwalo, nenyanga ayisayikukhipa ukukhanya kwayo. 
23_13_11_Ngiyakulijezisa izwe ngobubi balo, nababi ngezono zabo, ngenze ukuba kuphele ukuzidla kwabaziqhenyayo, ngithobise ukuziphakamisa kwabacindezeli. 
23_13_12_Ngiyakwenza umuntu abe yigugu kunegolide elihle, yebo, umuntukazana kunegolide elicwengekileyo. 
23_13_13_Ngalokho ngiyakuzamazamisa izulu, umhlaba unyakaziswe endaweni yawo, ngentukuthelo kaJehova Sebawoti ngosuku lokuvutha kwentukuthelo yakhe. 
23_13_14_Kuyakuthi njengensephe exoshwayo nezimvu ezingaqoqwa muntu, baphendukele, kube yilowo nalowo kubantu bakubo, babalekele, kube yilowo ezweni lakubo. 
23_13_15_Bonke abatholwayo bayakugwazwa, nabo bonke ababanjwayo bayakuwa ngenkemba. 
23_13_16_Izingane zabo ziyakuchotshozwa emehlweni abo, izindlu zabo ziphangwe, omkabo baphoqwe. 
23_13_17_Bhekani, ngiyakubavusela amaMede angayikunaka isiliva, negolide angathokozi ngalo. 
23_13_18_Iminsalo iyakuwisa phansi izinsizwa zabo; abayikuhawukela isithelo esisesizalweni, amehlo abo angabi nasihe kubantwana. 
23_13_19_IBabele, umhlobiso wemibuso, isivunulo sokuzikhukhumeza kwamaKaledi, liyakuba njengokuchitha kukaNkulunkulu iSodoma neGomora. 
23_13_20_Alisoze labuye lakhiwa, akusayikuhlalwa kulo ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane; umArabiya akayikumisa khona, nabelusi abayikulala lapho nemihlambi yabo. 
23_13_21_Kepha izilwane zasehlane ziyakubuthisa khona, nezindlu zalo ziyakugcwala izikhova; kuyakuhlala lapho izintshe, namademoni ayakungqabashiya khona. 
23_13_22_Izimpungushe ziyakukhala ezinqabeni zalo, namakhanka ezindlini zamakhosi; siseduze ukufika isikhathi salo, nezinsuku zalo aziyikwandiswa. 
23_14_1_Ngokuba uJehova uyakumhawukela uJakobe, abuye amkhethe u-Israyeli, ababeke ezweni lakubo; nabafokazi bayakuzihlanganisa nabo, banamathele endlini kaJakobe. 
23_14_2_Abantu bayakubathatha, babayise ezindaweni zabo; indlu yakwa-Israyeli iyakubenza ifa ezweni likaJehova, babe yizinceku nezincekukazi, babathumbe labo abakade bethunjiwe yibo, babuse phezu kwabacindezeli babo. 
23_14_3_Kuyakuthi ngosuku uJehova akuphumuza ngalo ebuhlungwini bakho, nasekuhluphekeni kwakho, nasemsebenzini olukhuni obusetshenziswa ngawo, 
23_14_4_uphakamise lesi saga ngenkosi yaseBabele, uthi: “Yeka ukuphela komcindezeli nokugcina kokubhensa! 
23_14_5_UJehova waphulile udondolo lwababi nentonga yababusi 
23_14_6_eyashaya abantu ngentukuthelo ngokushaya okunganqamukiyo, eyabusa izizwe ngolaka ngokuzingela okunganqandwanga. 
23_14_7_Wonke umhlaba uyaphumula, usenokuthula; baqhumuka ngokuhlabelela. 
23_14_8_Yebo, nemisayipuresi ithokoza ngawe, kanye nemisedari yaseLebanoni, ngokuthi: ‘Selokhu walaliswa phansi, akakho umgawuli okhuphukela kithina.’ 
23_14_9_Indawo yabafileyo ngaphansi inyakazisiwe ukuba ikuhlangabeze ekufikeni kwakho, ikuvusele izithunzi, zonke izikhulu zomhlaba, isukumise onke amakhosi ezizwe ezihlalweni zawo zobukhosi. 
23_14_10_Onke ayakuthatha athi kuwe: Nawe usubuthakathaka njengathi, usufana nathi, na? 
23_14_11_Ubukhosi bakho sebehliselwe endaweni yabafileyo, umsindo wezingubhu zenu; izimpethu zenekiwe ngaphansi kwakho, nezibungu ziyakusibekela. 
23_14_12_“Yeka ukuwa kwakho ezulwini, khwezi elikhanyayo, ndodana yokusa, nokunqunyelwa kwakho phansi, wena owawuthobisa izizwe. 
23_14_13_Wena wathi enhliziyweni yakho: ‘Ngiyakukhuphukela ezulwini, ngiphakamise isihlalo sami sobukhosi phezu kwezinkanyezi zikaNkulunkulu, ngihlale entabeni yomhlangano ngasekugcineni kwasenyakatho. 
23_14_14_Ngiyakukhuphuka phezu kwezindawo eziphakemeyo zamafu, ngizenze ngibe ngangoPhezukonke.’ 
23_14_15_Kepha uyakwehliselwa endaweni yabafileyo, ekugcineni komgodi. 
23_14_16_“Abakubonayo bayakugqolozela, bakuqaphele, bathi: ‘Nguye lo muntu owawuzamazamisa umhlaba, wanyakazisa imibuso, 
23_14_17_owenza izwe laba yihlane, wayichitha imizi yalo, akavumela iziboshwa zakhe ukuba zigoduke, na?’ 
23_14_18_Onke amakhosi ezizwe, onke alala ngodumo, yileyo naleyo endlini yayo. 
23_14_19_Kepha wena ulahliwe ngaphandle kwethuna lakho njengegatsha elinengekayo, ligqokwe ngababuleweyo, abahlatshwe yinkemba, abehlela ematsheni omgodi njengesidumbu esinyathelweyo. 
23_14_20_Awuyikuhlanganiswa nabo ekumbelweni, ngokuba uchithile izwe lakho, wabulala abantu bakho; inzalo yababi ayisayikubizwa ngegama naphakade. 
23_14_21_Lungiselani abantwana bakhe ukubulawa ngobubi bawoyise, ukuze bangavuki, badle ifa lomhlaba, bagcwalise ubuso bezwe ngemizi.” 
23_14_22_“Ngiyakubavukela,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “nginqume eBabele igama, nensali, nendodana, nomzukulwana,” usho uJehova. 
23_14_23_“Ngiyakulenza libe yifa likanondwebu namachibi amanzi, ngilishanele ngomshanelo wencithakalo,” usho uJehova Sebawoti. 
23_14_24_UJehova Sebawoti ufungile, wathi: “Impela njengokulinganisa kwami kuyakuba njalo, nanjengokunquma kwami kuyakuma kanjalo 
23_14_25_ukuthi ngiyakumaphula owase-Asiriya ezweni lami, ngimnyathele phansi ezintabeni zami; bese lisuka kubo ijoka lakhe, nomthwalo wakhe usuke emahlombe abo.” 
23_14_26_Yilesi esiyisinqumo esinqunyiwe emhlabeni wonke; yilesi esiyisandla eseluliwe phezu kwezizwe zonke. 
23_14_27_Ngokuba uJehova Sebawoti unqumile; ngubani ongakuchitha na? Isandla sakhe singeseluliweyo; ngubani ongasibuyisa na? 
23_14_28_Ngomnyaka wokufa kwenkosi u-Ahazi kwavela lesi siprofetho. 
23_14_29_Ungathokozi wena Filistiya lonke ngokuthi intonga ekushayileyo yaphukile, ngokuba empandeni yenyoka kuyakuphuma ibululu, nenzalo yalo iyakuba yinyoka endizayo. 
23_14_30_Amazibulo abampofu ayakuklaba, nabaswelayo bayakulala belondekile; ngiyakubulala impande yakho ngendlala, nensali yakho iyakubhujiswa. 
23_14_31_Klewula wena sango, dazuluka wena muzi, phela amandla wena Filistiya lonke! Ngokuba enyakatho kuvela umusi; akakho oyakwahlukana nebutho lakhe. 
23_14_32_Izithunywa zesizwe ziyakuphendulwa ngokuthini na? Ukuthi nguJehova obeke isisekelo eSiyoni; abahluphekayo babantu bakhe bayakuphephela kulo. 
23_15_1_Isiprofetho ngoMowabi. Impela ebusuku bunye i-Ari Mowabi linqotshiwe, lichithekile; impela ebusuku bunye iKhiri Mowabi linqotshiwe, lichithekile. 
23_15_2_Bayakhuphukela ethempelini; iDiboni lenyukela ezindaweni eziphakemeyo ukuyokhala; uMowabi uyaklewula eNebo naseMedeba; onke amakhanda ayizimpandlana, zonke izilevu ziphuculiwe. 
23_15_3_Ezitaladini zabo bayabhinca indwangu yamasaka, nasophahleni lwabo nasezigcawini zabo bayaklewula bonke, bamululeka izinyembezi. 
23_15_4_IHeshiboni liyadazuluka kanye ne-Elehale; izwi labo lizwakala kuze kube naseJahasi; ngalokho amabutho akwaMowabi ayakhamuluka, umphefumulo wakhe uyathuthumela phakathi kwakhe. 
23_15_5_Inhliziyo yami ikhalela uMowabi; ababalekileyo bakhe bayabalekela eSora, nase Egila Shelishiya; yebo, nasegqumeni laseLuhithe bakhuphukela bekhala, nasendleleni eya eHoronayimi, bephakamisa izwi lokudazuluka. 
23_15_6_Ngokuba amanzi aseNimrimi ayincithakalo, notshani buyoma, uhlaza luyaphela, akusekho okuluhlaza. 
23_15_7_Ngalokho okuseleyo abakutholileyo, nemfuyo yabo, bakuwelisa uMfula Weminyezane. 
23_15_8_Ngokuba ukukhala kuzungeze imikhawulo yakwaMowabi, nokuklewula kwakhe kuze kube se-Egelayimi, nokububula kwakhe kuze kube seBeri Elimi. 
23_15_9_Ngokuba amanzi aseDimoni agcwele igazi; yebo, ngiyakwehlisela iDimoni nokunye: ingonyama phezu kwabasindileyo bakwaMowabi, insali yezwe. 
23_16_1_Thumani amawundlu ombusi wezwe aphume eSela ngasehlane, aye entabeni yendodakazi yaseSiyoni. 
23_16_2_Kuyakuthi njengezinyoni ezizulazulayo, njengamaphuphu ahlakazekileyo, abe njalo amadodakazi akwaMowabi emazibukweni ase-Arinoni. 
23_16_3_“Lulekanani, nenze izinqumo, ubeke isithunzi sakho njengobusuku phakathi kwemini, nithukuse abaxoshiweyo, ningadaluli ababalekileyo. 
23_16_4_Abaxoshiweyo bakwaMowabi mabahlale kuwe; mawube yisivikelo kubo ebusweni bomchithi.” Lapho umcindezeli esephelile, nokuchitha sekuyekiwe, nabanyathelayo sebeqediwe ezweni, 
23_16_5_kuyakumiswa isihlalo sobukhosi ngomusa, kuhlale kuso ngeqiniso etendeni likaDavide umahluleli ofuna ukwahlulela esheshisa ukulunga. 
23_16_6_Sizwile ngokuziphakamisa kukaMowabi ukuthi uphakeme kakhulu, nangokuzidla kwakhe nokuziqhenya kwakhe nentukuthelo yakhe nokuphafuza kwakhe okuzenzisayo. 
23_16_7_Ngalokho uMowabi uyaklewula ngoMowabi; bonke bayakuklewula. Niyakukhala ngezigaxa zezithelo zomvini ezomileyo zaseKhiri Haresheti nidabukile kakhulu. 
23_16_8_Ngokuba amasimu aseHeshiboni abunile kanye nomvini waseSibima; amakhosi ezizwe achithile amagatsha awo; afinyelela naseJazeri, edukela nasehlane; amahlumela awo elulwa, awela ulwandle. 
23_16_9_Ngalokho ngiyakukhalela umvini waseSibima njengokukhala kweJazeri, ngikumanzise, Heshiboni, ngezinyembezi zami, nawe Elehale, ngokuba phezu kwezithelo zakho nokuvuna kwakho kuwile ukumemeza kwempi. 
23_16_10_Ukuthokoza kususiwe kanye nokujabula ensimini; nasezivinini akuhlatshelelwa, akujatshulwa; abanyathelayo abalinyatheli iwayini ezikhamweni; ngenze ukuba kuphele ukumemeza. 
23_16_11_Ngalokho inhliziyo yami iyakhala njengehabhu ngoMowabi, nokuphakathi kwami ngeKhiri Heresi. 
23_16_12_Kuyakuthi lapho uMowabi esebonakala, azikhathaze endaweni ephakemeyo, aye endlini yakhe engcwele ukuba athandaze, angaphumeleli. 
23_16_13_Yileli izwi uJehova alikhulumayo ngoMowabi ngaleso sikhathi. 
23_16_14_Kepha manje uJehova ukhulumile ukuthi: “Phakathi kweminyaka emithathu njengeminyaka yomqashwa udumo lukaMowabi luyakudelelwa, noma enezixuku eziningi; insali iyakuba ncane kakhulu, ingabi namandla.” 
23_17_1_Isiprofetho ngeDamaseku. “IDamaseku liyakususwa, lingabe lisaba ngumuzi, libe yinxiwa nencithakalo 
23_17_2_eshiyiwe kuze kube phakade, neyakuba ngeyemihlambi ebuthisa khona, ingesatshiswa muntu. 
23_17_3_Inqaba iyakuphela kwa-Efrayimi, nombuso eDamaseku, nensali e-Aramu, kube njengodumo lwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli,” usho uJehova Sebawoti. 
23_17_4_“Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku udumo luka Jakobe lube buthakathaka, kuzace ukukhuluphala kwenyama yakhe. 
23_17_5_Kuyakuba njengomvuni ovuna amabele asemi nengalo yakhe evuna izikhwebu, kube njengokukha izikhwebu esiGodini samaRefa. 
23_17_6_Kepha umkhothozo uyakusala khona njengokushaywa kweminqumo: izithelo ezimbili noma ezintathu enhlokweni phezulu, ezine noma eziyisihlanu emagatsheni omuthi,” usho uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli. 
23_17_7_Ngalolo suku abantu bayakumbheka uMenzi wabo, namehlo abo ayakumbuka oNgcwele ka-Israyeli. 
23_17_8_Abayikubheka ama-altare abo, umsebenzi wezandla zabo, bangabuki okwenziwe yiminwe yabo, o-Ashera nama-altare empepho. 
23_17_9_Ngalolo suku imizi yabo enamandla iyakuba njengezindawo ezishiyiweyo zasehlathini nezaseziqongweni zezintaba abazishiya phambi kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli zibe yincithakalo. 
23_17_10_Ngokuba ukhohliwe uNkulunkulu wokusindiswa kwakho, awukhumbulanga idwala lamandla akho; ngalokho noma utshala izithombo ezimnandi, uhlwanyele amahlumela angaziwayo, 
23_17_11_ngosuku lokutshala kwakho, lapho ubiyela, nangokusa kokuhlwanyela kwakho, lapho wenza ukuba kuqhakaze, ukuvuna kuyakubaleka ngosuku losizi nolobuhlungu obungenakupholiswa. 
23_17_12_Wo kukho ukuhlokoma kwezizwe eziningi ezihlokoma njengokuhlokoma kwezilwandle, nomsindo wokuxokozela kwabezizwe abaxokozela njengokuxokozela kwamanzi amaningi. 
23_17_13_Izizwe ziyaxokozela njengokuxokozela kwamanzi amaningi, kodwa uyakuzisola, zibalekele kude, zixoshwe njengamakhoba asezintabeni phambi komoya, nothuli olushwilayo phambi kwesiphepho. 
23_17_14_Ngesikhathi sokuhlwa, bheka, yingebhe; kungakasi azisekho. Yilesi esiyisabelo sabasiphangayo, nenkatho yabasamukayo. 
23_18_1_Wo kuwena lizwe lokuhashaza kwamaphiko eliphesheya komfula waseKushe, 
23_18_2_elithuma izigijimi ngolwandle nangemikhumbi yemihlanga phezu kwamanzi. Hambani nina zithunywa ezinejubane, niye esizweni esidephileyo nesikhazimulayo, kubantu abesabekayo lapha nasekudeni, isizwe esinamandla amakhulu nesinyathelayo, esilizwe laso lidatshulwe yimifula. 
23_18_3_Nonke nina enakhileyo ezweni nani nonke enihlezi emhlabeni bhekani, lapho ibhanela liphakanyiswa ezintabeni; zwanini, lapho icilongo libethwa. 
23_18_4_Ngokuba uJehova ushilo kimi kanje, wathi: “Ngiyakubheka ngithule, ngisendaweni yami, njengokubalela okukhazimula ekukhanyeni kwelanga, njengefu lamazolo ekufudumaleni ngesikhathi sokuvuna.” 
23_18_5_Ngokuba kungakafiki ukuvuna, nokukhahlela sekuphelile, nembali isiphenduka isithelo esivuthiweyo, uyakunquma amahlumela ngawocelemba, awasike amagatsha, awasuse. 
23_18_6_Ayakushiywa ndawonye abe ngawamanqe asezintabeni nawezilwane zasemhlabeni; amanqe ayakuhlala ehlobo phezu kwawo, nazo zonke izilwane zomhlaba ziyakuhlala ebusika phezu kwawo. 
23_18_7_Ngaleso sikhathi kuyakulethwa isipho kuJehova Sebawoti yibo abantu abadephileyo nabakhazimulayo, sivela kubantu abesabekayo lapha nasekudeni, isizwe esinamandla amakhulu nesinyathelayo, esilizwe laso lidatshulwe yimifula, endaweni yegama likaJehova Sebawoti, intaba yaseSiyoni. 
23_19_1_Isiprofetho ngeGibithe. Bheka, uJehova ukhwele phezu kwefu elinejubane, uyeza eGibithe; onkulunkulu baseGibithe bayathuthumela ebusweni bakhe, nezinhliziyo zabaseGibithe ziphela amandla phakathi kwabo. 
23_19_2_“Ngiyakuvusa abaseGibithe ukuba bamelane nabaseGibithe, balwe, kube yilowo nalowo nomfowabo, kube yilowo nalowo nomakhelwane wakhe, umuzi nomuzi, umbuso nombuso. 
23_19_3_Umoya waseGibithe uyakuba yize ngaphakathi kwalo; ngiyakuchitha amasu alo; bayakufuna onkulunkulu, nezinyanga, nabanamadlozi, nabathakathi. 
23_19_4_Ngiyakubanikeza abaseGibithe esandleni senkosi elukhuni, nenkosi enamandla iyakubusa phezu kwabo,” isho iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti. 
23_19_5_Amanzi ayakuphela elwandle, umfula wome, ushe. 
23_19_6_Imifula iyakunuka, imifudlana yaseGibithe iyakuncipha, yome, kubune umhlanga nebungu. 
23_19_7_Kuyakuba khona uqwathule ngaseNayile, ngasogwini lweNayile, nakho konke okutshaliwe ngaseNayile kuyakoma, kuhlakazwe, kungabe kusababikho. 
23_19_8_Abadobi bayakukhala, balile, bonke abaphonsa udobo eNayile; nabeneka amanetha emanzini bayakudabuka. 
23_19_9_Bayakujabha abasebenza ngefilakisi eliklayiweyo kanye nabaluki belineni. 
23_19_10_Izisekelo zalo ziyakwaphulwa, bonke abasebenza ngokuqashwa badabuke ngenhliziyo. 
23_19_11_Izikhulu zaseSowani ziyiziwula impela, nesiluleko sabaluleki abahlakaniphileyo bakaFaro siphendukile ubuwula; ningasho kanjani kuFaro ukuthi: “Mina ngiyindodana yabahlakaniphileyo, ngiyindodana yamakhosi asendulo,” na? 
23_19_12_Pho, baphi abahlakaniphileyo bakho na? Mabakutshele, bakwazise lokhu akucebile uJehova Sebawoti ngeGibithe. 
23_19_13_Izikhulu zaseSowani ziphendukile iziwula, izikhulu zaseNofi zikhohlisiwe; balidukisile iGibithe abangamatshe amagumbi ezizwe zalo. 
23_19_14_UJehova uthulule umoya ophambeneyo phakathi kwabo, baze balintengantengise iGibithe kuyo yonke imisebenzi yalo njengesidakwa sintengantenga ebuhlanzweni baso. 
23_19_15_IGibithe aliyikuba namsebenzi oyakwenziwa yikhanda nomsila, negatsha lesundu nomhlanga. 
23_19_16_Ngalolo suku iGibithe liyakuba njengabesifazane, lithuthumele, lesabe ukunikina kwesandla sikaJehova Sebawoti asinikina phezu kwalo. 
23_19_17_Izwe lakwaJuda liyakuba yingebhe yeGibithe; njalo lapho likhunjuzwa ngalo, liyakwesaba icebo uJehova Sebawoti alicebe ngalo. 
23_19_18_Ngalolo suku kuyakuba yimizi eyisihlanu ezweni laseGibithe eyakukhuluma ulimi lwaseKhanani, ifunge uJehova Sebawoti; omunye uyakuthiwa uMuzi Welanga. 
23_19_19_Ngalolo suku kuyakuba khona i-altare kuJehova phakathi kwezwe laseGibithe, nensika kuJehova emkhawulweni walo. 
23_19_20_Liyakuba yisibonakaliso nobufakazi kuJehova Sebawoti ezweni laseGibithe, ngokuba bayakukhala kuJehova ngabacindezeli; yena uyakubathumela umsindisi nomvikeli, abophule. 
23_19_21_UJehova uyakuzazisa eGibithe, nabaseGibithe bayakumazi uJehova ngalolo suku, bamkhonze ngomhlatshelo nomnikelo, benze izithembiso kuJehova, bazigcwalise. 
23_19_22_UJehova uyakulishaya iGibithe, elishaya, abeseliphulukisa; bayakubuyela kuJehova, bamncenge, abaphulukise. 
23_19_23_Ngalolo suku kuyakuba khona umendo ophuma eGibithe uye e-Asiriya; i-Asiriya liyakungena eGibithe, iGibithe lingene e-Asiriya, iGibithe likhuleke kanye ne-Asiriya. 
23_19_24_Ngalolo suku u-Israyeli uyakuba ngowesithathu kanye neGibithe ne-Asiriya, babe yisibusiso phakathi komhlaba, 
23_19_25_uJehova Sebawoti ababusisa ngaso, ethi: “Malibusiswe iGibithe abantu bami, ne-Asiriya umsebenzi wezandla zami, no-Israyeli ifa lami.” 
23_20_1_Ngomnyaka wokufika kukaTharithani e-Ashidodi, ethunywe nguSarigoni, inkosi yase-Asiriya, walwa ne-Ashidodi, walithatha, 
23_20_2_ngaleso sikhathi uJehova wakhuluma ngesandla sika-Isaya indodana ka-Amose, wathi: “Hamba uthukulule indwangu yamasaka okhalweni lwakho, ukhumule izicathulo zakho ezinyaweni zakho.” Wenze njalo, wahamba ze, akafakanga nazicathulo. 
23_20_3_UJehova wathi: “Njengalokhu inceku yami u-Isaya isihambe ze ingafakile nazicathulo iminyaka emithathu, iyisibonakaliso nesimangaliso eGibithe naseKushe, 
23_20_4_kanjalo inkosi yase-Asiriya iyakumukisa abathunjwa baseGibithe nabaxoshiweyo baseKushe, abasha nabadala, behamba ze, bengafakile nazicathulo, izinqe zabo zihlubuliwe, kube yihlazo laseGibithe. 
23_20_5_Bayakuphela amandla, babe namahloni ngeKushe ithemba labo nangeGibithe udumo lwabo. 
23_20_6_Abakhileyo kuleli elingasogwini bayakuthi ngalolo suku: ‘Bheka, linjalo ithemba lethu esabalekela kulo ukuba sisizwe, sophulwe enkosini yase-Asiriya; pho-ke, thina siyakuphunyuka kanjani na?’ ” 
23_21_1_Isiprofetho ngehlane lolwandle. Njengokudlula kwezivunguvungu eningizimu kuvela ehlane ezweni elesabekayo. 
23_21_2_Ngitshelwe umbono olukhuni: umphangi uyaphanga, umchithi uyachitha. Yenyuka, Elamu, vimbezela, Mediya; konke ukukhala kwalo ngikwenza kuphele. 
23_21_3_Ngalokho ukhalo lwami lugcwele imihelo; inkwantshu ingibambile njengenkwantshu yobelethayo; ngikhonkobele ukuba ngingezwa, ngiphele amandla ukuba ngingaboni. 
23_21_4_Ngadukelwa yingqondo, ngashaywa luvalo; ukuhwelela engakulangazelela kwaphenduka ukuthuthumela kimi. 
23_21_5_Ngukulungisa itafula yini? Ngukwendlala izindwangu, ukudla nokuphuza, na? Hhayi, sukumani, zikhulu, nicobe izihlangu. 
23_21_6_Ngokuba ishilo kanje iNkosi, yathi: “Hamba umise umlindi ozakubika akubonayo. 
23_21_7_Lapho ebona abamahhashi, amahhashi amabili ngamabili, nezinkweli zezimbongolo, nezinkweli zamakamela, uyakuqaphela nokuqaphela ngesineke esikhulu.” 
23_21_8_Obonayo wayesememeza, wathi: “Nkosi yami, ngimi njalo emini embhoshongweni wami, ngihlezi ngisemlindelweni nasebusuku bonke. 
23_21_9_Bheka, kuyeza isigaba samadoda, amahhashi amabili ngamabili. Wathatha wathi: ‘Liwile, liwile iBabele, nazo zonke izithombe ezibaziweyo zawonkulunkulu balo zidilizwe phansi.’ ” 
23_21_10_Wena ongokubhuliweyo kwami kwesibuya sami, engikuzwileyo kuJehova Sebawoti, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, khona ngiyanazisa. 
23_21_11_Isiprofetho ngeDuma. Ukhona ongimemeza ngiseSeyiri, ethi: “Mlindi, yisikhathi sini sobusuku na? Mlindi, yisikhathi sini sobusuku na?” 
23_21_12_Umlindi wathi: “Kuyeza ukusa, kepha kuse sebusuku. Uma nithanda ukubuza, buzani; buyani nize.” 
23_21_13_Isiprofetho nge-Arabiya. Hlalani ebusuku ehlathini lase-Arabiya nina mahele aseDedanimi. 
23_21_14_Owomileyo bamlethela amanzi abakhileyo ezweni laseThema, bahlangabeza ababalekayo nesinkwa. 
23_21_15_Ngokuba babalekela izinkemba, izinkemba ezihoshiweyo, neminsalo ensaliweyo, nobunzima bempi. 
23_21_16_Ngokuba iNkosi ishilo kimi kanje, yathi: “Phakathi komnyaka, njengeminyaka yomqashwa, udumo lonke lwaseKedari luyakuphela, 
23_21_17_nensali yenani leminsalo yamaqhawe abaseKedari iyakuba ncane,” ngokuba uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli ukhulumile. 
23_22_1_Isiprofetho ngesiGodi Sombono. Yini, pho, ukuba ukhuphukele wonke ophahleni lwezindlu 
23_22_2_wena muzi ogcwele ukumemeza, oxokozelayo, muzi othokozayo, na? Ababuleweyo bakho ababulawanga ngenkemba, kabafelanga empini. 
23_22_3_Zonke izinduna zakho zibalekile kanyekanye, zaboshwa ngaphandle kweminsalo; zonke ezakho ezafunyanwayo zaboshwa kanyekanye, noma zazibalekele kude. 
23_22_4_Ngalokho ngathi: “Ningangibheki, ngiyakukhala ngomunyu; ningazami ukungiduduza ngenxa yokuchithwa kwendodakazi yabantu bami.” 
23_22_5_Ngokuba kulusuku lokukhathazeka, nolokunyathelwa phansi, nolokukhungatheka, oluvela eNkosini uJehova Sebawoti esiGodini Sombono kanye nokudilizwa kwezingange nokumemeza ezintabeni. 
23_22_6_I-Elamu lathwala isambo phakathi kwezinqola, nabantu, namahhashi, neKhiri lambula isihlangu. 
23_22_7_Kwathi izigodi zakho ezikhethekileyo zagcwala izinqola, nabamahhashi bazihlela nokuzihlela ngasesangweni. 
23_22_8_Wasisusa isimbozo kwaJuda; wena wabheka ngalolo suku izikhali zasendlini yehlathi. 
23_22_9_Nabona imifantu emzini kaDavide ukuthi yayiminingi, nawaqoqa amanzi asechibini lasenzansi. 
23_22_10_Nazibala izindlu zaseJerusalema, nazidiliza izindlu ukuba niluqinise ugange. 
23_22_11_Futhi nenzela amanzi echibi elidala umgodi phakathi kwezingange zombili, kepha anibhekanga kumenzi walokho, animnakanga okade wakunquma. 
23_22_12_Ngalolo suku iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti yabizela ukukhala, nokulila, nobumpandla, nokubhinca indwangu yamasaka, 
23_22_13_kepha bheka, nakhu ukujabula, nokuthokoza, nokubulala izinkabi, nokuhlaba izimvu, ukudla inyama nokuphuza iwayini, ngokuthi: “Masidle, siphuze, ngokuba ngomuso sizakufa.” 
23_22_14_Kepha uJehova Sebawoti wazibonakalisa ezindlebeni zami, wathi: “Impela lesi sono asiyikuhlangulwa kini nize nife,” isho iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti. 
23_22_15_Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti, ithi: “Hamba uye kuleyo nduna uShebina ophezu kwendlu, uthi: 
23_22_16_‘Wenzani lapha, futhi unobani lapha ukuba uziqophele lapha ithuna na? Uziqophela ithuna lakhe phezulu, uzikipilitela indawo yokuhlala edwaleni!’ 
23_22_17_“Bheka, uJehova uyakukulahla njengalokhu umuntu elahla, abambe nokubamba. 
23_22_18_Uyakukuthandela nokukuthandela njengokuthandelweyo, akulahle njengegabade ezweni elibanzi. Uyakufela khona, lapho kuyakuba khona nezinqola zodumo lwakho wena hlazo lendlu yenkosi yakho. 
23_22_19_Ngiyakukuhlohloloza esikhundleni sakho, ngikuwise endaweni yakho. 
23_22_20_“Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku ngiyibize inceku yami u-Eliyakimi indodana kaHilikiya; 
23_22_21_ngiyakumembathisa ingubo yakho, ngimqinise ngebhande lakho, nginikeze ukubusa kwakho esandleni sakhe, abe nguyise kwabakhileyo eJerusalema nakuyo indlu yakwaJuda. 
23_22_22_Ngiyakubeka isihluthelelo sendlu kaDavide ehlombe lakhe; uyakuvula kungavali muntu, avale kungavuli muntu. 
23_22_23_Ngiyakumbethelisa okwesipikili endaweni eqinileyo, abe yisihlalo sobukhosi esikhazimulayo endlini kayise. 
23_22_24_Bayakuphanyeka phezu kwakhe lonke udumo lwendlu kayise, inzalo nabantwana, zonke izitsha ezincane, imicengezi nezinkamba. 
23_22_25_“Ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “isipikili esabethelwa endaweni eqinileyo siyakukhumuka, sinqanyulwe, siwe, nomthwalo obukuso unqunywe,” ngokuba uJehova ukhulumile. 
23_23_1_Isiprofetho ngeTire. Klewulani nina, Mikhumbi yaseTharishishi, ngokuba lichithekile; indlu ayisekho, nokungena akusenakwenzeka; kwambulelwe kubo kuvela ezweni laseKitimi. 
23_23_2_Thulani nina enakhileyo ngasogwini, nina abathengisi baseSidoni abanigcwalisile bedabula elwandle. 
23_23_3_Emanzini amaningi imbewu yaseSihori nokuvuna kweNayile kwakuyinzuzo yalo; laliyindawo yokuthenga kuzo izizwe. 
23_23_4_Yiba namahloni wena Sidoni, ngokuba lukhulumile ulwandle, inqaba yolwandle, ngokuthi: “Angibanga namihelo, angizalanga, angikhulisanga izinsizwa, angondlanga izintombi.” 
23_23_5_Lapho kubikwa eGibithe, bayakuthuthumela ngokuzwa ngeTire. 
23_23_6_Welani niye eTharishishi; klewulani nina enakhileyo ngasogwini. 
23_23_7_Yilowo ongumuzi wenu ojabulayo, ubudala bawo busukela ezinsukwini zasendulo, owayiswa kude yizinyawo zawo ukuba uhlale khona, na? 
23_23_8_Ngubani ocebe lokhu ngeTire eliqhelisayo, elibathengi balo bayizikhulu, nabahwebi balo bangabadumileyo bomhlaba, na? 
23_23_9_NguJehova Sebawoti okucebileyo ukuba konakaliswe ukuziphakamisa kwabo bonke ubukhosi, badeleleke bonke abadumileyo bomhlaba. 
23_23_10_Dabula izwe lakho njengeNayile, ndodakazi yaseTharishishi; akusekho bhande. 
23_23_11_Welulile isandla sakhe phezu kolwandle, wazamazamisa imibuso; uJehova uyalezile ngeKhanani ukuba kuchithwe izinqaba zalo. 
23_23_12_Wathi: “Awusayikujabula wena ntombi ehlazisiweyo, ndodakazi yaseSidoni; vuka, uwelele eKitimi; nalapho awuyikuthola ukuphumula.” 
23_23_13_Bheka, izwe lamaKaledi, leso sizwe esingasekho, esanqunyelwa yi-Asiriya izilwane zasehlane, limisa imibhoshongo, lizenza ize izindlu zaso zamakhosi, lenza laba yincithakalo. 
23_23_14_Klewulani nina mikhumbi yaseTharishishi, ngokuba inqaba yenu ichithekile. 
23_23_15_Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku iTire likhohlakale iminyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa njengezinsuku zankosinye. Ngasekupheleni kweminyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa kuyakuba khona kulo iTire njengasesihlabelelweni sesifebe: 
23_23_16_“Thatha ihabhu, uhambahambe emzini wena sifebe esikhohlakeleyo, ubethe kamnandi, uhlabelele izihlabelelo eziningi, ukuze ukhunjulwe.” 
23_23_17_Kuyakuthi ngasekupheleni kweminyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa uJehova ahambele iTire, lona libuyele enzuzweni yalo, lifebe nayo yonke imibuso yezwe ebusweni bomhlaba. 
23_23_18_Intengo yalo nenzuzo yalo iyakuba ngcwele kuJehova; ayiyikunqwabelwa, ilondolozwe, ngokuba intengo yalo iyakuba ngeyabahlala phambi kukaJehova, ukuze badle basuthe, babe nezingubo ezinhle. 
23_24_1_Bheka, uJehova wenza ize umhlaba, awuchithe, agumbuqele ubuso bawo, ahlakaze abakhileyo kuwo. 
23_24_2_Kuyakuthi njengakubantu kube njalo kumpristi, nanjengasencekwini kube njalo enkosini yayo, nanjengasencekukazini kube njalo enkosikazini yayo, nanjengakumthengi kube njalo kumthengisi, nanjengakotshelekayo kube njalo kobolekayo, nanjengakobiza inzalo kube njalo kokhokha inzalo. 
23_24_3_Umhlaba uyakuba yize leze, uphangwe nokuphangwa, ngokuba uJehova ukhulumile izwi lakhe. 
23_24_4_Umhlaba uyalila, ubune; izwe liyaphela amandla, linyamalale, abaphakemeyo bomhlaba badangale. 
23_24_5_Umhlaba wonakalisiwe phansi kwabakhileyo kuwo, ngokuba beqile imithetho, badlulile ezimisweni, baphulile isivumelwano esiphakade. 
23_24_6_Ngalokho isiqalekiso sidlile umhlaba, nabakhileyo kuwo batholiswa icala; ngalokho abakhileyo emhlabeni bayashiswa, kusale abantu abayingcosana nje. 
23_24_7_Iwayini elisha liyalila, umvini uyahhuma, bonke ababethokoza ngenhliziyo bayabubula. 
23_24_8_Ukujabula kwezigubhu kunqamukile, ukuxokozela kwabajabulayo kuphelile, nenjabulo yehabhu ikhawukile. 
23_24_9_Abasayikuphuza iwayini ngesihlabelelo; uphuzo olunamandla luyakubaba kubo abaluphuzayo. 
23_24_10_Umuzi oyihlane ubhidliziwe; zonke izindlu zivaliwe ukuba kungangeni muntu. 
23_24_11_Kukhalwa ngewayini ezitaladini; yonke intokozo inyamalele; injabulo yezwe idlulile. 
23_24_12_Emzini kusele incithakalo; isango livithiziwe, lachithwa. 
23_24_13_Ngokuba kuyakuba njalo emhlabeni phakathi kwabantu, njengokushaywa kweminqumo nanjengokukhothoza, lapho sekuvuniwe. 
23_24_14_Laba bayaphakamisa izwi labo, bamemeze; bajabula ngobukhosi bukaJehova entshonalanga. 
23_24_15_Ngalokho mdumiseni uJehova empumalanga, nasogwini lolwandle igama likaJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli. 
23_24_16_Siyezwa amahubo avela emikhawulweni yomhlaba, athi: “Udumo malube koLungileyo!” Kepha mina ngithi: “Ngifile, ngifile! Maye kimi!” Abakhohlisi bakhohlisile, yebo, abakhohlisi bakhohlisile nokukhohlisa. 
23_24_17_Ukwesaba, nomgodi, nogibe kuphezu kwakho wena owakhileyo emhlabeni. 
23_24_18_Kuyakuthi obalekela umsindo wokwesaba awele emgodini; okhuphuka emgodini uyakubanjwa lugibe, ngokuba amafasitele aphezulu avuliwe, nezisekelo zomhlaba ziyazamazama. 
23_24_19_Umhlaba uyaphuka nokwaphuka, umhlaba uyavithizwa nokuvithizwa, umhlaba uyazanyazanyiswa nokuzanyazanyiswa. 
23_24_20_Umhlaba uyatengezela nokutengezela njengesidakwa, uyantengantenga njengexhiba; isiphambeko siyakuba nzima phezu kwawo, uwe, ungabe usavuka futhi. 
23_24_21_Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku uJehova ahambele ibandla lasezulwini phezulu, namakhosi omhlaba emhlabeni. 
23_24_22_Bayakubuthelwa ndawonye njengeziboshwa zibuthelwa emgodini, bavalelwe etilongweni, bajeziswe emva kwezinsuku eziningi. 
23_24_23_Inyanga ekhazimulayo isiyakuyangaza, nelanga elinkemuzelayo liyakujabha, ngokuba uJehova Sebawoti uyakuba yinkosi entabeni yaseSiyoni naseJerusalema, abe yinkazimulo phambi kwamalunga akhe. 
23_25_1_Jehova, unguNkulunkulu wami; ngiyakukuphakamisa, ngidumise igama lakho, ngokuba wenzile izimangaliso, namasu asendulo, nokuthembeka, neqiniso. 
23_25_2_Ngokuba wenzile umuzi waba yinqwaba, nomuzi obiyelweyo waba yincithakalo; indlu yamakhosi abafokazi ayiseyiwo umuzi, ayisayikwakhiwa futhi kuze kube phakade. 
23_25_3_Ngalokho abantu abanamandla bayakukudumisa, imizi yezizwe ezinonya zikwesabe. 
23_25_4_Ngokuba ubuyinqaba kwabampofu, inqaba kwabaswelayo ekucindezelweni kwabo, isiphephelo esivunguvungwini, umthunzi ekubaleleni, ngokuba umoya waba nonya, unjengesivunguvungu odongeni, 
23_25_5_nanjengokushisa endaweni eyomileyo. Uyathobisa umsindo wabafokazi; njengokubalela ngomthunzi wefu, kanjalo ihubo labanonya liyakudanjiswa. 
23_25_6_UJehova Sebawoti uyakwenzela abantu bonke idili lokukhulupheleyo kule ntaba, idili lewayini elinenhlese, okukhulupheleyo okunomnkantsha, iwayini elinenhlese elicwengekileyo. 
23_25_7_Uyakuchitha kule ntaba ingaphandle lesimbozo esimboza abantu bonke, nomgubuzelo ogubuzela zonke izizwe. 
23_25_8_Uyakugwinya ukufa kuze kube phakade; iNkosi uJehova iyakwesula izinyembezi ebusweni bonke, isuse amahloni abantu bakhe emhlabeni wonke, ngokuba uJehova ukhulumile. 
23_25_9_Kuyakuthiwa ngalolo suku: “Bheka, lo unguNkulunkulu wethu; simhlalele, uyakusisindisa; lo unguJehova; simhlalele; siyakujabula, sithokoze ngensindiso yakhe.” 
23_25_10_Ngokuba kule ntaba isandla sikaJehova siyakuphumula, noMowabi uyakunyathelwa phansi endaweni yakhe njengotshani bunyathelwa emgodini womquba. 
23_25_11_Noma elula izandla zakhe phakathi kwawo njengohlambayo elula ukuba ahlambe, uyakuthobisa ukuziphakamisa kwakhe kanye nobuhlakani bezandla zakhe. 
23_25_12_Izinqaba eziphakemeyo zezingange zakho uyakuzibhidliza, azithobise, azenze ukuba zithintane nomhlabathi nothuli. 
23_26_1_Ngalolo suku lesi sihlabelelo siyakuhlatshelelwa ezweni lakwaJuda sokuthi: Umuzi onamandla sinawo; uyasimisela insindiso ibe yizingange nezindonga. 
23_26_2_Vulani amasango ukuba isizwe esilungileyo esigcina iqiniso singene. 
23_26_3_Inhliziyo eqinileyo uyayilinda ngokuthula okupheleleyo, ngokuba yethemba kuwe. 
23_26_4_Thembani kuJehova kuze kube phakade, ngokuba uJehova, yebo, uJehova uyidwala elingunaphakade. 
23_26_5_Ngokuba uthobisile ababehlezi phezulu, umuzi ophakemeyo; uyawubhidliza, uyawubhidliza kuze kube semhlabathini, awusondeze nasothulini. 
23_26_6_Unyawo luyakuwunyathela phansi, izinyawo zabaswelayo, izinyathelo zabampofu. 
23_26_7_Indlela yabalungileyo iqondile, umkhondo wabaqotho ulungile, uyawenza ukuba ulingane. 
23_26_8_Yebo, ezindleleni zezahlulelo zakho, Jehova, sikuhlalele. Umphefumulo uyalangazelela igama lakho nesikhumbuzo sakho. 
23_26_9_Ngomphefumulo wami ngikulangazelela ebusuku, yebo, ngomoya wami ophakathi kwami ngiyakufunisisa, ngokuba lapho izahlulelo zakho zisemhlabeni, abakhileyo bezwe bafunda ukulunga. 
23_26_10_Uma omubi ephiwa umusa, akafundi ukulunga; ezweni lobuqotho uyakwenza ukonakala, angaboni ukuphakama kukaJehova. 
23_26_11_Jehova, isandla sakho siphakeme, kepha kababoni; kodwa mababone ukushisekela kwakho abantu, babe namahloni; yebo, umlilo uyakuqeda izitha zakho. 
23_26_12_Jehova, uyakusimisela ukuthula; ngokuba nayo yonke imisebenzi yethu senzelwe yona nguwe. 
23_26_13_Jehova Nkulunkulu wethu, amanye amakhosi angaphandle kwakho asibusile, kepha kuwena wedwa siyadumisa igama lakho. 
23_26_14_Abafileyo ababuyi baphile, izithunzi azibuyi zivuke; ngalokho wabahambela, wabachitha, wenza ukuba konke ukukhunjulwa kwabo kuphele. 
23_26_15_Wandisa isizwe, Jehova, wandisa isizwe, wadunyiswa, wavula yonke imikhawulo yezwe. 
23_26_16_Jehova, besekuhluphekeni bakuhambela, bazethula ngemikhuleko lapho belaywa nguwe. 
23_26_17_Njengokhulelweyo osondela ukuba abelethe ezwiswa ubuhlungu, saba njalo phambi kobuso bakho, Jehova. 
23_26_18_Sasikhulelwe, sasinobuhlungu, sabeletha kungathi umoya nje; asenzanga insindiso emhlabeni, nabayakwakha ezweni abasazalwa. 
23_26_19_Kepha abafileyo bakho bayakubuye baphile, izidumbu zabo zivuke. Phaphamani, nijabule nina enihlala othulini, ngokuba amazolo akho angamazolo okukhanya, nomhlaba uyakubakhipha abafileyo. 
23_26_20_Wozani, bantu bami, ningene emakamelweni enu, nizivalele iminyango, nicashe ngokuphazima kweso, kuze kudlule ulaka. 
23_26_21_Ngokuba bhekani, uJehova uyaphuma endaweni yakhe ukuba ahambele ububi babakhileyo emhlabeni; umhlaba uyakubonakalisa igazi lawo, ungabe usabasibekela ababuleweyo babo. 
23_27_1_Ngalolo suku uJehova uyakuhambela ngenkemba yakhe elukhuni enkulu nenamandla uLeviyathani, inyoka esheshayo, uLeviyathani, inyoka ethandelayo, abulale udrako oselwandle. 
23_27_2_Ngalolo suku kuyakuba khona isivini esinxanelekayo. “Hlabelelani ngaso. 
23_27_3_Mina Jehova ngingumlindi waso, ngiyakusinisela njalo; funa soniwe, ngiyakusilinda ubusuku nemini. 
23_27_4_Ukufutheka akukho kimi; sengathi kungaba khona amakhakhasi nameva! Bengiyakuwasukela ngokulwa, ngiwashise kanyekanye, 
23_27_5_noma abambelele emandleni ami ukuba enze ukuthula nami, enzelane ukuthula nami.” 
23_27_6_Ngezinsuku ezizayo uJakobe uyakugxila, u-Israyeli akhahlele, aqhakaze, bagcwalise ubuso bomhlaba ngezithelo. 
23_27_7_Ubashayile njengalokho ebashayile ababashayayo na? Babulewe njengokubulawa kwababulewe nguye na? 
23_27_8_Ngokubamukisa nangokubaxosha uyabajezisa; wabasusa ngomoya wakhe olukhuni ngosuku lomoya wasempumalanga. 
23_27_9_Ngakho ububi bukaJakobe buyakuhlangulwa ngalokhu, lokhu kube yisithelo sonke sokususa isono sakhe, lapho enza ukuba onke amatshe e-altare avithizeke njengamatshe omcako, kungabe kusamiswa o-Ashera nama-altare empepho. 
23_27_10_Ngokuba umuzi obiyelweyo uyize, nekhaya limukelwe, lishiyiwe njengehlane; ithole liyakuklaba khona, libuthise khona, lidle, liqede amahlamvu awo. 
23_27_11_Lapho amagatsha awo esebunile, ayakwaphulwa, kufike abesifazane, baphembe umlilo kuwo, ngokuba bangabantu abangenakuqonda; ngalokho owabenzayo akayikubahawukela, nowababumbayo akayikuba namusa kubo. 
23_27_12_Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku uJehova avuthuze ezikhwetshini zasemfuleni kuze kube semfuleni waseGibithe, nibuthwe abanye ngabanye nina bantwana bakwa-Israyeli. 
23_27_13_Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku libethwe icilongo elikhulu, kufike ababelahlekile ezweni lase-Asiriya nabaxoshiweyo ezweni laseGibithe, bakhuleke kuJehova entabeni engcwele eJerusalema. 
23_28_1_Wo kuwo umqhele wokuziphakamisa wezidakwa zakwa-Efrayimi, nakuyo imbali ebunayo yobuhle bakhe obukhazimulayo, esenhloko yesigodi esivundileyo sabanqotshwe yiwayini. 
23_28_2_Bheka, iNkosi inaye oqinileyo nonamandla; uyakuwisa phansi ngamandla njengesivunguvungu esinesichotho, nesiphepho esichithayo, nesiphihli samanzi esinamandla esikhukhulayo. 
23_28_3_Umqhele wokuziphakamisa wezidakwa zakwa-Efrayimi uyakunyathelwa ngezinyawo, 
23_28_4_imbali ebunayo yobuhle bakhe obukhazimulayo, esenhloko yesigodi esivundileyo, ibe njengekhiwane elivuthiwe kungakafiki ukuvuna; olibonayo uyalibuka, aligwinye, lise sesandleni sakhe. 
23_28_5_Ngalolo suku uJehova Sebawoti uyakuba ngumqhele wobukhosi, nesicoco esihle kuyo insali yabantu bakhe, 
23_28_6_nomoya wokwahlulela kohlezi ekwahluleleni, namandla kubo ababuyisa impi esangweni. 
23_28_7_Nalabo baduka ngewayini; ngophuzo olunamandla bayatengezela; abapristi nabaprofethi bayaduka ngophuzo olunamandla, bayatengezela ngophuzo olunamandla; bayaduka ekuboneni, bakhubeka ekwahluleleni. 
23_28_8_Yebo, onke amatafula agcwele ubuhlanzo nokungcola, kungabe kusabakho ndawo. 
23_28_9_“Ngubani ayakumfundisa ukwazi, aqondise bani umbiko, na? Yibo abalunyuliweyo obisini, basuswa emabeleni, na? 
23_28_10_Ngokuba kuyisiyalezelo phezu kwesiyalezelo, isiyalezelo phezu kwesiyalezelo, umthetho phezu komthetho, umthetho phezu komthetho, lapha ingcosana, nalapho ingcosana.” 
23_28_11_Yebo, ngezindebe ezingingizayo nangolunye ulimi uyakukhuluma kulaba bantu 
23_28_12_akade esho kubo ukuthi: “Lokhu kungukuphumula; phumuzani abayethileyo; lokhu kungukuhlunyelelwa,” kepha abathandanga ukuzwa. 
23_28_13_Ngalokho izwi likaJehova liyakuba kubona isiyalezelo phezu kwesiyalezelo, isiyalezelo phezu kwesiyalezelo, umthetho phezu komthetho, umthetho phezu komthetho, lapha ingcosana, nalapho ingcosana, ukuze bahambe, bawe nyovane, baphuke, bacushwe, babanjwe. 
23_28_14_Ngalokho yizwani izwi likaJehova nina bantu abadelelayo, enibusa laba bantu baseJerusalema. 
23_28_15_Ngokuba nithe: “Senzile isivumelwano nokufa, sivumelene nendawo yabafileyo; lapho isiswebhu esikhukhulayo sidlula, asiyikusehlela thina, ngokuba senzile amanga abe yisiphephelo sethu, sicashile phansi kwenkohliso.” 
23_28_16_Ngalokho ithi iNkosi uJehova: “Bheka, ngibeka eSiyoni itshe lesisekelo, itshe elivivinyekileyo, itshe legumbi elinqabileyo lesisekelo esiyiso; okholwayo kayikubaleka. 
23_28_17_Ngiyakwenza ukwahlulela kube ngumucu wokulinganisa, nokulunga kube ngumthofu wokumisa, isichotho sihlwithe isiphephelo samanga, amanzi akhukhule indawo yokucasha. 
23_28_18_Futhi isivumelwano senu nokufa siyakuchithwa, nokuvumelana kwenu nendawo yabafileyo akuyikuma; lapho isiswebhu esikhukhulayo sidlula, niyakunyathelwa phansi yiso. 
23_28_19_Njalo lapho sidabula, siyakunibamba, ngokuba siyakudabula ukusa ngokusa imini nobusuku,” kube ngukwesaba kuphela, lapho umbiko uqondwa. 
23_28_20_Ngokuba umbhede uyakuba mfushane kunokuba umuntu enabe kuwo, nengubo ibe ncane kunokuba umuntu azisonge ngayo. 
23_28_21_Ngokuba uJehova uyakusukuma njengasentabeni yasePherasimi, athukuthele njengasesigodini saseGibeyoni, ukuze enze umsebenzi wakhe, umsebenzi wakhe ongavamile, afeze isenzo sakhe, isenzo sakhe esimangalisayo. 
23_28_22_Ngalokho ningadeleli, funa izibopho zenu ziqiniswe, ngokuba ngizwile eNkosini uJehova Sebawoti ukuthi ukuphela kunqunyiwe phezu kwawo wonke umhlaba. 
23_28_23_Bekani indlebe, nizwe izwi lami; lalelani, nizwe ukukhuluma kwami. 
23_28_24_Umlimi, eyakutshala, ulima lonke usuku na? Uyaduba abhuqe umhlabathi wakhe njalo na? 
23_28_25_Lapho esehlelembile ubuso bawo, angithi uhlwanyela amafitshizi, asakaze ikumini, atshale ukolweni ngezinhla, nebhali ezindaweni zalo, nokolweni ocolekileyo eceleni, na? 
23_28_26_UNkulunkulu wakhe uyamhlakahlisa ngendlela eyiyo, amfundise. 
23_28_27_Ngokuba amafitshizi awabhulwa ngesibhulo esibukhali, nesondo lengqukumbane kaliphendulwa phezu kwekumini, kepha amafitshizi ayavuthuzwa ngenduku nekumini ngothi. 
23_28_28_Amabele esinkwa ayacolwa na? Cha, ngokuba awabhulwa nokubhulwa njalo; nakuba eqhuba isondo lengqukumbane namahhashi alo phezu kwawo, awacolisiswa. 
23_28_29_Nalokho kuvela kuJehova Sebawoti oyisimangaliso ekululekeni nomkhulu emaswini. 
23_29_1_Wo kuwe Ariyeli, Ariyeli, umuzi lapho amisa khona uDavide. Yengezelani umnyaka emnyakeni, imikhosi iyingilize, 
23_29_2_ngize ngilicindezele i-Ariyeli, kube khona ukukhala nokububula, libe njenge-Ariyeli kimi. 
23_29_3_Ngiyakumisa, ngikuhaqe nxazonke zakho, ngikuvimbezele ngezinqaba, ngikumisele izindonga. 
23_29_4_Uyakubhidlizelwa phansi, ukhulume usemhlabathini; ukukhuluma kwakho kuyakuthotshiselwa phansi, kuphume othulini, izwi lakho libe njengelonedlozi livela emhlabathini, ukukhuluma kwakho kubethe imilozi othulini. 
23_29_5_Kodwa isixuku sezitha zakho siyakuba njengebhuqu elicolekileyo, noquqaba lwabacindezeli njengamakhoba adlulayo, yebo, kuyakwenzakala ngokuzumayo ngokuphazima kweso. 
23_29_6_Uyakuhanjelwa nguJehova Sebawoti ngokuduma nangokuzamazama, nangomsindo omkhulu, nangesivunguvungu, nangesiphepho, nangelangabi lomlilo oqothulayo. 
23_29_7_Isixuku sezizwe zonke ezisukela i-Ariyeli, ezisukela lona kanye nenqaba yalo, nezilicindezelayo, siyakuba njengephupho nombono wasebusuku. 
23_29_8_Kuyakuba njengolambileyo ephupha ukuthi uyadla, kepha evuka usenephango, noma njengowomileyo ephupha ukuthi uyaphuza, kepha evuka uyethile, womile; siyakuba njalo isixuku sezizwe zonke ezisukela intaba yaseSiyoni. 
23_29_9_Zimangaliseni, nimangale; ziphuphuthiseni, niphuphutheke; badakiwe, kepha kungengewayini, bayatengezela, kodwa kungengaphuzo olunamandla. 
23_29_10_Ngokuba uJehova uthulule phezu kwenu umoya wobuthongo obunzima; uwavalile amehlo enu, usibekele abaprofethi benu nezinhloko zenu ababoni. 
23_29_11_Umbono wakho konke lokho wawusuba kini njengamazwi encwadi enamathelisiweyo enikwa owazi incwadi ngokuthi: “Ake ufunde lokhu,” abesethi yena: “Angikwazi, ngokuba inamathelisiwe,” 
23_29_12_incwadi bese yinikwa ongayazi incwadi ngokuthi: “Ake ufunde lokhu,” abesethi yena: “Angiyazi incwadi.” 
23_29_13_Yathi iNkosi: “Ngenxa yokuba laba bantu besondela, bangidumise ngemilomo yabo nangezindebe zabo, kodwa bazidedisele kude nami izinhliziyo zabo, nokungesaba kwabo kungumyalo wabantu abawufundisiweyo nje, 
23_29_14_ngalokho ngiyakubuye ngenzele laba bantu izenzo ezimangalisayo, izimangaliso impela; ukuhlakanipha kwabahlakaniphileyo babo kuyakuphela, nokuqonda kwabaqondileyo babo kuyakusitheka.”
