23_29_15_Wo kubona abajula ukuba basithezele uJehova isu labo, abamisebenzi yabo isebumnyameni, nabasho ukuthi: “Ngubani osibonayo, ngubani osaziyo, na?” 
23_29_16_O ukuphendukezela kwenu! Ibumba liyakulinganiswa nombumbi yini, ukuze okwenziweyo kusho ngokwenzileyo ukuthi: “Yena akangenzanga,” na? noma okubunjiweyo kusho ngokubumbileyo ukuthi: “Akanakuqonda,” na? 
23_29_17_Akuseyisikhashana nje iLebanoni lize liphenduke insimu, nensimu ithiwe ihlathi, na? 
23_29_18_Ngalolo suku izithulu ziyakuzwa amazwi encwadi, namehlo ezimpumputhe ayakubona, engasenakufiphala ngesigayegaye nabumnyama. 
23_29_19_Abathobekileyo bayakwandisa intokozo yabo kuJehova, nabampofu kubantu bayakujabula koNgcwele ka-Israyeli. 
23_29_20_Ngokuba umcindezeli akasayikuba khona, nesideleli siyakube singasekho, nabo bonke abazulumba ububi bayakube beqothuliwe, 
23_29_21_ababemtholisa umuntu icala ngezwi nje, bambekela ugibe yena owathetha amacala esangweni, bachezukisa olungileyo ngento engelutho. 
23_29_22_Ngalokho ngendlu kaJakobe usho kanje uJehova owamhlenga u-Abrahama, uthi: “UJakobe akasayikuba namahloni, nobuso bakhe abusayikuphaphatheka. 
23_29_23_Ngokuba lapho ebona abantwana bakhe, umsebenzi wezandla zami phakathi kwakhe, bayakungcwelisa igama lami, yebo, bayakungcwelisa oNgcwele kaJakobe, bamesabe uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli. 
23_29_24_Abaduka emoyeni bayakwazi, baqonde, nabakhononayo bayakufunda, bakwamukele.” 
23_30_1_“Wo kubantwana abahlubukileyo,” usho uJehova, “abenza iziluleko, kungengezami nokho, nabenza isivumelwano, kungengesomoya wami kodwa, ukuze bengeze isono esonweni, 
23_30_2_abahamba ukuba behlele eGibithe, bengacelanga emlonyeni wami, baziqinise emandleni kaFaro, baphephele emthunzini waseGibithe! 
23_30_3_Ngalokho amandla kaFaro ayakuba ngamahloni kini, ukuphephela kwenu emthunzini waseGibithe kube ngukudumala kini. 
23_30_4_Ngokuba noma izikhulu zakhe ziseSowani, nezithunywa zakhe zifinyelela eHanesi, 
23_30_5_bonke bayakuba namahloni ngabantu abangenakubasiza, abangenansizakalo nanzuzo, kepha bengamahloni nehlazo kuphela.” 
23_30_6_Isiprofetho ngezilwane zaseNingizimu. Badabula izwe losizi nelokuhlupheka, lapha kuvela khona ibhubesi nebhubesikazi, ibululu nenyoka endizayo, bethwala imfuyo yabo emihlane yezimbongolo nengcebo yabo phezu kwamalunda amakamela bakuyise kubantu abangenansizakalo. 
23_30_7_IGibithe lisiza ngeze nangento engelutho; ngalokho ngilibize ngokuthi iRahabi elihlezi lithule. 
23_30_8_Manje hamba ukulobe phambi kwabo esibhebheni, ukubhale encwadini ukuba kube ngubufakazi besikhathi esizayo kuze kube phakade. 
23_30_9_Bangabantwana abahlubukileyo, abantwana abaqamba amanga, abantwana abangathandi ukuzwa umthetho kaJehova, 
23_30_10_abathi kubaboni: “Ningabe nisabona,” nakubaprofethi: “Ningasiprofetheli okuqinisileyo, kepha khulumani kithina okuthophayo, niprofethe inkohliso; 
23_30_11_phambukani endleleni, nichezuke emkhondweni, nimdedisele kithi oNgcwele ka-Israyeli.” 
23_30_12_Ngalokho usho kanje oNgcwele ka-Israyeli, uthi: “Njengokuba nilidelela leli zwi, nethemba kukho ukucindezela nakukho okuphambeneyo, nencike kukho, 
23_30_13_ngalokho lobu bubi buyakuba njengokomfantu lapho sekuzakuwa, kuvokomele ogangeni oluphakemeyo, ukudilika kwalo kufike ngokuzumayo ngokuphazima kweso. 
23_30_14_Luyabhidlizwa njengokuphahlazwa kwesitsha sombumbi, esichotshozwa singahawukelwa, kungabe kusatholakala phakathi kwezihlephu nodengezi lokuthatha umlilo eziko, nolokucakula amanzi emgodini.” 
23_30_15_Ngokuba yasho njalo iNkosi uJehova, oNgcwele ka-Israyeli, yathi: “Niyakusindiswa ngokuphenduka nangokuphumula, amandla enu abe ngukuthula nangokwethemba; kepha anithandanga. 
23_30_16_Kodwa nasho nathi: ‘Qha, siyakubaleka ngamahhashi,’ ngalokho niyakubaleka: ‘Sikhwele anejubane,’ ngalokho abanixoshayo bayakuba nejubane. 
23_30_17_Inkulungwane iyakubaleka ngokusongela koyedwa; ngokusongela kwaba yisihlanu niyakubaleka, nize nishiywe njengensika esiqongweni sentaba nanjengebhanela phezu kwegquma.” 
23_30_18_Ngalokho uJehova uyakulindela ukuba abe nomusa kini; nangalokhu uyakuphakama ukuba abe nesihe kini, ngokuba uJehova unguNkulunkulu wokwahlulela; babusisiwe bonke abamhlalelayo. 
23_30_19_Ngokuba wena sizwe esakhe eSiyoni eJerusalema ungabe usakhala nokukhala; uyakuba nomusa impela kuwe ngezwi lokudazuluka kwakho; lapho elizwa, uyakuphendula. 
23_30_20_Noma iNkosi iyakukunika isinkwa sosizi namanzi okuhlupheka, abafundisi bakho abasayikucasha, kodwa amehlo akho ayakubabona abafundisi bakho, 
23_30_21_nezindlebe zakho ziyakuzwa izwi emva kwakho, lithi: “Nansi indlela; hambani ngayo,” noma niphambuka ngakwesokunene, noma niphambuka ngakwesokhohlo. 
23_30_22_Niyakujivaza okunamekiweyo kwezithombe zenu ezibaziweyo zesiliva nesimbozo sezithombe zenu ezibunjiweyo zegolide; uyakuzihlakaza njengokungcolileyo, uthi kukho: “Suka lapha.” 
23_30_23_Uyakunika imbewu yakho oyakuyihlwanyela emhlabathini imvula, aveze nesinkwa ezithelweni zomhlabathi oyakuvunda, uthele kakhulu; ngalolo suku izinkomo zakho ziyakuklaba emadlelweni abanzi. 
23_30_24_Izinkabi nezimbongolo ezilima umhlabathi ziyakudla ukudla okuyolisiweyo, okweliweyo ngefosholo nangembenge. 
23_30_25_Kuzo zonke izintaba eziphakemeyo nakuwo onke amagquma amade kuyakuba khona imifula nemifudlana yamanzi ngosuku lokuhlaba okukhulu, lapho kuyakuwa imibhoshongo. 
23_30_26_Futhi ukukhanya kwenyanga kuyakuba njengokukhanya kwelanga, nokukhanya kwelanga kuyakuphindwa kasikhombisa njengokukhanya kwezimini eziyisikhombisa ngosuku uJehova abopha ngalo amanxeba abantu bakhe, aphulukise izilonda zemivimbo yabo. 
23_30_27_Bheka, igama likaJehova livela kude, livutha ngolaka lwakhe, linzima ngamafu; izindebe zakhe zigcwele intukuthelo, nolimi lwakhe lunjengomlilo oqothulayo; 
23_30_28_ukuphefumula kwakhe kunjengomfula okhukhulayo, uze ufinyelele entanyeni, ukuhlunga izizwe ngesihlungo sokubhubhisa; itomu elidukisayo liyakuba semihlathini yezizwe. 
23_30_29_Niyakuhlabelela njengasebusuku lapho kugujwa umkhosi, nithokoze ngenhliziyo njengalokhu kuhanjwa ngemitshingo kuyiwe entabeni kaJehova kulo iDwala lika-Israyeli. 
23_30_30_UJehova uyakulizwakalisa izwi lakhe elidumileyo, abonakalise ukwehla kwengalo yakhe ngokuvutha kolaka lwakhe, nangelangabi lomlilo oqothulayo, ngesivunguvungu, nangesiphepho, nangesichotho. 
23_30_31_Ngokuba ngezwi likaJehova i-Asiriya liyakushaywa luvalo, lapho elishaya ngenduku. 
23_30_32_Kuyakuthi njalo lapho induku enqunyiweyo idlula, uJehova ayibeka phezu kwalo, kube ngezigubhu nangamahabhu, alwe nalo ngengalo enikiniweyo. 
23_30_33_Indawo yokushisela kade yahlelwa, yebo, yalungiselwa nenkosi; uyenze yajula, yaba banzi; igoqo layo lingumlilo nezinkuni eziningi, nokuphefumula kukaJehova kunjengomfula wesibabule; kuyayokhela. 
23_31_1_Wo kubona abehlela eGibithe ukuba basizwe khona, bencike emahhashini, bethemba ezinqoleni, ngokuba ziningi, nakubo abamahhashi, ngokuba benamandla; kepha ababheki koNgcwele ka-Israyeli, noJehova abamfuni. 
23_31_2_Nokho naye uhlakaniphile, uyakuletha okubi; akayikubuyisa amazwi akhe, kepha uyakuvukela indlu yababi nosizo lwabenza okubi. 
23_31_3_AbaseGibithe bangabantu, abasiye uNkulunkulu, amahhashi abo ayinyama, awasiwo umoya, nalapho uJehova eyakwelula isandla sakhe uyakukhubeka naye osizayo, kuwe naye osizwayo, baphele bonke kanyekanye. 
23_31_4_Ngokuba usho kanje kimi uJehova, uthi: “Njengengonyama ebhongayo, ibhongo lengonyama phezu kwempango yalo, lapho abelusi abaningi belibizelwe, aliyikwesaba izwi labo, lingazithobi ngomsindo wabo, kanjalo uJehova Sebawoti uyakwehla ukuba alwe entabeni yaseSiyoni nasegqumeni layo. 
23_31_5_Njengezinyoni ezindizayo kanjalo uJehova, uJehova Sebawoti, uyakulivikela iJerusalema; uyakulivikela, alophule, alidlule, alikhulule.” 
23_31_6_Buyelani kuye enimhlubukile ngokujulileyo kangako nina bantwana bakwa-Israyeli. 
23_31_7_Ngokuba ngalolo suku bayakulahla, kube yilowo nalowo izithombe zakhe zesiliva nezithombe zakhe zegolide, ezizenzile izandla zenu zaba yisono senu. 
23_31_8_“I-Asiriya liyakuwa ngenkemba, kungengamuntu, nenkemba engesiyo eyomuntu iyakuliqeda; liyakubalekela usiko lwenkemba, kepha izinsizwa zalo ziyakuba yizinceku zempoqo. 
23_31_9_Idwala lakhe liyakunyamalala ngovalo, nezikhulu zalo ziyakuphela amandla ngebhanela,” usho uJehova omlilo wakhe useSiyoni, nosithando sakhe siseJerusalema. 
23_32_1_Bheka, kuyakuba khona inkosi ebusa ngokulunga, izikhulu zibuse ngokwahlulela. 
23_32_2_Umuntu uyakuba yindawo yokucashela umoya nesivikelo esivunguvungwini njengemifula yamanzi endaweni eyomileyo, njengomthunzi wedwala ezweni eliyethileyo. 
23_32_3_Amehlo ababonayo awayikuphuphutheka; izindlebe zabezwayo ziyakulalela. 
23_32_4_Inhliziyo yephulukundlu iyakuqonda, ize ikwazi, nolimi lwezingingingi luyakushesha lukhulume kahle. 
23_32_5_Isiwula asisayikubizwa ngokuthi sihloniphekile, nomkhohlisi akasayikuthiwa inkosi. 
23_32_6_Ngokuba isiwula siyakukhuluma ubuwula, nenhliziyo yaso iyakusebenza ububi, yenze ukungamesabi uNkulunkulu, ikhulume okuphambene noNkulunkulu, yenze ukuba olambileyo abe nephango, nowomileyo ukuba aswele uphuzo lwakhe. 
23_32_7_Izikhali zomkhohlisi zimbi; uhlela amacebo amabi, ukuze achithe izihlupheki ngamazwi amanga, nalapho ompofu ekhuluma ngokufaneleyo. 
23_32_8_Onesizotha uceba okuzothileyo, nangokuzotha kwakhe uyakuma. 
23_32_9_Vukani nina besifazane abazinzileyo, nizwe izwi lami; nina madodakazi azethembayo nibeke indlebe ekukhulumeni kwami. 
23_32_10_Ezinsukwini ezidlula umnyaka niyakuhlushwa nina besifazane abazethembayo, ngokuba ukuvuna kwemivini kuyakuphela, nokubutha akuyikufika. 
23_32_11_Qhaqhazelani nina besifazane abazinzileyo, nihlupheke nina enizethembayo; khumulani nizenze nqunu, nibhince indwangu yamasaka ezinkalweni zenu. 
23_32_12_Zishayeni esifubeni ngenxa yamasimu amahle nemivini ethelayo. 
23_32_13_Emhlabathini wabantu bami kuyakumila amakhakhasi nameva, yebo, kuzo zonke izindlu zokujabula emzini ojabulayo, 
23_32_14_ngokuba izindlu zamakhosi zilahliwe, nomuzi onabantu abaningi ushiyiwe; igquma nombhoshongo kuyakuba yimihume kuze kube phakade, nenjabulo yezimbongolo zasendle, nedlelo lemihlambi, 
23_32_15_uMoya aze athululwe phezu kwethu evela phezulu, nehlane liphenduke insimu, nensimu ithiwe ihlathi. 
23_32_16_Ukwahlulela kuyakwakha ehlane, ukulunga kuhlale ensimini. 
23_32_17_Umsebenzi wokulunga uyakuba ngukuthula, impumelelo yokulunga ibe ngukulondeka kuze kube phakade. 
23_32_18_Abantu bami bayakuhlala ematendeni okuthula, nasezindlini ezilondekayo, nasezindaweni zokuphumula ezinokuthula. 
23_32_19_Liyakuwisa isichotho, lize liwe ihlathi, nomuzi uyakuthotshiswa nokuthotshiswa. 
23_32_20_Nibusisiwe nina enitshala ngasemanzini onke; nikhulula izinyawo zezinkabi nezezimbongolo. 
23_33_1_Wo kuwena ochithayo, kungachithwanga wena, nakuwe okhohlisayo, kungakhohliswanga wena! Lapho uqede ukuchitha uyakuchithwa, nalapho usugcine ukukhohlisa, uyakukhohliswa nawe. 
23_33_2_Jehova, yiba nomusa kithi, sihlalela wena. Yiba yingalo yethu ekuseni njalo, nokusindiswa kwethu ngesikhathi sokuhlupheka. 
23_33_3_Ngezwi lokuhlokoma abantu bayabaleka; ngokuphakama kwakho izizwe ziyahlakazeka. 
23_33_4_Impango iyakubuthwa njengokubutha kwecimbi, nanjengokuhlasela kwezinkumbi iyakuhlaselwa. 
23_33_5_UJehova uphakeme, ngokuba uhlala phezulu; uligcwalisile iSiyoni ngokwahlulela nangokulunga. 
23_33_6_Kuyakuba khona ukuqiniseka ngesikhathi sakho, ubuningi bokusindiswa nokuhlakanipha nokwazi; ukumesaba uJehova kuyingcebo yakhe. 
23_33_7_Bheka, amaqhawe abo akhala ngaphandle; izithunywa zokuthula zikhala ngomunyu. 
23_33_8_Imigwaqo iyize, izihambi seziphelile; isivumelwano saphuliwe; imizi ideleliwe; umuntu akanakekelewa. 
23_33_9_Izwe liyalila, lidangele; iLebanoni linamahloni, liyabuna; iSharoni linjengehlane, iBashani neKarmeli kuyavuthulukisa. 
23_33_10_“Sengiyakuvuka,” usho uJehova; “sengiyakuphakama; sengiyakuphakanyiswa. 
23_33_11_Niyakukhulelwa yizikhotha ezomileyo, nizale amabibi; ukuphefumula kwenu kungumlilo oniqothulayo. 
23_33_12_Abantu bayakushiswa njengokushiswa komcako, njengameva anqunyiweyo ashiswa ngomlilo.” 
23_33_13_Yizwani nina enikude engikwenzileyo; nani eniseduze, vumani amandla ami. 
23_33_14_Izoni zaseSiyoni ziyesaba, ukuthuthumela kubambile abangenaNkulunkulu. “Ngubani phakathi kwethu ongahlala nomlilo oqothulayo; ngubani phakathi kwethu ongahlala nokunkewuzela okuphakade na?” 
23_33_15_Yena ohamba ngokulunga, okhuluma ngobuqotho, odelela inzuzo yokucindezela, othintitha izandla zakhe ukuze angamukeli imivuzo, ovala izindlebe zakhe ukuze angezwa ngegazi, ocimeza amehlo akhe ukuze angaboni okubi, 
23_33_16_yena uyakuhlala ekuphakameni, izinqaba zamadwala zibe yisivikelo sakhe, aphiwe isinkwa sakhe, amanzi akhe athembeke. 
23_33_17_Amehlo akho ayakuyibona inkosi ebuhleni bayo, ayakubona izwe elelulekele kude. 
23_33_18_Inhliziyo yakho iyakucabanga ngovalo, ithi: “Uphi umbhali, uphi olinganisile intela, uphi obalile imibhoshongo na?” 
23_33_19_Awuyikubona abantu abanobudlova, abantu abanokukhuluma okujulileyo ongenakukuzwa, nabalulimi lwabo olukwitizayo kungekho ongaluqonda. 
23_33_20_Kepha bheka iSiyoni, umuzi wemikhosi yethu; amehlo akho mawabuke iJerusalema, indlu yokuthula, itende elingayikususwa, elizikhonkwane zalo aziyikusishulwa nanini, nelizintambo zalo aziyikugqashulwa neyodwa. 
23_33_21_Kunalokho uJehova uyakuba nathi khona ebukhosini esikhundleni semifula nemifudlana ebanzi, lapho kungayikuhamba khona izikebhe ezinamaphini, nomkhumbi omkhulu ungadluli kuyo. 
23_33_22_Ngokuba uJehova ungumahluleli wethu, uJehova ungumenzi wemithetho yethu, uJehova uyinkosi yethu; uyakusisindisa. 
23_33_23_Izintambo zakho ziyaxega, azinakusiqinisa isiqu sensika yabo, azinakumeneka useyili; khona iyakwabelwa impango enkulu ephangiweyo; nezinyonga ziyakuthatha impango. 
23_33_24_Abakhe khona abayikusho ukuthi: “Ngiyagula,” abantu abahlala khona bayakuthethelelwa ububi babo. 
23_34_1_Sondelani nina zizwe, nizwe, nilalele nina bantu: makuzwe umhlaba nokugcwala kwawo, nezwe nakho konke okuvela kulo. 
23_34_2_Ngokuba uJehova uthukuthelela izizwe zonke, ufuthekela yonke impi yazo; uziqalekisile, uzinikele ekubulaweni. 
23_34_3_Ababuleweyo bazo balahliwe, nokunuka kuyenyuka ezidunjini zabo; izintaba zincibilika ngegazi labo. 
23_34_4_Ibandla lonke lasezulwini liyaphela, izulu lisongwe njengomqulu; ibandla lonke liyawa njengokuwa kweqabunga emvinini nanjengokubunileyo emkhiwaneni. 
23_34_5_Ngokuba inkemba yami izanelisile ngegazi ezulwini; bheka, iyakwehlela phezu kuka-Edomi naphezu kwabantu besiqalekiso sami ukuba ibahlulele. 
23_34_6_UJehova unenkemba; igcwele igazi, inonile ngamanoni nangegazi lamawundlu nelezimbuzi, nangamanoni ezinso zezinqama, ngokuba uJehova uyanikela eBosira, unokuhlaba okukhulu ezweni lakwa-Edomi. 
23_34_7_Izinyathi ziwa kanye nazo, nezinkunzana kanye nezinkunzi; izwe labo liyakugcwala igazi, nothuli lwabo luyakunona ngamanoni. 
23_34_8_Ngokuba kulusuku lokuphindisela kukaJehova; ngumnyaka wokubuyisela ngendaba yaseSiyoni. 
23_34_9_Imifudlana yakhona iyakuphenduka ikolitayi, uthuli lwakhona lube yisibabule, nezwe langakhona libe yikolitayi elivuthayo. 
23_34_10_Aliyikucinywa ubusuku nemini; umusi walo uyakukhuphuka kuze kube phakade; izizukulwane ngezizukulwane liyakuba yize, akuyikulidabula muntu nanini nanini. 
23_34_11_Liyakuba yifa levuba nelikanondwebu, kwakhe kulo isikhova negwababa; uyakwelula phezu kwalo intambo yencithakalo, nomthofu wokumisa wokuyize. 
23_34_12_Phakathi kwabakhulu balo akakho oyakumemezela umbuso, nazo zonke izikhulu zalo ziyakuba yinto engelutho. 
23_34_13_Ameva ayakukhuphukela ezindlini zamakhosi, izimbabazane namakhakhasi ezinqabeni zalo, libe yikhaya lamakhanka negceke lezintshe. 
23_34_14_Izilwane zasehlane ziyakuhlangana nezimpungushe, nedemoni liyakukhala kumngane walo, kwakhe khona umkhovu, uzitholele indawo yokuphumula. 
23_34_15_Lapho umantshingeyana uyakwakha ikhaya lakhe, azalele, achamisele, afukame ngomthunzi wakhe, kubuthane khona nawonhloyile, kube yilowo nalowo nomngane wakhe. 
23_34_16_Funani encwadini kaJehova, nifunde; ayiyikusilala nento eyodwa kulokhu, ayikho eyakuswela umngane wayo, ngokuba ngumlomo wakhe okuyalezile, nomoya wakhe okuhlanganisile. 
23_34_17_Nguye okwenzele inkatho; yisandla sakhe esikwabele ngentambo; kuyakudla ifa lalo kuze kube phakade, izizukulwane ngezizukulwane kuyakuhlala kulo. 
23_35_1_Kuyakujabula ihlane nogwadule, kuthokoze uqwathule, lukhahlele njengentebe. 
23_35_2_Luyakukhahlela kahle, luthokoze, yebo, luthokoze, luhube; luyakuphiwa udumo lweLebanoni, nobukhosi beKarmeli nobeSharoni, lubone inkazimulo kaJehova, nobukhosi bukaNkulunkulu wethu. 
23_35_3_Qinisani izandla ezibuthakathaka, nimise amadolo axegayo. 
23_35_4_Yishoni kwabanenhliziyo eyesabayo ukuthi: “Qinani, ningesabi; bhekani, uNkulunkulu wenu uyeza ngokuphindisela, impindiselo ivela kuNkulunkulu; nguye oza ukunisindisa.” 
23_35_5_Khona amehlo ezimpumputhe ayakuvulwa, zivuleke nezindlebe zezithulu. 
23_35_6_Khona unyonga luyakutshekula njengendluzele, nolimi lwesimungulu luyakuhuba, ngokuba ehlane kuyakubhoboka amanzi, nemifudlana kwahlongasibi. 
23_35_7_Isihlabathi esibengezelayo siyakuba yichibi, isigagadu sibe yimithombo yamanzi; ekhaya lamakhanka lapho ayebuthisa khona kuyakuba khona igceke lomhlanga nekhwani. 
23_35_8_Kuyakuba khona umendo nendlela eyakuthiwa iNdlela Yobungcwele; ongcolileyo akayikuhamba ngayo, kepha iyakuba ngeyabantu bakhe; abahamba ngayo, noma beyiziwula, abayikuduka kuyo. 
23_35_9_Akuyikuba khona lapho ingonyama, nesilwane esihahayo asiyikukhuphukela khona; lokho akuyikufunyanwa khona, kepha abakhululiweyo bayakuhamba ngayo. 
23_35_10_Abahlengiweyo bakaJehova bayakubuya baye eSiyoni ngokwethaba, intokozo engunaphakade ibe phezu kwamakhanda abo; bayakuthola ukujabula nokuthokoza, kubaleke usizi nokububula. 
23_36_1_Kwathi ngomnyaka weshumi nane wenkosi uHezekiya, uSaneheribi, inkosi yase-Asiriya, wenyuka wahlasela yonke imizi ebiyelweyo yakwaJuda, wayithatha. 
23_36_2_Inkosi yase-Asiriya yathuma uRabi Shake, asuke eLakishi, aye eJerusalema enkosini uHezekiya, enempi enkulu, wema ngasemseleni wechibi lasenhla, elingasendleleni yeNsimu Yomhlanzi. 
23_36_3_Kwase kuphumela kuye u-Eliyakimi indodana kaHilikiya owayephezu kwendlu, noShebina umbhali, noJowa indodana ka-Asafa, umabhalana. 
23_36_4_Wathi kubo uRabi Shake: “Ake nisho kuHezekiya, nithi: ‘Isho kanje inkosi enkulu, inkosi yase-Asiriya, ithi: Yithemba lini leli olethembayo na? 
23_36_5_Wena uyakhuluma, kepha kungamazwi angawomlomo nje lana ngesu nangamandla okulwa. Pho, wethemba bani, lokhu ungihlubukile na? 
23_36_6_Bheka, wethemba udondolo lwalo mhlanga ofecekileyo oyiGibithe; kepha uma umuntu ezimelela ngalo, luyangena esandleni sakhe, lusihlabe; unjalo uFaro inkosi yaseGibithe kubo bonke abamethembayo. 
23_36_7_Kepha uma nithi kimi: “Siyamethemba uJehova uNkulunkulu wethu,” akusiye yini ozindawo zakhe eziphakemeyo nama-altare akhe akususile uHezekiya, wathi kuJuda nakulo iJerusalema: “Niyakukhuleka phambi kwaleli altare,” na? 
23_36_8_“ ‘Ngalokho ake uvumelane nenkosi yami, inkosi yase-Asiriya, ngiyakukunika amahhashi ayizinkulungwane ezimbili, uma ungabeka izinkweli kuzo. 
23_36_9_Pho, ungaphindisela emuva kanjani nenduna eyodwa ezincekwini ezincane zenkosi yami na? Nokho wethemba iGibithe ukuthola khona izinqola nabamahhashi. 
23_36_10_Manje ngenyukele yini ngaphandle kukaJehova kuleli zwe ukuba ngilichithe, na? UJehova wathi kimi: “Yenyukela kulelo zwe, ulichithe.” ’ ” 
23_36_11_Base bethi o-Eliyakimi noShebina noJowa kuRabi Shake: “Ake ukhulume ezincekwini zakho ngesi-Aramu, ngokuba siyaluzwa, ungakhulumi kithi ngolimi lwabaJuda ezindlebeni zabantu abasogangeni.” 
23_36_12_Kepha uRabi Shake wathi: “Inkosi yami ingithumile yini enkosini yakho nakuwena ukukhuluma lawamazwi na? Hhayi kulaba bantu yini abahlezi ogangeni ukuba badle amasimba abo, baphuze umshobingo wabo kanye nani, na?” 
23_36_13_Wayesema uRabi Shake, wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu ngolimi lwabaJuda, wathi: “Zwanini amazwi enkosi enkulu, inkosi yase-Asiriya. 
23_36_14_Isho kanje inkosi, ithi: Maningakhohliswa nguHezekiya, ngokuba akayikuba namandla okunophula; 
23_36_15_futhi uHezekiya makanganenzi nethembe uJehova ngokuthi: ‘UJehova uyakusophula nokusophula, nalo muzi awuyikunikelwa esandleni senkosi yase-Asiriya.’ 
23_36_16_“Ningamlaleli uHezekiya, ngokuba inkosi yase-Asiriya isho kanje, ithi: Yenzani ukuthula nami, niphumele kimi, nidle, kube yilowo nalowo emvinini wakhe, kube yilowo nalowo emkhiwaneni wakhe, niphuze, kube yilowo nalowo amanzi omthombo wakhe, 
23_36_17_ngize ngifike, nginiyise ezweni elinjengezwe lakini, izwe lamabele nelewayini, izwe lesinkwa nelezivini. 
23_36_18_“Xwayani ukuba uHezekiya anganiyengi ngokuthi: ‘UJehova uyakusophula.’ Abanye onkulunkulu bezizwe bake bophula nokophula yini izwe lakubo esandleni senkosi yase-Asiriya na? 
23_36_19_Baphi onkulunkulu baseHamati nase-Aripadi; baphi onkulunkulu baseSefarivayimi na? Balophulile iSamariya esandleni sami na? 
23_36_20_Ngobani phakathi kwabo bonke onkulunkulu balawa mazwe abophule izwe lakubo esandleni sami ukuba uJehova alophule iJerusalema esandleni sami na?” 
23_36_21_Kepha bathula, abamphendulanga ngazwi, ngokuba umyalo wenkosi wathi: “Ningamphenduli.” 
23_36_22_Base befika u-Eliyakimi indodana kaHilikiya owayephezu kwendlu, noShebina umbhali, noJowa indodana ka-Asafa, umabhalana, kuHezekiya, izingubo zabo ziklebhukile, bamlandisa amazwi kaRabi Shake. 
23_37_1_Kwathi inkosi uHezekiya ikuzwile lokho, yaklebhula izingubo zayo, yazembesa indwangu yamasaka, yangena endlini kaJehova. 
23_37_2_Yathuma u-Eliyakimi owayephezu kwendlu, noShebina umbhali, namalunga abapristi, bembeswe izindwangu zamasaka, ku-Isaya umprofethi, indodana ka-Amose. 
23_37_3_Bathi kuye: “Usho kanje uHezekiya, uthi: Lolu suku lungusuku losizi nolokusolwa nolokudelelwa, ngokuba abantwana sebefikile ekuzalweni, kepha amandla okubeletha awakho. 
23_37_4_Mhlawumbe uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho uyakuzwa amazwi kaRabi Shake othunywe yinkosi yase-Asiriya, inkosi yakhe, ukweyisa uNkulunkulu ophilayo, asole amazwi uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho awezwileyo; ngalokho phakamisela insali esafunyanwayo umkhuleko wakho.” 
23_37_5_Izinceku zenkosi uHezekiya sezifikile ku-Isaya, 
23_37_6_u-Isaya wathi kuzo: “Niyakusho kanje enkosini yenu, nithi: ‘Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: Ungesabi lawo mazwi owezwileyo, izinceku zenkosi yase-Asiriya ezingithuke ngawo. 
23_37_7_Bhekani, ngiyakubeka umoya kuyo, izwe amahemuhemu, ibuyele ezweni lakubo, ngiyiwise ngenkemba ezweni lakubo.’ ” 
23_37_8_Wayesebuya uRabi Shake, wafumana inkosi yase-Asiriya ilwa neLibina, ngokuba wayezwile ukuthi isukile eLakishi. 
23_37_9_Kepha isizwile ngoTirahaka, inkosi yaseKushe, ukuthi: “Uphumile ukulwa nawe,” lapho ikuzwa lokho, yathuma izithunywa kuHezekiya, yathi: 
23_37_10_“Niyakukhuluma kanje kuHezekiya, inkosi yakwaJuda, nithi: UNkulunkulu wakho omethembayo makangakukhohlisi ngokuthi iJerusalema aliyikunikelwa esandleni senkosi yase-Asiriya. 
23_37_11_Bheka, wena uzwile okwenziwa ngamakhosi ase-Asiriya kuwo onke amazwe ngokuwachitha; pho, wena uyakophulwa na? 
23_37_12_Onkulunkulu balezo zizwe ezachithwa ngobaba, iGozani, neHarana, neResefi, nabantwana base-Edene ababeseThelasari bazophula na? 
23_37_13_Iphi inkosi yaseHamati, nenkosi yase-Aripadi, nenkosi yomuzi waseSefarivayimi, naseHena, nase-Iva na?” 
23_37_14_UHezekiya wayamukela incwadi esandleni sezithunywa, wayifunda; uHezekiya wayesenyukela endlini kaJehova, wayeneka phambi kukaJehova. 
23_37_15_UHezekiya wakhuleka phambi kukaJehova, wathi: 
23_37_16_“Jehova Sebawoti, Nkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, ohlezi phezu kwamakherubi, wena unguNkulunkulu, wena wedwa, wemibuso yonke yomhlaba, wena wenzile izulu nomhlaba. 
23_37_17_Beka indlebe yakho, Jehova, uzwe; vula amehlo akho, Jehova, ubone, uzwe onke amazwi kaSaneheribi athume ukweyisa ngawo uNkulunkulu ophilayo. 
23_37_18_“Yiqiniso, Jehova; amakhosi ase-Asiriya achithile izizwe zonke namazwe azo, 
23_37_19_alahlile onkulunkulu bawo emlilweni, ngokuba babengesibo onkulunkulu, babe ngumsebenzi wezandla zomuntu kuphela, umuthi namatshe; ngalokho abachithile. 
23_37_20_Manje, Jehova Nkulunkulu wethu, sisindise esandleni sakhe ukuba yonke imibuso yomhlaba yazi ukuthi wena unguJehova, wena wedwa.” 
23_37_21_U-Isaya indodana ka-Amose wathumela kuHezekiya, wathi: “Usho kanje uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, uthi: Njengalokhu ukhuleke kimi ngoSaneheribi inkosi yase-Asiriya, 
23_37_22_nanti izwi uJehova alikhulume ngaye ukuthi: “Ikudelele, yakuhleka usulu intombi, indodakazi yaseSiyoni; ikunikinele ikhanda indodakazi yaseJerusalema. 
23_37_23_Weyise bani, wethuka bani, na? Uphakamisele bani izwi lakho, wabhekisa phezulu amehlo akho, na? NgoNgcwele ka-Israyeli! 
23_37_24_Ngesandla sezinceku zakho uyijivazile iNkosi, wathi: ‘Ngobuningi bezinqola zami ngenyuke mina phezulu ezintabeni ngaphakathi kweLebanoni; ngigawula imisedari yalo emide nemisayipuresi yalo ekhethekileyo ngangena ekuphakameni kwalo kokugcina nasehlathini lalo eliminyeneyo. 
23_37_25_Ngemba, ngaphuza amanzi; ngomisa ngamathe onyawo lwami yonke imifula yaseGibithe.’ 
23_37_26_“Awuzwanga ukuthi kade ngakwenza na? Emihleni yasendulo ngakunquma; manje sengikulethile ukuba uchithe imizi ebiyelweyo ibe yizinqwaba. 
23_37_27_Abakhe kuyo babe namandla amancane, besaba, bajabha; baba njengotshani basendle, nembali notshani obuluhlaza, nokuluhlaza ezimpahleni zezindlu, namabele ahamukile engakakhuli. 
23_37_28_“Kepha ukuhlala kwakho, nokuphuma kwakho, nokungena kwakho ngiyakwazi, nokubhovumula kwakho ngami. 
23_37_29_Ngenxa yokubhovumula kwakho ngami, nangokuba ukuzidla kwakho kwenyukele ezindlebeni zami, ngiyakufaka ingwegwe yami emakhaleni akho netomu lami emlonyeni wakho, ngikubuyise ngendlela oweza ngayo. 
23_37_30_“Lokhu kuyakuba yisibonakaliso kuwe: “Niyakudla ngalo mnyaka okuzikhulelayo, nangomnyaka wesibili isihlabane, nangomnyaka wesithathu hlwanyelani, nivune, nitshale izivini, nidle izithelo zazo. 
23_37_31_Abasindileyo bendlu yakwaJuda abaseleyo bayakubuye bagxile phansi, bathele izithelo phezulu. 
23_37_32_Ngokuba kuyakuphuma eJerusalema insali nasentabeni yaseSiyoni abayakusinda; ukushisekela kukaJehova Sebawoti kuyakufeza lokho. 
23_37_33_“Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova ngenkosi yase-Asiriya, uthi: “Ayiyikungena kulo muzi, ayiyikucibishela mcibisholo khona; ayiyikubhekisa kuwo isihlangu, ayiyikunqwabela iduli ngakuwo. 
23_37_34_Indlela eyafika ngayo iyakubuya ngayo; ayiyikungena kulo muzi,” usho uJehova. 
23_37_35_“Ngiyakuwuvikela lo muzi ukuba ngiwusindise ngenxa yami nangenxa yenceku yami uDavide.” 
23_37_36_Kwaphuma ingelosi kaJehova, yabulala ekamu labase-Asiriya abayizinkulungwane eziyikhulu namashumi ayisishiyagalombili nanhlanu; sekuvukwa ngakusasa, bheka, kwakuyizidumbu ezifileyo zodwa. 
23_37_37_Wayesesuka uSaneheribi inkosi yase-Asiriya, wahamba, wabuya, wahlala eNineve. 
23_37_38_Kwathi ekhuleka endlini kaNisiroki unkulunkulu wakhe, o-Adirameleki noSareseri amadodana akhe bambulala ngenkemba, babalekela ezweni lase-Ararati. U-Esari Hadoni indodana yakhe waba yinkosi esikhundleni sakhe. 
23_38_1_Ngalezo zinsuku uHezekiya wagula, wayephansi kokufa. Kwafika kuye u-Isaya umprofethi, indodana ka-Amose, wathi kuye: “Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: Yalela indlu yakho, ngokuba uyakufa, awuyikusinda.” 
23_38_2_UHezekiya wayesephendulela ubuso bakhe odongeni, wakhuleka kuJehova, 
23_38_3_wathi: “Ngiyacela, Jehova: ake ukhumbule ukuthi ngihambile phambi kwakho ngeqiniso nangenhliziyo epheleleyo, ngenzile okuhle emehlweni akho.” Wayesekhala uHezekiya ngokukhala okukhulu. 
23_38_4_Lafika ku-Isaya izwi likaJehova, lathi: 
23_38_5_“Hamba, uthi kuHezekiya: ‘Usho kanje uJehova uNkulunkulu kaDavide uyihlo, uthi: Ngizwile umkhuleko wakho, ngibonile izinyembezi zakho; ngiyakwenezela ezinsukwini zakho iminyaka eyishumi nanhlanu. 
23_38_6_Ngiyakophula wena nalo muzi esandleni senkosi yase-Asiriya, ngiwuvikele lo muzi. 
23_38_7_“ ‘Lesi siyakuba yisibonakaliso kuwe esivela kuJehova sokuthi uJehova uyakukwenza lokho akukhulumileyo: 
23_38_8_bheka, isithunzi sezinyathelo ilanga elizehlile ezinyathelweni zelanga zika-Ahazi ngiyakusibuyisa izinyathelo eziyishumi.’ ” Ilanga labuya-ke izinyathelo eziyishumi ezinyathelweni elizehlileyo. 
23_38_9_Ihubo likaHezekiya inkosi yakwaJuda lapho wayekade egula, wasinda ekuguleni kwakhe: 
23_38_10_Ngathi: “Ngiphakathi nezinsuku zami ngiyakungena emasangweni endawo yabafileyo, ngaphuciwe inxenye yeminyaka yami.” 
23_38_11_Ngathi: “Angiyikumbona uJehova, uJehova ezweni labaphilayo; angisayikubuka muntu nginabakhileyo bezwe. 
23_38_12_Idokodo lami lisishuliwe, lasuswa kimi njengetende lomalusi; ngisongile ukuphila kwami njengomaluki; uyanginquma esalukweni; kusukela emini kuze kube sebusuku uyangiqeda. 
23_38_13_Ngakhala kwaze kwaba sekuseni; njengengonyama uyaphula onke amathambo ami; kusukela emini kuze kube sebusuku uyangiqeda. 
23_38_14_Ngatshiyozisa okwenkonjane, ngaliliselisa okwejuba; amehlo ami aphela ngokubheka phezulu; Nkosi, ngiyacindezelwa; yiba yisibambiso sami.” 
23_38_15_Ngingakhuluma ngithini na? Ukhulumile kimi, ukwenzile yena. Ngiyakubinyabinyeka yonke iminyaka ngomunyu womphefumulo wami. 
23_38_16_Nkosi, abantu baphila ngalokho, nokuphila komoya wami kukulokho kuphelele; ngalokho mawungiphulukise, ungiphilise. 
23_38_17_Bheka, kwakungokuhle kimi ukuthi nganginomunyu; wena wawuthanda umphefumulo wami, waze waphuma egodini lokubhujiswa, ngokuba uzilahlile nyovane zonke izono zami. 
23_38_18_Ngokuba indawo yabafileyo ayikubongi, nokufa akukudumisi; abehlela egodini ababheki ukuthembeka kwakho. 
23_38_19_Abaphilayo, abaphilayo bayakubonga njengami namuhla; uyise uyabazisa abantwana ukuthembeka kwakho. 
23_38_20_UJehova uyakungisindisa; ngalokho siyakubetha ngezingubhu ezinezintambo zonke izinsuku zokuhamba kwethu endlini kaJehova. 
23_38_21_U-Isaya wathi: “Mabathathe isigaxa samakhiwane, basibeke ethumbeni, uyakusinda.” 
23_38_22_Kepha uHezekiya wathi: “Yisibonakaliso sini sokuba ngiyakwenyukela endlini kaJehova na?” 
23_39_1_Ngaleso sikhathi uMerodaki Baladani indodana kaBaladani inkosi yaseBabele wathuma abanezincwadi nesipho kuHezekiya, lapho ezwile ukuthi kade egula, kepha usesimamile. 
23_39_2_UHezekiya wathokoza ngabo, wababonisa indlu yengcebo yakhe, isiliva, negolide, namakha, namafutha amahle, nayo yonke indlu yezikhali zakhe, nakho konke okwafunyanwa engcebeni yakhe; akubangakho nto endlini yakhe nasembusweni wakhe wonke uHezekiya angababonisanga yona. 
23_39_3_Wayesefika u-Isaya, umprofethi, enkosini uHezekiya, wathi kuye: “Batheni labo bantu; beze kuwe bevelaphi na?” Wathi uHezekiya: “Bavela ezweni elikude, iBabele, beze kimi.” 
23_39_4_Wayesethi: “Baboneni endlini yakho na?” UHezekiya wathi: “Babone konke okusendlini yami; akukho nto phakathi kwengcebo yami engingababonisanga yona.” 
23_39_5_U-Isaya wathi kuHezekiya: “Yizwa izwi likaJehova Sebawoti. 
23_39_6_Bheka, izinsuku ziyeza, lapho konke okusendlini yakho nalokho oyihlo abakubekelele khona kuze kube namuhla kuyakuyiswa eBabele; akuyikusala lutho, usho uJehova. 
23_39_7_Nasemadodaneni akho ayakuphuma kuwe, oyakuwazala, bayakuwathatha abe yizinceku endlini yobukhosi yenkosi yaseBabele.” 
23_39_8_Wayesethi uHezekiya ku-Isaya: “Lihle izwi likaJehova olikhulumileyo.” Wathi futhi: “Ngokuba kuyakuba khona ukuthula nokulondeka emihleni yami.” 
23_40_1_Duduzani, nibaduduze abantu bami, usho uNkulunkulu wenu. 
23_40_2_Qungani iJerusalema isibindi, nimemeze kulo ukuthi ukulwa kwalo sekuphelile nokuthi buhlanguliwe ububi balo, ngokuba lamukeliswe esandleni sikaJehova ngokuphindiweyo ngazo zonke izono zalo. 
23_40_3_Izwi liyamemeza lithi: “Lungisani ehlane indlela kaJehova, nihlelembe oqwathuleni umgwaqo kaNkulunkulu wethu. 
23_40_4_Zonke izigodi ziyakuphakanyiswa, zonke izintaba namagquma kuyakwehliswa; amagebhugebhu ayakuhlelenjwa, nemigoxigoxi iyakuba yithafa. 
23_40_5_Inkazimulo kaJehova iyakubonakaliswa, yonke inyama ikubone kanyekanye, ngokuba umlomo kaJehova ukhulumile.” 
23_40_6_Izwi liyakhuluma lithi: “Memeza!” Ngathi: “Ngiyakumemezani na?” Inyama yonke ingutshani, bonke ubuhle bayo bunjengembali yasendle. 
23_40_7_Utshani buyabuna, imbali iyavuthuluka, ngokuba umoya kaJehova uyaphephetha kukho. Impela abantu bangutshani. 
23_40_8_Utshani buyabuna, imbali iyavuthuluka, kepha izwi likaNkulunkulu wethu limi kuze kube phakade. 
23_40_9_Khuphukela entabeni ende, wena, Siyoni, obika okujabulisayo, uphakamise ngamandla izwi lakho, wena Jerusalema obika okujabulisayo, uliphakamise ungesabi, usho emizini yakwaJuda ukuthi: “Bhekani, nangu uNkulunkulu wenu.” 
23_40_10_Bhekani, iNkosi uJehova iyeza ngamandla; ingalo yayo iyakumbusela; bhekani, umvuzo wayo inawo, inkokhelo yayo iphambi kwayo. 
23_40_11_Iyakwalusa umhlambi wayo njengomalusi, ibuthe amawundlu ngemikhono yayo, iwagone esifubeni sayo, ihole kahle izindlezane. 
23_40_12_Ngubani olinganise amanzi ngentende yesandla sakhe, walinganisa izulu ngeminwe eyeluliweyo, wahlanganisa uthuli esilinganisweni, walinganisa izintaba ngezikalo namagquma ngezisindo, na? 
23_40_13_Ngubani oqondisile uMoya kaJehova, wamfundisa engumluleki wakhe, na? 
23_40_14_Walulekana nobani waze wamqondisa, wamfundisa indlela yokwahlulela, wamnika ukwazi, wamazisa indlela yokuqonda, na? 
23_40_15_Bheka, izizwe zinjengethonsi kwasesitsheni, zibalwa njengothuli lwesilinganiso; bheka, iziqhingi uyaziphakamisa njengothuli olucolekileyo. 
23_40_16_ILebanoni alanele ukubaswa, nezilwane zalo azanele ukuba zibe ngumnikelo wokushiswa. 
23_40_17_Zonke izizwe zinjengento engelutho phambi kwakhe, zibalwa njengokungelutho nokuyize kuye. 
23_40_18_Niyakumfanisa uNkulunkulu nobani, nimlinganise namuphi umfanekiso, na? 
23_40_19_Yisithombe yini esibunjiwe yisisebenzi, sanamekwa ngegolide ngumkhandi, sancibilikiselwa amaketanga esiliva, na? 
23_40_20_Ompofu kunokuba anikele ngomnikelo onjalo uyakhetha umuthi ongaboliyo, azifunele isisebenzi esihlakaniphileyo ukuba simise isithombe esibaziweyo esingenakuzanyazanyiswa. 
23_40_21_Anazi yini? Anizwa yini? Anitshelwanga yini kwasekuqaleni, aniqondanga kwasekusekelweni komhlaba, na? 
23_40_22_Nguye ohlezi esiyingelezini somhlaba — abakhile kuwo banjengezintethe — noweneka izulu njengendwangu, alelule njengetende ukuba kuhlalwe kulo, 
23_40_23_nowenza izikhulu zibe yinto engelutho, nabahluleli ukuba babe yize. 
23_40_24_Yebo, banele ukutshalwa nje, yebo, banele ukuhlwanyelwa nje, yebo, isiqu sanele ukugxila emhlabathini, abesephephetha kubo, babune, isivunguvungu sibasuse njengamabibi. 
23_40_25_“Niyakungifanisa nobani ukuba ngifane naye?” usho oNgcwele. 
23_40_26_Phakamiselani amehlo enu phezulu, nibone. Ngubani odalile lezo zinto na? Nguye okhipha ibandla lazo ngezibalo, abize zonke ngamagama; ngobuningi bamandla akhe nangobukhulu bezikhwepha zakhe ayisilali neyodwa. 
23_40_27_Usholoni wena Jakobe, ukhulumelani wena Israyeli, ukuthi: “Indlela yami isithekile kuJehova, ilungelo lami lidlulile kuNkulunkulu wami,” na? 
23_40_28_Awazi yini? Awuzwanga na? UJehova unguNkulunkulu ongunaphakade; udalile imikhawulo yomhlaba; akapheli amandla, akakhathali, nokuqonda kwakhe akunakuphenywa. 
23_40_29_Nguye omupha oyethileyo amandla, nakongenamandla uyandisa izikhwepha. 
23_40_30_Izinsizwa ziyaphela amandla, zikhathale, nabasha bawa nokuwa, 
23_40_31_kepha abamethembayo uJehova bayathola amandla amasha, bayakhuphuka ngamaphiko njengezinkozi, bagijime bengakhathali, bahambe bengapheli amandla. 
23_41_1_“Thulani phambi kwami nina ziqhingi, izizwe zithole amandla amasha. Mazisondele, andukuba zikhulume, sisondelane ekwahluleleni. 
23_41_2_“Ngubani ovusile ukulunga kuphume empumalanga, akubize ukuba kumlandele, anikele izizwe phambi kwakhe, amenze ukuba abuse amakhosi, abenze babe njengothuli ngenkemba yakhe, nanjengamabibi aphephezeliswayo ngomnsalo wakhe, na? 
23_41_3_Uyabaxosha, adlule kahle ngezindlela angazihambanga ngezinyawo. 
23_41_4_Ngubani okusebenzileyo, wakwenza, na? Nguye owazibiza izizukulwane kwasekuqaleni: mina Jehova engingowokuqala nenginguye nakwabokuphela.” 
23_41_5_Iziqhingi ziyakubona, ziyesaba; imikhawulo yomhlaba iyathuthumela; isondele, isifikile. 
23_41_6_Yilowo nalowo usiza umakhelwane wakhe; uthi komfowabo: “Yiba nesibindi.” 
23_41_7_Umbazi uqunga umkhandi isibindi, nololonga ngesando uqunga oshaya isikhandelo isibindi, ethi ngokunamathelisa: “Kuhle,” ekubethela ngezipikili, funa kunyakaziswe. 
23_41_8_“Kepha wena Israyeli, nceku yami, wena Jakobe engikukhethileyo, nzalo ka-Abrahama othandiweyo wami, 
23_41_9_wena engikuthathile emikhawulweni yomhlaba, ngakubiza emagumbini awo, ngathi kuwe: ‘Wena uyinceku yami,’ ngikukhethile, angikulahlanga; 
23_41_10_ungesabi, ngokuba mina nginawe; ungapheli amandla, ngokuba mina nginguNkulunkulu wakho; ngiyakuqinisa, futhi ngiyakusiza, yebo, ngiyakusekela ngesandla sokunene sokulunga kwami. 
23_41_11_“Bheka, bonke abafuthekela wena bayakuba namahloni, bajabhe; abamelene nawe bayakuba njengento engelutho, babhubhe. 
23_41_12_Uyakubafuna, ungabafumani kodwa, labo bantu abaxabana nawe; abalwa nawe bayakuba njengento engelutho nanjengeze. 
23_41_13_Ngokuba yimina Jehova uNkulunkulu wakho obamba isandla sakho sokunene, nothi kuwe: Ungesabi, mina ngiyakusiza. 
23_41_14_Ungesabi wena mpethu, Jakobe, nani bantu bakwa-Israyeli; mina ngiyakukusiza,” usho uJehova; uMhlengi wakho ungoNgcwele ka-Israyeli. 
23_41_15_“Bheka, ngiyakukwenza ukuba ube yisibhulo esisha esibukhali esinamazinyo; uyakubhula izintaba, uzicolisise, wenze amagquma abe njengamakhoba. 
23_41_16_Uyakuwahlakaza, umoya uwasuse, isivunguvungu siwachithe; wena uyakuthokoza ngoJehova, uzibonge ngoNgcwele ka-Israyeli. 
23_41_17_“Abampofu nabaswelayo bafuna amanzi, kepha awakho, nolimi lwabo luphele ukoma; mina Jehova ngiyakubaphendula, mina Nkulunkulu ka-Israyeli angiyikubashiya. 
23_41_18_Ngiyakuvula imifula emadulini angenalutho nemithombo phakathi kwezigodi; ngiyakwenza ihlane libe yichibi lamanzi, nomhlabathi owomileyo ube yiziphethu zamanzi. 
23_41_19_Ngiyakutshala umsedari ehlane, umtholo, nombomvana, nomnqumo, ngibeke kwahlongasibi umsayipuresi, nomthidari, nomkhoba kanyekanye, 
23_41_20_ukuze babone, bazi, baqaphele, baqonde kanyekanye ukuthi isandla sikaJehova sikwenzile lokhu nokuthi oNgcwele ka-Israyeli wakudala. 
23_41_21_“Lethani indaba yenu,” usho uJehova, “nisondeze izizathu zenu,” isho iNkosi kaJakobe. 
23_41_22_“Mabazisondeze, basitshele okuyakwenzeka; izinto zakuqala ziyini na? Mabasitshele zona ukuba sizibeke ezinhliziyweni zethu, sazi ukuphela kwazo, noma nisizwise okuzayo. 
23_41_23_Sitsheleni okuzayo ngesikhathi esizayo, sazi ukuthi ningonkulunkulu; yebo, yenzani okuhle noma okubi, simangale, sikubone kanyekanye. 
23_41_24_Bhekani, nivela kokungekho, nemisebenzi yenu ayiyinto yalutho; uyisinengiso onikhethileyo. 
23_41_25_“Ukhona engimvusile esenyakatho, wafika, nasempumalanga, ukuba abize igama lami; uyakwehlela phezu kwezikhulu njengaphezu kodaka, njengombumbi exova ibumba. 
23_41_26_Ngubani owakushoyo kwasekuqaleni ukuba sazi, nangaphambili ukuba sisho sithi: ‘Uqinisile,’ na? Cha, akakho okumemezileyo, akakho nokuzwisileyo, akakho nozwayo amazwi enu. 
23_41_27_Ngingowokuqala othi kulo iSiyoni: ‘Bheka, babheke,’ nginike iJerusalema umbiki wendaba ethokozisayo. 
23_41_28_Kepha lapho ngibheka, akukho muntu, akakho phakathi kwabo umluleki ongaphendula ngazwi, lapho ngibabuzayo. 
23_41_29_Bheka, bayize bonke; imisebenzi yabo ayiyinto yalutho, nezithombe zabo ezibunjiweyo zingumoya nokuyize. 
23_42_1_“Bheka inceku yami engiyisekelayo, okhethiweyo wami othokoza ngaye umphefumulo wami; nginikele umoya wami phezu kwakhe, uyakukhiphela izizwe ukwahlulela. 
23_42_2_Akayikukhala, adazuluke, angezwakalisi izwi lakhe ezitaladini. 
23_42_3_Umhlanga ofecekileyo akayikuwaphula, umongo othunqayo akayikuwucima; uyakukhipha ukwahlulela ngeqiniso. 
23_42_4_Akayikudangala, aphele amandla, aze amise ukwahlulela emhlabeni; neziqhingi ziyakuhlalela umthetho wakhe.” 
23_42_5_Usho kanje uNkulunkulu uJehova owadala izulu, waleneka, nowawendlala umhlaba nokuvela kuwo, nowanika abantu abakuwo ukuphefumula nomoya kwabahamba kuwo, uthi: 
23_42_6_“Mina Jehova ngikubizile ngokulunga, ngiyakubamba isandla sakho, ngikugcine, ngikubeke ube yisivumelwano sabantu nokukhanya kwabezizwe, 
23_42_7_ukuze uvule amehlo ezimpumputhe, ukhiphe iziboshwa etilongweni nabahlezi ebumnyameni etilongweni. 
23_42_8_“NginguJehova; yilo igama lami; angiyikunika omunye inkazimulo yami, nezithombe ezibaziweyo udumo lwami. 
23_42_9_Izinto zakuqala zifikile, sengimemezela izinto ezintsha; zingakaqhamuki, ngiyanizwisa zona.” 
23_42_10_Mhubeleni uJehova ihubo elisha, nodumo lwakhe, kusukela emikhawulweni yomhlaba, nina enehlela elwandle nakho konke okukulo, nina ziqhingi nabakhileyo kuzo. 
23_42_11_Ihlane nemizi yalo makujabule nemizana abakhileyo kuyo abakwaKedari, bahube abakhile emadwaleni, benanele beseziqongweni zezintaba. 
23_42_12_Mabanike uJehova udumo, bamemezele udumo lwakhe eziqhingini. 
23_42_13_UJehova uyaphuma njengeqhawe; njengendoda yempi uyavusa ukushisekela kwakhe; uyakhala, yebo, uyabangalasa, enze ubuqhawe phezu kwezitha zakhe. 
23_42_14_“Sekuyisikhathi eside ngithulile, ngathula ngazibamba; sengiyakukhala njengobelethayo, ngiphefuzele, ngibitoze kanyekanye. 
23_42_15_Ngiyakwenza ize izintaba namagquma, ngomise yonke imifino yawo, ngenze imifula ibe yiziqhingi, ngenze amachibi ukuba ashe. 
23_42_16_Ngiyakuhambisa izimpumputhe ngendlela ezingayaziyo; emikhondweni ezingayaziyo ngiyakuzihola; ngiyakwenza ubumnyama bube ngukukhanya phambi kwazo, namagebhugebhu ukuba ahlelenjwe; ngiyakwenza lezi zinto ngingazishiyi. 
23_42_17_Bayakubuyiselwa emuva, bajabhe nokujabha labo abethemba ezithombeni ezibaziweyo, abasho ezithombeni ezibunjiweyo ukuthi: ‘Ningonkulunkulu bethu.’ 
23_42_18_“Yizwani nina zithulu; bhekani nina zimpumputhe, ukuze nibone. 
23_42_19_Ngubani oyimpumputhe ngaphandle kwenceku yami, nesithulu njengesithunywa sami engisithumayo, na? Ngubani oyimpumputhe njengopheleleyo, oyimpumputhe njengenceku kaJehova, na? 
23_42_20_Ubona izinto eziningi, kepha awuqapheli; izindlebe zakhe zivulekile, kepha akezwa.” 
23_42_21_Kwaba kuhle kuJehova ngenxa yokulunga kwakhe ukuba akhulise umthetho, awudumise. 
23_42_22_Kepha laba bangabantu abaphangiweyo nabamukiweyo; bonke bacushiwe emigodini, bafihliwe ematilongweni; bangabokuphangwa, akakho obophulayo, yebo, bayimpango, kungekho oshoyo ukuthi: “Buyisa.” 
23_42_23_Ngubani phakathi kwenu obeka indlebe kulokhu, aqaphele, ezwele isikhathi esizayo, na? 
23_42_24_Ngubani owanikela uJakobe ukuba aphangwe, no-Israyeli kubo abaphangi, na? Angithi nguJehova, esonile kuye, nabangavumanga ukuhamba ngezindlela zakhe, nabangawulalelanga umthetho wakhe? 
23_42_25_Wayesethela phezu kwakhe ukufutheka kwentukuthelo yakhe, namandla empi; kwamvuthela nxazonke, kepha akakwazanga; kwamshisa, kepha akakubekanga enhliziyweni yakhe. 
23_43_1_Kepha manje usho kanje uJehova owakudalayo wena Jakobe, nowakubumba wena Israyeli, uthi: “Ungesabi ngokuba ngikuhlengile, ngikubizile ngegama lakho; ungowami. 
23_43_2_Lapho udabula emanzini, mina nginawe; nasemifuleni, ayiyikukukhukhula; lapho uhamba emlilweni, awuyikusha, nelangabi aliyikukushisa. 
23_43_3_Ngokuba nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, oNgcwele ka-Israyeli, uMsindisi wakho; ngiyanika iGibithe libe yihlawulo lakho, iKushe neSheba esikhundleni sakho. 
23_43_4_Ngenxa yokuba ubuyigugu emehlweni ami, futhi ubudumile, uthandekile kimi, ngiyakunika abantu esikhundleni sakho, nezizwe esikhundleni sokuphila kwakho. 
23_43_5_Ungesabi, ngokuba nginawe; ngiyakuyiletha inzalo yakho iphume empumalanga, ngikubuthe nasentshonalanga. 
23_43_6_Ngiyakusho kuyo inyakatho, ngithi: ‘Balethe,’ nakuyo iningizimu: ‘Ungabagodli.’ Lethani amadodana ami akude, namadodakazi ami ukuba aphume emikhawulweni yomhlaba, 
23_43_7_onke abizwe ngegama lami, nengiwadalele inkazimulo yami, engiwabumbile nengiwenzile.” 
23_43_8_Lethani abantu abayizimpumputhe abanamehlo nezithulu ezinezindlebe. 
23_43_9_Izizwe zonke mazibuthelwe ndawonye, abantu bonke babuthane; ngubani phakathi kwabo ongamemezela lokhu, asizwise izinto zakuqala; mabalethe ofakazi babo ukuba balungisiswe, bezwe, bathi: “Kuyiqiniso.” 
23_43_10_“Ningofakazi bami,” usho uJehova, “nenceku yami engiyikhethileyo ukuba nazi, ningethembe, niqonde ukuthi nginguye; ngaphambi kwami akwenziwanga uNkulunkulu, nangasemva kwami akayikuba khona. 
23_43_11_Mina, mina nginguJehova, ngaphandle kwami akakho umsindisi. 
23_43_12_Ngimemezele, ngisindisile, ngizwisile, kungakabikho unkulunkulu wabezizwe phakathi kwenu; yebo, ningofakazi bami,” usho uJehova, “mina nginguNkulunkulu. 
23_43_13_Yebo, kwasendulo nginguye; akakho ongophula esandleni sami; lapho ngisebenza, ngubani ongakuvimbela na?” 
23_43_14_Usho kanje uJehova, uMhlengi wenu, oNgcwele ka-Israyeli, uthi: “Ngenxa yenu ngithumele eBabele, ngiyakwehlisa bonke njengababaleki, namaKaledi ngemikhumbi yokujabula kwawo. 
23_43_15_NginguJehova oNgcwele wenu, uMdali ka-Israyeli, iNkosi yenu.” 
23_43_16_Usho kanje uJehova owenza indlela elwandle, nomkhondo emanzini anamandla, 
23_43_17_okhipha izinqola namahhashi, impi namandla; kuyalala kanyekanye, akusenakuvuka; kucishile, kucinyiwe njengomongo. 
23_43_18_“Ningakhumbuli izinto zakuqala, ningazindli ngezindaba zasendulo. 
23_43_19_Bhekani, ngiyakwenza okusha; kuyakuqhamuka manje, angithi niyakwazi na? Yebo, ngiyakwenza indlela ehlane nemifula kwahlongasibi. 
23_43_20_Izilwane zasendle ziyakungidumisa, amakhanka nezintshe, ngokuba ngiveza amanzi ehlane nemifula kwahlongasibi ukuphuzisa abantu bami abakhethiweyo, 
23_43_21_laba bantu engizenzele bona ukuba bashumayele udumo lwami. 
23_43_22_“Kepha awungibizanga, Jakobe, ngokuba wadinwa yimi, Israyeli. 
23_43_23_Awulethanga kimi izimvu zakho zomnikelo wokushiswa, awungidumisanga ngemihlatshelo yakho; angikukhonzisanga ngeminikelo, angikudinisanga ngenhlaka. 
23_43_24_Awungithengelanga umhlanga othaphukayo ngemali, awungisuthisanga ngamanoni emihlatshelo yakho, kepha ungisebenzisile ngezono zakho, ungidinisile ngobubi bakho. 
23_43_25_“Mina, mina nginguye owesula iziphambeko zakho ngenxa yami; angiyikukhumbula izono zakho. 
23_43_26_Ngikhumbuze, masahlulelane; yisho wena ukuba ulungisiwe. 
23_43_27_Uyihlo wokuqala wona, abahumushi bakho bangihlubukile. 
23_43_28_Ngidumazile izikhulu zendlu engcwele, ngimenzile uJakobe abe yisiqalekiso, no-Israyeli abe yisithuko. 
23_44_1_“Kepha yizwa manje, Jakobe, nceku yami, wena Israyeli engikukhethileyo. 
23_44_2_Usho kanje uJehova owakudalayo, wakubumba kwasesiwini, oyakukusiza, uthi: Ungesabi, Jakobe, nceku yami, wena Jeshuruni engikukhethileyo. 
23_44_3_Ngokuba ngiyakuthela amanzi phezu kokomileyo, nezikhukhula phezu kokushileyo, ngithulule uMoya wami phezu kwenzalo yakho, nesibusiso sami phezu kwabantwana bakho; 
23_44_4_bayakuhluma phakathi kotshani njengeminyezane ngasemifudlaneni yamanzi. 
23_44_5_Omunye uyakuthi: ‘NgingokaJehova;’ omunye uyakuzibiza ngegama likaJakobe, omunye azilobele uJehova esandleni sakhe, azidumise ngegama lika-Israyeli.” 
23_44_6_“Usho kanje uJehova, iNkosi ka-Israyeli, noMhlengi wakhe, uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: Ngingowokuqala, ngingowokugcina, ngaphandle kwami akakho uNkulunkulu. 
23_44_7_Ngubani ongabiza njengami, akumemezele, akubeke phambi kwami, kusukela ekusekeleni kwami abantu basendulo, na? Yebo, okuzayo nokuyakwenzeka mabakumemezele. 
23_44_8_Ningesabi, ningabi naluvalo; angithi ngikuzwisile kusukela endulo, ngakumemezela, na? Nina ningofakazi bami. Kukhona uNkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami na? Cha, alikho iDwala; angilazi.” 
23_44_9_Abenza isithombe esibaziweyo bayize bonke; izinto zabo ezithandekayo aziyikusiza; ofakazi babo ababoni, futhi abazi; bayakujabhiswa. 
23_44_10_Ngubani owenzile uNkulunkulu, ngubani obumbile isithombe esibaziweyo esingesokusiza na? 
23_44_11_Bheka, bonke abangane bakhe bayakujabha, nezisebenzi zingabantu nje. Mabahlangane bonke, beme; bayakwesaba, bajabhe kanyekanye. 
23_44_12_Umkhandi wensimbi wenza imbazo, asebenze emalahleni, ayibumbe ngezando, ayisebenze ngamandla ezingalo zakhe; uyalamba, angabikho amandla; akaphuzi amanzi, uyadangala. 
23_44_13_Umbazi uyelula intambo, adwebe umuthi ngokubomvu, awenze ngezibazo, adwebe ngekompasi, awenze ngomfanekiso womuntu, ngobuhle bomuntu, ukuba uhlale endlini. 
23_44_14_Uyazigawulela imisedari, athathe imikhoba nama-oki, awaqinise phakathi kwemithi yehlathi; uyatshala umfire, imvula iwukhulise. 
23_44_15_Bese kuba ngokomuntu ukuba abase ngakho; uthatha kuwo, othe; uyawuphemba, enze isinkwa; wenza unkulunkulu, akhuleke kuye, enze nesithombe esibaziweyo, akhothambele kuso. 
23_44_16_Ushisa inxenye yawo emlilweni; phezu kwale nxenye uyadla inyama, ose izoso, asuthe; yebo, uyotha athi: “Halala! Sengifudumele, ngibonile umlilo.” 
23_44_17_Ngokuseleyo kuwo uyakwenza unkulunkulu nesithombe; uyakhothamela kuso, akhuleke kuso, athandaze kuso, athi: “Ngophule; ungunkulunkulu wami.” 
23_44_18_Abazi, abaqondi, ngokuba unamekile amehlo abo ukuze bangaboni, nezinhliziyo zabo ukuze bangaqondi. 
23_44_19_Akakho okhumbulayo, nokwazi nokuqonda akukho kokuba kuthiwe: “Ngishisile inxenye yawo ngomlilo, ngenzile isinkwa phezu kwamalahle awo, ngosile inyama, ngayidla; ngingenza okuseleyo kuwo kube yisinengiso, ngikhothamele umbhuku womuthi,” na? 
23_44_20_Udla umlotha; inhliziyo ekhohlisiweyo imdukisile; akanakophula umphefumulo wakhe nokuba athi: “Akukho yini amanga kwesokunene sami na?” 
23_44_21_“Khumbula lezi zinto, Jakobe, wena Israyeli, ngokuba uyinceku yami; ngikubumbile, uyinceku yami; Israyeli, angiyikukhohlwa. 
23_44_22_Ngesulile iziphambeko zakho njengefu, nezono zakho njengemilaza; buyela kimi, ngokuba ngikuhlengile.” 
23_44_23_Thokozani, mazulu, ngokuba uJehova ukwenzile, nijabule nina zindawo eziphansi zomhlaba, niqhumuke ngokuhlabelela nina zintaba, nawe hlathi nayo yonke imithi ekuwe, ngokuba uJehova umhlengile uJakobe, ngokuhlabelela wazidumisa ngo-Israyeli. 
23_44_24_Usho kanje uJehova uMhlengi wakho nowakubumba kwasesiswini, uthi: “NginguJehova owenza konke, oweneka izulu yedwa, nowendlala umhlaba ngokwakhe, 
23_44_25_oshafisa izibonakaliso zabaprofethi bamanga, enze ababhuli ukuba bahlanye, obuyisela emuva abahlakaniphileyo, enze ukwazi kwabo kube ngubuwula; 
23_44_26_ogcwalisa izwi lenceku yakhe, afeze ukululekana kwezithunywa zakhe, oshoyo ngalo iJerusalema, athi: ‘Liyakuba nabantu,’ nangemizi yakwaJuda ukuthi: ‘Iyakwakhiwa, ngibuye ngivuse incithakalo yakhona;’ 
23_44_27_oshoyo kuwo umsinga ukuthi: ‘Yisha, ngiyakomisa imifula yakho;’ 
23_44_28_oshoyo ngoKoresi ukuthi: ‘Ungumalusi wami, uyakufeza konke okwentando yami, athi ngeJerusalema: Liyakwakhiwa, nakulo ithempeli: Isisekelo sakho siyakubekwa.’ ” 
23_45_1_“Usho kanje uJehova kogcotshiweyo wakhe, kuKoresi, osandla sakhe sokunene ngisibambile ukuba ngahlule izizwe phambi kwakhe, ngithukulule izinkalo zamakhosi, ngivule iminyango phambi kwakhe, amasango angabe esavalwa. 
23_45_2_Mina ngiyakuhamba phambi kwakho, ngihlelembe amagebhugebhu, ngaphule izivalo zethusi, nginqume imigoqo yensimbi. 
23_45_3_Ngiyakukunika ingcebo yobumnyama, nemfuyo ethukusiweyo ezindaweni ezisithekileyo, ukuba wazi ukuthi nginguJehova okubiza ngegama lakho, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli. 
23_45_4_Ngenxa yenceku yami uJakobe, u-Israyeli okhethiweyo wami, ngikubizile ngegama lakho, ngikunikile igama lodumo, ungakangazi. 
23_45_5_Mina nginguJehova, akakho omunye; ngaphandle kwami akakho uNkulunkulu; ngiyakubhincisa ungakangazi, 
23_45_6_ukuze bazi kusukela empumalanga nasentshonalanga ukuthi akakho ngaphandle kwami; mina nginguJehova, akakho omunye; 
23_45_7_yimi engenza ukukhanya nengidala ubumnyama, ngenza ukuthula, ngidala okubi; nginguJehova owenza konke lokho. 
23_45_8_“Consani, mazulu, phezulu, amafu athuntulule ukulunga; umhlaba mawuvuleke, kuthelwe ukusindiswa, kumile nokulunga; mina Jehova ngikudalile. 
23_45_9_“Wo kuye olwa noMenzi, udengezi phakathi kwezindengezi zomhlaba! Ibumba liyakusho kolibumbayo ukuthi: ‘Wenzani na?’ nomsebenzi wakho ukuthi: ‘Akanazo izandla,’ na? 
23_45_10_Wo kuye osho kuyise ukuthi: ‘Uzalani na?’ nakowesifazane ukuthi: ‘Unemihelo ngani na?’ 
23_45_11_“Usho kanje uJehova, oNgcwele ka-Israyeli noMenzi wakhe, uthi: Ningibuza ngezinto ezizayo, ngabantwana bami, ningiyaleze ngomsebenzi wezandla zami, na? 
23_45_12_Yimi engiwenzile umhlaba, ngadala abantu phezu kwawo; mina ngezandla zami ngeneka izulu, nebandla lalo lonke ngiliyalezile. 
23_45_13_Mina ngimvusile lona ngokulunga; ngiyakuhlelemba zonke izindlela zakhe; yena uyakuwakha umuzi wami, avumele abathunjwa bami ukuba bahambe, kungabi ngenkokhelo nangesipho, usho uJehova Sebawoti.” 
23_45_14_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Okukhandlekelweyo kwaseGibithe nokuzuziweyo kwaseKushe, nangamaSheba, abantu abade, kuyakungena kuwe, kube ngokwakho; bayakukulandela, bafike beboshwe ngamaketanga, bakhothamele kuwe, bakhuleke kuwe, bathi: ‘UNkulunkulu ukuwe kuphela, akakho omunye, akakho ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu.’ ” 
23_45_15_Impela unguNkulunkulu ozifihlayo, wena Nkulunkulu, Msindisi. 
23_45_16_Bayakujabha, babe namahloni bonke kanyekanye; bayakuhamba benamahloni bonke abenza izithombe. 
23_45_17_Kepha u-Israyeli uyakusindiswa nguJehova ngokusindiswa okuphakade; aniyikujabha, aniyikuba namahloni kuze kube phakade. 
23_45_18_Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova, owalidala izulu, onguNkulunkulu, owawubumba umhlaba, wawenza, wawumisa, engawudalelanga ize, wawubumba ukuba kuhlalwe kuwo, uthi: “NginguJehova, akakho omunye. 
23_45_19_Angikhulumanga ekusithekeni, endaweni emnyama emhlabeni; angishongo enzalweni kaJakobe ukuthi: ‘Ngifuneni ngeze.’ Mina Jehova ngikhuluma ukulunga, ngimemezela okuqotho. 
23_45_20_“Buthanani nize, nisondelane ndawonye nina bakhululekileyo bezizwe; abawuthwala umuthi wezithombe zabo ezibaziweyo abanakwazi, bakhuleka kunkulunkulu ongenakusindisa. 
23_45_21_Kumemezeleni, nikuveze; yebo, balulekane kanyekanye. Ngubani owakuzwisa lokhu endulo, wakumemezela kwasesikhathini samandulo na? Akusimina Jehova na? Akakho uNkulunkulu ngaphandle kwami, uNkulunkulu olungileyo noMsindisi, akakho ngaphandle kwami. 
23_45_22_“Phendukelani kini, nisindiswe, nonke nina majukujuku omhlaba, ngokuba nginguNkulunkulu, akakho omunye. 
23_45_23_Ngizifungile mina, kuphumile izwi emlonyeni wami ngokulunga, aliyikubuya, lokuthi: Kimina ayakuguqa onke amadolo, nezilimi zonke ziyakufunga. 
23_45_24_Kuyakuthiwa: ‘KuJehova kuphela nginokulunga namandla.’ ” Bayakufika kuye, bajabhe bonke abamvuthelayo. 
23_45_25_KuJehova yonke inzalo kaJakobe yakwa-Israyeli iyakulungisiswa, ibe nodumo. 
23_46_1_UBeli uyaguqa, uNebo uyakhothama; izithombe zabo zingezezilwane nezezinkomo; enibathweleyo bangumthwalo, banzima ezilwaneni eziyethileyo. 
23_46_2_Ziyakhothama, ziguqa kanyekanye, azinakuwukhulula umthwalo; nabo uqobo baya ekuthunjweni. 
23_46_3_“Ngilalele wena ndlu kaJakobe, yonke insali yendlu yakwa-Israyeli engiyithwesiweyo kwasesiswini, yabekwa phezu kwami kwasesizalweni. 
23_46_4_Noze niguge, nginguye, yebo, noze nibe yizimpunga, ngiyakunithwala; ngikwenzile lokhu, futhi ngiyakunetshatha, yebo, ngiyakunithwala, nginikhulule. 
23_46_5_“Niyakungifanisa, ningilinganise nobani, ningiqathanise nobani ukuba sifanane na? 
23_46_6_Abathulula igolide esikhwameni yini, balinganise isiliva esilinganisweni, baqashe umkhandi wesiliva ukuba enze unkulunkulu, bese bekhothama, bakhuleke, na? 
23_46_7_Bamthwala ehlombe, bametshathe, bambeke endaweni yakhe ukuba eme khona, angabe esasuka endaweni yakhe; kepha uma umuntu ekhala kuye, akayikumphendula, angamsindisi osizini lwakhe. 
23_46_8_“Khumbulani lokhu, nime niqinile, nibuye nicabange ezinhliziyweni zenu nina benzi bokubi. 
23_46_9_Khumbulani izinto zakuqala zamandulo, ngokuba nginguNkulunkulu, akakho omunye, yebo, nginguNkulunkulu, akakho onjengami, 
23_46_10_engimemezela ngaphambili okuyakuza, nasendulo izinto ezingakenziwa, ngokuthi: Icebo lami liyakuma, ngiyakwenza yonke intando yami, 
23_46_11_mina engibiza inqe empumalanga nomuntu wecebo lami ezweni elikude; yebo, ngikhulumile, ngiyakukufikisa; nginqumile, ngiyakukwenza. 
23_46_12_Ngilaleleni nina enilukhuni ngenhliziyo, enikude nokulunga. 
23_46_13_Ngiyakusondeza ukulunga kwami, akukude, insindiso yami ayiyikulibala; ngibeka insindiso eSiyoni nodumo lwami kwa-Israyeli. 
23_47_1_“Yehla, uhlale othulini wena ntombi, ndodakazi yaseBabele, uhlale emhlabathini, kungekho sihlalo sobukhosi, wena ndodakazi yamaKaledi, ngokuba awusayikubizwa ngokuthi uthambile nokuthi uyatetema. 
23_47_2_Thatha amatshe okugaya, ugaye impuphu, uyisuse imvakazi yakho, uwukhumule umhushuzo wakho, wambule umlenze, uwele imifula. 
23_47_3_Ubuze bakho buyakwambulwa, yebo, ubunqunu bakho buyakubonakala; ngiyakuphindisa, ngingayeki muntu. 
23_47_4_Igama loMhlengi wethu linguJehova Sebawoti, oNgcwele ka-Israyeli. 
23_47_5_“Hlala uzithulele, ungene ebumnyameni, wena ndodakazi yamaKaledi, ngokuba awusayikubizwa ngokuthi iNkosikazi Yemibuso. 
23_47_6_Ngabathukuthelela abantu bami, ngalingcolisa ifa lami, ngalinikela esandleni sakho; awubahawukelanga, walenza ijoka lakho ukuba lisinde kakhulu phezu kwabadala. 
23_47_7_Wathi wena: ‘Ngiyakuba yinkosikazi njalonjalo.’ Ngalokho awubekanga lezi zinto enhliziyweni yakho, awukhumbulanga ukugcina kwazo. 
23_47_8_“Manje yizwa lokhu wena ozijabulisayo, ohlala ulondekile, othi enhliziweni yakho: Yimi, akakho omunye; angiyikuhlalisa okomfelokazi, nokufelwa abantwana angiyikukwazi. 
23_47_9_Kodwa lokhu kokubili kuyakufika kuwe ngokuphazima kweso ngalusuku lunye, ukufelwa, kwabantwana nobufelokazi kufike phezu kwakho ngokugcweleyo phakathi kobuningi bamalumbo akho, nobuningi beziphonso zakho. 
23_47_10_Wethembile ebubini bakho, wathi: ‘Akakho ongibonayo.’ Ukuhlakanipha kwakho nokwazi kwakho kukudukisile; wathi enhliziyweni yakho: ‘Yimi, akakho omunye.’ 
23_47_11_Kepha ububi buyakukwehlela, awuyikwazi lapho buvela khona; nengozi iyakuwela phezu kwakho, awuyikuba namandla okuyichezukisa, incithakalo ifike phezu kwakho ngokuzumayo, ungazi. 
23_47_12_“Yima manje neziphonso zakho nobuningi bamalumbo akho okhandlekile kukho kwasebusheni bakho; mhlawumbe uyakusizakala, mhlawumbe uyakubanga uvalo. 
23_47_13_Ukhathele ngobuningi bamacebo akho; mabasukume, bakusindise abadabula izulu, nababheka izinkanyezi, nabazisa ngezinyanga ezintsha ukuthi kuphi lapho kuzakuvela khona lokhu okuzakukwehlela. 
23_47_14_Bheka, bayakuba njengamabibi ashiswa ngumlilo, abayikuzophula emandleni elangabi; akusilo ilahle lokotha, akusiwo umlilo wokuba kuhlalwe phambi kwawo. 
23_47_15_Ziyakuba njalo kuwe izinto okhandleke kuzo, zihambisene nawe kwasebusheni bakho; seziyakuzulazula, kube yileyo naleyo ngendlela yayo, ekusindisayo ingabikho. 
23_48_1_“Yizwa lokhu wena ndlu kaJakobe obiziwe ngegama lika-Israyeli, waphuma emanzini akwaJuda, ofunga igama likaJehova, odumisa uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, kungengaqiniso nakulunga kodwa. 
23_48_2_Ngokuba bazibiza ngomuzi ongcwele, bencika kuNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, nguJehova Sebawoti igama lakhe. 
23_48_3_Ngimemezele izinto zakuqala zamandulo, zaphuma emlonyeni wami, ngazizwakalisa; ngazenza ngokuzumayo, zenzeka. 
23_48_4_Ngokuba bengazi ukuthi unenkani, nentamo yakho ingumsipha wensimbi, nebunzi lakho liyithusi, 
23_48_5_ngazimemezela kwasendulo, ngazizwisa kungakenzeki, funa usho uthi: ‘Isithombe sami sizenzile, isithombe sami esibaziweyo, nesithombe sami esibunjiweyo siziyalezile.’ 
23_48_6_Wawukuzwile konke lokho; wakubona; awuyikukumemezela na? “Ngikuzwisile okusha kusukela namuhla, yebo, nokusithekileyo ongakwazanga. 
23_48_7_Kudaliwe manje, kungesendulo; awukuzwanga ngaphambi kwalolu suku, funa uthi: ‘Bheka, bengikwazi.’ 
23_48_8_Yebo, awuzwanga, awazanga, kwasendulo indlebe yakho ayivulwanga, ngokuba bengazi ukuthi wawukhohlisa nokukhohlisa, wabizwa ngokuthi umhlubuki kwasekuzalweni. 
23_48_9_Ngenxa yegama lami ngiyakulibazisa intukuthelo yami, ngizibambele wena ngodumo lwami ukuba ngingakunqumi. 
23_48_10_Bheka, ngikucwengisisile, kungavelanga isiliva kodwa; ngikuvivinyile esithandweni sezinhlupheko. 
23_48_11_Ngenxa yami, ngenxa yami ngiyakwenza, ngokuba igama lami lingcoliselwani na? Anginiki omunye inkazimulo yami. 
23_48_12_“Ngilalele, Jakobe, wena Israyeli, obiziweyo wami; ngisenguye, ngingowokuqala, futhi ngingowokugcina. 
23_48_13_Yebo, isandla sami sisibekile isisekelo somhlaba, nesokunene sami silenekile izulu; lapho ngikubizayo, kuma ndawonye. 
23_48_14_“Buthanani nina nonke, nizwe; ngubani phakathi kwabo omemezela lezi zinto na? Amthandayo uJehova uyakuyifeza intando yakhe ngeBabele, nengalo yakhe iyakuba phezu kwamaKaledi. 
23_48_15_Mina, mina ngikhulumile, yebo, ngimbizile, ngimlethile, uyakuphumelela endleleni yakhe. 
23_48_16_“Sondelani kimi, nizwe lokhu; angikhulumanga ekusithekeni kwasekuqaleni; kusukela esikhathini sokuba kwenzeke, ngangikhona.” Manje uJehova uNkulunkulu ungithumile kanye noMoya wakhe. 
23_48_17_Usho kanje uJehova uMhlengi wakho, oNgcwele ka-Israyeli, uthi: “NginguJehova uNkulunkulu wakho okufundisile okukusizayo, okuholile ngendlela omelwe ukuhamba ngayo. 
23_48_18_Sengathi nga ulalele imiyalo yami! Khona ukuthula kwakho kwakuyakuba njengomfula, nokulunga kwakho njengamaza olwandle; 
23_48_19_nenzalo yakho yayiyakuba ngangesihlabathi, nabantwana bezibilini zakho njengezinhlamvu zaso; igama lakhe nga linganqunywanga, lachithwa ngaphambi kwami.” 
23_48_20_Phumani eBabele, nibalekele amaKaledi, nimemezele lokhu ngezwi lokujabula, nikuzwakalise lokhu, nikuphumisele nasemikhawulweni yomhlaba, ngokuthi: “UJehova uhlengile inceku yakhe uJakobe.” 
23_48_21_Kabomanga lapho ebahola emahlane, wenza ukuba amanzi abagobhozele edwaleni; futhi waliqhekeza idwala, amanzi ampompoza. 
23_48_22_“Akukho ukuthula kwababi,” usho uJehova. 
23_49_1_Ngilaleleni nina ziqhingi, niqaphele nina bantu abakude; uJehova ungibizile kwasekuzalweni, waqamba igama lami kwasezibilinini zikamame. 
23_49_2_Wawenza umlomo wami njengenkemba ebukhali, wangithukusa ethunzini lesandla sakhe, wangenza umcibisholo ophucuziweyo, wangithukusa esambweni sakhe. 
23_49_3_Wathi kimi: “Uyinceku yami, u-Israyeli, engiyakuzidumisa kuye.” 
23_49_4_Kepha ngase ngithi mina: “Ngikhandlekele ize, amandla ami ngiwachithele okuyize nokungelutho; nokho ilungelo lami likuJehova, nomvuzo wami ukuNkulunkulu wami.” 
23_49_5_Manje uthi uJehova owangibumba kwasekuzalweni ukuba ngibe yinceku yakhe yokubuyisela kuye uJakobe, kubuthelwe kuye no-Israyeli futhi ngidunyisiwe emehlweni kaJehova, uNkulunkulu wami waba ngamandla ami 
23_49_6_yebo, uthi: “Kuyinto elula ukuba ube yinceku yami ukuvusa izizwe zakwaJakobe, nokubuyisa abaseleyo bakwa-Israyeli; ngalokho ngiyakukubeka ube ngukukhanya kwabezizwe, ube yinsindiso yami kuze kube semkhawulweni womhlaba.” 
23_49_7_Usho kanje uJehova, uMhlengi ka-Israyeli noNgcwele wakhe, kodelelwa nokudelelwa noyisinengiso esizweni, koyinceku yababusi, uthi: “Amakhosi ayakubona, asukume, izikhulu zibone, zikhothame ngenxa kaJehova othembekile, oNgcwele ka-Israyeli okukhethileyo.” 
23_49_8_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngiyakuphendula ngesikhathi somusa, ngosuku lokusindiswa ngiyakusiza; ngiyakukulondoloza, ngikubeke ube yisivumelwano sabantu sokubuyisa izwe nokubenza badle amafa achithekileyo, 
23_49_9_uthi kwababoshiweyo: ‘Phumani,’ nakwabasebumnyameni: ‘Velani.’ “Bayakuklaba ngasezindleleni, amadlelo abo abe semagqumeni onke. 
23_49_10_Abayikulamba, abayikoma, abayikushaywa yisifudumezi nelanga, ngokuba yena onomusa kubo uyakubahola, abayise emithonjeni yamanzi. 
23_49_11_Ngiyakuzenza zonke izintaba zami zibe yizindlela, imendo yami iphakame. 
23_49_12_Bheka, laba bayakuvela kude; bheka, laba bayakuvela enyakatho nasentshonalanga, nalaba ezweni laseSinimi.” 
23_49_13_Jabulani nina mazulu, uthokoze nawe mhlaba, niqhumuke ngokuhlabelela nina zintaba, ngokuba uJehova ududuza abantu bakhe, abe nomusa kwabahluphekileyo bakhe. 
23_49_14_Kepha iSiyoni lithi: “UJehova ungishiyile, iNkosi ingikhohliwe.” 
23_49_15_“Owesifazane angakhohlwa umntwana wakhe oncelayo ukuba angabi namusa kuyo indodana yesizalo sakhe na? Yebo, bona bangakhohlwa, kodwa mina anginakukukhohlwa wena. 
23_49_16_Bheka, ezandleni zami ngikubhalile, izingange zakho ziphambi kwami njalo. 
23_49_17_Abantwana bakho bayashesha; abakuchithayo nabakwenza ize baphuma kuwe. 
23_49_18_Phakamisa amehlo akho nxazonke, ubone: bonke bayabuthana, bafika kuwe. Kuphila kwami,” usho uJehova, “impela uyakubembatha bonke njengemvunulo, uzibhince ngabo njengomakoti. 
23_49_19_“Ngokuba izindawo zakho ezichithekileyo neziyize nezwe lakho eliqothuliweyo kuyakuminyana ngabakhileyo khona, nabakugwinyileyo bayakuba kude. 
23_49_20_Abantwana bokusweziselwa kwakho basayakusho ezindlebeni zakho ukuthi: Indawo ingumcingo kimi; sukani kimi ukuba ngihlale. 
23_49_21_Bese wusho enhliziyweni yakho ukuthi: ‘Ngubani ongizalele laba, lokhu ngaphuciwe abantwana bami, ngingenalutho, ngingumthunjwa, ngingozulazulayo, na? Ngubani okhulise laba na? Bheka, ngasala ngedwa; laba babephi na?’ ” 
23_49_22_Isho kanje iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ithi: “Bheka, ngiyakuphakamisela izizwe izandla zami, ngimisele abantu ibhanela lami; bayakuletha amadodana akho esifubeni sabo, namadodakazi akho ayakuthwalwa emahlombe. 
23_49_23_Amakhosi ayakuba ngabazanyana bakho, namakhosikazi awo ayakuba ngabancelisi bakho; bayakukukhothamela ubuso bubheke phansi, bakhothe uthuli lwezinyawo zakho; uyakwazi ukuthi nginguJehova, abethemba kimi abayikujabha.” 
23_49_24_Impango ingasuswa kuwo amaqhawe, nabathunjwa bangophulwa kubacindezeli, na? 
23_49_25_Noma kunjalo, uJehova uthi: “Yebo, abathunjwa bamaqhawe bangasuswa, nempango yabacindezeli iyakophulwa, kepha mina ngiyakulwa naye olwa nawe, ngisindise abantwana bakho. 
23_49_26_Ngiyakudlisa abacindezeli bakho inyama yabo, badakwe yigazi labo njengangewayini elimnandi; inyama yonke iyakwazi ukuthi mina Jehova nginguMsindisi wakho, noMhlengi wakho, uMninimandla kaJakobe.” 
23_50_1_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Iphi incwadi yesahlukaniso engimlahlile ngayo, noma ngumuphi enginesikwenetu kuye engithengisile ngani kuye na? Bhekani, nathengiswa ngobubi benu, nangeziphambeko zenu, unyoko walahlwa. 
23_50_2_Ngalokho ekufikeni kwami kwaba ngani ukuba kungabikho muntu, nasekubizeni kungabikho ophendulayo, na? Isandla sami sifinyeziwe nokufinyezwa, ukuze singahlengi na? Noma angisenamandla okophula na? Bheka, ngokukhuza kwami ngiyomisa ulwandle, ngenze imifula ibe yihlane; izinhlanzi zalo ziyanuka, ngokuba awakho amanzi, ziyafa ukoma. 
23_50_3_Ngiyembathisa amazulu ubumnyama, ngenze indwangu yamasaka ibe yisimbozo sawo.” 
23_50_4_INkosi uJehova inginikile ulimi lwabafundi ukuba ngazi ukuvuselela oyethileyo ngamazwi ahlumelelayo; ivusa njalo indlebe yami ekuseni imihla ngemihla ukuba ngizwe njengabafundi. 
23_50_5_INkosi uJehova iyivulile indlebe yami, mina angihlubukanga, angihlehlanga nyovane. 
23_50_6_Nganika abashayi umhlane, nezihlathi zami kubo abahluthula isilevu; angibusithelisanga ubuso bami ekuhlazisweni nasekufelweni amathe. 
23_50_7_Ngokuba iNkosi uJehova iyakungisiza; ngalokho angijabhanga, ngalokho ngibumisile ubuso bami njengensengetsha; ngiyazi ukuthi angiyikujabha. 
23_50_8_Ongithethayo useduze; ngubani ongamelana nami na? Masivuke kanyekanye; ngubani omangalelana nami na? Makasondele kimi. 
23_50_9_Bheka, iNkosi uJehova iyakungisiza; ngubani oyakungilahla na? Bheka, bonke bayakuguga njengengubo, badliwe njengezinundu. 
23_50_10_Ngubani phakathi kwenu omesabayo uJehova? Makalilalele izwi lenceku yakhe ehambile ebumnyameni, ethembile egameni likaJehova, noma ingenakukhanya, yencika kuNkulunkulu wakhe. 
23_50_11_Bhekani nina nonke eniphemba umlilo, enibhinca izikhuni, manihambe ekukhanyeni komlilo wenu naphakathi kwezikhuni eniziphembileyo. Lokhu kuyakuba phezu kwenu kuvela esandleni sami; niyakulala phansi ngobuhlungu. 
23_51_1_“Ngilaleleni nina enilandela ukulunga, nina enimfunayo uJehova; bhekani kulo idwala eniqhezulwe kulo, nakuyo imibhobo yomgodi enakhishwa kuyo. 
23_51_2_Bhekani ku-Abrahama uyihlo, nakuSara owanizalayo, ngokuba eseyedwa ngambiza, ngambusisa, ngamandisa. 
23_51_3_Ngokuba uJehova uyakuliduduza iSiyoni, aziduduze zonke izindawo zalo ezichithekileyo, enze ihlane lalo libe njenge-Edene, noqwathule lwalo lube njengensimu kaJehova; injabulo nentokozo kuyakufunyanwa khona, ukubonga nezwi lokuhlabelela. 
23_51_4_“Ngizweni, bantu bami, ningibekele indlebe nina sizwe sami, ngokuba kuyakuphuma kimi umthetho, ngibeke ukwahlulela kwami kube ngukukhanya kwabantu. 
23_51_5_Ukulunga kwami kuseduze, insindiso yami iphumile, izingalo zami ziyakubahlulela abantu; iziqhingi ziyangihlalela, zilindela umkhono wami. 
23_51_6_Phakamiselani amehlo enu ezulwini, niwubheke umhlaba phansi, ngokuba izulu liyakunyamalala njengomusi, umhlaba uguge njengengubo, nabakhileyo kuwo bafe njengezinsensane, kepha insindiso yami iyakuma kuze kube phakade, nokulunga kwami akuyikuphela. 
23_51_7_“Ngilaleleni nina enazi ukulunga, abantu abamthetho wami usezinhliziyweni zabo; ningesabi ukusolwa ngabantu, ningapheli amandla ngezithuko zabo. 
23_51_8_Ngokuba inundu iyakubadla njengengubo, nebhu libadle njengoboya bezimvu, kodwa ukulunga kwami kuyakuma kuze kube phakade, nensindiso yami ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane.” 
23_51_9_Vuka, vuka, wembathe amandla wena mkhono kaJehova, vuka njengasezinsukwini zasendulo, ezizukulwaneni zamandulo. Akusuwe owamnquma kabili uRahabi, wamgwaza udrako, na? 
23_51_10_Akusuwe owomisa ulwandle, amanzi asotweni olujulileyo, owenza izinzulu zolwandle zaba yindlela yokuba kuwele abahlengiweyo, na? 
23_51_11_Abahlawulelweyo bakaJehova bayakubuya, bafike eSiyoni bejabula; intokozo engapheliyo iyakuba semakhanda abo, bathole injabulo nentokozo, usizi nokububula kubaleke. 
23_51_12_“Yimina, yimi enginguye oniduduzayo; ungubani wena ukuba wesabe umuntu ofayo, nendodana yomuntu eyakwenziwa ibe njengotshani, na? 
23_51_13_Ukhohliwe uJehova uMenzi wakho owaleneka izulu nowasibeka isisekelo somhlaba; uthuthumele njalo izinsuku zonke ngokufutheka komcindezeli njengokungathi ozilungiselela ukuchitha; kuphi ukufutheka komcindezeli na? 
23_51_14_Othotshisiweyo uyakushesha ukukhululwa; kayikufa, kayikwehlela egodini, kayikuswela isinkwa sakhe. 
23_51_15_NginguJehova uNkulunkulu wakho ovusa ulwandle, ukuze amaza alo ahlokome; nguJehova Sebawoti igama lakhe. 
23_51_16_Ngiwabekile amazwi ami emlonyeni wakho, ngikusibekele emthunzini wesandla sami, ukuze ngiwatshale amazulu, ngisibeke isisekelo somhlaba, ngithi kulo iSiyoni: ‘Wena uyisizwe sami.’ ” 
23_51_17_Vuka, vuka, usukume wena Jerusalema ophuzile esandleni sikaJehova indebe yokufutheka kwakhe; uphuzile isitsha sendebe yokutengezela, wasiminya. 
23_51_18_Akakho ongalihola phakathi kwawo onke amadodana eliwazalileyo. Akakho ongalibamba ngesandla kuwo onke amadodana eliwakhulisileyo. 
23_51_19_Lokhu kokubili kukwehlele; ngubani okukhalelayo na? Lapho kukhona incithakalo nokubhujiswa, ukulamba nenkemba, ngubani ongakududuza na? 
23_51_20_Amadodana akho adangele, alala ezihlokweni zezitaladi zonke, njengewula esihibeni; agcwele ukufutheka kukaJehova nokukhuza kukaNkulunkulu wakho. 
23_51_21_Ngalokho ake uzwe lokhu wena ohluphekayo nodakiweyo, kungengewayini kodwa; 
23_51_22_isho kanje iNkosi yakho uJehova noNkulunkulu wakho emela indaba yabantu, ithi: “Bheka, ngiyithathile esandleni sakho indebe yokutengezela; yebo, isitsha sendebe yokufutheka kwami awusayikusiphuza. 
23_51_23_Ngiyakusibeka esandleni sabakuhluphayo, abashoyo emphefumulweni wakho ukuthi: ‘Khothama, sidlule phezu kwakho;’ wawusuwubeka umhlane wakho waba njengomhlabathi nesitaladi kwabadlulayo.” 
23_52_1_Vuka, vuka, wembathe amandla akho, Siyoni, uzigqoke izingubo zakho ezinhle, Jerusalema, muzi ongcwele, ngokuba akusayikungena kuwe ongasokile nongcolileyo. 
23_52_2_Zithintithe uthuli, usukume, uhlale, Jerusalema elithunjiweyo; zikhulule eziboshweni zentamo yakho wena ndodakazi yaseSiyoni ethunjiweyo. 
23_52_3_Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Nathengiswa ngento engelutho; niyakuhlengwa ngaphandle kwemali.” 
23_52_4_Ngokuba isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: Abantu bami behlela kuqala eGibithe ukuba bagogobale khona; i-Asiriya lamcindezela ngaphandle kwesizathu. 
23_52_5_“Manje nginantoni lapha,” usho uJehova, “lapho abantu bami besusiwe ngeze na? Ababusa phezu kwabo bayaklabalasa,” usho uJehova, “negama lami liyahlanjalazwa njalo usuku lonke. 
23_52_6_Ngalokho abantu bami bayakulazi igama lami; ngalokho bayakuqonda ngalolo suku ukuthi yimi engikhulumileyo; bhekani, ngilapha.” 
23_52_7_Zimnandi kangakanani ezintabeni izinyawo zoletha izindaba ezinhle, nomemezela ukuthula, obika izindaba ezinhle, ezwakalise ukusindiswa, oshoyo kulo iSiyoni ukuthi: “UNkulunkulu wakho uyinkosi.” 
23_52_8_Izwi labalindi bakho, bayaliphakamisa izwi, bajabule kanyekanye, ngokuba bayakubona iso neso, lapho uJehova ebuyela eSiyoni. 
23_52_9_Qhumukani ngokuhlabelela, nihlabelele kanyekanye, nina zindawo ezichithekileyo zaseJerusalema, ngokuba uJehova ubaduduzile abantu bakhe, ulihlengile iJerusalema. 
23_52_10_UJehova wambulile ingalo yakhe engcwele emehlweni ezizwe zonke, namajukujuku onke omhlaba ayakubona insindiso kaNkulunkulu wethu. 
23_52_11_Mukani, mukani, niphume lapha, ningathinti okungcolileyo, niphume phakathi kwalo, nizihlambulule nina eniphatha izitsha zikaJehova. 
23_52_12_Ngokuba aniyikuphuma ngokushesha, ningahambi ngokubaleka, ngokuba uJehova uyakuhamba phambi kwenu, noNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli uyakuba semva kwenu. 
23_52_13_Bheka, inceku yami iyakuphumelela kahle; iyakukhuliswa, iphakanyiswe, iphakame kakhulu. 
23_52_14_Njengalokhu abaningi bamangala ngayo ubuso bayo babonakele kunobabantu, nesimo sayo kunesamadodana abantu 
23_52_15_kanjalo iyakwethusa izizwe eziningi; amakhosi ayakuvala imilomo yawo ngenxa yayo, ngokuba lokho angatshelwanga khona ayakukubona, nalokho angakuzwanga ayakukuqonda. 
23_53_1_Ngubani owakholwa ngesikuzwileyo; ingalo kaJehova yambulelwa bani na? 
23_53_2_Ngokuba yakhula njengehlumela phambi kwakhe, nanjengempande emhlabathini owomileyo; yayingenasimo nabuhle ukuba siyibuke, yayingabukeki ukuba siyifune. 
23_53_3_Yayideleliwe, yashiywa ngabantu, umuntu wobuhlungu owazi ukugula; yeyiswa injengosithezelwa ubuso ngabantu, asiyishayanga nto yalutho. 
23_53_4_Kepha yazithwala izifo zethu, yabetshatha ubuhlungu bethu, kodwa thina sathi ijezisiwe, ishaywe nguNkulunkulu, ihlushiwe. 
23_53_5_Yebo, yalinyazwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu, yachotshozwa ngobubi bethu; isijeziso sasiphezu kwayo ukuba sibe nokuthula, nangemivimbo yayo siphilisiwe thina. 
23_53_6_Thina sonke sidukile njengezimvu; yilowo nalowo uphendukele endleleni yakhe; uJehova wehlisela phezu kwayo ububi bethu sonke. 
23_53_7_Yacindezelwa, kepha noma yathotshiswa, ayivulanga umlomo wayo; njengewundlu eliyiswa ekuhlatshweni, nanjengemvu ethule phambi kwabagundi bayo, ayiwuvulanga umlomo wayo. 
23_53_8_Yasuswa ekucindezelweni nasekwahlulelweni; ngubani esizukulwaneni sayo owacabanga ukuthi yahlwithwa ezweni labaphilayo, ishaywa ngesiphambeko sabantu bami, na? 
23_53_9_Babeka ithuna layo kanye nababi; ekufeni yayinabenza okubi, noma ingenzanga indluzula, kungekho nankohliso emlonyeni wayo. 
23_53_10_Nokho uJehova wathanda ukuyishaya ngezifo; lapho wenza umphefumulo wayo ube ngumnikelo wecala, iyakubona inzalo yayo, yenze izinsuku zayo zibe ziningi, nentando kaJehova iyakuphumelela esandleni sayo. 
23_53_11_Ngokuhlupheka komphefumulo wayo iyakukubona, yaneliswe. Ngokwazi kwayo inceku yami, elungileyo, iyakulungisisa abaningi, ithwale izono zabo. 
23_53_12_Ngalokho ngiyakuyabela kanye nabakhulu, yahlukanise impango nabanamandla, ngokuba yawuthulula umphefumulo wayo ekufeni, yabalwa kanye nezelelesi; yathwala nokho izono zabaningi, yakhulekela aboni. 
23_54_1_“Jabula wena nyumba, wena ongazalanga, uqhumuke ngokuhlabelela, umemeze wena ongabanga namihelo, ngokuba abantwana boyisikhwebu baningi kunabantwana bonendoda,” usho uJehova. 
23_54_2_“Yenza ibe banzi indawo yetende lakho; mabazelule izindwangu zamakhaya akho, ungazibambezeli, welule izintambo zakho, uziqinise izikhonkwane zakho. 
23_54_3_Ngokuba uyakusabalala ngakwesokunene nangakwesokhohlo, nengalo yakho iyakuqeda abezizwe, yakhe imizi echithekileyo. 
23_54_4_“Ungesabi, ngokuba awuyikujabha, ungabi namahloni, ngokuba awuyikujabhiswa, ngokuba uyakukhohlwa ihlazo lobusha bakho, ungabe usawakhumbula amahloni obufelokazi bakho. 
23_54_5_Ngokuba uMenzi wakho ungumyeni wakho, nguJehova Sebawoti igama lakhe; oNgcwele ka-Israyeli unguMhlengi wakho, uyakubizwa ngokuthi uNkulunkulu womhlaba wonke. 
23_54_6_Ngokuba uJehova ukubizile njengomfazi oshiyiweyo nodabukileyo emoyeni; umfazi wobusha ukhona omalayo na?” usho uNkulunkulu wakho. 
23_54_7_“Umzuzwana omncane ngakushiya, kepha ngobumnene obukhulu ngiyakukubutha. 
23_54_8_Ngentukuthelo echichimayo ngabusitheza ubuso bami kuwe isikhashana, kepha ngomusa ongapheliyo ngiyakukuhawukela,” usho uJehova uMhlengi wakho. 
23_54_9_“Ngokuba lokhu kunjengezinsuku zikaNowa kimi, ngokuba njengalokho ngafunga ukuthi amanzi kaNowa awayikube esadlula emhlabeni, kanjalo sengifungile ukuthi angisayikukuthukuthelela, ngikusole. 
23_54_10_Yebo, izintaba zingamuka, namagquma angasuswa, kepha umusa wami awuyikumuka kuwe, nesivumelwano sami sokuthula asiyikususwa,” usho uJehova okuhawukelayo. 
23_54_11_“Wena ohluphekayo, ohlukunyeziwe ungaduduzwanga, bheka, ngiyakufaka amatshe akho abe mahle, ngizibeke izisekelo zakho ngamasafire. 
23_54_12_Ngiyakwenza imibhoshongo yakho ngamarubi, namasango akho ngekristalo, nayo yonke imikhawulo yakho ngamatshe amahle. 
23_54_13_Bonke abantwana bakho bayakuba ngabafundi bakaJehova, nokuthula kwabantwana bakho kuyakuba kukhulu. 
23_54_14_Uyakumiswa ngokulunga; uyakuba kude nokucindezelwa, ngokuba awuyikwesaba, nanovalo, ngokuba aluyikusondela kuwe. 
23_54_15_Bheka, uma bebuthana, kungaphandle kwami, noma ngubani obuthanela wena, uyakuwa ngenxa yakho. 
23_54_16_“Bheka, mina ngidalile umkhandi ofutha umlilo wamalahle, azikhiphele isikhali somsebenzi wakhe; mina ngidalile futhi umchithi wokuba abhubhise. 
23_54_17_Asikho isikhali esenzelwa wena esiyakuphumelela, nalo lonke ulimi olukuvukelayo luyakwahlulelwa; lokhu kuyifa lezinceku zikaJehova nokulunga kwazo okuvela kimi, usho uJehova. 
23_55_1_“We nina nonke enomileyo, wozani emanzini; nani eningenamali wozani nithenge, nidle; wozani nithenge ngaphandle kwemali, yebo, iwayini nobisi, kungabizwa lutho. 
23_55_2_Niyichithelani imali kukho okungesiso isinkwa, nenzuzo yenu kukho okunganelisiyo, na? Ngilaleleni nokungilalela, nidle okuhle, umphefumulo wenu ujabule ngamanoni. 
23_55_3_Bekani izindlebe, nize kimi, nizwe, uyakuphila umphefumulo wenu; ngiyakwenza nani isivumelwano esiphakade, izenzo zomusa oqinisekileyo zikaDavide. 
23_55_4_Bheka, ngimnike abe ngufakazi kubantu, umholi nomyali kubantu. 
23_55_5_Bheka, uyakubiza izizwe ongazaziyo, nezizwe ebezingakwazi ziyakugijimela kuwe ngenxa kaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho nangenxa yoNgcwele ka-Israyeli, ngokuba ukudumisile.” 
23_55_6_Mfuneni uJehova esenokutholwa, nimbize eseseduze. 
23_55_7_Omubi makashiye indlela yakhe, nomuntu owenza okubi imicabango yakhe, abuyele kuJehova, uyakuba nomusa kuye, yebo, abuyele kuNkulunkulu wethu, ngokuba uyakwenza ukuthethelela kube kukhulu. 
23_55_8_“Ngokuba imicabango yami ayisiyo imicabango yenu, nezindlela zenu azisizo izindlela zami,” usho uJehova. 
23_55_9_“Ngokuba njengamazulu ephakeme kunomhlaba, kanjalo izindlela zami ziphakeme kunezindlela zenu, nemicabango yami kunemicabango yenu. 
23_55_10_Ngokuba njengokwehla kwemvula neqhwa ezulwini, kungabuyeli khona, kepha kuwunethisa umhlaba, kuwenze ukuba uthele, uhlume, unike ohlwanyelayo inhlwanyelo nodlayo isinkwa, 
23_55_11_liyakuba njalo izwi lami eliphuma emlonyeni wami: aliyikubuyela ze kimi, lingakafezi lokhu engikufunayo, liphumelele kulokhu engilithumele kukho. 
23_55_12_Ngokuba niyakuphuma ngokuthokoza, niholwe ngokuthula; izintaba namagquma kuyakuqhumuka ngokuhlabelela phambi kwenu, nemithi yonke yasendle iyakushaya ihlombe.
