23_55_13_Esikhundleni sogagane kuyakumila umsayipuresi, nasesikhundleni samakhakhasi kuyakumila umbomvana. Kuyakuba yigama kuJehova, nesibonakaliso esingapheliyo esingayikunqunywa.” 
23_56_1_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Gcinani ukwahlulela, nenze ukulunga, ngokuba insindiso yami iseduze ukuba ifike, nokulunga kwami ukuba kwambulwe. 
23_56_2_Ubusisiwe umuntu owenza lokhu, nendodana yomuntu ebambelela kukho, ogcina isabatha engaloni, osibamba isandla sakhe ukuba singenzi nakuphi okubi.” 
23_56_3_Indodana yowezizwe ezihlanganise noJehova mayingasho ukuthi: “Impela uJehova uyakungahlukanisa nabantu bakhe,” nomthenwa angathi: “Bheka, ngingumuthi owomileyo.” 
23_56_4_Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova ngabathenwa, uthi: “Abagcina amasabatha ami, nabakhetha engikuthandayo, nababambelela esivumelwaneni sami 
23_56_5_bona ngiyakubanika endlini yami naphakathi kwezingange zami isikhumbuzo negama elihle kunamadodana namadodakazi; ngiyakubanika igama eliphakade, elingayikunqunywa. 
23_56_6_Nabezizwe abazihlanganisa noJehova ukumkhonza uJehova nokulithanda igama likaJehova ukuba babe yizinceku zakhe bonke abaligcina isabatha, bangaloni, nababambelela esivumelwaneni sami, 
23_56_7_yebo, nabo ngiyakubayisa entabeni yami engcwele, ngibathokozise endlini yami yokukhuleka; iminikelo yabo yokushiswa nemihlatshelo yabo iyakwamukeleka e-altare lami, ngokuba indlu yami iyakubizwa ngokuthi indlu yokukhuleka phakathi kwabantu bonke.” 
23_56_8_INkosi uJehova ebutha abaxoshiweyo bakwa-Israyeli ithi: “Ngisezakubuthela kuye nabanye ngaphandle kwabase bebuthiwe.” 
23_56_9_Nonke nina zilwane zasendle, wozani nidle, nonke nina zilwane zasehlathini. 
23_56_10_Bonke abalindi bayizimpumputhe, abanakwazi; bonke bayizinja eziyizimungulu, abakwazi ukukhonkotha, balala bephupha, bathanda ukozela. 
23_56_11_Yebo, bayizinja ezihahayo, abakwazi ukusutha; yebo, laba bangabelusi abangenakuqonda, baphendukela bonke ezindleleni zabo, kube yilowo nalowo enzuzweni yakhe, bonke kanyekanye. 
23_56_12_Wozani, ngiyakuletha iwayini, sizakuzigcwalisa ngophuzo olunamandla; nengomuso liyakuba njenganamuhla, libe likhulu kakhulu. 
23_57_1_Olungileyo uyabhubha, akakho okubeka enhliziyweni; abantu abanomusa bayasuswa, kungaqondi muntu. Olungileyo uyasuswa ebubini, 
23_57_2_angene ekuthuleni; abahambe ngobuqotho bayakuphumula emibhedeni yabo. 
23_57_3_“Kepha sondelani nina madodana abahlola imihlola, inzalo yomphingi neyesifebe. 
23_57_4_Nidlala nobani, nikhamisela bani umlomo, ninyalizela bani, na? Anisibo abantwana beziphambeko, inzalo yamanga yini, 
23_57_5_nina enisha phakathi kwama-oki phansi kwayo yonke imithi eluhlaza, enibulala abantwana ezigodini phansi emifantwini yamadwala, na? 
23_57_6_Isabelo sakho siphakathi kwamatshe abushelezi asesigodini; wona yiwo angawenkatho yakho; nakuwona uthululele umnikelo wokuphuzwa, wenza umnikelo wempuphu. Ngiyakwaneliswa ngalokhu na? 
23_57_7_Entabeni ende nephakemeyo uwubekile umbhede wakho; futhi wakhuphukela khona ukunikela ngomhlatshelo. 
23_57_8_Wabeka isithombe sakho emva kwezicabha nezinsika, wazambulela omunye kunami, wakhwela embhedeni, wawandisa, wavumelana nabo, wayithanda imibhede yabo, wazibonelela indawo. 
23_57_9_Waya kuMoloki uphethe amafutha, wawandisa amakha akho; wathumela kude izithunywa zakho, wazehlisela nasendaweni yabafileyo. 
23_57_10_Wakhathala ngobude bendlela, kepha awushongo ukuthi: ‘Kuyize.’ Wathola amandla aneleyo, ngalokho awuphelanga amandla. 
23_57_11_“Washaywa luvalo ngobani, wamesaba, waze waqamba amanga, awangikhumbula, futhi ungakubekanga enhliziyweni yakho, na? Angithi njengokuba ngithulile kwasendulo, awungesabi, na? 
23_57_12_Mina ngiyakumemezela ukulunga kwakho nemisebenzi yakho; kepha akuyikukusiza. 
23_57_13_Ekukhaleni kwakho izixuku zezithombe zakho mazikophule, kepha umoya uzakuzisusa zonke, ukuphefumula kuzithathe; kodwa othemba kimi uzakudla ifa lezwe, adle nefa lentaba yami engcwele.” 
23_57_14_Kuyakuthiwa: “Hlelani, hlelani, nilungise indlela, nisisuse isikhubekiso endleleni yabantu bami.” 
23_57_15_Ngokuba usho kanje ophakamileyo nophezulu, ohlala kuze kube phakade, ogama lakhe lingoNgcwele, uthi: “Ngihlala endaweni ephakemeyo nengcwele, kepha nakuye onomoya ochotshoziweyo nothobekileyo, ukuvuselela umoya wabathobekileyo nokuphilisa izinhliziyo zabachotshoziweyo. 
23_57_16_Ngokuba angiyikulwa kuze kube phakade, angiyikuthukuthela njalonjalo, ngokuba umoya ubuyakuphela phambi kwami, leyo miphefumulo engiyenzileyo. 
23_57_17_Ngenxa yobubi bokuhaha kwakhe ngathukuthela, ngamshaya, ngazisitheza ngisathukuthele, kepha waqhubeka wahlubuka ngendlela yenhliziyo yakhe. 
23_57_18_Ngizibonile izindlela zakhe, ngiyakumphilisa; ngiyakumhola, ngimduduze yena nabamlilelayo, 
23_57_19_ngidala izithelo zezindebe zomlomo ngokuthi: Ukuthula, ukuthula kuye okude nakuye oseduze,” usho uJehova; “ngiyakumphilisa.” 
23_57_20_Ababi banjengolwandle olunyakazisiweyo, ngokuba alunakuphumula, namanzi alo akhipha udaka nobishi. 
23_57_21_“Akukho ukuthula kwababi,” usho uNkulunkulu wami. 
23_58_1_“Memeza ngezwi elikhulu, ungazibambi, uliphakamise izwi njengecilongo, utshele abantu bami iziphambeko zabo, indlu kaJakobe izono zayo. 
23_58_2_Nokho bangifuna izinsuku zonke, bathanda ukwazi izindlela zami; njengesizwe esenza ukulunga, singashiyi ukwahlulela kukaNkulunkulu waso, babuza kimi izahlulelo zokulunga, bathanda ukusondela kuNkulunkulu. 
23_58_3_Bathi: ‘Sizileleni ukudla, ungaboni, na?’ ‘Sizihlupheleni izinhliziyo zethu, ungakwazi, na?’ “Bhekani, ngosuku lokuzila kwenu niyaqhuba umsebenzi, nicindezele zonke izisebenzi zenu. 
23_58_4_Bhekani, nizilela ukulwa nokuphikisana nokushaya ngenqindi yobubi. Anisazili namuhla ukuze nilizwakalise izwi lenu phezulu. 
23_58_5_Yikhona lokhu kuzila engikukhethileyo yini nosuku lokuba umuntu awuhluphe umphefumulo wakhe; ukuthi umuntu ugoba ikhanda lakhe njengomhlanga, endlale indwangu yamasaka nomlotha phansi kwakhe, na? Lokhu kambe ungakubiza ngokuthi ukuzila nosuku olwamukelekayo kuJehova na? 
23_58_6_“Akusikho lokhu kuzila engikukhethileyo yini: ukuthukulula izibopho zobubi nokuxegisa imichilo yejoka; ukukhulula abacindezelwayo nokwaphula onke amajoka na? 
23_58_7_Akusikho ukwabela abalambileyo isinkwa sakho, nokuyisa abampofu nemihambima ekhaya lakho, nokwembesa ohamba ze, lapho umbonayo, nokungazisithezi kwaba yinyama yakho, na? 
23_58_8_Khona ukukhanya kwakho kuyakuqhamuka njengokusa, nokuphuluka kwakho kuyakuvela masinyane, ukulunga kwakho kuhambe phambi kwakho, inkazimulo kaJehova ibe semva kwakho. 
23_58_9_Khona wena uyakubiza, kusabele uJehova; uyakukhala, abesethi: Bheka, ngilapha. “Uma ususa phakathi kwakho ijoka, nokukhomba ngomunwe, nokukhuluma okubi, 
23_58_10_umnike olambileyo isinkwa sakho, usuthise othotshisiweyo, khona ukukhanya kwakho kuyakuphuma ebumnyameni, ukuhlwa kwakho kube njengemini. 
23_58_11_UJehova uyakukuhola njalo, asuthise umphefumulo wakho ezindaweni ezomileyo, aqinise amathambo akho; uyakuba njengensimu eniselweyo nanjengomthombo wamanzi, omanzi awo angaphuthi. 
23_58_12_Abavela kuwe bayakwakha izincithakalo ezindala, ubuye wakhe izisekelo zezizukulwane ezidlulileyo, ubizwe ngokuthi uMvalisikhala noMlungisi wemikhondo ukuba kuhlalwe khona. 
23_58_13_“Uma ulubuyisa unyawo lwakho kulo isabatha, ukuze ungenzi umsebenzi wakho ngosuku lwami olungcwele, ulibize isabatha ngokuthi intokozo, nolungcwele lukaJehova ngokuthi lunodumo, uludumise, ungahambi ngezindlela zakho, ungawuqhubi umsebenzi wakho, ukhulume ize, 
23_58_14_khona uyakuzijabulisa kuJehova, ngikukhweze ezindaweni eziphakemeyo zomhlaba, ngikuphe ukuba ulidle ifa likaJakobe uyihlo,” ngokuba umlomo kaJehova ukukhulumile. 
23_59_1_Bheka, isandla sikaJehova asifinyeziwe ukuba singasindisi, nendlebe yakhe ayinzima ukuba ingezwa. 
23_59_2_Kepha ububi benu bunahlukanisile noNkulunkulu, nezono zenu zibusithile ubuso bakhe kini ukuba angezwa.. 
23_59_3_Ngokuba izandla zenu zingcolile igazi, neminwe yenu ububi; izindebe zenu zomlomo zikhuluma amanga, nezilimi zenu zinyenyeza okubi. 
23_59_4_Akakho omemeza ngokulunga, akakho owahlulela ngeqiniso; bethemba kokuyize, bakhuluma amanga; bakhulelwe yingozi, bazala ububi. 
23_59_5_Bachamisela amaqanda ebululu, baluka ubulembu bolwembu; odlayo amaqanda abo uyafa, okuchotshozwayo kuqhamuka kuyibululu. 
23_59_6_Ubulembu babo abuyikuba yizingubo, futhi abanakuzimboza ngemisebenzi yabo; isenzo sendluzula sisezandleni zabo. 
23_59_7_Izinyawo zabo zigijimela ebubini, bashesha ukuchitha igazi elingenacala; imicabango yabo iyimicabango yobubi; incithakalo nokubhujiswa kusezindleleni zabo. 
23_59_8_Indlela yokuthula abayazi, nokwahlulela akukho emikhondweni yabo; bazenzele izindlela eziyisigwegwe, bonke abahamba ngazo abazi ukuthula. 
23_59_9_Ngalokho ukwahlulela kukude nathi, nokulunga akusifumani; sihlalela ukukhanya, kepha bheka, ubumnyama; silindela imini, kepha sihamba ekuhlweni. 
23_59_10_Siphuthaza udonga njengempumputhe, yebo, siphumputha njengabangenamehlo; sikhubeka emini njengasekuhweleleni; phakathi kwabaphilayo sinjengabafileyo. 
23_59_11_Siyagwavuma sonke njengamabhere, siyalilisela nokulilisela njengamajuba; silindela ukwahlulela, kepha akukho, nokusindiswa, kepha kukude nathi. 
23_59_12_Ngokuba iziphambeko zethu zandile phambi kwakho, nezono zethu ziyafakaza ngathi; ngokuba iziphambeko zethu zikithi, nokona kwethu siyakwazi: 
23_59_13_ukuphambuka nokumphika uJehova, nokumhlubuka uNkulunkulu wethu, nokukhuluma ukucindezela nokwambuka, nokucabanga nokukhuluma amazwi amanga aphuma enhliziyweni. 
23_59_14_Ukwahlulela kubuyiselwa emuva, nokulunga kumi kude, ngokuba iqiniso liyakhubeka esigcawini, nobuqotho abunakungena. 
23_59_15_Iqiniso lisilele; osuka ebubini uzenza impango; uJehova wakubona lokho, kwaba kubi emehlweni akhe ukuthi ukwahlulela akukho. 
23_59_16_Wabona ukuthi akukho muntu, wamangala ukuthi wayengekho omelayo; yayisimsindisa ingalo yakhe, nokulunga kwakhe kwamphasa. 
23_59_17_Wafaka ukulunga njengebhantshi lensimbi, nesigqoko sensindiso ekhanda lakhe; wagqoka izingubo zokuphindisela zaba ngezokwembatha, wazembesa ukushisekela njengengubo. 
23_59_18_Njengokwenza kwabo, kanjalo uyakubaphindisela: ukufutheka kuzo izitha zakhe, nokwenza kwabo kwabamelene naye, abuyisele eziqhingini izenzo zazo. 
23_59_19_Bayakulesaba igama likaJehova entshonalanga, nenkazimulo yakhe empumalanga, ngokuba uyakufika njengomfula okhahlamezayo, oqhutshwa ngumoya kaJehova. 
23_59_20_“Kepha uyakufika eSiyoni engumhlengi, nakulabo abakwaJakobe ababuya eziphambekweni,” usho uJehova. 
23_59_21_“Mina-ke, lokhu kuyisivumelwano sami nabo,” usho uJehova, “sokuthi umoya wami ophezu kwakho namazwi ami engiwabeke emlonyeni wakho akuyikusuka emlonyeni wakho, nasemlonyeni wenzalo yakho, nasemlonyeni wenzalo yenzalo yakho,” usho uJehova, “kusukela manje kuze kube phakade.” 
23_60_1_“Vuka ukhanye, ngokuba ukukhanya kwakho kuyeza; inkazimulo kaJehova iphumela phezu kwakho. 
23_60_2_Ngokuba bheka, ubumnyama buyasibekela umhlaba, nesigayegaye abantu; kepha uJehova uyaphuma phezu kwakho, nenkazimulo yakhe iyakubonakala phezu kwakho. 
23_60_3_Izizwe ziyakuhamba ekukhanyeni kwakho, namakhosi ekukhazimuleni kokuphuma kwakho. 
23_60_4_“Phakamisa amehlo akho nxazonke, ubone; babuthana bonke, beza kuwe; amadodana akho ayakuvela kude, namadodakazi akho ayakuphathwa ngezingalo. 
23_60_5_Khona uyakubona, ukhazimule; inhliziyo yakho iyakugquma, yanuleke, ngokuba ingcebo yolwandle iyakuphendulelwa kuwe, nemfuyo yezizwe iyakuza kuwe. 
23_60_6_Ubuningi bamakamela buyakukusibekela, amakamela amasha akwaMidiyani nase-Efa; bonke abaseSheba bayakuza, balethe igolide nenhlaka, bamemezele izindumiso zikaJehova. 
23_60_7_Yonke imihlambi yaseKedari iyakubuthelwa kuwe, nezinqama zakwaNebayoti ziyakukukhonza, zikhuphukele e-altare lami ngokuthanda kwami, ngiyidumise indlu yodumo lwami. 
23_60_8_“Ngobani laba abandiza njengefu, nanjengamajuba aya ezidlekeni zawo, na? 
23_60_9_Iziqhingi ziyangihlalela, imikhumbi yaseTharishishi kuqala, ukuletha amadodana akho evela kude, enesiliva negolide lawo kulo igama likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakho nakoNgcwele ka-Israyeli, ngokuba uyakudumisa. 
23_60_10_“Abezizwe bayakuzakha izingange zakho, amakhosi abo akukhonze; noma ngakushaya ngentukuthelo yami, sengiyakuhawukela ngomusa wami. 
23_60_11_Amasango akho ayakuvuleka njalo, awayikuvalwa imini nobusuku, ukuze imfuyo yezizwe ilethwe kuwe, amakhosi azo eqhutshwa eboshiwe. 
23_60_12_Ngokuba isizwe nombuso ongakukhonzi uyakuphela; yebo, lezo zizwe ziyakuqedwa impela. 
23_60_13_“Inkazimulo yaseLebanoni iyakuza kuwe, umsayipuresi, nomthidari, nomkhoba kanyekanye, ukuyihlobisa indawo yendlu yami engcwele, ngiyikhazimulise indawo yezinyawo zami. 
23_60_14_Amadodana abakucindezelayo ayakufika kuwe efolile, nabo bonke abakudelelayo bayakukhothama ngasematheni ezinyawo zakho, bakubize ngokuthi uMuzi kaJehova neSiyoni loNgcwele ka-Israyeli. 
23_60_15_“Esikhundleni sokuba ushiywe, uzondwe, kungabe kusabakho muntu odabulayo, ngiyakwenza isivunulo esiphakade nentokozo yezizukulwane ngezizukulwane. 
23_60_16_Uyakuncela ubisi lwezizwe, uncele namabele amakhosi; uyakwazi ukuthi mina Jehova nginguMsindisi wakho, noMhlengi wakho, uMninimandla kaJakobe. 
23_60_17_Esikhundleni sethusi ngiyakuletha igolide, nasesikhundleni sensimbi ngiyakuletha isiliva; esikhundleni somuthi ithusi, nasesikhundleni samatshe insimbi, ngibeke ukuthula kube ngababonisi bakho, nokulunga kube ngababusi bakho. 
23_60_18_Indluzula ayisayikuzwakala ezweni lakho, nencithakalo nokubhubhisa phakathi kwemikhawulo yakho, kepha uyakubiza izingange zakho ngokuthi iNsindiso, namasango akho ngokuthi iNdumiso. 
23_60_19_Ilanga alisayikuba ngukukhanya kuwe emini, nenyanga ayisayikukukhanyisela ngokukhazimula ebusuku; uJehova uyakuba ngukukhanya okuphakade kuwe, uNkulunkulu wakho abe ludumo lwakho. 
23_60_20_Ilanga lakho alisayikushona, nenyanga yakho ayisayikuncipha, ngokuba uJehova uyakuba ngukukhanya okuphakade kuwe, nezinsuku zokulila kwakho ziyakuphela. 
23_60_21_Abantu bakho bayakuba ngabalungileyo bonke, badle ifa lezwe kuze kube phakade, igatsha lokutshala kwami, umsebenzi wezandla zami, ukuba ngidunyiswe. 
23_60_22_Omncane uyakuba yinkulungwane, ophansi abe yisizwe esinamandla; mina nginguJehova, ngiyakukusheshisa ngesikhathi sakho.” 
23_61_1_UMoya weNkosi uJehova uphezu kwami, ngokuba uJehova ungigcobile ukuba ngishumayele izindaba ezinhle kwabathotshisiweyo; ungithumele ukubopha abanhliziyo ezaphukileyo, nokumemezela ukukhululwa kwabathunjwa nokuvulelwa kweziboshwa itilongo, 
23_61_2_ngimemezele umnyaka womusa kaJehova nosuku lokuphindisela lukaNkulunkulu wethu, ngiduduze bonke abalilayo, 
23_61_3_ngenze ukuba abalilayo eSiyoni baphiwe amaqhele esikhundleni somlotha, amafutha enjabulo esikhundleni sokulila, ingubo yokudumisa esikhundleni somoya odangeleyo, ukuze babizwe ngokuthi imithi yokulunga nokutshaliwe nguJehova ukuba adunyiswe. 
23_61_4_Bayakwakha izincithakalo ezindala, bavuse izindawo ezichithekileyo zakuqala, balungise imizi ebhujisiweyo, izindawo eziyihlane izizukulwane ngezizukulwane. 
23_61_5_Abezizwe bayakumela ukwalusa imihlambi yenu, abafokazi babe ngabalimi benu nabaphathi bezivini zenu. 
23_61_6_Kepha nina niyakuthiwa abapristi bakaJehova, niyakubizwa ngokuthi izikhonzi zikaNkulunkulu wethu; niyakudla imfuyo yezizwe, nizibonge ngodumo lwazo. 
23_61_7_Esikhundleni sehlazo lenu niyakuphiwa ngokuphindweyo; abadumeleyo, ukujabula kuyakuba yisabelo sabo; ngalokho ezweni lakubo bayakudla ifa ngokuphindiweyo, intokozo engapheliyo ibe ngeyabo. 
23_61_8_“Ngokuba mina Jehova ngithanda ukulunga, ngizonda ukuphanga kanye nokubi; ngiyakubanika umvuzo wabo ngeqiniso, ngenze isivumelwano esiphakade nabo. 
23_61_9_Inzalo yabo iyakwaziwa phakathi kwezizwe, nabantwana babo phakathi kwabantu; bonke abababonayo bayakubavuma ukuthi bayinzalo uJehova ayibusisile.” 
23_61_10_Ngiyathokoza nokuthokoza ngoJehova, umphefumulo wami wenama ngoNkulunkulu wami, ngokuba ungembathisile izingubo zensindiso, wangisibekela ngesambatho sokulunga, njengomyeni efaka iqhele ngokompristi, nanjengomakoti ezihlobisa ngezimvunulo zakhe. 
23_61_11_Ngokuba njengokuba umhlaba uveza ihlumela lawo, nanjengensimu ehlumisa okutshalwe kuyo, kanjalo iNkosi uJehova iyakuveza ukulunga nodumo phambi kwezizwe zonke. 
23_62_1_Ngenxa yeSiyoni angiyikuthula, nangenxa yeJerusalema angiyikuphumula, ukulunga kwalo kungakaphumi njengokukhanya nokusindiswa kwalo njengesibani esivuthayo. 
23_62_2_Izizwe ziyakubona ukulunga kwakho, namakhosi onke inkazimulo yakho; uyakubizwa ngegama elisha eliyakunqunywa ngumlomo kaJehova. 
23_62_3_Uyakuba ngumqhele wodumo esandleni sikaJehova, neqhele lobukhosi esandleni sikaNkulunkulu wakho. 
23_62_4_Awusayikuthiwa Oshiyiweyo, nezwe lakini alisayikuthiwa iNcithakalo, kepha uyakubizwa ngokuthi Ontokozo yami ikuye, nezwe lakini ngokuthi Oganileyo, ngokuba uJehova uyathokoza ngawe, nezwe lakini lendile. 
23_62_5_Ngokuba njengensizwa iganwa yintombi, kanjalo amadodana akho ayakuganwa nguwe; nanjengokuthokoza komyeni ngomakoti wakhe uNkulunkulu wakho uyakuthokoza ngawe. 
23_62_6_Ngimisile abalindi phezu kwezingange zakho, Jerusalema; abayikuthula nakanye imini nobusuku; nina eningabakhumbuzi ngoJehova maningaphumuli, 
23_62_7_futhi ningamniki ukuphumula, aze akhe iJerusalema, alibeke libe yindumiso emhlabeni. 
23_62_8_UJehova ufungile ngesandla sakhe sokunene nangengalo yamandla akhe, wathi: “Impela angisayikuzinika izitha zakho amabele akho abe ngukudla kwazo; abezizwe abayikuliphuza iwayini lakho olikhandlekeleyo, 
23_62_9_kodwa abawaqoqileyo bayakuwadla, bamdumise uJehova, nabaliqoqileyo bayakuliphuza emagcekeni endlu yami engcwele.” 
23_62_10_Phumani, niphume ngamasango, niyilungise indlela yabantu; hlelani, niwuhlele umendo, niwakhiphe amatshe; niphakamisele izizwe ibhanela. 
23_62_11_Bhekani, uJehova uyezwakala kuze kube sekugcineni komhlaba, ethi: “Yishoni kuyo indodakazi yaseSiyoni ukuthi: ‘Bheka, insindiso yakho iyeza. Bheka, umvuzo wakhe unawo, nenkokhelo yakhe iphambi kobuso bakhe.’ ” 
23_62_12_Bayakubizwa ngokuthi abantu abangcwele, abahlengiweyo bakaJehova; wena uyakuthiwa Ofuniweyo, uMuzi Ongashiyiwe. 
23_63_1_Ngubani lona ovela kwa-Edomi enezingubo ezibomvu zakwaBosira, lona ohlobile ngezambatho zakhe ehamba ngobukhulu bamandla akhe, na? “Yimi engikhuluma ngokulunga nenginamandla okusindisa.” 
23_63_2_Kungani ukuba izambatho zakho zibomvu, nezingubo zakho zinjengezonyathela esikhamweni sewayini, na? 
23_63_3_“Isikhamo sewayini ngisinyathele ngingedwa; kwakungekho nami noyedwa kubantu; ngabanyathela ngentukuthelo yami, ngabaciphiza ngokufutheka kwami, negazi labo lasaphazeka ezingutsheni zami, ngazingcolisa zonke izambatho zami. 
23_63_4_Ngokuba usuku lokuphindisela lwalusenhliziyweni yami; umnyaka wokuhlenga kwami usufikile. 
23_63_5_Ngabheka, kepha kwakungekho osizayo; ngamangala, kepha kwakungekho osekelayo; yayisingisindisa ingalo yami, nokufutheka kwami kwangisekela. 
23_63_6_Ngase nginyathela abantu ngentukuthelo yami, ngabachoboza ngokufutheka kwami, ngathululela phansi igazi labo.” 
23_63_7_Ngiyakubonga umusa kaJehova, ngimdumise uJehova ngakho konke uJehova asenzele khona, nokuhle okuningi phezu kwendlu ka-Israyeli ayisebenzele khona ngobubele bakhe nangobuningi bomusa wakhe. 
23_63_8_Wathi: “Nempela bangabantu bami, abantwana abangakhohlisi,” waba ngumsindisi wabo. 
23_63_9_Ezinhluphekweni zabo zonke wahlupheka naye, ingelosi yobuso bakhe yabasindisa; ngothando lwakhe nangokuhawukela kwakhe wabahlenga, wabanqukula, wabathwala zonke izinsuku zakuqala. 
23_63_10_Kepha bahlubuka, badabukisa uMoya wakhe oNgcwele, waphenduka isitha sabo, walwa nabo. 
23_63_11_Abantu bakhe base bekhumbula izinsuku zakuqala zikaMose, bathi: Uphi yena owabakhipha elwandle kanye nabelusi bomhlambi wakhe, na? Uphi yena owabeka uMoya wakhe oNgcwele phakathi kwabo, 
23_63_12_owenza ukuba ingalo yakhe emangalisayo ihambe ngakwesokunene sikaMose, owahlukanisa amanzi phambi kwabo ukuba azenzele igama eliphakade; 
23_63_13_owabadabulisa elwandle njengehhashi ehlane, ukuze bangakhubeki, na? 
23_63_14_Njengezinkomo ezehlela esigodini uMoya kaJehova wabaphumuza. Wahola kanjalo abantu bakho ukuba uzenzele igama elimangalisayo. 
23_63_15_Bheka usezulwini, ubone usendaweni yobukhosi bakho neyodumo lwakho: kuphi ukushisekela kwakho nemisebenzi yakho yamandla na? Ukuvutha kwesihe sakho nobumnene bakho kugodliwe kimi. 
23_63_16_Ngokuba wena unguBaba; ngokuba u-Abrahama akasazi, no-Israyeli akasivumi. Wena Jehova unguBaba; igama lakho linguMhlengi wethu waphakade. 
23_63_17_Jehova, usidukiselani ezindleleni zakho, uzenze lukhuni izinhliziyo zethu zingakwesabi, na? Buya ngenxa yezinceku zakho, izizwe zefa lakho. 
23_63_18_Abantu bakho abangcwele balidla ifa isikhashana nje; izitha zethu zinyathele phansi indlu yakho engcwele. 
23_63_19_Sinjengalabo ongazange ubuse phezu kwabo, nabangabizwanga ngegama lakho. 
23_64_1_Sengathi ungadabula amazulu, wehle, zizamazame izintaba phambi kwakho 
23_64_2_njengokuphenjwa komlilo ezinsabeni, nalapho umlilo ubilisa amanzi, ukuze wazise izitha zakho igama lakho, izizwe zithuthumele phambi kwakho. 
23_64_3_Ekwenzeni kwakho okwesabekayo esingakubhekanga wehla; izintaba zathuthumela phambi kwakho. 
23_64_4_Kusukela endulo abantu abezwanga, abacoshanga nangendlebe, futhi iso alibonanga uNkulunkulu ngaphandle kwakho osebenzela omhlalelayo. 
23_64_5_Wahlangabeza labo ababethokoza ngokwenza ukulunga, labo abakukhumbulayo ezindleleni zakho. Wena wathukuthela, thina sona; sahlala kukho nasendulo; siyakusindiswa na? 
23_64_6_Sonke saba njengongcolileyo, nokulunga kwethu konke kwakunjengengubo enindiweyo; sabuna sonke njengeqabunga, nobubi bethu basisusa njengomoya. 
23_64_7_Kwakungekho owalibiza igama lakho, owazivusela ukubambelela kuwe, ngokuba wabusitheza ubuso bakho kithi, wasiqeda ngenxa yobubi bethu. 
23_64_8_Kepha manje, Jehova, unguBaba; thina siyibumba, wena ungumbumbi wethu, singumsebenzi wesandla sakho sonke. 
23_64_9_Ungathukutheli kakhulu, Jehova, ungakhumbuli njalo ububi. Bheka, mawubone ukuthi sonke singabantu bakho. 
23_64_10_Imizi yakho engcwele iphendukile ihlane; iSiyoni liphendukile ihlane, neJerusalema liyincithakalo. 
23_64_11_Indlu yethu engcwele nemangalisayo, lapho obaba babekudumisa khona, ishisiwe ngomlilo, nazo zonke izindawo zethu ezithandekayo ziphendukile izincithakalo. 
23_64_12_Ungazibamba kukho konke lokhu, Jehova? Ungathula, uze usihluphe kangaka, na? 
23_65_1_“Ngafunwa ngabangangicelanga, ngafunyanwa ngabangangifunanga, ngathi: ‘Ngibhekeni, ngibhekeni,’ kuso isizwe esingabizwanga ngegama lami. 
23_65_2_Ngizelulile izandla zami usuku lonke kubantu abahlubukayo, abahamba ngendlela engenhle nangokwemicabango yabo, 
23_65_3_abantu abangithukuthelisa ebusweni bami njalo, behlabela ezivandeni, beshisa impepho phezu kwezitini, 
23_65_4_abahlala emathuneni, balale ezindaweni ezisithekileyo, badle inyama yezingulube, benomhluzi wezinto ezinengekayo ezitsheni zabo, 
23_65_5_abathi: ‘Hlehla, ungasondeli kimi, ngokuba ngingcwele kuwe;’ banjengomusi emakhaleni ami, umlilo ovutha usuku lonke. 
23_65_6_“Bheka, kulotshiwe phambi kwami ukuthi: Angiyikuthula, ngiyakuphindisela, yebo, ngiphindisele ezifubeni zabo 
23_65_7_ububi babo nobubi bawoyise kanyekanye,” usho uJehova, “abashisa impepho ezintabeni, bangihlambalaza emagqumeni; ngiyakulinganisa kuqala umvuzo wabo ezifubeni zabo.” 
23_65_8_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Njengalokhu iwayini litholwa ehlukuzweni, bese kuthiwa: ‘Malingachithwa, ngokuba isibusiso sikulo,’ kanjalo ngiyakwenza ngenxa yenceku yami: angiyikubabulala bonke. 
23_65_9_Ngiyakuveza inzalo kuJakobe, nendlalifa yezintaba zami kuJuda; abakhethiweyo bami bayakulidla, nezinceku zami ziyakwakha khona. 
23_65_10_ISharoni liyakuba yisibaya sezimvu, nesiGodi sase-Akori indawo yokubuthisa kwezinkomo kubantu bami abangifunayo. 
23_65_11_“Kepha nina enimshiya uJehova, nikhohlwe intaba yami engcwele, nihlelele iNhlanhla itafula, nigcwalisele isiMiselo iwayini elixutshanisiweyo, 
23_65_12_ngiyakuninqumela inkemba, nikhothamele nonke ukuhlatshwa, ngokuba lapho nganibiza, aniphendulanga, nalapho ngakhuluma, anizwanga, kepha nenza okubi emehlweni ami, nakhetha lokhu engingathokozanga ngakho.” 
23_65_13_Ngalokho isho kanje iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ithi: “Bhekani, izinceku zami ziyakudla, kepha nina niyakulamba; bhekani, izinceku zami ziyakuphuza, kepha nina niyakoma; bhekani, izinceku zami ziyakuthokoza, kepha nina niyakujabha; 
23_65_14_bhekani, izinceku zami ziyakujabula ngokwenama kwenhliziyo, kepha nina niyakuklewula ngokwaphuka komoya, nikhale ngobuhlungu benhliziyo. 
23_65_15_Niyakulishiya igama lenu libe yisiqalekiso kwabakhethiweyo bami, iNkosi uJehova inibulale, izibize izinceku zayo ngelinye igama, 
23_65_16_ukuze kuthi ozibusisa emhlabeni azibusise kuNkulunkulu weqiniso, nofunga emhlabeni, afunge uNkulunkulu weqiniso, ngokuba izinhlupheko zakuqala zikhohlakele nangokuba zisithele emehlweni ami.” 
23_65_17_“Ngokuba bheka, ngiyadala izulu elisha nomhlaba omusha; izinto zakuqala aziyikukhunjulwa, zingene enhliziyweni. 
23_65_18_Kepha jabulani, nethabe kuze kube phakade ngengikudalayo, ngokuba bheka, ngilidala iJerusalema libe ngukwethaba, nabantu balo babe yinjabulo. 
23_65_19_Ngiyakwethaba ngeJerusalema, ngijabule ngabantu bami, kungabe kusezwakala izwi lokulila nezwi lokukhala. 
23_65_20_“Kusukela lapho akusayikuba khona ingane yezinsuku nje nexhegu elingazigcwalisanga izinsuku zalo, ngokuba omusha uyakufa eneminyaka eyikhulu yobudala, isoni siqalekiswe sineminyaka eyikhulu. 
23_65_21_Bayakwakha izindlu, bahlale kuzo; bayakutshala izivini, badle izithelo zazo. 
23_65_22_Abayikwakha, kuhlale omunye; abayikutshala, kudle omunye, ngokuba izinsuku zabantu bami ziyakuba njengezinsuku zomuthi, nomsebenzi wezandla zabakhethiweyo bami uyakugugela kubo. 
23_65_23_Abayikushikashikela ize, bazalele izinhlupheko, ngokuba bayinzalo yababusisiweyo bakaJehova, nabantwana babo bayakuba nabo. 
23_65_24_Kuyakuthi bengakangibizi, mina ngiphendule; besakhuluma, mina ngiyakuzwa. 
23_65_25_Impisi iyakudla ndawonye newundlu, ingonyama idle utshani njengenkomo, uthuli lube ngukudla kwenyoka; aziyikulimaza, zingachithi kuyo yonke intaba yami engcwele,” usho uJehova. 
23_66_1_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Izulu liyisihlalo sami sobukhosi, umhlaba uyisenabelo sezinyawo zami; iphi leyo ndlu ebeniyakungakhela yona, iphi indawo yami yokuphumula, na? 
23_66_2_Zonke lezi zinto zenziwe yisandla sami, kwavela kanjalo konke lokhu,” usho uJehova. “Kepha yilowo engiyakubheka kuye: ohluphekayo nonomoya ochobozekileyo, othuthumela ngezwi lami. 
23_66_3_Ohlaba inkunzi ebulala nomuntu, nohlaba iwundlu eyaphula nentamo yenja, nonikela ngomnikelo wempuphu, kepha enikela nangegazi lezingulube, noshisa inhlaka, ebonga nesithombe, yebo, laba bakhethile izindlela zabo, nemiphefumulo yabo iyathokoza ngezinengiso zabo. 
23_66_4_Ngalokho ngiyakubakhethela izinhlupho, ngibehlisele abakwesabayo, ngokuba ekubizeni kwami kwakungekho ophendulayo, nasekukhulumeni kwami abezwanga, kepha benza okubi emehlweni ami, bakhetha lokhu engingathokozanga ngakho.” 
23_66_5_Yizwani izwi likaJehova nina enithuthumela ngezwi lakhe. “Abafowenu abanizondayo, abanixosha ngenxa yegama lami, bashilo bathi: ‘Makazidumise uJehova ukuba sibone intokozo yenu,’ kepha bona bayakujabha. 
23_66_6_Yizwi lomsindo elivela emzini, yizwi lasethempelini! Yizwi likaJehova ephindisela izenzo zezitha zakhe. 
23_66_7_“ISiyoni lingakabi namihelo lazala; lingakehlelwa ngubuhlungu labeletha umntwana wesilisa. 
23_66_8_Ngubani ozwile okunjalo na? Ngubani obonile okunjengalokhu na? Izwe lingazalwa ngosuku olulodwa na? Isizwe singabelethwa kanyekanye na? Ngokuba iSiyoni lithe lisenemihelo, lazala abantwana balo. 
23_66_9_Mina ngiyakusondeza ekuzalweni ngingazalisi na?” usho uJehova. “Mina engingozalisayo bengiyakuvala na?” usho uNkulunkulu wakho. 
23_66_10_“Thokozani kanye neJerusalema, nilethabele nina nonke enilithandayo; jabulani ngenjabulo kanye nalo nina nonke enilililelayo, 
23_66_11_ukuze nincele, naneliswe ngamabele ezinduduzo zalo, nenyiselwe, nename ngokugcwala kwenkazimulo yalo.” 
23_66_12_Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Bheka, ngiyakwelulela kulo ukuthula njengomfula, nenkazimulo yezizwe njengomfudlana okhukhulayo, nincele, niphathwe ngezingalo zalo, niwothwe nisemathangeni. 
23_66_13_Njengoduduzwa ngunina, kanjalo ngiyakuniduduza nina, niduduzeke eJerusalema.” 
23_66_14_Niyakukubona, izinhliziyo zenu zijabule, amathambo enu ahlume njengohlaza; isandla sikaJehova siyakwaziwa ukuthi sisezincekwini zakhe, athukuthelele izitha zakhe. 
23_66_15_Ngokuba bheka, uJehova uyakufika ngomlilo, izinqola zakhe zibe njengesivunguvungu, ukubuyisela intukuthelo yakhe ngokufutheka nokukhuza kwakhe ngamalangabi omlilo. 
23_66_16_Ngokuba uJehova uyakwahlulela inyama yonke ngomlilo nangenkemba; ababulawayo nguJehova bayakuba baningi. 
23_66_17_“Abazingcwelisa, bazihlambululele ukungena ezivandeni belandela omiyo egcekeni, bedla inyama yezingulube, nezinengiso, nezimpuku, bayakuphela kanyekanye,” usho uJehova. 
23_66_18_“Ngiyazi imisebenzi yabo nemicabango yabo; ngiyeza ukubutha zonke izizwe nezilimi, zifike, zibone inkazimulo yami. 
23_66_19_“Ngiyakubeka isibonakaliso phakathi kwazo, ngithume ababalekileyo babo kwabezizwe, eTharishishi, nasePhuli, naseLudi, abagoba umnsalo, nakuThubali naseJavani, eziqhingini ezikude, ezingezwanga umbiko ngami, zingabonanga inkazimulo yami, baze balande ngenkazimulo yami ezizweni. 
23_66_20_Bayakuletha bonke abafowenu bebakhipha ezizweni zonke ngamahhashi, nangezinqola, nangezinhlaka, nangeminyuzi, nangamakamela, babe ngumnikelo kaJehova, beze entabeni yami engcwele eJerusalema,” usho uJehova, “njengalokhu abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bewuletha umnikelo wabo ngesitsha esihlambulukileyo endlini kaJehova. 
23_66_21_Nakubona ngiyakuthatha abapristi namaLevi,” usho uJehova. 
23_66_22_“Ngokuba njengokuba izulu elisha nomhlaba omusha engiyakukwenza kuyakuma phambi kwami,” usho uJehova, “kanjalo kuyakuma inzalo yakho negama lakho. 
23_66_23_Kusukela ekwethwaseni kwenyanga kuye kwenye, kusukela kwelinye isabatha kuye kwelinye yonke inyama iyakufika ukukhuleka phambi kwami,” usho uJehova. 
23_66_24_“Bayakuphuma, babone izidumbu zabantu abaphambukile kimi, ngokuba impethu yabo ayiyikufa nomlilo wabo awuyikucima, babe yisinengiso kuyo yonke inyama.” 
24_1_1_Amazwi kaJeremiya, indodana kaHilikiya, wabapristi ababe se-Anathoti ezweni lakwaBenjamini, 
24_1_2_okwafika kuye izwi likaJehova ezinsukwini zikaJosiya indodana ka-Amoni, inkosi yakwaJuda, ngomnyaka weshumi nantathu wokubusa kwakhe; 
24_1_3_lafika futhi ezinsukwini zikaJehoyakimi indodana kaJosiya, inkosi yakwaJuda, kuze kube sekupheleni komnyaka weshumi nanye kaSedekiya indodana kaJosiya, inkosi yakwaJuda, kuze kube sekuthunjweni kweJerusalema ngenyanga yesihlanu. 
24_1_4_Kwafika kimi izwi likaJehova, lathi: 
24_1_5_“Ngingakakubumbi esiswini ngakwazi; ungakaphumi esizalweni ngakungcwelisa, ngakubeka umprofethi ezizweni.” 
24_1_6_Kepha ngathi: “Awu, Nkosi Jehova! Bheka, angikwazi ukukhuluma, ngokuba ngingumntwana.” 
24_1_7_Kepha uJehova wathi kimi: “Ungasho ukuthi ungumntwana, ngokuba uyakuya kubo bonke engikuthuma kubo, nakho konke engikuyala ngakho uyakukukhuluma. 
24_1_8_Ungabesabi, ngokuba nginawe ukuba ngikophule,” usho uJehova. 
24_1_9_UJehova wayeselula isandla sakhe, wawuthinta umlomo wami; uJehova wathi kimi: “Bheka, ngibekile amazwi ami emlonyeni wakho. 
24_1_10_Bona, ngiyakubeka namuhla phezu kwezizwe naphezu kwemibuso ukusiphula nokudiliza, ukuchitha nokubhubhisa, ukwakha nokutshala.” 
24_1_11_Izwi likaJehova lafika kimi futhi, lathi: “Jeremiya, ubonani na?” Ngathi: “Ngibona igatsha lomalimondi.” 
24_1_12_Wayesethi uJehova kimi: “Ubone kahle, ngokuba ngiyakulilinda izwi lami ukuba ngilenze.” 
24_1_13_Lase lifika kimi izwi likaJehova ngokwesibili, lithi: “Ubonani na?” Ngathi: “Ngibona ikhanzi elibilayo. Ubuso balo bungasenyakatho.” 
24_1_14_Wayesethi kimi uJehova: “Okubi kuyakuqhambuka ngasenyakatho, kubehlele bonke abakhileyo bomhlaba. 
24_1_15_Ngokuba bheka, ngiyakubiza yonke imindeni yemibuso yasenyakatho,” usho uJehova. “Iyakufika, yilowo nalowo ubeke isihlalo sawo sobukhosi ezikhaleni zamasango aseJerusalema, nakuzo zonke izingange zalo nxazonke, nakuyo yonke imizi yakwaJuda. 
24_1_16_Ngiyakukhipha ukwahlulela kwami phezu kwabo ngenxa yabo bonke ububi babo, ngokuba bangihlubukile, bashisela abanye onkulunkulu impepho, bakhuleka kuyo imisebenzi yezandla zabo. 
24_1_17_“Ngalokho bopha izinkalo zakho, usuke, ukhulume kubo bonke engikuyala ngabo; ungapheli amandla ngabo, funa ngiqede amandla akho ebusweni babo. 
24_1_18_Ngokuba bheka, ngikubekile namuhla ube ngumuzi obiyelweyo, nensika yensimbi, nezingange zethusi ngakulo izwe lonke, nangawo amakhosi akwaJuda nezikhulu zalo, nangakubo abapristi balo nabantu bezwe. 
24_1_19_Bayakulwa nawe, kepha abayikukwahlula, ngokuba nginawe,” usho uJehova, “ukuba ngikophule.” 
24_2_1_Lase lifika izwi likaJehova, lithi: “Hamba umemeze ezindlebeni zeJerusalema, uthi: Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: 
24_2_2_“ ‘Ngikukhumbulela umusa wobusha bakho, nothando lwakho, usengumakoti, nokungilandela kwakho ehlane, izwe elingatshalwanga. 
24_2_3_U-Israyeli ungcwele kuJehova, ululibo lwezithelo zakhe; bonke abazidlayo bayathola icala, okubi kuyakubehlela,’ ” usho uJehova. 
24_2_4_Zwanini izwi likaJehova nina ndlu kaJakobe, nani mindeni yonke yendlu ka-Israyeli. 
24_2_5_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ububi buni oyihlo ababufumene kimi, baze badeda kude nami, balandela okuyize, baba yize, na? 
24_2_6_Abashongo ukuthi: ‘Uphi uJehova owasikhuphula ezweni laseGibithe, wasihola ehlane ezweni lezingwadule nelemigodi, ezweni elomileyo nelethunzi lokufa, ezweni elingadatshulwa muntu, nalapho kungahlali muntu khona, na?’ 
24_2_7_Nganingenisa ezweni elivundileyo ukuba nidle izithelo zalo nokuhle kwalo, kepha lapho seningenile, nalingcolisa izwe lami, nenza ifa lami laba yisinengiso. 
24_2_8_Abapristi abashongo ukuthi: ‘Uphi uJehova?’ Abaphethe umthetho babengazi, ababusi baphambuka kimi, abaprofethi baprofetha ngoBali, balandela okungenakusiza. 
24_2_9_“Ngalokho ngiyakuphikisana nani,” usho uJehova, “ngiphikisane nabantwana babantwana benu. 
24_2_10_Dlulani eziqhingini zaseKitimi, nibone, nithume eKedari, niqonde kahle, nibone uma yake yaba khona into enjengalena na? 
24_2_11_Isizwe sike senana ngawonkulunkulu abangesibo onkulunkulu na? Kepha abantu bami benanile udumo lwabo ngokungenakusiza. 
24_2_12_Mangalani ngalokho, mazulu, nithuthumele, nichitheke impela,” usho uJehova. 
24_2_13_“Ngokuba abantu bami benzile okubi okubili: bangishiyile, umthombo wamanzi aphilileyo, bazigubhele imithombo, imithombo evuzayo, amanzi angenakuhlala kuyo. 
24_2_14_U-Israyeli uyisigqila yini, uyisigqila esazalelwa ekhaya na? Waba kanjani impango na? 
24_2_15_Amabhongo ezingonyama abhongile phezu kwakhe, akhonya, alenza izwe lakhe laba yincithakalo; imizi yakhe ishisiwe, kungekho owakhe kuyo. 
24_2_16_Nabantwana baseNofi naseThahipanesi baphuca ukhakhayi lwakho. 
24_2_17_Awuzenzeli lokhu wena ngokushiya kwakho uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, lapho ekuhola endleleni, na? 
24_2_18_Manje unani endleleni eya eGibithe ukuba uphuze amanzi aseSihori, na? Unani endleleni eya e-Asiriya ukuba uwaphuze amanzi omfula na? 
24_2_19_Ububi bakho buyakukulaya, nokuhlehla kwakho kuyakukusola; yazi, ubone ukuthi kuyinto embi nebabayo yokuthi umhlubukile uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho nokuthi ukungesaba akukho kuwe,” isho iNkosi uJehova Sebawoti. 
24_2_20_“Ngokuba walaphula ijoka lakho endulo, wazigqabula izibopho zakho, wathi: ‘Angiyikukhonza.’ Ngokuba kuwo onke amagquma aphakemeyo naphansi kwayo yonke imithi eluhlaza walala njengesifebe. 
24_2_21_Mina ngakutshala ungumvini omuhle, imbewu elungileyo yodwa; pho, uphenduke kanjani waba yigatsha elonakeleyo kimi, elomvini wabezizwe, na? 
24_2_22_Ngokuba noma ugeza ngesoda, uzithathele insipho eningi, ububi bakho bulotshiwe phambi kwami,” isho iNkosi uJehova. 
24_2_23_“Ungasho kanjani ukuthi: ‘Angingcolile, angilandelanga oBali,’ na? Bheka indlela yakho esigodini, wazi ukuthi wenzeni: uyikamela lensikazi elinejubane, elizulazula ezindleleni zalo, 
24_2_24_nembongolo yasendle ejwayele ihlane, esezela umoya ngokukhanuka kwayo; ngubani ongavimbela inkanuko yayo na? Bonke abayifunayo abayikukhathala, bayakuyifumana ngenyanga yayo. 
24_2_25_Nqanda unyawo lwakho lungabi olungenasicathulo, nomphimbo wakho ukuba ungomi; kepha wathi: ‘Kuyize; cha, ngithandile abafokazi, ngiyakubalandela.’ 
24_2_26_“Njengesela linamahloni, lapho selifunyenwe, kanjalo indlu yakwa-Israyeli iyakuba namahloni, bona kanye namakhosi abo, nezikhulu zabo, nabapristi babo, nabaprofethi babo 
24_2_27_abathi emthini: ‘Ungubaba,’ nasetsheni: ‘Wena wangizala.’ Ngokuba bangifulathele, abangibheki; kepha ngesikhathi sokuhlupheka kwabo bayakusho ukuthi: ‘Vuka, usisindise.’ 
24_2_28_Baphi onkulunkulu bakho ozenzele bona na? Mabavuke, uma bengakusindisa ngesikhathi sokuhlupheka kwakho, ngokuba njengomumo wemizi yakho, banjalo onkulunkulu bakho, Juda. 
24_2_29_“Niphikisanelani nami na? Niphambukile kimi nonke,” usho uJehova. 
24_2_30_“Ngibashayele ize abantwana benu, abakwamukelanga ukulaywa; inkemba yenu ibadlile abaprofethi benu njengengonyama echithayo. 
24_2_31_“Wena sizukulwane, bheka izwi likaJehova. “Bengiyihlane ku-Israyeli, noma izwe lesigayegaye, na? Basholoni abantu bami ukuthi: ‘Sesidlubulundile, asisayikubuyela kuwe,’ na? 
24_2_32_Intombi ingakhohlwa yini izivunulo zayo, nomakoti ixhama lakhe, na? Nokho abantu bami bangikhohliwe izinsuku ezingenakubalwa. 
24_2_33_Ulungisa kahle kanjani indlela yakho ukufuna uthando! Ngalokho nabesifazane ababi ubafundisile izindlela zakho. 
24_2_34_Nasemiphethweni yakho kufunyenwe igazi labampofu abangenacala, kungabi ngukuthi ubafumene befohla. Kepha kukho konke lokhu 
24_2_35_uthi: ‘Anginacala.’ Nempela intukuthelo yakhe ibuyile kimi. Bheka, ngiyakwahlulelana nawe, ngokuba uthi: ‘Angonanga.’ 
24_2_36_Usheshelani kangaka ukuyiguqula indlela yakho na? Uyakujabha nangeGibithe, njengalokho wajabhiswa yi-Asiriya. 
24_2_37_Uyakuphuma nalapho, izandla zakho zisekhanda, ngokuba uJehova uyabalahla obethembayo, awuyikuphumelela kubo. 
24_3_1_“Kuthiwa uma indoda ilahla umkayo, abesemuka abe ngowenye indoda, isayakubuyela kuye na? Lelo zwe belingayikungcoliswa kakhulu na? Kepha wena ofebile nezithandwa eziningi ubuyela kimi,” usho uJehova. 
24_3_2_“Phakamisela amehlo akho emadulini angenalutho, ubone; kuphi lapho ongalalwanga khona na? Ngasezindleleni ubahlalele njengomArabiya ehlane, walingcolisa izwe ngobufebe nangobubi bakho. 
24_3_3_Ngalokho izihlambi zinqandiwe, nemvula yamuva ayibangakho. Nokho wawunebunzi lesifebe, wala ukuba namahloni. 
24_3_4_Awusand' ukukhala kimi ukuthi: ‘Baba, wena ungumngane wobusha bami, na? 
24_3_5_Uyakuhlala enentukuthelo njalonjalo, ayigcine kuze kube nini na?’ Bheka, ukhuluma kanjalo; uyenza okubi, uyaphumelela.” 
24_3_6_UJehova wathi kimi emihleni kaJosiya inkosi: “Ubonile okwenziwe ngu-Israyeli ohlehlayo na? Ukhuphukele kuzo zonke izintaba eziphakemeyo naphansi kwayo yonke imithi eluhlaza, wafeba khona. 
24_3_7_Ngathi uzakubuyela kimi esekwenzile konke lokhu, kodwa akabuyanga; udadewabo okhohlisayo, uJuda, wakubona. 
24_3_8_Ngabona ukuthi noma ngangimlahlile u-Israyeli ohlehlayo ngalesi sizathu sokuthi uphingile, ngamnika incwadi yesahlukaniso, udadewabo okhohlisayo, uJuda, akesabanga nokho, kepha waya wafeba naye, 
24_3_9_nangokuzwakala kokufeba kwakhe langcoliswa izwe, waphinga nemithi namatshe. 
24_3_10_Kepha kukho konke lokhu udadewabo okhohlisayo, uJuda, akabuyelanga kimi ngenhliziyo yonke, kuphela ngokuzenzisa nje,” usho uJehova. 
24_3_11_Wayesethi uJehova kimi: “U-Israyeli ohlehlayo ubonakele elungile kunoJuda okhohlisayo. 
24_3_12_Hamba umemezele lawa mazwi ngasenyakatho, uthi: “ ‘Buya wena Israyeli ohlehlayo,’ usho uJehova; ‘angiyikuninyakamela, ngokuba nginomusa,’ usho uJehova; ‘angiyakugcina intukuthelo kuze kube phakade. 
24_3_13_Yazi kuphela ububi bakho ukuthi uphambukile kuJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, wazihlakaza izindlela zakho kubo abezizwe phansi kwayo yonke imithi eluhlaza; anililalelanga izwi lami,’ ” usho uJehova. 
24_3_14_“Buyani, bantwana abahlehlayo,” usho uJehova, “ngokuba ngingumyeni wenu, nginithabathe, abe munye emzini, babe babili emndenini, nginiyise eSiyoni, 
24_3_15_ngininike abelusi ngokwenhliziyo yami, abayakunalusa ngokwazi nangokuhlakanipha. 
24_3_16_Kuyakuthi lapho nanda, nichume ezweni, ngalezo zinsuku,” usho uJehova, “bangasayikusho ukuthi: ‘Umphongolo wesivumelwano sikaJehova;’ awuyikungena enhliziyweni, abayikuwukhumbula; abayikuwuswela, akusayikwenziwa omusha. 
24_3_17_Ngalolo suku bayakulibiza iJerusalema ngokuthi isihlalo sobukhosi sikaJehova; izizwe zonke ziyakubuthana kulo, kulo igama likaJehova eJerusalema; azisayikuhamba ngenkani yezinhliziyo zazo ezimbi. 
24_3_18_Ngalezo zinsuku indlu yakwaJuda iyakuya endlini yakwa-Israyeli, ziphume kanyekanye ezweni lasenyakatho, ziye ezweni engalinika oyihlo libe yifa labo. 
24_3_19_“Mina bengithi: “ ‘Ngiyakukubeka kanjani phakathi kwabantwana, ngikuphe izwe elinxanelekayo, ifa elihle kakhulu ezizweni!’ Ngathi: Niyakungibiza ngokuthi ‘Baba’, ningabuyi ekungilandeleni. 
24_3_20_Impela njengomfazi emkhohlisa umyeni, kanjalo ningikhohlisile nina ndlu ka-Israyeli,” usho uJehova. 
24_3_21_Izwi liyezwakala emadulini angenalutho, ukukhala nokukhuleka kwabantwana bakwa-Israyeli, ngokuba bayihlanekezele indlela yabo, bakhohlwa uJehova uNkulunkulu wabo. 
24_3_22_“Buyani nina bantwana abahlehlayo, ngikuphulukise ukuhlehla kwenu.” “Bheka, sesifikile kuwe, ngokuba unguJehova uNkulunkulu wethu. 
24_3_23_Impela amagquma ayize kanye nomsindo wasezintabeni. Ngokwempela ukusindiswa kuka-Israyeli kukuJehova uNkulunkulu wethu. 
24_3_24_UBosheti uqedile umshikashika wawobaba kwasebusheni bethu, izimvu zabo, nezinkomo zabo, namadodana abo, namadodakazi abo. 
24_3_25_Masilale phansi namahloni, ihlazo lethu lisisibekele, ngokuba sonile kuJehova uNkulunkulu wethu, thina nawobaba, kusukela ebusheni bethu kuze kube namuhla, asililalelanga izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wethu.” 
24_4_1_“Uma uphenduka, Israyeli,” usho uJehova, “uyakuphendukela kimi; uma ususa ebusweni bami izinengiso zakho, awuyikuntengantenga. 
24_4_2_Uyakufunga ngeqiniso, nangokwahlulela, nangokulunga, ngokuthi: ‘Kuphila kukaJehova,’ izizwe ziyakuzibusisa kuye, zizibonge kuye.” 
24_4_3_Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova kubantu bakwaJuda nabaseJerusalema, uthi: “Qathani umqatho wenu, ningatshali phakathi kwameva. 
24_4_4_Zisokeleni kuJehova, nisuse amajwabu ezinhliziyo zenu nina bantu bakwaJuda nabakhileyo eJerusalema, funa ukufutheka kwami kuphume njengomlilo, kuvuthe, kungabikho ongakucima, ngenxa yobubi bezenzo zenu. 
24_4_5_“Khulumani kwaJuda, nizwakalise eJerusalema, nithi: ‘Bethani amacilongo ezweni,’ nimemeze nithi: ‘Buthanani, singene emizini ebiyelweyo.’ 
24_4_6_Misani ibhanela elibheka ngaseSiyoni, nibaleke ningemi, ngokuba ngiyakuletha okubi kuvele ngasenyakatho nokubhujiswa okukhulu.” 
24_4_7_Ingonyama ikhuphukile esihlahleni sayo, umchithi wezizwe uyeza; uphumile endaweni yakhe ukuba ulenze izwe lakho libe yincithakalo, ichithwe imizi yakho, kungabikho ohlala kuyo. 
24_4_8_Ngalokho bhincani izindwangu zamasaka, nikhale, nihewule, ngokuba ulaka oluvuthayo lukaJehova alubuyanga kithi. 
24_4_9_“Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova, “inhliziyo yenkosi iphele kanye nezinhliziyo zezikhulu; abapristi bayakumangala, abaprofethi bethuke.” 
24_4_10_Ngase ngithi: “Awu, Nkosi Jehova, ubakhohlisile nokubakhohlisa laba bantu neJerusalema ngokuthi: ‘Niyakuba nokuthula;’ nokho inkemba ifinyelele emphefumulweni.” 
24_4_11_Ngaleso sikhathi kuyakuthiwa kulaba bantu nakulo iJerusalema: “Ishisandlu elivela emadulini angenalutho liya endodakazini yabantu bami, lingayikubahlakaza, lingayikubahlunga. 
24_4_12_Umoya omkhulu kunokuba kwenziwe lokhu uyakuphuma kimi. Manje sengiyakukhuluma nami ukwahlulela kubo.” 
24_4_13_Bhekani, uyakhuphuka njengamafu, izinqola zakhe zinjengesivunguvungu, amahhashi akhe anejubane kunezinkozi. Maye kithina, ngokuba sichithiwe! 
24_4_14_Jerusalema, hlanza inhliziyo yakho, kuphume ububi, ukuze usindiswe. Koze kube nini imicabango yakho emibi ihlala phakathi kwakho na? 
24_4_15_Ngokuba izwi liyamemezela liphuma kwaDani; lizwakalisa okubi kuvela ezintabeni zakwa-Efrayimi. 
24_4_16_“Khumbuzani izizwe; bhekani, nizwakalise eJerusalema ukuthi kufika abavimbezeli abaphuma ezweni elikude; baliphakamisa izwi labo ngakuyo imizi yakwaJuda. 
24_4_17_Njengabalinda insimu baphezu kwalo nxazonke, ngokuba lingihlubukile,” usho uJehova. 
24_4_18_“Ukuhamba kwakho nezenzo zakho kukwenzele lokhu; lokhu kuyingozi yakho ngokuba imunyu; ifinyelele enhliziyweni yakho.” 
24_4_19_Zibilini zami, zibilini zami, nginobuhlungu enhliziyweni yami; inhliziyo yami ikhala phakathi kwami, anginakuthula, ngokuba ulizwile, mphefumulo wami, izwi lecilongo, ukuhlatshwa komkhosi wempi. 
24_4_20_Kuyamenyezelwa ukubhujiswa phezu kokubhujiswa, ngokuba izwe lonke liyachithwa. Amatende ami ayachithwa masinyane, nezilenge zami ngokuphazima kweso. 
24_4_21_Koze kube nini ngibona ibhandela, ngizwe izwi lecilongo, na? 
24_4_22_“Yebo, abantu bami bayiziwula, abangazi; bangabantwana abayiziphukuphuku, abanakuqonda; bahlakaniphele ukwenza okubi, kepha ukwenza okuhle kabakwazi.” 
24_4_23_Ngabuka umhlaba; bheka, wawuyize, wawungenalutho, nezulu lalingenakukhanya. 
24_4_24_Ngabuka izintaba; bheka, zazamazama; onke amagquma anyakaza. 
24_4_25_Ngabuka; bheka, kwakungekho muntu; izinyoni zonke zezulu zazibalekile. 
24_4_26_Ngabuka; bheka, izwe elivundileyo laliyihlane, nemizi yalo yonke yayidiliziwe ebusweni bukaJehova naphambi kolaka lwakhe oluvuthayo. 
24_4_27_Ngokuba uJehova usho kanje, uthi: “Izwe lonke liyakuba yincithakalo, kepha angiyikuliqeda ngokupheleleyo. 
24_4_28_Umhlaba uyakhala ngalokhu, izulu phezulu limnyama, ngokuba ngikukhulumile, ngikuhlosile, ngingazisolanga; futhi angiyikubuya kukho.” 
24_4_29_Umuzi wonke uyabaleka ngenxa yomsindo wabamahhashi nowabemicibisholo; bayangena ezihlahleni, bakhuphukele emadwaleni; imizi yonke ishiyiwe, akakho ohlala kuyo. 
24_4_30_Lapho usuchithiwe, uyakwenzani na? Noma wembatha okubomvu, noma uzivunulisa ngezivunulo zegolide, noma ugqaba amehlo akho ngomuthi, uzenza muhle ngeze; izithandwa zakho ziyakudelela, zifuna ukukubulala. 
24_4_31_Ngizwile izwi njengokungathi elonemihelo, usizi lozibulayo, izwi lendodakazi yaseSiyoni eheheza, ezelula izandla zayo, ithi: “Maye kimina! Ngokuba umphefumulo wami uphele amandla ngababulali.” 
24_5_1_“Yehlani nenyuke ezitaladini zaseJerusalema, nibone nazi, nicinge ezigcawini, uma ningafumana umuntu, uma kukhona owenza ukwahlulela, ofuna iqiniso; bese ngilithethelela. 
24_5_2_Noma bethi: ‘Kuphila kukaJehova,’ nokho bafunga amanga.” 
24_5_3_Jehova, amehlo akho awaseqinisweni na? Ubashayile, kepha abadabukanga; ubaqedile, kepha balile ukwamukela ukulaywa; benza lukhuni ubuso babo kunetshe, bala ukuphenduka. 
24_5_4_Ngase ngithi mina: “Laba bayizimpofana nje, bayiziwula, ngokuba abayazi indlela kaJehova, ukwahlulela kukaNkulunkulu wabo. 
24_5_5_Sengiyakuya kwabakhulu, ngikhulume nabo, ngokuba bona bayayazi indlela kaJehova nokwahlulela kukaNkulunkulu wabo;” kepha bona babelaphulile ijoka kanyekanye, bazigqabulile izibopho. 
24_5_6_Ngalokho ingonyama yasehlathini iyakubashaya, babhujiswe yimpisi yasehlane, ingwe iyiqamekele imizi yabo, badatshulwe bonke abaphuma kuyo, ngokuba iziphambeko zabo ziningi, nokuhlehla kwabo kwandile. 
24_5_7_“Ngingakuthethelela kanjani na? Abantwana bakho bangishiyile, bafunga okungesibo onkulunkulu. Ngabafungisa, kepha baphinga, babuthana endlini yezifebe. 
24_5_8_Banjengamahhashi akhulupheleyo andindayo; yilowo nalowo uyiyizela umfazi womakhelwane wakhe. 
24_5_9_Angiyikubahambela ngalokho na?” usho uJehova. “Umphefumulo wami awuyikuphindisa esizweni esinjengalesi na? 
24_5_10_“Khuphukelani ezingangeni zalo, nilichithe, ningaliqedi ngokupheleleyo nokho; susani amagatsha alo, ngokuba awasiwo akaNkulunkulu. 
24_5_11_Ngokuba indlu ka-Israyeli nendlu kaJuda zingikhohlisile nokungikhohlisa,” usho uJehova. 
24_5_12_Zimphikile uJehova, zathi: “Hhayi yena! Okubi akuyikusehlela, asiyikubona inkemba nendlala. 
24_5_13_Abaprofethi bayakuba ngumoya, akakho okhulumayo kubo; kuyakwenziwa kanjalo kubo.” 
24_5_14_Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova uNkulunkulu Sebawoti, uthi: “Ngokuba nikhuluma leli zwi, bhekani, ngiyakwenza amazwi ami abe ngumlilo emlonyeni wakho, nalaba bantu babe yizinkuni, ubadle. 
24_5_15_Bhekani, ngiyakwehlisela phezu kwenu isizwe esivela kude nina ndlu ka-Israyeli,” usho uJehova; “yisizwe esinamandla, yisizwe esidala, yisizwe ongazi ulimi lwaso, nongezwa lokhu abakukhulumayo. 
24_5_16_Isambo sabo sinjengethuna elivulekileyo, bangamaqhawe bonke. 
24_5_17_Bayakudla okuvuniweyo kwakho nesinkwa sakho, badle amadodana akho namadodakazi akho, badle izimvu zakho nezinkomo zakho, badle imivini yakho nemikhiwane yakho, bachithe ngenkemba imizi yakho ebiyelweyo othemba kuyo. 
24_5_18_“Kepha nangalezo zinsuku,” usho uJehova, “angiyikuniqeda ngokupheleleyo. 
24_5_19_Kuyakuthi lapho nisho nithi: ‘UJehova uNkulunkulu wenu wenzeleni kithi konke lokhu na?’ usho kubo ukuthi: ‘Njengalokho ningishiyile, nakhonza onkulunkulu babezizwe ezweni lakini, kanjalo niyakukhonza abezizwe ezweni elingesilo elenu.’ 
24_5_20_“Memezani lokhu endlini kaJakobe, nikuzwakalise kwaJuda ngokuthi: 
24_5_21_Yizwani lokhu nina bantu eniyiziwula neningenakuqonda, eninamehlo, ningaboni kodwa, eninezindlebe, ningezwa kodwa. 
24_5_22_Aningesabi yini,” usho uJehova, “anithuthumeli phambi kwami, mina engibeke isihlabathi sibe ngumkhawulo wolwandle, umncele ophakade olungenakudlula kuwo, na? Noma lugubha, alunakuwahlula; noma luduma, alunakudlula kuwo. 
24_5_23_Kepha laba bantu banenhliziyo eyambukileyo nehlubukileyo; bambuka, bahamba. 
24_5_24_Futhi abasho ezinhliziyweni zabo ukuthi: ‘Ake sesabe uJehova uNkulunkulu wethu onika imvula eyokuqala neyamuva ngesikhathi sayo, asigcinele amasonto anqunyiweyo akuvuna.’ 
24_5_25_Ububi benu buchezukisile lokhu, nezono zenu zinenqabele okuhle. 
24_5_26_“Ngokuba phakathi kwabantu bami kufunyanwa ababi, baqamekela njengabacuphayo nabalinda izinyoni, babeke ugibe, babambe abantu. 
24_5_27_Njengendlwana yezinyoni igcwele zona, kanjalo izindlu zabo zigcwele inkohliso; ngalokho bakhulile, bacebile. 
24_5_28_Bakhuluphele, bayacwebezela; yebo, bayadlula ezintweni zobubi; abameli ukulunga, abameli izintandane ukuba zihlahlamele, nemfanelo yabampofu abayahluleli. 
24_5_29_Angiyikubahambela ngalokho na?” usho uJehova. “Umphefumulo wami awuyikuphindisa esizweni esinjengalesi na? 
24_5_30_“Okumangalisayo nokwesabekayo kuyenziwa ezweni. 
24_5_31_Abaprofethi baprofetha amanga, abapristi babusa eceleni kwabo; abantu bami bayakuthanda kanjalo, kepha niyakwenze njani ekupheleni na? 
24_6_1_“Thuthani impahla eJerusalema nina bantwana bakwaBenjamini, nibethe amacilongo eThekhowa, niphakamise insika yomusi eBeti Hakeremi, ngokuba ububi bulunguza ngasenyakatho nokuchitha okukhulu. 
24_6_2_Indodakazi yaseSiyoni etotosiweyo nethambileyo ngiyakuyinquma. 
24_6_3_Abelusi bayakufika kuyo benemihlambi yabo, bamise amatende abo ngakuyo nxazonke, baluse, kube yilowo nalowo endaweni yakhe.” 
24_6_4_“Zingcweliseleni ukulwa nayo; vukani, sikhuphuke emini. Maye kithina! Ngokuba ilanga liyaphenduka, namathunzi okuhlwa aselulekile. 
24_6_5_Vukani, sikhuphuke ebusuku, sichithe izindlu zayo zamakhosi.” 
24_6_6_Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Gawulani imithi yayo, ninqwabele iduli ngakulo iJerusalema. Yiwo umuzi oyakuhanjelwa, ungukucindezela kuphela phakathi kwawo. 
24_6_7_Njengomthombo umpompoza amanzi awo, kanjalo umpompoza ububi bawo; ubudlova nokubhubhisa kuzwakele phakathi kwawo; ukugula namanxeba kukhona phambi kwami njalo. 
24_6_8_Mawuxwayiswe, Jerusalema, funa umphefumulo wami wahlukane nawe, funa ngikwenze incithakalo, izwe elingahlalwa.” 
24_6_9_Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Bayakuyikhothoza nokuyikhothoza insali yakwa-Israyeli njengomvini; buyisela isandla sakho emaqomeni njengobutha izithelo zomvini.” 
24_6_10_Ngiyakukhuluma kubani, ngifakaze ukuba bezwe, na? Bheka, izindlebe zabo azisokile, abanakulalela; bheka, izwi likaNkulunkulu seliyihlazo kubo, abathokozi ngalo. 
24_6_11_Ngalokho ngigcwele ukufutheka kukaJehova, ngikhathele ukunyamezela. “Kuthululele phezu kwabantwana ezitaladini, nasemihlanganweni yezinsizwa kanyekanye, ngokuba nendoda iyakuthathwa nomkayo, ogugileyo kanye nozinsuku zakhe zigcwele. 
24_6_12_Izindlu zabo ziyakunikelwa kwabanye, amasimu abo nawomkabo kanyekanye, ngokuba ngiyakwelulela isandla sami kwabakhileyo ezweni,” usho uJehova. 
24_6_13_“Ngokuba kusukela kwabancane babo kuya kwabakhulu babo bayaphanga impango bonke, nabaprofethi nabapristi bonke baqamba amanga. 
24_6_14_Bapholisa kalula ukulimala kwabantu bami, bathi: ‘Ngukuthula, ngukuthula,’ kepha akukho ukuthula. 
24_6_15_Bayakuba namahloni, ngokuba benza izinengiso; nokho abanamahloni nakanye, abakhophozi; ngalokho bayakuwa phakathi kwabawayo; ngesikhathi sokubahambela kwami bayakukhubeka,” usho uJehova. 
24_6_16_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Yimani ezindleleni, nibone, nibuze imikhondo yasendulo ukuthi iphi indlela enhle, nihambe ngayo, niyakufumana ukuphumula kwemiphefumulo yenu; kepha bathi: ‘Asiyikuhamba ngayo.’ 
24_6_17_Ngase ngibeka abalindi phezu kwenu, ngithi: ‘Qaphelani ukukhala kwecilongo,’ kepha bathi: ‘Asiyikukuqaphela.’ 
24_6_18_Ngalokho zwanini nina zizwe, wazi wena bandla ukuthi yintoni ephakathi kwabo. 
24_6_19_Yizwa wena mhlaba ukuthi: Bheka, ngiyakwehlisela okubi phezu kwalaba bantu, izithelo zemicabango yabo, ngokuba abaqaphelanga amazwi ami, nomthetho wami bawulahlile. 
24_6_20_Ifikelani kimi inhlaka evela eSheba, nomhlanga othaphukayo ovela ezweni elikude, na? Iminikelo yenu yokushiswa ayamukeleki, nemihlatshelo yenu ayimnandi kimi.” 
24_6_21_Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Bheka, ngiyakubekela laba bantu izikhubekiso, oyise namadodana bakhubeke kanyekanye kuzo, umakhelwane abhubhe kanye nomngane wakhe.” 
24_6_22_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Bheka, kuvela abantu ezweni elisenyakatho; isizwe esikhulu siyakuvuswa ekugcineni komhlaba. 
24_6_23_Babamba umnsalo nomkhonto; banonya, abanamusa, izwi labo liduma njengolwandle, bakhwele amahhashi, behleliwe njengabantu abayakulwa, behlelelwe ukulwa nawe ndodakazi yaseSiyoni.” 
24_6_24_Sizwile imibiko yalokho: izandla zethu ziyadangala; usizi lusibambile, imihelo njengeyobelethayo. 
24_6_25_Ningaphumeli endle, ningahambi endleleni, ngokuba isitha sinenkemba, navalo nxazonke. 
24_6_26_Ndodakazi yabantu bami, bhinca indwangu yamasaka, uhuquzele emlotheni, wenze isililo njengesendodana eyodwa, ukukhala okumunyu, ngokuba umphangi uyakusehlela masinyane. 
24_6_27_“Ngikubekile ukuba ube ngumhloli nenqaba phakathi kwabantu bami, wazi, uhlole indlela yabo. 
24_6_28_Bahlubukile bonke nokuhlubuka, behamba behleba; bayithusi nensimbi, bangabachithi bonke. 
24_6_29_Izifutho ziyafutha, kepha emlilweni kuphuma umthofu kuphela; impela bancibilikisela ize nje, ngokuba ababi abakhishwa. 
24_6_30_Bayakuthiwa isiliva elilahlwayo, ngokuba uJehova ubalahlile.” 
24_7_1_Izwi elafika kuJeremiya livela kuJehova, lithi: 
24_7_2_“Yima esangweni lendlu kaJehova, umemeze lapho leli zwi, uthi: “ ‘Zwanini izwi likaJehova nina nonke bakwaJuda eningena ngalawa masango ukukhuleka kuJehova. 
24_7_3_Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, uthi: Lungisani izindlela zenu nezenzo zenu, khona ngiyakunakhisa kule ndawo. 
24_7_4_Ningethembi emazwini amanga, lapho kuthiwa: “Nanti ithempeli likaJehova, ithempeli likaJehova, ithempeli likaJehova.” 
24_7_5_Ngokuba uma nizilungisa nokuzilungisa izindlela zenu nezenzo zenu, uma nenza ukwahlulela impela phakathi komuntu nomakhelwane wakhe, 
24_7_6_uma ningacindezeli umfokazi, nentandane, nomfelokazi, ningachithi igazi elingenacala kule ndawo, futhi ningalandeli abanye onkulunkulu ukuba nilimale, 
24_7_7_ngiyakunakhisa kule ndawo ezweni engalinika oyihlo kusukela endulo kuze kube phakade. 
24_7_8_Bhekani, niyethemba emazwini amanga angenakusiza. 
24_7_9_“ ‘Niyakweba yini, nibulale, niphinge, nifunge amanga, nimshisele uBali impepho, nilandele abanye onkulunkulu eningabazanga, 
24_7_10_bese nifika nime ngaphambi kwami kule ndlu ebizwe ngegama lami, nithi: “Sophuliwe” — nize nenze zonke lezi zinengiso, na? 
24_7_11_Le ndlu ebizwe ngegama lami isiphenduke umhume wabaphangi emehlweni enu na? Bhekani, nami ngiyakubona, usho uJehova. 
24_7_12_“ ‘Kepha hambani niye endaweni yami eShilo, lapho ngalibeka khona igama lami kuqala, nibone engakwenzayo kuyo ngenxa yobubi babantu bami u-Israyeli. 
24_7_13_Manje ngokuba niyenzile yonke le misebenzi, usho uJehova, ningalalelanga, noma ngakhuluma njalonjalo, nganibiza, ningaphendulanga, 
24_7_14_ngiyakwenza kule ndlu ebizwe ngegama lami nenithemba kuyo, nakule ndawo enganinika yona nina nawoyihlo, njengalokho ngenza kulo iShilo. 
24_7_15_Ngiyakunilahla ebusweni bami, njengalokho ngabalahla bonke abafowenu, yonke inzalo yakwa-Efrayimi.’ 
24_7_16_“Wena-ke ungakhulekeli laba bantu, ungabaphakamiseli ukukhala nomkhuleko, ungabanxuseli kimi, ngokuba angiyikuzwa. 
24_7_17_Awuboni ukuthi benzani emizini yakwaJuda nasezitaladini zaseJerusalema na? 
24_7_18_Abantwana batheza izinkuni, oyise baphemba umlilo, abesifazane baxova inhlama ukuba benzele inkosikazi yezulu amaqebelengwane, bathululele abanye onkulunkulu umnikelo wokuphuzwa ukuba bangicunule. 
24_7_19_Kepha yimi abangicunulayo yini, usho uJehova: akusibo, buze bujabhe ubuso babo, na? 
24_7_20_“ ‘Ngalokho isho njalo iNkosi uNkulunkulu, ithi: Bheka, intukuthelo yami nokufutheka kwami kuyakuthululwa kule ndawo phezu kwabantu, naphezu kwezinkomo, naphezu kwemithi yasendle, naphezu kwezithelo zomhlaba, kuvuthe kungacimi. 
24_7_21_“ ‘Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli: Thasiselani iminikelo yenu yokushiswa emihlatshelweni yenu, nidle inyama. 
24_7_22_Ngokuba angikhulumanga koyihlo, angibayalelanga ngezindaba zeminikelo nemihlatshelo mhla ngibakhipha ezweni laseGibithe, 
24_7_23_kepha ngabayala kuphela le nto yokuthi: Lalelani izwi lami, ngiyakuba nguNkulunkulu wenu, nina nibe ngabantu bami, nihambe ngezindlela zonke enganiyala ngazo ukuba kube kuhle kini. 
24_7_24_Kepha abalalelanga, ababekanga izindlebe zabo, kepha bahamba ngamacebo abo nangenkani yezinhliziyo zabo ezimbi; bahlehla, abayanga phambili. 
24_7_25_Kusukela osukwini oyihlo abaphuma ngalo ezweni laseGibithe kuze kube namuhla ngithumile kini zonke izinceku zami abaprofethi, ngibathuma imihla ngemihla njalonjalo. 
24_7_26_Nokho abangilalelanga, ababekanga izindlebe zabo, kepha benza lukhuni izintamo zabo; benza kabi kunawoyise.’ 
24_7_27_“Uyakukhuluma onke lawo mazwi kubo, kepha abayikukulalela; uyakubabiza, kepha abayikukuphendula. 
24_7_28_Uyakuthi kubo: ‘Yilesi sizwe esingalilalelanga izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu waso, singamukelanga ukulaywa; iqiniso libhubhile, linqunyiwe emlonyeni waso. 
24_7_29_Gunda izinwele zakho, Jerusalema, uzilahle, wenze isililo emadulini angenalutho, ngokuba uJehova usalile, wasilahla isizukulwane sentukuthelo yakhe. 
24_7_30_“ ‘Ngokuba abantwana bakwaJuda benzile okubi emehlweni ami, usho uJehova; bazibekile izinengiso zabo endlini ebizwe ngegama lami zokuba bayingcolise. 
24_7_31_Bakhile izindawo eziphakemeyo zaseThofeti ezisesigodini sendodana kaHinomu ukuba bashise amadodana abo namadodakazi abo ngomlilo, engingakuyalelanga nokungangenanga enhliziyweni yami. 
24_7_32_Ngalokho bheka, izinsuku ziyeza, usho uJehova, elingasayikubizwa ngazo ngokuthi iThofeti nesigodi sendodana kaHinomu kepha isiGodi Sokubulala, ngokuba bayakumbela eThofeti, lokhu ingekho enye indawo. 
24_7_33_Izidumbu zalaba bantu ziyakuba ngukudla kwezinyoni zezulu nokwezilwane zomhlaba; akakho oyakuzesabisa. 
24_7_34_Ngiyakuthulisa emizini yakwaJuda nasezitaladini zaseJerusalema izwi lokujabula nezwi lokuthokoza, izwi lomyeni nezwi lomakoti, ngokuba izwe liyakuba yincithakalo. 
24_8_1_“ ‘Ngaleso sikhathi, usho uJehova, bayakuwakhipha amathambo amakhosi akwaJuda, namathambo ezikhulu zakhe, namathambo abapristi namathambo abaprofethi, namathambo abakhileyo eJerusalema emathuneni abo, 
24_8_2_baweneke elangeni nasenyangeni nakulo lonke ibandla lasezulwini, abakuthandile, bakukhonza, bakulandela, bakufuna, bakhuleka kukho; awayikubuthwa, awayikumbelwa, ayakuba ngumquba ebusweni bomhlabathi. 
24_8_3_Ukufa kuyakukhethwa kunokuphila yinsali yonke esele kulowo mndeni omubi, esele ezindaweni zonke, lapho ngiyixoshele khona, usho uJehova Sebawoti.’ 
24_8_4_“Futhi uyakusho kubo, uthi: ‘Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “ ‘Abantu bayakuwa, bangabuyi basukume, na? Umuntu uyaphambuka, angabuyi aphenduke, na? 
24_8_5_Bahlehlelani laba bantu baseJerusalema ngokuhlehla njalonjalo na? Babambelela enkohlisweni, bala ukubuya. 
24_8_6_Ngaqaphela, ngezwa; abakhulumanga kahle; akakho ozisola ngobubi bakhe, ethi: “Ngenzeni na?” Bonke baphendukela emisebenzini yabo njengamahhashi aphulukundlela empini. 
24_8_7_Nonogolantethe emkhathini uyazazi izikhathi zakhe ezimisiweyo, ihobhe, nenkonjane, nonohemu bagcina isikhathi sokufika kwabo, kepha abantu bami abazazi izahlulelo zikaJehova. 
24_8_8_“ ‘Ningasho kanjani, nithi: “Sihlakaniphile, umthetho kaJehova unathi,” na? Impela bheka, uthi lokuloba lwamanga lwababhali lusebenzile okwamanga. 
24_8_9_Abahlakaniphileyo bayakujabha, besabe, babhajwe; bheka, balilahlile izwi likaJehova, banokuhlakanipha kuni na? 
24_8_10_Ngalokho abafazi babo ngiyakubanika abanye, namasimu abo kwabayakuwadla, ngokuba kusukela kwabancane kuya kwabakhulu bayaphanga impango bonke, nabaprofethi nabapristi bonke baqamba amanga. 
24_8_11_Bapholisa kalula ukulimala kwendodakazi yabantu bami, bathi: “Ngukuthula, ngukuthula;” kepha akukho ukuthula. 
24_8_12_Bayakuba namahloni, ngokuba benza izinengiso; nokho abanamahloni nakanye, abakhophozi; ngalokho bayakuwa phakathi kwabawayo, ngesikhathi sokubahambela kwami bayakukhubeka, usho uJehova. 
24_8_13_“ ‘Bengiyakubutha nokubutha,’ usho uJehova, ‘kepha azikho izithelo zomvini emvinini, namakhiwane emkhiwaneni; namaqabunga abunile; engibanikile khona kusukile kubo.’ ” 
24_8_14_“Sihlalelani na? Buthanani, singene emizini ebiyelweyo, sibhubhe khona, ngokuba uJehova uNkulunkulu wethu usibhubhisile, wasiphuzisa amanzi enyongo, ngokuba sonile kuJehova. 
24_8_15_Silindela ukuthula, kepha okuhle akukho, nesikhathi sokuphulukiswa, kepha bheka, luvalo. 
24_8_16_Ukuthimula kwamahhashi akhe kuyezwakala kwaDani; ngezwi lokuyiyiza kwanamandla akhe izwe lonke liyathuthumela, ngokuba afikile, alidlile izwe nakho konke okukulo, umuzi nabakhe kuwo.” 
24_8_17_“Ngokuba ngiyathuma kini izinyoka nawomantshingeyana abangenakulunjwa, bayakuniluma,” usho uJehova. 
24_8_18_Alunakududuzeka kimi usizi oluphezu kwami, inhliziyo yami idangele. 
24_8_19_Bheka, izwi lokukhala kwendodakazi yabantu bami livela ezweni elikude, lithi: “Akakho uJehova eSiyoni na? Ayikho inkosi yalo kulo na?” “Bangicunuleleni ngezithombe zabo ezibaziweyo nangokuyize kwabezizwe na?” 
24_8_20_“Ukuvuna kudlulile, ihlobo liphelile, kepha thina asisindiswanga.” 
24_8_21_Ngokulimala kwendodakazi yabantu bami ngilimele; ngidabukile, ukumangala kungibambile. 
24_8_22_Ibhalisamu alikho kwaGileyadi na? Inyanga ayikho lapho na? Pho, ayipheleliswa ngani impilo yendodakazi yabantu bami na? 
24_9_1_Sengathi ikhanda lami nga lingamanzi, namehlo ami umthombo wezinyembezi ukuba ngikhalele ababuleweyo bendodakazi yabantu bami imini nobusuku. 
24_9_2_Sengathi nga nginendawo yokulala kwezihambi ehlane ukuba ngishiye abantu bami, ngisuke kubo, ngokuba bangabaphingi bonke, umhlangano wabakhohlisi. 
24_9_3_“Bagobela umnsalo wolimi lwabo amanga, abaqinelanga iqiniso ezweni; kepha basuka kokubi, baya kokubi; mina-ke abangazi,” usho uJehova. 
24_9_4_“Yilowo nalowo makaxwaye umakhelwane wakhe, ningethembi nakumfowenu, ngokuba abafowenu bonke bayaqinela, nabo bonke abakhelwane bayahambahamba behleba. 
24_9_5_Yilowo nalowo uyakhohlisa umakhelwane wakhe, abakhulumi iqiniso; bazifundisile izilimi zabo ukukhuluma amanga, bazikhathaza ngokwenza okubi. 
24_9_6_Uhlala phakathi kwenkohliso; ngenkohliso bayala ukungazi,” usho uJehova. 
24_9_7_Ngalokho uJehova Sebawoti usho kanje, uthi: “Ngiyakubancibilikisa, ngibavivinye, ngokuba ngingenze njani ngenxa yendodakazi yabantu bami na? 
24_9_8_Ulimi lwabo lungumcibisholo obulalayo, lukhuluma inkohliso; bakhuluma kahle ngomlomo wabo kumakhelwane wabo, kepha ezinhliziyweni bayamqamekela. 
24_9_9_Angiyikubahambela ngalokhu na?” usho uJehova. “Umphefumulo wami awuyikuphindisa esizweni esinjengalesi na?” 
24_9_10_Ngiyakuphakamisela izintaba ukukhala nokulila, namadlelo asehlane ukulilisela, ngokuba ashisiwe kungekho muntu odlula kuwo, kungezwakali ukukhonya kwezinkomo; izinyoni zezulu nezilwane zibalekile, zahamba. 
24_9_11_“Ngiyakulenza iJerusalema libe yizinqwaba nekhaya lamakhanka, ngenze imizi yakwaJuda incithakalo, lapho kungahlali muntu khona.” 
24_9_12_Ngubani umuntu ohlakaniphileyo ongakuqonda lokhu, okhulumile kuye umlomo kaJehova, akumemezele, na? Izwe lichithelweni, lasha njengehlane, kungekho odabulayo, na? 
24_9_13_UJehova wathi: “Ngokuba bewushiyile umthetho wami engawubeka phambi kwabo, bengalilalelanga izwi lami, bengahambanga ngalo, 
24_9_14_kepha belandela inkani yezinhliziyo zabo nawoBali abakufundiswa ngoyise.” 
24_9_15_Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, uthi: “Bheka, ngiyakubanika laba bantu ukuba badle umhlonyane, baphuze amanzi enyongo. 
24_9_16_Ngiyakubahlakazela ezizweni abangazazanga bona nawoyise, ngithume emva kwabo inkemba, ngize ngibaqede.” 
24_9_17_Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Qaphelani, nibize abesifazane besililo ukuba bafike, nithumele kwabesifazane abahlakaniphileyo ukuba bafike, 
24_9_18_basheshe basikhihlele isililo, ukuze amehlo ethu amululeke izinyembezi, nezinkophe zethu ziphophoze amanzi. 
24_9_19_Ngokuba izwi lokukhala lizwakala livela eSiyoni, lithi: ‘Yeka ukuphangwa kwethu! Sijabhile kakhulu, ngokuba silishiyile izwe, ngokuba badilizile izindlu zethu.’ ” 
24_9_20_Yebo, zwanini izwi likaJehova nina besifazane, izindlebe zenu zilamukele izwi lomlomo wakhe, nifundise amadodakazi enu ukukhala, kube yilowo nalowo umakhelwane wakhe ukulila. 
24_9_21_Ngokuba ukufa kwenyukele emafasiteleni ethu, kungene ezindlini zethu zamakhosi ukunquma abantwana ezitaladini, nezinsizwa ezigcawini. 
24_9_22_Khuluma! “Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “ ‘Izidumbu zabantu ziyakuwa njengomquba endle, nanjengesithonto emva komvuni, kungekho okubuthayo.’ ” 
24_9_23_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ohlakaniphileyo makangazibongi ngokuhlakanipha kwakhe, neqhawe malingazibongi ngobuqhawe balo, nocebileyo makangazibongi ngengcebo yakhe, 
24_9_24_kepha ozibongayo makazibonge ngalokhu ukuthi uyangiqonda, angazi ukuthi nginguJehova owenza umusa nokwahlulela nokulunga emhlabeni, ngokuba ngiyathokoza ngokunjalo,” usho uJehova. 
24_9_25_“Bheka, izinsuku ziyeza,” usho uJehova, “lapho ngiyakuhambela bonke abasokileyo ekungasokini kwabo, 
24_9_26_iGibithe, noJuda, no-Edomi, nabantwana bakwa-Amoni, noMowabi, nabo bonke abadilingiwe emaceleni amakhanda abo abakhe ehlane, ngokuba zonke izizwe azisokile, nendlu yonke yakwa-Israyeli ayisokile enhliziyweni.” 
24_10_1_Zwanini izwi uJehova alikhuluma kini nina ndlu ka-Israyeli. 
24_10_2_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ningayifundi indlela yabezizwe, ningashaywa luvalo ngezibonakaliso zasezulwini, ngokuba abezizwe bezesaba. 
24_10_3_Ngokuba imikhuba yabantu iyize, lokhu kugawulwa umuthi ehlathini; ngumsebenzi wesandla sesisebenzi ngembazo. 
24_10_4_Bawenza ube muhle ngesiliva nangegolide, bawubethela ngezipikili nangezando ukuba ungazamazami. 
24_10_5_Ungumsebenzi okhandiweyo, awukhulumi; uyathwalwa nokuthwalwa, ngokuba awuhambi. Ungawesabi, ngokuba awenzi okubi, nokuhle awunakukwenza.” 
24_10_6_Akakho onjengawe Jehova; umkhulu, igama lakho likhulu ngobuqhawe. 
24_10_7_Ngubani ongekwesabe, Nkosi yezizwe, ngokuba uyimfanelo yakho, ngokuba phakathi kwabo bonke abahlakaniphileyo bezizwe nakuyo yonke imibuso yabo akakho onjengawe. 
24_10_8_Bayiziphukuphuku, bayiziwula bonke; ngukulaya kwezithombe; kungumuthi nje, 
24_10_9_nezingcwecwe zesiliva ezilethwe zivela eTharishishi negolide lase-Ofiri, umsebenzi wesisebenzi nowezandla zomkhandi, kugqokiswe okuluhlaza nokububende, kungumsebenzi wabahlakaniphileyo konke. 
24_10_10_Kepha uJehova unguNkulunkulu weqiniso, unguNkulunkulu ophilileyo neNkosi yaphakade; ngentukuthelo yakhe umhlaba uyazamazama, izizwe azinakuma ngokufutheka kwakhe. 
24_10_11_“Niyakusho kanje kubo, nithi: ‘Onkulunkulu abangenzanga izulu nomhlaba, labo bayakubhubha emhlabeni nangaphansi kwezulu.’ ” 
24_10_12_Wawenza umhlaba ngamandla akhe, walimisa izwe ngokuhlakanipha kwakhe, ngokuqonda kwakhe waleneka izulu. 
24_10_13_Lapho elizwakalisa izwi lakhe, kungukuhlokoma kwamanzi ezulwini; uzikhuphula izinkungu emikhawulweni yomhlaba, enzele imvula unyazi, awukhiphe umoya endlini yengcebo. 
24_10_14_Bonke abantu bayiziphukuphuku, abanakwazi; bonke abakhandi bajabhiswa nezithombe zabo ezibaziweyo, ngokuba izithombe zabo ezibunjiweyo zingamanga, nomoya awukho kuzo. 
24_10_15_Ziyize, umsebenzi wenkohliso; ngesikhathi sokuhanjelwa kwabo ziyakubhubha. 
24_10_16_Oyisabelo sikaJakobe akanjengalezo, ngokuba nguye obumbile konke; u-Israyeli uyisizwe sefa lakhe, nguJehova Sebawoti igama lakhe. 
24_10_17_Qoqa umshuqulo wakho ezweni wena ohlezi ekuvinjezelweni. 
24_10_18_Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Bheka, ngiyakubazwiba abakhileyo ezweni ngalo mzuzwana, ngibacindezele ukuze bakuzwe.” 
24_10_19_Maye kimina ngenxa yokulimala kwami! Ukushaywa kwami kunzima. Kepha ngithi mina: “Nempela lokhu kulusizi lwami, ngiyakuluthwala.” 
24_10_20_Itende lami lichithakele, zonke izintambo zami zigqabukile; abantwana bami basukile kimi, kabasekho; kasekho owokwelula itende lami nowokumisa izilenge zami. 
24_10_21_Ngokuba abelusi bayiziphukuphuku, abamfunanga uJehova; ngalokho abaphumelelanga, nomhlambi wabo wonke uhlakazekile. 
24_10_22_Bheka, kusondela izwi lombiko, nokuzamazama okukhulu okuvela ezweni lasenyakatho, ukuba kwenze imizi yakwaJuda ibe yincithakalo, indawo yokuhlala kwamakhanka. 
24_10_23_Ngiyazi, Jehova, ukuthi indlela yomuntu ayikuye uqobo; akukuyo indoda ukuba ihambe, iqondise izinyathelo zayo. 
24_10_24_Ngilaye, Jehova, kepha ngokwahlulela, kungabi ngentukuthelo yakho, funa ungenze into engelutho. 
24_10_25_Thulula ukufutheka kwakho phezu kwabezizwe abangakwaziyo naphezu kwemindeni engalibizi igama lakho, ngokuba bamdlile uJakobe; yebo, bamdlile bamqeda, balichitha ikhaya lakhe. 
24_11_1_Izwi elafika kuJeremiya livela kuJehova, lithi: 
24_11_2_“Zwanini amazwi alesi sivumelwano, nikhulume kubantu bakwaJuda nakwabakhileyo eJerusalema, 
24_11_3_uthi kubo: Usho kanje uJehova, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli: ‘Makaqalekiswe umuntu ongezwa amazwi alesi sivumelwano, 
24_11_4_engayala ngawo oyihlo mhla ngibakhipha ezweni laseGibithe, isithando sensimbi,’ ngokuthi: ‘Zwanini izwi lami, nilenze njengakho konke enginiyala ngakho, nibe ngabantu bami, mina ngibe nguNkulunkulu wenu, 
24_11_5_ukuba ngisiqinise isifungo engasifunga koyihlo ukubanika izwe elichichima ubisi nezinyosi’ — njenganamuhla.” Ngase ngiphendula ngithi: “Amen, Jehova.” 
24_11_6_Wayesethi uJehova kimi: “Memeza onke lawa mazwi emizini yakwaJuda nasezitaladini zaseJerusalema, uthi: ‘Zwanini amazwi alesi sivumelwano, niwenze. 
24_11_7_Ngokuba ngibayalile nokubayala oyihlo osukwini engabakhuphula ngalo ezweni laseGibithe kuze kube namuhla, ngibayalile, ngathi: “Yizwani izwi lami.” 
24_11_8_Kepha abalalela, ababekanga izindlebe zabo, kepha bahamba, kwaba yilowo nalowo ngobulukhuni benhliziyo yakhe embi; ngase ngehlisela phezu kwabo onke amazwi alesi sivumelwano engabayala ukuwenza, kepha kabawenzanga.’ ” 
24_11_9_Wayesethi uJehova kimi: “Kufunyenwe uzungu phakathi kwabantu bakwaJuda naphakathi kwabakhileyo eJerusalema. 
24_11_10_Babuyele ebubini bawoyise bokuqala abala ukuzwa amazwi ami, balandela abanye onkulunkulu ukuba babakhonze: indlu ka-Israyeli nendlu kaJuda zisaphulile isivumelwano sami engasenza nawoyise. 
24_11_11_Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova, uthi: ‘Bheka, ngiyakwehlisela okubi phezu kwabo abangayikuba nakuphuma kukho; bayakukhala kimi, kepha angiyikubezwa. 
24_11_12_Imizi yakwaJuda nabakhileyo eJerusalema bayakukhala konkulunkulu ababashisela impepho, kepha abayikubasindisa neze ngesikhathi sokuhlupheka kwabo. 
24_11_13_Ngokuba njengomumo wemizi yakho, banjalo onkulunkulu bakho, Juda, nanjengomumo wezitaladi zaseJerusalema nimisele uBosheti ama-altare, ama-altare okushisela uBali impepho.’ 
24_11_14_“Ngalokhu ungabakhulekeli laba bantu, ungabaphakamiseli ukukhala nokuthandaza, ngokuba angiyikubezwa mhla bekhala kimi ngokuhlupheka kwabo. 
24_11_15_“Othandiweyo wami unani endlini yami lapho enza amacebo nabaningi na? Inyama engcwele ingavela kuwe, lokhu ujabula ngokwenza okubi, na?” 
24_11_16_UJehova wabiza igama lakho ngokuthi umnqumo oluhlaza obukekayo, onezithelo ezinhle; ngomsindo wesidumo esikhulu uyakuphemba umlilo kuwo, kwaphuke amagatsha awo. 
24_11_17_UJehova Sebawoti owakutshala ukhulumile okubi phezu kwakho ngenxa yokubi kwendlu yakwa-Israyeli nokwendlu yakwaJuda abakwenzile ukuba bangicunule ngokushisela uBali impepho. 
24_11_18_UJehova wangazisa, ngakwazi; khona wangibonisa izenzo zabo. 
24_11_19_Kepha mina nganginjengewundlu eliyiswa ekuhlatshweni; ngangingazi ukuthi bangicebela amacebo, bethi: “Masiwuchithe umuthi kanye nezithelo zawo, simnqume ezweni labaphilayo, igama lakhe lingabe lisakhunjulwa.” 
24_11_20_Jehova Sebawoti, mahluleli olungileyo, ovivinya izinso nenhliziyo, mangibone ukuphindisela kwakho kubo, ngokuba ngibonakalisile indaba yami kuwe. 
24_11_21_“Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova ngabantu base-Anathoti abafuna ukuphila kwakho, bathi: ‘Awuyikuprofetha ngegama likaJehova, ukuze ungafi ngesandla sethu;’ 
24_11_22_ngalokho usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Bheka, ngiyakubahambela; izinsizwa ziyakufa ngenkemba; amadodana abo namadodakazi abo ayakufa ngendlala, 
24_11_23_nensali ayiyikuba khona kubo, ngokuba ngiyakubehlisela abantu base-Anathoti okubi ngomnyaka wokuhanjelwa kwabo.’ ” 
24_12_1_Ulungile wena Jehova, noma ngimelana nawe; ngiyakukhuluma nawe ngokwahlulela: iphumelelani indlela yababi, kungani ukuba babe nokuthula abakhohlisa nokukhohlisa, na? 
24_12_2_Ubatshalile, futhi bagxilile; bayakhula, bathela izithelo; useduze nomlomo wabo, kepha ukude nezinhliziyo zabo. 
24_12_3_Kepha wena Jehova uyangazi, uyangibona, uvivinya inhliziyo yami ukuthi injani kuwe; bakhiphe njengezimvu zokuhlatshwa, ubalungisele usuku lokuhlatshwa. 
24_12_4_Koze kube nini izwe lidabuka, nemifino yonke yasendle ibuna, na? Ngobubi babakhileyo khona izinkomo nezinyoni ziyabhubha, ngokuba bathi: “Akayikubona ukugcina kwethu.” 
24_12_5_“Uma ugijimile nemigundatshani, yakukhathaza, ungancintisana kanjani namahhashi na? Uma wethemba ezweni lokuthula kuphela, uyakwenze njani ekukhukhumaleni kweJordani na? 
24_12_6_Ngokuba nabafowenu nendlu kayihlo nabo bakukhohlisile, nabo bamemeza kakhulu emva kwakho; ungabethembi, noma bekhuluma okuhle kuwe.” 
24_12_7_“Ngiyishiyile indlu yami, ngililahlile ifa lami, nginikele othandiweyo womphefumulo wami esandleni sezitha zakhe. 
24_12_8_Ifa lami likimi njengengonyama ehlathini; lingiphumisele izwi; ngalokho ngiyalizonda. 
24_12_9_Ifa lami liyinqe elimanakanaka kimi, amanqe angakulo alihaqile nxazonke; hambani, nibuthe zonke izilwane zasendle, nizilethe, zidle. 
24_12_10_Abelusi abaningi basichithile isivini sami, basinyathele phansi isabelo sami, benze ifa lami elinxanelekayo ihlane elichithakeleyo. 
24_12_11_Basenze incithakalo; siyincithakalo, sikhala kimi; izwe lonke lichithiwe, kepha akakho okubeka enhliziyweni. 
24_12_12_Abaphangi bafikele onke amaduli angenalutho, ngokuba inkemba kaJehova iyadla, kusukela komunye umkhawulo womhlaba kuze kufike komunye, nenyama enokuthula ayikho. 
24_12_13_Bahlwanyele ukolweni, bavuna ameva, bakhandlekile bengasizakalanga; yebo, niyakuba namahloni ngezithelo zenu ngenxa yokufutheka okuvuthayo kukaJehova.” 
24_12_14_Usho kanje uJehova ngabakhelwane bonke bami ababi, abalithinta ifa lami engabanika lona abantu bami u-Israyeli, uthi: “Bheka, ngiyakubasiphula ezweni lakubo, ngiyisiphule indlu yakwaJuda phakathi kwabo. 
24_12_15_Kepha kuyakuthi lapho ngibasiphulile, ngibuye ngibahawukele, ngibabuyisele, kube yilowo nalowo efeni lakhe, kube yilowo nalowo ezweni lakubo. 
24_12_16_Kuyakuthi uma beyakuzifunda nokuzifunda izindlela zabantu bami ukuba bafunge igama lami ngokuthi: ‘Kuphila kukaJehova,’ njengalokhu kade befundisa abantu bami ukufunga uBali, bakhiwe phakathi kwabantu bami. 
24_12_17_Kepha uma bengalaleli, ngiyakusisiphula nokusisiphula lesi sizwe, ngisichithe,” usho uJehova. 
24_13_1_Usho kanje uJehova kimi, uthi: “Hamba uzithengele ibhande lelineni, ulibeke ezinkalweni zakho, ungalingenisi emanzini.” 
24_13_2_Ngalithenga ibhande njengezwi likaJehova, ngalibeka ezinkalweni zami. 
24_13_3_Lase lifika izwi likaJehova ngokwesibili, lithi: 
24_13_4_“Thatha ibhande olithengileyo, elisezinkalweni zakho, uvuke uhambe, uye e-Ewufrathe, ulifihle emfantwini wesiwa.” 
24_13_5_Ngase ngihamba, ngalifihla ngase-Ewufrathe njengokungiyala kukaJehova. 
24_13_6_Kwathi ngasekugcineni kwezinsuku eziningi uJehova wathi kimi: “Suka uye e-Ewufrathe, ulilande khona ibhande engakuyala ngalo ukuba ulifihle khona.” 
24_13_7_Ngaya e-Ewufrathe, ngemba, ngalilanda ibhande, lapho ngangilifihle khona; bheka, ibhande lalonakele, lalingasenamsebenzi. 
24_13_8_Lase lifika izwi likaJehova, lithi: 
24_13_9_“Usho kanje uJehova: ‘Ngale ndlela ngiyakukuchitha ukuziqhenya kukaJuda nokuziphakamisa okukhulu kweJerusalema. 
24_13_10_Laba bantu ababi abala ukuzwa amazwi ami, abahamba ngobulukhuni bezinhliziyo zabo, balandela abanye onkulunkulu ukuba babakhonze, bakhuleke kubo, bayakuba njengaleli bhande elingasenamsebenzi. 
24_13_11_Ngokuba njengalokhu ibhande linamathela okhalweni lomuntu, kanjalo ngiyinamathelisile kimi yonke indlu yakwa-Israyeli nayo yonke indlu yakwaJuda,’ usho uJehova, ‘ukuba babe ngabantu bami, negama, nodumo, nendumiso, kepha kabalalelanga.’ 
24_13_12_“Uyakukhuluma kubo leli zwi lokuthi: ‘Usho kanje uJehova uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, uthi: Zonke izimvaba ziyagcwaliswa ngewayini.’ Bayakusho kuwe ukuthi: ‘Impela asazi yini ukuthi zonke izimvaba zigcwaliswa ngewayini na?’ 
24_13_13_Uyakusho kubo, uthi: ‘Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: Bheka, ngiyakugcwalisa ngokudakwa bonke abakhileyo kuleli zwe, namakhosi ahlala esihlalweni sobukhosi sikaDavide, nabapristi, nabaprofethi, nabo bonke abakhileyo eJerusalema. 
24_13_14_Ngiyakubaphahlaza omunye komunye, oyise nabantwana ndawonye, usho uJehova; angiyikubahawukela, angiyikubasindisa, angiyikuba nasihe kubo sokuba ngingabachithi.’ ” 
24_13_15_Zwanini, nibeke indlebe; ningaziqhenyi, ngokuba uJehova ukhulumile. 
24_13_16_Mnikeni uJehova uNkulunkulu wenu udumo, engakalihlwisi, futhi zingakakhubeki izinyawo zenu ezintabeni zokuhwelela, nothi nisabheka ukukhanya, akuphendule ithunzi lokufa, akwenze kube yisigayegaye. 
24_13_17_Kepha uma ningalaleli, umphefumulo wami uyakukhala ngasese ngokuzidla kwenu; iso lami liyakukhala nokukhala, limululeka izinyembezi, ngokuba umhlambi kaJehova uthunjiwe. 
24_13_18_Yisho kuyo inkosi nakuyo indlovukazi ukuthi: “Hlalani phansi ngokuzithoba, ngokuba izigqoko zenu ziwile phansi, umqhele wodumo lwenu.” 
24_13_19_Imizi yaseningizimu ivaliwe, akakho ovulayo; wonke uJuda uthunjiwe, uthunjiwe ngokupheleleyo. 
24_13_20_Phakamisani amehlo enu, nibone abavela enyakatho; uphi umhlambi owaphiwa wona, izimvu zakho ezinhle, na? 
24_13_21_Uyakuthini lapho emisa phezu kwakho labo okade ubafundisile ukuba babe ngabangane bakho, babe yinhloko, na? Awuyikubanjwa lusizi njengowesifazane obelethayo na? 
24_13_22_Uma uthi enhliziyweni yakho: Ngehlelelweni yilezi zinto na? Ngobukhulu bokona kwakho imiphetho yakho iphakanyisiwe, nezithende zakho ziyadlovulwa.
