27_5_21_waxoshwa kubantwana babantu; inhliziyo yakhe yaba njengeyezilwane, nenhlalo yakhe yayinezimbongolo zasendle; wadliswa utshani njengezinkabi, nomzimba wakhe wamanziswa ngamazolo ezulu, waze wazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu oPhezukonke ubusa imibuso yabantu, ubeka phezu kwayo amthandayo. 
27_5_22_“Nawe ndodana yakhe, Belishasari, awuthobanga inhliziyo yakho, noma wazi konke lokho, 
27_5_23_kepha uziphakamisile eNkosini yasezulwini; balethe izitsha zendlu yakhe phambi kwakho; wena nezinduna zakho, nawomkakho, nezancinza zakho niphuzile iwayini ngazo, utusile wena onkulunkulu besiliva, nabegolide, nabethusi, nabensimbi, nabomuthi, nabetshe abangaboni, abangezwa, abangazi; kodwa uNkulunkulu omphefumulo wakho usesandleni sakhe, nokungezakhe zonke izindlela zakho awumdumisanga. 
27_5_24_Yayisithunywa le nxenye yesandla ivela kuye, walotshwa lo mbhalo. 
27_5_25_“Yilo umbhalo owalotshwa: MENE, MENE TEKEL, UFARSIN. 
27_5_26_“Nansi incazelo yale nto: MENE: uNkulunkulu ubalile umbuso wakho, uwuqedile. 
27_5_27_TEKEL: ulinganisiwe esilinganisweni, ufunyenwe ulula. 
27_5_28_PERES: umbuso wakho wahlukene, unikelwe kumaMede namaPheresiya.” 
27_5_29_Khona uBelishasari wayaleza, bamembathisa uDaniyeli okububende, bafaka umgexo wegolide entanyeni yakhe, benza isimemezelo ngaye ukuthi ubeyakubusa engowesithathu embusweni. 
27_5_30_Ngalobo busuku uBelishasari inkosi yamaKaledi wabulawa. 
27_5_31_UDariyu umMede wamukela umbuso eneminyaka engamashumi ayisithupha nambili. 
27_6_1_Kwaba kuhle kuDariyu ukubeka phezu kombuso izikhulu eziyikhulu namashumi amabili ebeziyakuba sembusweni wonke. 
27_6_2_Phezu kwazo wamisa abongameli abathathu, uDaniyeli engomunye wabo, ukuba izikhulu zibike kubo, ukuze inkosi ingalimali ngalutho. 
27_6_3_Khona uDaniyeli lo wabadlula abongameli nezikhulu, ngokuba umoya ophakemeyo wawukuye; inkosi yayicabanga ukummisa phezu kombuso wonke. 
27_6_4_Khona abongameli nezikhulu base befuna ukuthola utho ngoDaniyeli oluqondene nombuso, kepha abatholanga lutho nacala kuye, ngokuba wayethembekile; akutholwanga siphosiso nacala kuye. 
27_6_5_Ayesethi lawa madoda: “Asiyikuthola lutho ngoDaniyeli, uma singalutholi kokuqondene nomthetho kaNkulunkulu wakhe.” 
27_6_6_Base bebuthana labo bongameli nezikhulu enkosini, basho kanje kuyo, bathi: “Mana njalo, nkosi Dariyu. 
27_6_7_Bonke abongameli bombuso, nababusi, nezikhulu, nabomkhandlu, nezinduna balulekene kanyekanye ukuba kumiswe isimiso senkosi, kumenyezelwe isiyalezo esiqinileyo sokuthi yilowo nalowo ocela isicelo nakumuphi unkulunkulu noma kumuntu ngezinsuku ezingamashumi amathathu, kuphela kuwe nkosi, uyakuphonswa emphandwini wezingonyama. 
27_6_8_Kalokhu, nkosi, simemezele isiyalezo, ulobe umbhalo ukuba ungaguqulwa ngokomthetho wamaMede namaPheresiya ongenakuguquka.” 
27_6_9_Ngokunjalo inkosi uDariyu yayisiloba umbhalo nesiyalezo. 
27_6_10_UDaniyeli esekwazi ukuthi umbhalo ulotshiwe, wangena endlini yakhe amafasitele ekamelo lakhe ayevulekile ebhekisa eJerusalema waguqa ngamadolo kathathu ngosuku, wakhuleka, wabonga uNkulunkulu wakhe, njengalokho enzile kuqala. 
27_6_11_Ayesebuthana lawo madoda, amfumana uDaniyeli ekhuleka, enxusa kuNkulunkulu wakhe. 
27_6_12_Asondela, akhuluma phambi kwenkosi ngesiyalezo senkosi, athi: “Asithi ulobile isiyalezo sokuthi yilowo nalowo ocela nakumuphi unkulunkulu noma kumuntu ngezinsuku ezingamashumi amathathu, kuphela kuwe nkosi, uyakuphonswa emphandwini wezingonyama na?” Inkosi yaphendula yathi: “Iqinisile leyo nto ngokomthetho wamaMede namaPheresiya ongenakuguquka.” 
27_6_13_Ayesephendula ethi phambi kwenkosi: “UDaniyeli lowo ongowabathunjwa bakwaJuda akakunaki wena nkosi, nesiyalezo osilobileyo, kepha uyacela isicelo sakhe kathathu ngosuku.” 
27_6_14_Lapho inkosi isizwile lawa mazwi, yadabuka kakhulu, yayibeka inhliziyo yayo kuDaniyeli ukuba imkhulule, yazama ukumophula kwaze kwaba sekushoneni kwelanga. 
27_6_15_Ayesebuthana lawo madoda enkosini, athi enkosini: “Yazi, nkosi, ukuthi kungumthetho wamaMede namaPheresiya ukuba kungaguqulwa isiyalezo nesimiso esimiswa yinkosi.” 
27_6_16_Yayisiyaleza inkosi, walethwa uDaniyeli, waphonswa emphandwini wezingonyama. Inkosi yakhuluma, yathi kuDaniyeli: “UNkulunkulu wakho omkhonza njalo uyakukukhulula.” 
27_6_17_Kwase kulethwa itshe, labekwa emlonyeni womphandu, inkosi yalinamathelisa ngendandatho yayo nangendandatho yizikhulu zayo, ukuze kungaguqulwa lutho maqondana noDaniyeli. 
27_6_18_Inkosi yase iya endlini yayo yobukhosi, yadlulisa ubusuku izila; izinkenezo zokubethwa azilethwanga kuyo, nobuthongo bayibalekela. 
27_6_19_Inkosi yavuka ekuseni kakhulu, yashesha yaya emphandwini wezingonyama. 
27_6_20_Kwathi isisondele emphandwini kuDaniyeli, yamemeza ngezwi elikhalayo; inkosi yakhuluma, yathi kuDaniyeli: “Daniyeli, wena nceku kaNkulunkulu ophilayo, uNkulunkulu wakho omkhonza njalo angakukhulula kuzo izingonyama na?” 
27_6_21_UDaniyeli wathi enkosini: “Mana njalo, nkosi. 
27_6_22_UNkulunkulu uthumile ingelosi yakhe, wavimba imilomo yezingonyama, azingilimazanga, ngokuba kwafunyanwa kimi ukungabi nacala phambi kwakhe; naphambi kwakho, nkosi, angenzanga okubi.” 
27_6_23_Yayisijabula kakhulu inkosi, yayaleza ukuba uDaniyeli akhushulwe emphandwini. UDaniyeli wayesekhushulwa emphandwini, akufunyanwanga mcothu kuye, ngokuba wayemethembile uNkulunkulu wakhe. 
27_6_24_Inkosi yayaleza, alethwa lawo madoda ayemangalele uDaniyeli, aphonswa emphandwini wezingonyama, wona nabantwana bawo, nawomkawo; izingonyama zatheleka phezu kwabo, zachoboza amathambo abo, bengakafinyeleli phansi emphandwini. 
27_6_25_UDariyu inkosi wayeselobela bonke abantu, nezizwe, nezilimi ezikhona emhlabeni wonke ukuthi: “Ukuthula makwande kinina. 
27_6_26_“Ngenza isiyalezo ukuba ekubuseni konke kombuso wami abantu bathuthumele, besabe phambi kukaNkulunkulu kaDaniyeli, “ngokuba “unguNkulunkulu ophilayo, umi kuze kube phakade, nombuso wakhe yiwo ongayikuchithwa, nokubusa kwakhe kuyakuma kuze kube sekupheleni. 
27_6_27_Uyakhulula, ophule; uyenza izibonakaliso nezimangaliso ezulwini nasemhlabeni, yena omkhululile uDaniyeli emandleni ezingonyama.” 
27_6_28_UDaniyeli wayeseqhubeka ngesineke ekubuseni kukaDariyu, nasekubuseni kukaKoresi umPheresiya. 
27_7_1_Ngomnyaka wokuqala kaBelishasari, inkosi yaseBabele, uDaniyeli wabona iphupho nemibono yekhanda lakhe embhedeni wakhe, waliloba iphupho, walanda inhloko yezindaba. 
27_7_2_UDaniyeli wathatha wathi: “Ngabona embonweni wami ebusuku; bheka, imimoya yomine yezulu yavumbuluka elwandle olukhulu. 
27_7_3_Izilo ezine ezinkulu zakhuphuka elwandle, zahlukile esinye kwesinye. 
27_7_4_“Esokuqala sasinjengengonyama, sinamaphiko okhozi; ngabheka aze ahluthwa amaphiko aso, saphakanyiswa emhlabeni, samiswa ngezinyawo ezimbili njengomuntu, sanikwa inhliziyo yomuntu. 
27_7_5_“Bheka, esinye isilo, esesibili, sinjengebhere, samiswa ngolunye uhlangothi, izimbambo ezintathu zisemlonyeni waso phakathi kwamazinyo aso; kwathiwa kuso: ‘Vuka, udle inyama eningi.’ 
27_7_6_“Emva kwalokho ngabona; bheka, esinye, sinjengengwe, sinamaphiko amane enyoni emhlane; isilo sasinamakhanda amane, sanikwa ukubusa. 
27_7_7_“Emva kwalokho ngabona emibonweni ebusuku; bheka, isilo sesine, esesabekayo, sinamandla, siqinile kakhulu; sasinamazinyo amakhulu ensimbi, sadla, saphula, sanyathela okuseleyo ngezinyawo zaso; sahlukile kuzo zonke izilo ezazingaphambi kwaso; sasinezimpondo eziyishumi. 
27_7_8_“Ngabuka izimpondo; bheka, kwavela phakathi kwazo olunye uphondo, oluncane, okungaphambi kwalo ezintathu zezimpondo zokuqala zasimbulwa; futhi bheka, kulolo phondo kwakukhona amehlo anjengamehlo omuntu, nomlomo okhuluma izinto ezinkulu. 
27_7_9_“Ngisabheka, kwabekwa izihlalo zobukhosi, kwahlala omdala wezinsuku; izambatho zakhe zazimhlophe njengeqhwa, izinwele zekhanda lakhe zinjengoboya bezimvu obuhlanzekileyo; isihlalo sakhe sobukhosi sasingamalangabi omlilo, amasondo aso engumlilo ovuthayo. 
27_7_10_Umnonjana womlilo wavela, waphuma phambi kwakhe; izinkulungwane zenkulungwane zazimkhonza, nezinkulungwane eziyishumi zezinkulungwane eziyishumi zazimi ngaphambi kwakhe; kwahlala abahluleli, izincwadi zavulwa. 
27_7_11_“Ngabheka ngaleso sikhathi ngenxa yenhlokomo yamazwi amakhulu akhulunywa luphondo; ngabheka saze sahlatshwa isilo, wachithwa umzimba waso, sanikelwa ukuba sishiswe ngomlilo. 
27_7_12_Kepha ezinye izilo, ukubusa kwazo kwasuswa, kodwa ukuphila kwazo kwelulwa isikhathi nenkathi. 
27_7_13_“Ngabona emibonweni ebusuku; bheka, kwafika namafu ezulu onjengendodana yomuntu; yafika komdala wezinsuku, yasondezwa phambi kwakhe. 
27_7_14_Yanikwa ukubusa, nobukhosi, nombuso, ukuze bonke abantu, nezizwe, nezilimi bayikhonze; ukubusa kwayo kungukubusa okuphakade okungayikudlula, nombuso wayo yiwo ongayikuchithwa. 
27_7_15_“Mina Daniyeli, umoya wami wakhathazeka edokodweni lawo, nemibono yekhanda lami yangihlupha. 
27_7_16_Ngasondela komunye wababemi khona, ngabuza kuye iqiniso lakho konke lokhu. Wangitshela, wangazisa incazelo yezindaba. 
27_7_17_‘Lezo zilo ezinkulu ezine zingamakhosi amane ayakuvela emhlabeni. 
27_7_18_Kepha abangcwele boPhezukonke bayakwamukeliswa umbuso, umbuso ube ngowabo kuze kube phakade, yebo, kuze kube phakade naphakade.’ 
27_7_19_“Ngase ngifuna ukwazi iqiniso ngesilo sesine esahlukile kuzo zonke zazo, esesabekayo kakhulu, esimazinyo aso ayeyinsimbi, nezinzipho zaso ziyithusi, esasidla, saphula, sanyathela okuseleyo ngezinyawo; 
27_7_20_nangezimpondo eziyishumi ezazisekhanda laso, nolunye olwavelayo, ezawa phambi kwalo ezintathu, lolo phondo olwalunamehlo nomlomo owawukhuluma izinto ezinkulu, olukubonakala kwalo kwakukukhulu kunezinye. 
27_7_21_Ngisabheka, lolo phondo lwalwa nabangcwele, lwabahlula, 
27_7_22_waze wafika omdala wezinsuku, abangcwele boPhezukonke banikwa ukwahlulelwa, kwafika isikhathi sokuba umbuso ube ngowabangcwele. 
27_7_23_“Wayesethi: ‘Isilo sesine siyakuba ngumbuso wesine emhlabeni, oyakwahluka kuyo yonke imibuso, udle wonke umhlaba, uwunyathele, uwaphule. 
27_7_24_Izimpondo eziyishumi-ke, kulowo mbuso kuyakuvela amakhosi ayishumi, kuvele enye emva kwawo; iyakwahluka kwawokuqala, ithobise amakhosi amathathu. 
27_7_25_Iyakukhuluma amazwi ngoPhezukonke, ikhathaze abangcwele boPhezukonke; iyakuhlosa ukuguqula izikhathi nomthetho; bayakukhashelwa esandleni sayo kuze kube yisikhathi nezikhathi nenxenye yesikhathi. 
27_7_26_“ ‘Kepha abahluleli bayakuhlala, basuse ukubusa kwayo kudliwe, kuchithwe kuze kube sekupheleni. 
27_7_27_Umbuso nokubusa nobukhulu bemibuso phansi kwalo lonke izulu kuyakunikwa isizwe sabangcwele boPhezukonke; umbuso wakhe ungumbuso ongunaphakade; yonke imibuso iyakumkhonza, imlalele.’ 
27_7_28_“Nakhu ukuphela kwendaba. Mina Daniyeli, imicabango yami yangikhathaza kakhulu, nokucwebezela kwami kwaguquka kimi, kepha ngayigcina indaba enhliziyweni yami.” 
27_8_1_Ngomnyaka wesithathu wokubusa kwenkosi uBelishasari kwabonakala kimi mina Daniyeli umbono emva kwalokho okwabonakala kimi kuqala. 
27_8_2_Ngabona embonweni; kwase kuthi ekuboneni kwami ngangiseShushani endlini yenkosi esifundeni sase-Elamu; ngabona-ke embonweni, ngangisemfuleni i-Ulayi. 
27_8_3_Ngase ngiphakamisa amehlo ami, ngabona; bheka, kwakumi phambi komfula inqama inezimpondo ezimbili; lezo zimpondo ezimbili zazithaphile, kepha olunye lwaluthaphe kunolunye, oluthaphileyo lwavela muva. 
27_8_4_Ngabona inqama iqhubukusha ngasentshonalanga, nangasenyakatho, nangaseningizimu; kwakungekho silo ebesinokuma phambi kwayo, kwakungekho ongophula esandleni sayo, kepha yenza njengentando yayo, yazikhulisa. 
27_8_5_Ngisacabanga, bheka, kwavela impongo ngasentshonalanga ebusweni bawo wonke umhlaba, ingawuthinti umhlaba kodwa; impongo yayinophondo oluqhamileyo emkhathini wamehlo ayo. 
27_8_6_Yafika enqameni eyayinezimpondo ezimbili, engayibona imi phambi komfula, yatheleka kuyo ngokufutheka kwayo okunamandla. 
27_8_7_Ngayibona isondela kakhulu enqameni, yababa ngayo, yayishaya inqama, yazaphula izimpondo zayo ezimbili; kwakungekho mandla enqameni okuma phambi kwayo, kepha yayiphonsa phansi, yayinyathela, kwakungekho ongayophula inqama esandleni sayo. 
27_8_8_Impongo yayisizikhulisa kakhulu; kwathi lapho isinamandla, uphondo olukhulu lwaphuka; esikhundleni salo kwamila ezine ziqhamela ngasemimoyeni yomine yezulu. 
27_8_9_Kolunye lwazo kwamila uphondo oluncane olwakhula kakhulu ngaseningizimu, nangasempumalanga, nangasezweni elihle. 
27_8_10_Lwakhula kwaze kwaba nasebandleni lasezulwini, lwaphonsa phansi okunye kwebandla, okwezinkanyezi, lwakunyathela. 
27_8_11_Yebo, lwazikhulisa kwaze kwaba nasesikhulwini sebandla, lwasaphuca umnikelo oshiswa imihla yonke, nendawo yendlu yaso engcwele yaphonswa phansi. 
27_8_12_Kwabekwa impi yokulwa kanye nomnikelo oshiswa imihla yonke ngesiphambeko: lwaphonsa phansi iqiniso, lwenza njengentando yalo, lwaba nempumelelo. 
27_8_13_Ngase ngizwa ongcwele ekhuluma, nomunye ongcwele wathi kulowo owakhuluma: “Uyakuba khona kuze kube nini lo mbono womnikelo oshiswa imihla yonke, nesiphambeko esichithayo sokuba kukhashelwe indlu engcwele nempi, kunyathelwe phansi, na?” 
27_8_14_Wathi kimi: “Koze kube yizikhathi zokuhlwa nezokusa eziyizinkulungwane ezimbili namakhulu amathathu; bese yihlanjululwa indlu engcwele.” 
27_8_15_Kwathi sengiwubonile umbono mina Daniyeli, ngafuna ukuwuqonda; bheka, kwase kumi phambi kwami kungathi isimo somuntu. 
27_8_16_Ngezwa izwi lomuntu phakathi kwe-Ulayi elalimemeza lathi: “Gabriyeli, menze lo ukuba aqonde umbono.” 
27_8_17_Wayesesondela lapho ngimi khona; lapho esefika, ngashaywa luvalo, ngawa ngobuso bami; kepha wathi kimi: “Qonda, ndodana yomuntu, ngokuba umbono ungowesikhathi sokuphela.” 
27_8_18_Esakhuluma nami, ngalala ubuthongo obukhulu, ubuso bami bubheke phansi; kepha wangithinta, wangimisa lapho kade ngimi khona. 
27_8_19_Wathi: “Bheka, ngiyakukwazisa okuyakwenzeka ngasekupheleni kwentukuthelo, ngokuba kungokwesikhathi sokuphela. 
27_8_20_Inqama oyibonileyo inezimpondo ezimbili, zingamakhosi aseMediya nasePheresiya. 
27_8_21_Impongo iyinkosi yaseJavini; uphondo olukhulu olusemkhathini wamehlo ayo luyinkosi yokuqala. 
27_8_22_Kepha olwaphukileyo, esikhundleni salo okwavela ezine, kuyakuvela imibuso emine esizweni salo, ingenamandla alo kodwa. 
27_8_23_“Ekugcineni kokubusa kwayo, lapho izihlubuki seziphelele, inkosi elukhuni ngobuso, eqonda izimfumbe, iyakuvela. 
27_8_24_Iyakuba namandla amakhulu, ingenamandla eyokuqala kodwa; iyakuchitha ngokumangalisayo, iphumelele ukukwenza; iyakuchitha abanamandla nabantu abangcwele. 
27_8_25_Ngokuhlakanipha kwayo iyakuphumelelisa inkohliso esandleni sayo, izikhulise enhliziyweni yayo, ichithe abaningi ekuthuleni; iyakumelana nesikhulu sezikhulu, ichotshozwe kungengasandla. 
27_8_26_“Imibono yakusihlwa neyasekuseni esilandiwe iqinisile, kepha gcina wena umbono, ngokuba ungowezinsuku eziningi.” 
27_8_27_Mina Daniyeli ngase ngiphela amandla, ngagula izinsuku ezithile; ngavuka, ngenza umsebenzi wenkosi; ngamangala ngombono, kwakungekho owuqondayo. 
27_9_1_Ngomnyaka wokuqala kaDariyu indodana ka-Ahashiveroshi, wozalo lwamaMede, owabekwa inkosi phezu kombuso wamaKaledi, 
27_9_2_ngomnyaka wokuqala wokubusa kwakhe mina Daniyeli ngaqonda ngezincwadi umumo weminyaka elakhuluma ngawo izwi likaJehova kuJeremiya umprofethi ukuba kupheleliswe ukuchithwa kweJerusalema, iminyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa. 
27_9_3_Ngase ngibhekisa ubuso bami kuyo iNkosi uNkulunkulu ukuba ngikhuleke, nginxuse ngokuzila ukudla, nangendwangu yamasaka, nangomlotha. 
27_9_4_Ngakhuleka kuJehova uNkulunkulu wami, ngavuma ngathi: “O Nkosi, Nkulunkulu omkhulu nowesabekayo, ogcina isivumelwano nomusa kwabamthandayo nabagcina imiyalo yakhe, 
27_9_5_sonile, siziphathe kabi, senzile okubi, sihlubukile, sachezuka emiyalweni yakho nasezahlulelweni zakho; 
27_9_6_asilalelanga izinceku zakho abaprofethi ezazikhuluma egameni lakho emakhosini ethu, nasezikhulwini zethu, nakobaba, nakubo bonke abantu bezwe. 
27_9_7_“Kuwena Nkosi kukhona ukulunga, kepha kithina amahloni obuso njenganamuhla: kubantu bakwaJuda, nakwabakhileyo eJerusalema, nakuye wonke u-Israyeli, abaseduze nabakude, kuwo onke amazwe obahlakazele kuwo ngenxa yezeqo zabo abeqe ngazo kuwe. 
27_9_8_Jehova, kithina kukhona amahloni obuso: kuwo amakhosi ethu, nakuzo izikhulu zethu, nakobaba, ngokuba sonile kuwe. 
27_9_9_Kepha kuyo iNkosi, uNkulunkulu wethu, kukhona umusa nokuthethelela; ngokuba simhlubukile, 
27_9_10_asililalelanga izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wethu ukuba sihambe ngemithetho yakhe ayibeka phambi kwethu ngezinceku zakhe abaprofethi. 
27_9_11_Wonke u-Israyeli weqile umthetho wakho, echezuka ukuze bangalilaleli izwi lakho; ngalokho isiqalekiso sithululwe phezu kwethu kanye nesifungo esilotshiwe emthethweni kaMose inceku kaNkulunkulu, ngokuba sonile kuye. 
27_9_12_Uqinisile amazwi akhe awakhuluma ngathi nangabahluleli bethu abasahlulelayo ngokusehlisela okubi okukhulu, ngokuba phansi kwezulu lonke akwenziwanga njengokwenziwe kulo iJerusalema. 
27_9_13_Njengokulotshiweyo emthethweni kaMose konke lokhu okubi kusehlele, nokho asincenganga ebusweni bukaJehova uNkulunkulu wethu ukuba siphenduke ebubini bethu, siqonde iqiniso lakho. 
27_9_14_UJehova wayesebulinda ububi, wasehlisela bona, ngokuba uJehova uNkulunkulu wethu ulungile emisebenzini yakhe yonke ayenzayo, kepha asililalelanga izwi lakhe. 
27_9_15_“Manje, Nkosi, Nkulunkulu wethu, wena owakhipha abantu bakho ezweni laseGibithe ngesandla esinamandla, wazenzela igama njenganamuhla, sonile, senzile okubi. 
27_9_16_Nkosi, ngakho konke ukulunga kwakho mawubuyise intukuthelo yakho nokufutheka kwakho emzini waseJerusalema, intaba yakho engcwele, ngokuba ngenxa yezono zethu nangobubi bawobaba iJerusalema nabantu bakho sebe yihlazo kubo bonke abasizungezayo. 
27_9_17_“Kalokhu, Nkulunkulu wethu, yizwa umkhuleko wenceku yakho nokunxusa kwayo, ukhanyise ubuso bakho phezu kwendlu yakho engcwele, echithakele ngenxa yeNkosi. 
27_9_18_Nkulunkulu wami, beka indlebe yakho, uzwe; vula amehlo akho, ubheke izincithakalo zethu nomuzi obizwe ngegama lakho, ngokuba asilethi ukunxusa kwethu phambi kwakho ngenxa yokulunga kwethu kepha ngomusa wakho omkhulu. 
27_9_19_Nkosi, yizwa; Nkosi, thethelela; Nkosi, lalela, wenze; ungalibali ngenxa yakho, Nkulunkulu wami, ngokuba umuzi nabantu bakho babizwe ngegama lakho.” 
27_9_20_Ngisakhuluma ngikhuleka, ngivuma izono zami nezono zabantu bakithi u-Israyeli, ngiletha ukunxusa kwami phambi kukaJehova uNkulunkulu wami ngentaba engcwele kaNkulunkulu wami, 
27_9_21_yebo, ngisakhuluma ngomkhuleko, lowo muntu uGabriyeli engambona embonweni kuqala, endiziswa ngokushesha, wangithinta ngesikhathi somnikelo wakusihlwa. 
27_9_22_Wangiqondisa, wakhuluma nami, wathi: “Daniyeli, sengiphumile ukukuhlakaniphisa nokukuqondisa. 
27_9_23_Ekuqaleni kokunxusa kwakho izwi lavela; sengifikile ukukutshela, ngokuba uthandekile; ngalokho qonda leli zwi, uqonde nombono. 
27_9_24_“Amasonto angamashumi ayisikhombisa anqunyelwe abantu bakho nomuzi wakho ongcwele ukuqeda iziphambeko, nokukhawula izono, nokwenza ukubuyisana ngobubi, nokungenisa ukulunga okuphakade, nokunamathelisa umbono nesiprofetho, nokugcoba indlu engcwelengcwele. 
27_9_25_“Ngalokho yazi, uqonde ukuthi, kusukela ekuphumeni kwezwi lokubuyisa nokwakha iJerusalema kuze kufike ogcotshiweyo, umbusi, kuyakuba ngamasonto ayisikhombisa, lihlale lakhiwe, izitaladi zalo nogange lwalo, amasonto angamashumi ayisithupha nambili nasesikhathini sokuhlupheka. 
27_9_26_Emva kwalawo masonto angamashumi ayisithupha nambili ogcotshiweyo uyakunqunywa angabi namuntu; umuzi nendlu engcwele kuyakuchithwa ngabantu bombusi ozayo, ukuphela kwakho kube sesikhukhuleni, kube ngukulwa kuze kube sekugcineni; incithakalo inqunyiwe. 
27_9_27_Uyakuqinisa isivumelwano nabaningi isonto libe linye, imihlatshelo neminikelo ikhawuke phakathi kwesonto, kufike incithakalo ngephiko lesinengiso, kuze kuphele okunqunyiweyo, kuthululelwe phezu komchithi.” 
27_10_1_Ngomnyaka wesithathu kaKoresi, inkosi yasePheresiya, uDaniyeli ogama lakhe labizwa ngokuthi uBeliteshasari wambulelwa izwi; izwi laliqinisile, lalingukulwa okukhulu; waliqonda izwi, waqonda nombono. 
27_10_2_Ngalezo zinsuku mina, Daniyeli, ngangilila amasonto amathathu apheleleyo. 
27_10_3_Ngangingadli isinkwa esithandiweyo, nenyama newayini akungenanga emlonyeni wami, futhi angizigcobanga nakanye kwaze kwaphelela amasonto amathathu. 
27_10_4_Ngosuku lwamashumi amabili nane lwenyanga yokuqala, ngiseceleni komfula omkhulu iHidekeli, 
27_10_5_ngaphakamisa amehlo ami, ngabona; bheka, nango umuntu embethe ilineni, ebhince okhalweni igolide elicwengekileyo lase-Ufazi. 
27_10_6_Umzimba wakhe wawunjengekrisolithe, nobuso bakhe bunjengokubonakala konyazi, namehlo akhe enjengezibani zomlilo, izingalo zakhe nezinyawo zakhe zinjengokubengezela kwethusi eliphucuziweyo, nezwi lamazwi akhe linjengezwi lesixuku. 
27_10_7_Mina, Daniyeli, kuphela ngawubona umbono, ngokuba abantu ababe nami abawubonanga umbono, kepha behlelwa ngukuthuthumela okukhulu, babaleka ukuba bacashe. 
27_10_8_Ngashiywa ngedwa; ngawubona lombono omkhulu, akusalanga mandla kimi, ngokuba ubuhle bami baphenduka ukonakala kimi, angaba namandla. 
27_10_9_Ngase ngizwa izwi lamazwi akhe; lapho ngezwa izwi lamazwi akhe, ngase ngilele ubuthongo obukhulu, ubuso bami bubheke phansi. 
27_10_10_Bheka-ke, kwangithinta isandla, sangimisa ukuba ngitotobe ngamadolo ami nangezintende zezandla zami. 
27_10_11_Wathi kimi: “Daniyeli, wena muntu othandekayo, qonda amazwi engiwakhuluma kuwe, ume nokuma, ngokuba ngithunywe kuwe;” lapho esekhulumile leli zwi kimi, ngema ngithuthumela. 
27_10_12_Wayesethi kimi: “Ungesabi, Daniyeli, ngokuba kusukela osukwini lokuqala owabeka ngalo inhliziyo yakho ukuqonda nokuzithoba phambi kukaNkulunkulu wakho amazwi akho ezwiwa; mina ngifikile ngenxa yamazwi akho. 
27_10_13_Kepha isikhulu sasembusweni wasePheresiya samelana nami izinsuku ezingamashumi amabili nanye, kepha bheka, uMikayeli, omunye wezikhulu zokuqala, weza ukungisiza, noma kade ngishiyiwe ngedwa khona namakhosi asePheresiya. 
27_10_14_Sengifikile ukuba ngikuqondise okuyakwehlela abantu bakho ngezinsuku ezizayo, ngokuba umbono usenezinsuku.” 
27_10_15_Esekhulumile kimi lawo mazwi, ngabhekisa ubuso bami phansi, ngathula. 
27_10_16_Bheka, onesimo samadodana abantu wathinta izindebe zami; ngase ngiwuvula umlomo wami, ngakhuluma, ngathi komi phambi kwami: “Nkosi yami, ngenxa yombono imihelo ingehlele, angisenamandla. 
27_10_17_Inceku enje yenkosi yami ingakhuluma kanjani nenkosi yami enje na? Ngokuba mina, khona lapho akusalanga mandla kimi, nokuphefumula bekungasekho kimi.” 
27_10_18_Wabuye wangithinta obonakala njengomuntu, wangiqinisa. 
27_10_19_Wathi: “Ungesabi, muntu othandekayo; ukuthula makube kuwe; qina, yebo, mawuqine.” Lapho ekhuluma kimi, ngaqiniswa, ngathi: “Mayikhulume inkosi yami, ngokuba ungiqinisile.” 
27_10_20_Wayesethi kimi: “Uyazi ukuthi ngifikeleni kuwe na? Kepha manje ngiyakubuya ukuba ngilwe nesikhulu sasePheresiya; lapho ngiphumile kuso, siyakufika isikhulu saseJavani. 
27_10_21_Kepha ngiyakutshela okulotshwe embhalweni weqiniso. Akakho noyedwa ozihlanganisa nami ukulwa nalaba ngaphandle kukaMikayeli, isikhulu senu. 
27_11_1_Mina-ke, ngomnyaka wokuqala kaDariyu umMede, ngema ukumqinisa ukuba abe namandla. 
27_11_2_“Kalokhu ngiyakukutshela iqiniso. Bheka, kusezakuvela amakhosi amathathu ePheresiya; eyesine iyakunotha kunawo onke; isiqinile ngengcebo yayo iyakuvusa bonke ukulwa nombuso waseJavani. 
27_11_3_Kuyakuvela inkosi enamandla eyakubusa ngokubusa okukhulu, yenze njengentando yayo. 
27_11_4_Iyakwanele ukuvela nje, umbuso wayo uyakufohlozwa, wahlukaniselwe emimoyeni yomine yezulu, ungabi ngowenzalo yayo, ungabi njengasekubuseni kwayo eyabusa ngakho, ngokuba umbuso wayo uyakusishulwa, ube ngowabanye ngaphandle kwalaba. 
27_11_5_“Inkosi yaseningizimu iyakuba namandla, kanjalo esinye sezikhulu zayo, yebo, sibe namandla kunayo, sibuse, nokubusa kwaso kuyakuba ngukubusa okukhulu. 
27_11_6_Ngasekupheleni kweminyaka bayakuhlangana, kufike indodakazi yenkosi yaseningizimu enkosini yasenyakatho ukwenza isivumelwano; kepha ayiyikugcina amandla engalo, nayo inkosi ayiyikuma nengalo yayo, kodwa iyakunikelwa nabayilethayo, nowayizalayo, nowayisizayo ngalezo zikhathi. 
27_11_7_“Kepha ehlumeleni lezimpande zayo kuyakuvela omunye esikhundleni sayo oyakuya empini, angene enqabeni yenkosi yasenyakatho, amelane nabo, ahlule. 
27_11_8_Nawonkulunkulu babo kanye nezithombe zabo ezibunjiweyo nezitsha zabo ezinxanelekayo zesiliva nezegolide uyakukuthumba, akuyise eGibithe, ayiyeke inkosi yasenyakatho iminyaka ethile. 
27_11_9_Kepha yona iyakungena embusweni wenkosi yaseningizimu, kodwa iyakubuyela ezweni lakubo. 
27_11_10_Amadodana ayo ayakuhloma, abuthe isixuku sezimpi eziningi; ziyakufika nokufika, zikhukhule, zidlule; ziyakubuya, zilwe kuze kube senqabeni yayo. 
27_11_11_“Inkosi yaseningizimu iyakubaba, iphume, ilwe nenkosi yasenyakatho; iyakuveza isixuku esikhulu, isixuku sinikelwe esandleni sayo. 
27_11_12_Kepha isixuku sesisusiwe, inhliziyo yayo iyakuziphakamisa, iwise phansi izinkulungwane ezingamashumi amaningi, kepha ayiyikuba namandla. 
27_11_13_Inkosi yasenyakatho iyakubuya, iveze isixuku esikhulu kunesokuqala, ifike nokufika ngasekupheleni kwezikhathi eziyiminyaka nempi enkulu nempahla eningi. 
27_11_14_“Ngalezo zikhathi abaningi bayakuyisukela inkosi yaseningizimu, nabaphangi babantu bakho bayakuziphakamisa ukuwuqinisa umbono, kepha bayakuwa. 
27_11_15_Iyakufika inkosi yasenyakatho, inqwabele iduli, ithathe umuzi obiyelweyo; izingalo zaseningizimu aziyikuma, nabantu bayo abakhethiweyo abayikuba namandla okuma. 
27_11_16_Kepha omsukelayo uyakwenza njengentando yakhe, akakho oyakuma phambi kwakhe; uyakuma ezweni elihle, abhubhise ngesandla sakhe. 
27_11_17_Uyakubhekisa ubuso bakhe ukufika namandla ombuso wakhe wonke kanye nezivumelwano, azenze; uyakumnika indodakazi yabesifazane, ayonakalise, kepha ayiyikuma, ingabi ngowakhe. 
27_11_18_Useyakubuphendulela ubuso bakhe eziqhingini, athathe eziningi, kepha isikhulu siyakuqeda ihlazo elenziwa nguye, futhi sibuyisele ihlazo lakhe kuye. 
27_11_19_Useyakubuphendulela ubuso bakhe ezinqabeni zezwe lakubo, kepha uyakukhubeka, awe, angabe esafunyanwa. 
27_11_20_“Bese kuvela esikhundleni sakhe oyakudlulisa umthelisi emhlobisweni wombuso, kepha ngezinsuku eziyingcosana uyakubhujiswa, kungabi ngolaka nangokulwa kodwa. 
27_11_21_“Esikhundleni sakhe kuyakuvela odelelekileyo abangamnikanga udumo lobukhosi; uyakufika ngesikhathi sokuthula, athathe umbuso ngobushelezi. 
27_11_22_Ngengalo yesifufula bayakukhukhulwa ebusweni bakhe, babhujiswe, yebo, nesikhulu sesivumelwano. 
27_11_23_Emva kokuvumelana naye uyakusebenza ngenkohliso, ngokuba uyakukhuphuka, abe namandla enesizwe esincane nje. 
27_11_24_Ngesikhathi sokuthula uyakusukela izindawo ezinonileyo zesifunda, akwenze okungenziwanga ngoyise nangoyisemkhulu: uyakuhlakaza phakathi kwabo impango, nengcugco, nempahla, acebe amacebo ngezinqaba kube yisikhathi. 
27_11_25_“Uyakuvusela inkosi yaseningizimu amandla akhe nesibindi sakhe ngempi enkulu, inempi enkulu enamandla impela; kepha ayiyikuma, ngokuba bayakuceba amacebo ngayo. 
27_11_26_Abadla ukudla kwayo okumnandi bayakuyibhubhisa, impi yayo ikhukhulwe; abaningi bayakuwa phansi begwaziwe. 
27_11_27_Amakhosi-ke omabili, izinhliziyo zawo ziyakuba ngezokwenza okubi; ayakukhuluma amanga esetafuleni linye, kepha akuyikuphumelela, ngokuba ukuphela kusezakuba sesikhathini esimisiweyo. 
27_11_28_Bese ibuyela ezweni lakubo inempahla enkulu, inhliziyo yayo imelane nesivumelwano esingcwele; isikwenzile iyakubuyela ezweni lakubo. 
27_11_29_“Ngesikhathi esinqunyiweyo iyakubuya, iye eningizimu; kepha akuyikuba sekugcineni njengasekuqaleni. 
27_11_30_Imikhumbi yaseKitimi iyakuyisukela; bese idabuka, ibuye ithukuthelele isivumelwano esingcwele, ifeze; iyakubuya, inake abasishiyile isivumelwano esingcwele. 
27_11_31_“Izimpi ziyakuvela nayo, zingcolise indlu engcwele, inqaba, zisuse umnikelo oshiswa imihla yonke, zimise isinengiso esichithayo. 
27_11_32_Iyakonakalisa ngokuthopha abaphatha kabi isivumelwano, kepha abantu abamaziyo uNkulunkulu wabo bayakuba namandla, baphikelele. 
27_11_33_“Abahlakaniphileyo babantu bayakuqondisa abaningi; kepha bayakuwa ngenkemba, nangelangabi, nangokuthunjwa, nangokuphangwa izinsuku eziningi. 
27_11_34_Ekuweni kwabo bayakusizwa ngokusizwa okuncane, bese bebambelela kubo abaningi ngokuthopha. 
27_11_35_Abanye kwabahlakaniphileyo bayakuwa ukuba bacwengisiswe, bahlanzwe, benziwe mhlophe kuze kube sesikhathini sokuphela, ngokuba kusezakuba sesikhathini esimisiweyo. 
27_11_36_“Inkosi iyakwenza njengentando yayo, iziphakamise, izikhulise phezu kwabo bonke onkulunkulu, ikhulume okumangalisayo ngoNkulunkulu wawonkulunkulu, ibe nenhlanhla luze luphelele ulaka, ngokuba okumisiweyo kuyakwenziwa. 
27_11_37_Ayiyikunakekela onkulunkulu bawoyise nofiswa yisifazane, inganaki nonkulunkulu oyedwa, ngokuba iyakuzikhulisa phezu kwabo bonke. 
27_11_38_Kepha unkulunkulu wezinqaba uyakumdumisa esikhundleni sabo, nonkulunkulu ababengamazi oyise uyakumdumisa ngegolide, nangesiliva, nangamatshe anqabileyo nangokunye okuthandiweyo. 
27_11_39_Iyakwenze njalo ezinqabeni ezinamandla inonkulunkulu ongowabezizwe; omvumayo iyakumandisela udumo, imenze ukuba abuse abaningi, imahlukanisele izwe libe ngumvuzo wakhe. 
27_11_40_“Ngesikhathi sokuphela inkosi yaseningizimu iyakuqhubukushana nayo; inkosi yasenyakatho isiyakuvunguzela yona ngezinqola, nangabamahhashi, nangemikhumbi eminingi, ingene emazweni amaningi, ikhukhule, idlule. 
27_11_41_Iyakungena nasezweni elihle, namanye amaningi ayakukhubeka, kepha lana ayakophulwa esandleni sayo: o-Edomi, noMowabi, nemvama yabantwana bakwa-Amoni.11:41 Dan. 8:9; 11:16. 
27_11_42_Iyakwelulela isandla emazweni, nezwe laseGibithe aliyikubaleka. 
27_11_43_Iyakubusa phezu kwengcebo yegolide nesiliva, naphezu kwakho konke okuthandiweyo kwaseGibithe; amaLubi namaKushe ayakuba sezinyathelweni zayo. 
27_11_44_Iyakwethuswa yimibiko evela empumalanga nasenyakatho; iyakuphuma ngokufutheka okukhulu ukuchitha nokubhubhisa abaningi. 
27_11_45_Iyakumisa itende lendlu yayo yobukhosi phakathi kolwandle nentaba enhle engcwele; kepha iya nokho ekupheleni kwayo, akakho ongayisiza. 
27_12_1_“Ngaleso sikhathi uMikayeli uyakuvela, isikhulu esigqamileyo esimela abantwana babantu bakho; kuyakuba yisikhathi sokuhlupheka esingazange sibe khona kusukela ekuveleni kwabantu kuze kube yileso sikhathi; ngaleso sikhathi abantu bakho bayakukhululwa, bonke abafunyanwa belotshiwe encwadini. 
27_12_2_Abaningi abalele emhlabathini wothuli bayakuvuka, abanye bavukele ukuphila okuphakade, abanye ihlazo nokunengwa okuphakade. 
27_12_3_Abahlakaniphileyo bayakukhanya njengokukhazimula kwesibhakabhaka, nabaphendulela abaningi ekulungeni njengezinkanyezi kuze kube phakade naphakade. 
27_12_4_Kepha wena Daniyeli, gcina amazwi, unamathelise incwadi kuze kube sesikhathini sokugcina; abaningi bayakwehla benyuka, ukwazi kube kuningi.” 
27_12_5_Ngase ngibona mina Daniyeli; bheka, kwakumi abanye ababili, omunye ogwini lomfula nganeno, omunye ogwini lomfula ngaphesheya. 
27_12_6_Omunye wathi kumuntu owembethe ilineni, owayephezu kwamanzi omfula: “Kuyakuba nini ukuphela kwalezi zimangaliso na?” 
27_12_7_Ngezwa umuntu owembethe ilineni, owayephezu kwamanzi omfula; waphakamisela isandla sakhe sokunene nesandla sakhe sokhohlo ezulwini, wamfunga ophila kuze kube phakade ukuthi kuyakuba ngokwesikhathi, nezikhathi, nenxenye, nalapho sebeqedile ukuphohloza amandla abantu abangcwele, zonke lezo zinto ziyakuqedwa. 
27_12_8_Ngakuzwa, kepha angiqondanga; bese ngithi: “Nkosi yami, ukuphela kwalokho kuyakuba yini na?” 
27_12_9_Wathi: “Hamba, Daniyeli, ngokuba amazwi avalelwe, anamathelisiwe kuze kube sesikhathini sokugcina. 
27_12_10_Abaningi bayakuzihlanza, bazenze mhlophe, bacwengisiswe, kepha ababi bayakwenza kabi, kodwa akayikuqonda noyedwa omubi; nokho abahlakaniphileyo bayakuqonda. 
27_12_11_“Kusukela esikhathini sokususwa komnikelo oshiswa imihla yonke nokumiswa kwesinengiso esichithayo kuyakuba yizinsuku eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amabili namashumi ayisishiyagalolunye. 
27_12_12_Ubusisiwe olindayo afinyelele ezinsukwini eziyinkulungwane namakhulu amathathu namashumi amathathu nanhlanu. 
27_12_13_“Kepha hamba wena kuze kube sekupheleni; usuphumulile uyakuma esabelweni sakho ngasekupheleni kwezinsuku.” 
28_1_1_Izwi likaJehova elafika kuHoseya indodana kaBeri ezinsukwini zawo-Uziya, noJothamu, no-Ahazi, noHezekiya, amakhosi akwaJuda, nasezinsukwini zikaJerobowamu indodana kaJowashi, inkosi yakwa-Israyeli. 
28_1_2_Lapho uJehova eqala ukukhuluma ngoHoseya, uJehova wathi kuHoseya: “Hamba uzithathele umfazi ophingayo nabantwana bophingayo, ngokuba izwe liyaphinga nokuphinga ngokungamlandeli uJehova.” 
28_1_3_Wayesehamba, wathatha uGomere indodakazi kaDibilayimi; wakhulelwa, wamzalela indodana. 
28_1_4_UJehova wathi kuye: “Qamba igama layo ngokuthi uJizreyeli, ngokuba kusezakuba yisikhashana ngize ngiphindisele igazi likaJizreyeli phezu kwendlu kaJehu, ngiqede umbuso wendlu ka-Israyeli. 
28_1_5_Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku ngaphule umnsalo ka-Israyeli esigodini saseJizreyeli.” 
28_1_6_Wabuye wakhulelwa, wazala indodakazi. Wayesethi uJehova kuye: “Qamba igama layo ngokuthi uLo Ruhama, ngokuba angisayikuyihawukela indlu yakwa-Israyeli ukuba ngibathethelele. 
28_1_7_Kepha indlu yakwaJuda ngiyakuyihawukela, ngibasindise ngoJehova uNkulunkulu wabo, ngingabasindisi ngomnsalo, nangenkemba, nangokulwa, nangamahhashi, nangabamahhashi.” 
28_1_8_Esemlumulile uLo Ruhama, wakhulelwa, wazala indodana. 
28_1_9_Wayesethi uJehova: “Qamba igama layo ngokuthi uLo-Ami, ngokuba anisibo abantu bami, mina angiyikuba nguNkulunkulu wenu. 
28_1_10_“Nokho umumo wabantwana bakwa-Israyeli uyakuba ngangesihlabathi solwandle esingenakulinganiswa, singenakubalwa; kuyakuthi esikhundleni sokuba kuthiwe kubo: ‘Anisibo abantu bami,’ kuthiwe kubo: ‘Ningamadodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo.’ 
28_1_11_Abantwana bakwaJuda nabantwana bakwa-Israyeli bayakubuthana ndawonye, bazimisele inhloko ibe nye, bakhuphuke ezweni, ngokuba luyakuba lukhulu usuku lukaJizreyeli. 
28_2_1_“Bese nibiza abafowenu ngokuthi u-Ami, nawodadewenu ngokuthi uRuhama. 
28_2_2_“Phikisanani nonyoko, niphikisane, ngokuba akasiye umkami, nami angisiyo indoda yakhe; makasuse ubufebe bakhe ebusweni bakhe, nokuphinga kwakhe phakathi kwamabele akhe, 
28_2_3_funa ngimhlubule abe nqunu, ngimenze njengasosukwini lokuzalwa kwakhe, ngimenze ihlane, ngimbeke abe njengezwe elomileyo, ngimbulale ngokoma. 
28_2_4_Angiyikuhawukela abantwana bakhe, ngokuba bangabantwana bobufebe. 
28_2_5_Ngokuba unina ufebile, ngokuba wathi: ‘Ngiyakulandela izithandwa zami ezinginika isinkwa sami namanzi ami, uboya bami bezimvu nefilakisi lami, amafutha ami nokuphuza kwami.’ 
28_2_6_Ngalokho bhekani, ngiyakuvimbela indlela yakho ngameva, ngakhe ugange ngakuye, ukuze angafumani imikhondo yakhe. 
28_2_7_Uyakulandela izithandwa zakhe, kepha akayikuzifica; uyakuzifuna, kepha akayikuzifumana; abesethi: ‘Ngiyakuhamba ngibuyele endodeni yami yokuqala, ngokuba kwakukuhle kimi lapho kunamanje.’ 
28_2_8_Kepha akazanga ukuthi yimina engamnika amabele, newayini elisha, namafutha, ngamandisela isiliva negolide abenza ngakho uBali. 
28_2_9_“Ngalokho ngiyakubuye ngithabathe amabele ami ngesikhathi sawo, newayini lami elisha ngenkathi yalo, ngisuse uboya bami bezimvu nefilakisi lami lokusibekela ubunqunu bakhe. 
28_2_10_Sengiyakwambula ihlazo lakhe emehlweni ezithandwa zakhe; akuyikubakho omophula esandleni sami. 
28_2_11_Ngiyakwenza ukuba iphele yonke intokozo yakhe, imikhosi yakhe, nokwethwasa kwenyanga, namasabatha akhe, nayo yonke imikhosi yakhe emisiweyo. 
28_2_12_Ngiyakuchitha imivini yakhe nemikhiwane yakhe ashilo ngakho, wathi: ‘Kuyinkokhelo yami ezinginikile yona izithandwa zami;’ ngiyakukwenza kube yihlathi, izilwane zasendle zikudle. 
28_2_13_Ngiyakumhambela ngenxa yezinsuku zawoBali owabashisela ngazo impepho, wahloba ngamacici akhe nangezinto zakhe ezinhle, wazilandela izithandwa zakhe, wangikhohlwa, usho uJehova. 
28_2_14_“Ngalokho bhekani, ngiyakumyenga, ngimyise ehlane, ngimqunge isibindi. 
28_2_15_Lapho ngiyakumnika izivini zakhe, nesigodi sase-Akori sibe ngumnyango wethemba; uyakuphendula lapho njengasezinsukwini zobusha bakhe nasosukwini lokukhuphuka kwakhe ezweni laseGibithe. 
28_2_16_“Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova, “ungibize ngokuthi: ‘YiNdoda yami,’ ungasangibizi ngokuthi: ‘NguBali wami.’ 
28_2_17_Ngiyakususa amagama awoBali emlonyeni wakhe, bangabe besakhunjulwa ngamagama abo. 
28_2_18_Ngalolo suku ngiyakubenzela isivumelwano nezilwane zasendle, nezinyoni zezulu nezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo emhlabeni, ngaphule umnsalo nenkemba nokulwa ukuba kusuke ezweni, ngibalalise belondekile. 
28_2_19_Ngiyakuzimisela wena ube ngumkami kuze kube phakade, ngizimisele wena ngokulunga, nangokwahlulela, nangomusa, nangobubele. 
28_2_20_Ngiyakuzimisela wena ngokuthembeka ube ngumkami; uyakumazi uJehova. 
28_2_21_“Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku ngiphendule,” usho uJehova, “ngiphendule amazulu, wona aphendule umhlaba. 
28_2_22_Umhlaba uyakuphendula amabele, newayini elisha, namafutha, khona kuphendule uJizreyeli. 
28_2_23_Ngiyakuzitshalela yena ezweni, ngihawukele ongahawukelwanga, ngithi kwababengesibo abantu bami: ‘Ningabantu bami,’ bona bathi: ‘UnguNkulunkulu wethu.’ ” 
28_3_1_UJehova wathi kimi: “Hamba futhi, umthande owesifazane othandwa ngumngane wakhe, eyisiphingikazi, njengalokhu uJehova ethanda abantwana bakwa-Israyeli, noma bephendukela kwabanye onkulunkulu, bethanda izigaxa zezithelo zomvini ezomileyo.” 
28_3_2_Ngase ngizithengela yena ngezinhlamvu eziyishumi nanhlanu zesiliva, nangehomere lebhali, nangenxenye yehomere lebhali, 
28_3_3_ngathi kuye: “Uyakuhlala kimi izinsuku eziningi, ungafebi, ungabi ngowomunye, nami ngibe njalo kuwe.” 
28_3_4_Ngokuba izinsuku eziningi abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bayakuhlala bengenankosi, bengenasikhulu, bengenamhlatshelo, bengenansika, bengenangubo yamahlombe namatherafi. 
28_3_5_Ngasemuva abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bayakubuya, bamfune uJehova uNkulunkulu wabo noDavide inkosi yabo, babuyele kuJehova benovalo nakukho okuhle kwakhe ngezinsuku ezizayo. 
28_4_1_Yizwani izwi likaJehova nina bantwana bakwa-Israyeli, ngokuba uJehova unokuphikisana nabakhileyo ezweni, lokhu kungekho qiniso, namusa, nakumazi uNkulunkulu ezweni. 
28_4_2_“Kukhona ukufunga nokuqamba amanga, nokubulala, nokweba, nokuphinga; bayafohla, izingazi zilandele izingazi. 
28_4_3_Ngalokho izwe liyakudabuka, bonke abakhe kulo badangale kanye nezilwane zasendle nezinyoni zezulu; yebo, nezinhlanzi zolwandle ziyakususwa. 
28_4_4_“Makungabikho ophikisana nomunye, asole omunye; nokho abantu bakho bayakuphikisana nabapristi. 
28_4_5_Mpristi, uyakukhubeka emini, kukhubeke umprofethi kanye nawe ebusuku; nonyoko ngiyakumbhubhisa. 
28_4_6_Abantu bami babhujiswa ngokuswela ukwazi; ngokuba ukulahlile ukwazi nami ngiyakukulahla wena, ungabi ngumpristi wami; lokhu ukhohliwe umthetho kaNkulunkulu wakho nami ngiyakukhohlwa abantwana bakho. 
28_4_7_Njengokwanda kwabo, kanjalo bona kimi; udumo lwabo ngiyakulwenana ngehlazo. 
28_4_8_Badla izono zabantu bami, babhekisa umphefumulo wabo ebubini babo. 
28_4_9_Kuyakuthi njengabantu abe njalo umpristi: ngiyakubahambela ngenxa yezindlela zabo, ngibuyisele kubo izenzo zabo. 
28_4_10_“Bayakudla, bangasuthi kodwa; bayakufeba, bangandi kodwa, ngokuba bayekile ukumnakekela uJehova. 
28_4_11_Ubufebe newayini newayini elisha kususa umqondo. 
28_4_12_Abantu bami babuza emthini, induku yabo ibatshele, ngokuba umoya wobufebe ubadukisile, basuka phansi kukaNkulunkulu wabo ngokufeba. 
28_4_13_Bayahlabela eziqongweni zezintaba, bashisa impepho emagqumeni, phansi kwama-oki nemipopula nemitherebinte, ngokuba umthunzi wakho muhle; kungalokho amadodakazi enu ayafeba, nawomakoti benu bayaphinga. 
28_4_14_“Angiyikuwajezisa amadodakazi enu, lapho efeba, nawomakoti benu lapho bephinga, ngokuba namadoda achezukela iziphingi, ahlaba kanye nezifebe zethempeli. Kanjalo abantu abangenangqondo bayakuwiswa. 
28_4_15_“Noma wena Israyeli ufeba, uJuda makangazitholeli icala; ningayi eGiligali, ningenyukeli eBeti Aveni, ningafungi ngokuthi: ‘Kuphila kukaJehova.’ 
28_4_16_Ngokuba u-Israyeli unenkani njengesithole; uJehova angabelusa njengemvana endaweni ebanzi na? 
28_4_17_U-Efrayimi uhlangene nezithombe; myeke. 
28_4_18_Ukuphuza kwabo sekuphelile; bayafeba nokufeba; izikhulu zabo zithandisisa ihlazo. 
28_4_19_Umoya ubasongile ngamaphiko awo; bayakujabha ngemihlatshelo yabo. 
28_5_1_“Yizwani lokhu nina bapristi, nilalele nina ndlu ka-Israyeli, nibeke indlebe nina ndlu yenkosi, ngokuba ukwahlulela kukinina, lokhu nanilugibe eMispa nenetha elenekwe eThabori. 
28_5_2_Abahlubuki bashone phansi ngokuhlaba kwabo, kepha ngingumlayi wabo bonke. 
28_5_3_Ngiyamazi mina u-Efrayimi, u-Israyeli akafihlekile kimi, ngokuba manje, Efrayimi, ufebile, u-Israyeli uzingcolisile. 
28_5_4_“Abenzi izenzo zokuba babuyele kuNkulunkulu, ngokuba umoya wobufebe uphakathi kwabo, noJehova abamazi. 
28_5_5_Ukuzidla kuka-Israyeli kuyafakaza ebusweni bakhe; o-Israyeli no-Efrayimi bayakukhubeka ngobubi babo; naye uJuda uyakukhubeka kanye nabo. 
28_5_6_Bayakuhamba nezimvu zabo nezinkomo zabo ukuyofuna uJehova; kepha abayikumfumana; umonyukile kubo. 
28_5_7_Bamkhohlisile uJehova, ngokuba bazalile abantwana abangabafokazi; manje inyanga eyethwasayo iyakubadla kanye nezabelo zabo. 
28_5_8_“Bethani umtshingo eGibeya necilongo eRama; hlabani umkhosi eBeti Aveni: basemva kwakho, Benjamini! 
28_5_9_U-Efrayimi uyakuba yincithakalo ngosuku lokujeziswa, ngazisile izizwe zakwa-Israyeli okuqinisekileyo. 
28_5_10_Izikhulu zakwaJuda zinjengabasusa imincele; ngiyakuthulula phezu kwazo intukuthelo yami njengamanzi. 
28_5_11_U-Efrayimi ucindezelekile, uchotshoziwe ekwahlulelweni, ngokuba wavuma ukulandela umyalo oyize. 
28_5_12_Mina-ke senginjengenundu ku-Efrayimi, nanjengokubola kuyo indlu yakwaJuda. 
28_5_13_“Lapho u-Efrayimi abona isifo sakhe noJuda isilonda sakhe, u-Efrayimi waya e-Asiriya, wathumela enkosini uJarebi; kepha ingeniphulukise, ayinakusipholisa isilonda senu. 
28_5_14_Ngokuba ngiyakuba njengengonyama ku-Efrayimi, nebhongo lengonyama kuyo indlu yakwaJuda; mina yebo, mina ngiyakudwengula, besengimuka; ngiyakususa, kungekho owophulayo. 
28_5_15_Ngiyakuhamba, ngibuyele endaweni yami, baze bazithwese icala labo, bafune ubuso bami; osizini lwabo bayakungifunisisa.” 
28_6_1_“Wozani sibuyele kuJehova, ngokuba yena usidwengulile; uyakusiphulukisa; usishayile, uyakusibopha. 
28_6_2_Uyakusiphilisa ngezinsuku ezimbili, asivuse ngosuku lwesithathu, siphile phambi kwakhe. 
28_6_3_Masimazi, sijonge ukumazi uJehova; ukuphuma kwakhe kuqinisekile njengokusa; uyakufika kithi njengemvula, njengemvula yamuva enethisa umhlaba. 
28_6_4_“Ngiyakwenzani kuwe Efrayimi, ngiyakwenzani kuwe Juda, na? Uthando lwenu lunjengefu lokusa nanjengamazolo amuka ekuseni. 
28_6_5_Ngalokho ngiyabashaya ngabaprofethi, ngibabulale ngamazwi omlomo wami, ukwahlulelwa kwakho kuqhame ekukhanyeni. 
28_6_6_Ngokuba ngifuna uthando, hhayi umhlatshelo; ngifuma ukumazi uNkulunkulu kuneminikelo yokushiswa. 
28_6_7_Kepha baseqile isivumelwano njengo-Adamu; bangikhohlisa ngalokho. 
28_6_8_IGileyadi lingumuzi wabenza okubi, linemikhondo yegazi. 
28_6_9_Njengabaphangi beqamekela umuntu, isigaba sabapristi siyabulala endleleni eya eShekemi, yebo, benza okunengekayo. 
28_6_10_Endlini yakwa-Israyeli ngibonile into eyesabekayo: kukhona ubufebe kwa-Efrayimi, u-Israyeli ungcolile. 
28_6_11_“Nawe Juda ulungiselwe ukuvunwa, lapho ngibuyisa ukuthunjwa kwabantu bami. 
28_7_1_“Lapho bengiyakumphulukisa u-Israyeli, bambulelwa ububi buka-Efrayimi nokubi kweSamariya, ngokuba benza inkohliso, amasela ayafohla, nabaphangi baphanga ngaphandle. 
28_7_2_Abacabangi ezinhliziyweni zabo ukuthi ngiyakhumbula konke okubi kwabo; sebezungeziwe yizenzo zabo, ziphambi kobuso bami. 
28_7_3_“Ngobubi babo bayathokozisa inkosi, nezikhulu ngamanga abo. 
28_7_4_Bayiziphingi bonke; banjengeziko elishiswa ngumphekisinkwa oyeka ukukhwezela kusukela ekuxovweni kwenhlama kuze kube sekubileni kwayo. 
28_7_5_Ngosuku lwenkosi yethu izikhulu zazigulisa ngokushisa kwewayini; yona yayiselulela izideleli isandla. 
28_7_6_Lapho sebeshisile izinhliziyo zabo ngamacebo zibe njengeziko, umphekisinkwa wabo ulala ubusuku bonke; ekuseni liyavutha njengomlilo wamalangabi. 
28_7_7_Bonke bashisa njengeziko, badla abahluleli babo; onke amakhosi abo ayawa, kungekho phakathi kwabo ongibizayo. 
28_7_8_“U-Efrayimi uyazihlanganisa nabanye abantu: u-Efrayimi uyiqebelengwane elingaphendulwanga. 
28_7_9_Abafokazi badlile amandla akhe, kepha yena akazi; izimvi zikhahlele kuye, kepha yena akazi. 
28_7_10_Ukuzidla kuka-Israyeli kuyafakaza ebusweni bakhe, nokho ababuyelanga kuJehova uNkulunkulu wabo, abamfunanga kukho konke lokhu. 
28_7_11_“U-Efrayimi unjengejuba elidukiswayo lingenangqondo; bayabiza iGibithe, baya e-Asiriya. 
28_7_12_Lapho sebehamba, ngiyabenekela inetha lami, ngibehlise njengezinyoni zezulu, ngibajezise njengokuzwakeleyo ebandleni labo. 
28_7_13_Maye kubo, ngokuba bangibalekele! Makube ngukuchithwa kubo, ngokuba baphambukile kimi! Bengiyakubahlenga mina labo abakhulume amanga ngami na? 
28_7_14_Abakhalanga kimi ngezinhliziyo zabo, kepha bahhewula emibhedeni yabo; banovalo ngamabele abo nangewayini labo, kepha mina bayangihlubuka. 
28_7_15_Mina-ke ngafundisa, ngaqinisa izingalo zabo, nokho baceba okubi ngami. 
28_7_16_Bayabuyela, kepha hhayi kongaPhezulu, bafana nomnsalo ogejayo; izikhulu ziyakuwa ngenkemba ngenxa yolaka lolimi lwabo. Lokhu kuyakuba yinhlekiso yabo ezweni laseGibithe. 
28_8_1_“Beka icilongo emlonyeni wakho; onjengokhozi wehlela indlu kaJehova; ngokuba beqile isivumelwano sami, baphambuka emthethweni wami. 
28_8_2_Bakhala kimi ngokuthi: ‘Nkulunkulu wethu, thina Israyeli siyakwazi.’ 
28_8_3_U-Israyeli ukulahlile okuhle; isitha siyakumxosha. 
28_8_4_Bona bazibekela amakhosi engavelanga kimi; bamisa izikhulu, ngingazi; isiliva labo negolide labo bakwenza kwaba yizithombe zabo, ukuze banqunywe. 
28_8_5_Ithole lakho, Samariya, linengekile; intukuthelo yami iyabavuthela; koze kube nini bengakwazi ukuba msulwa na? 
28_8_6_Ngokuba livela ku-Israyeli; umkhandi walenza, alisiye uNkulunkulu; yebo, ithole laseSamariya liyakuba yizihlephu. 
28_8_7_“Ngokuba bahlwanyele umoya, bayakuvuna isivunguvungu; izele alinahlumela, alivezi impuphu; uma liyiveza, iyakuqedwa ngabafokazi. 
28_8_8_U-Israyeli uyagwinywa; manje sebephakathi kwabezizwe njengesitsha okungekho intokozo kuso. 
28_8_9_Ngokuba benyukele e-Asiriya bezihambele njengezimbongolo zasendle; u-Efrayimi uyaqasha ngenkokhelo yothando. 
28_8_10_Noma beqasha phakathi kwabezizwe, manje sengiyakubabutha, bakhululwe kancane emthwalweni wenkosi yezikhulu. 
28_8_11_“Ngokuba u-Efrayimi wandisile ama-altare aba ngukona; ama-altare ayakuba ngukona kuye. 
28_8_12_Noma ngimlobela imithetho yami kaningi, iyashaywa okungaziwayo. 
28_8_13_Imihlatshelo yeminikelo yami bayihlaba, bayidle inyama, kepha uJehova akayenameli. Useyakhumbula ububi babo, abahambele ngezono zabo, babuyele eGibithe. 
28_8_14_Ngokuba u-Israyeli ukhohliwe uMdali wakhe, wakha izindlu zamakhosi, noJuda wandisile imizi ebiyelweyo, ngiyakuthuma umlilo emizini yakhe, uqede izindlu zayo zobukhosi.” 
28_9_1_Ungajabuli, Israyeli, kube ngukuthokoza njengokwabezizwe, ngokuba umukile kuNkulunkulu wakho ngokufeba, wathanda inkokhelo kuzo zonke izibuya zamabele. 
28_9_2_Isibuya nesikhamo sewayini akuyikubafunza, iwayini elisha liyakumkhohlisa. 
28_9_3_Abayikuhlala ezweni likaJehova; u-Efrayimi uyakubuyela eGibithe, nase-Asiriya bayakudla okungcolileyo. 
28_9_4_Abayikuthululela uJehova iwayini; imihlatshelo yabo ayiyikuba mihle kuye, isinkwa sabo sibe njengesinkwa sabalilayo; bonke abasidlayo bayakungcola, ngokuba isinkwa sabo siyakuba ngesephango, singangeni endlini kaJehova. 
28_9_5_Niyakwenze njani ngosuku lomhlangano nangosuku lomkhosi kaJehova na? 
28_9_6_Bhekani, ngokuba bemukile ekuchithweni iGibithe liyakubabutha, iMofi libembele; izinto zabo zamagugu zesiliva ziyakudliwa yizimbabazane, kube ngameva ematendeni abo. 
28_9_7_Ziyafika izinsuku zokuhanjelwa, izinsuku zempindiselo zisondele; u-Israyeli uyakukwazi. Umprofethi uyakuba njengesiwula, umuntu onomoya ahlanye ngenxa yobuningi bobubi bakho nangobutha obukhulu; 
28_9_8_umprofethi engumlindi ka-Efrayimi kanye noNkulunkulu wami, ugibe lomthiyi wezinyoni lukuzo zonke izindlela zakhe, nobutha busendlini kaNkulunkulu wakhe. 
28_9_9_Bazonakalisile ngokujulileyo njengasezinsukwini zaseGibeya; uyakhumbula ububi babo, uyabahambela ngezono zabo. 
28_9_10_“Ngamfumana u-Israyeli njengezithelo zomvini ehlane, ngabona oyihlo njengolibo emkhiwaneni ngesikhathi sawo sokuqala. Kepha bafika eBali Peyori, bazahlukanisela okunezinhloni, baba yizinengiso njengalokho abakuthandayo. 
28_9_11_Udumo luka-Efrayimi luyakundiza, lumuke njengenyoni, kungabikho ukuzala, nonesisu, nokukhulelwa. 
28_9_12_Noma bekhulisa abantwana babo, nokho ngiyakubaphuca bona kungasali muntu; yebo, maye kubo, lapho ngimuka kubo! 
28_9_13_U-Efrayimi, njengalokho ngibone eTire, utshalwe endaweni emnandi, kepha u-Efrayimi uyakukhiphela umbulali abantwana bakhe. 
28_9_14_“Banike, Jehova uyakunikani? Banike isisu esiphuphumayo namabele omileyo. 
28_9_15_“Bonke ububi babo buseGiligali; ngalokho ngabazonda khona; ngenxa yobubi bezenzo zabo ngiyakubaxosha endlini yami, angisayikubathanda; zonke izikhulu zabo zingabahlubuki. 
28_9_16_U-Efrayimi ushayiwe, impande yabo yomile, abayikuthela izithelo. Noma bezala, ngiyakubulala okuthandekayo kwesisu sabo.” 
28_9_17_UNkulunkulu wami uyakubalahla, ngokuba abamlalelanga, babe ngabazulazulayo phakathi kwabezizwe. 
28_10_1_U-Israyeli wayengumvini owenabileyo, ngokobuningi bezithelo zakhe wandisa ama-altare akhe; ngokobuhle bezwe lakhe wenza izinsuku ezinhle. 
28_10_2_Inhliziyo yabo yayahlukene; uyakuwaphula ama-altare abo, achithe izinsika zabo. 
28_10_3_Yebo, manje bayakuthi: “Asinankosi, ngokuba asimesabanga uJehova; kepha inkosi ingasenzelani na?” 
28_10_4_Bakhuluma amazwi nje, befunga amanga, benza isivumelwano; bese kumila ukwahlulela njengenhlungunyembe emiseleni yamasimu. 
28_10_5_Abakhileyo eSamariya bayakuba novalo ngenxa yamathole aseBeti Aveni, ngokuba abantu balo bayakulila ngawo, abapristi bezithombe bakhale ngawo ngenxa yodumo lwawo ukuthi lumukile kuwo. 
28_10_6_Iyakuyiswa e-Asiriya ibe yisipho kuyo inkosi uJarebi; u-Efrayimi uyakwamukela ihlazo, u-Israyeli ajabhe ngeziluleko zakhe. 
28_10_7_Inyamalele inkosi yaseSamariya njengebazelo ebusweni bamanzi. 
28_10_8_Izindawo eziphakemeyo zase-Aveni, isono sakwa-Israyeli, ziyakuchithwa; ameva namakhakhasi ayakukhuphukela ema-altare abo; bayakuthi kuzo izintaba: “Sisibekeleni,” nakuwo amagquma: “Welani phezu kwethu.” 
28_10_9_“Kwasezinsukwini zaseGibeya wonile, Israyeli; bema khona; impi nabo abobubi ayiyikubafica eGibeya na? 
28_10_10_Lapho ngithanda, ngiyabajezisa; abantu babahlanganyele ekubabopheleni ebubini obubili. 
28_10_11_U-Efrayimi uyisithole esifundisiweyo, esithanda ukubhula amabele; kepha mina ngiyekile intamo yaso enhle; sengiyakumbophela u-Efrayimi, uJuda alime, uJakobe azidubele. 
28_10_12_Zihlwanyeleleni ngokulunga, niyakuvuna ngomusa; qathani umqatho wenu; sekuyisikhathi sokumfuna uJehova, aze afike, anise ukulunga phezu kwenu. 
28_10_13_Nilime ububi, navuna okubi; nidlile izithelo zamanga, ngokuba nethemba endleleni yenu nakubo ubuningi bamaqhawe enu. 
28_10_14_Kuyakuvela ukuxokozela phakathi kwabantu bakho, zichithwe zonke izinqaba zakho, njengalokho uShalimani achitha iBeti Aribeli ngosuku lokulwa, unina echotshozwa phezu kwabantwana. 
28_10_15_Kanjalo iBethele liyakwenza kini ngenxa yobubi benu obukhulu; ekuseni inkosi yakwa-Israyeli iyakunqunywa nokunqunywa. 
28_11_1_“Lapho u-Israyeli esengumntwana ngamthanda, ngayibiza indodana yami iphume eGibithe. 
28_11_2_Lapho bebabiza, kwaba yilokhu besuka kubo; babahlabela oBali, bashisela izithombe ezibaziweyo impepho. 
28_11_3_Nokho mina ngamcathulisa u-Efrayimi; ngabaphatha ngezingalo zami, kepha abazanga ukuthi ngabaphulukisa. 
28_11_4_Ngabadonsa ngezintambo zomuntu, ngamagoda othando; ngaba kubo njengophakamisa ijoka entanyeni yabo, ngagobela kubo, ngabanika ukudla. 
28_11_5_“Abayikubuyela ezweni laseGibithe, owase-Asiriya abe yinkosi yabo, ngokuba benqaba ukubuya, na? 
28_11_6_Inkemba iyakutheleka emizini yabo, iqede imigoqo yayo, ibadle ngenxa yeziluleko zabo. 
28_11_7_Abantu bami bahlose ukuhlehla kimi; noma bebabizela kongaPhezulu kangakanani, akakho oziphakamisayo. 
28_11_8_“Ngingakunikela kanjani, Efrayimi, ngikukhaphele, Israyeli, na? Ngingakwenza kanjani ube njenge-Adima, ngikubeke ufane neSeboyimi, na? Inhliziyo iyaphenduka phakathi kwami, sonke isihawu sami sivusiwe. 
28_11_9_Angiyikwenza ukufutheka kwentukuthelo yami, ngingabuyeli ukumchitha u-Efrayimi, ngokuba nginguNkulunkulu, angisiye umuntu; ngingoNgcwele phakathi kwenu, angiyikufika ngolaka. 
28_11_10_Bayakulandela uJehova oyakubhonga njengengonyama, ngokuba uyakubhonga, abantwana bakhe bavele entshonalanga ngokuthuthumela. 
28_11_11_Bayakuvela ngokuthuthumela eGibithe njengezinyoni, nanjengejuba ezweni lase-Asiriya, ngibahlalise ezindlini zabo,” usho uJehova. 
28_11_12_U-Efrayimi ungizungezile ngamanga, nendlu yakwa-Israyeli ngenkohliso; uJuda usazulazula kuNkulunkulu nakoNgcwele othembekileyo. 
28_12_1_U-Efrayimi uyadla umoya, ulandela umoya wasempumalanga; uyandisa imihla yonke amanga nencithakalo; benza isivumelwano ne-Asiriya, namafutha ayiswa eGibithe. 
28_12_2_UJehova unokuphikisana noJuda futhi; uyakuhambela uJakobe ngenxa yezindlela zakhe, ambuyisele ngokwezenzo zakhe. 
28_12_3_Esiswini wabamba umfowabo ngesithende, nasebudodeni bakhe walwa noNkulunkulu; 
28_12_4_walwa nengelosi, wanqoba; wakhala, wanxusa kuyo; yamfumana eBethele, yakhuluma naye lapho. 
28_12_5_NguJehova uNkulunkulu Sebawoti, nguJehova igama lakhe lodumo. 
28_12_6_Ngalokho buyela wena kuNkulunkulu wakho, ugcine umusa nokulunga, ulindele uNkulunkulu wakho njalonjalo. 
28_12_7_IKhanani linesilinganiso esikhohlisayo esandleni salo, lithanda ukukhahlameza. 
28_12_8_U-Efrayimi uthi: “Impela ngicebile, ngithole imfuyo; kukho konke ukuzuza kwami abayikufumana bubi obuyisono.” 
28_12_9_“Kepha mina nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wakho kwasezweni laseGibithe; ngisezakukuhlalisa ematendeni njengasezinsukwini zemikhosi emisiweyo. 
28_12_10_Ngikhulumile kubaprofethi, ngandisile imibono, ngifanekisile ngesandla sabaprofethi.” 
28_12_11_Uma iGileyadi linobubi, impela bayakuba ngabachithiwe; uma behlabela izinkunzi eGiligali, ama-altare abo ayakuba njengezinqwaba ngasemiseleni yamasimu. 
28_12_12_UJakobe wabalekela ezweni lase-Aramu, u-Israyeli wakhonzela umfazi, walusa umhlambi ngenxa yomfazi. 
28_12_13_UJehova wakhuphula u-Israyeli eGibithe ngomprofethi, wagcinwa ngomprofethi. 
28_12_14_U-Efrayimi ucunulile ngokubabisayo; icala lakhe legazi liyakuphonswa phezu kwakhe; iNkosi yakhe ibuyisele kuye ihlazo lakhe. 
28_13_1_Lapho u-Efrayimi ekhuluma, kwavela ukuthuthumela; wayephakeme kwa-Israyeli, kepha wazitholela icala ngoBali, wafa. 
28_13_2_Manje benezela ekoneni, bazenzele imifanekiso ebunjiweyo ngesiliva labo nezithombe ngokuqonda kwabo, zonke ziyimisebenzi yezinyanga; bakhuluma ngabo, bathi: “Bahlaba abantu, kepha banga amathole.” 
28_13_3_Ngalokho bayakuba njengamafu okusa, nanjengamazolo amuka ekuseni, nanjengamakhoba aphephethwa esibuyeni nomusi ophuma ngefasitele. 
28_13_4_“Nokho nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wakho kwasezweni laseGibithe; ngaphandle kwami awazi Nkulunkulu, nomsindisi akakho ngaphandle kwami. 
28_13_5_Mina ngakwazi ehlane ezweni lokoma. 
28_13_6_Basutha njengamadlelo abo; basutha, nenhliziyo yabo yaphakama; ngalokho bangikhohliwe. 
28_13_7_Ngase ngiba njengengonyama kubo, ngiqamekela endleleni njengengwe. 
28_13_8_Ngitheleka phezu kwabo njengebhere elaphuciwe amawundlu alo, ngidwengula ubhedu lwenhliziyo, ngibadle njengengonyamakazi, isilwane sasendle sibaqaqe. 
28_13_9_“Ngukuchithwa kwakho, Israyeli, ngokuba uphambene nami, usizo lwakho. 
28_13_10_Iphi inkosi yakho manje ukuba ikusindise emizini yakho yonke; nabahluleli bakho, wena owathi: ‘Ngiphe inkosi nezikhulu’? 
28_13_11_Ngikunike inkosi ngentukuthelo yami, ngayisusa ngolaka lwami. 
28_13_12_Ububi buka-Efrayimi buboshiwe, isono sakhe sibekelelwe. 
28_13_13_Imihelo yobelethayo iyakumehlela; uyindodana engahlakaniphile, ngokuba kuyisikhathi sokuba angemi lapho kuqhamuka abantwana. 
28_13_14_“Ngiyakubahlenga esandleni sendawo yabafileyo, ngibahlawulele ekufeni; ziphi izifo zakho, kufa, kuphi ukuchitha kwakho, ndawo yabafileyo, na? Ukuguquka kufihlekile emehlweni ami. 
28_13_15_“Noma enezithelo phakathi kwabafowabo, kuyakufika umoya wasempumalanga, umoya kaJehova ovela ehlane; besewujabha umthombo, isiphethu sishe; uyakuphanga ingcebo yakhe, zonke izinto ezinxanelekayo. 
28_13_16_ISamariya liyakuthwala icala lalo, ngokuba lihlubukile uNkulunkulu walo; bayakuwa ngenkemba, izingane zabo zichotshozwe, abakhulelweyo babo baqaqwe.” 
28_14_1_Buyela kuJehova uNkulunkulu wakho, Israyeli, ngokuba ukhubekile ngobubi bakho. 
28_14_2_Thabathani amazwi, nibuyele kuJehova, nithi kuye: “Susa konke okubi, wamukele okuhle, sinikele ngemilomo yethu njengangezinkunzi. 
28_14_3_I-Asiriya aliyikusisindisa, asisayikukhwela amahhashi, singasasho kuyo imisebenzi yezandla zethu ukuthi ngonkulunkulu bethu, ngokuba intandane iphiwa umusa kuwe.” 
28_14_4_“Ngiyakuphulukisa ukuhlehla kwabo, ngibathande ngesihle, ngokuba intukuthelo yami ibuyile kubo. 
28_14_5_Ngiyakuba njengamazolo ku-Israyeli; uyakukhahlela njengomnduze, enabise izimpande zakhe njengeLebanoni. 
28_14_6_Imixhantela yakhe iyakuxhantela, ubuhle bakhe bube njengomnqumo, iphunga lakhe libe njengeLebanoni. 
28_14_7_Bayakubuya, bahlale emthunzini wakhe, babuye baphile njengamabele, bakhahlele njengomvini, igama lakhe lodumo libe njengomvini waseLebanoni. 
28_14_8_Efrayimi, ngisenendabani nezithombe na? Mina ngiyakumphendula, ngimbheke; nginjengomsayipuresi oluhlaza, kimina izithelo zakho ziyafunyanwa.”. 
28_14_9_Ngubani ohlakaniphile, aqonde lezi zinto; ngubani onomqondo, azazi, na? Ngokuba izindlela zikaJehova zilungile; abalungileyo bayakuhamba ngazo, kepha abaphambukayo bayakukhubeka ngazo. 
29_1_1_Izwi likaJehova elafika kuJoweli indodana kaPhethuweli. 
29_1_2_Yizwani lokhu nina badala, nibeke indlebe nina nonke enihlezi ezweni. Kwake kwaba khona emihleni yenu noma emihleni yawobaba na? 
29_1_3_Kutsheleni abantwana benu, nabantwana benu abantwana babo, nabantwana babo esinye isizukulwane. 
29_1_4_Okushiywe yisibotho kudliwe yisikhonyane, nokushiywe yisikhonyane kudliwe yizinkumbi, nokushiywe yizinkumbi kudliwe yinkasa. 
29_1_5_Phaphamani, zidakwa, nikhale, nihhewule nonke eniphuza iwayini ukuthi iwayini linqanyulelwe emlonyeni wenu. 
29_1_6_Ngokuba kwenyukele ezweni lami isizwe esinamandla nesingenakubalwa; amazinyo aso angamazinyo engonyama, namazinyo aso emihlathi angawengonyamakazi. 
29_1_7_Sichithile umvini wami, saxebula umkhiwane wami; siwuxhozile nokuwuxhoza, sawulahla, amagatsha awo sawenza aba mhlophe. 
29_1_8_Khala njengentombi ebhince indwangu yamasaka ngomyeni wobusha bayo. 
29_1_9_Iminikelo yempuphu neminikelo yokuphuzwa inqamukile endlini kaJehova; abapristi, izikhonzi zikaJehova, bayalila. 
29_1_10_Amasimu achithekile, umhlabathi uyalila, ngokuba amabele achithiwe; iwayini elisha lishile, amafutha ayawuma. 
29_1_11_Jabhani, balimi, nihhewule nina baphathi bezivini ngokolweni nangebhali, ngokuba isivuno samasimu sichithakele. 
29_1_12_Umvini ubunile, imikhiwane iwumile; imipomegranati, namasundu, nemi-apula, nemithi yonke yasendle kubunile, ngokuba intokozo ibunile phakathi kwamadodana abantu. 
29_1_13_Bhincani, nikhale, bapristi, nihhewule, nina zikhonzi ze-altare; wozani nilale bonke ubusuku ezindwangwini zamasaka, zikhonzi zikaNkulunkulu wami, ngokuba iminikelo yempuphu neminikelo yokuphuzwa kugodliwe endlini kaNkulunkulu wenu. 
29_1_14_Ngcwelisani ukuzila ukudla, nibize umhlangano; buthani amalunga, yebo, bonke abakhe ezweni, endlini kaJehova uNkulunkulu wenu, nikhale kuJehova. 
29_1_15_Hawu lolo suku! Ngokuba usuku lukaJehova lusondele, lufika njengokuchitha kuvela kuSomandla. 
29_1_16_Akunqunywanga ukudla kwethu phambi kwamehlo ethu, intokozo nenjabulo endlini kaNkulunkulu wethu, na? 
29_1_17_Imbewu iyabola phansi kwamagade ayo; izingobo zichithakele, izinqolobane zidiliziwe, ngokuba amabele omile. 
29_1_18_Yeka, ukububula kwezilwane! Imihlambi yezinkomo ikhungathekile, ngokuba ayinadlelo, yebo, nemihlambi yezimvu izithwese icala. 
29_1_19_Ngikhala kuwe Jehova, ngokuba amadlelo asehlane adliwe ngumlilo, nelangabi lishisile yonke imithi yasendle. 
29_1_20_Yebo, nezilwane zasendle ziyakulangazelela, ngokuba imifula yamanzi ishile, nomlilo udlile amadlelo asehlane. 
29_2_1_Bethani icilongo eSiyoni, nihlabe umkhosi entabeni yami engcwele; mabathuthumele bonke abakhe ezweni, ngokuba luyeza usuku lukaJehova, ngokuba lusondele; 
29_2_2_usuku lobumnyama nolwesigayegaye, usuku lwamafu nolobumnyama obukhulu, njengokusa kwenekwe ezintabeni, abantu abaningi abanamandla abangazange babe ngabanjalo kwasendulo, nabangasoze baba ngabanjalo emva kwabo kuze kube naseminyakeni yezizukulwane ngezizukulwane. 
29_2_3_Phambi kwabo kuyadla umlilo, nasemva kwabo kushisa ilangabi; izwe liphambi kwabo njengensimu yase-Edene, nangasemva kwabo kuyihlane lencithakalo, akukho okubabalekelayo. 
29_2_4_Isimo sabo sinjengesimo samahhashi, bagijima njengabamahhashi. 
29_2_5_Bangqabashiya ngomsindo wezinqola eziqongweni zezintaba, njengokuchochoza kwelangabi lomlilo elidla amabibi nanjengabantu abanamandla, abahlelelwe ukulwa. 
29_2_6_Phambi kwabo abantu bayathuthumela, bonke ubuso buyaphaphatheka. 
29_2_7_Bagijima njengamaqhawe, bakhwela ezingangeni njengamadoda empi; bahamba, kube yilowo nalowo ngendlela yakhe, abaphambanisi izindlela zabo. 
29_2_8_Abahlohlolozani omunye nomunye; bahamba, kube yilowo nalowo ngendlela yakhe; baziphonsa phakathi kwezikhali, abakhawuli. 
29_2_9_Batheleka emzini, bagijima ogangeni; bakhuphukela ezindlini, bangena ngamafasitele njengesela. 
29_2_10_Umhlaba uyazamazama phambi kwabo, amazulu ayathuthumela; ilanga nenyanga kuphenduka ubumnyama, nezinkanyezi zisusa ukukhanya kwazo. 
29_2_11_UJehova uzwakalisa izwi lakhe phambi kwempi yakhe, ngokuba ibandla lakhe likhulu kakhulu, nowenza izwi lakhe unamandla; yebo, usuku lukaJehova lukhulu, luyesabeka kakhulu; ngubani ongaluthwala na? 
29_2_12_“Kepha manje,” usho uJehova, “phendukelani kimi ngenhliziyo yenu yonke, nangokuzila ukudla, nangokukhala, nangokulila.” 
29_2_13_Niklebhule inhliziyo yenu, hhayi izingubo zenu, niphendukele kuJehova uNkulunkulu wenu, ngokuba yena unomusa, unobumnene, wephuza ukuthukuthela, unesihe esikhulu, uhawukela nomubi. 
29_2_14_Ngubani owaziyo uma engayikubuya, ahawukele, ashiye isibusiso emva kwakhe, kube ngumnikelo wempuphu nomnikelo wokuphuzwa kuJehova uNkulunkulu wenu, na? 
29_2_15_Bethani icilongo eSiyoni, ningcwelise ukuzila ukudla, nibize umhlangano; 
29_2_16_buthani abantu, ningcwelise ibandla, niqoqe abadala, nibuthe izingane nabancelayo; umyeni makaphume ekamelweni lakhe, nomakoti emgonqweni wakhe. 
29_2_17_Abapristi, izikhonzi zikaJehova, mabakhale phakathi kompheme ne-altare, bathi: “Hawukela abantu bakho, Jehova, unganikeli isabelo sakho sibe yinhlamba, ukuze abezizwe bababhinqe; yini ukuba basho phakathi kwabantu, bathi: ‘Uphi uNkulunkulu wabo na?’ ” 
29_2_18_UJehova wayesehawukela izwe lakhe, wabahawukela abantu bakhe. 
29_2_19_UJehova waphendula, wathi kubantu bakhe: “Bhekani, ngiyakunithumela amabele, newayini, namafutha, nisuthe ngakho, ngingabe ngisanenza inhlamba phakathi kwabezizwe. 
29_2_20_“Ngiyakudedisela kude nani owasenyakatho, ngimxoshele ezweni elomileyo nelichithakeleyo, ubuso bakhe bube ngaselwandle lwasempumalanga, umuva wakhe ube ngaselwandle lwasentshonalanga, kukhuphuke ukunuka kwakhe, kwenyuke iphunga lakhe elibi;” ngokuba wenzile izinto ezinkulu. 
29_2_21_Ungesabi, lizwe; jabula, uthokoze, ngokuba uJehova wenzile izinto ezinkulu. 
29_2_22_Ningesabi, zilwane zasendle, ngokuba amadlelo asehlane ayahluma, nemithi ithela izithelo, umkhiwane nomvini kuveza amandla akho. 
29_2_23_Jabulani, bantwana baseSiyoni, nithokoze kuJehova uNkulunkulu wenu, ngokuba uninika imvula yokuqala ngokulunga, unehlisela imvula, eyokuqala neyamuva, njengasekuqaleni. 
29_2_24_Izibuya ziyakugcwala amabele, nezikhongozelo ziyakuchichima iwayini namafutha. 
29_2_25_“Ngiyakubuyisela kini iminyaka eyadliwa yisikhonyane, nezinkumbi, nenkasa, nesibotho, impi yami enkulu engayithuma phakathi kwenu. 
29_2_26_Niyakudla nokudla, nisuthe, nilidumise igama likaJehova uNkulunkulu wenu oniphathe ngokumangalisayo; abantu bami abayikujabha kuze kube phakade. 
29_2_27_Niyakwazi ukuthi ngiphakathi kuka-Israyeli nokuthi nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu, akakho omunye; abantu bami abayikujabha kuze kube phakade. 
29_2_28_“Kuyakuthi ngasemuva ngithulule uMoya wami phezu kwayo yonke inyama; amadodana enu namadodakazi enu ayakuprofetha, abadala benu baphuphe amaphupho, izinsizwa zenu zibone imibono; 
29_2_29_naphezu kwezinceku nezincekukazi ngalezo zinsuku ngiyakuthulula uMoya wami. 
29_2_30_Ngiyakuveza izimangaliso ezulwini nasemhlabeni, igazi, nomlilo, nezinsika zomusi. 
29_2_31_Ilanga liyakuphenduka ubumnyama, inyanga ibe yigazi, lungakafiki usuku olukhulu nolwesabekayo lukaJehova. 
29_2_32_Kuyakuthi bonke ababiza igama likaJehova bakhululwe, ngokuba entabeni yaseSiyoni naseJerusalema kuyakuba ngabasindileyo, njengalokho eshilo uJehova, naphakathi kwabaseleyo kube ngababizwa nguJehova. 
29_3_1_“Ngokuba ngalezo zinsuku nangaleso sikhathi, lapho ngiyakubuyisa ukuthunjwa kukaJuda neJerusalema, 
29_3_2_ngiyakubutha zonke izizwe, ngizehlisele esigodini sikaJehoshafati, ngahlulelane nazo khona ngenxa yabantu bami nesabelo sami u-Israyeli, ezibahlakazile phakathi kwezizwe, zabela izwe lami. 
29_3_3_Zenza inkatho ngabantu bami, zanika umfana ngesifebe, zathengisa ngentombazana ngenxa yewayini, zaliphuza. 
29_3_4_“Niyini kimi, nina Tire neSidoni, nayo yonke imikhawulo yaseFilistiya na? Niyakungibuyisela utho na? Uma ningibuyisela utho ngiyakushesha ngibuyisele masinyane phezu kwekhanda lenu izenzo zenu, 
29_3_5_njengalokho nithathile isiliva lami negolide lami, nangenisa izinto zami ezinhle emathempelini enu, 
29_3_6_nathengisa ngabantwana bakwaJuda nangabantwana baseJerusalema kumadodana aseJavani ukuba nibadedisele kude nemikhawulo yabo. 
29_3_7_“Bhekani, ngiyakubavusa endaweni enithengisile kuyo ngabo, ngibuyisele ekhanda lenu isenzo senu. 
29_3_8_Ngiyakuthengisa ngamadodana enu nangamadodakazi enu esandleni sabantwana bakwaJuda, bona bathengise ngabo kumaSheba, isizwe esikude,” ngokuba uJehova ukhulumile. 
29_3_9_Memezelani lokhu phakathi kwabezizwe, ningcwelise impi, niwavuse amaqhawe; mawasondele, enyuke onke amadoda empi. 
29_3_10_Khandani amakhuba enu abe yizinkemba, ocelemba benu babe yimikhonto, obuthakathaka asho ukuthi ngiyiqhawe. 
29_3_11_Sheshani nifike nina bezizwe zonke nxazonke, nibuthane, wehlisele khona amaqhawe akho, Jehova. 
29_3_12_“Mabazivuse abezizwe, benyukele esigodini sikaJehoshafati, ngokuba ngahlulele bonke abezizwe nxazonke. 
29_3_13_Fakani isikela, ngokuba okuzakuvunwa sekuvuthiwe; ngokuba isikhamo sewayini sigcwele, nezikhongozelo ziyachichima, ngokuba ububi babo bukhulu.” 
29_3_14_Yizixuku ngezixuku esigodini sokwahlulela, ngokuba usuku lukaJehova lusondele esigodini sokwahlulela. 
29_3_15_Ilanga nenyanga kuba mnyama, izinkanyezi zisusa ukukhanya kwazo. 
29_3_16_UJehova uyaduma eseSiyoni, ezwakalise izwi lakhe eseJerusalema; izulu nomhlaba kuyazamazama, kepha uJehova uyisiphephelo sabantu bakhe, nenqaba yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli. 
29_3_17_Bese nikwazi ukuthi nginguJehova uNkulunkulu wenu engihlala eSiyoni, intaba yami engcwele; iJerusalema liyakuba ngcwele, abafokazi abasayikulidabula. 
29_3_18_“Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku izintaba ziconse iwayini elimnandi, amagquma agobhoze ubisi, yonke imifula yakwaJuda igobhoze amanzi; kuyakuvela umthombo endlini kaJehova oyakunisela isigodi saseShithimi. 
29_3_19_IGibithe liyakuba yincithakalo, u-Edomi abe yihlane lencithakalo ngenxa yendluzula eyenziwe kubantwana bakwaJuda, ngokuba bachithile igazi elingenacala ezweni labo. 
29_3_20_Kepha uJuda uyakuhlala kuze kube phakade, neJerusalema ezizukulwaneni ngezizukulwane. 
29_3_21_Ngiyakuphindisela igazi labo engingakaliphindiseli,” ngokuba uJehova wakhile eSiyoni. 
30_1_1_Amazwi ka-Amose owayephakathi kwabelusi baseThekhowa, owabonayo ngo-Israyeli emihleni ka-Uziya, inkosi yakwaJuda, nasemihleni kaJerobowamu indodana kaJowashi, inkosi yakwa-Israyeli, iminyaka emibili ngaphambi kokuzamazama komhlaba. 
30_1_2_Wathi: “UJehova uyaduma eseSiyoni, ezwakalise izwi lakhe eseJerusalema; amadlelo abelusi ayakulila, nesiqongo saseKarmeli siyakubuna.” 
30_1_3_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zaseDamaseku, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba babhula iGileyadi ngezibhulo ezibukhali zensimbi. 
30_1_4_Kepha ngiyakuthuma umlilo endlini kaHazayeli, uqede izindlu zobukhosi zikaBeni Hadadi. 
30_1_5_Ngiyakwaphula imigoqo yaseDamaseku, nginqume abakhileyo eBikati Aveni, nophethe intonga eBeti Edene, abantu base-Aramu bathunjelwe eKhiri,” usho uJehova. 
30_1_6_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zaseGaza, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba bathumba abantu ngokuthumba okupheleleyo ukuba babakhaphele ku-Edomi. 
30_1_7_Kepha ngiyakuthuma umlilo ogangeni lwaseGaza, uqede izindlu zalo zamakhosi. 
30_1_8_Ngiyakunquma abakhileyo e-Ashidodi, nophethe intonga e-Ashikeloni, ngiphendulele isandla sami e-Ekroni; nensali yamaFilisti iyakuphela,” isho iNkosi uJehova. 
30_1_9_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zaseTire, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba bakhaphela abantu ngokuthumba okupheleleyo ku-Edomi, bangakhumbuli isivumelwano sabazalwane. 
30_1_10_Kepha ngiyakuthuma umlilo ogangeni lwaseTire, uqede izindlu zalo zamakhosi.” 
30_1_11_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zakwa-Edomi, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba wamxosha umfowabo ngenkemba, walahla isihe sakhe, wagcina ulaka lwakhe, wayilondoloza intukuthelo yakhe. 
30_1_12_Kepha ngiyakuthuma umlilo eThemani, uqede izindlu zamakhosi zaseBosira.” 
30_1_13_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zabantwana bakwa-Amoni, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba baqaqile abakhulelweyo kwaGileyadi ukuba bayenze banzi imikhawulo yabo. 
30_1_14_Kepha ngiyakuphemba umlilo ogangeni lwaseRaba, uqede izindlu zalo zamakhosi ngokumemeza ngosuku lokulwa, nangesiphepho ngosuku lwesivunguvungu. 
30_1_15_Inkosi yabo iyakuya ekuthunjweni, yona nezikhulu zayo kanyekanye,” usho uJehova. 
30_2_1_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zakwaMowabi, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba washisa amathambo enkosi yakwa-Edomi aba ngumcako. 
30_2_2_Kepha ngiyakuthuma umlilo kwaMowabi, uqede izindlu zamakhosi zaseKeriyote, uMowabi afe ngokuxokozela, nangokumemeza, nangokukhala kwecilongo. 
30_2_3_Ngiyakunquma umahluleli phakathi kwakhe, ngibulale zonke izikhulu zakhe kanye naye,” usho uJehova. 
30_2_4_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zakwaJuda, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba bawulahlile umthetho kaJehova, abagcinanga izimiso zakhe, namanga abo abadukisile, abawalandelayo nawoyise. 
30_2_5_Kepha ngiyakuthuma umlilo kwaJuda, uqede izindlu zamakhosi zaseJerusalema.” 
30_2_6_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngenxa yeziphambeko ezintathu zakwa-Israyeli, yebo, ngenxa yezine, angiyikuguquka, ngokuba bathengisile olungileyo ngesiliva, nompofu ngamabhangqa ezicathulo. 
30_2_7_Bazondelela amakhanda abampofu ukuba abe sothulini lomhlabathi, bachezukisa indlela yabathobileyo; indoda noyise baya entombininye, ukuze balihlambalaze igama lami elingcwele, 
30_2_8_bacambalale ezingutsheni ezithathwe zaba yisibambiso eceleni kwawo onke ama-altare, baphuze iwayini labahlawulisiweyo endlini kaNkulunkulu wabo. 
30_2_9_“Nokho mina ngachitha ama-Amori ebusweni babo, akuphakama kwawo kwakunjengokuphakama kwemisedari, ayenamandla njengama-oki; kepha ngachitha nokho izithelo zawo phezulu nezimpande zawo phansi. 
30_2_10_“Futhi mina nganikhuphula ezweni laseGibithe, nganihambisa iminyaka engamashumi amane ehlane ukuba nidle ifa lezwe lama-Amori. 
30_2_11_Ngavusa kumadodana enu abaprofethi nasezinsizweni zenu amaNaziri. Akunjalo, nina bantwana bakwa-Israyeli, na?” usho uJehova. 
30_2_12_“Kepha naphuzisa amaNaziri iwayini, ngokuthi: ‘Ningaprofethi.’ 
30_2_13_“Bhekani, ngiyakunicindezela endaweni yenu njengengqukumbane icindezela, igcwele izithungu. 
30_2_14_Onejubane uyakuswela ukubaleka; onamandla akayikuqinisa amandla akhe, neqhawe aliyikuzikhulula. 
30_2_15_Obambe umnsalo akayikuma; onejubane ngezinyawo zakhe kayikuzikhulula, nokhwele ihhashi akayikuzikhulula; 
30_2_16_onesibindi phakathi kwamaqhawe uyakubaleka ze ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova. 
30_3_1_Yizwani leli zwi uJehova alikhulumile ngani bantwana bakwa-Israyeli, ngawo wonke umndeni engawukhuphula ezweni laseGibithe, ngokuthi: 
30_3_2_“Nginazile nina kuphela emindenini yonke yomhlaba; ngalokho ngiyakunihambela ngabo bonke ububi benu.” 
30_3_3_Kuhamba ababili kanyekanye, uma bengavumelananga, na? 
30_3_4_Ingonyama iyabhodla ehlathini, ingenampango, na? Ibongo lengonyama liyezwakalisa izwi lalo emphandwini walo, uma lingabambanga lutho, na? 
30_3_5_Inyoni iwela ogibeni emhlabathini, ingenasihibe, na? Ugibe luyaxhuma emhlabathini, lungabambanga nokubamba, na? 
30_3_6_Kungabethwa icilongo emzini, bangesabi abantu, na? Umuzi ungehlelwa ngokubi, engakwenzamga uJehova, na? 
30_3_7_Ngokuba iNkosi uJehova ayenzi lutho, ingayambulanga imfihlakalo yayo ezincekwini zayo abaprofethi. 
30_3_8_Ingonyama ibhongile, ngubani ongayikwesaba na? INkosi uJehova ikhulumile, ngubani ongayikuprofetha na? 
30_3_9_Zwakalisani ezindlini zamakhosi zase-Ashidodi, nasezindlini zamakhosi zasezweni laseGibithe, nithi: “Buthanani ezintabeni zaseSamariya, nibone izidumo ezinkulu eziphakathi kwalo, nokucindezelwa okukulo.” 
30_3_10_“Ngokuba abakwazi ukwenza okulungileyo,” usho uJehova; “babekelela ubudlova nokuphanga ezindlini zabo zamakhosi.” 
30_3_11_Ngalokho isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: “Isitha siyakulihaqa izwe, sehlise kini izinqaba zenu, ziphangwe izindlu zenu zamakhosi.” 
30_3_12_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Njengalokhu umalusi ophula emlonyeni wengonyama imilenze emibili noma inxenye yendlebe, kanjalo abantwana bakwa-Israyeli bayakophulwa, abahlala eSamariya ezingosini zezihlalo naphezu kwezingubo zikasilika zemibhede.” 
30_3_13_“Yizwani, nifakaze ngendlu kaJakobe, isho iNkosi uJehova, uNkulunkulu Sebawoti. 
30_3_14_“Ngokuba mhla ngiyakumhambela u-Israyeli ngeziphambeko zakhe, ngiyakuhambela nama-altare aseBethele, kunqunywe izimpondo ze-altare, ziwe phansi. 
30_3_15_Ngiyakushaya indlu yasebusika kanye nendlu yasehlobo, kuphele izindlu zophondo lwendlovu, yebo, izindlu eziningi ziyakuphela,” usho uJehova. 
30_4_1_Yizwani leli zwi, nina zinkomo zaseBashani enisentabeni yaseSamariya, enicindezela abaphansi, enichoboza abampofu, enithi emakhosini enu: “Lethani, siphuze.” 
30_4_2_INkosi uJehova ifungile ubungcwele bayo ukuthi: “Bhekani, izinsuku ziyakunehlela lapho niyakususwa ngezingwegwe, nabaseleyo kini ngezindobo. 
30_4_3_Niyakuphuma emifantwini, kube yilowo nalowo ngoqondene naye, nilahlwe eHermoni,” usho uJehova. 
30_4_4_“Wozani eBethele, niphambeke, naseGiligali, nandise iziphambeko, nilethe imihlatshelo yenu ekuseni njalo, nokweshumi kwenu kanye ngezinsuku ezintathu, 
30_4_5_nishise umnikelo wokubonga ngokuvutshelweyo, nimemezele iminikelo yesihle, niyizwakalise, ngokuba nithanda kanjalo, bantwana bakwa-Israyeli,” isho iNkosi uJehova. 
30_4_6_“Mina nganinika ukuhlanzeka kwamazinyo emizini yenu yonke nokuswela isinkwa kuzo zonke izindawo zenu, kepha anibuyelanga kimi,” usho uJehova. 
30_4_7_“Futhi ngagodla kini imvula, kusasele izinyanga ezintathu ukuba kuvunwe, ngalinisa phezu komunye umuzi, komunye umuzi angilinisanga; esinye isiqephu saniselwa, nesiqephu esinganiselwanga sasha. 
30_4_8_Kwase kuhamba imizi emibili noma emithathu, yaya komunye umuzi ukuyophuza amanzi, kodwa ayaneliswanga; kepha nokho anibuyelanga kimi,” usho uJehova. 
30_4_9_“Nganishaya ngokuhamuka nesikhutha; izivande zenu, nezivini zenu, nemikhiwane yenu, neminqumo yenu eminingi kwadliwa yisibotho, kepha nokho anibuyelanga kimi,” usho uJehova. 
30_4_10_“Nganithumela isifo ngendlela yaseGibithe, ngazibulala izinsizwa zenu ngenkemba, ngathumba amahhashi enu, ngenza ukuba ukunuka kwekamu lenu kukhuphukele nasemakhaleni enu, kepha nokho anibuyelanga kimi,” usho uJehova. 
30_4_11_“Nganichitha njengalokho uNkulunkulu achitha iSodoma neGomora; naninjengesikhuni esophulwe emlilweni, kepha nokho anibuyelanga kimi,” usho uJehova. 
30_4_12_“Ngalokho ngiyakwenze njalo kuwe Israyeli; njengokuba ngiyakwenza lokhu kuwe, zilungiselele ukuhlangana noNkulunkulu wakho, Israyeli.” 
30_4_13_Ngokuba bheka, owabumba izintaba, nowawudala umoya, otshela umuntu umqondo wakhe, owenza ukusa kube ngubumnyama, onyathela ezindaweni eziphakemeyo zomhlaba, igama lakhe linguJehova, uNkulunkulu Sebawoti. 
30_5_1_Zwanini leli zwi engiliphakamisa phezu kwenu libe yisililo ngendlu ka-Israyeli. 
30_5_2_“Iwile intombi yakwa-Israyeli, ayisayikuvuka; iphonsiwe phansi, akakho ongayivusa.” 
30_5_3_Ngokuba isho kanje iNkosi uJehova, ithi: “Umuzi owaphuma uyinkulungwane uyakushiya ikhulu, nowaphuma uyikhulu uyakushiya ishumi kuyo indlu yakwa-Israyeli.” 
30_5_4_Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova kuyo indlu yakwa-Israyeli, uthi: “Ngifuneni, niphile. 
30_5_5_Kepha ningalifuni iBethele, ningangeni eGiligali, ningadluleli eBeri Sheba, ngokuba iGiligali liyakuthunjwa nokuthunjwa, neBethele liyakuba yize.” 
30_5_6_Funani uJehova, niphile, funa afikele indlu kaJosefa njengomlilo, udle, kungekho owucimayo eBethele. 
30_5_7_Nina enihlanekezela ukwahlulela kube ngumhlonyane, nilahle phansi ukulunga; 
30_5_8_nimfune owenza isiLimela neMpambano, ophendula ithunzi lokufa libe ngukusa, ayenze imini ibe mnyama njengobusuku, obiza amanzi olwandle, awathululele ebusweni bomhlaba nguJehova igama lakhe 
30_5_9_owenza ukuchitha ukuba kunyazime phezu kwabanamandla, nencithakalo ukuba yehlele izinqaba. 
30_5_10_Bayamzonda ofakazela ukulunga esangweni; okhuluma ubuqotho banengwa nguye. 
30_5_11_Ngalokho, ngokuba ninyathela abampofu, namukele kuye isipho samabele, noma nakha izindlu ngamatshe abaziweyo aniyikuhlala kuzo, nokuba nitshala izivini ezinhle aniyikuphuza iwayini lazo. 
30_5_12_Ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi iziphambeko zenu ziningi nokuthi izono zenu zinkulu, nina enicindezela abalungileyo, namukela umvuzo, nenichezukisa abampofu esangweni. 
30_5_13_Ngalokho ohlakaniphileyo uyakuthula ngaleso sikhathi, ngokuba kuyisikhathi esibi lesi. 
30_5_14_Funani okuhle, hhayi okubi, ukuze niphile, abe nani uJehova uNkulunkulu Sebawoti kanjalo, njengalokhu nisho. 
30_5_15_Zondani okubi, nithande okuhle, nimise ukwahlulela esangweni; mhlawumbe uJehova uNkulunkulu Sebawoti uyakuba nomusa kuyo insali yakwaJosefa. 
30_5_16_Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova uNkulunkulu Sebawoti, iNkosi, uthi: “Ezigcawini zonke kuyakuba khona ukukhala, nakuzo zonke izitaladi bayakusho ukuthi: ‘Maye, maye!’ babize umlimi ukuba akhale, nabaziyo izililo ukuba balile; 
30_5_17_nakuzo zonke izivini kuyakuba khona ukukhala, ngokuba ngiyakudlula phakathi kwakho,” usho uJehova. 
30_5_18_Wo kinina enifisa usuku lukaJehova! Luyakunisizani usuku lukaJehova? Lungubumnyama, alusikho ukukhanya. 
30_5_19_Kunjengalokhu umuntu ebalekela ingonyama, kuhlangane naye ibhere, noma engena endlini encike ngesandla odongeni, alunywe yinyoka. 
30_5_20_Lungubumyama usuku lukaJehova, alusikho ukukhanya, nesigayegaye okungekho kuso ukukhazimula. 
30_5_21_“Ngiyayizonda, ngiyayidelela imikhosi yenu, angenameli imihlangano yenu.
