30_5_22_Noma ninikela kimi ngeminikelo yenu yokushiswa kanye neminikelo yenu yempuphu, angiyenameli, futhi angibheki iminikelo yenu yokubonga yamathole akhuluphalisiweyo. 
30_5_23_Susa kimi umsindo wezihlabelelo zakho, angiyikuzwa imvunge yezingubhu zakho. 
30_5_24_Kepha ukwahlulela makugobhoze njengamanzi, nokulunga njengomfula onganqamukiyo. 
30_5_25_“Naletha kimi imihlatshelo neminikelo yempuphu ehlane iminyaka engamashumi amane, nina ndlu ka-Israyeli, na? 
30_5_26_Seniyakuthwala uSakuti inkosi yenu noKhewani inkanyezi kankulunkulu wenu, izithombe zenu enizenzele zona. 
30_5_27_Ngiyakunenza ukuba nithunjelwe ngaphesheya kweDamaseku,” usho uJehova ogama lakhe linguNkulunkulu Sebawoti. 
30_6_1_Wo kwabazinzileyo eSiyoni, nabalondekile entabeni yaseSamariya, abaqhamileyo besokuqala sezizwe, efika kubo indlu yakwa-Israyeli! 
30_6_2_Dlulelani eKaline, nibone; nisuke lapho, niye eHamati elikhulu, bese nehlela eGati lamaFilisti; bahle kunale mibuso yini, umkhawulo wabo mkhulu kunomkhawulo wenu na? 
30_6_3_nina enidedisela kude usuku olubi, kepha nisondezile isihlalo sobudlova. 
30_6_4_Balele emibhedeni yophondo lwendlovu, bacambalala ezinkukhweni zabo; badla amawundlu omhlambi namathole avela phakathi kwesibaya. 
30_6_5_Bahaya ngomsindo wogubhu, baziqambela izinto zokubethwa njengoDavide. 
30_6_6_Baphuza imikhele yewayini, bazigcoba ngamafutha amahle, kepha abadabuki ngokuchithwa kukaJosefa. 
30_6_7_Ngalokho sebeyakuthunjwa phakathi kwabokuqala abathunjwayo, kusuke ukuxokozela kwabacambalalayo. 
30_6_8_INkosi uJehova izifungile, usho uJehova uNkulunkulu Sebawoti, yathi: “Ngiyanengwa ngukuzidla kukaJakobe, ngizonda izindlu zakhe zamakhosi; ngiyakukhaphela umuzi nokugcwala kwawo.” 
30_6_9_Kuyakuthi uma kusele amadoda ayishumi endlini inye, afe. 
30_6_10_Lapho umngane womuntu emphakamisa kanye noshisayo ukuba bakhiphe amathambo endlini, abesesho kophakathi kwendlu impela ukuthi: “Kusekhona muntu kuwe na?” yena esephendula athi: “Akusekho,” khona wothi: “Thula, ngokuba asinakuthinta igama likaJehova.” 
30_6_11_Ngokuba bhekani, uJehova uyayaleza: uyakushaya indlu enkulu ibe yizihlephu, nendlu encane ibe yizingcezu. 
30_6_12_Amahhashi ayagijima emadwaleni, kulinywa elwandle ngezinkabi, na? Ngokuba niphendulile ukwahlulela kwaba yisihlungu, nezithelo zokulunga zaba ngumhlonyane, 
30_6_13_nina enithokoza ngento engelutho, nithi: “Asizithathelanga izimpondo ngamandla ethu na?” 
30_6_14_“Ngokuba bhekani, ngiyakunivusela isizwe nina ndlu ka-Israyeli,” usho uJehova uNkulunkulu Sebawoti; “bayakunicindezela kusukela ekuyeni eHamati kuze kube semfuleni wase-Araba.” 
30_7_1_INkosi uJehova yangibonisa kanje: bheka, yayenza isikhonyane ekuqaleni kokumila kotshani bamuva; bheka, kwakungutshani bamuva emva kokusika kwenkosi. 
30_7_2_Kwathi lapho sesidlile utshani bezwe, ngathi: “Nkosi Jehova, ake uthethelele; uJakobe uyakuma kanjani, ngokuba mncane.” 
30_7_3_UJehova wazisola ngalokhu. “Akuyikubakho,” usho uJehova. 
30_7_4_Yayisingibonisa kanje iNkosi uJehova: bheka, iNkosi uJehova yabiza ukulwa ngomlilo; wadla utwa olukhulu, wawusuyakudla futhi isabelo sikaJehova. 
30_7_5_Ngase ngithi: “Nkosi Jehova, mawuyeke; uJakobe uyakuma kanjani, ngokuba mncane.” 
30_7_6_UJehova wazisola ngalokhu. “Akuyikubakho,” isho iNkosi uJehova. 
30_7_7_Wayesengibonisa kanje: bheka, iNkosi yayimi ngasogangeni olwakhiwe ngentambo yomthofu wokumisa, enentambo yomthofu wokumisa esandleni sakhe. 
30_7_8_UJehova wathi kimi: “Amose, ubonani na?” Ngathi: “Intambo yomthofu wokumisa.” Yayisithi iNkosi: “Bhekani, ngiyakubeka intambo yomthofu wokumisa phakathi kwabantu bami u-Israyeli; angisayikubadlula. 
30_7_9_“Izindawo eziphakemeyo zika-Isaka ziyakuchithwa, nezindlu ezingcwele zakwa-Israyeli ziyakuqothulwa, ngivukele indlu kaJerobowamu ngenkemba.” 
30_7_10_U-Amasiya umpristi waseBethele wayesethumela kuJerobowamu inkosi yakwa-Israyeli, wathi: “U-Amose ukwenzele ugobe phakathi kwendlu yakwa-Israyeli; izwe alinakuthwala onke amazwi akhe. 
30_7_11_Ngokuba u-Amose ushilo kanje, wathi: “UJerobowamu uyakufa ngenkemba, u-Israyeli athunjwe nokuthunjwa ezweni lakhe.” 
30_7_12_U-Amasiya wayesethi ku-Amose: “Wena mboni, hamba, ubalekele ezweni lakwaJuda, udle khona isinkwa, uprofethe khona; 
30_7_13_ungabe usaqhubeka kodwa ukuprofetha eBethele, ngokuba liyindlu engcwele yenkosi nendlu yombuso.” 
30_7_14_Wayesephendula u-Amose, wathi ku-Amasiya: “Angisiye umprofethi mina, nendodana yomprofethi angisiyo, kepha ngangingumalusi, ngangitshala imithombe. 
30_7_15_Kepha uJehova wangisusa ekulandeleni umhlambi; uJehova wathi kimi: ‘Hamba uprofethe kubantu bami u-Israyeli.’ 
30_7_16_Manje yizwa izwi likaJehova lokuthi: Wena uthi: “ ‘Ungaprofethi ngo-Israyeli, ungaconsisi izwi lakho phezu kwendlu ka-Isaka.’ 
30_7_17_“Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “ ‘Umkakho uyakufeba emzini, namadodana akho namadodakazi akho ayakuwa ngenkemba, nezwe liyakudatshulwa ngentambo; wena uyakufela ezweni elingcolileyo, u-Israyeli athunjwe nokuthunjwa ezweni lakhe.’ ” 
30_8_1_INkosi uJehova yayisingibonisa kanje: bheka, nanto iqoma lezithelo zasehlobo. 
30_8_2_Yathi: “Amose, ubonani na?” Ngathi: “Iqoma lezithelo zasehlobo.” Wayesethi uJehova kimi: “Ukuphela sekufikile kubantu bami u-Israyeli; angisayikumdlula. 
30_8_3_“Izihlabelelo zethempeli ziyakuba ngukuhhewula ngalolo suku,” isho iNkosi uJehova; “izidumbu ziyakuba ziningi, zilahlwe ezindaweni zonke. Thulani!” 
30_8_4_Yizwani lokhu nina enigwinya abampofu, nenichitha abaswelayo bezwe, 
30_8_5_nithi: “Kuyakudlula nini ukwethwasa kwenyanga ukuba sithengise ngamabele, nesabatha ukuba sikhiphe ukolweni, senze i-efa libe lincane, senze ishekeli libe likhulu, senze izilinganiso ukuba zikhohlise, 
30_8_6_ukuze sithenge abampofu ngesiliva nabaswelayo ngamabhangqa ezicathulo, sithengise ngamahlunge kakolweni.” 
30_8_7_UJehova ufungile ukuziqhenya kukaJakobe ngokuthi: “Impela angiyikukhohlwa kuze kube phakade nesisodwa sezenzo zabo. 
30_8_8_“Umhlaba awuyikuqhaqhazela ngalokho, balile bonke abakhileyo kuwo, na? Yebo, uyakukhukhumala wonke njengeNayile, unyakaze, ubuye ubohle njengomfula waseGibithe. 
30_8_9_“Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku,” isho iNkosi uJehova, “ngilishonise ilanga emini, ngenze ukuba kube mnyama emhlabeni emini ekhanyayo. 
30_8_10_Ngiyakuphendula imikhosi yenu ibe ngukukhala, nezihlabelelo zenu zonke zibe yizililo, ngibeke izindwangu zamasaka ezinkalweni zonke, nobumpandla kuwo onke amakhanda, ngikwenze kube njengokulilela indodana eyodwa, ukuphela kwakho kube njengosuku olumunyu.” 
30_8_11_“Bhekani, izinsuku ziyeza,” isho iNkosi uJehova, “lapho ngiyakuthuma indlala ezweni, kungabi yindlala yezinkwa, kungabi ngukomela amanzi, kepha kube ngeyokuzwa amazwi kaJehova. 
30_8_12_Bayakuzulazula kusukela elwandle kuze kube selwandle, kusukela enyakatho kuze kube sempumalanga, bahambahambe ukufuna izwi likaJehova, kepha abayikulifumana. 
30_8_13_“Ngalolo suku izintombi ezinhle nezinsizwa ziyakudangala ukoma. 
30_8_14_Abafunga icala laseSamariya, bathi: ‘Kuphila kukankulunkulu wakho, Dani,’ nokuthi: ‘Kuphila kothandiweyo wakho, Beri Sheba,’ bayakuwa, bangabe besavuka.” 
30_9_1_Ngayibona iNkosi imi ngase-altare, yathi: “Shaya izihloko zezinsika, ukuze imigulugulu izamazame, uzaphule phezu kwamakhanda abo bonke; abaseleyo babo ngiyakubabulala ngenkemba; obalekayo kubo akayikubaleka, nophunyukayo kubo akayikuphunyuka. 
30_9_2_Noma befohla endaweni yabafileyo, isandla sami siyakubakhipha khona; noma bekhuphukela ezulwini, ngiyakubehlisa khona. 
30_9_3_Noma becasha esiqongweni saseKarmeli, ngiyakubafunisisa, ngibakhiphe khona; nakuba befihlekile emehlweni ami phakathi kolwandle, ngiyakuyala inyoka ukuba iphume khona, ibalume. 
30_9_4_Noma beya ekuthunjweni phambi kwezitha zabo, ngiyakubiza inkemba ukuba iphume khona, ibabulale, ngibeke amehlo ami kubo kube kubi, kungabi kuhle.” 
30_9_5_INkosi uNkulunkulu Sebawoti yiyo ethinta umhlaba, uncibilike, bakhale bonke abakhileyo kuwo; uyakukhukhumala wonke njengeNayile, ubuye ubohle njengomfula waseGibithe; 
30_9_6_yiyona ewakhayo amakamelo ayo aphezulu ezulwini, isekele igobela lawo emhlabeni; yiyona ewabizayo amanzi olwandle, iwathululele ebusweni bomhlaba; nguJehova igama layo. 
30_9_7_“Aninjengabantwana bakwaKushe kimi, nina bantwana bakwa-Israyeli, na?” usho uJehova. “Angikhuphulanga u-Israyeli ezweni laseGibithe, namaFilisti eKafitori, nama-Aramu eKhiri, na?” 
30_9_8_“Bhekani, amehlo eNkosi uJehova akuwo umbuso owonayo; ngiyakuwuchitha ebusweni bomhlaba, ngingachithi nokho ngokupheleleyo indlu kaJakobe,” usho uJehova. 
30_9_9_“Ngokuba bheka, ngiyakuyaleza, ngizulazulise indlu yakwa-Israyeli phakathi kwabo bonke abezizwe, njengalokhu kuhlungwa ngesihlungo, kepha akuyikuwela nembewu eyodwa emhlabathini. 
30_9_10_Zonke izoni zabantu bami ziyakufa ngenkemba, zona ezithi: ‘Okubi akuyikusondela kithina, kusehlele.’ ” 
30_9_11_“Ngalolo suku ngiyakumisa idokodo likaDavide eliwileyo, ngivale imifantu yalo; ngiyakumisa izihlephu zalo, ngilakhe njengasezinsukwini zasendulo, 
30_9_12_ukuze badle ifa lensali yakwa-Edomi nelezizwe zonke ezabizwa ngegama lami,” usho uJehova okwenza lokhu. 
30_9_13_“Bhekani, izinsuku ziyeza,” usho uJehova, “lapho olimayo eyakufica ovunayo, nonyathela izithelo zomvini ohlwanyela imbewu; izintaba ziyakuconsa iwayini, amagquma onke ancibilike. 
30_9_14_Ngiyakubuyisa ukuthunjwa kwabantu bami u-Israyeli, bakhe imizi echithekileyo, bahlale kuyo; bayakutshala izivini, baphuze iwayini lazo; bayakwenza nezivande, badle izithelo zazo. 
30_9_15_Ngiyakubatshala ezweni labo, bangabe besasishulwa ezweni labo engibanike lona,” usho uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho. 
31_1_1_Umbono ka-Obadiya. Isho kanje iNkosi uJehova ngo-Edomi, ithi: Sizwile imibiko evela kuJehova, kuthunyiwe isithunywa phakathi kwabezizwe ngokuthi: “Vukani, simvukele ngokulwa.” 
31_1_2_“Bheka, ngiyakukwenza ube mncane phakathi kwabezizwe; udeleleke kakhulu. 
31_1_3_Ukuzidla kwenhliziyo yakho kukukhohlisile wena ohlezi emifantwini yamawa, ondawo yakho yokuhlala iphakeme, othi enhliziyweni yakho: Ngubani ongangehlisela phansi na? 
31_1_4_Noma uphakama njengokhozi, kubekwe isidleke sakho phakathi kwezinkanyezi, ngiyakukwehlisa khona,” usho uJehova. 
31_1_5_“Uma amasela efika kuwe, nabaphangi ebusuku yeka ukuchithwa kwakho bebengayikweba baze baneliswe na? Uma abavuna izithelo zomvini befika kuwe, bebengayikushiya umkhothozo na? 
31_1_6_Yeka ukufunisiswa kuka-Esawu, yeka ukuphenywa kwamagugu akhe afihliweyo! 
31_1_7_Bonke abantu besivumelwano sakho bayakukuxosha emkhawulweni; abantu ababehlalisana nawe ngokuthula bayakukukhohlisa, bakwahlule; abadla isinkwa sakho bayakubeka ugibe phansi kwakho; akakho oluqondayo. 
31_1_8_“Angithi ngiyakuchitha abahlakaniphileyo kwa-Edomi ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova, “nokuqonda entabeni yakwa-Esawu, na? 
31_1_9_Amaqhawe akho, Themani, ayakuphela amandla, ukuze yilowo nalowo anqunywe entabeni yakwa-Esawu ngokubulawa. 
31_1_10_Ngenxa yendluzula eyenziwa kumfowenu uJakobe, amahloni ayakukusibekela, unqunywe kuze kube phakade. 
31_1_11_Ngosuku owema kude ngalo, ngosuku abafokazi abasusa ngalo imfuyo yakhe, nabezizwe bangena ngamasango akhe, benza inkatho ngeJerusalema, nawe wawunjengomunye wabo. 
31_1_12_Kepha ungabheki usuku lomfowenu ngosuku lobufokazi bakhe, ungathokozi ngabantwana bakwaJuda ngosuku lokuchithwa kwabo, ungaqhalazi ngosuku losizi. 
31_1_13_Ungangeni ngesango labantu bami ngosuku lwesigemegeme sabo, ungabheki ukuhlupheka kwabo ngosuku lwesigemegeme sabo, ningabeki sandla emfuyweni yabo ngosuku lwesigemegeme sabo. 
31_1_14_Ungemi enhlanganweni yezindlela ukunquma abaphunyukileyo bakhe, ungakhapheli abaseleyo bakhe ngosuku losizi. 
31_1_15_“Ngokuba usuku lukaJehova lusondele ezizweni zonke; njengokwenza kwakho kuyakwenziwa kanjalo kuwe; izenzo zakho ziyakubuyela ekhanda lakho. 
31_1_16_Ngokuba njengalokho niphuzile entabeni yami engcwele, bayakuphuza kanjalo bonke abezizwe, baphuze, bagwinye, babe njengokungathi abazange babe khona. 
31_1_17_Kepha entabeni yaseSiyoni kuyakuba khona abasindayo, ibe ngcwele, nendlu yakwaJakobe iyakudla ifa layo. 
31_1_18_Indlu yakwaJakobe iyakuba ngumlilo, indlu kaJosefa ibe yilangabi, indlu ka-Esawu ibe ngamabibi, bawashise, bawaqede; akuyikubakho oseleyo endlini ka-Esawu,” ngokuba uJehova ukhulumile. 
31_1_19_Abaseningizimu bayakudla ifa lentaba yakwa-Esawu, nabasehlanzeni ifa lamaFilisti, badle ifa lezwe lakwa-Efrayimi nezwe laseSamariya, uBenjamini adle iGileyadi. 
31_1_20_Abathunjwa bale mpi yabantwana bakwa-Israyeli abaphakathi kwamaKhanani kuze kube seSarefati nabathunjwa baseJerusalema abaseSefaradi bayakudla ifa lemizi yaseningizimu. 
31_1_21_Abasindisi bayakukhuphukela entabeni yaseSiyoni ukuyakwahlulela intaba yakwa-Esawu, umbuso besewuba ngokaJehova. 
32_1_1_Izwi likaJehova lafika kuJona indodana ka-Amithayi, lathi: 
32_1_2_“Suka uye eNineve, umuzi omkhulu, umemeze phezu kwalo, ngokuba ububi balo benyukele ebusweni bami.” 
32_1_3_Kepha uJona wasuka ebusweni bukaJehova ukuba abalekele eTharishishi, wehlela eJopha, wafumana umkhumbi obuyakuya eTharishishi; wakhokha imali yawo, wakhwela kuwo, ukuba ahambe nawo, aye eTharishishi, asuke ebusweni bukaJehova. 
32_1_4_Kodwa uJehova waphonsa umoya omkhulu elwandle, kwaba yisiphepho esikhulu elwandle; kwacatshangwa ukuthi umkhumbi uyakwaphulwa. 
32_1_5_Khona amatilosi esaba, akhala, kwaba yilelo nalelo kunkulunkulu walo, aphonsa elwandle impahla ebisemkhunjini ukuba ube lula kubo. Kepha uJona wayehlele phakathi komkhumbi, wayeselele ubuthongo. 
32_1_6_Kwase kusondela kuye induna yomkhumbi, yathi: “Unani wena olele ubuthongo na? Vuka, ubize uNkulunkulu wakho; mhlawumbe lo Nkulunkulu uyakusikhumbula ukuba singabhubhi.” 
32_1_7_Bathi, kwaba yilowo nalowo kumngane wakhe: “Wozani senze inkatho, sazi ukuthi kungenxa kabani lobu bubi buphezu kwethu.” Base benza inkatho; inkatho yamudla uJona. 
32_1_8_Base bethi kuye: “Ake usitshele ukuthi kungenxa kabani lobu bubi buphezu kwethu. Umsebenzi wakho uyini? Uvelaphi? Liphi izwe lakini, ungowasiphi isizwe na?” 
32_1_9_Wathi kubo: “NgingumHeberu; ngiyamesaba uJehova, uNkulunkulu wasezulwini, owenzile ulwandle nomhlabathi owomileyo.” 
32_1_10_Base besaba abantu ngokwesaba okukhulu, bathi kuye: “Kuyini lokhu okwenzileyo na?” Ngokuba base bazi ukuthi ubalekile ebusweni bukaJehova, lokhu ebatshelile. 
32_1_11_Base bethi kuye: “Siyakwenze njani kuwe, ukuze ulwandle luthule kithina,” ngokuba ulwandle luyaqhubeka lube nesivunguvungu. 
32_1_12_Wathi kubo: “Ngiphakamiseni, ningiphonse elwandle, bese luthula kini ulwandle, ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi lesi siphepho esikhulu siphezu kwenu ngenxa yami.” 
32_1_13_Kepha amadoda agwedla ukuba abuyele emhlabathini, kepha ahluleka, ngokuba ulwandle lwaqhubeka lwaba nesiphepho kuwo. 
32_1_14_Ayesekhala kuJehova, athi: “Siyakuncenga: masingabhubhi ngenxa yalo muntu, ungabeki phezu kwethu igazi elingenacala, ngokuba wena Jehova wenzile njengokuhlosa kwakho.” 
32_1_15_Amphakamisa uJona, amphonsa elwandle; ulwandle lwase lupheza ukufutha. 
32_1_16_Amadoda ayesesaba uJehova ngokwesaba okukhulu; ahlabela uJehova umhlatshelo, enza izithembiso. 
32_1_17_UJehova wamisela inhlanzi enkulu ukuba imgwinye uJona; uJona wayesezibilinini zenhlanzi izinsuku ezintathu nobusuku obuthathu. 
32_2_1_UJona wakhuleka kuJehova uNkulunkulu wakhe esezibilinini zenhlanzi, 
32_2_2_wathi: “Ekuhluphekeni kwami ngakhala kuJehova, wangiphendula; ngisesiswini sendawo yabafileyo ngamemeza, wezwa izwi lami. 
32_2_3_Wangiphonsa ekujuleni, enhliziyweni yolwandle, umfula wangihaqa; onke amadlambi akho namaza akho adlula phezu kwami. 
32_2_4_Ngathi mina: ‘Ngixoshiwe emehlweni akho;’ nokho ngiyakubuye ngibheke ithempeli lakho elingcwele. 
32_2_5_Amanzi angihaqa kwaze kwaba nasekuphileni kwami, utwa lwangikaka. Umhlanga wathandela ekhanda lami. 
32_2_6_Ngehla ngasemikhawulweni yezintaba; imigoqo yomhlaba yayisemva kwami kuze kube phakade. Kepha wakhuphula ukuphila kwami egodini, Jehova Nkulunkulu wami. 
32_2_7_“Lapho umphefumulo wami waphela amandla phakathi kwami, ngamkhumbula uJehova; umkhuleko wami wangena kuwe ethempelini lakho elingcwele. 
32_2_8_“Abagcina okungumoya nokuyize nje bashiya Othembekile kubo. 
32_2_9_Kepha mina ngiyakukuhlabela ngezwi lokudumisa, ngigcwalise engikuthembisileyo. Ukusindiswa kukuye uJehova.” 
32_2_10_UJehova wakhuluma kuyo inhlanzi, yamhlanzela uJona emhlabathini owomileyo. 
32_3_1_Izwi likaJehova lafika kuJona ngokwesibili, lathi: 
32_3_2_“Suka uye eNineve, umuzi omkhulu, umemezele kulo isimemezelo esikhulu engasikhuluma kuwe.” 
32_3_3_Wayesesuka uJona, waya eNineve njengezwi likaJehova. INineve lalingumuzi omkhulu kakhulu, uhambo lwezinsuku ezintathu. 
32_3_4_UJona waqala ukungena emzini, uhambo losuku lwaba lunye, wamemeza wathi: “Kusezakuba yizinsuku ezingamashumi amane, bese lichithwa iNineve.” 
32_3_5_Abantu baseNineve bakholwa nguNkulunkulu; bamemezela ukuzila ukudla, bembatha izindwangu zamasaka, kusukela kwabakhulu babo kwaze kwaba kwabancane. 
32_3_6_Kepha izwi lafinyelela enkosini yaseNineve; yasukuma esihlalweni sayo sobukhosi, yakhumula ingubo yayo, yazimboza ngendwangu yamasaka, yahlala phansi emlotheni. 
32_3_7_Yamemezela, yasho eNineve ngomthetho wenkosi nabakhulu bayo, yathi: “Makungabikho muntu onambitha utho, nasilwane, nankomo, namvu, bangadli, bangaphuzi manzi, 
32_3_8_kepha bambozwe ngendwangu yamasaka, umuntu nesilwane, kukhalwe kuNkulunkulu ngamandla, yebo, kubuyiswe yilowo nalowo endleleni yakhe embi nasebudloveni obusezandleni zakhe. 
32_3_9_Ngubani owaziyo uma uNkulunkulu engayikubuya, azisole, abuye ekufutheni kwentukuthelo yakhe, size singabhubhi, na?” 
32_3_10_Lapho uNkulunkulu esebona izenzo zabo ukuthi babuya endleleni yabo embi, uNkulunkulu wazisola ngokubi owayeshilo ukuthi uyakukwenza kubo, akakwenzanga. 
32_4_1_Kepha lokho kwaba kubi kakhulu kuJona, wathukuthela. 
32_4_2_Wakhuleka kuJehova, wathi: “Ngiyakuncenga, Jehova; lokho kwakungesilo izwi lami ngisekhona ezweni lakithi na? Ngalokho ngakwandulela ngokubalekela eTharishishi, ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi unguNkulunkulu onomusa nobumnene, wephuza ukuthukuthela, unesihe esikhulu, uzisola ngokubi; 
32_4_3_ngalokho, Jehova, ake ususe kimi ukuphila kwami, ngokuba kungcono kimi ukufa kunokuphila.” 
32_4_4_Wayesethi uJehova: “Wenza kahle ngokuthukuthela na?” 
32_4_5_UJona wayesephuma emzini, wahlala ngasempumalanga komuzi, wazenzela idokodo khona, wahlala phansi kwalo emthunzini, ukuze abone ukuthi kuyakwenziwa njani kuwo umuzi. 
32_4_6_UJehova uNkulunkulu walungisela umhlakuva, wawukhulisa phezu kukaJona ukuba ube ngumthunzi phezu kwekhanda lakhe ukumophula kokubi kwakhe. UJona wathokoza ngomhlakuva ngokuthokoza okukhulu. 
32_4_7_Kepha sekuzakuvela ukusa ngangomuso uNkulunkulu walungisela impehlwa; yawuphehla umhlakuva, wabuna. 
32_4_8_Kwathi ekuphumeni kwelanga uNkulunkulu walungisela umoya oshisayo wasempumalanga; ilanga lashaya ekhanda likaJona, waba nesiyezi, wazicelela ukuba afe, wathi: “Kungcono kimi ukufa kunokuphila.” 
32_4_9_Wayesethi uNkulunkulu kuJona: “Wenza kahle ngokuthukuthela ngenxa yomhlakuva na?” Wathi: “Ngenza kahle ngokuthukuthela kuze kube sekufeni.” 
32_4_10_Wayesethi uJehova: “Wena wawuhawukela umhlakuva ongawukhandlekelanga nongawukhulisanga, owamila ebusuku bunye, wabhubha ebusuku bunye; 
32_4_11_mina-ke bengingayikulihawukela iNineve, umuzi omkhulu, okukuwo abantu abangaphezu kwezinkulungwane eziyikhulu namashumi amabili abangakwazi ukwahlukanisa isandla sokunene nesokhohlo, kanye nezinkomo eziningi, na?” 
33_1_1_Izwi likaJehova elafika kuMika waseMoresheti ezinsukwini zikaJothamu, no-Ahazi, noHezekiya, amakhosi akwaJuda, owalibona ngeSamariya neJerusalema. 
33_1_2_Zwanini, bantu bonke, uqaphele, mhlaba nokugcwala kwakho, iNkosi uJehova ibe ngufakazi ngani, iNkosi isethempelini layo elingcwele. 
33_1_3_Ngokuba bhekani, uJehova uphuma endaweni yakhe, ehle, anyathele ezindaweni eziphakemeyo zomhlaba. 
33_1_4_Izintaba ziyakuncibilika phansi kwakhe, nezigodi ziyakuqhekezeka njengengcina phambi komlilo, njengamanzi athululwe emaweni. 
33_1_5_Konke lokhu kungenxa yesiphambeko sikaJakobe nangezono zendlu yakwa-Israyeli. Siyini isiphambeko sikaJakobe? Asiyilo iSamariya na? Ziyini izindawo eziphakemeyo zakwaJuda? Aziyilo iJerusalema na? 
33_1_6_“Ngiyakwenza iSamariya libe yizihlephu zasendle nendawo yokutshala izivini, ngiqulele amatshe alo esigodini, ngambule isisekelo salo. 
33_1_7_Zonke izithombe zalo ezibaziweyo ziyakwaphulwa, nakho konke elikukhokhelweyo kuyakushiswa ngomlilo, nayo yonke imifanekiso ngiyakuyenza ukuba ibe yincithakalo, ngokuba likuqoqile ngenkokhelo yobufebe; kuyakubuye kube yinkokhelo yobufebe.” 
33_1_8_Ngenxa yalokho ngiyakukhala, ngihhewule, ngihambe ngihlutshuliwe, ngihamba ze; ngenze isililo njengamakhanka, ngikhale njengezintshe. 
33_1_9_Ngokuba amanxeba alo awanakuphulukiswa, lokhu sekufikile nakwaJuda, kufinyelela esangweni labantu bami naseJerusalema. 
33_1_10_Ningakulandisi eGati, ningakhali e-Akha; eBeti Afera huquzelani othulini. 
33_1_11_Dlulani nina enakhileyo eShafiri ngobunqunu nangehlazo; abakhe eSawanani abaphumi; ukukhala kwaseBeti Eseli akunivumeli ukuhlala khona. 
33_1_12_Ngokuba abakhe eMaroti banemihelo ngokuhle, lokhu okubi kwehlile kuvela kuJehova, kwafika esangweni laseJerusalema. 
33_1_13_Bophelani enqoleni ihhashi elinejubane, nina enakhileyo eLakishi; lona lalingukuqala kwezono kuyo indodakazi yaseSiyoni, ngokuba iziphambeko zakwa-Israyeli zafunyanwa kuwe. 
33_1_14_Ngalokho uyakupha iMoresheti Gati isipho sokuvalelisana; izindlu zase-Akizibi ziyakuba yinkohliso kuwo amakhosi akwa-Israyeli. 
33_1_15_Ngisezakwehlisa phezu kwenu enakhileyo eMaresha oyakunidla: udumo luka-Israyeli luyakufika e-Adulamu. 
33_1_16_Ziphucule, zigunde ngenxa yabantwana bokwenama kwakho, wandise ubumpandla bakho njengenqe, ngokuba bayakuthunjwa kuwe. 
33_2_1_Wo! kwabaceba ububi, benze okubi emibhedeni yabo! Ekukhanyeni kokusa bayakwenza, ngokuba kusemandleni ezandla zabo. 
33_2_2_Bafisa amasimu, bawadluzule, nezindlu, bazisuse; bacindezela indoda nendlu yayo, umuntu nefa lakhe. 
33_2_3_Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Bhekani, ngiceba okubi ngalo mndeni, eningayikukhipha kukho izintamo zenu; futhi ningahambi ngokuzidla, ngokuba lokhu kuyisikhathi esibi. 
33_2_4_Ngalolo suku bayakuphakamisa umfanekiso ngani, bakhale isililo, bathi: ‘Sichithiwe nokuchithwa; isabelo sabantu bami sinikwa omunye; yeka ukubuya kwakhe kimi; abahlubuki babelwa amasimu ethu.’ ” 
33_2_5_Ngalokho akuyikubakho ophonsa intambo ngenkatho ebandleni likaJehova. 
33_2_6_“Ningaprofethi,” baprofetha, basho njalo, “ningaprofethi ngalokho; ihlazo aliyikusifica.” 
33_2_7_Kuyakushiwo, nina ndlu kaJakobe, ukuthi uMoya kaJehova unyinyekile; yizenzo zakhe lezi na? “Awamahle yini amazwi ami kohamba ngobuqotho? 
33_2_8_Kepha kade bevukile abantu bami baba yizitha; nihlubula ingubo esambathweni sabadlula ngethemba, befulathele ukulwa. 
33_2_9_Niyaxosha abesifazane babantu bami ezindlini zokuthokoza kwabo, nisusa ezinganeni zabo ubukhosi bami kuze kube phakade. 
33_2_10_Sukumani nihambe, ngokuba lokhu akusikho ukuphumula kwenu; ngenxa yabayingcosana niyachitha ngokuchitha okunamandla. 
33_2_11_Uma bekuhambahamba umuntu okhuluma umoya nje namanga, athi: ‘Ngiyakuprofetha kuwe ngewayini nangophuzo olunamandla,’ ubeyakuba ngumprofethi walaba bantu. 
33_2_12_“Ngiyakukubutha, Jakobe, wonke wakho; ngiyakuqoqa nokuqoqa insali yakwa-Israyeli; ngiyakubabeka ndawonye njengezimvu zaseBosira, njengomhlambi phakathi kwedlelo lawo, kwenziwe ukukhamuluka okuvela kubantu. 
33_2_13_Umfohli ukhuphuka ngaphambi kwabo; sebefohlile, badlulela esangweni, baphuma ngalo; inkosi yabo idlulile phambi kwabo, noJehova usesihlokweni sabo.” 
33_3_1_Ngathi: “Zwanini nina zinhloko zakwaJakobe, nani zikhulu zendlu yakwa-Israyeli ukuthi: Akusikho okwenu ukwazi ukulunga 
33_3_2_nina enizonda okuhle, nithanda okubi, enebula kubo isikhumba sabo, nenyama yabo emathanjeni abo, 
33_3_3_enidla inyama yabantu bami, nihlinza kubo isikhumba sabo, naphula amathambo abo, yebo, nibaqoba njengokwasekhanzini nanjengenyama phakathi kwebhodwe.” 
33_3_4_Khona bayakukhala kuJehova, kepha akayikubaphendula; uyakusitheza ubuso bakhe kubo ngaleso sikhathi ngenxa yokwenza kwabo izenzo zabo zibe zimbi. 
33_3_5_Usho kanje uJehova: “Ngabaprofethi abadukisa abantu bami, abathi, bese nakho okokuhlafuna ngamazinyo abo, bamemeze bathi: ‘Ukuthula,’ nongabeki lutho emlonyeni wabo bamlungisele ukulwa. 
33_3_6_Ngalokho ubusuku buyakunehlela ukuze ningabi nambono, kuhlwe kini, ningabe nisabhula; ilanga liyakushonela abaprofethi, usuku lube mnyama phezu kwabo. 
33_3_7_Ababoni bayakuba namahloni, ababhuli bayangaze; bayakumboza amadevu abo bonke, ngokuba akuveli mpendulo kuNkulunkulu.” 
33_3_8_Kepha mina ngigcwele amandla ngoMoya kaJehova ngokulunga nangobuqhawe ukuba ngimtshele uJakobe iziphambeko zakhe, u-Israyeli izono zakhe. 
33_3_9_Ake nizwe lokhu nina zinhloko zendlu kaJakobe nani zikhulu zendlu yakwa-Israyeli eninengwa ngukwahlulelwa, nihlanekezela konke ukulunga, 
33_3_10_enakha iSiyoni ngegazi neJerusalema ngobubi, 
33_3_11_elizinhloko zalo zahlulela ngemivuzo, nelibapristi balo bafundisa ngenkokhelo, nelibaprofethi balo babhula ngemali, bencike nokho kuJehova, bethi: “UJehova akaphakathi kwethu na?” Asiyikwehlelwa ngokubi. 
33_3_12_Ngalokho ngenxa yenu iSiyoni liyakulinywa njengensimu, iJerusalema libe yincithakalo, intaba yendlu ibe yizindawo eziphakemeyo zamahlathi. 
33_4_1_Kepha kuyakuthi ngezinsuku ezizayo intaba yendlu kaJehova iqiniswe esiqongweni sezintaba, iphakame kunamagquma, nabantu bayakugobhozela khona. 
33_4_2_Izizwe eziningi ziyakuhamba, zithi: “Wozani sikhuphukele entabeni kaJehova nasendlini kaNkulunkulu kaJakobe; uyakusifundisa izindlela zakhe, sihambe emikhondweni yakhe, ngokuba umthetho uyakuvela eSiyoni, nezwi likaJehova eJerusalema. 
33_4_3_Uyakwahlulela phakathi kwezizwe eziningi, anqume phakathi kwezizwe ezinamandla ezikude; ziyakukhanda izinkemba zazo zibe ngamakhuba, imikhonto yazo ibe ngocelemba; isizwe asiyikuphakamisela isizwe inkemba, zingabe zisafuna ukulwa. 
33_4_4_Bayakuhlala, kube yilowo nalowo phansi komvini wakhe naphansi komkhiwane wakhe; akakho oyakubesabisa, ngokuba umlomo kaJehova Sebawoti ukhulumile. 
33_4_5_Ngokuba bonke abantu bahamba, kube yilowo nalowo ngegama likankulunkulu wakhe, kepha thina siyakuhamba ngegama likaJehova uNkulunkulu wethu kuze kube phakade naphakade. 
33_4_6_“Ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova, “ngiyakubutha abaqhugayo, ngiqoqe abaxoshiweyo nengenze okubi kubo, 
33_4_7_ngenze abaqhugayo babe yinsali, abadediselwe kude babe yisizwe esinamandla; uJehova uyakubusa phezu kwabo entabeni yaseSiyoni kusukela manje kuze kube phakade. 
33_4_8_Wena mbhoshongo womhlambi, negquma lendodakazi yaseSiyoni kuyakufika kuwe, yebo, ukubusa kokuqala kuyakufika, umbuso wendodakazi yaseJerusalema.” 
33_4_9_Umemezelani manje ngokumemeza okungakho na? Ayikho inkosi kuwe, ubhubhile umluleki wakho, lokhu ubanjwe yimihelo njengobelethayo. 
33_4_10_Yiba nemihelo, uzale, ndodakazi yaseSiyoni njengobelethayo, ngokuba manje uyakuphuma emzini, uhlale endle, ufike naseBabele, lapho uzakophulwa khona; lapho uJehova uyakukukhulula esandleni sezitha zakho. 
33_4_11_Manje izizwe eziningi zikubuthanele; zithi: “Malingcoliswe, amehlo ethu alibuke iSiyoni.” 
33_4_12_Kepha azazi imicabango kaJehova, aziqondi amasu akhe, ngokuba uzibuthile njengezithungu esibuyeni. 
33_4_13_“Suka ubhule, ndodakazi yaseSiyoni, ngokuba ngiyakwenza uphondo lwakho lube yinsimbi, nezinselo zakho ngizenze insimbi; uyakuchoboza abantu abaningi,” kwahlukaniselwe uJehova inzuzo yabo, nemfuyo yabo kuyo iNkosi yomhlaba wonke. 
33_5_1_Buthana ngamaviyo, ndodakazi yamaviyo; usivimbezele, bayakumshaya umahluleli wakwa-Israyeli ngenduku esihlathini. 
33_5_2_“Kepha wena Betlehema Efratha, omncane ukuba ube phakathi kwemindeni yakwaJuda, ngiyakuphunyelwa ngovela kuwe, ozakuba ngumbusi kwa-Israyeli, okuvela kwakhe kusukela endulo ezinsukwini zaphakade.” 
33_5_3_Ngalokho bayakukhashelwa, bese yibuyela insali yabafowabo kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli. 
33_5_4_Uyakuma, aluse ngamandla kaJehova nangokuphakama kwegama likaJehova uNkulunkulu wakhe; sebeyakuhlala, ngokuba uzakuba mkhulu kuze kube semajukujukwini omhlaba. 
33_5_5_Ukuthula kuyakuba yilokhu: lapho umAsiriya engena ezweni lakithi, anyathele ezindlini zethu zobukhosi, siyakumvusela abelusi abayisikhombisa nezikhulu zabantu eziyisishiyagalombili. 
33_5_6_Bayakuchitha izwe lase-Asiriya ngenkemba, nezwe lakwaNimrode ezintubeni zalo, asophule kumAsiriya, lapho engena ezweni lakithi, nalapho enyathela emikhawulweni yethu. 
33_5_7_Insali yakwaJakobe iyakuba phakathi kwabantu abaningi njengamazolo avela kuJehova, ngengezihlambi otshanini ezingahlaleli muntu, zingahlaleli abantwana babantu. 
33_5_8_Insali yakwaJakobe iyakuba phakathi kwezizwe, phakathi kwabantu abaningi, njengengonyama phakathi kwezilwane zasehlathini, njengebhongo lengonyama phakathi kwemihlambi yezimvu, elithi lapho lidabula, linyathele, lidwengule, kungekho owophulayo. 
33_5_9_Masiphakanyiswe isandla sakho phezu kwezitha zakho, zinqunywe zonke izitha zakho. 
33_5_10_“Kuyakuthi ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova, “nginqume amahhashi akho phakathi kwakho, ngichithe izinqola zakho, 
33_5_11_ngiyinqume imizi yasezweni lakho, ngizidilize zonke izinqaba zakho. 
33_5_12_Ngiyakunquma ukulumba esandleni sakho, kungabe kusabakho kuwe abahlola imihlola. 
33_5_13_Ngiyakunquma izithombe zakho ezibaziweyo nezinsika zakho phakathi kwakho, ungabe usakhonza imisebenzi yezandla zakho. 
33_5_14_Ngiyakubasiphula o-Ashera bakho phakathi kwakho, ngiyichithe imizi yakho. 
33_5_15_Ngiyakwenza impindiselo ngentukuthelo nangokufutheka kuzo izizwe ezingalalelanga.” 
33_6_1_Ake nizwe akushoyo uJehova, ethi: “Suka ulwe phambi kwezintaba, uzwise amagquma izwi lakho. 
33_6_2_Zwanini, zintaba, ukuphikisana kukaJehova, nani zisekelo zomhlaba eziqinileyo, ngokuba uJehova unokuphikisana nabantu bakhe, uyakumelana nabo. 
33_6_3_“Bantu bami, ngenzeni kini; kuyini enginikhathaze ngakho na? Ngiphenduleni. 
33_6_4_Nganikhuphula ezweni laseGibithe, nganihlenga endlini yezigqila, ngathuma phambi kwenu oMose, no-Aroni, noMiriyamu. 
33_6_5_Bantu bami, ake nikhumbule okwacetshwa nguBalaki inkosi yakwaMowabi, nalokho amphendula ngakho uBileyamu indodana kaBeyori, nokwakuphakathi kweShithimi neGiligali, nize nazi izenzo ezilungileyo zikaJehova.” 
33_6_6_Ngiyakusondela kuJehova nginantoni, ngikhothame kuNkulunkulu ophezulu, na? Ngiyakufika ngiphethe iminikelo yokushiswa, nginamathole amnyaka munye, na? 
33_6_7_UJehova uyakwenamela izinkulungwane zezinqama nezinkulungwane eziyishumi zemifula yamafutha na? Ngiyakunika izibulo lami ngenxa yesiphambeko sami, isithelo sesisu sami ngenxa yesono senhliziyo yami, na? 
33_6_8_Ukutshelile, muntu, okuhle; uJehova ufunani kuwe, kungabi ngukwenza ukulunga kuphela nokuthanda umusa, uhambe noNkulunkulu wakho ngokuthobeka, na? 
33_6_9_Izwi likaJehova liyamemeza kuwo umuzi. Ukwesaba igama lakho ngukusindiswa; zwanini induku noyimisileyo. 
33_6_10_Kusekhona inzuzo embi endlini yababi, ne-efa elincane eliqalekiswayo, na? 
33_6_11_“Ukhona ohlanzekile onesilinganiso esibi nesikhwama sezisindo ezikhohlisayo na? 
33_6_12_“Abacebileyo bawo bagcwele ubudlova, nabakhileyo kuwo bakhuluma amanga, nolimi lwabo lunenkohliso emlonyeni wabo. 
33_6_13_Ngalokho mina ngiyakugulisa ngokushaya, ngikuchithe ngenxa yezono zakho. 
33_6_14_Lapho udlayo, awuyikusutha, kube khona ukulamba phakathi kwakho; uyakususa, ungakhululi kodwa, nokukhululayo ngiyakukukhaphela enkembeni. 
33_6_15_“Uyakutshala, ungavuni kodwa; uyakunyathela iminqumo, ungazigcobi kodwa ngamafutha, nezithelo zomvini, ungaliphuzi nokho iwayini. 
33_6_16_Izimiso zika-Omri ziyagcinwa, nazo zonke izenzo zendlu ka-Ahabi; nihamba ngamacebo abo; ngalokho ngiyakunenza incithakalo nabakhileyo khona into encimfelwayo; niyakuthwala ihlazo labantu bami.” 
33_7_1_Maye kimi! Ngokuba nginjengokuvunwa kwezithelo zasehlobo, njengokukhothozwa komvini; akukho hlukuzo lokudliwa; umphefumulo wami uyafisa ikhiwane eliyingqalabutho. 
33_7_2_Abathembekileyo babhubhile emhlabeni, akakho oqotho phakathi kwabantu; bonke baqamekela igazi; bayazingelana, kube yilowo nalowo umfowabo ngenetha. 
33_7_3_Izandla zabo ziphezu kokubi ukukuthuthukisa; isikhulu sinesicelo, umahluleli ubheka umvuzo; omkhulu ukhuluma ngesifiso somphefumulo wakhe; bayakwalukanisa. 
33_7_4_Omuhle wabo unjengobobe, olungileyo mubi kunothango lwameva; usuku lwabalindi bakho nolokuhanjelwa kwakho lufikile; sekuyakuba ngukukhungatheka kubo. 
33_7_5_Ningamethembi umngane, ningakholwa ngumhlobo; gcina iminyango yomlomo wakho kuye olala ngasesifubeni sakho. 
33_7_6_Ngokuba indodana idelela uyise; indodakazi ivukela unina; umalokazana uvukela uninazala, nezitha zomuntu ngamadoda endlu yakhe. 
33_7_7_Kepha mina ngiyakumbheka uJehova; ngiyakulindela uNkulunkulu wokusindiswa kwami; uNkulunkulu wami uyakungizwa. 
33_7_8_Ungathokozi ngami, sitha sami; ngokuba uma ngiwile, ngiyakuvuka; lapho ngihlezi ebumnyameni, uJehova uzakuba ngukukhanya kwami. 
33_7_9_Ngiyakuthwala ulaka lukaJehova, ngokuba ngonile kuye, aze amele indaba yami, angenzele ukwahlulelwa, angiphumisele ekukhanyeni, ngibone ukulunga kwakhe. 
33_7_10_Isitha sami siyakukubona, sisitshekelwe ngamahloni, esona besithi kimi: “Uphi uJehova uNkulunkulu wakho?” Amehlo ami ayakusibona; manje siyakunyathelwa njengodaka lwasezitaladini. 
33_7_11_Kuyakufika usuku lokwakha izingange zakho; ngalolo suku umkhawulo wakho uyakudediselwa kude. 
33_7_12_Ngalolo suku bayakufika kuwe bevela e-Asiriya nasemizini yaseGibithe, kusukela eGibithe kuze kube seMfuleni, kusukela elwandle kuze kube selwandle, kusukela entabeni kuze kube sentabeni. 
33_7_13_Kepha izwe liyakuba yincithakalo ngenxa yabakhileyo kulo ngezenzo zabo. 
33_7_14_Yalusa abantu bakho ngentonga yakho, izimvu zefa lakho ezihlala zodwa ehlathini phakathi kweKarmeli; mazaluke eBashani nakwaGileyadi njengasezinsukwini zasendulo. 
33_7_15_“Njengasezinsukwini zokuphuma kwakho ezweni laseGibithe ngiyakubabonisa izimangaliso.” 
33_7_16_Abezizwe bayakubona, babe namahloni ngamandla abo onke, babeke isandla sabo emlonyeni wabo, izindlebe zabo zibe yizithulu. 
33_7_17_Bayakukhotha uthuli njengenyoka, baphume bethuthumela njengezinto ezinabuzelayo emhlabathini ezindaweni zazo ezivalelweyo, bafike ngokuqhaqhazela kuJehova uNkulunkulu wethu, besabe ngenxa yakho. 
33_7_18_Ngubani onguNkulunkulu onjengawe othethelela insali yefa lakho ububi bayo, uyiyekele isiphambeko sayo, na? Akabambeleli entukuthelweni yakhe kuze kube phakade, ngokuba wenamela umusa. 
33_7_19_Uyakubuye asibekezelele, anyathele phansi ububi bethu; yebo, uyakuphonsa zonke izono zabo ekujuleni kolwandle. 
33_7_20_Uyakunika uJakobe ukuthembeka no-Abrahama umusa owakufungela obaba kwasezinsukwini zasendulo. 
34_1_1_Isiprofetho ngeNineve, incwadi yombono kaNahume wase-Elikoshi. 
34_1_2_UJehova unguNkulunkulu oshisekelayo nophindiselayo; uJehova uyaphindisela, ugcwele ukufutheka; uJehova uphindisela kwabamelene naye, ugcinela izitha zakhe intukuthelo. 
34_1_3_UJehova wephuza ukuthukuthela, mkhulu ngamandla, akenzi onecala abe msulwa; uJehova unendlela yakhe esivunguvungwini nasesiphephweni, namafu ayibhuqu lezinyawo zakhe. 
34_1_4_Uyakhuza ulwandle, alomise, ashise nemifula yonke; iBashani liyawuma kanye neKarmeli, nezimbali zaseLebanoni ziyabuna. 
34_1_5_Izintaba ziyathuthumela phambi kwakhe, amagquma ayancibilika; umhlaba uyaphakama ebusweni bakhe, yebo, nakho konke okuhlala kuwo. 
34_1_6_Ngubani ongema ebusweni bentukuthelo yakhe na? Ngubani ongema ekufuthekeni kolaka lwakhe na? Ukufutheka kwakhe kuthululiwe njengomlilo, namadwala ayaqhekezeka phambi kwakhe. 
34_1_7_UJehova muhle, uyinqaba ngosuku lwenhlupheko, uyabazi abaphephela kuye. 
34_1_8_Kepha ngesikhukhula esiphuphumayo uyakuqeda indawo yakhona, axoshele izitha zakhe ebumnyameni. 
34_1_9_Enikucebayo ngoJehova uyakuqeda yena; ukuhlupheka akuyikuvela ngokwesibili. 
34_1_10_Lapho bethandela njengameva, benjengabaminzileyo ophuzweni lwabo, bayakuqedwa nokuqedwa njengamabibi omileyo. 
34_1_11_Kuphume kuwe owamcebela uJehova okubi, wanika isiluleko esibi. 
34_1_12_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Noma benamandla, futhi bebaningi, nokho bayakuqedwa, banyamalale; noma ngikuhluphile, angisayikukuhlupha. 
34_1_13_Sengiyakulaphula ijoka eliphezu kwakho, ngigqabule izibopho zakho.” 
34_1_14_Kepha uJehova uyalezile ngawe ukuthi akusayikuhlwanyelwa okwegama lakho; endlini yawonkulunkulu bakho ngiyakunquma izithombe ezibaziweyo nezibunjiweyo; ngiyakulungisa ithuna lakho, ngokuba awuyinto yalutho. 
34_1_15_Bheka ezintabeni izinyawo zoletha izindaba ezinhle, omemezela ukuthula. Gubha imikhosi yakho, Juda, ugcwalise izithembiso zakho, ngokuba omubi akasayikudabula kuwe; unqunyiwe ngokupheleleyo. 
34_2_1_Kukhuphukela umchithi kuwe; gcina inqaba, ulinde indlela, uqinise izinkalo zakho, uwenze amandla akho ukuba aqine. 
34_2_2_Ngokuba uJehova uyabuyisa ukuphakama kukaJakobe njengokuphakama kuka-Israyeli, lokhu abathululayo bebathululile, bachitha amagatsha emivini yabo. 
34_2_3_Izihlangu zamaqhawe akhe zibomvu, amadoda anamandla embethe okubomvu; izinqola zibengezela umlilo ensimbini ngosuku lokuzilungisela kwakhe; imikhonto iyaveva. 
34_2_4_Izinqola ziyahlanya ezitaladini, ziyaficana ezigcawini; ukubonakala kwazo kunjengezimbaqa, zigijima njengemibani. 
34_2_5_Useyakhumbula izikhulu zakhe, ziyakhubeka ekuhambeni kwazo; zisheshela izingange zakhona, izivikelo ziyalungiswa. 
34_2_6_Amasango emifula ayavulwa, indlu yamakhosi iyancibilika. 
34_2_7_Kunqunyiwe: liyambulwa, lisuswe; izincekukazi zalo zibubula ngezwi lamajuba, zibetha phezu kwezinhliziyo zazo. 
34_2_8_Kepha iNineve linjengechibi lamanzi kwasendulo, nokho bayabaleka. “Yimani, yimani!” Kepha akakho ophendukayo. 
34_2_9_Phangani isiliva! Phangani igolide! Ngokuba akukho ukuphela kokunqwatshelweyo nokukhazimula kwazo zonke izinto ezinxanelekayo. 
34_2_10_Liyize, alisenalutho, lichithekile; inhliziyo iyancibilika, amadolo ayashayana, imihelo isezinkalweni zonke, nobuso babo bonke buphaphathekile. 
34_2_11_Uphi umphandu wezingonyama, nedlelo lamabhongo ezingonyama, lapho kwahamba ingonyama nengonyamakazi nebhongo lengonyama, kungekho okwesabisayo na? 
34_2_12_Ingonyama yadwengula okwanele amabhongo ayo, yabindela izingonyamakazi zayo; yagcwalisa imiphandu yayo ngempango nemigede yayo ngengcugco. 
34_2_13_“Bheka, ngimelene nawe,” usho uJehova Sebawoti; “ngiyakushisa izinqola zakho emsini, inkemba idle amabhongo akho ezingonyama; ngiyakunquma impango yakho emhlabeni, nezwi lezithunywa zakho alisayikuzwakala.” 
34_3_1_Wo kumuzi wezingazi! Wonke ugcwele amanga nempango, ukuphanga akupheli. 
34_3_2_Ngukuqhuma kwesiswebhu, nomsindo wokugodlozela kwamasondo, namahhashi agadulayo, nezinqola ezixhumayo; 
34_3_3_ngabamahhashi abasukelayo, nenkemba enjengelangabi, nomkhonto onyazimayo, abaningi ababuleweyo nenqwaba yezidumbu, kungekho ukuphela kwezidikadika; bakhubeka ngezidikadika zabo, 
34_3_4_ngenxa yobuningi bobufebe besifebe esibukekayo, umnikazi wokulumba, esithengisa izizwe ngobufebe baso, nemindeni ngamalumbo aso. 
34_3_5_“Bheka, ngimelene nawe,” usho uJehova Sebawoti; “ngiyakuphakamisa imiphetho yakho ebusweni bakho, ngibonise izizwe ubunqunu bakho, nemibuso ihlazo lakho. 
34_3_6_Ngiyakuphonsa okunengakayo phezu kwakho, ngikuhlazise, ngikubeke ube yinto ebukwayo. 
34_3_7_Kuyakuthi bonke abakubonayo bakubalekele, bathi: ‘INineve lichithekile, ngubani oyakulililela na?’ Ngiyakukufunelaphi abaduduzi na?” 
34_3_8_Umuhle wena kuneNo Amoni elaliphakathi kwemifula, elalizungezwe ngamanzi, elilugange lwalo lwalululwandle, nelidonga lwalo lungamanzi, na? 
34_3_9_IKushe neGibithe kwakungamandla alo angenakuphela; uPhuthi namaLubi babe ngabasizi bakho. 
34_3_10_Nalo lamukiswa, laya ekuthunjweni, nezingane zalo zachotshozwa ezingosini zazo zonke izitaladi; benza inkatho ngezikhulu zalo, nabo bonke abakhulu balo baboshwa ngamaketanga. 
34_3_11_Uyakudakwa nawe, ufihlwe; futhi uyakufuna inqaba yokubalekela izitha. 
34_3_12_Zonke izinqaba zakho ziyimikhiwane enamakhiwane ayingqalabutho; uma inyakaziswa, awela emlonyeni wodlayo. 
34_3_13_Bheka, abantu bakho phakathi kwakho bangabesifazane nje; amasango ezwe lakho avulekele impela izitha zakho, umlilo udlile imigoqo yakho. 
34_3_14_Zikhelele amanzi okuvinjezelwa, uqinise izinqaba zakho; ngena odakeni, uxove ibumba, uqinise uhonela. 
34_3_15_Lapho umlilo uyakukuqeda, inkemba ikunqume, ikudle njengenkasa; zandise njengenkasa, zandise njengesikhonyane! 
34_3_16_Wandisile abathengisi bakho kunezinkanyezi zezulu; inkasa iyakhula, indize imuke. 
34_3_17_Izikhulu zakho zinjengezinkumbi, nezinduna zakho zinjengamaqulo esikhonyane esihlezi phakathi kwezingange ngosuku olumakhaza, kepha lapho liphuma ilanga, sindize simuke, ingabe isaziwa indawo yaso ukuthi iphi. 
34_3_18_Abelusi bakho balele, nkosi yase-Asiriya; abakhulu bakho bayaphumula; abantu bakho bahlakazekile ezintabeni, akakho obabuthayo. 
34_3_19_Akukho ukupholiswa kokwaphulwa kwakho; umvimbo wakho unzima; bonke abezwa umbiko ngawe bashaya izandla ngawe, ngokuba ngubani ububi bakho obungadlulelanga njalo phezu kwakhe na? 
35_1_1_Isiprofetho owasibonayo uHabakuki umprofethi. 
35_1_2_Ngiyakukuncenga kuze kube nini, Jehova, ungezwa, ngikhala ngendluzula, ungasindisi, na? 
35_1_3_Ungiboniselani ububi, ungibhekise ukukhathazeka na? Ngokuba ukuchitheka nendluzula kuphambi kwami; kukhona ukulwa, ukuxabana kuyaqhamuka. 
35_1_4_Ngalokho umthetho uba buthakathaka, nokwahlulela akuphumi kuze kube nini, ngokuba omubi uhaqa olungileyo; ngalokho ukwahlulela kuphuma kuhlanekezelwe. 
35_1_5_“Bonani phakathi kwabezizwe, nibheke, nimangale nokumangala, ngokuba wenza isenzo ezinsukwini zenu eningayikukholwa yiso, lapho silandwa. 
35_1_6_Ngokuba bhekani, ngiyavusa amaKaledi, isizwe esibabayo nesiphulukundlelayo, esidabula ebubanzini bomhlaba ukuyokudla izindawo zokuhlala ezingeyizo ezaso. 
35_1_7_Siyethusa, siyesabeka; kuphuma kuso ukwahlulela kwaso nesithunzi saso. 
35_1_8_Amahhashi aso anejubane kunezingwe, anonya kunezimpisi zakusihlwa; abamahhashi baso bayaqinisela; yebo, bavela kude abamahhashi baso, bandiza njengokhozi oluphuthuma ukudla. 
35_1_9_Zonke zifikela indluzula, ubuso bazo bujonga phambili; zibutha abathunjwa njengesihlabathi. 
35_1_10_Yebo, sibhinqa amakhosi, nababusi balusulu kuso; sihleka zonke izinqaba, sinqwabela uthuli, sizithathe. 
35_1_11_Bese sikhukhula njengomoya, sidlule, sizitholele icala, sona esimandla aso angunkulunkulu waso.” 
35_1_12_Wena Jehova Nkulunkulu wami, oNgcwele, awungowasendulo na? Asiyikufa; Jehova, usinqumele ukwahlulelwa; wena Dwala, usimisele ukujeziswa. 
35_1_13_Wena omehlo akho ahlambulukile ukuba ungaboni okubi, ungenakubheka ukuhlanekezela, ubhekelani abakhohlisayo, uthulelani lapho omubi egwinya olungileyo kunaye, 
35_1_14_wenze abantu babe njengezinhlanzi zaselwandle, njengezilwanyana ezinwabuzelayo ezingenambusi phezu kwazo na? 
35_1_15_Uyabakhipha bonke ngodobo, abadonse ngenetha, ababuthe ngenetha lakhe elihudulwayo; ngalokho uyathokoza, uyajabula. 
35_1_16_Ngalokho uyahlabela inetha lakhe, ashisele inetha lakhe elihudulwayo impepho, ngokuba isabelo sakhe siyanona ngakho, kube mnandi ukudla kwakhe. 
35_1_17_Ngalokho uyakuthulula inetha lakhe, abulale njalo izizwe ngokunganqamukiyo, na? 
35_2_1_Ngiyakuma endaweni yami yokulinda, ngigcule enqabeni, ngikhangele ukubona ukuthi uyakukhulumani kimi nokuthi ngiyakuphendulani ngokusola kwami. 
35_2_2_UJehova wangiphendula wathi: “Wulobe umbono, uwuqophe ezibhebheni ukuba kufundwe kalula. 
35_2_3_Ngokuba umbono usengowesikhathi esimisiweyo; uphuthuma ekupheleni, awuyikukhohlisa; noma ulibala, wulindele, ngokuba uyakufika nokufika, awuyikwephuza. 
35_2_4_“Bheka, umphefumulo wakhe uziphakamisile, awuqotho phakathi kwakhe, kepha olungileyo uzakuphila ngokukholwa kwakhe. 
35_2_5_Yebo, iwayini liyakhohlisa, lingumuntu okhukhumeleyo ongayikuma, owandisa ukufisa kwakhe njengendawo yabafileyo; unjengokufa: akasuthi; uyazibuthela zonke izizwe, uziqoqela bonke abantu. 
35_2_6_“Bona abayikuphakamisa isaga nomfanekiso wemfumbe ngaye, bathi: “ ‘Wo kuyena owandisa okungesikho okwakhe koze kube nini na? — nozisindisa ngezibambiso!’ 
35_2_7_Abayikuvuka ngokuzumayo abakulumayo, bavuke abakuthuthumelisayo, ube yimpango yabo, na? 
35_2_8_Ngokuba wena uphangile izizwe eziningi, bonke abanye abantu bayakuphanga wena, ngenxa yezingazi zabantu nendluzula eyenziwe ezweni, nasemzini, nakubo bonke abakhe kuwo. 
35_2_9_“Wo kozuzela indlu yakhe inzuzo embi ukuba abeke isidleke sakhe phezulu ukuyophulwa esandleni sobubi! 
35_2_10_Ucebele indlu yakho okubi ngokuchitha abantu abaningi, wona kuwo umphefumulo wakho. 
35_2_11_Ngokuba amatshe ayakukhala esodongeni, nomshayo uyakuwaphendula usemithini. 
35_2_12_“Wo kowakha umuzi ngezingazi, aqinise idolobha ngobubi! 
35_2_13_Bheka, akuveli kuJehova Sebawoti ukuthi abantu bakhandlekela umlilo, izizwe zizikhathaze ngokuyize, na? 
35_2_14_Ngokuba umhlaba uyakugcwala ukwazi inkazimulo kaJehova, njengamanzi asibekela ulwandle. 
35_2_15_“Wo komphuzisa umngane wakhe, axube nokufutheka, amdakise, ukuze abuke ubunqunu bakhe! 
35_2_16_Uyakusuthiswa ngehlazo esikhundleni senkazimulo, uphuze nawe, wambule ijwabu, indebe yesandla sokunene sikaJehova siphendulelwe kuwe, kube yihlazo phezu kodumo lwakho. 
35_2_17_Ngokuba indluzula eyenziwe eLebanoni iyakukusibekela, ukuchithwa kwezilwane kukwesabise, ngenxa yezingazi zabantu nendluzula eyenziwe ezweni, nasemzini, nakubo bonke abakhe kuwo. 
35_2_18_“Sisizani isithombe esibaziweyo, lokhu umbumbi waso esibaza, nesithombe esibunjiweyo nomfundisi wamanga, lokhu umbumbi waso ethemba kuso, ukuze enze izithombe eziyizimungulu, na? 
35_2_19_Wo koshoyo kumuthi ukuthi: ‘Vuka!’ nakulo itshe eliyisimungulu: ‘Phaphama!’ Lokhu kungafundisa na? Bheka, kunamekwe ngegolide nangesiliva, kungekho neze umoya phakathi kwakho. 
35_2_20_Kepha uJehova usethempelini lakhe elingcwele; thula phambi kwakhe, mhlaba wonke.” 
35_3_1_Umkhuleko kaHabakuki umprofethi; ngeShigiyonoti. 
35_3_2_Jehova, ngizwile umbiko ngawe, ngiyesaba izenzo zakho; zivuselele phakathi kwale minyaka, wenze ukuba zaziwe kule minyaka, ukhumbule umusa nasolakeni. 
35_3_3_UNkulunkulu uvela eThemani, oNgcwele uphuma entabeni yasePharanu. Sela Udumo lwakhe lusibekela amazulu, nomhlaba ugcwele indumiso yakhe. 
35_3_4_Kuqhamuka ukubengezela kunjengokukhanya; imisebe ivela esandleni sakhe, efihla lapho amandla akhe. 
35_3_5_Ngaphambi kwakhe kuhamba isifo, amalangabi aphuma ezinyathelweni zakhe. 
35_3_6_Uyema, uzamazamisa umhlaba; ubuka, uthuthumelisa izizwe; izintaba zaphakade ziyahlakazwa, namagquma amandulo akhothama yizindlela zakhe zaphakade. 
35_3_7_Ngibona amatende aseKushani ephansi kosizi, izilenge zezwe lakwaMidiyani ziyathuthumela. 
35_3_8_UJehova uyathukuthelela imifula na? Ulaka lwakho luvuthela imifula, nentukuthelo yakho ulwandle, lokhu ukhwele amahhashi akho, nezinqola zakho zokunqoba, na? 
35_3_9_Umnsalo wakho uvele obala, wambuliwe, usuthile ngemicibisholo yesambo sakho. Sela Uqhekeza umhlaba ube yimifula. 
35_3_10_Izintaba ziyakubona, zithuthumele; isikhukhula samanzi siyadlula; utwa luzwakalisa izwi lalo, luphakamisela phezulu izandla zalo. 
35_3_11_Ilanga nenyanga kwema endaweni yakho ngokukhanya kwemicibisholo yakho egijimayo nangokubengezela kwemikhonto yakho ecwebezelayo. 
35_3_12_Udabula umhlaba ngokuthukuthela, ubhula izizwe ngolaka. 
35_3_13_Uphumela ukusindiswa kwabantu bakho, yebo, ukusindiswa kogcotshiweyo wakho; uphohloza uphahla endlini yababi, wambula isisekelo kuze kube sentanyeni. Sela 
35_3_14_Ugwaza ikhanda lomholi wabo ngeyakhe imicibisholo, lapho besondela njengesivunguvungu ukungihlakaza, bejabula njengabayakudla ompofu ngasese. 
35_3_15_Unyathela ulwandle ngamahhashi akho, inqaba yamanzi amaningi. 
35_3_16_Ngiyezwa, kuyathuthumela okuphakathi kwami, izindebe zami ziyaqhaqhazela ngenhlokomo; ukubola kungena emathanjeni ami, ngithuthumela endaweni lapha ngimi khona, ngilindela usuku lokuhlupheka ukuze kukhuphuke lokhu okuyakucindezela abantu. 
35_3_17_Noma umkhiwane ungakhahleli, kungabikho izithelo emvinini, umsebenzi womnqumo uphuthe, amasimu angavezi ukudla, izimvu zinqunywe esibayeni, kungabikho nkomo ezibayeni, 
35_3_18_nokho mina ngiyakuthokoza ngoJehova, ngijabulele uNkulunkulu wokusindiswa kwami. 
35_3_19_UJehova, iNkosi yami, ungamandla ami, wenza izinyawo zami zibe njengezezindluzelekazi, angenze ukuba ngihambe ezindaweni zami eziphakemeyo. Kumholi wokuhlabelela. Ngogubhu. 
36_1_1_Izwi likaJehova elafika kuZefaniya indodana kaKushi kaGedaliya ka-Amariya kaHezekiya ezinsukwini zikaJosiya indodana ka-Amoni, inkosi yakwaJuda. 
36_1_2_“Ngiyakuqothula nokuqothula konke, kusuke ebusweni bomhlaba,” usho uJehova. 
36_1_3_“Ngiyakuqothula abantu nezilwane, ngiqothule izinyoni zezulu nezinhlanzi zaselwandle, ngikhubekise ababi, nginqume abantu ebusweni bomhlaba,” usho uJehova. 
36_1_4_“Ngiyakwelula isandla sami phezu kukaJuda naphezu kwabo bonke abakhileyo eJerusalema, nginqume insali kaBali kule ndawo, negama labapristi bezithixo kanye nabapristi, 
36_1_5_nabakhuleka kulo ibandla lasezulwini phezu kwezindlu, nabakhuleka kuJehova bemfunga, befunga futhi uMilkomu, 
36_1_6_nababuyile ekumlandeleni uJehova, nabangamfunanga uJehova bengabuzanga ngaye. 
36_1_7_Thula phambi kobuso beNkosi uJehova, ngokuba usuku lukaJehova luseduze; uJehova ulungisile umhlatshelo, ungcwelisile abamenyiweyo bakhe. 
36_1_8_Kuyakuthi ngosuku lomhlatshelo kaJehova, ngihambele izikhulu, namadodana enkosi, nabo bonke abembethe isambatho sabezizwe. 
36_1_9_Ngalolo suku ngiyakuhambela bonke abeqa umbundu, begcwalisa indlu yamakhosi abo ngobudlova nangenkohliso. 
36_1_10_“Ngalolo suku,” usho uJehova, “kuyakuba khona izwi lokukhala, livela eSangweni Lezinhlanzi, nokuhhewula, kuvela eNxenyeni Yesibili, nokufahlazeka okukhulu, kuvela emagqumeni. 
36_1_11_Hhewulani nina enakhe esiGqulweni, ngokuba bonke abantu abathengisayo bachithekile, bonke abathweswe isiliva banqunyiwe. 
36_1_12_Kuyakuthi ngaleso sikhathi ngicwaninge iJerusalema ngezibani, ngihambele abantu abajiyile enhleseni yabo, abathi ezinhliziyweni zabo: UJehova akenzi okuhle, akenzi nokubi. 
36_1_13_Ingcebo yabo iyakuba yimpango, nezindlu zabo incithakalo; bayakwakha izindlu, kepha abayikuhlala kuzo, batshale izivini, bangaliphuzi kodwa iwayini lazo. 
36_1_14_“Usuku olukhulu lukaJehova luseduze; luseduze, lushesha kakhulu; umsindo wosuku lukaJehova uyababa, neqhawe liyahhewula khona. 
36_1_15_Lolo suku lungusuku lolaka, usuku lokuhlupheka nolosizi, usuku lwencithakalo nolokuyize, usuku lobumnyama nolwesigayegaye, usuku lwamafu nolobumnyama obukhulu, 
36_1_16_usuku lwecilongo nolokuhlaba umkhosi ngasemizini ebiyelweyo nasemibhoshongweni yasezingosini. 
36_1_17_Ngiyakucindezela abantu, bahambe njengezimpumputhe, ngokuba bonile kuJehova; igazi labo liyakuthululwa njengothuli, nenyama yabo njengomquba. 
36_1_18_Nasiliva labo nagolide labo akuyikuba namandla okubophula ngosuku lwentukuthelo lukaJehova, kepha umhlaba wonke uyakudliwa ngumlilo womhawu wakhe, ngokuba uyakuqeda, yebo, aqede ngokuzumayo bonke abakhileyo ezweni.” 
36_2_1_Buthanani, yebo, buthana, sizwe esingenamahloni, 
36_2_2_isimiso singakazali lolo suku ludlula njengamakhoba lungakanehleli ulaka oluvuthayo lukaJehova, lungakafiki phezu kwenu usuku lolaka lukaJehova. 
36_2_3_Funani uJehova nina nonke bathobekileyo bomhlaba enisebenzile ukwahlulela kwakhe; funani ukulunga; funani ukuthobeka; mhlawumbe niyakusitshekelwa ngosuku lolaka lukaJehova. 
36_2_4_Ngokuba iGaza liyakushiywa, i-Ashikeloni libe yincithakalo; bayakulixosha i-Ashidodi emini, i-Ekroni lisishulwe. 
36_2_5_Wo kwabakhileyo ngasogwini lolwandle, isizwe samaKhereti! Izwi likaJehova liphezu kwakho, Khanani, lizwe lamaFilisiti. “Ngiyakukuchitha ukuze kungabikho ohlala khona.” 
36_2_6_Ugu lolwandle luyakuba ngamadlelo, lube nemigodi yabelusi nezibaya zezimvu. 
36_2_7_Ugu luyakuba ngolwensali yendlu yakwaJuda, yaluse kulo; ezindlini zase-Ashikeloni bayakubuthisa kusihlwa, ngokuba uJehova uNkulunkulu wabo uyakubahambela, abuyise ukuthunjwa kwabo. 
36_2_8_“Ngiyizwile inhlamba yakwaMowabi nezithuko zabantwana bakwa-Amoni abathuke ngazo abantu bami, bazikhulisela imikhawulo yabo. 
36_2_9_Ngalokho, kuphila kwami,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, uthi: “Impela uMowabi uyakuba njengeSodoma, nabantwana bakwa-Amoni njengeGomora, izwe lezimbabazane nelemigodi kasawoti nencithakalo yaphakade; insali yabantu bami iyakubaphanga, nabaseleyo besizwe sami bayakudla ifa labo.” 
36_2_10_Lokhu kuyakuba sesikhundleni sokuziphakamisa kwabo, ngokuba bathukile, bazikhulisela abantu bakaJehova Sebawoti. 
36_2_11_UJehova uyakwesabeka phezu kwabo, ngokuba uyakuzacisa bonke onkulunkulu bomhlaba, bakhuleke kuye, kube yilowo nalowo endaweni yakhe, zonke iziqhingi zezizwe. 
36_2_12_“Nani maKushe niyakubulawa ngenkemba yami.” 
36_2_13_Uyakwelulela isandla sakhe ngasenyakatho, achithe i-Asiriya, alenze iNineve libe yincithakalo, lome njengehlane. 
36_2_14_Imihlambi iyakubuthisa phakathi kwalo, zonke izilwane zesizwe, ivuba nonondwebu kuhlale ebusuku ezihlokweni zezinsika zalo, isikhova sikhale emafasiteleni, kube khona incithakalo emigulugulwini, ngokuba wambulile okwemisedari. 
36_2_15_Yiwo umuzi owajabula wahlala ulondekile, owathi enhliziyweni yawo: Mina ngikhona, akakho omunye; yeka ukuphenduka kwawo incithakalo nendawo yokubuthisa kwezilwane! Bonke abadlula kuwo bayakuncimfa, banikine isandla sabo. 
36_3_1_Wo kohlubukileyo nongcolileyo, muzi ocindezelayo! 
36_3_2_Awuzwa zwi, awamukeli ukulaywa, awumethembi uJehova, awusondelanga kuNkulunkulu wawo. 
36_3_3_Izikhulu zawo phakathi kwawo ziyizingonyama ezibhongayo; abahluleli bawo bayizimpisi zokuhlwa; abashiyeli lutho ingomuso. 
36_3_4_Abaprofethi bawo bangamayiyane nabakhohlisi; abapristi bawo bayingcolisile indlu engcwele, bawudlovulile umthetho. 
36_3_5_UJehova ulungile phakathi kwawo, akenzi okubi; ekuseni njalo uveza ukwahlulela kwakhe ekukhanyeni, akuphuthi; kepha abangalungile abazi amahloni. 
36_3_6_“Nginqumile izizwe, imibhoshongo yazo yasezingosini ichithekile; ngichithile izitaladi zazo ukuze kungadluli muntu; imizi yazo iqothuliwe ukuze kungabikho muntu, kungabikho ohlala kuyo. 
36_3_7_Ngathi: ‘Nokho uyakungesaba, wamukele ukulaywa.’ Indawo yawo yokuhlala ayiyikunqunywa, kungenzeki konke engiwumisele khona; kepha bavuka ekuseni, benza okubi. 
36_3_8_Ngalokho, ngilindeleni,” usho uJehova, “kuze kube lusuku engivuka ngalo ukuba ngiphange, ngokuba kuyisinqumo sami ukubutha izizwe ukuba ngiqoqe imibuso, ukuze ngithulule phezu kwabo intukuthelo yami, lonke ulaka lwami oluvuthayo, ngokuba wonke umhlaba uyakudliwa ngumlilo womhawu wami. 
36_3_9_“Ngokuba lapho ngiyakunika abantu izindebe ezihlanzekileyo, ukuze bonke babize igama likaJehova, bamkhonze nganhliziyonye. 
36_3_10_Kusukela phesheya kwemifula yaseKushe abanxusa kimi, indodakazi yabahlakazekileyo bami, bayakuletha umnikelo wami. 
36_3_11_Ngalolo suku awusayikuba namahloni ngazo zonke izenzo zakho ophambuke ngazo kimi, ngokuba khona ngiyakususa phakathi kwakho abazidla ngokujabula, awusayikuziphakamisa entabeni yami engcwele. 
36_3_12_Kepha ngiyakushiya phakathi kwakho abantu abahluphekayo nabampofu; bayakwethemba igama likaJehova. 
36_3_13_Insali yakwa-Israyeli ayisayikwenza okubi, ingakhulumi amanga, kungafunyanwa emlonyeni wabo ulimi olukhohlisayo; yebo, bayakwaluka, babuthise, kungekho obesabisayo.” 
36_3_14_Hlabelela ngokujabula, ndodakazi yaseSiyoni, umemeze, Israyeli, uthokoze, wethabe ngenhliziyo yonke, ndodakazi yaseJerusalema. 
36_3_15_UJehova ususile ukwahlulelwa kwakho, uxoshile izitha zakho. INkosi yakwa-Israyeli, uJehova, iphakathi kwakho; awusayikwesaba okubi. 
36_3_16_Ngalolo suku kuyakuthiwa kulo iJerusalema: “Ungesabi, Siyoni! Izandla zakho mazingadangali. 
36_3_17_UJehova uNkulunkulu wakho uphakathi kwakho, iqhawe eliyakukusindisa; uyakujabula ngawe ngentokozo, athule othandweni lwakhe, ethabe ngawe ngokuhlabelela.” 
36_3_18_“Abadabuka ngemikhosi ngiyakubabutha, ababahlukene nawe, usathwele ihlazo. 
36_3_19_Bhekani, ngaleso sikhathi ngiyakuphatha bonke abakuhluphayo, ngisindise abaqhugayo, ngibuthe abaxoshiweyo, ngibenze indumiso negama abahlazo labo lalisemhlabeni wonke. 
36_3_20_Ngaleso sikhathi ngiyakuningenisa, ngaleso sikhathi ngiyakunibutha, ngokuba ngiyakunenza igama nendumiso phakathi kwabantu bonke bomhlaba, lapho ngibuyisa ukuthunjwa kwenu phambi kwamehlo enu,” usho uJehova. 
37_1_1_Ngomnyaka wesibili kaDariyu inkosi ngenyanga yesithupha ngosuku lokuqala lwenyanga lafika izwi likaJehova ngesandla sikaHagayi umprofethi kuZerubabele indodana kaSheyalitiyeli, umbusi wakwaJuda, nakuJoshuwa indodana kaJehosadaki, umpristi omkhulu, ngokuthi: 
37_1_2_Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Laba bantu bathi: ‘Akukabi yisikhathi sokuza, isikhathi sokwakha indlu kaJehova.’ ” 
37_1_3_Kwase kufika izwi likaJehova ngoHagayi umprofethi, lathi: 
37_1_4_“Kuyisikhathi sokuba nihlale ezindlini zenu ezembesiweyo, le ndlu iseyize, na?” 
37_1_5_Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Bekani ezinhliziyweni zenu izindlela zenu. 
37_1_6_Nihlwanyela okuningi, ningenisa okuyingcosana; niyadla, kepha anisuthi; niyaphuza, kepha ananeliswa; niyembatha, kepha akakho ofudumalayo; ozuza imali uyizuzela isikhwama esibhobokileyo.” 
37_1_7_Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Bekani ezinhliziyweni zenu izindlela zenu. 
37_1_8_Khuphukelani entabeni, nilethe imithi, nakhe indlu; ngiyakuyenamela, ngikhazimuliswe,” usho uJehova. 
37_1_9_“Nabheka okuningi; bhekani, kwaphenduka okuncane; lapho nakuletha ekhaya, ngakuphephetha. Ngani na?” usho uJehova Sebawoti. “Ngenxa yendlu yami eyize, nina nisagijimela, kube yilowo nalowo endlini yakhe. 
37_1_10_Ngalokho izulu livinjelwe kungabe kusabakho mazolo, nomhlaba uvinjelwe ungabe usaba nazithelo. 
37_1_11_Ngase ngibiza ukoma phezu kwezwe, naphezu kwezintaba, naphezu kwamabele, naphezu kwewayini elisha, naphezu kwamafutha, naphezu kokuvezwa ngumhlaba, naphezu kwabantu, naphezu kwezinkomo, naphezu kwayo yonke imisebenzi yezandla.” 
37_1_12_UZerubabele indodana kaSheyalitiyeli noJoshuwa indodana kaJehosadaki, umpristi omkhulu, nayo yonke insali yabantu balalela izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wabo namazwi kaHagayi umprofethi, njengokuba uJehova uNkulunkulu wabo emthumile; abantu besaba phambi kukaJehova. 
37_1_13_Wayesekhuluma uHagayi, isithunywa sikaJehova, ngesimemezelo sikaJehova kubantu, wathi: “Nginani,” usho uJehova. 
37_1_14_UJehova wavuselela umoya kaZerubabele indodana kaSheyalitiyeli, umbusi wakwaJuda, nomoya kaJoshuwa indodana kaJehosadaki, umpristi omkhulu, nomoya wensali yonke yabantu, bafika, benza umsebenzi endlini kaJehova Sebawoti, uNkulunkulu wabo, 
37_1_15_ngosuku lwamashumi amabili nane ngenyanga yesithupha ngomnyaka wesibili kaDariyu inkosi. 
37_2_1_Ngenyanga yesikhombisa ngolwamashumi amabili nanye lwenyanga izwi likaJehova lafika ngesandla sikaHagayi umprofethi, lathi: 
37_2_2_“Ake ukhulume kuZerubabele indodana kaSheyalitiyeli, umbusi wakwaJuda, nakuJoshuwa indodana kaJehosadaki, umpristi omkhulu, nakuyo insali yabantu, uthi: 
37_2_3_‘Ngubani oseleyo phakathi kwenu owayibona le ndlu ekukhazimuleni kwayo kokuqala? Niyayibona injani manje na? Ayinjengento yalutho emehlweni enu na? 
37_2_4_Kepha qina manje, Zerubabele,’ usho uJehova, ‘ube namandla, Joshuwa, ndodana kaJehosadaki, mpristi omkhulu, niqine nonke nina bantu bezwe,’ usho uJehova, ‘nisebenze ngokuba nginani,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti. 
37_2_5_‘Isithembiso enganinika sona ekuphumeni kwenu eGibithe noMoya wami kuyakuhlala phakathi kwenu; ningesabi.’ 
37_2_6_“Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Kusezakuba yisikhashana nje ngizamazamisa amazulu nomhlaba, nolwandle, nomhlabathi owomileyo, 
37_2_7_ngizamazamise nabo bonke abezizwe, kufike okunxanelekayo kwabo bonke abezizwe, ngiyigcwalise le ndlu ngenkazimulo,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti. 
37_2_8_‘Ngelami isiliva, ngelami igolide,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti. 
37_2_9_‘Inkazimulo yokugcina yale ndlu iyakuba nkulu kuneyokuqala,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘nginike ukuthula kule ndawo,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti.” 
37_2_10_Ngolwamashumi amabili nane lwenyanga yesishiyagalolunye ngomnyaka wesibili kaDariyu izwi likaJehova lafika kuHagayi umprofethi, lathi: 
37_2_11_“Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Ake ubabuze abapristi ngomthetho, uthi: 
37_2_12_Uma umuntu ephethe inyama engcwele emphethweni wengubo yakhe, ethinta ngomphetho wakhe isinkwa, noma ukudla, noma iwayini, noma amafutha, noma yikuphi ukudla, kuyakuba ngcwele na?’ ” Abapristi baphendula bathi: “Qha.” 
37_2_13_Wayesethi uHagayi: “Uma ongcolile ngesidumbu ethinta noma yikuphi kulokhu, kuyakungcola na?” Abapristi baphendula bathi: “Kuyakungcola.” 
37_2_14_Wayesethatha uHagayi, wathi: “ ‘Banjalo laba bantu, sinjalo lesi sizwe ngaphambi kwami,’ usho uJehova; ‘injalo futhi yonke imisebenzi yezandla zabo; nalokhu abakusondeza khona kungcolile. 
37_2_15_“ ‘Ake nibeke ezinhliziyweni zenu manje, kusukela kulolu suku nangaphambili, ukuthi kungakabekwa itshe phezu kwetshe ethempelini likaJehova, 
37_2_16_kusukela kulezo, lapho kwayiwa enqwabeni yezilinganiso ezingamashumi amabili, kwakuyishumi nje, nalapho kwayiwa ezikhamweni zewayini ukukha izitsha ezingamashumi ayisihlanu, kwakungamashumi amabili nje. 
37_2_17_Nganishaya ngokuhamuka, nangesikhutha, nangesichotho kuyo yonke imisebenzi yezandla zenu, kepha nokho anibuyelanga kimi,’ usho uJehova. 
37_2_18_‘Ake nikubeke ezinhliziyweni zenu, kusukela kulolu suku nangaphambili, kwasosukwini lwamashumi amabili nane lwenyanga yesishiyagalolunye, kwasosukwini okwabekwa ngalo isisekelo sethempeli likaJehova, yebo, nikubeke ezinhliziyweni zenu. 
37_2_19_Imbewu isesibuyeni na? Qha, imivini, nemikhiwane, namapomegranati, neminqumo akuthelanga; kepha kusukela kulolu suku ngiyakukubusisa.’ ” 
37_2_20_Izwi likaJehova lafika ngokwesibili kuHagayi ngolwamashumi amabili nane lwenyanga, lathi: 
37_2_21_“Yisho kuZerubabele umbusi wakwaJuda, uthi: ‘Ngiyakuzamazamisa amazulu nomhlaba, 
37_2_22_ngigumbuqele isihlalo sobukhosi semibuso, ngichithe amandla emibuso yabezizwe, ngigumbuqele izinqola nabakhwela kuzo; namahhashi ayakuwa nezinkweli zawo, kube yileyo naleyo ngenkemba yomfowabo. 
37_2_23_“ ‘Ngalolo suku,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘ngiyakukuthatha, Zerubabele, nceku yami, ndodana kaSheyalitiyeli,’ usho uJehova, ‘ngikwenze indandatho, ngokuba ngikukhethile,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti.” 
38_1_1_Ngenyanga yesishiyagalombili ngomnyaka wesibili kaDariyu izwi likaJehova lafika kuZakariya indodana kaBerekiya ka-Ido, umprofethi, lathi: 
38_1_2_“UJehova wathukuthelela nokuthukuthelela oyihlo. 
38_1_3_Kepha yisho wena kubo, uthi: Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Buyelani kimi,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘ngiyakubuyela kini,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti. 
38_1_4_Ningabi njengawoyihlo abaprofethi bokuqala abamemeza kubo, bathi: Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Ake nibuye ezindleleni zenu ezimbi nasezenzweni zenu ezimbi;’ kepha kabalalelanga, kabangiqaphelanga, usho uJehova. 
38_1_5_Oyihlo baphi na? Nabaprofethi bakhona kuze kube phakade na? 
38_1_6_Kanti amazwi ami nezimiso zami engayala ngakho izinceku zami abaprofethi akubaficanga yini oyihlo, baze baphenduka, bathi: ‘Njengalokho uJehova Sebawoti ebehlosa ukwenza kithi njengezindlela zethu nemisebenzi yethu, wenze kanjalo kithina, na?’ ” 
38_1_7_Ngosuku lwamashumi amabili nane lwenyanga yeshumi nanye eyinyanga kaShebati ngomnyaka wesibili kaDariyu izwi likaJehova lafika kuZakariya indodana kaBerekiya ka-Ido, umprofethi, lathi: 
38_1_8_Ngabona ebusuku; bheka, nango umuntu ekhwele ihhashi elibomvu, wema phakathi kwemibomvana eyayisesigodini, nasemva kwakhe kwakukhona amahhashi abomvu, nalufipha, namhlophe. 
38_1_9_Ngase ngithi: “Bayini laba?” Ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami yathi kimi: “Ngiyakukubonisa ukuthi bayini laba.” 
38_1_10_Umuntu owayemi phakathi kwemibomvana wathatha wathi: “Laba yibo uJehova abathumile ukuba bahambahambe emhlabeni.” 
38_1_11_Base bethatha, bathi kuyo ingelosi kaJehova eyayimi phakathi kwemibomvana: “Sihambahambile emhlabeni; bheka, wonke umhlaba uhlezi uthule.” 
38_1_12_Yayisithatha ingelosi kaJehova, yathi: “Jehova Sebawoti, koze kube nini ungabi nasihe kulo iJerusalema nakuyo imizi yakwaJuda oyithukuthelele le minyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa na?” 
38_1_13_UJehova wayesephendula ingelosi eyayikhuluma kimi ngamazwi amahle, amazwi amnandi. 
38_1_14_Yayisithi kimi ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami: “Memeza uthi: Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Ngihawukela iJerusalema neSiyoni ngokuhawukela okukhulu. 
38_1_15_Ngentukuthelo enkulu ngiyathukuthelela izizwe ezizinzileyo, ngokuba lapho ngithukuthele kancane nje, zandisa okubi.’ 
38_1_16_“Ngalokho usho kanje uJehova, uthi: ‘Ngiyakubuyela eJerusalema ngomusa, indlu yami yakhiwe kulo,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘kwelulwe umucu wokulinganisa phezu kweJerusalema.’ 
38_1_17_“Phinda umemeze, uthi: Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Imizi yami isayakuchichima okuhle, uJehova abuye aliduduze iSiyoni, abuye alikhethe iJerusalema.’ ” 
38_1_18_Ngase ngiphakamisa amehlo ami, ngabona; bheka, nazo izimpondo ezine. 
38_1_19_Ngathi kuyo ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami: “Ziyini lezi?” Yathi kimi: “Lezi ziyizimpondo ezihlakazile oJuda, no-Israyeli, neJerusalema.” 
38_1_20_UJehova wayesengibonisa abakhandi abane bensimbi. 
38_1_21_Ngathi: “Laba bafike ukwenzani na?” Wakhuluma wathi: “Leziya ziyizimpondo ezazimhlakaza uJuda ngangokuba kungabangakho muntu ophakamisa ikhanda lakhe, kepha laba bafikile ukubashaya ngovalo, bawise phansi izimpondo zabezizwe ezaziphakamisa uphondo ngezwe lakwaJuda ukuba lihlakazwe.” 
38_2_1_Ngaphakamisa amehlo ami, ngabona; bheka, nango umuntu enentambo yokulinganisa esandleni sakhe. 
38_2_2_Ngathi: “Uya ngaphi?” Wathi kimi: “Ngiya ukulinganisa iJerusalema, ngibone ukuthi bungakanani ububanzi balo, bungakanani nobude balo.” 
38_2_3_Bheka, ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami yayisiphuma, nenye ingelosi yaphuma ukuyihlangabeza, 
38_2_4_yathi kuyo: “Gijima ukhulume kule nsizwa ukuthi iJerusalema liyakwakhiwa njengemizi engenanzingange ngenxa yobuningi babantu nezinkomo okuphakathi kwalo. 
38_2_5_‘Kepha mina,’ usho uJehova, ‘ngiyakuba lugange lomlilo kulo nxazonke, futhi ngibe yinkazimulo phakathi kwalo.’ 
38_2_6_“Hheyi, hheyi, balekelani izwe lasenyakatho!” usho uJehova, “ngokuba nginihlakazile njengemimoya yomine yezulu,” usho uJehova. 
38_2_7_“Hheyi, zikhulule, uye eSiyoni, wena ohlezi nendodakazi yaseBabele!” 
38_2_8_Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti ongithumile ukulanda inkazimulo yakhe ezizweni ezaziniphanga ngokuba othinta nina uthinta inhlamvu yeso lakhe uthi: 
38_2_9_“Bhekani, ngiyakuqhweba ngesandla phezu kwabo, babe yimpango yababebakhonza, nazi ukuthi nguJehova Sebawoti ongithumileyo. 
38_2_10_“Hlabelela ngokujabula, uthokoze, ndodakazi yaseSiyoni, ngokuba bhekani, ngiyeza, ngiyakuhlala phakathi kwakho,” usho uJehova. 
38_2_11_“Izizwe eziningi ziyakuzihlanganisa noJehova ngalolo suku, zibe ngabantu bami; ngiyakuhlala phakathi kwakho, wazi ukuthi nguJehova Sebawoti ongithumile kuwe. 
38_2_12_UJehova uyakudla ifa lakwaJuda, libe yisabelo sakhe ezweni elingcwele, abuye akhethe iJerusalema. 
38_2_13_Thula, nyama yonke, phambi kukaJehova, ngokuba uvukile, waphuma endaweni yakhe engcwele.” 
38_3_1_Wayesengibonisa uJoshuwa umpristi omkhulu emi phambi kwengelosi kaJehova, noSathane emi ngakwesokunene sakhe ukumelana naye. 
38_3_2_UJehova wathi kuSathane: “UJehova uyakukukhuza, Sathane, yebo, uJehova olikhethile iJerusalema uyakukukhuza; lo akasiso isikhuni esophulwe emlilweni na?” 
38_3_3_UJoshuwa wayembethe izingubo ezingcolileyo; wayemi phambi kwengelosi. 
38_3_4_Yathatha yasho kwababemi phambi kwayo, yathi: “Mkhumuleni izingubo ezingcolileyo.” Kuyena yathi: “Bheka, ngidedisile kuwe ububi bakho; ngiyakukwembathisa ezobukhosi.” 
38_3_5_Ngase ngithi: “Mababeke isigqoko esihlanzekileyo ekhanda lakhe.” Base bebeka isigqoko esihlanzekileyo ekhanda lakhe, bamembathisa izingubo, ingelosi kaJehova isemi khona. 
38_3_6_Ingelosi kaJehova yagomela kuJoshuwa, yathi: 
38_3_7_“Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: ‘Uma uhamba ngezindlela zami, ugcine inkonzo yami, uyakwahlulela endlini yami, ugcine namagceke ami; ngiyakukunika ukuba uhambe phakathi kwalaba abemi lapha. 
38_3_8_“ ‘Ake uzwe, Joshuwa, mpristi omkhulu, wena nabangane bakho abahlala phambi kwakho, ngokuba bangabantu abayisibonakaliso: bhekani, ngiyakuveza inceku yami, uHlumela. 
38_3_9_Ngokuba bheka, itshe engilibeke phambi kukaJoshuwa kukhona amehlo ayisikhombisa etsheni lilodwa ngiyakuqopha ukuqoshwa kwalo,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘ngidedisele kude ububi balelo zwe ngalusuku lunye. 
38_3_10_“ ‘Ngalolo suku,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘niyakumema, kube yilowo nalowo umngane wakhe phansi komvini naphansi komkhiwane.’ ” 
38_4_1_Ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami yabuya, yangivusa njengomuntu evuswa ebuthongweni bakhe. 
38_4_2_Yathi kimi: “Ubonani na?” Ngathi: “Ngibona, bheka, uthi lwezibani luyigolide lonke, lunembizana yalo phezu kwalo, nezibani zalo eziyisikhombisa zikulo; kukhona imibhobho eyisikhombisa kuleso naleso sibani esiphezu kwalo, 
38_4_3_neminqumo emibili eseceleni kwalo, omunye ungakwesokunene sembizana, nomunye ungakwesokhohlo sayo.” 
38_4_4_Ngathatha ngasho kuyo ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami, ngathi: “Ziyini lezi, nkosi?” 
38_4_5_Ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami yaphendula, yathi kimi: “Awazi yini ukuthi ziyini lezi?” Ngathi: “Qha, nkosi.” 
38_4_6_Yayisithatha isho kimi, ithi: “Lokhu kuyizwi likaJehova kaZerubabele lokuthi: ‘Kungabi ngempi, kungabi ngamandla, kepha kube ngomoya wami kuphela,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti. 
38_4_7_“Ungubani wena ntaba enkulu? Phambi kukaZerubabele uyakuba yithafa; uyakukhipha itshe eliyinhloko ngokumemeza ukuthi: ‘Umusa, mawube kulo!’ ” 
38_4_8_Izwi likaJehova lafika kimi, lathi: 
38_4_9_“Izandla zikaZerubabele zibeke isisekelo sale ndlu, futhi izandla zakhe ziyakuyiqeda, wazi ukuthi nguJehova Sebawoti ongithumile kini. 
38_4_10_“Ngokuba ngubani oyakudelela usuku lwezinto ezincane, lapho ethokoza lawa mehlo ayisikhombisa kaJehova aqalaza emhlabeni wonke ukubona umthofu wokumisa esandleni sikaZerubabele, na?” 
38_4_11_Ngase ngithatha, ngithi kuyo: “Iyini le minqumo emibili ngakwesokunene sothi lwezibani nangakwesokhohlo salo na?” 
38_4_12_Ngathatha ngokwesibili, ngathi kuyo: “Ayini lawa magatsha amabili eminqumo aseceleni kwemibhobho emibili yegolide, athululwa ngayo amafutha egolide na?” 
38_4_13_Yangiphendula yathi: “Awazi ukuthi ayini?” Ngathi: “Qha, nkosi.” 
38_4_14_Yayisithi: “Lawa angabagcotshiweyo ababili abemi ngaseNkosini yomhlaba wonke.” 
38_5_1_Ngabuye ngaphakamisa amehlo ami, ngabona; bheka, nanko umqulu wencwadi ondizayo. 
38_5_2_Yathi kimi: “Ubonani na?” Ngathi: “Ngibona umqulu wencwadi ondizayo, ubude bawo buyizingalo ezingamashumi amabili, nobubanzi bawo buyizingalo eziyishumi.” 
38_5_3_Yayisithi kimi: “Nasi isiqalekiso esiphumela ebusweni bomhlaba wonke, ngokuba ngokusho kwaso bonke abebayo bayakunqunywa lapha, nabo bonke abafungayo bayakunqunywa lapha ngokusho kwaso. 
38_5_4_‘Ngiyakusiphumisa,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘singene endlini yesela nasendlini yofunga amanga ngegama lami, sihlale phakathi kwendlu yakhe, siyiqede kanye nemithi yayo namatshe ayo.’ ” 
38_5_5_Yayisiphuma ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami, yathi kimi: “Ake uphakamise amehlo akho, ubone ukuthi kuyini lokhu okuphumayo.” 
38_5_6_Ngathi: “Kuyini?” Yathi: “Lokhu kuyi-efa eliphumayo.” Yabuye yathi: “Lokhu kungububi babo ezweni lonke.” 
38_5_7_Bheka, isisibekelo somthofu saziphakamisa, kwakungowesifazane owahlala phakathi kwe-efa. 
38_5_8_Yathi: “Lokhu kungububi.” Wamphonsa phakathi kwe-efa, waphonsa isisindo somthofu emlonyeni walo. 
38_5_9_Ngase ngiphakamisa amehlo ami, ngabona; bheka, kwaphuma abesifazane ababili, umoya usemaphikweni abo; babe namaphiko njengamaphiko kanogolantethe, baliphakamisa i-efa emkhathini wezulu nomhlaba. 
38_5_10_Ngase ngithi kuyo ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami: “Laba baliyisaphi i-efa na?” 
38_5_11_Yathi kimi: “Ukulakhela indlu ezweni laseShineyari; isilungisiwe liyakubekwa khona endaweni yalo.” 
38_6_1_Ngabuye ngaphakamisa amehlo ami, ngabona; bheka, kwaphuma izinqola ezine phakathi kwezintaba ezimbili; izintaba zaziyizintaba zethusi. 
38_6_2_Enqoleni yokuqala kwakukhona amahhashi abomvu, nasenqoleni yesibili amahhashi amnyama, 
38_6_3_nasenqoleni yesithathu amahhashi amhlophe, nasenqoleni yesine amahhashi anala alufipha. 
38_6_4_Ngase ngithatha, ngithi kuyo ingelosi eyayikhuluma nami: “Ayini lana, nkosi?” 
38_6_5_Ingelosi yaphendula, yathi kimi: “Lana ayimimoya yomine yezulu ephuma ekumeni phambi kweNkosi yomhlaba wonke. 
38_6_6_Enamahhashi amnyama iphumela ezweni lasenyakatho; amhlophe ayawalandela; anala aphumela ezweni laseningizimu.” 
38_6_7_Alufipha aphuma, afuna ukuhambahamba emhlabeni; yathi: “Hambani, nihambahambe emhlabeni.” Ayesehambahamba emhlabeni. 
38_6_8_Yayisimemeza kimi, yakhuluma kimi, yathi: “Bheka, aphumela ezweni lasenyakatho, ayakuthulisa uMoya wami ezweni lasenyakatho.” 
38_6_9_Lase lifika izwi likaJehova, lathi; 
38_6_10_“Yamukela kubathunjwa, kuHelidayi, nakuThobiya, nakuJedaya izipho, uhambe wena ngalona lolo suku, ungene endlini kaJosiya indodana kaZefaniya, lapho befike khona bevela eBabele. 
38_6_11_Lapho wamukele isiliva negolide, yenza umqhele, uwubeke ekhanda likaJoshuwa indodana kaJehosadaki, umpristi omkhulu, 
38_6_12_usho kuye, uthi: ‘Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: Bheka, kukhona indoda egama layo linguHlumela; uyakumila endaweni yakhe, akhe ithempeli likaJehova. 
38_6_13_Yebo, yena uyakulakha ithempeli likaJehova, athwale ubukhosi, ahlale, abuse esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi, kube khona nompristi esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi, kube khona ukululekana ngokuthula phakathi kwabo bobabili.’ 
38_6_14_Imiqhele iyakuba yisikhumbuzo sikaHelemi, nesikaThobiya, nesikaJedaya, nesikaHeni, indodana kaZefaniya, ethempelini likaJehova. 
38_6_15_Abakude bayakufika, bakhe ithempeli likaJehova, nazi ukuthi nguJehova Sebawoti ongithumile kini. Kuyakwenzeka, uma nilalela nokulalela izwi likaJehova uNkulunkulu wenu.” 
38_7_1_Kwathi ngomnyaka wesine wenkosi uDariyu izwi likaJehova lafika kuZakariya ngolwesine lwenyanga eyisishiyagalolunye, ekaKhisilevi. 
38_7_2_IBethele lalithume oSareseri noRegemi Meleki namadoda abo ukunxusa kuJehova 
38_7_3_nokukhuluma kubapristi abasendlini kaJehova Sebawoti nakubaprofethi ngokuthi: “Ngikhale ngenyanga yesihlanu, ngizile, njengalokho ngenzile le minyaka eminingi, na?” 
38_7_4_Lase lifika izwi likaJehova Sebawoti kimi, lathi: 
38_7_5_“Khuluma kubo bonke abantu bezwe nakubo abapristi, uthi: ‘Ekuzileni kwenu nasekulileni ngenyanga yesihlanu nangeyesikhombisa le minyaka engamashumi ayisikhombisa nangizilela nokungizilela mina na? 
38_7_6_Lapho nidlayo nalapho niphuzayo, anizidleli, niziphuzela nina, na? 
38_7_7_Akusiwo lawa mazwi uJehova awamemezayo ngesandla sabaprofethi bokuqala, lapho iJerusalema lalakhiwe lisabusa, nalapho imizi yalo nxazonke zalo nelaseningizimu nehlanze kwakwakhiwe, na?’ ” 
38_7_8_Izwi likaJehova lafika kuZakariya, lathi: 
38_7_9_“Washo kanje uJehova Sebawoti, wathi: ‘Yahlulelani izahlulelo eziqinisileyo, nenze umusa nobubele, kube yilowo nalowo kumfowabo, 
38_7_10_ningacindezeli abafelokazi, nezintandane, nabafokazi, nabampofu, kungabi ngoceba okubi ngomfowabo enhliziyweni yakhe.’ 
38_7_11_“Kepha bala ukulalela, baphekula ihlombe, benza izindlebe zabo zaba buthuntu ukuba bangezwa. 
38_7_12_Benza izinhliziyo zabo zaba yidayimani, funa bezwe umthetho namazwi ayewathume uJehova Sebawoti ngoMoya wakhe ngesandla sabaprofethi bokuqala; ngalokho kwavela intukuthelo enkulu ivela kuJehova Sebawoti. 
38_7_13_“ ‘Kwathi njengalokho wamemeza, bona bengezwanga, kanjalo,’ usho uJehova Sebawoti, ‘bayakumemeza bona, ngingezwa mina. 
38_7_14_Ngiyakubahlakazela phakathi kwezizwe zonke abangazazanga. Izwe selichithekile emva kwabo, ukuze kungabikho muntu odlulayo nobuyayo, ngokuba benza izwe elihle laba yincithakalo.’ ” 
38_8_1_Izwi likaJehova Sebawoti lafika lathi: 
38_8_2_Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Ngihawukela iJerusalema ngokuhawukela okukhulu, yebo, ngilihawukela ngokufutheka okukhulu.” 
38_8_3_Usho kanje uJehova, uthi: “Ngiyakubuyela eSiyoni, ngihlale phakathi kweJerusalema; iJerusalema liyakuthiwa uMuzi Weqiniso nentaba kaJehova Sebawoti iNtaba Engcwele.” 
38_8_4_Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Kusazakuhlala amaxhegu nezalukazi ezitaladini zaseJerusalema, yilowo nalowo abe nodondolo esandleni sakhe ngenxa yobuningi bezinsuku zakhe. 
38_8_5_Izitaladi zasemzini ziyakugcwala abafana namantombazana bedlala ezitaladini zawo.” 
38_8_6_Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Uma kuyisimangaliso emehlweni ensali yalaba bantu ngalezo zinsuku, kuyakuba yisimangaliso emehlweni ami na?” usho uJehova Sebawoti. 
38_8_7_Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Bhekani, ngiyakusindisa abantu bami ezweni lasempumalanga nasezweni lasentshonalanga, 
38_8_8_ngibahambise, bakhe phakathi kweJerusalema, babe ngabantu bami, mina ngibe nguNkulunkulu wabo ngeqiniso nangokulunga.” 
38_8_9_Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Maziqine izandla zenu nina enizwa kulezi zinsuku lawa mazwi avela emlonyeni wabaprofethi ababe khona mhla sibekwa isisekelo sendlu kaJehova Sebawoti, ithempeli, ukuba yakhiwe. 
38_8_10_Ngokuba ngaphambi kwalezo zinsuku kwakungekho nkokhelo yomuntu nanzuzo yenkomo, nakophumayo nakongenayo kwakungekho ukuthula ngenxa yesitha, ngokuba ngakhulula bonke abantu, kwaba yilowo nalowo wamelana nomfowabo. 
38_8_11_Kepha angisayikuba njalo kuyo insali yalaba bantu njengasezinsukwini zakuqala,” usho uJehova Sebawoti. 
38_8_12_“Ngokuba kuyakuba khona imbewu yokuthula; umvini uyakuthela izithelo zawo, umhlabathi uveze ukudla kwawo, amazulu anike amazolo awo, ngenze ukuba insali yalaba bantu idle ifa lazo zonke lezi zinto. 
38_8_13_Kuyakuthi, njengalokho wawuyisiqalekiso phakathi kwabezizwe wena ndlu yakwaJuda nawe ndlu yakwa-Israyeli, kanjalo nginisindise, nibe yisibusiso; ningesabi, kepha maziqine izandla zenu.” 
38_8_14_Ngokuba usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Njengalokho ngahlosa ukwenza okubi kini, lapho oyihlo babengithukuthelisa,” usho uJehova Sebawoti, “ngingazisolanga, 
38_8_15_kanjalo ngibuye ngahlosa kulezi zinsuku ukwenzela iJerusalema nendlu yakwaJuda okuhle; ningesabi. 
38_8_16_Yilezi zinto eniyakuzenza: khulumani iqiniso, kube yilowo nalowo nomfowabo, nahlulele izahlulelo zeqiniso nezokuthula emasangweni enu, 
38_8_17_ningacebi okubi ezinhliziyweni zenu, kube yilowo nalowo ngomakhelwane wakhe, ningathandi izifungo zamanga, ngokuba lezo zinto yilezo engizizondayo,” usho uJehova. 
38_8_18_Izwi likaJehova Sebawoti lafika kimi, lathi: 
38_8_19_Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Ukuzila kwenyanga yesine, nokuzila kweyesihlanu, nokuzila kweyesikhombisa, nokuzila kweyeshumi kuyakuba ngukujabula nokuthokoza nemikhosi emihle kuyo indlu yakwaJuda; thandani iqiniso nokuthula.” 
38_8_20_Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Kusazakufika izizwe nabakhe emizini eminingi, 
38_8_21_bahambe abakhileyo komunye, baye komunye, bathi: ‘Masiye impela ukunxusa ebusweni bukaJehova, simfune uJehova Sebawoti; nami ngiyakuhamba.’ 
38_8_22_Kuyakufika abantu abaningi nezizwe ezinamandla ukufuna uJehova Sebawoti eJerusalema nokunxusa ebusweni bukaJehova.” 
38_8_23_Usho kanje uJehova Sebawoti, uthi: “Ngalezo zinsuku amadoda ayishumi azo zonke izilimi zabezizwe ayakubamba umphetho womuntu wakwaJuda ngokuthi: ‘Siyakuhamba nani, ngokuba sizwile ukuthi uNkulunkulu unani.’ ” 
38_9_1_Isiprofetho sezwi likaJehova phezu kwezwe lakwaHadiraki; nalo iDamaseku liyakuba yindawo yokuhlala kwaso, ngokuba uJehova uneso kubantu, ikakhulu kuzo zonke izizwe zakwa-Israyeli, 
38_9_2_kanye neHamati elikhawula kulo, neTire neSidoni, ngokuba kuhlakaniphile kakhulu. 
38_9_3_ITire lazakhela inqaba, lanqwabela isiliva njengothuli, negolide elicwengekileyo njengodaka lwasezitaladini. 
38_9_4_Bheka, iNkosi iyakulaphuca, iphonse imfuyo yalo elwandle, lona lidliwe ngumlilo.
