40_15_20_Yilezo zinto ezimngcolisayo umuntu; kodwa ukudla ngezandla ezingahlanjiwe akumngcolisi umuntu.” 
40_15_21_UJesu ephuma lapho wamuka, waya emaphandleni aseTire naseSidoni. 
40_15_22_Bheka, kwavela emikhawulweni yakhona owesifazane waseKhanani, wakhala wathi: “Ngihawukele, Nkosi, Ndodana kaDavide! Indodakazi yami ikhwelwe kabi yidemoni.” 
40_15_23_Kepha akamphendulanga ngazwi. Base besondela kuye abafundi bakhe, bamncenga, bathi: “Mmukise ngokuba uyakhala emva kwethu.” 
40_15_24_Kodwa waphendula wathi: “Angithunyelwanga kwabanye, kuphela ezimvini ezilahlekileyo zendlu yakwa-Israyeli.” 
40_15_25_Kepha wayeseza, wakhuleka kuye wathi: “Nkosi ngisize.” 
40_15_26_Waphendula wathi: “Akukuhle ukuthatha isinkwa sabantwana, usiphonse ezinjaneni.” 
40_15_27_Yena wathi: “Yebo, Nkosi; kepha nezinjana zidla imvuthuluka ewa etafuleni labaninizo.” 
40_15_28_Khona uJesu waphendula, wathi kuye: “O mame, kukhulu ukukholwa kwakho; makube kuwe njengokuthanda kwakho.” Indodakazi yakhe yasinda kusukela kuleso sikhathi. 
40_15_29_Wasuka lapho uJesu, wafika ngaselwandle lwaseGalile, wenyukela entabeni, wahlala phansi khona. 
40_15_30_Kwase kusondela kuye izixuku eziningi zinezinyonga, nezimpumputhe, nezimungulu, nezilima, nabanye abaningi, zababeka ngasezinyaweni zakhe; wabaphulukisa,15:30 Isaya 35:5. 
40_15_31_baze bamangala abantu bebona izimungulu zikhuluma, izilima zisindile, izinyonga zihamba, izimpumputhe zibona; bamdumisa uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli. 
40_15_32_UJesu wayesebabiza abafundi bakhe, wathi: “Ngiyasihawukela isixuku, ngokuba sekuyizinsuku ezintathu sihlezi kimi, singenanto yokudla; angithandi ukubamukisa belambile, funa mhlawumbe baphele amandla endleleni.” 
40_15_33_Bathi kuye abafundi: “Singazitholaphi ehlane izinkwa ezingaka zokuba kusuthe isixuku esingaka na?” 
40_15_34_Wathi kubo uJesu: “Ninezinkwa ezingaki na?” Bathi: “Eziyisikhombisa, nezinhlanzana eziyingcosana.” 
40_15_35_Wayala isixuku ukuba sihlale phansi; 
40_15_36_wazithabatha izinkwa eziyisikhombisa nezinhlanzi, wabonga, wazihlephula, wanika abafundi, abafundi baphakela izixuku. 
40_15_37_Badla bonke, basutha, babutha imvuthuluka eseleyo, amaqoma ayisikhombisa agcwele. 
40_15_38_Kepha abadlayo babe yizinkulungwane ezine zamadoda ngaphandle kwabesifazane nabantwana. 
40_15_39_Esezimukisile izixuku wangena emkhunjini, wafika emikhawulweni yaseMagadana. 
40_16_1_AbaFarisi nabaSadusi beza bemlinga bacela kuye ukuba ababonise isibonakaliso esivela ezulwini. 
40_16_2_Kepha waphendula, wathi kubo: “Kusihlwa nithi: ‘Loba lisile, lokhu izulu libhejile;’ 
40_16_3_kuthi kusasa nithi: ‘Namuhla lizakuphendula, ngokuba libhejile, liguqubele.’ Kanti ukuma kwezulu niyakwazi ukukuchaza, kepha izibonakaliso zezikhathi aniziqondi na? 
40_16_4_Isizukulwane esibi nesiphingayo sifuna isibonakaliso, kepha asiyikunikwa sibonakaliso, kuphela isibonakaliso sikaJona umprofethi.” Wabashiya, wamuka. 
40_16_5_Sebefike phesheya, abafundi bakhe babekhohliwe ukuphatha izinkwa. 
40_16_6_UJesu wayesethi kubo: “Anobheka nixwaye imvubelo yabaFarisi nabaSadusi.” 
40_16_7_Baphendulana bodwa, bathi: “Kungokuba singaphathanga izinkwa.” 
40_16_8_Kepha ekwazi lokho uJesu wathi: “Nina bokukholwa okuncane, yini ukuba niphendulane nodwa ngokuthi kungokuba ningenazinkwa na? 
40_16_9_Anikaqondi yini, futhi anizikhumbuli izinkwa eziyisihlanu zezinkulungwane eziyisihlanu nokuthi nabutha iziqabetho ezingaki na? 
40_16_10_Nezinkwa eziyisikhombisa zezinkulungwane ezine nokuthi nabutha amaqoma amangaki na? 
40_16_11_Aniqondi ngani ukuthi bengingakhulumi kini ngesinkwa na? Kepha xwayani imvubelo yabaFarisi nabaSadusi.” 
40_16_12_Khona baqonda ukuthi kashongo ukuba baxwaye imvubelo yezinkwa kepha isifundiso sabaFarisi nabaSadusi. 
40_16_13_UJesu esefikile emaphandleni aseKesariya Filipi wababuza abafundi bakhe, wathi: “Abantu basho ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu ingubani na?” 
40_16_14_Bathi: “Abanye basho uJohane uMbhapathizi; abanye basho u-Eliya; abanye basho uJeremiya noma omunye wabaprofethi.” 
40_16_15_Wathi kubo: “Nina-ke nithi ngingubani na?” 
40_16_16_USimoni Petru waphendula wathi: “Wena unguKristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ophilayo.” 
40_16_17_UJesu waphendula, wathi kuye: “Ubusisiwe wena Simoni kaJona, ngokuba inyama negazi akukwambulelanga lokhu kodwa uBaba osezulwini. 
40_16_18_Nami-ke ngithi kuwe: Wena unguPetru; phezu kwaleli dwala ngiyakulakha ibandla lami; amasango eHayidese awayikulahlula. 
40_16_19_Ngiyakukunika izihluthulelo zombuso wezulu. Oyakukubopha emhlabeni koba kuboshiwe nasezulwini, nalokho oyakukukhulula emhlabeni koba kukhululiwe nasezulwini.” 
40_16_20_Khona wabayala abafundi ukuba bangatsheli muntu ukuthi nguye onguKristu. 
40_16_21_Kusukela kuleso sikhathi uJesu waqala ukubonisa abafundi bakhe ukuba umelwe ukuya eJerusalema, ahlushwe ngokuningi ngamalunga nangabapristi abakhulu nababhali, abulawe, kepha avuswe ngosuku lwesithathu. 
40_16_22_UPetru wayesemthatha, waqala ukumkhuza, wathi: “Musa, Nkosi, lokho akusoze kwenziwa kuwe.” 
40_16_23_Yena waphenduka, wathi kuPetru: “Buyela emva kwami, Sathane; uyisikhubekiso kimi, ngokuba awuqondi okukaNkulunkulu kepha okwabantu.” 
40_16_24_Khona uJesu wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Uma umuntu ethanda ukuza emva kwami, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele. 
40_16_25_Ngokuba yilowo nalowo othanda ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho; kepha olahlekelwa ngukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami uyakukufumana. 
40_16_26_Ngokuba kuyakumsizani umuntu, uma ezuza izwe lonke, onakalelwe ukuphila kwakhe, na? Yingabe uyakukhiphani umuntu, kube yisihlengo sokuphila kwakhe, na? 
40_16_27_Ngokuba iNdodana yomuntu iyakuza ngenkazimulo kaYise kanye nezingelosi zayo; khona-ke iyakuvuza yilowo nalowo ngesenzo sakhe. 
40_16_28_Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Bakhona abanye kwabemi lapha abangayikuzwa ngempela ukufa, baze bayibone iNdodana yomuntu iza embusweni wayo.” 
40_17_1_Emva kwezinsuku eziyisithupha uJesu wathatha oPetru, noJakobe, noJohane umfowabo, wakhuphukela nabo entabeni ende bebodwa. 
40_17_2_Waphenduka esinye isimo phambi kwabo; ubuso bakhe bakhanya njengelanga, izingubo zakhe zaba mhlophe njengokukhanya. 
40_17_3_Bheka, kwabonakala kubo oMose no-Eliya bekhuluma naye. 
40_17_4_Wathatha uPetru wathi kuJesu: “Nkosi, kuhle ukuba silapha. Uma uthanda, ngizakwakha lapha amadokodo amathathu, elinye libe ngelakho, elinye libe ngelikaMose, elinye libe ngelika-Eliya.” 
40_17_5_Esakhuluma, bheka ifu elikhanyayo labasithibeza; bheka, kwavela izwi efwini, lathi: “Lo uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo engithokozile ngayo; yizweni.” 
40_17_6_Kuthe sebezwa lokho abafundi, bawa ngobuso babo, besaba kakhulu. 
40_17_7_Kepha uJesu wasondela, wabathinta, wathi: “Sukumani, ningesabi.” 
40_17_8_Kepha bephakamisa amehlo abo ababonanga muntu, kuphela uJesu yedwa. 
40_17_9_Besehla entabeni, uJesu wabayala wathi: “Ningatsheli muntu lowo mbono, ize ivuke iNdodana yomuntu kwabafileyo.” 
40_17_10_Bambuza abafundi, bathi: “Pho, basholoni ababhali ukuthi u-Eliya umelwe ukufika kuqala na?” 
40_17_11_Waphendula wathi: “Nempela u-Eliya uyeza, uyakubuyisela konke. 
40_17_12_Kepha ngithi kini: U-Eliya sewafika; abamazanga nokho, kodwa benza kuye abakuthandayo. Kanjalo neNdodana yomuntu iyakuhlushwa yibo.” 
40_17_13_Khona abafundi baqonda ukuba ubekhuluma kubo ngoJohane uMbhapathizi. 
40_17_14_Sebefikile esixukwini, kweza kuye umuntu, waguqa ngamadolo phambi kwakhe, 
40_17_15_wathi: “Nkosi, hawukela indodana yami, ngokuba inesithuthwane, ihlupheka kabi, lokhu iwela kaningi emlilweni, kaningi emanzini. 
40_17_16_Ngiyilethe kubafundi bakho, kepha bahluleka ukuyiphulukisa.” 
40_17_17_UJesu waphendula wathi: “O! sizukulwane esingakholwayo nesiphambeneyo, koze kube nini nginani na? Koze kube nini nginibekezelela na? Yiletheni lapha kimi.” 
40_17_18_UJesu wayeseyikhuza, idemoni laphuma kuyo; umfana waphulukiswa kusukela kuleso sikhathi. 
40_17_19_Khona kwafika abafundi kuJesu bebodwa, bathi: “Thina besingemkhiphe ngani na?” 
40_17_20_Wayesethi kubo: “Kungenxa yokukholwa kwenu okuncane. Ngokuba ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ninokukholwa njengembewu yesinaphi, niyakuthi kule ntaba: ‘Suka lapha, uye laphaya,’ iyakusuka; akukho okuyakunahlula. 
40_17_21_Kepha lolo hlobo aluphumi ngaphandle kokuba kube ngokukhuleka nokuzila ukudla.” 
40_17_22_Besahambahamba eGalile, uJesu wathi kubo: “INdodana yomuntu izakukhashelwa ezandleni zabantu; 
40_17_23_bazakuyibulala, kepha ngosuku lwesithathu izakuvuswa.” Badabuka kakhulu. 
40_17_24_Kwathi ukuba bafike eKapernawume, abaqoqi bemali yethempeli beza kuPetru, bathi: “Umfundisi wenu akayitheli imali yethempeli na?” 
40_17_25_Wathi: “Uyayithela.” Esengene endlini uJesu wamandulela, wathi: “Usho ukuthini, Simoni? Amakhosi omhlaba athatha kubaphi intela nenkokhiso, kumadodana awo noma kubafo, na?” 
40_17_26_Wathi: “Kubafo.” UJesu wayesethi: “Ngakho-ke amadodana akhululekile. 
40_17_27_Kodwa-ke ukuba singabakhubekisi, yana elwandle, uphonse udobo, ubambe inhlanzi ephuma kuqala; wothi ukuba uyivule umlomo, uzakufumana imali; yithathe, ubanike, usithelele mina nawe.” 
40_18_1_Ngaleso sikhathi abafundi basondela kuJesu, bathi: “Ngubani omkhulu embusweni wezulu na?” 
40_18_2_Wayesebiza umntwana, wammisa phakathi kwabo, 
40_18_3_wathi: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ningaphenduki, nibe njengabantwana, anisoze nangena embusweni wezulu. 
40_18_4_Ngakho-ke yilowo nalowo oyakuzithoba njengalo mntwana nguyena omkhulu embusweni wezulu. 
40_18_5_Nalowo oyakwamukela umntwana onje abe munye ngegama lami uyangamukela mina. 
40_18_6_Kodwa okhubekisa abe munye kulaba abancinyane abakholwa yimi, kungcono kuye ukuba itshe lokusila ligaxwe entanyeni yakhe, azikiswe ekujuleni kolwandle. 
40_18_7_“Maye kulo izwe ngenxa yezikhubekiso! Ngokuba izikhubekiso zimelwe ukufika, kepha maye kumuntu esiza ngaye isikhubekiso! 
40_18_8_Kepha uma isandla sakho sikukhubekisa, kumbe unyawo lwakho, kunqume, ukulahle; kungcono kuwe ukuba ungene ekuphileni uyingini noma unyonga kunokuba uphonswe emlilweni ophakade unezandla zombili nezinyawo zombili. 
40_18_9_Noma iso lakho likukhubekisa, likhiphe, ulilahle. Kungcono kuwe ukuba ungene ekuphileni uneso linye kunokuba uphonswe esihogweni somlilo unamehlo omabili. 
40_18_10_Bhekani ningadeleli namunye kulaba abancinyane, ngokuba ngithi kini: Izingelosi zabo ezulwini zibona njalo ubuso bukaBaba osezulwini. 
40_18_11_Ngokuba iNdodana yomuntu ize ukusindisa okulahlekileyo. 
40_18_12_“Nithini na? Uma umuntu enezimvu eziyikhulu, kuduke enye kuzo, akazishiyi ezingamashumi ayisishiyagalolunye nesishiyagalolunye ezintabeni, ahambe ayofuna edukileyo, na? 
40_18_13_Athi uma eyithola, ngiqinisile ngithi kini, uthokoza ngayo kakhulu kunangezingamashumi ayisishiyagalolunye nesishiyagalolunye ezingadukanga. 
40_18_14_Kanjalo akusiyo intando kaYihlo osezulwini ukuba kubhubhe noyedwa kulaba abancinyane. 
40_18_15_“Kepha uma umfowenu ekona, hamba umsole ninodwa naye. Uma ekuzwa, woba umzuzile umfowenu. 
40_18_16_Kodwa uma engakuzwa, thatha futhi abe munye noma bebabili kanye nawe ukuba onke amazwi aqiniswe ngomlomo wawofakazi ababili noma abathathu. 
40_18_17_Uma enqaba ukubezwa, tshela ibandla; uma enqaba ukuzwa nalo ibandla, makabe kuwe njengowezizwe nomthelisi. 
40_18_18_“Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Konke eniyakukubopha emhlabeni koba kuboshiwe ezulwini, nakho konke eniyakukukhulula emhlabeni koba kukhululiwe ezulwini. 
40_18_19_“Futhi ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ababili kini emhlabeni bevumelana noma ngaluphi udaba abalucelayo, bayakulwenzelwa nguBaba osezulwini. 
40_18_20_Ngokuba lapho kubuthene ababili noma abathathu egameni lami, ngikhona lapho phakathi kwabo.” 
40_18_21_Khona kwasondela uPetru, wathi kuye: “Nkosi, umfowethu uyakungona kangaki, ngimthethelela, na? Kuze kube kasikhombisa na?” 
40_18_22_UJesu wathi kuye: “Angisho kuwe ukuthi kuze kube kasikhombisa kodwa kuze kube kamashumi ayisikhombisa aphindwe kasikhombisa. 
40_18_23_“Ngalokho umbuso wezulu ufaniswa nomuntu oyinkosi obethanda ukubalisana nezinceku zakhe. 
40_18_24_Kwathi eseqale ukubala, kwalethwa kuye enye enecala lamatalenta ayizinkulungwane eziyishumi. 
40_18_25_Kepha ingenalutho lokukhokha, inkosi yayala ukuba kuthengiswe ngayo, nangomkayo, nangabantabayo, nangakho konke enakho, kukhokhwe. 
40_18_26_Ngalokho inceku yawa phansi, yakhuleka kuyo, yathi: ‘Ake ungibekezelele, ngizakukukhokhela konke.’ 
40_18_27_Inkosi yaleyo nceku inesihe yayikhulula, yayithethelela icala. 
40_18_28_“Kepha kwathi isiphuma leyo nceku, yafumana enye yezinceku ezikanye nayo enecala kuyo lawodenariyu abayikhulu, yayibamba, yayiklinya, yathi: ‘Khokha icala lakho.’ 
40_18_29_“Khona inceku ekanye nayo yawa phansi, yayincenga yathi: ‘Ake ungibekezelele, ngizakukukhokhela.’ 
40_18_30_Kepha ayivumanga, kodwa yahamba, yayifaka etilongweni, ize ilikhokhe lelo cala. 
40_18_31_“Izinceku ezikanye nayo zathi ukubona okwenzekileyo, zadabuka kakhulu, zaya zabika enkosini yazo konke okwenzekileyo. 
40_18_32_Khona inkosi yayo yayibiza, yathi kuyo: ‘Nceku embi, lonke lelo cala ngikuthethelele lona ngokuba wangincenga; 
40_18_33_nga ungayihawukelanga yini inceku ekanye nawe, njengokuba nami ngikuhawukele, na?’ 
40_18_34_Inkosi yayo yathukuthela, yayinikela kubaphathi betilongo, ize ikhokhe lonke icala layo. 
40_18_35_“Kanjalo naye uBaba osezulwini uyakwenza kini, uma ningathetheleli ngezinhliziyo zenu kube yilowo nalowo umfowabo.” 
40_19_1_Kwathi uJesu eseqedile lawo mazwi, wamuka eGalile, weza emikhawulweni yaseJudiya phesheya kweJordani. 
40_19_2_Izixuku ezinkulu zamlandela, waziphulukisa khona. 
40_19_3_Kwase kusondela kuye abaFarisi, bamlinga bathi: “Kuvunyelwe yini ukuba indoda ilahle umkayo noma ngaliphi icala na?” 
40_19_4_Waphendula, wathi kubo: “Anifundanga yini ukuthi owadala ekuqaleni wabenza owesilisa nowesifazane, 
40_19_5_wathi: ‘Ngenxa yalokho umuntu uyakushiya uyise nonina, anamathele kumkakhe; labo ababili bayakuba nyamanye,’ na? 
40_19_6_Ngakho abasebabili, kodwa banyamanye. Ngakho-ke lokho akuhlanganisileyo uNkulunkulu, umuntu makangakwahlukanisi.” 
40_19_7_Bathi kuye: “Pho, uMose wayalelani ukuthi makanikwe incwadi yesahlukaniso, alahlwe, na?” 
40_19_8_Wathi kubo: “Ngenxa yobulukhuni benhliziyo yenu uMose wanivumela ukwahlukana nabo omkenu, kepha kusukela kwasekuqaleni kwakungenjalo. 
40_19_9_Namanje ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo olahla umkakhe kungengokuphinga, aganwe ngomunye, uyaphinga; noganwa ngolahliweyo uyaphinga.” 
40_19_10_Abafundi bathi kuye: “Uma injalo indaba yomuntu nomkakhe, akukuhle ukuganwa.” 
40_19_11_Kepha wathi kubo: “Akusibo bonke abangalamukela leli zwi, kuphela abakunikiweyo. 
40_19_12_Ngokuba kukhona abathenwa abazalwa benjalo kwasesiswini sikanina; kukhona nabathenwa abathenwe ngabantu; kukhona futhi abathenwa abazithenileyo ngenxa yombuso wezulu. Ongakwamukela lokho akwamukele.” 
40_19_13_Khona kwalethwa kuye abantwanyana ukuba abeke izandla phezu kwabo, akhuleke; kepha abafundi babakhuza. 
40_19_14_UJesu wayesethi: “Vumelani abantwana, ningabenqabeli ukuza kimi, ngokuba umbuso wezulu ungowabanjalo.” 
40_19_15_Wayesebeka izandla phezu kwabo; wamuka lapho. 
40_19_16_Bheka-ke, kwasondela kuye othile, wathi: “Mfundisi, ngiyakwenzantoni enhle ukuba ngibe nokuphila okuphakade na?” 
40_19_17_Wathi kuye: “Ungibuzelani ngokuhle na? Munye ongomuhle. Kepha uma uthanda ukungena ekuphileni, gcina imiyalelo.” 
40_19_18_Wathi kuye: “Miphi na?” UJesu wathi: “Yile: Ungabulali, ungaphingi, ungebi, ungafakazi amanga; 
40_19_19_yazisa uyihlo nonyoko; wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena.” 
40_19_20_Insizwa yathi kuye: “Konke lokho ngikugcinile; ngisasilalelweni na?” 
40_19_21_UJesu wathi kuye: “Uma uthanda ukuphelela, hamba uthengise ngempahla yakho, uphe abampofu, khona uzakuba negugu ezulwini; uze ungilandele.” 
40_19_22_Yathi insizwa ukuba izwe leli zwi, yamuka idabukile, ngokuba yayinengcebo enkulu. 
40_19_23_Kepha uJesu wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Onothileyo uyakungena kalukhuni embusweni wezulu. 
40_19_24_Futhi ngithi kini: Kulula ukuba ikamela lingene ngentunja yosungulo kunokuba onothileyo angene embusweni kaNkulunkulu.” 
40_19_25_Sebezwile lokho abafundi bethuka kakhulu, bathi: “Pho, kungasindiswa bani na?” 
40_19_26_Kepha uJesu ebabheka wathi kubo: “Kubantu akunakwenzeka; kepha kuNkulunkulu kungenzeka konke.” 
40_19_27_Khona uPetru wathatha wathi kuye: “Bheka, thina sishiye konke, sakulandela. Pho, siyakutholani na?” 
40_19_28_Wathi kubo uJesu: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Nina eningilandeleyo, ngokuphindukuzalwa lapho iNdodana yomuntu isihlezi esihlalweni senkazimulo yayo, nani niyakuhlala ezihlalweni zobukhosi eziyishumi nambili, nahlulele izizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli. 
40_19_29_Nalowo oshiye izindlu, noma abafowabo, noma odadewabo, noma uyise, noma unina, noma abantwana, noma amazwe ngenxa yegama lami, uyakwamukeliswa okuphindwe kaningi, adle ifa lokuphila okuphakade. 
40_19_30_Kepha abaningi abokuqala bayakuba ngabokugcina, nabokugcina babe ngabokuqala. 
40_20_1_“Ngokuba umbuso wezulu ufana nomuntu ongumninindlu owaphuma ekuseni ukuqasha izisebenzi ziye esivinini sakhe. 
40_20_2_Esevumelene nezisebenzi ngodenariyu ngosuku, wazithumela esivinini sakhe. 
40_20_3_“Waphuma futhi ngehora lesithathu, wabona abanye bemi esigcawini, bengenzi lutho; 
40_20_4_nakubo wathi: ‘Yanini nani esivinini; ngiyakuninika okufaneleyo.’ 
40_20_5_Baya-ke. “Waphuma futhi ngehora lesithupha nangelesishiyagalolunye, wenze njalo. 
40_20_6_Esephuma ngehora leshumi nanye wafumana abanye bemi, wathi kubo: ‘Nimeleni lapha usuku lonke ningenzi lutho na?’ 
40_20_7_“Bathi kuye: ‘Ngokuba akakho osiqashileyo.’ “Wathi kubo: ‘Hambani nani, niye esivinini.’ 
40_20_8_“Kepha selishonile, umninisivini wathi enduneni yakhe: ‘Biza izisebenzi, uzikhokhele imali yazo, uqale ngezokugcina, ugcine ngezokuqala.’ 
40_20_9_“Kuthe befika abehora leshumi nanye, kwaba yilowo nalowo wamukela udenariyu. 
40_20_10_Sekuza abokuqala, bathi bazakwamukela okukhulu; kepha nabo bamukela udenariyu ngabanye. 
40_20_11_Kepha sebamukela bakhonona ngomninindlu, 
40_20_12_bathi: ‘Laba abokugcina basebenze ihora linye nje, ubalinganise nathi esithwalile ubunzima nesifudumezi semini.’ 
40_20_13_“Waphendula, wathi komunye wabo: ‘Mngane, angikoni; kanti asivumelananga ngodenariyu na? 
40_20_14_Thatha okwakho, uhambe; kepha ngiyathanda ukunika lo wokugcina njengawe. 
40_20_15_Angivunyelwe ukwenza engikuthandayo ngokungokwami na? Kumbe iso lakho libi, ngokuba mina ngimuhle na?’ 
40_20_16_“Kanjalo abokugcina bayakuba ngabokuqala, nabokuqala babe ngabokugcina.” 
40_20_17_Kwathi uJesu esezakwenyukela eJerusalema, wathatha abafundi abayishumi nambili, wagudluka nabo; besesendleleni, wathi kubo: 
40_20_18_“Bhekani, sikhuphukela eJerusalema; iNdodana yomuntu izakukhashelwa kubapristi abakhulu nababhali; bazakuyinqumela ukuba ife, 
40_20_19_bayikhaphele kwabezizwe ukuba iklolodelwe, ishaywe, ibethelwe esiphambanweni; kepha ngosuku lwesithathu izakuvuswa.” 
40_20_20_Khona kwafika kuye unina wamadodana kaZebedewu kanye namadodana akhe; wakhuleka, wacela into kuye. 
40_20_21_Yena wathi kuye: “Ufunani na?” Wathi kuye: “Yisho ukuba lawa madodana ami amabili ahlale, enye ngakwesokunene sakho, enye ngakwesokhohlo sakho embusweni wakho.” 
40_20_22_UJesu waphendula wathi: “Anikwazi enikucelayo. Ningasiphuza yini isitsha engizakusiphuza na?” Bathi kuye: “Singakwenza.” 
40_20_23_Wathi kubo: “Yebo, nizakusiphuza isitsha sami, kepha ukuhlala ngakwesokunene sami nangakwesokhohlo akusikho okwami ukuphana ngakho, kodwa kungokwalabo abakulungiselwe nguBaba.” 
40_20_24_Bathi ukuzwa lokho abayishumi, bazithukuthelela izelamani ezimbili. 
40_20_25_Kepha uJesu wababiza, wathi: “Niyazi ukuthi ababusi bezizwe bazenza amakhosi phezu kwazo, nezikhulu zazo ziphethe amandla phezu kwazo. 
40_20_26_Akunjalo phakathi kwenu, kodwa yilowo nalowo ofuna ukuba mkhulu phakathi kwenu makabe yisikhonzi senu; 
40_20_27_nalowo ofuna ukuba ngowokuqala phakathi kwenu makabe yinceku yenu, 
40_20_28_njengalokho iNdodana yomuntu ingezelanga ukukhonzwa kepha ukukhonza nokunikela ukuphila kwayo, kube yisihlengo sabaningi.” 
40_20_29_Sebephuma eJeriko, isixuku esikhulu samlandela. 
40_20_30_Bheka, kwakuhlezi izimpumputhe ezimbili ngasendleleni; kuthe zizwa ukuthi uJesu uyadlula, zamemeza zathi: “Nkosi, Ndodana kaDavide, sihawukele!” 
40_20_31_Kepha isixuku sazikhuza ukuba zithule, kodwa kwayikhona zimemeza kakhulu, zithi: “Nkosi, Ndodana kaDavide, sihawukele!” 
40_20_32_UJesu wema, wazibiza wathi: “Nifuna ukuba nginenzeleni na?” 
40_20_33_Zathi kuye: “Nkosi, ukuba amehlo ethu avuleke.” 
40_20_34_UJesu waba nesihe, waphatha amehlo azo; zase zibona masinyane, zamlandela. 
40_21_1_Kwathi ukuba basondele eJerusalema, sebefikile eBetfage ngaseNtabeni Yeminqumo, uJesu wathuma abafundi ababili, 
40_21_2_wathi kubo: “Hambani niye emzaneni obhekene nani, nizakufumana masinyane imbongolo ikhulekiwe nethole linayo; zithukululeni, nizilethe kimi. 
40_21_3_Uma umuntu esho utho kini, anothi: ‘INkosi iyazidinga;’ uyakuzithumela masinyane.” 
40_21_4_Kepha lokho kwenzeka ukuba kugcwaliseke okwashiwo ngumprofethi othi: 
40_21_5_“Yishoni kuyo indodakazi yaseSiyoni ukuthi: Bheka, iNkosi yakho iza kuwe, imnene, ikhwele embongolweni, yebo, etholeni, inkonyane yesilwane esiboshelwayo.” 
40_21_6_Abafundi bahamba, benza njengokuba uJesu ebatshelile, 
40_21_7_baletha imbongolo nethole, babeka izingubo zabo phezu kwazo, wahlala phezu kwazo. 
40_21_8_Iningi lesixuku lendlala izingubo zalo endleleni, kepha abanye bagawula amahlamvu emithini, bawendlala endleleni. 
40_21_9_Izixuku ezazihamba phambili nezazimlandela zamemeza zathi: “Hosiyana kuyo iNdodana kaDavide! Ubusisiwe ozayo egameni leNkosi. Hosiyana kweliphezulu!” 
40_21_10_Kwathi esangena eJerusalema, umuzi wonke wanyakaza, wathi: “Ngubani lo?” 
40_21_11_Izixuku zathi: “Lo ungumprofethi, uJesu waseNazaretha laseGalile.” 
40_21_12_UJesu wayesengena ethempelini, waxosha bonke abathengisayo nabathengayo ethempelini, wagumbuqela amatafula abashintshelana imali nezihlalo zabathengisa ngamajuba. 
40_21_13_Wathi kubo: “Kulotshiwe ukuthi: ‘Indlu yami iyakubizwa ngokuthi indlu yokukhuleka,’ kepha nina niyenza ‘umhume wabaphangi.’ ” 
40_21_14_Kwase kufika kuye izimpumputhe nezinyonga ethempelini, waziphulukisa. 
40_21_15_Kepha abapristi abakhulu nababhali, bebona izimangaliso azenzayo nabantwana bememeza ethempelini, bethi: “Hosiyana kuyo iNdodana kaDavide,” bacasuka, 
40_21_16_bathi kuye: “Uyakuzwa lokhu abakushoyo laba na?” UJesu wathi kubo: “Yebo, anizange nifunde yini ukuthi: ‘Emlonyeni wezingane nowabancelayo uzilungisele indumiso,’ na?” 
40_21_17_Wayesebashiya, waphuma emzini, waya eBethaniya, walala khona. 
40_21_18_Kepha ekuseni esebuyela emzini walamba. 
40_21_19_Wabona umkhiwane owodwa ngasendleleni, weza kuwo; akafumananga lutho kuwo, amaqabunga odwa. Wayesethi kuwo: “Akungabe kusavela sithelo kuwe naphakade.” Umkhiwane wabuna khona lapho. 
40_21_20_Bekubona lokho abafundi bamangala bathi: “Umkhiwane ubune kanjani masinyane na?” 
40_21_21_UJesu wayesephendula, ethi kubo: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ninokukholwa, ningangabazi, aniyikwenza okomkhiwane kuphela, kodwa noma nithi kule ntaba: ‘Nqukuleka, uphonseke elwandle,’ kuyakwenzeka; 
40_21_22_nakho konke eningakucela ngokukhuleka nikholwa niyakukwamukeliswa.” 
40_21_23_Kuthe engena ethempelini, kweza kuye abapristi abakhulu namalunga esizwe, esafundisa, bathi: “Ukwenza lokhu ngagunya lini na? Futhi ngubani okunike leli gunya na?” 
40_21_24_UJesu waphendula, wathi kubo: “Nami ngizakunibuza izwi libe linye; uma ningitshela lona, nami ngizakunitshela ukuthi ngenza lokhu ngagunya lini. 
40_21_25_Ukubhapathiza kukaJohane kwavelaphi, ezulwini nokuba kubantu, na?” Bakhulumisana bodwa, bathi: “Uma sithi: ‘Ezulwini,’ uzakuthi kuthi: ‘Pho, anikholwanga nguye ngani na?’ 
40_21_26_Kepha uma sithi: ‘Kubantu,’ siyasesaba isixuku; ngokuba bonke bathi uJohane ungumprofethi.” 
40_21_27_Base bemphendula uJesu, bethi: “Asazi.” Wayesethi kubo naye: “Nami anginitsheli ukuthi ngenza lokhu ngagunya lini.” 
40_21_28_“Kepha nithini na? Umuntu wayenamadodana amabili; waya kweyokuqala, wathi: ‘Mntanami, hamba, uyosebenza namuhla esivinini.’ 
40_21_29_“Yaphendula yathi: ‘Angithandi;’ kodwa ngasemuva yaguquka, yaya. 
40_21_30_“Wayeseya kwenye, washo kanjalo. Yona yaphendula yathi: ‘Ngiyaya, nkosi;’ kepha kayiyanga. 
40_21_31_“Yiyiphi kulawa amabili eyenza intando kayise na?” Bathi kuye: “Eyokuqala.” UJesu wathi kubo: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Abathelisi nezifebe bangena phambi kwenu embusweni kaNkulunkulu. 
40_21_32_Ngokuba uJohane weza kini ngendlela yokulunga, anikholwanga nguye; kepha abathelisi nezifebe bakholwa nguye; kodwa nina, khona nikubona, aniguqukanga nakamuva, nize nikholwe nguye.”21:32 Luk. 3:10. 
40_21_33_“Yizwani omunye umfanekiso. Kwakukhona umuntu, umninindlu, owatshala isivini, wasibiyela ngothango, wemba khona isikhamo, wakha isiqongo sokulinda, wasiqashisa kubalimi, waya kwelinye izwe. 
40_21_34_Kwathi sekusondele isikhathi sezithelo, wathuma izinceku zakhe kubalimi ukuba zithathe izithelo zakhe. 
40_21_35_“Abalimi bazibamba izinceku zakhe, enye bayishaya, enye bayibulala, enye bayikhanda ngamatshe. 
40_21_36_Waphinda wathuma ezinye izinceku eziningi kunezokuqala; benze njalo nakulezo. 
40_21_37_Ekugcineni wathuma kubo indodana yakhe, ethi: ‘Bayakuyazisa indodana yami.’ 
40_21_38_“Kepha kwathi abalimi bebona indodana, bakhuluma bodwa, bathi: ‘Lo uyindlalifa; wozani siyibulale, sidle ifa layo.’ 
40_21_39_Base beyibamba, bayiphonsa ngaphandle kwesivini, bayibulala. 
40_21_40_“Pho-ke, mhla kufika umninisivini, uzakubenze njani labo balimi na?” 
40_21_41_Bathi kuye: “Uzakubabhubhisa kabi labo ababi, isivini sakhe sinikwe abanye abalimi abayakumnika izithelo ngezikhathi zazo.” 
40_21_42_UJesu wathi kubo: “Anizange nifunde yini emibhalweni ukuthi: “ ‘Itshe abalinqabayo abakhi lona laba yinhloko yegumbi; lona lavela eNkosini; liyisimangaliso emehlweni ethu,’ na? 
40_21_43_“Ngalokho ngithi kini: Niyakwamukwa umbuso kaNkulunkulu, uphiwe isizwe esiyakuveza izithelo zawo. 
40_21_44_Owayo phezu kwaleli tshe uyakuphohlozwa; kepha yilowo nalowo eliyakuwela phezu kwakhe liyakumcolisa.” 
40_21_45_Abapristi abakhulu nabaFarisi beyizwa imifanekiso yakhe bazi ukuthi ukhuluma ngabo. 
40_21_46_Base befuna ukumbamba; kepha bazesaba izixuku, ngokuba zazithi ungumprofethi. 
40_22_1_UJesu wathatha wakhuluma futhi kubo ngemifanekiso, wathi: 
40_22_2_“Umbuso wezulu ufaniswa nomuntu oyinkosi, owenzela indodana yakhe umshado. 
40_22_3_Wathuma izinceku zakhe ukubiza abamenyiweyo emshadweni; kepha abavumanga ukuza. 
40_22_4_“Waphinda wathuma ezinye izinceku, wathi: ‘Shonini kwabamenyiweyo ukuthi: Bhekani, sengilungisile ukudla kwami; izinkabi zami nokunonileyo sekuhlatshiwe; konke sekulungile, wozani emshadweni.’ 
40_22_5_“Kepha badelela, bahamba; omunye waya ensimini yakhe, omunye waya entengweni yakhe. 
40_22_6_Abaseleyo babamba izinceku zakhe, baziphatha kabi, bazibulala. 
40_22_7_Kepha inkosi yathukuthela, yathuma amabutho ayo, yabulala labo babulali, yashisa umuzi wabo. 
40_22_8_“Khona yathi ezincekwini zayo: ‘Umshado usulungiselwe, kepha abamenyiweyo bebengafanele; 
40_22_9_ngakho-ke hambani niye ezinhlanganweni zezindlela, nibizele emshadweni bonke eningabafumana.’ 
40_22_10_Lezo zinceku zaphuma, zaya ezindleleni, zabutha bonke ezabafumanayo, ababi nabahle; indlu yomshado yagcwala abahleziyo ekudleni. 
40_22_11_“Kuthe inkosi ingena ukubona abahleziyo ekudleni, yabona khona umuntu obengayembethe ingubo yomshado; 
40_22_12_yathi kuye: ‘Mngane, ungene kanjani lapha ungayembethe ingubo yomshado na?’ Kepha wathula. 
40_22_13_“Khona inkosi yathi ezincekwini: ‘Mbopheni izinyawo nezandla, nimphonse ebumnyameni obungaphandle; lapho kuyakuba khona ukukhala nokugedla amazinyo.’ 
40_22_14_“Ngokuba baningi ababiziweyo, kepha bayingcosana abakhethiweyo.” 
40_22_15_Khona abaFarisi basuka, bacebisana ukuba bamhile ngezwi. 
40_22_16_Bathuma kuye abafundi babo kanye nabakaHerode, bathi: “Mfundisi, siyazi ukuthi uqinisile, ufundisa indlela kaNkulunkulu ngeqiniso; awukhathali ngamuntu, ngokuba awubheki ubuso babantu. 
40_22_17_Ngakho sitshele, uthini wena? Kuvunyelwe ukuthela kuKesari noma qha?” 
40_22_18_Kepha uJesu ebazi ububi babo wathi: “Bazenzisi, ningilingelani na? 
40_22_19_Ngitshengiseni imali yokuthela,” bamtshengisa udenariyu. 
40_22_20_Wayesethi kubo: “Ngokabani lo mfanekiso nalo mbhalo na?” 
40_22_21_Bathi: “NgokaKesari.” Khona wathi kubo: “Ngakho-ke nikani uKesari okukaKesari noNkulunkulu okukaNkulunkulu.” 
40_22_22_Sebezwile lokho bamangala, bamshiya, bamuka. 
40_22_23_Ngalolo suku kwafika kuye abaSadusi abathi akukho ukuvuka kwabafileyo, bambuza 
40_22_24_bathi: “Mfundisi, uMose wathi: ‘Uma umuntu efa engenabantwana, umfowabo kamngene umkakhe, amvusele umfowabo inzalo.’ 
40_22_25_Kwakukhona-ke kithi izelamani eziyisikhombisa: owokuqala waganwa, wafa; engenanzalo washiya umkakhe kumfowabo. 
40_22_26_Kanjalo nowesibili nowesithathu, kwaze kwaba kowesikhombisa. 
40_22_27_Emva kwabo bonke wafa umfazi. 
40_22_28_Pho, ekuvukeni kwabafileyo uyakuba ngumkabani kwabayisikhombisa, lokhu bonke babe naye, na?” 
40_22_29_Kepha uJesu waphendula, wathi kubo: “Nidukile ningayazi imibhalo namandla kaNkulunkulu. 
40_22_30_Ngokuba ekuvukeni kwabafileyo abaganwa, abendiswa, kodwa banjengezingelosi ezulwini. 
40_22_31_Kepha maqondana nokuvuka kwabafileyo anifundanga yini okwakhulunywa kini nguNkulunkulu, ethi: 
40_22_32_‘Mina nginguNkulunkulu ka-Abrahama, noNkulunkulu ka-Isaka, noNkulunkulu kaJakobe,’ na? Akasiye uNkulunkulu wabafileyo kodwa owabaphilayo.” 
40_22_33_Kwathi izixuku zikuzwa lokho, zamangala ngokufundisa kwakhe. 
40_22_34_AbaFarisi sebezwile ukuthi uJesu ubathulisile abaSadusi, babuthana ndawonye. 
40_22_35_Omunye wabo, isazimthetho, wamlinga, wathi: 
40_22_36_“Mfundisi, ngumuphi umyalo omkhulu emthethweni na?” 
40_22_37_UJesu wathi kuye: “ ‘Woyithanda iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho ngayo yonke inhliziyo yakho, nangawo wonke umphefumulo wakho, nangayo yonke ingqondo yakho.’ 
40_22_38_Yilowo umyalo omkhulu nowokuqala. 
40_22_39_Owesibili ofana nawo uthi: ‘Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena.’ 
40_22_40_Kuleyo miyalo emibili kubambelela umthetho wonke nabaprofethi.” 
40_22_41_Besabuthene abaFarisi, uJesu wababuza, 
40_22_42_wathi: “Nithini ngoKristu na? Uyindodana kabani na?” Bathi kuye: “EkaDavide.” 
40_22_43_Wathi kubo: “Pho, uDavide ngoMoya wambiza kanjani ngokuthi iNkosi, ethi: 
40_22_44_“ ‘INkosi yathi eNkosini yami: “Hlala ngakwesokunene sami, ngize ngibeke izitha zakho phansi kwezinyawo zakho.” ’ 
40_22_45_“Ngakho-ke uma uDavide embiza ngokuthi iNkosi, uyindodana yakhe kanjani na?” 
40_22_46_Kwakungekho obengamphendula ngazwi; emva kwalolo suku akwabe kusabakho muntu onesibindi sokumbuza lutho. 
40_23_1_Khona uJesu wakhuluma ezixukwini nakubafundi bakhe, 
40_23_2_wathi: “Ababhali nabaFarisi bahlezi esihlalweni sikaMose. 
40_23_3_Ngakho-ke konke abanitshela khona, kwenzeni, nikugcine, kodwa ningenzi njengemisebenzi yabo; ngokuba bayakhuluma, bangenzi; 
40_23_4_babopha imithwalo enzima, bayibeke emahlombe abantu; kepha bona abavumi ukuyifukula ngomunwe wabo. 
40_23_5_“Kepha imisebenzi yonke yabo bayenza ukuba babonwe ngabantu; amafilakteriyu abo bawenza abe banzi, bawenze abe makhulu amachopho. 
40_23_6_Bathanda izindawo ezingenhla ekudleni nezihlalo eziphambili emasinagogeni, 
40_23_7_nokubingelelwa ezigcawini, nokubizwa ngabantu ngokuthi ‘Rabi’. 
40_23_8_“Kepha nina maningabizwa ngokuthi ‘Rabi’; ngokuba munye umfundisi wenu, nina nonke ningabazalelwane. 
40_23_9_Ningabizi muntu emhlabeni ngokuthi uyihlo; ngokuba munye uyihlo, osezulwini. 
40_23_10_Futhi ningabizwa ngokuthi abaholi; ngokuba munye umholi wenu, uKristu. 
40_23_11_Kodwa omkhulu kini akabe yisikhonzi senu. 
40_23_12_Kepha yilowo nalowo oziphakamisayo uzakuthothiswa, nalowo ozithobayo uzakuphakanyiswa. 
40_23_13_“Maye kinina babhali nabaFarisi, bazenzisi, ngokuba nivalela abantu umbuso wezulu! Ngokuba aningeni nina, nabangenayo anibavumeli ukungena. 
40_23_14_Maye kinina babhali nabaFarisi, bazenzisi, ngokuba nidla izindlu zabafelokazi, nangokuzenzisa nenza imikhuleko emide! Ngalokho-ke niyakwamukeliswa ukulahlwa okukhulu. 
40_23_15_“Maye kinina babhali nabaFarisi, bazenzisi, ngokuba nihamba ulwandle nomhlaba ukuba nithole nokuba iproselite lilinye, lithi selaba njalo nilenze indodana yesihogo ngokuphindiwe kunani! 
40_23_16_“Maye kinina baholi abayizimpumputhe enithi: ‘Ofunga ithempeli akulutho, kodwa ofunga igolide lethempeli uzibophile!’ 
40_23_17_Ziwula, zimpumputhe, ngokuba yikuphi okukhulu kunegolide nethempeli elingcwelisa igolide na? 
40_23_18_Futhi: ‘Yilowo ofunga i-altare akulutho, kodwa ofunga umnikelo ophezu kwalo uzibophile.’ 
40_23_19_Zimpumputhe, yikuphi okukhulu kunomnikelo ne-altare elingcwelisa umnikelo na? 
40_23_20_Ngakho-ke ofunga i-altare ufunga lona nakho konke okuphezu kwalo. 
40_23_21_Nofunga ithempeli ufunga lona nohlezi kulo. 
40_23_22_Nofunga izulu ufunga isihlalo sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu nohlezi phezu kwaso.23:22 Math. 5:34. 
40_23_23_“Maye kinina babhali nabaFarisi, bazenzisi, ngokuba nithela okweshumi kwesinkuntshane, nokwentshungu, nokodonqa, niyeke okunzima komthetho: ukwahlulela nesihawu nokukholwa! Benimelwe ukwenza lokhu, ningakuyeki nalokho. 
40_23_24_Baholi abayizimpumputhe, nihluza insensane, niginge ikamela.

40_26_41_Lindani, nikhuleke ukuba ningangeni ekulingweni; umoya uyavuma, kepha inyama ibuthakathaka.” 
40_26_42_Wabuye waya ngokwesibili, wakhuleka wathi: “Baba, uma lesi sitsha singedlule kimi ngingasiphuzanga, mayenziwe intando yakho.” 
40_26_43_Esebuya futhi wabafumana belele, ngokuba amehlo abo ayenzima. 
40_26_44_Wabuye wabashiya, waya wakhuleka ngokwesithathu esho futhi lona lelo zwi. 
40_26_45_Khona wafika kubafundi, wathi kubo: “Nisalele namanje niphumula; bhekani, ihora selisondele, iNdodana yomuntu isiyakhashelwa ezandleni zezoni. 
40_26_46_Sukumani sihambe; bhekani, ongikhaphelayo usesondele.” 
40_26_47_Esakhuluma, bheka, kwafika uJuda, omunye wabayishumi nambili, enesixuku esikhulu sinezinkemba nezinduku, sivela kubapristi abakhulu namalunga esizwe. 
40_26_48_Kepha omkhaphelayo wayebanike isiboniso sokuthi: “Lowo engiyakumanga nguye; mbambeni yena.” 
40_26_49_Wafika masinyane kuJesu, wathi: “E Rabi!” Wamanga. 
40_26_50_UJesu wayesethi kuye: “Mngane, ubabeleni na?” Khona basondela, babeka izandla kuJesu, bambamba. 
40_26_51_Bheka, omunye kwababe noJesu welula isandla, wahosha inkemba yakhe, wayigenca inceku yompristi omkhulu, wayinquma indlebe. 
40_26_52_UJesu wayesethi kuye: “Buyisela inkemba yakho endaweni yayo, ngokuba bonke abaphatha inkemba bayakubhubha ngenkemba. 
40_26_53_Ingabe uthi ngingecele kuBaba angithumele manje amalegiyona ezingelosi adlula ishumi nambili na? 
40_26_54_Pho-ke ingagcwaliseka kanjani imibhalo yokuthi kumelwe ukuba kube njalo na?” 
40_26_55_Ngaleso sikhathi uJesu wathi ezixukwini: “Niphumile kungathi nize kumphangi, niphethe izinkemba nezinduku ukungibamba, na? Bengihlezi ethempelini imihla ngemihla ngifundisa, anangibamba. 
40_26_56_Kepha konke lokho kwenzekile ukuba kugcwaliseke imibhalo yabaprofethi.” Khona bonke abafundi bamshiya, babaleka. 
40_26_57_Ababembambile uJesu bamusa kuKayafase umpristi omkhulu, lapho kwakubuthene khona ababhali namalunga. 
40_26_58_Kepha uPetru wamlandela ekude kwaze kwaba segcekeni lompristi omkhulu; wangena phakathi, wahlala phansi nezikhonzi ukuba abone isigcino. 
40_26_59_Abapristi abakhulu nomphakathi wonke bafuna ubufakazi bamanga ngoJesu, ukuze bambulale; 
40_26_60_kepha ababufumananga, nakuba kwafika ofakazi abaningi bamanga. Kodwa kamuva kwavela ababili, 
40_26_61_bathi: “Lo wathi: ‘Nginamandla okudiliza ithempeli likaNkulunkulu, ngibuye ngilakhe ngezinsuku ezintathu.’ ” 
40_26_62_Kwase kusukuma umpristi omkhulu, wathi kuye: “Awuphenduli lutho na? Kuyini abakufakaza ngawe laba na?” 
40_26_63_Kepha uJesu wathula. Wayesethi kuye umpristi omkhulu: “Ngikufungisa uNkulunkulu ophilayo ukuba usitshele uma unguKristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu.” 
40_26_64_UJesu wayesethi kuye: “Usho khona. Nokho ngithi kini: Kusukela manje niyakubona iNdodana yomuntu ihlezi ngakwesokunene saMandla, iza emafwini ezulu.” 
40_26_65_Khona umpristi omkhulu waklebhula izingubo zakhe, wathi: “Usehlambalazile; sisaswelelani ofakazi na? Bheka, kalokhu nikuzwile ukuhlambalaza kwakhe. 
40_26_66_Nithini na?” Kepha baphendula bathi: “Ufanele ukufa.” 
40_26_67_Base bemkhafulela ngamathe ebusweni, bamdushuza, kepha abanye bammukula, 
40_26_68_bathi: “Siprofethele, Kristu; ngubani okushayileyo na?” 
40_26_69_Kepha uPetru wayehlezi ngaphandle egcekeni; kweza kuye intombazana, yathi: “Nawe ubunoJesu waseGalile.” 
40_26_70_Kodwa waphika phambi kwabo bonke, wathi: “Angikwazi lokhu okushoyo.” 
40_26_71_Kwathi esephumele esangweni, enye intombazana yambona, yathi kwababe lapho: “Lona ube noJesu waseNazaretha.” 
40_26_72_Waphika futhi ngokufunga, wathi: “Angimazi lowo muntu.” 
40_26_73_Emva kwesikhashana ababemi khona basondela, bathi kuPetru: “Nempela nawe ungomunye wabo, ngokuba nokukhuluma kwakho kuyakudalula.” 
40_26_74_Khona waqala ukuthuka nokufunga, wathi: “Angimazi lowo muntu.” Masinyane lase likhala iqhude. 
40_26_75_UPetru wayesekhumbula izwi likaJesu abelishilo lokuthi: “Iqhude lingakakhali, uzakungiphika kathathu.” Waphumela phandle, wakhala kamunyu. 
40_27_1_Kwathi sekusile, bonke abapristi abakhulu namalunga esizwe benza icebo ngoJesu lokuba bambulale; 
40_27_2_bambopha, bamuka naye, bamnikela kuPilatu umbusi. 
40_27_3_Khona uJuda owamkhaphelayo, ebona ukuthi ulahliwe, wazisola, wabuyisela izinhlamvu zesiliva ezingamashumi amathathu kubapristi namalunga, 
40_27_4_wathi: “Ngonile ukuba ngikhaphele igazi elingenacala.” Bona bathi: “Kuyini lokho kithi na? Zibonele wena.” 
40_27_5_Wayesephonsa izinhlamvu zesiliva ethempelini, wamuka, waziphanyeka. 
40_27_6_Kepha abapristi abakhulu bazithatha izinhlamvu zesiliva, bathi: “Akuvunyelwe ukuzifaka emnikelweni, ngokuba kuyimali yegazi.” 
40_27_7_Benza icebo, bathenga ngayo insimu yombumbi, ibe ngeyokumbela abafokazi. 
40_27_8_Ngalokho insimu leyo ithiwa insimu yegazi kuze kube namuhla. 
40_27_9_Khona kwagcwaliseka okwashiwo ngomprofethi uJeremiya ukuthi: “Bathatha izinhlamvu zesiliva ezingamashumi amathathu, inani lowamiselwa inani onani lakhe lamiswa ngamadodana ka-Israyeli; 
40_27_10_bakhokha ngazo insimu yombumbi, njengokuba iNkosi ingiyalile.” 
40_27_11_Kepha uJesu wayemi phambi kombusi; umbusi wambuza wathi: “Wena uyinkosi yabaJuda na?” UJesu wathi kuye: “Usho khona.” 
40_27_12_Kwathi lapho abapristi abakhulu namalunga bemthwesa icala, kaphendulanga lutho. 
40_27_13_Khona uPilatu wathi kuye: “Awuzwa yini lokho okungaka abakufakaza ngawe na?” 
40_27_14_Akaze amphendula nakwelilodwa izwi, umbusi waze wamangala kakhulu. 
40_27_15_Kepha ngomkhosi umbusi wayejwayele ukukhululela isixuku isiboshwa sibe sinye esasisithanda. 
40_27_16_Ngaleso sikhathi babe nesiboshwa esidumileyo esithiwa uBaraba. 
40_27_17_Ngakho sebebuthene, uPilatu wathi kubo: “Nithanda ukuba nginikhululele bani, uBaraba nokuba uJesu othiwa uKristu, na?” 
40_27_18_Ngokuba wayekwazi ukuthi bamnikele ngomhawu. 
40_27_19_Esahlezi esihlalweni sokwahlulela, umkakhe wathumela kuye, wathi: “Ungabi nandaba kulowo muntu olungileyo; ngokuba ngihluphekile kakhulu namuhla ngaye ephusheni.” 
40_27_20_Kepha abapristi abakhulu namalunga bancenga izixuku ukuba zicele uBaraba, zimbulale uJesu. 
40_27_21_Wayesephendula umbusi, wathi kubo: “Nithanda ukuba nginikhululele muphi kulaba ababili na?” Bathi: “UBaraba.” 
40_27_22_UPilatu wathi kubo: “Pho-ke, ngimenze njani uJesu othiwa uKristu na?” Bonke bathi: “Makabethelwe esiphambanweni.” 
40_27_23_Wayesethi: “Ngokuba wenze bubi buni na?” Kepha bamemeza kakhulu, bathi: “Makabethelwe esiphambanweni.” 
40_27_24_UPilatu esebona ukuthi akanakwenza lutho nokuthi isiphithiphithi sesanda kakhulu, wathatha amanzi, wahlamba izandla phambi kwesixuku, wathi: “Anginacala egazini lalo muntu; ziboneleni nina.” 
40_27_25_Abantu bonke base bephendula bethi: “Igazi lakhe malibe phezu kwethu naphezu kwabantwana bethu.” 
40_27_26_Wayesebakhululela uBaraba, kepha wamshaya uJesu, wamnikela ukuba abethelwe esiphambanweni. 
40_27_27_Khona amabutho ombusi ayesemthatha uJesu, amngenisa enqabeni, aqoqela kuye ibutho lonke. 
40_27_28_Amhlubula, amembathisa ingubo ebomvu, 
40_27_29_aluka umqhele wameva, awufaka ekhanda lakhe, nomhlanga esandleni sakhe sokunene, aguqa ngamadolo phambi kwakhe, ambhinqa athi: “Bayede, nkosi yabaJuda!” 
40_27_30_Amkhafulela ngamathe, athatha umhlanga, amshaya ekhanda lakhe. 
40_27_31_Esembhinqile amhlubula ingubo, amembathisa izingubo zakhe, amuka naye ukuyombethela esiphambanweni. 
40_27_32_Esaphuma afumana umuntu waseKhurene, nguSimoni igama lakhe; amcindezela lowo ukuba athwale isiphambano sakhe. 
40_27_33_Esefikile endaweni ethiwa iGolgotha okungukuthi iNdawo Yekhanda, 
40_27_34_amphuzisa iwayini elixutshwe nenyongo; kepha kuthe elizwa, akathandanga ukuliphuza. 
40_27_35_Esembethele esiphambanweni abelana izingubo zakhe, enzelana inkatho; 
40_27_36_ahlala amlinda khona. 
40_27_37_Abeka ngaphezu kwekhanda lakhe icala lakhe libhalwe ngokuthi: LO NGUJESU, INKOSI YABAJUDA. 
40_27_38_Kwabethelwa kanye naye abaphangi ababili, omunye ngakwesokunene nomunye ngakwesokhohlo. 
40_27_39_Kepha abadlulayo bamhlambalaza benikina amakhanda abo, 
40_27_40_bathi: “Wena odiliza ithempeli, ubuye ulakhe ngezinsuku ezintathu, zisindise, uma uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, wehle esiphambanweni.” 
40_27_41_Kanjalo nabapristi abakhulu bambhinqa kanye nababhali namalunga, bathi: 
40_27_42_“Wasindisa abanye, angezisindise yena; uyinkosi yakwa-Israyeli, akehle manje esiphambanweni, sikholwe nguye. 
40_27_43_Wethembile uNkulunkulu; makamkhulule manje, uma emthanda, ngokuba wathi: ‘NgiyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.’ ” 
40_27_44_Kepha nabaphangi ababebethelwe esiphambanweni kanye naye bamdumaza kanjalo. 
40_27_45_Kepha kusukela ngehora lesithupha kwaba mnyama emhlabeni wonke, kwaze kwaba yihora lesishiyagalolunye. 
40_27_46_Kepha ngehora lesishiyagalolunye uJesu wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu, wathi: “Eli, Eli, lama sabaktani?” okungukuthi: “Nkulunkulu wami, Nkulunkulu wami, ungishiyeleni na?” 
40_27_47_Abanye kwababemi khona bekuzwa bathi: “Lo ubiza u-Eliya.” 
40_27_48_Masinyane omunye kubo wagijima, wathatha ilula, waligcwalisa ngoviniga, walihloma emhlangeni, wamphusiza. 
40_27_49_Kepha abanye bathi: “Yeka, sibone uma u-Eliya eza ukumsindisa.” 
40_27_50_UJesu wabuye wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu, wafa. 
40_27_51_Bheka-ke, isihenqo sethempeli sadabuka kabili, kusukela phezulu kuze kufike phansi; umhlaba wazamazama, amadwala aqhekezeka; 
40_27_52_amathuna avuleka, imizimba eminingi yabangcwele ababelele yavuka; 
40_27_53_baphuma emathuneni emva kokuvuka kwakhe, bangena emzini ongcwele, babonakala kwabaningi. 
40_27_54_Kepha induna yekhulu nababe nayo belinda uJesu sebebona ukuzamazama nalokho okwenzekileyo besaba kakhulu, bathi: “Nempela lo ube yiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.” 
40_27_55_Kwakukhona lapho abesifazane abaningi bebukela, bekude, ababemlandele uJesu bevela eGalile, bemkhonza; 
40_27_56_phakathi kwabo kwakukhona oMariya Magdalena, unina kaJakobe nokaJose, nonina wamadodana kaZebedewu. 
40_27_57_Sekuhlwile, kwafika umuntu ocebileyo wase-Arimatheya, igama lakhe nguJosefa, owayengumfundi kaJesu naye; 
40_27_58_lo waya kuPilatu, wacela isidumbu sikaJesu. Khona uPilatu wayala ukuba anikwe sona. 
40_27_59_UJosefa wasithatha isidumbu, wasisonga ngendwangu enhle ehlanzekileyo, 
40_27_60_wasibeka ethuneni lakhe elisha ayeliqophe edwaleni, wagingqela itshe elikhulu emnyango wethuna, wahamba. 
40_27_61_Kepha kwakukhona lapho uMariya Magdalena nomunye uMariya behlezi phambi kweliba. 
40_27_62_Kepha ngangomuso okungolulandela usuku lokulungisela abapristi abakhulu nabaFarisi babuthana kuPilatu, 
40_27_63_bathi: “Nkosi, sikhumbula ukuthi lowo mkhohlisi esekhona wathi: ‘Emva kwezinsuku ezintathu ngizakuvuka.’ 
40_27_64_Ngakho yala ukuba iliba ligcinwe kuze kube lusuku lwesithathu ukuba abafundi bakhe bangaze bafike bamebe, bathi kubantu: ‘Uvukile kwabafileyo;’ kuthi inkohliso yokugcina ibe mbi kuneyokuqala.” 
40_27_65_UPilatu wathi kubo: “Nampa abalindi; hambani niligcine njengokubona kwenu.” 
40_27_66_Base behamba, baligcina iliba, babeka uphawu etsheni bekanye nabalindi. 
40_28_1_Kepha ekupheleni kwesabatha ngovivi lolokuqala lweviki kwafika uMariya Magdalena nomunye uMariya, beza ukuyobona iliba. 
40_28_2_Bheka, kwaba khona ukuzamazama komhlaba okukhulu, ngokuba ingelosi yeNkosi yehla ezulwini, yeza yagingqa itshe, yahlala phezu kwalo. 
40_28_3_Ukubonakala kwayo kwakunjengonyazi, nesambatho sayo sasimhlophe njengongqoqwane. 
40_28_4_Kepha abalindi bathuthumela ngokuyesaba, baba njengabafileyo. 
40_28_5_Kodwa ingelosi yaphendula, yathi kwabesifazane: “Ningesabi nina; ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi nifuna uJesu obebethelwe esiphambanweni; 
40_28_6_kakho lapha, ngokuba uvukile njengokusho kwakhe; zanini nibone indawo lapho ebelele khona. 
40_28_7_Hambani masinyane, nitshele abafundi bakhe ukuthi uvukile kwabafileyo; bhekani, uyanandulela ukuya eGalile, nizakumbona khona. Bhekani, nginitshelile.” 
40_28_8_Base beshesha bamuka ethuneni benokwesaba nokuthokoza okukhulu, bagijima baya ukubikela abafundi bakhe. 
40_28_9_Bheka, uJesu wabahlangabeza, wathi: “Sanibona.” Besondela babamba izinyawo zakhe, bakhuleka kuye. 
40_28_10_Khona uJesu wathi kubo: “Ningesabi; hambani, nibikele abafowethu ukuba bahambe baye eGalile; bayakungibona khona.” 
40_28_11_Besahamba, bheka, abanye kubalindi bafika emzini, babikela abapristi abakhulu konke okwenzekileyo. 
40_28_12_Sebebuthene namalunga benza icebo, banika amabutho imali eningi,28:12 Math. 27:64. 
40_28_13_bathi: “Shonini ukuthi abafundi bakhe beza ebusuku, bameba silele. 
40_28_14_Uma kuzwakala lokho kumbusi, siyakuncengana naye thina, nina ningakhathazeki.” 
40_28_15_Ayeseyithatha imali, enza njengokufundiswa kwawo. Leli zwi landa phakathi kwabaJuda kuze kube namuhla. 
40_28_16_Kepha abafundi abayishumi nanye baya eGalile kuleyo ntaba uJesu ayebayalele yona; 
40_28_17_sebembona bakhuleka kuye, kepha abanye bangabaza. 
40_28_18_UJesu wasondela, wakhuluma kubo, wathi: “Ngiphiwe amandla onke ezulwini nasemhlabeni; 
40_28_19_ngalokho hambani nenze izizwe zonke abafundi, nibabhapathize egameni likaYise neleNdodana nelikaMoya oNgcwele, 
40_28_20_nibafundise ukugcina konke enginiyale ngakho; bhekani, mina nginani izinsuku zonke kuze kube sekupheleni kwezwe.” 
41_1_1_Ukuqala kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu. 
41_1_2_Njengokulotshwe kumprofethi u-Isaya ukuthi: “Bheka, ngiyasithuma isithunywa sami phambi kwakho esiyakulungisa indlela yakho,” — 
41_1_3_“izwi lomemezayo ehlane, lithi: ‘Lungisani indlela yeNkosi, nenze imikhondo yayo iqonde,’ ” 
41_1_4_kwavela uJohane ebhapathiza ehlane, eshumayela umbhapathizo wokuphenduka, kube ngukuthethelelwa kwezono. 
41_1_5_Kwaphumela kuye izwe lonke laseJudiya nabo bonke abaseJerusalema, babhapathizwa nguye emfuleni iJordani, bevuma izono zabo. 
41_1_6_UJohane wayembethe eyoboya bekamela, enoqhotho lwesikhumba okhalweni lwakhe, edla izinkumbi nezinyosi zasendle. 
41_1_7_Washumayela wathi: “Emva kwami kuyeza onamandla kunami, engingafanele ukuba ngikhothame ngithukulule umchilo wezicathulo zakhe. 
41_1_8_Mina nginibhapathize ngamanzi, kepha yena uzakunibhapathiza ngoMoya oNgcwele.” 
41_1_9_Kwathi ngaleyo mihla kwafika uJesu evela eNazaretha laseGalile, wabhapathizwa nguJohane eJordani. 
41_1_10_Wanele ukukhuphuka emanzini, wabona izulu livuleka, noMoya ehlela phezu kwakhe njengejuba. 
41_1_11_Kwavela izwi ezulwini, lithi: “Wena uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo; ngithokozile ngawe.” 
41_1_12_Masinyane uMoya wayesemqhubela ehlane. 
41_1_13_Wayekhona ehlane izinsuku ezingamashumi amane elingwa nguSathane; wayendawonye nezilwane; izingelosi zamkhonza. 
41_1_14_Emva kokuboshwa kukaJohane uJesu wafika eGalile eshumayela ivangeli likaNkulunkulu, 
41_1_15_wathi: “Isikhathi sigcwalisekile, umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele; phendukani, nikholwe yivangeli.” 
41_1_16_Kwathi edlula ngaselwandle lwaseGalile, wabona oSimoni no-Andreya umfowabo kaSimoni bephonsa inetha elwandle, ngokuba babe ngabadobi. 
41_1_17_UJesu wayesethi kubo: “Ngilandeleni; ngiyakunenza nibe ngabadobi babantu.” 
41_1_18_Base bewashiya masinyane amanetha, bamlandela. 
41_1_19_Eseqhubekile ingcosana wabona uJakobe kaZebedewu noJohane umfowabo besemkhunjini, belungisa amanetha. 
41_1_20_Wababiza masinyane; base bemshiya uyise uZebedewu emkhunjini kanye nezisebenzi, bamlandela. 
41_1_21_Bangena eKapernawume. Kwathi masinyane ngesabatha wangena esinagogeni, wafundisa. 
41_1_22_Bamangala ngokufundisa kwakhe; ngokuba wabafundisa njengonamandla, kungenjengababhali. 
41_1_23_Kwakukhona-ke esinagogeni umuntu onomoya ongcolileyo, wamemeza, 
41_1_24_wathi: “Sinamsebenzi muni nawe Jesu waseNazaretha? Uze ukusibhubhisa na? Ngiyakwazi ukuba ungubani — ungoNgcwele kaNkulunkulu.” 
41_1_25_UJesu wamkhuza wathi: “Thula, uphume kuye!” 
41_1_26_Umoya ongcolileyo wamhlukumeza, wakhala ngezwi elikhulu, waphuma kuye. 
41_1_27_Bethuka bonke, babuzana bodwa, bathi: “Kuyini lokhu? Yisifundiso esisha esinamandla; nawomoya abangcolileyo uyabayala, bamlalele.” 
41_1_28_Udumo lwakhe lwase lwanda masinyane kuso sonke isifunda saseGalile. 
41_1_29_Sebephume esinagogeni bangena masinyane endlini kaSimoni no-Andreya, benoJakobe noJohane. 
41_1_30_Umkhwekazi kaSimoni wayelele enomkhuhlane; bashesha bamtshela ngaye. 
41_1_31_Waya kuye, wamlulamisa embamba ngesandla; umkhuhlane wamyeka, wabakhonza. 
41_1_32_Kwathi ukuba kuhlwe, selishonile ilanga, baletha kuye bonke abagulayo nabakhwelwe ngamademoni. 
41_1_33_Umuzi wonke wawubuthene ngasemnyango. 
41_1_34_Waphulukisa abaningi abaphethwe yizifo ngezifo, wakhipha amademoni amaningi, wayengawavumeli amademoni ukukhuluma, ngokuba ayemazi. 
41_1_35_Ekuseni kusemnyama kakhulu, wavuka waphuma, waya endaweni eyihlane, wakhuleka khona. 
41_1_36_USimoni nababe naye bamlandela ngokuphuthuma. 
41_1_37_Sebemfumene bathi kuye: “Bonke bayakufuna.” 
41_1_38_Wathi kubo: “Masiye kwezinye izindawo emizaneni eseduze ukuba ngishumayele nakhona; ngokuba ngiphumele khona lokho.” 
41_1_39_Wahamba eshumayela emasinagogeni abo kulo lonke iGalile, ekhipha amademoni. 
41_1_40_Kwafika kuye onochoko, wamncenga eguqa ngamadolo, ethi kuye: “Uma uthanda, ungangihlambulula.” 
41_1_41_UJesu wamhawukela, welula isandla, wamphatha, wathi kuye: “Ngiyathanda; hlambuluka.” 
41_1_42_Lwasuka masinyane uchoko kuye, wahlambuluka. 
41_1_43_Esemyalisisile washesha wammukisa, 
41_1_44_wathi kuye: “Bheka, ungasho lutho kumuntu, kepha hamba uzibonakalise kumpristi, unikele ngokuhlanjululwa kwakho lokho okwayalelwa nguMose, kube ngubufakazi kubo.” 
41_1_45_Kepha yena esephumile waqala ukuyandisa kakhulu nokuyidumisa le ndaba, ngangokuba uJesu wayengasenakungena emzini obala; wayesehlala ngaphandle ezindaweni eziyihlane; beza kuye bevela nxazonke. 
41_2_1_Wabuye wangena eKapernawume emva kwezinsuku ezithile; kwezwakala ukuthi usendlini. 
41_2_2_Kwase kubuthana abaningi, akwabe kusabakho ndawo nangasemnyango; wakhuluma izwi kubo. 
41_2_3_Beza kuye bethwele umuntu ofe uhlangothi, ephethwe ngabantu abane. 
41_2_4_Bengenakusondela kuye ngenxa yesixuku baqaqa uphahla lapho ekhona, bathi sebebhobozile behlisa uhlaka alele kulo ofe uhlangothi. 
41_2_5_UJesu ebona ukukholwa kwabo wathi kofe uhlangothi: “Ndodana, uthethelelwe izono zakho.” 
41_2_6_Kepha kwakukhona ababhali abathile behlezi khona, bezindla ezinhliziyweni zabo ngokuthi: 
41_2_7_“Lo ukhulumelani kanje na? Uyahlambalaza. Ngubani ongathethelela izono, kungeyena uNkulunkulu yedwa na?” 
41_2_8_UJesu ekwazi masinyane emoyeni wakhe ukuthi bazindla kanjalo phakathi kwabo, wathi kubo: “Nizindlelani ngalokhu ezinhliziyweni zenu na? 
41_2_9_Yikuphi okulula ukuthi kofe uhlangothi: ‘Uthethelelwe izono zakho,’ noma ukuthi: ‘Vuka, uthathe uhlaka lwakho, uhambe,’ na? 
41_2_10_Kepha ukuze nazi ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu inamandla emhlabeni okuthethelela izono” — wathi kofe uhlangothi — 
41_2_11_“ngithi kuwe: Vuka, uthathe uhlaka lwakho, uye endlini yakho.” 
41_2_12_Wayesevuka, wathatha masinyane uhlaka lwakhe, waphuma phambi kwabo bonke, baze bamangala bonke, bamdumisa uNkulunkulu, bathi: “Asizange sikubone okunje.” 
41_2_13_Waphuma futhi, waya ngaselwandle; isixuku sonke sabantu seza kuye, wabafundisa. 
41_2_14_Wathi edlula, wambona uLevi ka-Alfewu ehlezi endaweni yokuthela, wathi kuye: “Ngilandele.” Wasuka-ke, wamlandela. 
41_2_15_Kwathi ehlezi ekudleni endlini yakhe, abathelisi abaningi nezoni bahlala noJesu nabafundi bakhe; ngokuba babe baningi, bamlandela. 
41_2_16_Khona ababhali babaFarisi bembona edla nezoni nabathelisi bathi kubafundi bakhe: “Yini ukuba adle nabathelisi nezoni na?” 
41_2_17_UJesu ekuzwa lokho wathi kubo: “Abaphilileyo abadingi inyanga, ngabagulayo bodwa; kangizelanga ukubiza abalungileyo kodwa izoni.” 
41_2_18_Abafundi bakaJohane nabaFarisi babezila ukudla; beza bathi kuye: “Yini ukuba abafundi bakaJohane nabafundi babaFarisi bazile ukudla, kodwa abafundi bakho bangazili na?” 
41_2_19_UJesu wathi kubo: “Abayeni bangazila yini, umyeni esenabo na? Bese naye umyeni bangezile. 
41_2_20_Kodwa zizakufika izinsuku, lapho umyeni ezakususwa kubo; yikhona-ke bezakuzila ngalolo suku. 
41_2_21_Akakho othungela isiziba esingakashukeki engutsheni endala, funa okusha okubekelwayo kuklebhule kwendala, kwande ukuklebhuka. 
41_2_22_Futhi akakho othela iwayini elisha ezimvabeni ezindala, funa iwayini liqhumise izimvaba, lichitheke iwayini, nezimvaba zonakale; kodwa iwayini elisha lithelwa ezimvabeni ezintsha.” 
41_2_23_Kwathi edabula amasimu ngesabatha, abafundi bakhe baqala ukukha izikhwebu behamba. 
41_2_24_Base bethi kuye abaFarisi: “Bheka, bakwenzelani ngesabatha okungavunyelwe na?” 
41_2_25_Wathi kubo: “Anizange nifunde yini akwenzayo uDavide mhla eswele, elambile yena nababe naye 
41_2_26_ukuthi wangena endlini kaNkulunkulu enkathini ka-Abiyathara umpristi omkhulu, wadla izinkwa zokubukwa ezingavunyelwe ukudliwa muntu, ngabapristi bodwa, wanika nababe naye, na?” 
41_2_27_Wayesethi kubo: “Isabatha lenzelwa umuntu, umuntu akenzelwanga isabatha. 
41_2_28_Ngokunjalo iNdodana yomuntu iyinkosi neyesabatha.” 
41_3_1_Khona wabuye wangena esinagogeni. Kwakukhona lapho umuntu onesandla esishwabeneyo. 
41_3_2_Bamqaphela ukuba uzakumphilisa yini ngesabatha, ukuze bambeke icala. 
41_3_3_Wathi kumuntu onesandla esishwabeneyo: “Sukuma, ume phakathi.” 
41_3_4_Wayesethi kubo: “Kuvunyelwe ngesabatha ukwenza okuhle noma okubi yini, ukusindisa umuntu noma ukumbulala na?” Kepha bathula. 
41_3_5_Waqalaza ebabuka ngokuthukuthela, edabukile ngobulukhuni benhliziyo yabo; wayesethi kulowo muntu: “Yelula isandla.” Waselula, saphiliswa isandla sakhe. 
41_3_6_AbaFarisi base bephuma masinyane bacebisana ngaye nabakaHerode ukuthi bangambhubhisa kanjani. 
41_3_7_UJesu wasuka kanye nabafundi bakhe, waya ngaselwandle; isixuku esikhulu samlandela sivela eGalile, naseJudiya, 
41_3_8_naseJerusalema, nase-Idumiya, nangaphesheya kweJordani, nangaseTire, naseSidoni; isixuku esikhulu sesizwile konke akwenzayo seza kuye. 
41_3_9_Wayeseyala abafundi bakhe ukuba isikebhe simlindele ngenxa yesixuku sabantu, ukuze bangamcindezeli, 
41_3_10_ngokuba wayephulukisa abaningi, kwaze kwathi bonke abanezifo bawela phezu kwakhe ukuba bamnamathe. 
41_3_11_Nawomoya abangcolileyo bathi ukuba bambone, bawa phansi phambi kwakhe, bamemeza bathi: “Wena uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.” 
41_3_12_Wabayalisisa ukuba bangamzwakalisi. 
41_3_13_Wayesenyukela entabeni, wabizela kuye abebafuna yena; beza kuye. 
41_3_14_Wamisa abayishumi nambili ukuba babe naye nokuba abathume baye kushumayela, 
41_3_15_babe namandla okukhipha amademoni. 
41_3_16_Wayesemisa laba abayishumi nambili: uSimoni owamqamba igama lokuthi uPetru, 
41_3_17_noJakobe kaZebedewu, noJohane umfowabo kaJakobe; laba wabaqamba igama lokuthi oBowanergesi okungukuthi amadodana okuduma; 
41_3_18_no-Andreya, noFiliphu, noBartolomewu, noMathewu, noTomase, noJakobe ka-Alfewu, noThadewu, noSimoni umKhanani, 
41_3_19_noJuda Iskariyothe owamkhaphelayo. 
41_3_20_Wayesefika ekhaya; isixuku sabuthana futhi, ababe besaba nathuba lokudla nasinkwa. 
41_3_21_Abakubo sebekuzwile baphuma ukuyombamba, ngokuba bathi uyahlanya. 
41_3_22_Nababhali abehla bevela eJerusalema bathi: “UnoBelzebule, ukhipha amademoni ngombusi wamademoni.” 
41_3_23_Wayesebabiza, wakhuluma kubo ngemifanekiso, ethi: “USathane angakhipha kanjani uSathane na? 
41_3_24_Uma umbuso wahlukene wodwa, lowo mbuso ungeme. 
41_3_25_Nendlu, uma yahlukene yodwa, leyo ndlu ayizukuma. 
41_3_26_NoSathane, uma ezivukela yena, ahlukane, akanakuma, kepha uyaphela. 
41_3_27_Yebo, akakho ongangena endlini yesiqhwaga, aphange impahla yaso, uma engabophi kuqala isiqhwaga, andukuba aphange indlu yaso. 
41_3_28_Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Abantwana babantu bayakuthethelelwa izono zonke nokuhlambalaza noma kungakanani abangahlambalaza ngakho, 
41_3_29_kepha lowo ohlambalaza uMoya oNgcwele kanakuthethelelwa naphakade, kodwa unecala lesono esingapheliyo.” 
41_3_30_Ngokuba bathi unomoya ongcolileyo. 
41_3_31_Kwase kufika unina nabafowabo, bema ngaphandle, bathumela kuye bembiza. 
41_3_32_Isixuku sabantu sasimphahlile; bathi kuye: “Bheka, unyoko nabafowenu nawodadewenu bangaphandle bekufuna.” 
41_3_33_Wabaphendula wathi: “Ngubani umame nabafowethu na?” 
41_3_34_Waqalaza ebuka ababehlezi bemphahlile, wathi: “Bhekani, nangu umame nabafowethu. 
41_3_35_Ngokuba owenza intando kaNkulunkulu nguye ongumfowethu nodadewethu nomame.” 
41_4_1_Khona wabuye waqala ukufundisa ngaselwandle. Kwabuthana kuye isixuku esikhulu kakhulu, waze wangena emkhunjini, wahlala elwandle; isixuku sonke sasisemhlabathini ngaselwandle. 
41_4_2_Wabafundisa okuningi ngemifanekiso; wathi kubo ekufundiseni kwakhe: 
41_4_3_“Lalelani; bhekani, kwaphuma umhlwanyeli ukuyohlwanyela. 
41_4_4_Kwathi ekuhlwanyeleni kwakhe enye imbewu yawela ngasendleleni; kwafika izinyoni, zayidla zayiqeda. 
41_4_5_Enye yawela edwaleni, lapho yayingenamhlabathi omningi khona; yamila masinyane, ngokuba ingenamhlabathi ojulileyo. 
41_4_6_Kwathi ukuba liphume ilanga, yahamuka; nangokuba ingenampande, yabuna. 
41_4_7_Enye yawela emeveni; ameva akhula, ayiminyanisa, ayaze yathela isithelo. 
41_4_8_Enye yawela emhlabathini omuhle; yahluma, yakhula, yathela isithelo, yaveza ngamashumi amathathu, nangamashumi ayisithupha, nangekhulu.” 
41_4_9_Wayesethi: “Onezindlebe zokuzwa makezwe.” 
41_4_10_Lapho esengasesitha, ababe naye kanye nabayishumi nambili bambuza ngale mifanekiso. 
41_4_11_Wathi kubo: “Nina niphiwe imfihlakalo yombuso kaNkulunkulu, kodwa abangaphandle benzelwa konke ngemifanekiso, 
41_4_12_ukuze ngokubona babone, bangabonisisi, nangokuzwa bezwe, bangaqondi, funa baphenduke, bathethelelwe.” 
41_4_13_Wayesethi kubo: “Aniwazi lo mfanekiso; pho, niyakuyazi kanjani yonke imifanekiso na? 
41_4_14_Umhlwanyeli uhlwanyela izwi. 
41_4_15_Abangasendleleni yilabo abathi lapho kuhlwanyelwa khona izwi, nanxa sebelizwile, kufike masinyane uSathane, alisuse izwi elihlwanyelwe kubo. 
41_4_16_Kanjalo abahlwanyelwe edwaleni yilabo abathi sebelizwile izwi, balamukele masinyane ngokuthokoza; 
41_4_17_kepha kabanampande phakathi kwabo, kodwa bahlala isikhashana nje, kuthi sekuvele ukuhlupheka nokuzingelwa ngenxa yezwi, bakhubeke masinyane. 
41_4_18_Abanye bangabahlwanyelwe emeveni; yibo abalizwile izwi, 
41_4_19_kepha iminako yalesi sikhathi, nokukhohlisa kwengcebo, nokunxanela ezinye izinto kungena kuliminyanise izwi, libe ngelingatheliyo. 
41_4_20_Nabahlwanyelwe emhlabathini omuhle yilabo abalizwa izwi, balamukele, bathele isithelo ngamashumi amathathu, nangamashumi ayisithupha, nangekhulu.” 
41_4_21_Wayesethi kubo: “Imbala isibani siza ukuba sibekwe phansi kwesitsha nokuba phansi kombhede yini, singabekwa othini, na? 
41_4_22_Ngokuba akukho okusithekileyo okungayikuhlalukiswa; akukho okuyisifuba okungayikuba sobala. 
41_4_23_Uma ekhona onezindlebe zokuzwa, makezwe.” 
41_4_24_Wayesethi kubo: “Qaphelani enikuzwayo; ngaleso silinganiso enilinganisa ngaso nani niyakulinganiselwa ngaso, nenezelwe nina. 
41_4_25_Ngokuba onakho uyakuphiwa; kepha ongenakho uyakwamukwa nalokho anakho.” 
41_4_26_Wayesethi: “Unjalo umbuso kaNkulunkulu; unjengokuba umuntu ephonsa imbewu emhlabathini, 
41_4_27_alale, avuke ubusuku nemini, imibewu imile, ikhule, engazi ukuthi kanjani. 
41_4_28_Umhlabathi uthela isithelo ngokwawo, kuqala ikhaba, khona isikhwebu, besekuba yizinhlamvu ezipheleleyo esikhwetshini. 
41_4_29_Nxa sesivuthiwe isithelo, afake masinyane isikela, ngokuba ukuvuna sekufikile.” 
41_4_30_Wathi futhi: “Siyakuwufanisa nani umbuso kaNkulunkulu? Siyakuwuchaza ngamfanekiso muni na? 
41_4_31_Unjengenhlamvu yesinaphi ethi, nxa ihlwanyelwe emhlabathini, incinyane kunazo zonke izimbewu ezisemhlabeni, 
41_4_32_kodwa nxa isihlwanyelwe imila ibe nkulu kunazo zonke izilimo, ixhante amagatsha amakhulu, ukuze izinyoni zezulu zakhele emthunzini wawo.” 
41_4_33_Walikhuluma izwi kubo ngemifanekiso eminingi enjalo njengamandla abo okuzwa; 
41_4_34_kodwa ngaphandle komfanekiso kakhulumanga kubo; kepha sebebodwa wabachasisela abafundi bakhe konke. 
41_4_35_Ngalolo suku sekuhlwile, wathi kubo: “Asiwele siye ngaphesheya.” 
41_4_36_Base bemukisa isixuku, bahamba naye, njengalokho ebesemkhunjini; kwakukhona neminye imikhumbi ihambisana naye. 
41_4_37_Kwase kuvuka isivunguvungu esikhulu somoya, amaza aphonseka phakathi emkhunjini, umkhumbi waze waqala ukugcwala. 
41_4_38_Kepha yena wayengasemuva emkhunjini elele esicamelweni; bamvusa, bathi kuye: “Mfundisi, awunaki, nakuba sibhubha, na?” 
41_4_39_Wayesevuka, wakhuza umoya, wathi kulo ulwandle: “Thula, uthi du.” Kwanqamuka umoya, kwaba khona ukuthula okukhulu. 
41_4_40_Wathi kubo: “Yini ukuba nesabe kangaka na? Yini ukuba ningabi nakukholwa na?” 
41_4_41_Besaba ngokwesaba okukhulu, bathi omunye komunye: “Kanti lo ungubani, lokhu nomoya nolwandle kuyamlalela?” 
41_5_1_Base befika phesheya kolwandle ezweni lamaGerasa. 
41_5_2_Esephume emkhunjini, kwahlangana naye masinyane umuntu ovela emathuneni, enomoya ongcolileyo. 
41_5_3_Wayehlala emathuneni, kungasekho muntu ongambopha nangeketanga; 
41_5_4_ngokuba wayeseboshwe kaningi ngawozankosi nangamaketanga, kepha amaketanga ayegqashuliwe nguye nawozankosi babephuliwe, kungekho noyedwa owayenamandla okumthambisa. 
41_5_5_Ngesikhathi sonke ubusuku nemini wayesemathuneni nasezintabeni, ememeza, ezilimaza ngamatshe. 
41_5_6_Wathi ukuba ambone uJesu esekude, wagijima, wakhuleka kuye; 
41_5_7_wayesememeza ngezwi elikhulu, ethi: “Nginamsebenzi muni nawe Jesu, Ndodana kaNkulunkulu oPhezukonke? Ngikufungisa uNkulunkulu, ungangihluphi.” 
41_5_8_Ngokuba wathi kuye: “Phuma kulo muntu, moya ongcolileyo.” 
41_5_9_Wayesembuza ethi: “Ngubani igama lakho?” Wathi kuye: “NginguLegiyona igama lami, ngokuba sibaningi.” 
41_5_10_Wamncenga kakhulu ukuba angabamukisi kulelo zwe. 
41_5_11_Kwakukhona lapho ngasentabeni umhlambi omkhulu wezingulube ziklabile. 
41_5_12_Bamncenga bathi: “Sithumele ezingulubeni ukuba singene kuzo.” 
41_5_13_Wabavumela. Omoya abangcolileyo baphuma, bangena ezingulubeni; umhlambi wagulukudela eweni, waphonseka elwandle kungathi izinkulungwane ezimbili, zaminza elwandle. 
41_5_14_Ababezalusa babaleka, baya babika emzini nasemaphandleni; base beza ukuyobona okwenzekileyo. 
41_5_15_Bafika kuJesu, bambona obekhwelwe ngamademoni ehlezi embethe, esangulukile, yena owayenelegiyona; base besaba. 
41_5_16_Ababekubonile babatshela ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani kowayekhwelwe ngamademoni, nangezingulube. 
41_5_17_Base beqala ukumncenga ukuba amuke ezweni lakubo. 
41_5_18_Wathi ukuba angene emkhunjini, lowo owayekhwelwe ngamademoni wamncenga ukuba abe naye. 
41_5_19_Akamvumelanga, kepha wathi kuye: “Hamba uye ekhaya kwabakini, ubabikele ukuthi kungakanani iNkosi ekwenzele khona, yakuhawukela.” 
41_5_20_Wamuka-ke, waqala ukulanda eDekapholi ngokuthi kungakanani abekwenzile kuye uJesu; bamangala bonke. 
41_5_21_Khona uJesu esebuye ewelele ngaphesheya ngomkhumbi, kwabuthana isixuku esikhulu kuye engaselwandle. 
41_5_22_Kwase kufika omunye wabaphathi besinagoge, nguJayiru igama lakhe, owathi ukuba ambone, waziphonsa phansi ngasezinyaweni zakhe, 
41_5_23_wamncenga kakhulu, wathi: “Indodakazi yami isiyalela; ake uze, ubeke izandla phezu kwayo ukuba isindiswe, iphile.” 
41_5_24_Wahamba naye. Isixuku esikhulu samlandela, samcindezela. 
41_5_25_Owesifazane owayenomopho iminyaka eyishumi nambili, 
41_5_26_ehluphekile ngokuningi ezinyangeni eziningi, echithile konke ayenakho, engasizakalanga ngalutho, kodwa kwayilokhu kuqhubeka, 
41_5_27_esezwile ngoJesu, weza esixukwini ngasemuva, wathinta ingubo yakhe, 
41_5_28_ngokuba wathi: “Uma ngingathinta nje izingubo zakhe, ngizakusindiswa.” 
41_5_29_Kwanqamuka masinyane umthombo wegazi lakhe, wezwa emzimbeni ukuthi uphulukile enhluphekweni yakhe. 
41_5_30_Wanele ukuzwa uJesu phakathi kwakhe ukuthi amandla aphumile kuye, waphendukela esixukwini, wathi: “Ngubani othinte izingubo zami na?” 
41_5_31_Abafundi bakhe bathi kuye: “Uyabona isixuku sikucindezela, usuthi: ‘Ngubani ongithintileyo na?’ ” 
41_5_32_Waqalaza ukuba ambone owenzile lokho. 
41_5_33_Khona owesifazane esaba ethuthumela, azi okwenzekile kuye, weza waziphonsa phansi phambi kwakhe, wamtshela iqiniso lonke. 
41_5_34_Wayesethi kuye: “Ndodakazi, ukukholwa kwakho kukusindisile; hamba ube nokuthula; usuphulukile enhluphekweni yakho.” 
41_5_35_Esakhuluma, kwafika abomphathi wesinagoge, bathi: “Indodakazi yakho isifile; usamkhathazelani uMfundisi na?” 
41_5_36_Kwathi ukuba uJesu ezwile izwi elishiwoyo, wathi kumphathi wesinagoge: “Ungesabi, kholwa kuphela.” 
41_5_37_Akavumelanga muntu amlandele, kuphela oPetru, noJakobe, noJohane umfowabo kaJakobe. 
41_5_38_Bafika-ke endlini yomphathi wesinagoge, wabona isiyaluyalu nabakhalayo nabalila kakhulu. 
41_5_39_Wangena, wathi kubo: “Niyaluzelani, nikhalelani na? Umntwana akafile, kodwa ulele.” 
41_5_40_Bamhleka usulu. Kepha yena wabakhipha bonke, wathatha uyise womntwana nonina kanye nababe naye, wangena lapho kulele khona umntwana. 
41_5_41_Wabamba umntwana ngesandla, wathi kuye: “Thalitha, kumi,” okungukuthi ngokuhunyushwa: “Ntombazana, ngithi kuwe, vuka!” 
41_5_42_Yayisivuka masinyane intombazana, yahamba; ngokuba yayineminyaka eyishumi nambili. Khona bamangala ngokumangala okukhulu. 
41_5_43_Wabayalisisa ukuba lokhu kungaziwa muntu; futhi wathi mayiphiwe ukudla. 
41_6_1_Khona wamuka lapho, waya ezweni lakubo; abafundi bakhe bamlandela. 
41_6_2_Sekufikile isabatha, waqala ukufundisa esinagogeni. Abaningi abamuzwayo bamangala bathi: “Lo ukuthathaphi lokhu na? Ukuhlakanipha kuni akunikiwe lona na? Nemisebenzi yamandla enje yenziwe ngezandla zakhe na? 
41_6_3_Lo akusiye umbazi, indodana kaMariya, nomfowabo kaJakobe, noJose, noJuda, noSimoni, na? Nawodadewabo abakho yini lapha kithi na?” Base bekhubeka ngaye. 
41_6_4_Wayesethi kubo uJesu: “Umprofethi kadelelwa ngaphandle kwasezweni lakubo, nasezihlotsheni zakhe, nasendlini yakwabo.” 
41_6_5_Wayengenakwenza lapho nowodwa umsebenzi wamandla ngaphandle kokuthi wabeka izandla phezu kwabagulayo abayingcosana, wabaphulukisa. 
41_6_6_Wamangala ngokungakholwa kwabo. Wahamba imizi ngemizi efundisa. 
41_6_7_Wayesebabiza abayishumi nambili, waqala ukubathuma ngababili, wabanika amandla phezu kwawomoya abangcolileyo. 
41_6_8_Wabayala ukuba bangaphathi lutho lwendlela, kuphela udondolo lodwa, bangaphathi nasinkwa, nasikhwama, nathusi emixhakeni, 
41_6_9_kepha bafake izicathulo, bangembathi kodwa amabhantshi amabili. 
41_6_10_Wathi kubo: “Nakuphi lapho ningena khona endlini, hlalani kuyo, nize nimuke khona. 
41_6_11_Nayiphi indawo engayikunamukela, nalapho bengayikunizwa khona, anothi nimuka kuyo, nivuthulule uthuli oluphansi kwezinyawo zenu, kube ngubufakazi kubo.” 
41_6_12_Base behamba beshumayela ukuba abantu baphenduke. 
41_6_13_Bakhipha amademoni amaningi, bagcoba abagulayo abaningi ngamafutha, babaphulukisa. 
41_6_14_Yayisikuzwa inkosi uHerode, ngokuba lalidumile igama lakhe. Kwathiwa uJohane uMbhapathizi uvukile kwabafileyo; kungalokho lawa mandla asebenza kuye. 
41_6_15_Kodwa abanye bathi: “Ngu-Eliya;” abanye bathi: “Ngumprofethi njengomunye wabaprofethi.” 
41_6_16_Kepha uHerode ekuzwile wathi: “UJohane engamnquma ikhanda nguye ovukile.” 
41_6_17_Ngokuba yena uHerode wayethumele wambamba uJohane, wambopha etilongweni ngenxa kaHerodiya umkaFiliphu umfowabo, ngokuba wayeganwe nguye. 
41_6_18_Ngokuba uJohane wayethe kuHerode: “Awuvunyelwe ukuthatha umkamfowenu.” 
41_6_19_Njalo uHerodiya wambambela amagqubu, wafuna ukumbulala; kepha kabanga namandla, 
41_6_20_ngokuba uHerode wayemesaba uJohane emazi ukuthi uyindoda elungileyo engcwele, wamlonda; nalapho emuzwa, wayesambatheka kaningi, nokho kwabamnandi kuye ukumuzwa. 
41_6_21_Kwathi sekufikile usuku oluhle, lapho uHerode ngosuku lokuzalwa kwakhe ezenzela idili izikhulu zakhe, nezinduna zempi, nabanumzane baseGalile, 
41_6_22_kwangena indodakazi kaHerodiya uqobo, yasina, yajabulisa uHerode nababehlezi naye. Inkosi yayisithi entombazaneni: “Cela kimi noma yini okuthandayo, ngizakukunika.” 
41_6_23_Wafunga kuyo, wathi: “Noma yini ongakucela kimi ngizakukunika, nakuba kungaze kube yinxenye yombuso wami.” 
41_6_24_Yayisiphuma, yathi kunina: “Ngizakucelani na?” Yena wathi: “Ikhanda likaJohane uMbhapathizi.” 
41_6_25_Yakhawuleza yangena masinyane enkosini, yacela yathi: “Ngithanda ukuba ungiphe khona manje ngoqwembe ikhanda likaJohane uMbhapathizi.” 
41_6_26_Inkosi yadabuka kakhulu, kepha ngenxa yezifungo nangenxa yababehlezi nayo ekudleni ayithandanga ukuyilandulela. 
41_6_27_Inkosi yayisithuma masinyane ibutho, waliyala ukuba lilethe ikhanda lakhe. Lahamba, lamnquma ikhanda etilongweni. 
41_6_28_Laletha ikhanda lakhe ngoqwembe, layinika intombazana, intombazana yamnika unina. 
41_6_29_Kwathi ukuba abafundi bakhe bakuzwe lokho, beza bathatha isidumbu sakhe, basibeka ethuneni. 
41_6_30_Abaphostoli babuthana kuJesu, bambikela ababekwenzile nababekufundisile. 
41_6_31_Wayesethi kubo: “Zanini nina nodwa endaweni eyihlane, niphumule ingcosana.” Ngokuba babe baningi abezayo nabahambayo, abaze bathola nasikhathi sokudla. 
41_6_32_Base bemuka ngomkhumbi, baya endaweni eyihlane bebodwa. 
41_6_33_Abaningi sebebabona bemuka, baqonda, baze bagijimela khona ngezinyawo, bephuma kuyo yonke imizi, babandulela. 
41_6_34_Wathi ephuma, wabona isixuku esikhulu, waba nesihe ngabantu, ngokuba babe njengezimvu ezingenamalusi; waqala ukubafundisa okuningi. 
41_6_35_Kwathi isikhathi sesihambile, beza kuye abafundi bakhe, bathi: “Le ndawo iyihlane, isikhathi sesidlulile; 
41_6_36_bamukise ukuba baye emaphandleni nasemizaneni ezungezileyo, bazithengele ukudla.” 
41_6_37_Wayesephendula, ethi kubo: “Bapheni nina ukudla.” Bathi kuye: “Sihambe yini, siyothenga izinkwa zawodenariyu abangamakhulu amabili, sibaphe badle na?” 
41_6_38_Wathi kubo: “Ninezinkwa ezingaki na? Hambani nibone.” Sebazi bathi: “Ziyisihlanu, nezinhlanzi ezimbili.” 
41_6_39_Wabayala ukuba bonke bahlale phansi etshanini obuluhlaza izigaba ngezigaba. 
41_6_40_Base behlala phansi amaviyo ngamaviyo, kwaba ngamakhulu nangamashumi ayisihlanu. 
41_6_41_Wazithabatha izinkwa eziyisihlanu nezinhlanzi ezimbili, wabheka ngasezulwini, wazibusisa, wazihlephula izinkwa, wazinika abafundi ukuba bazibeke phambi kwabo; nezinhlanzi ezimbili wababela bonke ngazo. 
41_6_42_Badla bonke, basutha. 
41_6_43_Babutha imvuthuluka, iziqabetho eziyishumi nambili ezigcwele, neyezinhlanzi. 
41_6_44_Ababedlile izinkwa babe ngamadoda ayizinkulungwane eziyisihlanu. 
41_6_45_Wayesecindezela masinyane abafundi bakhe ukuba bangene emkhunjini, bamandulele ukuya phesheya eBetsayida, yena aze amukise isixuku. 
41_6_46_Esebavalelisile wahamba waya entabeni ukuyokhuleka. 
41_6_47_Kwathi sekuhlwile, umkhumbi wawuphakathi nolwandle, yena eyedwa emhlabathini. 
41_6_48_Wababona behlupheka ekugwedleni, ngokuba umoya wawuphambene nabo, weza kubo ngomlindo wesine wobusuku ehamba phezu kolwandle. Kwangathi uyadlula kubo. 
41_6_49_Sebembonile ehamba phezu kolwandle, bacabanga ukuthi yisithunzi; bakhala. 
41_6_50_Ngokuba bonke bambona, bethuka. Kepha washesha wakhuluma nabo, wathi kubo: “Yimani isibindi; yimina, ningesabi.” 
41_6_51_Wayesekhwela emkhunjini kubo, umoya wanqamuka; bamangala kakhulu impela phakathi kwabo. 
41_6_52_Ngokuba abaqondanga okwezinkwa, lokhu inhliziyo yabo yayilukhuni. 
41_6_53_Sebewelile bafika ezweni laseGenesaretha, babopha ogwini. 
41_6_54_Ukuphuma kwabo emkhunjini yena wayaziwa masinyane. 
41_6_55_Bagijimela kulo lonke lelo zwe, baqala ukuletha abagulayo ngezinhlaka, lapho bemuzwa ukuthi ukhona. 
41_6_56_Kwathi nomaphi lapho engena khona, emizaneni, nasemizini, nasemaphandleni, babeka abagulayo ezigcawini, bamncenga ukuba bathinte noma umphetho wengubo yakhe kuphela; bonke abamthinta basindiswa. 
41_7_1_Kwabuthana kuye abaFarisi nabanye bababhali bevela eJerusalema. 
41_7_2_Sebebonile ukuthi abanye babafundi bakhe badla izinkwa ngezandla ezimbi okungukuthi ezingahlanjiwe — 
41_7_3_ngokuba abaFarisi kanye nabaJuda bonke abadli bengahlambisisanga izandla, bebamba isiko labadala; 
41_7_4_nanxa bevela endalini, abadli bengakahlambi; kukhona nezinye izinto eziningi abazamukeleyo ukuba bazibambe, njengokuhlanza izinkezo, nezinkamba, nezitsha zethusi — 
41_7_5_abaFarisi nababhali bambuza bathi: “Abafundi bakho abahambi ngani ngesiko labadala, kepha badla isinkwa ngezandla ezimbi na?” 
41_7_6_Wayesethi kubo: “U-Isaya waprofetha kahle ngani nina bazenzisi njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi: “ ‘Lesi sizwe singidumisa ngezindebe zomlomo, kepha inhliziyo yaso ikude nami; 
41_7_7_kodwa bangikhonza ngeze befundisa izifundiso eziyimiyalo yabantu.’ 
41_7_8_“Niyeka umyalo kaNkulunkulu, nibambe isiko labantu.” 
41_7_9_Wayesethi kubo: “Yebo, nichitha umyalo kaNkulunkulu ukuba nigcine isiko lenu. 
41_7_10_Ngokuba uMose wathi: ‘Yazisa uyihlo nonyoko,’ nokuthi: ‘Othuka uyise noma unina makafe nokufa;’ 
41_7_11_kepha nina nithi: ‘Uma umuntu ethi kuyise noma kunina: YiKorbana, okungukuthi umnikelo, lokho ongabe usizwa yimi ngakho,’ 
41_7_12_anisamvumeli ukuba enzele uyise noma unina utho. 
41_7_13_Izwi likaNkulunkulu nilenza libe yize ngesiko lenu enilivezileyo; nokunye okuningi okunjalo niyakwenza.” 
41_7_14_Khona wabuye wabiza isixuku, wathi kuso: “Ngizweni nonke, niqonde. 
41_7_15_Alukho utho olungaphandle komuntu lungene kuye olungamngcolisa; kepha okuphumayo kuye yilokho okumngcolisayo umuntu. 
41_7_16_Uma ekhona onezindlebe zokuzwa, makezwe.” 
41_7_17_Kuthe esengene endlini, evela esixukwini, abafundi bakhe bambuza ngalowo mfanekiso. 
41_7_18_Wayesethi kubo: “Kanti nani ningabangaqondiyo na? Aniqondi yini ukuthi konke okungaphandle okungena kumuntu kungemngcolise na? 
41_7_19_Ngokuba akungeni enhliziyweni yakhe, kodwa kungena esiswini, kuphumele ngaphandle, kuhlambulula ukudla konke.” 
41_7_20_Wayesethi: “Okuphumayo kumuntu yilokho okumngcolisayo umuntu; 
41_7_21_ngokuba ngaphakathi enhliziyweni yabantu kuphuma imicabango emibi, nobufebe, nokweba, nokubulala, 
41_7_22_nokuphinga, nokufisa, nokushinga, nenkohliso, nokungabi nanhloni, neso elibi, nokuhlambalaza, nokuzidla, nobuwula. 
41_7_23_Zonke lezo zinto ezimbi zivela ngaphakathi, zimngcolise umuntu.” 
41_7_24_Wayesemuka lapho, waya emikhawulweni yaseTire. Wangena endlini, akathanda ukwaziwa muntu, kodwa wayengenakufihlakala. 
41_7_25_Kwathi masinyane owesifazane ondodakazi yakhe encane inomoya ongcolileyo esezwile ngaye, weza waziphonsa phansi ngasezinyaweni zakhe. 
41_7_26_Kepha owesifazane lo wayengumGreki engumSirofenike ngokuzalwa, wamnxusa ukuba akhiphe idemoni endodakazini yakhe. 
41_7_27_UJesu wayesethi kuye: “Ake kusuthe abantwana kuqala, ngokuba akukuhle ukuthatha isinkwa sabantwana, usiphonse ezinjaneni.” 
41_7_28_Kodwa waphendula, wathi kuye: “Yebo, Nkosi; kepha nezinjana zidla imvuthuluka yabantwana phansi kwetafula.” 
41_7_29_Wayesethi kuye: “Ngenxa yalelo zwi, hamba-ke; idemoni seliphumile endodakazini yakho.” 
41_7_30_Wayesemuka, waya endlini yakhe, wafumana umntwana elele embhedeni, idemoni liphumile. 
41_7_31_UJesu waphuma futhi emikhawulweni yaseTire, wadabula iSidoni, weza ngaselwandle lwaseGalile edabula izwe laseDekapholi. 
41_7_32_Baletha kuye isithulu esinamalimi, bamncenga ukuba abeke isandla phezu kwaso. 
41_7_33_Wagudluka naso esixukwini bebodwa, wafaka iminwe yakhe ezindlebeni zaso, wafela amathe, waphatha ulimi lwaso, 
41_7_34_wabheka ngasezulwini, wabubula, wathi kuso: “Efatha!” okungukuthi: “Vuleka!” 
41_7_35_Zase zivuleka izindlebe zaso, wathukuluka masinyane umthambo wolimi lwaso, sakhuluma kahle. 
41_7_36_Wabayala ukuba bangatsheli muntu. Kepha kwathi nakuba ebayala kakhulu, kwayikhona bekwandisa kakhulu impela. 
41_7_37_Bamangala nokumangala, bathi: “Wenze kahle konke; nezithulu uzenza zizwe, nezimungulu zikhulume.” 
41_8_1_Ngalezo zinsuku sekukhona futhi isixuku esikhulu singenakudla, wabiza abafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: 
41_8_2_“Ngiyasihawukela isixuku, ngokuba sekuyizinsuku ezintathu sihlezi kimi, singenanto yokudla. 
41_8_3_Uma ngibamukisa, baye ekhaya bengadlanga, bayakuphela amandla endleleni, ngokuba abanye babo bavela kude.” 
41_8_4_Abafundi bakhe bamphendula bathi: “Umumtu angatholaphi lapha ehlane izinkwa zokusuthisa laba na?” 
41_8_5_Wababuza wathi: “Ninezinkwa ezingaki na?” Bathi: “Eziyisikhombisa.” 
41_8_6_Wayala isixuku ukuba sihlale phansi; wazithabatha izinkwa eziyisikhombisa, wabonga, wazihlephula, wanika abafundi bakhe ukuba bababele; basabela isixuku. 
41_8_7_Babe nezinhlanzana eziyingcosana futhi; esezibusisile wathi abababele nazo. 
41_8_8_Badla, basutha, babutha imvuthuluka eseleyo, amaqoma ayisikhombisa. 
41_8_9_Babengathi izinkulungwane ezine; wabamukisa. 
41_8_10_Wayesengena masinyane emkhunjini kanye nabafundi bakhe, weza ezweni laseDalmanutha. 
41_8_11_Khona kwafika abaFarisi, baqala ukuphendulana naye befuna kuye isibonakaliso esivela ezulwini, bemlinga. 
41_8_12_Wabubula emoyeni wakhe, wathi: “Lesi sizukulwane sifunelani isibonakaliso na? Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lesi sizukulwane asiyikunikwa sibonakaliso.” 
41_8_13_Wabashiya, wabuye wangena emkhunjini, wamuka, waya ngaphesheya. 
41_8_14_Kepha babekhohliwe ukuphatha izinkwa, bengenalutho, isinkwa sisinye kuphela emkhunjini. 
41_8_15_Wayesebayala ethi: “Anobheka nixwaye imvubelo yabaFarisi nemvubelo kaHerode.” 
41_8_16_Baphendulana bodwa, bathi abanazinkwa. 
41_8_17_UJesu ekwazi wathi kubo: “Yini ukuba niphendulane ngokuthi aninazinkwa na? Anikaboni, anikaqondi, na? Inhliziyo yenu iselukhuni na? 
41_8_18_Ninamehlo aniboni yini, ninezindlebe anizwa na? Anikhumbuli yini 
41_8_19_mhla ngihlephulela abayizinkulungwane eziyisihlanu izinkwa eziyisihlanu ukuthi nabutha iziqabetho ezingaki ezigcwele imvuthuluka na?” Bathi kuye: “Ishumi nambili.” 
41_8_20_“Mhla ziyisikhombisa kwaba yizinkulungwane ezine, nabutha amaqoma amangaki agcwele imvuthuluka na?” Bathi: “Isikhombisa.” 
41_8_21_Wathi kubo: “Anikaqondi na?” 
41_8_22_Bafika eBetsayida. Base beletha kuye impumputhe, bamncenga ukuba ayiphathe. 
41_8_23_Wayibamba impumputhe ngesandla, wayiholela ngaphandle komuzi, wafela amathe emehlweni ayo, wabeka izandla phezu kwayo, wayibuza wathi: “Ubona utho na?” 
41_8_24_Yabheka, yathi: “Ngibona abantu, ngibabona behamba; kungathi yizihlahla.” 
41_8_25_Khona waphinda wabeka izandla phezu kwamehlo ayo, yabhekisisa, yasinda, yabonisisa konke. 
41_8_26_Wayithumela ekhaya layo, wathi: “Ungangeni emzini wabantu.” 
41_8_27_UJesu wayesephuma kanye nabafundi bakhe, waya emizini yaseKesariya Filipi. Besendleleni, wababuza abafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Abantu bathi ngingubani na?” 
41_8_28_Bamtshela bathi: “UJohane uMbhapathizi;” abanye bathi: “Ngu-Eliya;” abanye bathi: “Ngomunye wabaprofethi.”
