41_8_29_Wayesebabuza ethi: “Nina-ke nithi ngingubani na?” UPetru waphendula, wathi kuye: “Wena unguKristu.” 
41_8_30_Wabayalisisa ukuba bangatsheli muntu ngaye. 
41_8_31_Khona waqala ukubafundisa ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu imelwe ukuhlupheka ngokuningi, ilahlwe ngamalunga nabapristi abakhulu nababhali, ibulawe, ivuswe emva kwezinsuku ezintathu. 
41_8_32_Leli zwi walikhuluma ngokusobala. UPetru wamthatha, waqala ukumkhuza. 
41_8_33_Kepha waphenduka, wabheka abafundi bakhe, wamkhuza uPetru, wathi: “Buyela emva kwami, Sathane, ngokuba awuqondi okukaNkulunkulu kepha okwabantu.” 
41_8_34_Wayesebiza isixuku nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Uma umuntu ethanda ukuza emva kwami, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe, angilandele. 
41_8_35_Ngokuba yilowo nalowo othanda ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho; kepha olahlekelwa ngukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami nangenxa yevangeli uyakukusindisa. 
41_8_36_Ngokuba kuyakumsizani umuntu ukuzuza izwe lonke, alahlekelwe ngukuphila kwakhe, na? 
41_8_37_Yingabe angakhiphani umuntu, kube yisihlengo sokuphila kwakhe, na? 
41_8_38_Ngokuba yilowo nalowo onezinhloni ngami nangamazwi ami kulesi sizukulwane esiphingayo nesonakeleyo, neNdodana yomuntu iyakuba nezinhloni ngaye, lapho iza ngenkazimulo kaYise kanye nezingelosi ezingcwele.” 
41_9_1_Wayesethi kubo: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Bakhona abanye kwabemi lapha abangayikuzwa ngempela ukufa, baze babone umbuso kaNkulunkulu ufikile ngamandla.” 
41_9_2_Emva kwezinsuku eziyisithupha uJesu wathatha oPetru, noJakobe, noJohane, wakhuphukela nabo entabeni ende bebodwa; waphenduka esinye isimo phambi kwabo. 
41_9_3_Izingubo zakhe zacwazimula zaba mhlophe qwa, ngangokuba umhlanzi wasemhlabeni angezenze zibe mhlophe kangaka. 
41_9_4_Kwabonakala kubo u-Eliya enoMose; babekhuluma noJesu. 
41_9_5_Wathatha uPetru, wathi kuJesu: “Rabi, kuhle ukuba silapha; masakhe amadokodo amathathu, elinye libe ngelakho, elinye libe ngelikaMose, elinye libe ngelika-Eliya.” 
41_9_6_Wayengazi ukuthi uzakuphendula ngokuthini, ngokuba babesaba kakhulu. 
41_9_7_Kwase kufika ifu, libasithibeza; kwavela izwi efwini, lithi: “Lo uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo; yizweni.” 
41_9_8_Kwathi masinyane beqalaza, ababe besabona muntu, kuphela uJesu yedwa enabo. 
41_9_9_Besehla entabeni, wabayala ukuba bangatsheli muntu abakubonileyo, iNdodana yomuntu ingakavuki kwabafileyo. 
41_9_10_Bazigcinela lelo zwi bebuzana ngokuthi kuyini lokho ukuvuka kwabafileyo. 
41_9_11_Base bembuza, bethi: “Basholoni ababhali ukuthi u-Eliya umelwe ukufika kuqala na?” 
41_9_12_Wayesethi kubo: “Nempela u-Eliya uyeza kuqala ukuba abuyisele konke; kepha kulotshiwe kanjani ngeNdodana yomuntu ukuthi izakuhlupheka ngokuningi, idelelwe, na? 
41_9_13_Kodwa ngithi kini: U-Eliya sewafika, benza kuye abakuthandayo, njengalokho kulotshiwe ngaye.” 
41_9_14_Kwathi sebeza kubafundi, babona isixuku esikhulu sibahaqile nababhali bebuzana nabo. 
41_9_15_Isixuku sonke sambona qede sashaywa luvalo, sagijimela kuye, sambingelela. 
41_9_16_Wayesebabuza ethi: “Nibuzana nabo ngantoni na?” 
41_9_17_Omunye wesixuku wamphendula wathi: “Mfundisi, ngilethe kuwe indodana yami enomoya oyisimungulu. 
41_9_18_Kuthi lapho eyibambayo, uyidonsela phansi, ikhihlize amagwebu, igedle amazinyo, iphele amandla. Ngikhulume nabafundi bakho ukuba bamkhiphe, kepha bahluleka.” 
41_9_19_Waphendula wathi: “O sizukulwane esingakholwayo, koze kube nini nginani na? Koze kube nini nginibekezelela na? Yiletheni kimi.” 
41_9_20_Bayiletha kuye. Kwathi umoya embona, wayihlukumeza kakhulu masinyane, yawa phansi emhlabathini, yazigingqa ikhihliza amagwebu. 
41_9_21_Wayesebuza kuyise ukuthi isikhathi sesingakanani ifikelwe yilokhu na? Wathi: “Kwasebuntwaneni. 
41_9_22_Uyiphonsile kaningi emlilweni nasemanzini ukuba ayibhubhise; kodwa uma unamandla okwenza utho, sihawukele, usisize.” 
41_9_23_UJesu wayesethi kuye: “Uma unamandla! Konke kungenzeka kokholwayo.” 
41_9_24_Uyise womntwana wayesememeza masinyane, wathi: “Ngiyakholwa, siza ukungakholwa kwami.” 
41_9_25_UJesu esebona ukuthi isixuku sigijimela ndawonye, wamkhuza umoya ongcolileyo, wathi kuye: “Wena moya oyisimungulu nesithulu ngiyakuyala mina, ngithi: Phuma kuye, ungabe usangena kuye.” 
41_9_26_Wamemeza, wamhlukumeza kakhulu, waphuma; waba njengofileyo, baze bathi abaningi: “Usefile.” 
41_9_27_Kepha uJesu wambamba ngesandla, wamvusa; wasukuma. 
41_9_28_Kuthe esengenile endlini, abafundi bakhe bambuza bebodwa, bathi: “Thina besingemkhiphe ngani na?” 
41_9_29_Wayesethi kubo: “Lolu hlobo lungephume ngalutho, kuphela ngokukhuleka nangokuzila ukudla.” 
41_9_30_Bamuka lapho, badabula iGalile, wayengathandi ukuba kwaziwe muntu, 
41_9_31_ngokuba wabafundisa abafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “INdodana yomuntu ikhashelwa ezandleni zabantu, bazakuyibulala; kuthi isibulewe, izakuvuka emva kwezinsuku ezintathu.” 
41_9_32_Kepha abakuzwisisanga lokho kusho, besaba nokumbuza. 
41_9_33_Base beza eKapernawume. Kwathi esengene endlini, wababuza wathi: “Beniphendulana ngantoni endleleni na?” 
41_9_34_Kepha bathula, ngokuba bebekhulumisene endleleni ngokuthi ngubani omkhulu. 
41_9_35_Wayesehlala phansi, wababiza abayishumi nambili, wathi kubo: “Uma umuntu ethanda ukuba ngowokuqala, makabe ngowokugcina kubo bonke nesikhonzi sabo bonke.” 
41_9_36_Wayesethatha umntwana, wammisa phakathi kwabo, wamgona, wathi kubo: 
41_9_37_“Yilowo nalowo oyakwamukela abe munye kubantwana abanje ngegama lami uyangamukela mina, ongamukela mina akamukeli mina kodwa ongithumileyo.” 
41_9_38_UJohane wayesethi kuye: “Mfundisi, sabona umuntu ongasilandeli ekhipha amademoni ngegama lakho; samnqabela ngokuba engasilandeli.” 
41_9_39_Kepha uJesu wathi: “Ningamnqabeli, ngokuba akakho owenza umsebenzi wamandla ngegama lami ongasuka masinyane, akhulume kabi ngami. 
41_9_40_Ngokuba ongamelene nathi ungakithi. 
41_9_41_Yilowo nalowo oniphuzisa inkezo yamanzi ngegama lami ngokuba ningabakaKristu, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Akasoze alahlekelwa ngumvuzo wakhe. 
41_9_42_Nalowo okhubekisa abe munye kulaba abancinyane abakholwayo kungangcono kuye ukuba itshe lokusila ligaxwe entanyeni yakhe, aphonswe elwandle. 
41_9_43_Uma isandla sakho sikukhubekisa, sinqume; kungcono ungene ekuphileni uyingini kunokuba uye esihogweni, emlilweni ongacimekiyo, unezandla zombili, 
41_9_44_lapho impethu yabo ingafi, nomlilo ungacimi. 
41_9_45_Uma unyawo lwakho lukukhubekisa, lunqume; kungcono ungene ekuphileni ulunyonga kunokuba uphonswe esihogweni, emlilweni ongacimekiyo, unezinyawo zombili, 
41_9_46_lapho impethu yabo ingafi, nomlilo ungacimi. 
41_9_47_Uma iso lakho likukhubekisa, likhiphe; kungcono ungene embusweni kaNkulunkulu uneso linye kunokuba uphonswe esihogweni unamehlo omabili, 
41_9_48_lapho impethu yabo ingafi, nomlilo ungacimi. 
41_9_49_Ngokuba bonke bazakugqunyiswa ngomlilo. 
41_9_50_“Usawoti muhle, kepha uma usawoti engasenabusawoti, niyakumhlaziya ngani na? Yibani nosawoti phakathi kwenu, nihlalisane ngokuthula.” 
41_10_1_Wasuka lapho, weza emikhawulweni yaseJudiya nangaphesheya kweJordani; izixuku zabuye zabuthana kuye, waphinda wabafundisa abantu njengokujwayela kwakhe. 
41_10_2_Kwase kusondela kuye abaFarisi, bambuza ukuthi kuvunyelwe yini ukuba indoda ilahle umkayo, bemlinga. 
41_10_3_Waphendula, wathi kubo: “UMose waniyala ngokuthini na?” 
41_10_4_Bathi: “UMose wavuma ukuba kulotshwe incwadi yesahlukaniso, alahlwe.” 
41_10_5_UJesu wayesethi kubo: “Ngenxa yobulukhuni benhliziyo yenu wanilobela lowo myalo. 
41_10_6_Kepha kusukela ekuqaleni kokudalwa uNkulunkulu wabenza owesilisa nowesifazane. 
41_10_7_Ngenxa yalokho umuntu uyakushiya uyise nonina, anamathele kumkakhe; 
41_10_8_labo ababili bayakuba nyamanye; ngakho abasebabili, kepha sebenyamanye. 
41_10_9_Ngakho-ke lokho akuhlanganisileyo uNkulunkulu makungahlukaniswa ngumuntu.” 
41_10_10_Besendlini abafundi babuye bambuza ngalokho. 
41_10_11_Wathi kubo: “Yilowo nalowo olahla umkakhe, aganwe ngomunye, uyaphinga kuye. 
41_10_12_Naye, uma elahla indoda yakhe, agane enye, uyaphinga.” 
41_10_13_Khona baletha kuye abantwanyana ukuba abaphathe; kepha abafundi babakhuza. 
41_10_14_Kodwa uJesu ekubona wathukuthela, wathi kubo: “Vumelani abantwana beze kimi, ningabenqabeli, ngokuba umbuso kaNkulunkulu ungowabanjalo. 
41_10_15_Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo ongamukeli umbuso kaNkulunkulu njengomntwana kasoze angena kuwo.” 
41_10_16_Wabagona, wababusisa ebeka izandla phezu kwabo. 
41_10_17_Ekuphumeni kwakhe ukuya endleleni umuntu wagijimela kuye, waguqa ngamadolo phambi kwakhe, wambuza wathi: “Mfundisi omuhle, ngiyakwenzani ukuba ngidle ifa lokuphila okuphakade na?” 
41_10_18_Kepha uJesu wathi kuye: “Ungibizelani ngokuthi ngimuhle na? Kakho omuhle, munye kuphela, uNkulunkulu. 
41_10_19_Uyayazi imiyalelo ukuthi: Ungabulali, ungaphingi, ungebi, ungafakazi amanga, ungamamuki umuntu utho, yazisa uyihlo nonyoko.” 
41_10_20_Kepha wathi kuye: “Mfundisi, konke lokho ngikugcinile kwasebusheni bami.” 
41_10_21_UJesu wayesembheka, emthanda, wathi kuye: “Usasilalelwe into inye; hamba uthengise ngakho konke onakho, uphe abampofu, khona uzakuba negugu ezulwini; uze ungilandele.” 
41_10_22_Kepha wanyukumala ngalelo zwi, wamuka edabukile, ngokuba wayenengcebo enkulu. 
41_10_23_UJesu waqalaza, wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Kulukhuni kangakanani kwabanomnotho ukungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu.” 
41_10_24_Kepha abafundi bethuka ngamazwi akhe. UJesu wabuye waphendula, wathi kubo: “Bantwana, kulukhuni kangakanani kwabethemba umnotho ukungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu. 
41_10_25_Kulula ukuba ikamela lingene ngentunja yosungulo kunokuba onothileyo angene embusweni kaNkulunkulu.” 
41_10_26_Bamangala kakhulu, bathi omunye komunye: “Pho, kungasindiswa bani na?” 
41_10_27_UJesu ebabheka wathi: “Kubantu akunakwenzeka, kepha kuNkulunkulu akunjalo; ngokuba kuNkulunkulu kungenzeka konke.” 
41_10_28_UPetru wathatha, wathi kuye: “Bheka, thina sishiye konke, sakulandela.” 
41_10_29_UJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Akukho muntu oshiye indlu, noma abafowabo, noma odadewabo, noma unina, noma uyise, noma abantwana, noma amazwe ngenxa yami nangenxa yevangeli, 
41_10_30_ongayikwamukeliswa ngekhulu: manje kulesi sikhathi izindlu, nabafowabo, nawodadewabo, nawonina, nabantwana, namazwe kanye nokuzingelwa, nasenkathini ezayo ukuphila okuphakade. 
41_10_31_Kepha abaningi abokuqala bayakuba ngabokugcina, nabokugcina babe ngabokuqala.” 
41_10_32_Babesendleleni bekhuphukela eJerusalema; uJesu wayehamba phambi kwabo; ababelandela babethukile, besaba. Wayesethatha futhi abayishumi nambili, waqala ukubatshela okuzakumehlela, ethi: 
41_10_33_“Bhekani, sikhuphukela eJerusalema; iNdodana yomuntu izakukhashelwa kubapristi abakhulu nababhali; bazakuyinqumela ukuba ife, bayikhaphele kwabezizwe; 
41_10_34_bazakuyiklolodela, bayikhafulele ngamathe, bayishaye, bayibulale; kepha emva kwezinsuku ezintathu izakuvuka.” 
41_10_35_Kwase kusondela kuye oJakobe noJohane amadodana kaZebedewu, bathi kuye: “Mfundisi, siyathanda ukuba usenzele lokhu esizakukucela kuwe.” 
41_10_36_Wathi kubo: “Nifuna ukuba nginenzeleni na?” 
41_10_37_Bathi kuye: “Siphe ukuba sihlale, omunye ngakwesokunene sakho, omunye ngokwesokhohlo sakho enkazimulweni yakho.” 
41_10_38_Kepha uJesu wathi kubo: “Anikwazi enikucelayo. Ningasiphuza yini isitsha engisiphuzayo mina, nibhapathizwe ngombhapathizo engibhapathizwa ngawo na?” 
41_10_39_Bathi kuye: “Singakwenza.” UJesu wathi kubo: “Isitsha engisiphuzayo mina niyakusiphuza, nibhapathizwe ngombhapathizo engibhapathizwa ngawo mina; 
41_10_40_kepha ukuhlala ngakwesokunene sami nangakwesokhohlo akusikho okwami ukuphana ngakho, kodwa kungokwalabo abakulungiselweyo.” 
41_10_41_Bathi ukuzwa lokho abayishumi, baqala ukuthukuthelela oJakobe noJohane. 
41_10_42_UJesu wayesebabiza, wathi kubo: “Niyazi ukuthi abathiwa babusa izizwe bazenza amakhosi phezu kwazo, nezikhulu zazo ziphethe amandla phezu kwazo. 
41_10_43_Kepha akunjalo phakathi kwenu, kodwa yilowo nalowo ofuna ukuba mkhulu phakathi kwenu makabe yisikhonzi senu, 
41_10_44_nalowo ofuna ukuba ngowokuqala phakathi kwenu makabe yinceku yabo bonke. 
41_10_45_Ngokuba nayo iNdodana yomuntu ayizelanga ukukhonzwa kepha ukukhonza nokunikela ukuphila kwayo, kube yisihlengo sabaningi.” 
41_10_46_Khona bafika eJeriko. Kwathi esaphuma eJeriko nabafundi bakhe nesixuku esikhulu, indodana kaThimewu uBartimewu, isinxibi esiyimpumputhe, wayehlezi ngasendleleni. 
41_10_47_Wathi ukuba ezwe ukuthi nguJesu waseNazaretha, waqala ukumemeza ethi: “Jesu, Ndodana kaDavide, ngihawukele!” 
41_10_48_Abaningi bamkhuza, bathi kathule; kepha kwayikhona wamemeza kakhulu, ethi: “Ndodana kaDavide, ngihawukele!” 
41_10_49_Wayesema uJesu, wathi: “Mbizeni.” Bayibiza impumputhe, bathi kuyo: “Yima isibindi, usukume; uyakubiza.” 
41_10_50_Yayisilahla ingubo yayo, yagxuma, yaya kuJesu. 
41_10_51_UJesu washo kuyo, wathi: “Ufuna ukuba ngikwenzeleni na?” Impumputhe yathi kuye: “Rabuni, ukuba ngibone.” 
41_10_52_UJesu wathi kuyo: “Hamba-ke; ukukholwa kwakho kukusindisile.” Yayisibona khona lapho, yamlandela endleleni. 
41_11_2_wathi kubo: “Hambani niye emzaneni obhekene nani; kothi nisangena kuwo, nizakufumana ithole lembongolo likhulekiwe, okungakaze kuhlale muntu kulo; lithukululeni, nililethe. 
41_11_3_Uma umuntu ethi kini: ‘Nikwenzelani lokhu na?’ anothi: ‘INkosi iyalidinga; izakulibuyisela lapha masinyane.’ ” 
41_11_4_Bahamba, bafumana ithole likhulekiwe ngasesangweni ngaphandle emgwaqweni; balithukulula. 
41_11_5_Abanye kwababemi khona bathi kubo: “Nenzani nilithukulula ithole na?” 
41_11_6_Basho kubo njengokusho kukaJesu; base bebayeka. 
41_11_7_Baliletha ithole kuJesu, babeka izingubo zabo phezu kwalo, wakhwela kulo. 
41_11_8_Abaningi bendlala izingubo zabo endleleni, abanye amahlamvu ababewagawule endle. 
41_11_9_Ababehamba phambili nababelandela bamemeza bathi: “Hosiyana! Ubusisiwe ozayo egameni leNkosi. 
41_11_10_Ubusisiwe umbuso ozayo kababa uDavide. Hosiyana kweliphezulu!” 
41_11_11_UJesu wangena eJerusalema, waya ethempelini; esekubukile konke waphuma, sekuhlwile, waya eBethaniya kanye nabayishumi nambili. 
41_11_12_Ngangomuso ekuphumeni kwabo eBethaniya walamba. 
41_11_13_Wabona umkhiwane ukude, unamaqabunga, wasondela ethi mhlawumbe angathola utho kuwo; esefikile kuwo akafumananga lutho, amaqabunga odwa, ngokuba kwakungesiso isikhathi samakhiwane. 
41_11_14_UJesu wakhuluma, wathi kuwo: “Akungabe kusadla noyedwa isithelo kuwe kuze kube phakade.” Abafundi bakhe bakuzwa. 
41_11_15_Bafika eJerusalema. Wangena ethempelini, waqala ukuxosha abathengisayo nabathengayo ethempelini, wagumbuqela amatafula abashintshelana imali nezihlalo zabathengisa ngamajuba; 
41_11_16_wayengavumi ukuba umuntu adabule ithempeli ethwele isitsha. 
41_11_17_Wafundisa, wathi kubo: “Akulotshiwe yini ukuthi, ‘indlu yami iyakubizwa ngokuthi indlu yokukhuleka yezizwe zonke’ na? Kepha nina niyenze ‘umhume wabaphangi.’ ” 
41_11_18_Abapristi abakhulu nababhali bekuzwa lokho bazindla ngokuthi bangambhubhisa kanjani, ngokuba babemesaba, lokhu isixuku sonke samangala ngokufundisa kwakhe. 
41_11_19_Njalo ngokuhlwa baphuma emzini. 
41_11_20_Kusasa bedlula babona umkhiwane ubunile kusukela ezimpandeni. 
41_11_21_UPetru ekhumbula wathi kuye: “Rabi, bheka, umkhiwane owuqalekisileyo ubunile.” 
41_11_22_UJesu waphendula, wathi kubo: “Kholwani nguNkulunkulu. 
41_11_23_Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo oyakuthi kule ntaba: ‘Nqukuleka, uphonseke elwandle,’ engangabazi enhliziyweni yakhe kepha ekholwa ukuthi lokho akushoyo kuyenzeka, uzakuba nakho. 
41_11_24_Ngalokho ngithi kini: Konke enikukhulekelayo nenikucelayo, kholwani ukuthi nikwamukele, nizakuba nakho. 
41_11_25_Futhi nxa nimi nikhuleka, thethelelani, uma ninamagqubu nomunye, ukuze noYihlo osezulwini anithethelele iziphambeko zenu. 
41_11_26_Kepha uma nina ningathetheleli, noYihlo osezulwini akayikunithethelela iziphambeko zenu.” 
41_11_27_Babuye bafika eJerusalema; kwathi ehamba ethempelini, beza kuye abapristi abakhulu, nababhali, namalunga, 
41_11_28_bathi kuye: “Lokhu ukwenza ngagunya lini na? Ngubani okunike leli gunya ukuze wenze lokhu na?” 
41_11_29_Kepha uJesu wathi kubo: “Ngizakunibuza izwi libe linye, nize ningiphendule; yikhona ngizakunitshela ukuthi ngenza lokhu ngagunya lini. 
41_11_30_Ukubhapathiza kukaJohane kwavela ezulwini noma kubantu na? Ngiphenduleni.” 
41_11_31_Bakhulumisana bodwa, bathi: “Uma sithi: ‘Ezulwini,’ uzakuthi: ‘Pho, anikholwanga nguye ngani na?’ 
41_11_32_Kepha uma sithi: ‘Kubantu,’ ” besaba isixuku, ngokuba bonke bathi uJohane ungumprofethi impela. 
41_11_33_Base bemphendula uJesu, bathi: “Asazi.” Wayesethi uJesu kubo: “Nami anginitsheli ukuthi ngenza lokhu ngagunya lini.” 
41_12_1_Wayeseqala ukukhuluma kubo ngemifanekiso, ethi: “Umuntu watshala isivini, wasibiyela ngothango, wemba isikhamo, wakha isiqongo sokulinda, wasiqashisa kubalimi, waya kwelinye izwe. 
41_12_2_Ngenkathi efaneleyo wayesethuma inceku kubalimi ukuba ithathe kubalimi ezithelweni zesivini. 
41_12_3_Bayibamba, bayishaya, bayimukisa ze. 
41_12_4_Waphinda wathuma kubo enye inceku; yona bayilimaza ekhanda, bayithuka. 
41_12_5_Wathuma enye futhi; yona bayibulala, nezinye eziningi: ezinye bazishaya, ezinye bazibulala. 
41_12_6_“Kwase kusele umuntu munye, indodana ethandekayo; yona wayithuma kubo ekugcineni, ethi: ‘Bayakuyazisa indodana yami.’ 
41_12_7_“Kepha labo balimi bakhuluma bodwa, bathi: ‘Lo uyindlalifa; wozani siyibulale, ifa libe ngelethu.’ 
41_12_8_Base beyibamba bayibulala, bayiphonsa ngaphandle kwesivini. 
41_12_9_“Uzakwenzani umninisivini na? Uzakuza, ababhubhise labo balimi, isivini asinike abanye. 
41_12_10_Aniwufundanga yini lo mbhalo othi: “ ‘Itshe abalinqabayo abakhi lona laba yinhloko yegumbi; 
41_12_11_lona lavela eNkosini; liyisimangaliso emehlweni ethu,’ na?” 
41_12_12_Base befuna ukumbamba, kepha besaba isixuku; ngokuba bazi ukuthi ukhulume lo mfanekiso ngabo. Base bemshiya bamuka. 
41_12_13_Khona abanye babaFarisi nabakaHerode bathunyelwa kuye ukuba bamhile ngezwi. 
41_12_14_Beza bathi kuye: “Mfundisi, siyazi ukuthi uqinisile nokuthi awukhathali ngamuntu, ngokuba awubheki ubuso babantu, kodwa indlela kaNkulunkulu uyifundisa ngeqiniso. Kuvunyelwe ukuthela kuKesari noma qha? Sithele nokuba singatheli na?” 
41_12_15_Kepha yena ekwazi ukuzenzisa kwabo wathi kubo: “Ningilingelani na? Lethani kimi udenariyu, ngimbone.” 
41_12_16_Bamletha. Wayesethi kubo: “Ngokabani lo mfanekiso nalo mbhalo na?” Bathi kuye: “NgokaKesari.” 
41_12_17_UJesu wathi kubo: “Nikani uKesari okukaKesari, noNkulunkulu okukaNkulunkulu.” Bamangala ngaye. 
41_12_18_Khona kwafika kuye abaSadusi abathi akukho ukuvuka kwabafileyo, bambuza bathi: 
41_12_19_“Mfundisi, uMose wasilobela ukuthi, uma kufa umfowabo womuntu, eshiya umkakhe engashiyi mntwana, umfowabo makamthathe umkakhe, amvusele umfowabo inzalo. 
41_12_20_Kwakukhona izelamani eziyisikhombisa, owokuqala wathatha umfazi; wafa engashiyanga nzalo. 
41_12_21_Nowesibili wamthatha; naye wafa engashiyanga nzalo; kanjalo nowesithathu. 
41_12_22_Abayisikhombisa kabashiyanga nzalo. Ekugcineni kwabo bonke kwafa nomfazi. 
41_12_23_Ekuvukeni mhla bevukayo uyakuba ngumkabani kubo, lokhu abayisikhombisa babe naye engumkabo, na?” 
41_12_24_UJesu wathi kubo: “Angithi nidukile ngenxa yokuba ningayazi imibhalo namandla kaNkulunkulu na? 
41_12_25_Ngokuba mhla bevuka kwabafileyo abaganwa, abendiswa, kodwa banjengezingelosi ezulwini. 
41_12_26_Kepha maqondana nabafileyo ukuthi bayavuswa anifundanga yini encwadini kaMose ngesihlahla ukuthi uNkulunkulu wakhuluma kuye, wathi: ‘NginguNkulunkulu ka-Abrahama, noNkulunkulu ka-Isaka, noNkulunkulu kaJakobe,’ na? 
41_12_27_Akasiye uNkulunkulu wabafileyo kodwa owabaphilayo. Nidukile kakhulu.” 
41_12_28_Kwase kusondela omunye wababhali owayebezwile bebuzana, eqonda ukuthi wayebaphendule kahle, wambuza wathi: “Ngumuphi umyalo wokuqala kuyo yonke na?” 
41_12_29_UJesu waphendula wathi: “Owokuqala ngowokuthi: ‘Yizwa, iNkosi uNkulunkulu wethu, iNkosi, yinye. 
41_12_30_Woyithanda iNkosi, uNkulunkulu wakho ngayo yonke inhliziyo yakho, nangawo wonke umphefumulo wakho, nangayo yonke ingqondo yakho, nangawo onke amandla akho.’ 
41_12_31_Owesibili yilo: ‘Womthanda umakhelwame wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena.’ Awukho omunye umyalo omkhulu kunale.” 
41_12_32_Umbhali wayesethi kuye: “Yebo, Mfundisi, ushilo ngeqiniso ukuthi yinye, ayikho enye ngaphandle kwayo; 
41_12_33_futhi ukuyithanda yona ngenhliziyo yonke, nangengqondo yonke, nangamandla onke, nokuthanda umakhelwane njengalokhu umuntu ezithanda yena kudlula yonke iminikelo yokushiswa nemihlatshelo.” 
41_12_34_UJesu embona ukuthi uphendule ngokuqonda, wathi kuye: “Awukude nombuso kaNkulunkulu.” Akwabe kusabakho onesibindi sokumbuza. 
41_12_35_Khona uJesu efundisa ethempelini wabuza wathi: “Basho kanjani ababhali ukuthi uKristu uyindodana kaDavide na? 
41_12_36_UDavide uqobo lwakhe washo ngoMoya oNgcwele ukuthi: “ ‘INkosi yathi eNkosini yami: “Hlala ngakwesokunene sami, ngize ngibeke izitha zakho phansi kwezinyawo zakho.” ’ 
41_12_37_“UDavide uqobo lwakhe umbiza ngokuthi iNkosi. Pho, uyindodana yakhe kanjani na?” Isixuku esikhulu sasimuzwa ngokujabula. 
41_12_38_Ekufundiseni kwakhe wathi: “Xwayani ababhali abathanda ukuhamba bembethe izingubo ezinde, nokubingelelwa ezigcawini, 
41_12_39_nezihlalo eziphambili emasinagogeni, nezindawo ezingenhla ekudleni, 
41_12_40_abadla izindlu zabafelokazi, bekhuleka isikhathi eside ngokuzenzisa; laba bayakwamukeliswa ukulahlwa okukhulu.” 
41_12_41_Wayesehlala phansi maqondana nomphongolo womnikelo, wabuka isixuku sibeka umnikelo emphongolweni. Abaningi abacebileyo babeka kakhulu. 
41_12_42_Kwase kufika umfelokazi ompofu wabeka amafadingi amabili okuyisitebela. 
41_12_43_Wayesebabiza abafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lo mfelokazi ompofu ubekile kakhulu kunabo bonke ababeke emphongolweni, 
41_12_44_ngokuba bonke babeka kokuchichimileyo kwabo, kepha yena ebumpofini bakhe ubeke konke anakho, konke abephila ngakho.” 
41_13_1_Kuthe ephuma ethempelini, omunye wabafundi bakhe wathi kuye: “Mfundisi, bheka amatshe anjani nezakhiwo ezinjani!” 
41_13_2_UJesu wathi kuye: “Uyabona lezi zakhiwo ezinkulu na? Akuyikushiywa itshe phezu kwetshe elingayikudilizelwa phansi.” 
41_13_3_Esahlezi eNtabeni Yeminqumo maqondana nethempeli, oPetru noJakobe noJohane no-Andreya bambuza bebodwa, 
41_13_4_bathi: “Sitshele ukuthi lokhu kuyakuba nini, nesibonakaliso siyakuba yini, lapho sekuyakufezeka konke lokhu, na?” 
41_13_5_Khona uJesu waqala ukukhuluma kubo, ethi: “Qaphelani ningadukiswa muntu. 
41_13_6_Kuyakuza abaningi ngegama lami, bathi: ‘Nginguye,’ badukise abaningi. 
41_13_7_Nxa nizwa izimpi namahemuhemu ezimpi, ningethuki; kumelwe ukuba kwenzeke, kepha ukuphela koba kungakafiki. 
41_13_8_Ngokuba isizwe siyakuvukela isizwe, nombuso uvukele umbuso; kuyakuba khona ukuzamazama komhlaba izindawo ngezindawo, kube khona indlala; lokhu kungukuqala kwemihelo. 
41_13_9_“Kepha ziqapheleni nina. Bayakunikhaphela emiphakathini; niyakushaywa emasinagogeni; niyakumiswa phambi kwababusi namakhosi ngenxa yami, kube ngubufakazi kubo. 
41_13_10_Kepha ivangeli limelwe ukushunyayelwa kuqala ezizweni zonke. 
41_13_11_Uma beniqhuba, benikhaphela, ningakhathaleli ngaphambili eniyakukukhuluma, kodwa lokho eniyakukunikwa ngaleso sikhathi, kukhulumeni; ngokuba kakunina enikhulumayo kodwa nguMoya oNgcwele. 
41_13_12_“Khona umuntu uyakukhaphela umfowabo ekufeni noyise umntanakhe, yebo, abantwana bayakuvukela abazali babo, bababulale. 
41_13_13_Niyakuzondwa yibo bonke ngenxa yegama lami, kodwa okhuthazelayo kuze kube sekupheleni nguyena oyakusindiswa. 
41_13_14_“Kepha nxa nibona amanyala encithakalo emi lapho kungafanele khona — ofundayo makaqaphele — khona abaseJudiya mababalekele ezintabeni, 
41_13_15_ophezu kwendlu angehli, angangeni ukuyothatha utho endlini yakhe, 
41_13_16_osensimini angabuyeli emuva ukuyothatha ingubo yakhe. 
41_13_17_Kepha maye kwabakhulelweyo nabancelisayo ngalezo zinsuku! 
41_13_18_Khulekani ukuba kungabi sebusika. 
41_13_19_Ngokuba lezo zinsuku ziyakuba nosizi olungazange lube khona olunjalo kwasekuqaleni kokudalwa akudalayo uNkulunkulu kuze kube manje, nolungasayikuba khona. 
41_13_20_Uma iNkosi ibingazifinyezi lezo zinsuku, bekungesindiswe muntu, kepha ngenxa yabakhethiweyo eyabakhetha yazifinyeza lezo zinsuku. 
41_13_21_Khona-ke uma umuntu ethi kini: ‘Bhekani, nangu uKristu,’ noma: ‘Bhekani, nanguya,’ ningakholwa. 
41_13_22_Ngokuba kuyakuvela okristu bamanga nabaprofethi bamanga, benze izibonakaliso nezimangaliso, ukuze badukise abakhethiweyo, uma kungenzeka. 
41_13_23_Kepha qaphelani nina; senginitshele konke ngaphambili. 
41_13_24_“Kodwa ngalezo zinsuku emva kwalolo sizi ilanga liyakufiphazwa, nenyanga ayiyikukhanya, 
41_13_25_nezinkanyezi ziyakuwa ezulwini, namandla asezulwini ayakuzanyazanyiswa. 
41_13_26_Khona-ke bayakubona iNdodana yomuntu iza emafwini, inamandla amakhulu nenkazimulo. 
41_13_27_Lapho iyakuthuma izingelosi, iqoqe abakhethiweyo bayo emimoyeni yomine, kusukela emkhawulweni womhlaba kuze kube semkhawulweni wezulu. 
41_13_28_“Fundani umfanekiso emkhiwaneni; nxa igatsha lawo selithamba, lihlume amaqabunga, niyazi ukuthi ihlobo seliseduze. 
41_13_29_Kanjalo nani, nxa nibona lokhu kwenzeka, yazini ukuthi iseduze ngasemnyango. 
41_13_30_Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lesi sizukulwane asiyikudlula, kungakenzeki konke lokhu. 
41_13_31_Kuyakudlula izulu nomhlaba, kepha amazwi ami awayikudlula. 
41_13_32_“Kepha lolo suku nalelo hora akakho owazi lutho ngalo, nazingelosi ezulwini, naNdodana, nguBaba kuphela. 
41_13_33_Qaphelani, nilinde, ngokuba anisazi isikhathi ukuthi siyakuba nini. 
41_13_34_Kunjengomuntu owahambela kwelinye izwe; washiya indlu yakhe, wanika izinceku zakhe amandla, yileyo naleyo wayinika umsebenzi wayo, wayala umlindisango ukuba alinde. 
41_13_35_“Ngakho lindani, ngokuba anazi ukuthi inkosi yendlu iyakufika nini, noma ngokuhlwa, noma phakathi kobusuku, noma ngokukhala kwezinkuku, noma ekuseni, 
41_13_36_funa ifike ngokuzuma, inifumane nilele. 
41_13_37_Kepha lokhu engikusho kini ngikusho kubo bonke, ngithi: ‘Lindani.’ ” 
41_14_1_Emva kwezinsuku ezimbili kwaba khona iPhasika nomkhosi wesinkwa esingenamvubelo; abapristi abakhulu nababhali bafuna isu lokumbamba ngobuqili, bambulale. 
41_14_2_Ngakho bathi: “Makungabi ngomkhosi, kungaze kube khona isiyaluyalu esizweni.” 
41_14_3_Kwathi eseBethaniya endlini kaSimoni owayenochoko, ehlezi ekudleni, kwafika owesifazane ephethe umfuma we-alabaste wamafutha enadi lodwa elibiza kakhulu; wachoboza umfuma wathela amafutha ekhanda lakhe. 
41_14_4_Kepha kwakukhona abanye abakhuluma bodwa ngokuthukuthela, bethi: “Kwenzelweni lokho kuchithwa kwamafutha na? 
41_14_5_Ngokuba lawa mafutha nga ethengisiwe ngawodenariyu abangaphezu kwamakhulu amathathu, kwaphiwa abampofu.” Bamthukuthelela kakhulu. 
41_14_6_Kepha uJesu wathi: “Myekeni; nimhluphelani na? Usebenzile umsebenzi omuhle kimi. 
41_14_7_Ngokuba abampofu ninabo njalo; nanini, uma nithanda, ningabenzela okuhle: kepha mina aninami njalo. 
41_14_8_Wenzile abengakwenza; wandulele ukuwugcobela umzimba wami ukumbelwa. 
41_14_9_Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Nomaphi lapho liyakushunyayelwa khona ivangeli ezweni lonke, kuyakukhulunywa nangalokho akwenzileyo, kube yisikhumbuzo ngaye.” 
41_14_10_UJuda Iskariyothe, omunye wabayishumi nambili, wayeseya kubapristi abakhulu ukuba amkhaphele kubo. 
41_14_11_Sebezwile bathokoza, bathembisa ukumnika imali. Wayesefuna ithuba lokumkhaphela. 
41_14_12_Ngosuku lokuqala lwesinkwa esingenamvubelo okwakuhlatshwa ngalo iphasika abafundi bakhe bathi kuye: “Uthanda ukuba siye silungiselephi ukuba udle iphasika na?” 
41_14_13_Wayesethuma ababili kubafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Hambani niye emzini; khona nizakuhlangana nomuntu othwele imbiza yamanzi; mlandeleni. 
41_14_14_Lapho engena khona, anothi kumninindlu: ‘Uthi uMfundisi: Iphi indlu yami, lapho ngingadlela khona iphasika nabafundi bami, na?’ 
41_14_15_Yena uzakunikhombisa ikamelo elikhulu eliphezulu, elendlelweyo, lilungisiwe; silungiseleni khona.” 
41_14_16_Bahamba abafundi bafika emzini, bafumana kunjengokusho kwakhe kubo; base belungisa iphasika. 
41_14_17_Kusihlwa wafika nabayishumi nambili. 
41_14_18_Sebehlezi ekudleni, uJesu wathi: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Omunye kini, odla nami, uzakungikhaphela.” 
41_14_19_Baqala ukudabuka, bathi kuye ngamunye: “Kungaba yimi na?” 
41_14_20_Wathi kubo: “Ngomunye wabayishumi nambili, okha kanye nami esitsheni. 
41_14_21_INdodana yomuntu iyamuka kambe njengokulotshiwe ngayo, kepha maye kulowo muntu iNdodana yomuntu ekhashelwa ngaye! Nga kukuhle kulowo muntu ukuba kazalwanga.” 
41_14_22_Kwathi besadla, uJesu wathabatha isinkwa, wasibusisa, wasihlephula, wabanika, wathi: “Thabathani nidle; lokhu kungumzimba wami.” 
41_14_23_Wayesethabatha isitsha, wabonga, wabanika; baphuza kuso bonke. 
41_14_24_Wathi kubo: “Lokhu kuyigazi lami lesivumelwano elithululwa ngenxa yabaningi. 
41_14_25_Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Angisayikuphuza okwesithelo somvini, kuze kufike lolo suku engiyakusiphuza ngalo sisisha embusweni kaNkulunkulu.” 
41_14_26_Kwathi sebehlabelele igama lokubonga, baphuma baya eNtabeni Yeminqumo. 
41_14_27_UJesu wathi kubo: “Nonke nizakukhubeka, ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi: ‘Ngiyakushaya umalusi, izimvu zihlakazeke.’ 
41_14_28_Kepha emva kokuvuswa kwami ngiyakunandulela ukuya eGalile.” 
41_14_29_UPetru wathi kuye: “Noma beyakukhubeka bonke, hhayi mina.” 
41_14_30_UJesu wathi kuye: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Namhlanje ngalobu busuku, lingakakhali kabili iqhude, uzakungiphika kathathu.” 
41_14_31_Kepha waqinisa ngamandla, wathi: “Noma ngingaze ngife nawe, angisoze ngakuphika.” Basho njalo bonke. 
41_14_32_Bafika endaweni ethiwa iGetsemane; wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Hlalani lapha, ngisaya kukhuleka.” 
41_14_33_Wathatha oPetru noJakobe noJohane, waqala ukuba novalo nosizi. 
41_14_34_Wathi kubo: “Umphefumulo wami ulusizi kakhulu kuze kube sekufeni; hlalani lapha, nilinde.” 
41_14_35_Waqhubeka ingcosana, wawa phansi, wakhuleka ukuba, uma kungenzeka, kudlule kuye lo mzuzu. 
41_14_36_Wathi: “Aba, Baba, konke kungenzeka kuwe; ake ususe kimi lesi sitsha, kepha kungabi njengokuba ngithanda mina, kodwa njengokuba uthanda wena.” 
41_14_37_Wayeseza, wabafumana belele; wathi kuPetru: “Simoni, ulele na? Ubungelinde ihora libe linye na? 
41_14_38_Lindani, nikhuleke ukuba ningangeni ekulingweni; umoya uyavuma, kepha inyama ibuthakathaka.” 
41_14_39_Wabuye wasuka waya kukhuleka, esho lona lelo zwi. 
41_14_40_Esebuya futhi wabafumana belele, ngokuba amehlo abo ayenzima; babengazi ukuthi bazakumphendula ngokuthini. 
41_14_41_Weza ngokwesithathu, wathi kubo: “Nisalele namanje niphumula. Kwanele, ihora lifikile; bhekani, iNdodana yomuntu isiyakhashelwa ezandleni zezoni. 
41_14_42_Sukumani sihambe. Bhekani, ongikhaphelayo usesondele.” 
41_14_43_Khona masinyane esakhuluma, kwafika uJuda, omunye wabayishumi nambili, enesixuku esinezinkemba nezinduku, sivela kubapristi abakhulu nababhali namalunga. 
41_14_44_Kepha omkhaphelayo wayebanike isiboniso sokuthi: “Lowo engiyakumanga, nguye; mbambeni, nihambe naye, nimqinise.” 
41_14_45_Esefikile wasondela kuye masinyane, wathi: “Rabi!” Wamanga. 
41_14_46_Base bembeka izandla, bambamba. 
41_14_47_Omunye kwababemi khona wahosha inkemba, wayigenca inceku yompristi omkhulu, wayinquma indlebe. 
41_14_48_UJesu wathatha wathi kubo: “Niphumile kungathi nize kumphangi, niphethe izinkemba nezinduku ukungibamba. 
41_14_49_Benginani imihla ngemihla ethempelini ngifundisa, anangibamba; kepha nga kugcwaliseka imibhalo.” 
41_14_50_Bamshiya bonke, babaleka. 
41_14_51_Insizwa ethile yamlandela yembethe indwangu nje emzimbeni; bayibamba. 
41_14_52_Yayisiyishiya indwangu, yabaleka ze. 
41_14_53_Base bemusa uJesu kumpristi omkhulu; kwabuthana bonke abapristi abakhulu namalunga nababhali. 
41_14_54_UPetru wamlandela ekude, waze wangena egcekeni lompristi omkhulu; wayehlezi kanye nezikhonzi otha umlilo. 
41_14_55_Abapristi abakhulu nomphakathi wonke bafuna ubufakazi ngoJesu ukuba bambulale, kepha ababufumananga. 
41_14_56_Ngokuba abaningi bafakaza amanga ngaye, kepha ubufakazi babo abuhlangananga. 
41_14_57_Kwasukuma abathile, bafakaza amanga ngaye, bathi: 
41_14_58_“Thina simzwile ethi: ‘Ngiyakulidiliza leli thempeli elenziwe ngezandla, ngakhe ngezinsuku ezintathu elinye elingenziwe ngezandla.’ ” 
41_14_59_Nakuba kunjalo ubufakazi babo abuhlangananga. 
41_14_60_Kwase kusukuma umpristi omkhulu phakathi kwabo, wambuza uJesu, wathi: “Awuphenduli lutho na? Kuyini abakufakaza ngawe laba na?” 
41_14_61_Kepha wathula, akaphendula lutho. Umpristi omkhulu wabuye wambuza, wathi kuye: “UnguKristu, iNdodana yoBongekayo na?” 
41_14_62_Wathi uJesu: “Nginguye. Niyakubona iNdodana yomuntu ihlezi ngakwesokunene saMandla, iza ngamafu ezulu.” 
41_14_63_Khona umpristi omkhulu waklebhula izingubo zakhe, wathi: “Sisaswelelani ofakazi na? 
41_14_64_Senikuzwile ukuhlambalaza; nithini na?” Bamlahla bonke ngokuthi ufanele ukufa. 
41_14_65_Abanye base beqala ukumkhafulela ngamathe nokumgubuzela ubuso nokumdushuza, bathi kuye: “Profetha.” Nezikhonzi zamthatha zammukula. 
41_14_66_UPetru esesegcekeni ngaphansi, kwafika enye yamantombazana ompristi omkhulu, 
41_14_67_yambona uPetru otha, yambheka, yathi: “Nawe ubunoJesu waseNazaretha.” 
41_14_68_Kepha waphika wathi: “Angikwazi, yebo, angikuzwisisi okushoyo;” waphumela enkundleni; lakhala iqhude. 
41_14_69_Intombazana imbona yabuye yaqala ukusho kwababemi khona ukuthi: “Lona ungomunye wabo.” 
41_14_70_Kepha waphinda waphika. Emva kwesikhashana futhi ababemi khona bathi kuPetru: “Nempela ungomunye wabo, ngokuba ungowaseGalile.” 
41_14_71_Wayeseqala ukuthuka nokufunga, ethi: “Angimazi lowo muntu enikhuluma ngaye.” 
41_14_72_Lase likhala masinyane iqhude ngokwesibili. UPetru wayesekhumbula izwi abelishilo kuye uJesu lokuthi: “Iqhude lingakakhali kabili, uzakungiphika kathathu;” wakhala nokukhala izinyembezi. 
41_15_1_Kwathi masinyane ekuseni abapristi abakhulu namalunga nababhali nomphakathi wonke benza icebo, bambopha uJesu, bamqhuba, bamnikela kuPilatu. 
41_15_2_UPilatu wambuza wathi: “Wena uyinkosi yabaJuda na?” Waphendula, wathi kuye: “Usho khona.” 
41_15_3_Abapristi abakhulu bammangalela ngokuningi. 
41_15_4_UPilatu wabuye wambuza, wathi: “Awuphenduli lutho na? Bheka, bakuthwesa icala ngokuningi kangaka.” 
41_15_5_Kodwa uJesu akabe esaphendula lutho, waze wamangala uPilatu. 
41_15_6_Kwathi ngomkhosi wayehleze ebakhululela isiboshwa sibe sinye abasicelayo. 
41_15_7_Kwakukhona-ke omunye, nguBaraba igama lakhe, owayeboshiwe kanye namahlubuka; wona ayebulele umuntu ekuhlubukeni. 
41_15_8_Isixuku senyuka, saqala ukucela ukuba abenzele njengalokho ebehleze ebenzela. 
41_15_9_Kepha uPilatu wabaphendula wathi: “Nithanda ukuba nginikhululele inkosi yabaJuda na?” 
41_15_10_Ngokuba wayekwazi ukuthi abapristi abakhulu bamnikele ngomhawu. 
41_15_11_Kepha abapristi abakhulu babhebhezela isixuku ukuba okungcono asikhululele uBaraba. 
41_15_12_UPilatu wabuye waphendula, wathi kubo: “Pho-ke, ngimenzenjani lo enithi uyinkosi yabaJuda na?” 
41_15_13_Babuye bamemeza, bathi: “Mbethele esiphambanweni!” 
41_15_14_Kodwa uPilatu wathi kubo: “Ngokuba wenze bubi buni na?” Kepha bamemeza kakhulu, bathi: “Mbethele esiphambanweni!” 
41_15_15_Khona uPilatu ethanda ukudelisa isixuku wasikhululela uBaraba, kepha wamshaya uJesu, wamnikela ukuba abethelwe esiphambanweni. 
41_15_16_Amabutho ayesemngenisa phakathi endlini ethiwa iPretoriyu, abizela ndawonye ibutho lonke. 
41_15_17_Ayesemembathisa ingubo ebubende, amcwashelisa ngomqhele ayeweluke ngameva. 
41_15_18_Aqala ukumkhulekela, athi: “Bayede, nkosi yabaJuda!” 
41_15_19_Amshaya ekhanda ngomhlanga, amkhafulela ngamathe, aguqa ngamadolo, akhuleka kuye. 
41_15_20_Esembhinqile amhlubula ingubo ebubende, amembathisa izingubo zakhe. Ayesephuma naye ukuba ambethele esiphambanweni. 
41_15_21_Acindezela umuntu obedlula, uSimoni waseKhurene, evela endle, uyise ka-Aleksandru noRufu, ukuba athwale isiphambano sakhe. 
41_15_22_Ayesemyisa endaweni yaseGolgotha okungukuthi ngokuhunyushwa iNdawo Yekhanda. 
41_15_23_Amnika iwayini elixutshwe nemure; kepha akalamukelanga. 
41_15_24_Ayesembethela esiphambanweni, abelana izingubo zakhe, enzelana inkatho ngazo ukuthi yilowo nalowo uyakuthathani. 
41_15_25_Kwakuyihora lesithathu esembethela esiphambanweni. 
41_15_26_Umbhalo wecala lakhe ubulotshiwe ngaphezulu wokuthi: INKOSI YABAJUDA. 
41_15_27_Kwabethelwa kanye naye abaphangi ababili, omunye ngakwesokunene nomunye ngakwesokhohlo sakhe. 
41_15_28_Kwase kugcwaliseka umbhalo othi: “Wabalwa kanye naboni.” 
41_15_29_Abadlulayo bamhlambalaza benikina amakhanda abo, bathi: “Eya wena odiliza ithempeli, ubuye ulakhe ngezinsuku ezintathu; 
41_15_30_zisindise, wehle esiphambanweni.” 
41_15_31_Kanjalo nabapristi abakhulu bambhinqa bebodwa kanye nababhali, bathi: “Wasindisa abanye, angezisindise yena. 
41_15_32_UKristu, iNkosi yakwa-Israyeli, makehle manje esiphambanweni, ukuze sibone, sikholwe.” Nababebethelwe kanye naye bamdumaza. 
41_15_33_Sekufikile ihora lesithupha kwaba mnyama emhlabeni wonke, kwaze kwaba yihora lesishiyagalolunye. 
41_15_34_Ngehora lesishiyagalolunye uJesu wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu, wathi: “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaktani?” okungukuthi ngokuhunyushwa: “Nkulunkulu wami, Nkulunkulu wami, ungishiyeleni na?” 
41_15_35_Abanye kwababemi khona bekuzwa bathi: “Bheka, ubiza u-Eliya.” 
41_15_36_Wayesegijima omunye, wagcwalisa ilula ngoviniga, walichoma emhlangeni, wamphuzisa, wathi: “Yekani, sibone uma u-Eliya eza ukumehlisa.” 
41_15_37_UJesu wayesememeza ngezwi elikhulu, wafa. 
41_15_38_Khona isihenqo sethempeli sadabuka kabili, kusukela phezulu kuze kufike phansi. 
41_15_39_Kepha induna yekhulu eyayimi maqondana naye imbona efa ngokunjalo, yathi: “Nempela lo muntu ube yiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.” 
41_15_40_Kwakukhona nabesifazane bebukela, bekude; phakathi kwabo kwakukhona noMariya Magdalena, noMariya unina kaJakobe omncane nokaJose, kanye noSalome 
41_15_41_ababemlandela eseseGalile, bemkhonza, nabanye abesifazane abaningi abenyukela naye eJerusalema. 
41_15_42_Kwathi ukuba kuhlwe, ngokuba kwakulusuku lokulungisela okungukuthi olwandulela isabatha, 
41_15_43_kwafika uJosefa wase-Arimatheya, ilunga elidumileyo lomphakathi, owayewubheka naye umbuso kaNkulunkulu; wangena ngesibindi kuPilatu, wacela isidumbu sikaJesu. 
41_15_44_Kepha uPilatu wamangala ngokuthi ngabe usefile, wabiza induna yekhulu, wabuza kuyo ukuthi sekukade efile na? 
41_15_45_Esezwile enduneni yekhulu wamnika uJosefa isidumbu. 
41_15_46_Wathenga indwangu enhle, wamehlisa, wamsonga ngaleyo ndwangu, wambeka ethuneni elaliqoshwe edwaleni, wagingqela itshe emnyango wethuna. 
41_15_47_OMariya Magdalena noMariya unina kaJose babona lapho abekwa khona. 
41_16_1_Selidlulile isabatha, oMariya Magdalena, noMariya unina kaJakobe, noSalome bathenga amakha ukuba beze bamgcobe. 
41_16_2_Ekuseni kakhulu ngosuku lokuqala lweviki beza ethuneni ekuphumeni kwelanga. 
41_16_3_Bakhuluma bodwa, bathi: “Ngubani oyakusigingqela itshe, lisuke emnyango wethuna na?” 
41_16_4_Bathi ukubheka, babona ukuthi itshe seligingqiwe; ngokuba lalilikhulu kakhulu. 
41_16_5_Kuthe bengena ethuneni, babona insizwa ihlezi ngakwesokunene yembethe ingubo ende emhlophe; bethuka. 
41_16_6_Kepha yathi kubo: “Ningethuki; nifuna uJesu waseNazaretha obebethelwe esiphambanweni; uvukile; kakho lapha; bhekani nansi indawo lapho bebembeke khona. 
41_16_7_Kodwa hambani nitshele abafundi bakhe kanye noPetru ukuthi uyanandulela ukuya eGalile; nizakumbona lapho, njengalokho eshilo kini.” 
41_16_8_Base bephuma, babaleka ethuneni, ngokuba babefikelwe ngukuthuthumela nokumangala, kabashongo lutho kumuntu, ngokuba babesaba. 
41_16_9_Esevukile, kusekuseni ngosuku lokuqala lweviki, wabonakala kuqala kuMariya Magdalena ayekhiphe kuye amademoni ayisikhombisa. 
41_16_10_Yena wahamba wababikela labo ababe naye uJesu, besalila bekhala. 
41_16_11_Kwathi bona sebezwile ukuthi uyaphila nokuthi uboniwe nguye, abaze bakholwa. 
41_16_12_Emva kwalokho wabonakala ngesinye isimo kwababili kubo behamba beya emaphandleni. 
41_16_13_Nabo bahamba babikela abanye; nalabo abaze bakholwa. 
41_16_14_Ngasemuva wabonakala kwabayishumi nanye behlezi ekudleni, wabasola ngokungakholwa kwabo nangobulukhuni benhliziyo yabo, ngokuba bengakholwanga yilabo abambonileyo esevukile. 
41_16_15_Wayesethi kubo: “Hambani niye ezweni lonke, nishumayele ivangeli kukho konke okudaliweyo. 
41_16_16_Okholwayo abhapathizwe uyakusindiswa, kepha ongakholwayo uyakulahlwa. 
41_16_17_Lezi zibonakaliso ziyakubalandela abakholwayo: ngegama lami bayakukhipha amademoni, bashumayele ngezilimi ezintsha, 
41_16_18_baphathe izinyoka; uma bephuza okubulalayo, akusoze kwaba nangozi; bayakubeka izandla phezu kwabagulayo, basinde.” 
41_16_19_Njalo-ke iNkosi uJesu isikhulumile kubo yakhushulelwa ezulwini, yahlala ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu. 
41_16_20_Kepha bona bephuma bashumayela ezindaweni zonke, iNkosi isebenza nabo, iqinisa izwi ngezibonakaliso ezilandelayo. 
42_1_1_Njengokuba abaningi sebezamile ukulanda ngokuhlelekile ngalezo zindaba ezigcwaliseke phakathi kwethu, 
42_1_2_njengalokho basinika zona labo ababekhona kwasekuqaleni, bezibonela ngamehlo, beyizikhonzi zezwi, 
42_1_3_kwasengathi kuhle nakimina, lokhu ngizihlolisisile zonke izinto, kusukela ekuqaleni, ngikulobele ngokulandelana, Theyofilu odumileyo, 
42_1_4_ukuze wazi ukuqiniseka kwalezo zindaba ozifundisiweyo. 
42_1_5_Emihleni kaHerode inkosi yaseJudiya kwakukhona umpristi othile ogama lakhe nguZakariya, esigabeni sika-Abiya, nomkakhe engowamadodakazi ka-Aroni, igama lakhe ngu-Elisabethe. 
42_1_6_Babelungile bobabili phambi kukaNkulunkulu behamba ngayo yonke imiyalo nezimiso zeNkosi, bengasoleki. 
42_1_7_Kepha babengenamntwana, ngokuba u-Elisabethe wayeyinyumba; bobabili base bekhulile. 
42_1_8_Kwathi-ke esayenza inkonzo yobupristi phambi kukaNkulunkulu njengokuhlelwa kwesikhathi sesigaba sakubo, 
42_1_9_ngokomthetho wobupristi kwaba nguye owabelwa ukungena ethempelini leNkosi, azoshisa impepho. 
42_1_10_Isixuku sonke sabantu sasikhuleka ngaphandle ngesikhathi sempepho. 
42_1_11_Kwabonakala kuye ingelosi yeNkosi imi ngakwesokunene se-altare lempepho. 
42_1_12_UZakariya eyibona wethuka, wehlelwa luvalo. 
42_1_13_Kepha ingelosi yathi kuye: “Ungesabi, Zakariya, ngokuba isicelo sakho sizwakele; umkakho u-Elisabethe uzakukuzalela indodana, uyiqambe igama lokuthi uJohane. 
42_1_14_Uzakuba nokujabula nokuthokoza wena; nabaningi bazakujabula ngokuzalwa kwakhe. 
42_1_15_Ngokuba uzakuba mkhulu emehlweni eNkosi; kasoze waphuza iwayini nophuzo oludakisayo; uzakugcwaliswa nguMoya oNgcwele esesesiswini sikanina. 
42_1_16_Abaningi kubantwana bakwa-Israyeli uyakubaphendulela eNkosini uNkulunkulu wabo. 
42_1_17_Uyakuhamba ngaphambi kwayo emoyeni nasemandleni ka-Eliya ukuphendulela izinhliziyo zawoyise kubantwana nabangalaleliyo ekuqondeni kwabalungileyo, ukulungisela iNkosi isizwe esilungiselweyo.” 
42_1_18_UZakariya wathi engelosini: “Ngiyakukwazi ngani lokhu na? Ingani sengiyindoda endala mina, nomkami uqhubekile ezinsukwini zakhe.” 
42_1_19_Ingelosi yaphendula, yathi kuye: “NginguGabriyeli mina, omiyo phambi kukaNkulunkulu; ngithunyiwe ukuba ngikhulume kuwe, ngikubikele lezi zindaba ezinhle. 
42_1_20_Bheka-ke, uzakuba yisimungulu, ungakwazi ukukhuluma kuze kube lusuku okwenzeka ngalo lokhu, ngokuba ungakholwanga ngamazwi ami azakugcwaliseka ngesikhathi sawo.” 
42_1_21_Abantu bemlindele uZakariya bamangala ngokulibala kwakhe ethempelini. 
42_1_22_Kuthe esephuma, wahluleka ukukhuluma kubo; bazi ukuthi ubone umbono ethempelini; wayelokhu ebaqhweba, wahlala eyisimungulu. 
42_1_23_Kwathi seziphelile izinsuku zokukhonza kwakhe, wamuka waya ekhaya. 
42_1_24_Kepha emva kwalezo zinsuku u-Elisabethe umkakhe wakhulelwa, wazifihla izinyanga eziyisihlanu, wathi: 
42_1_25_“Yenze njalo iNkosi kimi emihleni eyangibheka ngayo ukususa ihlazo lami phakathi kwabantu.” 
42_1_26_Ngenyanga yesithupha ingelosi uGabriyeli yathunywa nguNkulunkulu emzini waseGalile ogama lawo yiNazaretha, 
42_1_27_entombini eyayimiselwe indoda ebizo layo nguJosefa wendlu kaDavide; ibizo lentombi nguMariya. 
42_1_28_Yangena ingelosi kuye, yathi: “E wena ophiwe umusa! INkosi inawe; ubusisiwe esifazaneni.” 
42_1_29_Kepha yena wethuka ngezwi layo ezindla ngokuthi kungaba ngukubingelela kuni lokhu. 
42_1_30_Ingelosi yathi kuye: “Ungesabi, Mariya, ngokuba ufumene umusa kuNkulunkulu. 
42_1_31_Bheka, uzakukhulelwa, uzale indodana, uyiqambe igama lokuthi uJesu. 
42_1_32_Yena uyakuba mkhulu, athiwe iNdodana yoPhezukonke; iNkosi uNkulunkulu iyakumnika isihlalo sobukhosi sikayise uDavide; 
42_1_33_uyakuba yinkosi yendlu kaJakobe kuze kube phakade, nombuso wakhe awuyikuba nakuphela.” 
42_1_34_UMariya wathi engelosini: “Lokhu kuyakwenzeka kanjani, njengokuba ngingayazi indoda na?” 
42_1_35_Ingelosi yaphendula, yathi kuye: “UMoya oNgcwele uzakuza phezu kwakho, amandla oPhezukonke akusibekele; ngakho-ke okungcwele okuzozalwa kuzakuthiwa iNdodana kaNkulunkulu. 
42_1_36_Bheka, u-Elisabethe isihlobo sakho naye ukhulelwe indodana esemdala; lena ngeyesithupha yakhe obethiwa inyumba. 
42_1_37_Ngokuba akukho lutho olungenzeke kuNkulunkulu.” 
42_1_38_UMariya wathi: “Bheka, ngiyincekukazi yeNkosi; akube kimi njengezwi lakho.” Ingelosi yamuka kuye. 
42_1_39_Ngalezo zinsuku uMariya wasuka waya ngokushesha kwelezintaba emzini wakwaJuda. 
42_1_40_Wangena endlini kaZakariya, wambingelela u-Elisabethe. 
42_1_41_Kwathi ukuba u-Elisabethe ezwe ukubingelela kukaMariya, umntwana waxhuma esiswini sakhe; u-Elisabethe wagcwala uMoya oNgcwele, 
42_1_42_wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu, wathi: “Ubusisiwe wena esifazaneni! Sibusisiwe nesithelo sesisu sakho! 
42_1_43_Ngehlelwe kanjani yilokhu ukuba unina weNkosi yami ahambele kimi na? 
42_1_44_Ngokuba bheka, kuthe izwi lokubingelela kwakho lifika ezindlebeni zami, umntwana waxhuma esiswini sami ngokujabula. 
42_1_45_Ubusisiwe owakholwayo, ngokuba kuzakuba khona ukufezeka kwalokho akutshelwa, kuvela eNkosini.” 
42_1_46_Wayesethi uMariya: “Umphefumulo wami uyayitusa Nkosi, 
42_1_47_nomoya wami uyathokoza kuNkulunkulu, uMsindisi wami, 
42_1_48_ngokuba ubhekile ubuphansi bencekukazi yakhe. Bheka, kusukela manje izizukulwane zonke ziyakuthi ngibusisiwe. 
42_1_49_Ngokuba uSomandla ungenzele izinto ezinkulu: igama lakhe lingcwele. 
42_1_50_Isihawu sakhe sikuzo izizukulwane ngezizukulwane kubo abamesabayo. 
42_1_51_Wenzile amandla ngengalo yakhe; uchithile abazidlayo ekuzidleni kwenhliziyo yabo. 
42_1_52_Uwisile amakhosi ezihlalweni, uphakamisile abantukazana. 
42_1_53_Abalambileyo ubasuthisile ngezinto ezinhle, abacebileyo ubamukise ze. 
42_1_54_Uyisizile inceku yakhe u-Israyeli, ukuze akhumbule isihawu, 
42_1_55_njengalokho akusho kokhokho bethu ku-Abrahama nenzalo yakhe kuze kube phakade.” 
42_1_56_UMariya wahlala naye kungathi izinyanga ezintathu, wabuyela ekhaya. 
42_1_57_Saphelela-ke isikhathi sika-Elisabethe sokuba abelethe; wazala indodana. 
42_1_58_Abakhelene naye nezihlobo zakhe bezwa ukuthi iNkosi yenze isihawu sayo saba sikhulu kuye, bathokoza naye. 
42_1_59_Kwathi ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili beza ukusoka umntwana, bamqamba ngegama likayise uZakariya. 
42_1_60_Unina wayesephendula ethi: “Qhabo, uzakuthiwa uJohane.” 
42_1_61_Bathi kuye: “Akakho noyedwa emndenini wakini obizwa ngalelo gama.” 
42_1_62_Bamqhweba uyise ukuthi ufuna ukumqamba ngaliphi. 
42_1_63_Wabiza isileti, waloba ukuthi. “NguJohane igama lakhe.” Bamangala bonke. 
42_1_64_Kwase kuvuleka umlomo wakhe khona lapho nolimi lwakhe, wakhuluma embonga uNkulunkulu. 
42_1_65_Bonke abakhelene nabo behlelwa ngukwesaba, bakhuluma ngazo zonke lezo zindaba kulo lonke lezintaba laseJudiya, 
42_1_66_nabo bonke abazizwayo bazigcina ezinhliziyweni zabo, bethi: “Kodwa lo mntwana uyakuba yini na?” Isandla seNkosi sasinaye. 
42_1_67_UZakariya uyise wagcwala uMoya oNgcwele, waprofetha wathi: 
42_1_68_“Mayibongwe iNkosi, uNkulunkulu ka-Israyeli, ngokuba ibahambele abantu bayo, yabenzela inkululeko. 
42_1_69_Yasivusela uphondo lwensindiso endlini kaDavide inceku yayo, 
42_1_70_njengalokho yakhuluma ngomlomo wabaprofethi bayo abangcwele basendulo, 
42_1_71_insindiso ezitheni zethu nasesandleni sabo bonke abasizondayo, 
42_1_72_ukwenzela okhokho bethu isihawu nokukhumbula isivumelwano sayo esingcwele, 
42_1_73_isifungo eyasifunga kubaba u-Abrahama, 
42_1_74_ukusinika ukuba sithi sikhululiwe esandleni sezitha zethu, siyikhonze singenakwesaba 
42_1_75_ngobungcwele nangokulunga phambi kwayo zonke izinsuku zethu. 
42_1_76_Nawe-ke mntwana, uyakuthiwa umprofethi woPhezukonke, ngokuba uyakuhamba phambi kweNkosi ukulungisa izindlela zayo 
42_1_77_ukunika abantu bayo ukuyazi insindiso ngokuthethelelwa kwezono zabo, 
42_1_78_ngemisesane yesihawu sikaNkulunkulu wethu esizakuhanjelwa ngayo ngukusa kwaphezulu, 
42_1_79_ukubakhanyisela abahlezi ebumnyameni nasethunzini lokufa nokuqondisa izinyawo zethu endleleni yokuthula.” 
42_1_80_Wakhula-ke umntwana, waba namandla emoyeni; wahlala ehlane kwaze kwaba lusuku lokubonakaliswa kwakhe ku-Israyeli. 
42_2_1_Kwathi ngalezo zinsuku kwaphuma isimemezelo kuKesari Awugustu sokuba kubalwe izwe lonke. 
42_2_2_Lokhu kubalwa kokuqala kwenziwa uKhureniyu engumbusi waseSiriya. 
42_2_3_Bonke baya kubalwa, yilowo nalowo emzini wakubo. 
42_2_4_Naye uJosefa wakhuphuka ephuma eGalile emzini waseNazaretha, waya eJudiya emzini kaDavide othiwa iBetlehema, ngokuba wayengowendlu nozalo lukaDavide, 
42_2_5_ukuyobalwa kanye noMariya owayemmiselwe ukuba abe ngumkakhe, ekhulelwe. 
42_2_6_Kwathi-ke beselapho, zaphelela izinsuku zokuba abelethe. 
42_2_7_Wazibula ngendodana, wayembesa, wayilalisa emkhombeni, ngokuba bantula indawo endlini yezihambi. 
42_2_8_Kwakukhona abelusi kulelo zwe ababehlezi endle, belinda umhlambi wabo ebusuku. 
42_2_9_Ingelosi yeNkosi yema phambi kwabo, inkazimulo yeNkosi yabakhanyisa nxazonke; besaba ngokwesaba okukhulu. 
42_2_10_Ingelosi yathi kubo: “Ningesabi; ngokuba bhekani, nginibikela izindaba ezinhle zokuthokoza okukhulu okuzakuba kubantu bonke, 
42_2_11_ukuthi nizalelwe namuhla uMsindisi onguKristu iNkosi emzini kaDavide. 
42_2_12_Nalokhu kuyisiboniso kini: niyakufumana umntwana embesiwe, elele emkhombeni.” 
42_2_13_Masinyane kwaba khona kanye nengelosi uquqaba lwebandla lasezulwini, lumdumisa uNkulunkulu, luthi: 
42_2_14_“Udumo kuNkulunkulu kweliphezulu, nokuthula emhlabeni kubantu abathokozelwa nguye.” 
42_2_15_Kwathi ukuba zimuke kubo izingelosi ziya ezulwini, abelusi bakhuluma bodwa, bathi: “Asihambe manje, size sifike eBetlehema, sibone leyo nto eyenzekileyo iNkosi esazisile yona.” 
42_2_16_Bephuthuma bafika, bafumanisa oMariya noJosefa, nomntwana olele emkhombeni. 
42_2_17_Sebebonile balanda ngalelo zwi ababetshelwe lona ngalowo mntwana. 
42_2_18_Bonke abezwayo bamangala ngokukhulunywe kubo ngabelusi. 
42_2_19_Kepha uMariya wagcina onke lawo mazwi ezindla ngawo enhliziyweni yakhe. 
42_2_20_Babuya-ke abelusi bemdumisa, bembonga uNkulunkulu ngakho konke abakuzwileyo nabakubonileyo, njengalokho kwakukhulunyiwe kubo. 
42_2_21_Kwathi seziphelile izinsuku eziyisishiyagalombili zokuba umntwana asokwe, igama lakhe lathiwa uJesu, elaliqanjiwe yingelosi, engakathatshathwa esiswini. 
42_2_22_Kwathi ukuba kuphelele izinsuku zokuhlanjululwa kwabo ngokomthetho kaMose, benyukela naye eJerusalema ukuba bammise phambi kweNkosi 
42_2_23_njengokulotshiwe emthethweni weNkosi ukuthi: “Konke okwesilisa okuyizibulo kuyakuthiwa okwahlukaniselwe iNkosi”, 
42_2_24_banikele ngomhlatshelo njengokushiwo emthethweni weNkosi: “Amahobhe amabili noma amaphuphu amabili amajuba.” 
42_2_25_Bheka, kwakukhona umuntu eJerusalema ogama lakhe linguSimeyoni; lo muntu wayelungile, emesaba uNkulunkulu, ebhekile induduzo ka-Israyeli; noMoya oNgcwele wayephezu kwakhe. 
42_2_26_Kwakubonakalisiwe kuye ngoMoya oNgcwele ukuthi akayikubona ukufa engakamboni uKristu weNkosi. 
42_2_27_Wafika ngoMoya ethempelini. Kwathi ukuba abazali balethe umntwana uJesu ethempelini ukuba benze kuye njengesiko lomthetho, 
42_2_28_wamamukela ngokumgona, wambonga uNkulunkulu, wathi: 
42_2_29_“Sale usumukisa ngokuthula inceku yakho, Somandla, njengezwi lakho, 
42_2_30_ngokuba amehlo ami abonile insindiso yakho 
42_2_31_oyilungisele ebusweni babantu bonke, 
42_2_32_ukukhanya kokwambulela abezizwe nenkazimulo yesizwe sakho u-Israyeli.” 
42_2_33_Uyise nonina bamangala ngalokho okukhulunywa ngaye. 
42_2_34_USimeyoni wababusisa, wathi kuMariya unina: “Bheka, lo umiselwe ukuwa nokuvuka kwabaningi ku-Israyeli, nesibonakaliso esiphikwayo — 
42_2_35_yebo, inkemba iyakudabula nowakho umphefumulo — ukuba kwambulwe izizindlo zezinhliziyo eziningi.” 
42_2_36_Kwakukhona nomprofethikazi, u-Ana, indodakazi kaFanuweli, owesizwe sika-Aseri; wayesekhulile kakhulu, ebehlalile nendoda iminyaka eyisikhombisa emva kobuntombi bakhe, 
42_2_37_engumfelokazi waze waba neminyaka engamashumi ayisishiyagalombili nane, engasuki ethempelini, ekhonza ngokuzila nangokukhuleka ubusuku nemini. 
42_2_38_Naye-ke efika ngasona leso sikhathi wamtusa uNkulunkulu, wakhuluma ngaye kubo bonke ababebheke ukukhululwa kweJerusalema. 
42_2_39_Kwathi sebefeze konke okungokomthetho weNkosi babuyela eGalile emzini wakubo iNazaretha. 
42_2_40_Wakhula umntwana, waba namandla, wagcwala ukuhlakanipha; nomusa kaNkulunkulu wawuphezu kwakhe. 
42_2_41_Abazali bakhe baya eJerusalema iminyaka yonke ngomkhosi wePhasika. 
42_2_42_Eseneminyaka eyishumi nambili, bakhuphuka njengokomthetho womkhosi. 
42_2_43_Sebeziqedile izinsuku, ekubuyeni kwabo, umntwana uJesu wasala eJerusalema, abazali bakhe bengazi. 
42_2_44_Bethi-ke bona uphakathi kwabahambisana nabo bahamba ibanga losuku, bamfuna phakathi kwezihlobo nabazana nabo. 
42_2_45_Bengamtholi babuyela eJerusalema, bemfuna. 
42_2_46_Kwathi emva kwezinsuku ezintathu bamfumana ethempelini ehlezi phakathi kwabafundisi, ebezwa, ebabuza. 
42_2_47_Bonke ababemuzwa bamangala ngokuqonda nangokuphendula kwakhe. 
42_2_48_Bathi bembona, bamangala; unina wathi kuye: “Mntanami, usenzeleni okunje na? Bheka, uyihlo nami besikufuna silusizi.” 
42_2_49_Wathi kubo: “Kukanjani, beningifunelani na? Beningazi yini ukuthi kumelwe ukuba ngibe kokukaBaba na?” 
42_2_50_Abaliqondanga lelo zwi abelikhuluma kubo. 
42_2_51_Wehla nabo, wafika eNazaretha, wabathobela. Kepha unina wawagcina onke lawa mazwi enhliziyweni yakhe. 
42_2_52_UJesu waqhubeka ekuhlakanipheni, nasekukhuleni, nasemseni kuNkulunkulu nakubantu. 
42_3_1_Kwathi ngomnyaka weshumi nanhlanu wokubusa kukaTiberiyu Kesari, uPontiyu Pilatu engumbusi waseJudiya, uHerode engumtetrarki waseGalile, uFiliphu umfowabo engumtetrarki wezwe lase-Itureya nelaseTrakhoniti, uLisaniya engumtetrarki wase-Abilene, 
42_3_2_u-Anase engumpristi omkhulu noKayafase, kwafika izwi likaNkulunkulu kuJohane indodana kaZakariya ehlane. 
42_3_3_Weza ezweni lonke laseJordani eshumayela umbhapathizo wokuphenduka, kube ngukuthethelelwa kwezono, 
42_3_4_njengokuba kulotshiwe encwadini yamazwi ka-Isaya umprofethi ukuthi: “Izwi lomemezayo ehlane, lithi: ‘Lungisani indlela yeNkosi, nenze imikhondo yayo iqonde. 
42_3_5_Izigodi zonke ziyakugqitshwa, zonke izintaba namagquma kuyakwehliswa; kuqonde izinsongansonga, nemigoxigoxi ibe yizindlela ezilelezekile; 
42_3_6_inyama yonke izakubona insindiso kaNkulunkulu.’ ” 
42_3_7_Ngakho-ke wathi ezixukwini ezaziphumela ukubhapathizwa nguye: “Nzalo yezinyoka, ubani onibonise ukubalekela intukuthelo ezayo na? 
42_3_8_Ngakho vezani izithelo ezifanele ukuphenduka, ningaqali ukuthi phakathi kini: ‘Sinobaba u-Abrahama;’ ngokuba ngithi kini: UNkulunkulu unamandla okumvusela u-Abrahama abantwana kulawa matshe. 
42_3_9_Namanje izembe selibekiwe empandeni yemithi; ngakho yonke imithi engatheli isithelo esihle iyanqunywa, iphonswe emlilweni.” 
42_3_10_Izixuku zambuza zathi: “Pho, sizakwenzani na?” 
42_3_11_Waphendula, wathi kubo: “Onezingubo ezimbili akamuphe ongenayo; naye onokudla enze njalo.” 
42_3_12_Kwafika nabathelisi ukuba babhapathizwe, bathi kuye: “Mfundisi, sizakwenzani na?” 
42_3_13_Wathi kubo: “Ningabizi lutho ngaphezu kwenikumiselweyo.” 
42_3_14_Namabutho ambuza athi: “Thina-ke, sizakwenzani na?” Wathi kuwo: “Ningamuki muntu lutho ngendluzula, ningamxabheleli; yaneliswani yizinkokhelo zenu.” 
42_3_15_Abantu besabhekile, bezindla bonke ezinhliziyweni zabo ngoJohane ukuthi ingabe unguKristu yini, 
42_3_16_uJohane waphendula, wathi kubo bonke: “Mina kambe nginibhapathiza ngamanzi, kepha uyeza onamandla kunami engingafanele ukuthukulula umchilo wezicathulo zakhe; yena uzakunibhapathiza ngoMoya oNgcwele nangomlilo; 
42_3_17_oqoma lakhe lokwela lisesandleni sakhe ukushanelisisa isibuya sakhe nokubuthela ukolweni enqolobaneni yakhe; kepha amakhoba uzakuwashisa ngomlilo ongacimekiyo.” 
42_3_18_Nangokunye okuningi washumayela ivangeli kubantu, ebayala. 
42_3_19_Kepha uHerode umtetrarki, esolwa nguye ngenxa kaHerodiya umkamfowabo nangenxa yakho konke okubi abekwenzile uHerode, 
42_3_20_wenezela nalokhu kokunye konke, wamvalela uJohane etilongweni. 
42_3_21_Kwathi bebhapathiziwe abantu bonke, naye uJesu esebhapathiziwe, ekhuleka, izulu lavuleka, 
42_3_22_uMoya oNgcwele enesimo somzimba njengejuba wehlela phezu kwakhe; kwavela izwi ezulwini, lithi: “Wena uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo; ngithokozile ngawe.” 
42_3_23_Yena uJesu, ukuqala kwakhe, wayeneminyaka engaba ngamashumi amathathu, eyindodana, njengokushiwoyo, kaJosefa ka-Eli 
42_3_24_kaMathati kaLevi kaMeliki kaJanayi kaJosefa 
42_3_25_kaMatathiya ka-Amose kaNahume ka-Eseli kaNagayi 
42_3_26_kaMati, kaMatathiya kaSemeyini kaJosefa kaJuda 
42_3_27_kaJohanani kaResa kaZorobabeli kaSalatiyeli kaNeri 
42_3_28_kaMeliki ka-Adi kaKosamu ka-Elimadamu ka-Eri 
42_3_29_kaJose ka-Eliyezeri kaJorimi kaMathati kaLevi 
42_3_30_kaSimeyoni kaJuda kaJosefa kaJonamu ka-Eliyakimi 
42_3_31_kaMeleya kaMena kaMathata kaNathamu kaDavide 
42_3_32_kaJesayi ka-Obede kaBowasi kaSala kaNasoni 
42_3_33_ka-Aminadaba ka-Adameyini ka-Arani ka-Esiromu kaFaresi kaJuda 
42_3_34_kaJakobe ka-Isaka ka-Abrabama kaThara kaNahori 
42_3_35_kaSeruki kaRagawu kaFaleki ka-Ebere kaSala 
42_3_36_kaKayinamu ka-Arfakisadi kaSemi kaNowa kaLameka 
42_3_37_kaMathusala ka-Enoke kaJarethi kaMaleleyeli kaKayinani 
42_3_38_ka-Enose kaSeti ka-Adamu kaNkulunkulu. 
42_4_1_UJesu egcwele uMoya oNgcwele wabuya eJordani, waholekela ngoMoya ehlane, 
42_4_2_elingwa nguSathane izinsuku ezingamashumi amane. Akadlanga lutho kulezo zinsuku; seziphelile, walamba. 
42_4_3_Wayesethi kuye uSathane: “Uma uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, yisho kuleli tshe ukuba libe yisinkwa.” 
42_4_4_UJesu wamphendula wathi: “Kulotshiwe ukuthi: ‘Akusinkwa sodwa umuntu azakuphila ngaso.’ ” 
42_4_5_Esemenyusela entabeni ende wambonisa imibuso yonke yezwe ngomzuzwanyana. 
42_4_6_USathane wathi kuye: “Amandla onke lana ngokunika wena kanye nenkazimulo yawo, ngokuba inikwe mina, futhi ngiyinika noma ubani ngokuthanda kwami. 
42_4_7_Ngakho-ke wena, uma ukhuleka phambi kwami, konke kuzakuba ngokwakho.” 
42_4_8_UJesu waphendula, wathi kuye: “Kulotshiwe ukuthi: ‘Wokhuleka eNkosini uNkulunkulu wakho, umkhonze yena yedwa.’ ” 
42_4_9_Wayesemholela eJerusalema, wammisa esiqongweni sethempeli, wathi kuye: “Uma uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, ziphonse phansi lapha, 
42_4_10_ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi: 
42_4_11_“ ‘Uyakuyaleza izingelosi zakhe ngawe, zikulinde,’ “nokuthi: “ ‘Ziyakukuthwala ngezandla, ungaze waqhuzuka etsheni ngonyawo lwakho.’ ” 
42_4_12_UJesu waphendula, wathi kuye: “Kwathiwa: ‘Ungayilingi iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho.’ ” 
42_4_13_USathane eseqede ukulinga konke wamuka kuye isikhathi. 
42_4_14_UJesu wabuyela eGalile ngamandla kaMoya; udumo lwakhe lwanda kulo lonke izwe langakhona. 
42_4_15_Wafundisa emasinagogeni abo edunyiswa yibo bonke. 
42_4_16_Wafika eNazaretha, lapho wayondliwa khona, wangena esinagogeni ngosuku lwesabatha njengokwenza kwakhe, wasukumela ukufunda. 
42_4_17_Wanikwa incwadi ka-Isaya umprofethi, wayivula incwadi, wafumana indawo okulotshwe kuyo ukuthi: 
42_4_18_“UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwami, ngokuba ingigcobile ukuba ngishumayele ivangeli kwabampofu, ingithumele ukumemezela ukukhululwa kwabathunjiweyo, nokubona kwabayizimpumputhe, nokuhlenga abacindezelweyo, 
42_4_19_nokumemezela umnyaka omuhle weNkosi.” 
42_4_20_Wayigoqonga incwadi, wayinika isikhonzi, wahlala; amehlo abo bonke ababesesinagogeni amgqolozela. 
42_4_21_Waqala ukukhuluma kubo, ethi: “Namhlanje ugcwalisekile lo mbhalo ezindlebeni zenu.” 
42_4_22_Bonke bamfakazela bemangala ngamazwi omusa aphuma emlonyeni wakhe, bathi: “Lo akasiyo indodana kaJosefa na?” 
42_4_23_Wathi kubo: “Nempela niyakusho kimi lesi saga sokuthi: ‘Nyanga, zelaphe wena.’ Lokho esikuzwile kwenziwa eKapernawume, kwenze nalapha ezweni lakini.” 
42_4_24_Wathi-ke: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Akukho mprofethi owamukelwa ezweni lakubo. 
42_4_25_Kepha ngempela ngithi kini: Kwakukhona kwa-Israyeli abafelokazi abaningi emihleni ka-Eliya, lapho izulu lalivalekile iminyaka emithathu nezinyanga eziyisithupha, kwaba khona indlala enkulu ezweni lonke; 
42_4_26_kepha u-Eliya kathunyelwanga nakoyedwa kubona, kuphela eSarepita laseSidoni kowesifazane ongumfelokazi. 
42_4_27_Kwakukhona futhi kwa-Israyeli abanochoko abaningi ngesikhathi sika-Elisha umprofethi; kepha akuhlanjululwanga namunye kubo, kuphela uNayimani umSiriya.” 
42_4_28_Bonke ababesesinagogeni bagcwala ulaka bekuzwa lokho. 
42_4_29_Basukuma, bamxosha emzini, bamqhubela ekwengameni kwentaba umuzi wabo owakhiwe phezu kwayo, ukuze bamkhalakathelisele phansi. 
42_4_30_Kepha yena edabula phakathi kwabo wamuka. 
42_4_31_Wehlela eKapernawume umuzi waseGalile. Wayebafundisa ngosuku lwesabatha. 
42_4_32_Bamangala ngokufundisa kwakhe, ngokuba izwi lakhe lalinamandla. 
42_4_33_Kwakukhona esinagogeni umuntu onomoya wedemoni elingcolileyo, wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu, wathi: 
42_4_34_“Hhiya! Sinamsebenzi muni nawe Jesu waseNazaretha? Uze ukusibhubhisa na? Ngiyakwazi ukuba ungubani: ungoNgcwele kaNkulunkulu.” 
42_4_35_UJesu wamkhuza wathi: “Thula, uphume kuye!” Idemoni lamphonsa phansi phakathi kwabo, laphuma kuye lingamlimazanga. 
42_4_36_Behlelwa ngukwesaba bonke, bakhuluma bodwa, bathi: “Yizwi lini leli lokuba ayale omoya abangcolileyo ngegunya nangamandla, baphume?” 
42_4_37_Kwanda udumo ngaye kuzo zonke izindawo zangakhona. 
42_4_38_Wasuka esinagogeni, wangena endlini kaSimoni. Kepha umkhwekazi kaSimoni wayebanjwe ngumkhuhlane omkhulu; bamnxusa ngaye. 
42_4_39_Wamengama, wakhuza umkhuhlane; wona wamyeka; wasuka masinyane, wabakhonza. 
42_4_40_Ukushona kwelanga bonke ababe nabagulayo izifo ngezifo babaletha kuye; ebeka izandla phezu kwabo ngabanye wabaphulukisa. 
42_4_41_Kwaphuma namademoni kwabaningi ememeza ethi: “Wena uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.” Kepha wawakhuza, kawavumelanga ukuba akhulume, ngokuba ayemazi ukuthi unguKristu. 
42_4_42_Sekusile, waphuma waya endaweni eyihlane; izixuku zamfuna, zaze zafika kuye impela, zambamba ukuba angamuki kuzo. 
42_4_43_Kepha wathi kuzo: “Nakweminye imizi ngimelwe ukushumayela ivangeli lombuso kaNkulunkulu, ngokuba ngithunyelwe lokho.” 
42_4_44_Washumayela emasinagogeni aseGalile. 
42_5_1_Kwathi isixuku simbunganyela ukuba sizwe izwi likaNkulunkulu, wayemi ngaselwandle lwaseGenesaretha, 
42_5_2_wabona imikhumbi emibili imi ngaselwandle; abadobi babephumile kuyo behlanza amanetha. 
42_5_3_Esengene komunye wemikhumbi ongokaSimoni wamcela ukuba asuke kancane emhlabathini. Wahlala phansi, wabafundisa abantu esemkhunjini. 
42_5_4_Kuthe esegcinile ukukhuluma, wathi kuSimoni: “Qhubekela ekujuleni, nehlise amanetha enu, nibambe.” 
42_5_5_USimoni waphendula wathi: “Nkosi, sishikile ubusuku bonke, asibambanga lutho; kepha ngezwi lakho ngiyakuwehlisa amanetha.” 
42_5_6_Sebekwenzile lokho babamba izinhlanzi eziningi kakhulu, aze agqabuka amanetha abo. 
42_5_7_Babaqhweba omana babo abakomunye umkhumbi ukuba beze, bababambise. Beza-ke, bayigcwalisa imikhumbi yomibili, yaze yathi ayizike. 
42_5_8_Kuthe uSimoni Petru ekubona lokho, waziphonsa phansi ngasemadolweni kaJesu, wathi: “Suka kimi, Nkosi, ngokuba ngingumuntu oyisoni.” 
42_5_9_Ngokuba ubehlelwa ngukwesaba, yena kanye nabo bonke ababe naye, ngobuningi bezinhlanzi ababezibambile, 
42_5_10_kanjalo-ke noJakobe noJohane amadodana kaZebedewu ababesebenzisana noSimoni. UJesu wathi kuSimoni: “Ungesabi; kusukela manje uzakubamba abantu.” 
42_5_11_Sebeyilethile imikhumbi emhlabathini bashiya konke, bamlandela. 
42_5_12_Kwathi ekomunye wemizi, bheka, nanso indoda egcwele uchoko. Kuthe embona uJesu, wawa ngobuso, wamnxusa wathi: “Nkosi, uma uthanda, ungangihlambulula.” 
42_5_13_Welula isandla sakhe, wamphatha, wathi: “Ngiyathanda; hlambuluka.” Masinyane uchoko lwasuka kuye. 
42_5_14_Wamyala ukuba angatsheli muntu, wathi: “Kepha suka, uzibonakalise kumpristi, unikele ngokuhlanjululwa kwakho, njengalokho uMose akuyalayo, kube ngubufakazi kubo.” 
42_5_15_Kwayilapho ukukhuluma ngaye kwanda kakhulu. Zabuthana izixuku eziningi ukuzwa nokuphulukiswa ezifweni zazo. 
42_5_16_Kepha yena wamonyukela ehlane, wakhuleka. 
42_5_17_Kwathi ngolunye lwalezo zinsuku yena esafundisa, kwakuhlezi khona abaFarisi nabafundisi bomthetho ababephuma emizini yonke yaseGalile neJudiya neJerusalema. Namandla eNkosi ayekuye ukuba aphulukise. 
42_5_18_Bheka-ke, nanko amadoda ethwele ohlakeni umuntu ofe uhlangothi, efuna ukumngenisa nokumbeka phambi kwakhe. 
42_5_19_Engafumani ukuthi angamngenisa kanjani ngenxa yesixuku akhwela phezu kwendlu, amehlisa ophahleni kanye nohlaka ngaphakathi phambi kukaJesu. 
42_5_20_Ebona ukukholwa kwawo wathi: “Mngane, uthethelelwe izono zakho.” 
42_5_21_Ababhali nabaFarisi baqala ukuzindla ngokuthi: “Ngubani lo okhuluma ngokuhlambalaza? Ngubani ongathethelela izono ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu yedwa na?” 
42_5_22_Kepha uJesu ezazi izizindlo zabo waphendula, wathi kubo: “Nizindlani ezinhliziyweni zenu na? 
42_5_23_Yikuphi okulula ukuthi: ‘Uthethelelwe izono zakho,’ noma ukuthi: ‘Vuka uhambe,’ na? 
42_5_24_Kepha ukuze nazi ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu inamandla emhlabeni okuthethelela izono,” wayesethi kofe uhlangothi: “Kuwena ngithi: Vuka uthabathe uhlaka lwakho, uye endlini yakho.” 
42_5_25_Wasukuma khona lapho phambi kwabo, wathabatha lokho abelele kukho, wamuka waya endlini yakhe emdumisa uNkulunkulu. 
42_5_26_Ukumangala kwabehlela bonke, bamdumisa uNkulunkulu, bagcwala ukwesaba, bathi: “Sibonile izimanga namuhla.” 
42_5_27_Emva kwalokho waphuma, wabona umthelisi, igama lakhe nguLevi, ehlezi endaweni yokuthela, wathi kuye: “Ngilandele.” 
42_5_28_Washiya konke, wasukuma, wamlandela. 
42_5_29_ULevi wamenzela isidlo esikhulu endlini yakhe; kwakukhona isixuku esikhulu sabathelisi nabanye ababehlezi nabo ekudleni. 
42_5_30_AbaFarisi nababhali bakhonona kubafundi bakhe, bathi: “Yini ukuba nidle niphuze nabathelisi nezoni na?” 
42_5_31_Waphendula uJesu, wathi kubo: “Abaphilileyo abadingi inyanga, ngabagulayo bodwa. 
42_5_32_Kangizelanga ukubiza abalungileyo kodwa izoni ukuba ziphenduke.” 
42_5_33_Base bethi kuye: “Abafundi bakaJohane bazila kaningi, benze imikhuleko, kanjalo nababaFarisi, kepha abakho bayadla, baphuze.” 
42_5_34_Kepha uJesu, wathi kubo: “Ningabazilisa yini abayeni, umyeni esenabo na? 
42_5_35_Kodwa kuzakufika izinsuku, lapho umyeni ezakususwa kubo; yikhona bezakuzila ngalezo zinsuku.” 
42_5_36_Wabatshela nomfanekiso wokuthi: “Akakho odabula isiziba engutsheni entsha, asibekele engutsheni endala; uma enza lokho, uyayona entsha, futhi isiziba sentsha asizukuzwana nendala. 
42_5_37_Futhi akakho othela iwayini elisha ezimvabeni ezindala funa iwayini elisha liqhumise izimvaba, lichitheke lona, nezimvaba zonakale. 
42_5_38_Kodwa iwayini elisha limelwe ukuthelwa ezimvabeni ezintsha. 
42_5_39_Akakho othi ephuze iwayini elidala, afune elisha, ngokuba uthi elidala limnandi.” 
42_6_1_Kwathi ngesabatha wadabula amasimu; abafundi bakhe bakha izikhwebu, badla bezihlikihla ngezandla. 
42_6_2_Kepha abathile babaFarisi bathi: “Nenzelani lokho okungavunyelwe ngesabatha na?” 
42_6_3_UJesu ebaphendula wathi: “Anifundanga yini ngalokho akwenza uDavide mhla elambile yena nababe naye 
42_6_4_ukuthi wangena endlini kaNkulunkulu, wathatha izinkwa zokubukwa ezingavunyelwe ukudliwa muntu, ngabapristi bodwa, wadla, wanika nababe naye, na?” 
42_6_5_Wathi kubo: “INdodana yomuntu iyiNkosi neyesabatha.” 
42_6_6_Kwathi-ke ngelinye isabatha wangena esinagogeni, wafundisa. Kwakukhona umuntu lapho osandla sakhe sokunene sasishwabene. 
42_6_7_Ababhali nabaFarisi bamqaphelisisa ukuthi uyaphilisa yini ngesabatha, ukuze bathole ukumbeka icala. 
42_6_8_Kepha wazazi izizindlo zabo wathi kuyo indoda esandla sishwabene: “Sukuma, ume phakathi.” Wasukuma-ke, wema. 
42_6_9_UJesu wathi kubo: “Ngiyanibuza ukuthi kuvunyelwe ngesabatha ukwenza okuhle noma okubi yini, ukusindisa umuntu noma ukumbulala, na?” 
42_6_10_Esebaqalazile bonke wathi kuye: “Yelula isandla sakho.” Wenze njalo-ke saze saphiliswa isandla sakhe. 
42_6_11_Base begcwala ukuhlanya, bakhuluma bodwa ngokuthi bangamenze njani uJesu. 
42_6_12_Kwathi ngalezo zinsuku waphuma waya entabeni ukuyokhuleka; wahlala ubusuku bonke ekhuleka kuNkulunkulu. 
42_6_13_Kwathi sekusile, wababiza abafundi bakhe, wakhetha kubo abayishumi nambili, wabaqamba ngokuthi abaphostoli: 
42_6_14_uSimoni owamqamba ngokuthi uPetru, no-Andreya umfowabo, noJakobe, noJohane, noFiliphu, noBartolomewu, 
42_6_15_noMathewu, noTomase, noJakobe ka-Alfewu, noSimoni othiwa isishisekeli, 
42_6_16_noJuda kaJakobe, noJuda Iskariyothe owaba ngumkhapheli. 
42_6_17_Khona wehla nabo, wema endaweni eyithafa kanye nesixuku esikhulu sabafundi bakhe noquqaba lwabantu abavela kulo lonke laseJudiya, naseJerusalema, nangaselwandle lwaseTire neSidoni, 
42_6_18_ababezile ukumuzwa nokuphulukiswa ezifweni zabo; nababekhathazwa ngawomoya abangcolileyo baphulukiswa. 
42_6_19_Isixuku sonke safuna ukumthinta, ngokuba kwakuphuma kuye amandla abaphilisa bonke. 
42_6_20_Wayesephakamisela amehlo akhe ngakubafundi bakhe, wathi: “Nibusisiwe nina bampofu, ngokuba umbuso kaNkulunkulu ungowenu. 
42_6_21_Nibusisiwe nina balambileyo kalokhu, ngokuba niyakusuthiswa. Nibusisiwe nina bakhalayo kalokhu, ngokuba niyakuhleka. 
42_6_22_Nibusisiwe, nxa abantu benizonda nanxa benicwasa, benithuka, belilahla igama lenu ngokungathi libi ngenxa yeNdodana yomuntu. 
42_6_23_“Thokozani ngalolo suku, nigxume; ngokuba bhekani, umvuzo wenu mkhulu ezulwini; ngokuba oyise babo benze njalo kubaprofethi. 
42_6_24_“Kepha maye kinina bacebileyo, ngokuba niyamukele induduzo yenu! 
42_6_25_Maye kinina basuthiyo kalokhu, ngokuba niyakulamba! Maye kinina bahlekayo kalokhu, ngokuba niyakulila, nikhale! 
42_6_26_Maye kinina, nxa abantu bonke bekhuluma kahle ngani, ngokuba oyise babo benze njalo kubaprofethi bamanga! 
42_6_27_“Kepha ngithi kini enizwayo: Thandani izitha zenu, nenze okuhle kwabanizondayo, 
42_6_28_nibusise abaniqalekisayo, nibakhulekele abanidumazayo. 
42_6_29_Okushaya esihlathini, mnike nesinye; nokwaphuca ingubo, ungamnqabeli nebhantshi. 
42_6_30_Muphe yilowo nalowo ocela kuwe; nokwaphuca okwakho, ungabuyi ukubize kuye. 
42_6_31_Njengalokhu nithanda ukuba abantu benze kini, yenzani njalo kubo. 
42_6_32_“Uma nithanda abanithandayo, ninakubongwa kuni na? Ngokuba nezoni zithanda abazithandayo. 
42_6_33_Ngakho uma nenza okuhle kwabenza okuhle kini, ninakubongwa kuni na? Ngokuba nezoni zenza khona lokho. 
42_6_34_Uma nitsheleka labo enithemba ukwamukela kubo, ninakubongwa kuni na? Nezoni zitsheleka izoni ukuba zamukele okungako. 
42_6_35_Kepha thandani izitha zenu, nenze okuhle, nitsheleke, ningadikibali; nomvuzo wenu uyakuba mkhulu, nibe ngabantwana boPhezukonke, ngokuba umnene yena kwabangabongiyo nababi. 
42_6_36_Yibani nesihawu, njengokuba uYihlo enesihawu. 
42_6_37_“Ningahluleli, khona anisoze nahlulelwa; ningalahli, khona anisoze nalahlwa; thethelelani, khona niyakuthethelelwa. 
42_6_38_Yiphani, khona niyakuphiwa; bayakunipha esifubeni senu isilinganiso esihle, esigxushiweyo, esigqishiweyo, esichichimayo; ngokuba ngesilinganiso enilinganisa ngaso nani niyakulinganiselwa ngaso.” 
42_6_39_Wabatshela nomfanekiso wokuthi: “Impumputhe ingahola impumputhe na? Aziyikukhalakathela emgodini zombili na? 
42_6_40_Umfundi kaphezu komfundisi; kepha yilowo ophelelisiwe uyakuba njengomfundisi wakhe. 
42_6_41_“Ubhekelani ucezwana olusesweni lomfowenu, kanti ugongolo olukwelakho iso awuluboni na? 
42_6_42_Ungasho kanjani kumfowenu ukuthi: ‘Mfowethu, ake ngikhiphe ucezwana olusesweni lakho,’ wena ongaboni ugongolo olukwelakho iso, na? Mzenzisi, khipha kuqala ugongolo olukwelakho iso, yikhona uyakubonisisa ukukhipha ucezwana olusesweni lomfowenu. 
42_6_43_“Ngokuba akukho muthi omuhle othela isithelo esibi; futhi nomuthi omubi awutheli isithelo esihle. 
42_6_44_Ngokuba yilowo nalowo muthi waziwa ngesithelo sawo. Akukhiwa kambe amakhiwane emeveni, nezithelo zomvini azikhiwa ejikijolweni. 
42_6_45_Umuntu omuhle uveza okuhle emfuyweni enhle yenhliziyo, nomubi uveza okubi emfuyweni embi; ngokuba umlomo wakhe ukhuluma ngokuchichima kwenhliziyo. 
42_6_46_“Ningibizelani ngokuthi: ‘Nkosi, Nkosi,’ ningakwenzi engikushoyo, na? 
42_6_47_Yilowo nalowo oza kimi, ezwe amazwi ami, awenze, ngonikhombisa lowo afana naye. 
42_6_48_Ufana nomuntu owayakha indlu, wemba washonisa, wabeka isisekelo edwaleni. Ekufikeni kwesikhukhula umfula washaya leyo ndlu, kepha wawungenamandla okuyinyakazisa, ngokuba yayakhiwe kahle. 
42_6_49_Kodwa ozwayo engenzi unjengomuntu owakha indlu emhlabathini ingenasisekelo; umfula wayishaya, yawa masinyane; kwaba kukhulu ukudilika kwaleyo ndlu.” 
42_7_1_Kwathi eseqede onke amazwi akhe ezindlebeni zabantu, wangena eKapernawume. 
42_7_2_Inceku yenduna yekhulu ethile ethandekayo kuyo yayigula, isizakufa. 
42_7_3_Isizwile ngoJesu yathuma amalunga abaJuda kuye, imcela ukuba eze ayisindise inceku yayo. 
42_7_4_Esefikile kuJesu amncenga kakhulu, ethi: “Ifanele ukuba uyenzele lokho, 
42_7_5_ngokuba ithanda isizwe sakithi; yiyo esakhele isinagoge.” 
42_7_6_UJesu wayesehamba nawo. Kepha engasekude nendlu, induna yekhulu yathumela kuye abahlobo, bathi kuye: “Nkosi, ungazihluphi, ngokuba angifanele ukuba ungene phansi kophahla lwami. 
42_7_7_Ngakho angizibonanga ukuthi ngifanele ukuza kuwe; kepha yisho izwi, khona inceku yami iyakusinda. 
42_7_8_Ngokuba nami ngingumuntu ophansi kwamakhosi, nginamabutho phansi kwami; ngithi kwelinye: ‘Hamba,’ lihambe; nakwelinye: ‘Woza,’ lize; nasencekwini yami: ‘Yenza lokhu,’ ikwenze.” 
42_7_9_UJesu ekuzwa lokho wamangala ngayo, waphenduka, wathi esixukwini esimlandelayo: “Ngithi kini: Angizange ngifumane ukukholwa okungaka nakwa-Israyeli.” 
42_7_10_Ababethunyiwe sebebuyele ekhaya bafumana inceku isindile. 
42_7_11_Kwathi ngangomuso waya emzini othiwa iNayini; kwahamba naye abafundi bakhe nesixuku esikhulu. 
42_7_12_Esesondela esangweni lomuzi, bheka, kwaphunyiswa ofileyo, indodana eyodwa kanina, yena engumfelokazi; nabantu abaningi bomuzi babe naye. 
42_7_13_Yathi iNkosi isimbona, yamhawukela, yathi kuye: “Ungakhali.” 
42_7_14_Yasondela, yathinta uhlaka; abaluthweleyo base bema. Yayisithi: “Nsizwa, ngithi kuwe: Vuka!” 
42_7_15_Ofileyo wavuka, waqala ukukhuluma; yamnika unina. 
42_7_16_Bafikelwa ngukwesaba bonke, bamdumisa uNkulunkulu, bathi: “Kuvele umprofethi omkhulu phakathi kwethu,” nokuthi: “UNkulunkulu ubahambele abantu bakhe.” 
42_7_17_Kwaphumela leli zwi ngaye kulo lonke iJudiya nakulo lonke langakhona. 
42_7_18_Abafundi bakaJohane bambikela ngazo zonke lezo zinto. 
42_7_19_UJohane wayesebiza ababili kubafundi bakhe, wabathumela eNkosini, wathi: “Wena unguye ozayo, noma sobheka omunye na?” 
42_7_20_Amadoda esefikile kuyo athi: “UJohane uMbhapathizi usithumele kuwe, ethi: ‘Wena unguye ozayo, noma sobheka omunye na?’ ” 
42_7_21_Ngalowo mzuzu yayiphulukisa abaningi ezifweni nasebuhlungwini nakomoya ababi; nezimpumputhe eziningi yazipha ukubona. 
42_7_22_Yaphendula, yathi kuwo: “Hambani nimlandise uJohane lokho enikubonile nenikuzwile ukuthi: Izimpumputhe ziyabona, izinyonga ziyahamba, abanochoko bayahlanjululwa, izithulu ziyezwa, abafileyo bayavuswa, abampofu bayashunyayezwa ivangeli; 
42_7_23_ubusisiwe ongayikukhubeka ngami.” 
42_7_24_Sezimukile izithunywa zikaJohane, yaqala ukukhuluma ezixukwini ngoJohane, ithi: “Naphuma naya ehlane ukuyobonani na? Umhlanga ontengantengiswa ngumoya na? 
42_7_25_Kanti naphuma ukuyobonani na? Umuntu owembethe izingubo ezinothonotho na? Bhekani, abembethe okukhazimulayo, betamasa, basezindlini zamakhosi. 
42_7_26_Kodwa naphuma ukuyobonani na? Umprofethi na? Yebo, ngithi kini: Odlula umprofethi. 
42_7_27_Nguye okulotshwe ngaye ukuthi: “ ‘Bheka, ngiyathuma isithunywa sami phambi kobuso bakho esiyakulungisa indlela yakho phambi kwakho.’ 
42_7_28_“Ngithi kini: Kwabazelwe ngabesifazane akakho omkhulu kunoJohane; kepha omncane embusweni kaNkulunkulu mkhulu kunaye.” 
42_7_29_Abantu bonke, yebo, nabathelisi sebezwile bamvuma uNkulunkulu, babhapathizwa ngombhapathizo kaJohane. 
42_7_30_Kepha abaFarisi nezazimthetho balenza ize icebo likaNkulunkulu maqondana nabo bengabhapathizwanga nguye. 
42_7_31_“Pho-ke, abantu balesi sizukulwane ngiyakubafanisa nani na? Bafana nani na? 
42_7_32_Bafana nabantwana abahlezi esigcawini bememezana bethi: “ ‘Sinibethele imitshingo, anisinanga; salilisela, anikhalanga.’ 
42_7_33_“Ngokuba uJohane uMbhapathizi ufikile engadli sinkwa, engaphuzi wayini; nithi-ke: ‘Unedemoni.’ 
42_7_34_Ifikile iNdodana yomuntu, idla, iphuza, senithi: ‘Bhekani, umuntu oyisiminzi nesiphuzi, umhlobo wabathelisi nezoni.’ 
42_7_35_Kodwa ukuhlakanipha kuvunyiwe ngabantwana bakho bonke.” 
42_7_36_Omunye wabaFarisi wammema ukuba adle naye; esengene endlini yomFarisi wahlala ekudleni. 
42_7_37_Bheka, kwakukhona emzini owesifazane oyisoni; wathi esazi ukuthi uhlezi ekudleni endlini yomFarisi, weza nomfuma wamafutha, 
42_7_38_wema emuva ngasezinyaweni zakhe ekhala, waqala ukumatisa izinyawo zakhe ngezinyembezi, wazesula ngezinwele zekhanda lakhe, wazanga izinyawo zakhe, wazigcoba ngamafutha. 
42_7_39_Kuthe umFarisi obemmemile ekubona, wazindla wathi: “Uma lo ebengumprofethi, nga emazi lo wesifazane omphathayo ukuba ungubani nokuba unjani, ngokuba uyisoni.” 
42_7_40_UJesu waphendula, wathi kuye: “Simoni, kukhona engifuna ukukukhuluma kuwe.” Wathi: “Khuluma-ke, Mfundisi.” 
42_7_41_“Kwakukhona abantu ababili abanamacala kumtshelekisi othile; icala lomunye lalingodenariyu abangamakhulu ayisihlanu, elomunye amashumi ayisihlanu. 
42_7_42_Bengenanto yokukhokha, wabayekela bobabili. Ngumuphi kubo konje oyakumthanda kakhulu na?” 
42_7_43_USimoni waphendula wathi: “Ngithi yilowo amyekela okukhulu.” Wathi kuye: “Unqume kahle.” 
42_7_44_Ephendukela kowesifazane wathi kuSimoni: “Uyambona lo wesifazane na? Ngingene endlini yakho, awunginikanga amanzi ezinyawo, kepha yena uzimatisile izinyawo zami ngezinyembezi, wazesula ngezinwele zakhe. 
42_7_45_Awunganganga, kepha lo, yilokhu ngingenile, akayekanga ukwanga izinyawo zami. 
42_7_46_Ikhanda lami awuligcobanga ngamafutha, kepha lo uzigcobile izinyawo zami ngamafutha. 
42_7_47_Ngenxa yalokho ngithi kuwe: Izono zakhe eziningi zithethelelwe, ngokuba uthandile kakhulu; kepha othethelelwa okuncane uthanda kancane.” 
42_7_48_Wayesethi kuye: “Zithethelelwe izono zakho.” 
42_7_49_Ababehlezi naye ekudleni baqala ukusho phakathi kwabo ukuthi: “Ngubani lo othethelela nezono na?” 
42_7_50_Kepha wathi kowesifazane: “Ukukholwa kwakho kukusindisile; hamba, ube nokuthula.” 
42_8_1_Kwathi emva kwalokho wayehamba imizi nemizana eshumayela ememezela ivangeli lombuso, benaye abayishumi nambili 
42_8_2_nabesifazane abathile ababephulukiswe kubo omoya ababi nasezifweni: uMariya obizwa ngokuthi uMagdalena, okwakuphume kuye amademoni ayisikhombisa, 
42_8_3_noJowana umkaKhuza, induna kaHerode, noSusana, nabanye abaningi ababebakhonza ngempahla yabo. 
42_8_4_Sekubuthene kuye isixuku esikhulu sivela emizini ngemizi, wakhuluma ngomfanekiso, wathi: 
42_8_5_“Kwaphuma umhlwanyeli ukuyohlwanyela imbewu yakhe. Ekuhlwanyeleni kwakhe enye yawela ngasendleleni; yanyathelwa, izinyoni zezulu zayidla, zayiqeda. 
42_8_6_Enye yawela edwaleni; kuthe imila, yabuna, ngokuba ingenamswakama.
