42_8_7_Enye yawela phakathi kwameva, kwaze kwathi ameva esemila kanye nayo, ayiminyanisa. 
42_8_8_Enye yawela emhlabathini omuhle; kuthe imila, yathela ngekhulu.” Ekusho lokhu wamemeza wathi: “Onezindlebe zokuzwa makezwe.” 
42_8_9_Abafundi bakhe bambuza ukuthi ungaba yini lowo mfanekiso na? 
42_8_10_Wathi-ke: “Niphiwe nina ukwazi izimfihlakalo zombuso kaNkulunkulu, kepha abanye bakuphiwa ngemifanekiso ukuba bebona bangaboni, bezwa bangaqondi. 
42_8_11_“Umfanekiso yilokhu-ke: imbewu iyizwi likaNkulunkulu. 
42_8_12_Abangasendleleni yilabo abathi sebezwile, bese kufika uSathane, alisuse izwi enhliziyweni yabo ukuba bangakholwa, basindiswe. 
42_8_13_Abasedwaleni yilabo abathi sebezwile, balamukele izwi ngokuthokoza; kepha laba kabanampande, bakholwa isikhashana nje, kuthi ngesikhathi sokulingwa bahlubuke. 
42_8_14_Okuwele phakathi kwameva yilabo abathi sebezwile, bahambe, baminyaniswe ngeminako nengcebo nezinjabulo zokuphila, bangatheli izithelo ezivuthiwe. 
42_8_15_Okusemhlabathini omuhle yilabo abathi belizwile izwi, balibambe ngenhliziyo enhle nelungileyo, bathele izithelo ngokubekezela. 
42_8_16_“Akakho othi esokhela isibani, asimboze ngesitsha nokuba asibeke phansi kombhede, kepha usifaka othini, ukuze abangenayo babone ukukhanya. 
42_8_17_Ngokuba akukho okusithekileyo okungayikuhlaluka nokuyisifuba okungayikwaziwa, kube sobala. 
42_8_18_Ngakho-ke anobheka ukuba nizwa kanjani; ngokuba yilowo nalowo onakho uyakuphiwa; kepha lowo ongenakho uyakwamukwa nalokho athi unakho.” 
42_8_19_Kwase kufika kuye unina nabafowabo, kepha behluleka ukufinyelela kuye ngenxa yesixuku. 
42_8_20_Wabikelwa ukuthi: “Unyoko nabafowenu bemi ngaphandle befuna ukukubona.” 
42_8_21_Kepha waphendula, wathi kubo: “Umame nabafowethu yilabo abalizwa izwi likaNkulunkulu, balenze.” 
42_8_22_Kwathi-ke ngolunye lwalezo zinsuku wangena emkhunjini, yena kanye nabafundi bakhe, wathi kubo: “Asiwele siye ngaphesheya kolwandle.” Basuka-ke. 
42_8_23_Kuthe besahamba ngomkhumbi, walala ubuthongo; kwehlela-ke isivunguvungu somoya elwandle, bagcwala amanzi, babesengozini. 
42_8_24_Base besondela, bamvusa bathi: “Nkosi, Nkosi, safa.” Wavuka-ke, wakhuza umoya nokugubha kwamanzi. Kwanqamuka, kwathula kwathi du. 
42_8_25_Wayesethi kubo: “Kuphi ukukholwa kwenu na?” Besaba; bamangala, bathi omunye komunye: “Ungubani lo ukuba ayale nomoya namanzi, kumlalele?” 
42_8_26_Bafika ngomkhumbi ezweni lamaGerasa elibhekene neGalile. 
42_8_27_Esephumele emhlabathini, kwamhlangabeza indoda ethile yomuzi eyayinamademoni; kwase kuyisikhathi eside ingembathi ngubo, ingahlali endlini kodwa emathuneni. 
42_8_28_Isimbona uJesu yadazuluka, yawa phansi phambi kwakhe, yathi ngezwi elikhulu: “Nginamsebenzi muni nawe Jesu, Ndodana kaNkulunkulu oPhezukonke? Ngiyakuncenga, ungangihluphi.” 
42_8_29_Ngokuba wayala umoya ongcolileyo ukuba aphume kulowo muntu. Ngokuba wayesembambe kaningi; walindwa eboshwe ngawozankosi nangamaketanga ezinyawo; kepha wathi esegqabule izibopho, waqhutshelwa yidemoni ehlane. 
42_8_30_UJesu wambuza wathi: “Ungubani igama lakho?” Wathi: “ULegiyona,” ngokuba amademoni amaningi ayengene kuye. 
42_8_31_Amncenga ukuba angawayali ukuya kwalasha. 
42_8_32_Kwakukhona lapho umhlambi wezingulube eziningi ziklabile entabeni; amncenga ukuba awavumele angene kuzo; wawavumela. 
42_8_33_Aphuma-ke amademoni kuye umuntu, angena ezingulubeni, umhlambi wagulukudela eweni, waphonseka elwandle, waminza. 
42_8_34_Kwathi ababezalusa bebona okwenzekileyo, babaleka, bakubika emzini nasemaphandleni. 
42_8_35_Khona baphuma ukuyobona okwenzekileyo, bafika kuJesu, bamfumanisa umuntu okuphume kuye amademoni ehlezi ngasezinyaweni zikaJesu embethe, esangulukile; bashaywa luvalo. 
42_8_36_Ababekubonile babatshela ukuthi usinde kanjani owayekhwelwe ngamademoni. 
42_8_37_Abantu bonke bakulelo zwe lamaGerasa bamcela ukuba amuke kubo, ngokuba babephethwe ngukwesaba okukhulu; yena wayesengena emkhunjini, waphindela emuva. 
42_8_38_Kepha indoda okuphume kuyo amademoni yamnxusa ukuba ibe naye; kodwa wayimukisa, ethi: 
42_8_39_“Buyela ekhaya, ulande ukuthi kungakanani uNkulunkulu akwenzele khona.” Wamuka elanda emzini wonke ngokuthi kungakanani abekwenzelwe nguye uJesu. 
42_8_40_Kepha ekubuyeni kwakhe uJesu isixuku samthakazela; ngokuba bonke babembhekile. 
42_8_41_Bheka, kwafika indoda, nguJayiru igama layo, ingumphathi wesinagoge, yaziphonsa phansi ngasezinyaweni zikaJesu, yamncenga ukuba angene endlini yayo. 
42_8_42_Ngokuba yayinendodakazi eyodwa kungathi ineminyaka eyishumi nambili, yona isifa. Kepha esahamba, izixuku zamminyanisa. 
42_8_43_Owesifazane owayenomopho iminyaka eyishumi nambili, esekhokhele izinyanga konke abephila ngakho, engenakuphulukiswa muntu, 
42_8_44_weza ngasemuva, wathinta umphetho wengubo yakhe; kwanqamuka masinyane ukugobhoza kwegazi lakhe. 
42_8_45_UJesu wathi: “Ngubani ongithintileyo na?” Bephika bonke, wathi uPetru nababe naye: “Nkosi, izixuku ziyakuminyanisa, zikucindezele.” 
42_8_46_Kepha uJesu wathi: “Ukhona ongithintileyo, ngokuba ngizwile kuphuma amandla kimi.” 
42_8_47_Owesifazane ebona ukuthi kanakufihleka, weza ethuthumela, eziphonsa phansi phambi kwakhe, walanda phambi kwabantu bonke isisusa sokuba amthinte nokuthi usinde khona lapho. 
42_8_48_Wayesethi kuye: “Ndodakazi, ukukholwa kwakho kukusindisile; hamba, ube nokuthula.” 
42_8_49_Esakhuluma, kwafika othile evela kwamphathi wesinagoge, wathi kuye: “Indodakazi yakho isifile; ungabe usamkhathaza uMfundisi.” 
42_8_50_Kepha uJesu ekuzwa lokho wamphendula wathi: “Ungesabi, kholwa kuphela; izakusinda.” 
42_8_51_Esefike endlini kavumanga ukuba kungene muntu naye, kuphela oPetru, noJohane, noJakobe, noyise wentombazana, nonina. 
42_8_52_Babekhala bonke beyililela; kepha wathi: “Ningakhali; ayifile, kodwa ilele.” 
42_8_53_Bamhleka usulu, bazi ukuthi ifile. 
42_8_54_Kepha yena wayibamba ngesandla, wamemeza wathi: “Ntombazana, vuka!” 
42_8_55_Wabuyela umoya wayo, yavuka khona lapho; wayala ukuba inikwe ukudla. 
42_8_56_Abazali bayo bethuka; wabayala ukuba bangatsheli muntu okwenzekileyo. 
42_9_1_Wayesebabizela ndawonye abayishumi nambili, wabanika amandla negunya phezu kwamademoni onke nokuphulukisa izifo. 
42_9_2_Wabathuma ukushumayela umbuso kaNkulunkulu nokuphulukisa. 
42_9_3_Wathi kubo: “Ningaphathi lutho lwendlela, naludondolo, nasikhwama, nasinkwa, namali, ningabi namabhantshi amabili. 
42_9_4_Nakuyiphi indlu eningena kuyo, hlalani lapho, nize nimuke khona. 
42_9_5_Bonke abanganamukeliyo, anothi nxa nimuka kulowo muzi, nithintithe uthuli ezinyaweni zenu, kube ngubufakazi ngabo.” 
42_9_6_Bamuka-ke, bahamba imizi ngemizi beshumayela ivangeli, bephulukisa ezindaweni zonke. 
42_9_7_Kwathi uHerode umtetrarki ekuzwa konke okwenzekayo, wasambatheka ngokusho kwabanye ukuthi uJohane uvukile kwabafileyo, 
42_9_8_ngokwabanye ukuthi u-Eliya ubonakele, ngokwabanye ukuthi kuvukile umprofethi othile kwabadala. 
42_9_9_Kepha uHerode wathi: “UJohane ngamnquma ikhanda mina; kodwa ngubani lo engizwa ngaye okunje?” Wafuna ukumbona. 
42_9_10_Abaphostoli sebebuyile bamlandisa konke abakwenzileyo; wabathatha, wamuka nabo bebodwa ukuya emzini othiwa iBetsayida. 
42_9_11_Kepha izixuku sezazi zamlandela; wazithakazela, wakhuluma kuzo ngombuso kaNkulunkulu, wabaphulukisa abaswela ukuphulukiswa. 
42_9_12_Seliqala ukushona, beza kuye abayishumi nambili, bathi: “Bamukise abantu ukuba baye emizaneni nasezweni elizungezileyo, bangenise, bathole ukudla, ngokuba lapha sisendaweni eyihlane.” 
42_9_13_Kepha wathi kubo: “Bapheni nina ukudla.” Bathi-ke: “Esinakho yizinkwa eziyisihlanu nezinhlanzi ezimbili kuphela ngaphandle kokuba siyobathengela bonke laba bantu ukudla.” 
42_9_14_Ngokuba kwakukhona amadoda okungathi izinkulungwane eziyisihlanu. Wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Bahlaliseni ngezigaba ngamashumi ayisihlanu.” 
42_9_15_Benze njalo, babahlalisa bonke. 
42_9_16_Wazithabatha izinkwa eziyisihlanu nezinhlanzi ezimbili, wabheka ngasezulwini, wazibusisa, wazihlephula, wanika abafundi ukuba babele isixuku. 
42_9_17_Badla, basutha bonke, kwabuthwa imvuthuluka eyasala kubo, iziqabetho eziyishumi nambili. 
42_9_18_Kwathi ekhuleka ngasesitha, abafundi babe naye; wababuza ethi: “Abantu bathi ngingubani na?” 
42_9_19_Baphendula bathi: “UJohane uMbhapathizi; kepha abanye bathi: Ngu-Eliya; abanye kodwa bathi: Kuvukile umprofethi othile wabadala.” 
42_9_20_Wayesethi kubo: “Nina-ke nithi ngingubani na?” UPetru waphendula wathi: “UnguKristu kaNkulunkulu.” 
42_9_21_Wabayala, wagcizelela ukuba bangatsheli muntu lokho, 
42_9_22_wathi: “INdodana yomuntu imelwe ukuhlupheka ngokuningi, ilahlwe ngamalunga nabapristi abakhulu nababhali, ibulawe, ivuswe ngosuku lwesithathu.” 
42_9_23_Wayesethi kubo bonke: “Uma umuntu ethanda ukuza emva kwami, makazidele, athabathe isiphambano sakhe imihla ngemihla, angilandele. 
42_9_24_Ngokuba yilowo nalowo othanda ukusindisa ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho; kepha olahlekelwa ngukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yami uyakukusindisa. 
42_9_25_Ngokuba kuyakumsizani umuntu, uma ezuzile izwe lonke, yena uqobo alahleke nokuba alimale, na? 
42_9_26_Ngokuba yilowo nalowo onezinhloni ngami nangamazwi ami ngaye lo iNdodana yomuntu iyakuba nezinhloni, lapho iza ngenkazimulo yayo nekaYise neyezingelosi ezingcwele. 
42_9_27_Kepha nginitshela ngesiminya ukuthi bakhona abanye kwabemi lapha abangayikuzwa ngempela ukufa, baze babone umbuso kaNkulunkulu.” 
42_9_28_Kwathi emva kwalawo mazwi kungathi izinsuku zaba yisishiyagalombili wathatha oPetru, noJohane, noJakobe, wenyukela entabeni ukuyokhuleka. 
42_9_29_Kwathi ekukhulekeni kwakhe isimo sobuso bakhe saba ngesinye, nezingubo zakhe zaba mhlophe, zacwebezela. 
42_9_30_Bheka, kwakhuluma naye amadoda amabili ayengoMose no-Eliya; 
42_9_31_abonakala ngenkazimulo, akhuluma ngokumuka kwakhe abemelwe ukukufeza eJerusalema. 
42_9_32_UPetru nababe naye babekhwelwe ngubuthongo; kepha sebephapheme babona inkazimulo yakhe namadoda amabili emi naye. 
42_9_33_Kwathi ekwahlukaneni kwawo naye uPetru wathi kuJesu: “Nkosi, kuhle ukuba silapha; masakhe amadokodo amathathu, elinye libe ngelakho, elinye libe ngelikaMose, elinye libe ngelika-Eliya;” wayengazi ukuthi uthini. 
42_9_34_Esakhuluma lokhu, kwafika ifu, labasithibeza; besaba ekungeneni kwabo efwini. 
42_9_35_Kwavela izwi efwini, lathi: “Lo uyiNdodana yami ekhethiweyo; yizweni.” 
42_9_36_Kwathi livela izwi, uJesu wafunyanwa eyedwa. Bathula bona, ngaleyo mihla kabatshelanga muntu neyodwa yalezo zinto abazibonileyo. 
42_9_37_Kwathi ngangomuso sebehlile entabeni, isixuku esikhulu samhlangabeza. 
42_9_38_Bheka, indoda yasesixukwini yamemeza yathi: “Mfundisi, ngiyakunxusa ukuba ubheke indodana yami, ngokuba yiyo yodwa kimi. 
42_9_39_Bheka, umoya uyayibamba, idazuluke masinyane; uyihlukumeza, ikhihlize amagwebu, amuke kuyo eseyizukile. 
42_9_40_Ngibanxusile abafundi bakho ukuba bamkhiphe, kepha bahluleka.” 
42_9_41_UJesu waphendula wathi: “O sizukulwane esingakholwayo nesiphambeneyo, koze kube nini nginani, nginibekezelela, na? Yilethe lapha indodana yakho.” 
42_9_42_Kuthe iseza, idemoni layiwisa phansi, layihlukumeza kakhulu; uJesu wamkhuza umoya ongcolileyo, wamphulukisa umfana, wambuyisela kuyise. 
42_9_43_Bethuka bonke ngamandla amakhulu kaNkulunkulu. Besamangele bonke ngakho konke akwenzileyo, wathi kubafundi bakhe: 
42_9_44_“Khwezani lawo mazwi ezindlebeni zenu, ngokuba iNdodana yomuntu izakukhashelwa ezandleni zabantu.” 
42_9_45_Kepha abakuzwisisanga lokho kusho, kwakusithekile kubo, ukuze bangakuqondi; besaba ukumbuza ngalokho kusho. 
42_9_46_Kwavela ukuzindlisana phakathi kwabo kokuthi ngubani ongahle abemkhulu kubo. 
42_9_47_Kuthe uJesu ebona ukuzindla kwenhliziyo yabo, wathabatha umntwana, wammisa phambi kwakhe, 
42_9_48_wathi kubo: “Yilowo nalowo oyakwamukela lo mntwana ngegama lami uyangamukela mina, ongamukela mina uyamamukela ongithumileyo; ngokuba omncinyane kini nonke nguye omkhulu.” 
42_9_49_UJohane waphendula wathi: “Nkosi, sabona umuntu ekhipha amademoni ngegama lakho, samnqabela ngokuba engalandelani nathi.” 
42_9_50_Kepha uJesu wathi kuye: “Ningamnqabeli, ngokuba ongamelene nani ungakini.” 
42_9_51_Kwathi sezizakuphelela izinsuku zokwenyuswa kwakhe, wabhekisa ubuso bakhe ukuya eJerusalema. 
42_9_52_Wathuma izithunywa phambi kwakhe; zahamba, zangena emzini wamaSamariya ukuba zimlungisele. 
42_9_53_Kepha awamamukelanga, ngokuba ubuso bakhe babubheke eJerusalema. 
42_9_54_Kuthe abafundi bakhe oJakobe noJohane sebekubonile lokho, bathi: “Nkosi, uyathanda ukuba sibize umlilo wehle ezulwini, uwaqede, na?” 
42_9_55_Kepha waguquka, wabakhuza wathi: “Anazi ukuthi ningabomoya muni. 
42_9_56_Ngokuba iNdodana yomuntu ayizanga ukubhubhisa imiphefumulo yabantu kodwa ukuyisindisa;” base beya komunye umuzi. 
42_9_57_Kwathi behamba endleleni, umuntu othile wathi kuye: “Ngizakukulandela, noma uya ngaphi.” 
42_9_58_UJesu wayesethi kuye: “Izimpungushe zinemigodi, nezinyoni zezulu zinezidleke, kepha iNdodana yomuntu kayinandawo, lapho ingacamelisa khona ikhanda.” 
42_9_59_Wayesethi komunye: “Ngilandele.” Wathi yena: “Ngivumele ngiye kuqala ukuyakummbela ubaba.” 
42_9_60_Kepha wathi kuye: “Yeka abafileyo bembele abafileyo babo, kodwa hamba wena, ushumayele umbuso kaNkulunkulu.” 
42_9_61_Nomunye-ke wathi: “Ngizakukulandela, Nkosi; kepha ngivumele ngiye kuqala ukuyovalelisa abasekhaya.” 
42_9_62_Kodwa uJesu wathi kuye: “Akakho othi esebeke isandla sakhe egejeni, abuke emuva, ofanele umbuso kaNkulunkulu.” 
42_10_2_Yathi kubo: “Ukuvuna kukhulu, kepha izisebenzi ziyingcosana; ngakho-ke nxusani inkosi yokuvuna ukuba ithumele izisebenzi ekuvuneni kwayo. 
42_10_3_Hambani; bhekani, ngiyanithuma ninjengezimvu phakathi kwezimpisi. 
42_10_4_Ningaphathi sikhwama, nayika, nazicathulo, ningabingeleli muntu endleleni. 
42_10_5_“Nakuyiphi indlu eningena kuyo, qalani nithi: ‘Ukuthula makube kule ndlu.’ 
42_10_6_Kuyakuthi uma kukhona lapho indodana yokuthula, ukuthula kwenu kohlala phezu kwayo; kepha uma kungenjalo, kuzakubuyela kini. 
42_10_7_Hlalani kuleyo ndlu, nidle, niphuze abanipha khona; ngokuba isisebenzi sifanele inkokhelo yaso. Ningangenisi ezindlini ngezindlu. 
42_10_8_“Nakumuphi umuzi eningena kuwo, benamukele, yidlani okubekwa phambi kwenu, 
42_10_9_niphulukise abagulayo abakuwo, nithi kubo: ‘Umbuso kaNkulunkulu usondele kini.’ 
42_10_10_Kepha nakumuphi umuzi eningena kuwo, benganamukeli, phumelani ezitaladini zawo, nithi: 
42_10_11_‘Nothuli lomuzi wenu olunamathele ezinyaweni zethu siyaluhlangulela kini; nokho-ke yazini lokhu ukuthi umbuso kaNkulunkulu usondele.’ 
42_10_12_Ngithi kini: Kuyakuba ngcono kwabaseSodoma ngalolo suku kunakulowo muzi.” 
42_10_13_“Maye kuwe Korazini! Maye kuwe Betsayida! Ngokuba uma kwakwenziwe eTire naseSidoni imisebenzi yamandla eyenziwe kini, ngakube kade yaphenduka, ihlala ngesaka nangomlotha. 
42_10_14_Kepha kuyakuba ngcono kulo iTire neSidoni ekwahlulelweni kunakini. 
42_10_15_Nawe Kapernawume uyakuphakanyiselwa ezulwini na? Uyakwehliselwa eHayidese. 
42_10_16_“Onizwayo nina uyangizwa mina; onalayo nina uyangala mina; ongalayo mina uyamala ongithumileyo.” 
42_10_17_Babuya-ke abangamashumi ayisikhombisa ngokujabula, bathi: “Nkosi, namademoni ayasithobela ngegama lakho.” 
42_10_18_Wathi kubo: “Ngabona uSathane ewa ezulwini njengonyazi. 
42_10_19_Bhekani, ngininikile igunya lokunyathela izinyoka nawofezela naphezu kwamandla onke esitha; anisoze noniwa lutho. 
42_10_20_Nokho ningathokozi ngalokhu kokuthi omoya bayanithobela, kepha thokozani ngokuthi amagama enu alotshiwe ezulwini.” 
42_10_21_Ngasona leso sikhathi wathokoza ngoMoya oNgcwele, wathi: “Ngiyakubonga, Baba, Nkosi yezulu nomhlaba, ngokuba ukufihlile lokho kwabahlakaniphileyo nabanokuqonda, wakwambulela izingane; yebo, Baba, ngokuba kwaba kuhle phambi kwakho ukuba kube njalo. 
42_10_22_Konke ngikunikelwe nguBaba; akakho owazi ukuthi iNdodana ingubani, kuphela uYise, nokuthi uYise ungubani, kuphela iNdodana nalowo iNdodana ethanda ukumambulela yena.” 
42_10_23_Waphendukela kubafundi bebodwa, wathi: “Abusisiwe amehlo abona enikubonayo. 
42_10_24_Ngokuba ngithi kini: Baningi abaprofethi namakhosi ababethanda ukubona enikubonayo, abakubonanga, nokuzwa enikuzwayo, abakuzwanga.” 
42_10_25_Bheka, kwase kusukuma isazimthetho esithile, samlinga sathi: “Mfundisi, ngizakwenzani ukuba ngidle ifa lokuphila okuphakade na?” 
42_10_26_Wathi kuso: “Kulotshweni emthethweni? Ufunda kanjani?” 
42_10_27_Saphendula sathi: “Woyithanda iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho ngayo yonke inhliziyo yakho, nangawo wonke umphefumulo wakho, nangawo onke amandla akho, nangayo yonke ingqondo yakho, nomakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena.” 
42_10_28_Wayesethi kuso: “Uphendule kahle; yenza lokho, uzakuphila.” 
42_10_29_Kepha sona sithanda ukuzithetha sathi kuJesu: “Umakhelwane wami ngubani na?” 
42_10_30_UJesu waphendula wathi: “Umuntu othile wehla eJerusalema eya eJeriko; watheleka phakathi kwezigcwelegcwele, zamhlubula izingubo, zamshaya, zamuka zimshiya umndondo nje. 
42_10_31_Kwaqabuka kwehla umpristi othile ngaleyo ndlela; wathi embona, wamgwemela. 
42_10_32_Kanjalo nomLevi, efika kuleyo ndawo embona, wamgwemela. 
42_10_33_Kepha umSamariya othile owayesendleleni wafika kuye; wathi ukuba ambone, wamhawukela; 
42_10_34_waya kuye, wabopha amanxeba akhe ewathela ngamafutha newayini, wamkhwelisa esilwaneni sakhe, wamusa endlini yezihambi, wamgcina. 
42_10_35_Ngangomuso wakhipha odenariyu ababili, wabanika umninindlu, wathi kuye: ‘Mgcine, nalokho okwelekelayo ngiyakukubuyisela kuwe ekubuyeni kwami.’ 
42_10_36_“Ngumuphi ngokubona kwakho kulaba abathathu owaba ngumakhelwane wakhe owatheleka phakathi kwezigcwelegcwele na?” 
42_10_37_Sathi: “Yilowo owamenzela isihawu.” Wayesethi uJesu kuso: “Hamba wenze njalo nawe.” 
42_10_38_Kwathi ekuhambeni kwabo wangena emzini othile; owesifazane othile, igama lakhe nguMarta, wamamukela endlini yakhe. 
42_10_39_Wayenodadewabo othiwa nguMariya, owahlala ngasezinyaweni zeNkosi, walizwa izwi layo. 
42_10_40_Kepha uMarta ekhathazekile ukusebenza okuningi waya kuye, wathi: “Nkosi, awukhathaleli ukuthi udadewethu ungishiyile, ngisebenze ngedwa, na? Ngakho yisho kuye ukuba angisize.” 
42_10_41_Kepha iNkosi yamphendula yathi: “Marta, Marta, unakekela, ukhathazeka ngezinto eziningi. 
42_10_42_Kodwa inye into edingekile; uMariya ukhethile isabelo esihle angayikwaphucwa sona.” 
42_11_1_Kwathi ekhuleka endaweni ethile, esegcinile, omunye wabafundi bakhe wathi kuye: “Nkosi, sifundise ukukhuleka, njengokuba uJohane naye wabafundisa abafundi bakhe.” 
42_11_2_Wayesethi kubo: “Nxa nikhuleka, anothi: “ ‘Baba wethu osezulwini, malingcweliswe igama lakho; mawufike umbuso wakho; mayenziwe intando yakho emhlabeni njengasezulwini; 
42_11_3_usiphe isinkwa sethu sezinsuku zonke imihla ngemihla; 
42_11_4_usithethelele izono zethu, ngokuba nathi sibathethelela bonke abanecala kithi; ungasingenisi ekulingweni, kodwa usikhulule kokubi.’ ” 
42_11_5_Wathi kubo: “Ngumuphi kini oyakuba nomhlobo, aye kuye phakathi kobusuku, athi kuye: ‘Mhlobo, ngitsheleke izinkwa zibe zintathu, 
42_11_6_ngokuba kufike kimi umhlobo wami evela ekuhambeni, kepha anginanto engingayibeka phambi kwakhe;’ 
42_11_7_yena-ke ophakathi aphendule athi: ‘Ungangihluphi; sekuvaliwe emnyango, nabantwana bami balele kanye nami; anginakuvuka, ngikunike,’ na? 
42_11_8_Ngithi kini: Noma engazukuvuka amnike ngokuba engumhlobo wakhe, nokho ngenxa yokukhongisisa kwakhe uyakuvuka amnike konke akudingayo. 
42_11_9_“Ngithi kini: Celani, niyakuphiwa; funani, niyakufumana; ngqongqothani, niyakuvulelwa. 
42_11_10_Ngokuba yilowo nalowo ocelayo uyamukeliswa, nofunayo uyafumana, nongqongqothayo uyakuvulelwa. 
42_11_11_“Ngumuphi kini onguyise, oyakuthi nxa indodana icela inhlanzi, ayinike inyoka esikhundleni senhlanzi; 
42_11_12_uma icela iqanda, ayinike ufezela, na? 
42_11_13_Ngakho-ke uma nina eningababi nikwazi ukubapha abantwana benu izipho ezinhle, kakhulu kangakanani uYihlo osezulwini uzakubapha abacela kuye uMoya oNgcwele.” 
42_11_14_Wakhipha idemoni, laliyisimungulu; kwathi seliphumile idemoni, wakhuluma oyisimungulu; abantu bamangala. 
42_11_15_Kepha abanye kubo bathi: “Ukhipha amademoni ngoBelzebule umbusi wamademoni.” 
42_11_16_Abanye bemlinga bafuna kuye isibonakaliso esivela ezulwini. 
42_11_17_Kepha yena eyazi imicabango yabo wathi kubo: “Yilowo nalowo mbuso owahlukene wodwa uyachitheka, indlu idilike phezu kwendlu. 
42_11_18_NoSathane, uma ehlukene yedwa, umbuso wakhe uyakuma kanjani na? lokhu nithi ngikhipha amademoni ngoBelzebule. 
42_11_19_Uma mina ngikhipha amademoni ngoBelzebule, amadodana enu awakhipha ngobani na? Ngalokho-ke wona ayakuba ngabahluleli benu. 
42_11_20_Kepha uma ngikhipha amademoni ngomunwe kaNkulunkulu, umbuso kaNkulunkulu usufikile phela kini. 
42_11_21_“Uma isiqhwaga sihlomile, silinda umuzi waso, impahla yaso ihlezi ngokuthula. 
42_11_22_Kepha nxa onamandla kunaso esisukela, asinqobe, uyasaphuca izikhali zaso zonke ebesizethembile, ayabe impango yaso. 
42_11_23_“Ongenami umelene nami; ongabuthi nami uyahlakaza. 
42_11_24_“Nxa umoya ongcolileyo ephumile kumuntu, uyadabula izindawo ezomileyo efuna ukuphumula; engakufumani uthi: ‘Ngizakubuyela endlini yami engaphuma kuyo.’ 
42_11_25_Uyafika-ke, ayifumane ishaneliwe, ihlotshisiwe. 
42_11_26_Khona abesehamba, azithathele abanye omoya abayisikhombisa ababi kunaye, bangene bahlale lapho, ukugcina kwalowo muntu kube kubi kunokwakuqala.” 
42_11_27_Kwathi esakhuluma lokhu, owesifazane othile esixukwini waphakamisa izwi, wathi kuye: “Sibusisiwe isisu esakuthwalayo namabele owawancelayo.” 
42_11_28_Kepha yena wathi: “Yebo, kodwa kakhulu babusisiwe abalizwa izwi likaNkulunkulu, balilondoloze.” 
42_11_29_Sekubuthana kuye izixuku, waqala ukukhuluma, wathi: “Lesi sizukulwane siyisizukulwane esibi; sifuna isibonakaliso, kepha asiyikunikwa sibonakaliso, kuphela isibonakaliso sikaJona. 
42_11_30_Ngokuba njengalokho uJona waba yisibonakaliso kwabaseNineve, iNdodana yomuntu iyakuba njalo kulesi sizukulwane. 
42_11_31_Inkosikazi yaseningizimu iyakusukuma ekwahlulelweni kanye namadoda alesi sizukulwane, iwalahle; ngokuba yavela emikhawulweni yomhlaba izakuzwa ukuhlakanipha kukaSolomoni; bhekani, lapha kukhona okukhulu kunoSolomoni. 
42_11_32_Amadoda aseNineve ayakusukuma ekwahlulelweni kanye nalesi sizukulwane, asilahle; ngokuba aphenduka ngokushumayela kukaJona; bhekani, lapha kukhona okukhulu kunoJona. 
42_11_33_“Akakho othi esokhela isibani, asibeke esitha nangaphansi kwesitsha, kepha usifaka othini ukuba abangenayo babone ukukhanya. 
42_11_34_Isibani somzimba siyiso lakho; nxa iso lakho liphilile, umzimba wakho wonke ungukukhanya; kepha nxa lilibi, umzimba wakho ungubumnyama. 
42_11_35_Ngakho qaphela ukuba ukukhanya okukuwe kungabi ngubumnyama. 
42_11_36_Njalo-ke uma umzimba wakho wonke ungukukhanya ungenandawo emnyama, uyakukhanya wonke njengesibani sikukhanyisa ngokukhanya kwaso.” 
42_11_37_Esakhuluma, umFarisi wammema ukuba adle naye; wangena, wahlala ekudleni. 
42_11_38_UmFarisi wamangala ebona ukuthi kaqalanga ngokuhlamba engakadli. 
42_11_39_Yayisithi iNkosi kuye: “Manje-ke nina baFarisi nihlambulula ingaphandle lenkezo nesitsha, kepha ingaphakathi lenu ligcwele ukuphanga nokubi. 
42_11_40_Ziwula, yena owalenza ingaphandle akalenzanga nengaphakathi na? 
42_11_41_Kepha yiphani okungaphakathi kube yisiphiwo sabampofu, bhekani-ke, kobe kuhlambulukile konke kini. 
42_11_42_“Kodwa maye kinina baFarisi, ngokuba nithela okweshumi kwesinkuntshane, nokwentshungu, nokwemifino yonke, ninganaki ukulunga nokumthanda uNkulunkulu! Benimelwe ukwenza lokhu, ningakuyeki nalokho. 
42_11_43_“Maye kinina baFarisi, ngokuba nithanda izihlalo eziphambili emasinagogeni nokubingelelwa ezigcawini zokuthengelana! 
42_11_44_“Maye kinina, ngokuba nifana namathuna angasabonakaliyo, nabantu abahamba ngaphezu kwawo bengawazi!” 
42_11_45_Wayesephendula omunye wezazimthetho, wathi kuye: “Mfundisi, ngokusho lokho uyasijivaza nathi.” 
42_11_46_Kepha wathi: “Maye nakinina zazimthetho, ngokuba nithwesa abantu imithwalo ethwaleka kalukhuni! Nina-ke uqobo lwenu aniyithinti leyo mithwalo nangowodwa weminwe yenu. 
42_11_47_“Maye kinina, ngokuba niyawakha amathuna abaprofethi, kanti oyihlo bababulala! 
42_11_48_Ngalokho ningofakazi, nivuma imisebenzi yawoyihlo; ngokuba bona bababulala, nina-ke niyawakha amathuna abo. 
42_11_49_Ngenxa yalokho ukuhlakanipha kukaNkulunkulu kwathi: ‘Ngiyakuthumela kubo abaprofethi nabaphostoli; abanye bayakubabulala, abanye babazingele,’ 
42_11_50_ukuze kubizwe kulesi sizukulwane igazi labaprofethi bonke elachithwa kwasekusekelweni komhlaba, 
42_11_51_kusukela egazini lika-Abela kuze kufike egazini likaZakariya owabulawa phakathi kwe-altare nethempeli. Yebo, ngithi kini: Lizakubizwa kulesi sizukulwane. 
42_11_52_“Maye kinina zazimthetho, ngokuba nisisusile isihluthulelo sokwazi! Nina uqobo lwenu aningenanga, nabangenayo nabavimbela.” 
42_11_53_Kuthe ephuma lapho, ababhali nabaFarisi baqala ukumzonda kabi nokumbuzisisa ngokuninginingi, 
42_11_54_bemqamekela ukuba babambe into ephuma emlonyeni wakhe. 
42_12_1_Kwathi sezibuthene izigidi zabantu baze banyathelana, waqala ukukhuluma, ikakhulu kubafundi bakhe, ethi: “Xwayani imvubelo yabaFarisi engukuzenzisa. 
42_12_2_Akukho okusitshekelweyo okungayikwambulwa, nokufihliweyo okungayikwaziwa. 
42_12_3_Ngakho-ke konke enikukhuluma ebumnyameni kuyakuzwiwa ekukhanyeni, nalokho enikukhuluma endlebeni emakamelweni kuyakumenyezelwa phezu kwezindlu. 
42_12_4_“Kepha ngithi kinina bahlobo bami: Ningabesabi abawubulala umzimba, bengenakwenza okunye emva kwalokho. 
42_12_5_Kodwa ngiyakunitshengisa eniyakumesaba: Mesabeni lowo othi esebulele, abe namandla okuphonsa esihogweni. Yebo, ngithi kini: Mesabeni lowo. 
42_12_6_Akuthengwa yini imizwilili eyisihlanu ngezindibilishi ezimbili na? Akukhohlakele namunye kuyo emehlweni kaNkulunkulu. 
42_12_7_Kodwa nezinwele zekhanda lenu zibaliwe zonke. Maningesabi; nidlula imizwilili eminingi. 
42_12_8_“Futhi ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo oyakungivuma phambi kwabantu neNdodana yomuntu iyakumvuma yena phambi kwezingelosi zikaNkulunkulu; 
42_12_9_kepha ongiphika phambi kwabantu uyakuphikwa phambi kwezingelosi zikaNkulunkulu. 
42_12_10_Nalowo okhuluma izwi elibi ngeNdodana yomuntu uyakuthethelelwa, kepha ohlambalaza uMoya oNgcwele kayikuthethelelwa. 
42_12_11_“Kepha nxa beniqhubela emasinagogeni, nakubabusi, nakuzo iziphathimandla, ningakhathazeki ngokuthi niyakuziphendulela kanjani nangokuthini, nokuba niyakukhulumani, 
42_12_12_ngokuba uMoya oNgcwele uyakunifundisa ngasona leso sikhathi okufanele nikukhulume.” 
42_12_13_Omunye wesixuku wathi kuye: “Mfundisi, shono kumfowethu ukuba abelane nami ifa.” 
42_12_14_Kepha wathi kuye: “Mngane, ubani ongimise ngibe ngumahluleli noma umahlukanisi phezu kwenu na?” 
42_12_15_Wayesethi kubo: “Bhekani, nixwaye ukuhaha konke, ngokuba ukuphila komuntu akumi ngobuningi bempahla yakhe.” 
42_12_16_Wabalandisa umfanekiso, wathi: “Izwe lomuntu othile onothileyo lathela kahle. 
42_12_17_Wazindla phakathi kwakhe, wathi: ‘Ngizakwenzani, lokhu ngingenandawo engingabuthela kuyo ukudla kwami, na?’ 
42_12_18_“Wayesethi: ‘Ngizakwenza lokhu: ngizakudiliza izinqolobane zami, ngakhe ezinkulu, ngibuthele khona ukudla kwami konke nempahla yami. 
42_12_19_Bese ngithi kuwo umphefumulo wami: Mphefumulo, unempahla eningi ebekelelwe iminyaka emmingi; phumula, udle, uphuze, ujabule.’ 
42_12_20_“Kepha uNkulunkulu wathi kuye: ‘Wena siwula, ngalobu busuku umphefumulo wakho uzakubizwa kuwe; pho-ke, izinto ozilungisileyo ziyakuba ngezikabani na?’ 
42_12_21_“Kunjalo kozibekelela ingcebo enganothile kuNkulunkulu.” 
42_12_22_Wayesethi kubafundi bakhe: “Ngakho-ke ngithi kini: Ningakhathazeki ngokuphila kwenu ukuthi niyakudlani, nangomzimba wenu ukuthi niyakwembathani. 
42_12_23_Ngokuba ukuphila kukhulu kunokudla, nomzimba kunesambatho. 
42_12_24_Bhekani izingwababana ukuthi azihlwanyeli, azivuni, azinaxhiba nanqolobane, kepha uNkulunkulu uyazondla; nina nizidlula kakhulu kangakanani izinyoni. 
42_12_25_Ngumuphi kini ongathi ngokukhathazeka enezele ebudeni bakhe ingalo na? 
42_12_26_Ngalokho nxa ningenamandla okwenza nokuncinyane, yini ukuba nikhathazeke ngokunye na? 
42_12_27_“Bhekani iminduze ukuthi imila kanjani; ayiphothi, ayaluki, kepha ngithi kini noSolomoni ebukhazikhazini bakhe bonke wayengembathisile okomunye wayo. 
42_12_28_Uma uNkulunkulu embathisa kanjalo utshani basendle obukhona namuhla, ngomuso buphonswe eziko, kakhulu kangakanani uyakunembathisa nina eninokukholwa okuncane. 
42_12_29_Nani maningafuni eniyakukudla neniyakukuphuza; ningakhathazeki. 
42_12_30_Ngokuba konke lokho kufunwa ngabezizwe bomhlaba, kepha uYihlo uyazi ukuthi niyakudinga lokho. 
42_12_31_Kodwa funani umbuso wakhe, khona konke lokho kuyakwenezelwa nina. 
42_12_32_“Ungesabi, mhlambi omncane; ngokuba kwathandeka kuYihlo ukuninika umbuso. 
42_12_33_Thengisani ngeninakho, niphe abampofu; nizenzele izikhwama ezingagugiyo, ingcebo engapheliyo ezulwini, lapho kungasondeli sela, kungoni nundu khona. 
42_12_34_Ngokuba lapho kukhona ingcebo yenu, lapho iyakuba khona nenhliziyo yenu. 
42_12_35_“Izinkalo zenu mazibe ziboshiwe, nezibani zivutha. 
42_12_36_Nani yibani njengabantu ababheke inkosi yabo ibuya emshadweni ukuba, nxa ifika ingqongqotha, bayivulele masinyane. 
42_12_37_Zibusisiwe lezo zinceku okuyakuthi inkosi, nxa ifika, izifumane zilindile; ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Iyakuzibopha ukhalo, izihlalise ekudleni, ize izikhonze. 
42_12_38_Noma ifika ngomlindo wesibili noma ngowesithathu, ifumane kunjalo, zibusisiwe zona lezo. 
42_12_39_Kepha yazini lokhu kokuthi, uma umninindlu ebesazi isikhathi isela elizakufika ngaso, ubengayikuvuma ukuba ifohlwe indlu yakhe. 
42_12_40_Nani manibe nilungile, ngokuba iNdodana yomuntu iyeza ngesikhathi eningasicabangiyo.” 
42_12_41_UPetru wayesethi kuye: “Nkosi, usilandisa thina lo mfanekiso nokuba bonke na?” 
42_12_42_Yayisithi iNkosi: “Ngumuphi-ke umphathi othembekileyo noqondileyo, inkosi yakhe eyakumbeka phezu kwabendlu bayo ukuba abanike isabelo sabo sokudla ngesikhathi sakho? 
42_12_43_Ibusisiwe leyo nceku okuyakuthi inkosi yayo, nxa ifika, iyifumane yenze njalo. 
42_12_44_Impela ngithi kini: Iyakuyibeka phezu kwakho konke enakho. 
42_12_45_Kepha uma leyo nceku ithi enhliziyweni yayo: ‘Inkosi yami ilibele ukufika,’ iqale ukushaya abafana namantombazana, idle, iphuze, idakwe, 
42_12_46_inkosi yaleyo nceku iyakufika ngosuku engayibhekile ngalo nangomzuzu engawaziyo, iyinqumanqume, iyabele nabangakholekile. 
42_12_47_“Njalo-ke leyo nceku ebiyazi intando yenkosi yayo ingalungiselanga, ingenzanga ngokwentando yayo, iyakushaywa imivimbo eminingi; 
42_12_48_kepha ebingazi yenza okufanele imivimbo, iyakushaywa eyingcosana; yilowo nalowo ophiwe okuningi, kuyakubizwa okuningi kuye; nophathiswe okuningi, bayakubiza kuye okungaphezu kwalokho. 
42_12_49_“Ngize ukuphonsa umlilo emhlabeni; bengifunisisa kangakanani ukuba nga sewokhelwe. 
42_12_50_Kepha nginombhapathizo engizakubhapathizwa ngawo; ngikhathazekile kanjani, uze ufezeke. 
42_12_51_Nithi ngize ukuletha ukuthula emhlabeni na? Ngithi kini: Qha, kepha kakhulu ukwahlukana. 
42_12_52_Ngokuba kusukela manje kuyakuba khona abayisihlanu endlini inye bahlukene, abathathu nababili, ababili nabathathu; 
42_12_53_bayakwahlukana, uyise nendodana, indodana noyise; unina nendodakazi, indodakazi nonina; uninazala nomalokazana wakhe, umalokazana noninazala.” 
42_12_54_Wayesethi nakuzo izixuku: “Nxa nibona ifu likhuphuka entshonalanga, masinyane nithi: ‘Iyeza imvula,’ kube njalo. 
42_12_55_Futhi nxa kuphephetha iningizimu, nithi: ‘Lizakubalela,’ kube njalo. 
42_12_56_Bazenzisi, niyakwazi ukuchachisa ukuma komhlaba nokwezulu; kepha yini ukuba ningachachisi lesi sikhathi na? 
42_12_57_“Pho, yini ukuba ninganqumi ngokwenu okulungileyo na? 
42_12_58_Ngokuba, nxa uya enkosini nomelene nawe, ncengisisa usesendleleni ukuba ukhululeke kuye, funa mhlawumbe akuhudulele kumahluleli, umahluleli akunikele kulo iphoyisa, iphoyisa likuphonse etilongweni. 
42_12_59_Ngithi kuwe: Awusoze waphuma khona, uze ukhokhe ifadingi lokuphela.” 
42_13_1_Ngaleso sikhathi kwakukhona abathile abamtshela ngabaseGalile igazi labo uPilatu ayelixubanisile nemihlatshelo yabo. 
42_13_2_Waphendula, wathi kubo: “Nithi labo baseGalile babe yizoni kunabo bonke abaseGalile, ngokuba behlelwa yilokho, na? 
42_13_3_Ngithi kini: Qha, kepha uma ningaphenduki, niyakubhubha kanjalo nonke. 
42_13_4_Nalabo abayishumi nesishiyagalombili owawela phezu kwabo umbhoshongo waseSilowama, wababulala, nithi bona babe namacala kunabantu bonke abakhileyo eJerusalema na? 
42_13_5_Ngithi kini: Qha, kepha uma ningaphenduki, niyakubhubha ngokunjalo nonke.” 
42_13_6_Wayesebalandisa lo mfanekiso wokuthi: “Umuntu othile wayenomkhiwane utshalwe esivinini sakhe; weza efuna isithelo kuwo, akasifumananga. 
42_13_7_Wayesethi kuso isisebenzi sesivini: ‘Bheka, sekuyiminyaka emithathu ngiza ngifuna isithelo kulo mkhiwane, ngingasifumani; wunqume; yini ukuba uyone futhi inhlabathi?’ 
42_13_8_“Sona saphendula, sathi kuye: ‘Nkosi, wuyeke nangalo mnyaka, ngize ngivukuze inhlabathi emaceleni awo, ngiwuthelele umquba; 
42_13_9_mhlawumbe ungaze uthele ngozayo; kepha uma kungenjalo, wowunquma.’ ” 
42_13_10_Wayefundisa kwelinye lamasinagoge ngesabatha. 
42_13_11_Bheka, kwaba khona owesifazane onomoya wobuthakathaka iminyaka eyishumi nesishiyagalombili, eseqhothile engenakululama nempela. 
42_13_12_Kwathi uJesu embona, wambiza, wathi kuye: “Mame, ukhululiwe ebuthakathakeni bakho.” 
42_13_13_Wabeka izandla phezu kwakhe; weluleka khona lapho, wamdumisa uNkulunkulu. 
42_13_14_Umphathi wesinagoge, ecunukile ngokuba uJesu ephulukisile ngesabatha, waphendula, wathi kuso isixuku: “Kukhona izinsuku eziyisithupha okufanele ukusetshenzwa ngazo; ngakho-ke anoza ngazo, niphulukiswe, kungabi ngosuku lwesabatha.” 
42_13_15_Kepha iNkosi yamphendula yathi: “Bazenzisi, kanti yilowo nalowo kini kayithukululi yini ngesabatha inkabi yakhe noma imbongolo yakhe emkhombeni, ayise ukuyoyiphuzisa, na? 
42_13_16_Kepha lona, eyindodakazi ka-Abrahama, uSathane abembophile, bhekani, iminyaka eyishumi nesishiyagalombili, bekungafanele yini ukuba akhululwe kuleso sibopho ngosuku lwesabatha na?” 
42_13_17_Wathi ukuba asho lokho, bajabha bonke ababemelene naye; isixuku sonke sathokoza ngemisebenzi yonke yenkazimulo eyenziwe nguye. 
42_13_18_Wayesethi: “Umbuso kaNkulunkulu ufana nani na? Ngiyakuwufanisa nani na? 
42_13_19_Ufana nenhlamvu yesinaphi ayithatha umuntu, wayihlwanyela ensimini yakhe; yamila, yaba ngumuthi, izinyoni zezulu zaze zakhela emagatsheni awo.” 
42_13_20_Wabuye wathi: “Umbuso kaNkulunkulu ngiyakuwufanisa nani na? 
42_13_21_Ufana nemvubelo ayithatha owesifazane, wayifaka emaqomeni amathathu empuphu, kwaze kwabila konke.” 
42_13_22_Wayesedlula, wahamba imizi ngemizi nemizana ngemizana, efundisa, eqonde eJerusalema. 
42_13_23_Umuntu othile wayesethi kuye: “Nkosi, bayingcosana abasindiswayo na?” Wathi kubo: 
42_13_24_“Phikelelani ukungena ngomnyango omncinyane; ngokuba ngithi kini: Abaningi bayakufuna ukungena, bahluleke. 
42_13_25_Nxa umninindlu esukumile wavala emnyango, niqale ukuma ngaphandle, ningqongqothe emnyango, nithi: ‘Nkosi, sivulele,’ uyakuphendula, athi: ‘Anginazi lapho nivela khona.’ 
42_13_26_“Lapho-ke niyakuqala ukuthi: ‘Sasidla, siphuza phambi kwakho, wawufundisa emigwaqweni yakithi.’ 
42_13_27_“Athi-ke: ‘Ngithi kini: Anginazi lapho nivela khona; sukani kimi nina nonke, basebenzi bokungalungi.’ 
42_13_28_“Lapho kuyakuba khona ukukhala nokugedla amazinyo, nxa senibona o-Abrahama, no-Isaka, noJakobe, nabaprofethi bonke embusweni kaNkulunkulu, kepha nina nikhishelwe ngaphandle. 
42_13_29_Bayakufika bevela empumalanga, nasentshonalanga, nasenyakatho, naseningizimu, bahlale ekudleni embusweni kaNkulunkulu. 
42_13_30_Bhekani, bakhona abokugcina abayakuba ngabokuqala; bakhona abokuqala abayakuba ngabokugcina.” 
42_13_31_Ngawo lowo mzuzwana kweza abaFarisi abathile, bathi kuye: “Suka, umuke lapha, ngokuba uHerode ufuna ukukubulala.” 
42_13_32_Wathi kubo: “Hambani nithi kuleyo mpungushe: ‘Bheka, ngikhipha amademoni, ngiphulukise abagulayo namuhla nakusasa, kuthi ngosuku lwesithathu ngipheleliswe.’ 
42_13_33_Nokho ngimelwe ukuba ngihambe namuhla nakusasa nangomhlomunye; ngokuba akunakwenzeka ukuba umprofethi abhubhe ngaphandle kweJerusalema. 
42_13_34_“Jerusalema, Jerusalema, wena obulala abaprofethi, okhanda ngamatshe abathunyelwe kuwe, bengithanda kangaki ukubuthela ndawonye abantwana bakho njengesikhukukazi sibuthela amazinyane aso phansi kwamaphiko; kepha anivumanga. 
42_13_35_Bhekani, indlu yenu isisala inxiwa kini; kepha ngithi kini: Anisoze nangibona, kuze kufike isikhathi sokuba nithi: ‘Ubusisiwe ozayo egameni leNkosi.’ ” 
42_14_1_Kwathi ekungeneni kwakhe ngesabatha endlini yomunye waba yizikhulu kubaFarisi ukuba adle ukudla, bona uqobo babemqaphele. 
42_14_2_Bheka, kwavela phambi kwakhe umuntu othile owayenesifo samanzi. 
42_14_3_UJesu wathatha, wathi kuzo izazimthetho nabaFarisi: “Kuvunyelwe yini ukuphulukisa ngesabatha noma qha?” 
42_14_4_Kepha bathula. Wayesemphatha, wamphulukisa, wammukisa. 
42_14_5_Wathi kubo: “Ngumuphi kini ongathi indodana noma inkabi iyele emgodini, angayikhiphi masinyane ngosuku lwesabatha, na?” 
42_14_6_Bahluleka ukuphendula kulokho. 
42_14_7_Wabalandisa abamenyiweyo umfanekiso, ebona ukuzikhethela kwabo izihlalo eziphambili, wathi kubo: 
42_14_8_“Nxa umenyiwe ngumuntu ukuya emshadweni, ungahlali esihlalweni esiphambili, funa ngabe ukhona omkhulu kunawe omenyiwe nguye, 
42_14_9_eze yena onimeme wena naye, athi: ‘Mdedele lo;’ khona uqale uhlale kwesisenzansi unamahloni. 
42_14_10_Kepha nxa umenyiwe, hamba uhlale endaweni esenzansi ukuba, nxa efika okumemileyo, athi kuwe: ‘Mhlobo, yenyukela enhla;’ khona uyakuba nodumo phambi kwabo bonke abahlezi nawe ekudleni. 
42_14_11_Ngokuba oziphakamisayo uzakuthotshiswa; nozithobayo uzakuphakanyiswa.” 
42_14_12_Wathi nakommemileyo: “Uma wenza isidlo sasemini noma esakusihlwa, ungabizi abahlobo bakho, nabafowenu, nomndeni wakho, nabakhelwane bakho abacebileyo, funa nabo babuye bakumeme, kube khona ukwenanana. 
42_14_13_Kepha uma wenza isidlo, mema abampofu, nezinyonga, nezimpumputhe; 
42_14_14_uyakubusiswa-ke, ngokuba bangekwenanisele; uyakwenaniselwa ekuvukeni kwabalungileyo.” 
42_14_15_Esezwile lokho omunye wababehlezi naye ekudleni, wathi kuye: “Ubusisiwe lowo oyakudla isinkwa embusweni kaNkulunkulu.” 
42_14_16_Kepha wathi kuye: “Umuntu othile wenza idili elikhulu, wamema abaningi. 
42_14_17_Ngesikhathi sedili wathuma inceku yakhe ukuba isho kwabamenyiweyo ukuthi: ‘Zanini, ngokuba sekulungisiwe konke.’ 
42_14_18_“Kepha bonke baqala ukuzilandulela ngazwi linye; owokuqala wathi kuye: ‘Ngithengile insimu, kuswelekile ukuba ngiye ngiyibone; ngiyakuncenga, mawungilandulele.’ 
42_14_19_“Omunye wathi: ‘Ngithengile izinkabi eziyishumi, sengiya ukuzilinga; ngiyakuncenga, mawungilandulele.’ 
42_14_20_“Omunye wathi: ‘Ngithathile umfazi, ngalokho ngingeze.’ 
42_14_21_“Isibuyile inceku yabika lokho enkosini yayo. Khona umninindlu wathukuthela, wathi encekwini yakhe: ‘Khawuleza, uye emigwaqweni nasemingcingweni yomuzi, ungenise lapha abampofu, nezilima, nezimpumputhe, nezinyonga.’ 
42_14_22_“Yathi inceku: ‘Nkosi, sekwenziwe ngokuyala kwakho; kepha isekhona indawo.’ 
42_14_23_“Yathi inkosi encekwini: ‘Phuma uye ezindleleni nasezintangweni, ubacindezele bangene ukuba igcwale indlu yami. 
42_14_24_Ngokuba ngithi kini: Ayikho neyodwa yalawo madoda abemenyiwe eyakulizwa idili lami.’ ” 
42_14_25_Kwakuhamba naye izixuku eziningi; waphenduka, wathi kuzo: 
42_14_26_“Uma umuntu eza kimi engamzondi uyise, nonina, nomkakhe, nabantwana, nabafowabo, nawodadewabo, yebo, nokuphila kwakhe, angebe ngumfundi wami. 
42_14_27_Nalowo ongathwali isiphambano sakhe, angilandele, angebe ngumfundi wami. 
42_14_28_“Ngokuba ngumuphi kini othi efuna ukwakha umbhoshongo, angaqali ahlale phansi, abale izindleko ukuthi unakho okokuwuqeda na? 
42_14_29_Funa kuthi esebeke isisekelo, engenamandla okuqeda, bonke abakubonayo baqale ukumhleka, 
42_14_30_bathi: ‘Lo muntu waqala kabanga namandla okuqeda.’ 
42_14_31_“Noma yiyiphi inkosi eya kwenye inkosi ukuhlaselana nayo engaqali ihlale phansi, ihlole ukuba inamandla yini ukuhlangabezana ngezinkulungwane eziyishumi naleyo eza kuyo, inezinkulungwane ezingamashumi amabili na? 
42_14_32_Kepha uma kungenzeke, ingathi isekude leyo, ithuma amanxusa, icele okokuthula. 
42_14_33_Kunjalo-ke yilowo nalowo kini ongavalelisi nakho konke anakho angebe ngumfundi wami. 
42_14_34_“Usawoti uyinto enhle; kepha uma usawoti edumele, uyakuhlaziywa ngani na? 
42_14_35_Akasafanele namhlabathi namquba; uyalahlwa nje phandle; onezidlebe zokuzwa makezwe.” 
42_15_1_Kwase kusondela kuye bonke abathelisi nezoni ukumuzwa. 
42_15_2_AbaFarisi nababhali base bakhonona bethi: “Lo muntu wamukela izoni, adle nazo.” 
42_15_3_Wayesebalandisa lo mfanekiso, ethi: 
42_15_4_“Ngumuphi umuntu kini onezimvu eziyikhulu, alahlekelwe ngenye kuzo, angazishiyi ezingamashumi ayisishiyagalolunye nesishiyagalolunye ehlane, aye kwelahlekileyo, aze ayithole, na? 
42_15_5_Athi eseyitholile, ayetshathe ethokoza. 
42_15_6_Esefike ekhaya ameme abahlobo nabakhelwane, athi kubo: ‘Thokozani nami, ngokuba ngiyitholile imvu yami ebilahlekile.’ 
42_15_7_Ngithi kini: Kanjalo kuyakuba khona ukuthokoza ezulwini ngesoni sisinye esiphendukayo, kunabalungileyo abangamashumi ayisishiyagalolunye nesishiyagalolunye abangasweli ukuphenduka. 
42_15_8_“Noma ngumuphi owesifazane othi enezinhlamvu zesiliva eziyishumi, uma elahlekelwe luhlamvu lwaba lunye, angokheli isibani, ashanele indlu, afunisise, aze aluthole? 
42_15_9_Athi ukuba aluthole, abize abahlobo nabakhelwane, athi: ‘Thokozani nami, ngokuba ngilutholile uhlamvu lwami obelungilahlekele.’ 
42_15_10_Ngithi kini: Kanjalo kukhona ukuthokoza phambi kwezingelosi zikaNkulunkulu ngesoni sisinye esiphendukayo.” 
42_15_11_Wayesethi: “Umuntu othile wayenamadodana amabili. 
42_15_12_Encane yawo yayisithi kuyise: ‘Baba, nginike isabelo sefa esiqondene nami;’ wawahlukanisela impahla. 
42_15_13_“Kwathi emva kwezinsuku ezingeziningi indodana encane yayisibutha konke, yamuka, yaya ezweni elikude, yachitha khona imfuyo yayo ihamba ngokonakala. 
42_15_14_Isisaphaze konke, kwavela indlala enkulu kulelo zwe; yaqala ukuswela. 
42_15_15_Yayisiya kukhonza komunye umuntu walelo zwe; yena wayithuma emadlelweni akhe ukuba yaluse izingulube. 
42_15_16_Yafisa ukuzisuthisa ngemidumba edliwa yizingulube; kepha kayiphiwanga muntu. 
42_15_17_“Kuthe sekusile kuyo, yathi: ‘Bangaki abaqashwa bakababa abanokudla okuningi, kanti mina ngifa indlala lapha. 
42_15_18_Ngiyakusuka, ngiye kubaba, ngithi: Baba, ngonile kulo izulu naphambi kwakho; 
42_15_19_angisafanele ukuthiwa indodana yakho; ngenze ngibe njengomunye wabaqashwa bakho.’ 
42_15_20_Yayisisuka, yafika kuyise; kepha kuthe isekude, uyise wayibona, waba nesihe, wagijima, wayisingatha entanyeni, wayanga. 
42_15_21_“Indodana yayisithi kuye: ‘Baba, ngonile kulo izulu naphambi kwakho; angisafanele ukuthiwa indodana yakho.’ 
42_15_22_“Kepha uyise wathi ezincekwini zakhe: ‘Sheshani nikhiphe ingubo enhle kunazo zonke, niyembathise, nifake indandatho esandleni sayo nezicathulo ezinyaweni, 
42_15_23_nilethe ithole elikhuluphalisiweyo, nilihlabe, sidle, sijabule; 
42_15_24_ngokuba le ndodana yami ibifile, yabuye yaphila; ibilahlekile, seyatholakala;’ base beqala ukujabula. 
42_15_25_“Kepha indodana yakhe enkulu yayisensimini; yathi iseza isondela endlini, yezwa ukuhlabelela nokusina. 
42_15_26_Yabiza omunye wabafana, yabuza ukuthi kwenze njani lokho. 
42_15_27_Wathi kuyo: ‘Kufike umfowenu; uyihlo wahlaba ithole elikhuluphalisiweyo, ngokuba ubuye wamthola ephilile.’ 
42_15_28_“Kepha yathukuthela, kayivumanga ukungena; uyise wayesephuma, wayincenga. 
42_15_29_Kodwa yaphendula, yathi kuyise: ‘Bheka, iminyaka engaka ngikukhonzile; angizange ngeqe umyalo wakho, kepha mina awuzange ungiphe nazinyane lembuzi ukuba ngijabule nabahlobo bami, 
42_15_30_kodwa kuthe ukuba ifike leyo ndodana yakho eqede imfuyo yakho nezifebe, wayihlabisa ithole elikhuluphalisiweyo.’ 
42_15_31_“Wayesethi kuyo: ‘Mntanami, wena uhlala nami njalo; konke okwami kungokwakho. 
42_15_32_Kepha simelwe ukujabula, sithokoze, ngokuba umfowenu lo wayefile, wabuye waphila; wayelahlekile, sewatholakala.’ ” 
42_16_1_Wayesekhuluma nakubafundi bakhe, ethi: “Kwakukhona umuntu othile oyisicebi, owayenomphathi; yena wamangalelwa kuye ngokuthi uchitha impahla yakhe. 
42_16_2_Wambiza, wathi kuye: ‘Kuyini lokhu engikuzwa ngawe na? Landa ngobuphathi bakho, ngokuba ungebe usaba ngumphathi.’ 
42_16_3_“Wayesethi umphathi phakathi kwakhe: ‘Ngizakwenze njani, lokhu inkosi yami ingaphuca ubuphathi? Anginamandla okulima, nginamahloni ukunxiba. 
42_16_4_Ngiyakwazi engiyakukwenza ukuba bangamukele ezindlini zabo, nxa ngikhishwa ebuphathini.’ 
42_16_5_“Wababiza ngabanye abanamacala enkosini yakhe, wathi kowokuqala: ‘Unecala elingakanani enkosini yami na?’ 
42_16_6_“Wathi: ‘Amabhati ayikhulu amafutha.’ “Wayesethi kuye: ‘Thatha incwadi yakho, usheshe uhlale phansi, ulobe amashumi ayisihlanu.’ 
42_16_7_“Khona wathi komunye: ‘Wena-ke unecala elingakanani na?’ “Wathi: ‘Izilinganiso eziyikhulu zikakolweni.’ “Wathi kuye: ‘Thatha incwadi yakho, ulobe amashumi ayisishiyagalombili.’ 
42_16_8_“Inkosi yambabaza umphathi ongalungile ngokuthi wenze ngokuhlakanipha, ngokuba abantwana balesi sikhathi bahlakaniphile esizukulwaneni sabo kunabantwana bokukhanya. 
42_16_9_Nami ngithi kini: Zenzeleni nina abahlobo ngokukaMamona ongalungile, ukuze kuthi, nxa kuphelile, banamukele ezindlini eziphakade. 
42_16_10_“Othembekile kokuncinyane uthembekile nakokukhulu; ongalungile kokuncinyane kalungile nakokukhulu. 
42_16_11_Ngakho uma beningathembeki kokukaMamona ongalungile, ubani oyakuniphathisa okuyikhonakhona na? 
42_16_12_Futhi uma beningathembeki kokomunye, ubani oyakuninika okungokwenu na? 
42_16_13_“Akukho nceku engakhonza amakhosi amabili, ngokuba kokunye iyakuzonda enye, ithande enye, noma ibambelele kwenye, iyeyise enye. Ningeze nakhonza uNkulunkulu noMamona.” 
42_16_14_AbaFarisi ababethanda imali bakuzwa konke lokho, bamklolodela. 
42_16_15_Wayesethi kubo: “Nina ningabazishaya abalungileyo emehlweni abantu; kepha uNkulunkulu uyazazi izinhliziyo zenu, ngokuba lokho okuphakemeyo phakathi kwabantu kuyisinengiso emehlweni kaNkulunkulu. 
42_16_16_“Umthetho nabaprofethi kwakukhona kwaze kwafika uJohane; kusukela kuleso sikhathi ivangeli lombuso kaNkulunkulu liyashunyayelwa, wonke umuntu uphika ngokufuzula kuwo. 
42_16_17_Kepha kulula ukuba kudlule izulu nomhlaba kunokuba kuwe ibalana elilodwa lomthetho. 
42_16_18_“Yilowo nalowo olahla umkakhe, aganwe ngomunye, uyaphinga; noganwa ngolahliwe yindoda uyaphinga. 
42_16_19_“Kwakukhona umuntu othile onothileyo, owayegqoka ezibubende nezelineni elihle, ezijabulisa imihla ngemihla etamasa. 
42_16_20_Kwakukhona futhi ompofu othile, nguLazaru igama lakhe, owayelahliwe ngasesangweni lakhe egcwele izilonda, 
42_16_21_enxanela ukusuthiswa ngemvuthuluka ewa etafuleni lesicebi; yebo, kweza nezinja, zamkhotha izilonda. 
42_16_22_“Kwase kuthi wafa ompofu, wathwalwa yizingelosi, wasiwa esifubeni sika-Abrahama; nesicebi safa, sembelwa. 
42_16_23_SesiseHayidese saphakamisa amehlo aso, sisebuhlungwini, sambona u-Abrahama ekude, noLazaru esesifubeni sakhe. 
42_16_24_Samemeza sathi: ‘Baba Abrahama, ngihawukele, uthume uLazaru, agcobhoze isihloko somunwe wakhe emanzini, aphozise ulimi lwami, ngokuba ngiyahlushwa kuleli langabi.’ 
42_16_25_“Kepha u-Abrahama wathi: ‘Ndodana, khumbula ukuba wamukela okuhle kwakho usesekuphileni noLazaru kanjalo okubi; kodwa manje uyaduduzwa yena lapha, wena uyahlushwa. 
42_16_26_Nangaphezu kwakho konke lokho kubekiwe umhosha omkhulu phakathi kwethu nani ukuba abafuna ukusuka lapha baye kini bangekwenze, nabalapho bangaweleli kithi.’ 
42_16_27_“Sase sithi: ‘Njalo ngiyakucela, baba, ukuba umthumele endlini kababa, 
42_16_28_ngokuba nginabafowethu abayisihlanu, ukuze afakaze kubo, bangezi nabo kule ndawo yobuhlungu.’ 
42_16_29_“Kepha u-Abrahama wathi: ‘BanoMose nabaprofethi; mabezwe bona.’ 
42_16_30_“Sathi-ke: ‘Qha, baba Abrahama, kodwa uma kusuka umuntu kwabafileyo, aye kubo, bayakuphenduka.’ 
42_16_31_“Kepha wathi kuso: ‘Uma bengalaleli uMose nabaprofethi, kabayikuvunyiswa, noma kuvuka umuntu kwabafileyo.’ ” 
42_17_1_Wayesethi kubafundi bakhe: “Kungeze kwenzeka ukuba kungaveli izikhubekiso; kodwa maye kulowo ezivela ngaye! 
42_17_2_Kungcono kuye ukuba itshe lokusila ligaxwe entanyeni yakhe, alahlwe elwandle, kunokuba akhubekise abe munye kulaba abancinyane. 
42_17_3_Xwayani nina. Uma umfowenu ona, mkhuze; uma ephenduka, mthethelele. 
42_17_4_Noma ekonela kasikhombisa ngosuku, abuyele kuwe kasikhombisa, ethi: ‘Ngiyaphenduka,’ womthethelela.” 
42_17_5_Abaphostoli base bethi eNkosini: “Yandisa ukukholwa kwethu.” 
42_17_6_Yayisithi iNkosi: “Uma beninokukholwa okungangenhlamvu yesinaphi, beningasho kulo mthombe: ‘Simbuka, utshaleke elwandle,’ ubuyakunilalela. 
42_17_7_“Ngumuphi kini onenceku elimayo nokuba eyalusayo, athi kuyo ibuya endle: ‘Sondela masinyane, uhlale phansi, udle’? 
42_17_8_Kodwa akayikusho kuyo ukuthi: ‘Lungisa engizakukudla, uzibophe, ungiphakele, ngize ngidle, ngiphuze, andukuba udle, uphuze wena,’ na? 
42_17_9_Uyayibonga yini inceku, ngokuba yenzile ekuyaliweyo na? 
42_17_10_Kunjalo nani, nxa nikwenzile konke enikuyaliweyo, anothi: ‘Asizinceku zalutho; sikwenzile nje ebesifanele ukukwenza.’ ” 
42_17_11_Kwathi esehamba ukuya eJerusalema, wadabula iSamariya neGalile. 
42_17_12_Esangena emzaneni othile, kwahlangana naye amadoda ayishumi anochoko, amela kude, 
42_17_13_aphakamisa izwi, athi: “Jesu Nkosi, sihawukele!” 
42_17_14_Kuthe ewabona, wathi kuwo: “Hambani, niyoziveza kubapristi.” Kwathi esahamba, ahlanjululwa. 
42_17_15_Enye yawo isibona ukuthi iphulukisiwe, yabuya imdumisa uNkulunkulu ngezwi elikhulu, 
42_17_16_yawa ngobuso ngasezinyaweni zakhe imbonga; yayingumSamariya. 
42_17_17_Kepha uJesu waphendula wathi: “Akuhlanjululwanga abayishumi na? Baphi, pho, abayisishiyagalolunye na? 
42_17_18_Abafunyaniswanga yini ababuyela ukumnika uNkulunkulu udumo, kuphela lona wezizwe na?” 
42_17_19_Wayesethi kuye: “Sukuma uhambe; ukukholwa kwakho kukusindisile.” 
42_17_20_Ebuzwe ngabaFarisi ukuthi umbuso kaNkulunkulu uzakufika nini, wabaphendula wathi: “Umbuso kaNkulunkulu awufiki ubonwa ngamehlo. 
42_17_21_Futhi kabayikusho ukuthi: ‘Bhekani, nanku,’ nokuba, ‘nankuya;’ ngokuba bhekani, umbuso kaNkulunkulu uphakathi kini.” 
42_17_22_Wayesethi kubafundi bakhe: “Kuzakufika izinsuku, lapho niyakufisa ukubona lube lunye lwezinsuku zeNdodana yomuntu, kepha aniyikulubona. 
42_17_23_Bayakuthi kini: ‘Bhekani, nansiya; bhekani, nansi;’ maningayi, ningalandeli. 
42_17_24_Ngokuba njengonyazi, nxa lunyazima kwenye indawo phansi kwezulu, lukhanya luze lufike kwenye indawo phansi kwezulu, yoba njalo iNdodana yomuntu ngosuku lwayo. 
42_17_25_Kepha kuqala imelwe ukuhlupheka ngokuningi, yaliwe yilesi sizukulwane. 
42_17_26_“Njengokuba kwenzeka emihleni kaNowa, kuyakuba njalo nasemihleni yeNdodana yomuntu. 
42_17_27_Babedla, bephuza, beganwa, bendiswa, kwaze kwafika usuku uNowa angena ngalo emkhunjini, kwafika uzamcolo, wababhubhisa bonke. 
42_17_28_“Kanjalo njengokuba kwenzeka nasemihleni kaLoti, babedla, bephuza, bethenga, bethengisa, betshala, bakha; 
42_17_29_kepha ngosuku uLoti aphuma ngalo eSodoma lana umlilo nesibabule kuvela ezulwini, kwababhubhisa bonke; 
42_17_30_kuyakuba njalo ngosuku eyakwambulwa ngalo iNdodana yomuntu. 
42_17_31_Ngalolo suku oyakuba phezu kwendlu, impahla yakhe isendlini, kangehli ukuyithatha; njalo nosensimini kangabuyeli emuva. 
42_17_32_Khumbulani umkaLoti. 
42_17_33_Ofuna ukuzuza ukuphila kwakhe uyakulahlekelwa yikho, kepha olahlekelwa yikho uyakukulondoloza. 
42_17_34_Ngithi kini: Ngalobo busuku kuyakuba khona ababili embhedeni munye; omunye uyakuthathwa, omunye ashiywe. 
42_17_35_Kuyakuba khona ababili besila ndawonye; omunye uyakuthathwa, omunye ashiywe. 
42_17_36_Kuyakuba khona ababili ensimini; omunye uyakuthathwa, omunye ashiywe.” 
42_17_37_Base bephendula, bethi kuye: “Kuphi, Nkosi?” Wathi kubo: “Lapho kukhona isidumbu, kulapho amanqe eyakubuthana khona.” 
42_18_1_Wabalandisa umfanekiso wokuthi bamelwe ukukhuleka njalo, bangadangali. 
42_18_2_Wathi: “Kwakukhona emzini othile umahluleli othile owayengamesabi uNkulunkulu, enganaki muntu. 
42_18_3_Kulowo muzi kwakukhona futhi umfelokazi owayelokhu efika kuye, ethi: ‘Ngizwele esitheni sami.’ 
42_18_4_“Kwaba yisikhathi engavumi; kepha ngasemuva wathi phakathi kwakhe: ‘Nakuba ngingamesabi uNkulunkulu, nginganaki muntu, 
42_18_5_nokho-ke ngokuba lo mfelokazi engikhathaza njalo, ngiyakumzwela, funa angizuke ngokufika njalonjalo.’ ” 
42_18_6_Yayisithi iNkosi: “Yizwani okushiwo ngumahluleli ongalungile. 
42_18_7_UNkulunkulu kayikubezwela yini abakhethiweyo bakhe abakhala kuye imini nobusuku, ababekezelele, na? 
42_18_8_Ngithi kini: Uzakubezwela masinyane. Nokho nxa ifika iNdodana yomuntu, imbala iyakufumana ukukholwa emhlabeni na?” 
42_18_9_Wayesekhuluma kwabathile ababezethemba ukuthi balungile, bedelela abanye, ebalandisa lo mfanekiso ngokuthi: 
42_18_10_“Abantu ababili benyukela ethempelini beya kukhuleka, omunye engumFarisi, omunye engumthelisi. 
42_18_11_UmFarisi wema wazikhulekela ngokuthi: ‘Nkulunkulu, ngiyakubonga ngokuba ngingenjengabanye abantu: izigcwelegcwele, abangalungile, iziphingi, nanjengalo mthelisi. 
42_18_12_Ngizila ukudla kabili ngeviki, nginikela okweshumi kukho konke enginakho.’ 
42_18_13_“Kepha umthelisi emi kude wayengafuni nakuphakamisela amehlo akhe ngasezulwini, kodwa washaya isifuba sakhe, ethi: ‘Nkulunkulu, ngihawukele mina soni.’ 
42_18_14_“Ngithi kini: Lo wehlela endlini yakhe elungisisiwe kunomunye. Ngokuba yilowo nalowo oziphakamisayo uzakuthotshiswa, kodwa ozithobayo uzakuphakanyiswa.” 
42_18_15_Baletha kuye nabantwanyana ukuba abaphathe; kepha abafundi bekubona babakhuza. 
42_18_16_Kodwa uJesu wababizela kuye, wathi: “Vumelani abantwana beze kimi, ningabenqabeli, ngokuba umbuso kaNkulunkulu ungowabanjalo. 
42_18_17_Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo ongamukeli umbuso kaNkulunkulu njengomntwana kasoze angena kuwo.” 
42_18_18_Umbusi othile wayesembuza ethi: “Mfundisi omuhle, ngiyakwenzani ukuba ngidle ifa lokuphila okuphakade na?” 
42_18_19_Kepha uJesu wathi kuye: “Ungibizelani ngokuthi ngimuhle na? Kakho omuhle, munye kuphela, uNkulunkulu. 
42_18_20_Uyayazi imiyalelo ukuthi: ‘Ungaphingi, ungabulali, ungebi, ungafakazi amanga, yazisa uyihlo nonyoko.’ ” 
42_18_21_Kepha wathi: “Konke lokho ngikugcinile kwasebusheni bami.” 
42_18_22_UJesu ekuzwa lokho wathi kuye: “Usasilalelwe into inye: thengisa ngakho konke onakho, wabele abampofu, khona uzakuba negugu ezulwini; uze ungilandele.” 
42_18_23_Kuthe ekuzwa lokho, wadabuka impela, ngokuba wayenothile kakhulu. 
42_18_24_UJesu embona wathi: “Kulukhuni kangakanani kwaba nomnotho ukungena embusweni kaNkulunkulu. 
42_18_25_Kulula ukuba ikamela lingene ngentunja yosungulo kunokuba onothileyo angene embusweni kaNkulunkulu.” 
42_18_26_Abezwayo base bethi: “Pho, kungasindiswa bani na?” 
42_18_27_Kepha wathi: “Okungenzeki kubantu kungenzeka kuNkulunkulu.” 
42_18_28_Wayesethi uPetru: “Bheka, thina sishiye okwethu, sakulandela.” 
42_18_29_Wathi kubo: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Akukho muntu oshiye indlu, noma umkakhe, noma abafowabo, noma abazali, noma abantwana ngenxa yombuso kaNkulunkulu, 
42_18_30_ongayikwamukeliswa okuphindwe kaningi kulesi sikhathi nasenkathini ezayo ukuphila okuphakade.” 
42_18_31_Wayesebasondeza kuye abayishumi nambili, wathi kubo: “Bhekani, sikhuphukela eJerusalema; konke okulotshwe ngabaprofethi ngeNdodana yomuntu kuyakugcwaliseka. 
42_18_32_Ngokuba izakukhashelwa kwabezizwe, iklolodelwe, idunyazwe, ikhafulelwe ngamathe, 
42_18_33_bayishaye, bayibulale; kepha ngosuku lwesithathu izakuvuka.” 
42_18_34_Kepha bona kabaqondanga lutho lwalokho; lelo zwi lalifihlakele kubo, abakuqondanga obekushiwo. 
42_18_35_Kwathi esesondela eJeriko, impumputhe ethile yayihlezi ngasendleleni inxiba. 
42_18_36_Isizwa isixuku sidlula, yabuza ukuthi: “Kuyini lokhu?” 
42_18_37_Base beyitshela ukuthi: “Kudlula uJesu waseNazaretha.” 
42_18_38_Yayisimemeza ithi: “Jesu, Ndodana kaDavide, ngihawukele!” 
42_18_39_Ababehamba phambili bayikhuza ukuba ithule kepha kwayikhona imemeza kakhulu yona, ithi: “Ndodana kaDavide, ngihawukele!” 
42_18_40_Wema-ke uJesu, wayala ukuba ilethwe kuye. Isisondele, wayibuza wathi: 
42_18_41_“Ufuna ukuba ngikwenzeleni na?” Yathi: “Nkosi, ukuba ngibone.” 
42_18_42_UJesu wathi kuyo: “Bona! Ukukholwa kwakho kukusindisile.” 
42_18_43_Yayisibona khona lapho, yamlandela imdumisa uNkulunkulu, nabantu bonke bekubona bamnika uNkulunkulu indumiso. 
42_19_1_Wangena eJeriko, wadabula khona. 
42_19_2_Bheka, kwakukhona indoda, igama layo linguZakewu, ingumthelisi omkhulu, icebile. 
42_19_3_Yayifuna ukumbona uJesu ukuthi ungubani; yahluleka ngenxa yesixuku, ngokuba yayimfushane. 
42_19_4_Yagijimela phambili, yakhwela emthombeni ukuba imbone, ngokuba ebezakudlula ngakhona. 
42_19_5_Esefikile uJesu kuleyo ndawo wabheka phezulu, wathi kuyo: “Zakewu, shesha wehle, ngokuba namuhla ngimelwe ukuhlala endlini yakho.” 
42_19_6_Washesha wehla, wamamukela ngokuthokoza. 
42_19_7_Kuthe bekubona, bakhonona bonke, bathi: “Uye kungenisa kwandoda eyisoni.” 
42_19_8_Kodwa uZakewu wasukuma, wathi eNkosini: “Bheka, Nkosi, ngipha abampofu inxenye yempahla yami; kuthi uma ngimaphucile umuntu into ngamacebo, ngiyibuyisa iphindwe kane.” 
42_19_9_UJesu wathi kuye: “Namuhla insindiso ifikile kule ndlu, lokhu naye eyindodana ka-Abrahama. 
42_19_10_Ngokuba iNdodana yomuntu ize ukufuna nokusindisa okulahlekileyo.” 
42_19_11_Kuthe ukuba bakuzwe lokho, weleka walandisa umfanekiso, ngokuba ebeseduze neJerusalema nangokuba bebethi umbuso kaNkulunkulu uzakubonakala masinyane. 
42_19_12_Wathi-ke: “Umuntu othile wohlanga olukhulu waya ezweni elikude eyozithathela umbuso, abuye. 
42_19_13_Wayesebiza izinceku zakhe eziyishumi, wazinika omina abayishumi, wathi kuzo: ‘Hwebani ngabo, ngize ngibuye.’ 
42_19_14_“Kepha abantu bomuzi wakhe babemzonda, bathuma amanxusa emva kwakhe, bethi: ‘Asithandi ukuba lo abuse phezu kwethu.’ 
42_19_15_“Kwathi esebuyile ekuthatheni umbuso, wathi azibizelwe kuye lezo zinceku abezinike imali ukuba azi ukuthi yileyo naleyo izuzeni ngokuhweba. 
42_19_16_“Yavela-ke eyokuqala, yathi: ‘Nkosi, umina wakho uzuze omina abayishumi.’ 
42_19_17_“Wathi kuyo: ‘Kuhle-ke, nceku enhle; lokhu ufunyanwe uthembekile kokuncinyane, uzakubusa phezu kwemizi eyishumi.’ 
42_19_18_“Yafika neyesibili, yathi: ‘Umina wakho, Nkosi, uzuze omina abayisihlanu.’ 
42_19_19_“Wathi nakuleyo: ‘Nawe yiba phezu kwemizi eyisihlanu.’ 
42_19_20_“Kwafika nenye, yathi: ‘Nkosi, nangu umina wakho ebengimkhwezile esongwe endwangwini. 
42_19_21_Ngokuba bengikwesaba, lokhu ungumuntu olukhuni; uthabatha ongakubekanga, uvuna ongakuhlwanyelanga.’ 
42_19_22_“Wathi kuyo: ‘Ngizakukwahlulela ngomlomo wakho wena nceku embi. Ubuwazi ukuba ngingumumtu olukhuni, ngithabatha engingakubekanga, ngivuna engingakuhlwanyelanga; 
42_19_23_awufakanga ngani imali yami ebhange, mina-ke ekufikeni kwami ngabe ngiyibizile kanye nenzalo, na?’ 
42_19_24_“Wayesethi kwababemi khona: ‘Maphuceni umina, nimnike onawomina abayishumi.’ 
42_19_25_“Kepha bathi kuye: ‘Nkosi, unawomina abayishumi.’ 
42_19_26_“Ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo onakho uyakuphiwa, kepha ongenakho uyakwaphucwa nalokho anakho. 
42_19_27_Kodwa lezo zitha zami ezazingathandi ukuba ngibuse phezu kwazo, ziletheni lapha, nizibulale phambi kwami.” 
42_19_28_Eseshilo lokho waqhubekela phambili, wakhuphukela eJerusalema. 
42_19_29_Kwathi esondele eBetfage naseBethaniya ngasentabeni ethiwa eYeminqumo, wathuma ababili kubafundi bakhe, 
42_19_30_ethi: “Hambani niye emzaneni obhekene nani, nothi ukuba ningene kuwo, nizakufumana ithole lembongolo likhulekiwe, okungazange kuhlale muntu kulo; lithukululeni, nililethe. 
42_19_31_Uma umuntu enibuza ethi: ‘Nilithukululelani na?’ anothi: ‘INkosi iyalidinga.’ ” 
42_19_32_Ababethunyiwe bahamba-ke, bafumana kunjengokusho kwakhe kubo. 
42_19_33_Kuthe besalithukulula ithole, abaninilo bathi kubo: “Nilithukululelani ithole na?” 
42_19_34_Bathi: “INkosi iyalidinga.” 
42_19_35_Base beliletha kuJesu; babeka izingubo zabo phezu kwethole, bamkhwelisa uJesu. 
42_19_36_Esahamba, babendlala izingubo zabo endleleni. 
42_19_37_Esesondela ekwehleleni kweNtaba Yeminqumo, isixuku sonke sabafundi saqala ukuthokoza nokumdumisa uNkulunkulu ngezwi elikhulu ngemisebenzi yonke yamandla esiyibonileyo, 
42_19_38_sithi: “Ubusisiwe uMbusi ozayo egameni leNkosi, ukuthula ezulwini nenkazimulo kweliphezulu!” 
42_19_39_Abanye babaFarisi besesixukwini bathi kuye: “Mfundisi, bakhuze abafundi bakho.” 
42_19_40_Waphendula wathi: “Ngithi kini: Uma bethula laba, amatshe azakumemeza.” 
42_19_41_Kwathi esondela, ewubona umuzi, wawukhalela. 
42_19_42_Wathi: “Sengathi nga wazi nawe ngalolu suku okokuthula. Kepha kalokhu kufihlakele emehlweni akho. 
42_19_43_Ngokuba uyakufikelwa yizinsuku, lapho izitha ziyakukukaka ngodonga lwempi, zikuhaqe, zikuvimbezele nxazonke, 
42_19_44_zikuwise phansi, wena nabantwana abakuwe, zingashiyi itshe phezu kwetshe phakathi kwakho, ngokuba ungasazanga isikhathi sokuhanjelwa kwakho.” 
42_19_45_Wangena ethempelini, waqala ukuxosha abathengisayo, 
42_19_46_wathi kubo: “Kulotshiwe ukuthi: ‘Indlu yami iyakuba yindlu yokukhuleka,’ kepha nina niyenze ‘umhume wabaphangi’.” 
42_19_47_Wayefundisa ethempelini imihla ngemihla. Kepha abapristi abakhulu, nababhali, nezikhulu zabantu bafuna ukumbulala. 
42_19_48_Kodwa babengatholi ukuthi bangenzani, ngokuba abantu bonke babebambelela kuye bemuzwa. 
42_20_1_Kwathi ngolunye lwezinsuku lezo esafundisa abantu ethempelini, eshumayela ivangeli, abapristi abakhulu nababhali bekanye namalunga bamvukela. 
42_20_2_Bakhuluma, bathi kuye: “Sitshele ukuthi lokhu ukwenza ngagunya lini, nokuba ngubani okunike leli gunya na?” 
42_20_3_Waphendula, wathi kubo: “Nami ngizakunibuza izwi, nize ningitshele. 
42_20_4_Ukubhapathiza kukaJohane kwavela ezulwini noma kubantu na?” 
42_20_5_Bazindlisana bodwa, bathi: “Uma sithi: ‘Ezulwini,’ uzakuthi: ‘Anikholwanga nguye ngani na?’ 
42_20_6_Kepha uma sithi: ‘Kubantu,’ abantu bonke bazakusikhanda ngamatshe, ngokuba bakholiwe ukuthi uJohane ungumprofethi.” 
42_20_7_Base bephendula ukuthi abazi lapho evela khona. 
42_20_8_UJesu wayesethi kubo: “Nami-ke anginitsheli ukuthi ngenza lokhu ngagunya lini.” 
42_20_9_Wayeseqala ukulandisa lo mfanekiso, ethi kubantu: “Umuntu watshala isivini, wasiqashisa kubalimi, waya kwelinye izwe isikhathi eside. 
42_20_10_Ngenkathi efaneleyo wayesethumela inceku kubalimi ukuba bamnike ezithelweni zesivini; kepha abalimi bayishaya, bayimukisa ze. 
42_20_11_Waphinda wathuma enye inceku; naleyo bayishaya, bayidumaza, bayimukisa ze. 
42_20_12_Wayesephinda ethuma neyesithathu; nalena bayilimaza, bayiphonsa ngaphandle. 
42_20_13_“Khona wathi umninisivini: ‘Ngizakwenze njani na? Ngizakuthuma indodana yami ethandekayo; mhlawumbe lena bazakuyazisa.’ 
42_20_14_“Kepha abalimi beyibona bakhulumisana bathi: ‘Lo uyindlalifa; masiyibulale ukuba ifa libe ngelethu.’ 
42_20_15_Bayiphonsa ngaphandle kwesivini, bayibulala; ngakho-ke umninisivini uzakwenze njani kubo na? 
42_20_16_Uzakuza, ababhubhise labo balimi, isivini asinike abanye.” Bekuzwa bathi: “Qha, makungabi njalo.” 
42_20_17_Kepha wababheka, wathi: “Yini, pho, lokhu okulotshiweyo ukuthi: “ ‘Itshe abalinqabayo abakhi lona laba yinhloko yegumbi’? 
42_20_18_“Yilowo nalowo owayo phezu kwalelo tshe uyakuphohlozwa, kepha lowo eliyakuwela phezu kwakhe liyakumcolisa.” 
42_20_19_Ababhali nabapristi bafuna ukumbamba khona lapho, kepha besaba abantu, ngokuba bazi ukuthi uwukhulumile lo mfanekiso ngabo. 
42_20_20_Bamqaphela, bathuma izinhloli ezizishaya abalungileyo ukuba bamhile ngezwi lakhe, baze bamkhaphele emandleni nasegunyeni lombusi wezwe. 
42_20_21_Bambuza-ke bathi: “Mfundisi, siyazi ukuthi ukhuluma, ufundisa ngokuqondileyo, awukhethi buso bamuntu, kepha ufundisa indlela kaNkulunkulu ngokuqinisileyo. 
42_20_22_Sivunyelwe ukuthela kuKesari noma qha?” 
42_20_23_Kepha eqonda ubuqili babo wathi kubo: 
42_20_24_“Ngiboniseni udenariyu; unomfanekiso nombhalo kabani?” Bathi: “OkaKesari.” 
42_20_25_Wayesethi kubo: “Ngakho-ke nikani uKesari okukaKesari noNkulunkulu okukaNkulunkulu.” 
42_20_26_Abaze baba namandla ukumhila ngezwi lakhe phambi kwabantu; bamangala ngokuphendula kwakhe, bathula. 
42_20_27_Kwase kufika kuye abathile babaSadusi abathi akukho ukuvuka kwabafileyo; 
42_20_28_bambuza bathi: “Mfundisi, uMose wasilobela ukuthi, uma kufa umfowabo womuntu enomfazi kepha engenamntwana, umfowabo makamthathe umkakhe, amvusele umfowabo inzalo. 
42_20_29_Kwakukhona izelamani eziyisikhombisa; owokuqala wathatha umfazi; wafa engenamntwana, 
42_20_30_nowesibili; 
42_20_31_nowesithathu wamthatha; kanjalo-ke abayisikhombisa; bafa bengashiyanga bantwana. 
42_20_32_Ukugcina wafa nomfazi. 
42_20_33_Ngakho-ke ekuvukeni owesifazane uyakuba ngumfazi wamuphi kubo, lokhu abayisikhombisa babe naye engumkabo.” 
42_20_34_UJesu wathi kubo: “Abantwana bale nkathi bayaganwa, bayendiswa. 
42_20_35_Kepha labo abazakuthiwa bafanele ukufinyelela kuleyo nkathi nasekuvukeni kwabafileyo kabaganwa, kabendiswa; 
42_20_36_ngokuba bangebuye bafe, banjengezingelosi; bangabantwana bakaNkulunkulu bengabantwana bokuvuka. 
42_20_37_Kepha ukuthi bayavuswa abafileyo, noMose wakubonakalisa esihlahleni, lapho eyibiza iNkosi ngokuthi uNkulunkulu ka-Abrahama, noNkulunkulu ka-Isaka, noNkulunkulu kaJakobe. 
42_20_38_UNkulunkulu kasiye owabafileyo kodwa owabaphilayo, ngokuba bonke baphila kuye.” 
42_20_39_Abathile bababhali baphendula bathi: “Mfundisi, ukhulume kahle.” 
42_20_40_Ngokuba babengasenasibindi sokumbuza lutho. 
42_20_41_Wayesethi kubo: “Basho kanjani ukuthi uKristu uyindodana kaDavide na? 
42_20_42_lokhu uDavide uqobo uthi eNcwadini yamaHubo: “ ‘INkosi yathi eNkosini yami: “Hlala ngakwesokunene sami, 
42_20_43_ngize ngibeke izitha zakho zibe yisenabelo sezinyawo zakho.” ’ 
42_20_44_“Ngakho uDavide umbiza ngokuthi iNkosi; pho, uyindodana yakhe kanjani na?” 
42_20_45_Besalalele abantu bonke, wathi kubafundi bakhe: 
42_20_46_“Xwayani ababhali abafuna ukuhamba bembethe izingubo ezinde, bethanda ukubingelelwa ezigcawini nokuhlala phambili emasinagogeni nasezindaweni ezingenhla ekudleni, 
42_20_47_abadla izindlu zabafelokazi, bekhuleka isikhathi eside ngokuzenzisa; laba bayakwamukeliswa ukulahlwa okukhulu.” 
42_21_1_Kwathi ebheka, wabona abacebileyo bebeka iminikelo yabo emphongolweni womnikelo. 
42_21_2_Wabona nomfelokazi othile ompofu ebeka khona amafadingi amabili; 
42_21_3_wathi: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lo mfelokazi ompofu ubeke okuningi kunabo bonke. 
42_21_4_Ngokuba bonke laba babeka eminikelweni kokuchichimileyo kwabo, kepha yena ebumpofini bakhe ubeke konke abephila ngakho.” 
42_21_5_Besakhuluma abanye ngethempeli ukuthi lihlotshiswe ngamatshe amahle nangezipho, wathi kubo: 
42_21_6_“Kuyakufika izinsuku, lapho kungayikushiywa kulokhu enikubonayo itshe phezu kwetshe elingayikudilizelwa phansi.” 
42_21_7_Base bembuza bethi: “Mfundisi, lokhu kuyakuba nini na? Nesibonakaliso siyakuba yini, lapho sekuyakwenzeka lokhu, na?” 
42_21_8_Wathi: “Qaphelani ningadukiswa, ngokuba kuyakuza abaningi ngegama lami, bathi: ‘Nginguye;’ bathi futhi: ‘Isikhathi sesisondele;’ maningabalandeli. 
42_21_9_Nxa nizwa ngezimpi neziyaluyalu, ningethuki, ngokuba kumelwe ukuba kwenzeke lokho kuqala, kepha ukuphela akukabikho masinyane.” 
42_21_10_Khona wathi kubo: “Isizwe siyakuvukela isizwe, nombuso uvukele umbuso; 
42_21_11_kuyakuba khona ukuzamazama okukhulu komhlaba, nobhici, nendlala izindawo ngezindawo, kube khona izinto ezesabekayo nezibonakaliso ezinkulu ezivela ezulwini. 
42_21_12_“Kepha ngaphambi kwakho konke lokho bayakunibamba, banizingele, banikhaphele emasinagogeni nasematilongweni, baniyise phambi kwamakhosi nababusi ngenxa yegama lami. 
42_21_13_Kuyakunehlela kube ngubufakazi. 
42_21_14_Ngakho kugcineni ezinhliziyweni zenu ukuba ningazindli ngaphambili eniyakuziphendulela ngakho; 
42_21_15_ngokuba mina ngiyakuninika umlomo nokuhlakanipha abangemelane nakho, bakuphike, bonke abayimpi kini. 
42_21_16_Yebo, niyakukhashelwa nangabazali, nabafowenu, nezihlobo, nabangane; abanye benu bayakubulawa yibo. 
42_21_17_Niyakuzondwa yibo bonke ngenxa yegama lami. 
42_21_18_Akuyikulahleka nalunwele lwekhanda lenu. 
42_21_19_Ngokukhuthazela kwenu niyakuzuza imiphefumulo yenu. 
42_21_20_“Kepha nxa nibona iJerusalema lihaqiwe yizimpi, yazini ukuthi sekusondele ukuchithwa kwalo. 
42_21_21_Khona abaseJudiya mababalekele ezintabeni, abaphakathi kwalo baphume, abasemaphandleni bangangeni kulo. 
42_21_22_Ngokuba lezi ziyizinsuku zempindiselo ukuba kugcwaliseke konke okulotshiweyo. 
42_21_23_Maye kwabakhulelweyo nabancelisayo ngalezo zinsuku! Ngokuba kuyakuba khona ukuhlupheka okukhulu emhlabeni nentukuthelo phezu kwalesi sizwe. 
42_21_24_Bayakuwa bedliwa yinkemba, bathunjelwe ezizweni zonke; iJerusalema liyakunyathelwa phansi ngabezizwe, kuze kugcwaliseke izikhathi zabezizwe. 
42_21_25_“Kuyakuba khona izibonakaliso elangeni nasenyangeni nasezinkanyezini; nasemhlabeni usizi luyakwehlela izizwe, zixakeke ngokuduma kolwandle namaza, 
42_21_26_abantu baphele amandla ngokwesaba nangokubheka okuvelela umhlaba ngokuba amandla ezulu ayakunyakaziswa. 
42_21_27_Khona bayakuyibona iNdodana yomuntu iza efwini, inamandla nenkazimulo enkulu. 
42_21_28_Kepha nxa kuqala ukuvela lokho, lulamani, niphakamise amakhanda enu, ngokuba kusondele ukukhululwa kwenu.” 
42_21_29_Wabalandisa umfanekiso wokuthi: “Bhekani umkhiwane nemithi yonke. 
42_21_30_Nxa isihluma, niyabona, nazi ngokwenu ukuthi ihlobo seliseduze. 
42_21_31_Kanjalo nani, nxa nibona lezo zinto zenzeka, yazini ukuthi umbuso kaNkulunkulu useduze. 
42_21_32_“Ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Lesi sizukulwane asiyikudlula, kungakenzeki konke. 
42_21_33_Kuyakudlula izulu nomhlaba, kepha amazwi ami awasoze adlula. 
42_21_34_“Xwayani ukuba izinhliziyo zenu zingasindwa ngukuminza nokudakwa nokunaka okwalokhu kuphila, lunizume lolo suku ningazelele, 
42_21_35_ngokuba luyakufika njengogibe phezu kwabo bonke abahlezi emhlabeni wonke. 
42_21_36_Ngakho lindani ngesikhathi sonke, nikhuleke ukuba nibe namandla okuphepha kukho konke lokhu okuyakwenzeka nawokuma phambi kweNdodana yomuntu.” 
42_21_37_Njalo wayefundisa ethempelini emini, kepha kusihlwa wayephuma ayokulala entabeni ethiwa eyemiNqumo. 
42_21_38_Ekuseni abantu bonke beza kuye ethempelini ukumuzwa. 
42_22_1_Kwasondela umkhosi wesinkwa esingenamvubelo othiwa iPhasika. 
42_22_2_Abapristi abakhulu nababhali bafuna ukuba bangambulala kanjani; ngokuba babesaba abantu. 
42_22_3_Kepha uSathane wangena kuJuda othiwa u-Iskariyothe engowabayishumi nambili. 
42_22_4_Wasuka wakhuluma nabapristi abakhulu nezinduna ngokuthi angamkhaphela kanjani kubo. 
42_22_5_Bathokoza, bavumelana naye ukumnika imali. 
42_22_6_Wavuma-ke, waze wafuna ithuba lokumkhaphela kubo, singekho isixuku. 
42_22_7_Lwase lufika usuku lwesinkwa esingenamvubelo okumelwe ukuba kuhlatshwe ngalo iphasika. 
42_22_8_Wathuma oPetru noJohane, wathi: “Hambani niye ukusilungisela iphasika ukuba sidle.” 
42_22_9_Bathi kuye: “Uthanda ukuba sikulungiselephi na?” 
42_22_10_Wathi kubo: “Bhekani, seningene emzini niyakuhlangana nomuntu othwele imbiza yamanzi; mlandeleni, niye endlini angena kuyo, 
42_22_11_nize nithi kumninindlu: ‘Uthi uMfundisi kuwe: Liphi ikamelo lokungenisa, lapho ngingadlela khona iphasika nabafundi bami, na?’ 
42_22_12_Lowo-ke uzakunikhombisa ikamelo elikhulu eliphezulu, elendlelweyo; lungiselani lapho.” 
42_22_13_Basuka, bafumana kunjengokusho kwakhe kubo; base belungisa iphasika. 
42_22_14_Kwathi ukuba kufike isikhathi, wahlala phansi, nabaphostoli kanye naye. 
42_22_15_Wayesethi kubo: “Nginxanele nokunxanela ukudla nani leli phasika ngingakahlupheki. 
42_22_16_Ngokuba ngithi kini: Angisayikulidla ngempela lize ligcwaliseke embusweni kaNkulunkulu.” 
42_22_17_Wamukela isitsha, wabonga wathi: “Thabathani lokhu, nabelane; 
42_22_18_ngokuba ngithi kini kusukela manje angisayikuphuza okwesithelo somvini, uze ufike umbuso kaNkulunkulu.” 
42_22_19_Wayesethabatha isinkwa, wabonga, wasihlephula, wabanika, wathi: “Lokhu kungumzimba wami onikelwa nina; yenzani lokhu ukuba ningikhumbule.” 
42_22_20_Kanjalo-ke nesitsha emva kokudla, ethi: “Lesi sitsha siyisivumelwano esisha egazini lami elithululelwa nina. 
42_22_21_Kepha bhekani, isandla songikhaphelayo sinami etafuleni. 
42_22_22_Ngokuba iNdodana yomuntu isihamba njengokumisiweyo, kepha maye kulowo muntu ekhashelwa ngaye!” 
42_22_23_Base beqala ukubuzana bodwa ukuthi kungase kube ngubani kubo ozakukwenza lokho. 
42_22_24_Kwavela nokuphikisana phakathi kwabo kokuthi ngumuphi kubo ongathiwa omkhulu. 
42_22_25_Wayesethi kubo: “Ababusi bezizwe bazenza amakhosi phezu kwazo, neziphathimandla zazo zithiwa abazenzela okuhle. 
42_22_26_Kepha nina aninjalo; kodwa omkhulu kini makabe njengomncinyane, nobusayo makabe njengokhonzayo. 
42_22_27_Ngokuba ngumuphi omkhulu, ohlezi ekudleni noma okhonzayo, na? Akusiye ohlezi ekudleni na? Kepha mina ngiphakathi kwenu njengokhonzayo. 
42_22_28_Nina-ke ningababekhuthazela nami ekulingweni kwami; 
42_22_29_nanjengokuba uBaba engimisele umbuso, nami nginimisela wona 
42_22_30_ukuba nidle, niphuze etafuleni lami embusweni wami; niyakuhlala ezihlalweni zobukhosi, nahlulele izizwe eziyishumi nambili zakwa-Israyeli. 
42_22_31_“Simoni, Simoni, bheka, uSathane unifunile ukuba anihlunge njengokolweni; 
42_22_32_kepha mina ngikunxusele ukuba ukukholwa kwakho kungapheli; wena-ke, nxa usuphendukile, uqinise abafowenu.” 
42_22_33_Wathi kuye: “Nkosi, ngilungele ukuya nawe nasetilongweni nasekufeni.” 
42_22_34_Wayesethi: “Ngiyakutshela, Petru, ukuthi iqhude aliyikukhala namhlanje, ungakangiphiki kathathu ukuthi awungazi.” 
42_22_35_Wathi kubo: “Mhla nginithuma ningenasikhwama, nayika, nazicathulo, naswela utho na?” Bathi: “Lutho.” 
42_22_36_Wayesethi kubo: “Kepha manje onesikhwama kasithathe, neyika futhi; oswelayo kathengise ngengubo yakhe, athenge inkemba. 
42_22_37_Ngokuba ngithi kini: Kumelwe ukugcwaliseka kimi lokho okulotshiweyo kokuthi: ‘Wabalwa kanye nezelelesi;’ ngokuba okuqondene nami sekuyaphelela.” 
42_22_38_Base bethi: “Nkosi, bheka, nazi izinkemba ezimbili.” Wathi kubo: “Kwanele.” 
42_22_39_Wayesephuma, waya eNtabeni Yeminqumo njengomkhuba wakhe, nabafundi bakhe bamlandela. 
42_22_40_Esefikile endaweni wathi kubo: “Khulekani ukuba ningangeni ekulingweni.” 
42_22_41_Wamonyuka kubo kungathi ibanga lokuphonsa itshe, waguqa phansi, wakhuleka, 
42_22_42_wathi: “Baba, uma uthanda, susa lesi sitsha kimi; nokho makungenziwa intando yami kodwa eyakho.” 
42_22_43_Kwabonakala kuye ingelosi ivela ezulwini, imqinisa. 
42_22_44_Esosizini olunzima wakhuleka eqinisela, izithukuthuku zakhe zaba njengamathonsi egazi, aconsela emhlabathini. 
42_22_45_Esesukume ekukhulekeni weza kubafundi bakhe, wabafumana belele ngokudabuka. 
42_22_46_Wathi kubo: “Nilaleleni na? Vukani nikhuleke ukuba ningangeni ekulingweni.” 
42_22_47_Esakhuluma, bheka, kwafika isixuku; naye othiwa uJuda, omunye wabayishumi nambili, wayehamba phambi kwabo, wasondela kuJesu ukumanga. 
42_22_48_Kepha uJesu wathi kuye: “Juda, uyayikhaphela iNdodana yomuntu ngokuyanga na?” 
42_22_49_Kuthe ababengakuye sebebona okuzakwenzeka, bathi: “Nkosi, sigadle ngenkemba na?” 
42_22_50_Omunye othile kubo wayigadla inceku yompristi omkhulu, wayinquma indlebe yokunene. 
42_22_51_Kepha uJesu wathatha wathi: “Musani; sekwanele.” Wayiphatha indlebe, wayipholisa. 
42_22_52_Wathi uJesu kubapristi abakhulu, nezinduna zethempeli, namalunga ababeze kuye: “Niphumile kungathi nize kumphangi niphethe izinkemba nezinduku. 
42_22_53_Benginani imihla ngemihla ethempelini, anelulanga zandla kimi; kepha lokhu kuyihora lenu namandla obumnyama.” 
42_22_54_Base bembamba, bamuka naye, bamusa endlini yompristi omkhulu. UPetru walandela ekude. 
42_22_55_Sebebasile umlilo phakathi egcekeni bahlala phansi ndawonye; uPetru wahlala phakathi kwabo. 
42_22_56_Intombazana ethile, imbona ehlezi ngasemlilweni, yamgqolozela yathi: “Nalona ube naye.” 
42_22_57_Kepha waphika, wathi: “Sifazane, angimazi.” 
42_22_58_Emva kwesikhashana omunye wambona, wathi: “Nawe ungomunye wabo.” Kepha uPetru wathi: “Muntundini, angisiye.” 
42_22_59_Sekudlulile okungathi ihora linye, omunye umuntu waqinisa wathi: “Impela nalona ube naye, ngokuba futhi ungowaseGalile.” 
42_22_60_Kepha uPetru wathi: “Muntundini, angikwazi ukuthi uthini.” Masinyane esakhuluma, lakhala iqhude. 
42_22_61_INkosi yayisiphenduka, yambheka uPetru. UPetru walikhumbula izwi leNkosi, njengokuba ithe kuye: “Iqhude lingakakhali namhlanje, uzakungiphika kathathu.” 
42_22_62_Waphumela phandle, wakhala kamunyu. 
42_22_63_Amadoda abembambile uJesu ambhinqa emshaya. 
42_22_64_Ammboza ubuso, ambuza ethi: “Profetha ukuthi ngubani okushayileyo na?” 
42_22_65_Nokunye okuningi akukhuluma kuye emthuka. 
42_22_66_Kwathi sekusile, kwabuthana amalunga abantu nabapristi abakhulu nababhali, bamyisa emphakathini wabo, 
42_22_67_bathi: “Uma unguKristu, sitshele.” Wathi kubo: “Uma nginitshela, anisoze nakholwa; 
42_22_68_noma ngibuza, anisoze naphendula. 
42_22_69_Kepha kusukela manje iNdodana yomuntu izakuhlala ngakwesokunene samandla kaNkulunkulu.” 
42_22_70_Base bethi bonke: “Kanti uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu na?” Wathi kubo: “Nisho khona, ngokuba ngiyiyo.” 
42_22_71_Bathi: “Pho, sisaswele bufakazi na? Ngokuba sesizwile uqobo lwethu ngomlomo wakhe.” 
42_23_1_Kwase kusuka uquqaba lonke, lwamyisa kuPilatu. 
42_23_2_Baqala ukumthwesa icala, bathi: “Simfumene lo edukisa isizwe sakithi, enqaba ukuba kuthelwe imali kuKesari, ethi nguye onguKristu inkosi.” 
42_23_3_UPilatu wambuza wathi: “Wena uyinkosi yabaJuda na?” Wamphendula wathi: “Usho khona.” 
42_23_4_Wayesethi uPilatu kubapristi abakhulu nakuzo izixuku: “Angifumani cala kulo muntu.” 
42_23_5_Kwayikhona beqinisa kakhulu, bethi: “Uvusa abantu efundisa kulo lonke laseJudiya, eqalile kwelaseGalile, waze wafika lapha.” 
42_23_6_UPilatu esezwa lokho wabuza ukuba lowo muntu ungowaseGalile yini. 
42_23_7_Esethole ukwazi ukuthi ungowesifunda sikaHerode, wamthumela kuHerode owayekhona naye eJerusalema ngalezo zinsuku. 
42_23_8_Kwathi uHerode embona uJesu, wathokoza kakhulu, ngokuba kwase kukade efuna ukumbona, lokhu ebezwile ngaye; wayethemba ukuthi uzakubona isibonakaliso esithile senziwa nguye. 
42_23_9_Wambuza ngamazwi amaningi, kepha yena kamphendulanga ngalutho. 
42_23_10_Abapristi abakhulu nababhali babemi bemmangalela kakhulu. 
42_23_11_Kepha uHerode namabutho akhe bameyisa, bambhinqa, baze bamembathisa ingubo ecwebezelayo, bambuyisela kuPilatu. 
42_23_12_Ngalolo suku oPilatu noHerode baba ngabahlobo; ngokuba ngaphambili kwakukhona ubutha phakathi kwabo. 
42_23_13_UPilatu wabizela ndawonye abapristi abakhulu nababusi nabantu, 
42_23_14_wathi kubo: “Nilethe kimi lo muntu ngokuthi ungodukisa abantu. Bhekani, mina ngimhlolile phambi kwenu, kepha angifumananga cala lalezo zinto enimmangalela ngazo; 
42_23_15_kunjalo noHerode futhi ngokuba umbuyisele kithi; bheka-ke, akenzanga lutho afanele ukufa ngalo. 
42_23_16_Ngakho-ke ngiyakumshaya, ngimkhulule.” 
42_23_17_Ubemelwe phela ukubakhululela abe munye ngomkhosi. 
42_23_18_Kepha bamemeza kanyekanye, bathi: “Susa lo, usikhululele uBaraba,” 
42_23_19_yena owayefakwe etilongweni ngenxa yesiyaluyalu esithile esasenzeka emzini, nangenxa yokubulala. 
42_23_20_UPilatu wabuye wakhuluma kubo efuna ukumkhulula uJesu; 
42_23_21_kodwa bamemeza bathi: “Mbethele, mbethele esiphambanweni!” 
42_23_22_Wayesethi kubo ngokwesithathu: “Kanti lo wenze bubi buni na? Angifumananga kuye icala lokufa; ngakho ngiyakumshaya, ngimkhulule.” 
42_23_23_Kepha bamcindezela ngokumemeza okukhulu befuna ukuba abethelwe. Ukumemeza kwabo kwanqoba. 
42_23_24_Wayesenquma uPilatu ngokuthi akwenziwe abakufunayo.
