42_23_25_Wayesemkhulula owayefakwe etilongweni ngenxa yesiyaluyalu nokubulala, ababemcela, kepha wamnikela uJesu kubo njengokuthanda kwabo. 
42_23_26_Kwathi bemuka naye, babamba uSimoni waseKhurene evela endle, bamthwesa isiphambano ukuba asithwale emva kukaJesu. 
42_23_27_Kwamlandela isixuku esikhulu sabantu, kukhona nabesifazane ababemkhalela, bemlilela. 
42_23_28_Kepha uJesu ephendukela kubo wathi: “Madodakazi aseJerusalema, ningangikhaleli mina, kodwa zikhaleleni nina nabantwana benu. 
42_23_29_Ngokuba bhekani, kuyeza izinsuku abayakusho ngazo ukuthi: ‘Zibusisiwe izinyumba nezizalo ezingazalanga namabele angancelisanga.’ 
42_23_30_Khona “ ‘bayakuqala ukuthi ezintabeni: “Welani phezu kwethu,” nasemagangeni: “Sisibekeleni.” ’ 
42_23_31_“Ngokuba uma benza lokho emthini oluhlaza, kuyakwenziwani kowomileyo.” 
42_23_32_Kwakukhona nabanye, izelelesi ezimbili, abayiswa ukuba babulawe kanye naye. 
42_23_33_Sebefikile endaweni ethiwa iKhanda bambethela khona nazo izelelesi, esinye ngakwesokunene nesinye ngakwesokhohlo. 
42_23_34_Kepha uJesu wathi: “Baba, bathethelele, ngokuba abakwazi abakwenzayo.” Babelana izingubo zakhe, benzelana inkatho. 
42_23_35_Abantu bema, bebukela; nababusi bamklolodela bathi: “Wasindisa abanye; kazisindise yena, uma enguKristu okhethiweyo kaNkulunkulu.” 
42_23_36_Namabutho ambhinqa, eza kuye, amnika uviniga, 
42_23_37_ethi: “Uma uyinkosi yabaJuda, zisindise.” 
42_23_38_Kwakukhona nombhalo phezu kwakhe othi: LO YINKOSI YABAJUDA. 
42_23_39_Njalo esinye sezelelesi ebeziphanyekiwe samhlambalaza sathi: “Wena awusiye uKristu na? Zisindise kanye nathi.” 
42_23_40_Sase siphendula esinye, sasithethisa sathi: “Nawe awumesabi uNkulunkulu, ingani ukulokhu kulahlwa nawe na? 
42_23_41_thina kambe ngokufaneleyo, ngokuba samukela okulingene nesikwenzile; kepha lo akenzanga lutho olubi.” 
42_23_42_Sase sithi: “Jesu, ngikhumbule, nxa usufike embusweni wakho.” 
42_23_43_Wathi kuso: “Ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Namuhla uzakuba nami eParadisi.” 
42_23_44_Kungaba yihora lesithupha kwase kuba mnyama emhlabeni wonke, kwaze kwaba yihora lesishiyagalolunye; 
42_23_45_kwafiphala ilanga, isihenqo sethempeli sadabuka phakathi. 
42_23_46_UJesu wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu, wathi: “Baba, ezandleni zakho ngiyawubeka umoya wami.” Eseshilo lokho wafa. 
42_23_47_Induna yekhulu ibone okwenzekileyo yamdumisa uNkulunkulu, yathi: “Nempela lowo muntu ube ngolungileyo.” 
42_23_48_Zonke izixuku ezazibuthanele ukubukela lokho sezibonile okwenzekileyo, zabuyela emuva, zishaya izifuba zazo. 
42_23_49_Bonke abazana naye nabesifazane ababemlandela bevela eGalile bema kude, bebuka lezo zinto. 
42_23_50_Bheka-ke, kwakukhona indoda, igama layo nguJosefa, eyilungu lomphakathi, indoda enhle nelungileyo — 
42_23_51_yona yayingavumanga icebo nesenzo sabo — eyase-Arimatheya umuzi wabaJuda, eyayibheke umbuso kaNkulunkulu; 
42_23_52_yona yaya kuPilatu, yacela isidumbu sikaJesu. 
42_23_53_Yasehlisa, yasisonga ngendwangu enhle, yasibeka ethuneni elaliqoshwe edwaleni, lapho kungakabekwa muntu khona. 
42_23_54_Kwakulusuku lokulungisela; isabatha lase lizakuqala. 
42_23_55_Abesifazane abeza naye bevela eGalile balandela, balibona ithuna nokubekwa kwesidumbu sakhe. 
42_23_56_Base bebuyela emuva, balungisa amakha namafutha; kepha ngesabatha baphumula njengokomthetho. 
42_24_1_Kepha ngosuku lokuqala lweviki, kuntwela ngenzansi, bafika ethuneni bephethe amakha ababewalungisile. 
42_24_2_Bafumana itshe ligingqiwe ethuneni. 
42_24_3_Kuthe bengena, abasifumananga isidumbu seNkosi uJesu. 
42_24_4_Kwathi besasambathekile yilokho, bheka, nanko amadoda amabili emi ngakubo, enezingubo ezicwebezelayo. 
42_24_5_Besesaba bekhothamela phansi ngobuso, athi kubo: “Nifunelani ophilayo kwabafileyo na? 
42_24_6_Kakho lapha, kepha uvukile; khumbulani ukukhuluma kwakhe kini eseseGalile, 
42_24_7_ethi: ‘INdodana yomuntu imelwe ukukhashelwa ezandleni zabantu abayizoni, ibethelwe, ivuke ngosuku lwesithathu.’ ” 
42_24_8_Bawakhumbula-ke amazwi akhe. 
42_24_9_Base bebuya ethuneni, babika konke lokho kwabayishumi nanye nakubo bonke abanye. 
42_24_10_KwakungoMariya Magdalena, noJowana, noMariya unina kaJakobe; nabanye ababe kanye nabo babatshela abaphostoli lokho. 
42_24_11_Kepha lawo mazwi aba njengokukhuluma okuyize kubo, kabaze bakholwa yibo. 
42_24_12_Khona uPetru wasuka, wagijimela ethuneni, wakhothama, wabona izindwangu zizodwa; wamuka, waya ekhaya emangele ngokwenzekileyo. 
42_24_13_Bheka-ke, ababili babo babehamba ngalona lolo suku, beya emzaneni othiwa i-Emawuse, ukude neJerusalema amastadiyu angamashumi ayisithupha. 
42_24_14_Babekhulumisana omunye nomunye ngazo zonke lezo zinto ezehlakeleyo. 
42_24_15_Kwathi besakhuluma bebuzana, uJesu uqobo wasondela, wahambisana nabo. 
42_24_16_Kepha amehlo abo abebambekile ukuba bangamazi. 
42_24_17_Wathi kubo: “Zindaba zini lezi enikhuluma ngazo omunye nomunye nihamba na?” Base bema benyukumele. 
42_24_18_Omunye, nguKleyophase igama lakhe, waphendula, wathi kuye: “Wena uyisihambi eJerusalema, ungoyedwa ongazazi izinto ezenzekileyo khona ngalezi zinsuku na?” 
42_24_19_Wayesethi kubo: “Zinto zini na?” Bathi kuye: “NgoJesu waseNazaretha obengumprofethi onamandla ngesenzo nangezwi phambi kukaNkulunkulu nabantu bonke, 
42_24_20_ukuthi abapristi abakhulu nababusi bethu bamkhaphela ukunqunyelwa ukufa, baze bambethela esiphambanweni. 
42_24_21_Thina-ke besethemba ukuthi nguye ozakuhlenga u-Israyeli; kodwa phezu kwalokho konke sekulusuku lwesithathu lezo zinto zenzekile. 
42_24_22_Futhi nabesifazane abathile bakithi basethusile, ababeyile ethuneni ekuseni; 
42_24_23_kuthe bengasifumani isidumbu sakhe, bafika bathi babone nombono wezingelosi ezithi uyaphila. 
42_24_24_Nabathile babakithi baya ethuneni, bakufumana kunjalo njengokuba beshilo abesifazane, kodwa yena uqobo abambonanga.” 
42_24_25_Wayesethi kubo: “O nina eningaqondiyo nenilibele enhliziyweni ukukholwa yikho konke abakushilo abaprofethi! 
42_24_26_UKristu ubengamelwe yini ukuhlupheka ngalokho, aze angene enkazimulweni yakhe na?” 
42_24_27_Wayesethathela kuMose nakubaprofethi bonke, wabachasisela emibhalweni okuqondene naye. 
42_24_28_Base besondela emzaneni ababeya kuwo yena washaya sengathi udlulela phambili. 
42_24_29_Bamncengisisa bathi: “Hlala nathi, ngokuba sekuzakuhlwa, nemini isiyadlula.” Wangena wahlala nabo. 
42_24_30_Kwathi esehlezi nabo ekudleni, wathabatha isinkwa, wabonga, wasihlephula, wabanika. 
42_24_31_Amehlo abo ayesevuleka, bamazi; wayesenyamalala kubo. 
42_24_32_Bathi omunye komunye: “Inhliziyo yethu ibingavuthi yini phakathi kwethu, lapho ekhuluma kithi endleleni, nalapho esivulela imibhalo, na?” 
42_24_33_Base besuka ngasona leso sikhathi, baphindela eJerusalema, bafumana abayishumi nanye nababe nabo behlangene ndawonye, 
42_24_34_bethi: “Impela iNkosi ivukile, ibonakele kuSimoni.” 
42_24_35_Base belanda nabo okwenzekileyo endleleni, nokuthi yaziwa kanjani yibo ekuhlephuleni isinkwa. 
42_24_36_Besakhuluma lokho, yena uqobo wema phakathi kwabo, wathi kubo: “Ukuthula makube kinina.” 
42_24_37_Kepha bashaywa luvalo, besaba bethi babona ithongo. 
42_24_38_Wayesethi kubo: “Nikhathazekeleni na? Kuvelelani imizindlo ezinhliziyweni zenu na? 
42_24_39_Bhekani izandla zami nezinyawo zami ukuthi yimina uqobo; ngiphatheni, nibone, ngokuba ithongo alinanyama namathambo, njengokuba ningibona nginakho.” 
42_24_40_Esekushilo lokho wababonisa izandla nezinyawo. 
42_24_41_Kepha bengakakholwa ngenxa yentokozo bemangala, wathi kubo: “Ninakho ukudla lapha na?” 
42_24_42_Bamnika iqatha lenhlanzi eyosiweyo neqa lezinyosi. 
42_24_43_Wakuthatha, wadla phambi kwabo. 
42_24_44_Wayesethi kubo: “Yiwo lawo mazwi ami engawakhuluma kini ngisenani okuthi: ‘Kumelwe ukugcwaliseka konke okulotshwe ngami emthethweni kaMose, nakubaprofethi nasemaHutsheni.’ ” 
42_24_45_Khona wayesevula ingqondo yabo, ukuze baqonde imibhalo. 
42_24_46_Wathi kubo: “Kulotshiwe kanje ukuthi uzakuhlupheka uKristu, avuke kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu, 
42_24_47_kushunyayelwe egameni lakhe ukuphenduka, kube ngukuthethelelwa kwezono ezizweni zonke, kuqalwe eJerusalema. 
42_24_48_Nina-ke ningofakazi balezi zinto. 
42_24_49_Bhekani, ngiyathumela kini isithembiso sikaBaba; kepha hlalani emzini, nize nembathiswe amandla avela phezulu.” 
42_24_50_Wabahola, baze bafika ngaseBethaniya, waphakamisa izandla zakhe, wababusisa. 
42_24_51_Kwathi esababusisa, wahlukana nabo, wenyuselwa ezulwini. 
42_24_52_Bakhuleka kuye, baphindela eJerusalema benokuthokoza okukhulu. 
42_24_53_Babekhona ethempelini njalo bemdumisa uNkulunkulu. 
43_1_1_Ekuqaleni wayekhona uLizwi, uLizwi wayekuNkulunkulu, uLizwi wayenguNkulunkulu. 
43_1_2_Yena lowo wayekhona ekuqaleni kuNkulunkulu. 
43_1_3_Konke kwavela ngaye; ngaphandle kwakhe akuvelanga lutho kukho konke okuvelileyo. 
43_1_4_Ukuphila kwakukuye, ukuphila kwakungukukhanya kwabantu; 
43_1_5_ukukhanya kukhanya ebumnyameni, kepha ubumnyama abukwamukelanga. 
43_1_6_Kwavela umuntu ethunyiwe nguNkulunkulu, igama lakhe linguJohane. 
43_1_7_Lowo wezela ubufakazi ukuba afakaze ngokukhanya, ukuze bonke bakholwe ngaye. 
43_1_8_Yena wayengesikho ukukhanya, kepha wayengozofakaza ngokukhanya. 
43_1_9_Kwakungukukhanya okuqinisileyo okukhanyisa wonke umuntu, okwase kuza ezweni. 
43_1_10_Wayekhona ezweni, izwe lavela ngaye; kepha izwe alimazanga. 
43_1_11_Weza kokwakhe, abakhe abamamukelanga. 
43_1_12_Kepha bonke abamamukelayo wabapha amandla okuba babe ngabantwana bakaNkulunkulu, labo abakholwa egameni lakhe, 
43_1_13_abangazalwanga ngagazi, nantando yenyama, nantando yendoda, kodwa bazalwa nguNkulunkulu. 
43_1_14_ULizwi waba yinyama, wakha phakathi kwethu, sabona inkazimulo yakhe, inkazimulo njengeyozelwe yedwa kuYise, egcwele umusa neqiniso. 
43_1_15_UJohane wafakaza ngaye, wamemeza wathi: “Nguyena lo ebengisho ngaye ukuthi: ‘Lowo ozayo emva kwami uvelile ngaphambi kwami, ngokuba wayekhona kuqala kunami.’ ” 
43_1_16_Ngokuba ekugcwaleni kwakhe samukele sonke umusa phezu komusa. 
43_1_17_Ngokuba umthetho wanikezwa ngoMose, umusa neqiniso kwavela ngoJesu Kristu. 
43_1_18_Akakho oke wabona uNkulunkulu; iNdodana ezelwe yodwa esesifubeni sikaYise yiyona embonakalisile. 
43_1_19_Lokhu kungubufakazi bukaJohane mhla abaJuda bethuma abapristi namaLevi bephuma eJerusalema ukuba bambuze ukuthi: “Wena ungubani na?” 
43_1_20_Wavuma, kaphikanga, wavuma wathi: “Angisiye uKristu mina.” 
43_1_21_Bambuza bathi: “Uyini pho? Ungu-Eliya na?” Wathi: “Angisiye.” “UngumProfethi na?” Waphendula wathi: “Qha.” 
43_1_22_Base bethi kuye: “Ungubani na? ukuze sibaphendule abasithumileyo; uzisho ukuthi ungubani na?” 
43_1_23_Wathi: “Ngiyizwi lomemeza ehlane, ethi: ‘Lungisani indlela yeNkosi,’ ” njengalokho washo u-Isaya umprofethi. 
43_1_24_Labo ababethunyiwe babevela kubaFarisi. 
43_1_25_Bambuza-ke, bathi kuye: “Pho, ubhapathizelani, uma ungesiye uKristu, no-Eliya, nomProfethi, na?” 
43_1_26_UJohane wabaphendula wathi: “Mina ngibhapathiza ngamanzi; umi phakathi kwenu eningamaziyo: 
43_1_27_yena ozayo emva kwami, omchilo wesicathulo sakhe ngingafanele ukuwuthukulula.” 
43_1_28_Lokho kwenzeka eBethabara ngaphesheya kweJordani, lapho uJohane wayebhapathiza khona. 
43_1_29_Ngangomuso wabona uJesu eza kuye, wathi: “Bheka, iWundlu likaNkulunkulu elisusa izono zezwe. 
43_1_30_Nguye ebengisho ngaye, ngithi: ‘Emva kwami kuza umuntu owavela ngaphambi kwami, ngokuba wayekhona kuqala kunami.’ 
43_1_31_Nami bengingamazi; kodwa ukuze abonakaliswe ku-Israyeli, ngalokho ngizile ngibhapathiza ngamanzi.” 
43_1_32_UJohane wafakaza wathi: “Ngibonile uMoya ehla ezulwini njengejuba, wahlala phezu kwakhe. 
43_1_33_Nami bengingamazi, kodwa owangithuma ukubhapathiza ngamanzi wathi kimi: ‘Lowo oyakubona uMoya ehla ahlale phezu kwakhe, nguyena obhapathiza ngoMoya oNgcwele.’ 
43_1_34_Mina ngibonile, ngafakaza ukuthi: Lo uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.” 
43_1_35_Ngangomuso futhi wayemi uJohane nababili kubafundi bakhe. 
43_1_36_Ebona uJesu ehamba, wathi: “Bheka, nanto iWundlu likaNkulunkulu.” 
43_1_37_Abafundi ababili bezwa ekhuluma, bamlandela uJesu. 
43_1_38_Khona uJesu waphenduka, wababona belandela, wathi kubo: “Nifunani na?” Bathi kuye: “Rabi,” okungukuthi ngokuhunyushwa: Mfundisi, “uhlalaphi na?” 
43_1_39_Wathi kubo: “Wozani nibone.” Ngakho-ke beza babona lapho ehlala khona; bahlala naye ngalolo suku; kwakungaba yihora leshumi. 
43_1_40_Omunye walabo ababili abamuzwa uJohane balandela uJesu wayengu-Andreya umfowabo kaSimoni Petru; 
43_1_41_yena wafumana kuqala umfowabo uSimoni, wathi kuye: “Simfumene uMesiya,” okungukuthi ngokuhunyushwa uKristu. 
43_1_42_Wamyisa kuJesu; uJesu wambheka wathi: “Wena unguSimoni kaJona; uzakubizwa ngokuthi uKhefase,” okuhunyushwa ngokuthi uPetru. 
43_1_43_Ngangomuso wayefuna ukuya eGalile, wafumana uFiliphu; uJesu wathi kuye: “Ngilandele.” 
43_1_44_UFiliphu wayengowaseBetsayida, umuzi ka-Andreya noPetru. 
43_1_45_UFiliphu wafumana uNathanayeli, wathi kuye: “Simfumene lowo aloba ngaye emthethweni uMose kanye nabaprofethi, uJesu waseNazaretha, indodana kaJosefa.” 
43_1_46_UNathanayeli wathi kuye: “Kungase kuvele okuhle eNazaretha na?” UFiliphu wathi kuye: “Woza ubone.” 
43_1_47_UJesu wabona uNathanayeli eza kuye, wathi ngaye: “Bheka, umIsrayeli uqobo okungekho nkohliso kuye.” 
43_1_48_UNathanayeli wathi kuye: “Ungazelaphi na?” UJesu waphendula, wathi kuye: “Ungakabizwa nguFiliphu, uphansi komkhiwane, ngakubona.” 
43_1_49_UNathanayeli wamphendula wathi: “Rabi, uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu, uyiNkosi ka-Israyeli.” 
43_1_50_UJesu waphendula, wathi kuye: “Ukholwa ngokuba ngithe kuwe ngakubona uphansi komkhiwane na? Uzakubona okukhulu kunalokho.” 
43_1_51_Wathi kuye: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Nizakubona izulu livuliwe nezingelosi zikaNkulunkulu zenyuka, zehla phezu kweNdodana yomuntu.” 
43_2_1_Kwathi ngosuku lwesithathu kwakukhona umshado eKhana laseGalile; wayekhona lapho unina kaJesu. 
43_2_2_NoJesu nabafundi bakhe babemenyiwe emshadweni. 
43_2_3_Kwathi ukuba lisweleke iwayini, unina kaJesu wathi kuye: “Kabanalo iwayini.” 
43_2_4_UJesu wathi kuye: “Mame, ungene ngani kokwami na? Isikhathi sami asikafiki.” 
43_2_5_Wathi unina ezincekwini: “Nayikuphi akusho kini anokwenza.” 
43_2_6_Kwakukhona lapho izimbiza zamatshe eziyisithupha zibekwe ngesiko lokuhlamba labaJuda, ziphethe yileso naleso izilinganiso ezimbili noma ezintathu. 
43_2_7_UJesu wathi ezincekwini: “Gcwalisani izimbiza ngamanzi;” zazigcwalisa-ke. 
43_2_8_Wayesethi kuzo: “Yikhani manje, niyise kumphathi wokudla;” zayisa-ke. 
43_2_9_Umphathi wokudla ezwa amanzi aphenduke iwayini, engazi ukuthi livelaphi, kepha izinceku ezaziwakhile amanzi bezazi, umphathi wokudla wabiza umyeni, wathi kuye: 
43_2_10_“Wonke umuntu ubeka iwayini elimnandi kuqala, kuthi lapha sebephuze kakhulu, akhiphe elibi kunalo; wena ugcinile elimnandi kuze kube manje.” 
43_2_11_Lokho ukuqala kwezibonakaliso wakwenza uJesu eKhana laseGalile ebonakalisa inkazimulo yakhe; abafundi bakhe bakholwa nguye. 
43_2_12_Ngasemva kwalokho wehlela eKapernawume, yena, nonina, nabafowabo, nabafundi bakhe, bahlala khona izinsuku ezingeziningi. 
43_2_13_Lalisondele iPhasika labaJuda; uJesu wakhuphukela eJerusalema. 
43_2_14_Wafumana ethempelini abathengisa ngezinkomo nangezimvu nangamajuba, nabahlezi beshintsha imali. 
43_2_15_Wayesenza inkalivasi ngezintambo, waxosha bonke ethempelini, nezimvu nezinkomo, wachitha imali yabashintshayo, wagumbuqela amatafula, 
43_2_16_wathi kwabathengisa ngamajuba: “Susani lokhu lapha, ningayenzi indlu kaBaba indlu yokuthengelana.” 
43_2_17_Abafundi bakhe bakhumbula ukuba kulotshwe ukuthi: “Ukushisekela indlu yakho kuyangidla.” 
43_2_18_Ngakho-ke abaJuda baphendula, bathi kuye: “Usitshengisa isibonakaliso sini ukuba wenze lokhu na?” 
43_2_19_UJesu waphendula, wathi kubo: “Bhidlizani leli thempeli, ngizakulivusa ngezinsuku ezintathu.” 
43_2_20_Ngakho bathi abaJuda: “Leli thempeli kwaba yiminyaka engamashumi amane nesithupha lakhiwa, wena-ke uzakulivusa ngezinsuku ezintathu na?” 
43_2_21_Kepha wayekhuluma ngethempeli lomzimba wakhe. 
43_2_22_Kuthe esevukile kwabafileyo, abafundi bakhe bakhumbula ukuthi washo njalo kubo; bakholwa ngumbhalo nezwi abelishilo uJesu.. 
43_2_23_Kwathi eseJerusalema ngePhasika emkhosini, abaningi bakholwa egameni lakhe bebona izibonakaliso zakhe azenzayo; 
43_2_24_kepha uJesu yena kabethembanga ukuba abhobokelane nabo, ngokuba wayebazi bonke, 
43_2_25_nangokuba engaswele nobani amfakazele ngomuntu; wayekwazi yena okuphakathi komuntu. 
43_3_1_Kwakukhona umuntu wakubaFarisi, nguNikodemu igama lakhe, isikhulu sabaJuda. 
43_3_2_Lowo-ke weza kuye ebusuku, wathi kuye: “Rabi, siyazi ukuthi ungumfundisi ovele kuNkulunkulu, ngokuba akakho ongenza lezi zibonakaliso ozenzayo, uma uNkulunkulu engenaye.” 
43_3_3_UJesu waphendula, wathi kuye: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Uma umuntu engazalwa ngokusha, angewubone umbuso kaNkulunkulu.” 
43_3_4_UNikodemu wathi kuye: “Umuntu angazalwa kanjani esemdala na? Angangena ngokwesibili esiswini sikanina, azalwe, na?” 
43_3_5_Waphendula uJesu, wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Uma umuntu engazalwa ngamanzi nangoMoya, angengene embusweni kaNkulunkulu. 
43_3_6_Lokho okuzelwe yinyama kuyinyama; nalokho okuzelwe nguMoya kungumoya. 
43_3_7_Ungamangali ngokuba ngithe kuwe: ‘Nimelwe ukuzalwa ngokusha.’ 
43_3_8_Umoya uphephetha lapha uthanda khona; uyaluzwa udumo lwawo, kodwa kawazi lapho uvela khona nalapho uya khona; banjalo bonke abazelwe nguMoya.” 
43_3_9_UNikodemu waphendula, wathi kuye: “Lokhu kungenzeka kanjani na?” 
43_3_10_UJesu waphendula, wathi kuye: “Wena ungumfundisi ka-Israyeli, awukwazi lokhu na? 
43_3_11_Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Sikhuluma esikwaziyo, sifakaza ngesikubonileyo; kepha anibamukeli ubufakazi bethu. 
43_3_12_Nxa nginitshelile okomhlaba, kanakholwa; ningakholwa kanjani, uma nginitshela okwasezulwini na? 
43_3_13_Akakho owenyukele ezulwini, kuphela yena owehla ezulwini, iNdodana yomuntu. 
43_3_14_Njengokuba uMose waphakamisa inyoka ehlane, kanjalo iNdodana yomuntu imelwe ukuphakanyiswa 
43_3_15_ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo abe nokuphila okuphakade. 
43_3_16_“Ngokuba uNkulunkulu walithanda izwe kangaka, waze wanikela ngeNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yiyo angabhubhi, kodwa abe nokuphila okuphakade. 
43_3_17_Ngokuba uNkulunkulu kayithumelanga iNdodana ezweni ukuba yahlulele izwe, kodwa ukuba izwe lisindiswe ngayo. 
43_3_18_Okholwa yiyo kahlulelwa; ongakholwa usahlulelwe, lokhu engakholwanga egameni leNdodana ezelwe yodwa kaNkulunkulu. 
43_3_19_Ukwahlulela kuyilokhu ukuba ukukhanya kufikile ezweni, kepha abantu bathanda ubumnyama kunokukhanya, ngokuba imisebenzi yabo ibimibi. 
43_3_20_Ngokuba yilowo nalowo owenza okubi uzonda ukukhanya, akezi ekukhanyeni ukuba imisebenzi yakhe ingasolwa. 
43_3_21_Kepha owenza iqiniso uyeza ekukhanyeni, ukuze imisebenzi yakhe ibonakaliswe ukuthi yenziwe kuNkulunkulu.” 
43_3_22_Ngasemva kwalokho uJesu weza nabafundi bakhe ezweni laseJudiya; wahlala khona nabo, wabhapathiza. 
43_3_23_Naye uJohane wayebhapathiza e-Enoni eduze neSalimi, ngokuba amanzi ayemaningi lapho; beza babhapathizwa. 
43_3_24_Ngokuba uJohane wayengakafakwa etilongweni. 
43_3_25_Kwase kuvela ukuphikisana phakathi kwabafundi bakaJohane nabaJuda ngokuhlambulula. 
43_3_26_Base beza kuJohane, bathi kuye: “Rabi, lowo owayenawe phesheya kweJordani, owamfakazelayo, bheka, uyabhapathiza, bonke beza kuye.” 
43_3_27_UJohane waphendula wathi: “Umuntu angelwamukele utho, uma engaluphiwanga luvela ezulwini. 
43_3_28_Nina ngokwenu niyangifakazela ukuba ngathi: ‘Angisiye uKristu mina, kodwa ngithunyiwe ngaphambi kwakhe.’ 
43_3_29_Onomlobokazi ungumyeni, kepha umhlobo womyeni omiyo emuzwa uthokoza nokuthokoza ngezwi lomyeni. Le ntokozo yami isiphelele. 
43_3_30_Umelwe ukukhula yena, nginciphe mina. 
43_3_31_“Ovela phezulu uphezu kwakho konke; ovela emhlabeni ungowomhlaba, ukhuluma okomhlaba. Ovela ezulwini uphezu kwakho konke. 
43_3_32_Akubonileyo nakuzwileyo lokho ufakaza ngakho; kepha akakho owamukela ubufakazi bakhe. 
43_3_33_Owamukele ubufakazi bakhe ulubekile uphawu lokuthi uNkulunkulu uqinisile. 
43_3_34_Ngokuba lowo uNkulunkulu amthumileyo ukhuluma amazwi kaNkulunkulu; ngokuba akaniki uMoya ngokulinganisela. 
43_3_35_UYise uyayithanda iNdodana, wanikela konke esandleni sayo. 
43_3_36_Okholwa yiNdodana unokuphila okuphakade; kepha ongakholwa yiNdodana kayikubona ukuphila, kodwa intukuthelo kaNkulunkulu ihlezi phezu kwakhe.” 
43_4_1_Kwathi ukuba iNkosi yazi ukuthi abaFarisi bezwile ukuba uJesu wenza abafundi, ebhapathiza abaningi kunoJohane, 
43_4_2_ingani uJesu uqobo kabhapathizanga, kodwa kwakubhapathiza abafundi bakhe, 
43_4_3_yamuka eJudiya, yaphindela eGalile. 
43_4_4_Kwakuswelekile ukuba adabule iSamariya. 
43_4_5_Khona wafika emzini waseSamariya ogama lawo yiSikhari, eduze nesiqinti uJakobe asinika uJosefa indodana yakhe. 
43_4_6_Wawukhona lapho umthombo kaJakobe. Ngakho uJesu ekhathele ukuhamba wayesehlala ngasemthonjeni. Kwakungaba yihora lesithupha. 
43_4_7_Owesifazane waseSamariya weza ezokukha amanzi. UJesu wathi kuye: “Ngiphuzise.” 
43_4_8_Ngokuba abafundi bakhe babehambile baya emzini beyothenga ukudla. 
43_4_9_Khona owesifazane waseSamariya wathi kuye: “Yini ukuba wena ongumJuda ucele ukuphuziswa yimi engingowesifazane waseSamariya na?” Ngokuba abaJuda abadlelani namaSamariya. 
43_4_10_UJesu waphendula, wathi kuye: “Uma ubusazi isipho sikaNkulunkulu nokuthi ngubani othi kuwe: ‘Ngiphuzise,’ nga ucele kuye, yena nga ekunikile amanzi aphilayo.” 
43_4_11_Wathi kuye: “Nkosi, awuphethe lutho lokukha amanzi, umthombo ujulile; uwathathaphi, pho, lawo manzi aphilayo na? 
43_4_12_Kanti wena umkhulu yini kunobaba uJakobe owasinika lo mthombo, waphuza kuwo, yena kanye namadodana akhe nemihlambi yakhe, na?” 
43_4_13_Waphendula uJesu, wathi kuye: “Yilowo nalowo ophuza lawa manzi uyakubuye ome; 
43_4_14_kepha lowo oyakuphuza amanzi engiyakumnika wona kasayikoma naphakade; kepha amanzi engiyakumnika wona, phakathi kwakhe ayakuba ngumthombo wamanzi aphuphumayo, kube ngukuphila okuphakade.” 
43_4_15_Owesifazane wathi kuye: “Nkosi, ngiphe lawo manzi ukuba ngingomi, ngingabe ngiseza ukukha lapha.” 
43_4_16_Wathi kuye: “Hamba ubize indoda yakho, uze lapha.” 
43_4_17_Owesifazane waphendula wathi: “Anginandoda.” UJesu wathi kuye: “Usho kahle ukuthi: ‘Anginandoda;’ 
43_4_18_ngokuba usuke waba namadoda ayisihlanu; le onayo kalokhu akusiyo indoda yakho. Lokhu ukusho ngeqiniso.” 
43_4_19_Owesifazane wathi kuye: “Nkosi, ngiyabona ukuthi ungumprofethi wena. 
43_4_20_Okhokho bethu babekhulekela kule ntaba; nina-ke nithi iseJerusalema indawo lapho kufanele kukhulekelwe khona.” 
43_4_21_UJesu wathi kuye: “Sifazane, kholwa yimi, isikhathi siyeza, lapho ningasayikukhuleka kuBaba nakule ntaba naseJerusalema. 
43_4_22_Nina nikhuleka kweningakwaziyo, thina sikhuleka kwesikwaziyo; ngokuba insindiso ivela kubaJuda. 
43_4_23_Kodwa isikhathi siyeza, sesikhona namanje, lapho abakhulekayo abaqinisileyo beyakukhuleka kuBaba ngomoya nangeqiniso; ngokuba uBaba ufuna abakhuleka kuye abanjalo. 
43_4_24_UNkulunkulu unguMoya; abakhuleka kuye bafanele ukukhuleka ngomoya nangeqiniso.” 
43_4_25_Owesifazane wathi kuye: “Ngiyazi ukuthi uMesiya uyeza, othiwa uKristu; nxa esefikile yena, uyakusitshela konke.” 
43_4_26_UJesu wathi: “Nginguye mina engikhuluma nawe.” 
43_4_27_Ngaleyo nkathi bafika abafundi bakhe; bamangala ngokuba ekhuluma nowesifazane; nokho akubangakho owathi: “Ufunani na?” noma: “Ukhulumelani naye na?” 
43_4_28_Owesifazane wayeseshiya imbiza yakhe, waya emzini, wathi kubantu: 
43_4_29_“Wozani nibone umuntu ongitshele konke engikwenzileyo; kungebe nguye uKristu na?” 
43_4_30_Baphuma emzini, beza kuye. 
43_4_31_Kusenjalo abafundi bamncenga bathi: “Rabi, yidla.” 
43_4_32_Kepha wathi kubo: “Nginokudla engikudlayo eningakwaziyo.” 
43_4_33_Base bekhuluma bodwa abafundi, bethi: “Ukhona yini omlethele ukudla na?” 
43_4_34_UJesu wathi kubo: “Ukudla kwami kungukwenza intando yongithumileyo, ngifeze umsebenzi wakhe. 
43_4_35_Anisho yini ukuthi izinyanga zisezine kufike ukuvuna na? Bhekani, ngithi kini: Phakamisani amehlo enu, nibone ukuthi amasimu asemhlophe, aselungele ukuvunwa. 
43_4_36_Ovunayo wamukeliswa umvuzo, abuthe isithelo kube ngukuphila okuphakade ukuba ohlwanyelayo athokoze kanye novunayo. 
43_4_37_Ngokuba kulokhu liqinisile izwi lokuthi: ‘Omunye uyahlwanyela, omunye avune.’ 
43_4_38_Mina nganithumela ukuvuna lokho eningakusebenzanga; abanye basebenzile, nina-ke ningene emsebenzini wabo.” 
43_4_39_AmaSamariya amaningi alowo muzi akholwa nguye ngezwi lowesifazane owafakaza ngokuthi: “Ungitshele konke engikwenzileyo.” 
43_4_40_Athe ukuba eze kuye amaSamariya, amncenga ukuba ahlale nawo; wahlala khona izinsuku ezimbili. 
43_4_41_Bakholwa abaningi kakhulu futhi ngenxa yezwi lakhe. 
43_4_42_Base bethi kowesifazane: “Asisakholwa ngokulanda kwakho nje, ngokuba sesizizwele ngokwethu, siyazi ukuthi lo ngempela unguMsindisi wezwe.” 
43_4_43_Kepha emva kwezinsuku ezimbili waphuma lapho ukuya eGalile. 
43_4_44_Ngokuba uJesu uqobo wafakaza ngokuthi umprofethi kaziswa ezweni lakubo. 
43_4_45_Kuthe-ke ukuba afike eGalile, abaseGalile bamamukela bebone konke akwenzayo eJerusalema emkhosini; ngokuba nabo babezile emkhosini. 
43_4_46_UJesu wayesephinda eza eKhana laseGalile, lapho enza khona amanzi abe yiwayini. Kwakukhona induna ethile yenkosi endodana yayo yayigula eKapernawume. 
43_4_47_Yathi ukuba izwe ukuthi uJesu ufikile eGalile evela eJudiya, yaya kuye, yamncenga ukuba ehle aphulukise indodana yayo, ngokuba yayisizakufa. 
43_4_48_Ngakho-ke uJesu wathi kuyo: “Uma ningaboni izibonakaliso nezimangaliso, anisoze nakholwa.” 
43_4_49_Induna yenkosi yathi kuye: “Nkosi, yehla engakafi umntanami.” 
43_4_50_Wathi kuyo uJesu: “Hamba, indodana yakho iphilile.” Lowo muntu wakholwa yizwi alishilo kuye uJesu, wahamba. 
43_4_51_Kwathi esehla, izinceku zakhe zamhlangabeza, zathi umntanakhe uphilile. 
43_4_52_Wayesezibuza isikhathi aqale ngaso ukuba ngcono; khona zathi kuye: “Umkhuhlane umyekile izolo ngehora lesikhombisa.” 
43_4_53_Wayeseqonda uyise ukuthi yilona lelo hora uJesu asho ngalo kuye ukuthi: “Indodana yakho iphilile.” Wakholwa yena nendlu yakhe yonke. 
43_4_54_Leso siyisibonakaliso sesibili uJesu asenza efikile eGalile evela eJudiya. 
43_5_1_Emva kwalokho kwakukhona umkhosi wabaJuda; uJesu wakhuphukela eJerusalema. 
43_5_2_Kukhona-ke eJerusalema ngasesangweni lezimvu ichibi elithiwa ngesiHeberu iBethesda, linemipheme eyisihlanu. 
43_5_3_Kwakulele kuyo abagulayo abaningi kakhulu, izimpumputhe, nezinyonga, nabashwabeneyo, belindele ukuzanyazanyiswa kwamanzi. 
43_5_4_Ngokuba ingelosi yayehla izikhathi ngezikhathi, izamazamise amanzi, kuthi lowo ongene kuqala emva kokuzanyazanyiswa kwamanzi asinde esifweni sakhe, noma enasifo sini. 
43_5_5_Kwakukhona lapho umuntu othile owayesegule iminyaka engamashumi amathathu nesishiyagalombili. 
43_5_6_UJesu embona elele, azi ukuthi usenesikhathi eside enjalo, wathi kuye: “Uyathanda ukusinda na?” 
43_5_7_Ogulayo wamphendula wathi: “Nkosi, anginamuntu wokungifaka echibini, nxa amanzi ezanyazanyiswa; kuthi ngiseza, kwehle omunye phambi kwami.” 
43_5_8_UJesu wathi kuye: “Sukuma, uthabathe uhlaka lwakho, uhambe.” 
43_5_9_Wayesephila masinyane lowo muntu, wathabatha uhlaka lwakhe, wahamba. Kwakuyisabatha ngalolo suku. 
43_5_10_Khona base bethi abaJuda kophilisiweyo: “Yisabatha, akuvunyiwe uthwale uhlaka.” 
43_5_11_Wabaphendula wathi: “Ongiphilisileyo nguyena othe kimi: ‘Thabatha uhlaka lwakho, uhambe.’ ” 
43_5_12_Bambuza bathi: “Ngubani lowo muntu othe kuwe: ‘Thabatha uhlaka lwakho uhambe,’ na?” 
43_5_13_Kepha ophilisiweyo wayengazi ukuthi ungubani, ngokuba uJesu wayemukile lapho, kukhona isixuku kuleyo ndawo. 
43_5_14_Emva kwalokho uJesu wamfumana ethempelini, wathi kuye: “Bheka, uphilisiwe; ungabe usona, funa wehlelwe ngokubi kunalokho.” 
43_5_15_Wamuka lowo muntu, watshela abaJuda ukuthi nguJesu omphilisileyo. 
43_5_16_Ngenxa yalokho abaJuda bamzingela uJesu, ngokuba wakwenza lokho ngesabatha. 
43_5_17_Kepha wabaphendula wathi: “UBaba usebenza kuze kube manje, nami ngiyasebenza.” 
43_5_18_Ngalokho-ke abaJuda kwayikhona befuna kakhulu ukumbulala, ngokuba wayengaphulile isabatha kuphela, kodwa wabuye wathi uNkulunkulu unguYise, ezenza olingana noNkulunkulu. 
43_5_19_Khona uJesu waphendula, wathi kubo: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: INdodana ingenze lutho ngokwayo, kuphela lokho ebona uYise ekwenza, ngokuba lokho akwenzayo yena, neNdodana iyakwenza kanjalo. 
43_5_20_Ngokuba uYise uyayithanda iNdodana, uyikhombisa konke akwenzayo yena; woyikhombisa imisebenzi emikhulu kunalena ukuba nimangale. 
43_5_21_Ngokuba njengalokhu uYise evusa abafileyo, abaphilise, kanjalo neNdodana iyabaphilisa labo ethanda ukubaphilisa. 
43_5_22_Ngokuba noYise kahluleli muntu; ukunike iNdodana konke ukwahlulela 
43_5_23_ukuba bonke bazise iNdodana, njengokuba bazisa uYise. Ongayazisi iNdodana kamazisi noYise oyithumileyo. 
43_5_24_“Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Ozwa izwi lami, akholwe ngongithumileyo, unokuphila okuphakade; akayi ekwahlulelweni, kepha usephumile ekufeni, wangena ekuphileni. 
43_5_25_Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Isikhathi siyeza, sesikhona namanje, lapho abafileyo beyakulizwa izwi leNdodana kaNkulunkulu; abezwayo bayakuphila. 
43_5_26_Ngokuba njengalokhu uYise enokuphila ngokwakhe, kanjalo uyiphile neNdodana ibe nokuphila ngokwayo. 
43_5_27_Uyiphile amandla okwahlulela, ngokuba iyiNdodana yomuntu. 
43_5_28_“Ningamangali ngalokho, ngokuba isikhathi siyeza, lapho bonke abasemathuneni beyakulizwa izwi layo, 
43_5_29_abenze ukulunga baphumele ekuvukeni kokuphila, abenze okubi ekuvukeni kokulahlwa. 
43_5_30_Mina ngingenze lutho ngokwami; ngahlulela njengalokho engikuzwayo; ukwahlulela kwami kulungile, ngokuba ngingafuni eyami intando kepha intando yongithumileyo. 
43_5_31_“Uma ngizifakazela mina, ubufakazi bami abuqinisile. 
43_5_32_Ngomunye ofakaza ngami; ngiyazi ukuthi ubufakazi angifakazela ngabo buqinisile. 
43_5_33_“Nina nithumele kuJohane, walifakazela iqiniso. 
43_5_34_Kepha mina angibamukeli ubufakazi kumuntu; kodwa ngisho lokhu ukuba nisindiswe. 
43_5_35_Yena wayeyisibani esivuthayo nesikhanyayo; nina-ke benithanda ukuthokoza isikhashana ekukhanyeni kwakhe. 
43_5_36_“Kepha nginabo ubufakazi obukhulu kunobukaJohane, ngokuba imisebenzi uBaba anginike yona ukuba ngiyifeze, yona le misebenzi engiyenzayo, iyangifakazela ukuthi uBaba ungithumile. 
43_5_37_NoBaba ongithumileyo ufakazile ngami. Anizange nizwe izwi lakhe, anisibonanga isimo sakhe. 
43_5_38_Nezwi lakhe aninalo elihleziyo phakathi kwenu, ngokuba amthumileyo yena lowo anikholwa nguye. 
43_5_39_Nihlola imibhalo, ngokuba nithi ninokuphila okuphakade kuyo; yiyona efakaza ngami. 
43_5_40_Kepha anivumi ukuza kimi ukuba nibe nokuphila. 
43_5_41_“Mina angamukeli udumo kubantu. 
43_5_42_Kepha ngiyanazi nina ukuthi aninalo uthando lukaNkulunkulu phakathi kwenu. 
43_5_43_Ngize egameni likaBaba, aningamukeli; uma kuza omunye ngelakhe igama, niyakumamukela yena. 
43_5_44_Ningakholwa kanjani nina enidumisana nodwa, ningalufuni udumo oluvela kuNkulunkulu yedwa, na? 
43_5_45_“Ningacabangi ukuthi ngiyakunimangalela kuBaba; ukhona onimangalelayo, uMose enithemba kuye. 
43_5_46_Ngokuba uma benikholwa nguMose, beniyakukholwa yimina, ngokuba yena waloba ngami. 
43_5_47_Kodwa uma ningakholwa yimibhalo yakhe, niyakukholwa kanjani ngamazwi ami na?” 
43_6_1_Emva kwalokho uJesu wamuka waya phesheya kolwandle lwaseGalile olungolwaseTiberiya. 
43_6_2_Samlandela isixuku esikhulu, ngokuba babebona izibonakaliso azenzayo kwabagulayo. 
43_6_3_UJesu wenyukela entabeni, wahlala phansi khona nabafundi bakhe. 
43_6_4_Laliseduze iPhasika, umkhosi wabaJuda. 
43_6_5_Kuthe uJesu ephakamisa amehlo, wabona ukuthi isixuku esikhulu siza kuye, wathi kuFiliphu: “Sizakuzithengaphi izinkwa ukuba badle laba na?” 
43_6_6_Washo njalo emvivinya, ngokuba yena wayekwazi azakukwenza. 
43_6_7_UFiliphu wamphendula wathi: “Izinkwa zawodenariyu abangamakhulu amabili zingebanele, kube yilowo nalowo athole ingcosana.” 
43_6_8_Omunye wabafundi bakhe, u-Andreya umfowabo kaSimoni Petru, wathi kuye: 
43_6_9_“Kukhona umfana lapha onezinkwa zebhali eziyisihlanu nezinhlanzana ezimbili; kepha kuyini lokho kwabaningi kangaka na?” 
43_6_10_UJesu wathi: “Bahlaliseni abantu.” Kwakukhona utshani obuningi kuleyo ndawo. Ahlala phansi-ke amadoda, umumo wawo kungathi izinkulungwame eziyisihlanu. 
43_6_11_UJesu wazithabatha izinkwa, wabonga, wayesezabela ababehlezi phansi, kanjalo futhi nezinhlanzana, njengokuthanda kwabo. 
43_6_12_Kuthe sebesuthi, wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Buthani imvuthuluka eseleyo, kungachitheki lutho.” 
43_6_13_Base bebutha, bagcwalisa iziqabetho eziyishumi nambili ngemvuthuluka yezinkwa eziyisihlanu zebhali eyasala kwabadlileyo. 
43_6_14_Kwathi-ke abantu bebona isibonakaliso uJesu asenzayo, bathi: “Impela lo ungumProfethi ozayo ezweni.” 
43_6_15_Ngakho-ke uJesu azi ukuthi bazakuza, bambambe, bambeke inkosi, wamonyukela futhi entabeni yena yedwa. 
43_6_16_Sekuhlwa abafundi bakhe bewukela elwandle, 
43_6_17_bangena emkhunjini, bawela ulwandle beya eKapernawume. Kwase kuhlwile, uJesu wayengakafiki kubo. 
43_6_18_Kwavunguza umoya omkhulu, lwavuka ulwandle. 
43_6_19_Khona sebegwedlile kungathi amastadiyu angamashumi amabili nanhlanu noma amashumi amathathu, babona uJesu ehamba phezu kolwandle, esondela emkhunjini; bethuka. 
43_6_20_Kepha wathi kubo: “Yimina, ningesabi.” 
43_6_21_Khona bafuna ukumngenisa emkhunjini, umkhumbi wawusufika masinyane ezweni ababeya kulo. 
43_6_22_Ngangomuso isixuku esasingaphesheya kolwandle sabona kungekho omunye umkhunjana khona, sazi ukuthi ubumunye nje nokuthi uJesu wayengangenanga emkhunjini kanye nabafundi bakhe, kepha ukuthi abafundi bakhe babewele bodwa, 
43_6_23_kodwa eminye imikhunjana evela eTiberiya yafika eduze nendawo lapho badla khona isinkwa, iNkosi ibongile; 
43_6_24_isixuku sathi ukubona ukuthi uJesu akakho lapho nabafundi bakhe, sangena emikhunjaneni, naso saya eKapernawume sifuna uJesu. 
43_6_25_Kwathi ukuba bamfumane phesheya kolwandle, bathi: “Rabi, ufike nini lapha na?” 
43_6_26_UJesu wabaphendula wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Aningifuni ngokuba nabona izibonakaliso, kepha ningifuna ngokuba nadla izinkwa, nasutha. 
43_6_27_Ningasebenzeli ukudla okuphelayo kepha ukudla okuhlala kuze kube ngukuphila okuphakade, eyakunipha khona iNdodana yomuntu, ngokuba uYise uNkulunkulu ubekile uphawu kuyona.” 
43_6_28_Bathi-ke kuye: “Singenzani ukuba sisebenze imisebenzi kaNkulunkulu na?” 
43_6_29_Waphendula uJesu, wathi kubo: “Umsebenzi kaNkulunkulu yilowo ukuba nikholwe nguye amthumileyo.”6:29 1 Joh. 3:23. 
43_6_30_Ngakho bathi kuye: “Pho, wenza sibonakaliso sini ukuba sibone, sikholwe nguwe, na? Usebenzani na? 
43_6_31_Okhokho bethu badla imana ehlane njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi: ‘Wabapha isinkwa esivela ezulwini ukuba badle.’ ” 
43_6_32_UJesu wayesethi kubo: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Kwakungesiye uMose owanipha isinkwa esivela ezulwini, kodwa uBaba unipha isinkwa soqobo esivela ezulwini. 
43_6_33_Ngokuba isinkwa sikaNkulunkulu singuye owehla ezulwini, olipha izwe ukuphila.” 
43_6_34_Khona bathi kuye: “Nkosi, siphe njalonjalo leso sinkwa.” 
43_6_35_UJesu wathi kubo: “Mina ngiyisinkwa sokuphila; ozayo kimi kasoze alamba, nokholwa yimi kasoze oma. 
43_6_36_Kepha ngithe kini: Ningibonile, nokho anikholwa. 
43_6_37_Konke angipha khona uBaba kuyakuza kimi; ozayo kimi angisoze ngamlahlela ngaphandle. 
43_6_38_Ngokuba ngehle ezulwini kungengukuba ngenze intando yami, kodwa ukuba ngenze intando yongithumileyo. 
43_6_39_Lokhu kuyintando yongithumileyo ukuba konke angiphe khona ngingalahlekelwa lutho kukho, kodwa ngikuvuse ngomuhla wokuphela. 
43_6_40_Ngokuba lokhu kuyintando kaBaba ukuba yilowo nalowo obona iNdodana, akholwe yiyo, abe nokuphila okuphakade; ngiyakumvusa mina ngomuhla wokuphela.” 
43_6_41_Khona abaJuda bakhonona ngaye, ngokuba ethe: “Ngiyisinkwa esehle ezulwini.” 
43_6_42_Bathi-ke: “Lona akusiye uJesu indodana kaJosefa, uyise nonina sibazi na? Usesho kanjani, pho, ukuthi: ‘Ngehle ezulwini,’ na?” 
43_6_43_UJesu waphendula, wathi kubo: “Ningakhononi phakathi kwenu. 
43_6_44_Akakho ongeza kimi, uma uBaba ongithumileyo engamdonsi; mina-ke ngiyakumvusa ngomuhla wokuphela. 
43_6_45_Kulotshiwe kubaprofethi ukuthi: ‘Bonke bayakuba ngabafundiswe nguNkulunkulu.’ Yilowo nalowo ozwile kuBaba, wafunda, uyeza kimi. 
43_6_46_Akusikho ukuthi ukhona oke wambona uBaba, kuphela ovela kuNkulunkulu; nguyena ombonile uBaba. 
43_6_47_Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Okholwayo unokuphila okuphakade. 
43_6_48_Mina ngiyisinkwa sokuphila. 
43_6_49_Okhokho benu badla imana ehlane, bafa. 
43_6_50_Lesi siyisinkwa esehla ezulwini ukuba umuntu adle kuso, angafi. 
43_6_51_Mina ngiyisinkwa esiphilayo esehla ezulwini. Uma umuntu edla lesi sinkwa, uyakuphila phakade; futhi-ke isinkwa engizakusinikela ngenxa yokuphila kwezwe siyinyama yami.” 
43_6_52_Base bephikisana bodwa abaJuda, bethi: “Lo angasinika kanjani inyama yakhe, siyidle, na?” 
43_6_53_Khona uJesu wathi kubo: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma ningayidli inyama yeNdodana yomuntu, niphuze igazi layo, aninakuphila phakathi kwenu. 
43_6_54_Odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami, unokuphila okuphakade; mina ngiyakumvusa ngomuhla wokuphela. 
43_6_55_Ngokuba inyama yami ingukudla isibili, negazi lami lingukuphuza isibili. 
43_6_56_Odla inyama yami, aphuze igazi lami, uhlala kimi, nami kuye. 
43_6_57_Njengalokho uBaba ophilayo ungithumile, nami ngiphila ngoBaba, lowo ongidlayo naye uyakuphila ngami. 
43_6_58_Lesi siyisinkwa esehle ezulwini, kungenjengalokho okhokho benu badla imana, bafa; osidlayo lesi sinkwa uyakuphila phakade.” 
43_6_59_Lokho wakukhuluma esinagogeni efundisa eKapernawume. 
43_6_60_Ngakho-ke abaningi kubafundi bakhe bekuzwa lokho bathi: “Lilukhuni leli zwi; ngubani ongalizwa na?” 
43_6_61_Kepha uJesu azi phakathi kwakhe ukuthi abafundi bakhe bayakhonona ngalokho, wathi: “Lokhu kuyanicunula na? 
43_6_62_Pho, uma nibona iNdodana yomuntu yenyukela lapho yayikhona kuqala, niyakuthini na? 
43_6_63_NguMoya ophilisayo, inyama ayisizi lutho; amazwi engiwakhulume kini angumoya, angukuphila. 
43_6_64_Kepha bakhona abanye phakathi kwenu abangakholwa. Ngokuba uJesu wazi kwasekuqaleni ukuba ngobani abangakholwa nokuba ngubani ozakumkhaphela.” 
43_6_65_Wayesethi: “Kungenxa yalokho ngithe kini: Akakho ongeza kimi uma engakuphiwe nguBaba.” 
43_6_66_Emva kwalokho abaningi babafundi bakhe babuyela emuva, ababe besahamba naye. 
43_6_67_Ngakho uJesu wathi kwabayishumi nambili: “Nani nithanda ukumuka na?” 
43_6_68_USimoni Petru wamphendula wathi: “Nkosi, siyakuya kubani na? Amazwi okuphila okuphakade akuwe. 
43_6_69_Siyakholwa, siyazi ukuthi wena ungoNgcwele kaNkulunkulu.” 
43_6_70_UJesu wabaphendula wathi: “Mina anginikhethanga nina abayishumi nambili na? Kepha omunye kini ungusathane.” 
43_6_71_Wayekhuluma ngoJuda Iskariyothe kaSimoni, ngokuba nguye obezakumkhaphela engomunye wabayishumi nambili. 
43_7_1_Emva kwalokho uJesu wahamba eGalile, ngokuba wayengathandi ukuhamba eJudiya, lokhu abaJuda bebefuna ukumbulala. 
43_7_2_Kwase kusondele umkhosi wabaJuda, owamadokodo. 
43_7_3_Base bethi kuye abafowabo: “Muka lapha, uye eJudiya, ukuze nabafundi bakho babone imisebenzi yakho oyenzayo. 
43_7_4_Ngokuba akukho muntu owenza utho ekusithekeni, efuna yena uqobo lwakhe abe sobala. Uma wenza lezi zinto, zibonakalise wena kulo izwe.” 
43_7_5_Ngokuba nabafowabo babengakholwa nguye. 
43_7_6_Ngakho-ke uJesu wathi kubo: “Isikhathi sami asikafiki, isikhathi senu silungile njalo. 
43_7_7_Izwe lingenizonde nina, kepha mina liyangizonda, ngokuba ngifakaza ngalo ukuthi imisebenzi yalo mibi. 
43_7_8_Yenyukani nina, niye emkhosini; mina angenyukeli manje kulo mkhosi; ngokuba esami isikhathi asikapheleli.” 
43_7_9_Eseshilo lokho kubo wahlala eGalile. 
43_7_10_Sebenyukele emkhosini abafowabo, naye-ke wenyuka, kungesobala kepha kungathi kungasese. 
43_7_11_Khona abaJuda bamfuna emkhosini, bathi: “Uphi yena na?” 
43_7_12_Kwaba khona ukukhonona okukhulu ngaye phakathi kwezixuku. Abanye bathi: “Muhle;” abanye bathi: “Qha, ngokuba udukisa abantu.” 
43_7_13_Nokho kwakungekho muntu owakhuluma obala ngaye ngokwesaba abaJuda. 
43_7_14_Kuthe sekuphakathi komkhosi, uJesu wenyukela ethempelini, wafundisa. 
43_7_15_Ngakho abaJuda bamangala bathi: “Lona uyazi kanjani imibhalo engafundanga na?” 
43_7_16_Khona uJesu wabaphendula wathi: “Imfundiso yami akusiyo eyami kodwa ngeyongithumileyo. 
43_7_17_Uma umuntu ethanda ukwenza intando yakhe, uzakwazi ngemfundiso noma ivela kuNkulunkulu noma ngizikhulumela okwami. 
43_7_18_Okhuluma ngokwakhe ufuna udumo lwakhe; kepha ofuna udumo lomthumileyo lowo uqinisile; akukho ukungalungi kuye. 
43_7_19_UMose kaninikanga yini umthetho na? Nokho akakho kini ogcina umthetho. Nifunelani ukungibulala na?” 
43_7_20_Isixuku saphendula sathi: “Unedemoni wena; ngubani ofuna ukukubulala na?” 
43_7_21_UJesu waphendula, wathi kubo: “Munye umsebenzi engiwenzile, niyamangala nonke. 
43_7_22_Ngokuba uMose uninikile ukusoka — kungesikho ukuthi kuvela kuMose kodwa kokhokho — niyamsoka umuntu nangesabatha. 
43_7_23_Uma umuntu amukela ukusoka ngesabatha ukuze kungeqiwa umthetho kaMose, pho, ningithukuthelela ngokuba ngaphulukisa umuntu ngokuphelele ngesabatha na? 
43_7_24_Ningahluleli ngokwamehlo, kepha yahlulelani ukwahlulela okulungileyo.” 
43_7_25_Base bethi abanye kwabaseJerusalema: “Lo akusiye yini abafuna ukumbulala na? 
43_7_26_Bheka, ukhuluma obala, kabasho lutho kuye. Kungaba ngukuthi ababusi sebazi isibili ukuthi lo unguKristu na? 
43_7_27_Kodwa lo siyamazi lapho evela khona; kepha uKristu, nxa efika, akakho owazi lapho evela khona.” 
43_7_28_Ngakho uJesu wamemeza efundisa ethempelini, wathi: “Niyangazi, niyazi futhi ukuthi ngivelaphi; mina-ke angizizelanga, kodwa ongithumileyo uqinisile, eningamaziyo nina. 
43_7_29_Ngiyamazi mina, ngokuba ngivela kuye, futhi nguye ongithumileyo.” 
43_7_30_Ngakho bafuna ukumbamba, kepha akubangakho owambeka isandla, ngokuba isikhathi sakhe sasingakafiki. 
43_7_31_Kepha esixukwini abaningi bakholwa nguye, bathi: “UKristu, nxa esefikile, uyakwenza izibonakaliso eziningi kunalezo azenzileyo lona na?” 
43_7_32_AbaFarisi bezwa isixuku sikhonona ngalezo zinto ngaye; abapristi abakhulu nabaFarisi base bethuma izikhonzi ukuba zimbambe. 
43_7_33_Ngakho-ke uJesu wathi: “Kuseyisikhashana ngikhona kini, besengimuka, ngiye kongithumileyo. 
43_7_34_Niyakungifuna, ningangifumani, nalapho ngikhona, ningeze nina.” 
43_7_35_Ngakho abaJuda bakhuluma bodwa, bathi: “Uzakuya ngaphi lo lapho singayikumthola na? Uyakuya kwabahlakazekileyo kumaGreki, afundise amaGreki, na? 
43_7_36_Lizwi lini leli alishoyo lokuthi: ‘Niyakungifuna, ningangifumani,’ nokuthi: ‘Lapho ngikhona, ningeze nina,’ na?” 
43_7_37_Kepha ngosuku lokugcina olukhulu lomkhosi uJesu wema wamemeza wathi: “Uma ekhona owomileyo, akeze kimi, aphuze. 
43_7_38_Okholwa yimi, njengokusho kombhalo, esiswini sakhe kuyakugobhoza imifula yamanzi aphilayo.” 
43_7_39_Washo lokho ngoMoya abazakumamukela abakholwa nguye, ngokuba uMoya wayengakafiki, lokhu uJesu wayengakakhazimuliswa. 
43_7_40_Abanye besixuku sebezwa lawa mazwi bathi: “Lo ungumprofethi isibili.” 
43_7_41_Abanye bathi: “Lo unguKristu.” Kepha abanye bathi: “Kanti uKristu uvela eGalile na? 
43_7_42_Awushongo yini umbhalo ukuthi uKristu uvela enzalweni kaDavide naseBetlehema, emzaneni lapho wayekhona uDavide na?” 
43_7_43_Ngakho kwaba khona ukwahlukana ngaye esixukwini. 
43_7_44_Abanye-ke kubo babethanda ukumbamba; kepha akubangakho owambeka izandla. 
43_7_45_Zafika-ke izikhonzi kubapristi abakhulu nakubaFarisi. Bathi kuzo: “Animlethanga ngani na?” 
43_7_46_Izikhonzi zaphendula zathi: “Akuzange kukhulume muntu njengokuba kukhuluma lowo muntu.” 
43_7_47_Ngakho abaFarisi baziphendula bathi: “Kanti nani nidukisiwe na? 
43_7_48_Ukhona yini ezikhulwini nakubaFarisi oke wakholwa nguye na? 
43_7_49_Kodwa lesi sixuku esingawazi umthetho siqalekisiwe.” 
43_7_50_Wayesethi kubo uNikodemu owake weza kuye engomunye wabo: 
43_7_51_“Konje umthetho wakithi uyamlahla yini umuntu ungakamuzwa kuqala, uze wazi akwenzayo, na?” 
43_7_52_Baphendula, bathi kuye: “Kanti nawe ungowaseGalile na? Phenyisisa, ubone ukuthi akuveli mprofethi eGalile.” 
43_7_53_Base behamba, kwaba yilowo nalowo waya ekhaya. 
43_8_1_Khona uJesu waya eNtabeni Yeminqumo. 
43_8_2_Ekuseni kakhulu wabuye weza ethempelini; abantu bonke beza kuye; wayesehlala phansi, wabafundisa. 
43_8_3_Kepha ababhali nabaFarisi baletha kuye owesifazane ebanjwe ephinga; sebemmise phakathi kwabo, 
43_8_4_bathi kuye: “Mfundisi, lo wesifazane ubanjwe esoqotsheni lokuphinga. 
43_8_5_Emthethweni uMose wasiyala ngabanje ukuba bakhandwe ngamatshe. Pho, wena uthini na?” 
43_8_6_Bakusho lokho bemlinga, ukuze babe nokummangalela. Kepha uJesu wakhothama, waloba ngomunwe emhlabathini. 
43_8_7_Wathi besambuza njalo, walulama, wathi kubo: “Ongenasono phakathi kwenu kaqale amphonse ngetshe.” 
43_8_8_Waphinda wakhothama, waloba emhlabathini. 
43_8_9_Bathi ukuzwa lokho, belahlwa yizinhliziyo zabo baphuma ngabanye, beqalela kwabadala kwaze kwaba ngabokugcina, uJesu wasala yedwa; nowesifazane wayemi khona. 
43_8_10_UJesu wayeselulama; engaboni muntu ngaphandle kowesifazane wathi kuye: “Sifazane, baphi labo bamangaleli bakho na? Akakho okulahlayo na?” 
43_8_11_Wayesethi: “Akakho, Nkosi.” Wathi-ke uJesu kuye: “Nami angikulahli; hamba, ungabe usona.” 
43_8_12_Ngakho uJesu waphinda wakhuluma kubo, wathi: “Mina ngingukukhanya kwezwe; ongilandelayo kasoze ahamba ebumnyameni, kodwa woba nokukhanya kokuphila.” 
43_8_13_Khona bathi kuye abaFarisi: “Uyazifakazela wena; ubufakazi bakho ubuqinisile.” 
43_8_14_UJesu waphendula, wathi kubo: “Noma ngizifakazela mina, ubufakazi bami buqinisile, ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi ngavelaphi nokuthi ngiyaphi; kepha nina anazi ukuthi ngivelaphi nokuthi ngiyaphi. 
43_8_15_Nina nahlulela ngokwenyama, kepha mina angahluleli muntu. 
43_8_16_Nakuba ngahlulela, ukwahlulela kwami kungokuqinisileyo, ngokuba ngingengedwa, kodwa yimina nongithumileyo. 
43_8_17_Yebo, kulotshiwe nasemthethweni wakini ukuthi ubufakazi babantu ababili bungobuqinisileyo. 
43_8_18_Mina ngingozifakazelayo; noBaba ongithumileyo ufakaza ngami.” 
43_8_19_Base bethi kuye: “Uphi uyihlo na?” UJesu waphendula ngokuthi: “Anazi nami naBaba; uma beningazi mina, nga nimazi noBaba.” 
43_8_20_Lawo mazwi wawakhuluma ngasemphongolweni weminikelo efundisa ethempelini; akubangakho ombambayo, ngokuba isikhathi sakhe sasingakafiki. 
43_8_21_Khona waphinda wathi kubo: “Ngiyamuka mina, niyakungifuna, nifele ezonweni zenu; lapho ngiya khona mina, ningeze nina.” 
43_8_22_Base bethi abaJuda: “Imbala uzakuzibulala yini, lokhu ethi: ‘Lapho ngiya khona mina, ningeze nina,’ na?” 
43_8_23_Wathi kubo: “Nina ningabaphansi, mina ngingowaphezulu; nina ningabaleli zwe, mina angingowaleli zwe. 
43_8_24_Ngakho-ke ngathi kini nizakufela ezonweni zenu; ngokuba uma ningakholwa ukuthi nginguye, nizakufela ezonweni zenu.” 
43_8_25_Base bethi kuye: “Wena ungubani na?” Wathi kubo uJesu: “Lokho enganitshela khona kwasekuqaleni. 
43_8_26_Nginezinto eziningi enginokuzikhuluma nokwahlulela ngani, kepha ongithumileyo uqinisile, nami engakuzwa kuye ngikukhuluma ezweni.” 
43_8_27_Kabazanga ukuthi ukhuluma kubo ngoYise. 
43_8_28_Wayesethi uJesu: “Nxa seniyiphakamisile iNdodana yomuntu, khona-ke nizakwazi ukuthi nginguye nokuthi angenzi lutho ngokwami, kodwa ngikhuluma lokhu njengokuba uBaba engifundisile. 
43_8_29_Ongithumileyo unami, kangishiyanga ngedwa, ngokuba ngenza njalo okuthandeka kuye.” 
43_8_30_Esakhuluma lokho, abaningi bakholwa nguye. 
43_8_31_Khona uJesu wathi kubaJuda abase bekholiwe nguye: “Uma nimi ezwini lami, ningabafundi bami isibili; 
43_8_32_niyakulazi iqiniso, neqiniso liyakunikhulula.” 
43_8_33_Bamphendula bathi: “Siyinzalo ka-Abrahama thina, asibonange sibe yizigqila zamuntu; wena usho kanjani ukuthi: ‘Nizakuba ngabakhululekileyo’ na?” 
43_8_34_UJesu wabaphendula wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Yilowo nalowo owenza isono uyisigqila sesono. 
43_8_35_Isigqila kambe asihlali phakade endlini; kepha indodana ihlala phakade. 
43_8_36_Ngakho-ke uma iNdodana inikhulula, niyakuba ngabakhululekileyo impela. 
43_8_37_Ngiyazi ukuthi niyinzalo ka-Abrahama; kepha nifuna ukungibulala, ngokuba izwi lami lingenandawo kini. 
43_8_38_Ngikhuluma lokho engikubonile mina kuBaba; nani-ke nenza lokho enikuzwile kuyihlo.” 
43_8_39_Baphendula, bathi kuye: “Ubaba ngu-Abrahama.” UJesu wathi kubo: “Uma beningabantwana baka-Abrahama; beniyakwenza imisebenzi ka-Abrahama. 
43_8_40_Kodwa kalokhu nifuna ukungibulala mina muntu onitshele iqiniso, engilizwe kuNkulunkulu; u-Abrahama kakwenzanga lokho. 
43_8_41_Nina nenza imisebenzi kayihlo.” Bathi kuye: “Thina asizalwanga ngokuphinga; sinobaba munye, uNkulunkulu.” 
43_8_42_Wathi kubo uJesu: “Uma uNkulunkulu ebenguyihlo, beniyakungithanda mina, ngokuba ngafika ngivela kuNkulunkulu; ngokuba angizizelanga ngokwami, kepha yena ungithumile. 
43_8_43_Yini ukuba ningayizwisisi inkulumo yami na? Kungokuba aninakuzwa izwi lami. 
43_8_44_Nina ningabakayihlo uSathane, nithanda ukwenza izinkanuko zikayihlo. Yena wayengumbulali wabantu kwasekuqaleni, akemi eqinisweni, ngokuba iqiniso lingekho kuye. Nxa ekhuluma amanga, ukhuluma okungokwakhe, lokhu engumqambimanga noyise wawo. 
43_8_45_Kepha mina, ngokuba ngikhuluma iqiniso, anikholwa yimi. 
43_8_46_Ngumuphi kini ongangilahla ngesono na? Uma ngikhuluma iqiniso, anikholwa yimi ngani na? 
43_8_47_OngokaNkulunkulu uzwa amazwi kaNkulunkulu; kungakho ningezwe nina, ngokuba anisibo abakaNkulunkulu.” 
43_8_48_Baphendula abaJuda, bathi kuye: “Asisho kahle yini ukuthi ungumSamariya nokuthi unedemoni na?” 
43_8_49_UJesu waphendula wathi: “Anginademoni, kepha ngidumisa uBaba; nina-ke niyangidumaza. 
43_8_50_Mina-ke angifuni olwami udumo; ukhona ofunayo nowahlulelayo. 
43_8_51_Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma umuntu egcina izwi lami, akasoze akubona ukufa naphakade.” 
43_8_52_Bathi kuye abaJuda: “Manje sesiyazi ukuthi unedemoni; u-Abrahama wafa, nabaprofethi; wena-ke uthi: ‘Uma umuntu egcina izwi lami, kasoze akuzwa ukufa naphakade.’ 
43_8_53_Wena umkhulu yini kunobaba u-Abrahama osewafa na? Nabaprofethi sebafa. Uzenza bani na?” 
43_8_54_UJesu waphendula wathi: “Uma ngizidumisa mina, udumo lwami luyize; nguBaba ongidumisayo, enisho ngaye ukuthi unguNkulunkulu wenu. 
43_8_55_Kanti animazanga, kepha mina ngiyamazi. Uma ngithi angimazi, ngingaba ngumqambimanga njengani. Kepha ngiyamazi, ngigcina izwi lakhe. 
43_8_56_U-Abrahama uyihlo wathokozela ukubona usuku lwami, walubona, wajabula.” 
43_8_57_Base bethi kuye abaJuda: “Awukabi naminyaka engamashumi ayisihlanu, kanti u-Abrahama usuke wambona na?” 
43_8_58_UJesu wathi kubo: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Engakabikho u-Abrahama, ngangikhona mina.” 
43_8_59_Base bethatha amatshe ukuba bamkhande. Kepha uJesu wasithela, waphuma ethempelini. 
43_9_1_Wathi edlula, wabona umuntu owayeyimpumputhe kwasekuzalweni kwakhe. 
43_9_2_Abafundi bakhe bambuza bathi: “Rabi, ngubani owonayo, lona noma abazali bakhe, aze azalwe eyimpumputhe na?” 
43_9_3_UJesu waphendula wathi: “Akonanga noma yena noma abazali bakhe, kodwa ukuze kubonakaliswe kuye imisebenzi kaNkulunkulu. 
43_9_4_Ngimelwe ukusebenza imisebenzi yongithumileyo, kusesemini; buyeza ubusuku, lapho kungesebenze muntu. 
43_9_5_Ngisekhona ezweni ngingukukhanya kwezwe.” 
43_9_6_Eseshilo lokho wafela amathe emhlabathini, wenza udaka ngamathe, waninda amehlo ayo ngodaka. 
43_9_7_Wathi kuyo: “Hamba uyogeza echibini laseSilowama,” okuhunyushwa ngokuthi oThunyiweyo; yamuka-ke, yageza, yeza ibona. 
43_9_8_Ngakho abakhelene nayo nababeyibonile phambili iyisinxibi bathi: “Akusiye lo owayehlezi enxiba na?” 
43_9_9_Abanye bathi: “Nguyena,” abanye bathi: “Qha, kepha ufana naye;” yena wathi: “Nginguye.” 
43_9_10_Base bethi kuye: “Pho, amehlo akho avulwe kanjani na?” 
43_9_11_Waphendula yena, wathi: “Umuntu othiwa uJesu wenza udaka, wagcoba amehlo ami, wathi kimi: ‘Yana eSilowama, ugeze.’ Ngaya, ngageza, ngabona.” 
43_9_12_Bathi kuye: “Uphi yena na?” Wathi: “Angazi.” 
43_9_13_Bamyisa kubaFarisi lowo okade eyimpumputhe. 
43_9_14_Kwakuyisabatha mhla uJesu enza udaka, evula amehlo akhe. 
43_9_15_Khona nabaFarisi futhi bambuza ukuthi ukuthole kanjani ukubona. Wathi kubo: “Waninda amehlo ami ngodaka, ngageza, sengiyabona.” 
43_9_16_Ngakho abanye kubaFarisi bathi: “Lona kaveli kuNkulunkulu, lokhu engagcini isabatha.” Abanye bathi: “Umuntu oyisoni angazenza kanjani izibonakaliso ezinje na?” Kwaba khona ukwahlukana phakathi kwabo. 
43_9_17_Khona baphinda bathi kuyo impumputhe: “Wena uthini ngaye, lokhu evule amehlo akho, na?” Yathi: “Ungumprofethi.” 
43_9_18_Kepha abaJuda abakholwanga ngaye ukuthi wabeyimpumputhe nokuthi usethole ukubona, baze babiza abazali bakhe lowo osethole ukubona. 
43_9_19_Bababuza bathi: “Lo uyindodana yenu enithi ngayo yazalwa iyimpumputhe na? Pho, isibona kanjani manje na?” 
43_9_20_Abazali bakhe base bephendula bethi: “Siyazi ukuthi lo uyindodana yethu nokuthi wazalwa eyimpumputhe; 
43_9_21_kepha ukuthi usebona kanjani kalokhu asazi, nokuthi ngubani ovule amehlo akhe asazi; mbuzeni yena, usekhulile, uzozikhulumela yena.” 
43_9_22_Abazali bakhe basho lokho, ngokuba besaba abaJuda. Ngokuba abaJuda base bevumelene ngokuthi, uma ekhona ovuma ukuba unguKristu, kakhishwe esinagogeni. 
43_9_23_Ngakho-ke abazali bakhe bathi: “Usekhulile, mbuzeni yena.” 
43_9_24_Bambiza-ke ngokwesibili lowo muntu owabeyimpumputhe, bathi kuye: “Mnike uNkulunkulu udumo; thina siyazi ukuthi lowo muntu uyisoni.” 
43_9_25_Yena wayesephendula ethi: “Nokuba uyisoni angazi; kunye engikwaziyo, ukuthi bengiyimpumputhe, manje sengiyabona.” 
43_9_26_Bathi-ke kuye: “Wenzeni kuwe na? Uwavule kanjani amehlo akho na?” 
43_9_27_Wabaphendula wathi: “Kade nginitshela, kepha anizwanga; nifunelani ukuzwa futhi na? Niyafuna yini nani ukuba ngabafundi bakhe na?” 
43_9_28_Bamthuka bathi: “Nguwe ongumfundi wakhe, kepha thina singabafundi bakaMose. 
43_9_29_Siyazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu wakhuluma kuMose, kodwa lo asimazi lapha evela khona.” 
43_9_30_Waphendula lowo muntu, wathi kubo: “Lokhu kuyisimangaliso ukuthi nina anazi lapho evela khona, ingani uvule amehlo ami. 
43_9_31_Siyazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu akazizwa izoni, kodwa uma umuntu emesaba uNkulunkulu, ayenze intando yakhe, uyamuzwa lowo. 
43_9_32_Selokhu kwathini akuzange kuzwakale ukuthi ukhona owavula amehlo ozelwe eyimpumputhe. 
43_9_33_Uma lo ebengaveli kuNkulunkulu, ubengenakwenza lutho.” 
43_9_34_Baphendula, bathi kuye: “Wena wazalwa ezonweni ngokwempela, wena ufundisa thina na?” Base bemkhiphela phandle. 
43_9_35_UJesu wezwa ukuthi bamkhiphele phandle; kwathi emfumana, wathi: “Uyakholwa yiNdodana kaNkulunkulu na?” 
43_9_36_Waphendula yena, wathi: “Ingubani, Nkosi, ngize ngikholwe yiyo, na?” 
43_9_37_UJesu wathi kuye: “Usuyibonile; okhuluma nawe yiyona.” 
43_9_38_Wayesethi: “Ngiyakholwa, Nkosi.” Wakhuleka kuye. 
43_9_39_Wathi uJesu: “Mina ngizele ukwahlulela kuleli zwe ukuba abangaboniyo babone, nababonayo babe yizimpumputhe.” 
43_9_40_Labo kubaFarisi ababenaye bezwa lokho, bathi kuye: “Pho, nathi siyizimpumputhe na?” 
43_9_41_Wathi kubo uJesu: “Ukuba beniyizimpumputhe, ngabe aninasono. Kepha manje nithi: ‘Siyabona;’ isono senu sihlezi. 
43_10_1_“Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Ongangeni ngesango esibayeni sezimvu, kodwa ekhwela ngenye indawo, lowo uyisela nomphangi. 
43_10_2_Kepha ongena ngesango ungumalusi wezimvu. 
43_10_3_Umlindisango uyamvulela lowo; nezimvu ziyalizwa izwi lakhe; ubiza ezakhe izimvu ngamagama, aziholele phandle. 
43_10_4_Nxa esezikhiphile ezakhe zonke, uhamba phambi kwazo, izimvu zimlandele, ngokuba zilazi izwi lakhe. 
43_10_5_Kepha umfokazi azisoze zamlandela, kodwa ziyakumbalekela, ngokuba zingalazi izwi labafokazi.” 
43_10_6_UJesu washo lo mfanekiso kubo; kepha bona abezwisisanga ukuba kuyini lokho akukhuluma kubo. 
43_10_7_Ngakho-ke uJesu wabuye wathi kubo: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Mina ngiyisango lezimvu. 
43_10_8_Bonke abafike ngaphambi kwami bangamasela nabaphangi, kepha izimvu azibezwanga. 
43_10_9_Mina ngiyisango; uma umuntu engena ngami, uyakusindiswa, angene, aphume, afumane idlelo. 
43_10_10_Isela kalizi kungengokweba nokubulala nokubhubhisa; mina ngize ukuba babe nokuphila, babe nakho kuchichime. 
43_10_11_“Ngingumalusi omuhle. Umalusi omuhle udela ukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yezimvu. 
43_10_12_Okhokhelwayo engesiye umalusi, izimvu zingesizo ezakhe, ebona impisi iza, ushiya izimvu, abaleke — impisi izibhozomele, izihlakaze — 
43_10_13_ngokuba engokhokhelwayo, engazinakekeli izimvu. 
43_10_14_“Mina ngingumalusi omuhle; ngiyazazi ezami, nezami ziyangazi, 
43_10_15_njengalokhu uBaba uyangazi, nami ngiyamazi uBaba; ngidela ukuphila kwami ngenxa yezimvu. 
43_10_16_Nezinye izimvu nginazo ezingesizo ezalesi sibaya; nalezo ngimelwe ukuziletha; ziyakuzwa izwi lami, kube mhlambi munye nomalusi munye. 
43_10_17_Ngalokho uBaba uyangithanda, ngokuba ngidela ukuphila kwami ukuba ngibuye ngikuthabathe. 
43_10_18_Akakho ongangamuka ukuphila kwami, kodwa ngikudela ngokwami; nginamandla okukudela, nginamandla okubuye ngikuthabathe. Lo myalo ngiwamukele kuBaba.” 
43_10_19_Kwaba khona futhi ukwahlukana phakathi kwabaJuda ngalawo mazwi. 
43_10_20_Abaningi kubo bathi: “Unedemoni, uyahlanya; nimlalelelani na?” 
43_10_21_Abanye bathi: “Lawo mazwi akusiwo awomuntu onedemoni; imbala idemoni lingavula amehlo ezimpumputhe na?” 
43_10_22_Khona kwakungumkhosi wokuhlanjululwa kwethempeli eJerusalema, kusebusika. 
43_10_23_UJesu wayehamba ethempelini emphemeni kaSolomoni. 
43_10_24_Base bemhaqa abaJuda bethi kuye: “Koze kube nini ulibazisa izinhliziyo zethu na? Uma wena unguKristu, sitshele ngokuchachileyo.” 
43_10_25_UJesu wabaphendula wathi: “Nganitshela, kodwa anikholwanga; imisebenzi engiyenzayo egameni likaBaba yiyona efakaza ngami. 
43_10_26_Kodwa nina anikholwa, ngokuba anisibo abezimvu zami. 
43_10_27_Izimvu zami ziyalizwa izwi lami; nami ngiyazazi, ziyangilandela; 
43_10_28_ngizinika ukuphila okuphakade, azisoze zabhubha naphakade; akakho ongazihlwitha esandleni sami. 
43_10_29_UBaba onginikileyo mkhulu kunabo bonke; akakho ongazihlwitha esandleni sikaBaba. 
43_10_30_Mina noBaba simunye.” 
43_10_31_AbaJuda base bebuye bethatha amatshe ukuba bamkhande. 
43_10_32_UJesu wabaphendula wathi: “Nginitshengise imisebenzi eminingi emihle evela kuBaba; yimuphi umsebenzi kulena eningikhandela wona na?” 
43_10_33_Bamphendula abaJuda, bathi: “Asikukhandi ngenxa yomsebenzi omuhle kepha ngenxa yokuhlambalaza, ngokuba wena ungumuntu ozenza uNkulunkulu.” 
43_10_34_UJesu wabaphendula wathi: “Akulotshiwe yini emthethweni wakini ukuthi: ‘Ngithe: Ningonkulunkulu,’ na? 
43_10_35_Uma wathi bangonkulunkulu bona eleza kubo izwi likaNkulunkulu — nombhalo ungeqiwe — 
43_10_36_nithi ngaye uYise amahlukanisileyo, wamthumela ezweni, ukuba uyahlambalaza, ngokuba ngithe: ‘NgiyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu,’ na? 
43_10_37_Uma ngingenzi imisebenzi kaBaba, maningakholwa yimi. 
43_10_38_Kepha uma ngiyenza, nakuba ningakholwa yimi, kholwani yimisebenzi, ukuze nazi, niqonde ukuthi uBaba ukimi, nami ngikuBaba.” 
43_10_39_Base befuna futhi ukumbamba, kepha waphunyuka esandleni sabo. 
43_10_40_Waphinda wamuka, waya phesheya kweJordani kuleyo ndawo lapho uJohane waqala ukubhapathiza khona, wahlala lapho. 
43_10_41_Nabaningi beza kuye, bathi: “UJohane nempela akenzanga sibonakaliso nasinye, kepha konke uJohane akusho ngalowo muntu kwakuqinisile.” 
43_10_42_Abaningi bakholwa nguye lapho. 
43_11_1_Kwakukhona othile ogulayo, uLazaru waseBethaniya umuzi wakubo kaMariya nodadewabo uMarta. 
43_11_2_UMariya kwakunguye owagcoba iNkosi ngamafutha, wesula izinyawo zayo ngezinwele zakhe, omnewabo uLazaru wayegula. 
43_11_3_Ngakho-ke odadewabo bathumela kuye, bathi: “Nkosi, bheka, lo omthandayo uyagula.” 
43_11_4_UJesu esekuzwile lokho wathi: “Lokhu kugula akusikho okokufa, kodwa kungenxa yenkazimulo kaNkulunkulu ukuba iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ikhazimuliswe ngakho.” 
43_11_5_Kepha uJesu wayebathanda oMarta nodadewabo noLazaru. 
43_11_6_Ngakho-ke kwathi ezwa ukuthi uyagula, wahlala futhi izinsuku ezimbili endaweni abe kuyo. 
43_11_7_Emva kwalokho wathi kubafundi bakhe: “Asibuye, siye eJudiya.” 
43_11_8_Abafundi bathi kuye: “Rabi, abaJuda basand’ ukufuna ukukukhanda ngamatshe; usaya futhi khona na?” 
43_11_9_UJesu waphendula wathi: “Awakho yini amahora ayishumi nambili emini na? Uma umuntu ehamba emini, akakhubeki, ngokuba ubona ukukhanya kwaleli zwe. 
43_11_10_Kodwa uma umuntu ehamba ebusuku, uyakhubeka, ngokuba kungekho ukukhanya kuye.” 
43_11_11_Wakhuluma lokho; emva kwalokho wathi kubo: “ULazaru umhlobo wethu ulele, kepha ngiyahamba ukuba ngimvuse ebuthongweni.” 
43_11_12_Abafundi bakhe base bethi kuye: “Nkosi, uma elele, uyakusinda.” 
43_11_13_Kepha uJesu wayekhuluma ngokufa kwakhe, kepha bona babethi ukhuluma ngokulala ubuthongo. 
43_11_14_Ngakho-ke uJesu wathi kubo ngokuchachileyo: “ULazaru ufile; 
43_11_15_ngiyathokoza ngenxa yenu ukuthi bengingekho, ukuze nikholwe; kepha asiye kuye.” 
43_11_16_Khona uTomase, othiwa uDidimu, wathi kubafundi abakanye naye: “Asihambe nathi, ukuze sife kanye naye.” 
43_11_17_Kwathi-ke esefika uJesu, wamfumana esenezinsuku ezine ethuneni. 
43_11_18_IBethaniya laliseduze neJerusalema, kungaba ngamastadiyu ayishumi nanhlanu. 
43_11_19_Abaningi kubaJuda babefikile koMarta noMariya ukubakhuza ngomnewabo. 
43_11_20_Ngakho uMarta esezwe ukuthi uJesu uyeza, waya ukumhlangabeza, kepha uMariya wahlala endlini. 
43_11_21_Wayesethi uMarta kuJesu: “Nkosi, uma ubukhona, umnewethu nga engafanga; 
43_11_22_kepha ngiyazi nakalokhu ukuthi nokuba yini ongakucela kuNkulunkulu, uNkulunkulu uzakukunika khona.” 
43_11_23_UJesu wathi kuye: “Umnewenu uzakuvuka.” 
43_11_24_UMarta wathi kuye: “Ngiyazi ukuthi uyakuvuka ekuvukeni ngosuku lokugcina.” 
43_11_25_UJesu wathi kuye: “Mina ngingukuvuka nokuphila; okholwa yimi, noma efa, wophila. 
43_11_26_Nalowo ophila, akholwe yimi, kasoze afa naphakade. Uyakholwa yilokho na?” 
43_11_27_Wathi kuye: “Yebo, Nkosi, ngiyakholwa ukuthi wena unguKristu, iNdodana kaNkulunkulu, obezakuza ezweni.” 
43_11_28_Eseshilo lokho wamuka wabiza uMariya udadewabo ngasese, wathi: “UMfundisi ukhona, uyakubiza.” 
43_11_29_Yena-ke ekuzwa lokho wasuka masinyane, waya kuye. 
43_11_30_Kepha uJesu wayengakafiki emzini, kodwa wayesekuleyo ndawo uMarta amhlangabeza kuyo. 
43_11_31_AbaJuda ababesendlini naye bemkhuza, bebona uMariya esuka masinyane ephuma, bamlandela, bathi: “Uya ethuneni ukuba akhale khona.” 
43_11_32_UMariya esefike lapho ekhona uJesu, embona, wawa ngasezinyaweni zakhe, wathi: “Nkosi, uma ubukhona, umnewethu nga engafanga.” 
43_11_33_Ngakho uJesu embona ekhala, nabaJuda abafika naye bekhala, wabubula emoyeni, wakhathazeka; 
43_11_34_wathi: “Nimbekephi na?” Bathi kuye: “Nkosi, woza ubone.” 
43_11_35_UJesu wakhala izinyembezi. 
43_11_36_Ngakho-ke abaJuda bathi: “Bheka, ukumthanda kwakhe okungaka.” 
43_11_37_Kepha abanye kubo bathi: “Lo owavula amehlo empumputhe wayengekwenze yini ukuba yena lo angafi na?” 
43_11_38_Ngakho uJesu, ebubula futhi phakathi kwakhe, wafika ethuneni. Lalingumhume, kwakukhona itshe phezu kwawo. 
43_11_39_Wathi uJesu: “Susani itshe.” UMarta, udadewabo wofileyo, wathi kuye: “Nkosi, usenuka; ngokuba sezizine.” 
43_11_40_UJesu wathi kuye: “Angishongo yini kuwe ukuthi uma ukholwa, uzakubona inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu, na?” 
43_11_41_Balisusa-ke itshe. Kepha uJesu waphakamisa amehlo, wathi: “Baba, ngiyakubonga ngokuba ungizwile. 
43_11_42_Bengazi mina ukuthi ungizwa njalo, kodwa ngenxa yesixuku esingiphahlileyo ngishilo lokho, ukuze bakholwe ukuthi nguwena ongithumileyo.” 
43_11_43_Esekhulume lokho wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu, wathi: “Lazaru, phuma.” 
43_11_44_Waphuma ofileyo eboshwe izinyawo nezandla ngezindwangu, ubuso bakhe bumboziwe ngeduku. UJesu wathi kubo: “Mthukululeni, nimyeke ahambe.” 
43_11_45_Khona abaningi kubaJuda ababezile kuMariya bebona abekwenzile, bakholwa nguye. 
43_11_46_Kepha abanye babo baya kubaFarisi, babatshela abekwenzile uJesu. 
43_11_47_Ngalokho abapristi abakhulu nabaFarisi base bemema umphakathi, bathi: “Siyakwenze njani na? Lo muntu wenza izibonakaliso eziningi; 
43_11_48_uma simyeka njalo, bazakukholwa nguye bonke; amaRoma ayakufika, asamuke indawo nesizwe.” 
43_11_49_Kepha othile wabo, uKayafase, engumpristi omkhulu walowo mnyaka, wathi kubo: “Anazi lutho nina; 
43_11_50_aniqondi futhi ukuthi kunilungele ukuba umuntu oyedwa afele abantu, isizwe sonke singabhubhi.” 
43_11_51_Lokho kakushongo ngokwakhe, kodwa engumpristi omkhulu walowo mnyaka waprofetha ukuba uJesu wayezakufa ngenxa yesizwe; 
43_11_52_kungengenxa yesizwe kuphela, kepha ukuba abuthele ndawonye abantwana bakaNkulunklu abahlakazekileyo, babe munye. 
43_11_53_Kusukela kulolo suku baceba ukuba bambulale. 
43_11_54_Ngakho uJesu kabuyange esahamba obala phakathi kwabaJuda, kepha wamuka lapho, waya ezweni eliseduze nehlane emzini othiwa i-Efrayimi; wahlala khona nabafundi bakhe. 
43_11_55_Lase liseduze iPhasika labaJuda; abaningi abavela emaphandleni bakhuphukela eJerusalema ngaphambi kwePhasika ukuba bazihlambulule. 
43_11_56_Ngakho bamfuna uJesu, bexoxa bemi ethempelini, bethi: “Nithini na? Akayikuza nempela emkhosini na?” 
43_11_57_Abapristi abakhulu nabaFarisi babekhiphe umyalo wokuthi uma kukhona owaziyo lapho ekhona, ababikele, ukuze bambambe. 
43_12_1_Ngakho kuseyizinsuku eziyisithupha ngaphambi kwePhasika, uJesu wafika eBethaniya, lapho wayekhona uLazaru uJesu amvusa kwabafileyo. 
43_12_2_Base bemenzela ukudla khona; uMarta wayephaka, kepha uLazaru wayengomunye wababehlezi ekudleni naye. 
43_12_3_UMariya wayesethatha ilitra lamafutha enadi lodwa elinenani elikhulu, wagcoba izinyawo zikaJesu, wesula izinyawo zakhe ngezinwele zakhe; indlu yagcwala iphunga lamafutha. 
43_12_4_Kepha uJuda Iskariyothe, omunye wabafundi bakhe obezakumkhaphela, wathi: 
43_12_5_“Yini ukuba lawa mafutha engathengiswanga ngawodenariyu abangamakhulu amathathu, kwaphiwa abampofu, na?” 
43_12_6_Washo lokho kungengokuba ekhathalele abampofu, kepha ngokuba eyisela, ephethe isikhwama, eba okufakwa kuso. 
43_12_7_Ngakho uJesu wathi: “Myeke ukuba awalondolozele usuku lokumbelwa kwami. 
43_12_8_Ngokuba abampofu ninabo njalo, kepha mina aninami njalo.” 
43_12_9_Ngakho isixuku esikhulu sabaJuda sezwa ukuthi ulapho. Beza-ke kungengenxa kaJesu kuphela, kepha nokuba babone uLazaru abemvusile kwabafileyo. 
43_12_10_Kepha abapristi abakhulu benza icebo lokuba babulale noLazaru, 
43_12_11_ngokuba ngenxa yakhe abaningi babaJuda bamuka bakholwa nguJesu. 
43_12_12_Ngangomuso abantu abaningi abafike emkhosini sebezwile ukuthi uJesu uyeza eJerusalema, 
43_12_13_bathatha amahlamvu esundu, baphuma ukumhlangabeza. Bamemeza bathi: “Hosiyana! Ubusisiwe ozayo egameni leNkosi, yebo, iNkosi ka-Israyeli.” 
43_12_14_UJesu esefumene imbongolo entsha wakhwela kuyo njengokulotshiwe ukuthi: 
43_12_15_“Ungesabi, ndodakazi yaseSiyoni; bheka, iNkosi yakho iza, ikhwele etholeni lembongolo.” 
43_12_16_Lokho abafundi bakhe abakuqondanga ekuqaleni; kodwa esekhazimulisiwe uJesu, base bekhumbula ukuthi kulotshiwe lokho ngaye nokuthi babekwenzile lokho kuye. 
43_12_17_Ngakho safakaza isixuku esasinaye, lapho ebiza uLazaru aphume ethuneni, emvusa kwabafileyo. 
43_12_18_Ngenxa yalokho isixuku saya samhlangabeza, ngokuba sase sizwile ukuthi wayesenzile leso sibonakaliso. 
43_12_19_Ngakho abaFarisi bakhuluma bodwa, bathi: “Niyabona ukuthi anisizi lutho; bheka, izwe lonke liyamlandela.” 
43_12_20_Kwakukhona amaGreki athile phakathi kwababenyuka ukuba bakhuleke emkhosini. 
43_12_21_Lawo-ke aya kuFiliphu waseBetsayida laseGalile, acela kuye, athi: “Nkosi, sithanda ukubona uJesu.” 
43_12_22_UFiliphu weza wamtshela u-Andreya. Weza u-Andreya noFiliphu, basho kuJesu. 
43_12_23_UJesu waphendula, wathi kubo: “Sesifikile isikhathi sokuba ikhazimuliswe iNdodana yomuntu. 
43_12_24_Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Uma inhlamvu kakolweni iwela emhlabathini ingafi, ihlala yodwa; kepha uma ifa, ithela izithelo eziningi. 
43_12_25_Lowo othanda ukuphila kwakhe ulahlekelwa yikho, nozonda ukuphila kwakhe kuleli zwe uyakukulondela ukuphila okuphakade. 
43_12_26_Uma umuntu engikhonza, akangilandele; nalapha ngikhona mina, soba khona nesikhonzi sami. Uma umuntu engikhonza, uBaba uyakumazisa lowo. 
43_12_27_“Kalokhu umphefumulo wami ulusizi, ngizakuthini na? Baba, ngisindise kulo mzuzu. Kodwa ngenxa yalokhu ngize kulo mzuzu. 
43_12_28_Baba, khazimulisa igama lakho.” Kwase kufika izwi livela ezulwini, lithi: “Ngilikhazimulisile, ngobuye ngilikhazimulise.” 
43_12_29_Ngakho abantu ababemi bezwa bathi: “Beliduma;” abanye bathi: “Ingelosi ikhulume kuye.” 
43_12_30_UJesu waphendula wathi: “Leli zwi alizanga ngenxa yami kepha ngenxa yenu. 
43_12_31_Kalokhu kungukwahlulelwa kwaleli zwe; kalokhu umbusi waleli zwe uzakuxoshwa. 
43_12_32_Mina, nxa ngiphakanyiswa emhlabeni, ngiyakubadonsela kimi bonke.” 
43_12_33_Lokho-ke wakusho efanekisa ukufa okumfanele afe ngakho. 
43_12_34_Ngakho isixuku samphendula sathi: “Sizwile emthethweni ukuthi uKristu uyakuma phakade; usho kanjani wena ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu imelwe ukuphakanyiswa na? Ingubani le Ndodana yomuntu na?” 
43_12_35_Wayesethi kubo uJesu: “Kuseyisikhashana ukukhanya kukhona kini. Hambani nise nokukhanya, ukuze ubumnyama bunganehleli. Ohamba ebumnyameni akazi ukuthi uya ngaphi. 
43_12_36_Nise nokukhanya kholwani ngukukhanya, ukuze nibe ngabantwana bokukhanya.” Washo lokho uJesu, wamuka, wasithela kubo. 
43_12_37_Kepha noma ebezenzile izibonakaliso ezingaka phambi kwabo, abakholwanga nguye 
43_12_38_ukuba izwi lika-Isaya umprofethi ligcwaliseke, alikhuluma lokuthi: “Nkosi, ngubani owakholwa ngukushumayela kwethu na? Ingalo yeNkosi yambulelwa bani na?” 
43_12_39_Ngalokho babengekholwe, ngokuba u-Isaya washo futhi ukuthi: 
43_12_40_“Uphuphuthekisile amehlo abo, wayenza lukhuni inhliziyo yabo, funa babone ngamehlo, baqonde ngenhliziyo, baphenduke, ngibaphulukise.” 
43_12_41_U-Isaya wakusho lokho, ngokuba ebona inkazimulo yakhe, ekhuluma ngaye. 
43_12_42_Nokho abaningi nasezikhulwini bakholwa nguye, kodwa ngenxa yabaFarisi abakuvumanga, funa bakhishwe esinagogeni; 
43_12_43_ngokuba babethanda udumo lwabantu kunodumo lukaNkulunkulu. 
43_12_44_Khona uJesu wamemeza wathi: “Okholwa yimi kakholwa yimi kepha ngongithumileyo. 
43_12_45_Obona mina ubona ongithumileyo. 
43_12_46_Ngize ezweni ngingukukhanya ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yimi angahlali ebumnyameni. 
43_12_47_“Uma umuntu ezwa amazwi ami engawalondi, lowo angimahluleli mina, ngokuba angizanga ukuba ngahlulele izwe, kepha ukuba ngisindise izwe. 
43_12_48_Ongalayo engawamukeli amazwi ami unomahlulelayo; izwi engalikhulumayo yilona eliyakumahlulela ngosuku lokugcina. 
43_12_49_Ngokuba mina angikhulumanga ngokwami, kodwa uBaba ongithumileyo nguye onginike umyalo wokuba ngizakuthini, ngikhulumeni. 
43_12_50_Ngiyazi ukuthi umyalo wakhe ungukuphila okuphakade. Ngakho-ke lokho engikukhulumayo ngikukhuluma njengalokho uBaba angitshela khona.” 
43_13_1_Kwathi ngaphambi komkhosi wePhasika uJesu azi ukuthi isikhathi sakhe sesifikile ukuba amuke kuleli zwe, aye kuYise, ebathandile abakhe abasezweni wabathanda kwaze kwaba sekupheleni. 
43_13_2_Sekudliwa, uSathane esekufake enhliziyweni kaJuda Iskariyothe kaSimoni ukuba amkhaphele, 
43_13_3_uJesu ekwazi ukuthi uYise unikele konke ezandleni zakhe nokuthi wavela kuNkulunkulu, futhi ubuyela kuNkulunkulu, 
43_13_4_wasuka ekudleni, wabeka izingubo zakhe, wathabatha indwangu, wakhwica. 
43_13_5_Emva kwalokho wathela amanzi emcengezini, waqala ukugeza izinyawo zabafundi, wazesula ngendwangu abekhwice ngayo. 
43_13_6_Wafika-ke kuSimoni Petru. Wathi kuye: “Nkosi, wena ugeza izinyawo zami na?” 
43_13_7_UJesu waphendula, wathi kuye: “Lokhu engikwenzayo awukwazi manje, kodwa uzakukuqonda emva kwalokhu.” 
43_13_8_UPetru wathi kuye: “Awusoze wageza izinyawo zami naphakade.” UJesu waphendula wathi: “Uma ngingakugezi, awunasabelo nami.” 
43_13_9_USimoni Petru wathi kuye: “Nkosi, akungabi yizinyawo zodwa kepha nezandla nekhanda.” 
43_13_10_UJesu wathi kuye: “Ogeziweyo kadingi lutho, kuphela ukugezwa izinyawo, kepha ugezekile wonke. Nina-ke nigezekile, kodwa angisho nonke.” 
43_13_11_Ngokuba emazi obezakumkhaphela kungalokho athi: “Anigezekile nonke.” 
43_13_12_Esegeze izinyawo zabo wathabatha izingubo zakhe, wabuye wahlala, wathi kubo: “Niyakwazi yini engikwenzile kini na? 
43_13_13_Ningibiza nithi: ‘Mfundisi, Nkosi;’ nisho kahle, ngokuba ngiyikho. 
43_13_14_Uma-ke mina, iNkosi noMfundisi, ngigeze izinyawo zenu, nani-ke nifanele ukugezana izinyawo. 
43_13_15_Ngokuba ngininikile isibonelo ukuba nenze nani njengokuba ngenzile kini. 
43_13_16_Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Inceku ayinkulu kunenkosi yayo, nothunyiweyo kamkhulu kunomthumileyo. 
43_13_17_Uma nazi lokho, nibusisiwe uma nikwenza. 
43_13_18_“Angikhulumi ngani nonke; ngiyabazi engibakhethileyo; kodwa nga kugcwaliseka umbhalo othi: “ ‘Odla isinkwa sami ungiphakamisele isithende sakhe.’ 
43_13_19_“Kusukela manje ngiyanitshela kungakenzeki ukuba, nxa sekwenzeka, nikholwe ukuthi nginguye. 
43_13_20_Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Owamukela engimthumayo wamukela mina; ongamukelayo mina wamukela ongithumileyo.” 
43_13_21_UJesu eseshilo lokho wakhathazeka emoyeni, wafakaza wathi: “Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Omunye wenu uyakungikhaphela.” 
43_13_22_Abafundi babhekana bengabaza ukuthi ukhuluma ngobani. 
43_13_23_Kwakuhlezi ekudleni omunye wabafundi bakhe uJesu amthandayo, encike esifubeni sikaJesu. 
43_13_24_USimoni Petru wayesemqhweba ethi: “Yisho ukuthi ubekhuluma ngobani na?” 
43_13_25_Yena encike esifubeni sikaJesu wathi kuye: “Nkosi, ngubani na?” 
43_13_26_Ngakho waphendula uJesu, wathi: “Yilowo engiyakumcwilisela ucezu, ngimnike lona.” Eselucwilisile-ke ucezu, walunika uJuda Iskariyothe. 
43_13_27_Emva kocezu uSathane wayesengena kuye. Wayesethi kuye uJesu: “Okwenzayo kwenze masinyane.” 
43_13_28_Kepha akabakho kwababehlezi ekudleni owayekwazi lokho ukuthi ukusho ngani kuye. 
43_13_29_Kepha abanye bacabanga ukuthi, ngokuba uJuda ephethe isikhwama, uJesu uthi kuye: “Thenga esikuswele emkhosini,” noma ukuthi kabele abampofu okuthile. 
43_13_30_Kuthe eseluthathile ucezu waphuma masinyane; kwakuse busuku. 
43_13_31_Ngakho esephumile, uJesu wathi: “Kalokhu iNdodana yomuntu ikhazimulisiwe, noNkulunkulu ukhazimulisiwe kuyo. 
43_13_32_Uma uNkulunkulu ekhazimulisiwe kuyo, noNkulunkulu uyakuyikhazimulisa kuye, uyakuyikhazimulisa masinyane. 
43_13_33_“Bantwanyana, ngise khona nani isikhashana. Niyakungifuna, nanjengalokho ngasho kubaJuda ukuthi lapho ngiya khona ningeze nina, ngisho nakinina manje. 
43_13_34_“Ngininika umyalo omusha wokuba nithandane; njengalokhu nginithandile, nani nithandane. 
43_13_35_Ngalokho bonke bayakukwazi ukuthi ningabafundi bami, uma nithandana.” 
43_13_36_USimoni Petru wathi kuye: “Nkosi, uya ngaphi na?” UJesu waphendula wathi: “Lapho ngiya khona, ungengilandele kalokhu; kepha uyakungilandela kamuva.” 
43_13_37_Wathi kuye uPetru: “Nkosi, ngingekulandele kalokhu ngani na? Ngizakudela ukuphila kwami ngenxa yakho.” 
43_13_38_UJesu waphendula wathi: “Uzakudela ukuphila kwakho ngenxa yami na? Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe: Iqhude alizukukhala, ungakangiphiki kathathu.” 
43_14_1_“Inhliziyo yenu mayingakhathazeki. Kholwani nguNkulunkulu, nikholwe nayimi. 
43_14_2_Ekhaya likaBaba kukhona izindlu eziningi; uma bekungenjalo, bengiyakunitshela ukuthi ngiya ukunilungisela indawo. 
43_14_3_Nanxa ngiya nginilungisela indawo, ngobuye ngize, nginibuyisele kimi ukuba lapho ngikhona nibe khona nani. 
43_14_4_Nalapho ngiya khona niyayazi indlela.” 
43_14_5_UTomase wathi kuye: “Nkosi, asazi lapho uya khona; siyazi kanjani indlela na?” 
43_14_6_UJesu wathi kuye: “Mina ngiyindlela, neqiniso, nokuphila; akakho oza kuBaba ngaphandle kwami. 
43_14_7_Uma beningazi mina, beniyakumazi noBaba; kusukela manje niyamazi, nimbonile.” 
43_14_8_UFiliphu wathi kuye: “Nkosi, sikhombise uYihlo, kusanele.” 
43_14_9_UJesu wathi kuye: “Isikhathi esingaka nginani, awukangazi, Filiphu, na? Ongibonile mina ubonile uBaba; usho kanjani ukuthi: ‘Sikhombise uYihlo,’ na? 
43_14_10_Awukholwa ukuthi ngikuBaba, noBaba ukimi, na? Amazwi engiwakhulumayo mina kini angiwakhulumi ngokwami; kepha uBaba ohlezi kimi wenza imisebenzi yakhe. 
43_14_11_Kholwani yimi ukuthi ngikuBaba, noBaba ukimi; uma kungenjalo, kholwani ngenxa yale misebenzi. 
43_14_12_Ngiqinisile, ngiqinisile ngithi kini: Okholwa yimi, imisebenzi engiyenzayo mina naye uyakuyenza, nemikhulu kunale uyakuyenza; ngokuba mina ngiya kuBaba. 
43_14_13_Noma yini eniyakukucela egameni lami ngiyakukwenza ukuba uBaba akhazimuliswe eNdodaneni. 
43_14_14_Uma nicela utho kimi egameni lami, ngolwenza. 
43_14_15_“Uma ningithanda, niyakugcina imiyalo yami. 
43_14_16_Ngiyakucela kuBaba aniphe omunye uMduduzi wokuba ahlale kini phakade, 
43_14_17_uMoya weqiniso, izwe elingemamukele, ngokuba lingamboni, lingamazi; nina niyamazi yena, ngokuba uhlala nani, uyakuba kini. 
43_14_18_Angiyikunishiya niyizintandane; ngiyeza kini. 
43_14_19_Kuseyisikhashana izwe lingasangiboni, kepha niyangibona nina, ngokuba ngiphila mina, nani nizakuphila. 
43_14_20_Ngalolo suku niyakukwazi nina ukuba ngikuBaba, nani nikimi, nami ngikini. 
43_14_21_Onemiyalo yami ayigcine, nguyena ongithandayo; ongithandayo uyakuthandwa nguBaba, nami ngiyakumthanda, ngizibonakalise kuye.” 
43_14_22_UJuda, ongesiye u-Iskariyothe, wathi kuye: “Nkosi, kwenziwa yini ukuba uyakuzibonakalisa kithina, ungazibonakalisi kulo izwe, na?” 
43_14_23_UJesu waphendula, wathi kuye: “Uma umuntu engithanda, uyakugcina izwi lami; uBaba uyakumthanda; siyakuza kuye, sihlale naye. 
43_14_24_Ongangithandiyo kagcini amazwi ami, nezwi enilizwayo akusilo elami kepha ngelikaBaba ongithumileyo. 
43_14_25_“Ngikhulume lokho kini ngisahlezi nani. 
43_14_26_Kepha uMduduzi, uMoya oNgcwele, uBaba ayakumthumela egameni lami uyakunifundisa konke, anikhumbuze konke enginitshele khona. 
43_14_27_Ukuthula ngikushiya kinina, ukuthula kwami nginipha khona. Akunjengokupha kwezwe ukunipha kwami. Inhliziyo yenu mayingakhathazeki, ingesabi. 
43_14_28_“Nizwile ukuthi nganitshela ngathi: Ngiyamuka, kepha ngiyabuyela kini. Uma beningithanda, beniyakujabula, ngokuba ngiya kuBaba, lokhu uBaba mkhulu kunami. 
43_14_29_Manje senginitshelile kungakenzeki, ukuze nikholwe, nxa sekwenzekile. 
43_14_30_Angisayikukhuluma okuningi nani, ngokuba uyeza umbusi wezwe, kepha akanalutho kimi, 
43_14_31_kodwa kungukuba izwe lazi ukuthi ngiyamthanda uBaba nokuthi ngenza njengokuba uBaba engiyalile. “Sukumani simuke lapha. 
43_15_1_“Mina ngingumvini owonawona, uBaba ungumlimi. 
43_15_2_Yilelo nalelo gatsha elikimi, elingatheli izithelo, uyalisusa. Yilelo nalelo elithela izithelo uyalihlunga ukuba lithele kakhulu. 
43_15_3_Nina senihlanzekile ngezwi engilikhulume kinina. 
43_15_4_Hlalani kimi, nami kini. Njengalokhu igatsha lingethele izithelo ngokwalo, kuphela uma lihlala emvinini, kunjalo nani, kuphela uma nihlala kimi. 
43_15_5_“Mina ngingumvini, nina ningamagatsha; ohlala kimi, nami kuye, lowo uthela izithelo eziningi; ngokuba ngaphandle kwami ningenze lutho. 
43_15_6_Uma umuntu engahlali kimi, ulahlwa ngaphandle njengegatsha, abune; bawabuthe, bawaphonse emlilweni, ashe. 
43_15_7_Uma nihlala kimi, namazwi ami ehlala kini, niyakucela enikuthandayo, nikwenzelwe. 
43_15_8_UBaba uyakhazimuliswa ngalokhu ukuba nithele izithelo eziningi, nibe ngabafundi bami. 
43_15_9_“Njengalokho uBaba engithandile, nami nginithandile; hlalani othandweni lwami. 
43_15_10_Uma nigcina imiyalo yami, niyakuhlala othandweni lwami, njengalokho mina ngigcinile imiyalo kaBaba ngihlala othandweni lwakhe. 
43_15_11_Nginitshelile lokho ukuba ukuthokoza kwami kube kini, nokuthokoza kwenu kugcwale. 
43_15_12_“Yilo umyalo wami wokuba nithandane, njengalokho nginithandile.
